40001001	Annaya sey listaan dasey dakdakor Jesu Cristu ey ganak David ey ginanakan Abraham.
40001002	Ummanak pun da Abraham ey an-asawa an Sarah, inyanakda as Isaac. At ummanak pun vus da Isaac, as Jacob ey sin-anak anda Judah ey mansusunud.
40001003	As Judah anna, jinor-agna as Tamar ey manugangna at inyanakda da Perez an Zerah. At as Perez, inyanakda as Hezron ey aman Ram.
40001004	At da Ram avus, inyanakda as Amminadab ey aman Nason ey aman Salmon.
40001005	At da Salmon ey an-asawa an Rahab, inyanakda as Boaz ey nangasawa an Ruth ey sin-anak an Obed ey aman Jesse.
40001006	At as Jesse anna, siya sey aman Ari David. At as Ari David, inasawana sey sigud ey asawan Uriah, at inyanakda as Solomon.
40001007	At ummanak pun da Solomon, inyanakda as Rehoboam ey sin-anak an Asa.
40001008	At da Asa vus, inyanakda as Jesosafat ey aman Jehoram ey aman Uzzias.
40001009	At da Uzzias, inyanakda as Jotam ey aman Ahas ey aman Hezekias.
40001010	At da Hezekias vus, inyanakda as Manasses ey aman Amon ey aman Josias.
40001011	At da Josias vus, inyanakda as Jehoiachin ya dasey susunudna assey timpu ey nipapilit dasey iyIsrael ey niyuy ad Babylon.
40001012	At nanipud assey niyuyanda ad Babylon, annaya vus sey turuy sey kaurakan dasey dakdakor Jesus. At ummanak pun da Jehoiachin, inyanakda as Shealtiel ey aman Jerubbabel.
40001013	Ummanak pun da Zerubbabel, at as Abiud ey aman Eliakim, ummanak pun vus da Eliakim, at as Azor
40001014	ey aman Zadok. Ummanak vus da Zadok, at as Akim ey aman Eliud.
40001015	Ummanak vus da Eliud, at as Eleazar ey aman Matthan. Ummanak vus da Matthan at as Jacob
40001016	ey aman Joseph. At as Joseph, siya sey asawan Mary ey inan Jesus ey naawagan as Cristu.
40001017	At mallugi an Abraham inggana an Ari David, nasawaran as opat ey ginanakan ya mallugi vus an Ari David inggana assey nipapilitanda ey niyuy ad Babylon, nasawaran vus as opat ey ginanakan. At mallugi vus assey timpu saji ey niyuyanda ad Babylon inggana assey niyanakan sey kananda ey Cristu, nasawaran vus as opat ey ginanakan.
40001018	Annaya sey nakopyaan sey niyanakan Jesu Cristu. As inana ey Mary, niturag ey miyasawa an Joseph, kon assey daandapun man-asow-an, naagammuwan Mary ey natikdan siya gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
40001019	As Joseph ey katuragna, pasig ey niyun-un sey koona assey asintataguna at sumanga ey mangwa assey miviinan mary. At simsimmokna sey ajin sey turagda maturuyan an Mary ey niippun angigammu as tagu.
40001020	Assey anna ey sommosommokona nauy, nampiila sey enjel Apudyus an siya assey in-inopna at kanana, “Sika Joseph ey ganak David, ajika madanagan ey mangasawa an mary. Tey sey vugina at gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
40001021	Iyanakna sey usa ey laraki ya ngadananyu as Jesus tey sarakana dasey tagu asda amin ey basurda.”
40001022	At nakwa amin da nauy ta tumuttuwa sey imbagan Apudyus asda profet ey kanana,
40001023	“Mavugi sey usa ey babarasang ey niippun nanordor-ag ya iyanakna sey usa ey laraki ey mangadnan as Immanuel” ey sey piuna ugujun, “Awad as Apudyus an jitaku.”
40001024	At vummangun pun as Joseph, tinongparna sey imbagan sey enjel saji at inturuyna inasawa as Mary.
40001025	Kon ajina pun jinordor-ag inggana as niyanak sey laraki. At nginadnan Joseph as Jesus.
40002001	As Jesus at niyanak assey vubruy ad Bethlehem ey sakup sey provinsiyan sey Judea assey timpun sey nan-ariyan Herod. Assey timpu saji, inggow dasey narpu assey angkapon assey jumunglitan init ey angkariing ey jummatong ad Jerusalem ey nangimmatun assey nakopyaan dasey vituwun.
40002002	At kananda ey nangimus, “Gonaʼsna sey utting ey niyanak ey ambalin as arin da Jews? Tey innilani sey lummuswa ey vituwun assey angkapon assey jumunglitan init ey siyaji sey sinyar sey niyanakana, at siya ummaliyanni ta ingkani andayow an siya.”
40002003	Jingngor pun ari Herod nauy, nakalivussu sey somsomokna ya kama vus dasey tagu ey inggow ad Jerusalem.
40002004	Kingwana pun, jinagupna dasey nangangatu ey papaji ya dasey mimisturun sey lintog at inimusna an jida nu gona sey miyanakan sey kananda ey Cristu.
40002005	At imbagada an siya ey kananda, “Assey vubruy ey Bethlehem ad Judea, tey siya sey impakur-it Apudyus asda profet ey kanana,
40002006	‘Dakayu ey iBethlehem assey sakup sey lutan Judah, ambalin sey vubruyyu as mavivigvig ey vubruy assey amin ey sakup sey Judah, tey dakayu sey marpuwan sey ambalin as Apu ey mangimpangat ya amuut asda taguk ey iyIsrael.’”
40002007	At impaayag Herod dasey mangili ey narpu assey angkapon assey jumunglitan init ta kabagbagana jida ey niippun ujum as angigammu. At naagammuwana an jida sey ustu ey uras ey nampiil-an sey vituwun.
40002008	At pinalibbatna jida ey ummuy ad Bethlehem ey kanana ey namilin an jida, “Ingkayu ya ammaanyu anapun sey utting sana ya nu udasanyu ey, ampuuli kayu ta ipaagammuyu an sa'un ta inyak pey mandayow an siya.”
40002009	At lummibbatda pun, amud sey layadda tey innilada vus kasin sey vituwun saji ey innilada assey damu ey lummuswa assey angkapon assey jumunglitan init ey amangngupangngu assey daran ey ayunda inggana as nibatug assey iggawan sey utting.
40002011	Inumdasda pun, summakeyda assey vuruy ey iggawan sey utting. Innilada pun siya an inana ey Mary, nallikkadangda ey nandayow an siya. At intokwarda dasey intakinda ey vurawan, frankinsens ya mira at innatjunda an siya.
40002012	Oni pun, vinilin Apudyus jida assey in-inop ey ajida ampuuli an Herod. At nampuulida assey ilida ey nanguy assey sabali ey daran.
40002013	Ummayow pun dasey mangili saji, nampiila sey enjel sey Apu an Joseph assey in-inopna ey kanana, “Vumangunka ta italleym da an-ina anna ta allibas kayu ey umuy ad Egypt tey panggop Herod ey anapun sey utting anna ta ipagngatna. Inggow kayuʼsji inggana as ibagak ey ampuuli kayu.”
40002014	Vummangun ey dagus as Joseph at insarwapna da an-ina ey ummuy ad Egypt.
40002015	At iniinggowda as jiyuy ingganaʼs natuy as Herod. Nakwa nauy ta tumuttuwa sey imvilin sey Apu as dasey profet ey kanana, “Inayagak sey anakku ta lumayowda ad Egypt.”
40002016	Inagammun pun Herod ey nallipat dasey nangkariing ey mangili, amud sey sangana. At vinilinna dasey surdajuna ta gongatunda dasey amin ey ka'iyanak ey laraki ad Bethlehem ey antawun as juwa ya nasuruk ya urey asda vubvubruy ey adani ad Bethlehem. Kingwana nauy ey imbasarna assey timpu ey lummuswaan sey vituwun ey jingngorna asda mangili.
40002017	Assey nakwa sana, siya sey tummuttuwaan sey imvilin Apudyus an profet Jeremiah ey kanana,
40002018	“Mamadngor sey amud ey tagimbaru ad Ramah tey iviivilan Rachel dasey anakna at aji pun maa'aruk.”
40002019	Natuy pun as Herod, nampiila sey usa ey enjel sey Apu an Joseph ad Egypt assey in-inop
40002020	ey kanana, “Vumangunka ta ipuulim da an-ina anna ad Israel tey nangkakatuy ogon dasey ampanggop ey mangngat assey anak anna.”
40002021	Vummangun pun as Joseph, tinongparna sey imbagan sey enjel saji at nampuulida ad Israel.
40002022	Kon jingngor pun Joseph ey nipasani as Archelaus an amana ey Herod ey nan-ari ad Judea, ummugyat ey umuy as jiyuy. At gapu ta inggow da ujum ey nibaga an siya assey in-inopna, ingkaponda ey ummuy assey provinsiya ad Galili.
40002023	Jummatongda pun as jiyuy, vinumruyda assey vubruy ad Nazareth. At sey nakwa sana, siya sey tummuttuwaan sey imbagan Apudyus as dasey profet ey kanana, “Miivilang siya as iNazareth.”
40003001	Assey timpu saji ey inggawan da Jesus ad Nazareth, inggow as Amvuvunyag ey John ey ummuy assey danak ad Judea at insaradna ey mantudtuju,
40003002	kanana, “Man-awidanyu dasey basuryu tey tigangey sey manturayan Apudyus.”
40003003	As John anna, siya sey piun profet Isaiah ugujun assey kanana, “Awad assey danak sey usa ey tagu ey apporow angipkow ey kanana, ‘Ambaruwunyu sey ayun sey Apu ta nadarus as ayuna nu umali!’”
40003004	Sey lumvun Amvuvunyag ey John, at nakwa ey naara assey jutjut sey kemel ya sey sinturunna, gaddang ya sey ikataguna, jujun ya jilu.
40003005	At dasey tagu ey inggow ad Jerusalem ya da amin ey ummili assey provinsiyan sey Judea ya da vinumruy asda nanjijinnumang assey dawwang ad Jordan at ummuyda an siya
40003006	at impudnuda dasey basurda asin at John jida vunyagan assey dawwang ad Jordan.
40003007	Kon innilan pun John dasey ansarum ey Farisis anda Sajusis ey umuy ampavunyag an siya, kanana an jida, “Dakayu ey angkasilib ey kamaʼs tabbad! Ngan sey nangimbaga ey malisiyanyu sey manusaan Apudyus an dakayu nu ampavunyag kayu?
40003008	Aji pun mabalin, tey masapur ipiilayu assey nakopyaanyu ey tuttuwa ey nan-awidanyu dasey basuryu.
40003009	Ya ajiyu maggey kanan ey malisiyanyu sey majusaanyu gapu ta ganak dakayu an Abraham. Tey assey katuttuwaan, mabalin Apudyus ey ambalinun dasey batu anna as ganak Abraham!
40003010	At sey mipaniyan sey manusaan Apudyus an dakayu, kama as indada'anna sey putow ey mangabba asda kayu ey aji pun mamunga as ambaru ta mitungu assey apuy.”
40003011	At inturuy John ey kanana, “Danum sey usaruk ey mamunyag an dakayu as angimpiila ey nan-awidanyu dasey basuryu, kon awad sey mipasani an sa'un ey nangatu sey pannakabalinna tey urey nu as gagara ey ambalinak as kababaan ey alipanna, ajiyak pun pey dallu miivilang ey allabtin assey sapatusna. At nu umali, vunyagana dakayu assey Ispiritun Apudyus ya apuy.
40003012	At pasiguna dasey ambaru ey tagu ya dasey lawingan ey isuna assey mantopa ey ipasigna dasey nabgasan ya dasey kipow. At dasey nabgasan, itarpunna assey arangna, kon dasey kipow, iballuna assey apuy ey gumilgillajung as ing-inggana.”
40003013	Assey timpu saji ey amvunvunyagan John, jummatong as Jesus ey narpu ad Galili at ummuy an John assey dawwang ad Jordan ta ampavunyag.
40003014	Kon kanan John an siya, “Sika sey lobbongna ey amunyag an sa'un. Ngey paka vus umali an sa'un ey ampavunyag?”
40003015	Kon kanan Jesus an siya, “Aji bali, niippun karwingna tey sey koon taku anna, siyana sey mangwaan taku assey amin ey piun Apudyus ipakwa.” At iyyavun John.
40003016	Navunyagan pun gey as Jesus ey tummakwar assey danum, nabkatan ad langit at innilana sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey lumagulagud ey anungna karapati at inumpa an siya.
40003017	At kanan sey ginga ey narpu ad langit, “Siyana sey pipiuk ey anakku ey mangimpalaylayad ikow an sa'un.”
40004001	Assey timpu saji, inturung sey Ispiritun Apudyus as Jesus ey umuy assey danak ta sulisugun Jimunyu.
40004002	Ininggow as Jesus as jiyuy as opatpuru ey ag-agow ya lavi ey aji pun nangnangan at amud sey inuratna.
40004003	Ummuy as Jimunyu an siya at kanana, “Nu tuttuwa ey sika sey Anak Apudyus, iyumugnu dasey batu anna ta ambalindaʼs makan.”
40004004	Kon sinongbatan Jesus ey kanana, “Sey kanan sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, ‘Dakumpun as makan anggey sey ikatagun sey tagu, tey masapurda vus sey amin ey ibagan Apudyus.’”
40004005	Oni pun impuyut Jimunyu as Jesus ad Jerusalem assey kataknangan ey vuvung sey Tempel,
40004006	at kanana an siya, “Nu tuttuwa ey Anak sika an Apudyus, lumayugka tey kanan sey nikur-it ey Gingana, ‘Vilinun Apudyus da enjelna ey mamuut ya manapaya an sika ta aji mavigadan sey sikim assey batu.’”
40004007	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Kon kanan vus sey Gingan Apudyus, ‘Ajiyu padpadasun as Apudyus ey Apuyu.’”
40004008	Naas punji, impuyut Jimunyu as Jesus assey kataknangan ey vilig at impiilana sey amin ey nantokotokon ey ili assey luvung ya da amin ey vinaruda ey iturturayan dasey aari.
40004009	At kanan Jimunyu an Jesus, “Atjuk amin da nauy an sika nu allikkadangka ey mandayow an sa'un.”
40004010	Kon summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Ingkan Satanas! Tey sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, kanana, ‘Niippun ujum as mandayawanyu ya manserviyanyu nu aji anggey as Apudyus ey Apuyu!’”
40004011	Ummayow as Jimunyu at jummatong dasey enjel ey nanurung an Jesus.
40004012	Jingngor pun Jesus ey impadokman ari Herod as John, nampuuli ad Galili.
40004013	Jummatong pun ad Nazareth ey sakup sey Galili, ininggowʼsji as sin-akitan. Oni pun, ummuy ad Capernaum ey usa ey vubruy ey adani assey igid sey beybey ad Galili ey sakup sey lutan da Zebulun an Naptali. At as jiyuy sey iniiggawana.
40004014	Nakwa nauy ta tumuttuwa sey imbagan profet Isaiah ey kanana,
40004015	“Maturungan da tagu ad Zebulun ya ad Naptali ey awad assey viik sey dawwang ad Jordan ey adani assey igid sey beybey ad Galili ey kananda ey vubruy dasey Gentil.
40004016	Dasey tagu ey iniinggow siji anungda dasey awad assey gikbot tey lawingan sey awad assey somsomokda at sissiyada ey nisisina an Apudyus. Kon ambaru assey sana tey nasilawan sey somsomokda tey jummatong sey andogot ey silow an jida.”
40004017	Manipud assey timpu saji, insarad Jesus ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag ey kanana, “Man-awidanyu dasey basuryu tey jummatong ogon sey Manturayan Apudyus!”
40004018	Anaradaran pun as Jesus assey igid sey beybey ad Galili, innilana dasey juwa ey mansunud ey manavukur, da Simon ey nangadnan as Peter ya as Andrew ey sunudna.
40004019	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Umali kayu ta ambalin kayu as pasurutku ya itudtujuk sey koonyu ey mangawis asda tagu ey mamati an sa'un.”
40004020	At tineynanda ey dagus sey tavukurda at ummunudda an siya.
40004021	Inturuyda ey nanaran at innilan vus Jesus da juwa ey mansunud ey da James an John ey anak Zebedee. Nalluluganda assey bangka ey man-aama ey isaganada sey tavukurda at inayagan vus Jesus jida.
40004022	At tineynanda ey dagus sey bangka ya as amada at ummunudda an Jesus.
40004023	Namin Jesus ginaggakey dasey vubruy ad Galili ey nantudtuju asda sinagog ya nangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop assey Manturayan Apudyus. Ya nan-agas asda amin ey karasin sey sakit ey giknaun da tagu.
40004024	At nanjinamag as Jesus assey amin ey vubruy ad Syria. At inniyuyda an siya dasey awad sakitna ya da amin ey matongtong-ag ey kama asda nalun-ugan as jimunyu, da kordas anda naparalais at inagasana jida.
40004025	At amud ey tagu sey ummunud an siya ey narpu ad Galili ya da narpu assey kananda ey Simpuru ey Vubruy, asi at dasey narpu ad Jerusalem ya da ujum ey vubruy ad Judea ya da amin ey vinumruy assey viik sey dawwang ad Jordan.
40005001	Innilan pun Jesus da amud ey tagu ey ummunud an siya, nanagada ey ummuy assey tagudtud, asina at itukju. Nadagup pun dasey pasurutna,
40005002	insaradna ey mantudtuju an jida, kanana,
40005003	“Nagasat sey tagu ey mamigvig ey as Apudyus anggey sey anjinuwana ey tumurung an siya tey nijujugga assey tureyna.
40005004	“Nagasat sey tagu ey manomdom assey sana tey liwliwaun Apudyus siya.
40005005	“Nagasat sey tagu ey mangimbaba assey long-agna tey tawijuna sey luta anna ey atjun Apudyus an siya.
40005006	“Nagasat sey tagu ey amud sey layadna ey mangwa assey piun Apudyus tey atjun Apudyus sey ming-opana.
40005007	“Nagasat sey tagu ey kumadagu tey kadaguwan Apudyus siya.
40005008	“Nagasat sey tagu ey paanggayuna ey aanmok assey piun Apudyus tey maagammuwana ey ustu as Apudyus.
40005009	“Nagasat sey tagu ey mangwa assey vumaruwan da ujum as ajida pun amvivinnusuran tey ivilang Apudyus siya as anakna.
40005010	“Nagasat sey tagu ey matongtong-ag gapu assey angintatakjugana assey piun Apudyus tey nijujugga siya assey tureyna.
40005011	“Nagasat kayu nu insurtuwun dakayu asda tagu ya tongtong-agun dakayu ya ibagada pey lawa dasey barangna ey lawingan ey niippun katuttuwaana gapu an sa'un.
40005012	Amud atyén sey allaylaydanyu tey awad sey dokor ey gun-guna ey atjun Apudyus an dakayu ad langit. Tey kanaʼsna vus sey tongtong-ag dasey profet assey kar-argow.”
40005013	“Dakayu ey mamati an sa'un, awad sey kausaranyu asda tagu assey luta anna ey kama assey kausaran sey asin assey makan. Kon nu makaan sey simsim sey asin, aji pun mabalin ey mipuuli sey piyana. At gapu ta niippun servina, miballu pey lawa ey gusdagusdan da tagu.
40005014	“Ya dakayu vus sey kamaʼs silow ey manilow assey somsomok da tagu. At sey mipaniyana, kama kayu as usa ey vubruy assey tagudtud ey aji pun as mitaru.
40005015	Ya niippun vus tagu as angintug assey silow ya nila'ubana assey damus, nu aji intugna ya impatangna ta masilawan sey amin ey awad ad darum assey vuruy.
40005016	Kanaʼsji atyén vus sey sumilawanyu assey sinagung da tagu, tey nu ilanda sey ambaru ey kookoonyu, idayowda as Ama taku ey Apudyus ad langit.”
40005017	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Toroyu pey kanan ey siya ummaliyak assey luta anna ta waswasuk sey lintog Moses ya dasey tudtujun dasey profet. Sey ummaliyak, at inyak tongparun dasey amin ey nibaga.
40005018	Ibabaggak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey aji pun purus ambaliw sey lintog Apudyus. Tey urey nu muumas sey luta anna ya sey langit, aji pun maggey matarak sey urey kaban-itan ey lintog inggana as mamin da nauy matongpar.
40005019	Ngan man sey tagu ey mangiwwalin assey kalangpawan as dasey vilin Apudyus ya intudtujuna asda ujum ta siya vus sey unujunda, siya sey kababaan assey Turey Apudyus. Kon sey tagu ey manongpar assey lintog ya itudtujuna asda ujum ta siya vus sey unujunda, nangatu assey Turey Apudyus.
40005020	At ey sana, ibagak an dakayu ey aji kayu pun mabalin ey mijuga assey Tureyʼn Apudyus nu aji kayu as sinjumallu ey niyun-un nu dasey Farisis ya dasey mimisturun sey lintog.”
40005021	“Jingngoryu dasey nibaga asda dakdakor taku assey kar-argow ey kanana, ‘Ajika gumngat, tey ngan ey sey gumngat, muuwis ey majusa.’
40005022	Kon ey sana ibagak an dakayu ey sey tagu ey pumtuk assey vurunna, muuwis ey majusa. Sey tagu vus ey mangamsiw assey vurunna at miidarum assey kangatuwan ey korti. Ya nu iviviinnu vus sey vurunnu, awadka assey daran ey anturung assey apuy ad inférnu.
40005023	At nu awad ingka idatun an Apudyus assey Tempél ya ingkagasmoknu ey awad guran sey vurunnu an sika,
40005024	teynam yén sey datunnu ta ingka yén mikabagbaga assey vurunnu ta ampinnakawan kayu asika at ampuuli ey mangatud assey datunnu an Apudyus.
40005025	“Nu awad mangindarum an dakayu, ingkayu yén mikaaliglu an siya ta nu awad kabalinana, aji kayu mipasangu assey uwis. Tey nu luus kayu ey nipasangu assey uwis, ipurangna dakayu asda pulis ya mipisuk kayu assey baballudan.
40005026	At ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey as jiyuy sey iiggawanyu inggana as mabayadanyu sey amin ey mortayu.”
40005027	“Jingngoryu vus ey nibaga asda dakdakor taku assey maliyam ey kanana, ‘Ajika mikadagdagas.’
40005028	Kon assey sana, annaya sey ibagak an dakayu; ngan ey sey mangitollong assey vubai ya kanana assey somsomokna, ‘Atééy nait atyén a.’ At nu siyaji sey awad assey somsomokna, nakabasur tey naasna jinagdagas assey somsomokna.
40005029	At nu sey atam sey lapun sey makabasuram, ukitum ta iballum. Tey un-unina ey makaan sey usa ey partin sey long-agnu, nu sey miballuka assey apuy ad inférnu ey navuvukkar.
40005030	Ya nu sey padawanan ey imam vus sey lapun sey makabasuram, putjum ta iballum. Tey un-unina ey pukurka, nu sey miballuka assey apuy ad inférnu ey navuvukkar.”
40005031	“Nitudtuju vus an dakayu ey nu awad laraki as mangidang assey asawana, masapur ey mangatud as kasuratan as mangigammuwan ey inidangana siya.
40005032	Kon ey sana, ibagak an dakayu ey makabasur sey laraki ey mangidang assey asawana maraksig nu nikadagdagas sey vubai saji. Nakabasur siya tey ipasuvuna sey vubai saji ey mikadagdagas nu mangasawa kasin. Ya nakabasur vus sey laraki ey mangasawa assey vubai ey naidangan.”
40005033	“Jingngoryu avus sey nitudtuju asda dakdakor taku assey maliyam ey masapur tongparum nu ngan sey insapatam an Apudyus, ajim maggey man-awidan.
40005034	Kon ey sana, ibagak an dakayu ey aji kayu mansapsapata. Ajiyu isapata ad langit, tey siya sey tummutukjuwan Apudyus ey manturey.
40005035	Ya ajiyu vus mansapataan sey luta, tey siya sey ginugusdan sey sikina, unnu ajiyu isagung ad Jerusalem ey mansapata tey siya sey ilin Apudyus ey kangatuwan ey Ari.
40005036	Ya ajiyu vus isapata sey uruyu tey ajiyu pun kaviilan ey angimpaputak unnu angimpangitit as urey sa'an ey vuukyu.
40005037	At sey anggey as koonyu, kananyu ey ‘Oon,’ nu tuttuwa, ‘Aji pun,’ nu aji, ajiyu jug-an as sapata. Tey nu awad ijugjugayu as sapata, narpuji an Jimunyu.”
40005038	“Jingngoryu avus sey nitudtuju ey kanana, ‘Nu awad tagu as mangwa as mabvullokan sey atan sey asintataguna, masapur ey mabvullok vus sey atana. Ya nu awad vus tagu as mangwa as masuktuban sey vub-an sey asintataguna, masapur ey masuktu vus sey vub-ana.’
40005039	Kon ibagak an dakayu, aji kayu vumarus assey mangwaʼs lawing an dakayu. Annaya sey koonyu: Nu awad amitnag assey padawanan ey apingnu, itayam vus sey viik ta vitnaguna.
40005040	At nu awad mangindarum an sika ta arana sey lumvunnu, amorna ta ijugana aran sey gotapna.
40005041	At nu awad vus mangimpapilit an sika ey ampavukud assey vukudna assey usa ey kilameter, idarannu pey dallu inggana assey mikagwa ey kilameter.
40005042	Ya nu awad kudawunda an sika, atjum ya nu awad vus piunda ey vurujun an sika, ipavurudnu.”
40005043	“Jingngoryu vus sey nitudtuju assey kar-argow ey kanana, ‘Piunyu dasey vub-urunyu ya vusurunyu dasey kavusuryu.’
40005044	Kon assey sana, anna sey ibagak an dakayu. Piunyu dasey kavusuryu ya iluwaruwanyu dasey angapporoan an dakayu.
40005045	At nu kanaʼsji sey koonyu, maagammuwan ey dakayu sey aanak Apudyus ey Ama taku ad langit. Tey as Apudyus imparuvusna sey init ey initana da amin ey tagu, lawing man unnu ambaru. Ya kama vus assey udan ey atjuna as kasapuran da amin ey tagu, urey dasey angwaʼs lawingan ya da angwaʼs ambaru.
40005046	Tey nu siya anggey piunyu dasey maryad an dakayu, ey gun-gunaan pun lawa Apudyus dakayu? Tey urey vus dasey mandadagup as vuur ey lawing ey tagu at pipiunda vus dasey maryad an jida.
40005047	At nu siya anggey kabagbagayu dasey vub-urunyu, ey awad pun lawa nitoknanyu asda aji pun mamati? Tey urey jida at kanaʼsji vus sey koonda.
40005048	Masapur ey iyun-unyu sey koonyu ey niippun atyén ampatinggaana ey kama an Apudyus ey Ama taku ad langit ey niippun angkurangana.”
40006001	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ilanyu ta dakumpun as siya mangwaanyu assey ambaru ta ilan da tagu ta midayow kayu. Tey nu siyana sey koonyu, niippun atjun Apudyus ey Ama taku ad langit as gun-gunayu.
40006002	“At nu awad iturungyu asda lumawa, ajiyu ipippiila ya iwarawag ey anungna sey koko'on dasey aginsosomkan assey sinagog anda karsa ta ilan da tagu ta idayowda kanu pey jida. Ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa, naasda naara sey gun-gunada.
40006003	At nu awad iturungyu asda lumawa, ilanyu ta urey sey kaadaniyan ey vub-urunyu at ajina pun maagammuwan,
40006004	ta anggey kayu as nangigammu ya as Amayu ey Apudyus ey nangiila assey amin ey kingwayu sey mangun-guna an dakayu.”
40006005	“Nu alluwaru kayu, ajiyu anungun dasey aginsosomkan! Tey pipiunda ey sumisikad ey alluwaru asda sinagog ya assey igid dasey karsa ta losan da tagu ilan jida. At ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa ey naasda naara sey gun-gunada.
40006006	At nu alluwaru kayu, sumakey kayu assey kuwartuyu ya umbanyu sey sawang asi kayu at alluwaru an Amayu ey aji pun miila. At as Apudyus ey Amayu ey mangiila assey amin ey koonyu, atjuna sey gun-gunayu.
40006007	“Ya nu alluwaru kayu, ajiyu paanjuanjuwun ey mullokon sey ibagayu ey kamaʼs sey koon dasey aji pun nangigammu an Apudyus tey ngadnunda ey dongron Apudyus jida tey angkananju dasey luwaruda.
40006008	Ajiyu anungun jida tey as Amayu ey Apudyus aaggammuna dasey kasapuranyu urey nu ajiyu pun ibaga an siya.
40006009	At kanaʼs sanna sey koonyu ey alluwaru: ‘Amani ad langit, midayow sey nasantuwan ey ngadannu.
40006010	Jumatong atyén sey manturayam. Ya makwa atyén sey pium assey luta ya kama vus ad langit.
40006011	Atjum sey umaney as kanunni assey inag-agow.
40006012	Pakawanum dasey basurni ey kama assey namakawananni asda nakabasur an dakani.
40006013	Ajim iparuvus sey masulisuganni ey mangwaʼs lawingan ya turungam dakani ta ajin dakani allilawun an Jimunyu.’
40006014	“Nu pakawanum dasey nangwaʼs lawing an sika, pakawanun avus sika an Ama taku ey Apudyus ad langit.
40006015	Kon nu ajim pakawanun dasey nangwaʼs lawing an sika, ajin pun vus Apudyus sika pakawanun.”
40006016	“At nu mallangan kayu, ajiyu ipadlow ey anjujuuy kayu ey kama assey koko'on dasey aginsosomkan. Tey gagaraunda iwarang sey long-agda ta losan da tagu imatunan ey nuuuratda. At ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey naasda naara sey gun-gunada.
40006017	At nu mallangan kayu, masapur ey mandar-up ya panusunyu sey vuukyu
40006018	ta ajin da ujum agammuwun ey nallangan kayu, ta as Apudyus ey aji pun miila anggey sey angigammu. At as Apudyus ey Amayu ey nangiila assey amin ey kookoonyu, atjuna sey gun-gunayu.”
40006019	“Ajiyu gamgaman ey man-ugpun as vinaknang assey luta anna tey dadailun sey vuvuk, lati ya mabalin vus ey akawun da man-aakow.
40006020	Siya atyén koonyu sey man-ugpun as vumaknanganyu ad langit ey aji pun madadail assey vuvuk, lati ya aji pun maakow.
40006021	Tey ngan ey sey iggawan sey vinaknangyu, siya vus sey iggawan sey somsomokyu.”
40006022	“Sey ata, siya sey kamaʼs silown sey long-ag. At nu ampatak sey angiilan sey atam, kama as nasilawan sey somsomoknu.
40006023	Kon nu aggongot sey angiilan sey atam, kama as pasig ey lawingan sey awad ey somsomoknu. At nu kanam ey nasilawan sey somsomoknu kon sissiya at assey gikbot, dardallu ey aggikbot sey iggawam!”
40006024	“Niippun alipan as juwa sey apuna ey manserviyana, tey siguraju ey sang-ana sey usa ya maryad assey usa. Nu aji ey, amsiwuna sey usa ya intakjugna sey usa. Anungna vus assey pilak ya an Apudyus, tey nu nabarbalor sey pilak an siya, niippun vus balorna an siya sey piun Apudyus.
40006025	“Siyana sey lapun sey mangimbag-ak an dakayu ta aji kayu madanagan assey ikataguyu, kama assey makan, inumunyu ya usaryu ey lumvun tey nabarbalor pigey sey viyagyu nu sey makan ya nabarbalor vus sey long-agyu nu sey lumvunyu.
40006026	Ilanyu pees dasey titit, ajida pun ammura, an-ani ya antarpun as kanunda, kon ajida pun madanagan tey as Ama taku ey Apudyus ad langit sey keygad assey kanunda. At yangey aji am-amud sey amapangugna an dakayu nu dasey titit?
40006027	At urey gey paat kayu ey mandanag, niippun dallu miiturungna tey yangey paanjuwuna pun lawa sey viyagyu as sin-akitan?
40006028	“Ya pakayu lawa madanagan as ilumvunyu? Ilanyu dasey sayyavung assey tar-an, ajida pun mansiput unnu man-abor as lumvunda.
40006029	Kon ibagak an dakayu ey urey as Ari Solomon ey amud sey vinaknangna, niippun lumvunna as anung sey kinabarun sey usa asda sayyavung anna.
40006030	At nu kanaʼsji sey kingwan Apudyus ey nangatud assey vinarun dasey lugam ey awad assey sana ya as vigat ey naskuran, kinggura kayu vus ta ajin dakayu lumvunan an Apudyus? Ngey pana vus gey kanan sinat sey pammatiyu?
40006031	“Aji kayu madanagan nu ngan sey angar-an as ikatagu anda ilumvun.
40006032	Tey da nauy sey gamgaman dasey aji pun nangigammu an Apudyus. Kon as Amayu ey Apudyus ad langit, agammuna ey masapuryu amin da nauy.
40006033	At sey sosomkonyu atyén, sey miipanggop assey manturayan Apudyus ya sey annunyu ey mangwa assey piuna. At nu kanaʼsji sey koonyu, keygad as Apudyus ey mangatud assey kasapuranyu.
40006034	At siya sey aji kayu madanagan miipanggop assey kasapuranyu as vigat tey umaney as sanguwunyu dasey ligat ey jumatong assey vinigat. Ajiyu jugjug-an.”
40007001	Inturuy Jesus sey tudtujuna, kanana, “Ajiyu ambalinun sey long-agyu as uwis ey manguwis asda ujum ta ajin Apudyus dakayu uwisun.
40007002	Tey ngan ey sey koonyu ey manguwis asda asintataguyu, kanaʼsji vus sey koon Apudyus ey manguwis an dakayu. Tey sey koonyu asda ujum, kanaʼsji vus sey koon Apudyus an dakayu.
40007003	Ey sey anungna, kama as iillam sey ban-ug ey vurat sey vurunnu, kon ajim pun milasinan sey dokor ey vuratnu.
40007004	Yangey magnu gey kanan ey, ‘Ayu ta kaanuk sey agillok ey vuratnu kon anna at sey singgupung ey nipupuggar assey atam.’
40007005	Dakayu ey aginsosomkan! Masapur kaanunyu yén sey singgupung ey vuratyu ta ampatak as mangil-anyu ey mangaan assey vurat sey vurunyu.
40007006	“Ajiyu ipapilit ey mangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus asda tagu ey sumasanga ey mangngor tey da jiyuy da tagu ey kamaʼs asu ey urey nu atjunyu sey ampiya, ambaliwitda ey mangtub an dakayu. Ya anungna vus nu ipitlakyu sey nabalor ey bongor asda borok, pitpitunda pey lawa.”
40007007	“Nu awad masapuryu, kudawunyu an Apudyus at atjuna. Nu anapunyu sey piunyu, udasanyu. Ya nu mangkugkug kayu assey sawang, vuktan sey sinsawang at dongrona nu ngan sey ibagayu.
40007008	Tey sey angkudow an Apudyus, maatud sey kudawuna ya sey manganap assey piuna ey anapun, udasana ya mabkatan sey sawang asda mangkugkug.
40007009	Tey ilanyu man dakayu ey aama, nu angkudow sey anakyu as makan, ey batu pun lawa sey atjunyu?
40007010	Ya tabbad pun lawa sey atjum, nu angkudow as aggajiw?
40007011	At nu agammuyu ey mangatud as ambaru asda anakyu, dakayu ey ambasbasur, ey aji sin-umamud sey koon Apudyus ey Amayu ad langit ey mangatud as ambaru nu angkudow kayu an siya?
40007012	“At nu ngan sey piunyu ey koon da tagu an dakayu, siya vus sey koonyu an jida tey nauy sey nasalinunutan sey lintog Moses ya da tudtujun dasey profet assey kar-argow.”
40007013	“Anguy kayu assey nalipit ey daran, tey sey daran ey manturung assey misinaan an Apudyus at arwaarwa at adjuwan dasey manguy tey allasu as ayun.
40007014	Kon sey daran ey manturung assey mataguwan an Apudyus, nalipit ya amud sey ligat ey lak-amun at jinugmu da manguy.”
40007015	“Man-annad kayu asda nasilib ey tagu ey apporow mangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus. Tey kamada aan as naamu ey karneru kon assey katuttuwaan ey nakopyaanda, kamada as kuttuban ey asu. Tey nasomkan sey ilada kon assey katuttuwaan, umalida ey manadail assey pammatiyu.
40007016	Imatunanyu jida assey angokoonda. Sey mipaniyana, aji pun maggey amunga sey tarurung as greps ya kama vus assey gammusa, aji pun maggey mamunga as ampiya.
40007017	Kama vus assey ambaru ey kayu, ambaru vus sey vungana. Kon sey lawingan ey kayu, lawingan vus sey vungana.
40007018	Tey aji pun mabalin ey mamunga as lawingan sey ambaru ey kayu ya sey lawingan ey kayu, aji pun maggey mamunga as ambaru.
40007019	At amin ey nimura ey kayu ey aji pun mamunga as ambaru, gabbaun sey nangimmura ya singkurana.
40007020	At mimamattunan sey anung dasey kuttuban ey asu ey manadail assey pammatiyu gapu assey lawingan ey kookoonda.”
40007021	Inturuy Jesus ey mantudtuju, kanana, “Adjuwan ey tagu sey mangimbaga an sa'un ey kananda, ‘Apu, Apu,’ kon ajida pun makasakey assey Manturayan Apudyus, nu aji anggey dasey mangwa assey piun Ama taku ey Apudyus ad langit.
40007022	At nu jumatong sey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda tagu, adjuwan dasey ampangpangaasi an sa'un ey kananda, ‘Apu, Apu, pasakayum dakani tey gapu assey pannakabalinnu, iwwarawagni sey Gingan Apudyus ya pinaryowni dasey amud pey ey jimunyu ey nilun-ug asda tagu ya kingwani vus dasey adjuwan ey nakaskasdaow.’
40007023	Kon ibagak an jida, ‘Ingkayun, dakayu ey apporow nangwaʼs lawingan tey niippun agammuk an dakayu!’”
40007024	“Ngan ey sey angngor assey amin ey ibagak ya tinongparna, anungna sey tagu ey naotkan ey nampatakjug as vuruyna assey usun sey batu.
40007025	Iniggana pun sey amud ey udan, nandanas, asina at igga sey andangsor ey bali, kon aji pun nabakas sey vuruy tey nikurub sey turkudna assey dopras.
40007026	Kon sey tagu ey dodongrona sey ibagak ya ajina pun tongparun, anungna sey makuk-urangan ey tagu ey nampatakjug as vuruyna assey usun sey gallis.
40007027	Iniggana pun vus sey amud ey udan, nandanas, asina at igga sey andangsor ey bali, napuyu sey vuruy saji at nabakas.”
40007028	Naas pun Jesus imbaga da nauy, nasdaow losan da tagu assey nangokoona ey nantudtuju
40007029	tey jinuma sey nangokoona nu sey angokoon dasey mimisturun sey lintog ey mantudtuju tey miila ey awad karobbongana.
40008001	Nan-usug pun as Jesus ey narpu assey tagudtud ey nantudtujuwana, ummunud dasey amud ey tagu an siya.
40008002	Ummadani sey usa ey laraki ey masakit as ngupungup at nallikkadang assey sinagung Jesus ey kanana, “Apu, agammuk ey nu kadaguwanak an sika, kaviilam ey mangaan assey sakitku anna ta miivilangak as nadarus.”
40008003	At inagpadan Jesus ey kanana, “Oon, madaguwak an sika at piuk ey madarusanka.” At nakaan ey dagus sey sakitna.
40008004	Kanan Jesus an siya, “Ilam ta ajim uguugujun assey urey barangna ey tagu. Kon mangow-aska at ey umuy an paji ta ipavib-ilim sey long-agnu ta ilana ey nakaan sey sakitnu. Asika at mandatun an Apudyus as matongparan sey imvilin Moses ey makwa ta awad mangigammuwan da tagu ey nakaan sey sakitnu.”
40008005	Naas pun jiyuy, ummuy as Jesus ad Capernaum. Inumdas pun, inggow sey usa ey ap-apun da surdaju ey iRoman ey ummuy nangkudow as turung ey kanana,
40008006	“Apu, awad sey alipanku ey uumvug assey vuruy. Aji pun makagiju gapu assey amud ey sakitna.”
40008007	At kanan Jesus, “Inta, ta inyak siya agasan.”
40008008	Kon kanan sey ap-apun da surdaju saji, “Apu, maviinak ey mammangili an sika. Urey pey lawa igingam at makaan sey sakitna.
40008009	Tey urey vus sa'un at masapur dongrok sey mandar dasey nangatngatu nu sa'un. Ya kama vus dasey surdaju ey iturayak, dongronda sey ibagak. Tey nu kanak ey assey usa, ‘Ingka!’ at umuy. Ya kanak ey vus assey usa, ‘Umalika!’ at umali. Ya nu kanak assey usa ey alipan, ‘koom sanna!’ at koona. At yangey aji sinjumallu ey mapati sey ibagam tey awad karobbongam?”
40008010	Nasdaow as Jesus assey jingngornaji at kanana asda umunnuunnud an siya, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey niippun atgey indasak an jitaku ey ganak Israel as kananaʼsna ey kadogot sey pammatina an Apudyus.
40008011	Ibagak an dakayu ey niippun juwajuwana ey adjuwan dasey Gentil ey marpuʼs kiiliili ey umuy mikalagragsak anda Abraham, Isaac ya an Jacob assey Turey Apudyus.
40008012	Kon dasey Jews ey pinilin Apudyus ey jida atyén sey mijuga assey Tureyna, kaajuwan an jida sey miballu assey amudʼey gikbot at as jiyuy sey man-iviivilanda anda ngumarotngotan sey vub-ada gapu assey sigabna.”
40008013	At kanan Jesus assey ap-apun dasey surdaju saji, “Ingka, tey sey pinatim ey makwa, nakwa an sika.” At naagasan tuttuwa sey alipan sey ap-apun dasey surdaju assey uras saji.
40008014	Usa pun ey ag-agow, ummuy as Jesus assey vuruy da Peter. Innilana at avus ey uumvug as katugangan Peter ey vubai tey masakit.
40008015	Ummadani as Jesus an siya at inagpadana at nakaan ey dagus sey amud ey atungna. At vummangun ey namakan an Jesus.
40008016	Nasjum pun, indatongda an siya dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey nalun-ugan as jimunyu. At pinaryowna amin dasey nilulun-ug gapu assey pannakabalin sey gingana ya kinaanna sey sakit dasey amin ey awad sakitna.
40008017	Kingwan Jesus amin da nauy ta tumuttuwa sey imbagan profet Isaiah assey kar-argow ey kanana, “Siya vus pigey ey mismu sey nangaan assey sakit taku ya vinnusna dasey lawingan ey giknaun taku.”
40008018	Usa pun ey ag-agow ey innilan Jesus dasey amudʼey tagu ey nampaliwus an siya, vinilinna dasey pasurutna ta mandormangda ey umuy assey viik sey beybey.
40008019	Inumdasda pun siji, jummatong sey usa ey misturun sey lintog ey kanana an Jesus, “Apu misturu, piuk ey mivurun an sika urey nu ngan sey ayam.”
40008020	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Dasey mutit, awad sey iggawanda ey lungug ya dasey titit awad sey sukvut ey vuruyda, kon Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, niippun vuruy as sumakubak ya an-illongak.”
40008021	At inggow vus sey usa ey pasurutna ey kanana, “Apu, oniyén ta inyak yén ilavun as ama ta asiyak at umunud an sika.”
40008022	Kon kanan Jesus an siya, “Umunudka at an sa'un ta dasey niippun pammatina ey nanattuy an Apudyus, keygadda ey mangillavun asda anungda ey nanattuy.”
40008023	Oni pun, nambangka da Jesus asda pasurutna ta andormangda assey beybey.
40008024	Anna pun ey andormangda, kinornatana sey kagguugyat ey bali, kon nar-ot sey suyup Jesus.
40008025	Ummadani dasey pasurutna at vinangunda ey kananda, “Apu, tumurungka tey anna ey malinong taku!”
40008026	At kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Ayaka gey ugyatyu? Ey niippun gey akit as pammatiyu an Apudyus?” Tummakjug as Jesus at pinaginokna sey bali ya sey dalluyun at natatmok ey dagus sey bali ya summinok sey beybey.
40008027	Nasdaow losan dasey pasurutna at kananda, “Ngan sey kinatatagun nauy? Urey sey bali anda dalluyun at dongronda sey ibagana!”
40008028	Inumdas pun da Jesus ad jumang ey sakup sey Gadara, inggow da juwa ey laraki ey niyabot an siya ey narpuda asda liyang ey lalabvunan. Da juwa sana ey laraki, nalun-uganda as jimunyu ya kagguugyatda at siyaji sey umugyatan dasey tagu ey manguy assey daran saji.
40008029	Innilada pun gey as Jesus, nangkulisda ey kananda, “Sika ey Anak Apudyus, ngan sey pium ey koon an dakani? Ey ummalika ey manusa an dakani ey daan pun sey ustu ey timpuna?”
40008030	Kon assey lugar saji, niyaspur ey inggow dasey simvurugan ey borok ey mansuvusuvuk.
40008031	At nampangpangaasi dasey jimunyu an Jesus ey kananda, “Nu paryawum dakani, ipuuynu dakani asda simvurugan ey borok anji.”
40008032	At kanan Jesus, “Ingkayu!” At ummuyda nallun-ug asda borok. At situtuddak da borok ey lummayug ey nampisuk assey beybey.
40008033	At dasey tagu ey sintarakin asda borok saji, ummawidda assey vubruy ey nangimbaga assey nakwa as dasey borok ya da juwa saji ey nilun-ugan dasey jimunyu.
40008034	At da amin ey umili siji, ummuyda assey iggawan Jesus ey nampangpangaasi ta teynana sey vubruyda.
40009001	Oni pun, nambangka vus kasin da Jesus ey nandormang, at nampuulida assey mismu ey ilina ad Capernaum.
40009002	Jummatongda pun, inniyuy dasey tagu an siya sey usa ey laraki ey nattubangil ey uumvug assey obokna. Immatunan pun Jesus ey amud sey pammatida an siya, kanana assey nattubangil, “Pakasdorom sey somsomoknu sunud tey napakawan dasey basurnu.”
40009003	At dasey mimisturun sey lintog ey ininggow as jiyuy, kananda assey somsomokda, “Ngey pana vus gey iyisu sey long-agna an Apudyus!”
40009004	Kon as Jesus, agammuna sey awad assey somsomokda at kanana, “Pakayu lawa ansomsomok as lawingan?
40009005	Ngan sey allaslasu, kananta ey, ‘Napakawan dasey basurnu?’ unnu kananta ey, ‘Vumangunka ta manaranka?’
40009006	At assey sana, ipiilak an dakayu ey Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, awad sey karobbongak assey luta anna ey mamakawan assey basur.” At kanana assey nattubangil, “Vumangunka ya aram sey oboknu ta ingkan!”
40009007	At vummangun tuttuwa sey tagu saji at ummayow.
40009008	Innilan pun da tagu sey nakwa, nasdaowda ya nikuugyatda at jinayowda as Apudyus gapu assey nangatdana assey kanaʼsji ey pannakabalin assey tagu.
40009009	Assey anaradaranan da Jesus, innilana sey mansisingil as vuur ey angngadan as Matthew ey tutukju assey opisinana. At kanana an siya, “Umalika ta ambalinka as pasurutku.” Nasanikad as Matthew at ummunud an siya.
40009010	Assey anna ey mangan da Jesus ya dasey pasurutna assey vuruy da Matthew, adjuwan dasey inggowʼey mansisingil as vuur ya dasey kananda ey ambasbasur ey tagu ey nikauvung an jida.
40009011	Innilan pun dasey ujum ey Farisis, kananda as dasey pasurut Jesus, “Ngey pa vus mikauvung sey misturuyu anna asda kanjugannaʼt ey tagu?”
40009012	Kon jingngor pun Jesus jida, kanana, “Sey agasan sey Doctor at dasey awad sakitna, dakumpun as dasey niippun sakitna. Anungna vus an sa'un, ummaliyak ta inyak turungan dasey nakabasur, dakumpun asda niyun-un ey tagu. Ammaanyu somsomkon nu ngan sey piuna ugujun sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Sey nabarbalor an sa'un sey kumadaguwanyu asda vurunyu nu sey andatunanyu asda ayém.’”
40009014	Ummuy dasey pasurut amvuvunyag ey John an Jesus nan-imus ey kananda, “Ngey pa vus dakani ya da Farisis at siya uunnujunni sey nakopyaan taku miipanggop assey mallanganan, kon dasey pasurutnu, ajida pun unujun. Ngey paman?”
40009015	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Nu awad kasar, ey mantutukar da mangili ey kapon assey laraki ey umuy mikakasar nu awad siya an jida? Aji pun mit! Kon umdas sey timpu ey milayow ey misina an jida sey laraki ey nikasar, siyaji sey mallangananda.”
40009016	Inturuy Jesus ey nampani, kanana, “Niippun tagu as mangintukup assey barbaru ey sinnun assey naropok ey lumvun, tey nu kumson sey ka'itukup ey sinnun, konkonona sey nitukupana ya ummam-amud sey visseyʼn sey lumvun.
40009017	Anungna vus assey bayas. Niippun avus mangimvilung assey ka'utu ey bayas assey judaan ey gaddang ey ammutu, tey nu lumwag ey sey bayas, vumtak sey judaan ey ammutu ya nitu'ug sey bayas ya keynga at lawa sey ammutu. At sey ka'utu ey bayas, masapur vus mivilung assey barbaru ey gaddang ey ammutu ta nu lumwag sey bayas, mayétyét sey ammutu at aji pun vumtak ya niippun malamram.”
40009018	Sissiya atgey as Jesus ey gumingaginga an jida assey jummatong sey usa ey pangat da Jews. At nallikkadang assey sinagung Jesus at kanana, “Anji ey kakkatuy sey anakni ey vubai, umalika atyén ta ipateynu sey imam an siya ta matagu.”
40009019	At lummibbat as Jesus ya da pasurutna ey ummunud an siya.
40009020	Assey timpu saji, niyaspur vus ey inggow sey usa ey vubai ey umuy as nasawaran as juwa ey tawun sey nandaradaraana. Ummuy assey udjugan Jesus at tindokna sey gayadan sey lumvunna.
40009021	Tey kanana assey somsomokna, “Nu matdokku atyén lawa sey lumvunna, makaan sey sakitku anna.”
40009022	Nambaliwit pun as Jesus ey nangila an siya, kanana, “Pakasdorom sey somsomoknu tey gapu assey pammatim an sa'un, makaan sey sakitnu.” At dagus ey kummasdor sey vubai.
40009023	Inumdas pun da Jesus assey vuruy sey pangat saji, summakey ad darum at innilana dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey siiivil anda sikakanta ey tomorong,
40009024	at kanan Jesus asda tagu, “Lumawa kayu losan! Tey aji pun natuy sey babarasang anna tey nasusuyup anggey!” At koonda ey mangam-amang an Jesus.
40009025	Lummogsad pun gey da tagu, summakey as Jesus assey kuwartu ey iniggawan sey natuy at inugnana sey imana at maggey vummangun.
40009026	At nanjinjinamag assey amin ey vubruy ey sakup sey ili saji sey kingwan Jesus.
40009027	Ummayow pun as Jesus assey lugar saji, inggow da juwa ey vurag ey ummunud an siya ey kananda ey angip-ipkow, “Sika ey ganak David, kadaguwam dakani!”
40009028	Umunnuunnud da juwa ey vurag saji an Jesus inggana as summakey ad darum assey vuruy, at nikasakeyda vus. At kanan Jesus an jida, “Ey mamati kayu ey kaviilak ey mangwa assey kudakudawunyu sana?” At kananda ey summongbat, “Oon Apu, mamati kani!”
40009029	At inaprusan Jesus dasey atada ya kanana, “Makwa an dakayu sey pinatiyu!”
40009030	At nivukat sey allangrang-anda. At vinilin Jesus jida ey kanana, “Ajiyu ug-uggujun asda ujum ey tagu sey nauy ey kingwak an dakayu!”
40009031	Kon ummayowda pun at avus, iwwarawagda asda aminʼey tagu assey ili saji.
40009032	Ummayow pun da tagu saji, iniyuyda sey usa ey na'omor tey nilun-ugan sey jimunyu.
40009033	Pinaryow pun Jesus sey jimunyu ey nilun-ug, insarad sey laraki saji ey guminga, at nasdaow da adjuwan ey tagu ey nangila ey kananda, “Niippun atgey innilani as kanaʼsna as nakwa assey intiru ey ili taku ad Israel!”
40009034	Kon kanan dasey Farisis ey nangila, “Kaviilana gey ey angimparyow asda jimunyu tey sey ap-apun da jimunyu sey nangatud an siya as pannakabalin ey mangimparyow an jida.”
40009035	Ummuy Jesus ginaggakey dasey amin ey vubruy assey lugar saji. At nantudtuju asda sinagog ya iwwarawagna as dasey tagu sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus. Ya nan-agas vus as dasey tagu ey masakit asda nantokotokon ey sakit.
40009036	Innilana pun dasey amud ey tagu ey nadagup, nadaguwan an jida tey an-amuwongda as koonda ya kadagdaguda ey kamadaʼs niwarang ey karneru ey niippun amuut an jida.
40009037	At kanana asda pasurutna ey nampani, “Adjuwan atyén dasey tagu ey nakasagana ey mamati an Apudyus ey kamaʼs paguy ey nuutu ey mabalin maani, kon kurang dasey mansiput ey man-ani.
40009038	At dawatunyu assey singkuwa assey maani ta jug-ana ey mangimbaar as man-ani.”
40010001	Usa pun ey ag-agow, jinagup Jesus dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna at innatudna an jida sey karobbongan ey angimparyow asda jimunyu ya mangagas asda nantokotokon ey sakit.
40010002	Annaya dasey ngadan dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna: Sey namangu an jida at as Simon ey nangadnan as Peter ya as Andrew ey sunudna ya da James an John ey mansunud ey anak da Zebedee,
40010003	da Philip an Bartholomew, as Thomas ya as Matthew ey mansisingil as vuur, as James ey anak Alphaeus ya as Thaddaeus,
40010004	as Simon ey naturud ey guminga ey mangintatakjug assey ilina, asi at as Judas Iscariot ey nalliput an Jesus assey umanungus.
40010005	Vinaar Jesus da nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna ya kanana ey nanugun an jida, “Aji kayu umuy assey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey iggowʼn dasey Gentil ya dasey Samaritan.
40010006	Sey ayanyu at asda kailiyan taku ey iyIsrael tey kamadaʼs karneru ey natarak.
40010007	At assey amin ey ayanyu, itudtujuyu an jida ey tigangey jumatong sey Manturayan Apudyus.
40010008	Agasanyu dasey masakit, taguwunyu dasey natuy, agasanyu dasey masakit as ngupungup ta madarusanda ya paryawunyu dasey jimunyu. Niippun bayad sey innatudku ey karobbonganyu at aji kayu ampabayad assey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey turunganyu.
40010009	Aji kayu mangintakin as pilak,
40010010	ampasking, an-orosyu ey lumvun, sapatus ya urey surkud tey karobbonganyu ey maatdan assey amin ey kasapuranyu gapu assey siputyu sana.”
40010011	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nu ngan ey sey ayanyu ey vubruy, siya mandagusanyu dasey tagu ey maryad amasakey an dakayu ya mikabvuruy kayu an jida ingganaʼs umayow kayu.
40010012	At nu sumakey kayu assey vuruy ey mandagusanyu, ibagayu ey as Apudyus sey kanayun ey mamindisyun an jida.
40010013	At nu maryadda ey ammangili an dakayu, vindisyunan Apudyus jida. Kon nu sumangada, ajida pun mavindisyunan.
40010014	At nu ingkayu assey usa ey vubruy unnu vuruy ya ajin dakayu mangiliyun anda dongron sey ibagayu, teynanyu sey vubruy saji ya pagpagunyu dasey tapuk asda sikiyu as mangimpiila ey keygadda assey majusaanda.
40010015	Ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa, nu jumatong sey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda amin ey tagu, mandagdagsun sey jusan dasey tagu assey vubruy saji nu sey jusan dasey tagu ad Sodom ya ad Gomorah.”
40010016	Inturuy Jesus, kanana, “Dongronyu sey ibagak anna an dakayu, tey kama kayu asda karneru ey ipuuyku assey iggawan da simvurugan ey wolf. At masapur man-annad kayu gapu assey siputyu sana ya ilanyu ta niippun ipabasurda an dakayu.
40010017	Man-annad kayu tey awad da manokma ya mangindarum an dakayu ya impuuy dakayu asda sinagog ta malapsitan kayu.
40010018	Ya gapu assey pammatiyu an sa'un, idarumda dakayu asda turey ya da ari kon siyaji at avus sey wayayu ey mangimbaga assey Ambaru ey Damag an jida ya as dasey Gentil.
40010019	At nu mabastigar kayu, aji kayu madanagan assey isongbatyu unnu ngan-annunyu ey sumongbat. Tey nu jumatong sey timpu sanat, mipakagasmok an dakayu sey ustu ey igingayu.
40010020	Dakumpun as dakayu sey marpuwan sey igingayu nu aji sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey Amayu sey mangimpakagasmok an dakayu.
40010021	“Ya assey nait ey timpu, urey dasey mansusunud at mansisinnipsipda as mipagngatan da sunudda. Ya kama vus asda man-aama, ey dasey ama, liputanda dasey anakda ey mangindarum asda turey ta ipagngatda jida. Ya da aanak avus, ipagngatda dasey dakdakorda.
40010022	Ya dakayu vus, sasangngaan dakayu asda tagu gapu assey pammatiyu an sa'un. Kon ngan ey sey mangimpapati ey mamati an sa'un urey ngan sey makwa inggana assey anungusna, maatud an siya sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
40010023	At nu tongtong-agun dakayu asda tagu assey usa ey vubruy, an-atun kayu assey sabali ey vubruy. Ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa, aji kayu pun makagaggakey assey amin ey vubruy ad Israel ey mangwaʼs ipakwak ya umdas sey timpu ey ampuuliyak, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu.
40010024	“Niippun uswila as nangatngatu nu sey misturuna, unnu alipan ey nangatngatu nu sey apuna.
40010025	Ya ming-op atyén vus sey uswila nu mapadasana sey nilak-am sey misturuna. Ya anungna vus assey alipan, tey ngan ey vus sey lak-amun sey apuna, kapilitan ey siya vus sey lak-amuna. At nu laylaysunda sa'un ey Apuyu ey kananda ey sa'un kanu as Beelzebul ey ap-apun da jimunyu, kapilitan ey sin-umamud sey koonda ey angillayus an dakayu ey pasurutku.”
40010026	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Aji kayu umugyat asda tagu, tey amin ey aji pun miila ya aji pun maagammuwan assey sana, jumatong dallu sey timpu ey mipiil-ana ya maagammuwana.
40010027	At amin dasey imbagabagak ya inyagasaasku assey anggey kayu, masapur ipaagammuyu ey urey ivuggayu ta losan da tagu dongron.
40010028	Ya aji kayu avus umugyat asda mangngat anggey assey long-ag tey ajida pun kaviilan ey mangngat assey kajudwayu. Kon siya umugyatanyu, as Apudyus, tey kaviilana ey manusa assey long-ag ya kajudwa ad inférnu.
40010029	Kon somsomkonyu man dasey sis-iwit ey sa'an ey sentimus anggey sey balor sey juwa, niippun mit matuy as urey sa'an an jida nu ajin Amayu ey Apudyus iparuvus.
40010030	At yangey aji am-amud an dakayu ey tagu? Tey urey pey dasey vuukyu at agammun Apudyus sey vilangna.
40010031	At aji kayu umugyat tey nabarbalor kayu nu dasey sis-iwit!”
40010032	Inturuy Jesus, kanana, “Sey tagu ey mangimbaga assey tuttuwa ey sa'un sey Apuna, itakjugku siya an Ama ey Apudyus ad langit.
40010033	Kon dasey manginsulib assey sinagung da tagu ey ajida pun sa'un agammu, kanaʼsji vus sey kook ey mangimbaga an Ama ey Apudyus ad langit.”
40010034	“Ajiyu kanan ey ummaliyak ta iyalik sey urnus assey luvung nu aji sey man-iisikan ya maguruwan da tagu.
40010035	Tey anggiginnura dasey man-aama ya man-iina, kama vus asda angkakatuganga.
40010036	Ya dasey mamvivinnusur pigey ikow at dasey mismu ey angkakabvuruy.
40010037	“At sey tagu ey dakdakor sey layadna assey amana, inana ya da aanakna nu sey layadna an sa'un, ajina pun lobbong ey ambalin as pasurutku.
40010038	Sey tagu ey kanana ey sa'un sey umunudana, kon ajina pun maanusan sey ligat ey urey siya ikatuyna, niippun vus lobbongna ey ambalin as pasurutku.
40010039	Sey tagu ey mangimpapangug assey mataguwana assey luta anna, matuy dallu. Kon sey tagu ey aji pun umugyat ey matuy gapu assey umunudana an sa'un, maatdan as viyag ey niippun patinggana.”
40010040	Kanan vus Jesus ey nanginturuy, “Sey tagu ey amasakey an dakayu, sa'un sey pinasakeyna. Ya ngan ey vus sey amasakey an sa'un, pinasakeyna vus sey nangimbaar an sa'un.
40010041	At ngan ey vus sey amasakey asda mantudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus gapu assey siputda saji, an-isu sey maatud ey gun-gunada. At ngan ey sey amasakey assey niyun-un ey tagu gapu assey kinabarun sey ugalina, miyanung sey gun-gunana assey niyun-un saji ey tagu.
40010042	Ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa, sey mangimpin-um assey urey sintasa ey danum assey kababaan ey pasurutku tey siya at pasurutku, niippun juwajuwana ey gun-gunaan Apudyus siya.”
40011001	Naas pun Jesus tinudtujuwan da nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna, tineynana sey vubruy saji at ummuy nantudtuju asda addaniyan ey vubruy ey nangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag.
40011002	Assey timpu saji, nibabarud as John ey amvuvunyag. Jingngorna pun dasey kookoon Jesus, nangimbaar asda pasurutna
40011003	ey umuy man-imus an Jesus, “Ey sika tuttuwa sey imbaar Apudyus ey muuulley ey umali, unnu awad sabali?”
40011004	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Ampuuli kayu ta ibagayu an John sey amin ey jingngoryu anda innilayu ey kingwakingwak;
40011005	da vurag makailada, da piley makadaranda, naagasan dasey nangupungup at nadarusanda, da torong makadngorda, da natuy at ummulida ya niwarawag sey Ambaru ey Damag asda lumawa.
40011006	Ya ibagayu an siya ey nagasat sey tagu ey niippun juwajuwana ey sa'un sey imbaar Apudyus ey umali.”
40011007	Ummayow pun dasey pasurut John, insarad Jesus ey mangimbaga asda tagu sey miipanggop an John, kanana, “Assey ummayanyu assey iniiggawan John assey danak ey nandongor assey tudtujuna, ngan sey kananyu assey kinatataguna? Ey tagu ey kamaʼs gurun ey allasuʼs dabbayun sey abvid? Dakumpun!
40011008	At nu dokon, ngan sey ingkayu innila nu'? Ey usa ey tagu ey nallumvun as ambaru ey lumvun sey baknang? Dakumpun mit! Tey sey tagu ey nallumvun as kanaʼsji, assey vuruy sey ari sey iggawana.
40011009	Ibagayu uda nu ngan sey ingkayu innila. Ey usa ey Profet? Oon, kon assey katuttuwaan, nangatngatu ikow sey innilayu nu sey profet.
40011010	Tey as John anna, siya sey impakur-it Apudyus asda profet assey kar-argow ey kanana, ‘Awad sey ibaarku ey amangpangu nu sika ey manginsagana assey daran ey ayum.’”
40011011	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa, niippun nangatngatu as niyanak assey luvung anna nu dokon as John ey Amvuvunyag, kon ibagak vus ey sey tagu ey kababaan assey Turey Apudyus ad langit at nangatngatu nu as John.
40011012	At nallugi assey nantudtujuwan John inggana assey sana ey timpu, awad dasey tagu ey mangimpapangug ey mangintudtuju assey Turey Apudyus ya awad vus da mangimpapilit ey mijuga assey turey saji.
40011013	Tey dasey profet assey kar-argow ya asda nikukur-it ey lintog Moses at impapaddaanda imbaga sey miipanggop assey jumatngan sey Turey Apudyus. Oni pun, jummatong as John at impatuttuwana dasey nipapaddaan saji.
40011014	At nu piunyu ipanad sey impapaddaan sey usa ey profet, maagammuwanyu ey as John vus pigey sey Elijah ey nibabagga ey umali.
40011015	Naingaan kayu at ammaanyu sommosommokon nu ngan sey piun sey imbagak saji ey ugujun.”
40011016	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ngan at sey angimpaniyak an dakayu ey tagu assey sana? Anungyu dasey anak ey man-ay-ayam assey pawey ey ajida pun angkikinnaawatan. Tey kanan dasey ujum asda vurunda,
40011017	‘Nanganggangsa kani kon aji kayu pun nanadok! Ya nanagimbaru kani kon aji kayu pun vus nikaivil.’
40011018	At jida sey anungyu tey ummali pun as John, kanayun ey mallangan ya aji pun ummin-inum as bayas at kananyu ey, ‘Najimunyuwan!’
40011019	Ummaliyak pun vus, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu ey apporow nanganangan ya uminuinum, kananyu vus ey, ‘Ilanyu man sey tagu anna ya! Marawot ya vu'ukan ya siya vub-urunna dasey lawingan ey tagu ey mandadagup as vuur anda tagu ey ambasbasur!’ Kon urey nu siyanaʼt sey kananyu, mipiila dallu sey kinaustun sey silib Apudyus asda kookoon da tagu ey mamati.”
40011020	Inamuyuwan Jesus da tagu asda vubruy ey nangwaana asda amudʼey kaskasdaow tey ajida pun imbabawi dasey basurda ya ajida pun namati.
40011021	At kanana, “Kadagdagu kayu ey iChorazin anda iBethsaida! Tey amud sey kaskasdaow ey impiilak kon aji kayu pun nambabawi asda basuryu. Tey nu ad Tyre ya ad Sidon sey nangwaak asda kamaʼsna ey kaskasdaow, nallumvunda akey as saku ya nilamusda as dapur dasey long-agda as mangimpiila ey nan-awidanda dasey basurda!
40011022	At sey kanak an dakayu, un-unina sey jusan dasey iTyre ya dasey iSidon nu dakayu nu jumatong sey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda tagu.
40011023	Ya dakayu vus ey tagu ad Capernaum, kananyu pun lawa ey dakayu sey kangatuwanʼey tagu assey Turey Apudyus ad langit? Oni at dakayu sey miballu ad inférnu! Tey amud pigey sey nipiila ey kaskasdaow an dakayu kon ajiyu pun imbabawi dasey basuryu. Nu ad Sodom atyén sey nakwaan da impiilak ey milagru, nambabawida akey asda basurda ya sissiyada atgey ey sana!
40011024	At kanak an dakayu, un-unina sey jusan dasey tagu ad Sodom nu dakayu nu jumatong sey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda tagu!”
40011025	Assey timpu saji, nalluwaru as Jesus ey kanana, “Ama ey Apu ad langit ya assey luta! Ansaramatak an sika tey dasey ajim pun impaagammu asda naadar ya asda angkariing, impaagammum asda niippun adarna.
40011026	Siya sey kingwam Ama tey siya sey pinium ey makwa.”
40011027	At kanan Jesus asda tagu, “Innatjun Ama an sa'un sey kaviilan ya kinariing. Niippun nangigammu assey ustu ey Anak, nu dokon anggey as Amak. Ya niippun vus nangigammu assey ustu ey Ama, nu dokon anggey sa'un ey Anakna ya dasey tagu ey piuk ey mangimpaagammuwan.
40011028	“Umali kayu an sa'un, dakayu ey naayong ey mamuvukud asda mandanagsun ey vilin sey lintog ta man-illongok dakayu.
40011029	Koonyu dasey ivilinku ya ampatudtuju kayu an sa'un ta mapanus sey somsomokyu tey naanusak ya dakumpunak as paspas-um.
40011030	Tey sey ipakwak an dakayu at allasu as koon ya sey ipad-unku an dakayu at allangpow as vukudan.”
40012001	Assey usa ey Sabaju ey ngilin da iyIsrael, nanguy da Jesus assey u'uma. At gapu ta nuurat dasey pasurutna, kummutlungda as kutimanda.
40012002	Innilan pun dasey Farisis jida, kananda an Jesus, “Ilam man dasey pasurutnu anna ya, pumapakiw sey koonda anna assey lintog taku ey iyIsrael assey ag-agow ey ngilin!”
40012003	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Ey ajiyu pun vinasa sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kingwan David ya dasey vurunna assey kar-argow assey timpun sey nuuratanda?
40012004	Summakey mit assey vuruy Apudyus at nangara assey tinapey ey nidatun an Apudyus ey misanga assey lintog nu kanun sey dakumpun as paji kon kinanda asda vurunna.
40012005	Vinasayu mit vus sey nikur-it assey lintog Moses ey assey ag-agow ey Sabaju, aji pun makabasur dasey papaji ey ansiput assey Tempél urey nu labsingunda sey lintog sey ngilin.
40012006	Kon ibagak an dakayu ey awad assey sana sey nabarbalor nu sey Tempel.
40012007	Kanan Apudyus assey Gingana, ‘Sey nabarbalor an sa'un at sey kumadaguwanyu asda asintataguyu nu sey mandatunanyu asda ayém an sa'un.’ At nu naawatanyu sey piun nauy ey ugujun, ajiyu pabasurun dasey niippun basurna.
40012008	Tey Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu sey simviyang ey mangimbaga nu ngan sey makwa assey ag-agow ey ngilin.”
40012009	Ummayow as Jesus assey iggawanda saji at ummuy assey usa ey sinagog dasey iyIsrael.
40012010	Summakey pun ad darum, niyaspur ey inggow sey usa ey laraki ey niis-is sey imana. Ya inggow vus as jiyuy dasey ujum ey tagu ey manganaanap as amabasuranda an siya ta awad lasunda ey mangindarum an siya. At kananda, “Ey iparuvus pun lawa sey lintog taku nu man-agasta assey ag-agow ey ngilin?”
40012011	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Dakayu pey, nu as gagara ta awad navituwan as karneruyu ya niyaspur assey ag-agow ey ngilin, ey ajiyupun pun lawa okron?
40012012	At yangey aji nabarbalor sey tagu nu sey karneru? At siya sey miparuvus assey lintog sey tumurungan assey asintataguta assey ag-agow ey ngilin.”
40012013	At kanana assey tagu ey niis-is sey imana, “Uyajum sey imam!” Inuyadna pun tuttuwa, vummaru ey niyanung assey usa ey imana.
40012014	Innilan pun dasey Farisis sey nakwa, lummogsadda ey umuy mantuturag nu ngan annunda ey mangngat an Jesus.
40012015	Naagammuwan pun Jesus sey lawingan ey panggopda an siya, ummayow assey ili saji, kon adjuwan pey dallu da tagu ey ummunud an siya. At kinaanna sey sakit dasey amin ey awad sakitna an jida,
40012016	asina at tugunun jida ta ajida iwarawag asda ujum ey tagu sey miipanggop an siya.
40012017	Imbagana nauy ta tumuttuwa sey impabagan Apudyus an profet Isaiah assey kar-argow ey kanana,
40012018	“Annaya sey pinilik ey baba'aruk ey manservi an sa'un. Siya sey pipiuk ey mangatud as allaylaydak. Ibaarku sey Ispirituk ey milong-ag an siya ta iwarawagna asda Gentil sey ambaru ey gadtok Apudyus ey angimvilang asda tagu as niippun basurda.
40012019	Aji pun mikaisik anda amvugga ya ajina pun ijiskursu sey ibagana asda tagu.
40012020	Ajina pun putjun sey nayyunguyung ey paur, unnu gongatun sey angudkujimjim ey silow. Iturturuyna sey siputna ingganaʼs matongpar sey ambaru ey gadtok Apudyus.
40012021	At siya anggey sey annamnamaan da aminʼey tagu.”
40012022	Inniyuyda an Jesus sey usa ey laraki ey nabvurag ya aji pun makaginga tey nilun-ugan sey jimunyu. At pinaryow Jesus sey nilun-ug ey jimunyu assey laraki saji asi at makaginga ya makaila.
40012023	Amud sey nasdaawan dasey aminʼey nangila assey kingwan Jesus saji. At kananda, “Ey siyana nin tuttuwa sey ganak David ey uullayun taku?”
40012024	Jingngor pun dasey Farisis nauy, kananda; “Iyaay, dakumpun naʼt. Kaviilana in ey paryawun sey jimunyu tey as Beelzebul ey ap-apun da jimunyu sey nangatud as pannakabalinna ey mangwa.”
40012025	Kon inagammun pun Jesus sey awad assey somsomokda, kanana an jida, “Nu an asi gubat dasey tagu assey usa ey ili, niippun juwajuwana ey mavukarda ey sin-iliyén. Kama vus assey simbaryan unnu dasey angkakarubvun, nu an asi gurada, niippun ayana nu ajida mansisina.
40012026	At anungna vus nu manvivinnusur sey usa ya usa ey vungguy assey turey Satanas, narawag ey niippun urnusda ya niippun ayana nu aji ampatingga sey tureyna.
40012027	Usa pey, nu kananyu ey as Beelzebul sey nangatud assey pannakabalinku ey amaryow asda jimunyu, ngan man sey nangatud as kaviilan dasey pasurutyu ey mangimparyow asda jimunyu? At sey kookoon dasey pasurutyu at siya sey mangimpaniknik ey kinumbot kayu!
40012028	Tey sey katuttuwaana dakumpun an Beelzebul sey nangatud assey pannakabalinku ey amaryow asda jimunyu nu aji sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey narpuwana. At siyana sey angagammuwanyu ey nisarad sey manturayan Apudyus an dakayu.
40012029	“Mipani as Beelzebul as mangkasdor ey laraki. Niippun makasakey assey vuruyna ey manamsam asda awad ad darum nu ajina yén barujun siya ta asi at nawaya ey manamsam asda awad ad darum.
40012030	“Sey tagu ey aji pun mijuga an sa'un at siya sey pumapakiw. Ya ngan ey sey aji pun tumurung an sa'un ey managup asda tagu ta mamatida an Apudyus, jida sey mangwa as umadayuwan da tagu an Apudyus.
40012031	Sey ibagak an dakayu, urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey basur sey tagu ya urey dasey gumingaʼs vumusur an Apudyus at mabalin ey mapakawan, kon sey gumingaʼs vumusur assey Ispiritun Apudyus, aji pun mapakawan.
40012032	Urey sey gumingaʼs vumusur an Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu at mabalin ey mapakawan. Kon sey gumingaʼs vumusur assey Ispiritun Apudyus, aji pun ogon mapakawan.”
40012033	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nu ambaru sey kayu, ambaru vus sey vungana ya nu lawingan sey kayu, lawingan vus sey vungana. Tey sey vungan sey kayu sey mangigammuwan nu mambaru unnu lawingan.
40012034	Siyana sey angimpiila ey dakumpun kayu ey tagu tey kama kayu assey tabbad ey mandogot nu kumtub. At gapu assey kinarwingyu, aji pun mabalin ey guminga kayu as ambaru. Tey sey lawing ey intatarpun sey tagu assey somsomokna, siya vus pigey sey iluswan sey sungadna.
40012035	Sey ambaru ey tagu, ambabaru vus dasey igingana tey ambaru dasey awad assey somsomokna. Ya sey lawing ey tagu, lawingan vus dasey igingana tey siya vus pigey sey awad assey somsomokna.
40012036	“Isigurajuk an dakayu ey nu jumatong sey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda tagu, siyaji ey timpu sey manongbatanyu an Apudyus as dasey amin ey nababarang ey inggingayu.
40012037	Tey dasey apporoyu ingginga, siya sey ambasaran Apudyus ey manguwis an dakayu nu nakabasur kayu unnu aji pun.”
40012038	Oni pun, kanan da ujum ey mimisturun sey lintog ya dasey Farisis, “Apu Misturu, angimpiilaka uda as nakaskasdaow ey sinyar ey angimpatuttuwa ey as Apudyus sey narpuwan sey mannakabalinnu.”
40012039	Kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Amud sey kinarwing da tagu assey sana ey timpu tey nan-awidanda as Apudyus! Mangkudowdaʼs nakaskasdaow ey sinyar as ilan sey atada, kon ibagak ey niippun mipiila an jida nu aji as anggey sey isun sey nakwa an profet Jonah assey kar-argow.
40012040	Tey as Jonah, ininggow as turu ey ag-agow ya lavi assey vuwang sey dokor ey aggajiw. Anungna vus an Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu at inggawak avus as turu ey ag-agow ya lavi assey milavunak.
40012041	At nu jumatong sey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda amin ey tagu, sumikad da iNineveh ey angimpabasur an dakayu tey imbabawida dasey basurda assey jingngorda sey tudtujun Jonah. Tey ey sana, anna an dakayu sey nangatngatu nu as Jonah kon ajiyu pun pey dallu patiyun sey tudtujuna.
40012042	Ya sey vubai vus ey prinsesa ad Sheba, pabasuruna vus dakayu tey urey amud sey kaadayun sey ilina, inanusana ey ummuy nandongor assey kinariing ari Solomon ey mantudtuju. Kon an dakayu, urey nu anna sey sin-umamud sey kinangatuna nu as Ari Solomon, ajiyu pun pey dallu dongron sey tudtujuna.”
40012043	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nu umayow ey sey jimunyu ey nilun-ug assey usa tagu, umuy anggaggakey assey danak ey man-anap as vumruyana. Kon nu niippun udasana,
40012044	kanana assey somsomokna, ‘Ampuuliyak assey iniggawak saji!’ At nu ampuuli ya innilana ey niippun ininggow, nadarus ya naambaru sey kangamin,
40012045	umuy man-ayag as pitu as vurunna ey sin-umamud sey kinarwingda nu siya ta vumruyda losan assey tagu saji. At sey makwa assey tagu saji, sin-umamud ey kadagdagu nu assey ab-avusna. Kanaʼsji sey makwa asda lawingan ey tagu assey sana.”
40012046	Sissiya ey gumingaginga as Jesus asda tagu assey jummatong as inana ya dasey susunudna assey vuruy saji ey iggowna at piunda ipaayag ta mikabagbagada.
40012047	At imbagan sey usa ey tagu ey kanana an Jesus, “Andaji as lasin da inam anda susunudnu ey piunda kanu kabagbaga sika.”
40012048	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Oon, kon dokonda pun anggey as ivilangku ey inak anda susunudku.”
40012049	Intujuna dasey pasurutna at kanana, “Jida sey ivilangku as inak anda sunudku.
40012050	Tey ngan man sey mangwa assey piun Amak ad langit, jida dasey mivilang as inak anda sunudku.”
40013001	Assey siyaji ey ag-agow, lummogsad as Jesus assey jiyuy ey vuruy at ummuy assey igid sey beybey, asina at itukju ey mantudtuju asda tagu.
40013002	Kon gapu ta amud dasey tagu ey nadagup ey nangalivungvung ey andongor an siya, summakyét assey bangka at tummukju. Da tagu, angkasikadda assey igid sey beybey.
40013003	Adjuwan dasey intudtujuna an jida ey nan-usar asda panpani. Kanana, “Inggow sey usa ey tagu ey ummuy nawwagwag as vukar assey umana.
40013004	Assey nangiwwagwagana asda vukar, nibatug da ujum assey daran at ummuy dasey titit kinan.
40013005	Sey ujum ey vukar, nibatugda assey dopras ey niippun gama lutana. At gapu ta ayyapit sey lutana, sin-akitan at tummuvuda.
40013006	Kon jinumgot pun sey init, namin naryow dasey mura ya naranguda tey niippun pumkotan dasey lamutda.
40013007	Ya dasey ujum ey vukar, nibatugda assey sissiit ey lugam. Ummananju pun dasey lugam, nasyung da mura.
40013008	Kon dasey ujum ey vukar, nibatugda assey ambaru ey luta at tummuvuda ey antataba at naminda namunga. Singgagasut sey vungan da ujum, sin-oonompuru da ujum ya sintutlumpuru sey vungan da ujum.”
40013009	At inyanungus Jesus ey kanana, “Naingaan kayu, at ammaanyu sommosommokon nu ngan sey piun sey inugudku saji ey ugujun.”
40013010	Ummadani dasey pasurut Jesus at kananda an siya, “Pam lawa usarun dasey panpani nu tudtujuwam dasey tagu?”
40013011	Kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Pasig pani sey usaruk tey amin dasey aji pun naagammuwan ey miipanggop assey manturayan Apudyus at dakayu anggey sey mipaagammuwana, kon asda ujum ey tagu ajin pun Apudyus ipaagammu.
40013012	Tey sey tagu ey mamati ey awad maawatana, majugjug-an sey pannakaawatna inggana as umajuaju kon sey tagu ey aji pun mamati, kaanun Apudyus sey akit saji ey naawatana.
40013013	At siya sey pani sey usaruk ey mantudtuju an jida, tey urey nu iillanda, ajida pun immatunan ya urey vus nu dodongronda, ajida pun pey dallu maawatan.
40013014	At jida sey tummuttuwaan sey kanan sey impakur-it Apudyus an profet Isaiah ey kanana, ‘Urey nu dodongronda, ajida pun maawatan. Ya urey vus nu iillanda, ajida pun imatunan.
40013015	Tey da nauy ey tagu at tummabvug sey otokda ya kamaʼs sinusuratda dasey ingada anda kinikimitda dasey atada. Tey nu ajida atyén kanan sina, makailada ya dongronda sey mibaga ta maawatanda sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju ya siguraju ey mansinagungda an sa'un at kaanuk dasey basurda.’”
40013016	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Kon an dakayu, nagasat kayu tey makaila sey atayu ya makadngor sey ingayu.
40013017	Tey tuttuwa sey ibagak anna an dakayu ey amud pey ey profet anda niyun-un ey tagu sey maryad ey mangila asda iillanyu ya mangngor as dasey dodongronyu assey sana, kon ajida pun nadapun.”
40013018	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ey sana, dongronyu sey piuna ugujun sey pinanik saji miipanggop assey nawwagwag asda vukar.
40013019	Sey vukar ey nibatug assey daran at mipanida as dasey tagu ey nangngor assey tudtuju miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus kon ajida pun naawatan. Asi at umuy as Satanas at kinaanna assey somsomokda sey jingngorda.
40013020	At sey ujum vus ey vukar ey nibatug assey dopdopras, jida dasey tagu ey allaylayad ey mandongor assey Gingan Apudyus.
40013021	Kon aji pun lummamut assey somsomokda, nu aji sin-akitan anggey sey namatiyanda asda jingngorda. Tey nu awad jumatong as problema unnu ligat gapu assey namatiyanda, nan-awidanda ey dagus sey pammatida.
40013022	At dasey vukar vus ey nibatug as dasey sissiit, jida dasey tagu ey andodongngor assey Gingan Apudyus kon nala'uban sey jingngorda gapu assey pangugda nu ngan sey angar-anda assey kasapuran ya sey pangugda ey vumaknang. At niippun nantongparan sey jingngorda ey Gingan Apudyus.
40013023	Kon dasey nibatug assey ambaru ey luta, jida dasey nangngor assey Gingan Apudyus ya naawatanda. At adjuwan sey ambabaru ey koonda ey kamadaʼs mura ey namunga as singgagasut ya sin-oonompuru ya sintutlumpuru.”
40013024	Kasin nampani as Jesus asda tagu, kanana, “Sey mipaniyan sey Manturayan Apudyus at kama assey usa ey tagu ey ummuy nangiyyosok assey ambaru ey panar assey payowna.
40013025	Usa pun ey lavi, assey namin da tagu nasuyup, ummuy sey kavusur at nawwagwag as vukar sey marpaguy assey payow saji asi at umayow.
40013026	Anna pun ey pummagdot ya amvugida, miila at avus dasey marpaguy ey nikamus.
40013027	At ummuy dasey ansisipputun sey tagu saji an siya at kananda, ‘Apu, paman ya ambaru ey panar sey iyyosok taku assey payownu? Ngan gey lawa narpuwan dasey marpaguy saji ey nikamus?’
40013028	Kanan sey simpayow ey summongbat, ‘Awad kavusur as nangwasnaʼt.’ At kanan vus dasey ansisipputuna, ‘Ey pium ta ingkani bagutun dasey marpaguy?’
40013029	Summongbat vus sey simpayow ey kanana, ‘Na, ajiyu! Tey nu bagutunyu dasey marpaguy, mijuga at lawa sey ujum ey paguy.
40013030	Amorna ey migisan dasey marpaguy assey paguy ey jumakor inggana as inggagapas. At ibagak as dasey anggapas ta amanguwunda bagutun dasey marpaguy ta kawagunda ey manikur, asida at gapasun sey paguy ta mipintok assey arangku.’”
40013031	Kasin vus as Jesus nampani, kanana, “Sey turey Apudyus at anungna sey ban-it ey vukar sey mustasa ey ummuy sey usa ey tagu immura assey umana.
40013032	Siya sey kaban-itan asda amin ey vukar, kon tummuvu pun ey jummakor, siya at avus sey kadakkoragan asda aminʼey mura assey umana ey kamaʼs kayu ey nampangngapangnga at mabalin ey sumakyab da titit ya nan-illongda as dasey pangana.”
40013033	Inturuy vus Jesus ey kanana, “Sey Turey Apudyus at anungna sey tinuktuk ey ingkamus sey usa ey vubai assey ansarum ey arina at namin vinumtar sey nikamsana.”
40013034	Pasig ey pani sey inusar Jesus ey nantudtuju asda nadagup ey tagu. Niippun gummingaana as aji nan-usar as pani.
40013035	Kingwana nauy as tummuttuwaan sey impabagan Apudyus as dasey Profet ey kanana, “Panpani sey usaruk ey guminga an jida. Siyana sey kook ey mangintudtuju as dasey aji pun naagammuwan nanipud assey nakwaan sey luvung inggana assey sana.”
40013036	Tineynan pun Jesus dasey nadagup ey tagu, summakey assey usa ey vuruy at ummunud dasey pasurutna an siya at kananda, “Ibagam uda an dakani nu ngan sey piuna ugujun sey pinanim saji miipanggop assey lugam ey nikallut asda paguy.”
40013037	Summongbat as Jesus at kanana; “Sey nangiyyosok assey ambaru ey panar at Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu.
40013038	Sey payow ey naoskan at mipani asda aminʼey tagu assey luta anna. Da ambabaru ey panar at jida dasey tagu ey iturturayan Apudyus. At dasey marpaguy, jida dasey tagu ey iturturayan Satanas.
40013039	Ya sey kavusur ey ummuy nammura at siya as Satanas. Sey inggagapas at siyaji sey anungus sey ag-agow. Ya dasey anggapas, jida dasey enjel Apudyus.
40013040	At sey muugpunan sey lugam ta maskuran, kanaʼsji vus sey makwa as dasey mijuga an jimunyu assey anungus sey ag-agow.
40013041	Tey Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, baaruk dasey enjelku ta pulinanda kaanun assey tureyku dasey apporow angwa as vumasuran ya da angwa assey lawingan
40013042	ta iballuda jida assey iggow sey gumilgillajung ey apuy. At as jiyuy sey man-ivilanda ya ngumarotngotan da vub-ada gapu assey sigabna.
40013043	Kon dasey tagun Apudyus, sumilingda ey anungda sey init assey Turey Amada ey Apudyus. Naingaan kayu, at ammaanyu sommosommokon nu ngan sey piuna ugujun sey jingngoryu anna.”
40013044	Inturuy Jesus ey nampani, kanana, “Sey Turey Apudyus, mipani assey nabalor ey galin ey nitataru assey lutan sey usa ey tagu. Indasan pun sey usa ey tagu, tinang-ubana. At gapu assey amud ey layadna, ingnginana sey amin ey laksunna at nampuuli at ningin-ana sey luta saji.
40013045	“Sey usa vus ey mipaniyan sey Turey Apudyus at anungna sey usa ey pumoporak assey angkangina ey bongor.
40013046	Indasana pun sey usa ey nanatkon ey bongor ey amud sey balorna, ummuyna ingngina sey amin ey laksunna at ningin-ana sey bongor saji.”
40013047	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Sey mipaniyan vus sey Turey Apudyus, anungna sey tavukur ey impitlak dasey mangaggajiw assey beybey at nakna dasey antoktokon ey aggajiw.
40013048	Anna pun ey adjuwan sey nakna ey aggajiw, ginuyudda assey igid sey beybey at intukjuda ey mamulin. Impasigda dasey ambabaru assey arat ya imballuda dasey angkarawing.
40013049	Kanaʼsna sey makwa assey anungus sey ag-agow. Umali da enjel ey managop asda ambasbasur ey tagu ey nikallut asda niyun-un
40013050	asida at iballu jida assey iggow sey gumilgillajung ey apuy ey siya sey man-ivilanda ya ngumarotngotan dasey vub-ada assey sigabna.”
40013051	Inimus Jesus as dasey pasurutna, kanana, “Ey naawatanyu amin da nauy?” At summongbatda ey kananda, “Oon, naawatanni.”
40013052	At kanan vus Jesus an jida, “At nu awad ampaiturey an Apudyus as dasey sigud ey misturun sey lintog Moses, mipanida assey tagu ey wadawad sey awad an siya ey agammuna ey mangusar asda judaan ya ka'ara ey laksunna.”
40013053	Naas pun as Jesus nantudtuju ey nangusar as dasey pani anna, tineynana jida
40013054	at nampuuli assey vubruy ey jummakorana. At ummuy nantudtuju assey sinagog at nasdaow namin dasey nangngor an siya, at kananda ey ambabagbaga, “Ngey nangar-an tagu anna as liingna ya sey pannakabalinna ey mangwaʼs da kaskasdaow?
40013055	Ey dakumpun nauy sey anak sey karpenteru? Yangey dakumpun as Mary sey inana, ya da James, Joseph, Simon ya as Jude dasey susunudna?
40013056	Urey mit vus dasey vubai ey susunudna at awaddaʼs nauy ey vinumruy? At ngan gey la nangar-ana as liing ya pannakabalinna?”
40013057	At siyaji sey ajida pun nangimvilangan ya namatiyan an siya. Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Niippun profet as mavigvig assey mismu ey ilina unnu kabvuruyna nu aji siya mavigvigana assey ujumʼey ili.”
40013058	At gapu ta ajida pun patiyun siya, niippun gama kingwana as nakaskasdaow siji.
40014001	Asda timpu saji, as Herod ey ari ad Galili, jingngorna sey miipanggop assey kookoon Jesus,
40014002	asina at ibaga as dasey opisyarna ey kanana, “Siyanaʼt nin gey lawa as John ey Amvuvunyag ey kasin natagu at siya sey naatdan as pannakabalin ey mangwaʼs da kaskasdaow.”
40014003	Imbagan Herod jiyuy tey siya ey mismu sey nangimpadokma ya nangimpapisuk an John ey napopossasan assey baballudan. Kingwana nauy gapu assey nangingoran John an siya tey inasawana as Herodias ey asawan Philip ey sunudna. At nanginkinnuwun John iningoran siya ey kanana, “Niippun karobbongam ey mangasawa an Herodias tey asawan Philip ey sunudnu.”
40014005	At siya sey lapuna nu pan lawa Herod piun ipagngat as John, kon umugyat asda tagu tey vigvigunda as John ey usa ey profet.
40014006	Kon jummatong pun sey ag-agow ey niyanakan Herod, ummuy nanadok sey anak Herodias ey babarasang assey sinagung da mangilina. At amud sey layad Herod assey nanadokana,
40014007	at siya sey nangimpostaana assey babarasang ey kanana, “Ipostak an sika ey atjuk da amin ey kudawum!”
40014008	Jingngor pun Herodias, vinilinna sey anakna ey kanana, “Dawatum an Herod ta atjuna an sika sey urun John ey Amvuvunyag ey miigga assey paranggan!”
40014009	Nanjujuuy as ari Herod kon gapu ta luusna imposta assey sinagung dasey amin ey mangilina, imbagana assey babarasang ey maatud sey dawatuna saji.
40014010	At impasiwatna sey urun John assey baballudan,
40014011	asida at igga assey paranggan at ummuyda innatud assey babarasang, asin at vus sey babarasang iyuy an inana.
40014012	Jinamag pun dasey pasurut John sey nakwa sana, ummuyda innara sey ladagna at illavunda, asida at umuy ibaga an Jesus.
40014013	Jingngor pun da Jesus sey nakwa an John, ummayowda assey lugar saji at nandormangda ey nambangka assey beybey ey ummuy assey usa ey lugar ey niippun katagtaguwan tey piunda ey umanggey. Kon nanjinamag asda vubvubruy sey ummayan da Jesus at ummunud da adjuwan ey tagu ey nanguy assey igid sey beybey.
40014014	Anna pun ey tumakdang da Jesus assey bangka, innilana dasey amud ey tagu ey nangunud an siya at nadaguwan asda masakit at inagasana jida.
40014015	Anna pun ey mipisuk as init, ummadani dasey pasurutna an siya at kananda, “Anna ey gumikbot ya niippun amin katagtaguwan sina. Ibagam asda tagu anna ta umuyda ngumina as kanunda asda addaniyan ey vubruy.”
40014016	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Urey ajida umayow. Pakananyu in jida.”
40014017	Summongbatda ey kananda, “Lima anggey ey tinapey sey awad ya juwa ey ikan.”
40014018	At kanan vus Jesus, “Iyaliyuʼs sanna!”
40014019	Inniyuyda pun, imbagana asda tagu ta itukjuda asda lugrugam, asina at aran sey lima ey tinapey ya sey juwa ey ikan asi at mantangad ad langit ey mansaramat an Apudyus. Asina at pitpit-ingun sey tinapey ya putputjun sey ikan at innatjuna asda pasurutna ta iwarasda asda tagu.
40014020	Nangan losan da tagu inggana as ning-opda. Asin at da pasurut Jesus dagupun dasey vunada ey nangan. Jinagupda pun, nakoan sey nasawaran as juwa ey awit.
40014021	Sey vilang dasey nangan ey laraki at ummavut as limallivu ey aji pun nijuga nivilang dasey vubai ya da aanak.
40014022	Naas pun Jesus pinakanan dasey tagu, imbagana asda pasurutna ey alluganda assey bangka ta amangpanguda ey mandormang ad jumang ta asi umunud nu palibbatuna dasey tagu.
40014023	Ummayow pun dasey tagu, nanagada as Jesus ey ummuy assey tagudtud ey umuy alluwaru. Anna pun ey lummavi, sissiya atgey as Jesus assey tagudtud,
40014024	kon naas ogon ummadayu sey bangka ey nallulugganan dasey pasurutna assey beybey ey mituppituppiyak tey andangsor sey abvid ey miyaboabot an jida.
40014025	Anna pun ey madamaan, ummunud as Jesus ey nanaran assey usun sey danum ey kumatam an jida.
40014026	Innilan pun dasey pasurutna siya ey manaradaran assey usun sey danum, nikuugyatda at sikukulisda ey kananda, “Atiy, liyawan!”
40014027	Kon gumminga ey dagus as Jesus ey kanana, “Sa'un nauy, aji kayu umugyat!”
40014028	At gumminga as Peter ey kanana, “Apu, nu tuttuwa ey sika nait, ayaganak ey umali an sika ey manaran assey usun sey danum.”
40014029	At kanan Jesus, “Umalika!” At lummogsad as Peter assey bangka at insaradna ey manaran assey usun sey danum ey umuy an Jesus.
40014030	Kon giniknana pun sey amud ey dangsor sey abvid, nikuugyat at anna ey isaradna ey malitup. At kanana ey nangkulis, “Apu, Sarakanak!”
40014031	At jinawat Jesus ey dagus sey imana at kanana, “Ey kurang atpey sey pammatim an sa'un? Ngey paka anjuwajuwa?”
40014032	Anna pun ey summakeyda assey bangka, gumminok sey abvid.
40014033	At nandayow da pasurutna an siya ey kananda, “Sika tuttuwa sey Anak Apudyus!”
40014034	Jummatongda pun assey sakup sey Gennesaret,
40014035	immatunan dasey taguʼsji as Jesus. Kingwada pun, ummuyda impaayag da amin ey masakit as dasey kavubruvubruy siji ta iyuyda an Jesus.
40014036	Ya nampangpangaasida an siya ta iparuvusna atyén asda masakit ta todkonda lawa sey pagpag sey lumvunna. At dasey masakit ey nandok assey lumvunna, nakaan dasey sakitda.
40015001	Usa pun ey ag-agow, inggow dasey Farisis ya dasey mimisturun sey lintog ey narpu ad Jerusalem ey ummuy an Jesus. Kananda,
40015002	“Pan lawa dasey pasurutnu anna aji unujun sey ugali ey impatawid dasey dakdakor taku? Ajida pun unujun sey ustu ey koon ey amvuru asida at mangan.”
40015003	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Dakayu pey, payu aji unujun sey vilin Apudyus ta siya at avus unujunyu sey mismu ey ugaliyu?
40015004	Tey sey imvilin Apudyus at kanana, ‘Rispituwum da amam an inam,’ at ‘Nu awad mangarawag unnu mangwa as lawingan assey amana unnu inana, masapur ey mipagngat.’
40015005	Kon sabali mit sey apporoyu itudtuju. Tey kananyu ey nu awad atyén mabalin as iturung sey tagu assey amana ya inana, urey ajina atjun nu allasun ey kanana, ‘Sey iturungku an dakayu, luusku imposta ey maatud an Apudyus.’
40015006	At kananyu ey nu siyaji sey ibagada, mapasinsiyada ey urey ajida rispituwun dasey dakdakorda ey mangatud as masapurda. Assey tudtujuyu sanat, iwwalinyu dasey lintog Apudyus ta sey mismu ey ugaliyu sey unujunyu.
40015007	At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ipippiilayu atpey anggey sey pammatiyu an Apudyus. At tuttuwa sey impabagan Apudyus an Profet Isaiah assey kar-argow ey kanana,
