40015008	‘Dasey tagu anna, sungadda anggey sey mandaydayow kon assey katuttuwaan niippun layadda an sa'un.
40015009	Ya niippun servin sey mandayawanda tey siya itudtujuda dasey vilin sey tagu ey ambalinunda as vilinku.’”
40015010	Naas pun Jesus inugudji, inayagana dasey adjuwan ey tagu at kanana an jida, “Dongronyu sey ibagak anna ta maawatanyu!
40015011	Dakumpun assey makan ey miigga assey sungad sey tagu sey mangimparwing an siya an Apudyus, nu aji dasey lawingan ey igingan sey sungadna.”
40015012	Oni pun, ummadani dasey pasurutna an siya at kananda, “Niinsurtu akey dasey Farisis assey imbagam saji.”
40015013	Kon kanan Jesus ey nampani, “Amin ey mura ey dakumpun as Ama ad langit sey nangimmura at mabagutda.
40015014	Amorna pey lawa da Farisis anna tey jida dasey kamaʼs vurag ey apporow mangimpuyut assey vurunda ey kama vus as nabvurag. At nu nabvurag sey mangimpuyut assey usa vus ey vurag, siguraju ey matokdégda losan assey bakras.”
40015015	At gumminga as Peter ey kanana, “Ey mabalin ipaagammum an dakani nu ngan sey piun sey pinanim saji ey ugujun miipanggop assey mangimparwing assey tagu an Apudyus?”
40015016	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Sakka, urey atpey vus dakayu at ajiyu pun naawatan?
40015017	Ey ajiyu pun agammu ey amin ey umuy assey sungad sey tagu at umuy assey vuwang ya oni ey niyattey?
40015018	Kon dasey lumuswa assey sungad ey igingan sey tagu at marpu assey somsomok, da nauy sey mangimparwing asda tagu an Apudyus.
40015019	Tey assey somsomok, siya sey marpuwan dasey amin ey lawingan ey panggop da tagu. At da nauy sey manginturung assey tagu ey gumngat, mikadagdagas, ujum ey kaggissow ey kookoon da tagu, da man-akow, da man-us-ussat ya mangkaput.
40015020	Da nauy sey mangimparwing asda tagu an Apudyus. Kon nu sey aji mangwaan asda gagangey ey koon ey amvuru, dakumpun as siyanaʼt sey mangimparwing asda tagu an Apudyus.”
40015021	Ummayow pun da Jesus assey lugar saji, ummuyda assey ili ey sakupun sey Tyre ya Sidon.
40015022	Assey vubruy saji ey ummayanda, inggow sey usa ey vubai ey Gentil ey vinumruy siji ey ummuy an Jesus at kanana ey nangipkow, “Sika Apu ey ganak ari David, kadaguwanak an sika tey anji sey anakku ey matongtong-ag tey nilun-ugan sey jimunyu.”
40015023	Kon aji pun as Jesus gummingginga at ummadani dasey pasurutna at kananda, “Ibagam pey la an siya ta umayow tey tomorong ya anna ey umunnuunnud an jitaku.”
40015024	Vinaliwit Jesus sey vubai saji at kanana, “Niippun ujum as gadtok Ama ey Apudyus assey nangimbaarana an sa'un nu aji anggey as kasarakan dasey iyIsrael ey kamadaʼs natarak ey karneru.”
40015025	Kon ummadani sey vubai ey nallikkadang assey sinagung Jesus ey kanana, “Pangngaasim ta turunganak, Apu!”
40015026	Summongbat vus as Jesus ey kanana, “Ey mabalin pun lawa aran sey kanun sey anak ya impakan asda asu?”
40015027	“Tuttuwa naʼt Apu,” Kanan sey vubai, “Kon urey dasey asu at mabalinda kanun sey wayakwak sey sin-asu an jida.”
40015028	At kanan Jesus assey vubai, “Mandogot tuttuwa sey pammatim an sa'un! At makwa sey pium ey kudawun.” At vummaru ey dagus sey anakna saji.
40015029	Ummayow pun as Jesus assey lugar saji, nanguy assey igid sey beybey ad Galili asi at nanagada assey tagudtud. Intukjuna pun,
40015030	ummuy dasey amud ey tagu ey nangindatong an siya asda masakit. Awadka ey piley, vurag, nais-is sey sikina anda imana, omor ya da ujum ey antokotokon sey sakitda. Inniyuyda assey sinagung Jesus at naminna jida inagasan.
40015031	At dasey omor, makagingada, vummaru dasey nais-is sey imana anda sikina, makadaran dasey piley ya makaila dasey vurag. Innilan pun dasey tagu sey nakwa saji, amud sey nasdaawanda at jinayowda as Apudyus ey daydayawun dasey iyIsrael.
40015032	Ummuy pun as turu ey ag-agow sey iniiggawanda siji, inayagan Jesus dasey pasurutna at kanana an jida, “Madaguwak asda tagu anna tey mikatlu ey ag-agow nauy ey nikig-owda an jitaku at naamin dasey barunda. Sumangaak ey amalibbat an jida nu ajida yén mangan tey oni at lawa ya mangunawada assey daran gapu assey inuratda.”
40015033	“Ampey,” kanan dasey pasurutna, “Kon gona intaku mangar-an as ipakan taku as dasey amud ey tagu sana, niippun vus adani as vubruy assey iggow taku anna.”
40015034	Inimus Jesus asda pasurutna ey kanana, “Kam-ana ey tinapey sey awad an dakayu?” “Anna anggey sey pitu ey tinapey ya sey akit ey angkabaran-it ey aggajiw,” kanan dasey pasurutna.
40015035	At imbagan Jesus as dasey tagu ta itukjuda.
40015036	Asina at aran sey pitu ey tinapey ya sey aggajiw at nansaramat an Apudyus. Pinitpit-ingna pun, innatudna asda pasurutna ta iwarasda asda tagu.
40015037	At nangan amin da tagu inggana as ning-opda. Asin at dasey pasurutna ugpunun dasey vunada. Jinagupda pun, nakoan sey pitu ey awit.
40015038	Sey vilang dasey laraki ey nangan at ummuy as opatlivu ey aji pun nijuga nivilang dasey vubai ya da aanak.
40015039	Naasda pun nangan, pinalibbat Jesus dasey tagu asida at ambangka ey mandormang assey beybey ey umuy assey sakupun sey Magadan.
40016001	Inggow dasey ummuy an Jesus ey Farisis anda Sajusis ey piunda siya barbaliyan. Imbagada an siya ey angimpiila as kaskasdaow ey sinyar ey as Apudyus sey tuttuwa ey nangimbaar an siya.
40016002	Kon kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Nu anna ey mipisuk as init ya allidaga ad langit, kananyu ey, ‘Ambaru sey timpu assey sana tey anna ey lummidaga ad langit.’
40016003	Ya nu viggaviggat ey vus ya anna ey lummidaga ya gommongot ad langit, kananyu vus, ‘Umudan nin tey anna ey lummidaga ya gummongot ad langit.’ Agammuyu ey mangillasin assey timpu nu ilanyu ad langit, kon niippun agammuyu ey mangillasin assey piuna ugujun dasey kookoon Apudyus assey timpu sana!
40016004	Dakumpun dasey tagu assey sana! Magda gey nan-awidan as Apudyus! Ipapilitda at avus gey ey mangimpiilaak as kaskasdaow as angimmatunanda an sa'un, kon niippun mipiila an jida nu aji anggey sey anung sey nakwa an Jonah assey kar-argow.” Imbagan pun Jesus ji, tineynana jida.
40016005	Nandormang pun da Jesus assey beybey saji, simsimmok dasey pasurutna ey naliwatanda ey nantiplag as tinapey.
40016006	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Ammaanyu mampey imamad ilan sey tinuktuk dasey Farisis anda Sajusis.”
40016007	Imbagan pun Jesus jiyuy, insaradda ey ambabagbaga ey kananda, “Imbagana nin jiyuy tey niippun tiplag taku as tinapey.”
40016008	Kon inagammun Jesus sey uguugujunda at siya kanana an jida, “Pa kayu siaagutimtim assey niippun kanun taku? Ey gaggatung atpey sey pammatiyu ta madanagan kayu?
40016009	Ey ajiyu pun pey dallu maawatan? Ey naliwat kayu assey lima ey tinapey ey ummaney as nipakan as dasey nasuruk as limallivu ey tagu ya nu kam-ana sey inugpunyu ey vunada?
40016010	Ya ngan annun vus sey pitu ey tinapey ey lamug dasey nasuruk as opatlivu ey kinan ya nu kam-ana vus sey inugpunyu ey vunada?
40016011	At ngan-annuna ey ajiyu pun maawatan sey ibagabagak ey dakumpun assey tinapey sey uguugujuk an dakayu. Tey sey piuk ey ibaga an dakayu ad ganad at man-annad kayu asda tinuktuk da Farisis anda Sajusis.”
40016012	Imbagan pun Jesus jiyuy, naawatan dasey pasurutna ey dakumpun assey tinuktuk ey muusar assey angwaan as tinapey nu aji sey tudtujun dasey Farisis anda Sajusis.
40016013	Jummatong pun da Jesus assey dokor ey vubruy ad Caesarea Filipay, inimusna asda pasurutna ey kanana, “Ngan sey kanan da tagu miipanggop an Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu?”
40016014	At kananda ey summongbat, “Kanan da ujum ey sika kanu as John ey Amvuvunyag. Kanan vus da ujum ey sika as profet Elijah. Ya kananda da ujum ey sika as Jeremiah unnu usa asda profet assey kar-argow.”
40016015	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Dakayu pey, ngan sey miibagayu an sa'un?”
40016016	At kanan Simon Peter ey gumminga, “Sika sey Cristu ey Anak Apudyus ey niposta ey umali ey matattagu as ing-inggana.”
40016017	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Nagasatka Simon ey anak John, tey dakumpun as tagu sey nangimpaagammu an sika nu aji as Ama ad langit.
40016018	At ey sana, ngadanak sika an Peter, ey sey piuna ugujun, batu. At sey batu anna sey kamaʼs pon-ad ey mangimpatakjugak assey simbaanku ey jida dasey mamati an sa'un. At niippun mabalin makaabak an jida, urey sey pannakabalin sey katuy.
40016019	Piyaruk vus sika ey mangjun assey turvik ey mamkat assey manturayan Apudyus ad langit. At dasey ajim pun iparuvus assey luta anna at aji pun vus miparuvus ad langit ya sey iparuvusnu assey luta anna, miparuvus ad langit.”
40016020	At vinilin Jesus dasey pasurutna ey ajida ibagabaga asda barangna ey tagu ey siya sey Cristu.
40016021	Manlugi assey timpu saji, insarad Jesus ey mangimpakaawat asda pasurutna ey kanana, “Masapur inyak ad Jerusalem ya tongtong-agunak ikow as dasey angkamarong-ag ey papangat dasey iyIsrael ya dasey papangat da papaji anda mimisturun sey lintog asida at sa'un ipagngat. Kon umuliyak vus pigey assey mikatlu ey ag-agow.”
40016022	Imbagan pun Jesus jiyuy, intar-an Peter inayagan asina at ingoran ta ajina atyén kanan siji ey guminga, kanana, “Apu, ajin atyén Apudyus iparuvus ey makwa nait an sika!”
40016023	Nambaliwit as Jesus an Peter at kanana, “Umayowka, sika Satanas! Ajim sa'un sugsugan ey aji mangwa assey piun Apudyus. Tey sey awad assey somsomoknu, dakumpun an Apudyus sey narpuwana nu aji narpu assey somsomok ji tagu.”
40016024	Inturuy Jesus ey gumminga asda pasurutna, kanana, “Ngan ey sey maryad ey ambalin as pasurutku, masapur ey dakumpun as sey viyagna assey luta anna sey ipapangugna tey masapur ey vukudana sey krusna ta umunud an sa'un.
40016025	Tey sey tagu ey angimpapangug assey kataguwana assey luta anna at matuy dallu, kon sey tagu ey matuy gapu assey pammatina an sa'un, maatud an siya sey kasinna mataguwan as ing-inggana.
40016026	Tey niippun dallu servina, urey nu angkuwam sey amin ey awad assey luta anna nu as oni ey imballun sika an Apudyus ey majusa as ing-inggana. Tey niippun umaney as vinaknang as ibayad sey tagu ta mabalin mijuga an Apudyus.
40016027	Tey Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, ampuuliyak ey mangikuyug as dasey enjelku ya ipiilak vus sey kinaApudyus Ama. Assey siyaji ey timpu, siyaji sey mangatudak assey gun-gunan sey usa ya usa ey mibasar assey kingwada.
40016028	At ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa ey awadda an dakayu assey sana sey aji pun matuy inggana as ilanda sey mansardan sey tureyku, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu.”
40017001	Ummayow pun sey onom ey ag-agow, inayagan Jesus as Peter ya da James an John ey ansunud at nanagadada ey ummuy assey antaknang ey vilig.
40017002	Assey nangiil-anda an Jesus, maggey nambakra sey ilana. Jumilajilang sey vusarna ey anungna sey init ya pummutak sey lumvunna ey sumilisiling.
40017003	At maggey nampiila da Moses an Elijah ey mikabagbaga an siya.
40017004	Gumminga as Peter ey kanana an Jesus, “Apu, ambaru ta anna taku as nauy! Nu pium, mangwaak as turu ey bawi sina ta angkuwam sey usa, angkuwan Moses sey usa ya angkuwan Elijah sey usa.”
40017005	Sissiya atgey as Peter ey gumingaginga assey kinuvutan sey jumilajilang ey livuu jida ya inggow sey gumminga ey narpu assey livuu ey kanana, “Nauy sey pipiuk ey anakku ey angatud as ustu ey ming-opak, dongronyu sey ibagana!”
40017006	Jingngor pun dasey aposel sey ginga saji, nallukvubda assey luta gapu assey amud ey ugyatda.
40017007	Ummadani as Jesus at inagpadana jida ey kanana, “Itakjugyu, aji kayu umugyat!”
40017008	Nammotwada pun ey allangranga, anggey as Jesus sey inggow an jida.
40017009	Assey anna ey man-usugda assey vilig, vinilin Jesus jida ey kanana, “Ajiyu ibagabaga sey innilayu saji inggana as mataguwak kasin, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu.”
40017010	At inimus dasey pasurut Jesus ey kananda, “At nu kanaʼsna, pan la dasey mimisturun sey lintog kanan ey amangpangu as Elijah umali nu sika?”
40017011	“Tuttuwa ey mamangpangu as Elijah umali ta isaganana sey amin,” kanan Jesus ey summongbat.
40017012	“Kon ibagak an dakayu ey naas ummali as Elijah, kon ajin pun da tagu immatunan tey siya at avus kingwada sey piunda koon an siya. At kanaʼsji vus sey koon da tagu ey manongtong-ag an sa'un, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu.”
40017013	At naawatan da pasurutna ey siya uguugujuna an jida sey miipanggop an John ey Amvuvunyag.
40017014	Nampuulida pun, nandatnganda dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey naaamung. Inggow sey usa an jida ey laraki ey ummadani an Jesus at nallikkadang ey
40017015	kanana, “Apu, kadaguwam sey anakku ey laraki! Nakkordas at amud sey tongtong-agna nu lumuswa sey sakitna at siya sey apporona mootdagan assey apuy ya danum.
40017016	Inniyuyku siya asda pasurutnu kon ajida pun kaviilan ey mangagas an siya.”
40017017	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Amud kayu vus pey ey tagu assey sana tey dakumpun sey awad assey somsomokyu ya niippun pigey tuttuwa pammatiyu an sa'un! Urey nin nu iinggawak an dakayu, ansigavunyu pey dallu ey mamati an sa'un. Iyaliyu an sa'un sey anak sanat!”
40017018	Minandaran Jesus sey jimunyu ey nallun-ug assey anak saji at ummayow at dagus ey vummaru sey anak.
40017019	Ummanggeyda pun asda pasurutna, inimusda an siya, “Ngey pakani aji makaparyow assey jimunyu saji?”
40017020	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Siya in tey kurang sey pammatiyu. Kon isigurajuk an dakayu ey nu awad pammatiyu as urey amud sey kaban-itna ey anung sey kaban-it sey vukar sey mustasa, mabalinyu iyumug ey maatun sey vilig anna at maatun tuttuwa ya mabalin ey amin ey piunyu koon at makwa!”
40017022	Usa pun ey ag-agow ey nadagup da Jesus asda pasurutna assey iggawanda ad Galili, kanan Jesus an jida, “Tigangey sey malliputanda ya mipurangak asda vumusur an sa'un, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu.
40017023	Gongatunak, kon taguwun Apudyus sa'un assey mikatlu ey ag-agow.” Jingngorda pun sey inugud Jesus saji, amud sey jujuuyda.
40017024	Jummatong pun da Jesus ya dasey pasurutna ad Capernaum, ummuy dasey mansisingil as vuur sey Tempél at inimusda an Peter ey kananda, “Ey da ambayad sey misturuyu anna assey vuur sey Tempel?”
40017025	At kanan Peter ey summongbat, “Ngamman nu'.” Anna pun ey sumakey as Peter assey vuruy, namangu as Jesus gumminga ey kanana, “Simon, ngan sey kasomsomkam? Ngan sey ansingilan dasey ari assey luvung anna assey vuur, ey dasey taguna unnu dasey ujum ey tagu?”
40017026	At kanan Peter, “Asda ujum in ey tagu.” At kanan vus Jesus, “Nu kanaʼsnaʼt, aji pun masapur ey ambayad dasey taguna.
40017027	Kon urey nu kanaʼsnaʼt, aji taku angwaʼs lumawingan sey somsomok da tagu anna. At ingka mamungwit assey beybey. Ya sey ab-avus sey vungwitam, takangum sey sungadna at udasam sey parata ey lamugna as ibayadta. Aram ta ingka bayadan sey vuurta.”
40018001	Assey timpu saji, ummuy dasey pasurut Jesus an siya at inimusda, “Ngan sey mivilang as kangatuwan ey tagu assey manturayan Apudyus?”
40018002	Inayagan Jesus sey usa ey anak at pinasikadna assey sinagungda,
40018003	at kanana, “Isigurajuk an dakayu ey aji kayu pun makasakey assey Turey Apudyus ad langit nu ajiyu atuvun sey somsomokyu ey anungna sey angokoon sey anak anna.
40018004	Tey sey kangatuwan assey Turey Apudyus ad langit at sey mangimpakumbaba assey long-agna ey anungna sey anak anna.
40018005	Ya ngan ey sey angimvilang assey nababa ey tagu ey anung sey anak anna gapu assey pammatina an sa'un, sa'un sey imvilangna.”
40018006	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Kon nu awad ey mangwa as allapuwan sey usa ey kababaan ey tagu ey mangimpug-an assey pammatina an sa'un, unina at pey lawa nu awad ji dokor as batu ey mitakud assey bagangna asi at mipisuk assey adarum ey beybey.
40018007	“Kadagdagu dasey tagu assey luta anna tey amud pey maawisanda ey vumasur. Siguraju ey awad dasey sulisug, kon sin-umamud ey kadagdagu sey tagu ey mangwa as lapun sey masulisuganda.
40018008	“At nu sey imam unnu sey sikim sey lapun sey makabasuram, putjum ta iballum! Tey un-unina ey niippun sey usa ey ima unnu siki ey mikig-ow an Apudyus nu sey wadawad sey ima anda siki ya mipisukka assey apuy ey gumilgillajung as ing-inggana.
40018009	At nu sey atam sey lapun sey vumasuram, ukitum ta iballum, tey un-unina ey urey sa'an sey ata ey mikig-ow an Apudyus nu sey wadawad sey ata ya mipisukka assey apuy ey gumilgillajung as ing-inggana.
40018010	“At siya sey man-annad kayu ta ajiyu laylaysun sey urey usa asda kababaan ey tagu ey kamaʼs da anak anna. Tey isigurajuk an dakayu ey awad dasey enjelda ey kanayun assey iggow Amak ad langit ey mangiila an jida.
40018011	Tey Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, ummaliyak assey luta anna ta inyak isarakan dasey natarak ey tagu.”
40018012	Imbagan pun Jesus da jiyuy, nampani ey kanana, “Ngan sey kananyu assey tagu ey awad sey singgasut ey karneruna ya natarak sey usa? Ey ajina pun pun lawa teynan dasey siyampuru ya siyam ta anapuna sey sa'an ey natarak?
40018013	At nu udasana, isigurajuk an dakayu ey sin-umamud sey layadna assey sa'an ey karneru saji nu dasey siyampuru ya siyam ey aji pun natarak.
40018014	Kanaʼsji vus an Amayu ad langit ey sumanga nu awad matarak as urey sa'an asda kababaan ey tagu.”
40018015	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nu awad vurunnu as nakabasur an sika, ingka yén mikabagbaga, kon ilam ta anggey kayu ey juwa. At nu dongrona sika, mipuuli kasin sey ambaru ey amvurunanyu.
40018016	Kon nu ajina pun sika dongron, man-ayagka as sa'an unnu juwa as amvurunnu. Tey kasapuran ey awad juwa unnu turu as manakjug assey amin ey man-uugudan.
40018017	At nu aji pun pey dallu jumngor, ibagayu asda amin ey vungguyyu ey mamati. Kon nu sumanga pey dallu ey mangngor assey ibagan da vurunyu ey mamati, ivilangyu siya as usa ey aji pun mamati unnu usa ey akkawan ey apporow mandagup assey vuur.
40018018	“At isigurajuk an dakayu ey nu awad isangayu assey luta anna, isangan vus Apudyus ad langit ya da iparuvusyu assey luta anna at iparuvus vus Apudyus ad langit.
40018019	“Sey usa vus ey ibagak an dakayu at nu awad juwa an dakayu as man-isu sey somsomokna ey angkudow an Amak ad langit, atjuna sey kudawunyu.
40018020	Tey urey nu awad juwa unnu turu as madagup gapu assey pammatida an sa'un, awadak an jida ey nijuga.”
40018021	As jiyuy, ummuy as Peter an Jesus at kanana, “Apu, nu sissiya sey vurunku ey vumasubasur an sa'un, anginnuwuk pakawanun? Ey inggana as angimpitu?”
40018022	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Aji pun angimpitu anggey nu aji angimpitupitu.”
40018023	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Tey sey Turey Apudyus ad langit at kanaʼsna sey mipaniyana; Inggow sey Ari ey simsimmokna ey mansingil asda opisyarna ey nakautang an siya.
40018024	Anna pun ey isaradna atyén ey manuntun asda nakautang, indatongda sey usa ey nakautang as kalivulivu.
40018025	At gapu ta aji pun makabayad assey utangna, imbagan sey Ari an siya ey minginada ey simbaryan ya dasey laksunna ta awad mibayad assey utangna.
40018026	Kon nallikkadang sey opisyar saji assey sinagung sey ari ey kanana, ‘Kadaguwanak an sika, apu. Anusam yén ey anguulley inggana as mabayadak sey amin ey utangku an sika!’
40018027	Nadaguwan sey Ari saji at pinaryowna ey kanana, ‘Liwatak pey lawa sey utangnu at urey ajim bayadan.’
40018028	“Kon anna pun ey ummayow sey tagu saji, inabotna sey usa ey vurunna ey opisyar ey nakautang an siya as singgasut anggey. Kingwana pun, jinokmaana at kintorna ey kanana, ‘Bayadam sey utangnu an sa'un!’
40018029	Nallikkadang sey vurunna saji ey ampangpangaasi ey kanana, ‘Kadaguwanak an sika, apu. Anusam yén ey manguulley inggana as mabayadak sey utangku an sika.’
40018030	Kon ajina pun inavunan, nu aji impabarudna at avus inggana as mabayadana sey utangna.
40018031	Innilan pun dasey ujum ey vuvurunna sey kingwana saji, naalimuunda at ummuyda imbaga an Ari sey nakwa saji.
40018032	“Inayagan ari sey opisyar saji at kanana, ‘Ummamdanka vus pey! Niliwatak sey utangnu ya kanak ey urey ajim bayadan tey siya sey dawatnu.
40018033	Ngey paka aji nadaguwan assey vurunnu anna ey kama assey nangadaguwak an sika?’
40018034	At gapu assey amud ey sangan ari, impisukna sey tagu saji assey baballudan ta tongtong-agunda inggana as bayadana sey amin ey utangna.”
40018035	Inyanungus Jesus ey nangimbaga, kanana, “kanaʼsji vus sey koon Amak ad langit an dakayu nu ajiyu tuttuwaun ey mamakawan asda vurunyu.”
40019001	Naas pun Jesus intudtuju da nauy, tineynana sey vubruy ad Galili at nandormang assey dawwang ad Jordan ey ummuy assey sakup sey Judea.
40019002	Amud pey dasey ummunud an siya, at kinaanna sey sakit dasey awad sakitna.
40019003	Inggow da ujum ey Farisis ey ummuy an Jesus ta padasunda ey allilawun siya. Kananda, “Ey iparuvus sey lintog taku ey idangan sey laraki sey asawana assey barangna ey lasun?”
40019004	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Ey ajiyu pun vinasa sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus assey ab-avus sey nangwaana asda tagu? Kingwana sey laraki ya vubai
40019005	at kanana, ‘Siya nauy sey lapuna nu paʼn lawa sey laraki teynan dasey dakdakorna ta miyaggum an asawana ta ambalindaʼs sa'an ey long-ag.’
40019006	At gapu ta dokonda pun as juwa, nambalinda ogon as sa'an ey long-ag. At ngan man sey nan-aggumun Apudyus, aji pun mabalin ey man-idangun sey tagu.”
40019007	Kanan vus dasey Farisis, “Ampey, kon pan lawa Moses ibaga ey mabalin angatud sey laraki as kasuratan as angimpatuttuwa ey man-idangda asina at siya paryawun?”
40019008	At kanan vus Jesus, “Pinaruvusan Moses dakayu ey mangidang asda asawayu tey tummabvug kayuʼs matudtujuwan. Kon dakumpun as kananaʼsnaʼt assey nangwaan Apudyus asda tagu assey ab-avusna.
40019009	At ibagak an dakayu ey nu awad laraki as mangidang assey asawana as urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey lasun, maraksig nu nikadagdagas assey sabali ey laraki, makabasur siya nu mangasawa assey sabali ey vubai tey miivilang vus as dagdagasna sey mikagwa saji.”
40019010	Kanan dasey pasurutna an siya, “At nu kananaʼsnaʼt sey makwa asda man-asawa, ambab-aru nu ajita pey lawa mangasawa.”
40019011	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Tuttuwa ey awad da ujum ey makaawat tey inatdan Apudyus jida as kaviilan ey ajida pun mangasawa, kon dasey aji pun naatdan, ajida pun makakwa assey imbagayu sanat.
40019012	Tey awad da ujum ey nisigud assey niyanakanda, niippun magiknada ya awad vus da ujum ey nivutuwan. Kon awad da ujum ey ajida pun mangasawa gapu ta piunda ey sa'anun sey somsomokda ey mangiwwarawag miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus. At ngan ey sey makaawat assey tudtuju sana, koona.”
40019013	Usa pun ey ag-agow, inggow dasey nangiyyuy asda anakda an Jesus ta ipateyna sey imana ey mangilluwaru an jida. Kon iningoran dasey pasurutna jida.
40019014	Kon kanan Jesus, “Amorna ey umali dasey anak an sa'un. Ajiyu isanga sey umaliyanda tey dasey tagu ey kama asda anak anna sey kopyada, jida sey mijuga assey Turey Apudyus ad langit.”
40019015	Impateyn Jesus sey imana ey nangilluwaru an jida, asi at umayow.
40019016	Usa pun ey ag-agow, inggow sey laraki ey ummuy an Jesus at kanana, “Apu, ngan nin sey ambaru ey kook ta mikataguwak an Apudyus as ing-inggana?”
40019017	At kanan Jesus, “Ngey paʼm la an sa'un imusun nu ngan sey ambaru? Sa'an anggey sey ambaru ey siya as Apudyus. Kon nu pium ey maatdan as viyag ey niippun patinggana, unujum dasey lintog Apudyus.”
40019018	At kanan sey tagu saji, “Ngadan dasey lintog ey masapur unujuk?” At kanan Jesus, “Ajika gumngat, mikadagdagas, man-akow ya ajim maggey takjugan sey dakumpun as tuttuwa.
40019019	Nikur-it vus assey lintog Apudyus ey masapur ambaruwum sey koom asda dakdakornu ya masapur maryadka assey asintatagum ey anungna sey layadnu assey long-agnu.”
40019020	At kanan vus sey babaru saji, “Inunudku amin dasey lintog sanat. Ngan pey sey ujum ey masapur ey kook?”
40019021	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Nu pium ey niippun mangkurangam an Apudyus, ingka ingina amin ey laksunnu ta atjum sey nginana asda lumawa, asika at umunud an sa'un, at maatud an sika sey tuttuwa ey vinaknang ad langit.”
40019022	Jingngor pun sey babaru saji sey imbagan Jesus, ummayow ey anjujuuy tey amud sey vinaknangna.
40019023	At kanan Jesus asda pasurutna, “Tuttuwa sey ibagak anna ey ansigab sey mijugaan sey baknang assey Turey Apudyus ad langit.
40019024	Assey katuttuwaan, allaslasu as manikpus sey kemel assey abvut sey tanud nu sey baknang ey mijuga assey Turey Apudyus.”
40019025	Jingngor pun dasey pasurutna sey inugudna saji, amud sey nasdaawanda at kananda, “At nu siyanaʼt, niippun tagu as mabalin ey misarakan.”
40019026	Vinobotog Jesus jida at kanana, “Nu tagu sey angwa as mijug-anda an Apudyus, aji pun mabalin, kon nu as Apudyus sey angwa, mabalin tey niippun aji mabalin an siya.”
40019027	Gumminga as Peter ey kanana, “Dakani pey, tineynanni sey amin ey awad an dakani gapu assey ummunudanni an sika. Ey awad pun la maarani?”
40019028	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Tuttuwa sey ibagak anna an dakayu, nu jumatong sey vumaruwan sey luvung, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, tumukjuwak ey manturey ya miila sey kinadayowku. At awad vus dasey nasawaran as juwa ey tumukjuwanyu ey mikaturey an sa'un. At dakayu sey manginturey asda amin ey ganak dasey nasawaran as juwa ey anak Israel.
40019029	Ya da amin ey naneynan assey vuruyna, susunudna unnu dakdakorna ya dasey lutana gapu assey umunudana an sa'un, sin-umamud sey maatud an jida nu dasey tineynanda. Ya maawad an jida sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
40019030	Kon adjuwan dasey nangatu ey tagu assey sana ey ambalin as nababa. Ya adjuwan vus dasey nababa assey sana ey ambalin as nangatu assey daan ey ag-agow.”
40020001	Kanan Jesus ey nampani, “Sey Turey Apudyus ad langit at anungna assey usa ey tagu ey singkuwa assey luta ey namur-an assey greps. Wikkiwikkis pun ummuy nan-inap as matangdanan as mansiputuna.
40020002	Inggow dasey indasana at nan-aavunanda ey matangdanan dasey mansiput as labvun sey sa'an ey ag-agow, asina at jida baarun ey umuy mansiput assey umana.
40020003	“Anna pun vus ey maayadang as init, ummuy kasin assey matartarpungan dasey vurakvur at innilana ey niippun koonda.
40020004	At kanana an jida, ‘Nu piunyu ey umuy mikasiput, atjuk sey ustu ey tangdanyu.’
40020005	At ummuyda tuttuwa. “Anna pun vus ey mamatuk, ummuy vus kasin nan-ayag as mansiput. Ya siya avus sey kingwana assey magayud.
40020006	Anna pun ey tigangey sey imbobokra, innilana dasey angkasikad ey maam-ammung pey lawa ey niippun koonda, at kanana an jida, ‘Ngey pakayu lawa ammagmagayud sina ey angkasikad, ey niippun koonyu?’
40020007	“At kananda, ‘Niippun ampey mikatangdanan.’ At kanana, ‘Nu kananaʼsnaʼt, ingkayu mikasiput as dasey mansiput assey umak.’
40020008	“Masjum pun, kanan sey sin-uma assey kapatasna, ‘Ibokram dasey nansiput ta atjum sey tangdanda. Amangpanguwum bayadan dasey nangudjiji ey nansiput asim at dasey namangpangu ey ummali.’
40020009	Jummatong pun dasey nansiput, pinanguna vinayadan dasey ummali assey tigangey sey imbobokra assey tangdan sey sa'an ey ag-agow.
40020010	Anna pun ey mabayadan dasey namangpangu ey nansiput assey wikkiwikkis, kananda pun nu ad-aju sey tangdanda, kon nan-iisu sey naatud an jida.
40020011	Innarada pun dasey tangdanda, singungujuda ey manlili assey nanangdan an jida. At kananda,
40020012	‘Sa'an ey uras anggey sey nansiputan da nangudjiji nansiput kon inyanungnu at avus sey tangdanda an dakani ey ummar-argow assey amud ey init!’
40020013	“At kanan sey singkuwa assey uma assey usa an jida, ‘Ajik pun sika niluku. Vinayadak sey ustu ey tangdannu assey usa ey ag-agow ey siya sey nan-avunanta.
40020014	Aram at sey tangdannu ta ingkan. Tey nu piuk ey iyisu sey tangdan dasey nangudjiji ey nansiput ey miyisu an dakayu, sa'un sey simviyang siji ey dakumpun an sika.
40020015	Yangey niippun karobbongak ey mangwa assey piuk ey koon assey pilakku? Ey maaposka gapu ta ajiyak pun niimut?’”
40020016	At inyanungus Jesus ey kanana, “Kanaʼsji sey makwa assey Turey Apudyus tey dasey nababa assey sana, jida sey ngumatu ya dasey nangatu assey sana, jida sey vumaba.”
40020017	Assey nanagad-an da Jesus ey umuy ad Jerusalem, inayagana dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna ta tumar-anda at kanana an jida,
40020018	“Annaya sey ibagak an dakayu. Nu jumatong takuʼsji, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, mipurangak as dasey papangat da paji anda mimisturun sey lintog. Goddonganda sey matuyak,
40020019	asida at sa'un ipurang asda Gentil ta apporoanak ya lapsilapsitanak asida at sa'un ilansa assey krus, kon assey mikatlu ey ag-agow, kasin Apudyus sa'un taguwun.”
40020020	Assey timpu saji, ummadani as asawan Zebedee ya dasey juwa ey anakna an Jesus. Nayyung-uk as inada assey sinagung Jesus at kanana, “Apu, awad atyén sey kudawuk an sika.”
40020021	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Ngadan sey pium ey kudawun?” At kanana, “Ey aji pun lawa mabalin ta nu jumatong sey manturayam, maatdan da anakku anna as nangatu ey saad ta mikatukjuda an sika, usa assey padawanannu ya usa assey padawigim.”
40020022	Gumminga as Jesus asda mansunud ey kanana, “Niippun agammuyu assey ibagabagayu sanat. Ey maanusanyu sey tongtong-ag ey lak-amuk?” “Oon, maanusanni,” ey kananda.
40020023	At kanan vus Jesus an jida, “Tuttuwa ey matongtong-ag kayu ey anungku. Kon dakumpun as lobbongku ey mangimbaga nu ngan sey tumukju assey padawananku ya assey padawigik. Tey as Amak anggey sey simviyang ey mampili.”
40020024	Jingngor pun da vurunda ey aposel sey dawat da juwa ey mansunud sana, summangada an jida.
40020025	At inayagan Jesus jida losan ey kanana, “Agammu taku ey dasey tuturey assey luvung anna at pasigda mandamandaran dasey tagu ey iturturayanda ya anungna vus asda nangatu sey saadna at ipaspas-umda sey kinatureyda.
40020026	Kon dakumpun atyén as kanaʼsji sey koonyu. Tey nu awad maryad an dakayu ey ambalin as ap-apu, masapur ey ambalinuna sey long-agna as baba'arun dasey vurunna.
40020027	Ya nu awad maryad an dakayu ey ambalin as nangatu, masapur ey ambalinuna sey long-agna as kababaan ey alipan dasey vurunna.
40020028	Tey kama an Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, dakumpun as ummaliyak ey ampapuut, kon ummaliyak ey manservi ya angatud assey viyagku ey manubvut assey basur da adjuwan ey tagu.”
40020029	Assey ummayawan da Jesus asda pasurutna ad Jericho, ummunud dasey adjuwan ey tagu an jida.
40020030	Niyaspur ey inggow da juwa ey vurag ey tutukju assey igid sey karsa. Jingngorda pun ey marungey as Jesus, insaradda ey angipkow ey kananda, “Sika ey ganak David, kadaguwam dakani!”
40020031	Iningoran dasey tagu jida ta guminokda, kon indangsorda at avus ey nangipkow ey kananda, “Sika ey ganak David, kadaguwam dakani!”
40020032	Insikad Jesus at inayagana jida ey kanana, “Ngan sey piunyu ey kook an dakayu?”
40020033	At summongbatda ey kananda, “Apu, piunni atyén ey makaila!”
40020034	Nadaguwan as Jesus an jida at tindokna dasey atada at dagus ey makailada, asida at umunud an siya.
40021001	Anna pun ey marungey da Jesus ad Jerusalem ey nibatugda ad Bethfagi assey vilig ad Olib, namangpanguwuna da juwa ey pasurutna.
40021002	Kanana an jida, “Amangpangu kayu ta ingkayu assey oottapun taku anji ey vubruy. Nu jumatong kayuʼsji, udasanyu sey nitatakkud ey donkey ey awad sey ubvuna. Uggasunyu ya iyaliyu jidaʼsna.
40021003	At nu awad manukna an dakayu, ibagayu ey, ‘Masapur sey Apu.’ At iyavunna ey dagus.”
40021004	Nakwa nauy ta tumuttuwa sey imbagan sey profet ey kanana,
40021005	“Ibagayu asda umili ad Jerusalem, ‘Ilanyu, annat ey umali sey Ari ey nangimbaba assey long-agna ey nangakabbayu assey ubvun sey donkey.’”
40021006	At ummuy dasey pasurut Jesus at kingwada sey imbagana ey koonda.
40021007	At indatongda sey donkey ya sey ubvuna asida at iyyap-apda sey lumvunda asi at angabayu as Jesus.
40021008	Amud pey ey tagu sey nangiyyap-ap asda lumvunda assey karsa ya lummup-is da ujum assey pingin da kayu at iyyap-apda assey karsa ey ayun Jesus.
40021009	At dasey tagu ey namangu ya dasey nangudjiji, sivuvuggada ey kananda, “Madayow sey ganak Ari David. Dayawun taku sey ummali ey narpu an Apudyus. Madayow as Apudyus ad langit!”
40021010	Jummatong pun as Jesus ad Jerusalem, niippun kadodongran asda amin ey ummiliʼsji, kananda, “Ngadan tagu sanaʼt?”
40021011	Summongbat dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey ummunud an siya ey kananda, “Siyana as Jesus ey profet ey narpu ad Nazareth ey provinsiyan sey Galili!”
40021012	Ummuy as Jesus assey Tempél at pinaryowna da amin ey angnginngina anda nguminngina as midatun an Apudyus, asina at kalittuwangun sey tebol dasey para oros as pilak ya sey tutukjuwan dasey mallaklaku as karapati.
40021013	Kanana an jida, “Nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus, ‘Sey vuruyku at muusar as malluwaruwan da tagu an sa'un.’ Kon kingwayu at avus as apporow madagupan da man-aakow.”
40021014	Assey iggawan Jesus assey Tempel, ummuy dasey vurag anda pukur at impabaruna jida.
40021015	Kon innilan pun dasey nangatu ey papaji ya dasey mimisturun sey lintog da kaskasdaow ey kingwan Jesus ya dasey anak ey sivuvugga assey Tempél ey mandayow an siya ey ganak David, amud sey sangada!
40021016	At kananda an Jesus, “Ey dodongrom sey kinumbot ey ip-ipkown dasey anak anna?” “Dodongrok mit,” kanan Jesus. At inturuyna ey gumminga, “Ey ajiyu pun vinasa sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Tinudtujuwam dasey anak ya urey dasey ka'iyutting ey manuttuwa ey mandayow an Apudyus.’”
40021017	Imbagan pun Jesus ji, tineynana jida at ummuy ummiyan ad Betani.
40021018	Wikkiwikkis pun assey mavigat ey ampuuli da Jesus ad Jerusalem, nuurat siya.
40021019	Innilana sey kayu ey fig assey igid sey daran at ummuyna nilangranga, kon niippun indasana as vungana nu aji pasig ey tuvu. At kanana assey kayu saji, “Niippun ogon kasinnu amung-an.” Imbagana punji, naryow ey dagus sey kayu.
40021020	Innilan pun da pasurutna, amud sey nasdaawanda, at kananda, “Annuna gey lawa ey naryow ey dagus sey kayu sanat?”
40021021	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Tuttuwa sey ibagak anna an dakayu ey nu awad pammatiyu an Apudyus ey aji kayu anjuwajuwa assey koona, mabalin koonyu sey kingwak anna assey kayu. Ya mabalin vus ibagayu assey vilig anna ey maoppatka ya nipitlakka assey beybey at mabalin ey makwa.
40021022	Tey nu patiyunyu ey koon Apudyus sey kudawunyu an siya, siguraju ey koona.”
40021023	Nampuuli pun as Jesus assey Tempél ey anna ey mantudtuju, summakey dasey nangangatu ey paji ya da angkamarong-ag at kananda an siya, “Ngey kalintogam ey mangwa assey kingwam? Ngan sey nangatud assey karobbongam?”
40021024	Sinongbatan Jesus jida ey kanana, “Anna sey imusuk an dakayu, at nu masongbatanyu, ibagak an dakayu nu ngan sey nangatud as karobbongak ey mangwa asda nauy ey kingwak.”
40021025	At kanana, “Ngan sey nangatud assey karobbongan John ey mamunyag asda tagu? Ey as Apudyus unnu narpu as dasey tagu?” Nambabagbagada ey kananda, “Ngan nin sey isongbat taku? Nu kanan taku ey narpu an Apudyus, aji pey kanana an jitaku ey, ‘Payu ampey aji pinati as John nu'?’
40021026	Kon nu kanan taku vus ey tagu sey nangatud, kagguugyat tey innilam pey nu ngan sey koon da tagu an jitaku tey losanda mit mamati ey as John at usa ey Profet.”
40021027	At kananda an Jesus, “Toan, tey niippun agammuni.” At kanan Jesus an jida, “At nu siyanaʼt, ajik pun vus ibaga an dakayu nu ngan sey nangatud assey karobbongak.”
40021028	At nampani as Jesus an jida ey kanana, “Ngan sey kananyu assey ugujuk anna. Inggow sey usa ey tagu ey juwa da anakna ey laraki. Kanana assey pangu, ‘Anak, ingka assey sana mansiput assey uma, man?’
40021029	“‘Sumangaak,’ kanan sey anak saji, kon panpannusan pun, nansommosommok at ummuy nansiput.
40021030	“Asin at vus sey ama ibaga assey kumagwa ey anakna sey anung sey imbagana assey pangu. At kanan sey anak, ‘Oon Ama, inyak,’ kon aji pun inummuy nansiput.”
40021031	Asin at Jesus kanan as dasey nangangatu ey paji ya da angkamarong-ag, “Ngadannaʼs da juwa sana sey nangwa assey piun amada ey makwa?” “Sey namangu a,” kananda ey summongbat. At kanan Jesus an jida, “Ustu sey imbagayu, kon isigurajuk an dakayu ey dasey ambasbasur ey tagu ey kama asda mansisingil as vuur ya da vubai ey mangin-an sey kinavubaida, jida sey amangpangu mijuga assey Turey Apudyus nu dakayu.
40021032	Tey ummali pun as John ey Amvuvunyag ey nangintudtuju an dakayu assey koonyu ey ambalin as niyun-un ey tagu, ajiyu pun mit siya pinati. Kon as dasey mansisingil as vuur ya da vubai ey mangin-an sey kinavubaida, jida sey namati. Usa pey, urey nu innilayu sey nakwa an jida, aji kayu pun pey dallu nanjujuuli ey namati assey intudtujuna.”
40021033	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Dongronyu sey usa anna ey pani ey ugujuk. Inggow sey usa ey tagu ey singkuwa assey namur-an as greps ey naparangkaan. Nampaabvut as batu ey manayaana assey bérat sey greps nu maasot ya nampatakjug as antaknang ey sigey ta iggawan sey amabantey. At ipaabangna asda ujum ey tagu asi at mambaat assey addayuwan ey ili.
40021034	Jummatong pun sey timpu ey mavurasan sey vungana, nangimbaar asda alipanna ta umuyda aran sey villeyna.
40021035	Kon jummatongda pun, jinokmaan at avus da an-ab-abang dasey alipan. Jinatadatarda sey usa, gingngatda sey usa asida at kubkub-ungun sey usa.
40021036	At kasin nangimbaar sey tagu saji as ad-aju ey alipan nu dasey namangu. Kon kanaʼsji vus sey kingwan dasey an-ab-abang an jida.
40021037	Ummanungus pun, imbaarna sey anakna tey kanana assey somsomokna, ‘Siguraju nin ey iviinda sey anakku.’
40021038	“Kon innilan pun da man-ab-abang sey anakna, kananda, ‘Annat sey anakna ey mallaksun assey luta anna. Ayu gongatun taku siya ta jitaku sey mangingkuwa assey laksunna.’
40021039	At kingwada pun, jinokmaanda at ginuyudda assey lasin sey parangka, asida at gongatun.”
40021040	Inturuy Jesus, kanana, “Nu kanaʼsji sey nakwa, ngan sey kananyu assey koon sey singkuwa assey namur-an as greps as dasey an-ab-abang nu ampuuli?”
40021041	At summongbat dasey nangangatu ey papaji anda angkamarong-ag ey kananda, “Siguraju ey kagguugyat sey koona ey mangngat as dasey lawingʼey tagu ya impaabangna sey lutana asda sabali ey tagu ey mangatud assey ustu ey villeyna nu imvuvuras.”
40021042	Asin at vus Jesus kanan an jida, “Ustu vus aan sey songbatyu. Kon ey ajiyu pun vinasa sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Sey batu ey iwwalin dasey ampatakjug as vuruy, siya at avus sey nambalinun Apudyus as kabaloran ey batu ey mipon-ad ey mangimpapagdot assey vuruy. As Apudyus sey nangwa at nakaskasdaow tuttuwa.’”
40021043	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa ey urey nu dakayu ey iyIsrael sey pinilin Apudyus as taguna, ipog-anna ey manginturey an dakayu ya isaradna ey manginturey asda aminʼey tagu ey mangwa asda niyun-un ey piuna.
40021044	Ya ngan ey sey mootdag ey mibasbas assey batu sana, mamokmok. Ya ngan ey sey mitup-ugan sey batu sana nu map-as, mamokmok ey ambalin as dapur.”
40021045	Jingngor pun dasey nangangatu ey paji anda Farisis sey inugud Jesus ey pani, naawatanda ey jida sey uguugujuna,
40021046	at piunda siya dokmaan, kon umugyatda asda tagu tey vigvigunda ey as Jesus at usa ey profet.
40022001	Kasin as Jesus nampani ey mantudtuju asda tagu, kanana,
40022002	“Sey turey Apudyus at miyanung assey usa ey ari ey nanginsagana assey kasar sey anakna.
40022003	Naas pun nisagana, vinaarna dasey alipanna ta umuyda ibaga as dasey sigud ey nangimbagaanda ta umalida kon ajida pun inummuy.
40022004	Kingwana pun, kasin nambaar as dasey ujum ey alipanna ey umuy mangimbaga asda naimvitar ey mangili, ‘Pangaasiyu ta intaku mikakasar tey naas nisagana sey kangamin. Nuutu dasey naparti ey antataba ey baka. Intaku yén mangan.’
40022005	Kon ajin pun dasey mangili jingngor tey awad ey usa an jida, ummuy pey assey piuna ey ayén. Ummuy da ujum as payow ya sissiya da ujum ey angwa asda kiwaarda.
40022006	Kingwan pun da ujum, jinokmaanda at avus dasey alipan sey ari ya tinongtong-agda jida asida at jida gongatun.
40022007	Amud sey putuk ari at vinaarna dasey surdajuna ey umuy mangngat as dasey ginumngat saji, asina at imandar ey masikuran sey vubruyda.
40022008	Asin at ari ibaga as dasey ujum ey alipanna ey kanana, ‘Nisagana sey amungku, kon dasey tagu ey inimvitarku ajida pun karobbongan ey umali.
40022009	At ingkayu pey lawa assey karsa ya ayaganyu da amin ey tagu ey ilanyu ta umalida ey mikakasar.’
40022010	At ummuy dasey alipan inayagan da amin ey udasanda, masomkan man unnu marangsit ey tagu, at amud sey ummali ey mikakasar at napnu sey dokor ey vuruy ey iggowan sey nangkasar.
40022011	“Oni pun, summakey as ari ey umuy mikaam-ammung as dasey mangili. Innilana at avus sey tagu ey aji pun nallumvun as lumvun ey pangkasar.
40022012	At kanan sey ari, ‘Sika ey sunud, paka maggey umali as nauy ey ajika pun nallumvun assey pangkasar?’ Kon giginnok pey lawa sey tagu saji.
40022013	At imbagan sey ari asda alipanna ey kanana, ‘Takujunyu dasey imana ya sikina ya ivintugyu as pawey ta as jiyuy sey ambaksarana ya ngumarotngotan sey vub-ana.’”
40022014	At inyanungus Jesus ey kanana, “Amud pey dasey naayagan kon akittan dasey piliyun Apudyus ey mijuga assey tureyna.”
40022015	Naas punji, nadagup dasey Farisis at nambabagbagada nu ngan annunda ey mamarbali an Jesus ta nu awad kumbot as ugujuna, awad an-akil-anda ey angindarum an siya.
40022016	At nambaarda as dasey pasurutda ya da ujum ey tagun Herod ey umuy nan-imus an Jesus ey kananda, “Apu misturu, agammuni ey pasig tuttuwa sey ugujum. Agammuni avus ey niippun toktoknom asda tagu, nangatu man unnu nababa tey sey apporom itudtuju at sey katuttuwaan miipanggop assey piun Apudyus ey koon atyén da tagu.
40022017	At ey sana, ngan sey makanam? Ey kumuntra assey lintog taku nu ambayad taku as vuur assey ari ad Rome unnu aji pun?”
40022018	Kon inagammun Jesus sey lawingan ey panggopda at kanana, “Dakayu ey aginsosomkan! Payu sa'un barbaliyan?
40022019	Anginyali kayu uda as pilak ey mibayad assey vuur ta ilak!” Inatjunda pun an siya sey parata,
40022020	kanana, “Ngan sey sin-iglatu ya singngadan assey nimarka sina?”
40022021	“Sey ari ad Rome,” kananda ey summongbat. At kanan vus Jesus, “At nu kananaʼsnaʼt ey sey ari atpey sey singkuwa, atjunyu an siya sey para an siya ya atjunyu vus an Apudyus sey para an Apudyus.”
40022022	Amud sey nasdaawanda assey insongbatna at magda pey lawa tineynan siya.
40022023	Assey ag-agow saji, inggow dasey Sajusis ey ummuy an Jesus. Da nauy dasey aji pun mamati ey awad sey umuliyén dasey natuy. Kananda an Jesus,
40022024	“Apu misturu, sey kanan sey lintog taku ey ingkur-it Moses assey kar-argow, kanana ey nu mangasawa sey usa ey laraki ya natuy ey niippun anakda assey asawana, masapur ey asawaun sey sunudna sey baru ta nu awad ey anakda, miivilang as anak sey natuy saji.
40022025	At assey sana, inggow dasey pitu ey mansusunud ey laraki ey ummili assey vubruy taku anna assey kar-argow. Nangasawa sey pangu, kon natuy ey niippun anakna. At vinnus sey kumagwa ey sunudna sey baru saji.
40022026	Kon siya avus sey nakwa assey kumagwa ya sey kumatlu inggana assey mikapitu.
40022027	Umanungus pun, natuy sey vubai saji.
40022028	At assey sana, ngadanna asda pitu ey ansusunud saji sey ustu ey sin-asawa an siya nu kasin matagu dasey natuy tey losanda mit siya inasawa?”
40022029	Sinongbatan Jesus jida ey kanana, “Kinumbot kayu losan! Niippun pey lawa maawatanyu assey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ya niippun vus maawatanyu assey pannakabalinna.
40022030	Tey nu matagu kasin dasey nangkakatuy, miyanungda as dasey enjel ad langit ey ajida pun mangasawa.
40022031	At nu miipanggop ey assey umuliyén dasey natuy, ey ajiyu pun vinasa sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop as dasey nangkakatuy? Kanan sey Gingan Apudyus an dakayu,
40022032	‘Sa'un an Apudyus ey daydayawun da Abraham, Isaac ya as Jacob.’ Sey piuna ugujun, urey nu natuy da Abraham assey timpu saji, sissiyada ey natattagu ad langit, tey kanan Apudyus ey sissiyada assey sana ey mandaydayow an siya.”
40022033	At nasdaow dasey tagu ey nangngor assey tudtujun Jesus.
40022034	Jingngor pun dasey Farisis ey singkuk Jesus dasey Sajusis, nadagupda asida at umuy assey iggawan Jesus.
40022035	Inggow sey usa an jida ey misturun sey lintog ey namadas ey mamarbali an Jesus assey sarudsud,
40022036	kanana, “Apu misturu, ngan sey kapatigan ey vilin assey lintog Apudyus?”
40022037	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “‘Masapur ey pium as Apudyus ey Apum assey amin ey patinggan sey ansomsomkam, ya assey amin ey koom ya assey amin ey kinariingnu.’
40022038	Nauy sey kapatigan ya kabaloran ey vilin Apudyus.
40022039	Ya sey mikagwa at an-isu sey kapatigna: ‘Masapur ey pium sey asintatagum ey anung sey layadnu assey long-agnu.’
40022040	Da juwa anna ey lintog, at sinakupna dasey amin ey vilin ey ingkur-it Moses ya dasey amin ey intudtujun dasey profet assey kar-argow.”
40022041	Nadagup pun dasey ujum ey Farisis, kanan Jesus an jida,
40022042	“Ngan sey kananyu miipanggop assey Manginsarakan? Ngan sey singganak an siya?” At kananda, “ganak David.”
40022043	At kanan vus Jesus, “Nu kananaʼsnaʼt, pan lawa David awagan siya as Apuna? Tey sey impaspasmok sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey ibagan David, kanana,
40022044	‘Kanan Apudyus assey Apuk: Tumukjuka assey padawananku ingganaʼs abakuk da amin ey kavusurnu.’”
40022045	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “At nu inawagan David sey Manginsarakan as Apuna, ngan annuna ey siya vus sey singganak?”
40022046	Kon niippun makasongbat an jida. At nallugi assey siyaji, niippun manginturud ey kasin mamadas ey mamarbali an siya.
40023001	Gumminga as Jesus asda nadagup ey tagu ya dasey pasurutna, kanana,
40023002	“Dasey misturun sey lintog ya dasey Farisis, jida sey napiyar ey awad karobbongana ey mangimpakaawat assey lintog Apudyus ey ingkur-it Moses.
40023003	At masapur dongronyu ya unujunyu sey amin ey itudtujuda an dakayu, kon ajiyu unujun sey koko'onda tey ajida pun koon sey apporoda itudtuju.
40023004	Ya dada patur-ayan dasey piun sey lintog ibaga inggana as marigatan da tagu ey mangunud. Kama as ipavukudda asda tagu dasey andadagsun ey vukud kon ajida pun lawa uyajun sey imada ey tumurung.
40023005	Ya amin ey koonda, koonda pey lawa as pippiila ta idayown da tagu jida. At impaarwada dasey miiggaan sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey ibabadarda asda kitungda ya asda takreyda ya impaanjuda vus sey gayadan sey lumvunda ta awad vuyaun da tagu.
40023006	Ya nu awad amuamung, maryadda ey tumukju assey tukjun dasey nangangatu ey tagu ya anungna vus assey sinagog ey apporow madagupan dasey Jews.
40023007	Maryadda avus ey marispitu nu umuyda manggaggakey ya maryadanda nu awagan da tagu jida as, ‘Madaydayow ey Apu misturu.’
40023008	“Kon an dakayu ey, ajiyu agaban ey awagan dakayu asda vurunyu as ‘Apu Misturu,’ tey an-iisu kayu losan ya sa'un anggey sey misturuyu.
40023009	Ya ajiyu awagan sey urey barangnaʼsnaʼt ey tagu assey luta anna as ‘Ama,’ tey sa'an anggey sey Amayu ey Apudyus ey awad ad langit.
40023010	Ajiyu agaban ey awagan dakayu as ‘Apu,’ tey sa'an anggey sey Apuyu ey as Cristu.
40023011	Sey ampakumbaba ey ambalinuna sey long-agna as katurungan sey vurunna at siya sey kangatuwan an dakayu.
40023012	Ya ngan ey sey mangimpangatu assey long-agna at mibaba, ya ngan ey sey mangimpababa assey long-agna at siya sey ambalin as nangatu.”
40023013	Inturuy Jesus ey gumminga, “Kadagdagu kayu, dakayu ey misturun sey lintog ya dakayu ey Farisis, dakayu ey aginsosomkan! Tey kama as inumbanyu sey sawang ey ayun atyén dasey tagu ey ummuy assey turey Apudyus. At siya sey ajiyu pun mijug-an assey turey Apudyus tey ajiyu pun imparuvus dasey maryad ey mijuga.
40023014	“Kadagdagu kayu, dakayu ey misturun sey lintog ya dakayu ey Farisis, dakayu ey aginsosomkan! Miid ajiyu koon ey mamarbali asda baru ta awad agammuyu ey mangara as dasey laksunda ya urey dasey vuruyda. Ya inanjuanjuyu ey alluwaru as vuyaun da tagu. Gapu assey nauy ey kookoonyu, siguraju ey sin-umamud sey majusaanyu.
40023015	“Kadagdagu kayu, dakayu ey misturun sey lintog ya dakayu ey Farisis, dakayu ey aginsosomkan! Magyu gey da dormangun dasey beybey ya naktad kayu as dasey addayuwan ey ili ey mangawis as urey sa'an ey mampasurutyu. Ya nu awad ey awisunyu, nambalinunyu siya as sin-umamud nu dakayu ey majusa ad inférnu.
40023016	“Kadagdagu kayu akey tey kama kayu as vurag ey apporow mangimpuyut asda vurunyu. Tey sey tudtujuyu, kananyu, nu awad mansapata ya sey Tempél sey usaruna ey mansapata, dakumpun as basurna nu ajina pun tongparun, kon nu sey vurawan ey awad assey Tempél sey usaruna ey mansapata, masapur ey koona sey insapatana.
40023017	Vurag kayu pigey tuttuwa ya ung-ung kayu! Ey nabarbalor sey vurawan unnu sey Tempél ey nangimpasantu assey vurawan?
40023018	Kananyu vus ey nu awad mangusar assey mipatangan sey midatun an Apudyus as mansapataana, dakumpun as basurna nu ajina tongparun, kon nu sey usaruna ey mansapata at sey midatun an Apudyus, masapur ey koona sey insapatana.
40023019	Nabvurag kayu pigey tuttuwa! Ey nabarbalor sey midatun an Apudyus nu sey mipatangan sey midatun ey nangimpasantu assey midatun?
40023020	At nu awad mangusar assey mipatangan sey datun assey mansapataana, sinakowna sey amin ey nipatang assey usunna.
40023021	Ya nu awad mangusar assey Tempél assey mansapataana, dakumpun anggey sey Tempél sey inusarna ey nansapata tey urey vus as Apudyus ey simvuruy assey Tempel.
40023022	Ya nu awad manginsapata ad langit, injugana insapata sey tukjun sey turey Apudyus. Ya injugana vus insapata as Apudyus ey sintukju.
40023023	“Kadagdagu kayu, dakayu ey misturun sey lintog ya dakayu ey Farisis, dakayu ey aginsosomkan! Aminunyu atjun an Apudyus dasey amin ey pagkapuruyu, urey dasey amin ey karasin ji mikamus assey makan ta pumiya kon iwwarangyu at avus dasey nabalor ey lintog tey dakumpun as nalintog sey koonyu asda tagu. Ya niippun daguyu an jida ya aji kayu pun matalik ey mangwa assey piun Apudyus. Urey atjunyu sey pagkapuruyu kon masapur ey ajiyu iwarang dasey nabalor ey lintog.
40023024	Vurag kayu pigey tuttuwa ey mangimpuyupuyut asda vurunyu! Tey siya at avus ipatpatigyu dasey gaggatung ey lintog, kon iwwarangyu at avus dasey nabalor ey lintog.
40023025	“Kadagdagu kayu, dakayu ey misturun sey lintog ya dakayu ey Farisis, dakayu ey aginsosomkan! Kama kayu assey nangkiwas as tasa ya paratu, kon sey lasinna anggey sey kiniwasanyu ey kama as ipippiilayu sey kinaambaruyu asda tagu kon ad darum ey aji pun miila, napnu as kinaagum ya da ujum ey innarayu gapu assey nalukuwanyu asda asintataguyu ya da pipiun sey long-agyu.
40023026	Amud kayu vus pey, dakayu ey vurag ey Farisis! Kiwasanyu amanguwun yén ad darum sey tasa at madarusan vus sey lasinna.
40023027	“Kadagdagu kayu, dakayu ey misturun sey lintog ya dakayu ey Farisis, dakayu ey aginsosomkan! Tey anungyu sey lavun ey napinturan as apputak. Mambaru aan sey vuyana, kon napnu atpey as tong-ar ya da kaggissow.
40023028	Kanaʼsna sey anungyu tey ambaru sey angiilan da tagu an dakayu kon aginsosomkan kayu atpey tey pasig lawingan sey awad assey somsomokyu.
40023029	“Kadagdagu kayu, dakayu ey misturun sey lintog ya dakayu ey Farisis, dakayu ey aginsosomkan! Ambabaru vus aan dasey lavun ey kingwayu ey para as dasey tong-ar dasey profet ey gingngatda assey kar-argow ya asiyu at vus ang-anggaan sey lavun dasey nalintog ey tagu.
40023030	Ya kananyu ey nu jinapunyu atyén sey timpun dasey profet assey kar-argow, aji kayu pun atyén nikakwa assey kingwan dasey dakdakoryu ey nangngat an jida.
40023031	Gapu assey ibagabagayu sana, inavunanyu ey nikabasur kayu tey dakayu sey ganak dasey nangngat as dasey profet Apudyus!
40023032	At nu kananaʼsnaʼt, ayu at, ipadakpusyu sey insarad dasey dakdakoryu!
40023033	Nasilib kayu tuttuwa ey anungyu sey kagguugyat ey tabbad! Ey sey kananyu, malisiyanyu sey majusaanyu ad inférnu?
40023034	At gapu assey kookoonyu sana, ibaarku an dakayu dasey profet ya dasey nangkariing ey tagu ya dasey mantudtuju an dakayu. Gongatunyu da ujum ya illansayu da ujum assey krus ya lapsilapsitanyu da ujum as dasey sinagogyu. Ya urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey ili ey umawidanda, umunud kayu ey manongtong-ag an jida.
40023035	At ikaruyu sey jusan da aminʼey gingngatda mansarad assey nangngatanda an Abel inggana assey natuyan Zechariah ey anak Berechiah ey gingngatyu assey nambootan sey Tempél ya sey iggawan sey papattangan assey midatun an Apudyus.
40023036	Isigurajuk ey dakayu ey tagu assey sana ey timpu, majusa kayu gapu as dasey amin ey nakwanakwa.”
40023037	At kanan Jesus, “Anuy lawa, dakayu ey iJerusalem, dakayu sey nangngat as dasey profet Apudyus ya vinatuyu ey nangngat asda ujum ey imbaar Apudyus ey manudtuju atyén an dakayu. Mansigab sey somsomokku an dakayu tey nanginkinnu ey piuk dakayu amungun assey iggowʼk ey kama assey koon sey manuk ey manakuyup asda issiwna, kon ajiyu pun piun.
40023038	At keygad kayu pey lawa tey niippun mamuut an dakayu.
40023039	At mallugi assey sana, niippun ogon mangil-anyu an sa'un inggana assey daan ey ag-agow ey siya sey mangibagaanyu ey, ‘Madayow sey umali ey imbaar Apudyus.’”
40024001	Anna pun ey umayow as Jesus assey Tempel, ummadani dasey pasurutna an siya ey mangintuju as dasey ambabaru ey vuruy ey sinakown sey Tempel.
40024002	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Ey ambabaru dasey vuruy anna assey angiilayu? Kon dongronyu sey ibagak anna an dakayu; jumatong sey timpu ey mabakasan amin da nauy ey niippun miilayu asda batu anna ey naturtur-ug tey maminda mikur-ub.”
40024003	Assey iggawanda assey vilig ad Olib, tummukju as Jesus at ummadani dasey pasurutna an siya at inimusda ey kananda, “Ibagam uda nu makanu sey mabakasan sey Tempél ya ngan sey angimmatunan assey kasinnu umaliyan ya sey mapungpungan sey ag-agow.”
40024004	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Man-annad kayu ta ajin dakayu allilawun assey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu.
40024005	Tey adjuwan dasey lumuswa ey mangimbaga ey jida sey Cristu at adjuwan sey allilawunda ey tagu.
40024006	Oni at dongronyu dasey kumalijung ey manggugubat asda adani ey vubruy ya madamagyu vus dasey manggugubat assey ujum ey ili kon aji kayu umugyat. Tey masapur ey makwa amin da nauy, kon daan pun jumatong sey mapungpungan sey ag-agow.
40024007	Tey anggugubat dasey ujum ey ili ya urey vus dasey turey assey luta anna at man-asigubatda. Ya lumuswa sey amud ey urat ya lunig assey ujum ey ili.
40024008	Amin da nauy at lugruginji tongtong-ag ey kama assey vubai ey anggamut ey umanak.
40024009	“Vusurun dakayu asda tagu assey luta gapu assey pammatiyu an sa'un. Dokmaanda dakayu, tongtong-agun dakayu ya asida at dakayu gongatun.
40024010	Gapu asda nauy, adjuwan dasey mangimpug-an assey pammatina an sa'un. Awadda manginsipsip asda vurunna ey mamati ya nanvinnusurda.
40024011	Asi at lumuswa dasey adjuwan ey sinangprofet ey mangallilow asda adjuwan ey tagu.
40024012	At gapu assey umajuwan sey lawingan ey makwamakwa, adjuwan vus ey tagu sey makaan sey layadna asda asintataguda.
40024013	Kon ngan ey sey mangimpangug assey pammatina an sa'un inggana assey mapungpungan sey ag-agow, siya sey misarakan.
40024014	Ya sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop assey turey Apudyus at miwarawag assey amin ey kikkiili ta maagammuwan dasey aminʼey tagu asi at jumatong sey mapungpungan sey ag-agow.”
40024015	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “‘Oni at jumatong sey timpu at ilanyu sey impapaddaan profet ey Daniel: Awad sey jumadail ey aggissow assey angiilan Apudyus ey mag gey umuy sumisikad assey iggawan sey nasantuwan ey lugar.’ (Dakayu ey mamasa as nauy, masapur ey maawatanyu sey piuna ugujun.)
40024016	At nu ilanyuji, dakayu ey inggowʼd Judea, ganasanyu at ey umuy ambakwit as dasey vib-ilig.
40024017	At dasey niyaspur ey awad assey pawey, ajida pun masapur ey sumakey ad darum ey mangara asda ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey masapurda tey masapur kamakamunda at ey umawid.
40024018	Ya dasey niyaspur ey awad as dasey pap-ayow ey ansiput, ajida pun kasapuran ey vumokra assey vubruy ey umuy mangara asda lumvunda tey masapur umawidda ey dagus.
40024019	Kadagdagu dasey mavugi ya dasey ina ey awad uttingna assey timpu saji!
40024020	At iluwaruyu an Apudyus ta aji miyaspur assey agilid unnu sabaju ey ngingillinunyu sey timpun sey umawidanyu.
40024021	Tey sey ligat ey jumatong at niippun mipaniyana mallugi assey nakwaan sey luta inggana assey sana ya urey as ing-inggana at niippun kanaʼsji as makwa.
40024022	At nu aji pun Apudyus impaavubbang sey vilang sey ag-agow ey makwaanji gapu as dasey pinilina ey taguna, niippun mangillasat ey matagu.”
40024023	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nu jumatong nauy ey timpu ya awad angimbaga an dakayu ey, ‘Annaya as Cristu!’ unnu kananda ‘Anjiʼs sanji as Cristu!’ Aji kayu maggey mamati.
40024024	Tey lumuswa dasey sinangcristu ya dasey sinangprofet ey jida kanu sey jinutukan Apudyus. Kaviilanda ey mangwa as dasey adjuwan ey nakaskasdaow anda sinyar ta nu mabalin, urey dasey pinilin Apudyus ey taguna at maallilowda.
40024025	Ipadaanku ibaga da nauy an dakayu ta aji kayu maallilow nu jumatong sey timpuna.
40024026	“At nu awad mangimbaga an dakayu ey, ‘Awad kanu assey danak sey pinilin Apudyus ey manturey,’ aji kayu maggey umuy ey mangila. Ya nu kananda vus ey, ‘Annaʼs sanna ey nantataru,’ ajiyu maggey dongron.
40024027	Tey sey ampuuliyak, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, at anungku sey kuliyabbang ey silawana amin ad ngatu ey niippun aji mangila.
40024028	“Siguraju ey matongpar da nauy tey anungna sey ibagabagan da tagu ey kananda, ‘Ngan ey sey iggowʼn sey ladag, siya sey madagupan da titit ey umuy mangan asda ladag.’”
40024029	Inturuy Jesus ey gumminga, “Nu maas ey sey kasisigaban ey timpu saji, gumikbot sey ag-agow ya aji pun jumilang sey sorag. Mayakayak da vituwun ya nasiwar da amin ey awad ad langit.
40024030	Assey timpu saji, awad sey lumuswa ad langit ey angimpiila assey ampuuliyak, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu. At man-ivil da aminʼey tagu assey luta anna gapu assey amud ey ugyatda. Ilanda Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu ey marpu ad langit ey iyalin sey livuu. Ya miila vus sey pannakabalinku ya sey amud ey siling sey kinaApudyusku.
40024031	Ya awad sey madngor ey vungug sey andangsor ey tangguyub, asik at ibaar dasey enjelku ey umuy as dasey amin ey igid sey luta ta dagupunda dasey pinilin Apudyus ey taguna ey niippun mateynan as urey sa'an.”
40024032	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ilanyu man sey kayu ey fig ta awad maadaryu. Nu anna ey isarad sey pingina ey luminsi ya umutar, agammuyu ey tigangey sey dagun.
40024033	At anungna vus nu ilanyu dasey imbagak anna ey makwa, agammuyu ey tigangey sey umaliyak.
40024034	Isigurajuk an dakayu ey awad da tagu ey matattagu assey sana ey dapununda sey makwaan dasey amin ey imbagak.
40024035	Muumas man da amin ey awad ad langit ya urey sey luta anna, aji pun maggey maatub dasey imbagak urey as ing-inggana tey masapur ey maminda makwa.”
40024036	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nu miipanggop assey makwaan dasey imbagak, niippun nangigammu assey ag-agow unnu uras sey makwaana tey urey dasey enjel ad langit at ajida pun agammu. Ya urey pey Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu at ajik pun vus agammu tey as Ama ad langit, sey anggey as nangigammu.
40024037	Sey kookoon da tagu assey timpu ey ampuuliyak, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, at anungna assey timpun Noah assey kar-argow.
40024038	Tey assey timpu saji ey daan pun malitap sey luta, niippun kanan da tagu ey awad sey makwa. Sissiyada ey angkakakan anda man-iinum ya man-as-asawa inggana as jummatong sey ag-agow ey summakayan da Noah assey bapor.
40024039	Niippun assey somsomokda nu ngan nauy ey makwa inggana as nallitap at naminda nuuvur. At kanaʼsji vus sey makwa assey ampuuliyak, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu.
40024040	Nu awad juwa as laraki ey ansiput assey payow, aran Apudyus sey usa ya nateynan sey usa.
40024041	Ya anungna vus nu awad juwa as vubai ey ambayu, aran Apudyus sey usa ya nateynan sey usa.
40024042	At siya sey mansasaggana kayu tey niippun agammuyu nu ngadanna ey ag-agow sey umaliyan sey Apuyu.”
40024043	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Iggayu assey somsomokyu sey ugujuk anna: Nu as gagara ya agammun sey simvuruy sey timpu ey umaliyan sey man-akow, siguraju ey aji pun masuyup tey ajina pun iparuvus ey sakayun sey man-aakow sey vuruyna.
40024044	At masapur avus ey mansasaggana kayu tey Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, ampuuliyak assey timpu ey ajiyu pun agammu.”
40024045	Inturuy Jesus ey nampani, kanana, “Ngan sey kananyu assey mapiyar ya nariing ey baba'arun? Siya sey jutukan sey apuna ey mangiila as dasey ujum ey baba'arun ya siya sey mangatud assey ikataguda assey vinigat.
40024046	At nu ampuuli sey apuna saji ya indasana sey baba'aruna ey sissiya ey kookoona dasey siputna, awad sey gun-gunana ey maatud.
40024047	Isigurajuk an dakayu ey ipangatun sey apu sey baba'aruna saji ta siya sey mangiila assey amin ey laksunna.
40024048	Kon nu as gagara ya lawingan sey baba'arun saji ta kanana assey somsomokna, ‘Mabayag nin sey ampuuliyén sey Apuk.’
40024049	Ya isaradna ey manongtong-ag as dasey vurunna ey baba'arun ya ummuy nikakkakan ya nikain-inum asda vu'ukan.
40024050	Oni ey, jummatong sey apuna saji assey ag-agow ya uras ey ajina pun agammu.
40024051	At siguraju ey jusaun sey apu sey baba'arun saji assey amud ey jusa ey mijuga as dasey aginsosomkan. At siyaji sey man-ivilana ya ngumarotngotan sey vub-ana assey sigabna.”
40025001	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Sey mijugaan assey Turey Apudyus, mipani asda simpuru ey babarasang ey nangara as silowda ta umuyda abton sey laraki ey mangasawa.
40025002	Lima an jida sey masomkan kon dasey lima ey vurunda, kamaʼs kurang sey somsomokda
40025003	tey ajida pun jinugjug-an ey nangintakin as lana.
40025004	Kon dasey lima ey masomkan, jinug-anda ey nangintakin as lana ey usarunda nu maaminanda.
40025005	At assey manguullayanda assey jumatngan sey mangasawa ey laraki, masuyamanda at insuyupda.
40025006	“Gawan pun lavi, inggow sey pinumkow ey kanana, ‘Annaʼt ey umali sey mangasawa ey laraki! Ingkayu abton!’
40025007	Nabanangon dasey babarasang ey anginsagana assey silowda.
40025008	At kanan dasey lima ey aji pun nanugjuga ey nangintakin as lana asda vurunda ey masomkan, ‘Atdan yén dakani assey lanayu tey naamin sey lanani.’
40025009	At kanan dasey masomkan, ‘Atééy, aji pun in umaney as usarun taku losan. Ingkayu pey lawa ngumina as lanayu.’
40025010	At ummuy dasey kurang sey somsomokda. “Assey ummayawanda, jummatong sey laraki saji ey mangasawa at nitun-ud dasey lima ey nakasagana at nikasakeyda ey ummuy nikaragsak ad darum assey iggowʼn sey amung at inyunubda sey sawang.
40025011	“Oni pun, jummatong dasey lima saji at kananda, ‘Apu! Anna kani ey jummatong, pasakayun yén dakani!’
40025012	Kon summongbat sey laraki saji ey mangasawa ey kanana, ‘Aji pun mabalin tey niippun agammuk an dakayu!’”
40025013	At inyanungus Jesus ey kanana, “At siya sey masapur ey mansasaggana kayu tey ajiyu pun agammu sey ag-agow unnu uras ey ampuuliyak.”
40025014	Inturuy Jesus sey tudtujuna an jida ey kanana, “Sey Turey Apudyus at anungna sey usa ey tagu ey tigangey mambaat assey addayuwan ey lugar. At siya nangayagana asda baba'aruna ta italikna an jida dasey amin ey pilakna.
40025015	Inatdana sey usa ya usa an jida ey mitagop assey kaviilanda ey ugnan. Sey usa, innatdana as limallivu ya innatdana vus as juwallivu sey usa ya sillivu sey usa. Naas pun, lummibbat ey nambaat.
40025016	“Sey baba'arun ey naatdan as limallivu, ummuy nallaklaku at ummad-aju vus as limallivu.
40025017	At kama vus sey kingwan sey naatdan as juwallivu.
40025018	Kon sey baba'arun ey naatdan as sillivu, ingkurubna sey pilak sey apuna ey nitalik an siya.
40025019	“Nabayag pun, nangulin sey apun dasey baba'arun, asina at ipaayag dasey baba'aruna ta imusuna nu ngan sey nangkokoonda assey intalikna an jida.
40025020	Ummuy sey baba'arun ey nitalikan sey limallivu at kanana assey apuna, ‘Apu, intaliknu an sa'un sey limallivu, annaya avus sey limallivu ey anakna.’
40025021	At kanan sey apuna, ‘Ambaru sey kingwam, ambaru ya matalikka ey baba'arun. At gapu ta matalikka assey akittan ey innatjuk an sika, jugjug-ak sey italikku an sika. At umalika ta mikaragsakka an sa'un ey apum.’
40025022	At ummuy vus sey nitalikan sey juwallivu at kanana, ‘Apu, intaliknu an sa'un sey juwallivu, annaya vus sey juwallivu ey anakna.’
40025023	At kanan sey apuna, ‘Ambaru sey kingwam, ambaru ya matalikka ey baba'arun. At gapu ta matalikka assey akittan ey innatjuk an sika, jugjug-ak sey italikku an sika. At umalika ta mikaragsakka an sa'un ey apum.’
40025024	“At ummuy vus sey nitalikan sey sillivu at kanana, ‘Apu, agammuk ey amudka vus pey as tagu tey magka gey da mikavilley assey nallingotan da ujum ey kama as aniyum sey dakumpun as sika sey nammura.
40025025	At gapu assey ugyatku, ingkurubku ey nangintaru. At annaya sey pilaknu.’
40025026	At kanan sey apuna, ‘Ummamdan ka vus pey, tukar ey baba'arun! Agammum mit ampey ey mikavillayak assey nallingotan da ujum ya man-aniyak assey dakumpun as immurak.
40025027	At pam lawa aji imbangku ta awad anakna as arak assey ampuuliyak?’
40025028	Asina at kanan asda ujum ey baba'aruna, ‘Aranyu sey naatud an siya ta atjunyu assey nangjun assey simpuru ey livu.
40025029	Tey sey tagu ey nangigammu ey mangusar assey naatud an siya, majugjug-an sey maatud inggana as umajuaju sey awad an siya. Kon sey aji pun matalik, misopsop ey muumas sey urey akit ey awad an siya.
40025030	At sey koonyu assey niippun servina anna ey baba'arun, iballuyu as lasin ey iggawan sey gikbot ta as jiyuy sey man-ivilana ya ngumarotngotan sey vub-ana assey sigabna.’”
40025031	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nu ampuuliyak, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, vurnanak asda amin ey enjel ey angimpiila assey kinadayowku ya siyaji sey tumukjuwak ey manturey.
40025032	At madagup da aminʼey tagu assey luta anna assey sinagungku, asik at jida mansisiyanun ey anungna sey koon sey ampaspastor ey anginlasin asda karneru ya da ganjing.
40025033	At dasey niyun-un ey tagu ey mipani asda karneru, ipasigku jida assey padawananku ya ipasigku dasey lawingan ey mipani asda ganjing assey padawigik.
40025034	“At sa'un ey Ari, ibagak asda tagu ey inggow assey padawananku, ‘Umali kayu dakayu ey vinindisyunan Ama ta mijuga kayu assey tureyku ey nisasaggana para an dakayu mallugi assey nakwaan sey luvung.
40025035	Tey assey nuuratak, pinakanak an dakayu ya assey nuuwawak, pinin-umanak ya assey ummaliyak ey kamaʼs vunag at minangiliyak.
40025036	Assey niippun lumvunku, nilumvunanak ya assey nasakitak, pinuutak ya vinisitaak assey nibarudak.’
40025037	“At sumongbat dasey niyun-un ey tagu ey kananda, ‘Niippun mit nangil-anni an sika ey nuurat asini at sika pakanan, unnu nuuwwow ya pinin-umanni sika.
40025038	Niippun vus nammangiliyanni an sika unnu nangatdanni an sika as lumvun.
40025039	Ya niippun vus nangil-anni as nasakitam unnu nibarudam ya ummali kani ey nangila an sika.’
40025040	“At ibagak an jida, ‘Tuttuwa sey ibagak anna an dakayu ey sey kingwayu assey usa asda kababaan ey susunudku, at sa'un sey nangwaanyu.’
40025041	“Ya asik at kanan asda awad assey padawigik, ‘Dakayu ey illunud Apudyus, umadayu kayu an sa'un. Ingkayu assey iggawan sey apuy ey aji pun matuy ey nisasaggana as para an Satanas ya dasey katurungna.
40025042	Tey assey nuuratak, ajiyak pun pinakan ya assey nuuwwawak, ajiyu pun sa'un pinin-uman.
40025043	Ummaliyak assey vubruyyu, kon ajiyu pun sa'un minangili. Niippun vus lumvunku kon ajiyak pun nilumvunan. Assey nasakitak ya nabarudak, ajiyu pun vus sa'un pinuut.’
40025044	“Kananda vus ey summongbat, ‘Niippun mit nangil-anni an sika ey nuurat anda nuuwwow, unnu ummaliyam assey iggowni anda niippun lumvunnu anda nasakitam unnu nibarudam ya ajini pun sika tinurungan.’
40025045	“Asik at kanan an jida, ‘Tuttuwa sey ibagak anna an dakayu, sey ajiyu pun tummurungan assey usa as dasey kababaan ey susunudku, sa'un sey ajiyu pun tinurungan.’
40025046	“At da nauy sey mipuuy assey majusaanda as ing-inggana kon da niyun-un ey tagu, umuyda assey iggawan sey ambaru ey viyag ey niippun patinggana.”
40026001	Naas pun Jesus intudtuju amin da nauy, kanana asda pasurutna,
40026002	“Agammuyu ey juwa anggey ey ag-agow sey daan at jumatong sey vista ey kananda ey Manomsomkan. At siyaji sey timpu ey mipurangak ta milansaak assey krus, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu.”
40026003	Assey timpu ey nangimbagaan Jesus siji, siyaji vus sey timpu ey nadagupan dasey nangangatu ey papaji ya dasey pangat ey angkamarong-ag assey vuruy da Caiphas ey kangatuwan ey paji.
40026004	At nan-uugudanda nu ngan annunda ey manokma an Jesus ta ipagngatda ey aji pun atyén da tagu maagammuwan.
40026005	At kananda, “Aji taku maggey iyaspur koon assey vista tey oni at lawa ey maguru da tagu.”
40026006	Assey inggawan da Jesus ad Bethany, ummuyda assey vuruy da Simon. As Simon anna, siya sey inagasan Jesus sey sakitna ey ngupungup.
40026007	Anna pun ey mangamangan da Jesus, jummatong sey usa ey vubai ey nanangjun as idjuru ey kananda ey alabaster ey nakoan assey kanginaan ey bangbangu. Kingwana pun, intu'ugna assey urun Jesus.
40026008	Innilan pun dasey pasurut Jesus sey kingwana, kananda, “Aman! Pata gey lawa mananggaan sey bangbangu?
40026009	Ingnginana atyén ta awad maatud asda lumawa tey nangina nait ey bangbangu!”
40026010	Kon inagammun Jesus sey uguugujunda at kanana, “Amorna! Ajiyu amuyuwan sey vubai sana tey ustu vus pigey sey kingwana anna an sa'un.
40026011	Nu miipanggop ey asda lumawa, kanayun ey awadda an dakayu, kon an sa'un, ajiyak pun mabayag an dakayu.
40026012	Tey sey kingwana sana ey nangintu'ug assey bangbangu assey uruk, kingwanaji as misaganaan sey milavunak.
40026013	At isigurajuk an dakayu ey ngan ey sey miwarawagan sey Ambaru ey Damag assey amin ey kikkiili, muul-ullit sey kingwan sey vubai anna as anomsomkanda an siya.”
40026014	As Judas Iscariot ey usa asda nasawaran as juwa ey aposel Jesus, ummuy asda nangangatu ey papaji.
40026015	At kanana an jida, “Kam-ana sey ibayadyu an sa'un nu isipsipku as Jesus an dakayu?” At nangatudda an siya as turumpuru ey parata as tangdanna.
40026016	At mallugi siji, insarad Judas ey manginap assey madokmaan Jesus.
40026017	Assey ab-avus sey ag-agowʼn sey vista ey mangananda assey tinapey ey niippun tinuktukna, ummadani dasey pasurut Jesus at inimusda an siya ey kananda, “Gona sey pium ey manginsaganaanni assey manganan taku as manomsomkan assey nallausan sey enjel ad Egypt?”
40026018	At kanan Jesus, “Ingkayu assey vubruy ibaga assey usa ey tagu ey ag-agammuyu, kananyu ey, ‘Imbagan Misturu ey tigangey sey timpuna ey inggoddong Apudyus. At anna kani ey aposelna ey ummali assey vuruyyu ey manginsagana assey mangananni assey vista ey Manomsomkan.’”
40026019	Imbagan pun Jesus ji, ummuy dasey aposelna kingwa dasey amin ey impakwana at insaganada sey mangananda assey vistan sey Manomsomkan.
40026020	Lummavi pun, nikatukju as Jesus asda nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna ey mangan.
40026021	Anna pun ey mangamanganda, kanan Jesus an jida, “Tuttuwa sey ibagak anna an dakayu ey awad sey usa an dakayu ey malliput an sa'un.”
40026022	Nakalivussu sey somsomok dasey aposelna at awad ey usa an jida, kananda an Jesus, “Ey sa'un Apu sey pium ugujun?”
40026023	At kanan Jesus, “Usa an dakayu ey manginsowsow assey tinapey assey juyug anna, siya sey malliput an sa'un.
40026024	Tey Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, at matuyak tey siya sey kanan sey Gingan Apudyus ey makwa an sa'un. Kon kadagdagu sey tagu ey malliput an sa'un tey unina at pey lawa nu aji siya niyanak.”
40026025	Gumminga as Judas ey siya sey malliput an Jesus ey kanana, “Apu Misturu, ey sa'un pun lawa?” At kanan Jesus, “Ustu vus pigey sey kanam.”
40026026	Assey anna ey mangamanganda, nangara as Jesus assey tinapey ya nansaramat an Apudyus asina at pitpit-ingun ey nangatud as dasey aposelna ey kanana, “Anna, aranyu ta kanunyu, tey nauy sey long-agku.”
40026027	Asi at vus mangara assey natatasa ey bayas ya nansaramat an Apudyus asina at atjun an jida ey kanana, “Anna, aranyu ta uminum kayu losan
40026028	tey nauy sey darak ey mangimpatuttuwa assey baru ey Turag Apudyus. Mivukvuk sey darak ta makaan sey basur dasey adjuwan ey tagu.
40026029	Ibagak an dakayu ey niippun ogon kasinku uminuman assey bayas sana, inggana assey ag-agow ey mikin-umak an dakayu assey baru ey bayas assey Turey Apudyus.”
40026030	Imbagan pun Jesus ji, nangkankantada ey mandayow an Apudyus asida at lumogsad ey ummuy assey vilig ad Olib.
40026031	Jummatongda pun assey vilig ad Olib, kanan Jesus an jida, “Assey lavi anna, teynanyu losan sa'un tey siyana sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Gongatuk sey ampaspastor at mamin mavukar dasey karneru.’
40026032	Kon nu umuliyak ey kasin matagu, amangpanguwak umuy ad Galili nu dakayu.”
40026033	At kanan Peter an siya, “Ajik pun maggey teynan sika, urey nu koon da ujum.”
40026034	At kanan vus Jesus an Peter, “Assey katuttuwaan, daan pun ey manullakuk sey manuk assey lavi anna, mamitluwum sa'un vuyagun.”
40026035	Kon tornon pigey Peter ey kanana, “Ajik pun maggey koon nait urey nu mikakatuyak an sika!” At urey dasey ujum ey aposelna at tillonda losan ey nangimbaga assey anungna sey imbagan Peter.
40026036	Assey timpu saji, inniyuy Jesus dasey aposelna assey lugar ey kananda ey Getsemaniat kanana, “Itukjuyu as nauy ta inyak as sanji malluwaru.”
40026037	Intakinna as Peter ya da juwa ey anak Zebedee ey da James an John. Assey siyaji, insaradna ey manjujuuy ya makalivussu sey somsomokna.
40026038	At kanana an jida, “Amud sey sigab sey somsomokku anna ey kama as lamugku ikatuy. Inggow kayu yén sina ta vurnanak. Aji kayu masuyup.”
40026039	Tummar-an pun as akit, nallukvub assey luta ey alluwaru, kanana, “Ama, nu mabalin atyén, ajim iparuvus sey tongtong-ag anna ey tigangey umdas an sa'un! Kon urey nu kanaʼsna sey kudawuk an sika, piuk ey makwa sey pium ey dakumpun assey piuk.”
40026040	Nampuuli pun assey iggawan dasey turu ey vurunna, indasana at avus jida ey nasusuyup. At kanana an Peter, “Ey ajiyu pun miipangsit ey amrun an sa'un as urey sa'an ey uras?
40026041	Aji kayu atyén masusuyup ta siya koonyu sey alluwaru ta aji kayu masulisug ey vumasur. Tuttuwa ey angkasdor sey somsomokyu kon akkuya sey long-agyu.”
40026042	Kasin as Jesus tummar-an ey alluwaru, kanana, “Ama, nu aji pun mabalin ey maatub sey makwa anna an sa'un ey masapur ey lak-amuk, matongpar sey pium ey makwa.”
40026043	Kasin pun vus nampuuli as Jesus assey iggown dasey aposelna, indasana vus jida ey kasin nasusuyup tey ajida pun makajiyat asda atada.
40026044	At kasin as Jesus tummar-an ey ummuy nangimpitlu ey mangilluwaru assey dawdawatuna an Amana ey Apudyus.
40026045	Asi at vus kasin ampuuli assey iggown da aposelna at kanana an jida, “Ey sissiya kayu pey dallu masusuyup ya man-illong? Ustu nait! Tey anna ogon ey jummatong sey mangar-anda an Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu ey mipurang as dasey lawingan ey tagu.
40026046	Vumangun kayu tey anna ey jummatong sey malliput an sa'un.”
40026047	Sissiya as Jesus ey gumingaginga assey nadanatong as Judas ey usa asda nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna. Ingkukuyugna dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey ampa'ujun as bangid anda pang-ok ey imbaar dasey nangangatu ey papaji ya da papangat ey angkamarong-ag.
40026048	As Judas anna, naas nikaturag asda ingkuyugna ey kanana, “Sey ummauk an jida nu umadaniyak, siya sey dokmaanyu!”
40026049	At ginanasan Judas ey ummadani an Jesus ey kanana, “Apu misturu, anna kani ey jummatong,” ya asina at siya ummaun.
40026050	At kanan Jesus, “Sika ey vurunku, ayu at, koom sey panggopnu ey ummali!” At ummadani dasey tagu ey nanokma an Jesus asida at siya potpotan.
40026051	Kingwan pun sey usa asda vurun Jesus, inukputna sey bangidna at vinakagna sey usa asda alipan sey kangatuwan ey paji at napungudan sey ingana.
40026052	Kon kanan Jesus, “Iyarpangnu sey bangidnu sanat, tey sey tagu ey angusar as bangid ey gumngat, bangid vus sey ikatuyna.
40026053	Yangey ajim pun agammu ey mabalinku ey dawatun an Ama ta mangimbaar ey dagus as kalivulivu ey enjel ey tumurung?
40026054	Kon nu kanaʼsji sey kook, ngan annun dasey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey matongpar ey masapur kanaʼsna sey makwaana?”
40026055	Gumminga as Jesus asda tagu ey kanana, “Ey kasapuran ey ampa'ujun kayu as bangid anda pang-ok ey manokma an sa'un? Yangey kagguugyatak ey tagu? Inag-agow mit ey awadak assey Tempél ey mantudtuju, payu sa'un aji jinokmaan?
40026056	Kon makwa amin da nauy ta tumuttuwa sey impakur-it Apudyus as dasey profet assey kar-argow.” Nakwa pun jiyuy, namin ummawid dasey pasurut Jesus ey naneynan an siya.
40026057	Nadokmaan pun as Jesus, inniyuyda assey vuruy Caiaphas ey kangatuwan ey paji ey naamungan dasey misturun sey lintog ya dasey angkamarong-ag.
40026058	Kingwan pun Peter, ummunnuunnud kon ummaaddayu an jida inggana assey paweyn sey vuruy sey kangatuwan ey paji. At ummuy nikatukju asda guwarda ta uullayuna nu ngan sey makwa an Jesus.
40026059	Assey vuruy saji, inggow da nangangatu ey papaji ya da amin ey papangat ey miid ajida koon ey man-anap as man-us-ussat ey mantistigu as amabasuranda an Jesus ta awad lasunda ey mangimpagngat an siya.
40026060	Kon urey nu adjuwan dasey tagu ey angimpabasur an siya as kotom, niippun udasanda as umaney as angimpagngatanda an siya. Ummanungus pun, inggow da juwa ey tagu ey ummuy summikad assey sangu
40026061	kananda, “Kanan sey tagu anna ey mabalin kanu bakasuna sey Tempél Apudyus ya kasinna kanu patakjugun assey turu anggey ey ag-agow.”
40026062	At summikad sey kangatuwan ey paji at kanana an Jesus, “Ey niippun isongbatnu assey ipabasurda anna an sika?”
40026063	Kon giginnok as Jesus ey aji pun guminga. At kanan sey kangatuwan ey paji an siya, “Isapatam assey ngadan Apudyus ey matattagu as ing-inggana ey ibagam sey katuttuwaan. Ey sika sey Cristu ey Anak Apudyus?”
40026064	At kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Nu siya sey kanam, ustu sey imbagam! At ibagak an dakayu ey assey daan ey ag-agow, miilayu Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu ey tutukju assey padawanan Apudyus ey mannakabalin ya umaliyak ey marpu ad langit ey mivurun assey livuu!”
40026065	Jingngor pun sey kangatuwan ey paji sey imbagan Jesus, magna gey vinissey sey mismu ey lumvunna gapu assey sangana, asina at kanan, “Inyisuna sey long-agna an Apudyus! At ngan vus sey kasin taku anapun as basurna? Jingngoryu amin sey inugudna saji ey nanginsurtu an Apudyus.
40026066	At ngan sey kananyu?” Summongbat da tagu ey kananda, “Nakabasur! At lobbongna ey mipagngat!”
40026067	At tinuppatuppaanda sey vusarna asida at vuksivuksingun. Vinitnag da ujum,
40026068	asida at kanan, “Ibagam uda sika ey mangisarakan, nu ngan sey namuksing an sika.”
40026069	Anna pun ey tutukju as Peter assey paweyʼn sey vuruy, ummadani sey usa ey vubai ey baba'arun at kanana, “Ey dakumpun as sika sey usa ey vurun Jesus ey iGalili?”
40026070	Kon vinuyég Peter assey sinagung da amin ey tagu ey kanana, “Ngey uguugujum gey lawa sanat?”
40026071	Kingwan pun Peter, ummuy assey igid sey pawey ey adani assey pudayan. Kon inggow vus sey kasin nangila an siya ey usa vus ey vubai ey baba'arun. At kanana asda angkasikad ey tagu, “Sey tagu anna at usa akey ey vurun Jesus ey iNazareth.”
40026072	Kon ingkasin Peter ey namuyég, kanana, “Isapatak ey ajik pun ag-agammu sey tagu sanat!”
40026073	Nabab-ayag pun as akit, kanan dasey angkasikad ey tagu, “Ajim vuyagun ey usaka an jida ey iGalili tey mimamattunan assey inggigingam.”
40026074	Kon tillon Peter ey nansapata ey kanana, “Urey jusaunak an Apudyus nu an-us-ussatak! Tey tuttuwa ey ajik pun agammu sey tagu sanat ey ibagabagayu.” Imbagana pun jiyuy, nanullakuk sey manuk.
40026075	Asin at Peter ikagasmok sey imbagan Jesus an siya ey mamitluwuna vuyagun asi at manullakuk sey manuk. At ummayow as Peter ey ngumannganugngug ey man-ivil gapu assey amud ey sigab sey somsomokna.
40027001	Anna pun ey wikkiwikkis, nan-uugud da amin ey nangangatu ey paji ya dasey papangat ey angkamarong-ag ta anapunda sey koonda ey mangimpagngat an Jesus.
40027002	Kingwada pun, pinosasanda siya asida at umuy ipurang an Gubernador Pilate.
40027003	Naagammuwan pun Judas ey nagoddongan as Jesus ey niliputana, amud sey jujuulina assey kingwana at ummuyna impuuli sey turumpuru ey parata as dasey nangangatu ey paji anda angkamarong-ag.
40027004	Kanana an jida, “Nakabasurak tey niliputak sey tagu ey niippun basurna, at anna ogon ey nagoddongan ey matuy!” At kananda an siya, “Ngan sey viyangniʼs nait? Keygadka in.”
40027005	Kingwan pun Judas, imvintugna sey pilak assey Tempél asi at umayow at ummuy namvikgar.
40027006	Tinumtuman dasey nangangatu ey paji sey pilak at kananda, “Aji pun miparuvus assey lintog taku nu ijuga taku itarpun assey pilak sey Tempél tey siyana ey pilak at bayad sey usa ey viyag ji tagu.”
40027007	Naasda pun nambabagbaga, simsimmokda ey ngin-an sey lutan sey anjujuwin as banga ta koonda as larabvunan dasey vunag.
40027008	At siya sey lapuna ey nangadananji as “Luta ey Nabayadan as Dara” inggana assey sana.
40027009	Nauy ey nakwa at siya sey tummuttuwaan sey imbagan profet Jeremiah ey kanana, “Innarada sey turumpuru ey parata ey siya sey gatad sey usa ey tagu ey nan-aavunan da iyIsrael
40027010	at inusarda ey ngummina as lutan sey anjujuwin as banga ey siya sey imvilin sey Apu an sa'un.”
40027011	Impasanguda as Jesus an gubernador Pilate at kanana an Jesus, “Ey sika sey Arin dasey Jews?” “Ustu sey imbagam,” ey kanan Jesus.
40027012	Kon anna pun ey pabasurun dasey nangangatu ey paji ya dasey angkamarong-ag as Jesus, aji pun summongsongbat.
40027013	At kanan Pilate an siya, “Ey niippun dongrom as dasey adjuwan ey ipabasurda anna an sika?”
