40027014	Kon giginnok pey lawa as Jesus at siya sey nasdaawan gubernador.
40027015	Sey usa ey nakopyaan gubernador assey tinawun nu jumatong sey vista at masapur ey awad ivukkeyna as usa ey barud ey piliyun dasey tagu.
40027016	At assey timpu saji, inggow sey usa ey barud ey angngadan as Jesus Barabbas ey nanjinamag sey kinarwingna.
40027017	Nadagup pun da tagu, inimus Pilate an jida ey kanana, “Ngan sey piunyu ey ivukkeyk asda juwa anna, ey as Jesus Barabbas unnu as Jesus ey kananda ey Cristu?”
40027018	Kananaʼsna sey kingwan Pilate ey gumminga gapu ta nadlowna ey sey nangipuranganda an Jesus an siya at gapu assey apos.
40027019	Assey sissiya as Pilate ey tutukju assey tukjun sey uuwwisan, inggow sey imvilin asawana ey kanana, “Ajim vib-iyangan sey tagu sanat ey niippun basurna tey natongtong-agak ey lavi assey inin-inopku gapu an siya.”
40027020	Kon kinarakag dasey nangangatu ey paji ya da angkamarong-ag dasey tagu ta as Barabbas sey dawatunda ey ivukkeyn Pilate ta as Jesus ey Cristu sey ipagngatna.
40027021	At ingkasin pun Gubernador Pilate ey nangimus asda tagu nu ngan sey piunda asda juwa ey ivukkeyna, sinongbatanda ey kananda, “As Barabbas!”
40027022	At kanan vus Pilate asda tagu, “At nu kanaʼsna, ngan sey kook an Jesus ey kananda ey Cristu nu'?” “Ipalansam assey krus!” Losanda kanan ey sivuvugga.
40027023	Asin at vus Pilate kanan, “Kon ngan sey basurna?” Kon sivuvuggada at avus ey kananda, “Ipalansam assey krus!”
40027024	Giniknan pun Pilate ey niippun makwaana ya nadlowna ey tigangey maguru da tagu, nangara as danum at namvuru assey sinagung da tagu, asina at kanan, “Nauy sey mangil-anyu ey niippun pigey viviyangak assey mangimpagngatanyu assey tagu sana, keygad kayu nu ngan sey koonyu.”
40027025	At kananda losan ey summongbat, “Amorna ta keygad kani ya dasey ganakni sey simviyang assey matuyana.”
40027026	At imvukkeyʼn Pilate as Barabbas kon impasaplitna as Jesus asina at impurang an jida ta milansa assey krus.
40027027	Kingwan pun dasey ujum ey surdajun Pilate, inniyuyda as Jesus assey baraksda, asida at ayagan da aminʼey vurunda at nilikubda siya.
40027028	Asida at ponasan ya lumvunan assey addaraag ey lumvun.
40027029	Ya vummalingowngowda asda siit asida at ibarangat assey uruna. Ya impad-unda vus sey paur assey padawanan ey imana asida at mallikkadang kanu pey assey sinagungna ey mandayow an siya, kananda, “Sika ey arin dasey Jews, matattaguka as ing-inggana!”
40027030	Tinuppatuppaanda siya, asida at aran sey paur ey inuugnana at illapsitda assey uruna.
40027031	Naasda pun inut-utyukan, kinaanda sey impalumvunda an siya at inniggada sey sigud ey lumvunna, asida at umuy ilansa assey krus.
40027032	Anna pun ey mallasinda assey vubruy, inabotda sey usa ey tagu ey iCyrene ey angngadan as Simon at impapilit da surdaju impavukud sey krus Jesus an siya.
40027033	Inumdasda pun assey tagudtud ey kananda ey Golgota, (ey sey piuna ey ugujun, anungna sey tong-ar sey battokag)
40027034	innatdan dasey surdaju as Jesus as bayas ey nakamsan as ampiit ey apgu ta ajina kanu giknaun sey ansigab, kon sinimsiman pun Jesus, ajina pun ininum.
40027035	Naasda pun siya illansa, namvub-unutanda sey lumvunna ta ilanda nu ngan sey aran sey usa
40027036	asida at itukju ey mangajug an siya.
40027037	Iniggada assey lap-at sey uruna sey nikur-itan sey nipabasur an siya, ey kanana, “Siyana as Jesus ey Arin dasey Jews.”
40027038	Inggow da juwa ey akkawan ey illansa vus assey krus. Inniggada assey padawanan Jesus sey usa ya assey padawigina sey usa.
40027039	At nu awad ey mallaus as tagu, nawwigiwigda pey ey manginsurtu an siya
40027040	ey kananda, “Ayu uda, nu tuttuwa ey sika sey Anak Apudyus, isarakam sey long-agnu ta lumogsadka assey krus ta ingka dadailun sey Tempél ta ipatakjugnu assey turu ey ag-agow!”
40027041	At urey dasey nangangatu ey paji ya da misturun sey lintog ya da angkamarong-ag at siyaji vus sey kingwada ey nangapporoan an Jesus.
40027042	Kananda, “Insarakana mit da ujum ey tagu, kon ajina pun misarakan sey long-agna! Siya kanu sey Ari ad Israel! Lumogsad atyén assey krusna ta mamati taku an siya!
40027043	Kanana ey mantalik an Apudyus ya kanana ey siya at anak Apudyus. Ayu uda, ilan taku nu maryad as Apudyus ey manginsarak an siya!”
40027044	Urey vus dasey akkawan ey vurunna ey nilansa at amud vus sey kingwada ey nanginsurtu an siya.
40027045	Anna pun ey mamatuk, maggey gummikbot sey amin ey ili inggana assey magayud.
40027046	Assey anna ey magayud, indangsor Jesus ey kanana, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Sey piuna ey ugujun, “Apudyus, Apudyus, paʼm sa'un iwarang?”
40027047	Jingngor pun dasey ujum ey tagu ey angkasikad as jiyuy sey imbagan Jesus, kananda, “Anna ey ayagana as Elijah!”
40027048	Nanuddak ey dagus sey usa an jida ey ummuy nangara as sinnun at insowsowna assey kilom, asina at isipit assey paur ey angindowdow ta ipasupsupna an Jesus.
40027049	Kon kanan da ujum, “Amorna uda, ta ilan taku nu umali as Elijah ey manginsarak an siya!”
40027050	Ingkasin pun Jesus ey nangindangsor ey namvugga, nuubvus sey angusna.
40027051	Assey nuubvusan sey angus Jesus, maggey nangkagwa ey navissey sey kurtinan sey Tempél ey nisarad assey ngatuna inggana assey gayadanna. Asi at mallunig at napilpil-ak dasey dopras
40027052	ya nabkatan dasey lavun at adjuwan da ummuli ey nangkakatuy ey tagun Apudyus
40027053	at tineynanda da lavunda. Naas pun as Jesus ummuli, ummuyda ad Jerusalem at adjuwan dasey tagu ey nangila an jida.
40027054	Giniknan pun Kapitan ya dasey surdajuna ey namabantey an Jesus sey lunig ya innilada dasey amin ey nakwanakwa, amud sey ugyatda, asida at kanan, “Tuttuwa atpey ey siya sey Anak Apudyus!”
40027055	Assey nakwaji, inggow dasey adjuwan ey vubai ey tummatar-an ey nangiila asda nakwanakwa. Jida dasey narpu ad Galili ey apporow ummunnuunnud an Jesus ey nanuruturung an siya.
40027056	At da ujum an jida, jida da Mary Magdalene ya as Mary ey inan da James an Joseph ya as asawan Zebedee.
40027057	Anna pun ey lumavi, jummatong sey usa ey baknang ey iyArimatea ey angngadan as Joseph ey usa asda pasurut Jesus.
40027058	Ummuy an Pilate ta kudawuna sey ladag Jesus. Asin at Pilate ivilin ey atjunda sey ladag Jesus an Joseph.
40027059	At innaran Joseph sey ladag asina at kupikupan assey barbaru ey sinnun.
40027060	Asina at umuy ilavun assey kakkakwa ey lavun ey natiktikan ey dopras ey para atyén an siya. Asina at puddaligun sey arwa ey dapin-ey ey nangnubna assey sawang sey lavun asi at umayow.
40027061	Inggow vus da Mary Magdalene ya as kangadanna ey Mary ey tutukju as jiyuy ey nangiila.
40027062	Assey vigvigat sey Sabaju, ummuy dasey nangangatu ey paji ya da Farisis ey nikabagbaga an Pilate.
40027063	Kananda, “Apu gubernador, ingkagasmokni uwa ey assey natatagguwan sey ussatan sanat, kanana ey, ‘Umuliyak nu umayow sey turu ey ag-agow.’
40027064	At ambaru nin nu mabantayan ey ustu sey lavunna inggana as maas sey turu ey ag-agow, tey aji taku pun agammu nu maggey lawa umuy dasey pasurutna ya inakowda sey ladagna asida at ibaga asda tagu ey ummuli siya. At nu kanaʼsji sey makwa, am-amud ey adjuwan sey maallilow nu assey ab-avusna.”
40027065	Summongbat as Pilate ey kanana, “Man-ayag kayuʼs surdaju ta ingkayu bantayan sey lavunna ya iggayu sey kaviilanyu ey amantey an siya.”
40027066	At pinagdotda ikow sey tangub sey lavun ta niippun mamuddalig, asida at ipaajug asda surdaju.
40028001	Naas pun sey iillongan ey Sabaju ya anna ey pumawey assey Juminggu, ummuy da Mary Magdalene ya as kangadanna ey Mary ey ummuy mangila assey nilabnan Jesus.
40028002	Inggowda pun siji, maggey nallunig as andangsor tey inggow sey enjel Apudyus ey vummaba ey narpu ad langit ey namukar assey tangub sey lavun asina at antukjuwan.
40028003	Kama as kuliyabbang sey miil-ana ya apputak sey lumvunna ey kama as dararu.
40028004	Innilan pun dasey ambabantey sey enjel saji, namilpilda assey amud ey ugyatda at kummuntugda ey kamadaʼs natuy.
40028005	Kon gumminga sey enjel saji as dasey vubai ey kanana, “Aji kayu umugyat! Agammuk ey as Jesus sey anaanapunyu ey nilansa assey krus.
40028006	Kon niippun siya as nauy tey ummuli ey siya vus pigey imbagabagana an dakayu. Umali kayu ta ilanyu sey nibadngana.
40028007	Ingkayu at ibaga asda pasurutna ey ummuli at namangpangu ey umuy ad Galili. As jiyuy sey mangil-anyu an siya. Anna mampey ey imbagak at keygad kayu nu maliwatanyu.”
40028008	Kingwan pun dasey vubai, ginanasanda ey naneynan assey lavun. At urey nu sissiya sey ugyatda, allaylayadda pey dallu ey situtuddak ey umuy mangimbaga asda pasurut Jesus.
40028009	Kon anna pun ey umayowda, maggey niyabot as Jesus an jida at kanana, “Ngey umayanyu?” Nanuddakda ey nangawor assey sikina at jinayowda siya.
40028010	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Aji kayu umugyat. Ingkayu at ibaga asda susunudku ta umuyda ad Galili ta as jiyuy sey an-asiil-anni.”
40028011	Anna pun ey ummayow dasey vubai, ummuy dasey ujum ey guwarda assey vubruy at imbagada as dasey nangangatu ey paji dasey amin ey nakwanakwa.
40028012	At naamung dasey nangangatu ey paji ya dasey angkamarong-ag ta man-uugudanda nu ngan sey koonda. At nan-aavunanda ey nangatud assey dokor ey gatad ey pilak asda guwarda
40028013	ey kananda, “Sey ibagayu asda tagu at assey nasusuyup kayu, ummali dasey pasurut Jesus assey gawan lavi at inakowda sey ladagna.
40028014	Aji kayu madanagan tey nu maagammuwan ey gubernador, dakani sey keygad an siya at niippun makwa as lawingan an dakayu.”
40028015	At innaran dasey guwarda sey pilak at kingwada sey nivilin an jida. At siyaji sey damag ey nanjinjinamag asda Jews inggana assey sana.
40028016	At dasey nasawaran as sa'an ey pasurut Jesus, ummuyda ad Galili assey usa ey vilig ey siya sey imbagan Jesus an jida ey an-aabtanda.
40028017	Innilada pun siya, jinayowda, kon inggow da ujum ey anjuwajuwa.
40028018	Ummadani as Jesus an jida at kanana, “Naatud an sa'un sey amin ey karobbongan ad langit ya assey luta.
40028019	Ibaarku dakayu ey umuy asda amin ey kikkiili ta ambalinunyu dasey tagu as pasurutku. Vunyaganyu jida assey ngadan sey Ama, Anak ya sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
40028020	Ya itudtujuyu an jida ta unujunda sey amin ey imvilinku an dakayu. Ajiyu maliwatan ey kanayun ey awadak an dakayu as ing-inggana.”
41001001	Annaya sey sarad sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Jesu Cristu ey Anak Apudyus.
41001002	Awad sey ingkur-it profet Isaiah assey kar-argow ey imbagan Apudyus assey anakna ey kanana; “Awad sey ibaarku ey amangu nu sika ey umuy manginsagana assey daran asika at jumatong.
41001003	Siya sey inggow assey danak ey mangimvugga ey kanana, ‘Annat sey Apu ey umali. Darusanyu sey daran ta ambaru as ayuna nu umali.’”
41001004	At tummuttuwa nauy tey inggow as John assey danak ey amvunyag ya mantudtuju asda tagu ey kanana, “Masapur ey man-awidanyu dasey basuryu ya mavunyagan kayu as mangimpiil-anyu ey nan-awidanyu dasey lawingan ey kookoonyu at pakawanun Apudyus dakayu.”
41001005	Amud pey ey tagu sey narpu ad Jerusalem ya asda ujum ey kikkiili assey provinsiya ad Judea ey ummuy nangngor assey tudtujuna. At impudnuda dasey basurda an Apudyus asin at John vunyagan jida assey dawwang ad Jordan.
41001006	Sey lumvun amvuvunyag ey John, nakwa ey naara assey jutjut sey ayém ey kemel ya sey sinturunna, gaddang. At sey ikataguna, jujun ya jilu.
41001007	Impaagammuna avus asda tagu ey kanana, “Awad sey miyoros an sa'un ey nangatu sey pannakabalinna at gapu assey kinangatuna ajiyak pun miivilang ey manguggas assey kiddong sey sapatusna.
41001008	Sa'un anna, danum anggey sey ivunyagku an dakayu kon nu umali ey siya, vunyagana dakayu assey Ispiritun Apudyus.”
41001009	Assey timpu saji ey amvunyagan John asda tagu, jummatong as Jesus ey narpu assey vubruyda ad Nazareth ey munisipyun sey Galili at vinunyagan John siya assey dawwang ad Jordan.
41001010	Tummakdang pun as Jesus assey danum, innilana ey nabkatan ad langit ya anna sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey kamaʼs karapati ey lumagulagud at inumpa an siya.
41001011	Ya inggow sey gumminga ad langit ey kanana, “Sika sey pipiuk ey anakku. Sika sey mangimpalaylayad an sa'un.”
41001012	Naas pun, vinaar at sey Ispiritun Apudyus as Jesus ey ummuy assey danak.
41001013	At iniinggow as jiyuy assey opatpuru ey ag-agow ey apporon Satanas awiawisun. Ya inggow avus dasey kagguugyat ey animar assey lugar saji. Kon inggow dasey enjel ey apporow nanurung ya nangatud asda kasapurana.
41001014	Oni pun assey naas Herod Antipas impadokma as John, ummuy as Jesus ad Galili at insaradna ey mangintudtuju assey Ambaru ey Damag ey narpu an Apudyus.
41001015	Kanana, “Jummatong assey sana sey ustuustu ey timpu ey mansardan sey Turey Apudyus. At man-awidanyu dasey basuryu ya tornonyu ey mamati assey Ambaru ey Damag.”
41001016	Usa pun ey ag-agow ey nanguy as Jesus assey igid sey beybey ad Galili, innilana da juwa ey ansunud ey mangaaggajiw ey da Simon an Andrew ey pattukda ey anavukur.
41001017	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Ustu nait, umali kayu at ta da tagu sey dagupunyu ey matudtujuwan ta mamatida an sa'un.”
41001018	At tineynanda tuttuwa dasey tavukurda at ummunudda an siya.
41001019	Anna pun ey ituruyna ey manaran, innilan vus Jesus da juwa ey ansunud ey da James an John ey anak Zebedee ey tutukjuda assey bangkada ey manginsagana asda tavukurda.
41001020	Inayagana ey dagus jida at tineynanda as amada ya dasey tinangdananda ey vurunda assey bangka at ummunudda an Jesus.
41001021	Ummuy as Jesus ya dasey vurunna assey vubruy ad Capernaum. Assey ag-agow ey Sabaju, summakey as Jesus assey sinagog at insaradna ey mantudtuju.
41001022	At dasey tagu ey nangngor assey nangokoona ey nantudtuju, naminda nasdaow tey aji pun miyisu assey angokoon dasey misturun sey lintog Moses tey miila ey awad lobbongna ey mantudtuju.
41001023	Oni pun, maggey pinumkow sey usa ey marong-ag ey inggow ad darum ey nilun-ugan jimunyu ey kanana;
41001024	“Sika Jesus ey iNazareth, paka jumisturvu? Ey gadtoknu umali ey manadail an dakani? Agammuk sika, sika sey nasantuwan ey impostan Apudyus ey umali!”
41001025	Kon impaginok Jesus sey jimunyu ey kanana, “Guminokka! Teynam sey tagu sanat ey nilun-ugam!”
41001026	Namvugga sey nilulun-ug saji ya namilpiluna sey marong-ag asina at teynan.
41001027	Amud sey nasdaawan da tagu assey innilada saji. At nan-asiimusda ey kananda, “Ngan nauy ey kaddatu ey tudtuju? Anna amin sey lobbongna ey mangimparyow asda jimunyu ya patiyunda sey ibagana!”
41001028	At inagammun losan da tagu ey inggow asda kikkiili assey provinsiya ad Galili sey miipanggop an Jesus.
41001029	Lummogsad pun da Jesus assey sinagog saji, ummuyda ey dagus assey vuruy da Simon an Andrew at nikuuy vus da James an John ey mansunud.
41001030	Assey jummatngan da Jesus, imbagada an siya ey masakit as katugangan Simon ey amud atungna.
41001031	Ummadani pun as Jesus ey inugnana sey imana ey namangun an siya, nakaan ey dagus sey sakitna at siya at avus sey namakan an jida.
41001032	Anna pun ey gummikbot, indatong da tagu an Jesus dasey masakit ya dasey nalun-ugan asda jimunyu.
41001033	At assey vubruy saji, amud da tagu ey nadagup assey paweyn da Simon.
41001034	At kinaan Jesus dasey nantokotokon ey sakit dasey amud ey tagu. Pinaryowna vus dasey amud ey jimunyu ey nilun-ug asda tagu. Isangana sey gumingaan dasey jimunyu tey agammuda ey anak siya an Apudyus.
41001035	Assey mavigat, vummangun as Jesus assey madamaan at lummogsad ey ummuy assey lugar ey niippun katagtaguwan ey alluwaru.
41001036	Kon ummuy da Simon ya dasey vurunna ey manganap an siya.
41001037	Indasanda pun kananda, “Amud akey da tagu ey manginap an sika.”
41001038	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Urey nu kananaʼs nait tey kasapuran vus ey intaku asda ujum ey ili ta inyak tudtujuwan jida tey siyanaʼt sey ummaliyak.”
41001039	At ginaggakeyda amin dasey vubruy ad Galili. At assey amin ey vubruy ey ummayanda, nantudtuju as Jesus asda sinagog ey aammungan dasey Jews ya pinaryowna amin da jimunyu ey nallun-ug asda tagu.
41001040	Assey timpu saji, inggow sey usa ey tagu ey nangupungup. Ummuy pun an Jesus, nallikkadang ey ampangpangaasi ey kanana, “Agammuk ey karobbongam ey mangaan assey sakitku anna nu pium atyén.”
41001041	Nadaguwan as Jesus ey nangila, at inugnana sey imana ey kanana, “Madaguwak an sika at makaan sey sakitnu sana.”
41001042	At nakaan ey dagus sey sakitna at vummaru sey long-agna.
41001043	Naas pun, vinilin Jesus siya ey dagus, asina at siya palibbatun.
41001044	Kanana, “Dongrom sey ibagak anna. Ajim uguugujun assey urey barangna ey tagu sey kingwak an sika. Ingka ampiila assey paji ta ilana ey nakaan sey sakitnu. Ya nangatudka as mabalin ey midatun an Apudyus tey siya sey imvilin Moses as koon taku ta awad mangil-an da tagu ey nakaan sey sakitnu.”
41001045	Kon kingwan pun sey tagu saji ey nakaan sey sakitna, iwwarawagna at avus asda tagu sey kingwan Jesus an siya. At gapu assey kingwan sey tagu saji, aji pun mikauy as Jesus asda vubruy ey siwawaya tey an-il-illasi da amud ey tagu ey mangabot an siya. At sey kingwana, ingkaponna assey lugar ey niippun vubruy kon anna dallu da tagu ey narpu asda antokotokon ey vubruy ey umunnuunnud an siya.
41002001	Ummayow pun sey kam-ana ey ag-agow, nampuuli as Jesus assey ilina ad Capernaum at nanjinamag ey awad siya.
41002002	At amud da tagu ey nadagup assey vuruy ey iggowna at niippun mig-awan ad darum ya urey assey bangsar. Anna pun ey mantudtuju as Jesus an jida miipanggop assey Gingan Apudyus,
41002003	jummatong da opat ey tagu ey nangimvulig assey usa ey marong-ag ey nattubangil. Ikow-asda atyén an Jesus
41002004	kon niippun agammuda ey sumakey tey napnu da tagu ad darum. Kingwada pun, iniyuyda assey tabvungan asida at okkavun sey batug Jesus at uyujunda sey nattubangil ad darum ey inuumvug assey vuligna.
41002005	Innilan pun Jesus sey dogot sey pammatida an siya, imbagana assey nattubangil ey kanana, “Sunud, napakawan sey basurnu.”
41002006	Kon inggow vus dasey ujum ey misturun sey lintog Moses ey nikaam-ammung. Jingngorda pun sey imbagan Jesus, jinumsikda assey somsomokda ey kananda,
41002007	“Ngan sey lobbong tagu sana ey maggey manginyisu assey long-agna an Apudyus? As Apudyus mit anggey sey mabalin ey mamakawan asda basur.”
41002008	Kon inagammun Jesus sey inggow assey somsomokda at kanana an jida, “Palawa kanaʼsnaʼt sey awad asda somsomokyu?
41002009	Ngan sey allaslasu as ibaga assey nattubangil anna, ‘Ey kananta ey, napakawan sey basurnu, unnu kananta ey, vumangunka ta aram sey oboknu ta ingkan?’
41002010	Ta awad mangil-anyu ey Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu at awad sey karobbongak assey luta anna ey amakawan asda basur at kaanuk sey tubangilna.” At imbagana assey nattubangil ey kanana,
41002011	“Sika ey nattubangil, ibagak an sika ta vumangunka ya aram sey oboknu ta ingkan.”
41002012	Assey anna ey iillan da tagu, maggey tummakjug sey nattubangil at innarana sey obokna ya ginanasana ey ummayow. Nasdaow losan da tagu ey nangila at jinayowda as Apudyus, ey kananda, “Nanipud assey nataguwanni, niippun innilani as kamaʼs nauy ey nakwa.”
41002013	Kasin nampuuli as Jesus assey igid sey beybey ad Galili. Amud pey dasey tagu ey nadagup at tinudtujuwana jida.
41002014	Anna pun ey manaradaran as Jesus, innilana as Levi ey anak Alphaeus ey tutukju assey opisinana. Siya sey usa ey mansisingil as vuur. Kanan Jesus an siya, “Umalika ta umunudka an sa'un.” At lummibbat as Levi ey ummunud an siya.
41002015	Usa pun ey ag-agow, inayagan Levi da Jesus assey vuruyna. Amud pey sey ummunud asda ansingsingil as vuur ya dasey ujum ey kananda ey lawingan ey tagu. At nalikubda ey nikakan an Jesus ya dasey pasurutna.
41002016	Anna pun ey manganda, inggow vus dasey ujum ey Farisis ey misturun sey lintog ey nangila ey da mikakan as Jesus asda kananaʼs nait ey tagu. At inimusda asda pasurut Jesus ey kananda, “Yangey mikakan atpey sey apuyu anna asda anung da nait ey tagu?”
41002017	Jingngor pun Jesus, kanana ey gumminga, “Dasey tagu ey niippun sakitna, ajida pun kasapuran sey Doctor kon dasey tagu ey awad sakitna, jida sey angkasapuran. An sa'un, ummaliyak ta inyak tudtujuwan dasey ambasbasur, dakumpun asda ambabaru kanu pey.”
41002018	Usa pun ey ag-agow, losanda da pasurut John ey Amvuvunyag ya dasey Farisis mallangan as mandayawanda an Apudyus. Innilan pun da ujum ey tagu nauy, kananda an Jesus, “Dasey pasurut John ya dasey pasurut dasey Farisis at mallanganda losan kon dasey pasurutnu anna, ajida pun mit. Matkonanda pey ey aji pun mallangan?”
41002019	Sinongbatan Jesus ey kanana, “Yangey mallangan dasey mangilin sey laraki ey angkasar? Aji pun! Tey nu iinggow an jida sey tagu saji ey angkasar, siguraju ey mangamanganda.
41002020	Kon jumatong dallu sey ag-agow ey umayawan sey laraki ey nikasar at siyaji sey mallangananda.”
41002021	Inturuy Jesus ey nantudtuju, kanana, “Niippun tagu as mangintukup assey barbaru ey sinnun assey naropok ey lumvun. Tey nu kanaʼs ji sey makwa, kumson sey baru ey sinnun ya konkonona sey nitukupana ya ummam-amud sey visseyna.
41002022	At anungna vus assey barbaru ey bayas ey ka'utu at aji pun vus mabalin ey mivilung assey judaan ey ammutu ey gaddang tey aji pun mayétyét. Tey nu mavilungan, siguraju ey vumtak sey ammutu ya keynga at lawa sey baru ey bayas. At sey baru ey bayas, kasapuran vus ey baru ey ammutu sey mivilungana.”
41002023	Usa pun ey Sabaju ey ngilin, inggow as Jesus ya dasey aposelna asda u'uma ey manaradaran. At kummutlung dasey aposelna as kutikutimanda.
41002024	Innilan pun dasey Farisis jida, kananda an Jesus, “Ilam man sey koon dasey pasurutnu annaya ya, kumuntra mit assey lintog taku sey koonda anna ey angkiwaar assey ngilin.”
41002025	At kanan Jesus ey gumminga, “Vinasayu mit sey kingwan apu taku ey David assey kar-argow assey timpun sey nuuratanda asda vurunna.
41002026	Summakey mit assey vuruy Apudyus at nangara assey tinapey ey inggow siji ey para an Apudyus at kinanna ya nangatud vus asda vurunna. Nakwa nait assey timpun paji Abiatar ey kangatuwan ey paji assey timpu saji. Kon assey lintog taku ey Jews, misanga mit tey anggey dasey paji as mabalin ey mangan kon niippun kanan taku ey basurda jiyuy.”
41002027	At impanad Jesus ey gumminga ey kanana, “Masapur maawatanyu ey kingwan Apudyus sey sabaju ey ngilin as vumaruwan sey tagu ya dakumpun as tagu sey nakwa as vumaruwan sey ngilin.
41002028	Ya usa pey, sey Anak ji Tagu sey awad lobbongna ey mangimbaga nu ngan sey makwa unnu ngadanna sey mapaniyow assey Sabaju.”
41003001	Usa pun vus ey ag-agow ey timpun sey ngilin ey Sabaju, summakey as Jesus assey Sinagog ey apporon da Jews madagupan ya niyaspur vus ey inggow sey usa ey tagu ad darum ey niis-is sey imana.
41003002	Inggow vus dasey Farisis ey mansisiim an Jesus nu agasana vus sey niis-is saji ey urey nu ngilin ta awad allapuwanda ey amabasur an siya.
41003003	At kanan Jesus assey niis-is sey imana, “Umalika assey sangu anna.”
41003004	Ummuy pun, kanan Jesus asda tagu, “Ngey kanan sey lintog taku ey koon assey ngilin ey Sabaju? Ey koon taku sey ambaru unnu nait sey timpu ey angwaan asda dakumpun? Ey nauy sey ag-agow ey manurungan asda vurun taku ta matagu unnu timpu ey gumngatan?” Kon niippun guminga asda tagu.
41003005	Summanga as Jesus ey nangiila asda tagu ya lummawing sey somsomokna tey niippun daguda asda vurunda. At kanana assey niis-is sey imana, “Uyajum sey imam.” Inuyadna pun, vummaru ey nanggodong.
41003006	At lummogsad dasey Farisis at ummuyda nikabagbaga asda tagun ari Herod ta anapunda nu ngan annunda ey mangngat an Jesus.
41003007	Ummayow da Jesus ya dasey pasurutna assey Sinagog asida at umuy assey igid sey beybey ad Galili. Adjuwan dasey tagu ey narpu as dasey antokotokon ey vubruy ey ummuunnud an jida. Inggow dasey narpu assey provinsiyan sey Galili, Judea
41003008	ya da narpu ad Jerusalem. Da ujum, narpuda assey vubruy ey sakup sey Idumea ya dasey vubruy assey viik sey dawwang ad Jordan. Ya da ujum, narpuda assey vubruy ad Tyre ya Sidon. Da tagu sana, jingngorda dasey amin ey kingwan Jesus at siya sey ummuyda nangil-an an siya.
41003009	At gapu assey kaajun da tagu, imbagan Jesus asda aposelna ey umuyda angara as bangka ta awad tumukjuwana tey oni at lawa ya miipit.
41003010	Tey gapu assey nangaanana asda sakit dasey adjuwan ey tagu, ampop-oros dasey awad sakitna ey umadani ta todkonda atyén siya.
41003011	Ya dasey tagu avus ey nalun-ugan as jimunyu, apporoda umuy mallukvub assey sinagung Jesus nu ilanda siya ya pumkowda ey kananda, “Sika sey Anak Apudyus.”
41003012	Kon minandaran Jesus dasey nilulun-ug ta ajida ibagabaga sey miipanggop an siya.
41003013	Assey ummayan Jesus assey usa ey tagudtud, inayagana dasey tagu ey piuna umunud an siya.
41003014	Jummatongda pun, pinilina dasey nasawaran as juwa ey mivuvullun an siya ey nginadanana jida as aposel. Ya jida vus dasey baabaaruna ey umuy manudtuju asda tagu.
41003015	Ya innatjuna vus sey karobbonganda ey mangimparyow asda jimunyu ey da milun-ug asda tagu.
41003016	Asda nasawaran as juwa ey pinilina, annaya dasey ngadanda; As Simon ey nginadanana as Peter,
41003017	ya asi at da James an John ey anak da Zebedee kon nginadanana jida as Boanerges ey sey piuna ugujun, allasu as pumtuk.
41003018	Dasey ujum, jida da Andrew, as Philip, as Bartholomew, as Matthew, as Thomas, as James ey anak Alphaeus, as Thaddaeus, as Simon ey kananda ey naturud ey guminga ey mangintatakjug assey ilina,
41003019	ya asi at as Judas Iscariot ey nangingngina an Jesus assey umanungus.
41003020	Naas pun Jesus pinili dasey aposelna, nampuulida assey vubruy. At nandatdatong avus dasey adjuwan ey tagu at niippun at lawa agammun Jesus ya da aposelna ey mangan.
41003021	Jingngor pun dasey kabvuruy Jesus ey awad siya, piunda ey umuy aran tey jingngorda sey kanan da tagu ey na'ung-ung kanu siya.
41003022	Ya inggow vus dasey ujum ey misturun sey lintog ey narpu ad Jerusalem ey apporow mangugud ey nallun-ug nin as Beelzebul ey ap-apun da jimunyu an Jesus. Ya as Beelzebul avus sey nangatud assey karobbongana ey mangimparyow as dasey nilun-ug ey jimunyu.
41003023	Gapu ta siyana sey kananda an siya, inayagan Jesus dasey tagu at nampani ey kanana, “Pan vus Satanas paryawun dasey jimunyuna?
41003024	Ammaanyu somsomkon, nu niippun urnus dasey tagu assey usa ey ili ey pasigda angginnongat, siguraju ey mavurak jiyuy ey ili.
41003025	Ya nu niippun urnus sey usa ey simbaryan ey pasigda ampapatuy, yangey ajida pun mavurak.
41003026	At anungna vus an Satanas, tey nu gongatuna dasey vurunna ey jimunyu, siguraju ey mavurakda ya ampatingga sey tureyna. At siya sey aji pun mabalin ey koona nait.
41003027	As Satanas, mipani as kakasdoran ey tagu ey niippun makasakey assey vuruyna as umuy mangara asda laksunna nu ajina yén panguwun itakud siya asina at mabalin ey aran dasey awad ad darum. Kon inabakku as Satanas, at mabalin ey paryawuk dasey vurunna.”
41003028	Inturuy Jesus ey gumminga at kanana, “Assey katuttuwaan, amin ey karasin sey basur ey koon da tagu ya urey vus dasey lawingan ey igingada an Apudyus at mabalin ey mapakawan.
41003029	Kon ngan ey sey mangimbaga as lawingan assey Ispiritun Apudyus at aji pun mapakawan tey basurna jiyuy as ing-inggana.”
41003030	Kanaʼsna sey insongbat Jesus tey inggow dasey nangimbaga ey, “Nalun-ugan siya as jimunyu.”
41003031	Oni pun, jummatong as inan Jesus ya dasey sunudna at summisikadda as pawey ey mangimpaayag an siya.
41003032	At kanan dasey amud ey tagu ey nikaam-ammung an Jesus, “Anji da inam anda sunudnu as pawey ey mangayag an sika.”
41003033	At kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Dakumpun gey as jida sey inak anda sunudku.”
41003034	At intollongna ey nangila asda tagu ey nikaam-ammung an siya at kanana, “Andanaya vus da inak ya da sunudku.
41003035	Tey ngan ey sey tagu ey mangwa assey piun Apudyus, siya sey ivilangku as sunudku ya inak.”
41004001	Inggow vus sey kasin nantudtujuwan Jesus assey igid sey beybey ad Galili. At gapu assey kaajun da tagu ey apporow mikaam-ammung an siya, ingkunudna sey bangka ey inggow assey igid sey beybey asi at tumukju. At angkasikad da tagu assey igidna.
41004002	Adjuwan dasey intudtujuna ey nangusar as dasey panpani.
41004003	Kanana, “Guminok kayu man yén tey anna sey ul-ullituk. Inggow sey usa ey mangkikiwaar ey ummuy nawwagwag as vukar.
41004004	Assey nawwagwagana, nibatug sey ujum assey daran at ummuy da titit kinan.
41004005	At da ujum, nibatugda assey dopdopras ey ayyapit sey lutana. Aji pun nabayag at tummuvuda.
41004006	Kon lummuswa pun as init ey ummatung, naminda narangu tey niippun lummamutanda.
41004007	At da ujum vus ey vukar, nibatugda assey sissiit. Tuttuwa ey tummuvuda kon anna pun vus ey tummuvu da siit, nasyungda at ajida pun namunga.
41004008	Kon dasey ujum ey vukar, nibatugda assey ambaru ey luta at tummuvuda ey antataba at naminda namunga. Sintutlumpuru sey vungan da ujum ya sin-oonompuru sey vungan da ujum ya inggow pey da namunga as singgagasut.”
41004009	Naas pun Jesus inul-ullit jiyuy, kanana, “Niingaan kayu mit at ammaanyu sommosommokon nu ngey piun sey imbagak saji ey ugujun.”
41004010	Ummayow pun dasey tagu ey ummanggey as Jesus, inimus dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna ya da ujum ey nangngor an siya nu ngan sey piun sey panina saji ugujun.
41004011	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Inatjun Apudyus an dakayu sey somsomok ta maawatanyu dasey aji pun naagammuwan assey kar-argow miipanggop assey manturayana. Kon as dasey ujum ey tagu ey aji pun mamati, panpani anggey sey mibaga an jida
41004012	ta awad tumuttuwaan sey imbagan sey profet assey kar-argow ey kanana, ‘Urey nu iillanda, ajida pun mimatunan. Urey vus dodongronda, ajida pun pey dallu maawatan. Tey nu ajida atyén kanan sina ta ibabawida dasey basurda, pakawanun Apudyus jida.’”
41004013	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ey ajiyu pun atpey naawatan sey imbagak saji miipanggop assey niwagwag ey vukar? Ngey annunyu ey mangawat as dasey ujum ey panpani?”
41004014	At illawag Jesus ey kanana, “Sey mangkikiwaar ey impanik, siya sey apporow mangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus.
41004015	Da ujum ey vukar ey nibatug assey angkabnut ey daran, mipanida as dasey tagu ey nangngor assey Gingan Apudyus. Kon innamin Satanas kinaan sey jingngorda saji assey somsomokda.
41004016	At dasey nibatug avus asda dopdopras, nauy dasey tagu ey allaylayad ey mangawat assey Gingan Apudyus ey jingngorda.
41004017	Kon aji pun lummamut sey jingngorda ey Gingan Apudyus assey somsomokda. Tey nu jumatong ey sey problema unnu matongtong-aganda gapu assey mamatiyanda assey Gingan Apudyus, nan-awidanda sey pammatida.
41004018	At anungna vus as dasey vukar ey nibatug as dasey sissiit. Nauy vus dasey tagu ey nangngor assey Gingan Apudyus
41004019	kon nala'uban sey jingngorda saji. Tey gapu assey danagda nu ngey angar-anda assey kasapuran ya asda layadda ey vumaknang anda ujum ey piunda ey amungunʼey angkuwa, niippun nambanagan sey jingngorda ey Gingan Apudyus.
41004020	Kon dasey vukar ey nibatug assey ambaru ey luta, nauy dasey tagu ey nangngor assey Gingan Apudyus ya impanadda ey mamati. At jida sey kamaʼs mura ey namunga. At namunga da ujum as sintutlumpuru, sin-oonompuru ya da ujum, namungada as singgagasut.”
41004021	Kanan vus Jesus ey nampani an jida, “Sey tagu ey angintug assey silow, ajina pun tang-uban unnu igga assey siruk sey kama. Tey pasgidana ya impatangna assey ampatak ta miila sey ampasiigid.
41004022	At isuna vus dasey amin ey nitataru unnu aji pun nipaagammu tey awad dallu sey timpu ey miluswaana ya maagammuwana.”
41004023	Naas pun Jesus inugudji, kanana, “Niingaan kayu at ammaanyu sommosommokon nu ngey piun sey pani saji ugujun.”
41004024	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Masapur ey maawatanyu sey dongronyu. Tey nu koonyu nauy, umaju sey maawatanyu ya jugjug-an Apudyus sey agammuyu.
41004025	Tey sey tagu ey maryad ey andongor as dasey tudtujuk, majugjug-an sey maawatana. Kon sey tagu ey ajina pun koon sey dongrona, urey sey ak-akittan ey maawatana at mamin makaan.”
41004026	Awad vus sey usa ey pinanin Jesus ey kanana, “Sey Turey Apudyus at anungna vus assey usa ey tagu ey ummuy nan-osok assey umana.
41004027	Nu lavi ey, masuyup ya vummangun nu vigvigat. Tumuvu sey iyyosokna kon niippun agammuna nu ngan annunda ey tummuvu.
41004028	Tey keygad sey luta ey mampatuvu ya mampadokor inggana assey amusvusanda ya oni ey nabgasan.
41004029	Jumatong ey sey iyaani, umuyna aniyun sey iyyosokna saji.”
41004030	Inturuy Jesus ey mantudtuju asda tagu ey kanana, “Ngan sey manginyisuwan taku assey Turey Apudyus unnu ngey ambaru as mangimpaniyan taku?
41004031	Miyisu assey kababan-itan ey vukar ey dan da tagu imura.
41004032	Kon nu mimura ey ta tumuvu, siya at avus sey katataknangan ey mura asda amin ey nimura. Ampanga ey as angkananju, mabalin umuy da titit man-ijungan sey pangana.”
41004033	Adjuwan pey dallu dasey pani ey inusar Jesus assey nangintudtujuwana assey Gingan Apudyus as patinggan sey mabalinda ey maawatan.
41004034	Niippun nantudtujuwana asda tagu as aji nan-usar as pani. Kon nu umanggeyda ey asda aposelna, asina at ilawlawag an jida sey amin ey piun sey pinanina saji ey ugujun.
41004035	Anna pun ey masjum assey ag-agow saji, kanan Jesus as dasey aposelna, “Andormang taku assey beybey anna ta intaku ad jumang.”
41004036	At nalluganda assey inggow bangka ey tummukjuwan Jesus at tineynanda dasey amud ey tagu. Inggow avus dasey ujum ey tagu ey nambangka ey ummunud an jida.
41004037	Assey nalluluggananda, insaradna sey mandangsor ey bali. At gapu assey dangsor sey dalluyun, anna ey mapnu sey bangka assey danum at tigangeyda malinong.
41004038	Kon as Jesus, nasusuyup assey pagpag sey bangka saji. At vinangunda siya ey kananda, “Apu Misturu, yangey amorna ta muuvur taku?”
41004039	Vummangun as Jesus at impaginokna sey bali ya kanana assey dalluyun “Ustu naʼt, guminokka.” At maggey nakornatan ey vummaru sey nampaliwus.
41004040	At kanan Jesus as dasey aposelna, “Pa kayu umugyat? Ey niippun atpey pammatiyu an sa'un?”
41004041	Kon ummam-amud at avus sey ugyatda at kananda ey ambabagbaga, “Ngey katatagun nauy, urey sey bali anda dalluyun at dongronda siya!”
41005001	Inturuy da Jesus ey anormang assey beybey saji inggana as jummatongda ad jumang ey adani ad Gerasa
41005002	Lummogsad pun da Jesus, inabot sey usa ey tagu jida ey nilun-ugan dasey jimunyu. Sey tagu sana, narpu assey lalabvunan
41005003	tey as jiyuy sey iniiggawana. Amud sey kasdorna ya niippun mangingkaya ey mangintakud an siya ey urey kawad sey usarunda.
41005004	Nanginkinnuwunda intakud kon dana goston sey kawad sey imana ya sey sikina. At niippun mangingkaya ey mangimpaginok an siya.
41005005	Inag-agow ya nilavi ey gumakeygakey asda liyang ey lalabvunan ya dasey vib-ilig ey pumpumkow ya nangara as batu ya inggogodna assey long-agna.
41005006	Intapna pun as Jesus assey addayuwan, nanuddak ey nangabot an siya asi at mallikkadang assey sinagungna.
41005007	Namvugga ey kanana, “Sika Jesus ey anak sey kangatuwan ey Apudyus, ngan sey pium ey koon an sa'un. Isapatam an Apudyus ey ajim sa'un tongtong-agun.”
41005008	Imbagana ji tey apporon Jesus paryawun sey jimunyu ey nallun-ug ey kanana, “Sika ey jimunyu, teynam sey tagu anna.”
41005009	Inimus Jesus ey kanana, “Ngey ngadannu?” Summongbat sey nilun-ug saji ey kanana, “Kalivulivu sey ngadanku tey adjuwan kani.”
41005010	Asi at ampangpangaasi an Jesus ta ajina atyén paryawun jida assey ili saji.
41005011	Niyaspur vus ey inggow dasey adjuwan ey borok ey ansuvusuvuk assey tagudtud.
41005012	At kananda ey nampangpangaasi an Jesus, “Paruvusam atyén dakani ey umuy milun-ug asda borok.”
41005013	At pinaruvusan Jesus dasey jimunyu at tineynanda sey tagu saji at ummuyda nilun-ug asda borok. Nalun-ugan pun dasey borok saji ey ummuy as juwallivu, magda gey situtuddak ey ummuy nan-otdag assey dopras at nipisukda namin ey nuuvur assey beybey.
41005014	Dasey tagu ey mamabantey asda borok, ummawidda ey nangiwwarawag assey innilada saji. At adjuwan dasey tagu ey ummuy nangila assey nakwa saji.
41005015	Jummatong pun dasey tagu assey iggawan Jesus, innilada sey tagu saji ey tineynan dasey adjuwan ey jimunyu. Tummutukju ey nallumvun ya vummaru sey somsomokna at losanda tagu ummugyat.
41005016	At dasey nangila, inul-ullitda asda ujum ey tagu sey nakwa saji assey tagu ey nilun-ugan dasey jimunyu ya sey nakwa asda borok.
41005017	At nampangpangaasi dasey tagu an Jesus ey teynana sey ilida saji.
41005018	Anna pun ey sumakey da Jesus assey bangka ey umayow, nampangpangaasi sey tagu saji ey nalun-ugan as jimunyu ta umunud atyén an siya.
41005019	Kon kanan Jesus, “Ajika umali ta ampuulika assey vubruyyu ta ul-ullitum asda kabvuruynu sey kingwan Apudyus ya assey nangadaguwana an sika.”
41005020	At ummayow ey ingkaponna ad Decapolis ey kananda ey Simpuru ey Munisipyu ya apporona ul-ullitun dasey amin ey kingwan Jesus an siya. At losan da tagu nasdaow ey nangngor assey inul-ullitna.
41005021	Kasin pun nandormang da Jesus assey beybey ey nampuuli ad jumang, adjuwan vus da tagu ey nadagup ey ummuy an siya.
41005022	At inggow sey usa ey marong-ag ey opisyar assey sinagog ey angngadan as Jairus. Innilana pun as Jesus, ummuy nallikkadang assey sinagungna.
41005023	Nampangpangaasi ey kanana, “Anji ey tigangey matuy sey anakni ey vubai. Ipangngaasim ta umalika ey mangimpatey assey imam an siya ta makaan sey sakitna.”
41005024	At nitun-ud da Jesus an siya ya kama vus ey nitun-ud dasey amud ey tagu ey an-il-illasi ey umadani an Jesus.
41005025	Inggow avus sey vubai ey masakit as nasawaran as juwa ey tawun ey mandaradara.
41005026	Amud sey tongtong-agna ey nanpaapaagas asda antokotokon ey Doctor. Nagastuna amin ey laksunna kon aji pun maagasan tey ummam-amud at avus sey sakitna.
41005027	Jingngorna pun sey damag miipanggop an Jesus, nitun-ud asda tagu. Ummadani assey ujug Jesus
41005028	tey assey somsomokna, nu todkona atyén lawa sey lumvun Jesus, makaan sey sakitna.
41005029	Tindokna pun gey sey lumvun Jesus, nigisan ey gumminok sey darana ya nagiknana ey nakaan sey sakitna.
41005030	Vinkon pun Jesus ey awad sey pannakabalinna ey nuusar, nambaliwit ey kanana, “Ngey nandok assey lumvunku?”
41005031	Kanan dasey pasurutna, “Yangey innilam assey amud kaajun da tagu ey man-il-illasi ey mid-um an sika? Pam imusum nu ngan sey nandok an sika?”
41005032	Kon balibaliwitun pey dallu Jesus ey mangila nu ngey nangwaʼsji.
41005033	At sey vubai saji, gapu ta giniknana sey nakwa an siya, insaradna ey mamilpil assey ugyatna at ummuy nallikkadang assey sinagung Jesus, asina at ibaga sey katuttuwaan ey nakwa an siya.
41005034	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Sika ey sunud, gapu assey pammatim an sa'un, nakaan sey sakitnu. At ingkan tey vummaru sey mansomsomkam ya nakaan sey sakitnu.”
41005035	Anna pun ey sissiya ey mikabagbaga as Jesus, jummatong vus dasey ujum ey tagu ey narpu assey vuruy da Jairus ey opisyar sey sinagog. At imbagada an Jairus ey kananda, “Ajim taktakun sey misturu sana tey ummayow sey anak saji.”
41005036	Kon ajin pun Jesus inatingor sey imbagada an Jairus. Kanana an siya, “Ajika madanagan, pakasdorom sey pammatim an sa'un.”
41005037	At sey kingwan Jesus, sumanga nu umunud dasey ujum ey tagu an siya, anggey da Peter ya da James an John ey mansunud sey imparuvusna.
41005038	Jummatongda pun assey vuruy da Jairus, innilan Jesus da tagu ey masiwasiwar ey siiivil anda umag-aguraur.
41005039	Summakey pun as Jesus, kanana, “Pakayu siiivil? Aji pun mit natuy sey anak anna tey nasusuyup anggey.”
41005040	Kon inam-amang at avus da tagu siya. Kingwana pun, impalogsadna da amin ey tagu asina at ayagan sey aman ya inan sey anak saji ya dasey turu ey aposelna at ummuyda assey iggawan sey ladag.
41005041	Inugnana sey iman sey natuy saji ey kanana, “Talita Kom,” ey sey piuna ugujun, “Anakku, ibagak an sika ey vumangunka!”
41005042	Imbagana pun ji, vummangun sey anak at nanaran (Nasawaran as juwa sey tawun sey anak saji.) at amud sey nasdaawan da tagu.
41005043	At vinilin Jesus da tagu ta ajida ug-uggujun asda barangna ey tagu sey nakwa saji. At kanana, “Pakananyu anak sanat.”
41006001	Tineynan Jesus sey ili saji at nampuuli assey vubruyda at ummunud vus dasey pasurutna.
41006002	Assey ngilin ey Sabaju, ummuy as Jesus nantudtuju assey sinagog. Losan da tagu nasdaow ey nangngor assey tudtujuna. At kananda, “Ngey nangar-an tagu sana assey somsomokna ya assey kinariingna? Ya ngan amin sey nangar-ana assey karobbongana ey mangwa asda kaskasdaow?
41006003	Yangey dakumpun siya sey inggow ey karpenteru ey anak Mary? Yangey dokon siya sey pangu ey anak asda mansusunud ey da James, Joseph, Judas ya Simon? At yangey dakumpun as susunudna dasey ujum ey vubai ey nikiili an jitaku?” At siya at lawa sey lamug da tagu ey mangapsan ey aji pun mamatiyan an siya.
41006004	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Vigvigun dasey tagu sey profet Apudyus assey amin ey ili ey ayana, kon aji pun mavigvig assey mismu ey ilina ya asda jujugana anda kabvuruyna.”
41006005	At nauy sey ajin pun Jesus nangwaan asda adjuwan ey kaskasdaow tey mavilvilang anggey dasey masakit sey nangimpatayana assey imana ey nangagas an jida.
41006006	At nawwigiwig as Jesus ey nangila asda tagu tey ajida pun siya patiyun. Oni pun, ummuy as Jesus nantudtuju assey amin ey vubruy assey ili saji.
41006007	At inayagana dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna ya inatjuna sey karobbonganda ey mangimparyow asda nilun-ug ey jimunyu. Ya asina at sinjudwaun jida baarun asda kikkiili ey umuy mantudtuju.
41006008	Vinilinna jida ey kanana, “Ingkayu. Surkud anggey sey itakinyu. Aji kayu ampasking ya angara as makan anda mangintakin as pilak.
41006009	Mabalin ey mansapatus kayu kon aji kayu mangintakin as lumvun as man-orsanyu.”
41006010	Kanana vus, “Nu jumatong kayu assey usa ey ili ya awad ammangili an dakayu, inggow kayu assey vuruyna inggana as teynanyu sey vubruy saji.
41006011	Kon nu awad ey vubruy as aji amasakey an dakayu ya aji mangngor assey ibagayu, teynanyu sey vubruy saji ya pinukpukanyu sey tapuk assey sikiyu ta awad mangigammuwanda ey keygadda assey majusaanda.”
41006012	Naas pun Jesus imbaga da jiyuy, lummibbatda ey ummuy mantudtuju asda tagu ey masapur man-awidanda dasey basurda.
41006013	Ya pinaryowda dasey nilun-ug ey jimunyu asda tagu ya inaprusanda vus dasey adjuwan ey masakit as lana at nakaan dasey sakitda.
41006014	As Herod ey ari ad Galili, jingngorna sey kingwakingwan Jesus tey siya sey apporon da tagu uguugujun. Kanan dasey ujum, “As Jesus anna at siya as John ey amvuvunyag ey ummuli at siya sey awad pannakabalinna ey mangwa as dasey kaskasdaow.”
41006015	Ya da ujum vus, kananda ey, “Siya nin as Elijah ey profet assey kar-argow ey ummuli.” At kanan vus da ujum, “Siya sey usa ey profet Apudyus ey anung da profetna assey kar-argow.”
41006016	Kon jingngor pun ari Herod, kanana, “Maggey lawa siya tuttuwa as John ey amvuvunyag ey impasiwatku sey uruna. Anna at pey ummuli.”
41006017	Siyaji sey kanan ari Herod tey siya sey nangimbaar asda nanokma an John. At impabarudna ey nakakawwadan gapu assey nangamsiwan John an siya. Tey sey kingwan Herod, magna gey inasawa as Herodias ey asawan Philip ey sunudna.
41006018	At ingkasikasin siya John ey mangimbaga ey kanana, “Aggissow akey nu porson sey asawan sey sunudta.”
41006019	Siyana sey lapun sey summang-an Herodias an John. At piuna atyén ipagngat kon niippun agammuna ey mangwa
41006020	tey urey as Herod at umugyat an John at siya sey apporona manarakniban tey agammuna ey ambaru ya naapudyusan siya ey tagu. At nu dongrona sey itudtujun John, nakussu pey sey somsomokna kon anna dallu sey layadna ey mandongor assey tudtujuna.
41006021	Jummatong pun sey ag-agow ey niyanakan Herod, inayagana dasey papangat anda apun da surdaju ya da nangangatu ey tagu ad Galili ey mikaragsak an siya. Nauy ey timpu sey nawayaan Herodias ey mangimpagngat an John.
41006022	Summakey pun sey anak Herodias ey babarasang, ummuy nanadok at amud sey layad ari Herod ya dasey mangilina. At kanan ari assey babarasang, “Ibagam an sa'un nu ngey ngadannaʼsnait sey pium ta atjuk an sika.”
41006023	At insapatana ey kanana, “Urey ngadannaʼsnait sey kudawum at atjuk an sika, urey pey kagugwan sey tureyku at mabalin ey atjuk nu siya sey pium.”
41006024	Lummawa sey babarasang at ummuyna inimus an inana ey kanana, “Ngan sey kudawuk ey atjun ari an sa'un?” At kanan inana, “Ibagam ta sey urun amvuvunyag ey John sey atjuna an sika.”
41006025	At ginanasan sey babarasang saji ey nampuuli an ari at kanana, “Sey piuk ey atjum an sa'un ey dagus assey sana at sey urun amvuvunyag ey John ey miigga assey sadang.”
41006026	Jingngor pun ari jiyuy, amud sey jujuuyna kon gapu ta luusna insapata assey sinagung dasey mangilina, aji pun mabalin ey ibabawina.
41006027	At vinaarna sey usa asda amabantey ey surdajuna ey ummuy naniwat assey urun John assey baballudan.
41006028	At nampuuli sey surdaju saji ey iniiggana sey urun John assey sadang at innatjuna assey babarasang. At sey babarasang saji, ummuyna vus innatud an inana.
41006029	Jingngor pun dasey pasurut John sey nakwa an siya, ummuyda innara sey long-agna at illavunda.
41006030	Assey nampuuliyén dasey aposel Jesus ey ummuy nantudtuju, ummuyda an Jesus at inul-ullitda dasey amin ey kingwada ya dasey intudtujuda.
41006031	Gapu ta adjuwan da tagu ey an-orooros ey umuy mangila an Jesus, niippun agammuda ey umuy mangan. At kanan Jesus asda aposelna, “Intaku tumalin assey niippun katagtaguwan ta awad agammuyu ey man-illong.”
41006032	At nambangkada ey ummuy tumalin.
41006033	Kon amud pey sey nangila assey nambangkaanda at immatunanda ey da Jesus at pey da jiyuy. At dasey tagu ey narpu asda antokotokon ey vubruy, kinamakamda ey nanguy assey igid sey beybey at namanguda at avus ey jummatong assey lugar ey ayén da Jesus.
41006034	Tummakdang pun da Jesus, innilana dasey amud ey tagu at nadaguwan an jida tey anungda pey lawa sey karneru ey niippun mamuut an jida. At tinudtujuwana jida miipanggop asda nantokotokon ey makwamakwa.
41006035	Anna pun ey gumikbot, ummadani da aposelna an siya ey kananda, “Anna ey lumavi ya niippun amin vuruy sina.
41006036	At ambaru nu baarum da tagu ey umuy asda vubruy ta nguminada as kanunda.”
41006037	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Dakayu sey amakan an jida.” At kananda ey summongbat, “Ngan sey ingkani angar-an as ipakanni asda nauy! Urey nu awad labvu assey makatawun ey mingina at aji pun pey dallu umaney as kanunda.”
41006038	At kanan Jesus, “Ingkayu ilan nu kam-ana ey tinapey sey awad.” Ummuyda pun innila, kananda, “Awad anggey sey lima ey tinapey ya juwa ey ikan.”
41006039	At kanan Jesus, “Ibagayu asda tagu ta muugpuugpunda ey tumukju assey lugrugam.”
41006040	At nuugpuugpunda ey tummukju at awadka ey singgagasut ya awadka ey sillilimampuru.
41006041	Asin at Jesus aran inggow lima ey tinapey ya sey juwa ey ikan. Nantangad ad langit ey mansaramat an Apudyus. Asina at pitpit-ingun sey tinapey saji at innatjuna as dasey aposelna ta iwarasda asda tagu. Innarana vus sey juwa ey ikan ya pinpintudna at impawarasna vus.
41006042	Nangan da tagu losan inggana as ning-opda.
41006043	Naasda pun nangan, jinagup da aposelna sey vunada ey nangan at ummuy as nasawaran as juwa ey awit sey pinnuda.
41006044	Limallivu sey vilang dasey laraki kon aji pun nivilang dasey vubai anda anak ey nangan.
41006045	Naasda pun nangan, impalugan Jesus ey dagus dasey aposelna assey bangka ta amanguda ey andormang ey umuy ad Bethsaida. At nateynan as Jesus ta palibbatuna yén dasey tagu.
41006046	Impalibbatna pun jida, nanagada assey tagudtud ey ummuy nalluwaru.
41006047	Anna pun ey gummikbot, sissiya as Jesus assey tagudtud saji. Kon dasey aposelna, annada assey gawan sey beybey.
41006048	Assey nangisjungan Jesus an jida, innilana ey marigatanda ey manginturung assey bangka tey amud sey abvid ey miyabot an jida. Assey madamaan, umunud as Jesus ey nanaran assey usun sey danum. Angowkow-as atyén ad jumang,
41006049	kon innilada pun siya ey manaradaran assey usun sey danum, kananda at nu liyawan at sikukulisda
41006050	tey amud sey ugyatda ey mangila an siya. Kon kanan Jesus ey gumminga, “Sa'un nauy at aji kayu umugyat.”
41006051	At summakey assey bangka ey nikalugan an jida. Oni pun, mag atgey gumminok sey abvid saji. At natokor dasey aposelna ya nasdaowda.
41006052	Tey urey innilada sey nangimpaajuwan Jesus assey tinapey, ajida pun pey dallu maawatan nu ngey piuna ugujun sey miipanggop assey pannakabalinna tey kama as kummabnut sey somsomokda.
41006053	Inturuy da Jesus ya dasey aposelna ey nambangka inggana assey jummatongda ad Genesaret at intakudda sey bangka assey igid sey beybey.
41006054	Lummogsadda pun assey bangka, immatunan dasey tagu as Jesus.
41006055	At situtuddakda ey umuy asda vubruy ey mangimvulig asda masakit ta iyuyda an Jesus assey lugar ey ayaayana.
41006056	At urey ngadanna ey vubruy sey ayén Jesus, dokor man ey vubruy unnu kormaga, dagupunda dasey amin ey masakit assey apporow maamuamungan dasey tagu ya asida at ampangpangaasi an Jesus ta iparuvusna dasey masakit ta todkonda atyén lawa sey gayadan sey lumvunna. At da amin ey nandok, nakaan sey sakitda.
41007001	Usa pun ey ag-agow, inggow dasey Farisis ya da misturun sey lintog Moses ey narpu ad Jerusalem ey ummuy assey iggawan Jesus.
41007002	Innilada dasey ujum ey aposel Jesus ey ajida pun da unujun dasey minamaliyém ey ugalin dasey Jews miipanggop assey angokoonda ey amvuru asida at mangan.
41007003	Tey dasey Jews, am-amud dasey Farisis at ajida pun maggey mangan nu ajida unujun koon dasey judaan ey intudtujun dasey dakdakorda assey maliyam miipanggop assey angookoonda ey amvuru asida at mangan.
41007004	Ya anungna vus nu awad idatongda as makan ey nangin-an, ajida pun vus maggey kanun nu ajida panguwun isowsow assey danum. Awad pey dallu da ujum ey ugalida ey anungna sey koko'onda ey manguras assey tasa, kapatera anda gambang ey kandeluda.
41007005	At siya lapuna ey kanan dasey Farisis anda misturun sey lintog an Jesus, “Pan lawa da aposelnu aji unujun dasey ugali assey maliyam ey impatawid dasey dakdakor taku miipanggop assey koon ey amvuru asita at mangan?”
41007006	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Ustu tuttuwa sey impapaddaan profet Isaiah assey kar-argow ey kanan Apudyus miipanggop an dakayu ey pippiila, kanana, ‘Da nauy ey tagu, sungadda anggey sey andaydayow kon adayu atpey sey somsomokda an sa'un.
41007007	At niippun servin sey dada mandayawan an sa'un tey sey apporoda itudtuju ey vilin at kingkingwan pey lawa da tagu kon kananda ey siya sey vilinku.’”
41007008	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “At nan-awidanyu sey vilin Apudyus ya siya at avus apporoyu unujun sey ugalin da tagu.
41007009	Nariing kayu pigey tuttuwa ey mangiwwalin assey lintog Apudyus tey siya at avus apporoyu unujun koon sey judaan ey ugaliyu.
41007010	Kama assey impakur-it Apudyus an Moses ey kanana, ‘Rispituwum sey amam ya inam. Sey tagu ey mangimbaga assey dakumpun asda amana unnu inana at masapur ey mipagngat.’
41007011	Kon dakumpun atpey sey apporoyu itudtuju tey kananyu, ‘Nu awad mabalin miturung asda ama an ina, urey aji atjun nu mallasunta an jida ey sey mabalin ey iturung at KORBAN.’ (Sey piuna ugujun, ‘Niposta ey maatud an Apudyus.’)
41007012	Assey kanaʼsna ey tudtujuyu, ajiyu pun atpey paruvusan sey manurungan assey ama ya ina.”
41007013	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ilam, kinumbot nait ey ugaliyu ey apporoyu itudtuju asda tagu tey iwwalinna sey Gingan Apudyus. Usa anggey nait ey kookoonyu ey imbagak tey adjuwan pey dallu da ujum ey anung da nait.”
41007014	Inayagan vus Jesus dasey tagu at kanana, “Dongronyu sey ibagak anna an dakayu ta maawatanyu.
41007015	Niippun makan as mabalin kanun ey mangimpaaggissow assey tagu an Apudyus nu dokon sey marpu ad darum assey somsomok ey iluswan sey sungad.
41007016	Niingaan kayu at sosomkonyu sey jingngoryu.”
41007017	Tineynan Jesus dasey tagu at summakey ad darum at ummunud dasey aposelna ey ummuy nangimus nu ngan sey piun sey imbagana saji ey ugujun.
41007018	Kanan Jesus, “Urey atpey dakayu at ajiyu pun naawatan? Ey niippun agammuyu ey sey makan ey umuy assey sungad ya inukmun at dakumpun jiyuy sey mampaaggissow assey tagu?
41007019	Tey sey makan sey vuwang sey ayana ya oni ey niyattey. At dakumpun assey somsomok sey ayana.” Jiyuy sey imbagan Jesus ta impaagammuna ey mabalin ey kanun sey amin ey makan.
41007020	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Sey marpu assey somsomok sey tagu sey mangimpaaggissow an siya an Apudyus.
41007021	Tey assey somsomok sey marpuwan sey amin ey lawingan ey kookoon da tagu, kama asda; man-agguman sey laraki ya vubai ey dakumpun as man-asawa, dasey man-akow, da gumngat ya sey mikadagdagas.
41007022	Ya sey somsomok avus sey marpuwan sey topor, sey mangimpiil-an asda lawingan ey ugali ya dasey malliput. Sey somsomok avus sey marpuwan dasey kaviviin ey ugali ya sey mangwaan as madadailan da ujum ey tagu. Sey somsomok avus sey marpuwan sey paspas-um ya dasey ujum ey nilalangsit.
41007023	Amin dasey lawingan anna at assey somsomok sey narpuwana. Da nauy, sey mangimpaaggissow as dasey tagu.”
41007024	Tineynan Jesus sey vubruy saji at ummuy assey sakupun sey ili ey Tyre Jummatongda pun, summakey assey usa ey vuruy tey sey piuna atyén, niippun angagammu ey awad siya, kon naagammuwanda at avus.
41007025	Inggow sey usa ey mad-an ey nalun-ugan as jimunyu sey anakna ey vubai. Jingngorna pun ey awad as Jesus, ginanasana ey ummuy at nallikkadang assey sinagungna
41007026	ey nampangpangaasi ta paryawuna atyén sey jimunyu ey nilun-ug assey anakna. Sey mad-an saji, niyanak ad Ponisya ey sakup sey Syria at dakumpun as usa ey Jews.
41007027	Kon kanan Jesus an siya, “Masapur ey amanguwunta yén pakanan dasey anak ta ming-opda. Tey lawingan nu aranta sey kanun sey anak ya innatud asda asu.”
41007028	At kanan sey mad-an ey summongbat, “Tuttuwa sey inugudnu sanat Apu, kon yangey ajin da asu kanun sey vugtan dasey anak?”
41007029	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Gapu assey kanaʼsnaʼt ey songbatnu, mabalin ey ampuulika assey vuruyyu tey ummayow sey jimunyu ey nilun-ug assey anaknu.”
41007030	Nampuuli pun sey mad-an assey vuruyda, anna tuttuwa sey anak ey uumvug assey kama ey tineynan sey jimunyu.
41007031	Ummayow da Jesus ad Tyre at ummuyda assey igid sey beybey ad Galili. Assey ummayawanda, nanguyda ad Sidon asida at mangow-as ey nanguy ad Decapolis ey kananda ey “Simpuru ey Munisipyu.”
41007032	Jummatongda pun assey igid sey beybey, inggow siji sey tagu ey torong ya omor ey inniyuy dasey tagu an Jesus. Nampangpangaasida ta ipateyna atyén lawa sey imana assey tagu saji ta makaan sey sakitna.
41007033	At inayagan Jesus siya ta tumalinda asda kaajuwan ey tagu, asin at Jesus itdok sey gammatna assey ingan sey tagu saji. Ya tummuppa avus ya initdokna assey jilana.
41007034	At nantangad as Jesus ad langit ey ummag-us at kanana, “EPPATA,” ey sey piuna ugujun, “Mabkatanka.”
41007035	Imbagan pun Jesus jiyuy, nakaan ey dagus sey torong ya omorna at mabalin makadngor ya an-ar-arawas sey gumingaana.
41007036	At vinilin Jesus dasey tagu ta ajida iwarawag sey kingwana saji. Kon iyyam-amudda at avus ey nangiwwarawag.
41007037	Amud sey nasdaawan da tagu at kananda, “Ambaru sey apporona koon tey urey sey torong at makadngor ya sey omor at makaginga.”
41008001	Inggow vus kasin sey timpu ey nadagupan dasey amud ey tagu assey iggawan Jesus. Naamin pun sey barunda ey niippun kanunda, inayagan Jesus dasey aposelna at kanana,
41008002	“Madaguwak asda tagu anna tey mikatlu ey ag-agow ey sana sey iniiggawanda an jitaku ya naamin sey barunda.
41008003	At nu palibbatuk jida ey ajida pun mangan, maggey lawa ta mangunawada assey daran, am-amud tey addayuwan sey umayan da ujum.”
41008004	At kanan dasey aposelna an siya, “Kon gona sey intaku mangar-an as ipakan taku an jida? Niippun addaniyan as vubruy assey iggawan taku anna.”
41008005	Inimus Jesus an jida ey kanana, “Yangey niippun lawa tinapey as intakinyu?” At kananda, “Awad anggey sey pitu ey tinapey.”
41008006	At imbagan Jesus asda tagu ey tumukjuda asda lugrugam. Asina at aran sey pitu ey tinapey at nansaramat an Apudyus ya asina at pitpit-ingun at innatjuna asda aposelna ta iwarasda asda tagu.
41008007	Inggow vus sey akit ey baran-it ey ikan. Naas pun vus as Jesus nansaramat an Apudyus, imbagana ey iwarasda avus asda tagu.
41008008	Nangan amin da tagu inggana as ning-opda. Naas da pun nangan, jinagupda sey vunada at ummuy as pitu ey awit.
41008009	Sey vilang dasey tagu ey nangan at ummavut as opat ey livu.
41008010	Oni pun, pinalibbat Jesus da tagu asi at makalugan ey dagus asda aposelna assey bangka ey umuy assey sakup sey Dalmanuta.
41008011	Jummatongda pun ad Dalmanuta, inggow dasey ujum ey Farisis ey nikaisik an Jesus. Piunda siya barbaliyan at insaradda ey mangarakag an siya ey kananda, “Ayu uda, mangimpiilaka as nakaskasdaow ey sinyar ey mangimpatuttuwa ey as Apudyus sey nangatud assey pannakabalinnu.”
41008012	Ummag-us as Jesus gapuʼs sigab sey somsomokna at kanana, “Pan lawa da tagu assey sana ipapilit ey mangimpiilaak as nakaskasdaow ey sinyar? Isigurajuk an dakayu ey tagu assey sana ey urey sa'an at niippun ipiilak as jugan sey piunyu ilan.”
41008013	Siyaji sey imbagana asina at teynan jida. At kasin nallugan assey bangka ey mandormang assey beybey ad Galili.
41008014	Assey mandormanganda, ingkagasmok dasey aposel Jesus ey naliwatanda ey nantiplag tey sa'an anggey ey tinapey sey awad.
41008015	Vinagbagaan Jesus jida ey kanana, “Man-annad kayu as dasey tinuktuk dasey Farisis ya sey tinuktuk Herod.”
41008016	Imbagan pun Jesus sey miipanggop assey tinuktuk, siaagutimtimda at avus ey kananda, “Imbagana nin jiyuy tey naliwatan taku ey nantiplag as tinapey.”
41008017	Inagammun pun Jesus sey ambabag-anda, kanana, “Pa kayu lawa siaagutimtim assey niippun tinapey as kanunyu? Yangey inggana assey sana, niippun madlowyu ya niippun pey dallu maawatanyu? Ey ummamdan sey kummabnutan sey somsomokyu?
41008018	Naataan kayu kon pakayu aji makaila? Naingaan kayu vus kon pakayu aji makadngor? Yangey naliwatanyu
41008019	sey lima ey tinapey ey pinitpit-ingku ey lamug da limallivu ey tagu kinan? At kam-ana sey vunada ey inugpunyu assey naasda nangan?” At kananda, “Nasawaran as juwa ey awit.”
41008020	At kanan vus Jesus, “Ya sey inggow pey ey pitu ey tinapey ey lamug da opatlivu ey tagu kinan, kam-ana vus sey nasawar ey inugpunyu?” At kananda vus, “Pitu ey awit.”
41008021	At kanan Jesus an jida, “At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ey ajiyu pun pey dallu maawatan?”
41008022	Assey jummatongan da Jesus ad Bethsaida, indatongda an siya sey usa ey vurag. Nampangpangaasi dasey nangindatong ta todkona atyén sey tagu saji ta makaan sey vuragna.
41008023	At kiniwid Jesus sey vurag at ummuyda assey igid sey vubruy. Tinuppaan Jesus sey atan sey vurag asina at todkon at inimusna ey kanana, “Ey awad ilam?”
41008024	Nammotwa pun sey vurag saji, kanana, “Anna sey miilak! Miilak dasey tagu ey kamada as kayu ey manaradaran.”
41008025	At kasin vus Jesus tindok sey atana. Nallangranga pun, pummatak sey angil-ana assey amin.
41008026	At vinilin Jesus siya ta angow-as ey ampuuli assey vubruyda ya aji ampuuli assey vubruy saji ey nangiwidan Jesus an siya.
41008027	Ummuy da Jesus ya dasey aposelna asda vubruy ey sakup sey Caesarea Filipay. Anna pun ey anaradaranda, inimusna an jida ey kanana, “Ngey kanan da tagu miipanggop an sa'un?”
41008028	At kananda, “Assey somsomok da ujum, sika as John ey amvuvunyag ey ummuli. Da ujum, kananda vus ey sika kanu as profet Elijah. Ya awad vus da ujum ey kananda ey sika sey usa asda profet assey kar-argow ey kasin ummuli.”
41008029	At kanan vus Jesus an jida, “Dakayu pey, ngan sey kananyu assey miipanggop an sa'un?” Kanan Peter ey gumminga, “Sika sey Cristu ey impostan Apudyus ey umali.”
41008030	Asin at Jesus vilinun jida ey kanana, “Ilanyu man ta ajiyu uguugujun assey urey ngadannaʼsnait ey tagu.”
41008031	Oni pun, insarad Jesus ey mangimbaga asda aposelna assey makwa an siya, kanana, “Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, kapilitan ey lak-amuk sey amud ey tongtong-ag. Ya ajiyak pun vigvigun asda angkamarong-ag ey iyIsrael ya asda apun da paji. Ya ajiyak pun vus vigvigun asda misturun sey lintog ya oni ey impagngatda sa'un. Kon umuliyak assey mikatlu ey ag-agow.”
41008032	Illawlawag Jesus amin jiyuy an jida. Kingwan pun Peter, intar-anna as akit as Jesus asina ingoran gapu assey inugudna saji.
41008033	Kon nambaliwit as Jesus asda aposelna at iningorana as Peter ey kanana, “Umadayuka an sa'un Satanas! Tey sey awad assey somsomoknu at aji pun Apudyus piun tey nait sey piun sey tagu.”
41008034	Inayagan Jesus dasey amud ey tagu ya dasey aposelna at kanana an jida, “Ngan ey sey maryad ey umunud an sa'un, masapur ey dakumpun assey kataguwana assey sana sey sosomkona tey masapur ey unujuna sey ibagak urey siyaji sey ikatuyna.
41008035	Tey sey tagu ey mangimpapangog assey viyagna at matuy dallu. Kon sey tagu ey urey nu matuy gapu assey pammatina an sa'un ya sey mangintudtujuwana assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Apudyus at maatud an siya sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
41008036	Tey niippun servina urey nu kuwaun sey amin ey awad assey luta anna nu as oni ey majusata as ing-inggana. At ey awad pun lawa nagun-gunata?
41008037	Niippun! Tey niippun vinaknang as lamug sey tagu atjun as mannubvutna assey viyagna.”
41008038	“Amud sey kinarwing da tagu assey sana tey niippun pammatida an Apudyus. At ngan ey sey mikaslang an jida ey maviin ey manakjug an sa'un ya asda intudtujuk at ikaviinku vus siya assey ampuuliyak. Tey Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, ampuuliyak ey sumiling assey kinadayow Ama ey siya sey mitun-udan dasey nasantuwan ey enjel Apudyus.”
41009001	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Tuttuwa sey ibagak anna ey awad dasey ujum an dakayu assey sana ey aji pun matuy inggana as ilanda sey pannakabalin Apudyus assey manturayana.”
41009002	Ummayow pun sey onom ey ag-agow, inayagan Jesus as Peter ya da James an John. Nanagadada ey tummar-an assey antaknang ey vilig. Assey nangiil-anda an Jesus, maggey nambakra sey ilan sey long-agna.
41009003	Pummutak ya summiling sey lumvunna ey niippun miyisuwan sey putakna assey luta anna.
41009004	Ya inggow da Elijah an Moses ey profet assey kar-argow ey nampiila ey mikabagbaga an Jesus.
41009005	Gumminga as Peter ey kanana an Jesus, “Apu misturu, ambaru ta anna taku sina. Angwakani as turu ey bawi ta angkuwam sey usa, angkuwan Moses sey usa ya angkuwan vus Elijah sey usa.”
41009006	Siyaji sey imbagan Peter tey an-amuwwong as ugujuna gapu assey amud ey ugyatda.
41009007	Oni pun, lummuswa sey livuu at kinuvutana jida ya inggow sey gumminga ey narpu assey livuu ey kanana, “Annaya sey pipiuk ey anakku, dongronyu sey ibagana.”
41009008	Ammuswatda pun ey allangranga, anggey as Jesus sey innilada.
41009009	Ummayowda pun ey man-usug assey vilig, vinilin Jesus jida ey kanana, “Ilanyu ta ajiyu da uguugujun asda tagu sey innilayu inggana as kasin umuli sey Anak ji Tagu.”
41009010	Pinatida tuttuwa at ajida pun inug-uggud asda ujum. Kon dada dallu ambabagbaga nu ngan sey piun Jesus ey ugujun assey imbagana ey kasin umuli.
41009011	At inimusda an siya ey kananda, “Paʼn lawa da misturun sey lintog kanan ey mamangpangu umali as profet Elijah ya asi at umali sey impostan Apudyus ey Cristu?”
41009012	At kanana an jida, “Tuttuwa ey mamangpangu umali as Elijah ta umuyna isagana dasey tagu. Kon inggow vus sey impakur-it Apudyus assey kar-argow miipanggop assey Anak ji Tagu ey masapur matongtong-ag ya iwalin da tagu.
41009013	Kon ibagak vus an dakayu ey naas ummali as Elijah. At kingwan dasey tagu sey piunda ey koon an siya tey siya vus pigey sey impakur-it Apudyus assey kar-argow ey makwa an siya.”
41009014	Nampuuli pun da Jesus assey iggawan dasey ujum ey aposelna, innilada dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey mangam-ammung an jida. Ya inggow vus da ujum ey misturun sey lintog ey mikasongsongbat an jida.
41009015	Innilan pun da tagu ey annat as Jesus ey umadani an jida, nasdaowda ey nangila at nanuddakda ey umuy mangabot an siya at kananda, “Ambaru ta ummali ka.”
41009016	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Ngan sey mansosongbatanyu?”
41009017	Kanan sey usa an jida, “Apu misturu, sika atyén sey mangiyyaliyak assey anakku tey nilun-ugan sey jimunyu at na'omor.
41009018	Nu jumatong ey sey milun-ug an siya, maggey da malikwad ya tumarvutab sey sungadna ya ngumarotngot sey vub-ana asi at kumuntug. Imbagak as dasey aposelnu ta paryawunda atyén kon ajida pun kaviilan.”
41009019	At kanan Jesus asda tagu, “Awwoo! Gumman gey tuttuwa pammatiyu? Ayaka jiyuy as iniggawak an dakayu inggana assey sana ya niippun pey dallu pammatiyu. Ngey kasinku koon ey manganus an dakayu ya asi kayu at mamati. Iyaliyu as sanna sey anak sanat.”
41009020	At inniyuyda sey anak saji an siya. Innilan pun sey jimunyu as Jesus, magna gey impakuntug sey anak saji at nalikwad assey luta ey alludluddarud ya tumarvutab sey sungadna.
41009021	Inimus Jesus assey aman sey anak saji ey kanana, “Makanu sey nanginsardana?” At kanana, “Nansarad assey kaban-ugna.
41009022	Ya anadaar ey piun jimunyu gongatun siya. Maggey da malikwad assey iggow sey apuy ya assey danum. At nu kaviilam, kadaguwam atyén ta turungam dakani.”
41009023	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Ngan sey pium ugujun assey kanam ey nu awad kaviilak? Sey tagu ey awad pammatina an Apudyus, niippun aji mabalin an siya.”
41009024	Indangsor sey aman sey anak saji ey gumminga ey kanana, “Awad sey pammatik kon kurang at turunganak ta kumasdor sey pammatik.”
41009025	Innilan pun Jesus ey umadani dasey amud ey tagu an siya, kanana assey nilun-ug, “Sika ey jimunyu ey nangomor ya nanorong assey anak anna, umayowka ya ajika kasin mallun-ug an siya.”
41009026	Namvugga sey jimunyu saji at impakuntugna sey anak ey kamaʼs ladag ya asi at umayow. At kanan dasey tagu, “Natuy nin anak sana.”
41009027	Kon inugnan Jesus sey iman sey anak saji ey namangun at summikad.
41009028	Summakey pun da Jesus ad darum assey vuruy ey ummanggeyda, inimus dasey aposelna ey kananda, “Pa kani aji nakaparyow assey nilulun-ug ey jimunyu saji?”
41009029	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Assey anung da jiyuy ey jimunyu, inggana as tornonta ey malluwaru asi at mabalin ey paryawun.”
41009030	Tineynan da Jesus sey vubruy saji at nanguyda assey provinsiyan sey Galili. Sumanga as Jesus nu maagammuwan da tagu sey iggawana
41009031	tey awad sey piuna ey itudtuju asda aposelna. Kanana an jida, “Sey Anak ji Tagu, mipurang asda tagu ey mangngat an siya kon assey mikatlu ey ag-agow, kasin umuli.”
41009032	Jijingngor da aposelna sey imbagana kon ajida pun maawatan sey piuna ey ugujun ya umugyatda vus ey mangimus an siya.
41009033	Jummatong pun da Jesus ya da aposelna ad Capernaum, summakeyda ad darum assey usa ey vuruy. At inimus Jesus an jida ey kanana, “Ngan sey nansosongbatanyu assey daran saji?”
41009034	Kon niippun guminga an jida tey sey apporoda mansosongbatan assey daran at nu ngan sey kangatuwan an jida.
41009035	At tummukju as Jesus ya asina at ayagan dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna at kanana, “Sey tagu ey maryad ey ambalin as nangatu, masapur ey ampakumbaba ya ambalinuna sey long-agna as baba'arun ey katurungan dasey amin ey vurunna.”
41009036	Asina at ayagan sey usa ey anak at impasikadna assey sinagung dasey tagu at vinakwarna ey kanana an jida,
41009037	“Sey anak, kama as niippun vilangna, kon sey tagu ey awad pammatina an sa'un ya ivilangna dasey ujum ey tagu ey kama asda anak anna at sa'un sey imvilangna. Ya ngan ey vus sey mangimvilang an sa'un, imvilangna vus sey namaar an sa'un.”
41009038	Gumminga as John ey kanana, “Apu misturu, awad sey innilani ey tagu ey dana paryawun dasey nilun-ug ey jimunyu ey ngadannu kanu sey narpuwan sey kaviilana. At impaginokni tey dakumpun as vurun taku.”
41009039	Kon gumminga as Jesus, kanana, “Ajiyu paginkon tey ngan ey sey tagu ey sa'un sey narpuwan sey kaviilana ey mangwa as kaskasdaow, niippun lawingan as koona an sa'un.
41009040	Tey ngan ey sey aji pun kumuntra an jitaku at vurun taku.
41009041	Isigurajuk ey ngan ey sey tumurung an dakayu ey angatud as urey sintasa ey danum ta inumunyu gapu assey mamatiyanyu an sa'un ey Cristu, siguraju ey awad magun-gunana.”
41009042	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ngan ey sey tagu ey mangwa as vumasuran dasey kama asda anak anna ey mamati an sa'un, un-unina nu awad mitakud as dokor ey batu assey bagangna ya niballu assey beybey nu sey manginturuyana ey mangwa as vumasuran da ujum.
41009043	At nu sey imayu sey mangwa as vumasuranyu an Apudyus, ambab-aru nu putjunyu. Tey un-unina sey mijugata ey matagu ad langit ey urey niippun usa ey ima nu sey wadawad dasey ima ya ad inférnu sey umayan ey iggawan sey gumilgillajung ey apuy as ing-inggana.
41009045	Anungna vus nu sey sikiyu sey mangwa as vumasuranyu an Apudyus, ambab-aru nu putjunyu. Tey un-unina vus sey mijugata ey matagu ad langit ey urey putud sey usa ey siki nu sey wadawad da siki ya ad inférnu sey miballuwan.
41009047	Ya nu atayu vus sey mangatud as vumasuranyu an Apudyus, ambab-aru nu ukitunyu. Tey un-unina sey mijugata ey matagu ad langit ey urey sa'an sey ata nu sey wadawad sey ata ya ad inférnu sey miballuwan.
41009048	Ad inférnu, maviviggisan sey long-ag ya aji pun vus matuy sey apuy.”
41009049	Inturuy Jesus ey gumminga at kanana, “Da losan ey tagu at mapadasda sey tongtong-ag ta vumaru sey angkokoonda ey anungna sey makan ey maasinan ta pumiya.
41009050	Ambaru sey asin kon nu makaan sey simsimna ya lummamsit, aji pun ogon mipuuli sey piyana. At ammaanyu sommosommokon sey usar sey asin ta mantitinnurung ya muurnus kayu.”
41010001	Tineynan da Jesus ad Capernaum at ummuyda assey provinsiyan sey Judea at nandormangda assey dawwang ad Jordan. Nadagup kasin da amud ey tagu at tinudtujuwana jida tey nauy sey sigud ey kookoona.
41010002	Inggow vus dasey ujum ey Farisis ey ummuy mamadas mamarbali an Jesus. Kananda, “Ey iparuvus sey lintog taku ey mabalin idangan sey laraki sey asawana?”
41010003	Kanan Jesus ey gumminga, “Ngan sey lintog ey imvilin Moses an dakayu ey makwa?”
41010004	Kananda ey summongbat, “Imparuvusna mit nu awad kasuratan ey atjun sey laraki assey asawana ey mangimpaagammu ey man-idangda asina at siya paryawun.”
41010005	Kanan vus Jesus an jida, “Imparuvus Moses ey idanganyu sey asawayu gapu ta tummabvug kayu as matudtujuwan.
41010006	Kon assey ab-avusna ey nangwaan Apudyus assey amin ey kingwana, ‘kingwana sey tagu ey laraki ya vubai.’
41010007	‘At nait sey lapuna nu paʼn lawa sey laraki teynan da amana an inana ya niyaggum assey asawana
41010008	ta ambalinda as sa'an ey long-ag.’ At gapu ta nan-aggumda, dokonda pun as juwa tey nambalinda as sa'an ey long-ag.
41010009	At aji pun mabalin ey man-idangun sey tagu sey nan-aggumun Apudyus.”
41010010	Summakey pun da Jesus ad darum assey usa ey vuruy, inimus dasey pasurutna nu ngan sey piuna ey ugujun miipanggop assey imbagana.
41010011	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Sey laraki ey mangidang assey asawana ya kasin vus nangasawa at nakabasur siya assey ab-avus ey asawana tey dagdagasna sey mikagwa.
41010012	Ya kama avus assey vubai nu idangana sey asawana ya kasin nangasawa at nakabasur vus tey dagdagasna vus sey inyorosna ey laraki.”
41010013	Usa pun ey ag-agow, inggow da nangiyyuy an Jesus asda anakda ta ipateyna sey imana ey mamindisyun an jida, kon iningoran dasey aposel Jesus jida.
41010014	Innilan pun Jesus sey kingwada saji, summanga at kanana an jida, “Ajiyu isanga dasey anak ta amorna ey umadanida an sa'un tey anungna da nauy dasey mijuga assey manturayan Apudyus.
41010015	Isigurajuk an dakayu ey ngan ey sey tagu ey aji pun ampakumbaba ey mamati an Apudyus ey kama asda anak anna at aji pun mabalin ey mijuga assey Turey Apudyus.”
41010016	Siyaji sey imbagana ya asina at bakwarun da anak ey mangimpatey assey imana ey mamindisyun an jida.
41010017	Assey kasin lummibbatan da Jesus ya asda aposelna, nanuddak sey usa ey marong-ag ey ummuy nallikkadang assey sinagungna ey kanana, “Sika ambaru ey misturu, ngan sey kook ta mijugaak assey viyag ey niippun patinggana.”
41010018	Kanan Jesus an siya, “Somsomkom sey imbagam ey ambaruwak tey niippun ujum as ambaru nu aji anggey as Apudyus.”
41010019	Miipanggop ey assey sarudsudnu, agammum mit dasey vilin Apudyus ey kanana, “Ajita gumngat. Ajita mikadagdagas. Ajita man-akow. Ajita mantistigu assey us-ussat. Ajita mankusit. Rispituwun sey ama ya ina.”
41010020	At kanan sey tagu saji, “Siya ampey Apu misturu, manipud assey kaban-ugku at siya sey apporok kingwa.”
41010021	Intollong Jesus ey nangila an siya assey layadna at kanana, “Sa'an anggey sey masapur ey koom. Ingka ingina dasey amin ey laksunnu ya atjum sey nginana asda lumawa ta ad langit sey muugpunan sey vinaknangnu ya ummunudka an sa'un.”
41010022	Jingngorna pun sey imbagan Jesus saji, lummawing sey goomna at ummayow ey antutukar tey amud sey vinaknangna.
41010023	Ummayow pun sey tagu saji, innilan Jesus dasey aposelna at kanana an jida, “Mansigab sey mijug-an sey baknang assey Turey Apudyus.”
41010024	Jingngor pun dasey aposelna sey inugud Jesus saji, nasdaowda. Kon inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Susunud, mansigab tuttuwa sey mijug-an assey Turey Apudyus.
41010025	Allaslasu at avus akey sey lumnokan sey dokor ey ayém ey kemel assey abvut sey tanud nu sey umayan sey baknang assey Turey Apudyus.”
41010026	Jingngorda pun sey inggingana saji, ummam-amudda nasdaow, asida at ambabagbaga ey kananda, “Nu kanaʼs nait, niippun mabalin ey misarakan.”
41010027	Intollong Jesus jida at kanana, “Tuttuwa ey aji pun mabalin ey koon sey tagu nait kon an Apudyus, niippun aji mabalin an siya.”
41010028	Gumminga as Peter ey kanana, “Dakani pey, tineynanni dasey amin ey awad an dakani gapu assey ummunudanni an sika.”
41010029	At gumminga as Jesus ey kanana, “Tuttuwa sey ibagak an dakayu, sey tagu ey maneynan assey vubruyna, susunudna, dakdakorna, dasey anakna anda lutana gapu an sa'un ya assey mangiwwarawagana assey Ambaru ey Damag
41010030	at sin-umamud sey maatud an siya assey nauy ey matatagguwana nu dasey tineynana. Tey maatud an siya sey adjuwan ey amvuruyna, dasey ansunudna, dasey dakdakorna, dasey man-anakna anda manlutana kon awad dallu sey matongtong-agana. Kon assey daan ey ag-agow mijuga assey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
41010031	Kon assey sana adjuwan dasey angkangatu assey angiilan da tagu ey mibaba ya adjuwan vus assey sana dasey kananda ey niippun vilangna ey tagu ey mipangatu assey daan ey ag-agow.”
41010032	Assey managad-anda ey umuy ad Jerusalem, as Jesus sey namapangngu. Amud sey danag dasey aposelna ya umugyat avus dasey ujum ey tagu ey mituntun-ud an siya tey agammuda ey awad dasey ampanggop ey mangngat an siya ad Jerusalem. At siya sey kasin Jesus nangayagan as dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna at tummalinda asina at ibaga sey makwa an siya ad Jerusalem.
41010033	Kanana, “Dongronyu sey ibagak anna. Anna ey intaku ad Jerusalem at nu jumatong taku as jiyuy, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu at dokmaanak ya asiyak at ipurang asda apun da paji ya asda misturun sey lintog Moses. Ibagada ey masapur mipagngatak ya asida at sa'un ipurang asda iRoman.
41010034	Arwaganda sa'un ey iviviin, tuppatuppaanak, lapsilapsitanak ya asiyak at gongatun. Kon assey mikatlu ey ag-agow at umuliyak.”
41010035	Ummadani da James an John ey mansunud ey anak da Zebedee at kananda an Jesus, “Apu misturu, awad atyén sey piunni ey koom an dakani.”
41010036	“Ngadan nait?” kanan Jesus.
41010037	At kananda, “Nu jumatong sey manturayam ey siya sey midayawam, ambalinum atyén dakani as mislun ey kangatuwan an sika. Tumukju atyén sey usa assey padawanannu ya usa assey padawigim.”
41010038	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Niippun agammuyu assey dawdawatunyu sanat. Tey yangey maanusanyu sey tongtong-ag ey jumatong an sa'un ya maanusanyu vus ey matuy assey anung sey ikatuyku?”
41010039	At kananda, “Mabalin ey maanusanni.” At kanan vus Jesus, “Oon, tuttuwa ey maanusanyu sey tongtong-ag ey kama vus assey tongtong-ag ey jumatong an sa'un ya maanusanyu vus ey matuy ey anung sey ikatuyku.
41010040	Kon sey tumukju ey mislon an sa'un assey padawanan unnu assey padawigi, dakumpun an sa'un sey ampili tey insasagganan Apudyus da nait ey tumukjuwan dasey nanginsaganaana.”
41010041	Jingngor pun dasey ujum ey aposel sey kudawun dasey mansunud, summangada an da James an John.
41010042	At jinagup Jesus jida losan ey kanana, “Agammuyu sey kookoon dasey turey assey luta anna tey pasigda ipapilit sey piunda asda iturayanda ya anungna vus dasey ukum, pasigda vus ipavigvig sey kinangatuda.
41010043	Kon aji pun mabalin ey koonyu da nait. Tey ngan ey sey maryad ey ambalin as apu, masapur ey ampakumbaba ya ambalinuna sey long-agna as katurungan da vurunna.
41010044	Ya ngan ey vus sey maryad ey ngumatu an dakayu, masapur vus ey ambalinuna sey long-agna as alipan dasey amin ey vurunna.
41010045	Tey kama vus assey Anak ji Tagu at aji pun ummali ey ampaturung kon ummali ey anservi asda tagu ya ummali ta atjuna sey viyagna as manubvutna asda amin ey tagu ta ajida majusa as ing-inggana.”
41010046	Assey anaradaranan da Jesus, inumdasda ad Jericho. Anna pun ey kasin lumibbat da Jesus ya da aposelna ya da amud ey tagu, inggow as Bartimaeus ey vurag ey anak Timaeus ey tutukju assey igid sey daran ey ampalpalimmus.
41010047	Jingngorna pun asda tagu ey annat as Jesus ey mallaus, insaradna ey pumkow ey kanana, “Jesus ey ganak David, madaguka an sa'un.”
41010048	Adjuwan dasey tagu ey angingoingor an siya ta guminok ey kananda, “Ajika tomorong!” Kon iyam-amudna at avus ey angipkow, “Jesus ey ganak David, kadaguwanak.”
41010049	At gumminok as Jesus ey kanana, “Ayaganyu siya as nauy.” At inayaganda sey vurag saji at kananda, “Allaylayadka. Sumikadka tey anji ipaayag sika.”
41010050	Nan-ikaan Bartimaeus sey pokosna at nan-isikadna ey ummadani an Jesus.
41010051	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Ngey pium ey iturungku an sika?” At kanan sey nabvurag saji, “Apu misturu, makailaak atyén.”
41010052	At kanan vus Jesus an siya, “Ingkaat nu ngey ayam. Tey gapu assey pammatim an sa'un at makaan sey vuragnu.” Imbagan pun Jesus jiyuy, dagus ey makaila sey vurag saji. At nitun-ud an da Jesus assey daran.
41011001	Assey ummadani da Jesus ad Jerusalem ey nibatugda ad Bethfagi ya Betani ey adani assey Tagudtud ad Olib, vinaar Jesus dasey juwa ey pasurutna ey kanana,
41011002	“Ipangpanguyu assey vubruy anji ey oottapun taku. Nu jumatong kayu, udasanyu sey ubvun sey ayém ey donkey ey nibabawwud ey aji pun nakabkabayuwan. Uggasunyu ta iyaliyu as nauy.
41011003	At nu awad mangimus ey kanana, ‘Ngey koonyu sanat?’ Ibagayu ey masapur sey Apu ya ipuulina vus pigey ey dagus.”
41011004	Ummuy pun dasey juwa saji, indasanda sey ubvun sey donkey assey karsa, ey sey kiddongna, nitatakkud assey sawang sey usa ey vuruy.
41011005	Assey manguggasanda, kanan dasey tagu ey summisikad siji, “Ngey koonyu sanat, ngey payu uggasun?”
41011006	At imbagada sey kanan Jesus an jida at ajida pun insanga.
41011007	Vinutvutda sey ubvu saji ey nangiyyuy an Jesus asida at iyap-ap sey pokosda assey ujug sey ubvu at nangabayu as Jesus.
41011008	Adjuwan dasey tagu ey nangiyyap-ap asda pokosda assey karsa ey ayuna. Gummabba da ujum asda panga assey ig-igid sey karsa at iyyap-apda ey mangimpiila assey dayowda an siya.
41011009	Ya da tagu ey namangpangu ya dasey ujum ey nangudjiji ey umunud an Jesus, sivuvuggada assey layadda ey kananda, “Madayow sey Apu! Dayawun taku siya ey narpu an Apudyus.
41011010	Dayawun taku siya tey siya sey manginturuy assey kinaarin David ey apu taku! Madayow as Apudyus ey kangatuwan ad langit!”
41011011	Assey jummatngan da Jesus ad Jerusalem, ummuy Jesus innila sey Tempél. Minatmatana da amin ey ininggow asi at umayow tey anna ey tigangey masjum. At nampuuli ad Betani ya nitun-ud vus dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna.
41011012	Assey mavigat ey ampuulida ad Jerusalem ey narpu ad Betani, nuurat as Jesus.
41011013	Innilan pun Jesus sey kayu ey amud sey tuvuna ey niyadayu as akit assey daran, ummuyna innila nu awad vungana. Inumdas pun assey puunna, innilana ey niippun vungana nu aji pasig ey tuvu tey dakumpun as timpu ey mamungaana.
41011014	At kanana assey kayu saji, “Mansarad assey sana, niippun ogon mangan assey vungam.” At jingngor dasey aposelna sey imbagana saji.
41011015	Assey jummatnganda ad Jerusalem, ummuy as Jesus assey Tempél at insaradna ey mangimparyow ya mangimpalogsad as dasey tagu ey mantintinda ya da ngumina. Ya kinalittuwangna dasey tebol dasey para oros as pilak ya dasey tukjuwan da mantintinda asda karapati ey midatun an Apudyus.
41011016	Ya insangana vus dasey amin ey awad vukudna ey manguy assey pawey sey Tempél.
41011017	At nantudtuju asda tagu ey kanana, “Sey kanan Apudyus assey Gingana, ‘Sey vuruyku at muusar as alluwaruwan dasey tagu ey narpu asda kiiliili.’ Kon kingwayu at avus as tatarruwan dasey akkawan.”
41011018	Jingngor pun dasey apun da paji ya da misturun sey lintog Moses sey kingwan Jesus saji, nan-uugudda ey manganap nu ngan sey an-annunda ey mangngat an siya tey umugyatda gapu ta amud dasey tagu ey maryad ey mangngor assey tudtujuna.
