41011019	Anna pun ey gumikbot, ummayow da Jesus ad Jerusalem.
41011020	Assey mavigat ey ampuulida kasin ad Jerusalem, nanguyda assey iggawan sey kayu ey fig. Innilada ey narangu inggana assey puunna.
41011021	Ingkagasmok Peter sey inugud Jesus assey kayu saji ad gorobyan at kanana, “Apu misturu, ilam man sey giningaam ey fig saji ya, at narangu!”
41011022	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Nu tornonyu ey mamati an Apudyus,
41011023	isigurajuk an dakayu ey mabalinyu ibaga assey vilig annat ey kananyu, ‘Maoppatka ya nipisukka assey beybey’, at makwa nu patiyunyu ey niippun juwajuwan sey somsomokyu.
41011024	At siguraju sey ibagak an dakayu ey amin ey kudawunyu an Apudyus assey malluwaruwanyu ya patiyunyu ey atjuna at maatud an dakayu.
41011025	Kon nu alluwaru kayu, masapur pakawanunyu losan da nangwa as lawingan an dakayu at pakawanun vus dakayu an Apudyus ey amayu ad langit assey amin ey lawingan ey kingwayu.
41011026	Tey nu ajiyu ey pakawanun dasey nangwa as lawingan an dakayu, aji pun vus Apudyus pakawanun dakayu.”
41011027	Kasin vus nampuuli da Jesus ad Jerusalem. Nallausda pun assey paweyn sey Tempél, ummuy dasey apun da paji, dasey misturun sey lintog Moses ya dasey ujum ey angkamarong-ag ey Jews.
41011028	Kananda an siya, “Ngan sey nangimbaga an sika ey koom sey kingwam assey Tempél saji? Ngan sey nangatud assey karobbongam?”
41011029	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Ibagak an dakayu sey nangatud assey karobbongak ey mangwa asda apporok koon nu ibagayu vus an sa'un sey imusuk an dakayu.”
41011030	At kanana, “Ngan sey nangatud assey karobbongan John ey amvunyag? Ey as Apudyus unnu tagu?”
41011031	At nan-asitupakda ey kananda, “Nu ibaga taku ey as Apudyus, siguraju ey kanana ey pa taku aji pinati siya.
41011032	Kon nu ibaga taku vus ey tagu sey narpuwana, kagguugyat-in tey yangey aji maguru da tagu.” (Umugyatda tey losan da tagu patiyun ey tuttuwa ey profet as John.)
41011033	At kananda an Jesus, “Toan, tey niippun agammuni.” At kanan vus Jesus, “At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ajik pun ibaga an dakayu nu ngey nangatud assey karobbongak ey mangwa asda apporok koon.”
41012001	Kasin nampani as Jesus ey kanana an jida, “Awad sey usa ey tagu ey nammura as greps assey lutana ya asina at parangkaan. Nampaabvut assey batu as mamosposana assey bérat sey greps nu koona as bayas. Nangwa avus as antaknang ey sigey ey iggawan sey amabantey. Naas pun, impaabangna asda tagu asi at mambaat assey addayuwan ey ili.
41012002	Assey timpun sey namungaan sey mura, vinaarna sey usa ey alipanna ey umuy mangara assey villeyna asda nan-abang.
41012003	Jummatong pun sey alipan saji, magda gey illapjuk ya pinang-opang-okda asida at paryawun ey imaima.
41012004	Kasin vus nambaar sey silluta as alipanna kon pinang-okda vus sey uruna ya asida at vibviinun.
41012005	Urey nu kanaʼsji, kasin vus dallu nambaar kon gingngatda vus. Kanaʼsji sey apporoda kingwa asda ujum ey vinaarna. Pinang-okda ya gingngatda da ujum.
41012006	Ummanungus pun, vinaarna sey sa'an ey pipiuna ey anakna tey kanana assey somsomokna, ‘Siguraju ey iviinda sey anakku.’
41012007	“Jummatong pun sey anakna saji, nan-uugud at avus dasey nan-abang ey kananda, ‘Annaya sey anakna ey mangillaksun assey luta anna. Gongatun taku ta jitaku sey mangara assey laksunna.’
41012008	At kingwada pun, jinokmaanda siya ya asida at gongatun at imballuda assey lasin sey parangka.”
41012009	Naas pun Jesus inugud ji, kanana asda tagu, “Ngan sey koon sey singkuwa assey luta nu'? Siguraju ey ipagngatna jida losan ya impaabangna sey lutana asda ujum ey tagu.”
41012010	Inturuy Jesus, kanana an jida, “Vinasayu sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Sey batu ey iwwalin dasey mampatakjug as vuruy ey kananda ey niippun servina, siya at avus sey nambalin as kapagdotan ey mipon-ad.
41012011	Siyana sey kingwan sey Apu at nakaskasdaow tuttuwa assey angiila taku.’”
41012012	Jingngor pun dasey apun da Jews sey inugud Jesus saji, naawatanda ey jida atpey sey piuna ey ugujun. Nait sey lapuna ey piunda siya dokmaan kon umugyatda ey mangwa tey inggow dasey tagu at magda pey lawa ummayow ey naneynan an siya.
41012013	Ummayow pun dasey apun da Jews, vinaarda dasey ujum ey Farisis ya dasey pasurut Ari Herod ey ummuy mamarbali an Jesus ta ilanda nu awad kumbot as ibagana ta awad allapuwanda ey manokma an siya.
41012014	Ummuyda an Jesus at kananda, “Apu misturu, agammuni ey ustu amin dasey kanam ya niippun ugyatam as tagu. Urey nangatu ya nababa at an-iisu sey angokoom ey mangintudtuju assey piun Apudyus. At siya piunni dongron an sika nu ngey kanam miipanggop assey vuur. Ey iparuvus sey lintog taku ey Jews nu ambayad taku assey gubernun sey iRoman unnu aji pun?”
41012015	Kon inagammun Jesus sey silibda at kanana, “Pakayu umali ey amab-ali sa'un? Angiyyali kayu as parata ta ilak.”
41012016	Nangatudda pun ey innilana, kanana, “Ngan sey sin-iglatu ya singngadan assey nikur-it anna?” At kananda ey summongbat, “As ari ad Rome.”
41012017	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Nu kanaʼsnaʼt, atjunyu sey amin ey para an siya. Kon atjunyu vus sey amin ey para an Apudyus.” Jingngorda pun sey nangokoona ey gumminga, amud sey nasdaawanda an siya.
41012018	Inggow dasey vungguy dasey Jews ey kananda ey Sajusis. Jida dasey aji pun mamati ey kasin matagu sey natuy. Ummuy da ujum an jida ey nan-imus an Jesus ey kananda,
41012019	“Apu misturu, ingkur-it Moses assey lintog taku ey kanana, ‘Nu awad mangasawa as laraki ya natuy ey niippun anakda, masapur asawaun sey sunud sey natuy sey baru ta nu umanakda, mivilang sey utting as anak sey natuy saji.’
41012020	At ey sana,, inggow da pitu ey laraki ey mansusunud. Nangasawa sey namangu kon natuy ey niippun anakda.
41012021	At inasawan sey mikagwa sey baru kon natuy vus ey niippun anakda. Asin at vus sey mikatlu ey sunudna banson kon natuy vus ey niippun anakda.
41012022	Kanaʼsnaʼt sey nakwanakwa inggana as losan da mansusunud inasawa sey vubai kon naminda natuy ey niippun anakda. Ummanungus pun, natuy vus sey vubai saji.
41012023	At nu matagu kasin da nangkakatuy, ngadanna asda pitu ey mansusunud sey ustu ey sin-asawa assey vubai saji.”
41012024	Sinongbatan Jesus jida ey kanana, “Siyanaʼt pigey tuttuwa sey mangimpiila ey kinumbot kayu tey niippun agammuyu assey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ya assey mannakabalinna.
41012025	Tey sey mataguwan kasin da matuy, kamada asda enjel ad langit ey niippun man-as-asawa.
41012026	Miipanggop ey assey mataguwan kasin da nangkakatuy, vinasayu mit sey ingkur-it Moses assey nangil-ana assey gumilagilab ey kayu ey aji pun masgub. Ingkur-itna sey imbagan Apudyus an siya ey kanana, Sa'un as Apudyus ey apporon da Abraham, Isaac ya as Jacob dayawun.
41012027	Sey piuna ugujun, urey nu nabayagda ey natuy, sissiyada pey dallu ey matattagu ey apporow mandayow an Apudyus assey sana tey aji pun mabalin mandayow dasey nanattuy. Nait sey mangimpiila ey kinumbot kayu losan.”
41012028	Inggow siji sey usa ey misturun sey lintog Moses ey andodongngor. Naawatana ey ustuustu sey insongbat Jesus asda sajusis. At kanana an Jesus, “Ngan sey kabaloran asda amin ey lintog Apudyus?”
41012029	Kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Sey kabaloran ey lintog at kanana, ‘Dongronyu, dakayu ey ganak Israel tey as Apudyus anggey sey Apu taku, niippun ujum.
41012030	Masapur ey piunyu as Apudyus ey Apuyu assey amin ey somsomokyu, angusyu, kinariingyu ya assey amin ey patinggan sey kasdoryu.’
41012031	Ya sey mikagwa ey lintog at kanana, ‘Masapur pium sey asintatagum ey anung sey layadnu assey long-agnu.’ Niippun ujum as kabaloran ey lintog nu dokon anggey da nait.”
41012032	Summongbat sey misturun sey lintog ey kanana, “Tuttuwa Apu misturu, ustu sey imbagam tey anggey as Apudyus sey Apu taku ey niippun ujum.
41012033	Ya tuttuwa avus ey masapur pipiun taku siya assey amin ey somsomok taku, angus, kinariing ya assey amin ey patinggan sey kasdor taku. Ya masapur vus ey piun sey asintatagu ey anungna sey layad taku assey long-ag taku. Tuttuwa ey nait sey nabalor as koon nu sey mandatunan assey amin ey midatun an Apudyus.”
41012034	Nadlow Jesus ey masomkan siya ey tagu at kanana, “Aji pun mansigab sey mijug-am assey Turey Apudyus.” Jingngor pun da tagu sey nangokoona ey summongbat, niippun manginturud as kasin man-imus an siya.
41012035	Assey nantudtujuwan Jesus assey Tempél, inimusna ey kanana, “Pan lawa da misturun sey lintog kanan ey sey Cristu ey impostan Apudyus ey umali ey manturey at ganak Ari David?
41012036	Tey sey impaspasmok sey Ispiritun Apudyus an Ari David at kanana, ‘Imbagan Apu ey Apudyus assey Apuk, Tumukjuka assey padawananku inggana as aminuk abakun dasey amin ey kavusurnu.’”
41012037	Inturuy Jesus ey gumminga, kanana, “Nu kanaʼs nait ey urey as David at kanana ey as Cristu at Apuna, ngan-annuna ey siya vus sey singganak nu'?” Adjuwan dasey tagu ey maryad ey mandongor assey tudtujun Jesus.
41012038	At inturuyna ey kanana, “Ammaanyu ta ajiyu anungun dasey misturun sey lintog Moses tey mamaryadda ey umuy manginggaggakey asda magayagayad ey lumvunda. Ya piunda avus ey marispitu ey apporow malamanu asda iggawan da adjuwan ey tagu.
41012039	Piunda vus tumukju assey tukjun dasey angkangatu ey tagu asda sinagog ya anungna vus nu umuyda mikakan nu awad amparti.
41012040	Kon ajida pun maviin ey amros assey laksun da baru ya inanjuanjuda ey malluwaru ta awad mallingubda asda lawingan ey kookoonda. At gapu assey kookoonda sana, amud sey jusa ey atjun Apudyus an jida.”
41012041	Ummuy as Jesus assey Tempél at tummukju ey sinasagungna sey iggow sey kasun ey apporoda mangiggaan assey pilak. Iillana dasey tagu ey umuy mangigga assey pilak. Adjuwan dasey babaknang ey apporow angigga assey dokor ey gatad.
41012042	Inggow vus sey lumawa ey baru ey juwa anggey ey labrabong sey iniggana.
41012043	Inayagan Jesus dasey aposelna at kanana an jida, “Isigurajuk an dakayu ey urey nu man-ag-aggum sey amin ey iniggan da tagu, dokdokor pey dallu sey iniggan sey lumawa ey baru saji.
41012044	Tey asda ujum, inatjunda anggey pey lawa dasey nasawar ey pilakda kon sey baru saji, urey nu lumawa ya anggey jiyuy as pilakna, innatjuna namin an Apudyus.”
41013001	Assey lummawaan da Jesus assey tempél, kanan sey usa ey aposelna an siya, “Apu, ilam man dasey angkadanakkor ey batu ey nuusar assey kopyan sey Tempél ya dasey vuruy ey sinakowna. Mambaru sey nangokoonda ey nangwa!”
41013002	Kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Tuttuwa dasey iillanyu ey mambabaru ya mangkadanakkor ey batu kon jumatong sey timpu ey madadailana ey niippun miila as urey nantur-ug ey batu tey maminda mikur-ub.”
41013003	Oni pun, ummuy as Jesus assey Tagudtud ad Olib ey maoottap sey tempél. Tummukju pun ey tummalin, ummadani da Peter, James, John ya as Andrew asida at imusun ey kananda,
41013004	“Ey aji pun mabalin ta ibagam an dakani nu makanu sey makwaan sey imbagam ad ganad saji? Ey awad mangimmatunan ey tigangey sey makwaana?”
41013005	Kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Man-annad kayu ta niippun mangallilow an dakayu.
41013006	Tey adjuwan dasey lumuswa ey tagu ey kananda ey jida kanu as Cristu ey mangisarakan ey vinaar Apudyus ya adjuwan dasey allilawunda.
41013007	Ya aji kayu umugyat nu dongronyu dasey manggugubat assey addayuwan unnu assey addaniyan ey ili. Masapur makwa amin da nait kon daan pun sey anungus sey ag-agow.
41013008	Tey manggugubat dasey amin ey turey unnu gubernu assey luvung anna. Ya niippun ajina mallunigan asda amin ey ili ya jumatong vus sey urat. Kon da nauy ey tongtong-ag at siyana sey sarad sey amud ey tongtong-ag ey kama assey manggamutan sey vubai ey tigangey umanak.
41013009	“At nu misarad ey makwa da nait, man-orom kayu tey madokmaan ya midarum kayu assey korti, oni ey pinang-opang-ok dakayu asda sinagog. Ya nipasangu kayu vus asda gubernador ya asda ari gapu assey pammatiyu an sa'un. Kon siyana at avus sey wayayu ey mangimbaga an jida assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an sa'un.
41013010	Masapur dallu ey miwarawag sey Ambaru ey Damag assey kikkiili asi at jumatong sey anungus sey ag-agow.
41013011	At nu madokmaan ya nidarum kayu assey korti, aji kayu madanagan assey isongbatyu tey assey timpu saji, maagammuwanyu sey igingayu. At dakumpun an dakayu sey marpuwan sey ibagayu tey sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey mangimpakagasmok an dakayu.
41013012	“Assey timpu saji, urey dasey mansusunud at man-asiliputda ey mangimpagngat asda sunudda. Ya urey vus da ama, ipadokmada dasey anakda. Ya da anak vus, liputanda dasey amada ya inada ey mangimpagngat an jida.
41013013	Ya vusurun dakayu asda tagu gapu assey pammatiyu an sa'un. Kon asda manginyattum, urey ngan sey makwa inggana assey anungusna mijugada assey mataguwan ey niippun patinggana.”
41013014	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Jumatong sey timpu ey miilayu sey amud ey kagguugyat ey jumadail ey maggey umuy assey ajina pun karobbongan ey iggawan. (Dakayu ey mamasa as nauy, maawatanyu atyén sey piuna ugujun.) Nu ilanyu ey da nauy, umawid kayu. At dakayu ey tagu ad Judea, ingkayu mambakwit asda vib-ilig.
41013015	Sey tagu ey niyaspur ey awad assey pap-awey, ajida pun masapur ey sumakey ad darum assey vuruy ey mangara assey tagumpanna ta umawid at.
41013016	Anungna vus assey tagu ey niyaspur ey nansiput, aji pun mampuuli ey mangara assey pokosna ta umawid at.
41013017	At kadagdagu dasey mavugi ya dasey ampaspasusu assey timpu saji.
41013018	At iluwaruyu an Apudyus ta aji makwa nauy assey timpun sey agilid.
41013019	Tey sey tongtong-ag ey lumuswa assey daan ey ag-agow, niippun mipaniyan sey sigabna. Tey misarad assey nangwaan Apudyus asda kangamin inggana assey sana ya urey vus as ing-inggana at niippun makwa assey luvung anna as anungna jiyuy ey tongtong-ag.
41013020	At nu ajin Apudyus paavubbangun sey timpu saji, siguraju ey niippun mangillasat. Kon gapu ta madagu as dasey tagu ey pinilina, oni at ipaavubbangna sey ag-agow ey matongtong-aganda.
41013021	“Assey timpu saji, awad dasey mangimbaga an dakayu ey kananda, ‘Annaya as Cristu ey manginsarakan’, unnu kananda, ‘Awad as sanji’, ajiyu maggey dongron.
41013022	Tey lumuswa dasey tagu ey mangimbaga ey jida kanu dasey mangisarakan asda tagu ya jida kanu sey profet Apudyus. Ya mangwada asda kaskasdaow ya mangimpiilada assey sinyar ey mangallilow asda tagu ya urey dasey pinipilin Apudyus ey taguna nu mabalin.
41013023	At siyana sey man-ormanyu. Ipapaddaanku an dakayu ta aji kayu maallilow.”
41013024	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nu maas jiyuy ey tongtong-ag, gumikbot sey init ya aji pun jumilang sey sorag.
41013025	Mayakayak dasey vituwun ya nasiwar dasey amin ey awad ad langit.
41013026	At siyaji sey ampiil-an sey Anak ji Tagu. Umali ey mivurun assey livuu. Losan da tagu ilan sey pannakabalinna ya sumiling assey vinaruna.
41013027	Assey siyaji ey timpu, baaruk dasey enjelku ey umuy asda kikkiili inggana assey igid sey luta ey umuy managop asda pinilin Apudyus.”
41013028	Kanan vus Jesus, “Ilanyu man sey kayu ey fig ta adarunyu sey piuna itudtuju. Tey nu isaradna ey luminsi ya yumam-us ey umutar, agammuyu ey tigangey sey dagun.
41013029	At anungna vus nu ilanyu ey anna ey makwa dasey imbagak. Siguraju ey tigangey sey ampuuliyak.
41013030	Ya isigurajuk vus ey aji pun mamin matuy dasey tagu ey awad assey sana inggana as makwa dasey amin ey imbagak.
41013031	Urey muumas sey luta ya amin ey miila ad langit, aji pun maatub sey kinatuttuwan sey imbagak tey sissiya as ing-inggana.”
41013032	Kanan vus Jesus, “Sey ag-agow ya uras ey makwaan sey imbagak anna at niippun nangigammu tey anggey as Ama. Tey urey dasey enjel ad langit at ajida pun agammu ya urey vus sa'un.
41013033	At gapu ta niippun agammuyu nu makanu sey makwaana, man-annad kayu ya kanayun kayu mansasaggana.
41013034	Sey ampuuliyak at anungna sey ampuuliyén sey usa ey tagu ey ummuy nambaat assey adayu ey ili. Anna pun ey lumibbat, impaviyangna dasey amin ey makwa asda baba'aruna ey sinin-us-ana innatjun an jida dasey viyangda. Ya vinilinna vus sey guwarda ta pasig mansasaggana.
41013035	“At gapu ta niippun agammuyu, masapur mansasaggana kayu tey niippun agammuyu assey ag-agow ey ampuuliyak, sa'un ey apuyu, nu assey masjum, unnu assey gawan sey lavi, madamaan unnu wikkiwikkis.
41013036	At masapur ey mansasaggana kayu ta nu ampuuliyak, ajik dakayu andatngan ey nasusuyup.
41013037	Dasey imbagak anna an dakayu, siya vus sey ibagak asda amin ey tagu. Mansasaggana kayu!”
41014001	Awad sey juwa ey ag-agow sey daan asi at jumatong sey Vista ey kananda ey Manomsomkan ya Vista ey mangananda assey Tinapey ey niippun ipuna. At nan-uugudan dasey pangat da paji ya da misturun sey lintog Moses nu ngan an-annunda ey manokma an Jesus ey niippun mangigammu ya asida at gongatun.
41014002	Kananda, “Aji taku iyaspur assey Vista tey maggey lawa ta mangguru da tagu.”
41014003	Assey iggawan da Jesus ad Betani ya assey mangananda assey vuruy da Simon ey nangupungup, jummatong sey usa ey vubai. Uugnana sey idjuru ey nakwa ey naara assey batu ey kananda ey alabaster ey nakoan assey pasig ey nard ey usa ey kanginaan ey bangbangu. Pintudna sey bagang sey idjuru asi na at itu'ug assey urun Jesus.
41014004	Summanga da inggow ujum ey nangila at kananda, “Aman, keynga! Ananggaana gey lawa sey nangina ey bangbangu.
41014005	Unina at lawa nu ingnginana as dokor ey gatad ta maatud as dasey lumawa.” At amud sey amuyuda an siya.
41014006	Kon kanan Jesus ey gumminga, “Amorna. Payu lawa siya viyangan? Ustu sey kingwana anna an sa'un.
41014007	Miipanggop ey assey tumurunganyu asda lumawa, kanayun ey awadda an dakayu at mabalin ey tumurung kayu assey barangna ey uras. Kon an sa'un, ajiyak pun kanayun ey awad an dakayu.
41014008	Tey kingwana sey mabalinna ey koon at intu'ugna sey bangbangu assey long-agku as misaganaak asiyak at milavun.
41014009	At isigurajuk an dakayu ey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey ili sey mitudtujuwan sey Ambaru ey Damag, muul-ullit sey kingwana sana ta awad mangingkagasmokan an siya.”
41014010	Kingwan pun Judas Iscariot ey usa asda nasawaran as juwa ey aposel Jesus, ummuy nikaturag asda apun da paji nu ngan an-annuna ey mangimpadokma an Jesus an jida.
41014011	At amud sey layadda ey nangngor assey imbagana at impostada ey bayadanda siya. At insarad Judas ey manginap assey wayana ey mangimpadokma an Jesus.
41014012	Jummatong sey ab-avus sey ag-agow sey Vista ey manganan dasey Jews assey tinapey ey niippun ipuna. Ya siya avus sey mamartiyanda assey ubvun sey karneru ey muusar assey Vista ey Manomsomkan. At inimus dasey aposelna an siya ey kananda, “Gona sey ingkani manginsaganaan assey manganan taku assey Vista sana?”
41014013	At imbaar Jesus dasey juwa ey aposelna at kanana ey nanugun an jida, “Ingkayu ad Jerusalem. Nu jumatong kayu ey siji, awad sey laraki ey mangabot an dakayu ey namvuvukud as banga ey nasasakjuwan as danum. Umunud kayu an siya
41014014	assey vuruy ey ayana. Nu jumatong kayu, imusunyu assey simvuruy ey kananyu, ‘Ipiimus Misturu nu gona sey kuwartu ey miyuvungana asda aposelna assey sana ey makwaan sey Manomsomkan.’
41014015	At itujuna sey dokor ey kuwartu assey mikagwa ey garaju ey wadawad dasey amin ey masapur. Siyaji sey manginsaganaanyu assey manganan taku.”
41014016	Ummuy dasey juwa ey aposelna ad Jerusalem at tummuttuwa sey amin ey imbagan Jesus at insaganada sey mangananda assey siyaji ey lavin sey Manomsomkan.
41014017	Anna pun ey masjum, jummatong da Jesus ya dasey aposelna.
41014018	Tummukjuda pun ey mangan, kanan Jesus ey gumminga, “Ibagak an dakayu ey usa an dakayu ey mikauvung an sa'un ey sana sey malliput an sa'un.”
41014019	Jingngorda pun sey imbagan Jesus saji, lummawing sey somsomokda at awad ey usa an jida, nan-imus pey an Jesus ey kanana, “Ey sa'un sey pium ugujun?”
41014020	At kanana an jida, “Usa an dakayu ey nasawaran as juwa ey kauvungku assey sana.
41014021	Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu at mipagngatak tey siyana sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey makwa an sa'un. Kon kadagdagu pey lawa sey tagu anna ey malliput an sa'un tey un-unina nu aji atyén niyanak.”
41014022	Anna pun ey manganda, nangara as Jesus assey tinapey ya nansaramat an Apudyus asina at pitpit-ingun ey nangiwwaras an jida ey kanana, “Aranyu sanna, siyana sey long-agku.”
41014023	Naas pun, innarana sey natatasa ey bayas ya kasin nansaramat an Apudyus ya asina at vus atjun an jida ta man-at-atabanda ey inumun.
41014024	At kanana an jida, “Siyana sey darak ey mivukvuk as mapakawanan sey basur dasey adjuwan ey tagu. Siyana sey mangrot assey kakkopya ey Turag Apudyus asda tagu.
41014025	Isigurajuk an dakayu ey mansarad assey sana, ajiyak pun ogon uminum as anung nait ey bayas inggana as jumatong sey manturayan Apudyus asiyak at uminum assey barbaru ey karasin sey bayas.”
41014026	Naasda pun nangan, nangkankantada ey mandayow an Apudyus asida at lumogsad ey umuy assey Tagudtud ad Olib.
41014027	Assey iggawanda assey daran, kanan Jesus an jida, “As oni at umawid kayu losan ey maneynan an sa'un tey siyana sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Gongatuk sey amabantey asda karneru at mamin mavukar dasey karneru ey babantayana.’
41014028	Kon nu matuyak ya umuliyak, amangpanguwak ey umuy ad Galili ta as jiyuy sey man-asiil-an taku.”
41014029	Asin at Peter kanan ey, “Urey nu umayowda losan, ajik pun maggey teynan sika.”
41014030	Kon kanan Jesus an Peter, “Isigurajuk an sika sey katuttuwaan ey assey lavi anna, mamitluwum sa'un vuyagun ey niippun agammum an sa'un asi at mamigwa manullakuk sey manuk.”
41014031	Kon ipapilit pey dallu Peter ey kanana, “Urey nu mikakatuyak an sika at ajik pun maggey sika vuyagun.” At siyana vus sey imbagan da amin ey vurun Peter.
41014032	Jummatongda pun assey lugar ey Getsemani, kanan Jesus asda aposelna, “Tumukju kayu as nauy ta inyak malluwaru.”
41014033	Intakinna da Peter, James ya as John. Oni pun, magiknana sey amud ey sigab sey man-ang-angsana ya makussukussu sey somsomokna.
41014034	At kanana an jida, “Anna ey makussukussu sey somsomokku ey kama as lamugku ikatuy. Inggow kayu as sanna ta vurnanak ya aji kayu masuyup.”
41014035	Tummar-an as akit asi at mallukvub assey luta ey malluwaru ey nu mabalin atyén, miilisi siya assey amud ey tongtong-ag ey jumatong.
41014036	Kanana ey malluwaru, “Ama, Ama, makwa amin dasey pium. Ilisim sa'un assey tongtong-ag anna ey lak-amuk. Kon urey nu nauy sey kudawuk an sika, siya vus pigey makwa sey pium ey dakumpun assey piuk.”
41014037	Nampuuli pun as Jesus assey iggawan dasey turu saji, nandatngana jida ey nasusuyup. At kanana an Simon Peter, “Simon, nasusuyup ka? Ey ajim pun lawa maanusan ey mangila an sa'un as urey lawa sa'an ey uras?
41014038	Aji kayu pit pey masuyup. Malluwaru kayu ta aji kayu maawis ey makabasur. Tuttuwa ey assey somsomokyu, piunyu koon sey ustu kon aji pun makakwa sey long-agyu.”
41014039	Tineynan Jesus kasin jida ey ummuy nangimpigwa ey malluwaru ey kama vus assey illuwaruna assey ab-avusna.
41014040	Naas pun, kasin nampuuli assey iggowda at indasana vus jida ey nasusuyup ey ajida pun makajiyat assey atada ya an-amuwongda as ibagada an siya.
41014041	Assey pitlun sey nampuuliyana assey iggowda, kanana, “Ey sissiya kayu pey dallu ey nasusuyup ya an-iillong? Anuy! Ustu nait. Anna ey jummatong sey timpu ey mipurangan sey Anak ji Tagu as dasey lawingan ey tagu.
41014042	Vumangun kayu ta intakun tey annat ey marungey sey malliput an sa'un.”
41014043	Sissiya as Jesus ey gumingaginga assey nadanatong as Judas ey usa asda nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna. Adjuwan dasey tagu ey ingkuyugna ey vinaar dasey apun da paji, da misturun sey lintog ya da angkamarong-ag ey ampabbangid ya ampa'ujun as pang-ok da ujum.
41014044	Vinilin Judas dasey ingkuyugna ey kanana, “Sey ummauk an jida nu umadaniyak, siya sey dokmaanyu ta illayowyu ya guwardaanyu ey ustu.”
41014045	At ummadani ey dagus as Judas ey kanana, “Apu misturu,” asina at siya ummaun.
41014046	Innilan pun dasey vurun Judas sey kingwana, jinokmaanda ey dagus as Jesus.
41014047	Kingwan pun sey usa ey tagu ey summisikad assey dor-ag Jesus, inukputna sey bangidna at vinakagna sey alipan sey kangatuwan ey paji at napungudan sey ingana.
41014048	Gumminga as Jesus at kanana an jida, “Dakumpunak mit as kagguugyat ey tagu. Pakayu lawa ampabbangid ya ampa'ujun as pang-ok ey manokma an sa'un?
41014049	Inag-agow mit ey iinggawak an dakayu assey nantudtujuwak assey Tempél at payu sa'un aji jinokmaan siji? Kon makwa da nauy ta tumuttuwa amin sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus.”
41014050	Nadokmaan pun as Jesus, ummawid dasey vurunna at tineynanda siya.
41014051	Inggow sey usa ey babaru ey umunnuunnud an Jesus ey nampopokkos as ayyapit ey sinnun. Anna pun atyén ey ijugada siya dokmaan
41014052	naparuspus ey nateynan sey pokosna at nampoponnas ey ummawid.
41014053	Inniyuyda as Jesus assey vuruy sey kangatuwan ey paji ey naaammungan dasey nangangatu ey papaji, da angkamarong-ag ya dasey misturun sey lintog.
41014054	Inunud Peter jida kon nateynan as akit inggana assey paweyn sey vuruy sey kangatuwan ey paji. At nikatukju asda guwarda ey mikaaniju.
41014055	Ad darum assey vuruy saji, nadagup dasey nangangatu ey paji ya da amin ey kangatuwan ey turey assey ili. At anna ey man-inapda as amabasuranda an Jesus ta awad allapuwanda ey mangimpagngat an siya kon niippun udasanda.
41014056	Amud pey dasey nan-us-ussat ey manginsotsot an Jesus kon aji pun man-uunud sey imbagada.
41014057	Umanungus pun, inggow dasey summikad ey nanginsotsot an Jesus as kotom, kananda,
41014058	“Jingngorni sey imbagana ey kanana, ‘Dadailuk sey Tempél sana ey kingwan sey tagu ya kasinku ipatakjug assey turu ey ag-agow ey dakumpun as tagu sey mangwa.’”
41014059	Kon urey da nantistigu at aji pun vus nan-uunud sey apporoda imbaga.
41014060	At summikad sey kangatuwan ey paji assey sinagung dasey nadagup ey tagu at kanana an Jesus, “Ey niippun isongbatnu assey ipabasurda anna an sika?”
41014061	Kon gummiginnok as Jesus ey aji pun gumingginga. At inimus sey kangatuwan ey paji kasin ey kanana, “Ey sika sey Cristu ey anak sey madaydayow ey Apudyus ey niposta ey umali?”
41014062	At kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Oon, sa'un. At assey daan ey ag-agow, ilanyu avus sey Anak ji Tagu ey tumutukju assey padawanan Apudyus ey mannakabalin. Miilayu vus sa'un assey mampuuliyak ey marpu ad langit ey mivurun assey livuu.”
41014063	Jingngor pun sey Kangatuwan ey Paji sey imbagan Jesus, pinumtuk. At namsaana sey mismu ey panjilingna vinissey at kanana, “Aji taku pun masapur sey mangimpatuttuwa assey basurna.
41014064	Jingngoryu mit losan sey imbagana ey iyisuna sey long-agna an Apudyus. At ngan sey kananyu?” At nan-aavunanda losan ey kananda, “Masapur mipagngat!”
41014065	Kingwan pun da ujum, tinuppaanda siya, asida at vungutun ya vinuksivuksingda, asida at kanan, “Ayu uda a ibagam nu ngey namuksing an sika.” At urey vus dasey guwarda at illabsutda siya asida at lipakun.
41014066	Sissiya as Peter assey pawey assey nallaus sey usa ey vubai ey baba'arun sey kangatuwan ey paji.
41014067	Innilana pun as Peter ey man-aanniju, vinotogna siya ey kanana, “Usaka mit anda Jesus ey iNazareth.”
41014068	Kon vinuyég Peter ey kanana, “Ngey ibagabagam gey lawa sanat? Ajik pun maawatan.” At lummibbat as Peter ey ummuy assey igid sey pawey ey adani assey daran. Oni pun, nanullakuk sey manuk.
41014069	Kasin pun sey baba'arun innila as Peter, imbagana asda angkasikad ey tagu ey kanana, “Sey tagu annat at usa ey vurun da Jesus.”
41014070	Kon kasin vus Peter vinuyég. Nabab-ayag pun as akit, kanan dasey angkasikad ey tagu, “Ajim vuyagun ey usaka an jida tey iGalilika mit.”
41014071	Kon kanan Peter ey nansapata, “Urey jusaunak an Apudyus nu an-us-ussatak! Tey tuttuwa ey ajik pun agammu sey tagu sanat ey ibagabagayu.”
41014072	Imbagana pun jiyuy, ustu ey impigwan sey manuk ey nanullakuk. At ingkagasmok Peter sey imbagan Jesus an siya ey kanana, “Amitluwum sa'un vuyagun asi at sey pigwan sey manuk ey manullakuk.” At insaradna ey ngumannganugngug ey man-ivil gapu assey amud ey sigab sey somsomokna.
41015001	Anna pun ey wikkiwikkis, ginanasan dasey apun da papaji, da angkamarong-ag, dasey misturun sey lintog Moses ya da amin ey nangangatu ey turey dasey umili ey nammimitin. At nambabag-anda nu ngan sey koonda an Jesus. At vinarudda sey imana asida at umuy ipurang an Pilate ey gubernador ad Judea assey timpu saji.
41015002	Jummatongda pun ey nipasangu as Jesus, kanan Pilate an siya, “Aah, sika atpey sey Arin dasey Jews?” At summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Nu siya sey imbagam, aji siya.”
41015003	At dasey apun da papaji, amud pey sey impabasurda an Jesus.
41015004	At impigwan Pilate ey gumminga, kanana, “Ey dodongrom dasey adjuwan ey ipabasurda anna an sika? Ey ajika pun makasongbat?”
41015005	Kon giginnok pey lawa as Jesus at nasdaow as Pilate.
41015006	Assey gagangey ey kookoon gubernador Pilate assey tinawun nu jumatong sey Vistan sey Manomsomkan at awad sey dana ivukkey ey usa ey barud ey insigun assey piun da tagu.
41015007	At assey timpu saji, niyaspur ey inggow dasey barud ey ginumngat assey nangguruwanda assey gubernun sey iRoman. Sey usa an jida at as Barabbas.
41015008	Nadagup pun dasey tagu, imbagada an Pilate ey koona sey sigud ey gagangeyna ey angimvukkey assey usa ey barud.
41015009	At kanan Pilate asda tagu, “Ey piunyu ta sey arin dasey Jews sey ivukkeyk?”
41015010	Siya sey imbagan Pilate tey agammuna ey sey nangimpuranganda an Jesus at gapu assey apos.
41015011	Kon sinugsugan dasey apun da papaji dasey tagu ey nadagup ta as Barabbas sey kudawunda ey ivukkeyna.
41015012	At inimus Pilate asda tagu ey kanana, “Kon sey tagu pey anna ey kananyu ey arin da Jews, ngan sey kook an siya?”
41015013	At sivuvuggada losan ey kananda, “Milansa assey krus!”
41015014	At kanan vus Pilate, “Kon ngan sey basur ey kingwana?” Kon iyyam-amudda at avus ey sivuvugga ey kananda, “Ilansayu assey krus.”
41015015	At gapu ta piun Pilate ey ming-op da tagu, imvukkeyna as Barabbas. Kon as Jesus, impasaplitna asina at ipurang asda surdaju ta ilansada assey krus.
41015016	Oni pun inniyuy dasey surdaju as Jesus assey dokor ey vuruy Gubernador Pilate ey kananda ey “Pretorium” asida at ayagan dasey amin ey vurunda.
41015017	Asida at lumvunan as Jesus assey panjiling ey anungna sey panjiling sey ari. Ya nan-apidda assey siit at vinalingowngowda as manbarangatna.
41015018	Ya asida at siya dardalluwun ey kananda, “Madayowka ey arin da Jews.”
41015019	Sinaplisaplitanda sey uruna assey paur ya tinuppatuppaanda, asida at kanu pey mallikkadang ey mandayow an siya.
41015020	Naasda pun siya pinopporoan, kinaanda sey panjilingna at kasinda inigga sey sigud ey lumvunna, asida at siya italley at inniyuyda ey mangillansa assey krus.
41015021	Anna pun ey italleyda as Jesus, inabotda as Simon ey iSerene ey narpu assey u'uma ey umuy ad Jerusalem. At impapilit dasey surdaju ey vukudana sey krus Jesus. As Simon anna, siya sey aman da Alexander an Ruffus.
41015022	At inniyuyda as Jesus ad Golgota ey sey piuna ugujun, isuna battokag sey tagu.
41015023	Pin-umanda atyén as bayas ey nakamsan as agas ey mira ta makakkaanan kanu sey sigab ey magiknana. Kon ajina pun ininum.
41015024	At illansada siya assey krus asida at vilvillayun sey lumvunna. Kingwada pun, namvub-unutda ta ilanda nu ngan sey angkuwan sey usa an jida.
41015025	Sey nangillansaanda an Jesus assey krus at assey anna ey maayadang as init.
41015026	At sey impabasurda an siya ey ingkur-itda assey ngatun sey krusna at kanana, “Sey arin dasey Jews.”
41015027	At inggow vus dasey juwa ey akkawan ey injugada illansa. Nikrus sey usa assey padawananna ya sey usa assey padawigina.
41015028	Nauy ey nakwa at siyana sey tumuttuwaan sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus assey kar-argow ey kanana, “Mitakurung siya as dasey ambasbasur.”
41015029	At awad ey tagu as mallaus, inam-amangda pey ey manginsurtu an siya ey kananda, “Atééy! Assey sana gummanka vus ampey nu'? Imbagam ey dadailum sey Tempél asim at ipatakjug assey turu ey ag-agow!
41015030	Ayu pit lumogsadka assey krusnu ta isarakam sey long-agnu.”
41015031	At urey vus dasey apun da papaji ya dasey mimisturun sey lintog at apporoanda as Jesus. At kananda ey ambabagbaga, “Insarakana da ujum ey tagu kon aji pun makasarak assey mismu ey long-agna.
41015032	Lumogsad atyén as Cristu anna ey arin kanu pey dasey ganak Israel ta ilan taku ya patiyun taku ey siya tuttuwa sey vinaar Apudyus ey umali.” Urey vus dasey inggow juwa ey vurun Jesus ey nilalansa at inin-insurtuda vus siya.
41015033	Anna pun ey mamatuk, maggey gummikbot inggana assey magayud.
41015034	Ya anna pun ey vummatangan as init, indangsor Jesus ey gumminga ey kanana, “Eloi Eloi lama sabaktani”, ey sey piuna ugujun, “Ama ey Apudyus, pam sa'un man-awidan.”
41015035	Jingngor pun da ujum ey tagu ey angkasikad as jiyuy sey imbagan Jesus, kananda, “Dongronyu man ya, anji ey ayaayagana as profet Elijah.”
41015036	At kingwan pun sey usa, nanuddak ey ummuy nangara as sinnun at insowsowna assey kilom asina at isipit ey mangindowdow ta supsupan kanu Jesus ya asina at kanan, “Ilan taku uda a nu tuttuwa ey umali as Elijah ey mangimbaba an siya assey krus.”
41015037	Oni pun, indangsor Jesus ey namvugga asi at matuy.
41015038	Natuy pun as Jesus, maggey nangkagwa ey navissey sey angkopar ey kurtina assey tempél ey nansarad ad ngatu inggana assey gayadanna.
41015039	At sey Kapitan da surdaju ey summisikad assey sinagung sey krus saji, innilana sey nangokoon Jesus ey natuy at kanana, “Tuttuwa atpey ey siya sey Anak Apudyus.”
41015040	Inggow dasey ujum ey vubai ey ummaaddayu ey nangoottap assey amin ey nakwa. Da ujum an jida at da Mary Magdalene, Salome ya as Mary ey inan da Joses ya as James ey ujiji.
41015041	Da nauy da vubai ey nivuruvurun ya nanuruturung an Jesus assey iggawana ad Galili. Ya inggow vus da adjuwan ey vubai ey apporow ummunud an Jesus assey ummayana ad Jerusalem.
41015042	Nakwa amin da nauy assey ag-agow ey manginsaganaan da Jews asda masapur assey ngilin ey sabaju. Anna pun ey gumikbot,
41015043	inggow as Joseph ey iyArimatea ey maririspitu asda nangangatu ey turey sey umili ey nanginturud ey ummuy nangdow an Gubernador Pilate assey ladag Jesus. As Joseph anna, usa asda manguulley assey jumatngan sey manturayan Apudyus.
41015044	Jingngor pun Pilate, Nasdaow tey sin-akitan ya maggey natuy as Jesus. At kingwana pun, inayagana sey Kapitan dasey surdaju ta imusuna nu tuttuwa ey natuy.
41015045	Imbagan pun sey Kapitan ey tuttuwa ey natuy, imparuvusna as Joseph ey umuy mangara assey ladag Jesus.
41015046	At ummuy as Joseph ngummina as apputak ey sinnun. Asina at umuy opasun sey ladag Jesus assey krus asina at kurvikubén assey sinnun saji ey ningin-ana. Asina at umuy ilavun assey natiktikan ey dopras. Naas pun, pinukarna sey dokor ey batu as nangnubna.
41015047	At inggow da Mary Magdalene an Mary ey inan Joses ey nangiila assey nilabnana.
41016001	Anna pun ey jummakpus sey ngilin ey Sabaju ey isaradna ey gumikbot, ummuy da Mary Magdalene, Salome ya as Mary ey inan da James ey ummuy ngummina assey bangbangu ey muusar assey natuy ta umuyda igga assey long-ag Jesus.
41016002	Wikkiwikkis pun assey Juminggu, ummuyda assey iggawan sey lavun Jesus assey anna ey jumunglit as init.
41016003	Inggowda pun assey daran, ambabagbagada ey kananda, “Ngan sey mangaan assey batu ey unub sey lavun?”
41016004	Kon jummatongda pun ey ilanda, nakakaan at avus sey dokor ey batu ey unub sey lavun.
41016005	Summakeyda pun ad darum assey lavun, magda gey nakugwey ey nangila assey usa ey babaru ey tummutukju assey nangkapon assey padawanan ey nampapanjiling as apputak.
41016006	Gumminga ey kanana an jida, “Aji kayu umugyat. Agammuk ey siya anapunyu as Jesus ey iNazareth ey illansada assey krus. Kon niippun as sanna tey ummuli. Ilanyu, annaya sey nibadngan sey ladagna.
41016007	Ingkayu ibaga asda aposelna am-amud an Peter ta umuyda ad Galili tey as jiyuy sey umuyda mangil-an an siya tey siya sey imbabaggana an jida.”
41016008	At situtuddak dasey vubai ey umawid ey amud sey nasdaawanda ya ugyatda. At niippun nangimbagbagaanda gapu assey ugyatda.
41016009	Assey ummuliyén Jesus assey vigvigat sey Juminggu, namangpangu nampiila an Mary Magdalene. As Mary Magdalene anna at siya inggow namaryawan Jesus asda pitu ey jimunyu ey nallun-ug an siya.
41016010	At ummuy Mary imbaga asda vurun Jesus ey pasigda anjujuuy ya umiviivil.
41016011	Kon urey nu imbagana an jida ey natagu as Jesus ya innilana pigey siya, ajida pun pey dallu mamati.
41016012	Oni pun, nampiila vus kasin as Jesus asda juwa ey tagu ey manaradaran ey umuy assey usa ey vubruy. Kon ajida pun immatunan tey sabali sey kingwana ey nampiila.
41016013	Kon immatunanda pun ey as Jesus atpey, nanuddakda ey ummuy nangimbaga asda vurunda kon ajida pun pey dallu jida pinati.
41016014	Ummanungus pun, nampiila vus as Jesus asda nasawaran as sa'an ey aposelna assey anna ey manganda. Iningorana jida tey kama pey lawa as ingngosdorda sey somsomokda tey ajida pun patiyun dasey impadamagda an jida ey ummuli tuttuwa siya.
41016015	At kanana an jida, “Ingkayu asda kikkiili ta ingkayu iwarawag sey Ambaru ey Damag asda amin ey tagu
41016016	ta da amin ey mamati an sa'un ya mavunyagan, misarakanda kon dasey aji pun mamati, magoddonganda ey majusa.”
41016017	At inturuyna ey kanana, “Da nauy ey sinyar sey ipiilan da amin ey mamati; Usarunda sey kaviilan sey ngadanku ey mangimparyow asda jimunyu ya mabalin ey gumingada asda antokotokon ey ginga.
41016018	Ya urey vus nu ugnanda sey tabbad ya inumunda sey tangga, niippun makwa as lawingan an jida. Ya mabalin vus ey ipateyda sey imada asda masakit at makaan da sakitda.”
41016019	Naas pun as Apu Jesus nikabagbaga asda aposelna, ngummatu ey ummuy ad langit at tummukju assey padawanan Apudyus.
41016020	At kingwan pun dasey aposelna, insaradda ey umuy asda kikkiili ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag. Ya iinggow as Jesus ey apporow manuruturung an jida. At inatdana vus jida as kaviilan ey mangwa asda kaskasdaow ta awad mangil-an da tagu assey kinatuttuwan dasey tudtujuda.
42001001	Pipiuk ey Apu Teofilus, Adjuwan dasey tagu ey namadas ey nangingkur-it asda nakwanakwa assey iggow taku anna ta mambaru sey kuul-ullitana.
42001002	Ingkur-itda dasey nuuguugud an dakani ey inugud dasey mismu ey nangila asda nakwanakwa ey nisarad assey ab-avusna ya jida dasey apporow nangiwwarawag miipanggop assey Gingan Apudyus.
42001003	At sey kingwak Apu Teofilus, gapu ta inambaruk inadar sey amin ey nakwanakwa misarad assey ab-avusna, kanak ey ambab-aru nin nu sa'un ey mismu sey mangingkur-it asda nakwanakwa anna an sika ta ambab-aru sey kuul-ullitana.
42001004	Kanaʼsna sey kook ta maagammuwam sey amin ey kinatuttuwan dasey nitudtuju an sika.
42001005	Assey timpun sey nan-ariyan Herod ad Judea, inggow sey usa ey paji ey angngadan as Zechariah ey nijuga assey usa ey vungguy da papaji ey kananda ey vungguy Abias. As Elizabeth sey asawana ey narpu assey ginanakan da paji.
42001006	Niyun-unda ey an-asawa assey sinagung Apudyus ya ustu sey koonda ey mangunud assey amin ey vilin sey Apu ya asda lintogna.
42001007	Kon niippun anakda tey basig as Elizabeth ya narakeyda ey juwa.
42001008	Usa pun ey ag-agow, jummatong sey timpun Zechariah ya da vungguyna ey mansiput assey Tempél ey manservi an Apudyus.
42001009	Sey nakopyaan da papaji, amvinnunutda nu ngan sey siput ey mibatug assey usa ya usa an jida. At as Zechariah sey navunut ey sumakey assey Tempél sey Apu ey mansugub assey bangbangu.
42001010	Assey timpu ey masgumasgubén sey bangbangu, inggow dasey adjuwan ey tagu assey lasin ey alluwaluwaru.
42001011	At maggey nampiila sey usa ey enjel Apudyus ey sisikad assey padawanan sey altar ey masmasgubén sey bangbangu.
42001012	Natokor as Zechariah ey nangila gapu assey amud ey ugyatna.
42001013	Kon gumminga sey enjel ey kanana, “Ajika umugyat Zechariah tey jingngor Apudyus sey luwarum. At as asawam ey Elizabeth, mavugi ya iyanakna sey anakyu ey laraki ya masapur ngadananyu as John.
42001014	Allaylayadka gapu an siya ya allaylayad vus dasey adjuwan ey tagu assey miyanakana
42001015	tey nangatu siya ey tagu assey sinagung Apudyus. Masapur ey aji pun umin-inum as bayas unnu ngadannaʼs nait ey vumuuk. Ya urey assey vugi atgey siya, uugnanan sey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
42001016	Ya adjuwan da iyIsrael ey awisuna ey kasin ampuuli an Apudyus ey Apuda.
42001017	At sey anakyu anna sey mamangpangu ey umali asi at umali sey Apu. Ya sey pannakabalinna at kama assey pannakabalin ey innatud sey Ispiritun Apudyus an profet Elijah assey kar-argow. Panusuna sey ajin pun da an-aama mankikinnaawatan ya pabaruwuna sey somsomok dasey aji pun mangngor an Apudyus ta miyanung sey somsomokda asda ambaru ey tagu. Nauy sey koona ey manginsagana asda tagu asi at umali sey Apu.” Nauy sey imbagan sey enjel an Zechariah.
42001018	At kanan Zechariah assey enjel, “Ngey mangimpatuttuwa ey makwa nauy tey narakey kani mit ey an-asawa?”
42001019	Summongbat sey enjel ey kanana, “Sa'un as enjel Gabriel ey manserservi an Apudyus. Siya sey namaar an sa'un ey umuy mangimbaga an sika assey ambaru ey damag sana.
42001020	Kon gapu ta ajim pun pinati sey imbagak, ambalinka as omor inggana as makwa sey imbagak tey tuttuwa ey umdas dallu sey timpu ey tumuttuwaana.”
42001021	At dasey tagu ey iniinggow assey lasin, uullayunda sey lumawaan Zechariah ya nasdaowda tey ayaka gey bayagna ad darum assey Tempel.
42001022	Napanus pun, lummawa ey sinsinyarana gey lawa da tagu tey aji pun makaginga. At vingkon ogon da tagu ey awad nin impiilan Apudyus an siya ad darum assey Tempel.
42001023	Jummatong pun sey timpu ey moorsan da Zechariah ey mansiput assey Tempel, nampuuli assey vubruyda.
42001024	At aji pun nabayag, navugi tuttuwa as asawana ey Elizabeth at iniinggow as vuruy assey lima ey vuran.
42001025	Kanan Elizabeth assey somsomokna, “Jummatong tuttuwa sey mangwaan Apudyus assey ambaru an sa'un tey kinaanna sey miviviinak asda asintataguk.”
42001026	Assey mikonom ey vuran sey vugin Elizabeth, vinaar Apudyus as enjel Gabriel ta umuy ad Nazareth ey usa ey vubruy assey provinsiyan sey Galili
42001027	ta awad sey umuyna ibaga assey usa ey babarasang ey angngadan as Mary ey niippun nanordor-ag ey niturag ey asawaun Joseph ey ganak ari David.
42001028	At ummuy sey enjel an Mary ey kanana, “Annaak ey ummali ey mangimbaga an sika assey allaylaydam, sika ey piniun Apudyus. Kakaddaguwana sika.”
42001029	Jingngor pun Mary sey imbagan sey enjel, man-amuwwong as koona ya sommosommokona nu ngan sey piun ji ey ugujun.
42001030	Kon kanan sey enjel an siya, “Ajika umugyat Mary tey sika sey piniun Apudyus.
42001031	Oni at mavugika ya iyanaknu sey laraki ey ngadanam as Jesus.
42001032	Sey nauy ey iyanaknu at amud sey kinangatuna ya maawagan siya as anak sey kangatuwan ey Apudyus. As Apudyus ey Apu at ambalinuna siya as Ari ey kama an David ey dakdakorna assey kar-argow.
42001033	Siya sey manginturey asda ganak Jacob as ing-inggana tey niippun ampatinggaan sey kinaarina.” Nauy sey imbagan sey enjel an Mary.
42001034	At kanan Mary assey enjel, “Oon, kon ngan-annuna nait ey niippun mit nanor-ag an sa'un?”
42001035	Summongbat sey enjel at kanana, “Umali sey Ispiritun Apudyus an sika ya miijunganka assey pannakabalin sey kangatuwan ey Apudyus. Gapu ta nait sey makwa, maagammuwan ey naApudyusan sey anak ey iyanaknu ya maawagan as Anak Apudyus.
42001036	Urey as jugam ey Elizabeth ey kananda ey basig at navugi vus, urey nu narakey. Niippun namnamana ey umanak kon onom ey vuran sey vugina assey sana
42001037	tey niippun aji mabalin an Apudyus.”
42001038	At kanan Mary, “Annaak ey anserservi an Apudyus. Makwa atyén sey imbagam.” Oni pun ummayow sey Enjel saji.
42001039	Oni pun, ginanasan Mary ey nansagana ey ummuy assey vubruy da Zechariah assey tagtagudtud ad Judea.
42001040	Inumdas pun, nasanakey ad darum assey vuruy at vinagbagana as Elizabeth.
42001041	Jingngor pun gey Elizabeth sey gingan Mary, nanggiju sey utting assey vuwangna ya naatdan siya assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
42001042	At indangsorna ey kanana, “Sika sey navindisyunan asda amin ey vubai ya navindisyunan vus sey utting ey iyanaknu!
42001043	Kon ngan gey sey katataguk ta umalika ey mangila an sa'un, sika ey inan sey Apuk?
42001044	Tey jingngorku pun gey sey gingam, nanggiju sey utting assey vuwangku gapu assey sey layadna.
42001045	Gadtok ey nagasatka tey sigurajuwum ey makwa sey amin ey imbagan Apudyus an sika.”
42001046	At kanan Mary, “Dayawuk as Apudyus assey amin ey somsomokku.
42001047	Insarakana sa'un at amud pigey layadku.
42001048	Tey ingkagasmokna sa'un, alipanna ey nababa, ya mansarad assey sana, nagasatak losan da tagu ibaga,
42001049	gapu assey nakaskasdaow ey kingwana an sa'un anna, mannakabalin ey Apudyus ey nasantuwan sey ngadanna.
42001050	Mallugi assey saradna ya urey as ing-inggana, kakaddaguwana da amin ey mangimviin an siya.
42001051	Impiilana sey kaviilana ey mangwa asda koona ya kinussuna sey panggop dasey mangimpangpangatuʼs long-agda.
42001052	Dasey mannakabalin ey aari, tureyda kinaanna. ya dasey napakumbaba ey tagu impangatuna.
42001053	Innatdana dasey nuurat as ikataguda as keygad sey ming-opanda, kon dasey babaknang, nawwagwagayyada ey pinaryowna.
42001054	Dasey impostana asda dakdakor taku, tinongparna ya jitaku ey ganak Israel ey manserservi an siya, turuturungana.
42001055	As Abraham ajina pun naliwatan, kinadaguwana ya an jitaku losan ey ganakna as ing-inggana!”
42001056	Naas pun ji, nikig-ow as Mary anda Elizabeth as turumvuran asi at umayow ey nampuuli assey vubruyda.
42001057	Jummatong sey timpu ey umanakan Elizabeth at iyyanakna sey laraki.
42001058	Jingngor dasey karubvunda ya dasey jujugana sey nakaskasdaow ey dagun Apudyus an siya at nijugada ey allaylayad an siya.
42001059	Assey mikawaru ey ag-agow sey utting, ummuyda impakugit. Piun dasey tagu ngadanan sey utting assey ngadan amana ey Zechariah,
42001060	kon kanan inana, “A uh, John sey mipangadan an siya.”
42001061	At kanan vus dasey tagu, “Ampey, kon niippun mit jugayu as angngadan as kanaʼsnaʼt.”
42001062	Oni pun sininyasanda as Zechariah ta imusunda nu ngan sey piuna ey ingadanda assey utting.
42001063	Nampaara as Zechariah as angur-itana at ingkur-itna sey, “As John sey ngadanna.” At amud sey nasdaawan da amin ey inggowʼsji.
42001064	At nigisan ey nivukat sey gingan Zechariah at insaradna ey mandayow an Apudyus.
42001065	Nasdaow namin da karubvunda at nanjinjinamag nauy ey nakwa assey amin ey vubruy assey tagtagudtud ad Judea.
42001066	At amin ey nangngor assey nakwa sana, sommosommokonda nu ngan gey lawa sey ambalinan sey utting sana tey miila ey awad sey pannakabalin Apudyus an siya.
42001067	As Zechariah ey aman sey utting, naatdan as pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus asina at ibaga sey impaagammun Apudyus ey kanana,
42001068	“Dayawun taku as Apudyus ey Apun da iyIsrael tey ummali ey manurung ya mangiwwaya an jitaku ey taguna asda kavusur taku.
42001069	Tey imbaarna sey mannakabalin ey manginsarak an jitaku ey narpu assey ganak Ari David ey nanserservi an siya.
42001070	Imvilinna asda nasantuwan ey profetna assey kar-argow
42001071	ey sarakana jitaku asda kavusur taku ya asda amin ey vumusur.
42001072	Siya sey koona ta ipiilana sey daguna ey impostana asda dakdakor taku ya ajina pun naliwatan sey nabalor ey impopostana an jida
42001073	assey nanginsapataana an Abraham ey apu taku ey sarakana jitaku asda kavusur taku ya niippun umugyatan taku ey manservi an siya
42001075	ta ambalin taku as nasantuwan ya nalintog assey angiilana inggana as mapungpungan sey mataguwan taku.”
42001076	Inturuy Zechariah ey kanana, “Ya sika anakku, maawaganka as Profet sey kangatuwan ey Apudyus tey sika sey amangpangu ey umali nu sey Apu ta isaganam dasey tagu ey amadatong an siya.
42001077	Ya ipaagammum asda taguna nu ngan annunda ey misarakan gapu assey mapakawanan dasey basurda.
42001078	Tey as Apu taku ey Apudyus at amud sey daguna at sey manginsarakanana an jitaku at anungna sey jumunglitan sey init assey vigvigat.
42001079	At nu umali, silawana dasey kama as awad assey gikbot ey umugyat ey matuy. ya itudtujuna nu ngan annun taku ey matagu ey natarna.”
42001080	At sey anak da Zechariah saji, jummakor ya jinumgot sey pammatina an Apudyus. Kingwana pun, ummuy ininggow assey danak ey niippun katagtaguwan inggana as inumdas sey timpu ey mipiil-ana asda iyIsrael.
42002001	Assey timpu saji, imvilin Augustus ey Emperor ad Rome ey masapur masensus da amin ey tagu ey iturayana.
42002002	Nauy ey namangu ey sensus at nakwa assey timpun Quirinius ey gubernador ad Syria.
42002003	Usausa at ummuy assey vubruy dasey dakdakorna ta as jiyuy da ey ampalista.
42002004	At as Joseph, gapu ta ganak ari David, ad Bethlehem sey ayana ampalistaan. At lummibbat ad Nazareth ey vubruyda ey sakup sey Galili at ummuy ad Bethlehem ey vubruy apuna ey David ey sakup sey Judea.
42002005	Nivurun as Mary ey niturag an siya ey asawauna ta umuyda losan ampalista. Navugi assey timpu saji.
42002006	Assey iggawanda ad Bethlehem, siyaji sey timpu ey umanakana.
42002007	At inyanakna sey pangu ey anakna ey laraki. Pinokosana sey utting assey sinnun asina at ipap-ug assey atutung da ayém tey niippun iggawanda assey vuruy ey dadaggusan da tagu.
42002008	Assey lavi saji, inggow dasey amabantey asda karneruda assey purag.
42002009	Oni pun, maggey nampiila an jida sey enjel Apudyus at najilanganda assey siling Apudyus at amud sey ugyatda.
42002010	Kon kanan sey enjel an jida, “Aji kayu umugyat tey awad sey Ambaru ey Damag ey ibagak an dakayu ey siya sey mangatud as amud ey allaylaydan da amin ey tagu.
42002011	Tey assey lavi sana, awad sey niyanak assey vubruy ari David ey siya sey manginsarakan an dakayu ey tagu. Siya sey Cristu ey Apu.
42002012	At sey manuttuwaanyu, udasanyu sey utting ey napopokkosan as sinnun ey uumvug assey atutung da ayém.”
42002013	Oni pun, maggey nampiila ad langit dasey adjuwan ey enjel ey nivurun assey namangu ey nampiila ey enjel ey mandaydayow an Apudyus ey kananda,
42002014	“Madaydayow as Apudyus ad langit ya muurnus da tagu assey luta anna ey apporow mangimpalaylayad an siya.”
42002015	Nampuuli pun da enjel ad langit, nambabagbaga dasey amabantey asda karneru ey kananda, “Intaku ad Bethlehem ta intaku ilan sey nakwa ey impaagammun Apu taku ey Apudyus an jitaku.”
42002016	Ginanasanda ey ummuy at indasanda da Mary an Joseph ya sey utting ey inuumvug assey atutung da ayém.
42002017	Assey nangil-anda assey utting, imbagada asda dakdakorna sey imbagan sey inggow enjel miipanggop an siya.
42002018	At nasdaow dasey amin ey nangngor assey imbagan dasey ampaspastor sana.
42002019	Kon as Mary, inaaggammuna amin dasey makwamakwa at sommosommokona nu ngan sey piun da nauy ey ugujun.
42002020	Kon asda amabantey asda karneru, nampuulida assey purag ey amud sey layadda ey mandaydayow an Apudyus gapu assey innilada ya jingngorda tey tuttuwa amin sey imbagan sey enjel an jida.
42002021	Assey mikawaru ey ag-agown sey utting ey nakugit, nangadanan siya as Jesus tey siyaji sey imbagan sey enjel assey daan pun atgey mavugi as Mary an Jesus.
42002022	Assey jummatngan sey ag-agow ey kanan sey lintog Moses ey awad sey makwa as madarusan dasey ummanak, lummibbat da Joseph an Mary ey ummuy ad Jerusalem. Inniyuyda sey utting ta umuyda iparang assey Apu
42002023	tey nikukur-it assey lintog Apudyus ey da amin ey pangu ey anak ey laraki at masapur miparang as angkuwan Apudyus.
42002024	At da Joseph an Mary, ummuyda indatun an Apudyus sey kanan sey lintog ey masapur sumgubda as juwa ey ubvun sey ammok unnu juwa ey ubvun sey karapati.
42002025	Assey timpu saji, inggow sey usa ey marong-ag ad Jerusalem ey angngadan as Simeon ey anguulley assey misarakanan dasey kadaraana ey iyIsrael. Mambaru ey tagu ya amud sey layadna an Apudyus ya aawwad sey Ispiritun Apudyus an siya.
42002026	Impaagammun sey Ispiritun Apudyus an siya ey aji yén matuy inggana as ilana sey Cristu ey impostan Apudyus ey umali.
42002027	At assey timpu saji, impaspasmok sey Ispiritun Apudyus an Simeon ey umuy assey Tempel. At siyaji vus ey ag-agow sey mangiyyuyan dasey dakdakor Jesus an siya assey Tempél ta koonda sey kanan sey Lintog miipanggop assey utting.
42002028	Innilan pun Simeon sey utting, vinnusna asi at ampasaramat an Apudyus ey kanana,
42002029	“Apudyus ey Apu, ey sana urey aranak an sika, sa'un ey alipannu tey tinongparnu sey impostam an sa'un.
42002030	Tey innilan sey mismu ey atak sey manginsarakan ey insaganam as para asda amin ey tagu.
42002032	Miyisu siya assey silow ey manilow asda somsomok dasey Gentil ya gapu vus an siya, midayow dasey tagum ey iyIsrael.”
42002033	Nasdaow as aman Jesus ya as inana asda imbagabagan Simeon miipanggop an siya.
42002034	At vinindisyunan Simeon jida at kanana an Mary ey inan Jesus, “Jinutukan Apudyus sey anaknu anna as lapun sey miballuwan dasey adjuwan an jitaku ey iyIsrael ya siya vus sey lapuna ey adjuwan an jitaku sey misarakan. Mipani sey utting as sinyar ey narpu an Apudyus ya kontraun dasey adjuwan ey tagu
42002035	ta mipiila dasey awad asda somsomokda. At sika ey inana, idamam sey amud ey somsomoknu gapu assey makwa an siya.” Nait sey imbagan Simeon.
42002036	Inggow vus siji sey usa ey profet ey mad-an ey angngadan as Ana ey anak Fanuel ey ganak Aser. Pitu ey tawun sey nan-aaggumanda an asawana
42002037	asi at mabaru. Warumpuru ya opat sey tawunna. Inag-agow ya nilavi ey iinggow assey Tempél ey andaydayow an Apudyus ey magon ta mallangan assey malluwaruwana an Apudyus.
42002038	Assey siyaji ey uras, ummadani as Ana asda an-asawa asi at ampasaramat an Apudyus. Asina at isarad ey guminga miipanggop assey utting asda amin ey anguulley assey manginsarakanan Apudyus asda iJerusalem.
42002039	Assey naas da Joseph an Mary kingwa sey amin ey imvilin sey lintog Apudyus, nampuulida assey vubruyda ad Nazareth assey provinsiyan sey Galili.
42002040	At as jiyuy sey jummakran sey anakda. Kummasdor sey long-agna ya amud sey liingna ya mamaryad as Apudyus an siya.
42002041	Assey mantawun as Jesus as nasawaran as juwa, nikuuy anda amana ey ummuy ad Jerusalem tey siya sey nakopyaanda assey tinawun ey umuy mikavista assey kananda ey, Vista ey Manomsomkan assey Nallausan sey Enjel ad Egypt.
42002043	Naas pun sey Vista, ummayowda kon nateynan as Jesus ad Jerusalem ey niippun agammun dasey dakdakorna.
42002044	Sey agammun da dakdakor Jesus, nivurun siya asda ujum ey tagu. Ummar-argowda ey nanaran asida at imusun asda jujugada ya vurunda ey narpu ad Jerusalem nu awad innilada an siya.
42002045	Assey ajida pun muudasan, nampuulida ad Jerusalem ey manarata an siya.
42002046	Assey mikatlu ey ag-agow, indasanda siya assey Tempél ey nikaam-ammung asda mimisturun da Jews ey andodongngor ya an-imuimus an jida.
42002047	At nasdaow dasey amin ey nangngor assey amud ey agammuna ya kinariingna ey sumongbat.
42002048	Nasdaow da dakdakorna assey nangil-anda an siya. At kanan inana, “Anak, ngey kingwam sana? Amud sey danagni an amam ey manginap an sika.”
42002049	“Payu lawa sa'un anapun? Ey ajiyu pun agammu ey masapur awadak assey vuruy amak?” kanan Jesus ey summongbat.
42002050	Kon ajida pun naawatan sey piuna ey ugujun.
42002051	Ummunud as Jesus an jida ey nampuuli ad Nazareth, masomkan ya jumngor ey anak. Kon as inana sommosommokona da amin ey apporow makwamakwa.
42002052	Jummakor as Jesus ya lummiing. Ya amud sey layad Apudyus ya da tagu an siya.
42003001	Assey mikasimpuru ya lima ey tawun ey nanturayan Emperor Tiberius, as Pontius Pilate ey iRoman sey Gubernador ad Judea ya as Herod sey turey ad Galili ya as Philip ey sunudna sey turey ad Iturea ya ad Traconitis ya as Lysanias ey usa ey Jew sey turey ad Abiline
42003002	ya dasey kangatuwan ey paji at da Annas an Caiaphas. Assey siyaji ey timpu, nikabagbaga as Apudyus an John ey anak da Zechariah. As John at assey danak sey iniiggawana.
42003003	Kingwan pun John, ummuy asda nampasijumang ey kikkiili assey dawwang ad Jordan at kanana ey angiwwarawag, “Man-awidanyu dasey basuryu ya mampavunyag kayu ta pakawanun Apudyus dakayu.”
42003004	Sey kingwan John sana, siya sey tummuttuwaan sey nikur-it assey libnun profet Isaiah ey kanana, “Inggow assey danak sey mangimvuggavugga asda tagu ey kanana, ‘Isaganayu sey daran sey Apu! Anggodongonyu da daran ta ambaru as ayuna!
42003005	Masapur maabab dasey lakkung ya mipatanap dasey tagtagudtud anda vib-ilig. Mipagodong dasey nallikkulikku ey daran ya matab-unan dasey naliskungan.
42003006	At miilan dasey amin ey tagu nu ngan-annun Apudyus ey manginsarak an jida.’”
42003007	Amud sey tagu ey ummuy an John ta ampavunyagda. Kon kanana an jida, “Dakayu ey lawingan ey tagu ey kamaʼs mandogot ey tabbad, ey sey kananyu at maliklikanyu sey jusan Apudyus nu mampavunyag kayu?
42003008	Aji pun, tey masapur awad koonyu as mangimpiila ey nan-awidanyu dasey lawingan ey kookoonyu. Ajiyu kanan ey ajin dakayu jusaun tey ganak dakayu an Abraham tey sey ibagak an dakayu, kaviilan Apudyus ey ambalinun da batu anna as ganak Abraham.
42003009	Sey jusa ey koon Apudyus an dakayu at mipani assey putow ey nadada'an ey mangabba asda kayu. At amin dasey kayu ey niippun ambaru as vungana at magabbada ya nasikuran.”
42003010	At inimus dasey tagu an John ey kananda, “Ngan sey koonni nu'?”
42003011	Summongbat as John ey kanana, “Dasey sinjudwa sey lumvunna atjunda sey kagwana asda niippun lumvunna, dasey awad kanuna, masapur ivillayana dasey niippun kanuna.”
42003012	Inggow vus dasey mansisingil as vuur ey umuy mampavunyag at kananda, “Apu Misturu, ngan pey sey koonni?”
42003013	Summongbat as John at kanana, “Ajiyu amdanan sey singilunyu nu aji sey ustu anggey ey vuur sey usa ey tagu.”
42003014	Inggow vus da ujum ey surdaju ey umuy mampavunyag at kananda vus an siya, “Dakani pey, ngan pey sey mabalin ey koonni?” At kanana vus, “Ajiyu ug-ugyatun da tagu ta ajida mapilitan ey mangatud as pilak an dakayu unnu ang-angwa gey la as basurda. Masapur ming-op kayu asda suwiljuyu.”
42003015	Gapu ta uullayun da tagu sey umaliyan sey impostan Apudyus ey manturey, kananda assey somsomokda, “Ey as John anna nin sey Cristu?”
42003016	Kon kanan John an jida, “Sa'un, danum anggey sey ivunyagku an dakayu, kon awad sey mipasani ey nangatu nu sa'un tey urey sey manguggas assey kiddong sey sapatusna at ajiyak pun miivilang. Siya sey mamunyag an dakayu assey Ispiritun Apudyus ya apuy.
42003017	Mipani siya assey usa ey tagu ey inuugnana sey ligow ey mantopa assey ilik at dasey nabgasan dagupuna ta itarpunna assey arang kon dasey kipow, subguna jida assey apuy ey aji pun matmatuy.”
42003018	Nantokotokon sey kingwan John ey nangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag asda tagu ya tinugutugunna jida ta ambarbaliwda.
42003019	Oni pun, iningoran John as Gubernador Herod gapu assey namrosana an Herodias ey asawan sunudna ey Philip ya dasey ujum ey kingwakingwana ey lawingan.
42003020	Kon iyyam-amud at avus Herod ey nangwa as lawingan tey impabarudna as John.
42003021	Anna pun ey navunyagan amin da tagu, usa as Jesus an jida ey navunyagan. Anna pun ey malluwaru, maggey nabkatan ad langit
42003022	at lummagud sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey anungna karapati at inumpa an siya ya inggow sey ginga ey nadngor ey narpu ad langit ey kanana, “Sika sey pipiuk ey anakku. Sika anggey sey ming-opak.”
42003023	Assey nanginsaradan Jesus ey nantudtuju, mapattapatta ey ummuy as turumpuru sey tawunna. At assey kasomsomkan da tagu, siya sey anak Joseph. At as Joseph sana, anak Heli
42003024	ey anak Matat. As Matat, anak Levi ey anak Melki ey anak vus Jannai ey anak Joseph.
42003025	Ya as Joseph, anak Matatias ey anak Amos. As Amos, anak Nahum ey anak Esli ey anak Naggai.
42003026	As Naggai, anak Maat ey anak Matatias ey anak Semein ey anak Josech ey anak Joda.
42003027	As Joda, anak Joanan ey anak Rhesa ey anak Zerubbabel ey anak Shealtiel ey anak Neri.
42003028	As Neri, anak Melki ey anak Addi ey anak Cosam ey anak Elmadam ey anak Er.
42003029	As Er, anak Joshua ey anak Eliezer ey anak Jorim ey anak Matat ey anak Levi.
42003030	As Levi, anak Simeon ey anak Judah ey anak Joseph ey anak Jonam ey anak Eliakim.
42003031	As Eliakim, anak Melea ey anak Menna ey anak Mattata ey anak Nathan ey anak David.
42003032	As David, anak Jesse ey anak Obed ey anak Boaz ey anak Salmon ey anak Nason.
42003033	As Nason, anak Amminadab ey anak Admin ey anak Armi ey anak Hesron ey anak Perez ey anak Judah.
42003034	As Judah, anak Jacob ey anak Isaac ey anak Abraham ey anak Tera ey anak Nahor.
42003035	As Nahor, anak Serug ey anak Reu ey anak Peleg ey anak Eber ey anak Shela.
42003036	As Shela, anak Kainan ey anak Arfaxad ey anak Sem ey anak Noah ey anak Lamech.
42003037	As Lamech, anak Methusela ey anak Enoch ey anak Jared ey anak Mahalaleel ey anak Kenan.
42003038	As Kenan, anak Enos ey anak Seth. As Seth, anak Adam ey anak Apudyus.
42004001	Navunyagan pun as Jesus ey ummayow assey dawwang ad Jordan, inuugnan sey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey somsomokna. At inturung sey Ispiritun Apudyus siya assey danak ey niippun ummili.
42004002	At ininggow siji assey opatpuru ey ag-agow ey apporon Satanas awiawisun. Aji pun as Jesus nangnangan asda jiyuy ey ag-agow at amud sey inuratna.
42004003	Kanan Satanas an siya ey nangawis, “Gapu ta anak sika an Apudyus, ibagam assey batu anna ta ambalin as makan.”
42004004	Kon kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus, kanana, ‘Aji pun umaney sey makan as ikatagun sey tagu.’”
42004005	Naas pun jiyuy, intagadan Satanas siya assey ataknang ey lugar at aji pun nasinkimad, impiilana dasey amin ey kiiliili assey luvung.
42004006	At kanan Satanas an Jesus, “Atjuk an sika sey amin ey pannakabalinda ya dasey kinabaknangda tey amin da nauy at naatudda an sa'un at mabalinku atjun assey piuk ey mangatdanan.
42004007	Nu mandayowka an sa'un, angkuwam amin da nauy.”
42004008	Kon summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus, kanana, ‘As Apudyus ey Apuyu sey dayawunyu ya siya anggey sey manserviyanyu!’”
42004009	Oni pun, inniyuy Satanas as Jesus ad Jerusalem asina at ipasikad assey kataknangan ey tabvungan sey Tempél at kanana, “Gapu ta anak sika an Apudyus, lumayugka,
42004010	tey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Baarun Apudyus dasey enjelna ey amuut an sika
42004011	ya tapayaunda sika ta aji mid-um sey sikim asda batu.’”
42004012	Kon summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Awad vus sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Ajiyu padpadasun as Apudyus ey Apuyu.’”
42004013	Naas pun Satanas kingwa sey amin ey mabalinna koon ey mangawis an Jesus, tineynana siya inggana as awad vus wayana.
42004014	Assey nampuuli as Jesus ad Galili, aawwad an siya sey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus ya niwarawag asda amin ey vubruy ad Galili sey damag miipanggop an siya.
42004015	At insaradna ey mantudtuju asda sinagog ey aammungan da Jews at losanda siya indayow.
42004016	Ummuy pun as Jesus ad Nazareth ey jummakorana, ummuy assey sinagog tey siya sey apporona kookoon nu jumatong sey ag-agow ey iillongan da Jews at summikad ey mamasa assey Gingan Apudyus.
42004017	Innatjunda an siya sey nalulukut ey libnu ey ingkur-it profet Isaiah. Inukyadna sey nalulukut ey libnu at indasana sey nikur-itan sey kanana ey,
42004018	“Awad an sa'un sey Ispiritun Apudyus tey jinutukana sa'un ey umuy mangimbaga asda lumawa assey Ambaru ey Damag. Imbaarna sa'un ey mangiwwarawag asda barud ey mawayaanda ya mangagas asda vurag ta makailada. Imbaarna vus sa'un ta mawayaanda assey tongtong-agda.
42004019	Ya ipaagammuk ey jummatong sey timpu ey manginsarakanan Apudyus asda taguna.”
42004020	Naas pun Jesus vinasa, nilukutna sey libnu asina at ipuuli assey nangatud an siya asi at tumukju. At losan da tagu siya intotollong.
42004021	At kanana an jida, “Sey nauy ey impakur-it Apudyus assey kar-argow ey nibasa ey jingngoryu, anna ey tummuttuwa.”
42004022	At da amin ey nangngor asda ambabaru ey imbagana at allaylayadda ya nasdaowda ya kananda vus, “Yangey dokon siya sey anak da Joseph?”
42004023	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Niippun juwajuwana ey ibagayu an sa'un sey panpani anna ey kanana, ‘Doctor, agasam vus pigey sey long-agnu,’ ey sey piuna kanan, ‘Koom atyén assey mismu ey vubruynu sey nakaskasdaow ey jingngorni ey kingwam ad Capernaum.’”
42004024	Inturuy Jesus ey nangimbaga an jida ey kanana, “Assey katuttuwaan, niippun profet as mavigvig assey mismu ey ilina.
42004025	Kon somsomkonyu sey nakwa assey timpun profet Elijah assey aji pun ummud-udan assey turu ya kagugwa ey tawun ey nakwaan sey amud ey urat assey amin ey ili. Tuttuwa ey adjuwan dasey baru ad Israel anna assey timpu saji ey angkasapuran as turung
42004026	kon ajin pun Apudyus imbaar as Elijah ey umuy manurung as urey usa an jida nu aji imbaarna as Elijah ey ummuy nanurung assey usa ey baru ad Zarefat assey vubruy da Gentil ad Sidon.
42004027	Anungna vus sey nakwa assey timpun profet Elisha ey amud vus dasey tagu ad Israel anna ey masakit as ngupungup kon niippun usa an jida as inagasana nu aji anggey as Naaman ey iSyria ey dakumpun as Jews.”
42004028	Jingngor pun dasey tagu assey sinagog sey inugud Jesus saji, amud sey putukda.
42004029	Kingwada pun, lummibbatda ey nangillabsut an Jesus at linsinda assey vubruy saji asida at iyuy assey tuktuk sey vilig ey nipatakjugan sey vubruyda ta umuyda otdagun assey dopras.
42004030	Kon nambaliwit as Jesus at ummayow ey nanguy assey gawan da tagu.
42004031	Assey timpu saji, nan-usug as Jesus ey ummuy ad Capernaum ey usa ey vubruy assey provinsiyan sey Galili ey mantudtujuwana asda tagu assey ag-agow ey iillongan.
42004032	At nasdaowda assey nangokoona ey nantudtuju tey sey koona ey guminga at kama as gingan sey awad tureyna.
42004033	Assey sinagog ey nantudtujuwana, inggow sey laraki ey nalun-ugan as Jimunyu. Indangsorna ey nangkulis ey kanana,
42004034	“Wooow! Jesus ey iNazareth, ngan sey viyangnu an dakani? Ey ummalika ta dadailum dakani? Ag-aggammuk sika! Sika sey Nasantuwan ey Anak Apudyus!”
42004035	Kon minandaran Jesus sey jimunyu ey kanana, “Guminokka! Ingkan, teynam sey tagu sanat.” Nilikwad jimunyu sey tagu saji assey sinagung dasey tagu asina at teynan ey ajina pun vinigadan.
42004036	Nasdaow da tagu losan at kananda ey an-in-innimus, “Ngey karasin nauy ey ginga? Awad amin tureyna ya pannakabalinna ey amaryow asda jimunyu!”
42004037	At nanjinjinamag sey miipanggop an siya assey amin ey ili saji.
42004038	Lummogsad pun as Jesus assey sinagog, ummuy assey vuruy da Simon. Jummatong pun, imbagada an siya ey masakit as katugangan Simon ey amud sey atungna at jinawatda ta turungana.
42004039	Ummadani as Jesus at inisjungana siya assey uvugna at pinaryowna sey sakit ta makaan. At nakaan sey sakitna at vummangun ey dagus ey nangkopya as kanunda.
42004040	Anna pun ey magayud, dasey tagu ey awad jugana as masakit ey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey karasin sey sakit at inniyuyda an Jesus. Impateyna sey imana assey usa ya usa an jida at kinaanna dasey amin ey sakitda.
42004041	At ummayow da jimunyu ey nallun-ug asda tagu. Kon anna pun ey ummayowda, sivuvuggada ey kananda, “Sika sey Anak Apudyus!” Kon iningoran Jesus jida ta iginokda ey guminga tey agammuda ey siya sey Cristu.
42004042	Anna pun ey wikkiwikkis, tineynan Jesus sey vubruy saji at ummuy assey niippun katagtaguwan. Kingwan pun dasey tagu, ummuyda inanap. Indasanda pun, kinabagbagada siya ta aji atyén umayow assey vubruyda saji.
42004043	Kon kanana an jida, “Kasapuran ey inyak iwarawag sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus tey nait sey lapun sey namaarana an sa'un.”
42004044	At ummuy nantudtuju asda amin ey sinagog ad Judea
42005001	Assey usa ey ag-agow assey inggawan Jesus assey igid sey beybey ad Gennesaret, nilikub dasey amud ey tagu tey piunda ey mandongor assey Gingan Apudyus.
42005002	At as jiyuy, innilan Jesus sey juwa ey bangka assey igid sey beybey ey tineynan da ummuy nanavukur tey ummuyda yén inurasan da tavukurda.
42005003	At summakey assey usa ey bangka asina at ibaga an Simon ey singkuwa ta itukyudna as akit assey iggawan sey danum asi at tumukju ey mantudtuju asda tagu.
42005004	Naas pun nantudtuju, kanana an Simon, “Iyuyyu sey bangka assey adarum ey danum ya anavukur kayu at awad maarayu.”
42005005	Summongbat as Simon ey kanana, “Nampatpatnag kani ey nanavukur assey lavi Apu kon niippun innarani, kon nu nait sey kanam, inyak ikasin.”
42005006	Impitlakda pun sey tavukur, adjuwan sey nakna ey tigangey mavissey sey tavukurda.
42005007	At inayaganda dasey vurunda ey ininggow assey usa ey bangka ta tumurungda. At pinnuda sey juwa ey bangka ey tigangeyda manallum assey dagsun sey aggajiw.
42005008	Innilan pun Simon sey nakwa saji, nallikkadang assey sinagung Jesus ey kanana, “Ajika umadani an sa'un Apu tey amud sey basurku.”
42005009	Siyana sey kanan Peter tey nasdaowda assey kaajun sey aggajiw ey innarada.
42005010	Nasdaow vus da juwa ey anak Zebedee ey da James an John ey vurun Simon. Kon kanan Jesus an Simon, “Ajika umugyat tey misarad assey sana, dakumpun ogon as manavukur sey koom nu aji sey man-awis as tagu ey umunud an sa'un.”
42005011	Intakdangda pun dasey bangka, tineynanda amin at ummunudda an siya.
42005012	Assey usa ey ag-agow ey ininggow as Jesus assey usa ey vubruy, inggow sey usa ey laraki ey nangupungup ey ummadani an siya. Nallukvub assey sinagung Jesus ey nampangpangaasi ey kanana, “Apu, agammuk ey kaviilam ey mangaan assey sakitku anna nu pium.”
42005013	Inugnan Jesus siya ey kanana, “Piuk! Ey sana vumaruka!” At nakaan ey dagus sey sakitna.
42005014	Vinilin Jesus siya ey kanana, “Ajim maggey ibagbaga assey urey ngadanna ey tagu kon ingka ampiila an paji ta ilana ey nakaan sey sakitnu. Asika at mangatud as midatun tey siya sey imvilin Moses ta awad mangigammuwan dasey amin ey tagu ey vummaru sey long-agnu.”
42005015	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji sey imvilin Jesus, ummam-amud at avus ey nanjinamag sey miipanggop an Jesus. At amud dasey tagu ey ummuy nandongor an siya anda ummuy nampaagas asda sakitda.
42005016	Kon kanayun as Jesus ey umuy assey lugar ey niippun katagtaguwan ey umuy malluwaru.
42005017	Assey usa ey ag-agow ey mantudtuju as Jesus, inggow da angkatukju ey Farisis ya da misturun sey lintog Apudyus ey narpu asda vubvubruy ad Galili, Judea ya ad Jerusalem. Awad an siya sey pannakabalin Apudyus ey mangaan asda sakit.
42005018	At inggow dasey tagu ey nangiyyuy assey usa ey nattubangil ey inattatuyda ey inuumvug assey obokna. Piunda atyén ey isakey assey iggawan Jesus,
42005019	kon gapu assey amud ey tagu, niippun agammuda ey manginsakey. Kingwada pun, ummuyda assey tabvungan at inokkabda sey dopag sey vuruy at inuyudda sey nattubangil assey batug sey sinagung Jesus.
42005020	Innilan pun Jesus sey kinadogot sey pammatida an siya, kanana assey nattubangil, “Napakawan dasey basurnu, sika ey sunud.”
42005021	Jingngor pun dasey misturun sey lintog ya dasey Farisis sey imbagana saji, singungujuda ey kananda, “Ngan nin sey an-anmok sey tagu anna assey long-agna? Miivusur mit an Apudyus sey ibagabagana anna tey as Apudyus anggey sey awad karobbongana ey amakawan asda basur.”
42005022	Kon agammun Jesus sey awad assey somsommokda at kanana an jida, “Pa kayu lawa mansommosommok as kanaʼsnaʼt?
42005023	Allasu mit sey mangimbag-an ey ‘Napakawan sey basurnu,’ nu sey mangimbaga ey ‘Vumangunka ta manaranka.’
42005024	Kon nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ipiilak an dakayu ey sey Anak ji Tagu at awad sey karobbongana assey luta anna ey mamakawan asda basur.” At kanana assey nattubangil, “Ibagak an sika ta vumangunka ya lukutum sey oboknu ta ingkan.”
42005025	At tummakjug sey nattubangil assey sinagung da amin ey tagu at innarana sey obokna at ummayow ey mandaydayow an Apudyus.
42005026	Amud sey nasdaawan dasey amin ey inggowʼsji at jinayowda as Apudyus ey kananda, “Anni! Atoman akey nauy ey nakaskasdaow ey innila taku anna assey sana!”
42005027	Naas pun jiyuy, ummayow as Jesus at innilana sey usa ey mansisingil as vuur ey angngadan as Levi ey tutukju assey opisinana. At kanan Jesus an siya, “Umalika ta umunudka an sa'un.”
42005028	Lummibbat as Levi at tineynana sey kangamin at ummunud an Jesus.
42005029	Oni pun, ummuy as Jesus assey vuruy da Levi at impartiyan Levi siya as adjuwan ey mangimpiila assey dayowna an siya. Ya ininggow vus siji dasey adjuwan ey mansisingil as vuur ya da ujum ey mangili ey ummuy nikaam-ammung assey vuruy da Levi.
42005030	Kon innilan pun da ujum ey Farisis ya dasey vurunda ey misturun sey Lintog, jinumsikda at kananda asda pasurut Jesus, “Pakayu maggey mikauvung ya mikin-um asda mansisingil as vuur anda ujum ey ambasbasur ey tagu?”
42005031	Kon as Jesus sey nanongbat at kanana ey nangimpani, “Dasey niippun sakitna, ajida pun kasapuran sey Doctor tey sey mansapur at dasey awad sakitna.
42005032	Ajiyak pun as ummali ey umuy mangimbaga asda nalintog ey tagu ta ambabawida tey sey ummaliyak ta inyak ayagan dasey ambasbasur ta ambabawida.”
42005033	Inggow da ujum ey tagu ey kananda an Jesus, “Kanayun ey allangan ya malluwaru dasey pasurut John kama vus asda pasurut dasey Farisis. Natkonan dasey pasurutnu anna ey pasig mangamangan anda uminuinum?”
42005034	Summongbat as Jesus ey nampani at kanana, “Nu awad angkasar, ey mabalin pun lawa aji mangan dasey naamung ey vurun sey mangkasar? Manganda mit.
42005035	Kon nu as daan ey ag-agow, milayow an jida sey nangkasar at siyaji sey mallangananda.”
42005036	Kanan vus Jesus ey nampani, “Niippun tagu as mamissey assey baru ey sinnun ya intukupna assey naropok ey lumvun tey nu koonaji, keynga sey baru ey sinnun ey vinisseyna ya sey usa, aji pun mitagop assey naropok ey nitukupana.
42005037	Anungna vus ey niippun mangimvilung as baru ey bayas assey judaan ey gaddang ey ammutu tey nu kanaʼsji, vutakun sey baru ey bayas sey ammutu at keynga sey bayas ey miwasit ya sey gaddang ey ammutu.
42005038	Tey sey baru ey bayas at masapur ey mivilung assey barbaru ey gaddang ey ammutu.
42005039	Usa pey, sey tagu ey nangimpiingsa assey judaan ey bayas, sumanga ey uminum assey barbaru ey bayas tey kanana, ‘Ampip-iya pigey sey judaan ey bayas.’”
42006001	Usa pun ey Sabaju ey iillongan dasey Jews, nanguy da Jesus assey u'uma ey naoskan assey paguyda ey wheat. Kingwan pun dasey pasurutna, kummutlungda as kutimanda.
42006002	At kanan da ujum ey Farisis an Jesus, “Ngey payu maggey koon nait? Misanga mit assey lintog taku nait as koon assey ag-agow ey iillongan.”
42006003	Sinongbatan Jesus jida ey kanana, “Ey ajiyu pun vinasa sey kingwan David ya dasey vurunna assey nuuratanda?
42006004	Summakey assey vuruy Apudyus at innarana sey tinapey ey nidatun an Apudyus ey isangan sey lintog as kanun dasey dakumpun as paji. Kon kinanna asina at vus atdan dasey vurunna.”
42006005	Asin at Jesus kanan an jida, “Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu sey awad karobbongana ey mangimbaga nu ngan sey ustu as makwa assey ag-agow ey Sabaju.”
42006006	Usa pun vus ey ag-agow ey iillongan, summakey as Jesus assey sinagog ey mantudtuju. As jiyuy, inggow sey usa ey laraki ey niis-is sey dawanan ey imana.
42006007	Ya inggow vus dasey mimisturun sey Lintog ya da ujum ey Farisis ey siisiimunda as Jesus nu man-agas avus assey ag-agow ey iillongan ta awad allapuwanda ey mangindarum an siya.
42006008	Kon urey nu aaggammun Jesus sey awad assey somsomokda, imbagana assey laraki ta umuy tumakjug assey sinagung da amin ey tagu. Tummakjug pun sey laraki saji,
42006009	inimus Jesus asda tagu ey kanana, “Imusuk uda an dakayu nu ngan sey iparuvus sey lintog ey koon taku assey Ag-agow ey iillongan. Ey mangwa taku as ambaru unnu mangwa as lawingan? Ey isarakan taku sey vurun taku unnu gongatun taku jida?”
42006010	Nilangrangana pun jida, kanana assey inggow laraki, “Uyajum sey imam.” Inuyadna pun, vummaru ya niyisu assey viik ey imana.
42006011	Kon amud sey sangan da Farisis anda mimisturun sey Lintog at nan-uugudda nu ngan sey mabalinda ey koon an Jesus.
42006012	Assey timpu saji, nanagada as Jesus assey tagudtud at illablavina ey nalluwaru an Apudyus.
42006013	Assey mavigat, inayagana dasey amin ey pasurutna at nampili as nasawaran as juwa ey inawagana as aposelna.
42006014	Sey usa asda napili at as Simon ey nginadanana as Peter ya as sunudna ey Andrew asi at da James an John, da Philip an Bartholomew,
42006015	da Matthew an Thomas, as James ey anak Alphaeus, as Simon ey kananda ey mansokar tey itatakjugna sey ilina,
42006016	as Judas ey anak James ya asi at as Judas Escariot ey nalliput an siya assey umanungus.
42006017	Nan-usug pun da Jesus ya dasey aposelna, nipanadda assey arwaarwa ey tanap at nadagup dasey adjuwan ey pasurutna ya amud ey tagu ey narpuʼd Judea, ad Jerusalem ya asda vubruy assey igid sey beybey ad Tyre ya Sidon.
42006018	Ummuyda as jiyuy ta mandongorda asda ibagan Jesus ya mampaagas asda sakitda. Ummuy vus dasey tinongtong-ag jimunyu at vummaruda.
42006019	At amin dasey ummuy ey tagu siji at pinadasda ey ummuy nandok an Jesus tey awad sey pannakabalinna ey mangaan asda amin ey sakit.
42006020	Oni pun, nansinagung as Jesus as dasey pasurutna at kanana: “Nagasat kayu, dakayu ey kapus, tey mijuga kayu assey Turey Apudyus.
42006021	Nagasat kayu, dakayu ey angkurkurang as makan assey sana tey jumatong sey mapsuganyu. Nagasat kayu, dakayu ey apporow an-ivil gapu asda lawingan ey makmakwa tey jumatong sey timpu ey umamang kayu.
42006022	Nagasat kayu nu guraun dakayu asda tagu ya laksigun dakayu ya vibviinun dakayu ya kananda ey lawingan kayu gapu assey pammatiyu an sa'un, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu.
42006023	Nagasat kayu ya antattaud kayu assey layadyu nu kanaʼsna sey makwa an dakayu tey dokor sey gun-gunayu ad langit, tey nauy vus sey kingwan dasey dakdakorda asda profet assey kar-argow.
42006024	Kon kadagdagu kayu, dakayu ey babaknang tey assey luta anggey anna sey allam-ayanyu!
42006025	Kadagdagu kayu ey mamapsug assey sana tey jumatong sey muuratanyu. Kadagdagu kayu dakayu ey mayokyoyokyok assey sana tey jumatong sey manomdomanyu ya man-ivilanyu.
42006026	Kadagdagu kayu nu idayow dakayu as dasey amin ey tagu assey sana tey kanaʼsna vus sey kingwan dasey dakdakorda ey nangindayow as dasey dakumpun as ustu ey profet assey kar-argow.”
42006027	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Kon sey ibagak an dakayu ey andodongngor an sa'un, masapur ipiilayu sey layadyu as dasey vumusur ya angwa kayu as ambaru asda sumanga an dakayu.
42006028	Kudawunyu an Apudyus ta kadaguwana dasey angarawag an dakayu ya iluwaruwanyu vus dasey mangillumrum an dakayu.
42006029	Nu awad anappik assey apingyu, ipatappikyu vus sey viikna ya nu awad mangara assey jaketyu, amorna ey arana vus sey lumvunyu.
42006030	Atdanyu da angkudow an dakayu ya nu awad angara asda usaryu, amorna, urey ajida ipuuli.
42006031	Koonyu asda vurunyu sey piunyu ey koonda an dakayu.
42006032	“Nu siya anggeyʼs piunyu dasey maryad an dakayu, ey awad pun lawa maarayu? Tey urey vus dasey lawingan ey tagu at pipiunda vus dasey maryad an jida.
42006033	Nu mangwa kayu anggey as ambaru asda tagu ey nangwa as ambaru an dakayu, ey awad pun lawa maganabyu? Tey urey vus da lawingan ey tagu at koonda vus da nait.
42006034	Nu siya anggeyʼs pavurudanyu dasey agammuyu ey awad mangrosna assey vurujunda, ey awad pun lawa maganabyu? Urey vus dasey lawingan ey tagu at pavurudanda vus dasey vurunda ey lawingan tey agammuda ey orsanda sey vurujunda.
42006035	Kon an dakayu ey, masapur ipiilayu sey layadyu asda vumusur an dakayu ya koonyu sey ambaru an jida. Pavurudanyu sey amvurud an dakayu ey urey nu niippun namnamaunyu as ipuulida. Tey nu siyaji sey koonyu, dokor sey maarayu ya miivilang kayu as anak sey kangatuwan ey Apudyus. Tey as Apudyus, kadaguwana dasey niippun agammuna ey ampasaramat ya urey as dasey lawingan ey tagu.
42006036	Masapur ey kumakaddagu kayu ey anungna an Amayu ey Apudyus ey kumakaddagu.”
42006037	“Ajiyu ambalinun sey long-agyu as uwis ey mangoddong asda ujum ey tagu ta ajin vus Apudyus dakayu uwisun ya goddongan. Pakawanunyu dasey vurunyu ta pakawanun vus Apudyus dakayu.
42006038	Angatud kayu asda vurunyu at atdan vus Apudyus dakayu. Tey sey kaajun sey atjunyu, siya vus sey kaajun sey atjun Apudyus an dakayu. Kon sey koon Apudyus at iwagawagna ta masotsot asina at kasin jug-an ta masawar sey atjuna an dakayu.”
42006039	Nampani vus as Jesus ey kanana, “Aji pun mabalin ey kiwijun sey vurag sey anungna ey vurag tey nu siyaji sey makwa, siguraju ey mootdagda assey itpang.
42006040	Niippun vus uswila as nangatngatu nu sey misturuna, kon nu agammuwuna sey amin ey nitudtuju an siya, miyisu siya assey misturuna.”
42006041	Kasin vus as Jesus nampani ey kanana, “Ngey pa ampatak sey angiilayu assey ban-it ey vurat assey atan sey vurunyu kon ajiyu pun madlow sey singgupung ey vurat assey atayu?
42006042	Ngan annuna ey kanam assey vurunnu, ‘Ayu ta kaanuk sey vurat annat assey atam,’ kon ajim pun miila sey singgupung ey vurat assey atam? An sika ey aginsosomkan, kaanum yén sey singgupung ey vurat assey atam ta pumatak sey ilam asim at mabalin ey kaanun sey vurat sey vurunnu.”
