42006043	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Aji pun mamunga sey ambaru ey kayu as lawingan ya sey lawingan ey kayu at aji pun vus mamunga as ambaru.
42006044	Tey sey vungan sey kayu sey angimmatunan nu ngadanna ey kayu. Tey aji pun mamunga sey tarurung as atis unnu sey gammusa as greps.
42006045	Kanaʼsna vus an jitaku ey tagu tey sey ambaru ey tagu, ambaru vus sey lumuswa ey koona tey ambaru sey iniinggow assey somsomokna. Kon sey lawingan ey tagu, lawingan vus sey lumuswa ey koona tey jiyuy vus sey iniinggow assey somsomokna. Tey sey tagu, siya igingana sey awad assey somsomokna.”
42006046	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ngey payu lawa sa'un awagan as Apuyu, nu ajiyu patiyun sey ibagak?
42006047	Sey tagu ey umunud an sa'un ya dongrona sey ibagak, at annaya sey mipaniyana.
42006048	Mipani siya assey tagu ey nampatakjug as vuruyna ey ingkurubna sey turkud assey usun sey batu. Jumminakor pun sey dawwang, indangkasna sey vuruy saji kon aji pun nabakas tey gadtok pigey ey ampagdot sey nipon-adana.
42006049	Kon sey tagu ey nandongor asda imbagak ya ajina pun patiyun, mipani assey tagu ey nampatakjug as vuruyna assey usun sey gallis. Jumminakor pun, indangkasna sey vuruy saji at nikur-ub ey niwakas.”
42007001	Naas pun Jesus intudtuju da nauy asda tagu, ummayow ey nampuuli ad Capernaum.
42007002	Inggow siji sey usa ey Kapitan da surdaju ey iRoman. Inggow sey alipanna ey masakit ya tigangey matuy kon amud sey layadna assey alipanna.
42007003	Jingngor pun sey Kapitan sey miipanggop an Jesus, vinaarna da ujum ey pangat da Jews ta umuyda ayagan as Jesus ta kaanuna sey sakit sey alipanna.
42007004	Ummuyda an Jesus at nampangpangaasida ey kananda, “Ambaru ey tagu nauy at lobbongna ey turungam
42007005	tey pipiuna losan jitaku ey Jews ya nampakwa vus as sinagog taku.”
42007006	Imbagada pun jiyuy, nikuuy as Jesus an jida. Anna pun ey tigangeyda jumatong assey vuruy sey Kapitan, inabotda at avus da sabali ey tagu ey vinaarna ey umuy mangimbaga an Jesus ey kananda, “Apu, urey pey la kanu ajika umali ta ajim ayongon tey niippun kanu karobbongana ey mammangili an sika
42007007	Ya urey kanu sey umuyna mangabtan an sika at niippun karobbongana. At siya sey urey pey lawa kanu igingam at makaan sey sakit sey alipan saji.
42007008	Tey sey kanana, urey vus kanu siya at agammuna sey miipanggop assey kasasaad sey awad saadna tey siya ey Kapitan, awad avus sey nangatngatu nu siya ey mangimbagabaga assey koona at masapur ey tongparuna. Kon awad vus dasey surdajuna ey dongronda vus sey ibagana, tey nu kanana assey usa, ‘Umalika,’ at umali, nu kanana ey ‘ingka’ at umuy. At kama vus assey alipanna nu kanana ey koom nauy at koona.”
42007009	Nasdaow as Jesus assey jingngornaji at nambaliwit asda tagu ey umunnuunnud an siya at kanana, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey niippun atgey innilak as anungna nauy ey dogot sey pammati assey amin ey vubruy ad Israel.”
42007010	Nampuuli pun dasey vinaar sey Kapitan, indasanda sey alipan ey vummaru.
42007011	Naas pun nauy, ummuy as Jesus assey usa ey munisipyu ey kananda ey Nain at nivurun vus dasey pasurutna ya da adjuwan ey tagu an siya.
42007012	Anna pun ey umdasda assey pudayan, inabotna da umuy allavun. Sey natuy sana at sa'an anggey ey anak sey baru ya adjuwan da tagu assey vubruy saji ey ummuy nikalavun.
42007013	Urey as Jesus assey nangil-ana assey baru at amud sey daguna at kanana an siya, “Ina, iginoknu ey man-ivil.”
42007014	Ummadani as Jesus assey vulig ey nangimpauvuganda assey natuy at inagpadana at insikad da nangimvulig. At kanan Jesus, “Vumangunka anak!”
42007015	At maggey tummukju sey natuy saji ya gumminga. At kanan Jesus assey baru, “Anna sey anaknu.”
42007016	At nikuugyat da amin ey tagu ey nangila at jinaydayowda as Apudyus ey kananda, “Anna ey lummuswa an jitaku sey nangatu ey Profet. Anna as Apudyus ey manginsarakan asda taguna.”
42007017	At nanjinjinamag sey kingwan Jesus sana assey amin ey vubruy ad Judea ya urey asda nampaliwus ey ili.
42007018	Ummuy dasey pasurut John assey baballudan at imbagada an siya dasey amin ey nakwanakwa.
42007019	Kingwan pun John, impaayagna dasey juwa ey pasurutna at vinaarna jida ta umuyda imusun assey Apu nu siya sey impostan Apudyus ey umali unnu awad pey dallu muulley ey umali.
42007020	Ummuyda pun assey iggawan Jesus, kananda, “Vinaar dakani an John ey Amvuvunyag ta ingkani imusun an sika nu sika sey niposta ey umali unnu awadji muuulley as ujum.”
42007021	Jummatong pun dasey nibaar, niyaspur ey adjuwan da kinaan Jesus ey nantokotokon ey sakit da masakit ya pinaryowna da jimunyu ey nilun-ug asda tagu anda nivukat sey atan da nabvurag.
42007022	At kanan Jesus as dasey vinaar John, “Ampuuli kayu an John ta ibagayu dasey innilayu ya jingngoryu. Tey dasey nabvurag at makailada, dasey piley at makadaranda, dasey nangupungup at vummaruda, dasey torong at makadngorda, dasey natuy at ummulida ya niwarawag sey Ambaru ey Damag asda lumawa.
42007023	Ibagayu vus an John ey nagasat sey tagu ey aji pun anjuwajuwa an sa'un.”
42007024	Ummayow pun dasey vinaar John, imbagan Jesus asda tagu sey miipanggop an John, kanana, “Assey ingkayu nangil-an an John assey danak, ngan sey ninamnamayu ey ingkayu innila? Ey usa ey tagu ey miyanung assey gurun ey miid ajina midoposan nu angabvid? Dakumpun mit nin.
42007025	At nu dakumpun, ngan sey ingkayu innila nu'? Ey usa ey tagu ey nallulumvun asda angkangina ya naang-anggaan? Dakumpun mit vus tey dasey tagu ey nallumvun as juganji at naram-ey sey viyagda ya assey vuruy sey ari sey iggowda.
42007026	Ummuy kayu siji ey nangila assey usa ey profet, ey dokon? Tuttuwa ey usa siya ey profet kon assey katuttuwaan, sin-umamud sey kinangatuna nu sey profet.
42007027	Tey as John sey tummuttuwaan sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Awad sey baba'aruk ey ibaarku ey amangpangu nu sika ta umuyna isagana sey ayum.’”
42007028	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Tuttuwa sey ibagak anna an dakayu ey niippun niyanak assey luta anna as nangatngatu nu as John. Kon sey kababaan ey awad assey Turey Apudyus at nangatngatu nu as John.”
42007029	Jingngor amin da tagu sey imbagana ya am-amud dasey mansisingil as vuur at vinigvigda ey ustu sey kingwan Apudyus at siya sey nampavunyaganda an John.
42007030	Kon asda Farisis ya dasey mimisturun sey Lintog at sumangada ey mangunud assey piun Apudyus at ajida pun nampavunyag an John.
42007031	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ngan at sey mangimpaniyak asda tagu assey sana? Ngan sey miyisuwanda?
42007032	Mipanida asda anak ey man-ay-ayam assey pawey ey amvivinnugga asda vurunda ey kananda, ‘Nanganggangsa kani mit kon sumanga kayu ey manadok. Nanagimbaru kani vus ta kananni ey manomdom kayu kon sumanga kayu vus ey man-ivil!’
42007033	Kanaʼsna sey mipaniyanyu tey ummali pun as Amvuvunyag ey John ey nallangan ya aji pun ummin-inum as bayas, kananyu ey najimunyuwan siya!
42007034	Ummali pun vus sey Anak ji Tagu ey nikakan ya nikainum an dakayu, kananyu vus ey, ‘Ilanyu man sey tagu anna ya, marawot ya vu'ukan ya mivulluvullun asda tagu ey apporow mansisingil as vuur anda ambasubasur ey tagu.’
42007035	Urey nu kanaʼsna sey kananyu, miila dallu sey kinatuttuwan sey liing Apudyus assey katatagun dasey anakna ey mamati.”
42007036	Usa pun ey ag-agow inggow sey usa ey Farisis ey nangayag an Jesus ta umuyda mangan assey vuruyna. Ummuy as Jesus at nikauvung ey mangan.
42007037	Assey vubruy saji, inggow sey usa ey vubai ey amud sey kinarwing sey kaugudana. Jingngorna pun ey awad as Jesus ey mangan assey vuruy sey usa ey Farisis, ummuy ey nangintakin as sin-idjuru ey bangbangu ey amud sey nginana.
42007038	Summakey at tummakjug assey ujugan Jesus asi at man-ivil at apporow matidtidan sey sikin Jesus assey luwana ya pinunasana pey assey vuukna ya inummana ya asina at isiyat sey bangbangu assey sikin Jesus.
42007039	Innilan pun inggow Farisis ey nammangili an Jesus sey nakwa, kanana assey somsomokna, “Nu tuttuwa ey profet sey tagu anna, agammuna atyén sey kinatatagun sey vubai anna ey apporow mangugnan an siya! Agammuna atyén ey kaggissow sey kaviviyagna.”
42007040	Gumminga as Jesus assey Farisis at kanana, “Simon, awad sey ibagak an sika,” At kanan vus Simon, “Oon, ngadanji Apu Misturu?”
42007041	At nampani as Jesus ey kanana, “Inggow da juwa ey tagu ey nakautang as pilak assey usa ey ampupuutang. Sey usa, nakautang as limanggasut ya sey usa, limampuru sey inutangna.
42007042	Kon gapu ta ajida pun makabayad, imbagan sey ummutanganda ey urey ajida pun bayadan.” Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ngadanna asda juwa sana sey dokdokor sey layadna assey namuutang an jida?”
42007043	Summongbat as Simon ey kanana, “Siguraju in ey inggow dokdokor sey utangna.” “Tuttuwa sey imbagam.” kanan Jesus.
42007044	Asin at Jesus baliwitun sey vubai at kanana an Simon, “Sey inugudku at anungna sey vubai anna. Summakayak assey vuruynu kon ajiyak pun lawa innatdan as danum ey mangurasku assey sikik. Kon sey vubai anna, inurasana sey sikik assey luwana ya impunasna sey vuukna.
42007045	Ajim pun vus sa'un inumma ey namadatong ey siya sey nakopyaan taku. Kon an siya, mallugi assey jummatngak, ajina pun ipog-an ey mangummaumma as dasey sikik.
42007046	Ajim pun vus nilanaan sey vuukku, kon an siya, inamusna sey sikik as bangbangu.
42007047	At ibagak an sika ey sey amud ey layad ey impiilana an sa'un, siya sey mangimpiila ey napakawan sey amud ey basurna. Kon sey tagu ey akittan sey basurna ey napakawan, ak-akittan vus sey layad ey ipiilana.”
42007048	Asin at Jesus kanan assey vubai, “Napakawan dasey basurnu.”
42007049	At da inggow ujum ey ummuy nikakan, kananda assey somsomokda, “Ngadan gey sey kinatatagun nauy ey mamakawan asda basur ey?”
42007050	Kon kanan vus Jesus assey vubai, “Sey pammatim an sa'un at siya sey nanginsarakan an sika. Ingkan at, mapapanus ogon sey somsomoknu.”
42008001	Naas pun jiyuy, ummuy as Jesus asda kavubruvubruy ey nangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus. At nikuuy avus an siya dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna
42008002	ya da ujum ey vubai ey kinaan Jesus da sakitda ya namaryawana asda jimunyu ey nilun-ug an jida. Annaya dasey ngadan dasey vubai ey nivurun an Jesus; as Mary Magdalene ey namaryawan Jesus asda pitu ey jimunyu,
42008003	as Joanna ey asawan Jusa ey usa ey opisyar Herod ya as Susana ya dasey ujum ey adjuwan ey vubai ey apporow tummurung anda Jesus ey nangusar asda mismu ey laksunda.
42008004	Aji pun guminok da tagu ey andatodatong ey umuy an Jesus ey narpu asda nantokotokon ey vubruy. Anna pun ey nadagupda, nampani as Jesus ey kanana,
42008005	“Inggow sey usa ey tagu ey ummuy nawwagwag as vukar assey umana. Assey nangiwwagwagana, nibatug da ujum assey daran at nagusdanda ya innamin da titit kinan.
42008006	Ya da ujum ey vukar, nibatugda assey dopras ey ayyapit sey lutana. Tummuvuda kon sin-akitan at naranguda tey ammaggamagga.
42008007	Da ujum ey vukar nibatugda asda sissiit at nigisan da vukar dasey siit ey tummuvu at nasyung da mura.
42008008	Kon dasey ujum ey niwagwag, nibatugda assey ambaru ey luta at tummuvuda ey antataba ya adjuwan sey vungada.” Naas pun Jesus inugudji, kanana, “Naingaan kayu mit at ammaanyu sommosommokon sey jingngoryu.”
42008009	Inimus dasey pasurut Jesus nu ngan sey piun sey pinanina saji ey ugujun.
42008010	At kanan Jesus, “Dakayu sey nangatudan Apudyus assey pannakaawat ey mangigammu asda aji pun naagammuwan miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus. Kon asda ujum ey tagu, panpani anggey sey mibaga an jida ta urey nu itotollongda, ajida pun imatunan ya urey dodongronda, ajida pun maawatan.”
42008011	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Annaya sey piun sey pinanik ey ugujun. Sey vukar at siya sey Gingan Apudyus.
42008012	At dasey nibatug assey daran, miipani asda tagu ey nangngor assey Gingan Apudyus kon ummuy as Satanas at kinaanna asda somsomokda dasey nitudtuju ey jingngorda ta ajida mamati ya ajida miisarakan.
42008013	At dasey nibatug assey dopras, miipanida as dasey tagu ey nangngor assey Gingan Apudyus ya nallaylayadda ey nangngor ya pinatida. Kon niippun lummamutan sey jingngorda tey sin-akitan anggey sey namatiyanda tey jummatong pun sey padas assey viyag, nan-awidanda sey pammatida.
42008014	At dasey nibatug asda sissiit, da jiyuy da nandodongngor assey Gingan Apudyus kon gapu assey pangugda assey ikataguda assey luta ya asda layadda ey vumaknang anda ujum ey pipiun sey long-ag ey allamram-ayan, nasyung sey jingngorda at aji pun nanturuy sey vungada.
42008015	Kon dasey nibatug assey ambaru ey luta, miipanida asda nangngor assey Gingan Apudyus at tillonda ey namati ya sisimmokda sey jingngorda ya inturuturuyda ey mamati inggana as ambaru sey nambanagan sey Gingan Apudyus assey viyagda.”
42008016	Kasin nampani as Jesus ey kanana, “Niippun tagu as mangintug assey silow asina at la'uban unnu igga assey siruk sey kama nu aji ipatangna assey ambaru ey mipatngana ta masilawan dasey sumakey.
42008017	Tey niippun nitataru unnu ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey aji pun naagammuwan assey sana as aji maagammuwan ya mivutaktak assey daan ey ag-agow.
42008018	At ammaanyu dongron sey Gingan Apudyus tey sey tagu ey maawatana sey dongrona, majugjug-an sey agammuna kon sey tagu ey niippun maawatana, urey sey akit ey kanana ey maawatana at mamin makaan.”
42008019	Assey timpu saji, ummuy da inan Jesus ya dasey sunudna ey laraki assey iggawana kon niippun agammuda ey umadani tey amud pey tagu.
42008020	At inggow sey nangimbaga an Jesus ey kanana, “Anji as inam ya dasey sunudnu ey angkasikad as pawey ey piunda sika ilan.”
42008021	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Sey mivilang as inak ya sunudku at jida dasey mamangngor ya mangunud assey Gingan Apudyus.”
42008022	Usa pun ey ag-agow, kanan Jesus asda pasurutna, “Intaku ad jumang sey beybey anna.” At nambangkada ey ummuy.
42008023	Anna pun ey nalluluganda, nasuyup as Jesus. Oni pun, kinornatana ey nambali ey amud sey dangsor sey abvid ya jummanakkor dasey dalluyun at anna ey mapnu sey bangka as danum at kagguugyat as manallumda.
42008024	At kingwan pun da pasurut Jesus, vinangunda siya ey kananda, “Apu, Apu! Anna ey manallum taku!” Vummangun as Jesus at minandarana sey abvid ya sey dalluyun at summinok ya vummaru sey beybey.
42008025	Asin at Jesus kanan asda pasurutna, “Ey niippun pammatiyu an sa'un?” Kon amud sey ugyatda ya nasdaowda at an-iinnimusda ey kananda, “Ngan gey la sey katatagun sey tagu sana? Urey da bali anda dalluyun at dongronda sey ibagana!”
42008026	Inturuy da Jesus ey nangkomtang ingganaʼs inumdasda assey sakup sey Gerasa ey jujummangun sey Galili.
42008027	Anna pun ey lummawa as Jesus assey bangka, niyabot at avus sey usa ey laraki assey vubruy saji ey nalun-ugan as jimunyu. Nabayag ey ampoponnas ya aji pun inggow assey vuruy tey assey lalabvunan sey iinggawana.
42008028	Nanginkinnu ey tinongtong-ag dasey jimunyu siya, at urey nu ikurungda ya kawadanda sey imana anda sikina, dana da goston ya impatuddak pey sey jimunyu siya assey danak. Kon innilana pun as Jesus, nangkulis asi at mallukvub assey sinagung Jesus at kanana ey nangimvugga, “Sika Jesus ey Anak sey Kangatuwan ey Apudyus, ngey viyangnu an dakani? Ipangngaasim ta ajim sa'un jusaun!” Siyana sey imbagana tey minandaran Jesus sey jimunyu ta umayow assey tagu saji.
42008030	Inimus Jesus an siya ey kanana, “Ngan sey ngadannu?” At kanana, “Sa'un an Kalivulivu.” Siyana sey imbagana tey adjuwan sey jimunyu ey nilun-ug an siya.
42008031	At nampangpangaasida an Jesus ta ajina atyén ipuuy jida assey vitu ey niippun patinggan sey kaadarumna.
42008032	Assey adani an jida, inggow da adjuwan ey borok ey anggarab assey tagudtud. At nampangpangaasi da jimunyu ta umuyda milun-ug asda borok at pinaruvusan Jesus jida.
42008033	At tineynan dasey jimunyu sey laraki saji at ummuyda nilun-ug asda borok. Nallun-ugda pun gey asda borok, situtuddak da borok saji ey lummayug assey beybey at naminda nuuvur.
42008034	Innilan pun dasey amabantey asda borok sey nakwa saji, situtuddakda ey ummuy nangiwwarawag assey nakwa ya urey asda ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey lugar ey nipanadanda.
42008035	At ummuy da tagu innila sey nakwa saji. Inumdasda pun assey iggawan Jesus, indasanda sey inggow tagu ey tineynan da jimunyu ey tummutukju assey dor-ag Jesus ey nallumvun ya vummaru sey somsomokna at nikuugyat dasey tagu.
42008036	At dasey nangila nu ngan-annun sey nalun-ugan saji ey vummaru, kasinda inugud asda tagu sey nakwa.
42008037	Gapu assey ugyat dasey iGerasa, jinawatda an Jesus ta umayow assey vubruyda. At kasin nambangka da Jesus ey ummayow.
42008038	Sey laraki saji ey tineynan da jimunyu, nampangpangaasi ta umunud atyén kon insangan Jesus ey kanana,
42008039	“Ingkan assey vubruyyu ta ingka ipaagammu sey kingwan Apudyus an sika.” At ummayow ey miid ajina ummayan asda vubruy ey nangimpadamag assey kingwan Jesus an siya.
42008040	Nampuuli pun da Jesus, allaylayad da tagu ey namadatong an siya tey nabayag ey uullayunda.
42008041	Oni pun, jummatong sey usa ey mangimpapangat assey usa ey sinagog ey angngadan as Jairus. Nallikkadang assey sinagung Jesus ey ampangpangaasi ta umuy assey vuruyda
42008042	tey tigangey matuy sey sa'an ey anakna ey vubai ey antawun as nasawaran as juwa. Lummibbat pun as Jesus, an-il-illasi dasey amud ey tagu ey mid-um an siya.
42008043	Asda adjuwan ey tagu, inggow sey usa ey vubai ey andaradara as nasawaran as juwa ey tawun. Naamin sey laksunna ey apporowna ambayad asda Doctor kon niippun makaagas an siya.
42008044	Kingwana pun, ummadani assey ujugan Jesus asina at todkon sey gayadan sey lumvunna at dagus ey gumminok sey vumusvus ey darana.
42008045	At kanan Jesus, “Ngan sey nandok an sa'un?” Anna pun ey niippun mangimbaga, kanan Peter ey gumminga, “Apu, amud pey mit da tagu ey an-il-illasi ey mid-um an sika.”
42008046	Kon kanan Jesus, “Awad sey nandok an sa'un tey nagiknak ey awad sey pannakabalinku ey nuusar.”
42008047	Vinkon pun sey vubai saji ey anna ey maagammuwanda ey siya sey nangwa, amilpipilpil ey ummuy nallukvub assey sinagung Jesus. At assey sinagung dasey amud ey tagu, ibagana nu ngey pana lawa todkon sey lumvun Jesus ya sey gumminkan ey dagus sey giknauna.
42008048	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Anakku, sey pammatim sey nangaan assey sakitnu. Ingkan at tey napanus sey somsomoknu.”
42008049	Sissiya atgey ey gumingaginga as Jesus assey jummatong sey narpu assey vuruy sey masakit ey umuy mangimbaga an Jairus ey kanana, “Urey aji taku taktakun sey Apu tey natuy ogon sey anak saji.”
42008050	Jingngor pun Jesus, kanana an Jairus, “Ajika umugyat, pakasdorom at sey pammatim at vumaru sey anaknu.”
42008051	Jummatong pun da Jesus, insangana sey sumakayan da tagu. At anggey da Peter, John ya as James asi at sey ama ya inan sey natuy sey summakey.
42008052	Siiivil da amin ey tagu ey awad as jiyuy, kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Guminok kayu, aji kayu an-ivil tey sey anak anna at nasusuyup anggey, daan pun matuy.”
42008053	Inam-amangda at avus as Jesus tey agammuda ey natuy sey anak.
42008054	Kon inugnan Jesus sey iman sey anak at kanana, “Anakku Vumangunka, anak!”
42008055	At ummuli sey natuy saji at summikad ey dagus at imbagan Jesus ey pakananda.
42008056	Amud sey nasdaawan dasey ummanak kon tinugun Jesus jida ta ajida ug-uggujun asda ujum sey nakwa sana.
42009001	Usa pun ey ag-agow, inayagan Jesus dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna at innatjuna an jida sey pannakabalin ya karobbongan ey mamaryow asda jimunyu ya mangaan assey sakit da masakit.
42009002	Asina at baarun jida ey umuy mangiwwarawag miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus ya umuy mangaan assey sakit da masakit.
42009003	Tinugunna jida ey kanana, “Ingkayu. Aji kayu angintakin as urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt. Aji kayu ampasking anda mansurkud unnu mangintakin as makan anda pilak ya lumvun ey man-orsanyu.
42009004	Nu ngan ey sey vuruy ey sumakayanyu, iinggow kayuʼsji inggana as umayow kayu assey vubruy saji.
42009005	Kon nu awad vubruy as sumanga ey ammangili an dakayu, teynanyu sey vubruy saji ya nu umayow kayu, pagpagunyu sey tapuk assey sikiyu as angimpiila ey jusaun Apudyus jida.”
42009006	At lummibbat dasey aposelna ey ummuy nanursur asda kavubruvubruy ey ummuy nangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag ya ummuy nangaan assey sakit da masakit.
42009007	Assey timpu saji, jinamag Herod ey Gubernador ad Galili sey amin ey makwamakwa at nakalivussu sey somsomokna tey inggow da ujum ey kananda ey natagu kasin as John ey Amvuvunyag.
42009008	Kanan vus da ujum ey siyanaʼt as profet Elijah ey nampiila ya kanan vus da ujum ey awad nin profet assey kar-argow as kasin ummuli.
42009009	Kon as Herod, kanana assey somsomokna, “Impasiwatku mit as John kon ngan avus sey tagu sanat ey ibagabagada?” At mallugi siji, sommosommokona nu ngan annuna ey mangila an Jesus.
42009010	Nampuuli pun dasey aposel Jesus, inul-ullitda an siya dasey amin ey kingwada. At inayagan Jesus jida at ummuyda nantalin assey vubruy ad Bethsaida.
42009011	Kon jingngor pun da adjuwan ey tagu, inunudda siya. At inayagan Jesus jida at intudtujuna sey miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus ya kinaanna sey sakit dasey awad sakitna an jida.
42009012	Anna pun ey masjum, ummadani dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna at kananda an Jesus, “Paryawum da tagu anna ta umuyda asda adani ey vubruy anda u'uma ta umuyda an-ila as kanunda ya andag-usanda tey niippun mit vubruy sina.”
42009013	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Pakananyu in jida.” At kananda, “Yangey umaney sey lima ey tinapey ya juwa ey ikan as ipakanni? Ey sey kanam ingkani ngumina as kanun da amud ey tagu anna?”
42009014	(Sey vilang da laraki anggey ey awad siji at ummuy as limallivu.) Kon kanan Jesus asda pasurutna, “Patukjuwunyu jida as sillilimampuru sey usa ey grupu.”
42009015	Siyaji sey kingwan dasey pasurutna at pinatukjuda dasey tagu.
42009016	Asin at Jesus aran sey lima ey tinapey ya sey juwa ey aggajiw at nantangad ad langit ey ampasaramat an Apudyus asina at pitpit-ingun ya innatjuna asda pasurutna ta iwarasda asda tagu.
42009017	At namin nangan da tagu inggana as ning-opda. Naasda pun nangan, jinagup dasey pasurut Jesus sey vunada at nakoan sey nasawaran as juwa ey awit.
42009018	Usa pun ey ag-agow, tummanig as Jesus ey alluwaru. Ummadani an siya dasey pasurutna at inimusna an jida ey kanana, “Ngey kanan da tagu an sa'un?”
42009019	At kananda, “Kanan da ujum ey sika as John ey Amvuvunyag. Kanan vus da ujum ey sika as Elijah unnu usa asda profet assey kar-argow ey ummuli.”
42009020	Asin at Jesus imusun an jida ey kanana, “Dakayu pey? Ngan sey makananyu an sa'un?” Summongbat as Peter ey kanana, “Sika sey Cristu ey impostan Apudyus ey umali.”
42009021	At innip-ipsot pigey Jesus ey nanugun an jida ta ajida ibagbaga nauy assey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu.
42009022	Kanan vus Jesus ey gumminga, “Sey Anak ji Tagu at masapur ey lak-amuna sey amud ey tongtong-ag ya laksigun siya asda papangat da Jews ya dasey ap-apun da papaji ya dasey mimisturun sey Lintog. Ipagngatda kon umuli vus pigey assey mikatlu ey ag-agow.”
42009023	Kanan Jesus asda amin ey tagu, “Sey maryad ey ambalin as pasurutku, masapur ey man-awidana sey pipiun sey long-agna ya masapur inag-agow ey koona sey mipakwa assey usa ey pasurut urey nu mansigab. Nauy sey koon sey umunud an sa'un.
42009024	Tey sey tagu ey mangimpapangug assey viyagna, matuy dallu, kon sey tagu ey urey matuy gapu assey pammatina an sa'un, maatud an siya sey ambaru ey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
42009025	Ey awad nin maaran sey usa ey tagu nu angkuwana sey amin ey awad assey luta anna ya as oni ey, tinarakna sey viyagna ey majusa as ing-inggana?
42009026	Nu ikaviinyu ey maawagan as pasurutku ya ikaviinyu vus ey mangintakjug assey tudtujuk, ikaviinku vus dakayu, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu nu ampuuliyak ey siya sey sumilingak assey dayow Ama ey Apudyus ya dasey enjelna.
42009027	Ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa, awad da ujum an dakayu assey sana sey aji pun matuy inggana as ilanda sey Manturayan Apudyus.”
42009028	Ummayow pun sey usa ey juminggu mallugi assey nangimbagaan Jesus siji, inayagana da Peter, John ya as James at nanagadada assey tagudtud ey ummuy alluwaru.
42009029	Anna pun ey alluwaluwaru as Jesus, nambakra sey vusarna ya sumilisiling sey itak sey lumvunna.
42009030	Ya maggey nampiila dasey juwa ey laraki ey sumilisiling vus sey ilada ey mikabagbaga an Jesus. Jida da Moses an Elijah. Sey nan-uugudanda at sey umadani ey mipagngatan Jesus ad Jerusalem.
42009032	Kon as Peter ya dasey juwa ey vurunna, nasusuyupda. Vummangunda pun, innilada sey summilingan Jesus ya da juwa ey tagu ey nikatakjug an siya.
42009033	Anna pun ey tigangey umayow da juwa saji ey laraki, kanan Peter an Jesus, “Apu, ambaru ta anna takuʼsna. At angwa kani as turu ey bawi ta angkuwam sey usa, an Moses sey usa ya an Elijah sey usa.” Siyaji sey inggingan Peter tey an-amuwong as ugujuna.
42009034	Sissiya ey gumingaginga as Peter assey lummuswa sey livuu at inijungana jida. Amud sey ugyat dasey pasurut Jesus assey anna malingbanda assey livuu.
42009035	At inggow sey gumminga ey narpu assey livuu ey kanana, “Nauy sey anakku ey pinilik, dongronyu sey ibagana!”
42009036	Gumminok pun sey gumminga saji, anggey as Jesus sey awad siji. Kingwan pun da Peter, John ya as James, ajida pun gummingginga miipanggop assey innilada ya niippun nangimbagaanda inggana assey naneynanan Jesus an jida.
42009037	Assey mavigat, nan-usug da Jesus asda aposelna ey narpu assey tagudtud at inabot dasey amud ey tagu siya.
42009038	Asda adjuwan ey tagu saji, inggow sey usa ey laraki ey namvugga ey kanana, “Apu, pangngaasim ta ilam anakku anna tey anggeyna as anakku!
42009039	Tey awad sey jimunyu ey apporow allun-ulun-ug an siya ya ansigab as umayow. At nu milun-ug ey, amud sey angokoona ey manongtong-ag an siya. Apporow mangkulis ya kummuntug ya tummarvutab sey sungadna.
42009040	Nampangpangaasiyak asda pasurutnu ta paryawunda kon ajida pun makaparyow.”
42009041	Kanan Jesus asda tagu, “Anuy lawa, dakayu ey tagu assey sana. Kinumbot kayu losan. Gumman gey pammatiyu? Ayakamanji as iniiggawak ya nangan-anusak an dakayu.” Asin at Jesus kanan assey aman sey anak saji, “Iyalim as sanna sey anaknu.”
42009042	Anna pun ey umadani sey anak saji an Jesus, maggey sey jimunyu imballu asina at pakuntugun. Kon minandaran Jesus sey jimunyu ey nangimparyow at vummaru sey anak saji, asin at Jesus ipurang an amana.
42009043	At nasdaow da tagu losan assey pannakabalin Apudyus. Anna pun ey sissiya ey sommosommokonda sey kingwan Jesus, kanan Jesus asda pasurutna,
42009044	“Sosomkonyu nauy! Sey Anak ji Tagu, tigangey sey mipurangana assey pannakabalin da tagu.”
42009045	Kon ajin pun dasey pasurutna naawatan tey kama as nitataru sey piuna ey ugujun ya ajida pun vus miturdan ey man-imus an siya.
42009046	Inggow sey usa ey ag-agow ey nansosongbat da pasurut Jesus nu ngan sey kangatuwan an jida.
42009047	Kon agammun Jesus sey awad assey somsomokda at inayagana sey usa ey anak at impasikadna assey dor-agna.
42009048	Asina at kanan an jida, “Ngan man sey mangimvilang assey usa ey anak gapu assey pammatina an sa'un, sa'un sey imvilangna. At nu imvilangna sa'un, imvilangna vus sey nangimbaar an sa'un. At sey mivilang as kababaan an dakayu assey sana, siya sey ambalin as kangatuwan.”
42009049	Kanan John an Jesus, “Apu, innilani sey usa ey tagu ey apporowna iparyow sey nilun-ug ey jimunyu gapu assey mangusarana assey ngadannu, kon impaginokni tey dakumpun mit as vurun taku.”
42009050	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Ajiyu paginkon, tey ngan ey sey aji pun kumuntra an jitaku, vurun taku ji.”
42009051	Assey tigangey sey ag-agow ey ampuuliyén Jesus ad langit, impapatina assey somsomokna ey masapur umuy ad Jerusalem.
42009052	Kingwana pun, nambaar as amangpangu ey umuy assey usa ey vubruy dasey iSamaria ta umuyda isagana sey andag-usana.
42009053	Kon gapu ta ad Jerusalem sey mangingkapnana, sumanga da tagu siji ey amadatong an siya.
42009054	Naagammuwan pun da James an John ey pasurutna sey nakwa sana, kananda, “Apu, nu pium atyén ta dawatunni an Apudyus ta otdaguna sey apuy ta subguna jida?”
42009055	Kon nambaliwit as Jesus ey nangingor an jida,
42009056	asida at umuy assey sabali ey vubruy.
42009057	Assey anaradarananda, inggow sey usa ey laraki ey nangimbaga an Jesus, “Apu, umuunnudak an sika urey nu ngan sey ayam.”
42009058	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Sey mutit at awad sey lungug ey ayana ya sey titit at awad sey sukvut ey inggawana, kon sey Anak ji Tagu, niippun vuruy as sumakubana.”
42009059	Kanan vus Jesus assey usa ey tagu, “Umalika ta ambalinka as pasurutku.” At iyyavun sey tagu saji kon kanana, “Apu, oni ta inyak yén ilavun as amak.”
42009060	Kon kanan Jesus an siya, “Amorna ta keygad dasey natuy ey mangillavun assey anungda ey natuy. Kon an sika, ingka, ta iwarawagnu sey Turey Apudyus.”
42009061	Inggow vus sey usa ey kanana, “Apu, umunudak an sika, kon oniyén ta inyak ibaga as dasey kabvuruyku.”
42009062	Kon kanan Jesus an siya, “Lawingan sey makwa nu sey manginsarad ey man-araju at antawitawili. Isuna vus assey umunud an sa'un ey nu antawitawili, niippun agammuna ey manservi assey Turey Apudyus.”
42010001	Naas pun ji, pinilin Jesus dasey pitumpuru ya juwa asina at sinjudwaun jida ta amangpanguda umuy assey amin ey vubruy ey piuna ayén.
42010002	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Adjuwan sey maani kon akittan dasey man-ani. Kudawunyu assey singkuwa assey maani ta mangimbaar as umuy man-ani.”
42010003	At impalibbat Jesus jida ey kanana, “Ingkayu! Ibaarku dakayu asda tagu, kon ajiyu maliwatan ey anungyu sey karneru ey mipuuy asda angkarangsit ya atap ey asu.
42010004	Aji kayu angintakin as angiggaanyu as pilak unnu kamvung unnu sapatus as an-orsanyu. Ya aji kayu mikaam-ammung assey daran.
42010005	Nu sumakey kayu assey usa ey vuruy, panguwunyu ibaga ey kananyu, ‘Kanana atyén ta awad sey tarna assey vuruy anna.’
42010006	Nu sey simvuruy at maryadda assey imbagayu, urnus sey maatud an jida. Kon nu sumangada ey an dakayu, puuliyunyu sey ambaru ey imbagayu.
42010007	At nu awad maryad ey ammangili an dakayu, mapongsan kayu ey inggow an jida ya aji kayu man-attuattun assey sabali ey vuruy. Aji kayu maviin ey mangan unnu mikin-um assey ipasanguda an dakayu tey sey mansiput lobbongna ey matangdanan.
42010008	Nu awad vubruy as amadatong an dakayu, kanunyu dasey makan ey ipasanguda an dakayu.
42010009	Kaanunyu sey sakit dasey awad sakitna assey vubruy ey ayanyu ya ibagayu asda tagu ey tigangey jumatong sey manginturayan Apudyus an jida.
42010010	Kon nu awad vubruy as ayanyu ya sumangada ey amadatong an dakayu, ingkayu assey pawey ya imbagayu an jida ey kananyu,
42010011	‘Urey sey tapuk assey iliyu ey pinumkot assey sikini at pukpukanni as mangil-anyu ey keygad kayu assey majusaanyu. Kon masapur maagammuwanyu ey tigangey jumatong sey manginturayan Apudyus an dakayu kon sumanga kayu.’”
42010012	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nu jumatong sey manguwisan Apudyus asda amin ey tagu, dakdakor sey jusan sey vubruy ey sumanga an dakayu nu sey jusan dasey tagu ad Sodom.”
42010013	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Kadagdagu kayu ey iCorazin ya kama avus an dakayu ey iBethsaida tey adjuwan sey kingwak ey nakaskasdaow assey vubruyyu kon ajiyu pun imbabawi dasey basuryu. Nu ad Tyre ya ad Sidon atyén sey nangwaak asda nakaskasdaow anna, nallumvunda akey nin as saku ya intukjuda assey dapur ey mangimpiila assey nambabawiyanda.
42010014	At nu jumatong sey manguwisan Apudyus asda amin ey tagu, allanglangpow sey jusan dasey iTyre ya iSidon nu dakayu.
42010015	At an dakayu ey iCapernaum, ey sey kananyu dakayu sey mavivigvig ey nangatu ad langit? Oni at mibaba kayu ey mivintug ad inférnu ey iggawan dasey lawingan ey tagu.”
42010016	At kanan Jesus asda ummunud an siya, “Sey mamati assey ibagayu, sa'un vus pigey sey pinatida. Kon sey sumanga an dakayu, sa'un sey sumang-anda. At sey sumanga an sa'un, as Apudyus ey nangimbaar an sa'un sey sinang-anda.”
42010017	Nangulin pun dasey pitumpuru ya juwa ey vinaar Jesus, amud sey layadda at kananda an Jesus, “Apu, urey da jimunyu at pinaryowni assey nangusaranni assey ngadannu!”
42010018	At kanan Jesus, “Oon tuttuwa tey innilak sey naabakan Satanas ey kamaʼs kuliyabbang ey naotdag ey narpu ad langit.
42010019	Innatudku an dakayu sey kaviilan ta urey nu gusdanyu da tabbad anda gayyaman, niippun makwa an dakayu ya abakunyu sey pannakabalin Satanas ey kavusur. Niippun mabalin mangabak an dakayu.
42010020	Kon aji kayu allaylayad gapu assey kaviilanyu ey nangimparyow asda jimunyu nu aji siya allaylaydanyu tey nikukur-it sey ngadanyu ad langit.”
42010021	Assey timpu saji, impalaylayad sey Ispiritun Apudyus as Jesus at kanana, “Ama ey Apu ad langit ya assey luta anna, dokor sey saramatku an sika tey ajim pun impaagammu da nauy asda tagu ey nangkariing ya jiadar nu aji dasey tagu ey napakumbaba at avus sey nagimpaagammuwam. Nakwa nauy Ama tey siya sey pinium.”
42010022	Asin at Jesus kanan asda tagu, “Sa'un sey nangimpiyaran Ama ey Apudyus assey kangamin. Niippun ustu as nangigammu an sa'un ey anak nu aji anggey as Ama. Ya niippun ustu as nangigammu an Ama nu dokon anggey sa'un ey Anakna ya da tagu ey pinilik ey mangimpaagammuwan.”
42010023	Asi at mansinagung as Jesus asda pasurutna ya kanana ey nangiyyagasaas ta ajin da ujum dongron sey ibagana, kanana, “Nagasat kayu tey anna ey iillanyu dasey makwamakwa assey sana.
42010024	Tey adjuwan dasey profet ya dasey ari ey maryad atyén ey mangila asda iillanyu ya mangngor asda dodongronyu kon ajida pun nadapun tey daan pun sey timpuna.”
42010025	Assey timpu saji, ummadani sey usa ey misturun sey lintog ey umuy amab-ali an siya ey kanana, “Apu Misturu, ngan sey kook ta maatdanak as viyag ey niippun patinggana?”
42010026	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Ngan sey kanan sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus? Ngan sey naawatam assey namasaam?”
42010027	At summongbat sey misturun sey lintog saji ey kanana, “Masapur pipiun taku as Apudyus assey patinggan sey somsomok taku, katatagu, kasdor ya kinariing. Ya masapur vus ey pipiun sey karubvun ey anung sey maryadan assey long-ag.”
42010028	At kanan Jesus, “Ustu mit sey insongbatnu. Siyana sey koom at mataguka.”
42010029	Kon sey misturu anna, piuna pigey itakjug ey ustu sey koko'ona at kanana an Jesus, “Tuttuwa, kon ngadan da karubvunku?”
42010030	Summongbat as Jesus ey nampani at kanana, “Inggow sey usa ey vurun taku ey Jews ey narpu ad Jerusalem ey ummuy ad Jericho. Inggow pun assey ginawan sey daran, inabotna dasey tulisan at kingwada pun, innarada dasey amin ey awad an siya urey sey illurumvunna asida at siya pang-o-pang-okon inggana as tigangey matuy asida at teynan.
42010031	Niyaspur ey nanguy sey usa ey paji assey daran saji. Innilana pun sey laraki ey matmattayén, nilipatna ey nanguy assey viik sey daran.
42010032	Oni pun vus, nallaus sey usa ey ganak Levi. Innilana pun vus, nilipatna ey nanguy assey viik sey daran.
42010033	Kon inggow sey usa ey nallaus ey iSamaria ey umuy ambaat. Innilana pun sey tagu saji, nadaguwan.
42010034	Ummadani at inagasana assey lana ya assey bayas ya asina at badarun dasey vigadna. Ingkabayuna assey kabayuna ey nangiyyuy assey vuruy ey dadaggusan asina at puutun.
42010035	Mavigat pun, innatjuna sey pilak ey batug sey tangdan assey juwa ey ag-agow assey singkuwa assey dadaggusan asina at kanan, ‘Nu awad atyén kabalinana ta puutum sey tagu anna ta nu ampuuliyak, asik at bayadan nu awad injugam as nagastusnu.’”
42010036	Asin at Jesus kanan assey misturu, “Ngadanna asda turu sana sey ustu ey singkarubvun assey tagu anna ey tinongtong-ag da tulisan.”
42010037	Summongbat sey misturun sey lintog ey kanana, “Sey inggow in ey nangadagu an siya.” At kanan Jesus, “At nu kanaʼsna, koom sey kingwana.”
42010038	Inturuy da Jesus ya dasey pasurutna ey umuy assey ayanda inggana as jummatongda assey usa ey vubruy. Inumdasda pun, inggow siji sey usa ey vubai ey angngadan as Martha ey nammangili an jida.
42010039	Inggow vus siji as Mary ey sunudna ey tutukju assey sinagung Jesus ey andodongngor assey tudtujuna.
42010040	Kon as Martha, maal-alimuun ey angkopya. Ummanungus pun, ummuy an Jesus at kanana, “Apu, ey niippun lawingna sey koon sunudku anna ey pinaanggayak ey mapuspussipus ey angkopya? Ibagam atyén pey ta turunganak.”
42010041	Kon kanan Jesus, “Martha, ayaka gey sey danagnu ya paka lawa maal-alimuun assey amud ey makwa sanaʼt?
42010042	Sa'an anggey sey ambaru ey kasapuran ey koom. At nauy ey ambaru sey pinilin Mary ey koon at aji pun maggey mamiid an siya.”
42011001	Usa pun ey ag-agow, ummuy nalluwaru as Jesus assey usa ey lugar. Naas pun, kanan sey usa ey pasurutna, “Apu, itudtujum uda an dakani nu ngan sey koonni ey alluwaru ey anungna sey kingwan John asda pasurutna ey nanudtuju.”
42011002	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Annaya sey koonyu ey alluwaru: ‘Ama ey Apudyus, losan kani atyén mandayow an sika. Jumatong atyén sey timpu ey sika sey Turey assey amin.
42011003	Atjum sey umaney as kanunni assey inag-agow.
42011004	Pakawanum dasey basurni tey pinakawanni vus dasey nakabasur an dakani. Ya turungam dakani ta aji kani maawis ey vumasur.’”
42011005	Inturuy Jesus at kanana, “Nu as gagara ya awad usa an dakayu as ummuy assey vuruy sey vub-urunna assey gawan ji lavi ya kanana, ‘Sunud, atdanak udyén lawa nu awad makan sinat
42011006	tey anji sey kaddatong ey mangilik at niippun ipakanku.’
42011007	At nu as gagara ya summongbat siya ey awad ad darum ya kanana, ‘Ngey paka gey lawa vumaraga? Nar-ot sey suyupni asda anak ya nidakig amin sey sawang. Matukarak ey vumangun ey umuy mangatud an sika.’
42011008	Kon sey ibagak an dakayu, urey nu sumanga ey vumangun ey angatud assey kudawum, vumangun dallu ya atjuna dasey kasapuram, dakumpun as gapu ta vub-urunnu kon gapu ta iviinna sey mangilim saji ey ikdawam.
42011009	At sey ibagak an dakayu, angkudow kayu an Apudyus at atdana dakayu. Tornonyu ey man-anap at udasanyu ya tornonyu ey mangkugkug at mivukat sey sawang an dakayu.
42011010	Tey amin ey mangkudow at maatdan ya amin ey man-anap at udasana ya mivukat sey sawang asda mangkugkug.
42011011	Tey ilanyu pees dakayu ey ama, nu angkudow sey anakyu as aggajiw, atjunyu pun lawa sey tabbad?
42011012	Unnu angkudow as itlog, atjunyu pun lawa sey gayyaman?
42011013	Nu dakayu ey ambasbasur at agammuyu ey mangatud as ambaru asda anakyu, aji am-amud ey atjun Ama ey Apudyus ad langit sey Ispirituna asda amin ey mangkudow!”
42011014	Usa pun ey ag-agow, pinaryow Jesus sey jimunyu ey nangomor assey usa ey laraki. Ummayow pun sey jimunyu, maggey gumminga sey na'omor saji at nasdaow losan da tagu.
42011015	Kon kanan da ujum, “As Beelzebul ey ap-apun dasey jimunyu sey nangatud assey kaviilana ey mamaryow asda jimunyu!”
42011016	Inggow vus da ujum ey piunda ey barbaliyan as Jesus at imbagada ta angimpiila as kaskasdaow ey sinyar as mangimpiila ey as Apudyus sey narpuwana.
42011017	Kon aaggammun Jesus sey awad assey somsomokda at sinongbatana jida assey pani ey kanana, “Nu as gagara ya awad usa as ili ya apporoda ampapatuy, siguraju ey aji pun ambayag nait ey ili. Kama vus nu amvivinnusur sey usa ey angkakabvuruy, niippun vus ayana nu ajida mansisina.
42011018	Anungna vus an Satanas, nu vusuruna sey vurunna ey jimunyu, siguraju ey aji pun mabayag sey tureyna. Ibagak nauy tey kananyu ey as Beelzebul sey narpuwan sey pannakabalinku ey mangimparyow asda jimunyu!
42011019	Ya nu tuttuwa ey as Beelzebul sey nangatud assey pannakabalinku ey mamaryow asda jimunyu, ngey nangatud assey pannakabalin dasey pasurutyu ey mangimparyow asda jimunyu nu'? Nait sey mangimpiila ey kinumbot kayu losan assey ibagabagayu.
42011020	Kon assey katuttuwaan, as Apudyus sey nangatud assey pannakabalinku ey mangimparyow asda jimunyu ey siya nauy sey mangimpiila ey jummatong sey Manginturayan Apudyus an dakayu.
42011021	“As Satanas at mipani assey usa ey mangkasdor ey tagu ey nan-aarmas ey mangiyyaajug assey vuruyna ta niippun mabalin makasakey ey mangara asda awad ad darum.
42011022	Kon nu awad sinkumasdor as mangabak an siya, porsona sey armas Satanas ey isoksokarna asina at aminun aran dasey awad ad darum ya italleyna ta vilvillayuna asda vurunna.”
42011023	Kanan vus Jesus, “Sey tagu ey aji pun tumimpuyug an sa'un, siya sey kumuntra an sa'un. Ya sey tagu ey aji pun tumurung assey siputku, jida dasey jumadail.”
42011024	Inturuy Jesus sey tudtujuna ey nampani at kanana, “Nu umayow sey jimunyu ey nilun-ug assey usa ey tagu, umuy manggaggakey asda lugar ey niippun kadandanuman ey man-anap as vumruyana. At nu niippun udasana, kanana assey somsomokna, ‘Ampuuliyak pey lawa assey tagu ey narpuwak.’
42011025	At nu jumatong ta udasana sey vinumruyana ey nadarus ya nuurnus ey ajina pun anung assey naneynana,
42011026	umuy man-ayag as pitu as vurunna ey sin-umamud sey kinarwingda nu siya. At nu vumuruyda assey tagu saji, am-amud ey kadagdagu nu assey ab-avusna.”
42011027	Assey gumingagingaan Jesus, inggow sey usa ey madmad-an ey nijuga asda amud ey tagu ey kanana, “Nagasat sey ina ey nangiyyanak ya namasusu an sika!”
42011028	Kon summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Oon, kon sin-umamud ey nagasat sey tagu ey mamangngor assey Gingan Apudyus ya inunudna.”
42011029	Anna pun ey umaju da tagu ey madagup assey iggawan Jesus, kanana, “Lawingan da tagu assey sana ey timpu tey sey apporoda anapun at dasey kaskasdaow ey sinyar ey marpu an Apudyus, kon niippun mipiila an jida nu aji anggey sey anung sey nakwa an Jonah assey kar-argow.
42011030	Tey sey nakwa an Jonah at siya sey sinyar asda iNineveh ey as Apudyus sey nangimbaar an siya. Anungna vus sey makwa assey Anak ji Tagu at siya vus sey sinyar ey para asda tagu assey sana.
42011031	At nu jumatong sey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda tagu, lumuswa sey inggow prinsesa ad Seba at ilumrum dakayu ey tagu assey sana tey an siya, urey gey nu amud sey kaadayun sey ilina, ummuy pey dallu ey nangngor assey kinariing Solomon. Kon anna assey sana an dakayu sey nangatngatu nu as Solomon.
42011032	At nu jumatong sey ag-agow saji, ilumrum vus dakayu asda iNineveh. Tey jida, nambabawida assey nangngoranda assey tudtujun Jonah. Kon anna mit ampey an dakayu assey sana sey nangatngatu nu as Jonah.”
42011033	Inturuy Jesus ey nantudtuju, kanana, “Niippun tagu as intugna sey silow ya intaruna unnu la'ubana nu aji iggana assey ambaru ey mipatangana ta masilawan da amin ey sumakey.
42011034	Sey ata at siya sey kamaʼs silow sey long-ag. At nu niippun kuraput sey atam, ampatak sey angil-am assey ilam. Kon nu nakuraputan sey atam, kama as awadka assey gikbot.
42011035	At masapur ey man-annad kayu tey kananyu pun nu silow sey awad an dakayu, dakumpun atpey tey gikbot.
42011036	Nu sissiya ey sinisillawan Apudyus sey somsomokyu, niippun aggikbot an dakayu tey najijillangan kayu assey dogot sey ampatak ey silow.”
42011037	Naas pun nantudtuju as Jesus, inayagan sey usa ey Farisis assey vuruyna ta umuyda mangan. Ummuy pun as Jesus ey nikatukju ey mangan,
42011038	nasdaow sey Farisis saji ey nangila an Jesus tey ajina pun inunud sey nakopyaanda ey mamvuru asida at mangan.
42011039	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Dakayu ey Farisis! Anungyu sey tagu ey siya anggeyʼs kiwasana sey lasin sey tasa ya sey ujug sey paratu kon sey niigga ad darum assey viyagyu at napnu assey kinaagum anda kinarwing.
42011040	Nuung-ung kayu nin a! As Apudyus ey nangwa assey mimi'ila, yangey dakumpun vus as siya sey nangwa assey aji pun miila?
42011041	At sey niigga assey tasayu unnu paratuyu, atjunyu asda lumawa ta madarusan kayu.
42011042	“Kadagdagu kayu dakayu ey Farisis! Tey urey dasey lugam ey mangimpapiya assey matipuy ya da ujum ey maara assey umayu at dayu atjun sey pagkapuruyu, kon nan-awidanyu dasey nabarbalor ey lintog ey masapur ambaru sey koon asda asintatagu ya masapur pipiun as Apudyus. Urey koonyu dasey aji pun as ikow nabalor kon ajiyu maggey iwalin dasey nabarbalor.
42011043	“Kadagdagu kayu dakayu ey Farisis! Tey siya gey agabanyu sey umuy tumukju assey tukjuwan dasey madayow assey sinagog ya pipiunyu ey malamanu ey marispitu assey iggawan da adjuwan ey tagu.
42011044	Kadagdagu kayu dakayu ey Farisis! Tey mipani kayu asda lavun ey niippun mangillasinan ey apporon da tagu ayun ya niippun agammuda ey awad atpey sey vuyuk ad darum.”
42011045	At kanan sey usa ey avugajun sey lintog, “Apu, assey angokoom ey guminga, injugam dakani ininsurtu!”
42011046	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Kadagdagu kayu avus dakayu ey avugajun sey lintog! Tey apporoyu ipavukud asda tagu dasey angkadagsun ey vukud ey nauy dasey adjuwan ey lintog ey piunyu unujunda kon urey dakayu at aji kayu pun makakwa. Ya niippun lawa akit as koonyu as lumangpawan dasey angkadagsun ey impavukudyu.
42011047	Kadagdagu kayu! Inambaruyu kingwa sey nilabnan dasey profet ey gingngat dasey dakdakoryu assey kar-argow.
42011048	At sey kingwayu sana, nait sey mangimpiila ey inavunanyu sey kingwan da dakdakoryu assey kar-argow. Gingngat dasey dakdakoryu jida ya dakayu sey mangwa assey lavunda.
42011049	At nauy sey miil-an sey kinariing Apudyus tey sey kanana assey kar-argow miipanggop an dakayu, ‘Angimbaarak asda profet ya dasey mibaar ey mangimbaga assey piuk, kon gongatunda da ujum ya tongtong-agunda da ujum.’
42011050	At dasey tagu assey sana, jida sey majusa gapu asda amin ey profet ey gingngatda assey kar-argow mallugi assey nakwaan sey luta.
42011051	At mallugi assey nangngatanda an Abel inggana assey timpu ey nangngatanda an Zechariah assey nambootan sey altar ya sey nasantuwan ey vuruy Apudyus. At tuttuwa sey ibagak anna ey dakayu ey tagu assey sana sey majusa gapu asda nauy ey nakwa!
42011052	“Kadagdagu kayu dakayu ey avugajun sey Lintog! Tey indakigyu sey sawang ey iggawan sey pannakaawat assey Gingan Apudyus ya urey dakayu at sumanga kayu ey sumakey ya puntapuntanyu dasey maryad ey sumakey.”
42011053	Anna pun ey umayow as Jesus assey vuruy sey Farisis saji, iniggan dasey mimisturun sey lintog ya dasey Farisis sey kaviilanda ey manumsik an siya. At amud sey inimusda
42011054	ta awad atyén akit as kumbotana ta awad allapuwanda ey amabasur an siya.
42012001	Anna pun ey madagup da kalivulivu ey tagu ey manjijinnuklin, nansinagung as Jesus as dasey pasurutna ey kanana, “Annadanyu sey tinuktuk dasey Farisis; sey piuk ugujun, dasey ugalida ey aginsosomkan.
42012002	Tey amin ey aji pun miila unnu aji pun naagammuwan assey sana, jumatong dallu sey timpu ey mipiil-ana ya maagammuwana.
42012003	At urey dasey inggingayu assey lavi, maagammuwan dallu assey ag-agow ya dasey inyagutimtimyu assey anggayanyu, dongron da amin ey tagu.”
42012004	At kanan vus Jesus ey gumminga, “Sey ibagak an dakayu ey vub-urunku, aji kayu umugyat asda mabalin ey mangngat assey long-ag tey nu maasda ey gongatun sey long-ag, niippun ujum as kasinda koon tey siyaji anggey sey patinggan sey kaviilanda.
42012005	Kon sey ibagak an dakayu, as Apudyus sey umugyatanyu tey nu maasna gongatun sey long-agyu, kaviilana vus ey iballu dakayu ad inférnu. At siya anggey sey umugyatanyu!
42012006	“Kon aji kayu madanagan nu as Apudyus sey umugyatanyu tey urey sey vilang sey vuukyu at agammuna. Ya urey sey tilin ey kababaan ey karasin ji titit ey mabalin ngin-an sey lima as juwa ey sentimus at niippun matarak as usa an jida nu ajin Apudyus iparuvus. Yangey aji kayu nabarbalor nu sey tilin?”
42012008	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ibagak an dakayu ey ngan ey sey tagu ey mangintakjug an sa'un assey sinagung da tagu, takjugak vus siya assey sinagung dasey enjel Apudyus.
42012009	Kon sey tagu ey mamuyég an sa'un assey sinagung da tagu, vuyaguk vus siya assey sinagung dasey enjel Apudyus.
42012010	“Sey tagu ey angingginga as kumuntra assey Anak ji Tagu at mabalin ey mapakawan kon sey angingginga as kumuntra assey Ispiritun Apudyus at aji pun mabalin mapakawan.
42012011	“Nu iyuy dakayu asda sinagog unnu asda Gubernador unnu asda ujum ey turey, aji kayu madanagan ey mangintakjug assey long-agyu ya sey igingayu.
42012012	Tey assey uras sanat, sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey mangintudtuju an dakayu nu ngan sey ibagayu.”
42012013	Assey timpu saji, gumminga sey usa asda naamung ey tagu at kanana, “Apu, ibagam uda assey sunudku ta ivillayanak asda laksunni.”
42012014	Kon kanan Jesus, “Sika ey sunud, niippun viyangku ey mangimbanag ya mamilvilley asda laksunyu ey mansunud.”
42012015	Asin at Jesus kanan asda amin ey tagu, “Masapur annadanyu ta aji kayu angkarmukam tey sey viyag sey tagu at aji pun as allapu assey kaajun sey laksun.”
42012016	Inturuy Jesus ey nampani an jida ey kanana, “Inggow sey usa ey baknang ey panus sey inanina.
42012017	At kanana assey somsomokna, ‘Ngan sey kook? Anna mit ey kurang sey arangku as mangiggaak assey inanik.
42012018	Ah, kanaʼs sanna sey kook; bakasuk dasey arangku ta angwaak as angkadanakkor ta umaney as angimpintokak assey inanik ya dasey ujum ey laksunku.
42012019	Maas ey, asik at kanan assey long-agku, Gadtok ey nagasatak ey tagu! Subra da nauy as ikataguk assey kam-ana ey tawun. At urey ajiyak mansiput ta itukjuk ey mangamangan, uminuinum ya allagragsak tey ngey kasinku koon!’
42012020	Kon kanan Apudyus an siya, ‘Nuung-ungka nin pigey tuttuwa! Assey lavi anna, matuyka at ngan sey mallak-am asda intarpunnu ey para assey long-agnu?’”
42012021	At inyanungus Jesus ey kanana, “Kanaʼs nait sey makwa assey tagu ey andagudagup anggey as ibaknangna assey luta anna kon niippun somsomokna asda ivilang Apudyus ey nabalor.”
42012022	Kanan Jesus asda pasurutna, “Sey ibagak an dakayu, noanyu angimpangug assey angar-anyu as ikataguyu unnu ilumvunyu.
42012023	Tey aji pun miyisu sey kinabalor sey viyag assey makan unnu lumvun.
42012024	Ilanyu man da gayang, ajida pun da man-osok ya man-ani ya niippun vus arangda unnu mangintarpunanda as kasapuranda kon pakanan mit Apudyus jida. Yangey nabarbalor sey titit nu dakayu?
42012025	Ya usa pey, ey paanjuwun pun lawa sey danag sey mataguwanyu as urey sa'an ey uras?
42012026	At nu niippun kaviilanyu ey mangimpaanju as akit, kawadna vusji madanagan kayu asda ujum ey masapuryu?
42012027	“Ilanyu man dasey sabsavung ey apporow tumuvu, ajida pun mansiput ya ajida pun man-abor, kon sey ibagak an dakayu, ambab-aru sey sayyavungda nu sey kabaruwan ey lumvun sey kabaknangan ey ari ey as Solomon.
42012028	At nu kanaʼsji sey kabarun sey ipalumvun Apudyus asda lugam ey aji pun masinkimad ya namiid tey urey nu awadda assey sana ya as vigat ey naskuranda, aji sin-umamud sey koona ey angatud as ilumvunyu? Awwoo! Ayaka kakapsut sey pammatiyu?
42012029	Ajiyu pasig sosomkon sey ikataguyu ya noanyu assey danagyu.
42012030	Tey da tagu ey aji pun nangigammu an Apudyus, da nauy sey pasigda sosomkon. Kon an dakayu ey, aaggammun Amayu ad langit ey kasapuranyu amin da nauy.
42012031	Siya atyén pigey ipapangugyu koon sey piun Apudyus at atjuna amin da nauy an dakayu.”
42012032	Inturuy Jesus ey manudtuju asda pasurutna ey kanana, “Aji kayu umugyat urey nu akittan kayu tey allaylayad as Apudyus ey manginjuga an dakayu assey manturayana.
42012033	Ingkayu ingina dasey awad an dakayu ta atjunyu sey nginana asda lumawa at maatud an dakayu sey pitaka ey niippun abvutna ey siya sey mitarpunan dasey vinaknangyu ad langit. Tey as jiyuy, niippun umakitana ya niippun makaadani asda man-aakow ya niippun lakuy as manadail.
42012034	Tey ngan ey sey nanginggalinanyu assey vinaknangyu, siya sey iggown sey somsomokyu.”
42012035	Inturuy Jesus ey gumminga ey kanana, “Masapur ey mansasaggana kayu urey ngan sey makwa ey anungyu da alipan ey manguulley assey apuda ey ummuy nikakasar. Mansasagganada ey nangigga assey lumvunda ya nangintug assey silowda ta nu jumatong ya nantuktuk, vuktanda ey dagus sey sawang.
42012037	At nagasat dasey alipan nu udasan sey apuda jida ey ajida pun nasuyup ya nansasagganada urey nu ingganaʼs gawan lavi unnu tigangey manullakuk sey jumatngan sey apuda. Ibagak an dakayu ey nu maas ey man-oros as lumvunna, patukjuwuna dasey alipanna ta pakanana jida.”
42012039	Kasin vus nampani as Jesus ey kanana, “Dongronyu sey ibagak anna tey nu as gagara ya aaggammun sey simvuruy sey jumatngan sey man-aakow, siguraju ey ajina pun iparuvus sey sumakayan sey man-aakow.
42012040	At anungna vus an dakayu ey masapur mansasaggana kayu tey sey Anak ji Tagu, umali assey timpu ey ajiyu pun namnamaun.”
42012041	At kanan Peter ey nangimus, “Apu, ey dakani anggey sey mangimbag-am asda nait unnu amin ey tagu?”
42012042	At sinongbatan Jesus assey pani ey kanana, “Sey mapiyar ya masomkan ey alipan, siya sey piyarun sey apuna ey mangila asda ujum ey alipan ya mangatud as kanunda as inag-agow.
42012043	At nagasat sey alipan saji nu jumatong sey apuna ya nandatngana sey alipan ey kookoona sey nipiyar an siya.
42012044	At isigurajuk an dakayu ey ipangatun sey apuna siya ta siya sey mangiila asda amin ey laksunna.
42012045	Kon nu as gagara ya sey alipan sana at kanana assey somsomokna ey mabayag nin asi at jumatong sey apuna ya koona ey manongtong-ag asda vurunna ey alipan, laraki man unnu vubai ya koona ey mangamangan anda umin-inum ya amvubvuuk ya
42012046	oni ey, jummatong sey apuna assey ag-agow ey ajina pun namnamaun ya uras ey ajina pun agammu, kapilitan ey jusaun sey apuna siya assey amud ey jusa ya injugana siya asda miballu ey alipan ey aji pun mapiyar.
42012047	“Sey alipan ey nangigammu assey piun sey apuna ey makwa ya aji pun mansagana unnu mangwa assey piun sey apuna, lak-amuna sey amud ey litlit.
42012048	Kon sey alipan ey niippun agammuna assey piun sey apuna ya nangwa as lawingan, ak-akit sey lak-amuna ey litlit. Tey sey tagu ey nipiyaran sey ad-aju, ad-aju vus sey manamnama ey marpu an siya ya sey nipiyaran sey sin-umaju, sin-umaju vus sey manamnama ey marpu an siya.”
42012049	At kanan vus Jesus ey nampani, “Ummaliyak ey manikur assey luta anna. At piuk atyén ey gummilab ta maasana.
42012050	Kon masapur ey lak-amuk sey amud ey tongtong-ag. At anna ey maguru sey somsomokku ey ajiyak pun makaanus at ayuwak sey maasana.
42012051	Ey sey kananyu ummaliyak ey manginyali assey urnus assey luta? Dakumpun, tey sey ummaliyak ta mansisina da tagu.
42012052	At mallugi assey sana amvivinnusur dasey simbaryan. At nu limada, vusurun da turu da juwa, at da juwa vusurunda da turu.
42012053	Dasey man-aama ya man-iina at manvivinnusurda ya anungna vus dasey mangkatkatuganga at manvivinnusurda.”
42012054	Kanan Jesus asda amin ey tagu, “Kam-ey ta ilanyu ey gumikbot dasey livuu, kananyu ey umudan nauy, at umudan tuttuwa.
42012055	At nu awwangwang vus dasey livuu, kananyu vus ey amud nin nauy ey ligat, at maligat tuttuwa.
42012056	Dakayu ey aginsosomkan! Nu miibagayu sey makwa as vigat gapu asda sinyar ad ngatu ya assey luta, ngey payu lawa aji imatunan dasey sinyar ey ipiipiilan Apudyus assey sana ey timpu miipanggop an sa'un?”
42012057	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Pa kayu aji mansomsomok as ambaru ey makwa?
42012058	Nu awad mangindarum an dakayu ya iyuy dakayu assey korti, arigluwunyu yén ta ajin dakayu iyuy assey uwis. Tey nu luus kayu mipasangu assey uwis, ipurangna dakayu asda pulis ta iyuy dakayu assey baballudan.
42012059	At nu kanaʼsna sey makwa, aji kayu pun mivukkey inggana as aminunyu ibayad sey amin ey laksunyu.”
42013001	Assey timpu vus saji ey nantudtujuwan Jesus asda tagu, inggow dasey nangimbaga an siya miipanggop asda iGalili ey impagngat Gubernador Pilate assey anna ey mandatunda an Apudyus.
42013002	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Ey sey kananyu, mandagdagsun sey basur da nauy nu dasey ujum ey iGalili tey kanaʼsji sey ingkatuyda?
42013003	Dakumpun! Kon ibagak an dakayu ey nu aji kayu ambabawi asda basuryu, miyisu kayu an jida ey matuy.
42013004	Ya isuna vus asda nasawaran as waru ey natuy ey natapilan assey nikur-uban sey ataknang ey vuruy ad Siloam. Ey sey kananyu mandagdagsun sey basurda nu dasey ujum ey kailiyanda ey iJerusalem?
42013005	Dakumpun! Kon ibagak an dakayu ey nu aji kayu ambabawi asda basuryu, miyisu kayu vus an jida ey matuy.”
42013006	Kasin nampani as Jesus ey kanana, “Inggow sey tagu ey tummuvu sey kayu ey fig assey lutana. Nu jumatong ey sey timpu ey amung-an da kayu, umuyna ilailan nu awad vungana kon niippun udasana as urey lawa sa'an.
42013007	At kanana assey dana mansiputun assey lutana, ‘Ilam man ya, mikatlu nauy ey tawun ey inyak ilailan nu awad vungan sey kayu anna kon purus pigey ey aji pun mamunga, gabbaum at pey lawa tey keynga sey luta ey tummuvuwana.’
42013008	Kon summongbat sey mansisipputuna at kanana, ‘Apu, nu awad kabalinana ta anusanta yén as usa pey dallu ey tawun ta kurubak sey puunna ta koak as avunu
42013009	ta nu mamunga as tawun, ambaru, kon nu aji, asita at gabbaun.’”
42013010	Usa pun ey Sabaju, nantudtuju as Jesus assey sinagog.
42013011	Niyaspur ey inggow siji sey usa ey vubai ey pinikut sey jimunyu sey long-agna as nasawaran as waru ey tawun at aji pun anggodong ey sumikad.
42013012	Innilan pun Jesus siya, inayagana ey kanana, “Ina, makaan sey sakit nu.”
42013013	At impateyn Jesus sey imana an siya at dagus ey nanggodong at jinaydayowna as Apudyus.
42013014	Oni pun, pinumtuk sey inggow pangatda assey sinagog saji tey impabarun Jesus sey long-ag sey vubai saji assey ag-agow ey iillongan. At kanana asda tagu, “Onom ey ag-agow assey makajuminggu sey mabalin ey mangwaan assey kasapuran ey makwa. At da nauy atyén ey ag-agow sey umaliyanyu ey manpaagasan ta dakumpun assey ag-agow ey iillongan.”
42013015	Kon sinongbatan Jesus siya ey kanana, “Dakayu ey aginsosomkan! Yangey ajiyu pun umuy uggasun sey animaryu ya pin-uman jida assey ag-agow ey iillongan!
42013016	At ey sana, anna an jitaku sey usa ey ganak Abraham ey kamaʼs vinabarud Satanas as nasawaran as waru ey tawun! At yangey lawingan pun lawa nu makaan sey sakitna ta mawayaan assey ag-agow ey iillongan?”
42013017	Imbagana pun jiyuy, naviinan dasey kumukuntra an siya kon amud sey layad da tagu gapu asda kaskasdaow ey kingwakingwana.
42013018	At kanan vus Jesus, “Ngan gey lawa sey mangimpaniyak assey Turey Apudyus?
42013019	Sey mipaniyana at anungna sey vukar sey mustasa ey banban-it ey immuran sey usa ey tagu assey kor-angna. Tummuvu at jummakor inggana as niyisu assey kayu sey kadakorna at mabalin sumukvut da titit assey pangana.”
42013020	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ngan sey ujum ey mangimpaniyak assey Turey Apudyus?
42013021	Kama as tinuktuk ey ingkamus sey usa ey vubai assey adjuwan ey arina ey tinameyna inggana as namin vinumtar.”
42013022	Inturuy vus pigey da Jesus ey umuy ad Jerusalem ey apporow nantudtuju asda tagu assey amin ey munisipyu anda kavubruvubruy ey innuyda.
42013023	At inggow sey nangimus an siya ey kanana, “Apu, ey akittan anggey sey misarakan?” Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana,
42013024	“Iggayu sey kaviilanyu ey sumakey assey nalipit ey sawang ey umuy ad langit tey tuttuwa sey ibagak anna an dakayu ey adjuwan da tagu ey miid ajida koon ey sumakey kon ajida pun makasakey.
42013025	Tey sey simvuruy nu luusna umban sey sawang marsin dasey awad as pawey. At urey nu ankogkokogkogda ya kananda, ‘Apu, vuktam sey sawang!’ Kon ibagana an jida, ‘Niippun agammuk nu ngey narpuwanyu!’
42013026	Ya asida at kanan, ‘Paan ya dakani mit sey inggow apporow nikauvung ya nikin-um an sika ya ummalika pey ey nantudtuju assey vubruyni!’
42013027	Kon ikasinna vus ey ibaga an jida, ‘Niippun tuttuwa agammuk nu ngey narpuwanyu. At ingkayun at dakayu ey lawingan sey kookoona!’
42013028	At nu ilanda da Abraham, Isaac ya as Jacob ya da amin ey profet ey awad assey Turey Apudyus, amud sey man-ivilanda ya ngumarotngotan sey vub-ada tey jida dasey narsin ey niballu.
42013029	Kon adjuwan dasey mijuga ey mikauvung assey Turey Apudyus ey marpu asda nangkapat ey jugyun sey luta.
42013030	Ya awad dasey mangudjiji assey sana ey amangu ya awad dasey amangu assey sana ey mangudjiji assey Turey Apudyus.”
42013031	Assey gumingagingaan Jesus, inggow dasey jummatong ey Farisis at kananda an siya, “Ingkan at, umayowka assey vubruy anna tey piun sika gongatun an Herod.”
42013032	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Ingkayu ibaga assey nasilib sanat ey Herod tey iturturuyku pey dallu ey angimparyow as dasey jimunyu ya mangaan assey sakit dasey masakit assey sana, as vigat ya nu as kavigatna, ipadakpusku sey siputku.
42013033	At masapur ituruyku vus pigey ey umuy ad Jerusalem assey sana, as vigat ya as kavigatna tey niippun sabali as mipagngatan sey usa ey profet nu dokon ad Jerusalem.”
42013034	At kanan Jesus, “Anuy, dakayu ey iJerusalem! Dakayu sey nangngat as dasey profet ya namikung asda tagu ey imbaar Apudyus ey umuy manudtuju atyén an dakayu. Nanginkinnu ey piuk atyén dagupun ya puutun dakayu ey anung sey usa ey uvuwan ey manakuyup asda issiwna kon sumanga kayu pey dallu.
42013035	At ey sana, keygad kayu as koonyu tey teynan ogon Apudyus dakayu. Ibagak an dakayu ey niippun kasinyu mangil-an an sa'un inggana assey daan ey ag-agow ey mangimbag-anyu, ‘Dayawun taku sey imbaar Apudyus ey umali.’”
42014001	Usa pun ey ag-agow ey iillongan dasey Jews, ummuy nikakan as Jesus assey vuruy sey usa ey pangat dasey Farisis ya inggow da tagu ey maniisiim an siya nu ngan sey koona.
42014002	Niyaspur ey inggow siji sey usa ey laraki ey nilulumtug sey sikina ya imana.
42014003	Inimus Jesus asda Farisis ya asda misturun sey Lintog ey kanana, “Ey misanga assey lintog taku sey man-agas assey ag-agow ey iillongan, unnu aji pun?”
42014004	Kon anna pun ey niippun sumongbat an jida, inugnan Jesus sey masakit saji at nakaan sey sakitna asina at ibaga an siya ta umayow.
42014005	Asina at kanan asda tagu, “Nu awad navituwan as anakyu unnu bakayu ya niyaspur assey ag-agow ey iillongan, ey ajiyupun pun lawa umuy okron ey dagus?”
42014006	Kon niippun summongbat an jida.
42014007	Nilangrangan pun Jesus da ujum ey inayagan sey Farisis ey siya ilandaʼs tumukjuwanda dasey ambaru ey tukjuwan, nampani an jida ey kanana,
42014008	“Nu maayaganta ey umuy mikakan, ajita gamgaman ey umuy tumukju assey tukjuwan da nangangatu ey tagu tey oni at lawa ya awad nangatngatu nu sika as naayagan.
42014009	At nu jumatong sey nangatu ey tagu ey naayagan, umali sey nangayag an sika ya kanana, ‘Kumunudka sinat ta tumukjuwan sey tagu anna.’ At nu kanaʼsji, siguraju ey maviinanka ya ingka tummukju assey igidna.
42014010	At nu awad mangayag an jita, inta yén tumukju assey igidna. At umali sey nangayag an sika ya kanana, ‘Sunud, umalika ta ingka tumukju assey ambab-aru ey tukjuwan.’ At nu kanaʼsji sey makwa, midayowka assey sinagung da ujum ey mangili.
42014011	Tey mibaba sey mangimpangatu assey long-agna ya mipangatu sey ampakumbaba.”
42014012	At kanan vus Jesus assey tagu ey nangayag an siya, “Nu ampaamungka, dakumpun as siya ayagam dasey vub-urunnu, da susunudnu unnu da jujugam tey mabalinda vus sika ayagan at subalitanda sey kingwam an jida.
42014013	Kon nu ampaamungka, ayagam dasey lumawa, da piley anda vurag.
42014014	At nu kanaʼsji, nagasatka tey ajida pun makasubalit assey kingwam an jida at as Apudyus sey mangatud assey gun-gunam assey umuliyén da ambaru ey tagu assey daan ey ag-agow.”
42014015	Jingngor pun sey usa ey tagu ey kauvung Jesus, kanana, “Amud nin pigey sey gasat dasey mijuga assey Turey Apudyus ad langit!”
42014016	At sinongbatan Jesus siya ey kanana, “Awad sey usa ey tagu ey nanginsagana as dokor ey amung at adjuwan dasey tagu ey nangimbagaana ta umalida.
42014017	Naas pun nisagana sey amin, imbaarna sey usa ey baba'arun ta umuyna ibaga as dasey naayagan ta umalida tey naas nisagana sey makan.
42014018	Kon awad ey usa an jida, nallasun pey ey kanana, ‘Anééy, anji sey kangngin-ak ey luta at masapur inyak yén ilan at ajiyak pun makaali.’
42014019	Kanan vus sey usa, ‘Dispinsarunyu tey ajiyak pun makaali tey inyak yén ipadas isiput dasey kangngin-ak ey lima ey paris ey baka.’
42014020	At kanan vus sey usa, ‘Atééy, ajiyak pun makaali tey inugudni ey saji sey man-asawaanni an asawak.’
42014021	“Nampuuli pun sey baba'arun saji, imbagana assey apuna sey lasun dasey naayagan at amud sey putukna. At kasinna imbaga assey baba'aruna ey kanana, ‘At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, igag-anasnu ta ingka asda karsa ya asda daran assey vubruy sana ta ayagam dasey lumawa, dasey nattubangil, dasey vurag ya da piley.’
42014022	Naas pun nakwa, kanan sey baba'arun assey apuna, ‘Apu, kingwak sey imvilinnu kon adjuwan pey dallu sey mig-awan.’
42014023	At kanan vus sey apuna an siya, ‘Ingka, urey asda addayuwan ey karsa anda amin ey daran ta ayagam dasey amin ey tagu ta umalida ey mikaamung ta mapnu sey vuruyku.
42014024	Tey sey ibagak an sika, niippun usa asda namangu ey naayagan as manimsim assey insaganak ey makan.’”
42014025	Assey timpu ey amud dasey tagu ey mitun-utun-ud an Jesus, nansinagung an jida ey kanana,
42014026	“Aji pun mabalin ey ambalin sey usa as pasurutku, nu aji am-amud sey layadna an sa'un nu sey layadna assey amana, inana, asawana, da anakna ya asda susunudna ya urey assey mismu ey long-agna.
42014027	Ya aji pun vus mabalin ey ambalin sey usa as pasurutku nu ajina pun maanusan sey tongtong-ag gapu assey umunudana an sa'un ey urey siya sey ikatuyna.
42014028	“At nu as gagara ya awad usa an dakayu as an-anmok ey ampatakjug as dokor ey vuruy, panguwuna yén jumjumun sey pilakna nu umaney as usaruna inggana as maas.
42014029	Tey nu ajina yén somsomkon ya insaradna, oni ya anggey sey turkud as matuud ya niippun amadakpusna. At am-amangun da losan ey mangila
42014030	ey kananda, ‘Anjiya sey tagu ey nampatakjug kon ajina pun impadakpus.’
42014031	“Sey usa vus ey mipaniyana, at nu awad usa ey ari as umuy mikagubat ya simpuru ey livu anggey sey surdajuna ya juwampuru ey livu sey surdajun sey kagubatna, somsomkona yén nu lamugna ey sanguwun sey kalabanna asina at ilibbat.
42014032	Kon nu sommosommokona ya ajina pun lamug, urey adayu sey iggawan dasey kagubatda, mangimbaar asda umuy miyabot ta an-uugudanda sey vumaruwanda.
42014033	Anungna vus an dakayu, nu piunyu ey ambalin as pasurutku, masapur sommosommokonyu yén sey kinasigabna. Tey aji pun mabalin ey ambalin sey usa ey tagu as pasurutku nu ajina man-awidan dasey amin ey awad an siya.”
42014034	Nampani vus kasin as Jesus ey kanana, “Ambaru sey asin tey awad servina, kon nu makaan sey simsimna, aji pun mipuuli sey piyana.
42014035	At niippun ogon servina tey urey usarun assey luta ey man-avunu at aji pun mabalin. At sey koon, iballu pey lawa. Niingaan kayu mit at ammaanyu sommosommokon sey jingngoryu!”
42015001	Usa pun ey ag-agow, ummuy dasey adjuwan ey mansisingil as vuur ya da ujum ey ivilang da Jews as ambasbasur ey mandongor assey tudtujun Jesus.
42015002	Singunguju dasey Farisis ya dasey misturun sey Lintog ey kananda, “Ilanyu man sey tagu anna ya, mivulluvullun gey la as dasey ambasbasur ya mikauvung an jida!”
42015003	At nampani as Jesus an jida ey kanana,
42015004	“Nu as gagara ya awad usa an dakayu as awad singgasut as karneruna ya natarak sey usa, ngan nin sey koona? Ey ajinapun pun lawa teynan dasey siyampuru ya siyam assey purag ta umuyna anapun sey sa'an saji ey natarak inggana as udasana?
42015005	At nu udasana, vukudana gapu assey amud ey layadna ya
42015006	itakdang assey vubruy. Asina at ayagan dasey vurunna anda karubvunna ya kanana, ‘Umali kayu ta allagragsak taku tey indasak sey natarak ey karneruk!’”
42015007	At inyanungus Jesus ey kanana, “Sey ibagak an dakayu, kanaʼsji sey mipaniyan sey dokor ey ragsak ad langit nu mambabawi sey usa ey ambasbasur nu dasey siyampuru ya siyam ey niyun-un ey tagu ey ajida pun kasapuran ey ambabawi.”
42015008	At inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ngan sey koon sey usa ey vubai nu as gagara ya awad simpuru as paratana ya natarak sey usa? Siguraju ey intugna sey silow ya ambaruwuna sagadan sey jugyun sey vuruy assey manganapana inggana as udasana.
42015009	Ya nu udasana, ayagana dasey vurunna ya da karubvunna ey kanana, ‘Umali kayu ta allagragsak taku tey indasak sey natarak ey pilakku!’”
42015010	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Kanaʼsji vus sey allaylaydan da enjel Apudyus nu mambabawi sey urey usa ey ambasbasur.”
42015011	Inturuy Jesus ey man-ul-ullit as pani ey kanana, “Inggow sey usa ey marong-ag ey juwa sey anakna ey laraki.
42015012	Kanan sey ujiji an amada, ‘Ama, piuk atyén aran sey laksunku assey sana.’ At vinilley amada sey laksunda ey mansunud.
42015013	“Ummayow pun sey kam-ana ey ag-agow, ingnginan sey ujiji sey amin ey villeyna at ummuy assey addayuwan ey ili. Assey iniiggawanaʼsji, innaminna sey pilakna vinusvus asda kinumbot ey kaviviyag.
42015014	Naamin pun sey pilakna, inumdas sey amud ey urat assey ili saji at navutvutan ey niippun iyarana as kanuna.
42015015	At ummuy nikalabvu assey usa ey taguʼsji ey nangatud as siputuna ey ampapakan asda borok.
42015016	At gapu assey amud ey inuratna, piuna mangan asda vunga ey apporowda ipakan asda borok nu mabalin gapu assey amud ey inuratna tey niippun mangatud as kanuna.
42015017	“Ummanungus pun kanana assey somsomokna, ‘Dasey ansisipputun amak at ansubsubra sey kanunda ya annaak pey sina ey matuy assey inurat!
42015018	Inyak pigey ta ampuuliyak an amak ya kanak an siya ey, Ama, nambasurak an Apudyus ya nambasurak an sika.
42015019	Ajiyak pun ogon mivilang as usa ey anaknu. Aranak lawa as usa ey mansisipputum.’
42015020	Siyaji sey kanana assey somsomokna at lummibbat ey ampuuli an amana. Kon inggow pun assey pudayan ey adayu atgey assey vuruyda, intap amana at amud sey daguna at nanuddak ey umuy mangabot an siya asina at kaworon assey amud ey layadna.
42015021	At gumminga sey anakna ey kanana, ‘Ama, nambasurak an Apudyus ya an sika at ajiyak pun ogon miivilang as usa ey anaknu.’
42015022	Kon inayagan amana dasey alipanna ey kanana, ‘Ganasanyu! Iyaliyu sey kabaruwan ey lumvun ta ipalumvunyu assey anakku ya iyaliyu vus sey singsing ta singsinganyu ya sey sapatus ta sapatusanyu.
42015023	Ya ingkayu aran sey pinatabayu ey ubvun sey baka ta partiyunyu ta allagragsak taku
42015024	tey sey anakku anna ey nivilang ey natuy at ummuli, natarak kon nad-asan.’ At illugida ey allagragsak.
42015025	“Assey timpu saji, inggow sey pangu ey sunudna as payow ey mansiput. Kon anna pun ey vumokra ey umadani assey vuruyda, jingngorna da manganggangsa ya da antatadok.
42015026	At inayagana sey usa as dasey alipan at inimusna nu ngan sey makwamakwa.
42015027	At kanan sey alipan, ‘Jummatong sey sunudnu at pinartin amayu sey katatab-an ey ubvun sey baka gapu assey layadna tey jummatong sey sunudnu ey matattagu ey niippun lawingan as nakwa an siya.’
42015028	“Summanga sey pangu ey anak at pummarsut ey aji pun sumakey. At lummawa sey amada ey umuy manga'aruk an siya ta sumakey.
42015029	Kon sinongbatana as amana ey kanana, ‘Ilam man ya! Assey kam-ana ey tawun ey anungku sey alipan ey sumipusiput as para an sika ya niippun nilabsingku as vilinnu, niippun lawa kanam ey atdanak as urey lawa ganjing as partiyuk ta awad lawa allaylaydanni asda vurunku.
42015030	Kon jummatong pun sey anaknu anna ey namusvus assey laksunnu asda aggissow ey vubai, siya at avus sey impartiyam as katatab-an ey ubvun sey baka taku!’
42015031	“At kanan amana, ‘Anakku, dakumpun as kanaʼsnaʼt tey iniinggowka an sa'un. At amin ey awad an sa'un at kuwam.
42015032	Kon masapur ey allagragsak taku tey sey sunudnu ey nivilang ey natuy at ummuli. Natarak kon nad-asan.’”
42016001	Nampani kasin as Jesus asda pasurutna ey kanana, “Awad sey usa ey baknang ey nangimpiyar assey amin ey vinaknangna assey usa ey mangimpapangat asda ansisipputuna. Kon awad sey nangimbaga an siya ey sey tagu ey piniyarna at vusvuvusvusuna sey pilak sey apuna.
42016002	At impaayagna siya ey kanana, ‘Ngan sey jingngorku anna miipanggop an sika? Iyalim sey listaan sey amin ey nipiyar an sika tey kaanuk sika ey mangila asda laksunku.’
42016003	Kanan sey tagu assey somsomokna, ‘Ngan nin sey kook assey sana? Anna ey kaanunak assey apuk kon niippun lamugku ey mangwa asda angkadagsun ey siput ya maviinak ey umuy ampalpalimus.
42016004	Ah, agammuk sey kook, ta nu makaanak assey siputku, awadda vub-urunku ey amasakey an sa'un.’
42016005	At impaayagna da amin ey nakautang assey apuna at inimusna assey usa nu kam-ana sey utangna.
42016006	Summongbat ey kanana, ‘Singgasut ey ammutu ey mantika.’ At kanan sey inggow piniyar sey baknang, ‘Annaya sey listaan sey utangnu, pilmaam ta iggata as limampuru ey ammutu anggey.’
42016007	At inimusna vus assey mikagwa ey kanana, ‘Sika pey, kam-ana sey utangnu?’ ‘Singgasut ey caban ey vugas,’ kanan sey nakautang. At kanan vus sey inggow piniyar sey baknang, ‘Anna sey listaan sey utangnu, pilmaam ta iggata as warumpuru anggey.’
42016008	Inagammun pun sey apuna sey kingwan sey nasilib ey piniyarna, jinayowna sey kinasilibna ey nannanmok assey ikataguna. Tey tuttuwa ey da tagu ey niippun agammuda an Apudyus at sin-umamud sey silibda nu dasey nasilawan sey somsomokda miipanggop asda niilluvungan ey makwamakwa.”
42016009	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “At ibagak an dakayu ey pasurutku, usarunyu sey vinaknangyu assey luta as mikavub-urunanyu asda asintataguyu ta nu jumatong sey timpu ey niippun muusaran sey pilak, padatngon dakayu ad langit ey iggawanyu as ing-inggana.
42016010	“Sey tagu ey mapiyar ey mangjun asda akittan ey nipurang an siya, mapiyar vus as dasey adjuwan. Kon sey aji pun mapiyar ey mangjun assey akittan, aji pun vus mapiyar asda adjuwan.
42016011	At nu aji kayu mapiyar ey mangjun assey niilluvungan ey vinaknang, ngan annunyu ey mapiyar assey tuttuwa ey vinaknang?
42016012	Tey nu aji kayu mapiyar ey mangjun assey pilak da ujum, niippun vus mangatud an sika as angkuwam?
42016013	“Aji pun mabalin ey juwa sey apun sey usa ey alipan tey siguraju ey ipatpatigna sey usa ya sang-ana sey usa. At aji pun mabalin ey anggisanunyu ey manservi an Apudyus ya sey pilak.”
42016014	Jingngor pun da Farisis sey imbagan Jesus, inam-amangda ey nangamsiw tey siya nabarbalor an jida sey pilak.
42016015	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Dakayu, ipippiilayu ey ambaru kayu assey atan da tagu kon agammun Apudyus sey awad assey somsomokyu tey dasey ivilang da tagu as napatig at da jiyuy dasey niippun balorna an Apudyus.
42016016	“Sey Lintog Moses ya dasey ingkur-it da Profet assey kar-argow at siya sey apporoyu inunud inggana assey timpun John ey Amvuvunyag. At mallugi an John ey Amvuvunyag, nitudtuju sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus ya adjuwan dasey mangimpapilit ey mijuga.
42016017	Kon ajiyu kanan ey maggey miyaw-awan sey urey kalangpawan ey lintog Apudyus tey allaslasu paan sey luta ya langit as muumas nu sey kalangpawan ey Lintog Apudyus as maggey mamiid.”
42016018	Kanan vus Jesus, “Sey laraki ey mangidang assey asawana ya nangasawa kasin, nakabasur siya assey dagdagas. Kama vus assey laraki ey mangasawa assey vubai ey naidangan at nakabasur vus assey dagdagas.”
42016019	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Inggow sey usa ey baknang ey allurumvun as angkangina ya inag-agow ey pasig allamram-ey ya mangamangan asda ampipiya ey makan.
42016020	Inggow vus siji sey usa ey lumawa ey angngadan as Lazarus ey nagulgullidan sey long-agna ey inag-agow ey iinggow assey sawang sey baknang
42016021	ey manguulley nu awad lawa vugta as yakayakun sey baknang ta awad maniparna assey inuratna. Ya urey da asu at simusimutanda sey gulidna.
42016022	“Natuy pun sey lumawa sana, inniyuy dasey enjel assey iggawan Abraham ey mikaragsak ad langit. Natuy pun vus as baknang, illavunda.
42016023	At amud sey matongtong-agana ad Hades. Nantangad pun, innilana as Abraham assey addayuwan ya as Lazarus ey nidodor-ag an siya.
42016024	Namvugga as baknang ey kanana, ‘Ama Abraham, kumadaguka pit pey ta ibaarnu as Lazarus ta isowsowna lawa sey murjung sey tammujuna assey danum ta ipatidtidna assey jilak ta tumagaliyong lawa tey anna ey amud sey tongtong-agku assey apuy anna!’
42016025	Kon kanan Abraham, ‘Sika ey anakku, ey naliwatam sey natatagguwam assey luta ey wadawad amin da ambabaru an sika kon as Lazarus, pasig ey ligat sey nilak-amna kon assey sana, niippun ogon matongtong-agana, kon an sika, lak-amun sey tongtong-ag.
42016026	Ya usa pey, niippun agammuni ey umali assey iggawam tey anna sey nambobbootan taku ey dokor ya adarum ey karangkang at urey nu awad maryad ey umali sinaʼt, aji pun mabalin tey niippun ayuna. Anungna vus an dakayuʼsnaʼt, aji pun vus mabalin ey umali kayu assey iggowni.’
42016027	“At kanan baknang, ‘Nu kanaʼsnaʼt Apu, ipangngaasim ta ibaarnu as Lazarus as vuruy da ama,
42016028	tey awad da lima ey sunudku ta umuyna bagbagaan jida ta ajida atyén vus umali assey iggawak anna tey amud sey sigabna.’
42016029	“Kon kanan Abraham, ‘Nu miipanggop asda sunudnu, awad sey ingkur-it Moses ya dasey profet as manudtuju an jida. Masapur dongronda atyén dasey ingkur-itda.’
42016030	“Summongbat sey baknang ey kanana, ‘Oon, ama Abraham, kon nu awad atyén pigey umuli as natuy ey umuy mangimbaga an jida, siguraju ey ibabawida dasey basurda.’
42016031	“Kon kanan Abraham an siya, ‘Nu ajida dongron sey imbagan Moses ya dasey profet assey surat, urey awad umuli as natuy at ajida pun pey dallu dongron.’”
42017001	Kanan Jesus asda pasurutna, “Awad dasey makwamakwa ey allapuwan sey vumasuran dasey tagu kon kadagdagu sey tagu ey mangwa as lapun sey vumasuran da ujum!
42017002	Unina at nu awad mitakud as dokor ey batu assey bagangna ya nipitlak assey beybey nu sey awad koona as vumasuran dasey nababa ey tagu.
42017003	At siya sey annadanyu dasey kookoonyu! “Nu awad vumasuran sey vurunnu an sika, bagbagaam siya at nu ambabawi, pakawanum.
42017004	Ya urey nu mangimpitu ey vumasur an sika assey usa ey ag-agow ya mangimpitu ey umali ey ampakawan, masapur ey pakawanum.”
42017005	Gumminga dasey aposel Jesus ey kananda, “Apu, pakasdorom atyén sey pammatini.”
42017006	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Nu awad pammatiyu as anungna sey kaban-it sey vukar sey mustasa, mabalin ey kananyu assey kayu annaʼt ey sikamor, ‘Mabagutka ya mimuraka assey beybey at makwa tuttuwa.’”
42017007	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nu as gagara ya awad usa an dakayu as awad alipanna ey jummatong ey ummuy nalluwang unnu ummuy nambantey asda karneru, ey kanam pun lawa an siya, ‘Umalika ta manganka.’
42017008	Dakumpun mit as siyaji sey ibagayu, nu aji, ‘Ingka orsan sey lumvunnu ta isaganam sey kanuk anda inumuk ta nu maasak ey mangan, asika at mibanus.’
42017009	Ya ajika pun vus ansaramat an siya gapu ta kingwana sey imbagam ey koona.
42017010	Anungna vus an dakayu nu koonyu sey amin ey imvilin Apudyus ey koonyu, kananyu ey, ‘Alipan kani anggey at kingwani sey viyangni.’”
42017011	Assey anna ey umuy da Jesus ad Jerusalem, nanguyda assey nambobbootan sey provinsiyan sey Samaria ya Galili.
42017012	Anna pun ey umdasda assey usa ey vubruy, inabot dasey simpuru ey tagu ey masakit as ngupungup. Intatakjugda ey niyadayu
42017013	ey kananda ey mangimvugga, “Apu Jesus, kadaguwam pit pey dakani!”
42017014	Innilan pun Jesus jida, kanana, “Ingkayu ampiila asda paji.” Anna pun ey umuyda, maggey nakaan dasey ngupungup ey sakitda.
42017015	Kingwan pun sey usa an jida assey anna ey nagiknana ey nakaan sey sakitna, nampuuli ey nangimvugga assey dayowna an Apudyus.
42017016	Jummatong pun assey iggawan Jesus, nallikkadang assey sinagungna at amud sey saramatna. ISamaria sey tagu sana ey nampuuli.
42017017	At kanan Jesus, “Simpuru mit dasey nakaan sey sakitda. Gumman da siyam nu?
42017018	Ngey pa vus gey sa'an ya sabali ey tagu sey nampuuli ey ampasaramat an Apudyus?”
42017019	Kanan Jesus assey laraki saji, “Sumikadka at ta ingkan tey gapu assey pammatim at vummaruka.”
42017020	Usa pun ey ag-agow, inggow dasey Farisis ey nangimus an Jesus nu makanu sey mansardan sey Turey Apudyus. At kanan Jesus an jida, “Sey Turey Apudyus at niippun mangillasinan nu makanu sey mansardana.
42017021	Niippun vus mangimbaga ey kanana, ‘Annaʼs sanna!’ unnu ‘Ilanyu man ya, anjiʼs sanji!’ Tey sey Turey Apudyus at awad assey somsomok dasey mamati an siya.”
42017022	Kanan Jesus asda pasurutna, “Oni at jumatong sey timpu ey piunyu atyén ilan as urey lawa sin-akitan sey Anak ji Tagu kon aji pun mabalin.
42017023	At awad dasey mangimbaga ey kananda, ‘Ingkayu ilan, awad as sanji!’ unnu ‘Umali kayu ta ilanyu tey annaʼs sanna!’ Kon aji kayu maggey mamati ya umuy mangila.
42017024	Tey sey ampuuliyén sey Anak ji Tagu at niippun aji mangila tey anungna sey kuliyabbang ey jilangana amin ad langit.
42017025	Kon masapur ey lak-amuk yén sey amud ey tongtong-ag ya ajiyak pun ivilang asda tagu ey matattagu assey sana.
42017026	“Sey nakopyaan dasey tagu nu ampuuliyak at anungna sey nakwa assey timpun Noah.
42017027	Assey timpu saji, anturturuy da tagu ey mangwa asda koonda. Mangamangan, umin-inum ya man-as-asawa da ujum inggana assey ag-agow ey summakayan da Noah assey bapor at anna ey malitap sey luta ya naminda nuuvur.
42017028	Anungna vus assey timpu ey iniiggawan da Lot ad Sodom. Nanturturuy vus da tagu ey mangwa assey koonda. Mangamangan, umin-inum, ngumina ya antintinda, ammurmura ya ampatakjug da ujum as vuruy
42017029	inggana assey timpu ey tineynan Lot sey ili saji asi at mayakayak sey apuy ya sey vummabara ey batu ey kananda ey sulfur at naminda nasgub.
