42017030	Kanaʼsna vus sey makwa ey niippun kanan da tagu ey awad makwa ya anna at ey jummatong sey ag-agow ey mipiil-an sey Anak ji Tagu.
42017031	“At assey nait ey timpu, sey tagu ey niyaspur ey inggow as pawey at aji pun masapur sumakey ey mangara asda usarna, kama vus asda awad as payow, aji pun vus masapur ey vumokrada.
42017032	Ey ajiyu pun naliwatan sey nakwa an asawan Lot?
42017033	Tey dasey mangimpapangug assey viyagda assey luta anna at matuyda dallu kon dasey aji pun mangimpapangug assey viyagda gapu an sa'un ey urey nu siya sey ikatuyda at misarakanda.
42017034	Nu as gagara ya lavi sey ampuuliyak ya awad juwa as tagu ey nandodor-ag ey nasusuyup, maara sey usa ya nateynan sey usa.
42017035	Nu awad juwa as vubai ey ambayu, maara sey usa ya nateynan sey usa.
42017036	Anungna vus nu awad juwa as laraki ey mansiput as payow, maara sey usa ya nateynan sey usa.”
42017037	At kanan da pasurut Jesus, “Gonaʼsna sey makwaana nauy Apu?” Sinongbatan Jesus assey pani ey kanana, “Nu ngan sey iggawan sey ladag as jiyuy vus sey madagupan da titit ey mangan assey ladag.”
42018001	Oni pun, inul-ullit Jesus asda pasurutna sey usa ey pani ta tudtujuwana jida ey masapur atyén kanayunda ey malluwaru ta ajida ngumaya.
42018002	Kanana, “Inggow sey usa ey uwis assey usa ey ili ey niippun ugyatna an Apudyus ya alliwliw-ana pey lawa dasey asintataguna.
42018003	Inggow vus sey usa ey baru assey ili saji ey ampuupuuli ey umuy assey uwis ey ampangpangaasi ey kanana, ‘Turunganak pit pey ta ajiyak abakun assey kajinnarumku.’
42018004	Nabayag ey ajin pun sey uwis dongron. Kon ummanungus pun ey nappug, kanana assey somsomokna, ‘Urey gey nu niippun ugyatku an Apudyus ya alliwliw-ak pey lawa da tagu,
42018005	turungak at pey lawa sey baru anna tey nappugak ya tomorong at lawa ya tumaktak ey ampuupuuli.’”
42018006	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Urey gey nu lawingan sey uwis saji, sommosommokonyu sey imbagana.
42018007	At nu kananaʼsji sey kingwan sey uwis, ey kinggura vus ta aji am-amud sey koon Apudyus ey manurung asda pinilina ey taguna ey alluwaluwaru an siya assey inag-agow ya nilavi? Ey ilidjulidjuna pun lawa ey tumurung?
42018008	Sey ibagak an dakayu, atjuna ey dagus sey ambaru ey mitagop an jida. Kon as daan ey ag-agow ey ampuuliyén sey Anak ji Tagu, ey awad pun lawa nin udasana as nanlon ey namati an siya?”
42018009	Kasin vus as Jesus nampani as dasey tagu ey miming-op assey kinaambaruda ya amsiwunda da ujum ey tagu.
42018010	Kanana, “Inggow da juwa ey tagu ey ummuy nalluwaru assey Tempel. Farisis sey usa ya mansisingil as vuur sey usa.
42018011	Summakey pun sey Farisis ey tummalin ad darum, insaradna ey malluwaru, kanana, ‘Apudyus, mansaramatak tey ajik pun anungun da ujum ey tagu ey amud sey agumda, lukuda ya dada mikadagdagas. Ya mansaramatak tey dakumpunak as lawingan ey tagu ey anungna sey usa ey anjiʼs sanji ey mansisingil as vuur.
42018012	Tey sa'un at mamigwaak mallangan assey makajuminggu ya apporok atjun sey pagkapuruk assey amin ey mikatangdanak.’
42018013	“Kon sey mansisingil as vuur, inggow atgey assey adayu ey ajina pun itangad ad langit nu aji tijutijuguna sey barukungna as mambabawiyana ey kanana, ‘Apudyus, madaguka an sa'un ey ambasbasur.’”
42018014	Iyyanungus Jesus ey kanana, “Isigurajuk an dakayu ey sey ummayow ey napakawan sey basurna at sey mansisingil as vuur ey dakumpun assey Farisis saji. Tey sey mangimpangatu assey long-agna at mipababa kon sey ampakumbaba at siya sey mipangatu.”
42018015	Usa pun ey ag-agow, inggow dasey nangiyyuy asda anakda an Jesus ta ipateyna sey imana ey mamindisyun an jida. Innilan pun dasey pasurutna iningoranda jida.
42018016	Kon inayagan Jesus dasey anak at kanana asda pasurutna, “Amorna ey umali dasey anak an sa'un. Ajiyu sang-an jida tey sey mijuga assey Turey Apudyus at anungda dasey anak anna.
42018017	Ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa, sey tagu ey mijuga assey Turey Apudyus at jida dasey napakumbaba ey anungna dasey anak anna.”
42018018	Inggow sey usa ey ap-apun da Jews ey nangimbaga an Jesus ey kanana, “Sika ey ambaru ey Misturu, ngan sey kook ta maatdanak as viyag ey niippun patinggana?”
42018019	Kanan Jesus, “Ngey pamla kanan ey ambaruwak? Niippun ujum as ambaru nu aji anggey as Apudyus.
42018020	Ya agammum mit vus dasey Lintog Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Ajika mikadagdagas, ajika gumngat, ajika an-akow, ajika mantistigu as inuussat ya rispituwum da amam an inam.’”
42018021	At kanan sey laraki saji, “Ingkaban-ugku ey nanguunnud asda lintog sanat.”
42018022	Jingngor pun Jesus jiyuy, kanana an siya, “Awad pey dallu sey sa'an ey kurangnu. Ingka ingina da amin ey awad an sika ya atjum sey nginana asda lumawa ta maatdanka as vinaknang ad langit ya umalika ta ambalinka as pasurutku.”
42018023	Kon jingngorna pun sey imbagan Jesus saji, lummawing sey somsomokna tey amud sey vinaknangna.
42018024	Assey nangintollongan Jesus an siya ey anjujuuy, kanana, “Mansigab sey sumakayan sey baknang assey Turey Apudyus!
42018025	Allaslasu sey lumnokan sey kemel assey abvut sey tanud nu sey sumakayan sey baknang assey Turey Apudyus.”
42018026	Jingngor pun da tagu sey imbagan Jesus saji, kananda, “At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, niippun mabalin ey misarakan?”
42018027	Kon kanan Jesus, “Sey aji pun mabalin ey koon da tagu, mabalin ey koon Apudyus.”
42018028	Kanan Peter ey gumminga, “Dakani pey? Tineynanni mit dasey amin ey awad an dakani ta umunud kani an sika as ampasurutnu.”
42018029	Sinongbatan Jesus ey kanana, “Tuttuwa, kon isigurajuk an dakayu ey sey maneynan assey vuruyna unnu asawana unnu susunudna unnu dakdakorna unnu anakna gapu assey manserviyana assey Turey Apudyus,
42018030	at sin-umaju sey atjun Apudyus an siya assey sana ey matatagguwana. Ya assey daan ey ag-agow, maatdan siya as viyag ey niippun patinggana.”
42018031	Intar-an Jesus da nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna asina at kanan, “Agammuyu ey intaku ad Jerusalem. At nu jumatong taku siji, amin dasey ingkur-it dasey profet assey kar-argow miipanggop assey Anak ji Tagu at tumuttuwa.
42018032	Mipurangak asda Gentil asida at sa'un malliwliw-an ya vibviinun ya tuppatuppaan.
42018033	Bokbokonak ya asiyak at gongatun kon assey mikatlu ey ag-agow, umuliyak vus pigey.”
42018034	Kon as dasey pasurutna, ajida pun maawatan nu ngan sey uguugujuna tey kama as nitataru sey piuna ugujun at niippun maawatanda.
42018035	Anna pun ey umadani da Jesus ad Jericho, inggow sey usa ey vurag ey tummutukju assey igid sey daran ey ampalpalimus.
42018036	Jingngorna pun da amud ey tagu ey allaus, inimusna nu ngan sey makmakwa.
42018037	At kanan da tagu an siya, “Anna ey allaus as Jesus ey iNazareth.”
42018038	Kingwan pun sey vurag saji, namvugga ey kanana, “Jesus ey anak David, madaguka an sa'un!”
42018039	Iningoran da tagu ey amangngupangngu ta iginokna atyén kon iyyam-amudna at avus ey namvugga, “Sika ey ganak David, madaguka an sa'un!”
42018040	Nibatug pun as Jesus, intakjugna asina at ibaga asda ujum ey tagu ta iyadanida an siya sey vurag. Ummadani pun sey vurag saji, kanan Jesus,
42018041	“Ngan sey pium ey kook an sika?” At kanana ey summongbat, “Apu, piuk atyén ey makaila.”
42018042	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Oon, allangrangaka, gapu assey pammatim at vumaruka.”
42018043	At nakaan ey dagus sey vuragna at mabalin ey makaila ya ummunud an Jesus ey apporow ampasapasaramat an Apudyus. At urey da tagu ey nangila assey nakwa saji at jinaydayowda as Apudyus.
42019001	Jummatong pun da Jesus ad Jericho ey allausda assey vubruy,
42019002	inggow sey usa ey baknang ey ap-apun dasey mansisingil as vuur ey angngadan as Zacchaeus.
42019003	Piuna atyén ilan as Jesus kon gapu ta ansokba, aji pun makaila gapu assey kaajun da tagu.
42019004	Kingwana pun, nanuddak ey namangu nu da tagu asi at kumrab assey usa ey kayu ey kananda ey sikamor ta awad agammuna ey mangila an Jesus nu mallaus.
42019005	Nibatug pun as Jesus assey iggowna, nantangad ey nangila an Zacchaeus at kanana, “Zacchaeus, lumogsadka tey masapur mandagusak assey vuruyyu assey sana.”
42019006	Nan-ilogsad Zacchaeus ey amud sey layadna ey nangimpuyut an Jesus assey vuruyda.
42019007	Kon singunguju da tagu ey nangila ey kananda, “Pana kan siji? Pa vus umuy ampamangili tagu anna assey vuruy sey usa ey amud sey basurna?”
42019008	Assey iggawanda assey vuruy, summikad as Zacchaeus at kanana an Jesus, “Apu, atjuk sey kagugwan sey vinaknangku as dasey lumawa ya nu awad kinusitku, mangimpatuk sey kaajuna ey ipuuli assey nangar-ak.”
42019009	Kanan Jesus an siya, “Dakayu ey simbaryan, assey sana ey ag-agow, nasarakan kayu tey dakayu sey ustu ey ganak Abraham.
42019010	Tey sey Anak ji Tagu, ummali ey umuy manganap ya manginsarakan as dasey natarak ey tagu.”
42019011	Dodongron da tagu sey amin ey ibagabagan Jesus. At gapu ta tigangeyda jumatong ad Jerusalem, adjuwan dasey tagu ey kananda assey somsomokda ey misarad nin assey sana sey Manturayan Apudyus. At gapu assey nauy ey kasomsomkan da tagu, nampani as Jesus,
42019012	ey kanana, “Awad sey usa ey nangatu ey tagu ey ummuy assey addayuwan ey ili ta ivurnuyda sey kinaArina asi at ampuuli assey ilida ey manturey.
42019013	Assey daanna pun lumibbatan, inayagana da simpuru ey alipanna at innatdana jidaʼs sin-us-a ey pilak ey vurawan at kanana an jida, ‘Anna, ilanyu sey koonyu ta ipaajuyu inggana as ampuuliyak.’
42019014	Kon da tagu ey kailiyana, sumangada an siya at nangimbaarda as amangpangu umuy mangimbaga assey simviyang ey manjutuk as Ari ey kananda, ‘Sumanga kani an siya ey ambalin as Arini.’
42019015	Kon najutukan dallu siya ey nambalin as Ari at nampuuli ey manturey. At impaayagna ey dagus da simpuru saji ey alipanna ta agammuwuna nu kam-ana sey ummajuwan sey pilakna ey innatjuna an jida.
42019016	Ummuy sey usa at kanana, ‘Apu Ari, sey sa'an ey pilak ey vurawan ey innatjum at ummanak as simpuru.’
42019017	‘Ustu sey kingwam,’ kanan sey Ari. ‘Ambaruka ey alipan. At gapu ta mapiyarka ey nangjun assey akit ey innatjuk an sika, ambalinuk sika as turey sey simpuru ey danakkor ey vubruy.’
42019018	Ummuy vus sey mikagwa ey alipan at kanana, ‘Apu Ari, sey sa'an ey pilak ey vurawan ey innatjum an sa'un at ummanak as lima.’
42019019	At kanan vus Ari, ‘Nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ambalinuk sika as turey sey lima ey danakkor ey vubruy.’
42019020	Ummuy vus sey usa ey alipan, kanana, ‘Apu Ari, annaya sey pilaknu ey innatjum an sa'un. Kinupikupak asik at itarpun ta aji matarak
42019021	tey umugyatak an sika tey amudka vus pey tey aram sey dakumpun as kuwam ya aniyun sey dakumpun as inyosoknu.’
42019022	Summongbat sey Ari ey kanana, ‘Kinumbotka ey alipan. Sey imbagam vus pigey sey lapuna as mangoddongak an sika. Nu agammum ey kanaʼsna sey nakopyaak ey arak sey dakumpun as kuwak ya aniyuk sey dakumpun as inyosokku,
42019023	pam lawa aji imbangku sey pilakku ta assey sana ey nampuuliyak, awad atyén lawa akit as anakna?’
42019024	At kanan sey ari asda angkatakjug, ‘Aranyu sey pilak an siya ta atjunyu assey nanggaransiya assey simpuru ey pilak.’
42019025	Kon kananda an siya, ‘Ayaka vus Apu, awad mit an siya sey simpuru.’
42019026	At kanan vus sey Ari ey summongbat, ‘Tuttuwa, kon ibagak an dakayu ey sey tagu ey mapiyar ey mangjun assey naatud an siya at majugjug-an kon sey tagu ey aji pun mapiyar ey mangjun assey naatud an siya, urey sey akit ey awad an siya at misopsop makaan.
42019027	Ya miipanggop ey asda kavusurku ey sumanga an sa'un ey man-Ari, iyaliyu ta gongatunyu jida assey sinagungku.’”
42019028	Naas pun Jesus imbaga da jiyuy ey pani an jida, inturuyda ey ummuy ad Jerusalem ey siya sey namapangngu.
42019029	Anna pun ey umadanida ad Bethfagi ya ad Bethany, intakjugda assey pon-ad sey vilig ad Olib asina at ibaar da juwa ey pasurutna,
42019030	ey kanana, “Ipangpanguyu assey vubruy anji ey jujummangun taku. At nu umdas kayu assey pudayan, awad sey nitatakkud ey ubvun sey donkey ey aji pun nakabkabayuwan. Uggasunyu ta iyaliyu sina.
42019031	At nu awad anukna an dakayu as kanana, ‘Payu maggey uggasun nait?’ Ibagayu ey kasapuran sey Apu.”
42019032	Ummuy pun dasey nibaar saji, tummuttuwa dasey amin ey imbagan Jesus an jida.
42019033	Anna pun ey uggasunda sey kiddong sey donkey, kanan dasey singkuwa, “Ngey payu maggey uggasun donkey sanat?”
42019034	At kananda ey summongbat, “Kasapuran sey Apu.”
42019035	Vinutvutda at iniyuyda an Jesus. Asida at kaanun sey gotap dasey lumvunda at iyyap-apda assey ujug sey donkey asi at as Jesus mangabayu.
42019036	Assey angakabbayuwan Jesus, iyyap-ap da tagu sey lumvunda assey daran ey ayuna as dayowda an siya.
42019037	Anna pun ey an-usugda assey tagudtud ad Olib ey umadanida ad Jerusalem, amud sey layad dasey adjuwan ey pasurutna at insaradda ey mangimvugga assey dayowda an Apudyus asda innilada ey nakaskasdaow ey kingwana.
42019038	Kananda ey nangimvugga, “Madayow sey Ari taku ey imbaar Apudyus! Gapu an siya, tumarna ad langit, Madayow as Apudyus ey kangatuwan ad langit!”
42019039	At kananda ujum ey Farisis ey nijujugga as dasey amud ey tagu, “Apu misturu, Ingoram man dasey pasurutnu annat ta guminokda!”
42019040	Kon kanan Jesus, “Nu iginokda, miyoros dasey batu anna ey mamvugga.”
42019041	Ummadani pun da Jesus ad Jerusalem ey miila ogon sey vubruy, nan-ivil gapu assey daguna.
42019042	Kanana, “Dakayu ey iJerusalem, maagammuwanyu atyén urey assey sana ey ag-agow nu ngan sey mangatud as vumaruwanyu. Kon nitataru nauy ey pannakaagammu an dakayu assey sana.
42019043	Jumatong sey timpu ey salibawbawan dakayu as dasey kavusuryu ya nangwada as sijil asida at dakayu bakkungun ta niippun agammuyu ey umawid.
42019044	Ikur-ubda dasey vuruyyu ya gongatunda da tagu ey ummili. Aminunda iwalis da batu ta niippun miila as tuping. Kanaʼsna sey makwa tey ajiyu pun vinigvig sey ummaliyan Apudyus ey manginsarak an dakayu.”
42019045	Summakey pun as Jesus assey Tempel, koona ey mangimpalogsad asda mantintinda
42019046	ey kanana, “Nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey ‘Sey vuruyku at muusar as alluwaruwan da tagu an sa'un.’ Kon kingwayu at avus as mallukuwanyu asda asintataguyu!”
42019047	Naas pun jiyuy, inag-agow ey umuy mantudtuju as Jesus assey Tempel. Kon dasey papangat da papaji ya da mimisturun sey Lintog anda papangat da tagu at anaanapunda nu ngan annunda ey mangngat an siya
42019048	kon niippun an-annunda ey mangwa tey losan da tagu maryad ey mandongor assey amin ey ibagana.
42020001	Usa pun ey ag-agow, assey mantudtujuwan Jesus assey tempel ya mangimpaagammuwana asda tagu assey miipanggop assey Ambaru ey Damag, ummuy da ap-apun da papaji, da mimisturun sey Lintog ya da angkamarong-ag ey pangat da Jews
42020002	at kananda an siya, “Ngey karobbongam ey mangwa asda kookoom sanat? Ngey nangatud assey karobbongam?”
42020003	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Imusuk udyén an dakayu ta songbatanyu.
42020004	Ngan sey nangatud an John as kalintogan ey amvunyag asda tagu, ey as Apudyus unnu tagu?”
42020005	At insaradda ey man-asitinnupak ey kananda, “Ngan sey isongbat taku? Nu kanan taku ey as Apudyus sey nangatud, kanana vus ey payu aji pinati siya nu'?
42020006	At nu kanan taku vus ey tagu sey nangatud, atééy, yangey ajin jitaku batuwun asda tagu ey annaʼsna tey losanda mit mamati ey usa as John ey profet.”
42020007	At kananda, “Toan, niippun agammuni nu ngan sey nangatud.”
42020008	At kanan vus Jesus, “Nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ajik pun vus ibaga nu ngan sey nangatud assey lobbongku ey mangwa asda kookook.”
42020009	Nampani as Jesus asda tagu ey kanana, “Inggow sey tagu ey nammura as greps assey lutana asina at ipapuut asda tagu ta mavilley. Oni pun ummuy assey sabali ey ili at nabayag siji.
42020010	Jummatong pun sey imvuvuras asda greps, imbaarna sey usa ey alipanna ey umuy mangara assey villeyna. Kon kingwan pun da inggow amupuut assey luta, pinang-okda sey alipan saji asida at paryawun ey niippun innatjunda.
42020011	At kasin nambaar sey singkuwa assey luta as sabali ey alipan kon kama vus sey kingwada ey namang-ok an siya asida at vibviinun ya pinaryowda ey niippun innatjunda.
42020012	Urey nu kanaʼsji, kasin pey dallu nambaar as mikatlu ey alipan kon vinakagda at avus asida at siya paryawun lasinun.
42020013	Ummanungus pun, kanan sey singkuwa assey luta, ‘Ngan sey mabalin ey kook? Ibaarku sey pipiuk ey anakku, siguraju nin ey iviinda siya!’
42020014	Kon innilan pun dasey amupuut assey luta sey anakna ey imbaarna, kananda ey nan-uugud, ‘Atééy, annat! Siyana sey mangillaksun assey luta anna, gongatun taku ta angkuwa taku sey lutana!’
42020015	At kingwada pun, jinokmaanda at inniyuyda assey lasin sey namur-an as greps asida at gongatun.” Asin at Jesu kanan, “Assey somsomokyu, ngan sey koon sey silluta asda amupuut saji?
42020016	Siguraju ey umali at aminuna jida gongatun, asina at ipapuut asda ujum ey tagu.” Jingngor pun da tagu sey imbagan Jesus saji, kananda, “Na'id! Niippun makwa as jugan naʼt!”
42020017	Kon intollong Jesus jida ey kanana, “Nu aji nait makwa, ngan sey kipuuyan sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Sey batu ey iwwalin dasey ampatakjug as vuruy ey kananda ey niippun servina, siya at avus sey nambalin as kapatigan ey batu ey mangimpapagdot assey vuruy.’
42020018	At ngan ey sey tagu ey maotdag assey batu sana at mamokmok ya ngan ey sey tagu ey utmugan sey batu sana at mamokmok ey ambalin as tapuk.”
42020019	Jingngor pun da mimisturun sey Lintog ya da ap-apun da papaji sey pinanin Jesus, piunda atyén siya dokmaan assey siyaji ey timpu tey naawatanda ey jida atpey sey ibagabagana kon umugyatda asda tagu.
42020020	Assey timpu saji, insaradda ey manganap assey wayada ey amab-ali an Jesus. At pinasuksukanda da ujum ey tagu ta umuyda kanu pey tornon ey man-imus an Jesus tey sey piunda, awad atyén mikumbot as isongbatna ta awad man-akilanda ey mangindarum an siya an Gubernador. Tey as Gubernador anggey sey awad karobbongana ey manguwis an jida.
42020021	At ummuy dasey napasuksukan an Jesus at kananda, “Apu misturu, agammuni ey ustu amin sey ibagabagam ya sey tudtujum. Agammuni vus ey ajim pun antoktoknon da tagu tey man-iisu sey koom an jida urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt sey katataguda, nu aji siya itudtujum sey tuttuwa ey piun Apudyus ey koon sey tagu.
42020022	Ngan sey kanan sey lintog taku, ey mabalin ey ambayad kani as vuur an Emperor ad Rome unnu aji?”
42020023	Kon agammun Jesus sey bab-alida at kanana an jida,
42020024	“Angimpiila kayu uda as pilak.” Impiilada pun, kanana, “Ngan sey sin-iglatu ya singngadan as sanna?” “As Emperor,” kananda ey summongbat.
42020025	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Atjunyu an Emperor sey kuwana ya atjunyu vus pigey sey para an Apudyus.”
42020026	At dasey napasuksukan ey ummuy, niippun agammuda ey amab-ali an Jesus assey sinagung da tagu. At magda pey lawa gumminok tey nasdaowda assey angokoona ey sumongbat.
42020027	Assey timpu saji, inggow vus dasey ujum ey Jews ey kananda ey Sajusis ey jida dasey aji pun mamati ey kasin umuli dasey natuy assey daan ey ag-agow. Ummuyda an Jesus at kananda,
42020028	“Apu misturu, sey kanan sey lintog taku ey ingkur-it Moses, ‘Nu awad an-asawa ey ajida pun ummanak ya natuy sey laraki, masapur ey asawaun sey sunudna sey baru ta nu awad anakda miivilang as anak sey natuy saji ey laraki.’
42020029	At inggow dasey pitu ey mansusunud ey laraki. Nangasawa sey pangu kon natuy ey niippun anakda.
42020030	At vinnus sey mislon at kama vus ey niippun anakda at natuy.
42020031	Vinnus pun vus sey kumatlu, kanaʼsji vus sey nakwa. Pasig kanaʼsji inggana as losan sey baru inasawa da pitu sana ey ansusunud at naminda natuy ey niippun anakda.
42020032	Ummanungus pun natuy vus sey vubai saji.
42020033	At nu as gagara ya umuli da natuy assey daan ey ag-agow, ngan sey ustu ey sin-asawa assey vubai tey losanda mit siya inasawa.”
42020034	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Man-as-asawa da tagu assey luta anna
42020035	kon dasey ivilang Apudyus as awad karobbongana ey umuli ey umuy ad langit at ajida pun man-as-asawa siji.
42020036	Tey anungda dasey enjel ey ajida pun ogon matuy. Jida sey mivilang as aanak Apudyus tey ummulida at naatdanda as baru ey viyag.
42020037	Nu miipanggop ey avus assey umuliyén dasey natuy, urey as Moses at pinaniknikana nauy. Tey assey nakwa miipanggop assey gumilagilab ey kayu, imbagana sey miipanggop assey Apu ey siya sey Apudyus ey apporon da Abraham, Isaac ya as Jacob dayadayawun.
42020038	Sey piuna jiyuy ey ugujun, matagu kasin dasey natuy tey yangey mandayow dasey nanattuy? Tey as Apudyus at siya sey dayadayawun dasey natattagu tey an siya, amin ey mamati at sissiyada ey matattagu.”
42020039	Inggow da ujum ey mimisturun sey lintog ey kananda, “Apu, ambaru sey insongbatnu.”
42020040	At mansarad siji, niippun manginturud ey kasin mansarudsud an Jesus.
42020041	Oni pun kanan Jesus an jida, “Ngey pada lawa kanan ey sey ibaar Apudyus ey Cristu assey luta anna at siya sey ganak David?
42020042	Tey urey as David at ingkur-itna assey libnu ey Psalms ey kanana, ‘Kanan Apudyus assey Apuk: Tumukjuka assey padawananku
42020043	inggana as aminuk ipaabak dasey kavusurnu an sika.’”
42020044	Inturuy Jesus ey Kanana, “Nu inawagan David sey Cristu as Apuna, ngannuna vus ey siya sey singganak?”
42020045	Assey anna ey andodongngor dasey amud ey tagu, imbagan Jesus as dasey pasurutna kanana,
42020046	“Annadanyu dasey mimisturun sey Lintog. Mamaryadda ey gumakeygakey ey allurumvun asda ambabaru ya malungrunggayad ey lumvun ta awad mavigviganda. Mamaryadda vus ey maririspitu ya mamaryadda vus nu amin ey mangila an jida at kananda, ‘Ngey ayam Apu?’ Siya vus pipiunda tumukjuwan sey tukjun dasey nangatu assey sinagog ya kama vus nu awad umuyda mikakanan nu awadji amung.
42020047	Kon niippun viinda ey amab-ali as dasey baru ta pigpiga nu aranda dasey laksunda anda vuruyda asida at anjuanjuwun ey malluwaru ta ming-op kanu pey dasey tagu ey mangila. At gapu assey nauy ey kookoonda, andagdagsun sey jusada.”
42021001	Allangranga pun as Jesus, innilana dasey babaknang ey apporow angimpisuk as datunda assey iiggaan as pilak assey Tempel.
42021002	Innilana vus sey usa ey baru ey lumawa ey nangimpisuk assey juwa ey labrabong.
42021003	At kanan Jesus, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey ad-aju sey impisuk sey lumawa anna ey baru nu da amin ey impisuk dasey ujum.
42021004	Tey dasey ujum, subran pey lawa sey vinaknangda sey inatudda, kon sey baru anna, innaminna innatud sey intatarpunna ey usaruna atyén as ikataguna.”
42021005	Assey timpu saji, inggow da ujum ey pasurut Jesus ey manguguugud assey vinarun sey Tempél ey nakwa asda mambabaru ey batu ya dasey indatun da tagu as para an Apudyus ey inusarda ey nangang-angga assey Tempel. Kon kanan Jesus,
42021006	“Oni at jumatong sey timpu ey mamin mikur-ub da nauy ey apporoyu ilan ya niippun sa'an as batu as aji magiju tey maminda miwalis.”
42021007	Asida at kanan, “Apu misturu, makanu sey makwaan nait ya ngadan sey sinyar ey mangimmatunan ey tigangey jumatong nait ey timpu?”
42021008	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Ilanyu ta aji kayu maallilow. Tey adjuwan dasey umali ey kananda, ‘Sa'un sey muuulley ey imbaar Apudyus ey Cristu,’ ya kananda vus, ‘Jummatong assey sana sey timpuna.’ Kon ajiyu dongron jida.
42021009	Ya aji kayu vus umugyat nu awad dongronyu as anggugubat ya allarapun. Tey masapur makwa amin da nauy kon dakumpun as siyana sey anungus sey ag-agow.”
42021010	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Dasey tagu assey usa ey ili, gubatunda dasey sabali ey ili ya anungna vus ey manggiginnubat dasey tuturey.
42021011	Ya awad dasey jumatong ey kagguugyat ey lunig, amud ey urat, pang-or ya awad da miila ad langit ey nantokotokon ey kagguugyat ya nakaskasdaow ey sinyar.
42021012	“Kon assey daan da nauy makwaan, dokmaan ya tongtong-agunda dakayu. Vutvutun dakayu iyuy asda sinagog anda baballudan. Ya gapu assey pammatiyu an sa'un ipasanguda dakayu asda ari anda ujum ey turey.
42021013	Kon nauy sey wayayu ey mangimbaga an jida assey miipanggop an sa'un.
42021014	Iiggayu assey somsomokyu ey aji kayu madadannagan as isongbatyu nu jumatong jiyuy ey timpu
42021015	tey sa'un vus pigey sey mangimpaspasmok asda ugujunyu ya mangatud as liingyu ta ajin dakayu urgun as dasey kavusuryu ya ajida pun makaskuk assey ibagayu.
42021016	Assey timpu vus saji, urey dasey dakdakoryu, susunudyu, jujugayu ya vurunyu at ilumrum dakayu ya ipagngatda da ujum an dakayu.
42021017	Ya sasangngaan vus dakayu asda tagu gapu ta sa'un sey ummunudanyu.
42021018	Kon urey sey vuukyu at niippun sa'an as matarak.
42021019	Ipapatiyu sey pammatiyu ta mijuga kayu an Apudyus as ing-inggana.”
42021020	Kanan vus Jesus, “Nu ilanyu ey salibawbawan dasey amud ey surdaju ad Jerusalem, agammuyu ey tigangey sey milungvuwana.
42021021	At nu ad Judea sey iniiggawanyu assey timpu saji, umawid kayu at assey vilig. Ya nu ad Jerusalem sey iggowyu, ambakwit kayu at ya dasey awad ummayana, ajida pun masapur ey ampuuli assey vubruy.
42021022	Tey siyana sey timpun sey majusaan sey iJerusalem as tumuttuwaan sey amin ey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus.
42021023	Assey timpu saji, kadagdagu dasey navugi ya dasey ampasusu! Tey da tagu assey luta sana at amud sey matongtong-aganda ya giknaunda sey jusan Apudyus an jida.
42021024	Matuy da ujum assey bakag ya mitalley da ujum assey sabali ey ili ta ambalinda as alipan. At sey vubruy anna ey Jerusalem ey vubruy da Jews, abakun dasey Gentil ya jida sey manturey inggana as jumatong sey timpu ey mamungpungan Apudyus assey tureyda.”
42021025	“Assey timpu saji, awad sey kagguugyat ey makwa assey init, sorag ya dasey vituwun. Niippun mipaniyan sey ugyat da tagu ya man-amuwwongda as koonda assey dangsor sey agajuud sey beybey ya dalluyun.
42021026	Muurowda assey ugyatda assey manguullayanda nu ngan sey makwa assey luta tey masiwar dasey amin ey awad ad langit.
42021027	Ya assey timpu saji, amin dasey awad assey luta anna, ilanda sey Anak ji Tagu ey umali ey mivurun assey livuu. Ilanda sey sumilingana ya sey amud ey pannakabalinna.
42021028	At nu misarad amin da nauy ey makwa, pakasdoronyu sey somsomokyu ya allaylayad kayu tey tigangey sey manginsarakanan Apudyus an dakayu.”
42021029	Nampani kasin as Jesus an jida ey kanana, “Ilanyu man ya sey kayu anna ey fig ya da ujum ey kayu.
42021030	Nu mallagrag ya ilugida ey sumimit agammuyu ey tigangey sey dagun.
42021031	Anungna vus nu ilanyu ey isaradna ey makwa dasey imbagak, agammuyu ey tigangey sey Manturayan Apudyus.
42021032	Tuttuwa sey ibagak anna an dakayu ey aji pun matuy da amin ey tagu ey matattagu assey sana ya jummatong sey makwaan da amin ey imbagak.
42021033	Muumas man sey amin ey awad ad langit ya luta, kon aji pun maggey maatub dasey amin ey imbagak tey maminda makwa.”
42021034	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Man-annad kayu! Ilanyu ta dakumpun assey allamram-ayanyu sey patpatigunyu anda amvubvuuk ya dakumpun assey viyag assey luta anna sey apporoyu sosomkon. Tey nu kanaʼsji sey koonyu, siguraju ey makugwey kayu assey ag-agow ey umaliyan sey Anak ji Tagu tey aji kayu pun nakasagana.
42021035	Tey sey ag-agow saji at mipani assey mabkas ey ortib ey mangna asda amin ey awad assey luta.
42021036	Masapur ey mansasaggana kayu ey kanayun ya alluwaluwaru kayu an Apudyus ta awad kasdoryu ey angillasat asda amin anna ey makwa ya ambaru sey koonyu ey sumangu assey Anak ji Tagu.”
42021037	Inag-agow ey umuy as Jesus mantudtuju assey Tempél ya nu lumavi ey, ummuy assey tagudtud ad Olib umiyan.
42021038	Ya vinigat ey masapa dasey amud ey tagu ey madagup assey Tempél ey mandongor assey tudtujuna.
42022001	Assey tigangey jumatong sey vistan dasey Jews ey kananda ey Manomsomkan ey siya sey mangananda assey tinapey ey aji pun naipuwan,
42022002	anaanapun dasey ap-apun da papaji ya da mimisturun sey Lintog nu ngan annunda ey mangngat an Jesus ey aji atyén maagammuwan tey umugyatda as angguru da tagu.
42022003	Assey timpu saji, nallun-ug as Satanas an Judas Iscariot ey usa asda nasawaran as juwa ey aposel Jesus.
42022004	At ummuy nikabagbaga asda ap-apun da papaji ya ap-apun dasey guwarda assey Tempél ta mikaturag an jida nu ngan sey koona ey mangimpadokma an Jesus.
42022005	Amud sey layadda at nan-aavunanda ey bayadan as Judas.
42022006	Inavunan Judas sey nantuturaganda at insaradna ey manganap assey wayana ey mangimpadokma an Jesus ey niippun mangigammu.
42022007	Jummatong sey ag-agowʼn sey Vista ey mangananda assey Tinapey ey aji pun naipuwan ya timpu vus ey mamartiyanda as dasey karneru ey isidada assey Vista ey Manomsomkan.
42022008	At vinaar Jesus da Peter an John ey kanana, “Ingkayu isagana sey manganan taku assey Vista anna.”
42022009	At kanan da Peter an John, “Gona sey pium ey ingkani manginsaganaan?”
42022010	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Ingkayu ad Jerusalem. Nu umdas kayuʼsji, awad sey laraki ey mangabot an dakayu ey namvuvukud as banga ey nasasakjuwan. Unujunyu siya assey vuruy ey ayana
42022011	ya imusunyu assey simvuruy ey kananyu, ‘Imbagan sey Apu nu gona kanu sey kuwartu ey mikauvungana an dakani ey aposelna assey sana ey Vistan sey Manomsomkan.’
42022012	At ipuyutna ituju sey dokor ey kuwartu assey mikagwa ey garaju ey wadawad sey amin ey kasapuran taku. At isaganayu sey kanun takuʼsji.”
42022013	Ummuy da juwa sana at tummuttuwa sey amin ey imbagan Jesus at insaganada sey kanunda assey Manomsomkan saji.
42022014	Jummatong pun sey mangananda saji, tummukju da Jesus ya da aposelna,
42022015	at kanana an jida, “Piuk atyén pigey ey mikauvung an dakayu assey Vistan sey Manomsomkan anna ta asiyak at matongtong-ag.
42022016	Tey ibagak ey niippun mikauvungak kasin an dakayu assey juganna ey Vista ey Manonsomkan inggana as matongpar sey piuna ugujun assey Turey Apudyus.”
42022017	At innaran Jesus sey natatasa ey bayas at nampasaramat an Apudyus, asina at kanan an jida, “Aranyu ta an-at-atabanyu.
42022018	Tey ibagak an dakayu ey niippun ogon uminumak as jugannaʼt ey bayas inggana as jumatong sey Turey Apudyus.”
42022019	Innarana vus sey tinapey at nampasaramat an Apudyus, asina at pitpit-ingun ey nangiwwaras an jida ey kanana, “Nauy sey long-agku ey midatun as manubvut an dakayu. Nauy atyén sey kookoonyu as manomsomkanyu an sa'un.”
42022020	Naasda pun kinan, innarana vus sey usa ey natatasa ey bayas at kanana an jida, “Naya sey sintasa ey bayas ey siya sey kakkopya ey Turag Apudyus an dakayu. Makwa nauy assey mivukvukan sey darak as para an dakayu nu matuyak.
42022021	Kon anna ey mikauvung an jitaku sey malliput an sa'un.
42022022	Sey Anak ji Tagu, masapur matuy tey siya sey nibabagga ey makwa an siya kon kadagdagu akey lawa sey tagu ey malliput an siya.”
42022023	At illugin dasey aposel ey an-iinnimus nu ngadanna an jida sey manginturud ey mangwaʼs ji.
42022024	Inggow sey nansosongbatan dasey pasurut Jesus nu ngan sey kangatuwan an jida.
42022025	At kanan Jesus, “Dasey ari ya da ujum ey turey assey luta anna at ipilitda ipakwa sey piunda asda tagu ey iturturayanda ya piunda vus ey maawagan as tumuturung asda tagu.
42022026	Kon ajiyu anungun jida tey sey ambalin as kangatuwan at ambalinuna sey long-agna as kama as ujiji ey siya sey katurunganda. Ya sey ampangat an dakayu at siya sey ambalin as baba'arun.
42022027	Tey assey nakopyaan da tagu, ngan sey kangatuwan an jida? Ey sey tagu ey apporow manservi unnu sey tagu ey tutukju ey siya anggey as koona sey mangamangan? Agammu taku ey sey tagu ey tutukju at siya sey nangatu. Kon annaak ey nambalin as katurung ey manservi an dakayu.
42022028	“Dakayu sey apporow nangintatakjug an sa'un assey amin ey natongtong-agak.
42022029	At kook vus an dakayu sey kingwan Amak an sa'un. At gapu ta innatudna sey karobbongak ey manturey, atjuk vus an dakayu sey karobbonganyu ey manturey.
42022030	Ya mikauvung kayu an sa'un assey manturayak ya dakayu vus sey manginturey asda ginanakan dasey nasawaran as juwa ey anak Israel”
42022031	Kanan Jesus an Peter, “Sika ey Simon, dongrom sey ibagak anna an sika! Pinilit Satanas kudawun ey mamadas an dakayu losan ta ilana nu awad mitopa an dakayu ey kamaʼs mitopaan sey jugi ey misiyén assey vugasna.
42022032	Kon illuwaruwak sika Simon ta ajim man-awidan sey pammatim an sa'un ta nu mansinagungka kasin an sa'un, masapur pakasdorom sey pammatin dasey vurunnu.”
42022033	At kanan Peter ey summongbat, “Apu, nakasaganaak ey mijuga an sika ey mipisuk urey assey baballudan ya urey nu mikakatuyak an sika.”
42022034	Kon kanan Jesus, “Peter, anna sey ibagak an sika. Nu daan manullakuk assey lavi anna, mamitluwum ibaga ey niippun agammum an sa'un.”
42022035	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Assey nangimbaarak an dakayu ey ummuy nantudtuju ey niippun intakinyu as iiggaan as pilak, pasking unnu sapatus, ey awad nangkuranganyu?” “Niippun,” kananda ey summongbat.
42022036	“Kon assey sana,” kanan Jesus, “Itakinyu nu awad iiggaan as pilakyu anda paskingyu. Ya nu niippun bangidyu, ngumina kayu. Urey inginayu sey gotap sey lumvunyu nu niippun iyarayu.
42022037	Tey jummatong assey sana sey timpu ey masapur tumuttuwa sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop an sa'un ey kanana, ‘Miivilang siya as tulisan.’”
42022038	At kanan dasey pasurutna, “Apu, anna sey juwa ey bangid.” “Annaʼt pey vus!” kanan Jesus.
42022039	Naas pun jiyuy, lummogsad as Jesus at ummuy assey tagudtud ad Olib ey siya sey kanayun ey umuyna umiyanan at ummunud dasey pasurutna.
42022040	Jummatongda pun siji, kanan Jesus an jida, “Alluwaru kayu ta pakasdoron Apudyus sey pammatiyu ta aji kayu maabak assey sulisug.”
42022041	Oni pun tummar-an as Jesus an jida at nallikkadang ey malluwaru
42022042	ey kanana, “Ama, nu awad atyén kabalinana, ilisim sa'un assey sagrapuk anna ey tongtong-ag. Kon dakumpun assey piuk sey matongpar nu aji sey pium.”
42022043	At nampiila sey enjel ey narpuʼd langit ey nangimpakasdor an siya.
42022044	Assey amud ey sigab sey somsomokna, impapatina ey nalluwaru at lummuswa sey lingotna ey kamaʼs dara ey antidtidtid assey luta.
42022045	Naas pun nalluwaru, nampuuli assey iggawan da pasurutna at indasana jida ey nasusuyup gapu assey inayongda ey mangigikna assey sigab sey somsomokda.
42022046	At kanan Jesus, “Na! Pakayu vus masusuyup? Vumangun kayu ta malluwaru kayu ta aji kayu maabak assey sulisug.”
42022047	Assey gumingagingaan Jesus, nadanatong dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey manokma an siya ey impangat Judas ey usa asda nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna. Ummadani an Jesus ta ummauna,
42022048	kon kanan Jesus, “Pam ambalinun sey sinyar sey layad as sinyar sey malliputam assey Anak ji Tagu?”
42022049	Innilan pun dasey pasurut Jesus sey makwa sana, kananda, “Apu, ey mikabab-akag kani?”
42022050	At inukput sey usa asda pasurut Jesus sey bangidna at vinakagna sey alipan sey kangatuwan ey paji at naropngas sey padawanan ey ingana.
42022051	Kon kanan Jesus, “Annaʼt pey vus!” At inagpadana sey navigadan ey ingan sey alipan at napilat ey nipuuli sey ingana.
42022052	At Kanan Jesus asda ap-apun da papaji ya da ap-apun da guwardan sey Tempél ya dasey papangat ey ummuy manokma an siya, “Yangey kagguugyatak ey tagu ta ampa'ujun kayu as pang-ok anda bangid ey manokma an sa'un?
42022053	Vinigat ey iinggawak assey Tempél an dakayu, ngey payu sa'un aji jinokmaan siji? Kon jummatong sey nigoddong ey wayayu ya sey wayan sey pannakabalin sey gikbot.”
42022054	Jinokmaanda pun as Jesus, inniyuyda assey vuruy sey kangatuwan ey paji. Ummuunnud as Peter kon ummaaddayu.
42022055	Kon nan-apuy pun da guwarda assey pawey ey nalikubda, ummuy as Peter nikaaniju an jida.
42022056	Innilan pun sey usa ey vubai ey baba'arun as Peter assey nasilawan assey apuy, intollongna asina at kanan asda tagu, “Vurunna akey sey tagu anna.”
42022057	Kon namvuyég as Peter ey kanana, “Ngey ugujun gey lawa sey vubai anna! Yangey agammuk tagu sanaʼt?”
42022058	Panpannusan pun, inggow sey usa ey laraki ey nangimmatun an Peter at kanana, “Sika sey usa an jida.” Kon kanan vus Peter, “Na'id, dakumpun!”
42022059	Ummayow pun sey usa ey uras, inggow vus sey usa ey laraki ey nangimpapilit ey kanana, “Na! Niippun juwajuwana ey vurun Jesus tagu anna tey iGalili mit.”
42022060	Kon kanan Peter ey summongbat, “Niippun at pigey agammuk assey ugujum sanaʼt!” Sissiya ey guminga as Peter assey nanullakuk sey manuk
42022061	at nambaliwit as Apu Jesus ey nangila an siya. At ingkagasmok Peter sey inggow imbagan Jesus ey daan pun atgey manullakuk ya namitluwuna ibaga ey niippun agammuna an Jesus.
42022062	At ummayow as Peter ey ngumannganugngug ey man-ivil gapu assey sigab sey somsomokna.
42022063	Kingwan pun dasey amabantey an Jesus, vinungutda sey atana asida at isarad ey mamokbok ya mangut-utyuk an siya asida at mullokon ibaga, “Ayu uda, pugtuwam sey namokbok an sika!”
42022065	Ya miid ajida ibaga ey manginsurtu an siya.
42022066	Anna pun ey pumawey, nadagup dasey papangat da Jews ya dasey ap-apun da papaji ya da mimisturun sey Lintog asida ipasangu as Jesus an jida.
42022067	Kananda an siya, “Ibagam nu sika sey Cristu ey niposta ey umali.” Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Urey nu ibagak, aji kayu pun mit dallu mamati
42022068	ya nu awad imusuk, ajiyu kayu pun vus sumongbat.
42022069	Kon misarad assey sana, sey Anak ji Tagu, tumukju assey padawanan Apudyus ey Mannakabalin.”
42022070	At nanggigisanda losan ey nangimus ey kananda, “Pium ugujun sika sey Anak Apudyus?” Summongbat ey kanana, “Ustu sey imbagayu!”
42022071	At nagarabda losan ey kananda, “Ngan sey kasin taku anapun as manistigu assey basurna? Jingngor taku mit losan sey imbagana.”
42023001	Oni pun, lummibbatda losan at inniyuyda as Jesus an Gubernador Pilate. Jummatongda pun,
42023002	koonda ey mangimpabasur an siya ey kananda, “Sey tagu anna, naagammuwanni ey siya sey mangwamangwa as mabakasanni ey umili. Ya usa pey, kanana ey urey aji kani ambayad as vuur an Emperor ya kanana vus ey siya sey Cristu ey Ari.”
42023003	At inimus Pilate an Jesus ey kanana, “Ey sika sey Arin dasey Jews?” At kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Ustu sey imbagam!”
42023004	At kanan Pilate asda ap-apun da papaji ya da adjuwan ey tagu, “Niippun mit udasak as basur tagu anna.”
42023005	Kon ipapilitda ey kananda, “Gapu assey tudtujuna, naguru da tagu ad Judea mallugi ad Galili at anna ey inumdas sina.”
42023006	Jingngor pun Pilate sey imbagada sana, inimusna ey kanana, “Ey iGalili at pey tagu sana?”
42023007	Inagammun pun Pilate ey narpu as Jesus ad Galili ey sakup sey anturayan Herod Antipas, impuuyna as Jesus an Ari Herod tey niyaspur ey inggow ad Jerusalem assey Vista saji.
42023008	Innilan pun Herod as Jesus, amud sey layadna tey nabayag ey dongrodongrona sey miipanggop an siya at piuna ilan ya piuna ey mangila as urey lawa sa'an ey nakaskasdaow as koona.
42023009	At kaimuimus as Herod kon aji pun guminga as Jesus.
42023010	Ya anna dasey ap-apun da papaji ya da mimisturun sey Lintog ey angkasikad ey miid ajida ipilit ipabasur an siya.
42023011	Urey as Herod ya dasey surdajuna at ap-apporoanda ya inin-insurtuda as Jesus. Kingwada pun, nilumvunanda as anungna sey lumvun sey ari asida at ipuuli an Pilate.
42023012	At mansarad siji, vummaru ogon da Herod an Pilate tey assey keysan ey ag-agow at amvinnusurda.
42023013	Kingwan pun Pilate, impaayagna dasey ap-apun da papaji, da papangat ey Jews ya da ujum ey tagu,
42023014	at kanana, “Iyyaliyu indarum sey tagu anna an sa'un ey kananyu ey siya sey nangwa as mabakasan da tagu. Kon vinastigarku mit assey sinagungyu at niippun indasak as mangimpatuttuwa asda impabasuryu an siya.
42023015	Ya urey as Ari Herod at niippun vus indasana as basurna at siya sey nangimpuuliyana assey tagu anna an jitaku. At niippun lobbongna ey matuy tey niippun nad-asan as basurna.
42023016	At sey makwa, ipabokbokku anggey asik at ivukkey.”
42023017	Siyana sey kanan Pilate tey gagangey ey koko'ona ey awad sey usa ey barud ey ivukkeyna nu jumatong sey vista ey Manomsomkan.
42023018	Kon anna da tagu ey sivuvugga ey kananda, “Gongatum nait! As Barabbas sey piunni ey ivukkeynu!”
42023019	(As Barabbas sana at nabarud gapu assey kingwana ey nangguru ya ginumngat ad Jerusalem.)
42023020	Piun Pilate ey ivukkey as Jesus at ingkasinna ey nikabagbaga asda tagu.
42023021	Kon sivuvugga at avus da tagu ey kananda, “Ilansam! Ilansam assey krus!”
42023022	Impitlun Pilate ey gumminga asda tagu ey kanana, “Paman? Ngan sey andagsun ey kingwana? Pinaniknikak mit ey niippun lapun sey mipagngatana. Ipabokbokku anggey asik at ivukkey.”
42023023	Kon anna da tagu ey angindangsodangsor ey mangimvugga ey masapur mipagngat as Jesus ey milansa assey krus inggana as naatud sey ipapilitda ey makwa.
42023024	At iyyuyan Pilate ey makwa sey piunda.
42023025	At siya imvukkeyna sey tagu ey nabarud gapu assey kingwana ey nangguru ya ginumngat tey siya sey piun dasey tagu ey mivukkey. At impurangna as Jesus an jida ta keygadda as koonda.
42023026	Anna pun ey iyuyda ilansa as Jesus assey krus, inabotda sey usa ey laraki assey daran ey angngadan as Simon ey iCyrene ey narpu assey u'uma ey umuy atyén ad Jerusalem. Kingwan pun da ujum ey surdaju, impavukudda an siya sey krus at iyunnuunnudna an Jesus.
42023027	At amud pey da tagu ey ummunud ya inggow dasey vubai ey ngumannganugngug ey mangivil an siya.
42023028	Nansinagung as Jesus an jida at kanana, “Dakayu ey vubai ad Jerusalem, dokonak pun atyén as ivilanyu nu aji siya ivilanyu dasey long-agyu ya dasey aanakyu.
42023029	Tey oni at jumatong sey amud ey tongtong-ag an dakayu ey mangimbag-an da tagu ey kananda, ‘Nagasat dasey basig ey aji pun umanak ya aji pun namadas ey navugi ya nampasusu.’
42023030	Nu umdas nauy ey timpu, adawagan da tagu dasey vilig anda tagudtud ta map-asda ta tab-unana jida.
42023031	Tey nu kanaʼsna sey makwa an sa'un ey niippun basurna, aji sin-umamud sey makwa an dakayu ya dasey ganakyu ey ambasbasur?”
42023032	Inggow vus da juwa ey tulisan ey injugada imvurun an Jesus ey matuy.
42023033	Jummatongda pun assey lugar ey kananda ey, “Tung-ar ji Battokag,” illansada as Jesus assey krus. Ingkrusda vus da juwa ey tulisan assey padawigi ya padawanan Jesus.
42023034	At kanan Jesus, “Ama, pakawanum jida tey niippun agammuda assey kookoonda.” Kingwan pun da surdaju, namvub-unutda ey namilvilley assey lumvun Jesus.
42023035	Inggow vus dasey tagu ey amuvuya siji ya dasey papangat da Jews ey amborboryakanda as Jesus ey kananda, “Sinarakana mit da ujum ey tagu kon ilan taku uda nu sarakana sey long-agna nu tuttuwa ey siya sey Cristu ey pinilin Apudyus.”
42023036	Namborboryakan vus da surdaju siya asida at painuman as kilum
42023037	ya kananda, “Ayu pit, isarakam sey long-agnu nu tuttuwa ey sika sey Arin da Jews.”
42023038	Inggow sey Ingkur-itda assey lap-at sey urun Jesus ey kanana, “Siyana sey Arin dasey Jews.”
42023039	Sey inggow usa ey tulisan ey nikrus at ininsurtuna vus as Jesus ey kanana, “Ey dakumpun as sika sey Cristu? Isarakam pit pey sey long-agnu ta isarakam vus dakani!”
42023040	Kon sey inggow vurunna ey tulisan, iningorana siya ey kanana, “Ey niippun ugyatnu an Apudyus? Anna ey matuyka ey kama an siya.
42023041	Kon an jita, lobbongna ey makwa nauy tey siya sey supapak sey kingwata ey lawingan kon an siya, niippun mit aan kingwana as lawingan.”
42023042	Asina at kanan an Jesus, “Jesus, ajim sa'un maliwatan nu jumatong sey Manturayam.”
42023043	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Tuttuwa sey ibagak anna an sika ey assey sana ey ag-agow, mijugaka an sa'un ad langit.”
42023044	Anna pun tigangey mamatuk, maggey nakakosong as init at gummikbot sey amin ey ili as turu ey uras at mag vus gey nagugwa sey kurtinan sey Tempél ey navissey.
42023046	Ya indangsor Jesus ey kanana, “Ama, ipiyarku an sika sey kajudwak.” Imbagana pun gey jiyuy, nuubvus sey angusna.
42023047	Innilan pun sey Kapitan da surdaju dasey amin ey nakwa, jinayowna as Apudyus ey kanana, “Tuttuwa atpey amin ey niippun basur tagu anna!”
42023048	Dasey tagu ey nadagup, innilada dasey nakwa at tummakdangda asda vuruyda ey kugkukugkugunda sey barukungda gapu assey sigab sey somsomokda.
42023049	Kon dasey vurun Jesus ya dasey inggow vubai ey nivulluvullun an siya manipud ad Galili, tummatar-anda ey angkatakjug ey mangiila assey amin ey nakwa.
42023050	Inggow sey usa ey laraki ey angngadan an Joseph ey iyArimatea ey usa ey vubruy assey provinsiyan sey Judea. As Joseph sana, ambaru sey kaugudana ya uullayuna sey jumatngan sey Manturayan Apudyus. Ya urey nu usa siya asda konsel, ajina pun iyyunud sey kuwana ey somsomok assey nan-uugudanda ya kingwan dasey vurunna ey Jews.
42023052	Kingwana pun, ummuy an Pilate ey nangdow assey ladag Jesus.
42023053	At ummuyna impas sey ladag Jesus assey krus asina at kurvikubén assey nangina ey sinnun asina at umuy ilavun assey naaabvutan ey dopras ey aji pun nuus-usar.
42023054	Sey nakwaan nauy at assey tigangey mipisuk as init assey kallimaan ey anna ey misarad sey man-illongan dasey Jews.
42023055	At dasey vubai ey nivurun an Jesus ey narpu ad Galili, nikauyda an Joseph at innilada sey natitiktikan ey dopras ya sey kingwan Joseph ey nangillavun an Jesus ad darum.
42023056	Naas pun, tummakdangda ey ummuy nanginsagana asda lana ya bangbangu ey iggada assey ladag Jesus. Kon Sabaju assey mavigat at nantungowda tey siya sey lintogda ey Jews.
42024001	Mavigat pun assey Juminggu, nakawikis dasey vubai sana ey ummuy assey nilabnan Jesus ey intakinda dasey bangbangu ey insaganada.
42024002	Umdasda pun ey ilanda, nakakaan sey batu ey unub sey lavun
42024003	at nilumnokda ad darum kon niippun sey ladag Jesus.
42024004	Tatakjugda ey masmasdaow, at maggey nampiila dasey juwa ey laraki ey nallulumvun as angkanaitak ey sumilisiling ey tatakjugda assey dor-agda.
42024005	Nayyunguyung dasey vubai saji gapu assey amud ey ugyatda. Kon kanan dasey laraki saji an jida, “Ngey payu anapun sey natattagu assey iggawan dasey natuy?
42024006	Niippun as Jesus sina tey tinagun Apudyus. Yangey naliwatanyu sey imbagana an dakayu assey iggawanyu ad Galili
42024007	ey masapur mipurang siya ey Anak ji Tagu asda ambasbasur ta mikrus, kon kasin matagu assey mikatlu ey ag-agow?”
42024008	At ingkagasmok dasey vubai sey imbagan Jesus.
42024009	Sey ngadan da vubai sana at da Mary Magdalene, Joanna, as Mary ey inan James ya da ujum ey vubai ey nangila assey nakwa. Ummayowda at ummuyda imbaga asda nasawaran as sa'an ey aposel ya da ujum ey vurunda.
42024011	Kon assey somsomok dasey aposel, kananda pun nu kankannanda pey lawa at ajida pun pinati.
42024012	Kingwan pun Peter, nanuddak ey ummuy assey nilabnana. Nilangrangana pun ad darum, anggeyʼs innilana sey inggow sinnun ey nikurvikub assey ladag Jesus at nampuuli ey amud sey nasdaawana nu ngannuna ji ey nakwa.
42024013	Assey ag-agow saji, lummibbat dasey juwa ey pasurut Jesus ey ummuy ad Emmaus ey sey kaadayuna ad Jerusalem, nasuruk as nasawaran as sa'an ey kilameter.
42024014	Anna pun ey anaradaranda, uguugujunda dasey apporow nakwa.
42024015	Assey angug-uggudanda assey nakwanakwa, mag atgey nivurun as Jesus ey nitun-ud an jida.
42024016	Kon urey nu innilada siya, ajida pun siya immatunan.
42024017	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Ngan gey la sey uguugujunyu sanat?” At intakjugda ey mimi'ila assey atada ey antutukarda.
42024018	At kanan sey usa an jida ey angngadan as Cleopas, “Ey anggeyka nin pigey as mangili ad Jerusalem as aji pun nangigammu asda nakwanakwa anna?”
42024019	At kanan Jesus, “Paman, ngan sey nakwa?” At kananda, “Sey nakwa pees an Jesus ey iNazareth. Usa siya ey profet ey tinuruturungan Apudyus ya adjuwan ey tagu sey mamigvig assey pannakabalinna ey mantudtuju ya mangwa asda nakaskasdaow.
42024020	Kon kingwan pun dasey ap-apun da papaji ya da papangat taku, impadokmada siya asida at goddongan sey matuyana ya milansaana assey krus.
42024021	Tokon atyén nu aji siya sey gogotmonni ey mangiwwaya an jitaku ey Jews. Mikatlu in ey ag-agow assey sana manipud nakwaan da nauy.
42024022	Kon assey sana avus, awad sey nakwa ey siya sey nasdaawanni. Tey assey wikkiwikkis ummuy da inggow vurunni ey vubai assey nilabnana
42024023	kon niippun kanu indasanda assey ladagna. Asida at ampuuli ey mangimbaga ey nampiila kanu sey juwa ey enjel at imbagada ey ummuli.
42024024	Ummuy pun vus da ujum ey vurunni assey nilabnana, ustu sey imbagan dasey vubai, niippun vus kanu innilada an Jesus.”
42024025	Asin at Jesus kanan an jida, “Ayaka pey naʼt as kinatuntuyu! Ngey payu aji maawatan ya patiyun sey imbagan dasey amin ey profet?
42024026	Ey niippun agammuyu ey masapur matongtong-ag sey Cristu asi at jumatong sey midayawana?”
42024027	Namin Jesus insuplikar sey piuna ugujun dasey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop an siya misarad assey ingkur-it Moses ya da amin ey ingkur-it dasey profet.
42024028	Tigangeyda pun umdas assey vubruy ey ayanda, angow-as atyén as Jesus assey ayana,
42024029	kon kanan da juwa saji ey ampangpangaasi an siya, “Umiyan taku tey anna ey lummavi.” At nitun-ud as Jesus an jida.
42024030	Anna pun ey manganda, innaran Jesus sey tinapey at nansaramat an Apudyus asina at pitpit-ingun ey mangatud an jida.
42024031	At assey siyaji, maggey navuktan sey atada at immatunanda siya. Kon mag vus gey saji nuumas ey niippun an jida.
42024032	At kananda ey nambagbaga, “Amuyu atpey as kamaʼs allin-awa sey ansomsomkanta assey apporowna isuplikar dasey Gingan Apudyus assey anaradaranan taku.”
42024033	Assey uras saji, lummibbatda ey dagus ey nampuuli ad Jerusalem. Jummatongda pun, indasanda dasey nasawaran as sa'an ey aposel ya da ujum ey naaamung
42024034	ey kanakananda, “Tuttuwa ey natagu kasin sey Apu tey nampiila an Simon!”
42024035	Oni pun inul-ullit vus dasey juwa saji ey narpuʼd Emaus sey nakwa an jida assey daran ya sey nangimmatunanda an Jesus assey namitpit-ingana assey tinapey.
42024036	Sissiya ey ul-ullitun da juwa sey nakwa assey maggey anna as Jesus ey nikatakjug an jida. At kanana, “Vumaru atyén sey somsomokyu.”
42024037	Kon nakugweyda namin ya amud sey ugyatda tey kananda pun nu banig ey nampiila.
42024038	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Ngey pakayu vus umugyat anda anjuwajuwa an sa'un?
42024039	Annaya dasey imak anda sikik, ilanyu ta mamati kayu ey sa'un nauy. Agpadanyu ta ming-op kayu tey sey banig, niippun long-agna anda tung-arna. At iillanyu mit ey wadawadda an sa'un.”
42024040	Assey nangimbagaanaʼsna, impiilana dasey imana anda sikina.
42024041	Kon anjuwajuwada pey dallu gapu assey amud ey nasdaawanda anda layadda at siya sey kanan Jesus an jida, “Ey awad makan sinaʼt?”
42024042	At indowdowda sey jinawis ey aggajiw
42024043	at kinanna ey iillanda.
42024044	At kanana an jida, “Da nauy ey makwamakwa at siya vus pigey sey imbagabagak an dakayu assey keysan ey ag-agow assey iniiggawak an dakayu ey masapur tumuttuwa sey amin ey nikur-it miipanggop an sa'un assey lintog Moses ya dasey profet ya sey nikur-it assey libnu ey Psalms.”
42024045	At nilawagan Jesus sey somsomokda ta maawatanda dasey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus.
42024046	At kanana an jida, “Kanan sey nikukur-it: Masapur matongtong-ag sey Cristu asi at matuy kon kasin matagu assey mikatlu ey ag-agow.
42024047	Ya masapur avus ey miwarawag sey ambabawiyan dasey tagu ya sey mamakawanan Apudyus asda basurda gapu an sa'un assey amin ey ili misarad ad Jerusalem.
42024048	At dakayu sey mangintakjug asda tagu ey tuttuwa dasey amin ey innilayu.
42024049	Ibaarku an dakayu sey ipopostan Amak ta mikig-ow an dakayu. Kon masapur inggow kayu yén ad Jerusalem anna inggana as maatdan kayu as pannakabalin ey marpu ad langit.”
42024050	Oni pun impuyut Jesus jida assey lugar ey adani ad Bethany at ingngatuna sey imana ey mamindisyun an jida.
42024051	Assey anna ey vindisyunana jida, nipangatu ey ummuy ad langit.
42024052	At nallikkadang dasey pasurutna ey mandayow an siya asida at ampuuli ad Jerusalem ey amud sey layadda
42024053	ya kanayunda ey umuy assey Tempél ey mandayow an Apudyus.
43001001	Assey daan pun atgey makwa sey luvung, aawwad sey naawagan as Ginga. Nivuvullun sey Ginga anna an Apudyus ya siya vus pigey as Apudyus.
43001002	Sey Ginga anna at nisisigud ey nivuvullun an Apudyus.
43001003	Siya sey nangimpakwaan Apudyus assey kangamin. At niippun nakwa nu miid siya.
43001004	Siya sey marpuwan sey viyag ey mipani as silow ey manilow assey somsomok da tagu.
43001005	Sey silow anna, sisillawana sey gikbot at aji pun makaabak sey gikbot assey silow.
43001006	Inggow sey usa ey tagu ey imbaar Apudyus ey angngadan as John
43001007	ta umuyna ibaga asda tagu sey miipanggop assey silow ta dongron da tagu losan sey ibagana ta mamatida assey silow.
43001008	As John at dakumpun as siya sey silow, kon siya ummaliyana ta ibagana sey miipanggop assey silow.
43001009	Sey tuttuwa ey silow at siya sey ummali assey luta anna ta silawana sey somsomok da amin ey tagu.
43001010	Kon ummali pun sey naawagan as silow assey luta anna, ajin pun da tagu imvilang ey urey nu nakwa sey kangamin gapu an siya.
43001011	Ummuy assey mismu ey ilina, kon inidyén dasey kailiyana siya.
43001012	Kon inggow dasey ujum ey nangimvilang ya namati an siya. At jida sey nangatudan Apudyus assey kalintogan ey ambalin as anakna.
43001013	Sey nambalinanda as anak Apudyus at dakumpun assey mandor-agan sey man-asawa ya sey panggopda ey maatdan as anak nu aji siya sey piniun Apudyus.
43001014	At sey Ginga saji, nambalin as tagu at nikig-ow an dakani. Assey iniiggawana assey luta, innilani sey kinangatuna ey siya sey sa'sa'an ey Anak ey narpu an Amana ey Apudyus. Amud sey kinaambaruna ya naminna imbaga sey kinatuttuwa miipanggop an Apudyus.
43001015	Impatuttuwan John ey nangimbaga asda tagu ey kanana, “Siya nauy sey imbagak an dakayu ey kanak, ‘Sey mipasani an sa'un at sin-umamud sey kinangatuna tey urey assey daanku pun miyanakan, iniinggow siya.’”
43001016	Gapu assey amud ey kinaambaruna, mandatodatong dasey vindisyunna an jitaku ey mamati.
43001017	Assey lintog ey, as Moses sey nangatudan Apudyus ta ipaagammuna an jitaku, kon assey amud ey kinaambaruna ya assey katuttuwaan miipanggop an siya, as Jesu Cristu sey nangimpaagammuwana.
43001018	Niippun nangila an Apudyus nu aji anggey as Jesus ey saʼsa'an ey anakna ey kanayun ey vurun sey Ama. Siya sey nangimpaagammu asda tagu miipanggop assey Ama.
43001019	Inggow dasey papaji ya da kananda ey Levites ey imbaar dasey papangat da Jews ad Jerusalem ey ummuy nangimus an John nu ngan sey makanana assey long-agna.
43001020	At inambaruna imbaga ey niippun insulibna ey kanana, “Dakumpun as sa'un sey Cristu.”
43001021	At kananda vus, “At ngey makanam assey long-agnu nu'? Ey sika as Elijah?” At summongbat as John ey kanana, “Dokonak pun.” At kananda vus, “Ey sika sey uullayunni ey umali ey Profet?” “Dakumpun,” kanan vus John ey summongbat.
43001022	At kananda vus an siya, “At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ngadannu nu'? Ibagam an dakani nu ngan sey kinatatagum ta awad ibagani nu ampuuli kani asda nangimbaar an dakani! Ngan sey makanam assey long-agnu?”
43001023	At summongbat as John ey kanana, “Sa'un sey tummuttuwaan sey impapaddaan Isaiah assey imbagana ey awad assey danak sey mangip-ipkow ey kanana, ‘Isaganayu sey long-agyu tey umali sey Apu.’”
43001024	Asin at vus dasey imbaar da Farisis kanan,
43001025	“Nu dokon sika sey Cristu unnu as Elijah ya sey umali ey Profet, ngey pam lawa vunyagan da tagu nu'?”
43001026	At kanan John, “Danum anggey sey ivunyagku an dakayu kon awad an dakayu sey usa ey ajiyu pun as agammu.
43001027	Siya sey mipasani an sa'un ya gapu assey kinangatuna, ajiyak pun miivilang ey manguggas assey kiddong sey sapatusna.”
43001028	Nauy sey nambabag-anda anda John ad Betani assey jumang sey dawwang ad Jordan ey namvunyagan John asda tagu.
43001029	Mavigat pun, innilan John as Jesus ey umadani an siya at kanana, “Annayat sey karnerun Apudyus ey midatun ey mangaan assey basur da tagu.
43001030	Siya sey apporok ibagabaga an dakayu ey awad sey mipasani an sa'un ey sin-umamud sey kinangatuna tey urey assey daanku pun miyanakan, aawwad siya.
43001031	Urey sa'un at ajik pun vus agammu nu ngadan sey tagu sanaʼt kon sey gadtokku ey mamunyag asda tagu assey danum ta mipaagammu siya asda iyIsrael.
43001032	Niippun agammuk an siya kon as Apudyus ey nangimbaar an sa'un ey mamunyag asda tagu, kanana, ‘Sey tagu ey umpaan ya mikig-awan sey Ispiritun Apudyus, siya sey mamunyag an dakayu assey Ispiritun Apudyus.’ At innilak sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey lummagud ey narpuʼd langit ey kamaʼs karapati ey inumpa ya nikig-ow an siya.
43001034	At ey sana, gapu ta innilak, takjugak ey siya sey Anak Apudyus” kanan John ey gumminga.
43001035	Mavigat pun, sisikad da John ya da juwa ey pasurutna assey jissu saji.
43001036	Nallaus pun as Jesus, intollong John ey nangila an siya at kanana, “Siyanaʼt sey Karnerun Apudyus.”
43001037	Jingngor pun dasey juwa ey pasurutna sey imbagana saji, ummunudda an Jesus.
43001038	Nambaliwit pun as Jesus ey innilana jida ey umunud an siya, kanana, “Ngan sey piunyu ibaga?” Summongbatda ey kananda, “Gona iggawam Rabbi?” (Sey piuna ugujun sey Rabbi at Misturu.)
43001039	At kanan Jesus, “Umali kayu pees ta ingkayu ilan.” Ummunudda an Jesus at innilada sey iggowna. At nammagmagayudda ey ininggow siji inggana as lummavi.
43001040	Sey usa asda juwa ey nangngor assey imbagan John ey ummunud an Jesus, at as Andrew ey sunud Simon Peter.
43001041	Kingwana pun, ginanasana ey ummuy nanganap an Simon ey sunudna at kanana, “Indasanni sey Messiah.” (Sey piuna ugujun sey Messiah at Cristu.)
43001042	At inniyuy Andrew as Simon ey sunudna an Jesus. Intotollong Jesus siya at kanana, “Sika as Simon ey anak John kon mangadnanka as Sefas.” (Sey piun sey Sefas ugujun at isuna sey ngadan ey Peter, ey sey piuna ugujun, batu.)
43001043	Assey mavigat, simsimmok Jesus ey umuy ad Galili. Indasana as Philip at kanana an siya, “Umalika ta ambalinka as pasurutku.”
43001044	As Philip at kailiyan da Andrew an Peter ey iBethsaida.
43001045	Kingwan pun Philip, ummuyna inanap as Nathaniel, at kanana, “Indasanni sey tagu ey nibabagga as dasey libnu ey ingkur-it Moses ya sey apporon dasey Profet ingkur-it. Siya as Jesus ey anak Joseph ey iNazareth.”
43001046	Kon kanan Nathaniel ey summongbat, “iNazareth? Yangey awad pun lawa ambaru as marpu ad Nazareth?” At kanan Philip, “Umalika in ta ingka ilan!”
43001047	Innilan pun Jesus as Nathaniel ey kumatam, kanana, “Annayat sey tonok ey iyIsrael ey pasig tuttuwa sey ibagana.”
43001048	At kanan Nathaniel an Jesus, “Ngan sey nangigammuwam an sa'un?” Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Innilak sika assey puun sey fig assey daan pun Philip angayagan an sika.”
43001049	Summongbat as Nathaniel ey kanana, “Rabbi, sika sey Anak Apudyus! Sika sey Arin sey Israel.”
43001050	Kanan vus Jesus an siya, “Ey siya mamatiyam gapu ta imbagak ey innilak sika assey puun sey fig? Miilam dallu dasey sin-umamud ey nakaskasdaow nu da nauy.”
43001051	Inturuyna ey kanana, “Isigurajuk an dakayu ey oni at ilanyu sey mabkatana ad langit. Ya ilanyu dasey enjel Apudyus ey ampu'upu'uli assey Anak ji Tagu.”
43002001	Ummayow pun sey juwa ey ag-agow, inggow sey kasar assey munisipyu ad Cana ey sakup sey provinsiyan sey Galili. Inggow siji as inan Jesus.
43002002	Naayagan vus da Jesus ya dasey pasurutna ey ummuy nikakasar.
43002003	Naaminanda pun as bayas, kanan inana, “Naaminanda as bayas.”
43002004	Kon kanan Jesus an inana, “Keygadak ina, urey ajim ibaga tey daan pun sey ustu ey timpu ey mangwaak assey planun Apudyus.”
43002005	Kon imbagan inana asda para taug assey bayas, “Koonyu nu ngan sey ipakwana an dakayu.”
43002006	Awad sey nakopyaan da Jews miipanggop assey koon ey amvuru. At inggow siji sey onom ey danakkor ey ammutu ey apporoda koan as danum ta awad usarunda. Sey miigga assey usa at umuy as juwampuru unnu turumpuru ey galon.
43002007	Imbagan Jesus asda antataug ey kanana, “Tabvuwanyu dasey ammutu anna as danum.” At naminda pinnu dasey ammutu assey danum.
43002008	Asin at Jesus kanan an jida, “Tumaug kayu ta iyuyyu assey manginturturung assey amung anna.” At nangiyyuyda.
43002009	Sinimsimana pun sey danum ey nambalin as bayas, impaayagna sey laraki ey angkasar. At kanana, “Sey nakopyaan da tagu, siya amanguwunda ipin-um sey kapiyaan ey bayas ta nu mavib-ilingan ey da tagu, asida at itakwar sey vuwatna. Kon intatarpunnu at avus sey kapiyaan ta asim assey sana itakwar.” Imbaganaji tey niippun agammuna nu ngan sey narpuwan nauy ey bayas tey anggey dasey antataug as nangigammu.
43002011	Nauy ey kingwan Jesus ad Cana assey provinsiya ad Galili at siyana sey ab-avus sey sinyar ey nangimpiil-ana assey kinaApudyusna. At namati dasey pasurutna an siya.
43002012	Naas pun sey kasar, ummuy as Jesus ad Capernaum. At nikuuy as inana ya dasey sunudna anda pasurutna. At ininggowda siji assey kam-ana ey ag-agow.
43002013	Assey anna ey tigangey umdas sey vistan da Jews ey kananda ey Manomsomkan, ummuy da Jesus ad Jerusalem.
43002014	Ummuy pun assey paweyn sey Tempel, innilana dasey tagu ey angnginngina as baka, karneru, karapati ya da tagu ey para oros as pilak.
43002015	At kingwan pun Jesus, nangara assey kiddong at kingwana as lapsit asina at usarun ey mangavur an jida, urey da baka anda karneru. Iwwalisna sey pilak dasey para oros as pilak ya kinalittuwangna dasey teybolda.
43002016	Asina at kanan asda apporow angnginngina as karapati, “Ilayowyu da nauy! Ajiyu ambalinun as marketan sey vuruy Ama!”
43002017	At ingkagasmok dasey pasurutna sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Sey layadku assey vuruynu Apudyus at anungna apuy ey gumilagilab ad darum assey long-agku ey urugna as ikatuyku.”
43002018	Gapu assey kingwan Jesus saji, kanan dasey papangat dasey Jews an siya, “Ngan sey karobbongam ey nangwa asda nauy? Ngan sey kaskasdaow as ipiilam an dakani ey awad karobbongam ey mangwa asda kingwam sana.”
43002019	Sinongbatan Jesus jida ey kanana, “Bakasunyu sey Tempél anna at ipatakjugku assey turu ey ag-agow.”
43002020	At kananda an siya, “Ngan sey kanam? Ummuy as opatpuru ya onom ey tawun sey nipatakjugan sey Tempél sana ya magnu gey kanan ey ipatakjugnu anggey assey turu ey ag-agow!”
43002021	Kon sey piun Jesus ibaga ey Tempél at sey long-agna.
43002022	At natuy pun siya ey ummuli, ingkagasmok dasey pasurutna sey imbagana saji at namatida assey impakur-it Apudyus ya sey imbagan Jesus.
43002023	Assey iniggawan Jesus ad Jerusalem assey timpun sey vista saji, adjuwan da tagu ey namati an siya assey nangil-anda asda nakaskasdaow ey sinyar ey kingwana.
43002024	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, aji pun Jesus intalik sey long-agna an jida tey agammuna sey nakopyaan da tagu.
43002025	Ya aji pun masapur ey awad mangimbaga an siya miipanggop asda tagu tey agammuna sey awad assey somsommokda.
43003001	Inggow sey usa ey pangat dasey Jews ey angngadan as Nicodemus ey usa ey Farisis.
43003002	Usa pun ey lavi, ummuy assey iggawan Jesus at kanana, “Rabbi, agammuni ey imbaar Apudyus sika ey manudtuju an dakani tey niippun tagu as mabalin ey mangwa asda nakaskasdaow ey sinyar ey kookoom nu niippun as Apudyus an sika.”
43003003	At kanan Jesus, “Ibagak an sika sey katuttuwaan ey niippun tagu as mabalin ey mijuga assey turey Apudyus nu aji kasin miyanak.”
43003004	Summongbat as Nicodemus ey kanana, “Ngan annuna ey miyanak kasin sey nat-ong ey tagu? Ey kasin pun lawa ampuuli assey vuwang inana ya kasin miyanak?”
43003005	At kanan vus Jesus, “Assey katuttuwaan, niippun tagu as mabalin ey mijuga assey turey Apudyus nu aji miyanak assey danum ya assey Ispiritun Apudyus.
43003006	Tey sey iyanak sey tagu at awad an siya sey kopyan da tagu kon sey miyanak assey Ispiritun Apudyus at awad vus an siya sey kopyan sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
43003007	At siya sey ajika masdaow assey kanak ey, ‘Masapur miyanak kayu kasin.’
43003008	Tey urey nu ansigab as maawatan nu ngan annuna ey makwa, makwa dallu. Kama assey abvid, niippun agammu taku nu ngey marpuwana ya kapnona tey keygad siya assey ayana, kon dodongron taku sey vungugna. Kanaʼs ji vus sey makwa asda tagu ey miyanak assey Ispiritun Apudyus.”
43003009	Kanan vus Nicodemus, “Ngan annun nauy ey makwa?”
43003010	At kanan Jesus, “Usaka ey madayow ey misturu ad Israel anna kon ajim pun maawatan?
43003011	Ibagak an sika sey katuttuwaan, sey agammuni ya innilani at siya sey ibagani kon ajiyu pun patiyun dakani.
43003012	Sey ibagabagak anna an sika at dasey makwamakwa assey luta anna, kon ajim pun patiyun. At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ngan annum ey mamati nu ibagak an sika dasey makwamakwa ad langit?
43003013	Niippun ujum as ummuy ad langit nu aji anggey sey Anak ji Tagu ey lummagud ey narpu ad langit.
43003014	“At sey makwa an sa'un at anung sey kingwan Moses ey nangintayun assey tinabbatabbad assey surkud assey iggawanda assey danak. Kanaʼsji vus sey mitayunan sey Anak ji Tagu
43003015	ta ngan ey sey mamati an siya, matagu as ing-inggana.
43003016	Tey gapu assey amud ey layad Apudyus asda tagu, imbaarna sey sa'sa'an ey Anakna ey matuy ta ngan ey sey mamati an siya at aji pun misina an Apudyus nu aji matagu as ing-inggana.
43003017	Tey as Apudyus, dakumpun as siya nangimbaarana assey Anakna assey luvung sey umuy mangimbaga asda tagu ey nakabasurda at majusada nu aji imbaarna ta sarakana jida.
43003018	“At ngan ey sey mamati an siya ey Anakna, aji pun majusa. Kon asda aji pun mamati, luus nibabagga sey majusaanda tey ajida pun pinati sey sa'sa'an ey Anak Apudyus.
43003019	Sey majusaanda at mibasar assey kingwan Apudyus anna: Ummali sey mipani as silow assey luvung anna ey manilow assey somsomok da tagu, kon siya at avus ambab-aruwunda sey aggikbot nu sey appawey tey lawingan sey kopyada.
43003020	Tey dasey apporow mangwa as lawingan, sumangada assey silow ya sumangada ey umadani tey sumangada ey mipiila sey lawingan ey kopyada.
43003021	Kon dasey mangunud assey katuttuwaan, umadanida assey silow ta mipiila ey sey kookoonda at gapu assey mangunudanda an Apudyus.”
43003022	Naas pun nauy, ummuy as Jesus ya dasey pasurutna assey provinsiyan sey Judea at ininggowda as jiyuy ey mamunyag asda tagu.
43003023	Ya as John avus, ad Enon ey adani ad Salim sey amvunvunyagana tey adjuwan sey danum siji. At as jiyuy sey apporon da tagu ampavunyagan an siya
43003024	tey assey timpu saji, daan pun atgey siya mibarud.
43003025	Usa pun ey ag-agow, inggow dasey ujum ey pasurut John ey nikaisik assey usa ey Jew miipanggop assey nakopyaanda ey mamvuru.
43003026	Ummuyda an John at kananda, “Apu Misturu, ey masmasmoknu sey inggow vurunnu assey iniggawam assey jumangna ad Jordan, sey inggow tagu ey apporom ibaga? Apporow kanu amvunyag at losan da tagu umuy an siya.”
43003027	At kanan John, “Niippun kabalinan sey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu nu dokon an Apudyus sey mangatud an siya.
43003028	Jingngoryu mit sey imbagak assey kanak ey ‘Dokonak pun an Cristu, nu aji nibaarak ey mamangpangu nu siya.’
43003029	Sey miyanungak at anungna sey vub-urun sey usa ey angkasar ey simviyang assey misaganaan sey kasar. At urey nu dakumpun siya sey sin-asawa assey mikasar, amud dallu sey layadna tey uullayuna ya dodongrona sey ibagan sey vub-urunna ey angkasar. At an sa'un vus ey nanginsagana asda tagu asi at jumatong sey Cristu, amud sey layadku assey sana.
43003030	Masapur ey siya sey mipangatu ya sa'un sey mibaba.”
43003031	Sey marpu ad langit at siya sey kangatuwan assey kangamin. Kon sey marpu assey luta, luta vus pigey sey iggowna ya sey apporona uguugujun at miipanggop assey niluluta kon sey marpu ad langit, siya sey kangatuwan assey amin.
43003032	Ibagana asda tagu sey innilana ya jingngorna, kon jinugmu anggey dasey mamati assey ibagana.
43003033	Kon ngan ey sey mamati, takjugana ey tuttuwa sey imbagan Apudyus.
43003034	Tey sey apporon sey imbaar Apudyus ibaga at Gingan Apudyus tey inatjun Apudyus sey Ispirituna an siya ey niippun kurangna.
43003035	Amud sey layad Ama ey Apudyus assey Anakna at innatudna an siya sey kangamin.
43003036	At ngan ey sey mamati assey Anak Apudyus, maatud an siya sey viyag ey niippun patinggana. Kon sey tagu ey aji pun mamati assey Anak Apudyus, niippun an siya sey viyag sana nu aji majusa as ing-inggana.
43004001	Naagammuwan Jesus ey jingngor dasey Farisis ey ad-aju kanu sey apporona awisun ya vunyagan as ampasurutna nu as John.
43004002	(Kon assey katuttuwaan, dakumpun an Jesus sey apporow amvunyag tey dasey pasurutna.)
43004003	At siya sey ummayawana ad Judea ta ampuuli ad Galili.
43004004	Assey ampuuliyanda ad Galili, anguyda ey anguy ad Samaria.
43004005	Assey nanguyanda, jummatongda assey ili ad Sichar ey adani assey luta ey illaksun Jacob an anakna ey Joseph assey kar-argow.
43004006	Naayong as Jesus ey nanaradaran. Anna pun ey tigangey mamatuk, nipanadda assey iggown sey vuvun ey kinuruban Jacob assey kar-argow at intukjun Jesus assey dor-ag sey vuvun.
43004007	Dasey pasurutna, ummuyda assey vubruy ngummina as kanunda. Assey ummayawanda, jummatong sey usa ey vubai ey iSamaria ey umuy manakju at kanan Jesus an siya, “Uminumak uda.”
43004009	At kanan sey vubai, “Ngey kanam saji? Usaka ey Jews ya angkudowkaʼs inumum an sa'un ey iSamaria?” (Tey sey ugalin dasey Jews, aji pun mabalin ey mivurunda unnu mikabagbagada asda iSamaria.)
43004010	At kanan Jesus, “Nu agammum atyén pey sey atjun Apudyus ya ngadan sey angkudow anna an sika as danum, mangkudowka atyén an siya at atjuna an sika sey danum ey angatud as viyag.”
43004011	At kanan sey vubai, “Apu, adarum sey vuvun ya niippun usarum as manguwadnu assey danum, ngan sey angar-am assey danum ey angatud as viyag?
43004012	Ey nangatngatuka nu as Jacob ey dakdakor taku assey kar-argow? Siya sey nangatud as nauy ey vuvun as laksununni ey siyana sey apporona nanakjuwan as umminumana ya kama vus asda anakna ya urey dasey tarakinda.”
43004013	At kanan vus Jesus ey summongbat, “Amin ey tagu ey uminum assey danum sana at muuwwow kasin.
43004014	Kon sey manginum assey danum ey atjuk at aji pun muuwwow. Tey ambalin jiyuy as ob-ob assey long-agna ey angatud as viyag ey niippun patinggana.”
43004015	At kanan sey vubai, “Apu, ampey, atdanak assey danum sanat ta ajiyak muuwwow ya iginokku ogon ey umuy manakju sina.”
43004016	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Ingkan ta ingka ayagan as asawam ta umali kayuʼs nauy.”
43004017	“Niippun asawak.” kanan sey vubai. At kanan vus Jesus, “Tuttuwa sey kanam ey niippun asawam
43004018	tey urey nangallimaka nangasawa, dakumpun as asawam sey laraki ey kabvuruynu assey sana at ustu sey kanam.”
43004019	At kanan sey vubai, “Mimatunak ey usaka atpey ey profet, Apu.
43004020	At imusuk uda nu payu lawa ey Jews kanan ey anggey ad Jerusalem sey ustu ey mandayawan an Apudyus kon assey tagudtud mit sana sey apporon dasey dakdakorni mandayawan an Apudyus assey kar-argow”
43004021	At kanan Jesus, “Sika ey sunud, dakayu ey iSamaria, niippun agammuyu assey dayadayawunyu kon an dakani ey Jews, agammuni sey dayadayawunni tey dakani sey marpuwan sey mangisarakan. At patiyum sey kanak anna ey jumatong sey timpu ey dakumpun assey tagudtud sana unnu ad Jerusalem sey mandayawan da tagu an Ama taku ey Apudyus.
43004023	Assey katuttuwaan, jummatong assey sana ey timpu, ey dasey ustu ey mandayow an Ama taku ey Apudyus at mandayowda ey idaran sey Ispirituna jida ey miyunud assey katuttuwaan ey kinaApudyusna. Da nauy sey piun Apudyus ey koon da tagu ey mandayow an siya.
43004024	As Apudyus at Ispiritu ey niippun long-agna at dasey mandayow an siya, masapur mandayowda ey idaran sey Ispirituna ey mibasar assey katuttuwaan ey kinaApudyusna.”
43004025	At kanan sey vubai an Jesus, “Agammuk ey umali sey Messiah ey kananda ey Cristu. At nu umali, ipaagammuna dasey amin an jitaku.”
43004026	At kanan Jesus, “Sa'un anna ey gumingaginga an sika sey kanam sanaʼt.”
43004027	Assey siyaji, nangulin dasey pasurut Jesus at amud sey nasdaawanda assey nandatnganda as Jesus ey mikabagbaga assey vubai ey iSamaria. Kon niippun nangimus nu ngan sey masapur sey vubai unnu palawa mikabagbaga as Jesus an siya.
43004028	Oni pun, tineynan sey vubai sey bangana at nampuuli assey vubruy ey ummuy nangimbaga asda tagu ey kanana,
43004029	“Umali kayu! Ingkayu ilan sey inggow tagu ey nangimbaga an sa'un assey amin ey apporok kingkingwa. Ey siya pun lawa jiyuy sey Cristu?”
43004030	Naatikuykuy da tagu assey vubruy ey ummuy nangila an siya.
43004031	Assey siyaji vus, anna ey ayaayagan dasey pasurut Jesus siya ta umuy mangan ey kananda, “Rabbi, umalika ta ingka yén mangan.”
43004032	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Ayu at, tey anna sey makan ey kanuk ey niippun agammuyu.”
43004033	At insarad dasey pasurutna ey man-iinnimus ey kananda, “Ey awad nin nangiyyali as kanuna?”
43004034	Kon kanan Jesus, “Sey ikataguk at sey mangwa assey piun Apudyus ey nangimbaar an sa'un at masapur ey ipaasku sey siput ey ipakwana an sa'un.
43004035	Sey kanan da tagu, ‘Nu maas ey gey sey opat ey vuran, jumatong sey iyyaani.’ Kon ibagak an dakayu, timpun sey iyyaani assey sana. Ilanyu da tagu anna ey umaliali, mipanida as nuutu ey paguy ey mabalin ey maani.
43004036	Sey man-ani at malabvuwan ya dasey tagu ey mipani as maani, atdan Apudyus jida assey viyag ey niippun patinggana. At an-isu ey allaylayad sey nammura ya sey man-ani.
43004037	At siya sey tumuttuwaan sey kanan da tagu ey, ‘Awad sey ammura ya awad vus sey man-ani.’
43004038	Ibaarku dakayu ey umuy mangani assey dakumpun as nallingotanyu at kama as dakayu sey mangara assey inayong da ujum.”
43004039	Adjuwan dasey iSamaria ey vummubruy ad Sichar ey namati an Jesus gapu assey kanan sey vubai ey, “Imbagana an sa'un dasey apporok kingwakingwa.”
43004040	At siya sey ummuy pun dasey iSamaria an Jesus, jinawatda an siya ey mikig-ow yén an jida. At nikig-ow as Jesus an jida as juwa ey ag-agow.
43004041	At ummam-amud ummaju dasey namati an siya gapu assey intudtujuna.
43004042	Asida at kanan assey vubai, “Ey sana mamati kani, dakumpun as gapu ta imbagam nu aji gapu tey jingngorni ey mismu sey inugudna at naagammuwanni ey siya tuttuwa sey mangisarakan asda tagu.”
43004043	Ummayow pun sey juwa ey ag-agow, tineynanda ad Samaria at nampuulida ad Galili.
43004044	Tey as Jesus ey mismu sey nangimbaga ey kanana, “Sey usa ey profet at aji pun midayow assey mismu ey ilina.”
43004045	Assey jummatnganda ad Galili, pinadatongda siya tey innilada dasey apporona kingwakingwa ad Jerusalem assey Vista ey Manomsomkan.
43004046	Assey iggawanda ad Galili, nampuuli kasin as Jesus assey vubruy ad Cana ey siya sey nangwaana ey nambalinuna sey danum as bayas. Assey jummatngana as jiyuy, inggow sey usa ey ukom assey gubernu ey narpu ad Capernaum ey masakit sey anakna ey laraki.
43004047	Jingngorna pun ey awad as Jesus ey jummatong ad Galili ey narpuʼd Judea, ummuy nampangpangaasi ta umuy atyén as Jesus ad Capernaum ey mangagas assey anakna ey tigangey matuy.
43004048	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Ey inggana as awad ilanyu as nakaskasdaow ey sinyar, asi kayu at mamati?”
43004049	Kon nampangpangaasi pey dallu sey opisyar ey kanana, “Apu, kadaguwanak an sika at umalika ta daan matuy sey anakku.”
43004050	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Ingkan, matagu sey anaknu.” Pinatina sey imbagan Jesus at nampuuli assey vubruyda.
43004051	Inggow atgey sey opisyar assey daran assey impasabot dasey baba'aruna an siya sey damag ey vummaru sey anakna.
43004052	At inimus sey opisyar nu ngan sey uras ey vummaruwana. At kananda, “Ad gorobyan, assey anna ey magayud.”
43004053	At ingkagasmok sey opisyar ey aman sey utting ey siyaji sey uras ey nangimbagaan Jesus an siya ey kanana, “Matagu sey anaknu.” At siya sey namatiyanda ey simbaryan an Jesus.
43004054	Nauy sey mikagwa ey kaskasdaow ey sinyar ey kingwan Jesus assey jummatngana ad Galili ey narpu ad Judea.
43005001	Naas pun nauy, ummuy as Jesus ad Jerusalem nikavista assey vistan dasey Jews.
43005002	At as jiyuy, inggow sey pukung ey kananda ey Betzata. Nauy ey pukung at adani assey kananda ey Liwangan sey Karneru. Assey igid sey pukung, awad sey lima ey iidjungan.
43005003	At dasey iidjungan sana, inggow dasey adjuwan ey angkauvug ey masakit. Awadka ey vurag, piley ya nattubangil. Uullayunda sey makibyawan sey danum.
43005004	Tey nu sin-uujum ey kanu, awad sey umali ey enjel Apudyus ey umuy mangibyow assey pukung. At ngan ey sey amangu ampisuk asda masakit nu makibyow sey danum, maagasan sey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey sakitna.
43005005	Inggow as jiyuy sey usa ey laraki ey masakit as turumpuru ya waru ey tawun.
43005006	Innilan pun Jesus siya ey uumvug, immatunana ey nabayag sey inuumvugana as jiyuy. At inimusna an siya ey kanana, “Ey pium ey vumaru?”
43005007	Summongbat sey masakit ey kanana, “Apu, niippun siya angimpisuk an sa'un assey danum nu angkibyow. Tey anna ey gey isaradku umuy, naas pey namangpangu da ujum.”
43005008	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Vumangunka, aram sey oboknu ta ingkan.”
43005009	At nakaan ey dagus sey sakit sey laraki at innarana sey obokna at lummibbat ey umayow. Nakwa nauy assey ag-agow ey iillongan da Jews.
43005010	At innilan pun dasey turey ey Jews sey tagu sana ey vummaru, kananda an siya, “Misanga mit assey lintog taku ey vukudam sey oboknu assey ag-agow ey iillongan.”
43005011	Kon summongbat sey laraki saji at kanana, “Imbagan sey nangimpabaru an sa'un ey arak sey obokku ta inyakon.”
43005012	At inimusda an siya ey kananda, “Ngan sey tagu ey nangimbaga an sika ey siyana sey koom?”
43005013	Kon niippun agammun sey laraki saji nu ngan sey nangaan assey sakitna tey nikallut as Jesus asda tagu at ummayow as Jesus ey niippun nangigammu.
43005014	Oni pun, indasan Jesus sey laraki saji assey Tempél at kanana an siya, “Ilam at vummaruka. Masapur ey ipug-annu ey vumasur tey am-amud at lawa sey makwa an sika.”
43005015	At kingwan pun sey tagu saji, ummayow at ummuyna imbaga asda papangat da Jews ey as Jesus atpey sey nangaan assey sakitna.
43005016	At nauy sey lapuna nu pan lawa dasey Jews isarad ey manongtong-ag an Jesus gapu tey kingwana nauy assey ag-agow ey iillongan.
43005017	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “As Amak, niippun guminkana ey mangwa as para asda tagu at kanaʼsji vus sey kook ey mangunud assey kookoona.”
43005018	At gapu assey imbagan Jesus saji, ummam-amud ey anggagator dasey papangat ey Jews ey mangngat an siya. Tey dakumpun anggey assey lintog sey nilabsingna nu aji iyyisuna sey long-agna an Apudyus tey imbagana ey as Apudyus sey Amana.
43005019	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Sa'un ey Anak Apudyus, niippun mabalinku koon assey kuwak ey kasomsomkan nu aji kook anggey sey ilak ey koon Ama. At ngan ey sey koona, siya avus sey kook.
43005020	Tey as Amak, pipiuna sa'un ey Anakna. At siya sey ipipi'ilana an sa'un sey amin ey koona. Ya awad vus sey ipiilana an sa'un ey sin-umamud ey nakaskasdaow nu sey kingwak anna ta awad ikowyu masdaawan.
43005021	Tey kama assey managuwan Ama asda nangkakatuy, siya avus sey kook ey Anakna tey taguwuk nu ngan dasey piuk ey taguwun.
43005022	As Ama at niippun uwisuna as tagu nu aji innatjuna an sa'un ey Anakna sey amin ey karobbongan ey manguwis
43005023	ta dayawun dasey amin ey tagu sa'un ey Anakna ey kama assey mandayawanda an Ama. At ngan man dasey aji pun mandayow an sa'un, ajida pun vus dayawun as Ama ey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43005024	“Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Sey tagu ey mangngor assey ibagabagak ya mamati assey nangimbaar an sa'un, maatdan as viyag ey niippun patinggana. Aji pun magoddongan ey majusa tey narakpus sey majusaana at naatdan as viyag ey niippun patinggana.
43005025	Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Amin ey tagu at kamadaʼs nanattuy tey nisinada an Apudyus. Kon jummatong assey sana sey timpu ey dasey kamaʼs nanattuy at dongronda sey ibagak ey Anak Apudyus at ngan ey dasey mamati assey jingngorda, mataguda.
43005026	Tey as Ama, siya sey marpuwan sey viyag. At innatjuna vus an sa'un sey karobbongan ey mangatud as viyag.
43005027	Ya innatjuna avus assey Anakna sey karobbongan ey manguwis tey siya sey Anak ji Tagu.
43005028	Aji kayu masdaow assey kanak ey jumatong sey timpu ey dasey nangkakatuy at losanda dongron sey gingak
43005029	ya lumuswada asda lavunda. At dasey nangwa assey ambaru at umulida ya maatdanda as viyag ey niippun patinggana kon dasey nangwa as lawingan at umulida ey majusa.
43005030	“Niippun kook assey kuwak ey kasomsomkan tey sey kook ey manguwis at mibasar assey imbagan Ama an sa'un. At ustu sey kook ey manguwis tey ajik pun maggey koon sey piuk nu aji sey piun sey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43005031	“At nu sa'un sey mangimbaga an dakayu assey miipanggop assey long-agku, aji pun kapapati sey ibagak.
43005032	Kon awad as Amak ey manakjug an sa'un at agammuk ey tuttuwa sey ibagana miipanggop an sa'un.
43005033	Usa pey, inggow dasey imbaaryu ey ummuy an John at tinakjugana sey katuttuwaan miipanggop an sa'un.
43005034	Ajik pun kasapuran ey awad tagu as manakjug assey miipanggop an sa'un kon ipakagasmokku anggey sey imbagan John ta mamati kayu ya misarakan kayu.
43005035	As John at mipani assey silow ey niiintug at nallaylayad kayu as sin-akitan assey nanilawana assey somsomokyu.
43005036	Kon awad sey mangimpanad an dakayu assey kinatuttuwan dasey imbagabagak ey sin-umamud nu sey imbagan John. Tey dasey siput ey kookook ey apporon Ama ipakwa an sa'un at da nauy sey mangimpanad ey as Ama sey nangimbaar an sa'un.
