43005037	At as Ama ey nangimbaar an sa'un, siya ey mismu sey manakjug assey miipanggop an sa'un. Kon niippun nangngoranyu assey gingana ya niippun nangil-anyu nu ngan sey nakopyaana.
43005038	Ajiyu pun vus inigga assey somsomokyu sey imbagana tey sumanga kayu ey mamati an sa'un ey imbaarna.
43005039	Adaadarunyu sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus tey assey somsomokyu, kananyu pun nu maatdan kayu as viyag ey niippun patinggana. Kon dasey nikur-it anna, sa'un mit sey ibagabagana
43005040	kon sumanga kayu pey dallu ey umali an sa'un ta atjuk atyén sey viyag an dakayu ey niippun patinggana.
43005041	“Ajik pun gamgaman sey angindayawan dasey tagu an sa'un
43005042	tey agammuk sey katataguyu ya agammuk ey dakayu ey papangat dasey Jews at niippun layadyu an Apudyus.
43005043	Annaak ey ummali gapu assey nangatdanan Ama assey karobbongak kon summanga kayu ey amadatong an sa'un. Kon nu awad ey ujum as umali ey ang-angwadaʼs karobbonganda, jida at avus sey padatngonyu.
43005044	Ngan annunyu pun vus ey mamati? Tey siya gey piunyu sey manjijinnayow kon ajiyu pun padasun ey manganap assey dayow ey marpu assey sa'sa'an ey Apudyus.
43005045	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, ajiyu kanan ey sa'un sey mangindarum an dakayu an Ama. Tey sey mangindarum an dakayu at as Moses ey iggawan sey namnamayu.
43005046	Tey nu pinatiyu atyén as Moses, patiyunyu atyén vus sa'un tey dasey ingkur-itna at miipanggop an sa'un.
43005047	Kon gapu ta ajiyu pun patiyun sey ingkur-itna, ngannunyu pun vus ey mamati assey ibagabagak?”
43006001	Ummayow pun sey kam-ana ey ag-agow, nandormang da Jesus assey jumang sey beybey ad Galili (sey usa vus ey ngadanna at beybey ad Tiberias.)
43006002	Adjuwan dasey tagu ey ummunud an siya tey innilada dasey nakaskasdaow ey kingwana ey nangaan asda sakit dasey masakit.
43006003	Nanagada da Jesus asda pasurutna assey tagudtud at intukjudaʼsji.
43006004	Assey timpu saji, tigangey sey vistan da Jews ey kananda ey Manomsomkan.
43006005	Nallangranga pun as Jesus ey innilana dasey amud ey tagu ey kumatam an siya, kanana an Philip, “Gona nin gey lawa intaku angar-an as ipakan taku asda amud ey tagu sana?”
43006006	Aaggammun Jesus sey koona kon inimusna jiyuy ta ilana nu ngan-annun sey pammatin Philip an siya.
43006007	At kanan Philip, “Toan, urey gey nu awad pilak takuʼs juwanggasut ey dinari ey mingina as makan at aji pun pey dallu umaney as sinna'itunda.”
43006008	At kanan sey usa ey pasurutna ey angngadan as Andrew ey sunud Simon Peter,
43006009	“Anna sey usa ey anak ey nantiplag as lima ey tinapey ey barley ya juwa ey ikan. Kon yangey umaney nauy assey amud ey tagu.”
43006010	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Ibagayu asda tagu ta tumukjuda.” Pasig ey lugrugam sey iggowda saji at siya sey tummukjuwanda. Sey vilang dasey laraki at ummuy as limallivu.
43006011	Oni pun, innaran Jesus sey tinapey saji at nansaramat an Apudyus, asin at dasey pasurutna iwaras asda tagu ey angkatukju. At kama vus sey kingwana assey ikan at narnub da losan inggana as ning-opda ey nangan.
43006012	Naasda pun nangkakakan, kanan Jesus asda pasurutna, “Dagupunyu dasey vunada ta niippun maramram.”
43006013	At jinagup dasey pasurutna sey amin ey vunada assey lima ey tinapey at pinnuda sey nasawaran as juwa ey awit.
43006014	Innilan pun dasey tagu sey kaskasdaow sana ey kingwan Jesus, kananda, “Niippun juwajuwana ey siyana sey Profet ey nipapaddaan ey umali assey luta anna.”
43006015	Kon as Jesus, agammuna ey piun dasey tagu pilitun siya ey ambalin as arida. At kingwana pun, nanagada ey ummuy tummar-an assey tagudtud.
43006016	Anna pun ey isaradna ey gumikbot, nan-usug dasey pasurut Jesus ey ummuy assey beybey
43006017	at nambangkada ey andormang ey angingkapon ad Capernaum. Anna ogon ey gumikbot ya niippun gey as Jesus an jida.
43006018	Assey siyaji, anna ey sardana ey jumangsodangsor sey abvid ya sey dalluyun sey beybey.
43006019	Ummuy nin as lima unnu onom ey kilameter sey innuyda ey nambangka, intapda as Jesus ey anaradaran assey usun sey danum ey kumatam an jida at nikuugyatda.
43006020	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Aji kayu umugyat, sa'un nauy!”
43006021	Asi at pey vumaru sey somsomokda at pinasakeyda as Jesus. At assey siyaji, magda atgey inumdas assey igid sey beybey ey kapnonda.
43006022	Anna pun ey mavigat, kanan pun dasey amud ey tagu nu nateynan as Jesus tey innilada ey sa'an anggey sey bangka ey inggow assey lavi saji ey nalluganan dasey pasurutna. Ya agammuda vus ey aji pun as Jesus nivurun asda pasurutna ey ummayow.
43006023	Oni pun, nandatdatong dasey ujum ey bangka ey narpu assey partin sey Tiberias at ummigidda assey jissu ey addaniyan assey nangananda assey tinapey assey nansaramatan Jesus an Apudyus.
43006024	Innilan pun dasey tagu ey niippun as Jesus ya dasey pasurutna, nalluganda asda bangka ey ummuy ad Capernaum ey manganap an siya.
43006025	Indasan pun dasey tagu siya assey jumang sey beybey, kananda, “Rabbi, makanu ummaliyam sina?”
43006026	Kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Siya manganaanapanyu an sa'un gapu assey nangananyu assey tinapey inggana as ning-opanyu, dakumpun as siya manganapanyu an sa'un tey naawatanyu dasey nakaskasdaow ey sinyar ey innilayu.
43006027	Dakumpun atyén as makan ey ampapattingga sey ayoayongon nu aji urey sey makan ey angatud as viyag ey niippun patinggana. Sey mangatud as nauy ey makan an dakayu at Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu tey as Apudyus ey Ama, umayun an sa'un.”
43006028	Asida at imusun an Jesus ey kananda, “Ngan sey koonni ta makwani dasey piun Apudyus?”
43006029	At kanan Jesus, “Sey piun Apudyus ey koonyu at mamati kayu an sa'un ey imbaarna.”
43006030	At kananda ey summongbat, “Ngan ampey sey sinyar ey kaskasdaow ey ipiilam an dakani ta awad amatiyanni an sika? Ngan sey mabalin ey koom?
43006031	As Moses at pinakanna dasey dakdakor taku assey manna assey iniggawanda assey danak. Tey inggow sey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Pinakanna jida assey makan ey narpu ad langit.’”
43006032	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Dakumpun as Moses sey nangatud as dasey dakdakoryu assey makan ey narpu ad langit tey as Ama. Ya sey kinanda saji ey narpu ad langit at dakumpun ji as ustu ey makan ey atjun Apudyus an dakayu assey sana.
43006033	Tey sey ustu ey makan ey atjun Apudyus at sey narpuʼd langit. Siya sey mangatud as viyag ey niippun patinggana.”
43006034	At kananda an siya, “Apu, pangngaasim ta kanayunum ey atjun an dakani sey nait ey makan.”
43006035	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Sa'un sey makan ey mangatud assey viyag ey niippun patinggana. Tey sey tagu ey umadani ya mamati an sa'un at aji pun muurat ya muuwwow.
43006036	Kon an dakayu, urey nu innilaak, aji kayu pun pey dallu mamati.
43006037	Amin dasey tagu ey italik Ama an sa'un at umalida an sa'un. Ya dasey umali an sa'un, ajik pun maggey paryawun jida.
43006038	Tey dakumpun as siya ummaliyak ey narpuʼd langit ta inyak koon sey piuk nu aji sey piun sey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43006039	Sey piun Ama ey nangimbaar an sa'un at ambaruwuk puutun dasey amin ey intalikna an sa'un ta niippun matarak as urey sa'an nu aji aminuk jida taguwun assey anungus sey ag-agow. Tey sey piun Ama, amin dasey mangigammu ya mamati an sa'un at maatdan as viyag ey niippun patinggana.”
43006041	Imbagan pun Jesus jiyuy, insarad dasey Jews ey singunguju gapu assey imbagana ey siya sey makan ey narpu ad langit.
43006042	Kananda, “Yangey dakumpun nauy as Jesus ey anak da Joseph? Agammu taku mit da amana an inana. Ngey pana kanan ey siya at lummagud ey narpu ad langit?”
43006043	Kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Iginokyu ey ngumujunguju
43006044	tey niippun dallu tagu as mabalin umali as ampasurutku nu ajin Ama ey nangimbaar an sa'un ipaali jida. At jida dasey taguwuk assey anungus sey ag-agow.
43006045	Tey awad sey ingkur-it dasey profet assey kar-argow ey kanana, ‘Amin ey tagu at tudtujuwan Apudyus.’ At amin ey mangngor assey ibagan Ama ya an siya sey man-adaranda, umalida an sa'un.
43006046	Dakumpun as siya piuk ugujun ey awad nangila an Apudyus tey niippun nakaila nu aji anggayak ey narpu an siya.
43006047	Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Ngan man sey tagu ey mamati an sa'un, awad an siya sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
43006048	Tey sa'un sey makan ey mangatud as viyag ey niippun patinggana.
43006049	Dasey dakdakoryu assey kar-argow at nanganda as manna assey iniiggawanda assey danak kon natuyda mit.
43006050	Kon sey ustu ey makan ey apporok ibagabaga an dakayu assey sana at siya sey makan ey narpu ad langit. At ngan ey sey mangan assey nauy ey makan, aji pun matuy as ing-inggana.
43006051	Sa'un sey matattagu ey makan ey narpu ad langit. At dasey mangan assey nauy ey makan, mataguda as ing-inggana. Sey makan anna at siya sey long-agku ey atjuk ta matagu dasey tagu assey luta anna.”
43006052	Imbagan pun Jesus jiyuy, insarad dasey Jews ey mansosongbat ey kananda, “Ngannun sey tagu anna mangatud assey long-agna ta kanun taku?”
43006053	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Nu ajiyu kanun sey long-agku, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu ya ajiyu inumun sey darak, aji kayu pun maatdan as viyag ey niippun patinggana.
43006054	Tey sey mangan assey long-agku ya uminum assey darak, awad an siya sey viyag ey niippun patinggana ya taguwuk siya assey anungus sey ag-agow.
43006055	Tey sey long-agku at siya sey ustu ey makan ya sey darak sey ustu ey miinum.
43006056	Sey tagu ey mangan assey long-agku ya manginum assey darak, aawwad siya an sa'un ya aawwadak vus an siya.
43006057	Matataguwak gapu an Ama ey nangimbaar an sa'un tey siya sey marpuwan sey viyag. At kama avus assey mangan an sa'un at matatagu gapu an sa'un.
43006058	Tey sa'un sey ustu ey makan ey narpu ad langit ey aji pun miyisu assey makan ey kinan dasey dakdakoryu assey kar-argow. Tey dasey nangan assey manna saji at natuyda. Kon sey mangan assey nauy ey makan at matagu as ing-inggana.”
43006059	Siyana dasey imbagan Jesus assey nantudtujuwana assey sinagog ad Capernaum.
43006060	Jingngor pun dasey tagu ey umunnuunnud an siya sey imbagana saji, adjuwan an jida sey nangimbaga ey kananda, “Ansigab as maawatan sey tudtuju sana! Ngan gey lawa sey mangngor ya mamati sinaʼt?”
43006061	Urey gey nu niippun nangimbaga an Jesus, agammuna ey singungujuda gapu assey imbagana saji. At kanana an jida, “Yangey anggey gey lawa nait ya nakalivussu sey somsomokyu?
43006062	At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, yangey aji am-amud nu ilanyu sey Anak ji Tagu ey ngumatu ey ampuuli assey iggowna?
43006063	Sey mangatud as viyag at sey Ispiritun Apudyus. Niippun kabalinan dasey tagu ey mangwa assey jugannaʼt. At dasey imbagak an dakayu, siya sey mangawatanyu assey Ispiritun Apudyus ey mangatud assey mataguwanyu as ing-inggana.
43006064	Kon awad pey dallu da ujum an dakayu ey aji pun mamati.” Imbagan Jesus nauy tey aaggammuna urey assey nanginsardana ey mantudtuju asda aji pun mamati ya sey malliput an siya.
43006065	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Siyana sey lapuna nu paʼk lawa ibaga an dakayu ey niippun mabalin makaali an sa'un ey mamati nu ajin Ama iparuvus.”
43006066	At manipud siji, panus da nansanud asda apporow umunnuunnud an siya at ajida pun ogon umunud.
43006067	At inimusna asda nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna ey kanana, “Dakayu pey, ey man-awidanak vus an dakayu?”
43006068	Summongbat as Simon Peter ey kanana, “Apu, ngan gey lawa kasinni koon? Dasey igingagingam mit anggey sey mangatud as viyag ey niippun patinggana.
43006069	At mamati kani ya naagammuwanni ey sika sey Nibaar ey Narpu an Apudyus.”
43006070	At kanan Jesus, “Sa'un sey namili an dakayu ey nasawaran as juwa, kon awad sey usa an dakayu ey najimunyuwan!”
43006071	As Judas ey anak Simon Iscariot sey piun Jesus ugujun. Tey urey nu usa as Judas asda nasawaran as juwa ey aposelna, siya sey malliput an Jesus assey umanungus.
43007001	Naas pun nauy, ummuy Jesus tinaruntun dasey kavubruvubruy ad Galili. Sumanga ey umuy ad Judea tey anaanapun dasey papangat ey Jews siji nu ngan annunda ey mangngat an siya.
43007002	Assey timpu saji, tigangey sey vistan dasey Jews ey kananda ey Bab-awwi.
43007003	At kanan dasey sunud Jesus an siya, “Paka aji umuy ad Judea ta ilan dasey pasurutnu ey awad siji dasey kaskasdaow ey apporom koon.
43007004	Tey sey maryad ey madamag at ajina pun itataru dasey apporona kookoon. At gapu ta makakwaka as dasey nakaskasdaow, ingka ipiila ta losan da tagu ilan.”
43007005	Siyaji sey kanan dasey sunud Jesus tey urey jida at ajida pun mamati an siya.
43007006	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Daan pun umdas sey mangagammuwanda an sa'un. Kon an dakayu, urey barangna ey timpu at mabalin kayu umuy.
43007007	Niippun lasun as manguraan da tagu an dakayu kon an sa'un, guraunak tey apporok ibagabaga sey lawingan sey kookoonda.
43007008	Ingkayu mikavista. Ajiyak pun umali tey daan pun umdas sey timpuna.”
43007009	Siyana sey kanana asi at mateynan ad Galili.
43007010	Lummibbat pun dasey sunud Jesus ey ummuy nikavista, ummunud vus pigey as Jesus kon aji pun nampadlow asda tagu.
43007011	Assey vista saji, anaanapun dasey papangat da Jews as Jesus ey imuimusunda nu gona iggowna.
43007012	At da nadagup ey tagu ey ummuy nikavista, singungujuda ey ansosongbat miipanggop an siya. Kanan da ujum, “Ambaru siya ey tagu.” Kon kanan da ujum, “Auh, uraurawuna anggey da tagu.”
43007013	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, niippun makaturud ey mangugud an siya ey siwawaya tey umugyatda asda papangat da Jews.
43007014	Anna pun ey angginawa sey vista, ummuy as Jesus nantudtuju assey paweyn sey Tempel.
43007015	At amud sey nasdaawan dasey papangat da Jews, at kananda, “Ngan sey nangar-an tagu anna as liingna ey aji pun mit nan-uswila?”
43007016	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Sey itudtujuk anna at dakumpun as narpu assey kuwak ey goom tey narpu an Apudyus ey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43007017	Ngan ey sey maryad ey mangwa assey piun Apudyus, maagammuwana nu ngan sey narpuwan sey tudtujuk, nu narpu an Apudyus unnu assey kuwak ey goom.
43007018	Sey tagu ey mangimbagabaga assey kuwana ey somsomok, siya anapuna sey midayawan sey long-agna. Kon sey tagu ey siya anapuna sey midayawan sey namaar an siya at matalik ya niippun ussatna.”
43007019	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Yangey ajin pun Moses innatud sey lintog Apudyus an dakayu assey kar-argow? Paan ya innatudna, kon niippun usa an dakayu as nangunud. Tey nu inunudyu sey lintog sana, ngey payu vus sa'un piun gongatun?”
43007020	Summongbat dasey tagu ey kananda, “Najimunyuwanka nin a! Ngan sey maryad ey mangngat an sika?”
43007021	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Inggow sey kinaanku sey sakitna assey ag-agow ey iillongan at siya sey gapun sey nasdaawanyu ya lummawingan sey somsomokyu.
43007022	Kon urey mit vus dakayu at awad sey dayu koon assey ag-agow ey iillongan. Tey imvilin Moses ey kugitunyu dasey anakyu ey laraki. At nu mibatug ey assey ag-agow ey iillongan, angkugit kayu mit ta tongparunyu sey lintog sana. (Kon dakumpun as Moses sey nanginsarad tey dasey dakdakorda.)
43007023	At nu koonyu jiyuy assey ag-agow ey iillongan ta matongpar sey vilin Moses miipanggop assey usa ey partin sey long-ag, ey sumanga kayu an sa'un gapu assey nangaanak assey sakit sey usa ey tagu assey ag-agow ey iillongan ta vumaru sey amin ey partin sey long-agna?
43007024	Ipug-anyu ey amabasur asda tagu ey angimbasar assey iillan sey atayu ta sey ustu, siya sey itakjugyu.”
43007025	As jiyuy, kanan dasey ujum ey tagu ad Jerusalem, “Ey siyana atpey sey tagu ey piun dasey papangat ey gongatun?
43007026	Anna mit ey sisasangu ey gumingaginga kon niippun pey lawa makananda an siya. Ey vinigvigda nin ey siya sey Cristu?
43007027	Iyaay! Nu umali as Cristu at niippun nangigammu assey marpuwana. Kon sey tagu anna, agammu taku mit sey narpuwana.”
43007028	At anna pun ey mantudtuju as Jesus assey Tempel, imvuggana ey kanana, “Tuttuwa ey agammuyu sa'un ya agammuyu sey narpuwak. Kon assey katuttuwaan, ajiyak pun as ummali gapu assey kuwak ey karobbongan. Tey awad sey nangimbaar an sa'un ey ajiyu pun ag-agammu,
43007029	kon an sa'un ey, agammuk siya, tey siya sey narpuwak ya siya sey nangimbaar an sa'un.”
43007030	Assey nangimbagaan Jesus siji, padasun atyén dasey papangat ey dokmaan siya kon niippun makaturud tey daan pun umdas sey timpu ey madokmaana.
43007031	Urey nu kanaʼsji, adjuwan da tagu ey namati an siya. Kananda, “Siguraju ey siya nauy sey umali ey Cristu tey yangey awad makakwa asda kaskasdaow ey anung dasey apporona kingwa?”
43007032	Jingngor pun dasey Farisis sey iyaguagutimtim dasey tagu miipanggop an Jesus, nan-uugudda asda nangangatu ey papaji at nangimbaarda asda guwardan sey Tempél ey umuy manokma an Jesus.
43007033	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Aji pun as mabayag sey iggawak an dakayu at ampuuliyak assey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43007034	Oni ey vus, anaanapunak an dakayu kon aji kayu pun makad-as an sa'un tey aji kayu pun mabalin ey makaali assey iggowku.”
43007035	Nan-asiimus dasey papangat ey Jews ey kananda, “Gona nin kanu pey sey ayana ey aji taku pun makad-as an siya? Ey umuy pun lawa asda addayuwan ey ili ey iggawan dasey vurun taku ey Jews ta umuyna tudtujuwan dasey Gentil?
43007036	Kanana ey oni at anaanapun taku siya kon aji taku pun makad-as ya aji taku pun vus makauy assey iggawana. Ngan nin sey piuna ey ugujun?”
43007037	Assey anungus sey ag-agow sey vista ey siya sey ikow kapatigan ey ag-agow, summikad as Jesus at kanana ey nangimvugga, “Nu awad muuwwow an dakayu, umali an sa'un ta uminum.
43007038	Tey sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, kanana, ‘Ngan ey sey mamati an sa'un, awad an siya sey angatud as viyag ey kama as danum ey vumuvus ey aji pun matjukan.’”
43007039	Sey ibagabagan Jesus sana at sey miipanggop assey Ispiritun Apudyus ey awatun dasey mamati an siya. Tey assey timpu saji, daan pun atgey mibaar sey Ispiritun Apudyus an jida tey daan pun umdas sey mipangatuwan Jesus ya madayawana.
43007040	Inggow da ujum ey nangngor assey imbagan Jesus sana at kananda, “Siya nin tuttuwa nauy sey muuulley ey Profet!”
43007041	Ya kanan vus da ujum, “Siya sey Cristu!” Kon kanan vus da ujum, “Auh, yangey ad Galili sey marpuwan sey Cristu?
43007042	Kanan mit sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey lumuswa sey Cristu assey ganak ari David ya miyanak ad Bethlehem ey ilina.”
43007043	At siyana sey nantoktoknan dasey kasomsomkan da tagu miipanggop an Jesus.
43007044	Awad da ujum ey piunda as Jesus dokmaan kon niippun manginturud ey mangwa.
43007045	Assey siyaji, nampuuli dasey guwarda assey iggawan dasey ap-apun da papaji anda Farisis. At inimus dasey papaji anda Farisis ey kananda, “Ngey payu aji iyyali sina?”
43007046	At kanan dasey guwarda, “Niippun pigey tagu as anung sey angokoona ey guminga!”
43007047	Summongbat dasey Farisis ey kananda, “Urey atpey dakayu at naallilow kayu avus?
43007048	Ey awad agammuyu as urey sa'an asda turey unnu Farisis as namati an siya?
43007049	Niippun! Kon asda tagu anna ey niippun agammuda as dasey ingkur-it Moses, jusaun Apudyus jida.”
43007050	Inggow sey usa ey Farisis ey angngadan as Nicodemus ey siya sey ummuy nikabagbaga an Jesus assey usa ey lavi. Kanana asda vurunna,
43007051	“Kanan sey lintog taku ey aji pun mabalin ey goddongan taku sey usa ey tagu ey majusa nu daan as mabastigar ya maagammuwan nu ngan sey kingwana.”
43007052	At kanan da vurunna an siya, “Ey iGalilika atpey vus? Ayu pees, anapum assey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus at niippun profet as marpu ad Galili.”
43007053	Assey siyaji, navukar da tagu at ummayowda asda vuruyda.
43008001	Navukar pun da tagu, ummuy as Jesus assey tagudtud ey napudjuk as Olib.
43008002	Wikkiwikkis pun assey mavigat, nampuuli as Jesus assey Tempél at nadagup avus da tagu assey iggowna. Asina at itukju ey manudtuju an jida.
43008003	Anna pun ey mantudtuju, indatong dasey mimisturun sey lintog anda Farisis sey usa ey vubai ey naaddarasan ey nikador-ag assey laraki ey dakumpun as asawana, asida at ipatakjug assey sinagung da tagu.
43008004	At kananda an Jesus, “Apu Misturu, naaspuran sey vubai anna ey nikador-ag assey laraki ey dakumpun as asawana.
43008005	Imvilin Moses an jitaku as dasey ingkur-itna ey masapur batubatuwun taku sey vubai ey jugannaʼt inggana as matuy. At ey sana, ngan sey makanam?”
43008006	Inimusda jiyuy an Jesus as amarbalida ta awad an-akil-anda ey mangindarum an siya. Kon nayyunguyung as Jesus ey nangur-it assey luta ey inusarna sey tammujuna.
43008007	Assey anna ey ipigwapigwada ey mangimus, summikad at kanana, “Nu ngan ey sey niippun basurna an dakayu, siya sey amangu ey amatu assey vubai sana.”
43008008	Imbagana pun jiyuy, kasin vus nayyunguyung ey nangingkur-it assey gammatna assey luta.
43008009	Jingngorda pun sey imbagan Jesus saji, nasinsinnus-ada ey umayow ey impangat dasey angkamarong-ag inggana as anggey da Jesus ya sey vubai as nateynan ey summisikad siji.
43008010	Ummoswat pun as Jesus, kanana assey vubai, “Gumman dasey amabpabasur saji an sika? Ey niippun sa'an as nateynan ey mamatu an sika?”
43008011	“Niippun, Apu,” kanan sey vubai. At kanan vus Jesus, “Urey sa'un at ajik pun sika goddongan ey matuy. Ingkan, kon ajim ikasikasin ey vumasur.”
43008012	Assey kasin Jesus gummingaan asda tagu, kanana, “Sa'un sey mipani as silow asda tagu. Ngan ey sey mangunud an sa'un, aji pun manaran assey aggikbot tey awad an siya sey silow ey mangatud as viyag.”
43008013	At kanan dasey Farisis an siya, “Aji pun kapapati sey ibagabagam tey sika ey mismu sey mangintakjug assey long-agnu.”
43008014	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Urey nu sa'un sey mismu ey manakjug assey long-agku, tuttuwa dasey ibagabagak tey agammuk sey narpuwak ya sey ayak. Kon an dakayu, niippun agammuyu assey narpuwak ya sey ayak.
43008015	Ya sey koonyu vus ey manguwis an sa'un at mibasar assey kasomsomkanyu, kon an sa'un, niippun uwisuk as tagu.
43008016	Kon nu as gagara ya awad uwisuk, ustu sey kook tey dakumpun as sa'anak ey manguwis nu aji juwa kani an Ama ey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43008017	Nikur-it assey lintogyu ey nu man-unud sey ibagan sey juwa ey mantistigu, mapati sey ibagada.
43008018	At nu kanaʼsna, sey usa ey manakjug assey long-agku at sa'un ey mismu ya sey mikagwa at as Ama ey nangimbaar an sa'un.”
43008019	At kananda an siya, “Gona iggawan Amam?” At kanan vus Jesus, “Niippun agammuyu an sa'un ya niippun vus agammuyu an Ama. Tey nu agammuyu atyén sa'un, agammuyu vus as Ama.”
43008020	Nauy dasey imbagabagan Jesus assey nantudtujuwana ad darum assey Tempél ey adani assey kuwartu ey apporoda mangintarpunan asda datun. Kon niippun nanokma an siya tey daan pun umdas sey timpu ey madokmaana.
43008021	Kanan vus Jesus an jida, “Oni at umayawak ya anapunak an dakayu, kon aji pun mabalin ey makaali kayu assey ayak tey matuy kayu ey aji pun mapakawan dasey basuryu.”
43008022	At kanan dasey papangat da Jews, “Pana lawa kanan ey aji taku pun mabalin ey makauy assey ayana? Ey gongatuna pun lawa sey long-agna?”
43008023	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “An dakayu ey, luta sey lummuswaanyu, kon an sa'un, ad langit sey narpuwak. Sey koonyu ey ansomsomok at niluluta, kon sa'un at dakumpun.
43008024	At siya sey nangimbagaak an dakayu ad ganad ey matuy kayu ey ajin pun Apudyus pakawanun dasey basuryu tey siya nauy sey tuttuwa ey makwa an dakayu nu ajiyu patiyun ey Sa'un vus pigeyji ey tagu sey ibagabagak.”
43008025	At kananda an Jesus, “Ngey ngadannu gey sanaʼt?” Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Sa'un sey apporok ibagabaga an dakayu manipud assey saradna inggana assey sana.
43008026	Nu miipanggop an dakayu, adjuwan sey mabalin ey mangoddongak an dakayu. Kon sey ibagak anggey asda tagu at sey jingngorku ey narpu assey nangimbaar an sa'un tey tuttuwa sey ibagabagana.”
43008027	Kon asda nangngor at ajida pun naawatan ey as Amana ey Apudyus sey ibagabagana.
43008028	At siya sey kanan Jesus an jida, “Nu maasyu sa'un ipangatu assey krus, Sa'un ey Anak ji Tagu, siyaji sey mangigammuwanyu ey sa'un sey ibagabagak saji ey tagu. Ya maagammuwanyu avus ey niippun kook as marpu assey kuwak ey somsomok nu aji siya anggeyʼs igingak dasey imbagan Ama an sa'un.
43008029	At sey nangimbaar an sa'un, awad siya an sa'un. Ajina pun sa'un paanggayun tey apporok koon dasey amin ey ipakwana ey mallaylaydana.”
43008030	Assey nangimbagaan Jesus siji, adjuwan sey namati an siya.
43008031	Kanan Jesus asda Jews ey namati an siya, “Nu ituruturuyyu ey manguunnud assey tudtujuk, dakayu sey tuttuwa ey pasurutku.
43008032	Maagammuwanyu sey katuttuwaan ey miipanggop an sa'un ya gapu assey katuttuwaan sana, mawayawayaan kayu.”
43008033	At kanan dasey papangat da Jews ey summongbat, “As Abraham sey singganak an dakani at niippun sin-alipan an dakani. At paʼm kanan ey mawayawayaan kani?”
43008034	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Amin ey ambasbasur at nambalinda as alipan sey basur.
43008035	Assey simbaryan, aji pun mikakabvuruy sey usa ey alipan as ing-inggana, kon sey anak, mikakabvuruy as ing-inggana.
43008036	At nu wayawayaan dakayu assey Anak ji Tagu, gadtok ey mawayaan kayu.
43008037	Agammuk ey as Abraham sey singganak an dakayu kon piunyu sa'un gongatun tey sumanga kayu assey ibagabagak an dakayu.
43008038	Sey anggeyʼs ibagak at sey impiilan Ama an sa'un ey kama vus an dakayu ey siya koonyu sey jingngoryu an amayu.”
43008039	Summongbatda ey kananda, “As Abraham ampey sey amani.” At kanan vus Jesus, “Nu tuttuwa ey as Abraham sey amayu, koonyu atyén vus sey kingwana.
43008040	Kon iyanaanapyu pigey sey koonyu ey mangngat an sa'un ey mangimbagabaga an dakayu assey katuttuwaan ey jingngorku an Apudyus. Niippun mit kingwan Abraham as jugannaʼt!
43008041	Tey sey kookoonyu at sey koko'on amayu.” At kananda vus, “As Apudyus sey anggey as Amani, niippun ujum, anggey siya as unujunni.”
43008042	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Nu tuttuwa ey as Apudyus sey Amayu, mamaryad kayu atyén an sa'un tey as Apudyus sey narpuwak at assey sana, annaak sina. Ajiyak pun ummali sina assey kuwak ey goom nu aji vinaarak an siya.
43008043	At ngey payu aji maawatan sey kanak? Amuyu atpey as angingainga kayu asda piuk ey ibaga.
43008044	Anungyu pigey tuttuwa as amayu ey Satanas. At siya sey piunyu ey koon sey piuna ey nisarad assey ab-avusna inggana assey sana at pumatupatuy. Niippun vus ibagana as tuttuwa tey sigud ey niippun katuttuwaan an siya. At nu man-us-ussat, koona jiyuy tey siya sey mitagop assey nakopyaana ey ussatan ya siya dallu sey puun sey ussat.
43008045	Kon gapu ta tuttuwa sey ibagabagak an dakayu, siyana sey lapuna as ajiyu pun mamatiyan an sa'un.
43008046	Ey awad usa an dakayu as mangimpaniknik ey vummasurak? Nu ibagak sey katuttuwaan, payu sa'un aji patiyun?
43008047	Dasey anak Apudyus at dongronda sey ibagana an jida. Kon dakumpun as anakna dakayu at siya sey ajiyu pun mangngoran assey ibagana.”
43008048	Kanan dasey papangat da Jews an Jesus, “Tuttuwa sey kananni ey iSamariaka ey najimunyuwan!”
43008049	“Niippun jimunyu an sa'un,” Kanan Jesus, “tey as Ama sey dayawuk, kon laylaysunak an dakayu.
43008050	Dakumpun as siya anapuk sey midayawan sey long-agku kon awad sey usa ey simviyang assey midayawak ey siya vus pigey sey manguwis asda apporow lumaylayus.
43008051	Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Sey mangunud assey ibagabagak at aji pun matuy.”
43008052	Asida at kanan an Jesus, “Assey sana, niippun tuttuwa juwajuwana ey najimunyuwanka! Natuy as Abraham assey kar-argow ya kama avus asda profet. Kon kanam pey dallu ey aji pun matuy sey mangunud assey ibagabagam?
43008053	Ey nangatngatuka gey nu as amani ey Abraham ya dasey profet? Naminda mit nangkakatuy. Ngan sey angiilam assey long-agnu?”
43008054	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Nu sey long-agku sey idayowku, niippun servin sey dayowku sana. Kon sey mangindayow an sa'un at as Amak ey siya sey kananyu ey Apudyusyu.
43008055	Ajiyu pun agammu siya kon sa'un, agammuk siya. At nu kanak ey niippun agammuk an siya, nambalinak as ussatan ey kama an dakayu. Kon tuttuwa ey agammuk ya patiyuk dasey ibagana.
43008056	Amud sey layad Amayu ey Abraham tey namnamauna ey ilana sey umaliyak assey luta. At ey sana, innilana at amud sey layadna.”
43008057	At kananda vus an siya, “Daan at malimampuru sey tawunnu ta'. Innilam at avus kanu as Abraham?”
43008058	At kanan vus Jesus, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey assey daan pun atgey as Abraham miyanak, jummada'anak.”
43008059	Jingngorda pun jiyuy, nangaradaʼs batu ta batuwunda atyén siya, kon nantallingud ey ummayow assey Tempel.
43009001	Assey anna ey anaradaran da Jesus, innilana sey usa ey laraki ey nabvurag ey nisisigud assey niyanakana.
43009002	Inimus dasey pasurutna an siya ey kananda, “Apu Misturu, ngan nin sey simbasur assey lapun sey nabvuragan tagu sana? Ey dasey sin-anak pun lawa, unnu siya ey mismu?”
43009003	At kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Dakumpun as gapu assey basurna unnu basur dasey ummanak an siya. Nakwa nauy an siya ta mipiila sey pannakabalin Apudyus ey mangaan assey vinuragna.
43009004	Masapur ey koon taku sey ipakwan sey nangimbaar an sa'un tey sissiya atgey ey ag-agow. Tey nu lumavi ey, niippun agammu taku ey mangwa.
43009005	Assey annaak atgey assey luvung, sa'un sey silow ey manilow asda tagu.”
43009006	Naas pun Jesus imbaga jiyuy, tinuppaana sey lapuk at intameyna asina at iyaprus assey atan sey nabvurag saji,
43009007	at kanana, “Ingka mandar-up assey pukung ad Siloam.” (sey piuna kanan sey Siloam, “Nibaar.”) Ummuy pun nandar-up sey vurag saji, nampuuli assey vubruyda ey makaila ogon.
43009008	Innilan pun dasey karubvunna ya dasey tagu ey apporow nangila an siya assey ampalpalimmusana, kananda, “Yangey dakumpun as siya nauy sey inggow tagu ey pasig tutukju ey ampalpalimus?”
43009009	Kanan da ujum, “Siya mit.” Kon kanan vus da ujum, “Na'id dakumpun, kavusvusarna anggey.” At guminga mismu sey tagu saji ey kanana, “Sa'un jiyuy.”
43009010	At inimusda ey kananda, “Ngan annuna gey la ey makailaka assey sana?”
43009011	At kanana, “Sey tagu saji ey angngadan as Jesus, nantamey as lapuk asina at iyaprus assey atak. At kanana, ‘Ingka mandar-up ad Siloam.’ Ummuyak pun nandar-up, mag atgey nabkatan sey atak.”
43009012	At kananda, “Gona iggowna?” “Toan,” kanana ey summongbat.
43009013	Oni pun, iniyuyda sey tagu ey nakaan sey vinuragna asda Farisis,
43009014	tey sey ag-agow ey nantamayan Jesus assey lapuk ya nangaanana assey vinuragna at ag-agow ey iillongan.
43009015	At inimus avus dasey Farisis nu ngan annun sey vurag saji ey makaila. At kanan sey tagu saji ey nakaan sey vuragna, “Inggow sey impalidna ey piyok assey atak. Nandar-upak pun, makailaak ogon.”
43009016	Kanan dasey ujum ey Farisis, “Dakumpun as narpu an Apudyus nait ey tagu tey ajina pun unujun sey lintog miipanggop assey ag-agow ey iillongan.” Kon dasey ujum ey vurunda, kananda, “Tuttuwa, kon makakwa pun lawa sey tagu ey ambasubasur as kaskasdaow ey sinyar ey anung sey kingwan sey tagu sana?” At gapuʼsji, nangkikinnuntarada.
43009017	At kasin vus dasey Farisis inimus assey laraki ey kananda, “Kanam ey siya sey nangaan assey vinuragnu. Ngan sey makanam an siya nu'?” “Usa siya ey profet.” Kanana ey summongbat.
43009018	Kon aji pun dasey ujum ey Farisis mamati ey sey tagu saji at niyanak ey vurag kon ey sana mabalin ey makaila. Kingwada pun, impaayagda dasey sin-anak an siya,
43009019	asi da at imusun ey kananda, “Ey siyana sey inggow anakyu ey kananyu ey niyanak ey vurag? Nu siya, ngannuna ey makaila assey sana?”
43009020	At kanan dasey ummanak, “Agammuni ey siya sey anakni ya agammuni ey niyanak ey vurag.
43009021	Kon niippun agammuni nu ngan annuna ey makaila assey sana. Ya niippun vus agammuni nu ngan sey nangaan assey vuragna. Imusunyu pigey an siya tey nat-ong mit at agammuna ey sumongbat.”
43009022	Siyana sey imbagan dasey ummanak tey umugyatda asda ap-apun da Jews tey naasda ginoddongan ey nu awad mamati ey as Jesus at siya sey Cristu, laksigunda jida assey sinagog ey apporon dasey Jews madagupan.
43009023	Siyana sey lapuna nu pan lawa da ummanak kanan, “Imusunyu an siya tey nat-ong at agammuna ey sumongbat!”
43009024	At inayaganda vus kasin sey tagu saji ey nabvurag at kananda, “Isapatam an Apudyus ey ibagam sey tuttuwa tey sey nangagas an sika at agammuni ey ambasbasur nait ey tagu.”
43009025	At kanan sey tagu saji ey summongbat, “Niippun agammuk nu nakabasur siya unnu aji pun. Sey anggey as agammuk at nabvuragak kon makailaak assey sana.”
43009026	At kananda vus an siya, “Ngan sey kingwana an sika? Ngan-annuna ey nangaan assey vinuragnu?”
43009027	At kanana vus ey summongbat, “Naasku mit imbaga an dakayu kon sumanga kayu ey mangngor. Ngey payu vus piun ey kasin dongron? Ey piunyu atpey vus ey ambalin as pasurutna?”
43009028	Assey siyaji, inin-insurtun dasey Farisis siya ey kananda, “Sika sey pasurut sey tagu saji. Kon dakani sey pasurut Moses.
43009029	Agammuni ey nikabagbaga as Apudyus an Moses kon miipanggop ey assey tagu saji, niippun agammuni nu ngan sey narpuwana.”
43009030	At kanan sey tagu saji, “Ayaka gey nait! Kinaanna sey vinuragku ya niippun atgey agammuyu assey narpuwana.
43009031	Agammu taku mit ey as Apudyus at ajina pun dongron dasey tagu ey ambasbasur tey siya anggey as dongrona dasey tagu ey mandayow an siya ya mangwa assey piuna.
43009032	Nansarad assey nakwaan sey luta, niippun jingngor taku as tagu ey nangaan assey vinurag sey usa ey niyanak ey vurag.
43009033	At nu dokon an Apudyus sey narpuwan sey tagu anna, aji pun makakwa assey jugannaʼt.”
43009034	Sinongbatanda siya ey kananda, “Sika sey nisisigud ey ambasbasur manipud assey iniggawam assey vuwang ya sika at avus sey manudtuju an dakani?” Siyaji sey imbagada asida at siya paryawun assey iggawanda.
43009035	Jingngor pun Jesus sey namaryawanda assey nabvurag saji, ummuyna inanap at kanana, “Ey mamatika assey Anak ji Tagu?”
43009036	At kanan sey laraki saji, “Apu, ibagam an sa'un nu ngey ngadanna ta siya sey mantalikak.”
43009037	At kanan Jesus, “Anna ey sasaggungum ey mikabagbaga an sika.”
43009038	At kanan sey laraki saji, “Apu, mamatiyak an sika,” asi at mallikkadang ey mandayow an siya.
43009039	Kanan Jesus, “Ummaliyak assey luta anna ta miila sey nantoknan dasey nangigammu an Apudyus ya dasey aji pun. As dasey aji pun nangigammu an Apudyus ey mipani as nabvurag, kaanuk sey vinuragda. Kon as dasey kananda ey agammuda as Apudyus, ipiilak ey sissiya sey vinuragda.”
43009040	Inggow da ujum ey Farisis ey nangngor assey imbagan Jesus sana at kananda, “Ey sey pium ey ibaga, nabvurag kani vus?”
43009041	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Nu nabvurag kayu, niippun atyén basuryu. Kon gapu ta kananyu ey makaila kayu, sissiya sey basuryu.”
43010001	Nampani as Jesus ey kanana, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Sey tagu ey sumakey assey kurungan dasey karneru ey aji pun manguy assey ustu ey sawang ta kumrab at avus ey anguy assey akup, siya sey akkawan unnu marangsit ey tagu.
43010002	Kon sey tagu ey anguy assey ustu ey sawang, siya sey ustu ey amupuut asda karneru.
43010003	At pasakayun sey guwarda siya assey sawang. At nu sumakey ey ta ayagana dasey karneruna ey usaruna sey impiingsada ey mangawagna an jida, imatunanda sey gingana at kumatamda an siya. Asina at jida ilogsad ey ipuyut assey garab.
43010004	Nu maminda lumogsad, siya sey angimpuyut ya umuunnud dasey karneru an siya tey impiingsada sey gingana.
43010005	Ajida pun maggey umunud assey barangnaʼsnaʼt ey tagu tey umawidda at avus gapu ta ajida pun impiingsa sey gingana.”
43010006	Imbagan Jesus nauy ey pani an jida kon ajida pun naawatan sey piuna ey ugujun.
43010007	At siya sey kasin as Jesus gumminga asda tagu ey kanana, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey sa'un sey Liwangan ey ayun dasey karneru.
43010008	Amin dasey namangu ey ummali nu sa'un, jida dasey akkawan ya marangsit at siya ajin pun dasey karneru jingngor jida.
43010009	Sa'un sey sawang. At ngan ey sey sumakey ey anguy an sa'un at misarakan. Mipanida as karneru ey sumakey ya lummogsad ey umuy manggarab.
43010010	Sey akkawan, siya umaliyana sey umuy man-akow, gumngat ya mandadail. Kon an sa'un, ummaliyak ta ngan ey sey mangunud an Apudyus at maatdan as viyag ey niippun patinggana ya ambaru ey niippun kurangna.
43010011	“Sa'un sey ambaru ey amupuut asda karneru ya manginsarakan an jida ey urey nu siya sey katuyak.
43010012	Kon sey matangtangdanan anggey ey amabantey asda karneru ey dakumpun as siya sey singkuwa, umawid ey maneynan asda karneru nu awad jumatong as wolf ey manokma as dasey karneru ey siya sey masiwaranda.
43010013	Umawid sey matangtangdanan gapu ta matangdanan anggey ya niippun balor dasey karneru an siya.
43010014	Sa'un sey ambaru ey amupuut asda karneru. Agammuk dasey karneruk ya agammuda vus sa'un.
43010015	Kanaʼsna vus an Ama ey agammuna sa'un ya agammuk vus siya ya iturukku sey long-agku ey matuy ta matagu dasey karneruk.
43010016	Awad pey dallu da ujum ey karneruk ey niippun as nauy ey kurungan. Masapur ey ipuyutku vus jida assey kurungan anna ta nu dongronda vus sey gingak, masa'anda ey vungguy ya sa'an sey mamupuut ey mangila an jida.”
43010017	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “As Ama at mamaryad an sa'un tey iturukku sey long-agku ey matuy ta asiyak kasin matagu.
43010018	Niippun mabalin mangngat an sa'un nu aji sa'un sey sinsomsomok ey anginturuk assey matuyak. Awad sey kaviilak ey mangatud assey viyagku ya kaviilak vus ey mamuuli. Siyana sey imvilin Ama ey kook.”
43010019	Jingngor pun dasey Jews sey imbagan Jesus saji, insaradda ey aji pun angkikinnaawat.
43010020	Adjuwan an jida sey nangimbaga ey kananda, “Najimunyuwan siya! Na'ung-ung siya! Pa taku lawa dongron sey ibagana?”
43010021	Kon kanan vus da ujum, “Sey tagu ey najimunyuwan at aji pun guminga as kanaʼsnaʼt. Tey ngannun sey jimunyu ey mangaan assey vurag sey usa ey nabvurag?”
43010022	Assey timpun sey agilid, inggow sey vista ad Jerusalem ey anomsomkanda assey kasinda nangwaan assey domog sey Tempel.
43010023	Assey timpu saji, anna as Jesus ey anaradaran assey kananda ey Bangsar Solomon assey paweyn sey Tempel.
43010024	Inalivungvungan da Jews siya at kananda, “Ayakaji as ag-agow ya ajim pun gey ibaga an dakani sey tuttuwa ey miipanggop an sika? Nu sika sey Cristu, ipakaawatnu ey mangimbaga an dakani.”
43010025	Sinongbatan Jesus jida ey kanana, “Naasku imbaga an dakayu kon aji kayu pun mamati an sa'un. Dasey nakaskasdaow ey apporok kingwa gapu assey pannakabalin Ama at siya sey mangimpanad assey miipanggop an sa'un
43010026	kon ajiyu pun patiyun tey dakumpun kayu as karneruk.
43010027	Agammuk dasey karneruk ya dongronda sey gingak at umunudda an sa'un.
43010028	Atjuk an jida sey viyag ey niippun patinggana ya ajida pun mabalin misina an Apudyus ya niippun mabalin mamros an jida an sa'un.
43010029	Tey as Ama ey nangatud an jida an sa'un at sin-umamud sey pannakabalinna nu dasey kangamin. At siya sey niippun makaviil ey mamros an jida assey amuupuutan Ama ey Apudyus.
43010030	Sa'un ya as Ama at sa'sa'an kani.”
43010031	Jingngor pun dasey Jews sey imbagana saji, kasinda nangara as batu ta batuwunda siya.
43010032	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Adjuwan dasey ambabaru ey nakaskasdaow ey kingwak an dakayu ey impakwan Ama an sa'un. Ngadanna asda kingwak sana sey lapun sey mamatuwanyu an sa'un?”
43010033	At kananda ey summongbat, “Dakumpun assey ambaru ey kingwam sey lapun sey mamatuwanni an sika nu aji sey mangillaylayusam an Apudyus. Taguka mit ey anungni, kon nambalinum at avus sey long-agnu as Apudyus.”
43010034	Kanan Jesus an jida, “Nikukur-it mit assey lintogyu sey kanan Apudyus assey kar-argow miipanggop an dakayu ey papangat da Jews, kanana, ‘Ap-apudyus kayu.’
43010035	Agammu taku ey sey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus at aji pun maat-atub. Nu inawagan Apudyus as ap-apudyus dasey tagu ey nikabagbagaana,
43010036	ngey payu kanan ey gummingaak as mivusur an Apudyus nu kanak ey sa'un sey Anakna? Sa'un mit sey pinilina ya imbaarna assey luta anna.
43010037	At nu ajik pun koon dasey nakaskasdaow ey apporon Ama ipakwa an sa'un, urey ajiyu sa'un patiyun.
43010038	Kon andana mit dasey kookook at siya atyén sey maawisanyu ey mamati urey nu sumanga kayu assey ibagabagak ta maagammuwanyu ya maawatanyu ey awad as Ama an sa'un ya awadak vus an Ama.”
43010039	Piunda atyén dokmaan as Jesus kon nallibas ey ummayow.
43010040	At nampuuli as Jesus assey jumang sey dawwang ad Jordan assey lugar ey namvunvunyagan John at as jiyuy sey iniggawana.
43010041	Amud pey dasey an-orooros ey ummuy mangila an siya ey kananda, “Niippun kingwan John as nakaskasdaow ey sinyar, kon amin dasey imbagana miipanggop assey tagu sana at tuttuwa.”
43010042	At adjuwan dasey tagu siji ey namati an siya.
43011001	Assey ili ad Betani, inggow dasey mansusunud ey da Mary, Martha ya as Lazarus. (As Mary anna at siya sey inggow nangintu'ug assey bangbangu assey sikin Jesus asina at ipunas sey vuukna.) As Lazarus ey sunudda at masakit.
43011003	Nangimbaar da Mary an Martha as umuy mangimbaga an Jesus ey kananda, “Apu, masakit akey sey pipium ey vub-urunnu.”
43011004	Jingngor pun Jesus, kanana, “Sey sakitna anna at ajina pun ikatuy nu aji nakwa nauy as madayawan Apudyus ya madayawan avus sey Anakna.”
43011005	As Jesus at mamaryad asda turu sana ey mansusunud.
43011006	Kon urey nu nadamagna ey masakit as Lazarus, iniinggow yén siya as juwa ey ag-agow assey iggawana saji.
43011007	Oni pun, kanana asda pasurutna, “Intaku kasin ad Judea.”
43011008	Kon kanan dasey pasurutna, “Rabbi, aji taku ampuuli ad Judea tey piga vus sey tigangeyʼn da Jews amatuwan an sika.”
43011009	Kon kanan vus Jesus, “Agammuyu mit ey nasawaran as juwa ey uras sey umargow. At nu manaran sey tagu assey ag-agow, aji pun mijungtur tey mimi'ila sey ayuna.
43011010	Kon nu lavi sey manaranana, mijungtur tey aji pun miila.”
43011011	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nasusuyup as Lazarus ey vub-urun taku, kon inyak ta inyak siya bangunun.”
43011012	At kanan dasey pasurutna, “Apu, nu nasusuyup, ambaru ta kumasdor.”
43011013	Siyaji sey kanan dasey pasurutna tey ngadnunda nu nasusuyup tuttuwa as Lazarus, kon sey piun Jesus ibaga, natuy as Lazarus.
43011014	At vinugasana ey kanana, “Natuy as Lazarus,
43011015	kon gapu an dakayu, naragsakak tey niippunak siji assey natuyana ta kumasdor sey pammatiyu an sa'un. At siya sey intaku ilan siya.”
43011016	As Thomas ey kananda ey “Kapil,” kanana asda vurunna ey pasurut Jesus, “Mikauy taku losan ta urey nu mikakatuy taku an siya!”
43011017	Jummatong pun da Jesus ad Betani, naagammuwana ey naas ogon nakapat sey nilabnan Lazarus.
43011018	Sey vubruy sana ey Betani at adani ad Jerusalem, umuy anggey as turu ey kilameter sey kaadayuna
43011019	at siya sey adjuwan dasey narpu ad Judea ey ummuy manarsalliwa anda Mary an Martha gapu assey natuyan sey sunudda.
43011020	Jingngor pun Martha ey marungey as Jesus, lummogsad ey umuy mangabot an siya, kon as Mary ininggow ad darum assey vuruy.
43011021	Inabot pun Martha as Jesus, kanana, “Nu ininggowka atyén pey sina Apu, aji pun nin natuy sey sunudku!
43011022	Kon agammuk ey urey assey sana, atjun Apudyus sey pium ey kudawun an siya.”
43011023	At kanan Jesus, “Matagu kasin sey sunudnu.”
43011024	At kanan Martha, “Oon tuttuwa, agammuk ey umuli siya assey anungus sey ag-agow.”
43011025	Asin at Jesus kanan, “Sa'un sey managu asda natuy. Sa'un vus sey mangatud assey viyag. At sey tagu ey mamati an sa'un, urey nu matuy, matagu dallu as ing-inggana.
43011026	Ya dasey natattagu ey mamati an sa'un at ajida pun matuy. Ey mamatika as nauy?”
43011027	At kanan Martha, “Mamatiyak Apu ey sika sey Cristu ey Anak Apudyus. Sika sey uullayunni ey umali assey luta anna.”
43011028	Naas pun Martha imbaga da nauy, nampuuli assey vuruyda ey umuy mangayag an Mary ey sunudna. Kanana ey nangiyyagutimtim, “Jummatong as misturu at anji ey imusuna sika.”
43011029	Jingngor pun Mary, lummibbat ey dagus ey umuy mangabot an Jesus.
43011030	(As Jesus at daan pun atgey jumatong assey vubruy ey iggawan da Mary tey sissiya atgey assey pudayan assey ummuy Martha nangabtan an siya.)
43011031	At dasey tagu ey inggow assey vuruy ey umuy manarsalliwa anda Mary, ummunudda an siya assey innilada ey angkamukamu ey lumogsad tey kananda pun nu umuy managimbaru assey lavun Lazarus.
43011032	Inumdas pun as Mary assey iggawan Jesus, nallukvub ey dagus assey sinagungna ey kanana, “Apu, nu ininggowka atyén pey sina, aji pun natuy sey sunudku.”
43011033	Innilan pun Jesus as Mary ya dasey tagu ey nivurun an siya ey siiivil, amud sey sigab sey somsomokna ya nasursurjung,
43011034	at kanana, “Gona nangillabnanyu an siya?” “Apu, umalika ta ingka ilan,” kananda an siya
43011035	Anna pun ey umuyda, nalluwa as Jesus.
43011036	At kanan dasey tagu, “Ilanyu, amud sey layadna an Lazarus!”
43011037	Kon kanan da ujum, “Nu impaambaruna sey nabvurag saji, ngey pana maggey iparuvus ey matuy as Lazarus?”
43011038	Sissiya ey amud sey sigab sey somsomok Jesus assey anna ey umadani assey liyang ey nangillabnan da an Lazarus ey nuumban as batu.
43011039	Kanan Jesus asda tagu, “Kaanunyu sey batu ey unubna!” Kon kanan Martha ey sunud sey natuy, “Ustu Apu, sumungsung in ogon tey naas nakapat sey nilabnana.”
43011040	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Ey ajik imbaga an sika ey nu mamatika at miilam sey pannakabalin Apudyus?”
43011041	At kinaanda sey batu ey unub sey lavun. Asi at mantangad as Jesus ey kanana, “Ansaramatak Ama tey jingngornu sa'un.
43011042	Agammuk ey dodongronak ey kankanayun, kon ibagak nauy gapu asda tagu ey annaʼsna ta mamatida ey sika sey nangimbaar an sa'un.”
43011043	Naas pun Jesus imbaga jiyuy, inipkowna ey kanana, “Lazarus, lumuswaka!”
43011044	At lummuswa as Lazarus ey nakurvikuban da imana ya sikina anda vusarna assey sinnun. At kanan Jesus, “Kaanunyu sey kurvikubna ta awad agammuna ey anggiju.”
43011045	At dasey amud pey ey Jews ey nivurun an Mary, innilada sey kingwan Jesus at namatida an siya.
43011046	Kon inggow da ujum an jida ey ummuy asda Farisis at imbagada sey kingwan Jesus saji.
43011047	At naamung dasey Farisis ya dasey nangangatu ey papaji at impaayagda dasey ujum ey papangat dasey Jews at kananda, “Ngan gey la sey koon taku? Amud mit pigey dasey nakaskasdaow ey apporon sey tagu sana kookoon!
43011048	Nu beybey-an taku ey sassana sey kookoona, maminda tagu mamati an siya. At nu kanaʼsna, yangey aji umali dasey iRoman ey apporow manginturey an jitaku ya bakasunda sey Tempél taku ya sey ili taku anna?”
43011049	Kon inggow sey usa an jida ey kangatuwan ey paji assey siyaji ey tawun ey angngadan as Caiaphas, kanana, “Niippun agammuyu as ugujunyu!
43011050	Ey ajiyu pun maawatan ey un-unina sey sa'an ey tagu as matuy ta awad agammun dasey kailiyana ey matagu nu sey losan taku muupilat ey sin-iliyén?”
43011051	Sey imbagan Caiaphas saji, dakumpun as narpu assey kuwana ey goom, kon gapu ta siya sey kangatuwan ey paji assey siyaji ey tawun, pinagingan Apudyus siya ey nangimpadaan assey matuyan Jesus ey para asda kailiyana ey Jews.
43011052	Ya dakumpun gey as anggeyda ey Jews tey urey dasey amin ey anak Apudyus ey ummili asda amin ey kikkiili ta ambalinuna jida as simbaryan.
43011053	Mallugi assey ag-agow saji, insarad dasey papangat da Jews ey manganaanap nu ngan annunda ey mangngat an Jesus.
43011054	At assey timpu saji, aji pun as Jesus nampippiila asda tagu ad Judea at ummayowda siji ey nangingkapon ad Efraim ey usa ey munisipyu ey adani assey danak at as jiyuy sey iniggawanda asda pasurutna.
43011055	Tigangey pun sey vista ey kananda ey Manomsomkan, amud pey tagu ey narpu assey kavubruvubruy ey nandatdatong ad Jerusalem ta umuyda yén koon sey nakopyaanda ey man-amus as madarusanda ta asida at mabalin ey mikavista.
43011056	At dasey tagu anna ey nandatdatong ad Jerusalem, anaanapunda as Jesus at kananda ey ambabagbaga assey Tempel, “Ngan sey makananyu? Ey umali siya ey mikavista unnu aji pun?”
43011057	Siya sey kananda tey imvilin dasey nangangatu ey papaji ya dasey Farisis ey ngan ey sey nangigammu assey iggawan Jesus, ipaagammuda ta umuyda siya dokmaan.
43012001	Awad sey onom ey ag-agow ey daan ya asi at umdas sey vista. Assey siyaji, ummuy da Jesus ad Betani ey vubruy da Lazarus. As Lazarus anna at siya inggow natuy ey tinaguna.
43012002	Insaganaanda ey ammangili an Jesus. As Martha sey nangimpuut asda mangili. At as Lazarus, nikasangu anda Jesus ey mangan.
43012003	Anna pun ey mangamanganda, innaran Mary sey kagugwan sey parasku ey pasig ey nard ey kanginaan ey bangbangu at intu'ugna assey sikin Jesus asina at punasan assey vuukna. At manomadomadom sey bangun sey bangbangu saji ad darum ey vuruy.
43012004	Kon as Judas Iscariot (Siya sey malliput an Jesus ey usa asda pasurut Jesus.) kanana,
43012005	“Aman! Pata lawa aji ingngina as batug ji turung gasut ey dinari ta awad atjun asda lumawa?”
43012006	Imbagan Judas jiyuy ey dakumpun as gapu ta madagu asda lumawa, nu aji gapu ta siya at akkawan. Siya vus sey mamangjun assey pilakda at dana aran sey ujum as para an siya.
43012007	Kon kanan Jesus, “Amorna, keygad siya! Tey intatarpunna nauy ey bangbangu as misaganaan sey long-agku para assey ag-agow ey milabnak.
43012008	Kon asda lumawa, kanayun ey awadda an dakayu, kon an sa'un ey, ajiyak pun as kanayun ey awad an dakayu.”
43012009	Jingngor pun dasey amud ey tagu ey awad as Jesus ad Betani, ummuyda ey nangila an siya. Kon dakumpun anggey as Jesus sey piunda ey umuy ilan nu aji urey as Lazarus ey natuy ey tinagun Jesus.
43012010	At kingwan pun dasey nangangatu ey papaji, pinanggopda ey ijuga gongatun as Lazarus
43012011	tey gapu assey nakwa an siya, amud pey ey Jews sey nangimpug-an ey umunud an jida tey namatida an Jesus.
43012012	Mavigat pun, jingngor dasey amud ey tagu ey ummuy nikavista ey annat ey marungey as Jesus.
43012013	Kingwada pun, nangarada asda tuvun da ballang asida at umuy abton siya ey sivuvugga ey kananda, “Madayow as Apudyus! Vindisyunan atyén Apudyus sey imbaarna ey pannakalong-agna ey ambalin as Ari taku ey iyIsrael!”
43012014	Assey siyaji, nangabayu as Jesus assey ubvun sey donkey. At nauy sey tummuttuwaan sey impakur-it Apudyus assey kar-argow ey kanana,
43012015	“Dakayu ey iJerusalem aji kayu umugyat tey annaʼt ey umali sey Ariyu ey nangakabbayu assey ubvun sey donkey.”
43012016	Assey nakwa saji ey nangabayuwana assey ubvun sey donkey, aji pun dasey pasurut Jesus naawatan sey piuna ey ugujun. Kon naas pun siya ummuli ey nampuuli ad langit, ingkagasmokda ey sey nauy ey nakwa at siya sey tummuttuwaan sey impakur-it Apudyus assey kar-argow ey jida vus pigey sey natongparana.
43012017	Dasey tagu ey nangila assey namkawan Jesus an Lazarus ey lummuswa assey lavun assey nanaguwana an siya, jida sey apporow nangimpadamag assey nakwa saji.
43012018	At siyana sey lapuna ey amud pey sey tagu ey ummuy nangabot an siya tey jingngorda dasey nakaskasdaow ey sinyar ey kingwana.
43012019	At asda Farisis avus, nambabag-anda ey kananda, “Ilanyu man ya! Niippun kasin taku koon, anna ey ummunud sey silluvungan an siya!”
43012020	Assey timpun sey vista saji, inggow dasey ujum ey Greek ey ummuy vus nijuga ey mandaydayow an Apudyus ad Jerusalem.
43012021	Ummuyda an Philip, (As Philip at iBethsaida ey sakup sey provinsiyan sey Galili) at kananda an siya, “Apu, piunni atyén ey kabagbaga as Jesus.”
43012022	Ummuy Philip imbaga an Andrew at nantun-udda ey juwa ey ummuy nangimbaga an Jesus.
43012023	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Jummatong sey timpun sey madayawan sey Anak ji Tagu.
43012024	At ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey sey vukar nu aji yén matab-unan assey luta ta aji mapilok sey uppakna, sissiya ey vukar. Kon nu mimura ta mapilok ya tumuvu, amunga as adjuwan.
43012025	At sey tagu ey siya anggeyʼs ipapangugna sey viyagna assey luta anna at matuy dallu. Kon sey tagu ey ivilangna as niippun balor sey viyagna assey luta anna, siya sey matagu as ing-inggana.
43012026	At ngan ey sey maryad ey manservi an sa'un, masapur ey sa'un sey unujuna ta sey iggowku siya avus sey iggowna. At dasey manservi anna an sa'un, idayow vus Ama jida.”
43012027	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Anna ey mansigab sey somsomokku, ngan gey lawa sey iluwaruk an Ama? Ey dawatuk nin an Ama ta milisiyak nauy ey tongtong-ag ey makwa an sa'un? Kon siyana mit sey inggadtokku ey ummali ta matongtong-agak.”
43012028	Asin at Jesus kanan, “Ama, ipiilam sey madayawan sey ngadannu!” Inggingana pun ji, inggow sey gumminga ey narpu ad langit ey kanana, “Impiilak sey madayawak, at ipiilak vus kasin.”
43012029	Jingngor pun dasey amud ey tagu ey angkasikad siji, kananda, “Anna ey nangijur.” Kon kanan vus da ujum, “Awad enjel as nikabagbaga an siya.”
43012030	Kon kanan Jesus an jida, “Sey ginga ey jingngoryu at dakumpun as para an sa'un nu aji niiginga ta mamati kayu.
43012031	Tey anna ey jummatong sey timpu ey muuwisan dasey tagu assey luta anna. Ya assey sana vus ey timpu sey maabakan Satanas ey ap-apun dasey tagu ey aji pun mamati.
43012032	At nu mipangatuwak ey mikrus assey luta anna, awisuk amin da tagu ta mamatida an sa'un.”
43012033	Sey nangimbagaan Jesus siji, ta ipaagammuna nu ngan annuna ey matuy.
43012034	Jingngor pun dasey amud ey tagu sey imbagana saji, kananda, “Paʼm kanan ey masapur mipangatu sey Anak ji Tagu? Tey sey kanan mit sey lintog ey nitudtuju an dakani at sey Cristu at matatagu as ing-inggana. Ey ngan sey Anak ji Tagu sana nu'?”
43012035	Kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Sa'un ey silow, sin-akitan anggey sey iggawak an dakayu. Ituruyyu at ey manaran tey anna atgey sey silow an dakayu tey oni at lawa ya magikbotan kayu. Tey sey manaran assey gikbot at an-amuwwong as kapnona.
43012036	Gapu ta anna ey sissiya sey silow an dakayu, mamati kayu assey silow ta ambalin kayu as tagu ey nasilawan sey somsomokna.” Naas pun Jesus imbagaji, ummayow at aji pun nampiila an jida.
43012037	Urey nu amud sey kaskasdaow ey sinyar ey impiipiilan Jesus an jida, ajida pun pey dallu namati an siya.
43012038	At nauy sey tumuttuwaan sey imbagan profet Isaiah ey kanana, “Apu, niippun mamati assey apporoni ibaga ya ajida pun pinagan-anu dasey impiilam ey pannakabalinnu.”
43012039	At sey gapuna as ajida pun mamatiyan, tey inggow vus sey imbagan profet Isaiah ey kanana,
43012040	“Vinurag Apudyus dasey atada ya impakabnutna sey somsomokda ta ajida pun makaawat ya ajida pun makaila ya ajida pun sagungun siya ta ajina ipabaru jida.”
43012041	Siyana sey imbagan Isaiah tey urey assey kar-argow, nipiila an siya sey kinaApudyus Jesus at siya sey nangimbagaana assey miipanggop an siya.
43012042	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, adjuwan dasey papangat ey Jews ey namati an Jesus. Kon ajida pun ipadlow ey mamatida tey an-oromda as jusaun dasey Farisis jida ya laksigunda jida as vurunda
43012043	tey siya dokdokronda sey mangindayawan da tagu an jida nu as Apudyus.
43012044	Oni pun, indangsor Jesus ey gumminga ey kanana, “Sey tagu ey mamati an sa'un, dakumpun anggey as sa'un sey pinatina nu aji urey sey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43012045	At ngan ey sey nangila an sa'un, innilana vus sey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43012046	Ummaliyak ey kamaʼs silow assey luta ta ngan ey sey mamati an sa'un, aji pun iinggow assey aggikbot.
43012047	“Ngan ey sey mangngor assey tudtujuk ya ajina pun patiyun, dakumpun as sa'un sey manguwis an siya. Tey dakumpun as siya ummaliyak assey luta anna sey umuy manguwis nu aji ummaliyak ta inyak jida isarakan.
43012048	Kon awad sey asi manguwis asda tagu ey sumanga an sa'un ya aji pun mangngor assey ibagak. Tey dasey mismu ey apporok ingginga sey manguwis an jida assey anungus sey ag-agow.
43012049	Tey ajik pun ibaga da nauy assey kuwak ey goom nu aji as Ama ey nangimbaar an sa'un sey nangimvilin assey masapur ey igingak.
43012050	At siya anggey as ugujuk sey imvilin Ama an sa'un, tey agammuk ey dasey vilinna at mangatud as viyag ey niippun patinggana.”
43013001	Assey tigangey jumatong sey kananda ey vista ey Manomsomkan assey nallausan sey enjel, agammun Jesus ey jummatong sey timpuna ey maneynan assey luta anna ta ampuuli an Amana ad langit. Manipud assey lugrugina at pipiuna dasey taguna assey luta anna. At ey sana piuna ipiila sey kinabalor sey layadna an jida.
43013002	Assey siyaji ey lavi, assey anna ey mangan da Jesus asda aposelna, naas at Satanas impaspasmok an Judas ey anak Simon Iscariot sey panggopna ey malliput an Jesus.
43013003	Kon agammun Jesus ey amin ey pannakabalin at innatud amana an siya ya agammuna vus ey as Apudyus sey narpuwana ya siya vus pigey sey ampuuliyana.
43013004	At kingwana pun, tummakjug assey kakakkanan at kinaanna sey gotap sey lumvunna asina at ikain sey tuwarya.
43013005	Naas pun, kinoana sey visin assey danum at insaradna ey manguras assey sikin dasey aposelna asina at punasan assey tuwarya ey ingkakainna.
43013006	Anna pun ey mibatug an Simon Peter, kanana an Jesus, “Apu, dakumpun atyén as sika sey manguras assey sikik.”
43013007	At kanan Jesus, “Ajim pun maawatan sey kook anna kon maawatam dallu assey daan ey ag-agow.”
43013008	Kon kanan Peter, “Na! Ajim at maggey urasan sey sikik!” Kon kanan Jesus an siya, “Nu ajik urasan sey sikim, ajika pun ogon mivilang as pasurutku.”
43013009	At kanan vus Peter, “Nu kanaʼsna atpey, Apu, dakumpun anggey sey sikik sey urasam, nu aji urey sey imak ya sey uruk at ijugam amin urasan.”
43013010	At kanan vus Jesus, “Sey tagu ey naas nan-amus, ajina pun vus kasin urasan sey long-agna tey naas nadarusan, maraksig anggey assey sikina. Nadarus kayu losan maraksig assey usa an dakayu.”
43013011	Siyana sey kanan Jesus tey aaggammuna sey malliput an siya, at siya sey kanana, “Nadarus kayu losan maraksig assey usa an dakayu.”
43013012	Naas pun Jesus inurasan dasey sikida, impuulina inigga sey gotap sey lumvunna asi at ampuuli assey tukjuna. At kanana, “Ey naawatanyu sey kingwak saji an dakayu?
43013013	Ustu mit tey apporoyu sa'un awagan as Misturu ya Apu tey siyanaʼt sey katuttuwaan miipanggop an sa'un.
43013014	Nu sa'un ey Apuyu ya Misturuyu at inurasak dasey sikiyu, masapur atyén vus ey man-iinnuras kayu as siki.
43013015	Kingwak nauy ta awadji unujunyu ta koonyu avus asda ujum sey kingwak an dakayu.
43013016	Tey ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey niippun alipan as nangatngatu nu sey sin-alipan an siya ya niippun nibaar as nangatngatu nu sey nangimbaar an siya.
43013017	At ey sana, gapu ta naawatanyu sey katuttuwaan, nagasat kayu nu koonyu da nauy.
43013018	“Sey imbagak anna at dokon pun as miipanggop an dakayu losan tey agammuk dasey pinilik. Kon masapur matongpar sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Sey apporow nikauvung an sa'un at nambalin as kavusurku.’
43013019	Ibagak da nauy an dakayu ta nu jumatong sey makwaana, mamati kayu ey sa'un sey Cristu.
43013020	Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Sey amadatong assey ngadannaʼs naʼt ey ibaarku at sa'un sey pinadatongna. At ngan ey sey amadatong an sa'un, pinadatongna vus sey nangimbaar an sa'un.”
43013021	Naas pun Jesus imbaga da nauy, amud sigab sey somsomokna at illawagna imbaga ey kanana, “Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey awad sey usa an dakayu ey malliput an sa'un.”
43013022	Assey siyaji,, nan-asitollong dasey aposelna ey an-amuwongda nu ngadanna an jida sey piun Jesus kanan.
43013023	Sey usa asda aposel Jesus ey ikowna pipiun, tutukju assey dor-ag Jesus.
43013024	At sininyasan Simon Peter siya ta imusuna nu ngadanna an jida sey piun Jesus ey kanan.
43013025	Nantawili sey aposel saji an Jesus at kanana, “Apu, ngadanji ey malliput an sika?”
43013026	At kanan Jesus, “Sey angindawdawak assey tinapey nu maasku isowsow, siya jiyuy.” Assey siyaji, insowsow Jesus sey tinapey asina at atjun an Judas ey anak Simon Iscariot.
43013027	Innaran pun gey Judas sey tinapey saji, nilun-ug as Satanas an siya. At kanan Jesus an Judas, “Ganasam! Ingka at koon sey simsimmoknu ey koon.”
43013028	At dasey aposel Jesus ey angkatukju ey mangamangan, ajida pun naawatan nu pan lawa Jesus ji ibaga an Judas.
43013029	Gapu ta as Judas sey mamangjun assey pilakda, kanan pun da ujum nu imbaar Jesus siya ey umuy ngumina as kasapuranda assey vista unnu umuy mangatud as pilak asda lumawa.
43013030	Naas pun Judas kinan sey tinapey, lummogsad ey dagus. Lavi sey nakwaana nauy.
43013031	Ummayow pun as Judas, kanan Jesus, “Assey sana ey timpu sey madayawan sey Anak ji Tagu ya gapu an siya madayow as Apudyus.
43013032	At nu madayow as Apudyus gapu an siya, ipiilan Apudyus assey sana ey timpu sey madayawan sey Anak ji Tagu.
43013033	“Dakayu ey aanakku, sin-akitan anggey sey iggawak an dakayu. Ya oni at anapunak an dakayu, kon ikasinku ibaga an dakayu sey imbagak as dasey papangat da Jews ey aji kayu pun makaali assey ayak.
43013034	At ey sana, annaya sey baru ey ivilinku an dakayu. Masapur manlilinnayad kayu. Kama atyén assey layad ey apporok impiila an dakayu sey koonyu ey manlilinnayad.
43013035	At nu manlilinnayad kayu, siyaji sey mangigammuwan dasey amin ey tagu ey pasurutku dakayu.”
43013036	Inimus Peter an Jesus ey kanana, “Ngan sey ayam Apu?” At kanan Jesus, “Sey ayak at ajika pun mabalin ey umunud assey sana. Kon assey daan ey ag-agow mabalin ey umunudka.”
43013037	At kanan vus Peter, “Paak lawa aji makaali an sika assey sana, Apu? Nakasaganaak mit ey matuy para an sika.”
43013038	At kanan Jesus, “Ey tuttuwa ey nakasaganaka ey matuy para an sa'un? Ibagak an sika sey katuttuwaan ey daan pun atgey manullakuk assey sana ey lavi at mamitluwum sa'un vuyagun ey kanam ey ajim pun sa'un agammu.”
43014001	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ilanyu ta aji malilivuk sey somsomokyu nu aji iturturuyyu at ey mamati an Apudyus ya mamati vus an sa'un.
43014002	Adjuwan sey mig-awan assey iggow Ama ad langit. Inyak siji ta isaganak sey iggawanyu. Ajik pun maggey ibaga nauy an dakayu nu dakumpun as tuttuwa.
43014003	At nu maas misagana sey iggawanyu, ampuuliyak ey umali mangara an dakayu ta mikig-ow kayu an sa'un assey iggawak.
43014004	Agammuyu mit sey daran ey umuy assey ayak.”
43014005	At kanan Thomas an siya, “Apu, niippun agammuni nu ngan sey ayam. Ngan annunni ey angigammu assey daran ey umuy assey ayam?”
43014006	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana an siya, “Sa'un sey daran ey umuy ad langit tey sa'un sey puun sey katuttuwaan ya sa'un sey angatud as viyag. Niippun makauy an Amak nu aji manguy an sa'un.
43014007	At nu tuttuwa ey agammuwak an dakayu, agammuyu vus as Ama. At mansarad ey sana, agammuyu ya innilayu siya.”
43014008	Kanan vus Philip an siya, “Apu, ipiilam as Amam an dakani ta ming-op kani.”
43014009	Sinongbatan Jesus ey kanana, “Atomanji Philip as iniggawak an dakayu ya ajim pun atgey agammu sa'un? Sey tagu ey nangila an sa'un, innilana vus as Amak. Ngey paʼm kanan ey ipiilak as Amak an dakayu?
43014010	Ey ajim pun atgey patiyun ey awadak an Ama ya awad vus as Amak an sa'un? Dasey apporok ingginga an dakayu, dakumpun as narpu assey kuwak ey somsomok nu aji narpu an Ama ey aawwad an sa'un. Ya amin dasey apporok kingwa siya vus pigey sey nangwa.
43014011	Patiyunyu atyén sey kanak ey awadak an Ama ya awad vus as Amak an sa'un. At nu aji kayu ming-op assey kanak, mamati kayu atyén gapu asda nakaskasdaow ey apporok kingwa.
43014012	“Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Nu ngan man sey mamati an sa'un, mabalin ey koona vus dasey kaskasdaow ey apporok kingwa. Ya mabalinna vus ey koona sey sin-umamud nu da nauy tey ampuuliyak an Ama.
43014013	At ngan man sey kudawunyu gapu assey nititimpuyuganyu an sa'un at kook ta madayow as Ama gapu an sa'un ey Anakna.
43014014	Ikasinku ey mangimbaga ey nu ngadannaʼs naʼt ey kudawunyu gapu assey nijujug-anyu an sa'un, atjuk.”
43014015	Kanan vus Jesus, “Nu awad layadyu an sa'un, unujunyu dasey vilinku.
43014016	Dawatuk an Ama ta ibaarna sey tumuturung an dakayu ey siya sey miyoros an sa'un ta mikig-ow an dakayu as ing-inggana.
43014017	Siya sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey mangintudtuju an dakayu assey katuttuwaan miipanggop an siya. At dasey tagu ey aji pun mamati, at ajida pun mabalin ey awatun siya tey ajida pun as milasinan ya niippun agammuda an siya. Kon an dakayu, agammuyu siya tey aawwad an dakayu ya as oni at milong-ag an dakayu.
43014018	“Ajik pun dakayu man-awidan ey kamaʼs ulila ey niippun amuut tey ampuuliyak vus pigey an dakayu.
43014019	Aji pun as mabayag at niippun mangil-an dasey tagu ey aji pun mamati an sa'un. Kon an dakayu, miilaak dallu. At gapu ta mataguwak kasin, kasin kayu avus matagu.
43014020	Assey nait ey timpu, maagammuwanyu ey awadak an Ama ya awad kayu avus an sa'un ey kama assey kaawadku an dakayu.
43014021	Sey tagu ey mangunud assey vilinku, siya sey awad layadna an sa'un. Pipiun Ama sey tagu ey maryad an sa'un ya urey vus sa'un at pipiuk siya ya ipaagammuk an siya sey amin ey nakopyaak.”
43014022	At kanan Judas (dakumpun an Judas Iscariot) “Apu, Pa lawa dakani anggey sey mangimpaagammuwam assey amin ey nakopyaam ey dokon asda amin ey tagu assey luta?”
43014023	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Tey sey maryad an sa'un, dongrona sey ibagak. Sey tagu ey kanaʼsji, siya sey piun Ama. At ingkani an Amak ey mikig-ow an siya.
43014024	Kon sey tagu ey sumanga an sa'un, ajina pun dongron sey ibagak. At dasey amin ey imbagak ey jingngoryu, dakumpun as narpu assey kuwak ey somsomok nu aji narpu an Ama ey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43014025	“Ibagak amin da nauy an dakayu tey sissiyaak atgey an dakayu.
43014026	Kon oni at ibaar Ama an dakayu sey Ispirituna ey pannakalong-agku ey tumurung an dakayu. Siya sey mangintudtuju an dakayu assey amin, ipakagasmokna dasey amin ey imbagabagak an dakayu.
43014027	“Aji kayu madanagan ya aji kayu umugyat tey atjuk sey tumarnaan sey somsomokyu. Sey tarna ey atjuk an dakayu at aji pun miyisu assey tarna ey ibagabagan da tagu assey luta anna nu aji sey nauy ey tarna, sa'un ey mismu sey marpuwana.
43014028	Jingngoryu mit sey imbagak ey teynak dakayu, kon ampuuliyak vus pigey an dakayu. At nu pipiunak an dakayu, allaylayad kayu atyén tey inyak an Ama ey sin-umamud sey kinangatuna nu sa'un.
43014029	Ipapaddaanku ibaga nauy an dakayu assey sana tey anna ey daan pun makwa, ta nu umdas sey makwaana, mamati kayu ey tuttuwa sey imbagak.
43014030	“Ajiyak pun ambayag ey mikabagbaga an dakayu tey anna ey umali as Satanas ey pangat dasey tagu ey aji pun mamati. Niippun karobbongana an sa'un
43014031	kon iturukku ey makwa ta maagammuwan da tagu assey luta anna ey pipiuk as Ama ya tornok ey mangwa assey amin ey imvilinna ey kook. “Kanaʼsji, intakun.”
43015001	Nampani as Jesus at kanana, “Sa'un sey ustu ey puun sey mura ey greps at as Ama, siya sey amupuut.
43015002	Korsatana kaanun dasey gakkurang ey aji pun mamunga ya darusana dasey gakkurang ey mamunga ta umad-aju sey vungada.
43015003	Dakayu sey mipani as dasey gakkurang ey nadarusan gapu assey namatiyanyu as dasey tudtujuk an dakayu.
43015004	Iturturuyyu ey mijujugga an sa'un ya mijujuggaak vus an dakayu. Tey sey gakkurang at aji pun mamunga nu makorsatan ey misina assey puunna. Anungna vus an dakayu at aji kayu pun vus makakwa assey piun Apudyus nu niippunak an dakayu.”
43015005	Ingkasin Jesus ey nampani, kanana, “Sa'un sey puun sey mura ey greps ya dakayu sey gakkurangna. Ngan ey sey manginturturuy ey mijujugga an sa'un ya mijujuggaak vus an siya, siya sey makakwa as dasey adjuwan ey piun Apudyus ey kama as namunga as adjuwan ey vunga. Kon nu niippunak an dakayu, aji kayu pun makakwa assey piuk.
43015006	Ngan ey dasey aji pun mijujugga an sa'un, miballuda ey kamaʼs nakorsatan ey gakkurang. Nu maranguda ey, muugpunda ey maskuran.
43015007	Kon nu iturturuyyu ey mijujugga an sa'un ya mimumura sey gingak assey somsomokyu ey siya sey unuunujunyu, urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey kudawunyu ey piunyu at maatud an dakayu.
43015008	Siyana sey madayawan Ama nu adjuwan sey vungan sey pammatiyu. At nu kanaʼsji, siyana vus sey mangimpiila ey pasurutku dakayu.
43015009	“Mamaryadak an dakayu ey kama assey mamaryadan Ama an sa'un. At siya sey ituturuyyu ey mivuvullun an sa'un ta umajuaju sey maagammuwanyu miipanggop assey layadku.
43015010	Nu tongparunyu sey vilinku, mamaryadak an dakayu ey anung sey manginturturuyan Amak ey mamaryad an sa'un tey tinongparku sey vilinna.
43015011	Ibagak da nauy an dakayu ta allaylayad kayu ikow ey kama assey layadku.
43015012	“Sey vilin ey piuk ey unujunyu at masapur manlilinnayad kayu ey kama assey layadku an dakayu.
43015013	Sey kapatigan ey koon sey tagu ey angimpiila assey layadna at sey manginturukana assey long-agna ey matuy ta matagu dasey vurunna.
43015014	At nu unujunyu sey vilinku anna, dakayu dasey vub-urunku.
43015015	Dakumpun as baba'arun sey angimvilangak an dakayu tey sey baba'arun niippun agammuna assey panggop sey apuna. Ivilangku dakayu as vub-urunku tey amin ey jingngorku an Ama at impaagammuk an dakayu.
43015016	Dakumpun as dakayu sey namili an sa'un, nu aji sa'un sey namili ya nanjutuk an dakayu ey umuy man-awis as adjuwan ey tagu as mamati an sa'un ta awad ivungan sey pammatiyu as mannanayun. At nu siya sey koonyu, atjun Ama sey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey kudawunyu gapu assey nijujug-anyu an sa'un.
43015017	At ikasinku ibaga sey vilinku an dakayu ey masapur manlilinnayad kayu.”
43015018	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Nu vusurun dakayu asda aji pun mamati, somsomkonyu ey pinanguda sa'un vinusur asin at dakayu.
43015019	Nu midanung sey koko'onyu asda aji pun mamati, pipiunda dakayu as vurunda. Kon pinilik dakayu ta aji kayu midanung an jida ey aji pun mamati. At siyana sey lapuna nu pada lawa dakayu vusurun.
43015020	Imurayu assey somsomokyu sey imbagak an dakayu ey dakumpun as nangatngatu sey alipan nu sey apuna. At nu tongtong-agunak an jida, siguraju ey tongtong-agunda vus dakayu. At nu dongronda sey ibagak, siguraju ey dongronda avus dakayu.
43015021	Kon amin da nauy ey tongtong-ag at ipalak-amda an dakayu gapu assey namatiyanyu an sa'un ya gapu ta niippun agammuda assey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43015022	Nu ajiyak atyén ummali assey luta anna ey nanudtuju an jida, dakumpun as basurda sey ajida pun mamatiyan an sa'un. Kon gapu ta ummaliyak, niippun ilasunda assey basurda.
43015023	At ngan ey sey vumusur an sa'un, vinusurna vus as Ama.
43015024	Nu niippun atyén kingwak asda nakaskasdaow ey aji pun sey tagu lamug koon, niippun atyén basurda. Kon innilada pun at avus sey kingwak, ginurada at avus dakani an Amak.
43015025	Kon makwa nauy ta awad tumuttuwaan sey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Guraunak pey lawa as kotom.’
43015026	“Oni at ibaarku an dakayu sey Ispiritu ey marpu an Ama ey tumurung an dakayu. Siya sey mangimbaga an dakayu assey miipanggop an sa'un.
43015027	Ya urey dakayu at takjuganyu sey miipanggop an sa'un tey nivulluvullun kayu an sa'un mansarad assey lugrugin sey nantudtujuwak.”
43016001	“Imbagak amin da nauy an dakayu ta urey nu ngan sey makwamakwa, ajiyu man-awidan sey pammatiyu an sa'un.
43016002	Jumatong sey amaryawanda an dakayu assey sinagog. Ya dakumpun as anggey nauy tey jumatong sey timpu ey nu gongatun dakayu, kananda ey koonda nauy as manserviyanda an Apudyus.
43016003	Da nauy sey koon da tagu an dakayu tey niippun agammuda an Ama unnu sa'un.
43016004	Ibabaggak da nauy an dakayu ta nu jumatong sey timpu ey mangwaanda an dakayu, ikagasmokyu sey imbagabagak an dakayu.” Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ajik pun imbaga da nauy assey nanginsardak ey nantudtuju an dakayu tey sissiyaak an dakayu.
43016005	Kon assey sana, ampuuliyak assey nangimbaar an sa'un kon niippun mangimus an dakayu nu ngan sey ayak.
43016006	Kon gapu ta imbagak da nauy an dakayu assey sana, manjujuuy kayu.
43016007	Ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa. Sey maneynak an dakayu at para assey vumaruwanyu tey nu ajiyak pun umayow, aji pun umali sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey manurung an dakayu kon nu umayawak ibaarku siya ey umali an dakayu.
43016008	At nu umali, ilawlawagna ey mangimpakaawat asda tagu ey kinumbot sey maawatanda miipanggop assey basur. Ilawagna avus ey mangimpakaawat ey kinumbot sey maawatanda miipanggop assey kinalintog ya sey manguwisan Apudyus asda tagu.
43016009	Miipanggop ey assey basur, ilawagna ey mangimpakaawat an jida ey basurda sey ajida pun mamatiyan an sa'un
43016010	ya kinumbot vus sey maawatanda miipanggop assey kinalintog tey anna ey inyak an Ama at niippun kasinda mangil-an an sa'un.
43016011	Kinumbot avus sey maawatanda miipanggop assey man-uwisan Apudyus tey naas ogon nagoddongan as Satanas ey turey assey luvung anna ey majusa.
43016012	“Adjuwan pey dallu sey piuk atyén ibaga an dakayu assey sana kon agammuk ey aji kayu pun makaskasmok.
43016013	Kon nu umali sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey mangimpakaawat assey katuttuwaan miipanggop an Apudyus, siya sey manginturung an dakayu ey mangigammu assey amin ey katuttuwaan. Dakumpun as igingana sey kuwana ey kasomsomkan nu aji igingana sey amin ey dongrona an Amak ey Apudyus. Ipaagammuna vus an dakayu sey makwa assey daan ey ag-agow.
43016014	Sa'un sey dayawuna tey sey awad assey somsomokku at siya sey ipaagammuna an dakayu.
43016015	Amin ey awad assey somsomok Ama at siya vus pigey sey awad assey somsomokku at siya sey nangimbagaak ey sey awad assey somsomokku at siya sey ipaagammun sey Ispiritun Apudyus an dakayu.”
43016016	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Aji pun as ambayag at niippun ilanyu an sa'un kon aji pun vus as ambayag ya kasinyu sa'un ilan.”
43016017	Imbagan pun Jesus jiyuy, nan-iinnimus dasey ujum ey pasurutna ey kananda, “Ngan gey la sey piuna ey kanan saji? Kanana ey aji pun as ambayag at niippun ilan taku an siya ya aji pun vus as mabayag ya kasin taku ilan siya? Asina at vus kanan, ‘Tey sey gapuna at inyak an Ama.’
43016018	Ngan nin sey piuna ugujun assey ‘Aji pun as ambayag?’ Niippun mit agammu taku nu ngan sey piuna ey ugujun.”
43016019	Agammun Jesus ey awad sey piunda ey imusun an siya at kanana an jida, “Imbagak an dakayu ey aji pun as ambayag at niippun ilanyu an sa'un kon aji pun vus as ambayag ya ilan sa'un. Ey siyana sey piunyu ey imusun?
43016020	Ibagak an dakayu sey katuttuwaan. Umdas sey manomdomanyu ya man-ivilanyu kon siya at avus sey allaylaydan dasey aji pun mamati. Manomdom kayu, kon sey manomdomanyu at moorsan as layad.
43016021	Sey miyisuwana at kama assey vubai ey manggamut, mantutukar tey jummatong sey timpuna ey giknauna sey sigabna. Kon nu lumuswa sey utting niippun masmasmokna assey sigab gapu assey amud ey layadna tey lummuswa uttingna.
43016022	Kanaʼsna an dakayu tey assey sana, mansigab sey somsomokyu kon aji pun as ikow mabayag at man-asiila taku dallu. At assey siyaji ey timpu, allaylayad kayu ya niippun mabalin mangaan assey nauy ey layad an dakayu.
43016023	“Assey siyaji ey timpu, niippun ogon kasinyu imusun an sa'un. Ibagak an dakayu sey tuttuwa ey atjun Ama sey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey kudawunyu gapu assey nijujug-anyu an sa'un.
43016024	Inggana assey sana, niippun atgey kindowyu gapu assey nijujug-anyu an sa'un. Kon assey sana, angkudow kayu at maatud an dakayu ta allaylayad kayu ey niippun kurangna.”
43016025	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Imbagak da nauy an dakayu ey nangusar assey pani. Kon assey daan ey ag-agow ajiyak pun ogon mampani nu aji narawag sey kook ey mangimbaga an dakayu assey miipanggop an Ama.
43016026	At nu jumatong nait ey timpu, dakayu ey mismu sey angkudow an siya gapu assey nijujug-anyu an sa'un. Ajik pun kasapuran ikdawan dakayu an Ama
43016027	tey amud sey layad Ama an dakayu gapu assey layadyu an sa'un ya namatiyanyu ey siya sey narpuwak.
43016028	Ummaliyak assey luta anna ey narpu an Ama. At assey sana, teynak dakayu assey luta anna ta ampuuliyak an siya.”
43016029	At kanan dasey aposelna an siya, “Assey sana, allasuʼs maawatan sey koom ey guminga tey dakumpun as pani sey usarum.
43016030	At agammuni ey agammum sey kangamin. Aji pun masapur ey awad man-imus an sika tey mabalinnu songbatan urey nu daanda pun iginga. At siyana sey mamatiyanni ey narpuka tuttuwa an Apudyus.”
43016031	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Ey mamati kayu ogon assey sana?
43016032	Kon anna ey jummatong sey timpu ey mavukaranyu. Usausa an dakayu, umayow assey vuruyna ey maneynan an sa'un. Kon dakumpun as anggayak ey mateynan tey aawwad as Ama an sa'un.
43016033	Ibagak da nauy an dakayu ta awad atyén tarna assey somsomokyu gapu assey nijujug-anyu an sa'un. Adjuwan sey matongtong-aganyu assey luta anna kon pakasdoronyu sey somsomokyu tey inabakku sey amin ey pannakabalin sey kinarwing assey luta anna.”
43017001	Naas pun Jesus imbaga da nauy, nantangad ad langit at kanana, “Ama, anna ey umdas sey timpu ey inggoddongnu. Ipiilam sey kinangatuk ey Anaknu ta ipiilak avus ey Anaknu sey kinangatum ey Amak
43017002	tey innatjum an sa'un sey karobbongan ey manginturey asda amin ey tagu ta atjuk sey viyag ey niippun patinggana asda amin ey impiyarnu an sa'un.
43017003	Sey mangigammuwanda an sika ey sa'an ey tuttuwa ey Apudyus ya sa'un ey Jesu Cristu ey imbaarnu at mikataguda an sika as ing-inggana.
43017004	Impiilak assey luta anna sey kinangatum assey nangimpadakpusak ey nangwa assey impakwam an sa'un.
43017005	At ey sana Ama, ipiilam sey kinangatuk ey anung sey kinangatuk assey iniiggawak an sika assey daan pun atgey makwa sey luvung.
43017006	“Impiilak sey kinaApudyusnu asda tagum ey pinilim assey luta anna ey nambalinum as pasurutku. Sigud ey tagum jida ey nambalinum as pasurutku. Inunudda sey imbagam,
43017007	at assey sana, agammuda ey sika sey narpuwan sey amin ey apporok kingwa anda imbagabaga
43017008	tey inawatda dasey intudtujuk an jida ey imbagam an sa'un. Agammuda ey tuttuwa ey sika sey narpuwak ya pinatida ey sika sey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43017009	“Sey iluwaruwak at dakumpun as dasey aji pun mamati an sa'un nu aji dasey tagum ey impiyarnu an sa'un.
43017010	Amin dasey tagu ey mivilang as kuwak at sika sey sintagu ya amin ey tagum at sa'un sey sintagu ya mipiila sey dayowku gapu an jida.
43017011	At ey sana, ajiyak pun iinggow assey luta anna nu aji ampuuliyak an sika kon da pasurutku anna at mateynanda. Nasantuwan ey Ama, puutum jida gapu assey pannakabalin sey ngadannu ey innatjum an sa'un ta masa'anda ey kama assey nasa'ananta.
43017012	Assey iggawak an jida, pinupuutku jida gapu assey pannakabalin sey ngadannu ey innatjum an sa'un. Sinaraknibak jida at niippun sa'an as natarak maraksig anggey assey usa ey nagoddongan ey majusa ta tumuttuwa sey nikukur-it assey gingam.
43017013	“Anna ey tigangey sey ampuuliyak an sika. Ibagak nauy an jida assey anna ey sissiyaak assey luta anna ta maatud an jida sey layadku ey niippun kurangna.
43017014	Intudtujuk an jida dasey imbagam an sa'un at vinusur jida asda aji pun mamati gapu assey ajida pun anginyunudan assey niluluta ey koko'onda. Anungda sa'un ey aji pun vus umunud assey niluluta.
43017015	Ajik pun kanan ey kaanum jida assey luvung anna kon sey dawatku, puutum jida ta ajida maabak gapu assey pannakabalin Satanas.
43017016	Tey anungda sa'un ey aji pun umunud assey niluluta.
43017017	Ambalinum jida as tagum ey nadarus gapu assey mangintudtujuwam assey katuttuwaan ey siya sey gingam ey tuttuwa.
43017018	Tey anna ey baaruk jida assey luvung anna ey kama assey namaaram an sa'un.
43017019	Idatunku sey long-agku ey manservi an sika as para an jida ta urey jida at ambalinunda sey long-agda ey manservi as tuttuwa an sika.
43017020	“Dakumpun anggey jida as iluwaruwak nu aji urey vus dasey mamati an sa'un gapu assey tudtujuda.
43017021	Ama, iluwaruk ta masa'anda losan ta patiyun da tagu ey sika sey nangimbaar an sa'un. Masa'anda atyén vus ey mijujugga an jita ey kama assey kaawadnu an sa'un ya sey kaawadku an sika.
43017022	Idayowku dasey pasurutku ey kama assey nangindayawam an sa'un ta masa'anda ey kama assey nasa'ananta.
43017023	Aawwadak ey nisa'an an jida ya aawwadka ey nisa'an an sa'un ta niippun angkurangan sey nasa'ananda. At nu kanaʼsji, agammuwun da tagu ey sika sey nangimbaar an sa'un ya agammuwunda vus ey an-isu sey layadnu an jida ya sey layadnu an sa'un.
43017024	“Ama! piuk ey dasey tagu ey impiyarnu an sa'un at mikig-owda an sa'un ad langit ta miilada sey siling sey kinangatuk ey innatudnu an sa'un tey pinipiunak an sika urey assey daan pun atgey makwa sey luvung.
43017025	“Ama ey apporow mangwa as ambaru, ajin pun dasey jipun mamati agammu sika. Kon agammuk sika ya dasey pasurutku at agammuda ey sika sey nangimbaar an sa'un.
43017026	Tey impaagammuk an jida sey miipanggop assey kinaApudyusnu ya ituturuyku ey ipaagammu ta manlilinnayadda ey kama assey maryadam an sa'un ya aawwadak vus an jida.”
43018001	Naas pun as Jesus nalluwaru, ummayowda asda aposelna at nandormangda assey wail ad Kidron. Assey jumangna, inggow sey lugar ey namur-an as adjuwan ey olib at siya sey ummayanda.
43018002	As Judas ey malliput an siya, aaggammuna jiyuy ey lugar tey kanayun ey as jiyuy sey apporon Jesus miyabotan asda aposelna.
43018003	At kingwan pun Judas, ingkuyugna dasey simvurugan ey surdajun da iRoman ya da ujum ey guwarda assey Tempél ey imbaar dasey nangangatu ey papaji anda Farisis. Ummuyda ey nampa'armas ya nampa'ujun as silow.
43018004	Gapu ta aaggammun Jesus sey amin ey makwa an siya, inabotna jida ey kanana, “Ngan sey anapunyu?”
43018005	“As Jesus ey iNazareth,” kananda ey summongbat. At kanan Jesus, “Annaak mit.” As Judas ey malliput an siya, nikatatakjug an jida.
