43018006	Imbagan pun Jesus ey, “Annaak mit,” nansanudda at nalikwadda namin ey nangkayang assey luta.
43018007	Kasin vus Jesus inimus an jida ey kanana, “Ngadanna sey anapunyu?” “As Jesus ey iNazareth,” kananda vus ey summongbat.
43018008	At kanan vus Jesus, “Imbagak mit ampey ey sa'un nauy. At nu sa'un sey anapunyu, paruvusanyu ey umayow dasey vurunku.”
43018009	Siyana sey imbagan Jesus ta tumuttuwa sey kanana, “Ama, niippun usa as natarak asda impiyarnu an sa'un.”
43018010	Kingwan pun Simon Peter ey nambabangngid, inukputna sey bangidna at vinakagna as Malchus ey alipan sey kangatuwan ey paji at naropngas sey padawanan ey ingana.
43018011	At kanan Jesus an Peter, “Iyarpangnu sey bangidnu sanat! Ey ajim pun agammu ey nakasaganaak ey mallak-am assey tongtong-ag ey inggoddong Ama an sa'un?”
43018012	Kingwan pun dasey surdaju ya sey kapitanda ya dasey guwarda assey Tempel, jinokmaanda as Jesus at vinarudda sey imana.
43018013	At inniyuyda yén an Annas ey katugangan Caiaphas. As Caiaphas sey kangatuwan ey paji assey siyaji ey tawun.
43018014	As Caiaphas sana sey nangimbaga asda ap-apun da Jews ey un-unina sey sa'an ey tagu as matuy ta awad agammun dasey kailiyana ey matagu.
43018015	Assey nangillayawanda an Jesus, ummunud as Peter ya sey usa ey aposel Jesus. Gapu ta sey usa ey aposel Jesus anna, aaggammun sey kangatuwan ey paji at siya sey naparuvusan ey nikasakey an Jesus assey paweyʼn sey palasyun sey kangatuwan ey Paji.
43018016	Kon as Peter, nateynan ey tatakjug assey sawang sey akup. At kingwan pun sey aposel sana ey ag-agammun sey kangatuwan ey paji, nallasin at kinabagbagana sey vubai ey amabantey assey sawang ta pasakayuna as Peter.
43018017	Impasakeyʼn pun sey vubai saji as Peter, kanana, “Yangey dokonka pun as usa ey pasurut sey tagu annat?” “Na'id, dokonak pun,” kanan peter ey summongbat.
43018018	Gapu ta tongnin assey lavi saji, nan-apuy dasey alipan ya dasey guwarda asida at malikub ey man-aniju ey angkatakjug. Assey siyaji, ummuy vus as Peter ey nikatakjug an jida ey man-aniju.
43018019	Assey siyaji, illugin sey kangatuwan ey paji ey mamastigar an Jesus miipanggop asda pasurutna ya dasey tudtujuna.
43018020	At kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Apporowak gumminga assey sinagung da adjuwan ey tagu tey apporowak nantudtuju as dasey sinagog ya assey Tempél ey dadaggupan da amin ey Jews. Niippun intaruk as imbagak.
43018021	At pa lawa sa'un sey man-imusam? Man-imuska in asda tagu ey nandongor an sa'un tey agammuda dasey imbagak an jida.”
43018022	Imbagan pun Jesus jiyuy, tinampak sey usa ey guwarda ey tummatakjug siji, at kanana, “Pam gey kanan sinaʼt ey guminga assey kangatuwan ey paji!”
43018023	Sinongbatan Jesus siya ey kanana, “Nu awad lawingan as imbagak, ibagam asda tagu anna nu ngadanji. Kon nu ustu sey imbagak, paka tumampak?”
43018024	Oni pun impaiyuy Annas as Jesus asda guwarda ey sissiya ey nababarud an Caiaphas ey kangatuwan ey paji.
43018025	Sissiya as Peter ey tatakjug ey mikaaniju assey kananda an siya, “Yangey dokonka pun as usa asda pasurut sey tagu anji?” “Na'id, dokonak pun,” kanana ey namuyég.
43018026	Gumminga vus sey usa ey alipan sey kangatuwan ey paji ey jugan sey inggow nilopngas Peter sey ingana, at kanana, “Yangey dokon an sika sey innilak ey vurun sey tagu annat assey lugar ey napudjukan as olib?”
43018027	“Na'id,” kanan vus Peter ey namuyég, kon assey siyaji, nanullakuk at sey manuk.
43018028	Tigangey pumawey assey naas as Jesus nabastigar assey vuruy Caiaphas. Kingwan pun dasey ap-apun da Jews, inniyuyda siya assey palasyun gubernador Pilate. Kon ajida pun summakey tey paniyawun sey lintogda ey sumakeyda assey vuruy dasey Gentil tey maaggisawanda at ajida pun mabalin ey mikakan assey vista ey kananda ey Manomsomkan.
43018029	At siya sey lummogsad as Pilate at inimusna an jida ey kanana, “Ngan sey angindarumanyu assey tagu anna?”
43018030	At kananda ey summongbat, “Yangey magni gey iyali sey tagu anna an sika nu niippun basurna?”
43018031	At kanan Pilate an jida, “At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, keygad kayu ya inuwisyu siya ey mangimbasar assey lintogyu.” Summongbatda ey kananda, “Niippun mit karobbonganni ey Jews ey mangoddong assey katuyan sey usa ey tagu.”
43018032	(Nakwa nauy ta tumuttuwa sey imbagan Jesus miipanggop assey nakopyaan sey ikatuyna.)
43018033	Summakey as Pilate assey vuruyna asina at ipaayag as Jesus. At inimusna ey kanana, “Ey sika sey Arin dasey Jews?”
43018034	At kanan Jesus, “Ey narpu pigey an sika nait ey sarudsud unnu awad nangimbaga an sika miipanggop an sa'un?”
43018035	At kanan Pilate, “Yangey usaak ey Jews assey angiilam? Dasey vurunnu mit ey Jews ya dasey nangangatu ey papaji sey nangindarum an sika sina. Ngan at sey kingwam?”
43018036	At kanan Jesus, “Dakumpun assey luta anna sey iggawan sey tureyku. Tey nu assey luta anna sey iggawan sey tureyku, siguraju ey intakjugak asda pasurutku ya nikapatuyda ta ajida sa'un jinokmaan. Kon assey katuttuwaan, dakumpun assey luta anna sey iggawan sey tureyku.”
43018037	At kanan vus Pilate, “At nu siyanaʼt, usaka atpey ey Ari?” At kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Ustu sey kanam ey Ariyak. Sey panggopku ey ummali assey luta anna ey miyanak ta ipaagammuk sey katuttuwaan. At ngan man ey tagu sey mamati assey katuttuwaan, dongrona sey ibagak.”
43018038	At kanan vus pilate, “Katuttuwaan geyla ey?” Inimus pun Pilate jiyuy, kasin lummawa at kanana asda tagu, “Niippun mit indasak as basur sey tagu anna as majusaana.
43018039	Kon awad sey iniili ey nakopyaanyu ey nu timpun sey vista ey Manomsomkan, angimvukkayak as usa ey barud nu siya sey piliyunyu. Ey piunyu ta siya ivukkeyk sey Ariyu ey Jews?”
43018040	At kanan da tagu ey sivuvugga, “Na'id! Dakumpun as siya sey mivukkey! As Barabbas sey piunni!” As Barabbas sana at usa ey kumukuntra assey gubernu.
43019001	Assey siyaji, impabokbok pilate as Jesus.
43019002	At kingwan pun dasey surdaju, vummalingowngowda asda siit asida at ikorona assey uruna ya linumvunanda siya as addaraag ey kamaʼs lumvun ji Ari.
43019003	Asida at man-or-oros ey angimbaga an siya ey kananda, “Mantureyka as ing-inggana, sika ey Arin da Jews.” Ibagada ey jiyuy, sinipatda sey apingna.
43019004	Lummogsad kasin as Pilate at kanana asda tagu, “Anna ey ipalogsadku siya an dakayu ta maagammuwanyu ey niippun indasak as basurna.”
43019005	At lummogsad as Jesus ey nakokorronaan assey siit ya nalulumvunan as addaraag ey kamaʼs lumvun ji ari. At kanan Pilate an jida, “Anna! Ilanyu uda sey tagu anna.”
43019006	Kon innilan pun dasey nangangatu ey paji ya dasey guwardan sey Tempél siya, kananda ey sivuvugga, “Ipalansam! Ipalansam assey krus!” At kanan Pilate an jida, “Aranyu! Keygad kayu ya illansayu. Niippun agammuk as basurna.”
43019007	Summongbat dasey Jews ey kananda, “Awad mit sey lintogni. At nu mibasar assey lintogni, masapur ey mipagngat siya tey kanana ey siya sey Anak Apudyus.”
43019008	Jingngor pun Pilate nauy, ummam-amud ummugyat,
43019009	at nampuuli kasin assey palasyuna at kanana an Jesus, “Ngan sey narpuwam?” Kon aji pun as Jesus summongbat.
43019010	At kanan Pilate, “Pam sa'un aji songbatan? Ey ajim pun agammu ey awad sey karobbongak ey angimbaga ta mawayaanka unnu angimpalansa an sika assey krus?”
43019011	Summongbat as Jesus ey kanana, “Niippun karobbongam an sa'un nu aji as Apudyus sey nangatud an sika. At sey tagu ey nangiyyawat an sa'un an sika, andagdagsun sey basurna nu sey basurnu.”
43019012	Jingngor pun Pilate nauy, padasuna ey iyanap sey mawayaan Jesus. Kon sivuvugga da Jews ey kananda, “Nu wayawayaam siya, dokonka pun as vub-urun Emperor! Tey sey tagu ey ambalinuna sey long-agna as Ari at vumusur an Emperor!”
43019013	Jingngor pun Pilate sey kananda saji, illogsadna kasin as Jesus at ummuy tummukju assey tukjun sey uwis ey natuping as batu. Sey ngadan sey tukju anna assey gingan sey Hebrew at kananda ey “Gabbata.”
43019014	Assey tummukjuwanaʼsji, tigangey mamatuk assey ag-agow ey mansaganaan da Jews para assey mavigat ey kananda ey Manomsomkan. At kanan Pilate asda tagu, “Anna sey Ariyu!”
43019015	Kon sivuvuggada ey kananda, “Ipagngatnu! Ipagngatnu! Ipalansam assey krus!” At kanan vus Pilate, “Ey maryad kayu ey ipalansak sey Ariyu assey krus?” Summongbat dasey nangangatu ey papaji ey kananda, “Niippun ujum as Arini nu dokon anggey as Emperor!”
43019016	Oni pun, impurang pilate as Jesus an jida ta ilansada assey krus.
43019017	Oni pun, impavukud dasey surdaju sey krusna ey mangiyyuy assey lugar ey kananda ey “Iggowʼn sey tong-ar ji battokag.” Sey ngadanna assey gingan da Hebrew at “Golgota.”
43019018	At as jiyuy sey nangillansaanda an Jesus assey krus. Inggow vus da juwa ey tagu ey illansada. Sey usa nangkapon assey padawigina ya nangkapon assey padawananna sey usa.
43019019	Inggow vus sey impakur-it Pilate ey impakpakda assey krus Jesus ey kanana, “As Jesus ey iNazareth, siya sey Arin da Jews.”
43019020	Nikur-it nauy assey turu ey ginga, Hebrew, Latin ya Greek. Amud pey dasey tagu sey apporow namasa sina tey sey nikrusan Jesus sana at addaniyan assey dokor ey vubruy ad Jerusalem.
43019021	Oni pun, ummuy dasey nangangatu ey papaji an Pilate at kananda, “Ngey paʼm ingkur-it ey, ‘Siya sey arin da Jews.’ Sey ingkur-itnu atyén at, ‘Kanan sey tagu anna ey siya sey Arin da Jews.’”
43019022	Kon kanan Pilate, “Nu ngan sey luusku ingkur-it, siya sey nikur-it.”
43019023	Naas pun dasey surdaju illansa as Jesus assey krus, nangguggugwaanda nangkappatun sey lumvunna ta marnubda. Asida at aran sey kageyna ey niippun nadaitana tey nakanayun ey naabor.
43019024	At kanan dasey surdaju ey nambabagbaga, “Aji taku vissayun sey usa sana ta amvub-unut taku pey lawa ta ilan taku nu ngan sey mangara.” Nakwa nauy ta awad tumuttuwaan sey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Namvib-illayanda sey lumvunku ya namvub-unutanda sey kageyku.”
43019025	Assey dor-ag sey krus Jesus, tatakjug da inana ey mansunud ya as Mary ey asawan Cleopas ya as Mary Magdalene.
43019026	Innilan pun Jesus as inana ya sey aposelna ey pipiuna, kanana an inana, “Nayat sey ivilangnu as anaknu,”
43019027	Asina at vus kanan assey aposelna saji, “Nayat sey ivilangnu as inam.” Manlugi assey siyaji, intalleyn sey aposel saji as inan Jesus at as vuruyda sey iniiggawana.
43019028	Nakwa pun amin da nauy, agammun Jesus ey naminna kingwa sey amin ey impakwan Apudyus an siya. At kanana, “Nuuwwawak,” imbagana nauy ta tumuttuwa sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus.
43019029	Inggow as jiyuy sey ammutu ey nakokoan as kilum. Kingwada pun, insabbongda sey sinnun asida at ipakat assey pingin sey kayu ey hisop asida at itdok assey sungad Jesus ta supsupana.
43019030	Sinupsupan pun Jesus, kanana, “Naas ogon.” Asi at manting-uy ey nangimpurang assey viyagna an Apudyus.
43019031	Assey mavigat, siyaji sey kananda ey kabaloran ey ag-agow ey man-illongan tey nigisan avus assey vista ey Manomsomkan. At gapu ta paniyawunda nu sisiyya sey long-ag dasey nikrus assey ag-agow ey man-illongan, ummuy dasey papangat da Jews imbaga an Pilate ta maptud atyén sey sikin dasey nikrus ta mapgus as matuyanda ta opasunda jida assey krus ta ajida iinggow siji inggana assey mavigat.
43019032	At ummuy dasey surdaju pintud sey sikin dasey inggow juwa ey vurun Jesus ey nikrus.
43019033	Kon umdasda pun an Jesus, nanattuy ogon at ajida pun pintud sey sikina.
43019034	Kingwan pun sey usa ey surdaju, niyuyukna assey bangkowna sey lusik Jesus at lummuswa sey dara ya danum.
43019035	(Sa'un ey nangingkur-it asda nauy ey nakwanakwa at takjugak tey innilan sey atak sey nakwaana. Tuttuwa sey ibagabagak anna, at sey panggopku ey mangul-ullit ta mamati kayu atyén.)
43019036	Nakwa vus nauy ta tumuttuwa sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Niippun maptud as usa asda tung-arna.”
43019037	Ya inggow vus sey usa ey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Oni at ilanda siya ey niyuyukda.”
43019038	Naas pun amin da nauy, ummuy Joseph ey iyArimatea kindow an Pilate sey ladag Jesus. As Joseph sana at usa ey mamati an Jesus kon inggiginnokna tey umugyat asda papangat da Jews. At iyyavun Pilate ey aran Joseph sey ladag Jesus at ummuyna innara.
43019039	As Nicodemus ey siya sey inggow ummuy nangila an Jesus assey usa ey lavi, nivurun an Joseph ey nangintakin as bangbangu ey naara assey nangkamus ey aloe ya mira ey tigangey as opatpuru ey kilu.
43019040	At ummuy da ey juwa innara sey ladag Jesus at kinurvikubénda assey mambaru ey sinnun ey injugada inigga sey bangbangu saji tey siyaji sey nakopyaan da Jews nu awad matuy.
43019041	Assey addaniyan assey nikrusan Jesus, inggow sey lugar ey namur-an asda adjuwan ey kayu ey iggawan vus sey kakkakwa ey lavun ey niippun atgey nilavun.
43019042	At gapu ta anna ogon ey umdas sey ngilin ey man-illongan da Jews ya anna sey adani ey lavun, siyaji sey nangillabnanda an Jesus.
43020001	Assey anna atgey ey wongngowongngot assey vigvigat sey Juminggu, ummuy Mary Magdalene innila sey lavun Jesus. Jummatong pun, innilana at avus ey nakaan sey dokor ey batu ey unub sey lavun.
43020002	At nanuddak ey ummuy an Simon Peter ya sey usa ey aposel Jesus ey pipiuna at imbagana ey kanana, “Innarada sey ladag sey Apu assey lavunna at niippun agammuni nu gona nangiyyuyanda an siya!”
43020003	At ummuy da Simon Peter ya sey usa ey aposel innila sey lavun.
43020004	Nanuddakda ey juwa ey ummuy kon anggag-anas sey usa ey aposel ey manuddak nu as Peter at namangu inumdas assey lavun.
43020005	Nayyung-uk ey nangila ad darum at sey anggey as innilana at sey sinnun ey nikurvikub an Jesus kon aji pun summakey ad darum.
43020006	Jummatong pun as Simon Peter ey ummuunnud an siya, nangow-as ey sumakey ad darum at innilana sey sinnun ey babaddong
43020007	ya sey panyu ey nivub-ud assey urun Jesus ey nalulupti ey nisisiyyan assey sinnun.
43020008	Assey siyaji, summakey vus sey usa saji ey aposel ey namangpangu inumdas assey lavun. Innilana pun dasey sinnun ey awad siji, namati ey natagu kasin as Jesus.
43020009	Tey sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kasin matagu as Jesus at ajida pun pey dallu naawatan.
43020010	At ummayow dasey juwa saji ey aposel.
43020011	Kon as Mary tatakjug ey umiviivil assey lasin sey lavun. Assey anna ey umiviivil, nayyung-uk ey nangila ad darum assey lavun
43020012	at nantollongana at avus dasey juwa ey enjel ey nallumvun as apputak ey angkatukju assey nibadngan sey ladag Jesus. Sey usa, angkapon assey ulluwanna ya sey usa assey sugyajunna.
43020013	Kananda an siya, “Sika ey sunud, paka lawa umiviivil?” Kanan Mary ey summongbat, “Oon, tey innarada sey Apuk at niippun agammuk nu gona nangiggaanda an siya!”
43020014	Nambaliwit pun as Mary, innila at avus as Jesus ey tatakjug kon ajina pun immatunan ey as Jesus jiyuy.
43020015	At kanan Jesus, “Sika ey sunud, paka lawa umiviivil? Ngan sey anaanapum?” Kon as Mary, kanana pun nu siya sey amupuut assey minura ey kayu at kanana an siya, “Apu, nu sika sey nangara, pangngaasim ta ibagam nu gona nangiggaam an siya ta inyak aran.”
43020016	At kanan Jesus an siya, “Mary!” Nansinagung as Mary at kanana, “Rabboni!” (Sey piuna ey ugujun assey ginga ey Hebrew at “Misturu.”)
43020017	Kon kanan Jesus an siya, “Ajiyak udnan tey daanak pun atgey ampuuli an Ama. Kon ingkan ta ingka ibaga asda susunudku ey ampuuliyak an Ama ey Apudyus ey dayadayawuk ey siya vus sey Amayu ya Apudyus ey dayadayawunyu.”
43020018	At ummuy Mary Magdalene imbaga asda aposel Jesus ey innilana as Jesus ya imbagana an jida sey imbagan Apu Jesus an siya.
43020019	Assey anna ey lummavi assey siyaji ey Juminggu, nadagup dasey aposel Jesus ey nandadakig ad darum assey vuruy tey umugyatda asda papangat da Jews. At assey siyaji, maggey natanakjug as Jesus assey iggawanda at kanana, “Vumaru atyén sey somsomokyu.”
43020020	Naas pun as Jesus nikabagbaga an jida, impiilana sey imana ya sey vutikna. At amud sey layad dasey aposel Jesus assey innilada siya.
43020021	At kasin Jesus kanan an jida, “Vumaru atyén sey somsomokyu. Ibaarku dakayu ey kama assey nangimbaaran Ama an sa'un.”
43020022	Oni pun inas-awan Jesus jida ey kanana, “Milong-ag an dakayu sey Ispiritun Apudyus
43020023	ta nu awad pakawanunyu sey basurna, naas Apudyus pinakawan. Ya nu awad ajiyu pakawanun sey basurda, ajin pun vus Apudyus pinakawan.”
43020024	Assey nampiil-an Jesus asda aposelna, niippun siji as Thomas ey nangadanan as Kapil ey usa asda nasawaran as juwa.
43020025	At siya sey kanan da ujum ey aposel Jesus an siya, “Innilani sey Apu!” Kon kanan Thomas an jida, “Asiyak gey mamati nu ilak dasey innuy sey lansa assey agparna ya nu aprusuk dasey pilatna ya ilukilukku sey gammatku assey innuy sey bangkow assey vutikna.”
43020026	Ummayow pun sey sinjumingguwan, kasin nadagup dasey aposel Jesus ad darum assey vuruy at inggow as Thomas an jida. Nidadakig sey sawang kon summakey as Jesus ey nikatakjug an jida at kanana, “Vumaru atyén sey somsomokyu.”
43020027	Asina at kanan an Thomas, “Anna sey agparku, ayu ilukiluknu sey gammatnu ya inaprusam sey vutikku. Kaanum atyén sey juwajuwam ta mamatika!”
43020028	At kanan Thomas, “Sika sey Apuk ya Apudyus ey dayadayawuk”
43020029	Asin at Jesus kanan an siya, “Ey mamatika assey sana tey innilaak? Nagasat dasey aji pun nangila an sa'un kon mamatida.”
43020030	Ansarum pey dallu sey nakaskasdaow ey apporon Jesus kingwa ey innilan dasey pasurutna ey aji pun namin nikur-it assey libnu sana.
43020031	Kon nikur-it da nauy ta patiyunyu ey as Jesus sey Cristu ey Anak Apudyus. At nu mamati kayu an siya, maatud an dakayu sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
43021001	Naas pun nauy, nampiila vus kasin as Jesus asda aposel assey beybey ad Tiberias. Kanaʼs sanna sey nakwa;
43021002	As jiyuy, inggow da Simon Peter, as Thomas ey nangadanan as Kapil, as Nathaniel ey iCana assey sakup sey Galili, da juwa ey anak da Zebedee ya da juwa ey aposel Jesus.
43021003	Kanan Simon Peter asda vurunna, “Inyak lawa mangaggajiw.” At kanan da vurunna, “Umali kani pey.” At nambangkada ey ummuy nanavukur. Kon urey nampatpatnagda assey siyaji ey lavi ey nanavukur, niippun purus innarada.
43021004	Anna pun ey pumawey, inggow as Jesus ey tatakjug assey igid sey beybey kon aji pun da aposel siya immatunan.
43021005	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Ey awad vus pigey innarayu, dakayu ey susunud?” “Niippun ampey,” kananda ey summongbat.
43021006	At kanan vus Jesus, “Ipitlakyu sey tavukuryu assey angkapon assey padawanan sey bangka at awad makna.” Impitlakda pun sey tavukur, arumda ey mamutvut assey kaajun sey nakna ey aggajiw.
43021007	Assey siyaji, kanan sey aposel ey pipiun Jesus an Peter, “As Apu taku pey ji!” Jingngor pun Simon Peter ey as Apuda ji, nan-iyiggana sey lumvunna tey nampoponnas at lummayug ey nangkiyat ey ummuy an Jesus.
43021008	Kon nateynan da vurunna assey bangka ey namutvut assey tavukur ey napnuʼs aggajiw. Adanida assey tarantag ey umavut nin as singgasut ey meter sey bootda assey igidna.
43021009	Tummakdangda pun assey igidna, innilada sey vumarabara ey apuy ya anna sey jinawis ey aggajiw ya inggow vus sey tinapey.
43021010	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Anginyali kayu as sanna assey ka'arayu ey aggajiw.”
43021011	Nampuuli as Peter assey bangka asina at vutvutun sey tavukur assey tarantag ey napnu assey danakkor ey aggajiw. Ummuy as narpaan as limampuru ya turu sey vilang dasey angkadanakkor ey nakna. Kon urey nu kanaʼs ji sey kaajun sey nakna ey aggajiw, aji pun navissey sey tavukur.
43021012	At kanan Jesus an jida, “Ayu, umali kayu ta mangan taku.” Niippun usa as nangimus nu ngey ngadanna tey agammuda ey siya as Apuda.
43021013	Assey siyaji, innaran Jesus sey tinapey ya sey jinawis at vinilvilleyna innatud an jida.
43021014	Siyana sey pitlun Jesus nampiila asda aposelna manipud assey ummuliyana.
43021015	Naasda pun nangan, kanan Jesus an Simon Peter, “Simon ey anak John, ey dokdokor sey layadnu an sa'un nu da ujum?” “Oon Apu, agammum mit ey pipiuk sika,” kanan Peter ey summongbat. At kanan Jesus, “Nu kanaʼsnaʼt, tudtujuwam dasey karneruk ey barbaru ey namati.”
43021016	Impigwan vus Jesus ey nangimus, kanana, “Simon ey anak John, ey pipium sa'un?” “Oon Apu, agammum mit ey pipiuk sika,” kanana vus ey summongbat. At kanan vus Jesus, “Nu kanaʼsnaʼt, pasturam dasey karneruk.”
43021017	Oni pun, impitlun Jesus ey nangimus, kanana, “Simon ey anak John, ey tuttuwa ey pipium sa'un?” Assey siyaji, nanjujuuy ogon as Peter tey impitlun Jesus ey mangimus nu pipiuna siya at siya sey kanana ey summongbat, “Apu, agammum mit sey kangamin at agammum ey pipiuk sika.” At kanan vus Jesus, “Nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ipuutnu dasey karneruk.”
43021018	Inturuy Jesus ey kanana, “Ibagak an sika sey katuttuwaan. Assey kabanbanwagnu, keygadka ey mangigga assey baarnu ya ummuyka assey pium ey ayan. Kon nu marakeyka, iwayam dasey imam at takjunda asida at sika iyuy assey ajim pun piun ey ayan.”
43021019	(Sey nangimbagaan Jesus siji tey impaagammuna sey karasin sey ikatuy Peter as madayawan Apudyus.) At kanan Jesus an siya, “Unujunak.”
43021020	Nantawili pun as Peter, innilana sey aposel ey pipiun Jesus ey anna ey mitun-ud an jida. Siya nauy sey inggow aposel ey nid-um an Jesus assey anungus sey nangananda assey lavi. Siya sey nangimus an Jesus nu ngadanna ey tagu sey malliput an siya.
43021021	Innilan pun Peter siya, kanana an Jesus, “Apu, at ngan nin sey makwa an siya nu'?”
43021022	Kon kanan Jesus, “Nu as gagara ya piuk ey matatagu siya inggana as ampuuliyak, ngan lawa sey viyangnu siji? Umalika at ta unujunak.”
43021023	At gapu assey imbagan Jesus saji, nanjinjinamag asda amin ey pasurut Jesus ey aji pun kanu matuy sey usa ey aposel sana. Kon dakumpun as nauy sey piun Jesus kanan, tey kanana anggey ey, “Nu as gagara ya piuk ey aji matuy sey tagu anna inggana as ampuuliyak, ngan lawa sey viyangnu siji?”
43021024	Sa'un an aposel Jesus sey nangingkur-it asda nauy ey nakwa at takjugak sey kinatuttuwan sey inugudku ya agammuni ey tuttuwa amin da nauy.
43021025	Amud pey dallu dasey ujum ey kingwan Jesus ey ajik pun ingkur-it tey assey somsomokku, aji pun nin umaney sey intiru ey luvung as iggawan sey kalibnulibnu nu as gagara ya maminda mikur-it.
44001001	Annaya sey suratku an sika apu Teofilus, Sey namangu ey libnu ey ingkur-itku, inul-ullitku dasey amin ey kingwan Jesus anda intudtujuna mallugi assey nanginsardana
44001002	inggana assey ag-agow ey nampuuliyana ad langit. Natuy pun ey ummuli, nanginkinnu ey nikig-ow asda pinilina ey aposelna. Ya adjuwan vus dasey kingwana ey nangimpatuttuwa ey kasin natagu. Ummuy as opatpuru ey ag-agow sey apporona nivurnan an jida at intudtujuna an jida sey miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus. Imbagana vus an jida sey imbagan sey Ispiritun Apudyus an siya.
44001004	Usa pun ey ag-agow assey nikig-awan Jesus an jida, vinilinna jida ey kanana, “Sey imvunyag John as dasey tagu at danum, kon oni at mavunyagan kayu assey Ispiritun Apudyus. At siya sey aji kayu maggey umayow ad Jerusalem anna ta uullayunyu sey imbabaggak ey impostan Amak ey Ispirituna ey atjuna an dakayu.”
44001006	Naamung pun dasey aposel, kananda an Jesus, “Apu, ey sana ey timpu sey miparyawan dasey iRoman ey manginturturey an jitaku ta keygad taku ey iyIsrael ey manginturey assey gubernu taku?”
44001007	Kanan Jesus ey summongbat, “Aji pun kasapuran ey maagammuwanyu da nait tey as Ama anggey sey mangigammu ey mangoddong nu ngey makwa assey daan ey ag-agow ya nu makanu sey makwaana.
44001008	Kon nu jumatong an dakayu sey Ispiritun Apudyus, maatdan kayu as pannakabalin ey mangintakjug assey innilayu miipanggop an sa'un. At itakjugyu sa'un ad Jerusalem, assey amin ey vubruy ad Judea, ad Samaria ya inggana assey amin ey igid sey luta.”
44001009	Naasna pun imbaga da nauy an jida, nipangatu siya ad langit. At tinatangadda inggana as nalingban assey livuu.
44001010	Sissiyada ey manatangad assey ngumatungatuwana ad langit assey maggey nidor-ag an jida da juwa ey enjel ey nallumvun as angkanaitak.
44001011	At kananda, “Dakayu ey iGalili, pakayu lawa mantatangad ad langit? As Jesus anna ey ummuy ad langit at ampuuli vus pigey as daan ey ag-agow ey isun vus pigey sey nangil-anyu an siya assey ummayana ad langit.”
44001012	Naas pun sey nakwa saji assey vilig ad Olib, nampuuli dasey aposel ad Jerusalem ey sey kaadayuna at umavut as sa'an ey kilameter.
44001013	Jummatongda pun as jiyuy, summakeyda assey mikagwa ey garajun sey vuruy ey iniiggawanda. Jida da Peter, John, James ya as Andrew, da Philip an Thomas, da Bartholomew an Matthew ya as James ey anak Alphaeus ya as Simon ey kananda ey Selot, ey sey piuna ugujun, siya sey mangintatakjug assey ilina ya as Judas ey anak James.
44001014	Kanayun ey maamungda ey malluwaru ya apporow mijuga da ujum ey vubai ya urey as Mary ey inan Jesus ya dasey susunud Jesus ey laraki.
44001015	Usa pun ey ag-agow ey naamung dasey mamati an Jesus ey ummuy as singgasut ya juwampuru sey vilangda, summikad as Peter at kanana,
44001016	“Dakayu ey susunud, tummuttuwa sey impakur-it sey Ispiritun Apudyus an David assey kar-argow miipanggop an Judas ey siya sey nangimpangat asda nanokma an Jesus.
44001017	As Judas, usa an dakani tey pinilin Jesus ey mikasiput an dakani ey aposel.”
44001018	(Tey as Judas anna, natangdanan ey nangwa assey dakumpun ey kingwana ey siya sey inusarna ey ngummina as luta ey siya vus pigey sey natuyana. Namvikgar pun ey vinumgong, naotdag ey nantuwad at vinumtak sey vuwangna at niwalis sey bagisna.
44001019	Jingngor losan da tagu ad Jerusalem sey nakwa an siya at nginadananda assey kuwada ey ginga sey luta saji as Akeldama, ey sey piuna ugujun, “Nadaraan ey Luta.”)
44001020	Inturuy Peter ey gumminga, kanana, “Nikur-it vus assey libnu ey Psalms ey kanana, ‘Mabaawan sey vuruyna at niippun inggow as tagu.’ Ya awad vus sey nikur-it ey kanana, ‘Bansun da ujum ey tagu sey siputna.’”
44001021	Inturuy Peter ey kanana, “At kasapuran ey ampili taku as usa ey miyoros an Judas as amvurunni ey mangintakjug assey ummuliyén Apu Jesus. Masapur ey sey mapili at kanayun ey nivuruvurun an jitaku anda Jesus mansarad assey nanvunvunyagan John asda tagu inggana assey nipangatuwan Jesus ad langit.”
44001023	At imbagada da Mathias an Joseph Barsabbas ey nangadanan as Justus.
44001024	Nalluwaruda an Apudyus ey kananda, “Apu, agammum sey somsomok da amin ey tagu, ipiilam an dakani nu ngadanna asda juwa anna sey piliyum
44001025	ey miyoros an Judas ey nangiwwarang assey kinaaposelna ey ummuy assey lugar ey mitagop assey kingwana.”
44001026	Naasda pun nalluwaru, namvub-unutda at as Mathias sey navunutan ey mijuga asda nasawaran as sa'an ey aposel Jesus.
44002001	Jummatong pun sey ag-agow ey Vista ey kananda ey Pentecos, nadagup dasey mamati an Jesus assey usa ey vuruy.
44002002	Oni pun, jingngorda sey vummungug ey narpu ad langit ey anungna sey dangsor sey abvid ey nisurut assey vuruy ey iggawanda.
44002003	Ya innilada vus sey gilab sey apuy ey nansisina ey nan-opa assey usausa an jida.
44002004	At indaran sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey somsomokda asina at pagingaun jida as dasey nantokotokon ey gingan da ujum ey tagu ey urey nu ajida pun agammu.
44002005	Assey timpu saji, adjuwan dasey Jews ey narpu asda nantokotokon ey ili ey awad ad Jerusalem ey jida dasey manguunnud assey vilin Apudyus.
44002006	Gapu assey vummungug saji, nadagup dasey amud ey tagu ey ummuy nangila. At magda gey nasdaow tey awad ey usa an jida, dodongrona sey mismu ey gingana ey igingan dasey mamati an Jesus.
44002007	Natataag da tagu ey kananda, “iGalili mit losan da tagu anna ey gumingaginga.
44002008	Ngan annuna ey dodongron taku sey mismu ey ginga taku ey igingagingan da tagu anna?
44002009	Awad an jitaku da narpu ad Parthia, Media ya Elam. Anna da narpu ad Mesopotamia, Judea ya ad Cappadocia. Anna da narpu ad Pontus ya ad Asia.
44002010	Narpu da ujum ad Prigia ya Pamfilia. Narpu da ujum ad Egypt ya dasey kikkiili ey sakup sey Libya ey adani ad Cyrene. Ya anna an jitaku da narpu ad Rome,
44002011	Jews anda Gentil ey ummunud assey lintog Moses. Da ujum an jitaku at narpuda ad Crete ya ad Arabia kon losan taku dodongron jida ey gumingaginga assey mismu ey ginga taku ey mangimbaga asda nakaskasdaow ey kingwan Apudyus.
44002012	At ngey piun nauy ey ugujun?” Siya sey kanan da tagu tey amud sey nasdaawanda ya an-amuwongda as ugujunda.
44002013	Kon inggow da ujum ey iniggadaʼs am-amang dasey pasurut Jesus ey kananda, “Navuuk da tagu anna.”
44002014	Summikad pun as Peter ya dasey nasawaran as sa'an ey aposel, indangsorna ey gumminga asda tagu ey kanana, “Dakayu ey kailiyan ey Jews ya dakayu amin ey anna ad Jerusalem, guminok kayu yén ta wayaanak ey mangimparawag nu ngan sey piun nauy ey ugujun.
44002015	Ajiyu kanan ey navuuk kani tey yangey awad mavuuk assey maayadang atgey as init?
44002016	Sey nakwa anna an dakani at siyana sey tummuttuwaan sey impapaddaan profet ey Joel assey kar-argow assey kanana,
44002017	Annaya sey kanan Apudyus; ‘Assey daan ey ag-agow, baaruk sey Ispirituk ey milong-ag asda amin ey tagu. At dasey aanakyu, ipadngorda sey ipaagammuk an jida. Ya dasey babaru at ilanda sey ipiilak an jida ey kama as in-inop. Ya da angkamarong-ag at in-inponda vus sey ipain-inopku an jida.
44002018	Ya assey nait ey timpu, urey dasey baba'arun, laraki man unnu vubai ey manguunnud assey ibagak, atjuk sey Ispirituk an jida ta ipadngorda sey ipaagammuk an jida.
44002019	Awad dasey kaskasdaow ey ipiilak ad langit ya assey luta anna ey sey usaruk ey angimpiila at dara, apuy ya amud ey asuk.
44002020	Gumikbot as init ya jumaraag as sorag ey kama as dara ya asi at jumatong sey kapatigan ey ag-agow ey niippun miyisuwana ey siya sey jumatngak ey Apudyus.
44002021	At dasey amin ey angkudow as turung sey Apu at misarakan.’ Siyana sey impapaddaan Joel assey kar-argow,” ey kanan Peter.
44002022	Inturuy Peter, kanana, “Dakayu ey susunud ey iyIsrael, dongronyu atyén sey ibagak anna. As Jesus ey iNazareth, siya sey imbaar Apudyus ey umali. At impaniknik Apudyus nauy gapu asda kaviilan ey innatudna an Jesus ey nangwa asda milagru ya da kaskasdaow ey sinyar. Agammuyu mit tey iniinggow kayu assey nakwaan da nauy.
44002023	As tumuttuwaan sey sisimmok Apudyus ey makwa, inavunana sey mipurangan Jesus an dakayu assey nanokmaanyu an siya. At dakayu sey nangngat an Jesus tey impurangyu siya asda lawingan ey tagu ta ilansada assey krus.
44002024	Kon urey nu natuy as Jesus, tinagun vus pigey Apudyus tey aji pun mabalin ey ipugud sey katuy siya.
44002025	As Jesus anna at siya sey tummuttuwaan sey impapaddaan David assey kar-argow ey kanana, ‘Apu, ajiyak pun umugyat tey agammuk ey kanayun ey vuvurnanak ya turuturunganak an sika.
44002026	At siya sey allaylayadak ya idaydayowku sika. Angginnok sey somsomokku tey namnamauk ey awad sey para assey long-agku
44002027	tey ajim pun sa'un iigga ad Hades ey iggawan da nangkakatuy. Ya ajim pun vus iparuvus ey mabyuk sey long-agku tey napasnikak ey manservi an sika.
44002028	Impaagammum an sa'un sey daran ey umuy assey kataguwan at amud sey layadku tey vuvurnanak an sika.’ Siyanaʼt sey ingkur-it David,” ey kanan Peter.
44002029	Inturuy vus Peter ey gumminga, kanana, “Miipanggop ey an David ey apu taku assey kar-argow, piuk ey ipaagammu an dakayu ey susunud sey katuttuwaan miipanggop an siya. Tey natuy at awad sey lavunna inggana assey sana.
44002030	Kon gapu ta usa siya ey profet, agammuna sey impostan Apudyus an siya ey siguraju ey awad sey usa ey ganakna ey ambalinun Apudyus as ari ey miyoros an siya.
44002031	Agammuna vus ey kasin Apudyus taguwun sey man-ari ey as Cristu. At impadaanna imbaga ey aji pun iinggow assey iggawan da natuy ya aji pun mabyuk sey long-agna.
44002032	At sey man-ari anna, at as Jesus ey tinagun Apudyus, takjuganni amin da nauy tey innilani sey ummuliyana.
44002033	Impangatun amana ey Apudyus at awad assey padawananna. At innatudna an Jesus sey karobbongan ey mangimbaar assey Ispirituna as dasey tagu ey siya vus pigey sey impostana. At assey sana, imbaar Jesus sey Ispirituna ey milong-ag an dakani ey siya sey iillanyu ya dodongronyu.
44002034	Inggow sey ingkur-it David miipanggop assey nipangatu ad langit ey kanana, ‘Kanan Apudyus assey Apuk: Tumukjuka assey padawananku inggana as aminuk abakun dasey kavusurnu.’ Sey imbagan David saji, dakumpun assey long-agna tey dakumpun as siya sey nipangatu ad langit tey as Jesus ey Apuna.”
44002036	“At dakayu ey susunud ey iyIsrael, masapur maagammuwanyu ey niippun juwajuwana ey as Jesus anna ey illansayu assey krus at siya sey Cristu ey impostan Apudyus ey umali ya siya sey jinutukana ey ambalin as Apu.”
44002037	Jingngor pun da tagu sey imbagan Peter saji, nasursurjungda, at kananda an Peter ya dasey ujum ey aposel, “Ngan ampey sey koonni, dakayu ey susunud?”
44002038	Summongbat as Peter ey kanana, “Dakayu ey susunud, ibabawiyu dasey basuryu ya ampavunyag kayu ey angimpiila ey as Jesus sey Apuyu at mapakawan dasey basuryu ya maatud vus sey Ispirituna an dakayu.
44002039	Tey impostan Apudyus da nauy an dakayu ya dasey ganakyu ya dasey amin ey tagu ey awad assey addayuwan ey ili ya urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu ey ayagana ey mamati an siya.”
44002040	Adjuwan dasey imbagabagan Peter ey nangillawlawag an jida ta maawisda atyén, at iyyanungusna ey kanana, “Mamati kayu an Jesus ta aji kayu mijuga ey majusa as dasey lawingan ey tagu.”
44002041	Adjuwan dasey namati an jida assey imbagan Peter asida at ampavunyag. Ummuy as turunlivu ey tagu sey namati ey nijuga an jida assey siyaji ey ag-agow.
44002042	At impapatida ey nangadar ya nangunud assey tudtujun dasey aposel. Nivurunda asda namati an Jesus ya nijugada ey umuy malluwaluwaru asda vurunda ya nikakanda assey tinapey ey manomsomkanda assey natuyan Jesus.
44002043	Adjuwan dasey milagru anda sinyar ey impakwan Apudyus asda aposel at angkataag da tagu gapu asda jiyuy ey innilada.
44002044	At da amin ey namati, inturturuyda ey nantitimpuyug ya nan-iinnatud as kasapuran.
44002045	Ingnginan da ujum sey lutada ya da ujum sey laksunda at inatdanda dasey ujum ey niippun mabarbalinda ey insigun sey kasapuran sey usa ya usa.
44002046	Inag-agow ey madagupda assey Tempél ey mandayow an Apudyus. Maasda ey mandayow, losanda umuy mangan assey vuruy sey usa an jida tey naimpusuwan sey somsomokda ya amud sey ragsakda.
44002047	Ya kankanayun ey idaydayowda as Apudyus. Ya urey dasey ujum ey tagu at maryadda an jida. Ya inag-agow avus ey awad dasey isarakan Apu Jesus ey mijuga an jida.
44003001	Usa pun ey magayud assey timpun sey alluwaruwan da Jews, ummuy da Peter an John assey Tempel.
44003002	Assey sawang sey Tempél ey nangadanan as Mambaru ey Sawang, inggow sey usa ey laraki ey piley nanipud assey niyanakana. Vinigat ey miyuy as jiyuy ta ampalimmus asda tagu ey sumakey ad darum assey Tempel.
44003003	Anna pun ey sumakey da Peter an John, innilan sey amparpalimmus jida at nangkudow as miturungda an siya.
44003004	Vinobotogda siya asin at Peter kanan, “Itollongnu dakani.”
44003005	At intollongna jida tey kanana pun nu awad atjunda an siya.
44003006	Kon kanan Peter, “Niippun pilakku kon siya atjuk an sika sey awad an sa'un. At gapu assey pannakabalin Jesu Cristu ey iNazareth, sumikadka ta manaranka.”
44003007	Inugnan Peter sey dawanan ey imana at impasikadna. At dagus ey nakaan sey pileyna ya kummasdor
44003008	at summikad ya tummaud. At nanaran ey ummunud anda Peter an John ey summakey assey Tempel. Idaranna ey, tummaud pey ey mangindayow an Apudyus.
44003009	Innilan da tagu siya ey inggow as jiyuy ey anaradaran ey mangindayow an Apudyus.
44003010	Immatunanda pun ey siya sey inggow piley ey kanayun ey tutukju assey sawang ey kananda ey Mambaru ey Sawang, amud sey nasdaawanda.
44003011	Gapu assey nasdaawan da tagu, situtuddakda ey umuy assey iggow sey kananda ey Bangsar Solomon tey siya sey iggawan da Peter an John ey anna sey piley saji ey kinakamdana jida.
44003012	Innilan pun Peter da tagu, kanana an jida, “Susunud ey iyIsrael, pakayu masdaow assey nakwa sana? Ngey payu itotollong dakani? Ey sey kananyu pinadaranni tagu anna gapu assey pannakabalinni unnu gapu ta ambaru kani assey angiilan Apudyus?
44003013	Dakumpun, tey as Apudyus ey jinaydayow dasey dakdakor taku assey kar-argow ey jida da Abraham, Isaac ya as Jacob, siya sey nangaan assey piley sey tagu anna ta miila sey kinaApudyus Jesus ey anakna ey nangwa assey amin ey imbagana. Tey as Jesus anna at siya sey impurangyu asda turey ya urey nu piun gubernador Pilate siya ivukkey, sumanga kayu.
44003014	Urey nu naApudyusan as Jesus, sumanga kayu an siya ta sey ginumngat at avus sey piniliyu ey ivukkeyn Pilate.
44003015	At as Jesus ey angatud assey viyag ey niippun patinggana, siya at avus sey gingngatyu kon tinagun vus pigey Apudyus. Takjuganni ey tuttuwa tey innilani sey ummuliyana.
44003016	At kummasdor sey piley anna ey iillanyu ya agammuyu gapu assey pannakabalin sey ngadan Jesus. Vummaru siya gapu assey pammati an Jesus at anna mit ey iillanyu losan assey sana.”
44003017	Inturuy Peter ey guminga, kanana, “At assey sana, dakayu ey susunud, agammuk ey sey nangngatanyu an Jesus at gapu assey ajiyu pun agammu ey siya sey imbaar Apudyus. Ya urey dasey ap-apuyu at ajida pun vus agammu.
44003018	Kon sey natuyan Jesus at siya sey tummuttuwaan sey impakur-it Apudyus assey kar-argow tey imbabaggan da amin ey profet ey masapur matongtong-ag ya matuy sey Cristu ey ibaarna.
44003019	At siya sey masapur man-awidanyu dasey basuryu ta as Apudyus sey unujunyu at pakawanuna dakayu.
44003020	Tey nu kanaʼsnaʼt sey koonyu, atjun Apudyus sey timpu ey vumaruwan ya kumasdoran sey somsomokyu ya ibaarna vus as Cristu ey jinutukana ey manginturey an jitaku.
44003021	Kon masapur iinggow as Jesus ad langit inggana as jumatong sey timpu ey mangimpabaruwan Apudyus assey kangamin tey siya sey imbagabagan Apudyus as dasey naapudyusan ey profet assey keysan ey ag-agow.
44003022	Kama assey ingkur-it Moses ey kanana, ‘Assey daan ey ag-agow, awad sey profet ey kama an sa'un ey ibaar sey Apu taku ey Apudyus an dakayu. Usa siya ey kadaraan taku ey iyIsrael. Masapur ey dongronyu sey amin ey ibagana an dakayu.
44003023	Tey sey aji pun mamati at misina asda tagun Apudyus ya majusa as ing-inggana.’
44003024	Manipud an Samuel inggana as dasey nampasapasani ey profet, impapaddaanda imbaga dasey makwamakwa assey timpu sana.
44003025	At amin dasey imbagan Apudyus as dasey profet, jitaku sey nibatgana. Ya mikavilley taku vus as dasey inturag Apudyus asda dakdakor taku assey kar-argow tey kanana an Abraham ‘Gapu asda ginanakam, mavindisyunan da amin ey tagu assey amin ey kikkiili assey luta anna.’
44003026	At siya sey jitaku ey Jews sey namangu ey nangimbaaran Apudyus assey baba'aruna ey anakna ta vindisyunana jitaku gapu assey mangimbagaana ey man-awidan taku dasey lawingan ey ugali.”
44004001	Sissiya atgey da Peter an John ey mikabagbaga asda tagu, assey jummatong dasey papaji ya sey ap-apun sey guwarda anda Sajusis assey Tempel.
44004002	Amud sey sangada anda Peter tey apporoda itudtuju asda tagu ey ummuli as Jesus at siya sey manuttuwaan ey kasin matagu dasey matuy.
44004003	At siya sey nanokmaanda anda Peter ya nangimpisukanda an jida assey baballudan assey tigangey masjum ta mabastigarda nu mavigat.
44004004	Kon adjuwan dasey nandongor assey intudtujun da Peter at namatida an Jesus. Sey vilang dasey laraki ey namati nu mijuga dasey namati assey ab-avusna at umuy as limallivu.
44004005	Mavigat pun, nadagup dasey turey ya dasey angkamarong-ag ya dasey mimisturun sey lintog ad Jerusalem.
44004006	Inggow vus siji da Annas ey kangatuwan ey paji, as Caiaphas, as John, as Alexander ya da ujum ey jujugan da kangatuwan ey paji.
44004007	Pinasikadda da Peter an John assey sinagungda asida at bastigarun jida ey kananda, “Ngey annunyu ey nangwa as nauy? Ngan sey narpuwan sey pannakabalinyu ey nangaan assey piley sey tagu anna ya ngan sey singngadan assey inusaryu?”
44004008	As Peter ey idardaran sey Ispiritun Apudyus, summongbat ey kanana, “Dakayu ey turey ya angkamarong-ag ad Israel anna,
44004009	nu sey mabastigaranni assey sana at miipanggop assey ambaru ey nakwa assey piley anna,
44004010	dongronyu atyén ta ibagak sey ustu an dakayu ya dakayu losan ey kailiyan ey iyIsrael. Sey tagu anna ey summisikad assey sinagungyu ey nakaan sey pileyna at vummaru gapu assey pannakabalin Jesu Cristu ey iNazareth ey illansayu assey krus kon tinagun Apudyus.
44004011	As Jesus vus sey nipaniyan sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Sey batu ey iwwalinyu, dakayu ey ampatpatakjug as vuruy, nambalinun Apudyus as kapatigan ey batu ey nipon-ad as mangimpapagdot assey vuruy.’
44004012	Tey as Jesus anggey sey mabalin ey manginsarakan an jitaku. Tey assey intiru ey luvung, niippun ujum as imbaar Apudyus ey manginsarakan an jitaku nu aji anggey siya.”
44004013	Innilan pun dasey ap-apun da Jews sey turud da Peter an John ey summongbat an jida, nasdaowda, am-amud assey inagammuda ey da nauy ey tagu at dokonda pun as jiadar. Siyana sey nangillasinanda ey jida sey nivuruvurun an Jesus.
44004014	Kon niippun miisongbatda tey sey tagu saji ey nakaan sey pileyna, tummatakjug assey dor-agda.
44004015	At kingwada pun, pinaryowda da Peter an John ta mapasig da ap-apu ey man-uugud.
44004016	At kananda, “Ngan sey kasin taku koon asda tagu sana? Losan mit pigey da tagu ad Jerusalem agammu sey nakaskasdaow ey milagru ey kingwada at aji pun mabalin ey vuyagun taku tey nini'ila ey kingwada.
44004017	At sey koon taku ta aji atyén umajuaju dasey angngor assey ngadan Jesus, ug-ugyatun taku jida ta ajida ikaskasin ey mangimbaga assey ngadan Jesus assey urey ngadanna ey tagu.”
44004018	At pinasakeyda kasin da Peter an John at vinagbagaanda jida ey kananda, “Ajiyu pey ikaskasin ey mangibaga assey ngadan Jesus. Ajiyu avus kasin itudtuju sey miipanggop an siya assey urey ngadannaʼs nait ey tagu.”
44004019	Kon kanan da Peter an John, “Dakayu sey manmanmok nu ustu assey angiilan Apudyus nu dakayu sey tongparunni unnu as Apudyus.
44004020	Aji pun mabalin ey iyageyni ey mangimbaga assey agammuni ya jingngorni an Jesus.”
44004021	At iyyam-amud da ap-apu ey nangug-ugyat an jida asida at jida paryawun tey niippun agammuda ey manusa an jida tey losan da tagu dayawun as Apudyus gapu assey nakaskasdaow ey nakwa.
44004022	Sey tagu ey nakaan sey pileyna at nasuruk as opatpuru sey tawunna.
44004023	Nivukkey pun da Peter an John, ummuyda assey iggawan da vurunda ey mamati at impadamagda sey imbagan dasey ap-apun da papaji ya da angkamarong-ag.
44004024	Jingngor pun da vurunda, nantitimpuyugda ey nalluwaru an Apudyus ey kananda, “Mannakabalin ey Apu, sika sey nangwa assey langit, luta ya beybey ya da amin ey ininggow asda nauy ey kingwam.
44004025	Sika vus pigey sey nangimbaga assey impakur-it sey Ispiritum an David ey dakdakorni assey kar-argow ey nanserservi an sika ey kanana, ‘Pa lawa sumasanga dasey Gentil? Pa lawa kumukuntra dasey iyIsrael an Apudyus as niippun gotokna?
44004026	Dasey kaariari ya da ap-apu assey luvung, naamungda ey nakasagana ey mangubat an sika Apudyus ya sey pinilim ey Cristu.’
44004027	At tummuttuwa nauy tey naamungda ad Jerusalem anna da Herod, Pontius Pilate, da Gentil ya dasey kailiyanni ey iyIsrael ta mantuturaganda sey mangngatanda an Jesus ey jinutukam ey Cristu ey nanserservi an sika ey niippun basurna.
44004028	At impatongparda sey amin ey sisimmoknu gapu assey pannakabalinnu ey masapur matongpar sey pium.
44004029	At ey sana Apu, ilam sey koonda anna ey mangug-ugyat an dakani ey manserservi an sika. Atjum sey turudni ey mangingginga assey amin ey pium ey ibagani.
44004030	Ipiilam avus sey pannakabalinnu ta agasanni da masakit ya mabalin ey koonni da ujum ey nakaskasdaow gapu assey ngadan Jesus ey niippun basurna ey nanserservi an sika.”
44004031	Naasda pun nalluwaru, nayyugayug sey vuruy ey naaammunganda. At naatdanda as pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus at tummurudda ey nangiwwarawag assey Gingan Apudyus.
44004032	Nan-iisuwan da amin ey mamati sey somsomokda. At niippun ansomsomok as amunguna sey laksunna tey losanda ivillayan dasey ujum ey makasapur.
44004033	Ya da aposel avus, amud sey koonda ey mangintakjug assey ummuliyén Jesus ya amud sey turung Apudyus an jida ey mamati.
44004034	Niippun mangkurang as urey usa an jida tey dasey awad lutana unnu vuruyna at ingnginada, asida at atjun sey nginana asda aposel
44004035	ta asin da aposel iwaras asda mamati ey angkasapuran ey insigun assey kasapuran sey usa ya usa an jida.
44004036	Inggow sey usa ey ganak Levi ey niyanak ad Cyprus ey angngadan as Joseph ey nginadanan dasey aposel as Barnabas (ey sey piuna ugujun, “Mangimpakasdor assey somsomok dasey vurunna.”)
44004037	Kingwan pun Joseph, ingnginana sey lutana at innatudna sey nginana asda aposel.
44005001	Kon inggow da an-asawa ey da Ananias an Saphira ey nangingngina assey ujum ey lutada.
44005002	Nanturagda ey an-asawa ta angillasinda assey nginan sey lutada ya asin at Ananias atjun sey ujum asda aposel ey kanana, “Annaya sey amin ey nginan sey lutani.”
44005003	At kanan Peter an siya, “Ananias, pam ituruk ey anturey as Satanas an sika ta us-ussatam sey Ispiritun Apudyus ya isulibnu sey ujum ey nginana?
44005004	Kuwayu mit sey luta saji assey daan pun mingina ya urey vus sey nginana at keygad kayu assey mangusaranyu. Pa kayu an somsomok as kanasnaʼt? Dakumpun as tagu sey inus-ussatanyu tey as Apudyus.”
44005005	Jingngor pun Ananias sey imbagan Peter saji, maggey nalikwad at natuy. Summakey dasey vinabaruwan at kinurvikubénda sey long-agna assey urus asida at ilogsad ey umuy mangillavun. Gapu assey nakwa saji, amud sey ugyat da amin ey nangngor assey nakwa an siya.
44005007	Ummayow pun nin sey turu ey uras, jummatong vus as asawana, kon niippun agammuna assey nakwa.
44005008	Inimus Peter an siya ey kanana, “Ey siyana anggey sey nginan sey lutayu?” At kanana vus, “Oon, nait mit anggey.”
44005009	At kanan vus Peter an siya ey, “Payu an-isuwun ey an-asawa ey mamadpadas assey Ispiritun Apudyus? Andanaʼt assey sawang dasey ummuy nangillavun an asawam. At iyorosda sika ilogsad.”
44005010	At nalikwad vus ey natuy. Summakey pun da vinabaruwan, innilada siya ey natuy at illogsadda vus ey ummuy illavun assey dor-ag asawana.
44005011	Amud sey ugyat dasey amin ey mamati ya da ujum ey nangngor assey nakwa saji.
44005012	Sey Kanayun ey apporon da mamati an Jesus madagupan at assey kananda ey Bangsar Solomon assey Tempél. At urey da tagu ey aji pun mamati at idayowda da mamati an Jesus, kon umugyatda ey mijuga. Kon urey nu kanaʼsnaʼt, umaju ey umaju da mamati ey mijuga an jida, laraki man as vubai. Ya adjuwan sey kingwakingwan dasey aposel ey nakaskasdaow ey iillan da tagu.
44005015	At gapu assey kookoon da aposel, inniyuy da tagu da masakit assey igid sey karsa ey angkauvug asda kama unnu obok tey assey somsomokda, urey atyén lawa mibatug sey anniniwan Peter an jida nu mallaus at makaan sey sakitda.
44005016	At adjuwan dasey tagu ey narpu assey kikkiili ey sakupun sey Jerusalem ey nangiyyuy as dasey masakit ya dasey nalun-ugan as jimunyu at vummaruda losan.
44005017	Gapu assey layad da tagu asda aposel, amud sey apos sey kangatuwan ey paji ya da vurunna ey Sajusis.
44005018	At impadokmada da aposel asida at jida ibarud.
44005019	Kon assey lavi saji, inggow sey enjel Apudyus ey ummuy namkat assey sawang sey baballudan at illogsadna da aposel, kanana,
44005020	“Ingkayu assey Tempél ya takjuganyu ey mangimbaga asda amin ey tagu miipanggop assey baru ey viyag ey marpu an Apudyus.”
44005021	Anna pun ey wikkiwikkis assey mavigat, tinongpar da aposel sey imbagan sey enjel saji. At summakeyda assey Tempél ey mantudtuju. Assey siyaji avus, ummuy sey kangatuwan ey paji ya da vurunna assey mimittingan at impaayagda da amin ey angkamarong-ag ya da ap-apun da Jews ta an-uugudda. Asida at angimbaar as umuy mangara as dasey aposel assey baballudan.
44005022	Kon jummatong pun dasey opisyar ey nabaar assey baballudan, niippun indasanda asda aposel at nampuulida ey ummuy nangimpaagammu.
44005023	Kananda, “Jummatong kani pun assey baballudan, nituturvik mit. Ya inggow mit vus dasey ambabantey assey sawang. Kon vinuktanni pun, niippun indasanni as tagu ad darum.”
44005024	Jingngor pun sey apun da amabantey assey Tempél ya da ap-apun dasey papaji, nakalivussu sey somsomokda, kananda, “Ngan nin sey kipuuyan nauy?”
44005025	Assey makalkalivussuwan sey somsomokda, inggow sey jummatong ey kanana, “Na! Da tagu akey ey imbarudyu at awadda assey Tempél ey mantudtuju asda tagu.”
44005026	At ummuy sey Kapitan ya dasey surdajuna assey Tempél ey mangara an jida. Kon ajida pun pinilit tey ummugyatda as batuwun da tagu jida.
44005027	Insakeyda da aposel at pinasikadda jida assey sinagung dasey ap-apun da Jews asin at sey kangatuwan ey paji bastigarun jida ey kanana,
44005028	“Imbabaggani mit an dakayu ey ajiyu itudtuju sey miipanggop an Jesus kon iyyam-amudyu at avus ey nangimpaagammu asda tagu ad Jerusalem ya usa pey, ipabasuryu amin an dakani sey natuyana.”
44005029	Summongbat da Peter ya da vurunna ey aposel, kananda, “Masapur ey as Apudyus sey tongparunni, dakumpun as tagu.
44005030	Dakayu mit sey nangngat an Jesus ey illansayu assey krus. Kon tinagun vus pigey Apudyus ey jinaydayow dasey dakdakor taku assey kar-argow.
44005031	Impangatuna ey insaad assey padawananna ta siya sey manginturey ya manginsarakan an jitaku. Siya sey kingwan Apudyus ta wayaana jitaku ey iyIsrael ey ambabawi ta pakawanuna dasey basur taku.
44005032	Takjuganni ey tuttuwa amin da nauy ya urey sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey innatjuna as dasey amin ey mangunud an siya at takjugana vus.”
44005033	Jingngorda pun sey imbagan dasey aposel, amud sey putukda at piunda atyén gongatun jida.
44005034	Kon inggow sey usa an jida ey Farisis ey angngadan as Gamaliel ey misturun sey lintog ya usa vus ey vivigvigun da tagu. Summikad at kanana, “Ipalogsadyu jida as sin-akitan.”
44005035	Lummogsad pun dasey aposel, kanana, “Susunud ey iyIsrael, annadan taku sey koon taku asda tagu anna.
44005036	Tey assey keysan ey ag-agow, inggow sey nakwa ey anung nauy. Lummuswa as Teudas ey nangimpangatu assey long-agna at ummuy as opat gasut ey tagu sey ummunud an siya. Kon gingngatda siya at nasinasina dasey pasurutna at niippun nantongparana.
44005037	Naas pun vus ji, lummuswa vus as Judas ey iGalili assey timpun sey sensus. Adjuwan vus da inawisna ey pasurutna. Kon gingngatda vus siya at nasinasina vus da pasurutna.
44005038	At ey sana, sey ibagak an jitaku, beybey-an taku jida ya paruvusan taku jida tey nu narpu assey tagu sey panggopda ya kookoonda, niippun dallu ambaru as ambanaganda.
44005039	Kon nu as Apudyus sey narpuwana, aji taku pun makaabak an jida tey kama as Apudyus sey lablabanun taku.”
44005040	At inavunan dasey ap-apun da Jews sey imbagan Gamaliel sana. Impaayagda kasin dasey aposel at impasaplitda jida asida at jida bagbagaan ta ajida ikaskasin ey mangintudtuju assey miipanggop an Jesus ya asida at jida paryawun.
44005041	At ummayow dasey aposel ey amud sey layadda tey imvilang Apudyus jida ey matongtong-ag para an Jesus.
44005042	Inag-agow ey umuyda mantudtuju assey Tempél ya as dasey vuruy da tagu. Ya impapatida ey mangintudtuju assey Ambaru ey Damag ey as Jesus sey Cristu ey pinilin Apudyus ey manginturey asda tagu.
44006001	Assey timpu saji, umaju ey umaju dasey mamati an Jesus kon inggow sey ajida pun angkikinnaawatan. Sey ajida pun angkikinnaawatan, tey kanan dasey Jews ey Greek sey gingada, apporow kanu mabeybey-an dasey baru an jida assey inag-agow ey miwarasan sey makan. Nauy sey lilida asda sigud ey Jews sey gingada.
44006002	At inamung dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposel dasey amin ey mamati an Jesus at kananda, “Aji pun atyén mabalin ey beybey-anni sey kiwaarni ey mangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus ta sey manwaras at avus assey makan sey apporoni koon.
44006003	At dakayu ey susunud, pumili kayu as pitu an dakayu ey masomkan ya idardaran sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey somsomokna ya ambaru sey madamagana ta jida sey simviyang miipanggop assey miwarasan sey pilak.
44006004	Ta dakani ey, sey alluwaru ya mantudtuju sey viyangni.”
44006005	At naryad da amin ey naamung assey imbagan dasey aposel. Sey usa ey napili at as Stephen ey mandogot sey pammatina ya idardaran sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey somsomokna. Dasey vurunna ey napili at jida da Philip, Procorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas ya as Nicolaus ey Gentil ey narpu ad Anthiok ey ummunud assey ugalin da Jews.
44006006	Da nauy da tagu ey imparangda as dasey aposel, asin at dasey aposel ipatey sey imada ey mangilluwaru an jida.
44006007	At nanturturuy ey umaju ey umaju dasey mamati assey Gingan Apudyus. At ummaju vus dasey mamati ad Jerusalem ya adjuwan vus dasey papaji ey ummunud assey ustu ey pammati.
44006008	As Stephen at dokor sey turung Apudyus an siya ya inatdana as pannakabalin ey mangwa asda adjuwan ey nakaskasdaow ey iillan da tagu.
44006009	Kon inggow da ujum ey Jews ey iCyrene ya iyAlexandria ey membru assey usa ey Sinagog ey kananda ey Sinagog da Nawayawayaan ey Alipan. Nikasongsongbatda an Stephen kama vus dasey ujum ey Jews ey iCilicia ya da narpu ad Asia.
44006010	Kon ajida pun makaabak an siya tey sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey manuturung an siya at nariing ey sumongbat.
44006011	Kingwada pun, pinasuksukanda da ujum ey tagu ta isutsutda as Stephen. At kananda, “Jingngorni as Stephen ey gumminga as lawing ey mivusur an Moses ya an Apudyus.”
44006012	Jingngor pun da tagu nauy ya da angkamarong-ag ya da mimisturun sey lintog, nasugsuganda at jinokmaanda as Stephen at inniyuyda assey iggawan dasey ap-apun da Jews.
44006013	Nangnangwada avus as inuussat ey tistigu ey kananda, “Sey tagu anna at ajina pun gey iginok ey mangimbagabaga as lawingan ey mivusur assey naapudyusan ey Tempél ya assey lintog Moses.
44006014	Tey jingngorni sey nangimbagaana ey as Jesus ey iNazareth at dadailuna sey Tempél ya orsana dasey ugali ey impabnus Moses an jitaku.”
44006015	At losan dasey ap-apu ey naaamung vinobotog as Stephen ya innilada sey vusarna ey isuna vusar sey enjel.
44007001	Inimus sey kangatuwan ey paji an Stephen ey kanana, “Ey tuttuwa da nauy ey ipabasurda an sika?”
44007002	Summongbat as Stephen ey kanana, “Susunud ya aama, dongronyu atyén sey ibagak anna an dakayu. Assey kar-argow, nampiila as madaydayow ey Apudyus an apu taku ey Abraham assey iniiggawana ad Mesopotamia assey daanna pun atgey man-atunan ad Haran.
44007003	Kanan Apudyus an siya, ‘Teynam sey iliyu anna ya dasey jujugam ta ingka assey lugar ey isuruk an sika.’
44007004	At tineynana sey ilina ey ilin dasey Chaldeans at ummuy ad Haran vinumruy. Natuy pun as amana, impuuy Apudyus siya assey ili anna ey iggow taku.
44007005	Assey ummaliyan apu taku ey Abraham as nauy, niippun innatud Apudyus an siya as urey lawa sintulliwok ey luta. Kon impostan Apudyus an siya ey as maliyam ey, atjun Apudyus an siya sey nauy ey luta as mallaksun dasey ganakna. Assey nangimpostaan Apudyus asda nauy an siya at niippun atgey anakda.
44007006	Kanan vus Apudyus an siya, ‘Umuy dasey ganaknu assey ujum ey ilin da sabali ey tagu ta ambalinda as alipan ey matongtong-ag as opat gasut ey tawun.
44007007	Kon jusauk dasey tagu ey mangalipan an jida ya asik at ilayow dasey ganaknu assey ili saji ta ampuulida as nauy ey luta ta as nauy sey mandayawanda an sa'un.’
44007008	Intugun vus Apudyus anda Abraham ey kugitunda dasey anakda ey laraki as sinyar sey nangavunanda assey inturagna an jida. At lummuswa pun sey anakda ey Isaac, kinugitna assey mikawaru ey ag-agow. At siya vus sey kingwan Isaac an Jacob ey anakda. Ya siyana vus sey kingwan Jacob asda nasawaran as juwa ey anakda ey madadamag ey dakdakor taku.
44007009	“Kon gapu ta maapos dasey dakdakor taku an Joseph ey sunudda, ingnginada siya as dasey nguminngina ey nangiyyuy an siya ad Egypt at nambalin as alipan. Kon aawwad as Apudyus an siya.
44007010	Tinurungana siya asda amin ey nalligligatana. Innatjun vus Apudyus sey kinariingna at siya sey naryadan Faraw ey arida ad Egypt an siya. At jinutukan Faraw as Joseph ey nan-gubernador assey amin ey ili ad Egypt ya siya vus sey simviyang assey amin ey laksunna.
44007011	“Assey timpu saji, jummatong sey urat assey intiru ey luta ad Egypt ya ad Canaan at amud sey nalligligatan da tagu. At dasey dakdakor taku, niippun angar-anda as makan.
44007012	Jingngor pun Jacob ey awad sey makan ad Egypt, imbaarna dasey aanakna ey jida dasey dakdakor taku ey umuy nanokmun as kanunda. Siyaji sey ab-avusda ey ummuy as jiyuy.
44007013	Assey pigwada ey umuy, impaagammun Joseph sey kinatataguna ey siya sey sunudda at siya at avus sey nangigammuwan Faraw asda kabvuruy Joseph.
44007014	Asin at Joseph impaayag as amana ey Jacob ya da amin ey susunudna ya dasey kabvuruyda. At ummuyda as pitumpuru ya lima ey ummuy ad Egypt.
44007015	At vummubruyda ad Egypt inggana as nangkakatuydaʼsji.
44007016	Kon nabab-ayag pun, niyuy sey tong-arda ad Sechem at naminda niigga assey liyang ey ningin-an Abraham asda anak Hamor.”
44007017	Inturuy Stephen ey kanana, “Anna pun ey umadani sey matongparan sey impostan Apudyus an Abraham assey kar-argow, ummaju da dakdakor taku ad Egypt.
44007018	Kon anna pun ey nan-orooros dasey turey ad Egypt, nibanus sey usa ey ari ey niippun jingjingorna miipanggop an Joseph.
44007019	At vinab-aliyana dasey dakdakor taku ya tinongtong-agna jida asina at pilitun jida ey mangimballu asda uttingda ta matuyda.
44007020	“Assey timpu saji, niyanak as Moses ey angkasdor ey utting. At ummuy as turu ey vuran sey nampaspasusuwan inana an siya.
44007021	Kon napilitanda ey maneynan an siya assey igid sey dawwang at indasan sey usa ey vubai ey anak Faraw at imvilangna as ustu ey anakna.
44007022	Nitudtuju an siya sey amin ey maadar ya kinariing dasey iyEgypt at nambalin siya as mavivigvig ey tagu assey amin ey koona ya ibagana.
44007023	“Mantawun pun as Moses as opatpuru, simsimmokna ey umuy mangila asda jujugana ey iyIsrael.
44007024	Ummuy pun, inaspurana at avus sey usa an jida ey ap-apporoan sey usa ey iyEgypt. At ummuy Moses insarak sey jugana saji at gingngatna sey amopporoan an siya.
44007025	Assey somsomok Moses, kanana pun nu maawatan dasey jujugana ey siya sey usarun Apudyus ey mangiwwaya an jida kon ajida pun siya naawatan.
44007026	Mavigat pun, innilana vus da juwa ey iyIsrael ey ampatuy at piuna jida ingoran ey kanana, ‘Dakayu ey vuvurun, yangey awad mansunud as ampatuy?’
44007027	“Kon sey nanginsarad ey nakabasur intukyudna as Moses ey kanana, ‘Ngan sey nangimbaga an sika ey awad karobbongam ey manginturey ya manguwis an dakani?
44007028	Ey pium sa'un gongatun ey isun sey iyEgypt ey gingngatnu ad gorobyan?’
44007029	Jingngor pun Moses sey imbagana saji, ummugyat at ummawid ey ummuy vinumruy ad Midian. At nangasawa siya as jiyuy at ummanakda as juwa ey laraki.”
44007030	Inturuy Stephen ey kanana, “Assey mikaopatpuru ey tawun ey iniiggawan Moses ad Midian, inggow sey enjel ey nampiila an siya assey iggawan sey gumilagilab ey ban-it ey kayu assey danak ey adani assey vilig ad Sinai.
44007031	Nasdaow as Moses assey nangil-ana at ummadani ta imamadna ilan kon jingngorna at avus sey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana,
44007032	‘Sa'un an Apudyus ey daydayawun dasey dakdakoryu ey da Abraham, Isaac ya as Jacob.’ Jingngor pun Moses sey gumminga saji, namilpil assey ugyatna ey ajina pun maturdan ey mangila.
44007033	Kanan Apudyus an siya, ‘Kaanum sey sapatusnu tey sey summisikkadam at naapudyusan ey luta.
44007034	Innilak sey amud ey tongtong-ag dasey taguk ad Egypt. Dodongrok avus sey ayuwwongda at siya sey ummaliyak ta inyak jida wayawayaan. At umalika ta ibaarku sika ey ampuuli ad Egypt.’ Siyana sey imbagan Apudyus an Moses.
44007035	“As Moses anna ey iwwalin dasey kadaraana assey damu ey kananda, ‘Ngan sey nangimbaga an sika ey awad karobbongam ey manginturey ya manguwis an dakani?’ At tummuttuwa nauy tey siya sey imbaar Apudyus ey manginturey ya mangiwwaya an jida ta teynanda ad Egypt. At sey enjel Apudyus ey namparang an siya assey gumilagilab ey kayu, siya sey nanurung an Moses.
44007036	At as Moses vus pigey sey nangimpangat as dasey iyIsrael assey naneynanda ad Egypt. Ya adjuwan vus dasey kingwana ey kaskasdaow ey milagru ad Egypt ya sey nandormanganda assey kananda ey Addaraag ey Beybey ya urey vus assey nanaradarananda assey danak assey opatpuru ey tawun.
44007037	As Moses vus anna sey nangimbaga asda iyIsrael ey kanana, ‘Awad sey ibaar Apudyus an dakayu ey profet ey kama an sa'un. Usa siya ey kadaraan taku ey iyIsrael.’
44007038	As Moses vus sey nikabagbaga assey enjel assey naamungan dasey dakdakor taku assey danak ad Horeb. Ya impabnus vus Moses an jitaku sey naatud an siya ey Gingan Apudyus ey mangatud as kataguwan.
44007039	“Kon aji pun da dakdakor taku dongron as Moses tey ajida pun patiyun sey ibagbagana tey amud at avus sey layadda ey ampuuli ad Egypt.
44007040	Tey assey nabayagan Moses assey tuktuk sey vilig saji, kananda an Aaron, ‘Mangwaka as ap-apudyus taku ta awad mangimpangat an jitaku tey aji taku pun agammu nu ngan sey nakwa assey tagu saji ey Moses ey nangillayow an jitaku ad Egypt.’
44007041	At nangwada as ap-apudyusda ey anung sey ubvun sey baka at indatunanda ya impartiyanda ey mallagragsak ya mandayow assey mismu ey kingwada.
44007042	At gapu assey kingwada saji, nan-awidan Apudyus dasey dakdakor taku. Iwwarangna jida ta amorna ey dasey vituwun ad langit sey andaydayawanda. Tey siya vus pigey sey impakur-it Apudyus assey usa ey profet ey kanana, ‘Dakayu ey iyIsrael, ey sa'un pun lawa sey impartipartiyanyu ey angimpiila assey dayowyu assey opatpuru ey tawun ey iniggawanyu assey danak?
44007043	Dakumpun mit as sa'un sey impartiyanyu nu aji dasey intakkitakinyu ey torda ey vub-ulluy sey ap-apudyusyu ey Molek ya sey vinitvituwwun ey ap-apudyusyu ey kananyu ey Refan. Da nauy ey ap-apudyus ey kingwayu sey indaydayowyu. At siya sey mangimparyawak an dakayu ta miyuy kayu assey ili ey sin-umadayu nu ad Babylon.’
44007044	“Dasey dakdakor taku assey iniggawanda assey danak, nangwada as dokor ey bawi ey torda ey nangiggaanda assey batu ey nikur-itan dasey vilin Apudyus. Sey kingwada saji ey bawi, inan-anungda sey impiilan Apudyus an Moses.
44007045	Natuy pun as Moses, niyoros as Joshua ey nangimpangat an jida assey ummaliyanda assey ili taku anna. At sey vub-ulluy anna ey vinnusda, intakinda assey namnusanda assey lutan da sigud ey ummili as nauy ey pinaryow Apudyus. At sey vub-ulluy anna at iniinggow as nauy ey ili taku inggana assey timpun David.
44007046	Nalaylaydan as Apudyus an David at kindow David an Apudyus nu mabalin ta ampatakjug as ustu ey iggawan sey Apudyus Jacob.
44007047	Kon dakumpun as David sey nangimpatakjug tey as anakna ey Solomon.
44007048	“Kon as Apudyus ey kangatuwan, aji pun inggow assey vuruy ey kingwan da tagu tey awad sey kanan dasey profet,
44007049	‘Ad langit sey tumukjuwak ey manturey ya sey luta sey ansikadak. At ey makakwa kayu as vuruy as lamugku iggawan?
44007050	Tey sa'un mit sey nangwa assey kangamin.’ “Siyana sey impakur-it Apudyus assey kar-argow,” ey kanan Stephen.
44007051	Inturuy Stephen ey kanana, “Ummamdan sey kummabnutan sey somsomokyu. Anungyu paganu ey sumanga ey mamati ya kama kayu as torong ey niippun dongrona assey ibagan Apudyus. Kama vus pigey as dasey dakdakor taku ey kanayun ey vuvussurunda sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
44007052	Yangey awad lawa usa as dasey profet as ajin dasey dakdakoryu tinongtong-ag? Niippun, tey urey sey profet ey nangimpadaan assey umaliyan sey nalintog ey manservi an Apudyus at gingngatda vus. At ey sana dakayu vus sey nalliput ya nangngat an Jesus ey mangisarakan.
44007053	Dakayu sey sillaksun assey lintog ey impaatud Apudyus as dasey enjel an dakayu kon ajiyu pun pinati.”
44007054	Jingngor pun dasey ap-apun da Jews sey imbagan Stephen saji, kotbakotbanda sey vub-ada assey putukda.
44007055	Kon as Stephen ey idardaran sey Ispiritun Apudyus, nantangad ad langit at innilana sey siling Apudyus ya as Jesus ey summisikad assey padawananna.
44007056	“Anjiya tuttuwa!” ey kanana. “Nabkatan ad langit, at iillak sey Anak ji Tagu ey summisikad assey padawanan Apudyus.”
44007057	At dasey ap-apun da Jews, sivuvuggada ey mamnut assey ingada. Ya asida at mamin migab-ur ey manokma an Stephen.
44007058	At illabsutda ey nangiyyuy assey igid sey vubruy asida at batubatuwun. Ya dasey nanakjug ey nangimpabasur an siya at kinaanda sey gotap sey lumvunda asida at ipaajug assey usa ey amattuk ey laraki ey angngadan as Saul ta awad agammuda ey mamatu an Stephen.
44007059	Assey mamatubatuwanda an Stephen, nalluwaru ey kanana, “Apu Jesus, aram sey kajudwak.”
44007060	Nallikkadang at indangsorna ey gumminga ey kanana, “Apu, ajim jusaun jida assey koonda anna.” Imbagana pun jiyuy, nuubvus sey angusna.
44008001	As Saul sey nangoddong ey gongatunda as Stephen. At da ujum ey Jews ey manguunnud assey lintog Apudyus, ummuyda illavun ey amud sey ivilda. Assey ag-agow ey natuyan Stephen, siyaji sey sarad sey amud ey tongtong-ag dasey namati ad Jerusalem. At nansisiyyan da mamati ey ummuy as dasey vubvubruy ad Judea ya ad Samaria at anggey dasey aposel as nateynan ad Jerusalem.
44008003	Kon sey piun Saul, amin atyén ey mamati an Jesus, aminuna jida dokmaan anda tongtong-agun. Awwey sakey asda vuruyda ey anguyud an jida, laraki man as vubai ya pinalogsadna jida ey mangiyyuy assey baballudan.
44008004	Kon dasey nasinasina ey mamati an Apu Jesus ey ummuy as dasey nantokotokon ey vubruy, awad ey ayanda, intudtujuda pey sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Jesus.
44008005	As Philip sey usa an jida ey ummuy assey usa ey vubruy ad Samaria ey nangiwwarawag ey as Jesus sey Cristu ey imbaar Apudyus.
44008006	At jingor pun dasey tagu sey imbagabagan Philip ya innilada dasey kaskasdaow ey kingwana, pinatida sey amin ey imbagana.
44008007	Tey dasey jimunyu ey nilun-ug asda adjuwan ey tagu at sikukulisda ey umayow. Ya adjuwan vus dasey nattubangil ya piley ey vummaru sey long-agda.
44008008	At siya sey amud sey layad da tagu as jiyuy ey vubruy.
44008009	Kon assey vubruy saji, inggow sey usa ey laraki ey angngadan as Simon ey nabayag ey mangwamangwa as masdaawan da amin ey iSamaria gapu assey majik ey kookoona. At nampaspas-um ey usa siya ey nangatu ey tagu.
44008010	At amin da tagu assey ili saji, nangatu man as nababa, pinatida sey imbagabagana ya vinigvigda ey Mandogot sey Pannakabalinna ey anung sey pannakabalin Apudyus.
44008011	Sey lapuna nu pada lawa patipatiyun siya tey nabayag ey ammajimajik as masdaawan da tagu.
44008012	Kon assey namatiyanda assey Ambaru ey Damag ey intudtujun Philip miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus ya sey miipanggop an Jesus ey siya sey Cristu, nampavunyagda losan, laraki man as vubai.
44008013	Urey vus as Simon at namati assey intudtujun Philip. Naas pun siya navunyagan, ummunud at nasdaow ey nangiila as dasey nakaskasdaow ey sinyar ya milagru ey kookoon Philip.
44008014	Jingngor pun dasey aposel ad Jerusalem ey namati dasey tagu ad Samaria assey Gingan Apudyus, imbaarda da Peter an John ey umuy mangila an jida.
44008015	Jummatongda pun, illuwaruwanda jida ta maatdanda assey Ispiritun Apudyus
44008016	tey assey navunyaganda, anggey sey ngadan Jesus at daan pun milong-ag sey Ispiritun Apudyus an jida.
44008017	At impateyn da Peter an John sey imada as dasey mamati at nilong-ag sey Ispiritun Apudyus an jida.
44008018	Innilan pun Simon ey nilong-ag sey Ispiritun Apudyus an jida assey nangimpatayan da Peter an John assey imada, indowdowna sey pilak
44008019	ey kanana, “Atdanak pey as pannakabalin ey sana ta urey nu ngadannaʼsnaʼt sey angimpatayak assey imak, milong-ag vus sey Ispiritun Apudyus an jida.”
44008020	Kon kanan Peter an siya, “Mijugaka atyén assey pilaknu ey masgub ad inférnu tey sey awad assey somsomoknu at mabalin ey ngin-am sey Ispiritun Apudyus ta milong-ag asda tagu.
44008021	Niippun urugnu ey mangwa assey anung sey kiwaarni miipanggop an Jesus tey lawinganka assey angiilan Apudyus.
44008022	Ibabawim dasey lawingan ya dakumpun ey sisimmoknu ya dawatum an Apudyus ta pakawanuna sika.
44008023	Tey miilak ey amud sey aposnu ya vinabarud sika assey basur.”
44008024	Kanan Simon anda Peter an John, “Pangngaasiyu ta iluwaruwanak an Apudyus ta aji makwa sey imbagayu sanat an sa'un.”
44008025	Naas pun da Peter an John intudtuju sey Gingan Apudyus asda tagu ya impaniknikda dasey innilada ya jingngorda miipanggop an Jesus, nampuulida ad Jerusalem. At assey nangulinanda, amin ey vubruy ey indangkasda ad Samaria, itudtujuda vus sey Ambaru ey Damag.
44008026	Inggow sey usa ey enjel Apudyus ey nampiila an Philip at kanana, “Anggappotka ta ingka assey karsa ey marpu ad Jerusalem ey anguy assey danak ad Gaza.”
44008027	Lummibbat as Philip ey ummuy. Inggow pun assey daran, indasana sey usa ey ukum ey iyEthiopia ey narpu ad Jerusalem ey ummuy nandayow an Apudyus. Nangatu sey saadna tey siya sey angil-ila assey amin ey laksun sey Reyna ad Ethiopia.
44008028	Nallulugan assey kalisana ey ampuuli assey vubruyda. Assey nallulugganana, basabasauna sey libnu ey ingkur-it profet Isaiah assey kar-argow.
44008029	Kanan sey Ispiritun Apudyus an Philip, “Umadanika an siya assey kalisana.”
44008030	Nanuddak as Philip ey ummadani an siya at jingngorna sey ukum ey ambasabasa assey ingkur-it Isaiah. Kanan Philip, “Ey maawatam vus pigey sey basabasaum sanat?”
44008031	Summongbat sey ukum at kanana, “Ajik pun ampey, ambaru nin nu awad angimpakaawat an sa'un.” At inayagana as Philip ta mikalugan an siya.
44008032	Sey basabasauna ey impakur-it Apudyus at kanana, “Siya sey kama as karneru ey niyuy assey oossangan. Kama vus as ubvun sey karneru ey giginnok nu pukisanda tey aji pun gumingginga.
44008033	Vinibviinda siya ya dakumpun as ustu sey nuuwisana. Niippun vus katuntunan sey ganakna tey pinungpungda sey viyagna assey luta.”
44008034	At inimus sey ukum saji an Philip ey kanana, “Ngan sey ibagabagan sey profet anna? Ey sey long-agna unnu sabali ey tagu?”
44008035	At illawlawag Philip ey as Jesus sey kipuuyan nauy ey vinasana. At inturuyna ey nangillawlawag inggana as impaagammuna sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Jesus.
44008036	Assey anna ey anaradaran sey kalisada, inumdasda assey iggown sey danum. At kanan sey ukum an Philip, “Anna mit sey danum, ey mabalin ta vunyaganak?”
44008037	At kanan Philip, “Mabalin ey mavunyaganka nu tuttuwa ey mamatika an Jesus.” At kanan sey ukum saji, “Patiyuk ey as Jesu Cristu at anak Apudyus.”
44008038	At imbagan sey ukum assey manginturturung assey kalisa ta ipaginokna. Vummabada ey juwa an Philip assey iggawan sey danum at vinunyagan Philip siya.
44008039	Tummakdangda pun, illayowʼn sey Ispiritun Apudyus as Philip at niippun innilan sey ukum an siya. Kon inturuyna vus pigey ey umuy assey ayana ey amud sey layadna.
44008040	Kon as Philip, allangranga pun, maggey anna siya ad Azotus. At insaradna vus ey mangintudtuju assey Ambaru ey Damag assey amin ey vubruy ey idangkasna inggana as jummatong ad Caesarea.
44009001	Assey timpu saji, umam-amud sey angokoon Saul ey manongtong-ag as dasey pasurut Jesus tey sey piuna, aminuna jida ipagngat. At ummuy assey kangatuwan ey paji
44009002	ey nampakwa as surat as pammaruvus ta umuyna ipiila asda Sinagog ad Damascus ta nu awad udasana as dasey pasurut Jesus, awad kalintogana ey manokma an jida, laraki man as vubai ta iyuyna jida ad Jerusalem.
44009003	Anna pun ey umadani da Saul ad Damascus, maggey najilangan siya assey jilang ey narpu ad langit
44009004	at nalikwad assey luta. At jingngorna sey ginga ey kanana, “Saul, Saul, pam sa'un tongtong-agun?”
44009005	Gumminga as Saul ey kanana, “Ngey ngadannu Apu?” “Sa'un an Jesus ey apporom tongtong-agun.
44009006	Sumikadka ta ingka assey ili ta asi mibaga an sika as jiyuy sey masapur ey koom.”
44009007	Dasey vurun Saul, nakugweyda tey jingngorda sey gumminga kon niippun innilada as vugasna.
44009008	Summikad pun as Saul ey allangranga, niippun ogon ilana. At kiniwid da vurunna siya ey nangiyyuy ad Damascus.
44009009	Turu ey ag-agow ey aji pun makaila ya aji pun nangnangan anda uminum.
44009010	Ad Damascus, inggow sey usa ey pasurut Jesus ey angngadan as Ananias. Nampiila as Apu Jesus an siya assey kamaʼs in-inop, kanana, “Ananias.” At tinumbar as Ananias ey kanana, “Paman Apu, ngey ibagam?”
44009011	Kanan Apu Jesus an siya, “Sumikadka ta ingka assey karsa ey kananda ey ‘Nanggodong ey Karsa.’ Imusum as vuruy da Judas nu awad as jiyuy sey usa ey tagu ey angngadan as Saul ey iTarsus. Awad siji ey malluwaluwaru
44009012	ya sey malluwaluwaruwana, impiilan Apudyus an siya sey kamaʼs in-inop ey awad sey usa ey tagu ey angngadan as Ananias ey summakey ya impateyna sey imana an siya ta kasin makaila.”
44009013	Kanan Ananias, “Oon, Apu, kon amud pey sey jingngorku miipanggop assey tagu sanat ya dasey kagguugyat ey kingwana asda tagum ad Jerusalem.
44009014	At anna vus ey ummali ad Damascus ey inatdan dasey ap-apun da papaji as kalintogan ey manokma an dakani losan ey mandayow an sika.”
44009015	Kon kanan pey dallu Apu Jesus an siya, “Ingka at, tey siya sey pinilik ey manservi an sa'un ey mangimpaagammu asda Gentil ya da aarida ya dakayu ey iyIsrael assey miipanggop an sa'un.
44009016	Asik ipiila an siya nu ngan annun sey matongtong-agana gapu an sa'un.”
44009017	Ummuy pun as Ananias assey vuruy ey iggawan Saul, ipateyna sey imana ey kanana, “Sunud ey Saul, as Jesus ey Apu taku sey nampiila an sika assey ummaliyam sina. Siya vus pigey sey nangimbaar an sa'un ta kasinka makaila ya sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey mangindaran an sika.”
44009018	Inugudna pun ji, maggey naotdag sey isuna sibsib ji ikan assey atan Saul at kasin makaila. At summikad ey ummuy nampavunyag.
44009019	Naas pun nangan, nipuuli sey kasdorna. Nivuruvurun as Saul as dasey mamati ad Damascus assey kam-ana ey ag-agow.
44009020	Oni pun, ummuy ey dagus asda Sinagog ey mangintudtuju ey as Jesus at anak Apudyus.
44009021	At naminda nasdaow dasey nangngor an siya at kananda ey an-iinnimus, “Yangey dakumpun nauy sey nanongtong-ag as dasey tagu ey mandaydayow an Jesus ad Jerusalem? Yangey dakumpun as siya igadtokna ey ummali as nauy ta dokmaana da mamati ta iyuyna jida asda ap-apun da papaji ad Jerusalem?”
44009022	Kon as Saul, ummam-amud at avus sey angokoona ey mantudtuju ey mangawis asda tagu ya mangimpaniknik ey as Jesus at siya sey Cristu ey manginsarakan asda tagu. At da Jews ey inggow ad Damascus, ajida pun makasongbat an siya.
44009023	Ummayow pun sey kam-ana ey ag-agow, nantuturagan dasey Jews nu ngan annunda ey mangngat an Saul.
44009024	At inag-agow ya nilavi ey babangngabangunda sey pudayan sey vubruy ta nu umayow, gongatunda siya. Kon naagammuwan Saul sey panggopda an siya.
44009025	Usa pun ey lavi, innaran dasey pasurut Jesus sey arat at illuganda siya asida at uyujun assey abvut sey sijil sey vubruy ta awad agammuna ey umayow.
44009026	Jummatong pun as Saul ad Jerusalem, umuy atyén mijuga asda pasurut Jesus. Kon umugyatda an siya tey ajida pun patiyun ey usa vus siya ey pasurut Jesus.
44009027	At kingwan pun Barnabas, kinuyugna as Saul ey nangiyyuy assey iggawan dasey aposel. Asina at ul-ullitun an jida sey nangil-an Saul an Apu Jesus assey daran ey umuy ad Damascus. Ya impaagammuna vus sey imbagan Jesus an Saul ya sey kinaturudna ey nangintudtuju miipanggop an Jesus ad Damascus.
44009028	At nivuruvurun as Saul an jida ey siwawaya ey umuumuy asda vuvuruy ad Jerusalem ey mantudtuju miipanggop an Apu Jesus ey niippun ugyatana.
44009029	Nikajisjiskas ya nikasongsongbat asda Jews ey Greek sey gingada kon anaanapunda at nu ngan-annunda ey mangngat an siya.
44009030	Naagammuwan pun dasey vurunna ey namati, vinurnanda siya ey umuy ad Caesarea asida at palibbatun ey ampuuli assey vubruyda ad Tarsus.
44009031	Assey timpu saji, ummun-unina sey natongtong-agan dasey mamati an Jesus as dasey vubruy ad Judea, Galili ya ad Samaria. Ya gapu assey turung sey Ispiritun Apudyus ya sey amud ey layadda ey mangunud assey Apu, kummasdor sey pammatida ya umaju ey umaju dasey mamati an Jesus.
44009032	As Peter vus, ginaggakeyna sey amin ey vubruy ey umuy mangila as dasey tagun Apudyus. Jummatong pun ad Lidda,
44009033	indasana sey usa ey tagu ey angngadan as Enas ey inuumvug as waru ey tawun tey nattubangil at aji pun makalawa as pawey.
44009034	Kanan Peter an siya, “Enas, vumangunka ta lukutum sey oboknu tey agasan sika an Jesus.” At maggey kummasdor ey dagus.
44009035	At assey nangil-an da amin ey ummili ad Lidda ya dasey ummili assey tanap ad Sharon assey nakwa saji, namatida an Apu Jesus.
44009036	Ad Joppa vus, inggow sey usa ey vubai ey pasurut Jesus ey angngadan as Tavita. (Sey ngadanna assey gingan sey Greek at Dorcas, ey sey piuna ugujun, “ugsa.”) Ambaru sey kookoona ya agammuna ey tumurung asda niippun mabarbalinna.
44009037	Assey iggawan Peter ad Lidda, nasakit as Tavita at natuy. Naasda pun siya inamus, iniggada sey ladagna assey mikagwa ey garaju assey usa ey kuwartu.
44009038	At imbaarda da juwa ey laraki ey umuy nangayag an Peter tey jingngorda ey awad siya ad Lidda ey adani assey vubruyda. Jummatong pun dasey nabaar, kananda, “Ganasam ta intaku assey vubruyni ad Joppa.”
44009039	Lummibbat as Peter at nitun-ud an jida. Jummatongda pun, inniyuyda as Peter assey iggawan sey natuy. At inggow da baru ey siiivil ey naar-arngungu ey nidor-ag an Peter ya ipiipiilada an siya dasey lumvun anda panjiling ey jinait Dorcas assey matatagguwana.
44009040	Impalogsad Peter jida losan at nallikkadang ey nalluwaru, asina at sagungun sey ladag at kanana, “Tavita, vumangunka.” Nanjiyat as Tavita at innilana pun as Peter, vummangun ey tummukju.
44009041	Inugnan Peter sey imana asina at ipasikad. Inayagana da amin ey mamati ya dasey baru at imparangna as Tavita an jida.
44009042	Sey nakwa saji at nanjinamag assey amin ey ummili ad Joppa at adjuwan dasey namati an Apu Jesus.
44009043	As Peter, nikig-ow assey vubruyda ad Joppa assey kam-ana ey ag-agow assey vuruy da Simon ey gumagallit as larat.
44010001	Inggow sey usa ey tagu ad Caesarea ey angngadan as Cornelius ey iRoman ey Kapitan sey usa ey vungguy da surdaju ey kananda ey “Kumpanyan sey Surdajun da Italian.”
44010002	Da Cornelius ey simbaryan at losanda mandaydayow an Apudyus. Ya adjuwan vus sey tinuruturungana asda Jews ey niippun mabarbalinna ya kanayun ey lumuwaluwaru an Apudyus.
44010003	Usa pun ey ag-agow assey anna ey magayud, inggow sey impiilan Apudyus an siya. Ampatak sey nangil-ana assey enjel Apudyus ey summakey assey vuruyda at kanana, “Cornelius!”
44010004	Natotokor as Cornelius ey nangiila assey enjel gapu assey ugyatna, at kanana, “Ngey ibagam Apu?” Kanan sey enjel ey summongbat, “Mamaryad as Apudyus ey aangngor as dasey luwarum ya innilana dasey amin ey turungnu asda niippun mabarbalinna.
44010005	At mangimbaarka as umuy mangayag an Simon Peter ad Joppa.
44010006	Awad siya ey minangilin Simon ey gumagallit as larat ey vinumruy assey igid sey beybey.”
44010007	Ummayow pun sey enjel saji, inayagan Cornelius da juwa ey katurungna ya usa ey surdaju ey vub-urunna ey mandaydayow an Apudyus.
44010008	Imbagana an jida sey nakwa, asina at jida ibaar ey umuy ad Joppa.
44010009	Mavigat pun assey anna ey tigangey jumatong da nibaar ad Joppa, niyaspur vus ey ummuy as Peter malluwaru assey otop sey vuruy assey anna ey mamatuk.
44010010	Piuna atyén ey mangan tey nuurat. Kon anna atgey isaganada sey makan, inggow sey impiilan Apudyus an siya assey kamaʼs in-inop.
44010011	Innilana ey nabkatan ad langit ya inggow sey muuyuuyud assey batugna ey isuna sey dokor ey urus ey nakikiddongan sey opat ey jugyuna.
44010012	Ya navuvugsung ad darum dasey nantokotokon ey angkaddarap ya da nantokotokon ey tumayap ey paniyawun da Jews isida.
44010013	Oni pun, jingngorna sey gumminga ey kanana, “Peter, vumangunka ta pumartika as isidam.”
44010014	Kon kanan Peter, “Sumangaak Apu tey niippun nansid-ak asda lamsow ya paniyawunni ey Jews.”
44010015	Kon ingkasin sey gumminga ey kanana, “Sey imbagan Apudyus ey ambaru as kanun at ajim maggey paniyawun.”
44010016	Impitluna impiila da nauy an Peter asi at mipuuli sey urus ad langit.
44010017	Sommosommokon pun Peter nu ngan sey piunji ey ugujun, jummatong at avus dasey imbaar Cornelius ey angkasikad assey sawang.
44010018	Inimusda nu siyaji ey vuruy sey nandagusan sey angngadan as Simon Peter.
44010019	Sissiya ey sommosommokon Peter nu ngey piun sey innilana ey ugujun, assey kanan sey Ispiritun Apudyus, “Awad da turu ey tagu ey manginap an sika.
44010020	Lumogsadka ya ajika ambabbabang ey mitun-ud an jida tey sa'un vus pigey sey nangimbaar an jida.”
44010021	Lummogsad as Peter at kanana asda tagu ey ummali, “Sa'un sey anaanapunyu. Ey awad ibagayu?”
44010022	At kananda ey summongbat, “Imbaar dakani an Kapitan Cornelius ey umuy mangayag an sika tey imbagan sey enjel Apudyus an siya ey ipaayag sika ta dongrona sey ibagam. Usa siya ey ambaru ey tagu ey mandaydayow an Apudyus ya urey vus pigey dasey vurunnu ey Jews at dongronda siya.”
