44010023	Pinasakeyʼn Peter jida at ummiyanda. Mavigat pun, lummibbatda at nikuuy as Peter an jida ya nitun-ud vus dasey ujum ey mamati ey iJoppa.
44010024	Kasin pun mavigat ey jummatongda ad Caesarea, inggow da Cornelius ya dasey jujugana an da vub-urunna ey manguulley an jida.
44010025	Anna pun ey sumakey as Peter, inabot Cornelius siya at nallikkadang assey sinagungna ey mandayow an siya.
44010026	Kon pinasikad Peter ey kanana, “Sumikadka tey taguwak anggey ey anungnu.”
44010027	Sissiya as Peter ey mikabagbaga an siya assey anna ey summakey ad darum. Assey nangil-an Peter as dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey naamung,
44010028	kanana an jida, “Agammuyu mit sey nakopyaanni ey Jews ey misanga sey mijuga unnu ampamangili as dasey Gentil. Kon impaagammun Apudyus an sa'un ey niippun tagu as paniyawuk unnu ivilangku as aggissow.
44010029	At siya sey impaayagyu pun sa'un, ummaliyak ey niippun makanak. At assey sana, imusuk nu paak la ipaayag.”
44010030	Gumminga as Cornelius at kanana, “Mikapat ey ag-agow assey sana assey kananaʼs nauy ey magayud. Anna pun ey alluwaluwaruwak assey vuruyni anna, mag atgey summisikad assey sinagungku sey usa ey tagu ey nallumvun as sumilisiling.
44010031	Kanana an sa'un, ‘Cornelius, jingngor Apudyus sey luwarum ya innilana vus dasey nangokoom ey nanurung as dasey niippun mabarbalinna.
44010032	At angimbaarka as umuy ad Joppa ey mangayag an Simon Peter. Awad siya assey vuruy da Simon ey gumagallit as larat ey vinumruy assey igid sey beybey.’
44010033	At siyana sey nangimpaayagak an sika ey dagus at ambaru tey inanusam ey ummali. At assey sana, anna kani amin as nauy ey iillan Apudyus ey anguulley ya angngor assey amin ey imvilinna ey ibagam an dakani.”
44010034	Insarad Peter ey gumminga, kanana, “Assey sana, patiyuk ey an-iisuwun Apudyus da amin ey tagu.
44010035	At urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu, Jews unnu Gentil ey mangimpatig an siya ya mangwa assey ambaru at ivilang Apudyus.
44010036	Niippun juwajuwana ey naagammuwanyu sey Ambaru ey Damag ey impaagammun Apudyus an dakani ey iyIsrael ey mabalin kasin mipuuli sey ambaru ey mivurnan dasey tagu an siya gapu assey kingwan Jesu Cristu ey Apun da amin ey tagu.
44010037	Ya naagammuwanyu mit vus dasey nisabsabali ey nakwanakwa assey amin ey ili ad Israel nansarad ad Galili assey naas John intudtuju sey miipanggop assey vunyag.
44010038	Ya niippun juwajuwana ey naagammuwanyu vus ey innatud Apudyus sey Ispirituna ya sey pannakabalinna an Jesus. At urey ngadanna ey lugar sey ayana, pasig ey ambaru sey kingwana ya impabaruna vus dasey tinongtong-ag jimunyu tey awad as Apudyus an siya.
44010039	Dakani ey aposelna at takjuganni sey amin ey kingwakingwana ad Jerusalem ya asda ujum ey vubruy da Jews. Gingngatda siya ey illansada assey krus.
44010040	Kon assey mikatlu ey ag-agow nanipud natuyana, tinagun Apudyus at impiilana
44010041	an dakani. Ya apporow kani nikauvung an siya tey dakani anggey sey pinilin Apudyus ey mangimpaagammu assey miipanggop an siya.
44010042	Ya vinilinna dakani ey mangintudtuju assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an siya ya mangintakjug ey siya sey jinutukan Apudyus ey manguwis asda amin ey tagu ya urey dasey nangkakatuy.
44010043	Amin dasey profet assey kar-argow at imbagada sey miipanggop an Jesus ey mapakawan sey basur da amin ey mamati an siya.”
44010044	Sissiya ey gumingaginga as Peter at maggey nilong-ag sey Ispiritun Apudyus asda amin ey andodongngor.
44010045	At amin dasey Jews ey mamati an Jesus ey nivurun an Peter ey narpu ad Joppa, nasdaowda ey nangila assey nakwa tey ajida pun namnamaun ey atjun vus Apudyus sey Ispirituna as dasey Gentil.
44010046	Inagammuda ey awad sey Ispiritun Apudyus anda Cornelius tey idaydayowda sey kinangatun Apudyus ya kaviilanda ey guminga assey sabali ey ginga ey ajida pun inadar. At kanan Peter asda vurunna,
44010047	“Dakumpun as Jews da nauy ey tagu kon naatdanda assey Ispiritun Apudyus ey isun vus sey naatud an jitaku. At ey sana, aji pun mabalin ey awad manginsanga assey mavunyaganda.”
44010048	At imvilinna ey mavunyagan da Cornelius ey mangimpiila ey as Jesu Cristu sey umapuwanda. Naasda pun navunyagan, imbagada an Peter ta mikig-ow yén an jida assey kam-ana ey ag-agow.
44011001	Assey timpu saji, naagammuwan dasey aposel ya da ujum ey mamati an Jesus ey awad assey amin ey sakup sey Judea ey urey atpey vus dasey Gentil at mamatida assey Gingan Apudyus.
44011002	Assey nampuuliyén Peter ad Jerusalem, jinumsik dasey inggow manutuntun assey ugalida ey Jews. Kananda,
44011003	“Atééy, ummuyka atpey assey vuruy dasey tagu ey aji pun nakugit ya nikakanka amin an jida!”
44011004	Kon inul-ullit Peter sey nakwa ey nanginsarad assey lugrugina,
44011005	kanana, “Assey iggawak ad Joppa, assey anna ey alluwaluwaruwak, inggow sey impiilan Apudyus an sa'un ey kama as in-inop. Innilak sey anungna arwa ey urus ey nakikiddongan sey opat ey jugyuna ey mauyuuyud ey narpuʼd langit ya nibadong assey dor-agku.
44011006	Imamadku pun ilan nu ngan dasey inggow ad darum, anna dasey nantokotokon ey karasin sey ayém. Awadka ey naamu ya awadka ey atap. Awad vus da angkaddarap ya tumayap.
44011007	Oni pun, jingngorku sey gumminga ey kanana, ‘Vumangunka Peter ta pumartika as isidam.’
44011008	Kon kanak, ‘Sumangaak Apu! Umisawak ey mangan asda lamsow ya da paniyawunni ey Jews.’”
44011009	“Kasin vus sey ginga ey narpuʼd langit imbaga, ‘Ajim ivilang as aggissow sey makan ey jinarusan Apudyus.’
44011010	Namitluwuk innila sey nakwaan nauy asi at mipuuli ad langit.”
44011011	“Oni pun, jummatong dasey turu ey laraki assey vuruy ey nandagusak ey umuyda sa'un ayagan ta ingkani ad Caesarea.
44011012	At imbagan sey Ispiritun Apudyus an sa'un ey ajiyak ambabbabang ey mitun-ud an jida. At ummunud kani ya anda naya dasey onom ey vurun taku ey mamati ey iJoppa ey nivurun an dakani. Inumdas kani pun ad Caesarea, summakey kani assey vuruy da Cornelius.
44011013	Imbagan Cornelius an dakani sey innilana ey enjel Apudyus ey summisikad assey vuruyda. At kanan kanu sey enjel an siya, ‘Ambaarka as umuy ad Joppa ey mangayag assey tagu ey angngadan as Simon Peter.
44011014	Ibagana an dakayu nu ngan annunyu ey simbaryan ey misarakan.’”
44011015	Inturuy Peter ey kanana, “Anna pun ey isaradku ey guminga, nilong-ag at avus sey Ispiritun Apudyus an jida ey anung vus sey nilong-agana an jitaku assey ab-avusna.
44011016	At ingkagasmokku sey kanan Apu Jesus, ‘Vinunyagan John da tagu assey danum kon mavunyagan kayu assey Ispiritun Apudyus.’
44011017	Narawag ey as Apudyus sey nangatud assey Ispirituna asda Gentil ey anung vus pigey sey nangatdanana an jitaku assey namatiyan taku an Apu Jesu Cristu. At ngadanku gey ey manginsanga assey piun Apudyus ey koon?”
44011018	Jingngorda pun sey imbagan Peter, gumminokda ey anguguugud an siya. At jinayowda as Apudyus ey kananda, “Nu kanaʼsnaʼt, innatud vus Apudyus asda Gentil sey wayada ey ambabawi ta maatdanda vus assey viyag ey niippun patinggana.”
44011019	Assey nangngatan dasey Jews an Stephen, nansisina dasey mamati gapu assey natongtong-aganda. At ummuy da ujum ad Ponisya, Cyprus ya ad Anthiok ey mangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus kon anggey dasey Jews sey mangimbagabagaanda.
44011020	Kon inggow vus dasey mamati ey iCyprus ya iCyrene ey ummuy ad Anthiok at intudtujuda vus sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Apu Jesus asda Gentil.
44011021	At gapu ta awad an jida sey pannakabalin Apudyus ey mantudtuju, adjuwan dasey namati ey namigvig ey as Jesus sey umapuwanda.
44011022	Jinamag pun dasey mamati ad Jerusalem ey mamati vus da Gentil ad Anthiok, imbaarda as Barnabas ey umuy mangila.
44011023	Jummatong pun as jiyuy, amud sey layadna ey nangila assey amud ey kinaambarun Apudyus an jida. At tinugunna jida ta iturturuyda ey tornon sey pammatida an Apu Jesus.
44011024	Ambaru ey tagu as Barnabas ya sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey mangidaradaran an siya ya kummamtuungan assey pammati at adjuwan sey inawisna ey nijuga ey mamati an Apu Jesus.
44011025	Oni pun ummuy as Barnabas ad Tarsus ey umuy manginap an Saul.
44011026	Indasana pun, nampuulida ey juwa ad Anthiok. At nasintawunda siji ey nijujugga asda mamati at adjuwan dasey tagu ey tinudtujuwanda. At ad Anthiok sey ab-avus sey nangadanan dasey mamati an Jesu Cristu as Cristianu.
44011027	Assey iniggawan da Barnabas an Saul as jiyuy, inggow dasey profet ey narpu ad Jerusalem ey ummuy ad Anthiok.
44011028	Summikad sey usa an jida ey angngadan as Agabus. At gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus, impadaanna imbaga ey awad sey amud ey urat ey jumatong assey intiru ey luvung. (Nakwa nauy assey timpun Emperor Claudius.)
44011029	Nan-uugud dasey mamati an Jesus ad Anthiok ey angimpow-it as turungda asda vurunda ey mamati ad Judea ey insigun sey kaviilan sey usa ey atjun.
44011030	At impow-itda sey nuugpun ey turungda anda Barnabas an Saul ta iyuyda asda pangat da mamati ad Judea.
44012001	Assey timpu saji, insarad ari Herod ey manongtong-ag asda ujum ey mamati an Jesus.
44012002	At impasiwatna as James ey sunud John.
44012003	Innilana pun ey allaylayad dasey Jews, iyyam-amudna at avus at impadokmana as Peter. (Nakwa nauy assey Vistan sey Manomsomkan ey mangananda assey tinapey ey aji pun naipuwan.)
44012004	Nadokmaan pun as Peter, impabarud Herod ya impabanteyna as dasey nasawaran as onom ey surdaju ey sin-op-at sey usa ey vungguy ey an-orooros ey mamantey an siya. Sey kanan Herod, nu maas sey Vista saji, ipalogsadna as Peter ta vuyvuyaun da tagu sey mabastigarana ya mipagngatana.
44012005	Assey nibaballudan Peter, impapatin dasey mamati an Jesus ey mangilluwaluwaru an siya.
44012006	Assey lavi saji ey mamastigaran atyén Herod ya mangimpagngatana an Peter nu mavigat, nasusuyup siya ey nakakawwadan assey bobboot da juwa ey surdaju ya nababantayan vus sey sawang sey baballudan.
44012007	Oni pun, mag atgey nampiila sey usa ey enjel Apudyus at nasilawan sey kuwartu ey iggawan Peter. Ingguyunna as Peter ey namangun at kanana, “Ganasam, vumangunka!” At mag atgey naotdag sey posas sey imana.
44012008	At kanan sey enjel, “Ortom sey sinturunnu ya iggam sey sapatusnu.” At kingwan Peter. Kanan vus sey enjel, “Ampokoska ta umunudka an sa'un.”
44012009	At ummunud as Peter assey enjel saji ey lumogsad assey baballudan kon niippun agammuna nu tuttuwa sey kookoon sey enjel saji tey assey somsomokna, kanana pun nu in-inopna anggey.
44012010	Nilausanda sey ab-avus ya sey mikagwa ey ambabantey at inumdasda assey sawang ey baliyang sey kopyana ey umuy assey lasin. Mag vus gey nabkatan sey sawang at lummawada ey juwa. Anna pun ey anaradaranda assey karsa, maggey natarak sey enjel saji.
44012011	Oni pun, vinkon Peter ey tuttuwa atpey sey nakwa saji an siya, at kanana assey somsomokna, “Siguraju ey as Apudyus sey nangimbaar assey enjelna ey manginsarak an sa'un ta ajin Herod sa'un gongatun ya aji vus maturuy sey panggop dasey vurunku ey Jews ey makwa an sa'un.”
44012012	Oni pun, ummuy siya assey vuruy da Mary ey inan John Mark ey naaammungan dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey mangilluwaluwaru an siya.
44012013	Jummatong pun siji, nankugkug at ummuy sey usa ey katurung ey angngadan as Rhoda ey umuy mangila.
44012014	Immatunana pun sey gingan Peter, nanuddak at avus ey nampuuli ad darum ey umuy mangimbaga ey awad as Peter assey sawang. At gapu assey layadna, naliwatana ey mamkat assey sawang.
44012015	At kanan da tagu an siya, “Ung-ungka nin a.” Kon ipapilitna ey tuttuwa. Asida at kanan, “Maggey lawa ta enjelna nait.”
44012016	Kon sissiya as Peter ey kumugkukugkug assey sawang. Ummuyda pun vinuktan, nasdaowda ey nangila an siya.
44012017	At tinupapana jida ta guminokda. Asina at ul-ullitun sey kingwan Apudyus ey nangillawa an siya assey baballudan. At kanana, “Ibagayu nauy an James ya da ujum ey vurun taku ey mamati.” Oni pun, ummayow ey ummuy assey sabali ey ili.
44012018	Mavigat pun, nasiwar dasey ambabantey ey an-amuwongda as koonda assey maggey niippun as Peter.
44012019	At imvilin Herod ey anapunda siya kon niippun indasanda. At impabastigarna da ambabantey asina at jida ipagngat. Naas pun, ummayow as Herod ad Judea at ummuy ad Caesarea at as jiyuy sey iniggawana assey kam-ana ey ag-agow.
44012020	Assey iniiggawan Herod as jiyuy, amud sey sangana asda tagu ad Tyre ya ad Sidon. At kingwan pun da tagu, lummibbatda ey ummuy nangila an siya. At kinabagbagada as Blastus ey siya sey mangil-ila assey palasyun Herod ta turungana jida. Asida at umuy an Herod ey mikabagbaga assey vumaruwanda atyén tey sey marpuwan sey kanunda at assey ilin da ari Herod.
44012021	Jummatong pun sey ag-agow ey imbagan Herod ey an-aabtanda, iniggana sey ustu ey ang-angga asi at umuy tumukju assey tronuna ey manjiskursu asda tagu.
44012022	Naas pun gumminga, kanan da tagu ey nangimvugga, “Dakumpun akey as tagu sey gumingaginga sanat tey usa ey apudyus.”
44012023	At gapu ta nalaylaydan assey dayow da tagu an siya, dagus ey inatdan sey enjel Apudyus as sakitna at navigisan sey long-agna asi at matuy tey innarana sey dayow ey para an Apudyus.
44012024	Kon nanturturuy pey dallu sey Gingan Apudyus ey mitudtutudtuju at umaju ey umaju sey tagu ey mamati.
44012025	Naas pun sey siput da Barnabas an Saul ad Jerusalem, nampuulida ad Anthiok ey intakinda as John Mark.
44013001	Asda mamati ad Anthiok, inggow dasey profet ey nijuga an jida ey apporow mangimbaga asda ipaagammun Apudyus ya inggow vus dasey awad kaviilana ey mantudtuju asda namati an Jesus. Jida da Barnabas, as Simeon ey nangadanan as Angngitit, as Lucius ey narpu ad Cyrene, as Saul ya asi at as Manaen ey vub-urun Gubernador Herod manipud assey kabaran-ugda.
44013002	Usa pun ey ag-agow, nallanganda gapu assey mandayawanda an Apudyus. Kanan sey Ispiritun Apudyus an Jida, “Jutukanyu da Barnabas an Saul ey umuy mangwa assey piuk ey ipakwa an jida.”
44013003	At kasinda vus nallangan gapu assey mangilluwaruwanda an jida ya impateyda sey imada anda Barnabas an Saul asida at jida palibbatun.
44013004	Lummibbat da Barnabas an Saul ey vinaar sey Ispiritun Apudyus. Nan-usugda ey ummuy ad Seleucia asida at mallugan assey bapor ey umuy assey ili ad Cyprus ey nanggagawa assey beybey.
44013005	Jummatongda pun assey vubruy ad Salamis ey ili ad Cyprus, ummuyda assey sinagog da Jews ey mangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus. Ya inggow vus pigey as John Mark ey nivurun an jida ey tumuruturung.
44013006	Sinursurda sey luta saji ey Cyprus inggana as jummatongda assey viik sey vubruy ad Pafos. Indasanda as jiyuy sey usa ey kummamtuungan ey apporow ammajimajik ey angngadan as Bar-Jesus. Usa siya ey Jew ey magna pey gey da ibaga ey usa siya ey profet Apudyus.
44013007	Nauy ey tagu at vub-urun sey Gubernador assey ili saji ey as Sergius Paulus. Nariing ey tagu as Gubernador at impaayagna da Barnabas an Saul tey piuna ey dongron sey Gingan Apudyus.
44013008	Kon as Elimas ey majisan (Elimas sey ngadanna assey Gingan sey Greek), kuntakuntrauna jida at piuna lingalingun as Gubernador ta aji atyén mamati assey ustu ey pammati.
44013009	At as Saul ey nangadanan as Paul ey idaradaran sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey somsomokna, vinobotogna as Elimas
44013010	at kanana, “Sika, anungnu as Satanas. Awad ey ustu, jinumsiknu pey. Ajim pun iginok ey ambalinun as us-ussat sey tuttuwa ey Gingan Apudyus.
44013011	At ey sana, jusaun sika an Apudyus ta mabvuragka at niippun ilam assey darangdang sey init assey kam-ana ey ag-agow.” At dagus ey gummikbot sey allangrang-an Elimas at angkapkappukap ey manganap as mangiwid an siya.
44013012	Innilan pun Gubernador sey nakwa, namati an Apu Jesus. Ya nasdaow assey tudtujun da Paul miipanggop an Jesus.
44013013	At lummibbat da Paul asda vurunna ad Pafos at nalluganda assey bapor ey mandormang ey ummuy ad Perga ey usa ey vubruy assey provinsiyan sey Pamfilia. Jummatongda pun, tineynan John Mark jida at nampuuli ad Jerusalem.
44013014	Kon inturuturuy pey dallu da Paul ey nanguy ad Perga inggana as jummatongda ad Anthiok ey sakup sey Pisidia. Assey ag-agow ey iillongan da Jews, ummuyda assey Sinagog at nikatukjuda asda tagu.
44013015	Naas pun nibasa sey ujum ey lintog Moses ya da ujum ey ingkur-it dasey profet, inggow sey vinaar sey ap-apun sey Sinagog an jida ey kanana, “Dakayu ey susunud, nu awad ibagayu as kumasdoran sey somsomok taku, mabalin ey ibagayu.”
44013016	Summikad tuttuwa as Paul at tinupapana da tagu ta guminokda asina at isarad ey guminga. Kanana, “Susunud ey iyIsrael ya dakayu vus ey Gentil ey awad as nauy ey mandaydayow an Apudyus, guminok kayu yén ta dongronyu sey ibagani.
44013017	As Apudyus ey daydayawun taku ey iyIsrael at siya sey namili as dasey dakdakor taku assey kar-argow ta jida sey mantaguna. Assey iniiggawanda ad Egypt ey dakumpun as ilida, tinurungana jida at ummajuda. Ya impiilana vus sey dokor ey pannakabalinna assey nangillayawana an jida ta teynanda ad Egypt.
44013018	Assey opatpuru ey tawun ey nanaradarananda assey danak, pinuupuutna jida ya inan-anusana sey vummasubasuranda.
44013019	Jummatongda pun ad Canaan, impaabakna sey pitu ey nasyun as dasey dakdakor taku ta jida sey angingkuwa assey lutada.
44013020	At sey vilang sey tawun ey nakwaan da nauy at ummuy as opat gasut ya limampuru ey tawun misarad assey ummayanda ad Egypt inggana assey vummubruyanda as nauy ey iggow taku. “Oni pun vus, as Apudyus sey nangatud as dasey nan-orooros ey nangimpangat an jida inggana assey timpun profet Samuel.
44013021	Assey timpun Samuel, nangkudow da dakdakor taku an Apudyus as man-arida at jinutukana as Saul as man-arida ey anak Kish ey narpu assey ginanakan Benjamin. At tummukju siya ey nanturey as opatpuru ey tawun.
44013022	Kinaan pun Apudyus as Saul, imbanusna as David ey nan-ari an jida. At sey kanan Apudyus miipanggop an David, kanana, ‘As David ey anak Jesse, siya sey tagu ey pipiuk tey koona sey amin ey ibagak.’
44013023	At as David sey nangingganak assey manginsarakan an jitaku ey iyIsrael ey siya as Jesus ey imbaar Apudyus ey siya vus pigey sey impostana assey kar-argow.
44013024	Kon assey daan pun Jesus isarad ey mantudtuju, inggow as John ey nantudtuju asda amin ey iyIsrael ey masapur ibabawida dasey basurda ya mampavunyagda.
44013025	Anna pun ey tigangey John ipadakpus sey siputna, imbagana asda tagu ey kanana, ‘Ngan sey anomsomokyu an sa'un? Dakumpun an sa'un sey uullayunyu ey ibaar Apudyus ey manginsarakan an dakayu. Tey awad sey mipasani an sa'un ey gapu assey kinangatuna, ajiyak pun miivilang as urey lawa ambalin as kababaan ey alipanna.’
44013026	“At dakayu ey susunud ey ginanakan Abraham ya dakayu vus ey Gentil ey mandaydayow an Apudyus; jitaku sey nangimpaagammuwan Apudyus nu ngan annuna ey manginsarakan an jitaku.
44013027	Kon dasey tagu ey vummubruy ad Jerusalem ya dasey papangatda, ajida pun agammu ey as Jesus sey imbaar Apudyus ey manginsarakan urey apporoda basabasaun assey Sinabaju sey ingkur-it dasey profet miipanggop an siya. Jida at avus sey nakwaan sey impapaddaan dasey profet tey jida sey nangoddong assey mipagngatan Jesus.
44013028	Ya urey nu niippun agammuda as basurna, imbagada pey dallu an Pilate ta ipagngatna siya.
44013029	Kingwada jiyuy as matongparan sey amin ey nikur-it miipanggop an Jesus, inggow vus sey nangopas assey long-agna ey umuy nangillavun assey naaabvutan ey dopras.
44013030	Kon tinagun vus pigey Apudyus siya.
44013031	At nanginkinnu ey nampiila assey kam-ana ey ag-agow as dasey vurunna ey narpu ad Galili ey ummuy ad Jerusalem. At jida sey nangimpaagammu an jitaku ey Jews sey miipanggop an siya.
44013032	At nauy sey gadtokni ey ummali ta ibagani an dakayu sey Ambaru ey Damag. At sey impopostan Apudyus as dasey dakdakor taku assey kar-argow,
44013033	jitaku ey ginanakanda sey nakwaana tey assey timpu taku anna sey nanaguwan Apudyus an Jesus. Tey siyana vus pigey sey nikur-it assey mikagwa ey Psalms ey kanana, ‘Sika sey anakku. At ey sana, ipiilak ey sa'un sey amam.’
44013034	Miipanggop ey vus assey nanaguwan Apudyus an Jesus ta aji ogon kasin matuy, awad vus sey impostana assey kar-argow ey kanana, ‘Atjuk an dakayu sey ambaru ey impostak an David ey aji pun maat-atub.’
44013035	As Jesus sey tummuttuwaan sey impostana sana tey awad vus sey nikur-it assey Psalms ey kanana, ‘Sa'un sey matalik ey manserservi an sika. Ajim iparuvus sey mabyukan sey long-agku.’
44013036	Kon dakumpun an David sey kipuuyan nauy tey naas pun David kingwa sey panggop Apudyus an siya assey natatagguwana, natuy mit. At illavunda assey nilabnan dasey dakdakorna at nambalin as luta sey long-agna.
44013037	Kon as Jesus anna, aji pun nabyuk sey long-agna tey tinagun vus pigey Apudyus.”
44013038	Inturuy Paul ey kanana, “Dakayu ey susunud, piuk ey agammuwunyu atyén ey gapu assey kingwan Jesus, mabalin ey pakawanun Apudyus dasey basur taku.
44013039	Tey urey nu unujun taku dasey lintog Moses, aji taku pun vumaru assey angiilan Apudyus. Kon nu mamati taku an Jesus, ivilang jitaku an Apudyus as niippun basurna ya ambaru taku as angiilana.
44013040	At siya sey man-annad kayu ta aji makwa an dakayu sey imbagan dasey profet assey kar-argow ey kanana,
44013041	‘Ilanyu, dakayu ey mangillaylayus assey Gingan Apudyus. Awad sey matokoranyu ya natuy kayu. Tey awad sey kook assey matatagguwanyu ey ajiyu pun patiyun ey makwa urey nu awad mangimbagabaga an dakayu.’” Siyaji sey namungpungan Paul assey imbagana asda tagu.
44013042	Naas pun gumminga da Paul an Barnabas ey anna ey lumogsadda assey Sinagog, imbagan dasey tagu ey ampuulida atyén assey kasin umali ey Sabaju ta ituruyda ey mantudtuju.
44013043	Navukar pun dasey tagu, adjuwan ey Jews sey nitun-ud anda Paul. Ya inggow vus dasey Gentil ey nitun-ud an jida, jida da nauy sey nangunud assey nakopyaan da Jews. At tinugun da Paul jida ey angimpakasdor assey somsomokda ta tornonda ey mantalik assey jingngorda miipanggop assey turung Apudyus.
44013044	Jummatong pun sey kasin ey Sabaju, amud ey tagu sey nadagup ey tigangey mamin umali dasey amin ey umili ey umuy mandongor assey Gingan Apudyus.
44013045	Innilan pun dasey aji pun mamati ey Jews sey kaajun da tagu ey ummuy mangngor assey tudtujun da Paul, amud sey aposda at kinuntrada sey ibagbagada ya inang-angyégda jida.
44013046	Kon inturud da Paul an Barnabas ey gumminga, kananda, “Kasapuran ey dakayu atyén ey Jews sey amangu ey mibagaan sey Gingan Apudyus. Kon gapu ta sumanga kayu, dakayu ey mismu sey aji pun mangimvilang assey long-agyu ey mijuga assey mannanayun ey kataguwan an Apudyus. At keygad kayu ta ingkanin, ingkani asda sey Gentil.
44013047	Tey sey imvilin Apudyus, kanana, ‘Piyaruk dakayu ey umuy manilow assey somsomok dasey Gentil ta awad agammun da amin ey tagu assey kalutaluta ey misarakan.’”
44013048	Jingngor pun da Gentil sey inugud da Paul, nallaylayadda at indaydayowda sey Gingan Apudyus ey apporon da Paul itudtuju. At amin ey pinilin Apudyus ey maatdan assey viyag ey mannanayun at namatida.
44013049	At nanjinjinamag sey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop an Jesus assey amin ey vubruy assey ili saji.
44013050	Kon da Jews ey aji pun mamati, sinugsuganda dasey babaknang ey vubai ey andaydayow an Apudyus ya dasey nangatu ey tagu assey ili saji. At insaradda ey manongtong-ag anda Paul an Barnabas, asi da at jida paryawun assey ili saji.
44013051	Kingwan pun da Paul an Barnabas, pinukpukanda sey lapuk assey dapanda ta awad angagammuwan da umili ey keygadda assey majusaanda, asida at umuy ad Iconium.
44013052	Kon dasey mamati ad Anthiok ey tineynan da Paul, amud sey layadda ya idaradaran sey Ispiritun Apudyus jida.
44014001	Jummatong pun da Paul ad Iconium, kingwada sey anung sey kingwada ad Anthiok at ummuyda assey Sinagog da Jews ey mantudtuju. At gapu assey nangokoonda ey mantudtuju, adjuwan da Jews anda Gentil ey namati.
44014002	Kon dasey aji pun mamati ey Jews, sinugsuganda dasey Gentil ta lumawing sey somsomokda asda namati an Jesus.
44014003	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, inturuturuy pey dallu da Paul an Barnabas ey ininggow siji ey niippun ugyatda ey mangintudtuju assey miipanggop an Jesus. Ya tinakjugan sey Apu ey tuttuwa sey tudtujuda miipanggop assey kinaambaruna gapu assey nangatdana an jida assey pannakabalin ey mangwa asda kaskasdaow ey sinyar ya milagru.
44014004	At nagugwa da tagu assey ili saji tey inggow da ummunud as dasey Jews ya inggow vus dasey ummunud asda aposel.
44014005	At nantuturag dasey kumukuntra ey Jews ya da ujum ey Gentil ya da ap-apuda ey manongtong-ag ya mangub-ung anda Paul an Barnabas.
44014006	Kon vinkon pun dasey aposel, ummayowda at ummuyda ad Listra ya ad Derbe ya dasey ujum ey ili ey sakup sey Lyconya.
44014007	At intudtujuda vus sey Ambaru ey Damag as jiyuy.
44014008	Assey iniiggawan da Paul ad Lystra, inggow sey usa ey laraki ey niyanak ey piley at aji pun makadaran.
44014009	Tutukju ey aangngor assey tudtujun da Paul. Innilan pun Paul, vinkonna ey awad pammatina at mabalin ey vumaru sey long-agna. At intollong Paul siya
44014010	ey nangindangsor ey gumminga, “Sumikadka!” At maggey summikad ey tummaud at insaradna ey manaran.
44014011	Innilan pun da tagu sey kingwan Paul saji, imvuggada assey gingada ey iLiconia ey kananda, “Apudyus da nauy ey nampiila an jitaku, tagu anggey sey ilada. At anna ey vummabada an jitaku!”
44014012	At nginadananda jida assey ngadan dasey ap-apudyusda. As Barnabas, ningadananda as Zeus. At as Paul tey siya sey gumingaginga, nginadananda as Hermes.
44014013	Sey iggawan sey tempel ey manaydayawan da tagu an Zeus at assey pudayan sey vubruy. At kingwan pun sey pajin Zeus, nangiyyuy asda laki ey baka ey naang-anggaan as sabsavung assey pudayan sey ili ta mandatunda anda Paul.
44014014	Inagammun pun da Paul an Barnabas sey panggop da tagu, namsaanda vinissey sey lumvunda gapu assey putukda ya as lummawingan sey somsomokda asida at manuddak ey umuy assey iggawan da tagu ey amvugga ey kananda,
44014015	“Dakayu ey susunud, ngey koonyu sana! Tagu kani anggey ey anungyu. Ummali kaniʼsna ey mangimpaagammu assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Jesus ta man-awidanyu dasey ap-apudyusyu sana tey niippun servina ta mamati kayu atyén assey natattagu ey Apudyus ey nangwa ad langit, luta ya beybey ya da amin ey ininggow.
44014016	Assey kar-argow, imparuvus Apudyus da amin ey tagu ey nangwa asda piunda ey koon.
44014017	Urey nu kanaʼsji, awad pey dallu dasey ambaru ey kingwana an jida as angimmatunanda ey awad siya. Siya sey nangatud assey udan ey marpu ad ngatu ta ipatuvuna dasey murayu ta mamungada assey ustu ey timpuna ta awad ikataguyu ya siya vus sey nangatud assey allaylaydanyu.”
44014018	Kon urey nu imbagan da Paul jiyuy asda tagu, anna pey dallu ey ituruyda ey mandatun an jida.
44014019	Assey timpu saji, inggow da jummatong ey Jews ey narpu ad Anthiok ey sakup sey Pisidia ya da narpu ad Iconium. Sinugsuganda da tagu at vinikungda as Paul. Kananda pun nu natuy at vinutvutda ey nangiyyuy assey lasin sey ili.
44014020	Kon inalivungvungan pun da mamati as Paul, mag atgey summikad at nampuuli assey ili. Mavigat pun ummayow da Paul an Barnabas at ummuyda ad Derbe.
44014021	Jummatong pun da Paul ad Derbe, intudtujuda vus sey Ambaru ey Damag at adjuwan ey tagu sey inawisda ey nambalin as pasurut Jesus. Oni pun, nampuulida ad Lystra ya ad Iconium, asi at ad Anthiok ey sakup sey Pisidia.
44014022	At amin dasey vubruy ey ummayanda, impakasdorda sey somsomok da mamati ya tinugunda jida ta tornonda sey pammatida. Kananda, “Tornon taku ey mamati urey nu adjuwan ey tongtong-ag sey jumatong an jitaku tey masapur ey lak-amun taku dasey amud ey tongtong-ag asi taku at mijuga assey Turey Apudyus.”
44014023	Ya asda vubruy vus ey ummayanda, nanjutukda asda mangimpangat asda mamati. At nallanganda assey mangilluwaruwanda an jida ey kananda, “Italikni dakayu an Apu Jesus ey pinatiyu ta siya sey keygad ey amuut an dakayu.”
44014024	Nanguy da Paul an Barnabas assey ili ey Pisidia asida at jumatong ad Perga ey sakup sey Pamfilia. Iggowda pun as jiyuy, intudtujuda vus sey Gingan Apudyus asida at man-usug ey umuy ad Atalia.
44014026	Oni pun, nalluganda assey bapor ey ampuuli ad Anthiok, Syria ey narpuwanda. Tey dasey mamati ad Anthiok, jida sey nangimpalibbat, nangilluwaluwaru ya nangintalik an Apudyus anda Paul ta siya sey keygad ey mamuut ya manurung an jida assey siput saji ey kingwada.
44014027	Jummatongda pun ad Anthiok, jinagupda da amin ey mamati asida at ul-ullitun sey amin ey impakwan Apudyus ya sey nangokoona ey nanurung an jida ya kama vus assey kingwana ey nanurung asda Gentil ta mamatida.
44014028	At nabayagda ey nikig-ow asda mamati ad Anthiok.
44015001	Inggow da narpu ad Judea ey ummuy ad Anthiok ey nantudtuju asda mamati as jiyuy. Kananda, “Aji kayu pun misarakan nu aji kayu makugit tey siya sey tudtujun sey lintog Moses.”
44015002	Kon aji pun da Paul an Barnabas inavunan at siya sey lapun sey nan-iisikanda. At nantuturag da amin ey mamati ad Anthiok ta umuy da Paul, Barnabas ya da ujum ey vurunda ad Jerusalem ey mikabagbaga asda aposel ya da papangat miipanggop as jiyuy ey tudtuju.
44015003	Impalibbat pun dasey mamati jida, nanguyda assey vubruy ad Ponisya ya ad Samaria. At impaagammuda as dasey mamati as jiyuy nu ngan annun da Gentil ey namati vus an Apudyus. At amud sey layad dasey namati ey nangngor.
44015004	Jummatongda pun ad Jerusalem, allaylayad dasey naaamung ey mamati ya da aposel anda angkamarong-ag ey namadatong an jida. At impaagammun da Paul sey amin ey kingwan Apudyus ey nangusar an jida.
44015005	Kon inggow dasey vurunda ey mamati ey jugan dasey Farisis ey summikad at kananda, “Masapur ey makugitda ya mibaga an jida ta unujunda sey lintog Moses.”
44015006	At nadagup dasey aposel anda angkamarong-ag ey man-uugud miipanggop assey ajida pun angkikinnaawatan.
44015007	Panus pun sey nanjijiskasanda, summikad as Peter ey kanana, “Dakayu ey susunud, agammuyu mit ey assey kar-argow, sa'un sey pinilin Apudyus an jitaku ey umuy mangintudtuju assey Ambaru ey Damag as dasey Gentil ta dongronda ya mamatida an Jesus.
44015008	At as Apudyus ey nangigammu assey somsomok da tagu, impiilana ey nallaylayad siya as dasey Gentil assey namatiyanda tey innatjuna vus sey Ispirituna an jida ey kama vus assey nangatdana an jitaku.
44015009	Niippun nantoknana sey kingwan Apudyus an jida ya an jitaku tey jinarusana vus sey somsomokda gapu assey pammatida.
44015010	At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ngey payu padpadasun as Apudyus ta ipapilityu ey unujun dasey mamati sey gagangey ey intudtujun Moses? Tey urey dasey dakdakor taku ya urey vus jitaku at aji taku pun kaviilan ey unujun.
44015011	At ammaan taku somsomkon ey sey nisarakanan taku at gapu assey amud ey kinaambarun Apu Jesus ey kama vus an jida.” Siyana sey kanan Peter.
44015012	Naas pun Peter inugudji, gumminok dasey tagu ey naaamung assey jingngorda vus sey inul-ullit da Barnabas an Paul miipanggop asda kaskasdaow ey sinyar ya milagru ey kingwan Apudyus asda Gentil gapu assey nangusarana an jida.
44015013	Naas pun sey imbagada, gumminga as James ey kanana, “Dakayu ey susunud, dongronyu sey ibagak anna!
44015014	Ka'ibagan Simon Peter sey nanginsardan Apudyus ey nangimpiila assey daguna asda sey Gentil ta awad vus ayagana an jida as mantaguna.
44015015	At sey kingwan Apudyus sana, tumimpuyug nauy assey imbabaggan dasey profet. Tey kanan sey Gingan Apudyus,
44015016	‘Ampuuliyak assey daan ey ag-agow, kanan sey Apu, ta kasinku dagupun dakayu ey nasinasinak ey ginanakan Ari David ta ipuulik sey kinaarina.
44015017	At assey timpu saji, mansinagung da amin ey inayagak ey Gentil ta ivilangku jida as taguk.’
44015018	Siyana sey kanan sey Apu ey nangimpiila assey kar-argow assey sigud ey sisimmokna.”
44015019	Inturuy James ey kanana, “At assey kuwak ey goom, aji taku atyén tongtong-agun dasey Gentil ey mansinagung an Apudyus.
44015020	Ta siya anggey as koon taku, suratan taku jida ta ibaga taku ey ajida isida dasey nidatun assey ap-apudyus tey kaggissow an Apudyus. Ya ajida maggey dor-agun sey dakumpun as asawada. Ya ajida isida sey dara ya da naktor ey aji pun naigokan.
44015021	Tey agammun da amin ey Jews da nauy ey lintog Moses tey assey dandani gey inggana assey sana, Sinabaju ey apporow mibasabasa da nauy asda Sinagog assey amin ey kikkiili.”
44015022	At nan-aavunan dasey aposel, papangat ya da amin ey namati ey ampilida an jida ey vungguy nu ngan sey mivurun anda Paul an Barnabas ey mangiyyuy assey surat ad Anthiok. At pinilida da juwa ey mavivigvig ey laraki ey da Judas ey angngadan as Barsabbas ya asi at as Silas.
44015023	Annaya sey nikur-it assey surat ey impow-itda: “Dakani ey susunudyu ey aposel ya da angkamarong-ag ad Jerusalem anna, annaya sey suratni an dakayu ey Gentil ey ininggow ad Anthiok, Syria ya ad Cilicia.
44015024	Jingngorni ey inggow kanu dasey narpuʼd Jerusalem anna ey ummuy an dakayu nantudtuju assey sabali ey tudtuju ey siya sey nalivukan sey somsomokyu. Kon niippun pammaruvus as innatudni an jida ey umali as nait.
44015025	At siya sey nammimitin kani at simsimmokni ey ambaru nu ampuuli da Paul an Barnabas sinat. Jida sey napatig ey vurunni ey nangimposta assey viyagda ey manservi an Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu. Pinilini vus da Judas an Silas ey mivurun an jida ta jida sey mismu ey mangimpaagammu an dakayu assey isun vus pigey sey insuratni.
44015028	Sey piunni ey ibaga an dakayu at siya vus pigey sey piun sey Ispiritun Apudyus tey impaspasmokna an dakani ta ajini dakayu tongtong-agun ey mangunud assey ugalini ey Jews. At naya anggey sey kasapuran ey unujunyu.
44015029	‘Ajiyu isida dasey nidatun asda ap-apudyus ya aji kayu vus ansida as dara ya da naktor ey aji pun naigokan. Ajiyu dor-agun sey dakumpun as asawayu. At ambaru nu maanusanyu ey koon da nauy. Siyana anggey sey ibagani an dakayu.’”
44015030	Naas pun sey surat saji, impalibbatda dasey nibaar ey umuy ad Anthiok. Jummatongda pun, jinagupda da losan ey mamati as jiyuy asida at ipurad sey surat.
44015031	Vinasan pun da tagu sey surat, amud sey layadda gapu assey ambaru ey nitugun an jida.
44015032	Adjuwan vus sey imbagabagan da Judas an Silas ey manugun an jida ya mangimpakasdor assey pammatida tey inusar Apudyus jida ey nangingginga assey piuna.
44015033	Ummayow pun sey kam-ana ey ag-agow ey iniiggawanda as jiyuy, lummibbatda ey nampuuli ad Jerusalem. At ambaru sey kingwan dasey namati ad Anthiok ey nangimpalibbat an jida.
44015035	At inturturuy pey dallu da Paul an Barnabas ey ininggow ad Anthiok ey nivurun asda ujum ey namati ey nantudtuju miipanggop an Apu Jesus.
44015036	Ummayow pun sey kam-ana ey ag-agow, kanan Paul an Barnabas, “Inta uda ilan dasey susunud taku ey mamati as dasey kikkiili ey nantudtujuwanta miipanggop an Apu Jesus ta inta ilan nu ngan annunda pey.”
44015037	At inyavun Barnabas ey umuyda kon piuna itakin as John Mark.
44015038	Kon sumanga as Paul tey tineynan John Mark jida ad Pamfilia assey ab-avus sey ummayanda nantudtujuwan at ajina pun inturuy ey tummurung assey siputda
44015039	At gapu assey siyaji, nan-isikda ey juwa asida at mansiyan. At intakin Barnabas as Mark at nalluganda assey bapor ey ummuy ad Cyprus.
44015040	Kon as Paul, inayagana as Silas as amvurunna. At illuwaruwan dasey mamati jida asida at jida palibbatun ta keygad as Apudyus ey mangila ya manurung an jida assey amin ey ayanda.
44015041	At lummibbat da Paul ey ummuy assey kikkiili ad Syria ya ad Cilicia ey umuy nangimpakasdor assey somsomok dasey namati.
44016001	Jummatong pun da Paul ad Derbe ya ad Lystra, indasanda sey usa ey mamati an Jesus ey angngadan as Timothy. As inana at usa ey Jews ey namati an Jesus kon as amana, usa ey Gentil.
44016002	As Timothy at ambaru sey kaugudana asda amin ey mamati ad Lystra ya ad Iconium.
44016003	at piun Paul siya itakin. Kon gapu ta agammun da amin ey tagu as jiyuy ey Gentil as amana, impakugit Paul siya ta niippun makanan dasey Jews asda amin ey vubruy ey ayanda.
44016004	At ummuyda ginaggakey dasey kavubruvubruy siji ta umuyda ipaagammu asda Gentil sey nan-uugudan dasey aposel ya da angkamarong-ag ad Jerusalem ta siya sey unujunda.
44016005	At siya sey kummasdoran sey pammatin da tagu as jiyuy, at inag-agow ey umaju ey umaju dasey mamati.
44016006	Nanguy pun da Paul assey provinsiyan sey Asia, tinipod sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey mantudtujuwanda siji. At nangowkow-asda ey nanguy assey nambootan sey Frigia ya Galatia.
44016007	Jummatongda pun assey igid sey provinsiya ad Misia, kananda ey umuyda ad Bithynia kon aji pun sey Ispiritun Jesus pinaruvusan jida.
44016008	At nallausda anggey ad Misia at nangow-asda ey ummuy ad Troas.
44016009	Assey lavi saji, inggow sey impiilan Apudyus an Paul assey kama as in-inop. Innilana sey usa ey laraki ey iMacedonia ey sisikad ey ampangpangaasi an siya ey kanana, “Andormangka pit pey ta umalika ad Macedonia anna ta turungan dakani.”
44016010	At lummibbat kani ey dagus ey man-anap as allugananni ey andormang ad Macedonia tey siguraju kani ey as jiyuy sey piun Apudyus ey ayanni mantudtujuwan assey Ambaru ey Damag.
44016011	Lummibbat kani ad Troas ey nallugan assey bapor at nangow-as kani ad Samotracia. Mavigat pun jummatong kani ad Neapolis.
44016012	Jummissaag kani siji at nanaran kani ey ummuy ad Filipay ey kadakkoragan ey vubruy ad Macedonia. Sey kaajuwan ey ummili asji at dasey iRoman ya iRoman avus dasey tuturey. At ininggow kani siji assey kam-ana ey ag-agow.
44016013	Assey ag-agow ey iillongan dasey Jews, nallasin kani assey vubruy at ummuy kani assey igid sey dawwang assey lugar ey kananni pun nu siya sey alluwaruwan dasey Jews. Jummatong kani pun, anna tuttuwa dasey vubai ey naaamung at nikatukju kani ey nikabagbaga an jida.
44016014	Sey usa as dasey nandongor an dakani at as Lydia ey iTiatira ey antintinda asda angkangina ey sinnun ey addaraag. As Lydia at usa ey Gentil kon nijuga asda Jews ey mandaydayow an Apudyus. Tinurungan Apudyus sey somsomokna at pinatina sey intudtujun Paul.
44016015	Namati pun as Lydia, nampavunyag ya urey dasey kabvuruyna. Naas pun, inayagana dakani assey vuruyda ey kanana, “Nu ivilangak as usa ey tuttuwa ey mamati an Apu Jesus, intaku assey vuruyni ta as jiyuy sey iggawanyu.” Impapilitna at ummuy kani.
44016016	Usa pun ey ag-agow ey umuy kani anda Paul assey alluwaruwanni, inabot dakani assey usa ey babarasang ey alipan ey nilulun-ugan sey jimunyu. Inatdan sey jimunyu sey babarasang saji as pannakabalin ey mangimbaga assey makwa assey daan ey ag-agow. Gapu assey pannakabalinna, adjuwan sey pilak ey araaran sey sin-alipan an siya.
44016017	Kingwana pun, maggey ummunud an dakani ey kanana ey nangimvugga, “Da nauy ey tagu at anserservida an kangatuwan ey Apudyus. Iwarawarawagda nu ngan annun Apudyus ey manginsarakan an dakayu!”
44016018	Kam-ana ey ag-agow ey siya sey kookoona inggana as nappug as Paul at nambaliwit ey kanana assey jimunyu ey nilun-ug assey babarasang, “Gapu assey ngadan Jesu Cristu, mandarak sika ta teynam sey babarasang sanat.” At ummayow ey dagus sey jimunyu saji.
44016019	Innilan pun dasey sin-alipan assey babarasang ey niippun ogon angar-anda as pilak, jinokmaanda da Paul an Silas at ginuyudda jida ey nangiyyuy assey iggawan dasey tuturey assey vubruy saji.
44016020	Asida at jida idarum ey kananda, “Jews da nauy ey apporow mangimpangat assey guru assey vubruy taku anna
44016021	tey sey apporoda itudtuju at sey nakopyaanda ey Jews ey kumuntra assey lintog taku ey iRoman at aji pun mabalin ey unujun taku sey ugalida.”
44016022	At nakarakag dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey vumusur an jida at insaradda ey mamuksing anda Paul an Silas. Asin at da uwis imandar ey maponasanda ta malapsitanda.
44016023	Naasda pun jida tinongtong-ag, impisukda jida assey baballudan asida at ivilin as dasey guwarda ta bantayanda ey ustu.
44016024	At kingwan pun sey guwarda, iniyuyna jida assey ikow nangigid ey kuwartu asina at ipitun sey sikida assey nambobbootan sey juwa ey tabra.
44016025	Gawan pun sey lavi, alluwaluwaru ya angkankanta da Paul an Silas ey mandayow an Apudyus at dodongron dasey ujum ey barud jida.
44016026	Oni pun, maggey nallunig as andangsor at nayyugayug sey baballudan saji at nabkatan ey dagus dasey sawang ya nakaan amin ey posas dasey barud.
44016027	Vummangun pun sey guwarda, innilana ey nabkatan amin dasey sawang sey baballudan. At inukputna sey bangidna ta gongatuna atyén sey long-agna tey kanana pun nu namin ummawid dasey barud.
44016028	Innilan pun Paul sey panggopna, namvugga ey kanana, “Ajim gongatun sey long-agnu, anna kani amin as sanna!”
44016029	Nampaara sey guwarda saji as silow at summakey ey dagus assey iggawan da Paul an Silas ey amilpipilpil assey ugyatna asi at mallukvub assey sinagungda.
44016030	Oni pun, illawana jida asina at kanan, “Apu, ngan sey masapur ey kook ta misarakanak?”
44016031	At kanan da Paul ey summongbat, “Mamatika an Apu Jesus at misarakanka ya da amin ey kabvuruynu.”
44016032	At inturuy da Paul ey manudtuju an siya ya dasey amin ey kabvuruyna assey miipanggop an Apu Jesus.
44016033	At assey siyaji vus pigey ey gawan sey lavi, innaran sey guwarda jida at inurasana dasey vigadda. Asida at losan mampavunyag ey simbaryan.
44016034	Naas pun, pinasakeyna da Paul an Silas assey vuruyda at pingkanana jida. At amud sey layadda ey simbaryan gapu assey namatiyanda an Apudyus.
44016035	Mavigat pun, imvilin da uwis asda pulis ey kananda, “Palogsajunyu da tagu anna ta umayowda.”
44016036	At kanan sey guwarda anda Paul, “Imvilin dasey uwis dakayu Paul an Silas ey mabalin ampagginnok kayu ey umayow.”
44016037	Kon kanan Paul asda pulis ey nibaar, “Urey nu niippun indasanda as basurni, impabokbok dakani assey sinagung dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey ajida pun yén dakani vinastigar ya impabarud vus dakani. iRoman kani mit at ey sana, piun dakani paryawun ey niippun angagammu? Aji pun mabalin nait. Jida ey ukum ey iRoman sey umali ey angimvukkey an dakani.”
44016038	Impadamag pun da pulis nauy, ummugyat dasey tuturey assey naagammuwanda ey iRoman atpey da Paul an Silas.
44016039	At siya sey ummuyda nangkudow as dispensar anda Paul an Silas asida at jida kuyugun ey mangillawa. At imbagada an jida ta umayowda assey vubruy saji.
44016040	Ummayow pun da Paul an Silas assey baballudan, ummuyda assey vuruy da Lydia. At indasanda asji dasey vurunda ey mamati. Kinabagbagada jida ey mangimpakasdor assey pammatida asida at umayow.
44017001	Ummayow pun da Paul ad Filipay, nanguyda ad Amfipolis ya ad Apolonia at jumatongda ad Tesalonica ey iggawan sey usa ey sinagog da Jews.
44017002	At ummuy as Paul assey Sinagog tey siya sey apporona kookoon. Turu ey nan-uunud ey Sabaju sey apporon Paul nikajisjiskasan asda tagu ey mangimbasar assey Gingan Apudyus.
44017003	Impakaawatna dasey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ya illawlawagna vus ey sey Cristu at masapur matongtong-ag asi at matuy kon matagu vus kasin. Kanana “As Jesus ey ibagabagak an dakayu at siya sey Cristu ey mangisarakan.”
44017004	At inggow da ujum an jida ey namati assey nitudtuju at nivurunda anda Paul an Silas. Adjuwan vus sey namati as dasey Gentil ey nijuga asda Jews ey mandaydayow an Apudyus. Ya inggow vus dasey babaknang ey vubai ey namati.
44017005	Kon inggow dasey ujum ey Jews ey maapos at jinagupda dasey vurakvur ey sivuvugga inggana as naguru da amin ey umili. At kingwan pun da Jews ya da nadagup ey vurakvur, sinakeyda sey vuruy da Jason ey iggawan da Paul ta palogsajunda atyén jida ta mipasanguda asda tagu.
44017006	Kon anna pun ey niippun indasanda anda Paul, as Jason sey ginuyudda ya da ujum ey mamati at inniyuyda jida assey sinagung dasey turey assey ili saji. At kananda ey angimvugga, “Dasey tagu ey anguruguru asda amin ey kikkiili, anna ey inumdasda assey vubruy taku anna
44017007	at minangilin Jason jida. At losan da ummunud an jida, nilabsingda sey lintog sey Emperor ad Italy tey apporoda ibaga ey awad kanu sey sabali ey ari ey angngadan as Jesus.”
44017008	Jingngor pun dasey turey ya da tagu sey ipabasurda anda Paul an Silas, amud sey danagda.
44017009	At imbagan dasey turey ta ampinsa da Jason ya da ujum ey mamati asida at mivukkey.
44017010	Anna pun ey lummavi, impalibbat dasey mamati da Paul an Silas ey umuy ad Berea. Jummatongda pun as jiyuy, ummuyda ey dagus assey Sinagog dasey Jews.
44017011	Mannakaawat dasey Jews ad Berea ey ajida pun anung dasey iTesalonica tey mamaryadda ey mamangngor assey Gingan Apudyus. Ya inag-agow ey basabasaunda sey Gingan Apudyus ta ilanda nu tuttuwa vus pigey sey itudtutudtujun da Paul.
44017012	At gapu assey kanaʼs jiyuy ey kookoonda, adjuwan sey namati an jida urey dasey adjuwan ey Gentil ey laraki ya dasey adjuwan ey babaknang ey vubai.
44017013	Kon jinamag pun da Jews ad Tesalonica ey awad da Paul ad Berea ey mantudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus, inunudda jida asida at insarad ey manugsug asda tagu ey mangwa as guru.
44017014	At gapu assey nakwa saji, dagus ey impalibbat dasey namati as Paul ey umuy assey igid sey beybey kon nateynan da Silas an Timothy ad Berea.
44017015	Inggow dasey ummuy ey nanginturud an Paul inggana ad Athens asida at ampuuli ad Berea. Kon imvilin Paul an jida ey masapur umunuda ey dagus da Silas an Timothy.
44017016	Assey anguullayan Paul anda Silas an Timothy ad Athens, amud sey lummawingan sey somsomokna gapu as dasey adjuwan ey ap-apudyus ey innilana assey vubruy saji.
44017017	At ummuy assey Sinagog ey nikajiskas asda Jews anda Gentil ey nijuga asda Jews ey mandayow an Apudyus. Inag-agow avus ey da umuy as dasey madadaggupan da tagu ey mikabagbaga asda tagu ey nan-as-aspur ey awad as jiyuy.
44017018	Inggow vus as jiyuy dasey kananda ey mimisturun sey Epicuryan ya Stoic ey mikajisjiskas an Paul. At kanan dasey ujum an jida, “Ngan sey uguugujun tagu anna ey niippun mit pey lawa vugas sey ibagabagana?” Gumminga vus da ujum ey kananda, “Kama as awad sey natnatkon ey apudyus ey ibagabagana.” Kanaʼsji sey kananda tey apporon Paul itudtuju sey miipanggop an Jesus ya sey mataguwan da natuy.
44017019	Kingwada pun, iniyuyda as Paul assey dadaggupan da angkamarong-ag ya da papangat assey ili saji ey kananda ey Areopagus. At kananda an siya, “Piunni agammuwun sey miipanggop assey barbaru ey tudtujum
44017020	tey awad da ujum ey imbagabagam ey niippun jingjingngorni at piunni maawatan sey piuna ugujun.”
44017021	Siyaji sey kananda tey da amin ey ummili ad Athens, urey dasey narpu assey ujum ey ili ey vummubruy siji, mamaryadda ey andodongngor ya anguguugud as dasey barbaru ey muug-uggud.
44017022	Summikad as Paul assey sinagungda at kanana, “Agammuk ey dakayu ey iyAthens at ipapatiyu vus ey mandayow as dasey ap-apudyusyu
44017023	tey assey gumakagakayak assey vubruyyu anna, innilak dasey dayadayawunyu at inggow sey innilak ey nikur-it assey usa ey altar ey kanana, ‘Sey altar anna at para assey apudyus ey niippun agammuni.’ At sey Apudyus ey daydayawanyu ey urey nu niippun agammuyu, siya sey ipaagammuk an dakayu assey sana.
44017024	Siya sey Apudyus ey nangwa assey luta ya da amin ey ininggow. Siya sey Apun sey amin ey awad assey luta ya ad langit. At aji pun mabalin ey inggow siya assey kingwan da tagu.
44017025	Ya usa pey, niippun vus masapurna as mabalin ey atjun sey tagu an siya tey siya mit sey nangatud assey angus, viyag ya sey amin ey kasapuran da tagu.
44017026	Kingwan pun Apudyus, kingwana sey sa'an ey tagu as marpuwan dasey nantokotokon ey tagu assey usun sey luta. Ya ginoddongana vus sey timpu ey manturayan sey usa ya usa ya kinaikaisna sey inggawanda.
44017027	Kanaʼs ji sey kingwan Apudyus ta awad manmanmokan da tagu ya manginapanda an siya, mag at ta udasanda siya. Kon assey katuttuwaan, aji pun niyadayu as Apudyus an jitaku.
44017028	Inggow sey imbagan sey usa an dakayu assey kar-argow ey kanana, ‘As Apudyus sey lapuna nu pa taku lawa awad ya urey sey anggijuwan ya sey kataguwan taku.’ Awad avus da ujum an dakayu ey naadar ey kananda, ‘Kingwan Apudyus jitaku as man-anakna.’
44017029	At nu tuttuwa ey anak jitaku an Apudyus, yangey mabalin ey kanan taku ey as Apudyus at kama asda tinaggutaggu ey balituk, bakrow unnu batu ey kingwan da tagu gapu assey kinariingda ey an-anmok assey koonda?
44017030	Assey kar-argow, inan-anusan Apudyus dasey dakumpun ey kingwan da tagu tey daanda pun siya agammuwun. Kon assey sana, imvilinna ey masapur man-awidan da tagu dasey lawingan ey kookoonda.
44017031	Tey awad sey inggoddong Apudyus ey ag-agow ey manguwisana asda amin ey tagu assey luta. Awad sey pinilina ey nalintog ey manguwis asda tagu. At sey nangimpiil-ana asda tagu ey siya sey ustu ey pinilina tey natuy pun, tinaguna kasin!”
44017032	Jingngorda pun sey imbagan Paul ey awad sey natuy ey kasin natagu, inam-amang da ujum siya. Kon da ujum, kananda, “Piunni ey kasin dongron sey tudtujum sanat.”
44017033	Naas pun ji, ummayow as Paul.
44017034	Kon inggow dasey ummunud an siya ey namati assey tudtujuna. Jida da Dionisius ey usa ey apun sey Areopagus ya inggow vus sey usa ey vubai ey angngadan as Damaris ya inggow pey da ujum ey tagu ey ummunud an siya.
44018001	Assey ummayawan Paul ad Athens, ummuy ad Corinth.
44018002	Jummatong pun, nandatngana as jiyuy sey usa ey Jews ey angngadan as Aquila ey niyanak ad Pontus. Kallapu da Aquila an asawana ey Priscilla ad Italy tey imvilin Emperor Claudius ey da amin ey Jews ad Rome ey kapital sey Italy at umayowda. Ummuy pun Paul jida innila,
44018003	naagammuwana ey an-isu sey siputda ey apporow angwa as torda at nikig-ow an jida ey mikasiput.
44018004	Sinabaju ey umuumuy assey sinagog da Jews ey angimpapati ey mantudtuju asda Jews ya da Gentil ta mamatida an Jesus.
44018005	Jummatong pun da Silas an Timothy ey narpu ad Macedonia, pinaanggeyn Paul sey siputna ey mantudtuju assey inag-agow. Impakaawatna as dasey Jews ey as Jesus sey Cristu ey imbaar Apudyus.
44018006	Kon kinuntran pun dasey Jews ya pinadngoranda siya as lawingan, iwwagwagna sey lumvunna ta awad angagammuwanda ey keygadda nu majusada. Kanana, “Nu jusaun Apudyus dakayu, dakayu sey simbasur, dakumpun an sa'un. At misarad assey sana, inyak asda Gentil mantudtuju.”
44018007	Tineynan Paul jida at ummuy nikabvuruy assey usa ey Gentil ey angngadan as Titius Justus ey usa ey andaydayow an Apudyus ey sey vuruyna, adani assey Sinagog.
44018008	Inggow vus as jiyuy sey usa ey ap-apun sey Sinagog ey angngadan as Crispus ey mamati ya urey vus dasey kabvuruyna ya da ujum ey adjuwan ey tagu ad Corinth. Jingngorda pun sey intudtujun Paul, namatida asida at ampavunyag.
44018009	Usa pun ey lavi, inggow sey impiilan Apu taku ey Jesus an siya assey in-inopna ey kanana, “Iturturuynu at ey mantudtuju ya ajim maggey iginok tey aawwadak an sika ya adjuwan dallu da tagu assey vubruy anna ey ambalin as taguk. Ajika umugyat tey niippun mangan-anu an sika.”
44018011	At ininggow as Paul as jiyuy as sintawun ya kagugwa ey apporow mantudtuju asda tagu miipanggop assey Gingan Apudyus.
44018012	Naorsan pun sey gubernador ad Acaia, nibanus as Gallio. Assey timpu saji, nantuturag dasey aji pun mamati ey Jews at jinokmaanda as Paul asida at iyuy assey korti ey mangindarum an gubernador.
44018013	Kananda, “Sey tagu anna at apporona itudtuju sey sabali ey tudtuju asda tagu sey koonda ey mandayow an Apudyus ey vumusur assey lintog.”
44018014	Guminga atyén as Paul, kon kanan Gallio asda Jews, “Nu awad atyén basur tagu anna, unnu dakumpun as kingwana, mabalin ey anusak ey mandongor an dakayu.
44018015	Kon gapu ta sey an-iisikanyu anna at miipanggop assey kuwayu ey ginga ya nu ngan sey piuna ugujun ya miipanggop asda ngadan da tagu ya asda lintogyu, keygad kayu ya imbanagyu tey ngan gey la nait as ibanag?”
44018016	Siyaji sey imbagan gubernador Gallio asina at jida paryawun assey korti.
44018017	At kingwan pun da tagu ey amvuyvuya, jinokmaanda as Sostenes ey ap-apun sey Sinagog gapu assey putukda asida at siya lapsitan assey sangun sey korti. Kon aji pun Gallio viniviyangan jida.
44018018	Naas pun ji, nabayag pey dallu sey iniggawan Paul ad Corinth, asina at teynan dasey vurunna ey mamati at ummuy ad Syncrea ey vinurnan da Aquila an Priscilla ey an-asawa. Jummatongda pun as jiyuy, nampapungnguk as Paul ta ipiilana ey awad sey impostana an Apudyus ey tinongparna. Asida at mallugan assey bapor ey umuy ad Syria.
44018019	Nibatugda pun ad Efesus, ummuy as Paul nikajiskas asda Jews assey Sinagog. Piun atyén da tagu ey inggow as Paul an jida kon ajina pun iyyavun. Sey imbagana anggey an jida, kanana “Nu iparuvus Apudyus, ampuuliyak vus pigey an dakayu.” Tineynana da Aquila an Priscilla siji at nallugan assey bapor ey manginturuy assey ayana.
44018022	Jummatong pun ad Caesarea, nanagada ey ummuy ad Jerusalem. Ummuyna yén innila dasey mamati as jiyuy, asina at idakpus ad Anthiok ey sakup sey Syria.
44018023	Ininggow pun as jiyuy assey kam-ana ey ag-agow, ummuyna vus ginaggakey dasey kikkiili ey sakup sey Galatia ya Prigia ta pakasdorona dasey mamati.
44018024	Assey timpu saji, inggow sey usa ey Jews ey iyAlexandria ey angngadan as Apollos ey ummuy ad Efesus. Nariing siya ey mantudtuju ya panus vus sey agammuna miipanggop assey impakur-it Apudyus.
44018025	Mas-umta assey angokoona ey mantudtuju ya niippun kumbot as ibagana miipanggop an Apu Jesus tey inggow sey nanudtuju an siya assey kar-argow. Kon sey agammuna anggey at sey intudtujun John assey namvunvunyagana.
44018026	Niippun ugyatna ey mantudtuju assey Sinagog ad Efesus. Jingngor pun da Priscilla an Aguilla, inayaganda siya assey vuruyda asida at ambaruwun ey mangimpakaawat assey miipanggop an Jesus ya sey piun Apudyus ey koon da tagu ey matagu.
44018027	Panpannusan pun, simsimmok Apollos ey umuy ad Acaia. At tinurungan dasey namati ad Efesus siya at nangwada as surat as dasey mamati ad Acaia ta ambaruwunda mangiliyun siya. Jummatong pun as jiyuy, dokor sey turungna an jida ey namati an Jesus gapu assey kinaambarun Apudyus
44018028	tey inabakna dasey Jews assey nanjijiskasanda miipanggop an Jesus. Impatuttuwana an jida sey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey sey Cristu ey imbaar Apudyus ey manginsarakan asda tagu at as Jesus.
44019001	Assey iniggawan Apollos ad Corinth, siyaji vus sey nanagtagudtudan Paul ey ummuy ad Efesus. Jummatong pun as jiyuy, inggow dasey mamati siji ey indasana.
44019002	At inimusna an jida ey kanana, “Ey inawatyu sey Ispiritun Apudyus assey namatiyanyu?” At kananda, “Toan, tey niippun jingjingngorni assey kanam sanat ey Ispiritun Apudyus.”
44019003	At kanan vus Paul, “At ngan sey piuna ugujun sey navunyaganyu nu'?” At kananda, “Sey navunyaganni at isuna sey intudtujun John.”
44019004	At kanan Paul an jida, “Sey intudtujun John, at masapur ey man-awidan dasey basur asita at mavunyagan ya imbagana vus ey mamati taku assey mipasani an siya ey as Jesus.”
44019005	Jingngor da pun nauy, nampavunyagda kasin ey angimpiila ey as Jesus sey umapuwanda.
44019006	Oni pun impateyʼn Paul sey imana an jida at nilong-ag sey Ispiritun Apudyus at insaradda ey guminga assey sabali ey ginga ey mangimpaagammu assey tudtuju ey narpu an Apudyus.
44019007	Nasawaran as juwa sey vilang dasey namati siji.
44019008	Ummuy as turu ey vuran sey ayaayan Paul assey Sinagog siji ey mikajisjiskas asda tagu ya niippun ugyatna ey mantudtuju miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus ta maawisda atyén ey mamati.
44019009	Kon inggow da ujum ey ingngosdorda sey somsomokda at sumangada ey mamati at inamsiwda at avus sey pammatin dasey umunud an Apu Jesus assey sinagung dasey nadagup ey tagu. At ummayow as Paul assey Sinagog saji at ingkuyugna da mamati at ummuyda assey uswilaan Tiranus ey siya sey apporoda madagupan assey inag-agow.
44019010	At as jiyuy sey nantudtujuwan Paul as juwa ey tawun. At da amin ey ummili assey provinsiyan sey Asia, Jews unnu Gentil at jingngorda sey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop an Jesus.
44019011	Innatud Apudyus sey kaviilan Paul ey mangwa asda ikow nakaskasdaow ey milagru.
44019012	Tey urey da panyuna unnu gamit ey usarna, nu iyuyda as dasey masakit, makaan sey sakitda. Ya nu iyuyda avus asda nalun-ugan as jimunyu, maggey da umayow dasey nilun-ug ey jimunyu.
44019013	Assey timpu saji, inggow da ujum ey Jews ey gumakeygakey asda vubvubruy ey umuy mangimparyow asda jimunyu ey nilun-ug asda tagu. Pinadasda ey nangusar assey ngadan Apu Jesus ey kananda, “Sika ey jimunyu, gapu assey pannakabalin sey ngadan Jesus ey itudtujun Paul, umayowka.”
44019014	Dasey nangwa sina, jida dasey pitu ey laraki ey anak Sceba ey ap-apun dasey papajin da Jews.
44019015	Kon kanan sey jimunyu ey parparyuwunda, “Agammuk as Jesus ya agammuk vus as Paul, kon dakayu, ngey ngadanyu gey?”
44019016	At kingwan pun sey tagu saji ey nalun-ugan, nanukrus at inayémna jida at naabakda at ummawidda ey napoponnasan ya pasigda vigad ey lummawa assey vuruy saji.
44019017	Jingngor pun da amin ey ummili ad Efesus ey Jews anda Gentil sey nakwa saji, nikuugyatda at vinigvigda sey ngadan Apu Jesus ey siya sey madayow.
44019018	At gapu assey nakwa saji, adjuwan dasey mamati an Jesus ey ummuy nangimpudnu assey sinagung da vurunda as dasey lawingan ey kingwada.
44019019	At inggow dasey apporow mangwa as majik ey inugpunda dasey libnuda asida at sikuran ey vuyvuyaun da adjuwan ey tagu. Vinilangda pun sey gatad sey singkuranda saji, ummuy as limampuru ey livu ey drachma.
44019020	At gapu assey amin ey nakwa saji, nanjinamag sey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop an Apu Jesus at siya sey ummaju dasey mamati an siya.
44019021	Oni pun, simsimmok Paul ey umuy ad Jerusalem ey manguy assey provinsiyan sey Macedonia ya ad Acaia. At kanana asda vurunna, “Nu maasak umuy ad Jerusalem, masapur vus ey inyak anggaggakey ad Rome.”
44019022	At namangpanguwuna da Timothy an Erastus ey apporow tumurung an siya ey umuy ad Macedonia kon nateynan siya assey provinsiyan sey Asia.
44019023	Assey timpu saji, lummuswa sey amud ey guru ad Efesus gapu assey namatiyan da tagu an Apu Jesus.
44019024	Tey inggow sey usa ey laraki ey angngadan as Demetrius ey nariing ey amvusar as anungna vurawan ey koona as vub-ulluy sey apudyusda ey angngadan as Artemis. Panus ey pilak sey inugpun Demetrius ya dasey ansisipputuna gapu assey siputda saji.
44019025	At kingwan pun Demetrius, jinagupna dasey ansisipputuna ya dasey ujum ey mangwamangwa as juganji. At kanana an jida, “Dakayu ey susunud, agammuyu mit ey sey vummaknangan taku at gapu assey siput taku anna.
44019026	At sey gagara taku ey nadagup assey sana tey innila taku ya jingngor taku sey kookoon sey usa ey tagu ey angngadan as Paul. Sey apporona itudtuju asda amin ey tagu at dakumpun as tuttuwa ey apudyus sey kingwan da tagu. At adjuwan da tagu ad Efesus anna ey namati ya urey as dasey amin ey ummili ad Asia.
44019027	At nu siyana, siguraju ey miviviin sey siput taku. At nu umuumuy, niippun maryad ey ngumina asda koon taku anna. Usa pey, siguraju ey niippun servin sey tempél Artemis ey nangatu ey apudyus taku. Ya urey vus as Artemis ey daydayawun da tagu assey amin ey kikkiili ad Asia anna ya assey intiru ey luvung at makaan ogon sey kinaapudyusna.”
44019028	Jingngor pun da tagu sey imbagan Demetrius saji, amud sey putukda at sivuvuggada ey kananda, “Kangatuwan dallu as Artemis ey apudyus ad Efesus.”
44019029	At nagabvurow da tagu ad Efesus. At jinokmaanda da juwa ey iMacedonia ey da Gaius an Aristarcus ey vurun Paul, asida at jida guyuguyujun ey mangiyyuy assey plasa ey madadaggupan da tagu.
44019030	Piun atyén Paul ey umuy mikabagbaga asda amud ey tagu kon tinuknaan dasey vurunna ey mamati.
44019031	Ya inggow vus dasey ujum ey turey assey provinsiya saji ey vub-urun Paul ey nangimbaar as tagu ey ummuy manukna an siya ey kananda, “Pangngaasim Paul ta ajika ampiila assey plasa.”
44019032	At dasey tagu ey nadagup, amud sey ngarowngowda ey nantokotokon sey ivuggavuggada ey aji pun an-uunud tey kaajuwan an jida sey an amuwwong nu pada lawa madagup as jiyuy.
44019033	At kingwan pun da ujum ey Jews, intukyudda sey usa ey tagu ey angngadan as Alexander ta umuy assey sangu, asida at ibaga an siya sey piunda ey ibagana asda tagu. At tinupapan Alexander dasey tagu ta guminokda ta ipakaawatna sey makwamakwa.
44019034	Kon immatunan pun da tagu ey Jews as Alexander, insaradda at avus ey vumuggavugga as juwa ey uras. Kananda, “Madayow as Artemis ey kangatuwan ey apudyus taku ad Efesus.”
44019035	Inggow sey usa ey ap-apu ad Efesus ey nikaam-ammung. Summikad at kanana, “Dakayu ey susunud ad Efesus, agammun da amin ey tagu ey jitaku sey amupuut assey tempel Artemis ey kangatuwan ey apudyus taku ya sey tinaggutaggu ey batu ey kavusvusarna ey naotdag ey narpu ad langit.
44019036	Niippun mit angimbaga ey dakumpun as tuttuwa nait at siya sey guminok taku ya aji taku amabarang.
44019037	Tey dasey tagu anna ey inyaliyu as nauy at niippun mit inakowda assey tempel taku ya niippun vus imbagbagada as kumuntra assey apudyus taku sana.
44019038	Nu awad ipabasur da Demetrius ya dasey vurunna as barangna ey tagu, awad mit da uwis ya da turey assey opisinada. As jiyuy atyén sey umuyda andad-aruman.
44019039	Kon nu awad pey ujum as piunyu ibaga, oni atyén ta asi taku man-uugudan assey ustu ey timpuna.
44019040	Tey mabalin mit ey idarum jitaku as dasey turey ad Rome miipanggop assey nakwa sana ey nagabvurawan da tagu. At niippun mit miisongbat taku tey niippun ustu as lapuna.”
44019041	Imbagana pun nauy, pinaryowna da tagu.
44020001	Jummalipapa pun da tagu, jinagup Paul dasey mamati at tinugunna jida asi at umayow ey umuy ad Macedonia.
44020002	Jummatong pun as jiyuy, ginaggakeyna vus dasey vubvubruy ey iggawan dasey mamati at pinakasdorna sey somsomokda asi at angow-as ey umuy assey provinsiyan sey Acaia.
44020003	At ininggow as jiyuy assey turu ey vuran. Oni pun, simsimmokna ey umuy ad Syria. Anna pun atyén ey lumibbat, naagammuwana sey planun dasey Jews ey umuy mamangabang an siya. At nan-onat ey nampuuli ey manguy ad Macedonia.
44020004	Jummatongda pun ad Filipay ey sakup sey Macedonia, impangpangun dasey vurunni at inuulleyn dakani ad Troas. At inggow da Sopater ey anak Pirrus ey iBerea, da Aristarcus an Segundus ey iTesalonica, as Gaius ey iDerbe, as Timothy, ya da Tikicus an Trofimus ey narpu assey provinsiyan sey Asia.
44020006	Naas pun sey Vista ey mangananda assey tinapey ey aji pun vinumtar, nambapor kani ey ummunud an jida. Lima ey ag-agowni ey nallulugan assey bapor asini at udasan dasey vurunni ad Troas. At nakajuminggu kani as jiyuy.
44020007	Assey masjum sey Sabaju, nadagup kani ey mamati ey mangan assey tinapey ey manomsomkan assey natuyan Jesus. Oni pun, insarad Paul ey mantudtuju inggana assey gawan sey lavi tey nu mavigat, umayow siya.
44020008	At adjuwan sey silow ey niiintug assey kuwartu ad ngatu ey nadagupanni.
44020009	Inggow avus as jiyuy sey usa ey babaru ey angngadan as Euticus ey tutukju assey windu. Napanus pun sey gumingagingaan Paul, anna as Euticus ey anjukjukmag ey masuyaman. Oni pun, nar-ot sey suyupna at naotdag ey narpu assey mikatlu ey garajun sey vuruy ey iniiggawanni. Vinuswatda pun, nanattuy.
44020010	Kon lummogsad as Paul at vinakwarna siya, asina at kanan, “Aji kayu madanagan tey sissiya ey natattagu.”
44020011	Summakey kasin as Paul at nangan kani. Naas kani pun nangan, inturuyna avus ey mantudtuju inggana as pumawey asi at umayow ey namangpangu nu dakani.
44020012	Kon sey babaru saji, intalleyda assey vuruyda ey amud sey layadda tey ummuli.
44020013	Piun Paul ey manaran siya inggana ad Assos. Kon an dakani, nallugan kani assey bapor at namangu kani ey inumdas ad Assos ey siya sey imbagan Paul ey angullayanni an siya ta asi at mikalugan nu an-aabot kani siji.
44020014	Jummatong pun siya ad Assos, nikalugan an dakani ey umuy ad Mitilene.
44020015	Nibatug kani pun ad Mitilene, nangowkoas kani. Anna pun ey mavigat, nibatug kani assey jumangna ad Kios ey nanggagawa assey danum. Inturuyni inggana as jummatong kani ad Samos assey mikagwa ey ag-agow. Mavigat pun assey mikatlu ey ag-agowni, inumdas kani ad Miletus.
44020016	Imbagan Paul ey aji kani manguy ad Efesus tey oni ey mataktak kani siji assey provinsiyan sey Asia tey ayuwan Paul sey jumatngana ad Jerusalem ta kamakamuna sey Vista ey kananda ey Pentecos.
44020017	Assey iggawanni ad Miletus, impaayag Paul dasey papangat dasey mamati ad Efesus.
44020018	Jummatong da pun, kanana an jida, “Dakayu ey susunud, mansarad assey ummaliyak assey provinsiyan sey Asia, innilayu nu ngan annuk ey nivuruvurun an dakayu.
44020019	Assey nangintudtujuwak miipanggop an Apu Jesus, kingwak da jiyuy ey dakumpun as madayawak. Malluruwaak assey sigab sey somsomokku gapu assey nanongtong-agan dasey vuvurunku ey Jews an sa'un ey piunda sa'un gongatun.
44020020	Innilayu mit vus sey kingwak ey nantudtuju an dakayu assey sinagung dasey adjuwan ey tagu ya urey as dasey vuvuruyyu at niippun iyyaposku as ngadannaʼs nait ey makaturung an dakayu tey imbagak an dakayu losan.
44020021	Tinugutugunku dasey vuvurunku ey Jews ya dasey Gentil ey masapur man-awidanda dasey basurda ta sagungunda as Apudyus ya mamatida an Apu taku ey Jesus.
44020022	“At ey sana, gapu assey piun sey Ispiritun Apudyus, inyak ad Jerusalem ey urey nu ajik pun agammu sey makwa an sa'un as jiyuy.
44020023	Sey agammuk anggey at sey mabarudak ya sey matongtong-agak as jiyuy tey siya sey impapaddaan sey Ispiritun Apudyus an sa'un assey amin ey ili ey nanggaggakayak.
44020024	Kon urey nu matuyak, tey sey nabalor an sa'un at dakumpun assey viyagku tey sey angimpadakpusak ey mangwa assey amin ey ipakwan Apu Jesus an sa'un ey mangimpaagammu assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop assey kinaambarun Apudyus.”
44020025	Inturuy Paul ey kanana, “Dakayu ey susunud ey nivuruvurunak assey nantudtujuwak assey Turey Apudyus, agammuk ey niippun intaku kasin man-asiil-an.
44020026	At siya sey ipapatik ey mangimbaga an dakayu assey sana, ta nu awad misina an dakayu an Apudyus, niippun basurku
44020027	tey intudtujuk an dakayu sey amin ey piun Apudyus at niippun iyyaposku.
44020028	“At ammaanyu annadan sey angokoonyu assey viyagyu ya dasey tagu ey impiyar sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey puutunyu. Dakayu losan sey amuut asda mamati an Apudyus tey jitaku sey nambalinuna as taguna gapu assey daran Jesus ey anakna.
44020029	Tey agammuk ey nu umayawak, awad dasey umali ey mantudtuju an dakayu assey dakumpun ey tudtuju ey kamada asda kagguugyat ey wolves ey umuy mangngat as dasey naamu tey allilawunda sey pammatin dasey puupuutunyu.
44020030	Urey dakayu ey madagudagup sina at awadji lumuswa ey mantudtuju assey us-ussat ta awisuna dasey mamati ta siya sey umunudanda.
44020031	At siya sey masapur man-annad kayu ta aji kayu maallilow. Sosomkonyu sey impapaddaanku imbaga assey iniiggawak an dakayu assey turu ey tawun. Ag-agow ya lavi ey tinudtujuwak dakayu ya sin-uujum ey daak ambaksar gapu assey layadku ya daguk an dakayu.
44020032	“At assey sana, dawatuk an Apudyus ta siya sey keygad ey manurung an dakayu ya sey nitudtuju ey gingana sey makaturung an dakayu. Siya sey mannakabalin ey mangimpakasdor assey pammatiyu ya mangatud an dakayu as dasey impostana ey atjuna as dasey amin ey nambalinuna as taguna.
44020033	Ya sey amin ey iniiggawak an dakayu, niippun ginamgamak as pilakyu, balituk, sinnun unnu barangnaʼsnaʼt ey laksun.
44020034	Agammuyu mit ey amin ey kasapurak ya dasey kasapuran da vurunku at mismu ey nallingotak.
44020035	At assey amin ey kingwak, impiilak an dakayu ey masapur mampawot taku ey mansiput ta awad mangar-an taku as iturung taku asda angkasapuran as turung. Aji taku maliwatan sey imbagan Apu taku ey Jesus ey kanana, ‘Nagasgasat ikow sey tagu ey angatud nu sey maatdan.’”
44020036	Naas pun Paul imbaga da nauy, losanda nallikkadang ey malluwaru.
44020037	At nasursurjung da papangat ey narpu ad Efesus, at awad ey usa an jida, nalluruwa ey mikawor ey mangimpalibbat an Paul.
44020038	Ummam-amudda nasursurjung assey imbagana ey niippun ogon angil-anda an siya. At vinurnanda dakani ey ummuy assey bapor ey mallugananni.
44021001	Tineynanni dasey iyEfesus ad Miletus at ingkaponni ad Cos. Mavigat pun, inturturuyni ey nallulugan inggana as jummatong kani ad Rodes asini at vus ikapon ad Patara. Jummissaag kaniʼsji at
44021002	nan-atun kani assey bapor ey umuy ad Ponisya.
44021003	Nanguy kani assey padawanan ey maotap sey luta ad Cyprus at ingkaponni ad Syria. Jummatong kani pun assey igid sey beybey ad Tyre ey usa ey vubruy ad Syria, jummissaag kani siji tey siya sey manginjissaagan sey bapor asda karga.
44021004	Assey jummissaaganni, inggow dasey mamati an Jesus ey indasanni siji, at nikig-ow kani an jida as sinjumingguwan. Imbagada an Paul ta aji atyén umuy ad Jerusalem tey impaagammun sey Ispiritun Apudyus an jida ey awad sey makwa an siya as jiyuy.
44021005	Kon jummatong pun sey ag-agow ey lumibbatanni, inturuyni vus pigey sey baatni. At inturud dakani as dasey mamati siji ey urey dasey asawada ya da anakda inggana assey igid sey vubruyda ey iggawan sey bapor ey allugananni. Oni pun, nallikkadang kani assey igid sey beybey ey malluwaru.
44021006	Naas kani pun nan-iinnayu, summakey kani assey bapor at nampuuli dasey nanginturud an dakani.
44021007	Lummibbat kani vus ad Tyre at ingkaponni ad Tolemais. Jummissaag kani at ingkani sinarsalliwa dasey mamati an Jesus as jiyuy at ummiyan kani.
44021008	Mavigat pun, lummibbat kani ey ingkaponni ad Caesarea. Jummatong kani pun ad Caesarea, nikig-ow kani as vuruy da Philip ey usa as dasey pitu ey napili ad Jerusalem assey kar-argow. Sey siputna, siya sey apporow umuy mangintudtuju assey Ambaru ey Damag.
44021009	Inggow dasey opat ey babarasang ey anakda ey pasigda profet ey apporow umuy mangimbaga assey impaagammun Apudyus.
44021010	Assey iniggawanni as jiyuy assey kam-ana ey ag-agow, jummatong sey usa ey profet ey angngadan as Agabus ey narpu ad Judea.
44021011	Ummali ey mangila an dakani. Kingwana pun, innarana sey sinturun Paul at imvub-udna assey mismu ey imana anda sikina, asina at kanan, “Imbagan sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey kanaʼsna sey koon dasey Jews ad Jerusalem assey singkuwa assey sinturun anna, asida at siya iyuy assey iggawan dasey ap-apun da Gentil ta barangna sey koonda an siya.”
44021012	Jingngorni pun sey imbagan Agabus saji, nampangpangaasi kani an Paul ta ajina ituruy ey umuy ad Jerusalem. Ya urey vus dasey ujum ey mamati, imbagada an Paul ta aji pey lawa umuy ad Jerusalem.
44021013	Kon kanana, “Payu sa'un ivilan ya pasursurjungun? Nakasaganaak ey mibarud ya urey matuyak ad Jerusalem as para an Apu Jesus.”
44021014	At gumminok kani pey lawa tey aji kani pun makatipod an siya. At kananni, “At nu siyanaʼt, keygad as Apudyus ey mangimpatongpar assey piuna an sika.”
44021015	Ummayow pun sey kam-ana ey ag-agowni ad Caesarea, ginappotni dasey usarni at lummibbat kani ey umuy ad Jerusalem.
44021016	Inggow vus dasey ujum ey namati ad Caesarea ey nivurun an dakani. Jummatong kani pun, iniyuy dakani assey vuruy da Mason ey iCyprus ta as jiyuy kanu sey iggawanni. As Mason, usa as dasey namangu ey namati.
44021017	Jummatong kani pun ad Jerusalem, allaylayad dasey mamati an Jesus ey namadatong an dakani.
44021018	Mavigat pun, nivurun as Paul an dakani ey umuy mangila an James. At wadawad dasey angkamarong-ag ey mangimpapangat asda mamati as jiyuy.
44021019	Naas pun Paul linamanu jida, inul-ullitna sey amin ey kingwan Apudyus as dasey Gentil assey ummayana nantudtujuwan an jida.
44021020	Jingngorda pun sey inugud Paul, losanda jinayow as Apudyus. Kon kananda an siya, “Sunudni ey Paul, piunni ey ipaagammu an sika ey nilivu akey sey vilang dasey Jews ey mamati an Jesus ey angimpapati vus ey manguunnud assey lintog Moses.
44021021	At lummawing sey somsomokda assey jingngorda ey apporom kanu itudtuju asda amin ey Jews ey vummubruy asda kikkiilin dasey Gentil ey iyageyda ey mangunud asda lintog Moses. Ya kanam vus kanu ey ajida ipakugit sey anakda ya ipug-anda ey mangunud assey ugali taku ey Jews.
44021022	At ey sana, ngan nin sey koon taku tey jingngorda akey ey jummatongka.
44021023	Assey somsomokni, ambaru nin nu kanaʼs sanna sey koom. Awad da opat ey laraki as nauy ey awad sey impostada an Apudyus ey koonda.
44021024	Mivurunka an jida assey Tempél ta mikakwaka ey mangwa assey imvilin Moses ey koon miipanggop assey madarusan sey tagu an Apudyus. Ya bayadam sey gastusda ey umuy mampapungnguk an paji. Kanaʼsna sey koom ta awad angagammuwan da tagu ey sey jingngorda miipanggop an sika at dakumpun atpey as tuttuwa tey miila ey ustu mit sey koom ey mangunud assey lintog taku.
44021025	Kon aji bali as dasey Gentil ey namati an Jesus tey awad mit sey suratni an jida ey mangimpaagammu ta ajida isida sey nidatun as dasey ap-apudyus, dara ya dasey naktor. Ya ajida dor-agun sey dakumpun as asawada.” Siyaji sey imbagada an Paul.
44021026	At mavigat pun, kinuyug Paul dasey opat ey laraki saji at nijuga ey nangwa assey ampadarusanda assey long-agda an Apudyus. Oni pun, summakey assey Tempél at impaagammuna an paji sey ustu ey maasan sey koonda saji ta ampartida as midatun an Apudyus ya ampapungnguk dasey opat ey vurunna.
44021027	Anna pun ey tigangey maas sey mikapitu ey ag-agow, inggow da ujum ey Jews ey narpu assey provinsiyan sey Asia ey nangila an Paul assey Tempel. Kinarakagda da tagu at jinokmaanda as Paul
44021028	asida at amvugga ey kananda, “Tumurung kayu dakayu ey susunud. Anna ey jummatong sey tagu ey apporow mangintudtuju ey niippun servi taku ey iyIsrael ya urey sey lintog Moses ya sey Tempél taku. Ya anna vus ey inaggisawana sey Tempél taku tey insakeyna dasey Gentil.”
44021029	Imvuggada jiyuy tey innilada as Trofimus ey iyEfesus ey vub-urun Paul ad Jerusalem at sey agammuda, insakeyʼn Paul siya ad darum assey Tempel.
44021030	Jingngor pun da tagu sey vugga saji, naguruda ey umili at situtuddakda ey umuy assey Tempel. Allablabsutanda as Paul ey mangillawa assey paweyʼn sey Tempél at nan-iyunubda sey sawang.
44021031	Anna pun ey gongatun atyén da tagu as Paul, inggow sey ummuy nangimbaga assey kumander da surdajun da iRoman ey nalivuk da umili.
44021032	At nangara ey dagus as kumander as dasey ujum ey opisyarna ya da surdaju at ginanasanda ey ummuy assey iggawan sey guru. Innilan pun da tagu jida ey marungey, ingginokda ey mamokbok an Paul.
44021033	Ummadani sey kumander at impaposasna as Paul assey juwa ey posas. Asina at imusun asda tagu ey kanana, “Ngan nauy ey tagu? Ngan sey kingwana?”
44021034	Kon sivuvugga da tagu ey barangna sey ipabasurda. At gapu assey tomorong da tagu, an-amuwong as kumander nu ngan sey ustu ey nakwa. At kingwana pun, immandarna asda surdajuna ta iyuyda as Paul assey baraksda.
44021035	Indatongda pun as Paul assey suban sey kampuda, inoppatda tey anna da tagu ey manukjukrus gapu assey amud ey sangada
44021036	ya umunnuunnudda ey mangimvugga ey kananda, “Gongatunyu siya! Gongatunyu siya!”
44021037	Anna pun ey isakeyda atyén as Paul ad darum assey kampuda, kanana assey kumander, “Ey mabalin ta gumingaak?” Nasdaow sey kumander tey gingan sey Greek sey inggingan Paul, at kanana, “Agammum atpey ey guminga assey Greek?
44021038	Kanak at nu sika sey inggow iyEgypt ey lummaban assey gubernu assey keysan ey ag-agow ey nangimpangat asda opat livu ey pumapatuy assey danak.”
44021039	Summongbat as Paul at kanana, “Dakumpun an sa'un tey usaak ey Jew ey niyanak ad Tarsus ey mavivigvig ey vubruy assey provinsiyan sey Cilicia. Paruvusanak atyén ta gumingaak asda tagu.”
44021040	Inavunan pun kumander, summikad as Paul assey suban asina at sinyasan dasey tagu ta guminongda. Gumminokda pun, gumminga assey gingan da Jews ey iHebrew.
44022001	At kanana, “Susunud ya aama, dongronyu atyén sey isongbatku an dakayu.”
44022002	Jingngorda pun ey gumminga assey iHebrew, natatmokda at inturuy Paul ey kanana,
44022003	“Usaak ey Jew ey niyanak ad Tarsus assey provinsiyan sey Cilicia kon ad Jerusalem anna sey jummakrak. Sa'un sey usa ey uswilan Gamaliel. Intudtujuna an sa'un sey amin ey lintog dasey dakdakor taku. Sa'un sey usa ey ampawot ey manservi an Apudyus ey kama vus an dakayu ey anna assey ag-agow sana.
44022004	Apporowk tinongtong-ag dasey mamati an Jesus. Impagngatku da ujum, laraki man unnu vubai ya impisukku jida assey baballudan.
44022005	At mabalin takjugan sey kangatuwan ey paji ya dasey amin ey papangat taku ey tuttuwa sey ugujuk anna tey jida sey nangatud assey surat an sa'un ta atjuk asda susunud taku ad Damascus. At inatdanak as kalintogan ey umuy as jiyuy ey manokma asda mamati an Jesus ad Damascus ta iyalik jida ad Jerusalem ey napopossasan ta majusada.”
44022006	Inturuy Paul kanana, “Kon inggow kani pun assey daran ey umadani ad Damascus assey anna ey mamatuk, mag kani gey nasilawan assey amud sey jilangna ey silow ey narpu ad langit
44022007	at nalikwadak assey luta. At jingngorku sey ginga ey kanana, ‘Saul, Saul, pam sa'un tongtong-agun?’
44022008	At kanak, ‘Ngey ngadannu Apu?’ “At summongbat ey kanana, ‘Sa'un an Jesus ey iNazareth ey apporom tongtong-agun.’
44022009	Kon da vurunku, anggeyʼs innilada sey silow saji ey niippun jingngorda assey ginga.
44022010	“At kanak, ‘Ngan sey pium ey kook Apu?’ At kanana, ‘Sumikadka ta ingka ad Damascus tey awad as jiyuy sey mangimbaga an sika assey amin ey sisimmokku ey koom.’
44022011	Kon niippun ilak tey nabvuragak gapu assey siling sey silow saji. At kiniwidak asda vurunku ey ummuy ad Damascus.
44022012	“Inumdas kani pun as jiyuy, inggow sey tagu ey angngadan as Ananias. Siya sey usa ey apporow mangunud assey lintog taku ey Jews ya usa siya ey mavivigvig asda Jews as jiyuy ey ili.
44022013	Ummali an sa'un at summikad assey dor-agku at kanana, ‘Sunud ey Saul, mavuktan kasin sey mallangrang-am.’ Imbagana pun gey jiyuy, anna ogon ey miilak siya.
44022014	At kanan Ananias, ‘As Apudyus ey jinayow dasey dakdakor taku assey kar-argow, pinilina sika ta agammuwum sey piuna ey koom ya miilam sey niyun-un ey anakna ya dongrom vus sey gingana.
44022015	Tey sika sey mangintakjug an siya ey mangimpaagammu asda amin ey tagu assey innilam ya jingngornu.
44022016	At ey sana, ajim ipannapanna! Sumikadka ta ingka ampavunyag ya dawatum an Jesus ta darusana sey basurnu.’ Siyana sey imbagan Ananias an sa'un.
44022017	“Assey nampuuliyak ad Jerusalem, ininggawak assey Tempél ey alluluwaru. Oni pun, kamaak as nan-in-inop ya
44022018	innilak as Apu taku at kanana, ‘Ganasam, teynam ad Jerusalem anna tey aji pun da taguʼsna patiyun sey ugujum miipanggop an sa'un.’
44022019	“Kon summongbatak at kanak, ‘Na'id Apu, patiyunak tey agammuda vus pigey ey sa'un sey apporow ummuy asda Sinagog ey nanokma ya nangimbarud asda mamati an sika ya sa'un vus sey namokbok an jida.
44022020	Gingngatda pun vus as Stephen ey nangintakjug an sika, inggawak vus siji ya tinakjugak vus sey nangngatanda tey sa'un sey nangjun assey lumvun dasey nangngat an siya.’
44022021	“Kon kanan sey Apu taku an sa'un, ‘Ingka at. Lumibbatka ta ibaarku sika assey iggawan dasey Gentil.’”
44022022	Dodongron da tagu sey ibagan Paul, kon anna pun ey imbagana ey ummuy assey iggawan da Gentil, sivuvuggada at avus ey kananda, “Gongatun taku tagu anna! Niippun lobbongna ey matagu!”
44022023	Inturturuy da tagu ey sivuvugga ya ikarakaray-abda sey lumvunda asida at angaraʼs lapuk ya inggab-urda impatangad ey angimpiila assey putukda
44022024	At kingwan pun sey kumander, immandarna as dasey surdajuna ey isakeyda as Paul ad darum ta bokbokonda siya ta ipudnuna sey basurna tey palawa amud sey sangan da tagu an siya.
44022025	Kon itakudda pun atyén as Paul ta bokbokonda, kanana assey opisyar ey summisikad, “Ey aji pun kumuntra assey lintog ey mabokbok sey usa ey iRoman ey daan pun atgey mabastigar?”
44022026	Jingngor pun sey opisyar sey imbagan Paul, ummuy an kumander at kanana, “Ngan gey la koon taku anna? iRoman mit atpey tagu anna!”
44022027	At ummuy sey kumander at kanana an Paul, “Ey tuttuwa ey iRomanka?” At kanan Paul, “Tuttuwa mit.”
44022028	At kanan sey kumander, “Urey vus sa'un, kon amud sey gastusku asiyak at miivilang as iRoman.” At sinongbatan vus Paul ey kanana, “Kon iRomanak manipud assey niyanakak.”
44022029	At kingwan pun da tagu ey mamokbok atyén an Paul, nansanudda ey dagus ya urey sey kumander at amud sey ugyatna assey naagammuwana ey iRoman atpey as Paul ya magna gey impaposas.
44022030	Mavigat pun, impakaan kumander sey posas Paul, asina at ivilin asda apun da papaji ya da papangat da Jews ta ammimitinda, asina at ipasangu as Paul an jida tey piuna agammuwun sey ustu ey ipabasur da Jews an siya.
44023001	Minatmatan pun Paul ey nangila as dasey Sanhedrin, kanana, “Susunud ey iyIsrael, assey amin ey nangokook manipud assey kar-argow inggana assey sana ey ag-agow, nadarus sey somsomokku assey angiilan Apudyus.”
44023002	Imbagana pun ji, imbagan Ananias ey kangatuwan ey paji as dasey adani an Paul ta tampakunda sey sungadna.
44023003	At kanan Paul an siya, “Sika ey kama kanu pey as niyun-un ey uwis, jusaun sika an Apudyus! Tutukjukaʼsnaʼt ey manguwis an sa'un ey mangimbasar assey lintog taku, kon sika sey aji pun mangunud assey lintog tey immandarnu ey tampakunak.”
44023004	At kanan da tagu ey niyaaddani an Paul, “Pam maggey insurtuwun sey kangatuwan ey pajin Apudyus!”
