44023005	Summongbat as Paul at kanana, “Susunud ey iyIsrael, niippun agammuk ey siya atpey sey kangatuwan ey paji tey nu agammuk atyén, ajiyak pun gumminga as kanaʼsji tey awad sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, ‘Ajika guminga as lawingan as dasey turey assey iliyu.’”
44023006	Immatunan pun Paul ey Sajusis da ujum an jida ya Farisis da ujum, indangsorna ey gumminga, kanana, “Susunud ey iyIsrael, Usaak ey Farisis ya Farisis vus dasey dakdakorku. Anna ey mabasbastigarak assey sana ey ag-agow gapu assey namnamak ey matagu kasin dasey natuy.”
44023007	Inggingana pun gey jiyuy, insarad dasey Farisis ya dasey Sajusis ey ansosongbat at nagugwa da tagu ey naaamung.
44023008	(Tey dasey Sajusis, ajida pun mamati ey kasin matagu dasey natuy ya niippun vus kanu enjel unnu alinnawa, kon dasey Farisis, patiyunda ey awad amin da nauy.)
44023009	At anna ey jumangsodangsor sey ansosongbatan da Farisis anda Sajusis. At summikad da ujum ey Farisis ey mimisturun sey lintog at tillonda ey nangimbaga ey kananda, “Niippun atpey amabasuran taku assey tagu anna! Mabalin ey awad ji enjel unnu sabali as aji pun miila ey nikabagbaga an siya.”
44023010	At ummam-amud sey angokoonda ey ansosongbat at ummugyat as kumander tey kanana, uniyʼey mavisvissey sey long-ag Paul tey anna ey mallablabsutanda. At immandarna asda surdajuna ta umuyda porson as Paul as dasey tagu ta iyuyda assey baraksda
44023011	Assey lavi saji, nampiila as Apu Jesus an Paul at kanana, “Ajika umugyat tey masapur ey takjugam sa'un ad Rome ey kama vus assey nanakjugam an sa'un ad Jerusalem anna.”
44023012	Mavigat pun, inggow da nasuruk as opatpuru ey Jews ey nantuturag ey mangngat an Paul. Nansapatada ey ajida pun mangmangan ya umin-inum inggana as gongatunda as Paul.
44023014	At kingwada pun, ummuyda as dasey ap-apun da papaji ya da papangat da Jews at kananda, “Insapatani ey aji kani pun mangmangan inggana as gongatunni siya.
44023015	At ey sana, dakayu ya dasey konsel, annaya sey koonyu. Ibagayu an kumander ta iyalina as Paul sina ya kananyu ey ambaruwunyu siya bastigarun miipanggop assey kasuna. At sey koonni, bangabangunni ta gongatunni siya assey daran ta daan sina umdas.”
44023016	Kon inggow sey amunakun Paul ey laraki ey anak sey sunudna ey vubai ey nanangngor assey nan-uugudanda at kingwana pun, ummuyna imbaga an ulitugna ey Paul assey baraks.
44023017	At inayagan Paul sey usa ey opisyar at kanana, “Iyuynu sey anak anna an kumander tey awad sey ibagana.”
44023018	At iniyuy sey opisyar siya an kumander at kanana, “Imbagan Paul ey barud ey iyalik an sika sey anak anna tey awad kanu sey ibagana.”
44023019	Kiniwid kumander sey anak saji at tummar-anda asina at imusun ey kanana, “Ngan sey pium ey ibaga an sa'un?”
44023020	Summongbat sey anak at kanana, “Nan-uugud dasey papangat da Jews ta iparangnu as Paul assey konsel as vigat ta ambaruwunda kanu bastigarun,
44023021	kon pangngaasim ta ajim atyén patiyun tey awad da nasuruk as opatpuru ey tagu ey umuy amangabang an siya assey daran. Insapatada ey ajida pun kanu mangmangan ya umin-inum inggana as gongatunda siya. At awadda ey nakasagana ey anguulley as mangavunam assey dawatda.”
44023022	At pinaryow kumander sey anak saji ey kanana, “Ilam ta niippun angigammu ey imbagam nauy an sa'un, man?”
44023023	Oni pun, inayagan kumander sey juwa asda opisyarna at kanana, “Isaganayu sey juwanggasut ey surdaju ya juwanggasut ey ampassey-ang ya pitumpuru ey ampakkabayu ta iyuyyu as Paul ad Caesarea. Laviyunyu ey lumibbat.
44023024	Angatud kayu vus pigey as angabayuwan Paul. Ilanyu ta idatongyu an Gubernador Felix ey niippun makwa an siya.”
44023025	Nanurat as kumander an Gubernador Felix at kanana assey suratna,
44023026	“Apu gubernador Felix, sa'un an Claudius Lysias ey nanurat an sika. Kanana atyén ta ambaru taku losan.
44023027	Sey tagu anna ey ipaalik an sika at jinokmaan dasey Jews ey tigangeyda gongatun. Naagammuwak pun ey usa siya ey iRoman, ingkani siya innara asda surdajuk.
44023028	Piuk ey agammuwun nu ngan sey basurna as angindarumanda an siya at iniyuyku assey iggowʼn da konselda.
44023029	At siya sey nangagammuwak ey niippun atpey basurna tey sey maawatak ey problemada at gapu anggey assey lintogda ey aji pun umaney as ikatuyna unnu mabarudana.
44023030	Kon impaagammuda pun an sa'un ey awad da nantuturag ey Jews ey mangngat an siya, simsimmokku ey dagus ey ipaalik siya an sika. Imbagak asda nangindarum an siya ta sika Apu Gubernador sey ansasanguwanda.” Nauy sey ingkur-it Claudius assey suratna an Gubernador Felix.
44023031	At assey lavi saji, kingwan dasey surdaju sey immandar kumander at inturudda as Paul inggana ad Antipatris.
44023032	Mavigat pun, nampuuli da aji pun nangabayu ey surdaju assey baraksda ad Jerusalem kon as dasey nampakkabayu, inturuyda ey nangiyyuy an Paul ad Caesarea.
44023033	Jummatongda pun ad Caesarea, innatudda sey surat an Gubernador asida at ipurang as Paul an siya.
44023034	Vinasan pun gubernador sey surat saji, inimusna an Paul nu ngadanna ey provinsiya sey narpuwana. Naagammuwana pun ey iCilicia siya,
44023035	kanana an Paul, “Asik dongron sey ustu ey kasum nu jumatong dasey nangindarum an sika.” At imvilinna ey masapur mabantayan ey ustu as Paul assey dokor ey vuruy ey impatakjug ari Herod assey kar-argow.
44024001	Ummayow pun sey lima ey ag-agow, jummatong as Ananias ey kangatuwan ey paji ya da ujum ey angkamarong-ag ad Caesarea. Inggow sey vurunda ey avugaju ey angngadan as Tertullus. At imparangda sey darumda an Gubernador Felix ey mivusur an Paul.
44024002	Impaayagda pun as Paul, gumminga as Tertullus ey angimpabasur an siya. Kanana, “Madayow ey Apu Gubernador Felix, gapu assey kinariingnu ey nanginturey an jitaku, nabayag ey natarna sey ili taku anna ya gapu ta siya sosomkom sey vumaruwan taku, adjuwan vus sey nakwa ey vummaruwan sey umili.
44024003	Assey amin ey ayanni, allaylayad kani ey aanmok asda nauy ey kingwam at dokor sey saramatni an sika.
44024004	Kon ajik pun piun ey mataktakka at siya kudawuk sey anusnu ey mangngor assey akit ey ibagani.
44024005	“Sey tagu sana, mipani as pistiʼn sey umili. Ginuruna da Jews assey amin ey kikkiili assey intiru ey luvung ya siya avus sey usa ey ap-apun dasey usa ey vungguy ey pasurut sey usa ey iNazareth.
44024006	Inaggisawana amin sey Tempél ad Jerusalem at jinokmaanni siya. Bastigarunni atyén siya ey angimbasar assey lintogni
44024007	kon nikaviyang as kumander Lysias at pillosna an dakani.
44024008	Imvilinna ey umali kani an sika ta sika sey angindarumanni an siya. At nu bastigarum sey tagu anna, maagammuwam ey tuttuwa sey amin ey nangindarumanni an siya.” Siyana sey imbagan Tertullus.
44024009	Urey vus da vurunna ey Jews at tinakjuganda ey tuttuwa sey amin ey imbagan Tertullus ey mivusur an Paul.
44024010	Naas pun sey imbagan Tertullus, sininyasan Gubernador as Paul ta guminga. At kanan Paul ey summongbat, “Apu Gubernador, agammuk ey nabayag sey nan-uwisam assey ili taku anna at siya sey allaylayadak ey angimbaga an sika assey songbatku assey darumda anna an sa'un.
44024011	At maagammuwam dallu ey ummuy nin as nasawaran as juwa ey ag-agow nisarad assey ummayak ad Jerusalem ey ummuy mandayow an Apudyus.
44024012	Assey iggawak as jiyuy, niippun mit nangila an sa'un nu nikasongbatak assey Tempél unnu nangguruwak asda tagu as jiyuy ya urey asda sinagog unnu barangnaʼsnaʼt ey lugar assey vubruy.
44024013	Usa pey, niippun mit vus iparangda an sika as angimpatuttuwa asda amin ey ipabasurda anna an sa'un.
44024014	Kon ajik pun isulib an sika sey katuttuwaan ey apporok koon. Uunnujuk sey tudtuju miipanggop an Jesus ey kananda ey dakumpun as ustu. Siyana sey angokook ey andayow an Apudyus ey jinayow dasey dakdakor taku assey kar-argow. Ya mamatiyak vus asda amin ey lintog Moses ya da ingkur-it dasey profet assey kar-argow.
44024015	Namnamauk vus ey kasin Apudyus taguwun da amin ey nangkakatuy, ambaru man unnu lawingan ey tagu. At siya mit vus sey apporon da tagu anna namnamaun.
44024016	At gapu assey namnamak, iniggak sey kaviilak ey angimpapati ey mangwa assey ustu ta niippun atyén vumasurak an Apudyus ya asda asintataguk.
44024017	“Ummayow pun sey kam-ana ey tawun nisarad assey ummayawak ad Jerusalem, kasinak nampuuli siji ey angiyyuy assey pilak ey miiturung as dasey vurunku ey Jews ya amparti as idatunku an Apudyus assey Tempel.
44024018	Siyaji sey kookook assey indasanak assey Tempél tey kakkaasku ey nangwa assey kadarusan an Apudyus. At niippun mit adjuwan as tagu as jiyuy ya niippun mit vus guru
44024019	tey dasey ininggow anggey at dasey Jews ey narpu assey provinsiyan sey Asia. At jida atyén sey awad sina ey mangimpabasur an sa'un nu awad innilada as lawingan ey kingwak tey jida mit anggey sey nangila an sa'un.
44024020	Kon gapu ta niippunda, urey atyén da tagu anna ey awad sina at ibagada nu ngan sey basur ey kingwak assey summisikkadak assey sinagung da konsel ad Jerusalem.
44024021	Manungad in nu pabasurunak gey lawa assey nangimvuggaak ey kanak, ‘Mabasbastigarak assey sana ey ag-agow assey sinagungyu gapu assey pammatik ey kasin matagu dasey natuy.’ Siyana mit anggey sey imbagak an jida.”
44024022	As Felix ey adjuwan sey agammuna miipanggop assey umunudan an Jesus, impaginokna sey uugud saji, at kanana, “Oni yén ta jumatong as kumander Lysias ta asik at ibanag sey kasum.”
44024023	Naas pun, vinilinna sey opisyar ta ipabanteyna pey dallu as Paul. Kon wayaanda yén siya as akit ta awad agammun dasey vurunna ey manginyuy asda amin ey kasapurana.
44024024	Ummayow pun sey kam-ana ey ag-agow, ummuy as Felix ey intakinna as Drusilla ey asawana ey nangila an Paul. As Drusilla, usa siya ey Jews. Impaayagna as Paul ta dongronda sey ibagana miipanggop assey pammati an Jesus.
44024025	Kon intudtujun pun Paul sey miipanggop assey ustu ey angokoon ey matagu ya sey angattuman ey aji mangwa assey lawingan ey piun sey long-ag ya sey anungus sey timpu ey anguwisan Apudyus asda amin ey tagu, mag atgey ummugyat as Felix at kanana, “Ustu nait. Iginoknu ta ingkan ta asik kasin sika ipaayag nu awad mawayaak.”
44024026	Siyaji sey imbagan Felix tey sey usa ey awad assey somsomokna, kanana, “Pigpiga nu pasuksukan atyén Paul siya.” At siyaji sey gapuna nu palawa kanayun ey ipaayagna as Paul ta ambagbagada.
44024027	Ummayow pun sey juwa ey tawun, inorsan Porcius Festus as Felix ey Gubernador. At gapu ta piun Felix ey mamaryad dasey Jews an siya, tineynana as Paul assey baballudan.
44025001	Ummayow pun sey turu ey ag-agow nisarad assey tummukjuwan Festus ey nan-gubernador ad Caesarea, ummuy ad Jerusalem.
44025002	Jummatong pun as jiyuy, ummuy da ap-apun da papaji ya da papangat da Jews at imparangda sey darumda an Paul. Nampangpangaasida an Festus
44025003	ta ipuuyna as Paul ad Jerusalem ta bangabangunda siya assey daran ta gongatunda.
44025004	Kon sinongbatan Festus jida ey kanana, “Ad Caesarea mit sey nibaballudana at aji pun mabayag at ampuuliyak siji.
44025005	At mabalin umunud da ujum ey papangatyu ta as jiyuy sey angindarumanyu an siya nu awad kingwana as lawingan.”
44025006	Ummuy nin as waru unnu simpuru ey ag-agow sey iniiggawan Festus ad Jerusalem asi at ampuuli ad Caesarea. Assey kavigatana, tummukju assey tukjun sey uuwwisan, asina at ipaayag as Paul.
44025007	Ummuy pun as Paul, nilikub da Jews ey narpu ad Jerusalem, asida at iparang sey amud pey ey basur ey lapun sey angindarumanda an siya, kon niippun vus iparangda as angimpatuttuwa assey basurna.
44025008	At nilasunan Paul sey long-agna, kanana, “Niippun kingwak as lawingan ey kumuntra assey lintog taku ey Jews unnu assey Tempél taku ya urey an Emperor ad Rome.”
44025009	Kon as Festus, piuna ey maryad da Jews an siya at siya sey kanana an Paul, “Ey pium miyuy ad Jerusalem ta as jiyuy sey angimbanagak assey darumda anna an sika?”
44025010	Kon summongbat as Paul ey kanana, “Annaak ey summisikad sina assey sinagung sey jinutukan Emperor ey man-uwis. At as nauy vus pigey sey lobbongna ey mibanagan sey kasuk. Agammum mit ey niippun kingwak as lawingan as dasey Jews.
44025011	At nu awad kingwak as dakumpun as lamugnaʼs ikatuyku, ajik pun kudawun sey mawayaak. Kon gapu ta niippun katuttuwaan sey darumda anna an sa'un, niippun karobbongan sey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu ey angimpurang an sa'un an jida. Kudawuk ey as Emperor ad Rome sey mangimbanag assey kasuk.”
44025012	Gapu assey imbagan Paul saji, kinabagbagan Festus dasey ujum ey turey ey katurungana. At kanana an Paul, “Gapu ta as Emperor sey kindownu ey mangimbanag assey kasum, as Emperor sey ayam.”
44025013	Ummayow pun sey kam-ana ey ag-agow, ummuy Ari Agripa innila as Gubernador Festus ey angimpiila assey layadna gapu assey nan-gubernadorana ya nikuuy vus as Bernice ey sunudna.
44025014	Nabayag pun sey iggawanda as jiyuy, inul-ullit Festus an Ari sey miipanggop assey kasun Paul. Kanana, “Awad sey usa ey barud as nauy ey tineynan Felix.
44025015	Ummuyak pun ad Jerusalem, impaspasmok da ap-apun da papaji ya da papangat da Jews sey kasun Paul at kananda ey goddongak kanu sey matuyana.
44025016	Kon imbagak an jida ey dakumpun as nakopyaanni ey iRoman sey mangiyyawat assey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey nidarum ta majusa nu daan mabastigar. Tey masapur maatdan as wayana ey sumangu asda nangindarum an siya ta awad agammuna ey manongbat an jida.
44025017	Ummalida pun as nauy, inasikasuk jida ey dagus. At anna pun ey mavigat, tummukjuwak assey uuwwisan at imvilinku ey iparangda sey barud.
44025018	Summikad pun dasey nangindarum an siya, kanak at nu awad mandagsun as ipabasurda an siya kon niippun mit atpey.
44025019	Sey lilida anggey an siya at miipanggop assey pammatida ey Jews ya sey usa ey tagu ey angngadan as Jesus ey natuy kon ipapatin Paul ey ummuli.
44025020	At gapu ta niippun agammuk ey an-anmok nu ngan annuk ey angimbanag assey jugannaʼt, imbagak an Paul nu piuna ey umuy ad Jerusalem ta as jiyuy sey mabastigaran sey kasuna.
44025021	Kon sumanga tey piuna ey urey mibabarud sina ta uullayuna ey as Emperor ad Rome sey mangimbanag assey kasuna. At siya sey nangimvilinak ey masapur mabantayan inggana as ibaarku siya an Emperor.”
44025022	At kanan Agripa an Festus, “Piuk vus ey dongron nauy ey tagu.” At kanan Festus, “Dongrom siya as vigat.”
44025023	Mavigat pun, ummuy da Agripa an Bernice assey uuwwisan ey iniggada sey ang-anggada ey angimpiila assey kinangatuda. Ya inggow vus dasey kumander da surdaju ya da mavivigvig ey tagu assey ili saji. Summakeyda pun, imvilin Gubernador Festus ey miparang as Paul.
44025024	Gumminga as Festus at kanana, “Ari Agripa ya dakayu losan ey nadagup as nauy, sey tagu anna ey iillanyu, siya sey indarum dasey Jews ad Jerusalem ya dasey Jews ad Caesarea an sa'un. Ivugvuggada ey niippun kalintogana ey matagu.
44025025	Kon niippun indasak as kingwana ey umaney as mangngatan an siya. Kon gapu ta piuna ey as Emperor sey angimbanag assey kasuna, simsimmokku ey miyuy ad Rome.
44025026	Kon niippun agammuk nu ngan sey ikur-itku an Emperor miipanggop an siya. At siya sey lapun sey nangimparangak an dakayu assey sana, am-amud an sika Ari Agripa ta awad ikur-itku nu maas mabastigar.
44025027	Tey sey awad assey somsomokku, niippun servina ey ipuuyku sey usa ey barud an Emperor nu niippun ustu as muudasan as basurna.”
44026001	Kanan Agripa an Paul, “Mabalin ey gumingaka.” Inuyad Paul sey imana, kanana,
44026002	“Madayow ey Ari Agripa, mabalin ey kanakʼey nagasatak assey sana ey ag-agow tey annaka as nauy ta mabalin ey dongrom sey songbatku asda amin ey ipabasur da Jews an sa'un,
44026003	am-amud tey agammum da amin ey nakopyaan taku ey Jews ya dasey aji taku pun angkinnaawatan. Kudawuk atyén sey anusnu ey andongor assey ibagak.”
44026004	“Agammun da amin ey Jews nu ngan sey kinatataguk nisarad assey kaban-ugku. Agammuda avus nu ngan annuk ey natagu assey vubruyni ya urey ad Jerusalem.
44026005	Nikakaddag ey agammuda ey keygad sey nataguwak, sa'un sey usa ey nijuga assey kaistriktuwan ey vungguy sey religion taku ey kananda ey Farisis at impapatik ey nangunud assey amin ey tudtujun sey pammatida. Ajida pun mabalin isulib ey tuttuwa sey ibagak anna.
44026006	At ey sana, annaak ey mabasbastigar gapu ta namnamauk ey koon Apudyus sey impostana as dasey dakdakor taku assey kar-argow.
44026007	Amin avus dasey juga taku ey Jews ey ganak dasey nasawaran as juwa ey kapuunan, at siya amin sey namnamaunda ey mangawat assey impostan Apudyus assey kar-argow at siya sey andaydayawanda an Apudyus as inag-agow ya nilavi. At gapu ta patiyuk ey tinagun Apudyus kasin as Jesus ey siya sey angimbasaran taku ey taguwuna vus dasey amin ey nangkakatuy, siyana apu Ari sey nangindarumanda an sa'un.
44026008	Amin kayu anna ey awad sina, payu lawa ansigavun ey patiyun ey taguwun Apudyus dasey natuy?”
44026009	“Urey avus sa'un assey keysan ey ag-agow at kanak at pigey ey iggak sey kaviilak ey manguntra assey amin miipanggop an Jesus ey iNazareth.
44026010	At naya sey kingwak ad Jerusalem; Inatdanak as kalintogan asda ap-apun da papaji at adjuwan sey impisukku assey baballudan. At nu awad vus magoddongan ey matuy, tinakjugak avus sey matuyana.
44026011	Nanginkinnu avus ey impajusak jida as dasey sinagog. Ya pinilitku jida ta man-awidanda sey pammatida an Jesus. Amud pigey sey sangak an jida at urey as dasey adayu ey ili, ummuyku jida tinongtong-ag.”
44026012	Inturuy Paul ey kanana, “At nauy sey gapuna nu paak lawa umuy ad Damascus ey mangiyyuy assey surat ey narpu as dasey ap-apun da papaji ey nangatud assey karobbongak ey manokma assey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey mamati an Jesus.
44026013	Madayow ey Apu Ari, inggow kani pun assey daran, assey anna ey mamatuk, innilak sey jummilang ey narpuʼd langit ey sinjumugot sey silingna nu sey init. Nasilingak ya urey dasey vurunku
44026014	at mag kani gey nalikwad assey luta. At jingngorku sey gumminga assey Hebrew ey kanana, ‘Saul, Saul, Pam sa'un tongtong-agun. Sey long-agnu at lawa sey tongtong-agum assey vumusuram an sa'un ey kama as baka ey mangudtar assey naag-aggidan ey usarun sey an-ar-araju.’”
44026015	“At kanak, ‘Ngey ngadannu Apu?’ “At summongbat ey kanana, ‘Sa'un an Jesus ey apporom tongtong-agun.
44026016	Kon vumangunka ta summikadka. Nampiilaak an sika ta jutukak sika ey umuy mangwa assey piuk. At ingka ibaga asda amin ey tagu sey nangil-am an sa'un ya dasey ipiilak an sika assey daan ey ag-agow.
44026017	Isarakku sika as dasey kailiyam ey Jews ya dasey Gentil urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey koonda an sika. Ibaarku sika ey umuy
44026018	mantudtuju an jida ta masilawan sey somsomokda at maawatanda sey miipanggop an sa'un. At man-awidanda dasey lawingan ya sey tureyʼn Satanas ta ampatureyda an Apudyus. At nu mamatida an sa'un, mapakawan sey basurda ya miivilangda as napili ey tagun Apudyus.’ Nauy sey imbagan Apu Jesus an sa'un assey daran ey umuy ad Damascus.”
44026019	Inturuy Paul ey nangimbaga an Ari Agripa ey kanana, “At siyaji Ari Agripa, pinatik tuttuwa sey amin ey nipiila an sa'un ey narpu ad langit.
44026020	At insaradku ad Damascus ey mantudtuju asda tagu, asiyak at umuy ad Jerusalem ya assey amin ey vubruy assey provinsiya ad Judea ya assey iggawan da Gentil. Tinudtujuwak jida losan ey masapur ibabawida sey basurda ta mansinagungda an Apudyus ya ipiilada avus assey angokoonda ey matagu nu tuttuwa ey nambabawida.
44026021	At gapu ta siyana sey apporok itudtuju, jinokmaanak asda Jews assey Tempél ta gongatunak.
44026022	Kon inggana assey sana, tinuruturunganak an Apudyus at annaak ey sisikad assey sinagungyu ey mangimpapati ey mantudtuju asda amin ey tagu, nababa man unnu nangatu. Tey sey apporok itudtuju at anungna vus pigey sey imbagan Moses ya dasey profet assey kar-argow ey masapur makwa
44026023	ey sey Cristu ey umali at masapur matongtong-ag asi at matuy. Ya siya vus sey amangu ey umuli ta silawana sey somsomok da tagu, Jews man unnu da Gentil ta ipaagammuna nu ngan annun Apudyus ey manginsarakan asda tagu.”
44026024	Imbagan pun Paul da jiyuy ey mangintakjug assey karobbongana, vinuggaan Festus siya ey kanana, “Paul, nuung-ungka nin-a! Iyyung-ungnu sey ummamdan ey inadarnu!”
44026025	Kon kanan Paul ey summongbat, “Dakumpunak as ung-ung, Apu Gubernador. Sey ibagbagak at tuttuwa ey ugud sey ustu sey somsomokna.
44026026	Ya mabalin ey ansokarak ey mangimbaga assey amin tey agammuk ey nanginkinnu ey jingngor Ari Agripa da nauy tey aji pun nitaru ey nakwa.
44026027	Ari Agripa, ey mamatika assey imbagan da profet? Agammuk ey mamatika.”
44026028	Kon kanan Ari Agripa an Paul, “Ey sey kanam, sin-akitan anggey sey mangawisam an sa'un ta ambalinak as Cristianu?”
44026029	At kanan vus Paul, “Sin-akitan man unnu mabayag, iluwaruk an Apudyus ta mamati kayu atyén losan an Apu Jesus ta ambalin kayu as kama an sa'un maraksig assey posasku anna.”
44026030	At summikad as Ari ya as Gubernador ya as Bernice ya da ujum ey nikatukju an jida
44026031	at ummayowda ey kananda, “Niippun mit kingwan tagu anna as urugna as ikatuy unnu mibarudana.”
44026032	Kanan vus Ari Agripa an Gubernador Festus, “Mawayaan atyén gey sey tagu anna nu ajina kanan ey mipasangu an Emperor ad Rome.”
44027001	Jummatong pun sey ag-agow ey kananda ey ayanni anda Paul ad Italy, impurangda siya ya da ujum ey barud an Julius ey kangatuwan ey opisyar sey surdaju assey usa ey “Kumpanyan sey surdajun Emperor ad Rome.”
44027002	At nallugan kani assey bapor ey narpu ad Adramittium ey nakasagana ey umuy as dasey kikkiili assey provinsiyan sey Asia. At inggow vus as Aristarcus ey iMacedonia ey narpu assey munisipyun sey Tesalonica ey nivurun an dakani.
44027003	Mavigat pun, jummatong kani ad Sidon. Madaguwan as Julius an Paul at pinaruvusana ey umuy mangila asda vub-urunna as jiyuy ta angatudda as kasapurana.
44027004	Kasin pun lummibbat sey bapor ey nallugananni, nampapakni kani ey nanguy assey jinadakligan sey luta ad Cyprus tey anna ey amud dangsor sey abvid ey abtonni.
44027005	Jinormangni pun sey beybey ey jujummangun sey provinsiya ad Cilicia ya ad Pamfilia, nipanad kani ad Myra assey provinsiyan sey Licia.
44027006	Jummatong kani pun as jiyuy, indasan sey opisyar sey usa ey bapor ey narpu ad Alexandria ey umuy ad Italy at nan-atunun dakani.
44027007	Nallugan kani pun, niippun agammun sey bapor ey gumanas tey andangsor sey abvid at natongtong-ag kani as kam-ana ey ag-agow asi kani at mibatug assey maotapan sey vubruy ad Sinidus. Miyaboabot vus sey andangsor ey abvid at niippun agammuni ey manginturuy. At siya sey imbasiwsiwni ingkapon assey jinadakligan sey luta ad Crete ey anguy ad Salmone.
44027008	At urey gey nu nangiigid kani ad Crete, naligatan kani pey dallu asi kani at jumatong assey kananda ey “Mambaru as An-illongan sey Bapor” ey adani assey vubruy ad Lasea.
44027009	Napanus sey nataktakanni as jiyuy gapu assey andangsor ey abvid. Ya anna ey lumawilawing sey ag-agow at kagguugyat sey mallugan assey bapor tey anna ey jummatong sey timpun sey bali. At vinagbagaan Paul jida, kanana,
44027010	“Dakayu ey vuvurun, miilak ey kagguugyat nu ituruy taku ey ambaat tey dakumpun anggeyʼs sey karga unnu sey bapor anna sey matarak tey urey sey viyag taku.”
44027011	Kon aji pun sey opisyar pinati sey imbagan Paul tey siya pinatina sey singkuwa assey bapor ya sey apporow anginturung.
44027012	Ya gapu ta lawingan kanu siji as iggawan sey bapor nu timpun sey bali, ad-aju an dakani sey maryad ey ituruyni ey umuy ta samvutunni kanu ad Foniks ey usa ey lugar ad Crete ta as jiyuy sey iggawanni assey timpun sey bali. Ambaru kanu as jiyuy as iggawan sey bapor tey nadadakligan at ajina pun abton sey marpuwan sey bali.
44027013	Anna pun ey isarad sey innayad ey abvid ey anurvuk, kananda ey mabalin ituruyda sey panggopda. At ginuyudda sey nikakawit ey baliyang ey nangimpupugud assey bapor at lummibbat kani ey nangiigid ad Crete ta aji kani miyabvid.
44027014	Kon napanpannusan pun, jummatong at avus sey andangsor ey abvid ey narpu assey padawigi nu mansinagungta assey marpuwan init.
44027015	Iyyabvidna sey bapor at niippun agammuda ey anginturung at vinaybay-anda pey lawa ey miyabvid kani ta nangamung sey manginkapnana assey bapor.
44027016	Anna pun ey ummadani kani assey sugwab sey ban-it ey luta ad Cauda, nalingban kani as akit assey abvid at insakeyni ad darum sey ban-it ey bangka ey guyuguyujun sey bapor kon naligatan kani pey dallu ey nanginsakey.
44027017	Naas pun, asida at takjun sey bapor assey dakkorag ey kiddong ta aji mabakas. Ya asida at vus opasun sey layab sey bapor ta miinnayad ey miyabvid tey madanaganda nu maggey lawa misagud sey bapor asda tummagudtud ey gallis assey beybey ad Libya.
44027018	Anna pun ey mavigat, inturturuyna sey amud ey bali. At kingwada pun, koonda ey mangimballu as dasey kargan sey bapor ta lumanglangpow.
44027019	Assey kasin mavigat, injugada imballu sey ujum ey lamintan sey bapor.
44027020	Ummuy as kam-ana ey ag-agow ey nanggigiklum ad langit ey niippun miila as init ya vituwun ya aji pun guminok sey andangsor ey bali at niippun ogon namnamani ey matagu.
44027021	Nabayag amin ey niippun nangnangan an dakani at summikad as Paul at kanana, “Dakayu ey vuvurun, jingngoryu atyén sey imbagak ad Crete ta aji taku luus lummibbat at niippun atyén nadadail ya natarak as karga.
44027022	Kon urey nu kanaʼsna, aji kayu madanagan tey niippun matuy an jitaku, sinturagin sey bapor anna as madadail.
44027023	Tey assey lavi, as Apudyus ey daydayawuk ya singkuwa an sa'un, imbaarna sey enjelna,
44027024	at kanana, ‘Paul, ajika umugyat tey midatagka an Emperor ad Rome. At gapu an sika, turungan Apudyus dasey kalugannu at niippun matuy an dakayu.’ Siyana sey imbagana an sa'un
44027025	at pakasdoronyu da somsomokyu dakayu ey vuvurun tey awad sey talikku an Apudyus at niippun juwajuwana ey siyana sey makwa tey imbagana an sa'un.
44027026	Kon awad sey misagudan taku assey usa ey luta ey nanggagawa assey danum.”
44027027	Juwa ey juminggu ey mituppituppiyak kani assey beybey ad Mediteranian gapu assey abvid. Gawan pun lavi, vinkon dasey anginturturung assey bapor ey ummadani kani assey igid sey beybey.
44027028	Kinamangda pun sey kaadarum sey danum, ummuy as juwampuru ey dopa sey kaadarumna. Nabab-ayag pun, ingkasinda ey nangamang at ummuy vus as nasawaran as lima ey dopa.
44027029	At anna ey umugyatda tey maggey lawa misagud sey bapor as dasey dopras ey adani assey igid sey beybey. At kingwada pun, inuyudda sey opat ey nakikiddongan ey baliyang assey ubét sey bapor ta mikawit assey dotagna, asida at malluwaru ta mapgus atyén ya pummawey.
44027030	At kingwan pun dasey ansiput assey bapor, piunda allibas at vinab-aliyanda da tagu. At kingwada pun, inuy-uyda sey bangkan sey bapor assey danum ta umuyda kanu pey uyujun sey ujum ey nakikiddongan ey baliyang assey sinagung sey bapor.
44027031	Kon kanan Paul assey opisyar ya dasey surdaju, “Nu teynan da tagu anna sey bapor, niippun matagu an dakayu.”
44027032	Jingngor pun da surdaju sey imbagan Paul, nan-igusatda sey kiddong sey bangka at illayowʼn sey dalluyun.
44027033	Anna pun ey isaradna ey pumawey, pinilit Paul jida ta manganda at kanana, “Anna ey juwa ey juminggu ey niippun nangnangan an dakayu gapu ta nalingaling assey ugyatyu.
44027034	At ey sana, pangngaasiyu ta mangan kayu ta awad ikilugyu ey mangillasat assey bali anna. Aji kayu madanagan tey niippun sa'an as matarak an jitaku.”
44027035	Naas pun Paul imbaga jiyuy, nangara assey tinapey asi at mansaramat an Apudyus assey sinagungda losan, asina at pitpit-ingun at insaradna ey mangan.
44027036	Innilada pun sey kingwan Paul, kummasdor sey somsomokda at losanda nangan.
44027037	Sey vilangni ey nallulugan assey bapor at ummuy kani as juwanggasut ya pitumpuru ya onom.
44027038	Naas kani pun nangan, imballuda dasey nikakarga ey vugas ta lumangpow sey bapor.
44027039	Anna pun ey pummawey, inggow sey luta ey miilani, kon niippun agammun dasey ansiput assey bapor nu ngadanji ey luta. Kon inggow sey miilada ey nijuyu ey igid sey danum ya inggow sey gallis assey igidna at kananda ey mabalin nin ipaigidda sey bapor as jiyuy.
44027040	At ginsatda sey kiddong sey baliyang ey kawit sey bapor ta amorna ey mateynan assey beybey ya inuggasda vus sey kiddong sey kama as ipeyna ey manginturung assey bapor. Naas pun, impasadsadda sey layab assey sinagung sey bapor ta miyabvid assey igid sey beybey.
44027041	Kon nisagud sey bapor assey tummagudtud ey gallis at nilumrum sey sanguna ey aji pun makagiju ya anna avus sey likud sey bapor ey sardana ey mabakas gapu assey dangsor sey dalluyun.
44027042	Assey siyaji, pinanggop dasey surdaju ey mangngat asda amin ey barud ta niippun angkiyat ey umawid an jida.
44027043	Kon insangan sey opisyar tey piuna matagu as Paul. At immandarna at avus asda makakiyat ta lumayugda assey beybey ey angkiyat ta umuyda assey igid,
44027044	ta asi da ujum umunud ey ansap-ar asda tabra unnu barangna ey narakrak ey kopyan sey bapor. At nauy sey kingwani, asi kani at losan umdas assey igid sey beybey.
44028001	Tummakdang kani pun, naagammuwanni ey Malta atpey sey ngadan sey luta saji ey nipanadanni.
44028002	Ambaru sey kingwan da tagu siji ey namadatong an dakani. Nan-apuyda as man-anijuwanni tey tongnin ya anna ey koona ey umudan.
44028003	Nan-ugpun as Paul as lupis ey mitungu kon anna pun ey itunguna, lummuswa at avus sey mandogot ey tabbad ey niladkom assey kayu at kintubna sey iman Paul.
44028004	Innilan pun da tagu siji sey tabbad ey nantatayyun assey iman Paul, kananda ey ambabagbaga, “Niippun juwajuwana ey pumapatuy atpey sey tagu anna. Tey tokon gey nu illasatna sey bali assey beybey at aji pun nuuvur, aji pun dallu sey annaʼd ngatu iparuvus ey matagu.”
44028005	Kon impayagpag Paul sey tabbad saji assey apuy at niippun vus pey lawa nakwa an siya.
44028006	At uullayunda ey lumtog sey long-agna unnu malikwad ya natuy. Kon nabayag pun ey niippun gey makwa an siya, nambaliw sey somsomokda at kananda, “apudyus nin gey lawa tagu anna.”
44028007	Assey tummakdanganni ad Malta, inggow sey adani ey lutan sey ap-apu assey ili saji ey angngadan as Publius. Inambarun dakani minangili assey turu ey ag-agow.
44028008	Niyaspur ey masakit as aman Publius ey amud sey atungna ya da umattey as dara. Ummuy pun Paul innila, nalluwaru ey nangimpatey assey imana an siya at nakaan ey dagus sey sakitna.
44028009	Naagammuwan pun da tagu sey nakwa, nandatdatong da amin ey masakit assey vubruy saji, at namin Paul kinaan dasey sakitda.
44028010	At gapu assey amud ey layadda an dakani, nantokotokon sey innatjunda. At anna pun ey lumibbat kani ey manginturuy assey ayanni, nangatudda avus as dasey amin ey kasapuranni.
44028011	Ummayow pun sey turu ey vuran ey iniiggawanni ad Malta, nallugan kani assey usa ey bapor ey narpu ad Alexandria ey nangadnan as “Kapil ey Apudyus,” ey iniinggow as jiyuy assey timpun sey agilid saji.
44028012	Inturuyni ey nallulugan inggana as jumatong kani ad Siracos at ininggow kani as jiyuy as turu ey ag-agow.
44028013	Lummibbat kani pun vus ad Siracos, inumdas kani ad Regium ey dokor ey ili. Mavigat pun vus ambaru sey koona ey angabvid ey marpu assey padawanan nu mansinagungta assey marpuwan sey init at ambaru sey lummibbatanni. At kasin pun vus mavigat, nipanad kani assey munisipyu ad Puteoli.
44028014	Indasanni siji da ujum ey susunud assey pammati at inawisda dakani ey mikig-ow an jida as sinjumingguwan. Naas pun ji, inturuyni ey umuy ad Rome.
44028015	Jingngor pun dasey mamati ad Rome ey jummatong kani, ummalida ey mangabot an dakani ey urey addayuwan sey narpuwanda. Tey narpu da ujum assey marketan ad Appius ya narpu vus da ujum assey kananda ey Turu ey Hotel. Innilan pun Paul jida, nansaramat an Apudyus at kummasdor sey somsomokna.
44028016	Jummatong kani pun ad Rome, imparuvusda as Paul ey umuy assey piuna ey iggawan kon awad sey surdaju ey amabantey an siya.
44028017	Ummayow pun sey turu ey ag-agow, impaayag Paul dasey ap-apun da Jews ad Rome. Nadagupda pun, kanana, “Susunudku ey iyIsrael, niippun kingwak as basur as dasey jujuga taku ey Jews. Niippun vus kingwak as kumuntra assey ugali ey tinawid taku as dasey dakdakor taku assey kar-argow. Kon toan, nu paak lawa ipisuk assey baballudan ad Jerusalem asida at vus sa'un ipurang as dasey iRoman.
44028018	Vinastigarak pun asda iRoman, piunda sa'un paruvusan tey niippun indasanda as kingwak as urugna as mangngatanda an sa'un.
44028019	Kon sumanga at avus dasey jujuga taku ey Jews at siya sey napilitanak ey nanginngatu assey mabastigarak an Emperor ta siya sey angimbanag urey nu ajik jida idarum.
44028020	At nauy sey lapuna nu paʼk lawa dakayu impaayag tey piuk ey mikabagbaga an dakayu ta ipaagammuk an dakayu sey ustu nu paak lawa maposasan. At niippun ujum as lapuna nu dokon sey pammatik assey namnamaun taku ey ganak Israel.”
44028021	At kananda an siya, “Niippun mit inaw-awatni as surat ey narpu ad Judea miipanggop an sika. Ya inggow mit vus dasey jujuga taku ey narpu ad Judea at niippun mit vus impadamagda unnu inul-ullitda as lawingan as kingwam siji.
44028022	Kon piunni ey dongron sey awad assey somsomoknu miipanggop an Jesus ey uunnujum tey agammuni ey assey amin ey ili, sumanga da tagu an siya.”
44028023	At nantuturagda nu ngan sey ag-agow ey kasinda an-aabtan. Jummatong pun ji ey ag-agow, amud pey ey tagu sey naamung assey iggawan Paul. At insaradna ey mantudtuju assey vigvigat inggana assey lavi ey nangillawlawag miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus. Impapatina ey nangimpakaawat miipanggop as dasey lintog Moses ya dasey ingkur-it da profet ta awisuna jida ey mamati an Jesus.
44028024	At inggow da ujum ey namati assey imbagana kon anna dallu da ujum ey sumanga.
44028025	At navukar da tagu ey ajida pun nangkikinnaawatan. Kon assey daan pun da tagu mavukar, kanan Paul an jida, “Ustu tuttuwa sey kanan sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey imbagan profet Isaiah asda dakdakor taku assey kar-argow ey kanana,
44028026	‘Ingka ibaga nauy asda tagu; Urey nu dodongronda sey ibagak, niippun dallu maawatanda ya urey bobottogonda, ajida pun mimatunan. Nauy sey ibagam an jida,
44028027	tey da tagu anna at kama as kummabnut sey somsomokda ya kama as sinuratda sey ingada ya kama vus as kinikimitda sey atada. Tey nu ajida atyén kanan sina, dongronda sey gingak ya miilada sey ipiilak ya maawatanda sey ibagak. At nu siyaji sey makwa, mansinagungda an sa'un ta kasinku pabaruwun jida’”
44028028	At inyanungus Paul ey kanana, “Dakayu ey susunud, piuk ey ipaagammu an dakayu ey awad dasey imbaar Apudyus ey umuy mangimbaga as dasey Gentil nu ngan annunda ey misarakan. At siguraju ey dongronda.”
44028029	Imbagan pun Paul da nauy, navukar da tagu ey ansosongbat.
44028030	Ummuy as juwa ey tawun sey iniiggawan Paul assey vuruy ey ab-abangana ad Rome. At Mamaryad ey amasakey asda amin ey umuy mangila an siya.
44028031	Niippun ugyatna ey mangintudtuju assey Turey Apudyus ya sey miipanggop an Apu Jesu Cristu. Ya niippun vus manginsanga assey mantudtujuwana.
45001001	Sa'un an Paul ey usa as dasey manserservi an Cristu Jesus ya napili ey man-aposelna ya najutukan ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag.
45001002	Sey nauy ey Ambaru ey Damag at impopostan Apudyus assey kar-argow ey impakur-itna asda profet.
45001003	Sey Ambaru ey Damag sana at miipanggop assey anakna ey as Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku. Miipanggop assey kinatataguna, narpu siya assey ganak David.
45001004	Miipanggop ey assey kinaApudyusna, nipiila sey amud ey pannakabalinna ey siya sey Anak Apudyus assey ummuliyana.
45001005	Gapu an siya, inatdanak an Apudyus as waya ey ambalin as aposel Cristu ta awisuk dasey amin ey tagu assey amin ey ili ta mamatida ya jumngorda an siya.
45001006	Ya kama vus an dakayu ey awad sinat ad Rome at nijuga kayu as dasey tagu ey pinilin Apudyus ey mijuga an Jesu Cristu.
45001007	At nauy sey gapuna nu paak lawa manurat an dakayu ey awad ad Rome, dakayu ey pipiun Apudyus ya pinilina ey ambalin as taguna. Kanana atyén ta atjun Apudyus ey Ama taku ya as Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku sey amin ey vumaruwan an dakayu.
45001008	Piuk yén amangu ey mampasaramat an Apudyus ey apporok dayawun gapu an Jesu Cristu as para an dakayu losan tey nanjinjinamag sey pammatiyu assey intiru ey luvung.
45001009	As Apudyus, takjugana ey tuttuwa sey ibagak anna. Siya sey manserserviyak assey amin ey kaviilak gapu assey mangiwwarawagak assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop assey Anakna. Aaggammuna ey sosomkok dakayu losan
45001010	assey amin ey malluwaruwak. Apporowk kudawun an Apudyus ta nu iparuvusna, mawayaanak ey umali mangila an dakayu.
45001011	Tey amud sey layadku ey mangila an dakayu ta mangimvillayak assey tudtuju ey marpu assey Ispiritun Apudyus ta kumasdor sey pammatiyu.
45001012	Sey piuk ey kanan, kumasdor atyén sey somsomokyu gapu assey pammatik ya kumasdor avus sey somsomokku gapu assey pammatiyu.
45001013	Susunud, piuk ey ipaagammu an dakayu ey apporok gandatun ey umali an dakayu kon awad ey awad sey manaktak an sa'un. Sey piuk atyén at awad awisuk as mamati an dakayu ey anung sey nakwa asda Gentil assey nanudtujuwak asda ujum ey ili.
45001014	Tey kama as awad utangku, ey sey utangku sana, siya sey inyak mangiwwarawagan assey Ambaru ey Damag as dasey amin ey tagu, an jitaku man unnu da awad assey sabali ey ili, jiadar man unnu aji pun.
45001015	At siya sey lapuna nu paak lawa anggaganat ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag an dakayu ey ummili sinat ad Rome.
45001016	An sa'un ey, niippun juwajuwak assey Ambaru ey Damag tey nauy sey pannakabalin Apudyus ey manginsarakan as dasey amin ey mamati ey amangu dasey Jews asi at dasey Gentil.
45001017	Tey sey Ambaru ey Damag at ipaagammuna nu ngan annun Apudyus ey mangimvilang assey tagu as niyun-un an siya. Ya niippun kasin mangimvilangana assey tagu as niyun-un nu aji anggey sey pammatina. Tey siya nauy sey impasurat Apudyus ey kanana, “Matagu sey ivilang Apudyus as niyun-un gapu assey pammatina.”
45001018	As Apudyus ey awad ad langit, impiilana sey amud ey putukna asda amin ey basur ya kinarwing da tagu. Tey gapu assey kinarwingda, lingbana sey mipaagammuwan sey katuttuwaan.
45001019	Jusaun Apudyus jida tey dasey mabalin ey maagammuwan miipanggop an siya at nipaagammu ey narawag tey as Apudyus sey nangimpakaawat an jida.
45001020	Tey mallugi assey nangwaan Apudyus assey luvung, maaawwatan ya narawag sey mannanayun ey pannakabalinna ya kinaApudyusna ey urey nu aji siya miila tey miila asda kingwana. At niippun lasun da tagu as ajida mangigammuwan an siya.
45001021	Urey nu aaggammuda ey awad as Apudyus, ajida pun atjun sey dayow ey para an siya unnu niippun pey lawa kananda ey ampasaramatda an siya. Nambalin at avus as niippun gotok sey somsomokda ya kama as aggikbot dasey awad an jida.
45001022	Urey nu kananda ey nariingda, nambalinda as ung-ung.
45001023	Tey ingginongda ey mandayow an Apudyus ey matatagu as ing-inggana ya siya at avus dayawunda dasey tinaggutaggu unnu tinitititit unnu sinang-animar unnu ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey mangkadkaddarap.
45001024	At gapu assey inuung-ung ey kopyada, vinaybay-an Apudyus jida ta amorna ey koonda dasey lawingan ey pipiun sey long-agda ya dasey kaggissow ya kaviviin ey kookoonda assey long-agda.
45001025	Inorsanda sey katuttuwaan miipanggop an Apudyus assey inuussat ya siya avus dayawunda ya manserviyanda dasey kingwan Apudyus ey as Apudyus atyén ey nangwa sey lobbongna ey madayow as ing-inggana. Amen!
45001026	Siyana sey lapuna ey vinaybay-an Apudyus jida ta amorna ey koonda dasey kaviviin ey pipiun sey long-agda. Ya urey dasey vubai at nakaan sey layadda ey midor-ag as dasey laraki tey dasey anungda ey vubai at avus sey piunda ey midor-agan.
45001027	Ya anungna avus as dasey laraki, nakaan sey layadda ey midor-ag as dasey vubai tey dasey anungda at avus ey laraki sey piunda ey midor-agan. Kaviviin sey kookoonda assey usa ya usa at siya sey lak-amunda sey jusa ey mitagop assey aggissow ey kookoonda.
45001028	At gapu assey aji pun dasey tagu mamigvigan assey katuttuwaan miipanggop an Apudyus, vinaybay-ana jida ta amorna ey ansommosommokda ey mangwa as dasey dakumpun ey makwa.
45001029	Ya kama as nasonson assey viyagda sey amin ey karasin ji basur ya kinarwing, kinaagum ya ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey karasin ji dakumpun ey makwa. Maaposda, gumngatda, mikaisikda, umaallilowda ya panggoponda ey awad atyén lawingan as makwa asda vurunda. Kaputanda,
45001030	ampipinnarwingda, sasang-anda as Apudyus, amud sey langsitda, ampaspas-umda ya long-agda anggey sey idadayowda. Nariingda ey ansomsomok asda dakumpun ey makwa, ajida pun purus dongron dasey dakdakorda,
45001031	niippun akit as ambaru ey awad assey somsomokda, ajida pun matalik ey tagu ya niippun layadda anda daguda asda vurunda.
45001032	Ya urey nu aaggammuda sey lintog Apudyus ey lobbongna ey mipagngat dasey mangwa asda nauy, iturturuyda pey dallu ey mangwa. Ya usa pey, allaylayadda at avus ey mangavun nu awad mangwa asda kanaʼsji ey makwa.
45002001	Ngadannu man ey tagu ey amabasur assey asintatagum, ajim pun maggey malisiyan sey jusan Apudyus urey ngan sey katatagum tey nu goddongam sey usa ey tagu ya sey kingwana at siya vus sey koom, sey long-agnu vus pigey sey ginoddongam.
45002002	Tey agammu taku ey niyun-un sey koon Apudyus ey manguwis asda amin ey tagu ey mangwaʼs jugannaʼt.
45002003	Ey sey kanam, ajin pun sika an Apudyus jusaun nu sey kookoom at isuna sey kookoon da tagu ey ginoddongam?
45002004	Ey niippun balorna an sika sey amud ey vinarun Apudyus ya sey manginyaattumana ey aji pun manusa asda tagu ya sey mangaannusana an jida. Ey ajim pun maawatan ey sey amud ey vinarun Apudyus at piuna ey ambabawika?
45002005	Kon an sika, sumangaka at avus ey ambabawi gapu ta tummabvug sey urum. At insopsopnu at avus sey majusaam assey ag-agow ey mangimpiil-an Apudyus assey amud ey putukna ya miil-an sey ustu ey koona ey man-uwis.
45002006	Tey atjun Apudyus sey gun-gunan sey usa ya usa ey tagu ey miyambong assey kingwakingwana.
45002007	At dasey tagu ey nangan-anus ey nangwa assey ambaru gapu ta namnamaunda ey as Apudyus sey mangindayow an jida ya mataguda assey iggowna, atjuna an jida sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
45002008	Kon dasey tagu ey siya pangpanguwunda koon dasey pipiun sey long-agda ya sumangada ey mangunud asda ambaru ey makwa ta siya koonda dasey lawingan ey makwa, lak-amunda sey amud ey putuk ya jusan Apudyus an jida.
45002009	At dasey apporow nangwa as lawingan, lak-amunda sey amud ey sigab ya tongtong-ag, amangu dasey Jews, asi at dasey Gentil.
45002010	Kon dasey apporow mangwa as ambaru, idayow ya ipangatun Apudyus jida ya atjuna sey vumaruwan sey somsomokda, amangu dasey Jews, asi at dasey Gentil.
45002011	Tey as Apudyus, an-iisuwuna sey koona assey man-uwisana asda tagu.
45002012	Dasey nakabasur ey niippun sey Lintog Moses an jida, majusada ey aji pun Apudyus ibasar sey igoddongna ey jusada assey Lintog. Kon as dasey Jews gapu ta awad sey lintog Moses an jida, nauy ey lintog sey mangimbasaran Apudyus ey mangoddong assey majusaanda.
45002013	Tey dakumpun dasey andodongngor assey lintog sey ivilang Apudyus as niyun-un nu aji dasey mangunud assey amin ey kanan sey Lintog.
45002014	At urey nu niippun sey Lintog Moses as dasey Gentil, nu koonda sey ambaru ey niigga assey Lintog gapu ta agammuda sey ambaru ey makwa, nauy ey kasomsomkanda at nambalin as lintog an jida.
45002015	Sey kookoonda, siya sey angimpiila ey kama as nikur-it sey kanan sey Lintog assey somsomokda. Ya sey somsomokda avus sey mangimbaga an jida nu ustu sey kookoonda unnu aji pun.
45002016	At siyana sey makwa assey ag-agow ey mangimpaviyangan Apudyus an Jesu Cristu ey manguwis assey kangamin ey urey dasey aji pun naagammuwan ey awad assey somsomok da tagu. Nauy vus pigey sey apporok ibaga assey mangiwwarawagak assey Ambaru ey Damag.
45002017	Kon an sika, vigvigum ey usaka ey Jews ya siya dokdokrom sey mangunudam assey Lintog ya ipaspas-umnu ey tagun Apudyus sika
45002018	ya agammum sey piun Apudyus ey koom ya nariingka ey mamili assey ustu ey makwa tey inadarnu da nauy assey Lintog.
45002019	Ya isigurajum ey sika sey manudtuju asda tagu ey kamaʼs nabvurag assey miipanggop an Apudyus ta masilawan dasey aggongot ey somsomokda.
45002020	Ya kanam ey kaviilam ey mamagbaga ya mantudtuju asda tagu ey kamaʼs anak ey niippun agammuna assey ustu. Siyana sey kanam tey assey somsomoknu at agammum sey Lintog Apudyus ey marpuwan sey amin ey kinariing ya mangdasan assey katuttuwaan.
45002021	Kon sika ey apporow mantudtuju asda ujum, paʼm aji tudtujuwan sey long-agnu? Itudtujum ey ajida man-akow, kon paka vus man-akow nu'?.
45002022	Sika ey sumanga assey dagdagas, paka vus mikadagdagas nu'? Ya kanam ey vusurum da ap-apudyus, kon paka sumakey assey tempélda ey mangakow asda awad ad darum?
45002023	Ampaspas-umka ey awad an sika sey Lintog Apudyus kon sika vus pigey sey angimviviin an Apudyus gapu assey apporom mallabsingan assey nauy ey lintogna!
45002024	Nauy sey piun sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Sey lapuna as mangillayusan da Gentil an Apudyus at gapu an dakayu ey Jews.”
45002025	Awad sey patig sey kugit nu unujum sey Lintog Apudyus. Kon nu ajim unujun sey Lintog, niippun servina tey miyisuka asda Gentil ey dakumpun as tagun Apudyus.
45002026	Kama avus as dasey Gentil, urey nu ajida pun nampakugit, kon unujunda sey Lintog Apudyus ey ajin pun lawa Apudyus jida ivilang as kama as nakugit ey taguna?
45002027	At nu unujun dasey Gentil sey kanan sey Lintog urey nu ajida pun nakugit, jida sey mangimbaga ey nakabasur kayu tey urey nu awad an dakayu sey nikukur-it ey Lintog Apudyus ya nampakugit kayu, nilabsingyu pey dallu sey nauy ey Lintog.
45002028	Tey sey ustu ey Jews at dasey nabarbaliwan sey somsomokda ey dakumpun dasey niyanak ey Jews ya nakugit ey miila sey nakwaana assey long-ag. Jida sey kama as nakugit ey vinarbaliwan sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey dakumpun assey mangunudan assey nikur-it ey Lintog. Sey kanaʼsna ey tagu at dakumpun as sey anungna ey tagu sey mangindayow an siya nu aji as Apudyus.
45003001	At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, aji pey niippun nallasiyan dasey Jews as dasey Gentil? Ya niippun vus servin sey ampakugitan?
45003002	Dakumpun as kanasnaʼt tey adjuwan sey nallasiyan dasey Jews. Sey usa, dasey Jews sey nangintalikan Apudyus assey Gingana.
45003003	Nu as gagara ya awad Jews as aji pun matalik, ey sey piuna kanan, aji pun vus matalik as Apudyus ey manongpar assey imbagana?
45003004	Dakumpun as kanasnaʼt sey piuna kanan! Tey urey nu man-us-ussat da amin ey tagu, aji pun mabalin ey man-us-ussat as Apudyus. Tey sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, kanana, “Nu gumingaka Apudyus, maagammuwan ey ustu sey ibagam. Nu awad amabasur an sika, aji pun mabalin ey maabakka.”
45003005	Kon nu sey lawingan ey kookoon taku at ipaniknikna sey kinalintog Apudyus, ey mabalin pun lawa kanan taku ey, “Aji pun nalintog as Apudyus nu jusauna jitaku.” (Siya mit sey mabalin ey kanan da tagu.)
45003006	Kon dakumpun as kanasnaʼt! Tey nu aji atyén nalintog as Apudyus, ngan annuna ey manguwis asda amin ey tagu?
45003007	Kon mabalin ey awad dasey mangimbaga ey kananda, “Nu gapu assey ussatku at sin-umamud sey miil-an sey kinatuttuwan Apudyus, paak vus magoddongan ey majusa nu'?”
45003008	Dasey mangimbaga as nauy at anungna vus nu kananda, “Koon taku at sey lawingan tey iluswana mit sey ambaru.” Tuttuwa ey awad dasey nangam-amsiw an sa'un ey kananda ey siyana kanu sey apporok itudtuju kon dakumpun as tuttuwa naʼt. At jida sey lobbongda ey majusa.
45003009	Ngan sey makanan taku? Ey ambab-aru sey katatagun dasey Jews nu dasey Gentil? Dakumpun! Tey imbabaggak ey man-isu ey iturturayan sey basur dasey amin ey tagu, Jews man unnu Gentil.
45003010	Tey naya sey kanan sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, “Niippun niyun-un as urey sa'an ey tagu.
45003011	Niippun avus ustu as makaawat assey miipanggop an Apudyus ya niippun ustu as manganap unnu mangagammu an siya.
45003012	Losanda nan-awidan as Apudyus at nambalinda as lawing ey tagu. Niippun mangwa assey ustu urey lawa sa'an.”
45003013	“Ya sey sungadda at anungna sey nantatakang ey lavun ey sumungsung tey pasig ey aggissow sey igingada. Ya sey sungadda sey usarunda ey mangallilow asda vurunda. Ya sey apporon sey sungadda ibaga at anungna dogot sey tabbad.
45003014	Pasigda man-arawag ya mansasagganada ey guminga.
45003015	Ya allasuwunda ey gumngat.
45003016	Ya urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey ayanda, awad ey awad sey dadailunda ya guru ey makwa.
45003017	Ya niippun agammuda ey mangindaran assey vumaruwan ya kapanusan.
45003018	Ya niippun ugyatda an Apudyus.”
45003019	At ey sana, agammu taku ey amin ey nikur-it assey Lintog Apudyus at naatud ta unujun dasey tagu ey naatudana ta niippun allasun sey usa ey tagu ey mangimbaga ey niippun kanu basurna at ajina pun karobbongan ey majusa. Kon dakumpun as kanasnaʼt tey amin ey tagu at nakabasur an Apudyus.
45003020	Tey niippun tagu as ivilang Apudyus as niyun-un gapu assey mangunudana assey Lintog. Tey sey muusaran sey Lintog at ipaagammuna as dasey tagu ey nakabasurda.
45003021	Kon ey sana, nipaagammu sey koon Apudyus ey mangimvilang assey usa ey tagu as niyun-un, kon dakumpun as gapu assey mangunudana assey Lintog. Sey nauy ey planu at nibabagga assey Lintog Moses ey tinakjugan dasey profet
45003022	ey sey ivilang Apudyus as niyun-un at sey tagu ey awad pammatina an Jesu Cristu. Ya an-iisu sey koon Apudyus assey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu.
45003023	At gapu ta niippun tagu as aji vummasur, adayuda losan assey kinaambarun Apudyus.
45003024	Kon assey sana, gapu assey amud ey kinaambaruna, imvilangna jitaku as niyun-un gapu assey kingwan Cristu Jesus ey nanubvut an jitaku.
45003025	Tey as Jesu Cristu, siya sey imbaar Apudyus ey matuy ta sey mivukvukan sey darana, siya sey mamayadna assey basur da tagu ta amin ey mamati an siya, mapakawan dasey basurda. Kingwan Apudyus nauy ta ipiilana sey kinalintogna ey man-uwis. Tey assey kar-argow, inanuanusana sey basur dasey tagu at ajina pun jida jinusa ey dagus.
45003026	Kon assey sana, impiilana sey kinalintogna assey nangimvilangana as niyun-un dasey amin ey mamati an Jesus.
45003027	At ey sana, ey awad pun lawa mabalin taku idayow as kinaambaru taku? Niippun! Tey dakumpun assey nangunudan taku assey Lintog sey mangimvilangan Apudyus an jitaku as niyun-un nu aji gapu anggey assey pammati taku an Cristu.
45003028	Tey patiyun taku ey gapu anggey assey pammati sey mivilangan taku as niippun basurna an Apudyus ey dakumpun assey mangunudan taku assey Lintog.
45003029	Tey as Apudyus, dakumpun anggey as dasey Jews sey sin-Apudyus an siya nu aji urey dasey Gentil.
45003030	Sa'an anggey as Apudyus ya sa'an anggey sey mivilangan sey tagu as niippun basurna, Jews man unnu Gentil ey gapu anggey assey pammati.
45003031	Ey sey piuna kanan, iwwalin sey pammati taku sey Lintog? Aji pun a, tey jitaku at avus sey manutuntun assey Lintog.
45004001	Ngan sey makanan taku an Abraham ey singganak asda dakdakor taku, ngan sey lapuna ey nivilang siya as niyun-un?
45004002	Nu sey nangimvilangan Apudyus an Abraham as niyun-un ey tagu at gapu asda kingwana, awad atyén ipaspas-umna. Kon assey katuttuwaan, niippun mabalinna ipaspas-um assey sinagung Apudyus.
45004003	Tey sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus, kanana, “Pinatin Abraham as Apudyus, at gapu assey pammatina, imvilang Apudyus siya as niyun-un ey tagu.”
45004004	Nu mansiput sey usa ey tagu, aji pun mivilang as atud sey nilabvuwana nu aji bayad sey inayongna.
45004005	Kon sey tagu ey aji pun mansiput para assey kasarakanana, nu aji mantalik anggey an Apudyus ey nangimvilang an siya as niyun-un ey urey nu manangbasur, sey pammatina vus pigey sey lapuna as nangimvilangan Apudyus an siya as niyun-un ey tagu.
45004006	Siya nauy sey piun David ey ugujun assey nangimbagaana ey allaylayad sey tagu ey ivilang Apudyus as niyun-un ey dakumpun as gapu assey kingwana.
45004007	Kanan David, “Nagasat sey tagu ey pinakawan Apudyus dasey basurna.
45004008	Nagasat sey tagu ey imvilang Apudyus as niippun basurna.”
45004009	Ey nauy ey ragsak at para anggey as dasey nakugit ey Jews? Aji pun! Tey urey avus dasey Gentil ey aji pun nakugit at mijugada, tey nu somsomkon taku sey impakur-it Apudyus miipanggop an Abraham assey kar-argow, imvilangna siya as niyun-un gapu anggey assey pammatina.
45004010	Makanu sey nangimvilangan Apudyus an Abraham as niyun-un? Ey assey naas nampakugit? Aji pun, tey imvilang Apudyus siya as niyun-un assey daan pun atgey makugit.
45004011	Tey sey nampakugitana assey ummanungus, siyaji sey mangimpiila ey awad pammatina ya imvilang Apudyus siya as niyun-un ey tagu. At urey assey daanna pun makugitan, imvilang Apudyus siya as niyun-un ey tagu gapu assey pammatina. At nambalin siya as pannakaaman dasey amin ey tagu ey ivilang Apudyus as niyun-un urey nu ajida pun as nakugit.
45004012	Ya as Abraham vus sey pannakaaman dasey luus nakugit, kon aji pun as gapu ta nakugitda nu aji gapu ta inunudda sey pammatin Abraham urey assey daanna pun makugitan.
45004013	Impostan Apudyus an Abraham ya as dasey ganakna ey jida sey mallaksun assey luvung. Impostana jiyuy dakumpun as gapu assey nangunudan Abraham assey Lintog nu aji gapu assey namatiyana at siya sey nangimvilangan Apudyus an siya as niyun-un ey tagu.
45004014	At nu maatud sey impostan Apudyus as dasey mangunud anggey assey lintog, piuna ugujun, niippun servin sey pammati ya niippun vus mitupakan sey impostan Apudyus.
45004015	Tey sey Lintog, siya sey mibasaran sey majusaan sey tagu, kon nu niippun lintog, niippun malabsing.
45004016	At maawatan taku ey sey impostan Apudyus at maatud anggey asda tagu ey mamati an siya ey mibasar assey kinaambaruna. At nu kinaambarun Apudyus sey mibasarana, siguraju ey maatud an jitaku losan ey mivilang as ganak Abraham ya dakumpun anggey as dasey Jews ey nangigammu assey Lintog nu aji amin ey mamati ey anung sey pammatin Abraham. Tey siya sey kama as ama taku losan,
45004017	ey siya nauy sey piuna ugujun sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Ambalinuk sika as pannakaaman dasey adjuwan ey tagu asda kikkiili.” Assey angiilan Apudyus, nambalin as Abraham as ama taku losan tey pinatina as Apudyus ey mabalin taguwuna dasey natuy. Ya pinatina as Apudyus ey mabalin manginyumug assey kangamin ya naawad ey urey niippun lapuna.
45004018	Pinatin Abraham ya ninamnamana ey makwa sey impostan Apudyus urey nu niippun namnamana ey makwa sey niposta at siya sey nambalinana as pannakaaman dasey adjuwan ey tagu. Tey sey imbagan Apudyus, kanana, “Sey kaajun sey ganaknu at anungna sey kaajun dasey vituwun ad langit.”
45004019	Aji pun as Abraham nanjuwajuwa ey urey nu agammuna ey kama pey lawa as nanattuy sey long-agna tey umuy ogon as singgasut sey tawunna ya basig amin as Sarah ey asawana. Kon urey nu kananaʼsji, aji pun pey dallu nanjuwajuwa sey pammatina ey matongpar sey imbagan Apudyus.
45004020	Inturturuyna ey namati ey aji pun avus nanjuwajuwa ey tongparun Apudyus sey impostana, tey assey katuttuwaan, kummasdor at avus sey pammatina ya jinaydayowna as Apudyus.
45004021	Ya insigurajuna assey somsomokna ey koon Apudyus sey impostana.
45004022	At gapu assey nauy ey pammatina, imvilang Apudyus siya as niyun-un ey tagu.
45004023	Kon sey nauy ey nuugud ey imvilang Apudyus siya as niyun-un ey tagu at aji pun as nikur-it ey para anggey an Abraham
45004024	nu aji nijuga taku avus ey mivilang as niyun-un, jitaku ey mamati an Apudyus ey siya sey nanagu an Jesus ey Apu taku assey natuyana.
45004025	Siya sey nipagngat gapu assey basur taku asi at umuli ta mivilang taku as niippun basurna.
45005001	Ey sana tey anna ey imvilang Apudyus jitaku as niyun-un ey tagu gapu assey pammati taku, nakwa sey podon taku an siya gapu assey kingwan Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku.
45005002	At gapu an siya, nilagum taku assey dagun Apudyus ey siya sey magikna taku anna assey sana. At allaylayad taku tey namnamaun taku ey milak-am assey midayawan Apudyus.
45005003	Ya dakumpun anggey jiyuy as mallaylaydan taku nu aji mallaylayad taku avus assey matongtong-agan taku tey agammu taku ey sey tongtong-ag at siya sey mangatud assey anus taku.
45005004	At nu maanusan taku sey tongtong-ag, ipaluswana sey ambaru ey ugali ey avunan Apudyus. Ya nu avunan Apudyus sey ugali taku, siguraju ey matongpar sey namnama taku.
45005005	At sey nauy ey namnama taku, aji pun mangatud as ngumayaan sey somsomok tey agammu taku ey matongpar gapu assey Ispirituna ey inatjuna an jitaku tey impagiknana an jitaku sey amud ey layad Apudyus.
45005006	At assey ustu ey timpu ey pinilin Apudyus, assey niippun atgey lamug taku ey manurung assey long-ag taku, ummali as Cristu ey natuy para an jitaku ey ambasbasur.
45005007	Mansigab as iyuyan sey tagu sey long-agna ey matuy para assey usa ey niyun-un ey tagu. Kon mabalin nin ey awad manginturud ey matuy para assey ambaru ey tagu.
45005008	Kon as Apudyus, impiilana sey amud ey layadna an jitaku tey urey gey anna ey ambasbasur taku, imbaarna as Cristu ey matuy para an jitaku.
45005009	At nu imvilang Apudyus jitaku as niyun-un gapu assey daran Cristu ey nivukvuk assey natuyana, sin-umamud ey dokor sey namnama taku ey sarakana jitaku assey manusaana asda tagu.
45005010	Tey nu imvilang jitaku an Apudyus as vub-urunna gapu assey natuyan Cristu ey anakna assey timpu ey kavusurna jitaku, siguraju ey misarakan taku assey daan ey ag-agow gapu assey natatagguwan Cristu tey nambalin as vub-urunna.
45005011	Kon dakumpun anggey da nauy sey namnamaun taku tey urey assey sana at allaylayad taku gapu assey nambalinan taku as vub-urun Apudyus gapu an Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku ey siya sey nangwa assey mikavub-urunan taku an siya.
45005012	Gapu assey basur sey usa ey tagu assey kar-argow ey as Adam, jiyuy sey lugin sey nambasuran da amin ey tagu. Ya sey salinunut sey basurna at sey natuyana ey jiyuy vus mitakurungan da amin ey tagu ey matuy tey vummasurda losan.
45005013	At urey assey daan pun Apudyus mangatudan assey Lintogna an Moses, jummada'an sey basur dasey tagu ey urey nu niippun lintog as nilabsingda tey daan pun atgey maatud sey lintog saji.
45005014	Kon nallugi assey timpun Adam inggana assey timpun Moses, matumatuy vus pigey da tagu urey dasey aji pun nambasur as isun sey basur Adam ey aji pun nangunud assey vilin Apudyus. Kon awad sey miyisuwan Adam an Cristu ey siya sey miyoros ey umali.
45005015	Kon aji pun as man-isu sey mantongparan sey basur Adam ya sey illiblin Apudyus ey atjuna. Tey nu matuy da amin ey tagu gapu assey basur sey usa ey tagu, ambab-aru sey mantongparan sey kinaambarun Apudyus ya anungna vus assey libli ey innatudna asda adjuwan ey tagu gapu assey kingwan Jesu Cristu ey nangimpiila assey kinaambaruna.
45005016	Sey usa avus ey aji pun nan-isuwan sey libli ey innatud Apudyus ya sey salinunut sey basur sey usa ey tagu at naya: Sey nantongparan sey sa'an ey basur at nagoddongan dasey amin ey tagu ey majusa. Kon sey libli ey innatud Apudyus at sey nangimvilangana an jitaku as niippun basurna urey nu adjuwan sey nambasuran taku.
45005017	Tuttuwa ey gapu assey basur sey sa'an ey tagu, nanturey sey katuy asda amin ey tagu. Kon sinjumallu sey vinarun sey nantongparan sey kingwan sey usa ey tagu ey as Jesu Cristu. Tey da amin ey mangawat assey amud ey kinaambarun Apudyus ya sey libli ey innatudna as mivilanganda as niyun-un, mijugada an Cristu assey manturayana.
45005018	At urey nu nagoddongan ey matuy da amin ey tagu gapu assey basur sey usa ey tagu, mabalin pey dallu mivilang sey tagu as niippun basurna ta maatdan as viyag ey niippun patinggana gapu assey sa'an ey ambaru ey kingwan Jesu Cristu.
45005019	At gapu assey aji pun nanongparan sey usa ey tagu assey vilin Apudyus, nambalin ey nakabasur da amin ey tagu. Kon gapu avus assey nanongparan sey usa ey tagu an Apudyus, mivilang vus as niyun-un an Apudyus dasey amin ey mamati.
45005020	Naatud sey Lintog ta awad mangagammuwan da tagu assey amud ey basurda. Kon urey nu kananaʼsji ey amud sey basur dasey tagu, sin-umamud dallu sey kinaambarun Apudyus ey manurung an jida.
45005021	Tuttuwa ey sey basur sey nanginturey as dasey katagutagu ta matuyda ey misina an Apudyus. Kon assey sana, sey kinaambarun Apudyus sey anturturey ey siya sey mivilangan taku as niyun-un ey manginturung an jitaku assey viyag ey niippun patinggana gapu assey nijugaan taku an Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
45006001	At ngan sey makanan taku? Ey iturturuy taku ey vumasur ta majugjug-an sey kinaambarun Apudyus an jitaku?
45006002	Aji pun in mabalin! Tey ngan annun taku ey manginturuy ey vumasur ey nivilang taku mit as natuy at nakaan sey pannakabalin sey basur an jitaku.
45006003	Agammuyu mit ey assey navunyagan taku ey nijugaan taku an Cristu Jesus, kama taku avus as natuy ey nijuga assey natuyana.
45006004	Assey navunyagan taku, nijuga taku ey natuy assey natuyana ya assey nilabnana. At assey sana ey ummuli as Cristu assey katuy gapu assey pannakabalin Ama taku ey Apudyus, mabalin ey mijuga taku avus assey baru ey viyagna.
45006005	At gapu ta nijuga taku an siya ey natuy assey natuyana, mijuga taku avus an siya ey kasin matagu assey ummuliyana.
45006006	Tey agammu taku ey sey jummada'an ey katatagu taku at nijuga ey nilansa assey krus ta makaan sey pannakabalin sey nisisigud ey katatagu taku ey ambasbasur ya aji taku ampaalipan assey basur.
45006007	Tey nu natuy sey usa ey tagu, nawayawayaan siya assey pannakabalin sey basur.
45006008	At gapu ta nijuga taku ey natuy an Cristu, agammu taku ey mijuga taku avus an siya ey kasin matagu.
45006009	Tey agammu taku ey tinagun Apudyus siya assey natuyana ya aji pun kasin matuy tey niippun ogon kaviilan sey katuy ey manginturey an siya.
45006010	At sey natuyana, ummaney as makaanan sey pannakabalin sey basur. At assey matatagguwana assey sana, matagu assey madayawan Apudyus.
45006011	At masapur sosomkonyu ey nivilang kayu as natuy assey kaviilan sey basur kon anna at ey inatdan Cristu Jesus dakayu assey viyag ey matagu para assey madayawan Apudyus.
45006012	At siya sey ajiyu iparuvus sey basur ey manginturey an dakayu ta ajiyu unujun dasey lawingan ey pipiun sey long-ag.
45006013	Ya ajiyu avus ituruk sey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey partin sey long-agyu ey vumasur ta muusar ey mangwa asda lawingan, nu aji atjunyu sey amin ey partin sey long-agyu an Apudyus ta muusar ey mangwa as dasey ambaru ey makwa. Nauy sey miyambong as dasey tagu ey kama as natuy kon innatdan Apudyus as baru ey viyag.
45006014	Aji pun mabalin ey kasin sey basur dakayu iturayan tey assey sana, dakumpun assey Lintog sey manginturung assey viyagyu nu aji sey kinaambarun Apudyus.
45006015	At assey sana, ey iturturuy taku ey ambasur tey dakumpun assey Lintog sey manginturturung an jitaku nu aji sey kinaambarun Apudyus? Aji pun in mabalin!
45006016	Ey ajiyu pun agammu ey sey nangiyyuyaanyu assey long-agyu ey mangwa assey ibagan sey usa ey tagu at siya sey nambalin as Apuyu ey sin-alipan an dakayu? At nu ampaalipan kayu assey basur, katuy sey antongparanyu. Kon nu as Apudyus sey piliyunyu ey unujun, antongpar kayu assey mangimvilangana an dakayu as niyun-un.
45006017	Kon ampasaramatak an Apudyus tey urey nu alipan dakayu assey basur assey kar-argow, nambalin kayu ey napasnik assey sana ey mangunud assey katuttuwaan ey nitudtuju an dakayu.
45006018	At assey sana, nawayaan kayu assey basur at nambalin kayu as alipan sey niyun-un ey kaviviyag.
45006019	Sey nangusarak as pani miipanggop asda alipan ya apu ta allasu as maawatan tey daan pun atgey umaju sey maawatanyu. Assey kar-argow, iyyuyayu sey amin ey partin sey long-agyu assey basur ta siya kookoonyu dasey lawingan ya kaggissow ey makwa. Ey sana masapur avus iyuyayu sey amin ey partin sey long-agyu ey ampaalipan assey niyun-un ey kaviviyag ta ambalin kayu as nadarus an Apudyus.
45006020	Assey kar-argow ey alipan dakayu assey basur, niippun kananyu ey koonyu dasey ambabaru ey piun Apudyus.
45006021	Kon ey awad ambaru as naganabyu ey nangwa asda kingwayu assey kar-argow? Niippun! Tey siya illuswana, sey miviviinanyu assey sana. Tey sey mantongparan da jiyuy ey kingwayu at sey matuyanyu ey misina an Apudyus as ing-inggana.
45006022	Kon assey sana, nawayaan kayu assey basur ya nambalin kayu as alipan Apudyus. Sey magun-udyu at sey napasnik ey viyag ey ambalinanyu as nadarus ey manturung assey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
45006023	Tey sey bayad sey basur at sey matuyan ey misinaan an Apudyus as ing-inggana. Kon sey illiblin Apudyus ey inatjuna at sey mannanayun ey mikataguwan an siya gapu assey nijugaan taku an Cristu Jesus ey Apu taku.
45007001	Dakayu ey susunud, agammuk ey maawatanyu sey ibagak tey aaggammuyu sey amin ey Lintog. Agammuyu mit ey awad sey karobbongan sey Lintog ey manginturey assey tagu nu sissiya ey matattagu.
45007002	Anungna assey vubai ey nangasawa. Sey kanan sey lintog, aji pun mabalin ey mangasawa assey sabali ey laraki nu sissiya sey asawana. Kon nu matuy sey asawana, mawayaan sey vubai assey nauy ey lintog at mabalin ey kasin mangasawa.
45007003	At nu sissiya as asawana ya da umuy assey sabali ey laraki, kanan taku ey nikadagdagas siya. Kon nu natuy sey asawana, niippun kalintogan sey lintog sana an siya, at aji pun as mikadagdagas nu kasin mangasawa.
45007004	At kanasnaʼt vus an dakayu ey susunud. Nawayaan kayu assey karobbongan sey Lintog gapu assey nijugaanyu ey nikakatuy assey natuyan Cristu tey kama as partin sey long-ag Cristu dakayu. At assey sana, as Cristu sey singkuwa an dakayu tey nijuga kayu ey kasin natagu ta mabalin ey manservi kayu an Apudyus.
45007005	Tey assey nataguwan taku assey kar-argow, apporow taku inunud dasey gagangeyn sey kinatagu. At ummam-amud ummaju dasey lawingan ey pipiun sey long-ag taku gapu assey nangigammuwan taku assey Lintog. At kingwa taku dasey manginturung an jitaku assey matuyan.
45007006	Kon assey sana, gapu assey nijugaan taku ey natuy assey natuyan Cristu, nawayaan taku assey Lintog ey nangalipan an jitaku. At sey manserserviyan taku an Apudyus assey sana, aji pun mibasar assey mangunudan assey nikur-it ey Lintog ey anung sey kingwa taku assey kar-argow nu aji mibasar assey baru ey katatagu ey marpu assey Ispiritun Apudyus.
45007007	Ey mabalin pun lawa kanan taku ey sey Lintog at lawingan? Aji pun in! Tey nu niippun Lintog, ajik pun naagammuwan sey basur. Nu niippun Lintog as kanana, “Ajika angkarmukam as kuwan sey sabali ey tagu,” ajik pun naagammuwan ey basur atpey sey angkarmukam.
45007008	Kon gapu assey nauy ey vilin sey Lintog, ginundawayan at avus sey basur ey nangimpaluswa asda nantokotokon ey karasin ji karmukam. Tey nu niippun lintog, niippun maagammuwan as basur.
45007009	Assey kar-argow ey niippun agammuk nu ngan sey piun sey Lintog ey kanan, napnikak assey kook ey matagu. Kon naawatak pun sey piuna ey kanan, naagammuwak at avus ey manangbasurak
45007010	ya kamaak as natuy. At sey ambaru ey Lintog ey manginturung atyén an sa'un assey mataguwak, illuswana at avus sey magoddongak ey matuy ey misina an Apudyus.
45007011	Tey jummatong pun sey Lintog, illuswana at avus sey wayawayan sey basur ey mangallilow ya mangngat an sa'un.
45007012	Naapudyusan sey Lintog ya naapudyusan vus sey vilinna ey ambaru ya ustu.
45007013	Ey sey piun nauy ey kanan, misina taku an Apudyus gapu assey ambaru ey Lintog? Aji pun in! Tey sey basur sey nangusar assey ambaru ey Lintog as matuyak. At siyana sey mangil-an taku ey gapu assey ambaru ey vilin sey Lintog, ummam-amud at avus ey pinarwing jitaku assey basur.
45007014	Agammu taku ey ambaru sey Lintog tey as Apudyus sey narpuwana. Kon taguwak anggey ey allasu as vumasur. Anungku sey tagu ey ningina as man-alipan sey basur.
45007015	Ajik pun maawatan sey kookook tey dasey piuk ey koon, ajiyak pun as makakwa ya dasey sasang-ak ey koon, siya at avus sey apporok koon.
45007016	At nu dasey apporok koon at jida dasey sasang-ak ey koon, piuna ugujun, vigviguk sey kinabarun sey Lintog.
45007017	At dakumpun as sa'un sey apporow mangwa as dasey lawingan nu aji sey basur ey awad an sa'un.
45007018	Agammuk ey niippun pigey ambaru as nisisigud ey awad an sa'un tey urey nu piuk ey koon sey ambaru, ajiyak pun as makakwa.
45007019	Tey dasey ambaru ey piuk ey koon, da jiyuy sey ajiyak pun as makakwa. Kon dasey lawingan ey jikpun piun koon, da jiyuy at avus sey apporok koon.
45007020	At nu kook dasey jikpun piun koon, piuna ugujun, dakumpun as sa'un sey nangwa nu aji sey basur ey awad an sa'un.
45007021	Da naya sey napadasak: Piuk ey mangwa assey ambaru, kon sey basur sey manginturung an sa'un ey mangwa as dasey dakumpun.
45007022	Tey assey somsomokku, maryadak assey Lintog Apudyus,
45007023	kon awad sey sabali ey manginturturey assey long-agku. At sey manginturturey assey long-agku ey siya sey ambasbasurak, vusuruna sey Lintog Apudyus ey maryadan sey somsomokku. At sey salinunutna, nambalinunak as kama as barud sey lintog sey basur ey nanangjun assey long-agku.
45007024	Siyana sey kinatataguk ey kadagdagu! Ngan gey lawa sey mabalin ey manginsarakan an sa'un assey nauy ey long-ag ey nagoddongan ey matuy?
45007025	Kon amud sey ansaramatak an Apudyus tey siya anggey sey mabalin ey manginsarakan an sa'un gapu an Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku! Naya sey katataguk: Assey somsomokku at piuk ey tongparun sey Lintog Apudyus, kon gapu assey basur ey nilong-ag an sa'un, apporok dallu tongparun sey lintog sey basur.
45008001	Amin taku ey nijujugga an Cristu Jesus at siguraju ey aji taku pun majusa.
45008002	Tey gapu assey nijujug-an taku an Cristu Jesus, awad sey viyag ey innatjun sey Ispiritu an jitaku. At sey manginturturayana an jitaku, siyaji sey nangiwwaya an jitaku assey pannakabalin sey basur ey manturung assey matuyan.
45008003	Sey aji pun kaviilan sey Lintog Moses ey koon gapu assey kinakuya taku, kingwan Apudyus. Inabakna sey kaviilan sey basur assey nangimbaarana assey anakna ey nambalin as tagu ey anung taku ey manangbasur ta siya sey mangaan assey basur taku.
45008004	Siyana sey kingwan Apudyus ta kaviilan taku ey mangunud assey ustu ey vilin sey Lintog. At mabalin ey makakwa taku nu sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey paruvusan taku ey mangindaran assey viyag taku ey dakumpun as dasey pipiun sey long-ag taku.
45008005	Sey tagu ey apporow mangunud as dasey pipiun sey long-agna, niippun ujum as manginturturey assey somsomokna nu aji sey pipiun sey long-agna. Kon sey mangunud assey piun sey Ispiritun Apudyus assey viyagna, sey Ispiritun Apudyus vus pigey sey manginturturey assey somsomokna.
45008006	Nu sey nisisigud ey kinatatagu sey mamangjun assey somsomok taku, niippun ujum as mantongparan nu aji sey matuyan ey misina an Apudyus. Kon nu sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey manginturey assey somsomok taku, maatdan taku as viyag ey niippun patinggana ya tumarna sey ansomsomkan taku.
45008007	Tey sey tagu ey ampaiturey assey niilluvungan ey somsomok, kavusurna as Apudyus. Ajina pun unujun sey lintog Apudyus tey assey katuttuwaan, ajida pun dallu makaunud assey Lintog.
45008008	At sey tagu ey siya apporona unujun sey kuwana ey somsomok, ajina pun mabalin koon sey mallaylaydan Apudyus.
45008009	Kon an dakayu ey, dakumpun as tinatagu sey anturturey nu aji sey Ispiritun Apudyus nu tuttuwa ey awad siya an dakayu. Tey ngan ey sey tagu ey niippun sey Ispiritun Cristu an siya, aji pun mivilang as tagun Cristu.
45008010	Kon nu awad as Cristu an dakayu, urey nu matuy sey long-agyu gapu assey basur, atjun dallu sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey mataguwanyu as ing-inggana gapu ta imvilang Apudyus dakayu as niyun-un ey tagu.
45008011	Nu nilong-ag an dakayu sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey nanagu an Cristu assey natuyana, taguwuna avus sey long-agyu nu matuy gapu assey Ispirituna ey nilong-ag an dakayu.
45008012	At dakayu ey susunud, kasapuran ey tongparunyu sey piun Apudyus ta dakumpun assey pipiun sey long-ag sey apporoyu koon.
45008013	Tey nu sey pipiun sey long-ag sey apporoyu unujun, niippun juwajuwana ey matuy kayu ey misina an Apudyus. Kon nu awatunyu sey turung sey Ispiritun Apudyus ta man-awidanyu sey lawingan ey apporoyu koon, matagu kayu.
45008014	Tey dasey tagu ey iturturung sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey viyagda, jida dasey anak Apudyus.
45008015	Tey sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey innatjuna an dakayu at ajina pun ambalinun dakayu as alipan ey umuugyat nu aji nambalinuna dakayu as aanak Apudyus. At gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus, mabalin ey awagan taku siya as, “Ama.”
45008016	At sey Ispiritun Apudyus avus, siya sey mangimpatuttuwa assey somsomok taku ey jitaku sey aanak Apudyus.
45008017	At gapu ta aanak jitaku an Apudyus, tawijun taku sey amin ey ipalaksunna. Ya mijuga taku avus ey mikalaksun assey amin ey atjuna an Cristu. Tey nu mikalak-am taku assey ligat Cristu, milagum taku avus an siya assey kinangatuna.
45008018	Nu somsomkok dasey amin ey tongtong-ag ey apporow taku lak-amun assey matatagguwan taku assey luta anna, adayu as miyisu assey kinabarun sey jinuma ey lak-amun taku assey daan ey ag-agow.
45008019	Ya urey dasey amin ey kingwan Apudyus at piunda ey nu mabalin, jumatong atyén assey sana sey timpu ey angimparangan Apudyus as dasey aanakna.
45008020	Tey dasey amin ey kingwan Apudyus at nagoddongan ey ampatingga sey muusaranda. Dakumpun as jida sey namiun ey kanaʼsna sey makwa nu aji siya sey piniun Apudyus ey ambanaganda. Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, awad pey dallu sey namnama
45008021	ey assey daan ey ag-agow, vumaru sey kangamin ya misarakanda assey pannakabalin sey katuy ya sey mapilokan ya milak-amda avus assey kinabarun sey jinuma ey maatud asda aanak Apudyus.
45008022	Tey agammu taku ey inggana assey sana ey timpu at kama as siaayuwwong da amin ey kingwan Apudyus ey anungda sey umanak ey vubai.
45008023	Kon dakumpun anggey as dasey kingwan Apudyus sey matongtong-ag assey sana tey urey vus jitaku ey namangu ey naatdan assey Ispirituna at anna vus ey siaayuwwong taku gapu assey sigab sey tongtong-ag assey manguullayan taku assey mangimparangan Apudyus an jitaku as niyun-un ey aanakna. At siyaji sey timpu ey manginsarakanana assey nauy ey long-ag taku asda amin ey lawingan.
45008024	Tey sey nauy ey namnama, siya sey nanginsarakan an jitaku. Kon nu naatud an jitaku sey nauy ey namnama, ey annamnama taku pey dallu? Aji pun in! Tey yangey namnamaum sey naasnu innara?
45008025	Kon nu daan pun maatud sey namnama taku, anusan taku ey anguulley.
45008026	Ya sey Ispiritu avus, turuturungan jitaku assey kinakapuy taku. Tey niippun agammu taku ey alluwaru assey ustu kon sey Ispiritu sey mikabagbaga an Apudyus para an jitaku, siya sey mangimpadakpus as dasey aji taku pun miiginga.
45008027	At as Apudyus ey nangigammu assey amin ey awad assey somsomok taku, agammuna avus sey awad assey somsomok sey Ispiritu tey sey dawatun sey Ispiritu an Apudyus ey para an jitaku ey taguna at miyunud assey piun Apudyus.
45008028	An jitaku ey mamaryad an Apudyus ey pinipilina as matongparan sey panggopna, agammu taku ey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey makwa an jitaku, ambalinuna jiyuy as vumaruwan taku.
45008029	Tey aaggammun Apudyus dasey taguna at jida sey pinipilina ey miyanung assey Anakna ta sey Anakna sey ambalin as pangu an jida ey mansusunud.
45008030	At dasey sisimmokna ey miyanung assey anakna, inayagana avus jida. At dasey inayagana, imvilangna jida as niippun basurna. Ya dasey nivilang as niippun basurna, injugana jida assey kinangatuna.
45008031	At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ngan lawa sey miibaga taku asda nauy ey kookoon Apudyus as para an jitaku? Tey nu awad as Apudyus an jitaku, niippun mabalin mangabak an jitaku.
45008032	As Apudyus, ajina pun kinagagaan sey mismu ey Anakna nu aji iyyuyana as para an jitaku. At nu iyyuyan Apudyus sey Anakna as para an jitaku, ey ajinapun pun lawa atjun dasey amin ey masapur taku?
45008033	At nu kanaʼsnaʼt, ngan sey mabalin amabasur an jitaku ey pinilin Apudyus? Ey as Apudyus pun lawa? Dakumpun a! Tey siya mit sey nangimvilang an jitaku as niippun basurna.
45008034	At ngan sey mabalin ey manusa an jitaku? Ey as Cristu Jesus pun lawa? Dakumpun a! Tey siya mit sey natuy as para an jitaku ya kasin avus natagu as para an jitaku at ey sana awad assey padawanan Apudyus ey mangintatakjug an jitaku.
45008035	At awad pun lawa mabalin ey mangaan assey layad Cristu an jitaku? Niippun! Tey urey nu amud sey ligat, unnu ngadanna ey makwa as malivukan sey somsomok, unnu manongtong-ag an jitaku, unnu muuratan, unnu kumurangan sey lumvun, unnu dasey kagguugyat ey makwamakwa, unnu urey sey matuyan taku, sissiya pey dallu sey layad Cristu an jitaku.
45008036	Tey urey sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus at nibabagga ey kanana, “Gapu an sika ey Apu, inag-agow ey awad ampanggop ey mangngat an dakani. Imvilangda dakani as karneru ey nisagana as maparti.”
45008037	Kon urey nu lak-amun taku amin da nauy ey ligat, niippun dallu kaviilan da nauy ey mangabak an jitaku nu aji nangaabak taku ogon gapu an Cristu ey mamaryad an jitaku.
45008038	Tey niippun juwajuwak ey sey layad Apudyus an jitaku at niippun mabalin mangaan. Urey nu matuy taku, unnu matattagu taku, aji pun dallu makaan sey layadna. Urey dasey enjel, unnu da jimunyu, unnu da ujum ey awad pannakabalinna at ajida pun kaviilan ey kaanun sey layadna an jitaku. Urey dasey apporow makwamakwa anna assey sana, unnu dasey makwa assey daan ey ag-agow
45008039	ya urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey awad ad ngatu, unnu awad ad darum assey luta ya amin ey awad assey luvung, niippun mabalin mangaan assey layad ey impiilan Apudyus an jitaku gapu an Cristu Jesus ey Apu taku.
45009001	Tuttuwa sey ibagabagak anna an dakayu tey usaak ey namati an Cristu at sumangaak ey mangugud assey us-ussat. Urey sey somsomokku ey inuugnan sey Ispiritun Apudyus at paniknikana ey tuttuwa sey ibagabagak
45009002	ey amud sey jujuuyku anna ya sigab sey somsomokku
45009003	gapu as dasey kadaraak ey Jews. Tey nu awad atyén kabalinana, urey pey sa'un sey miyoros an jida ey majusa ya misina an Cristu nu siya sey kasarakananda.
45009004	Tey jida sey ganak Israel ey pinilin Apudyus as taguna ya imvilangna as aanakna. Jida avus sey nangimpiil-ana assey summilingan sey kinaApudyusna. Jida avus sey nikaturagana as dasey impostana ya nangatdanana assey Lintogna ya jida sey nangintudtujuwana assey ustu ey koon ey mandayow an siya. Ya jida avus sey nangawat as dasey adjuwan ey impostana.
45009005	Ya dasey dakdakorda at mavivigvigda ey tagu assey kar-argow. Urey sey Cristu at narpu assey ganak da nu miipanggop assey kinataguna. Ya siya sey Apudyus ey manginturey asda kangamin ey awad assey luta. Madayow siya as ing-inggana. Amen.
45009006	Ajik pun kanan ey aji pun Apudyus tinongpar sey impostana as dasey taguna. Tey sey ganak Israel at dakumpun as losanda ey tagun Apudyus.
45009007	Ya dakumpun avus as amin ey ganak Abraham at mavigvigda as ganakna. Tey sey imbagan Apudyus an Abraham, kanana, “Dasey ganak Isaac anggey sey mivilang as ganaknu.”
45009008	Sey piun nauy ey ibaga at dakumpun as amin ey ganak Abraham at ivilang Apudyus as aanakna nu aji anggey dasey anak ey miyanak ey manguy assey impostana. Jida sey mivilang as tuttuwa ey ganak Abraham.
45009009	Tey sey impostan Apudyus an Abraham miipanggop an Isaac, kanana, “Nu ampuuliyak assey umali ey tawun assey kanaʼsna ey timpu at awad ogon sey anakyu an Sarah ey laraki.”
45009010	Dakumpun gey as jiyuy sey mangimpiila assey koon Apudyus ey mampili tey inggow avus sey nakwa as dasey kapil ey anak da Rebecca an Isaac ey apu taku.
45009011	Tey assey daanda pun atgey miyanakan ey niippun atgey kingwada as ambaru unnu lawingan, kanan Apudyus an Rebecca, “Sey namangu at ambalin as baba'arun sey ujiji.” Imbagan Apudyus ji ta maagammuwan ey sey namiliyana assey usa an jida at aji pun mibasar assey kingwan da juwa nu aji sey nangayagana ey namili assey usa ta tongparuna sey jummada'an ey panggopna.
45009013	Siyana vus pigey sey piun sey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Impiilak sey layadku an Jacob kon summangaak an Esau.”
45009014	Ey sey piun nauy ey kanan at dakumpun as ustu sey kingwan Apudyus? Ustu mit!
45009015	Awad sey karobbongan Apudyus ey mangwa as jiyuy tey kanana an Moses, “Kadaguwak sey piuk ey kadaguwan.”
45009016	At siyana sey mangigammuwan taku ey sey mamiliyan Apudyus as dasey tagu at aji pun as mibasar assey piun da unnu ngadanna ey koonda nu aji gapu anggey assey dagun Apudyus.
45009017	Sey usa pey ey mangimbasaran taku at sey imbagan Apudyus an Ari ad Egypt assey kar-argow ey kanana, “Nambalinuk sika ey ari ta awad angimpiil-ak assey pannakabalinku ta maagammuwan sey ngadanku assey intiru ey luvung.”
45009018	At siya sey kadaguwana dasey piuna ey kadaguwan ya pakabnutuna avus sey somsomok dasey tagu ey piuna ey pakabnutun.
45009019	At nu kanaʼs jiyuy, oni at awad ji mangimbaga ey kanana, “Nu kananaʼsnaʼt, ngey paʼn la Apudyus pabasurun dasey tagu nu ajida pun jumngor? Yangey awad dallu makaviil ey mangontra assey piun Apudyus?”
45009020	Kon ngadannu gey ey tagu ey mikasongbat an Apudyus? Ey mabalin pun lawa guminga sey banga assey nangwa an siya ya kanana, “Ngey pana kanan sina sey nangokoom ey nangwa an sa'un?”
