45009021	Assey katuttuwaan, awad sey kalintogan sey anjujuwin as banga ey mangusar assey luta assey piuna ey mangusaran ya mabalin ey koona sey natamey ey luta assey juwa ey karasin sey banga. Mabalin ey nabalor sey muusaran sey usa ya sey usa, barangna pey lawa sey muusarana.
45009022	Kanasnaʼt sey koon Apudyus; Piuna ipiila sey pannakabalinna ya putukna kon inanusana inattuman dasey tagu ey pinupumtukana ey lobbongda ey majusa
45009023	ta ipiilana dasey nakaskasdaow ey kinaApudyusna as dasey tagu ey sigud ey kinadaguwana ya insaganana jida ey mikalak-am assey ambaru ey viyag ad langit.
45009024	Jitaku dasey tagu ey pinipilin Apudyus, kon dakumpun as anggey taku ey Jews nu aji urey vus dasey Gentil.
45009025	Tey siya nauy sey kanan Apudyus assey Gingana ey impakur-itna an Hosea ey kanana, “Dasey dakumpun as taguk, ivilangku jida as taguk assey sana. Ya sey sin-iliyén ey sinang-ak, awagak jida as tagu ey pipiuk.”
45009026	“Ya assey jissu ey nangimbagaak an jida ey, ‘Dakumpun kayu as taguk, siya vus pigey ey jissu sey maawaganda as aanak sey matatagu ey Apudyus.’”
45009027	Inggow avus sey impapaddaan Isaiah miipanggop as dasey ganak Israel ey kanana, “Urey nu anungda gallis assey igid sey beybey sey kaajun dasey ganak Israel, akittan sey misarakanan an jida.
45009028	Tey niippun juwajuwana ey aji pun as mabayag at jumatong sey manguwisan Apudyus asda amin ey tagu.”
45009029	Ya kama avus assey namangu ey impapaddaan Isaiah ey kanana, “Nu aji atyén as Apudyus ey kangatuwan nangimvuna as akit an dakani ey Jews, namin kani jummapur ey anung sey nakwa ad Sodom ya Gomorah.”
45009030	At ngan sey piuna kanan dasey amin anna ey imbagabagak? Annaya sey piuna kanan; Dasey Gentil, urey nu ajida pun inanap sey koonda ey miivilang as niyun-un, nivilangda vus pigey as niyun-un an Apudyus gapu assey pammatida.
45009031	Kon dasey ganak Israel ey nangimpapati ey mangunud assey Lintog as mivilanganda as niyun-un an Apudyus, niippun nambanbanaganda.
45009032	Ngey pana vus kanan siji? Tey sey kananda, miivilangda as niyun-un an Apudyus gapu assey ambaru ey kookoonda ey dakumpun as gapu assey pammatida. At siya sey nisabangturanda assey batu ey apporon da tagu misabangturan.
45009033	Siya nauy sey piun sey impakur-it Apudyus assey Gingana ey kanana, “Ilanyu, awad sey iggak ey batu ad Zion ey misabangturan ya matokdagan dasey tagu. Kon sey tagu ey mantalik an siya, aji pun maviinan.”
45010001	Susunud, sey piuk atyén nu mabalin at misarakan dasey jujugak ey Jews. Siyana sey kanayun ey apporok iluwaru an Apudyus.
45010002	Takjugak ey napasnikda vus amin ey manservi an Apudyus, kon kinumbot sey apporoda koon ey manservi.
45010003	Tey niippun agammuda nu ngan annun Apudyus ey mangimvilang as dasey tagu as niyun-un an siya. Tey sey kuwada ey kasomsomkan, siya kanu miivilanganda as niyun-un sey apporoda koon. At sey kanasnaʼt ey kasomsomkan, sumangada ey tumimpuyug assey koon Apudyus ey mangimvilang asda tagu as niyun-un.
45010004	Kon assey katuttuwaan, as Cristu sey namungpung assey Lintog. At da amin ey mamati an siya, mivilangda as niippun basurna an Apudyus.
45010005	Sey ingkur-it Moses miipanggop assey koon sey tagu ey miivilang as niyun-un at kanana, “Nu pium ey matagu, aminum unujun dasey amin ey vilin sey lintog.”
45010006	Kon sey kanan sey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop assey miivilangan as niyun-un gapu assey pammati at kanana, “Ajiyu maggey kanan assey somsomokyu ey, ‘Awad atyén ngumatu ey umuy ad langit.’ (Ey sey piuna ugujun, ta pababauna as Cristu sina.)
45010007	Unnu kananyu ey, ‘Awad atyén umuy ad darum assey iggawan dasey natuy.’” (Ey sey piuna ugujun, ta umuyna taguwun as Cristu.)
45010008	Tey annaya sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Sey Gingan Apudyus at adani an dakayu. Awad assey somsomokyu at mabalinyu ey iginga.” Sey nauy ey Gingan Apudyus at siyana sey miipanggop assey pammati ey iwarawarawagni.
45010009	Tey nu avunam ey as Jesus sey kangatuwan ey Apu ya patiyum assey somsomoknu ey kasin Apudyus siya tinagu, misarakanka.
45010010	Tey gapu assey pammati taku, nivilang taku as niippun basurna ya assey mangavunan taku ey mamati taku, siya sey nisarakanan taku.
45010011	Tey awad avus sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Niippun miviinan dasey amin ey mamati an siya.”
45010012	Sey piun nauy ey kanan at kinadaguwan Apudyus da amin ey tagu tey niippun nantoknan dasey Jews as dasey Gentil assey angiilan Apudyus. Tey saʼsa'an anggey sey Apu taku losan ya nakasagana ey mangatud assey amin ey ambabaru asda amin ey angkudow an siya.
45010013	Tey sey impakur-it Apudyus, kanana, “Amin ey angkudow as turung sey Apu at misarakan.”
45010014	Kon ngan-annunda ampey ey angkudow an siya nu ajida pun namati? Ya ngan-annunda ey mamati nu niippun jingjingngorda miipanggop an siya? Ya ngan-annunda ey mangngor nu niippun umuy mangiwwarawag?
45010015	Ya ngan-annunda avus ey umuy mangiwwarawag nu niippun mangimbaar an jida? Tey sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus, kanana, “Angatud as amud ey allaylaydan dasey umali ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag!”
45010016	Kon ajida pun namati assey Ambaru ey Damag tey sey imbagan Isaiah, kanana, “Apu, yangey awad nangngor assey apporoni imbagabaga.”
45010017	Kon urey nu kananaʼsji, tuttuwa ey sey pammatin dasey tagu at allapu assey mangngoranda assey ambaru ey Damag. Ya sey mangngoranda assey Ambaru ey Damag, allapu assey miwarawagan sey miipanggop an Cristu Jesus.
45010018	Kon sey miibagak; Ey niippun nin tuttuwa jingjingngor dasey Jews assey damag? Jingngorda mit tey sey impakur-it Apudyus, kanana, “Nagngor sey gingan dasey nantudtuju assey urey ngadanna ey iggawan da tagu ya naktad assey igid sey luta sey apporoda imbaga.”
45010019	Kon anna vus sey miibagak; Ey ajin pun lawa da ganak Israel naawatan sey jingngorda? As Moses sey namangu ey summongbat ey kanana, “Angwaak as mangimunanyu gapu assey mangngorak as dasey laylaysunyu ey tagu. Ya angwaak as pumtukanyu gapu assey mangadaguwak as dasey tagu ey niippun agammuda an sa'un.”
45010020	Inggow vus sey imbagan Isaiah ey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Indasanak asda tagu ey aji pun manganap an sa'un. Impaagammuk sey long-agku asda tagu ey aji pun nangimus an sa'un.”
45010021	Kon miipanggop ey as dasey ganak Israel, kanan Apudyus, “Inag-agow ey nakasaganaak ey amadatong an jida kon sumasangada ya ajida pun umatingor.”
45011001	Annaya vus sey miibagak; Ey nan-awidan Apudyus dasey taguna ey Israel? Aji pun! Tey urey sa'un at usaak ey iyIsrael ey narpu assey ganak Benjamin ey ganak Abraham.
45011002	Aji pun Apudyus nan-awidan dasey judaan ey pinilina ey taguna. Tey agammuyu mit sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey lilin Elijah an Apudyus gapu assey nangokoon dasey kailiyana ey iyIsrael ey kanana,
45011003	“Apu, gingngatda dasey profetnu ya vinakasda avus sey susugguban da tagu as animar ey idatunda an sika. Anggayak as navun-an, kon piunak pey dallu ey iyavus gongatun.”
45011004	Ya agammuyu mit vus sey insongbat Apudyus an siya ey kanana, “Awad pey dallu dasey navun-an ey pitunlivu ey aji pun nandaydayow as dasey ap-apudyus ey Baal.”
45011005	Kanaʼsna avus assey sana tey awad dasey mavilvilang ey navun-an ey pinilina gapu assey kinaambaruna.
45011006	At nu sey namiliyana an jida at gapu assey kinaambaruna, kaawatan ey dakumpun as oros sey kingwada ey ambaru sey namiliyana an jida. Tey nu dasey apporoda kingwa ey ambaru sey gapuna as namiliyana an jida, aji pun mabalin ey kanan taku ey kinaambarun Apudyus jiyuy.
45011007	Ngan sey piun nauy ey kanan? Sey apporon da Israel anaanapun, ajida pun indasan tey anggey dasey mavilvilang ey pinipilin Apudyus as nangdas, kon da ujum, kummabnut sey somsomokda.
45011008	Tey nauy sey piuna ugujun sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Impatabvug Apudyus sey somsomokda ya pannakaawatda. At siya sey inggana assey sana, urey nu awad atada, niippun ilanda ya urey nu awad ingada, niippun dongronda.”
45011009	At as David avus, inggow sey impakur-it Apudyus an siya ey kanana, “Kanana atyén ta assey mangan-ganasanda ey mangan, siya sey madokmaanda ey anungda titit ey makna assey katig unnu animar ey makna assey vitu ta majusada ey ustu.
45011010	Mabvullok atyén sey atada ta ajida makaila ya mapikutda gapu assey ligat as ing-inggana.”
45011011	Awad uda sey imusuk; Assey nisabangturan dasey kaajuwan ey iyIsrael, ey sey piuna ugujun, ajida pun kasin makabangun as ing-inggana? Aji pun! Tey assey katuttuwaan, gapu assey vummasuranda, illuswana sey misarakanan dasey Gentil. Kanaʼsna sey nakwa ta umapos dasey iyIsrael asda Gentil ta makarakagda atyén.
45011012	At nu sey nambanagan sey basur dasey iyIsrael at illuswana sey amud ey vinaru asda amin ey tagu ya sey ajida pun namatiyan an Cristu at illuswana vus sey amud ey vinaru asda Gentil, ey aji sin-umamud sey vinaru ey iluswana nu mamin mivilang dasey iyIsrael as tagun Apudyus?
45011013	Ey sana, anna vus sey ibagak an dakayu ey Gentil. Gapu ta jinutukanak an Apudyus as man-aposel ta inyak tudtujuwan dakayu, iggak sey kaviilak ey mangimpatig assey nauy ey siputku
45011014	ta awad maaposan dasey vurunku ey iyIsrael an dakayu ta nu mabalin, awad atyén ji awisuk an jida as misarakan.
45011015	Tey sey nangillaksigan Apudyus an jida gapu assey basurda, naatdan as waya dasey ujum ey tagu ey ambalin as vub-urunna. At ey aji sin-umamud sey vinaruna nu kasin Apudyus jida ivilang? At nu kanaʼsji, kama as natagu kasin dasey nangkakatuy.
45011016	Dasey iyIsrael at mipanida assey tinapey. Ya agammu taku ey nu midatun an Apudyus sey pit-ing sey namangu ey nakwa ey tinapey, mivilang ey kuwan Apudyus sey amin ey nivuna. Sey usa avus ey mipaniyanda at kayu. Tey nu midatun an Apudyus sey lamutna, mivilang ey kuwan vus Apudyus urey dasey pangana.
45011017	Mipani dasey iyIsrael assey minura ey olib ey nakaan sey ujum ey pangana ya nisuup sey pangan sey tagintarun ey olib. Dakayu ey Gentil sey mipaniyan nauy ey tagintarun ey olib. At ey sana, nilagum kayu ey mipakasdor assey ambaru ey marpu assey lamut sey mura.
45011018	Kon ilanyu ta ajiyu laylaysun dasey judaan ey panga ey nakaan. Tey masapur somsomkonyu ey panga kayu anggey, dakumpun kayu as lamut ey mangimpatuvu assey panga.
45011019	Mabalin ey awad mangimbaga an dakayu ey kanana, “Tuttuwa nauy, kon naptud mit ampey dasey ujum ey panga ta dakani sey misuup.”
45011020	Tuttuwa, kon masapur somsomkonyu ey sey gapun sey naptudanda at gapu ta ajida pun mamati, kon sey nisuupanyu at gapu ta namati kayu. At siya sey aji kayu atyén ampaspas-um nu aji aranyu nauy as umugyatanyu.
45011021	Tey nu niippun gagan Apudyus ey nangaan as dasey judaan ey panga ey pintudna, aji sin-umamud an dakayu ey Gentil?
45011022	At ey sana, miila taku sey kinaanus Apudyus ya miila taku vus sey koona ey manjusa. Tornona ey manusa asda aji pun mamati kon naanus an dakayu am-amud nu iturturuyyu ey mantalik assey kinaanusna. Tey nu aji, putjuna ey mangaan avus an dakayu.
45011023	Ya kama vus as dasey iyIsrael nu mamatida atyén, mipuulida assey naptudanda tey awad sey pannakabalin Apudyus ey mangwa.
45011024	Tey nu dakayu ey Gentil ey kama as pangan sey tagintarun ey olib at insuupna dakayu assey ambaru ey kayuna ey olib ey dakumpun as anungyu, aji sin-umamud ey allaslasu sey koona ey angimpuuli as dasey nakaan ey sigud ey panga assey nakaananda ey kayu?
45011025	Susunud, awad sey nitataru ey lasun ey piuk ipaagammu an dakayu ta nu maagammuwanyu, ajiyu kanan assey somsomokyu ey adjuwan sey agammuyu. Piuk ipaagammu an dakayu ey dakumpun as mannanayun sey kumabnutan sey somsomok dasey iyIsrael. Tey ampatingga nauy nu makumplitu sey inggoddong Apudyus ey vilang dasey Gentil ey mijuga an siya.
45011026	Tey nu jumatong jiyuy ey timpu, misarakan dasey amin ey Jews. Tey siya nauy sey kanan sey impakur-it Apudyus assey Gingana ey kanana, “Oni at umali sey manginsarakan ey marpu ad Zion ta kaanuna sey kinarwing dasey ganak Jacob.
45011027	At siyaji sey matongparan sey impostak an jida ey kaanuk dasey basurda.”
45011028	At nu miipanggop assey nangawidan dasey iyIsrael assey Ambaru ey Damag, nivilangda as kavusur Apudyus kon nambanag as ambaru an dakayu ey Gentil. Nu miipanggop assey namiliyan Apudyus an jida, jida sey tagu ey pipiuna gapu anda Abraham ey dakdakorda.
45011029	Tey aji pun as mabalin ey orsan Apudyus sey somsomokna miipanggop as dasey atjuna ey ambabaru as dasey pinipilina ey taguna.
45011030	Nu miipanggop an dakayu ey Gentil, ajiyu pun inunud as Apudyus assey kar-argow, kon ey sana, kinadaguwan Apudyus dakayu gapu assey aji pun dasey iyIsrael namatiyan.
45011031	Kanasnaʼt vus as dasey iyIsrael, ajida pun patiyun as Apudyus assey sana, kon gun-ujunda dallu sey dagun Apudyus gapu assey nangadaguwana an dakayu ey Gentil.
45011032	Tey nambalinun Apudyus dasey amin ey tagu ey kama as barud ji kinadongor ta ipiilana asda amin ey tagu sey daguna.
45011033	Madayow as Apudyus tey amud sey vinaruna asda taguna. Niippun ampatinggaan sey kinariingna ya agammuna! Urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu at niippun nangigammu assey ustu ey somsomok Apudyus unnu makaawat assey angookoona.
45011034	Tey awad sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Ey awad nangigammu assey somsomok Apudyus? Ey awad mabalin manudtuju an siya?
45011035	Ey awad tagu as namuutang an Apudyus ta lobbongna ey anguulley assey orosna?”
45011036	Tey as Apudyus mit sey nangwa ya manginturey assey kangamin. At nakwa sey kangamin para assey midayawana. Madayow siya as ing-inggana! Amen.
45012001	Susunud, gapu assey dagun Apudyus an jitaku, pangngaasiyu ta ipurangyu sey long-agyu an Apudyus ey kama as matattagu ey datun ya nadarus ey manservi anggey an siya ey angatud as allaylaydana tey siyaji sey ustu ey koon ey mandayow an siya.
45012002	Ajiyu anungun sey ugalin dasey aji pun as mamati, nu aji iturturuyyu ey mangimparuvus an Apudyus ey mangimpabaru assey somsomokyu ta vumaru sey katataguyu. Tey nu siyaji sey koonyu, maagammuwanyu dasey piun Apudyus ey koonyu ya maagammuwanyu nu ngan dasey ambaru ya maagammuwanyu vus sey mallaylaydana ya sey ustu ey makwa.
45012003	Gapu assey kinaambarun Apudyus an sa'un ey nangatud assey karobbongak, bagbagaak dakayu losan ta ajiyu idayow sey long-agyu as nangatngatu nu sey ustu ey katataguyu, nu aji ustuustu atyén sey anomsomkanyu assey long-agyu ey mibasar assey kaviilan ey innatjun Apudyus assey usa ya usa an dakayu gapu assey pammatiyu.
45012004	Tey sey long-ag taku ey tagu at adjuwan sey partina ya nantokotokon sey kausaranda.
45012005	Anungna vus an jitaku ey mamati tey urey nu adjuwan taku, mipani taku as sa'an ey long-ag gapu assey nijujug-an taku an Cristu. At siya sey usausa an jitaku at partin sey sa'an ey long-ag.
45012006	At masapur ey usarun taku dasey nantokotokon ey kaviilan ey innatjun Apudyus an jitaku gapu assey kinaambaruna. Nu sey kaviilam at sey mangimbag-am assey impaagammun Apudyus an sika, siyaji sey koom ey mibasar assey pammatim.
45012007	Nu sey kaviilam at sey manservi as dasey vurunnu, ambaruwum ey manservi ya nu sey kaviilam avus at sey mangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus, tornom at ey mangintudtuju.
45012008	At nu sey kaviilam at mamagbaga ya mangimpakasdor assey pammatin da ujum, siya sey koom. Nu innatjuna avus sey kaviilam ey mangimvingey assey awad an sika as katurungan dasey makasapur, siya sey koom ey ajim as imutan. Nu sey naatud an sika at kaviilan ey mangimpangat, masapur ey ampawotka ey mangimpangat. At nu sey kaviilam at sey tumurung as dasey kadagdagu, masapur ey allaylayadka ey mangwa.
45012009	Masapur ey dakumpun as pippiila anggey sey layadyu asda vurunyu. Man-awidanyu dasey lawingan ya tutuntunanyu dasey amin ey ambaru.
45012010	Ya manlilinnayad kayu ey anung sey mansusunud. Ya masapur ivilangyu sey vurunyu ey mamati as napatpatig nu dakayu.
45012011	Aji kayu antukkatukkar assey kiwaaryu nu aji ampawotonyu ey manservi assey Apu.
45012012	Masapur ey allaylayad kayu gapu assey namnamayu. Anusanyu nu awad ligatyu ya iturturuyyu ey alluwaru.
45012013	Ya nu awad vurunyu ey mamati as makasapur as turung, dakayu ey mismu sey manurung an jida ya ilanyu avus ta piyammangili kayu.
45012014	Nu awad manongtong-ag an dakayu, dawatunyu an Apudyus ta ambaru sey koona an jida. Siyaji sey iluwaruyu ta ambaru sey makwa an jida ey ajiyu vus jida arwagan.
45012015	Ya mikalagragsak kayu asda allagragsak ya mikadomdom kayu asda manomdom.
45012016	Masapur ey nuurnus kayu ey matagu ey niippun toktoknonyu. Ajiyu ipaspas-um sey long-agyu nu aji siya koonyu sey mikavub-urun asda nababa ey tagu. Ajiyu kanan ey dakayu sey kariingan.
45012017	Nu awad koonda as lawingan an dakayu, aji kayu vumarus nu aji padasunyu ey koon sey ambaru ya ustu assey angiilan dasey tagu.
45012018	Nu mabalin atyén, koonyu sey amin ey kaviilanyu para assey kapanusan dasey amin ey tagu.
45012019	Aji kayu da vumarus, dakayu ey vuvurun ta asi keygad as Apudyus ey pumtuk an jida ey angimbarus an dakayu tey awad sey impakur-itna ey kanana, “Sa'un ey Apu sey awad karobbongana ey vumarus, sa'un sey mabalin ey manusa an jida.”
45012020	Ya dakumpun as anggey jiyuy as koonyu nu aji unujunyu sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Nu nuurat sey kavusuryu, pakananyu. Nu nuuwwow, pin-umanyu. Tey nu siyaji sey koonyu, amud sey vumiinanda.”
45012021	Aji kayu ampaabak asda lawingan ey makwa nu aji abakunyu dasey lawingan assey ambaru ey makwa.
45013001	Amin ey tagu at masapur ey ampaitureyda as dasey turey assey gubernu tey niippun karobbonganda ey manturey nu ajin Apudyus imparuvus. Ya Amin dasey turey at as Apudyus sey nangimpatakjug an jida.
45013002	At sey tagu ey kumuntra as dasey turey, kinuntrana dasey jinutukan Apudyus. At ngan ey sey mangwa assey kanaʼsna, siya sey nangagara assey majusaana.
45013003	At dasey mangwa as ambaru, ajida pun umugyat as dasey turey kon dasey mangwa as lawingan, jida sey umugyat. At nu pium ey aji umugyat as dasey turey, koom sey ambaru at idayow sika
45013004	tey jida sey baba'arun Apudyus ey mangwa assey vumaruwan. Kon nu dakumpun sey koom, siya sey umugyatam tey awad sey karobbonganda ey manusa an sika. Tey jida ey turey sey baba'arun Apudyus ey usaruna ey manusa as dasey mangwa as lawingan.
45013005	At siya sey ampaiturey taku as dasey turey, dakumpun as gapu ta umugyat taku ey majusa nu aji siyana sey ustu ey makwa.
45013006	Nauy sey lapuna ey ambayad taku assey vuur tey dasey turey at as Apudyus sey manserserviyanda assey mangwaanda assey siputda.
45013007	Masapur bayadam dasey nangkarakarasi ey lobbongna ey ipabayad sey Gubernu. Ya masapur ey rispituwum ey ustu dasey manginturey an sika.
45013008	At nu awad utang taku, masapur ey bayadan taku ta mapungpung. Kon sey layad taku asda vurun taku siyaji sey ivilang taku as utang ey niippun mapungpungana. Tey ngan ey sey tagu ey pipiuna sey vurunna, tinongparna sey vilin Apudyus.
45013009	Tey dasey vilin ey kanana, “Ajika mikadagdagas; Ajika gumngat; Ajika man-akow; Ajika angkarmukam assey dakumpun as kuwam” ya dasey ujum ey vilin at napongsanda assey sa'an ey vilin ey kanana, “Masapur ey maryadka assey asintatagum ey anung sey maryadam assey long-agnu.”
45013010	Tey nu tuttuwa ey maryad taku assey asintatagu taku, niippun koon taku as lawingan an jida. At sey tagu ey mamaryad assey asintataguna, tinongparna dasey amin ey vilin sey Lintog.
45013011	Masapur ey koonyu da nauy tey agammuyu ey nabalor nauy ey timpu ey matatagguwan taku assey sana. Ajiyu anung sey nasusuyup, nu aji kama kayu atyén as vummabangun tey ummadani sey misarakanan taku assey sana nu assey timpu ey namatiyan taku.
45013012	Tey tigangey maas sey kama as lavi ey gummongotan sey somsomok da tagu gapu assey basur. Ya tigangey sey pumawayana ey ampuuliyén Jesu Cristu. At siya sey iginong taku dasey lawingan ey koko'on dasey awad assey gikbot ta orsan taku assey kopya ey miyambong assey appawey.
45013013	Sey kaviviyag ey unujun taku atyén at sey nadarus ya ambaru ey miyambong assey tagu ey awad assey appawey. Aji taku amvubvuuk ya mijuga as dasey ummamdan ey lagragsak. Aji taku mikadagdagas ya mangwa as dasey lawingan unnu kaviviin ey makwa ya aji taku da man-iisik anda man-iinnapos.
45013014	Sey koon taku atyén at unujun taku sey kaviviyag Apu Jesu Cristu ta siya sey kama as ilurumvun taku ya annadan taku ta aji taku iparuvus sey long-ag taku ey mangwa as dasey lawingan ey pipiun sey long-ag.
45014001	Nu awad mamati as daan pun atgey as mat-ong sey pammatina, ivilangyu jida as vurunyu ya aji kayu mikasongbat miipanggop assey kasomsomkanda.
45014002	Anungna assey misida, awad da ujum ey mansida as barangna tey niippun paniyawunda kon asda ujum, awad dasey ajida pun isida tey paniyawunda.
45014003	At sey mansida as barangna, ajina atyén jumsikun dasey mansida anggey as matipuy ya sey mansida anggey as matipuy, ajina atyén vus kanan ey nakabasur dasey mansida as barangna tey imvilang vus Apudyus jida as taguna.
45014004	Tey nu sabali sey koon dasey vurunyu, niippun viyangyu ey manguwis an jida tey dakumpun as dakayu sey manserserviyanda. Tey sey apuna mit anggey sey keygad an siya ey mangoddong nu ustu unnu dakumpun sey kookoona. Ya miyustu tey awad sey Apu ey manurung an siya.
45014005	Ya kama avus assey ag-agow; Awad da ujum ey tagu ey mamigvig ey nabarbalor sey usa ey ag-agow nu dasey ujum ey ag-agow, kon kanan avus dasey ujum ey niippun natkon tey man-iisu amin ey ag-agow. At nu miipanggop ey as nauy, masapur ey aji manjuwajuwa sey kasomsomkan sey usa ya usa ey ustu sey kookoona.
45014006	Sey mangimvilang as nabarbalor sey usa ey ag-agow nu dasey ujum, koona jiyuy as mangindayawana an Apu Jesus. Kama avus assey mansida assey barangna, koonaji as mangindayawana an Apu Jesus tey ampasaramat yén an Apudyus asina at isida. Urey avus dasey sumanga assey barangna ey misida tey idyanda assey mangindayawanda an Apu Jesus ya ampasaramatda avus assey isidada.
45014007	Tey jitaku ey mamati, dakumpun as sey madayawan taku sey apporow taku anapun assey matatagguwan taku ya urey assey matuyan taku.
45014008	Tey assey matatagguwan taku unnu assey matuyan taku at as Apu Jesus dallu sey midayow. At urey nu matattagu taku unnu matuy taku, sey Apu sey singkuwa an jitaku.
45014009	Tey siyana sey lapuna nu pa lawa matuy as Cristu ya kasin natagu ta siya sey ambalin as Apun dasey matattagu ya nangkakatuy.
45014010	At aji taku ampipinnabasur ya man-iinnamsiw tey sumangu taku losan an Apudyus ey muuwis.
45014011	Tey kama assey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Sa'un sey Apu ey aji pun matmatuy at mallikkadang da amin ey tagu an sa'un. Vigvigunda losan ey sa'un sey Apudyus.”
45014012	At sumangu taku losan an Apudyus ta ibaga taku an siya dasey amin ey kingwakingwa taku.
45014013	Aji taku ampipinnabasur nu aji igga taku assey somsomok taku ey aji mangwa as dasey barangna ey makabasuran unnu masulisugan dasey vurun taku ey mamati.
45014014	Gapu assey nijujug-ak an Apu Jesus, naagammuwak ey niippun makan as paniyow. Kon nu ivilang sey usa ey tagu ey paniyow, ambalin as paniyow an siya nu kanuna.
45014015	At nu awad vurunnu as malivukan assey manginsidaam assey ivilangna ey paniyow ya aaggénka at ey manginsida, dakumpun as layad sey impiilam assey vurunnu saji. At siya sey annadan taku ta aji taku livukun sey pammatin dasey vurun taku gapu anggey assey makan tey urey mit vus jida at ingkatuy Jesus sey basurda.
45014016	At ilam ta sey ivilangnu as ambaru at aji ambalin as lawingan sey kaugudana.
45014017	Tey sey nabalor assey Turey Apudyus at dakumpun assey kanun taku unnu inumun taku nu aji sey kinalintog, kaurnusan ya sey lagsak ey marpu assey Ispiritun Apudyus.
45014018	Nu kanaʼs nauy sey katatagu taku assey manserviyan taku an Cristu, mallaylayad as Apudyus an jitaku ya idayow vus jitaku asda ujum ey tagu.
45014019	At siya sey masapur tornon taku ey mangwa as dasey mabalin ey mangatud assey kaurnusan ya mangimpakasdor assey pammatin sey usa ya usa an jitaku.
45014020	Ya aji taku atyén as bakasun sey kingwan Apudyus gapu anggey assey makan. Tuttuwa ey niippun makan as mangimparwing an jitaku an Apudyus, kon lawingan dallu nu sey manganan taku as dasey barangna, siya sey lapun sey vumasuran dasey vurun taku.
45014021	Un-unina at nu aji taku mansida as barangna unnu uminum as bayas unnu mangwa assey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey makwa nu siya sey vumasuran dasey vurun taku ey mamati.
45014022	Nu ngan sey patiyun sey usa ya usa miipanggop as nauy, un-unina at nu ajina as ibagbaga as dasey vurunna ta jida anggey an Apudyus ey juwa sey nangigammu. Nagasat sey tagu ey mangwa assey sisimmokna ey ustu ey niippun juwajuwana assey somsomokna.
45014023	Kon sey manjuwajuwa ya annaat ey isidana, nakabasur siya tey aji pun miyunud sey kingwana assey pammatina. Tey tuttuwa ey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey makwa nu anjuwajuwaka assey kinaustuna ya annaat ey koom, nakabasurka.
45015001	Jitaku ey nat-ong sey pammatina, masapur anusan taku dasey nakapuy sey pammatina ey kurang sey maawatanda ya masapur ey turungan taku jida. Ya dakumpun anggey assey long-ag taku sey sosomkon ey ipalaylayad
45015002	nu aji koon taku sey amin ey vumaruwan da ujum ta kumasdor sey pammatida.
45015003	Tey urey as Jesu Cristu at dakumpun assey mallaylaydan sey long-agna sey simsimmokna tey awad sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop an siya ey kanana, “Sey nangam-amsiwan dasey tagu an sika, sa'un sey inamsiwda.”
45015004	Amin ey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus assey kar-argow at nikur-itda as matudtujuwan taku ta mabalin ey maanusan taku sey ligat ya kumasdor sey somsomok taku gapu assey Gingan Apudyus ey nangatud assey namnama taku.
45015005	Kanana atyén ta as Apudyus ey marpuwan sey anus ya kasdor sey somsomok, siya sey manurung an dakayu ta masa'an kayu ey anungunyu sey ugalin Cristu Jesus
45015006	ta masa'an sey somsomokyu ey mandayow an Apudyus ey Apudyus ya Aman Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku.
45015007	Masapur ivilangyu sey usa ya usa an dakayu ta madayow as Apudyus ey anung sey kingwan Cristu ey nangimvilang an dakayu.
45015008	Tey ibagak an dakayu ey as Cristu at nambalin as baba'arun dasey Jews ta ipiilana ey matalik as Apudyus ey manongpar assey impostana as dasey dakdakorda.
45015009	Ya ummali ta dayawun dasey Gentil as Apudyus gapu assey daguna an jida. Kanasnaʼt vus pigey sey imbagan sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Mijugaak as dasey Gentil ey mangindayow an sika, ikankantak sey dayowku an sika.”
45015010	Awad avus sey nikur-it ey kanana, “Dakayu ey Gentil, umali kayu ey mikaragsak as dasey pinilin Apudyus ey taguna.”
45015011	Kanana avus, “Dayawunyu sey Apu dakayu ey Gentil. Dayawunyu siya, dakayu amin ey tagu.”
45015012	Awad avus sey ingkur-it Isaiah ey kanana, “Oni at awad sey miyanak ey ganak Jesse. Ipangatun Apudyus siya ey manginturey as dasey amin ey Gentil ya siya sey annamnamaanda.”
45015013	Kanana atyén ta as Apudyus ey marpuwan sey namnama, atjuna sey amud ey allaylaydanyu ey niippun kurangna ya tarna gapu assey namatiyanyu an siya ta anturturuy ey jumgot sey namnamayu an siya gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
45015014	Susunud, niippun juwajuwak ey niippun nangkurangan sey vinarun sey ugaliyu. Agammuk avus ey agammuyu ey ustu sey kookoonyu ya kaviilanyu ey mantitinnudtuju.
45015015	Kon assey suratku anna, ajik pun as illikowlikow ey manginsurat as dasey ujum ey imbagak ta ajiyu maliwatan. Tuttuwa ey kamaak as mansokar ey mangimbaga asda nauy ey karobbongan ey innatud Apudyus an sa'un gapu assey kinaambaruna.
45015016	Nambalinak as baba'arun Cristu Jesus ey najutukan ey manservi ey kama as pajin dasey Gentil ta iwarawagku an jida sey Ambaru ey Damag ey narpu an Apudyus ta jida sey kama as datun ey mangimpalaylayad an siya ey nambalinun sey Ispiritun Apudyus as nadarus.
45015017	Gapu assey nijujug-ak an Cristu Jesus, mabalin ey idayowku sey nauy ey kiwaarku para an Apudyus.
45015018	Kon niippun ujum as mabalin ey idayowku nu aji sey kingwan Cristu ey nangusar an sa'un ey nangawis as dasey Gentil ta mamatida an Apudyus. Inusar Apudyus dasey imbagak ya kingwak
45015019	ey sinyar anda nakaskasdaow ey nakwa gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey awad an sa'un. At mallugi ad Jerusalem inggana ad Iliricum, inambaruk intudtuju sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Cristu.
45015020	Tey sey panggopku at itudtujuk sey Ambaru ey Damag as dasey ili ey niippun ummuy nantudtuju miipanggop an Cristu ta ajik lotapan sey siniput dasey ujum ey tagu.
45015021	Tey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Dasey daanna pun mibagaan sey miipanggop an siya, jida sey mangila ya dasey aji pun nangngor an siya, maawatanda sey miipanggop an siya.”
45015022	At gapu asda nauy ey kingwakingwak, siya sey nataktakak ey umali an dakayu.
45015023	Kon assey sana tey anna ey naasku sey siputku asda ili ey ginaggakeyku ya nabayag avus ey piuk ey umali mangaggakey an dakayu,
45015024	mabalin ogon ey maturuyak ey sana. At assey ayak ad Spain, piuk ey andag-us sinat ey ampaturung ta dakayu atyén sey allibbatak ey umuy as jiyuy nu maasak mikasas-alliwa an dakayu as sin-akitan.
45015025	Kon ey sana, inyak ad Jerusalem tey awad sey iyuyku ey miturung as dasey tagun Apudyus siji.
45015026	Tey dasey namati ad Macedonia ya ad Acaia, simsimmokda ey mandagup as iturungda as dasey namati ey lumawa ad Jerusalem.
45015027	Jida vus pigey sey sinsomsomok ey tumurung. Kon siyanaʼt vus pigey sey ambaru as koonda tey gapu as dasey Jews, inumdas sey Gingan Apudyus an jida ey Gentil at nijugada assey mannanayun ey vumaruwan ey marpu an Apudyus. At siya sey lobbongda ey manurung as dasey Jews assey ikataguda.
45015028	At nu maasku iyawat sey pilak anna an jida, lumibbatak ey umuy ad Spain at siya sey mandagusak sinat.
45015029	At agammuk ey nu umaliyak sinat, siguraju ey idatongku sey niippun kurangna ey vumaruwan taku losan ey atjun Cristu.
45015030	Dawatuk an dakayu ey susunud, gapu an Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu ya gapu assey layad taku ey innatud sey Ispiritun Apudyus, ampangpangaasiyak atyén ta ipapatiyu ey mikaluwaru an sa'un ta turunganak an Apudyus.
45015031	Iluwaruyu ta saraknibanak an Apudyus as dasey aji pun mamati ad Judea. Iluwaruyu vus ta malaylaydan dasey tagun Apudyus ad Jerusalem ey mangawat assey turung ey iyuyku an jida
45015032	ta nu iparuvus Apudyus, naragsakak ya lumin-awa sey an-ang-angsak ey jumatong ey mijuga an dakayu.
45015033	Kanana atyén ta as Apudyus ey marpuwan sey urnus, siya sey aawwad an dakayu losan. Amen.
45016001	Piuk ey iyag-agammu an dakayu as Foebe ey sunud taku assey pammati ey mangimpapangat asda mamati ad Senkreya.
45016002	Ambaruwunyu ey amadatong an siya tey usa ey sunud taku assey Apu tey nauy sey lobbongna ey koon asda tagun Apudyus. Turunganyu siya asda kasapurana tey adjuwan sey tinurungana, sa'un sey usa an jida.
45016003	Pakumustaunyu uwa da Priscilla an Aquila ey an-asawa, jida sey vurunku ey nanserservi an Cristu Jesus.
45016004	Kama as insardada sey viyagda gapu an sa'un at dokor sey utangku an jida. Ya dakumpun gey as anggayak as mampasaramat an jida tey urey dasey vungguy da mamati ey Gentil assey ujum ey ili.
45016005	Piuk avus ey pakumustaun dasey mamati ey apporow madagup as vuruy da Priscilla. Piuk vus ey pakumustaun as Epenetus ey napatig ey vub-urunku ey siya sey namangu ey namati an Cristu assey provinsiya ad Asia.
45016006	Pakumustauk vus as Mary ey nangimpapati assey siputna ey para an dakayu.
45016007	Pakumustauk avus da Andronicus an Junia ey kadaraak ey Jews ya vurunku ey nabarud assey keysan ey ag-agow. Madadamagda as dasey aposel ya namanguda ey namati nu sa'un.
45016008	Pakumustauk avus as Ampliatus ey pipiuk ey vub-urunku an Apu Jesus
45016009	ya kama avus anda Urbanus ey vurun taku ey manserservi an Cristu ya kama vus an Estakis ey pipiuk ey vub-urunku.
45016010	Ya pakumustauk avus as Apelles ey napaniknikan sey kinatalikna an Cristu ya urey vus da Aristobulus ey simbaryan
45016011	ya as Herodion ey kadaraak ey Jews ya kama avus as dasey namati ey kabvuruy da Narcissus.
45016012	Pakumustauk avus da Trifina an Trifosa ey nangimpapati ey nansiput para an Apu Jesus ya kama avus an Persisa ey pipiuk ey vurunku ey mampawot ey mansiput as para an Apu Jesus.
45016013	Pakumustauk avus as Ruffus ey usa asda madadamag ey manserservi an Apu Jesus ya as inana ey nangimvilang an sa'un as anakna.
45016014	Pakumustauk avus da Asincritus, Flegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermes ya dasey ujum ey susunud taku ey mamati ey nijuga an jida.
45016015	Pakumustauk vus da Filologus an Julia, da Nereus ya sey sunudna ey vubai, da Olimpas ya dasey mamati ey tagun Apudyus ey vurunda.
45016016	Ya ampinpinnakumusta kayu losan as mangimpiila ey manlilinnayad kayu. At da amin ey vungguy dasey mamati an Cristu at pakumustaunda dakayu losan.
45016017	Dakayu ey susunud, pangngaasiyu ta man-annad kayu asda tagu ey apporow mangwa assey mansisinaanyu ya mangallilow assey pammatiyu gapu assey tudtujuda ey kumuntra assey ustu ey inadaryu assey kar-argow. Adayuwanyu jida!
45016018	Tey dasey jugannaʼt ey tagu, dakumpun an Cristu ey Apu taku sey manserserviyanda nu aji anggey assey long-agda. Gapu assey ambabaru ya makaawis ey gingada, allilawunda dasey tagu ey allasu as maallilow.
45016019	Nanjinamag assey kikkiili sey angokoonyu ey mamati at siya sey gapuna ey malaylaydanak gapu an dakayu. At piuk atyén ey masapur nariing kayu miipanggop assey ambaru ya urey tontu kayu nu miipanggop assey lawingan.
45016020	Aji pun as mabayag at as Apudyus ey marpuwan sey kaurnusan at abakuna as Satanas gapu an dakayu ey kama as gusdanyu siya. Kanana atyén ta ambaambaru sey koon Apu Jesus an dakayu losan.
45016021	As Timothy ey kasiputak at pakumustauna vus dakayu ya kama vus as dasey vuvurunku ey Jews ey da Lucio an Jason ya as Sosipater.
45016022	Sa'un an Tercius ey nangingkur-it assey surat sana ey impakur-it Paul. Pakumustauk avus dakayu.
45016023	Pakumustaun vus dakayu an Gaius. Siya sey simmangili an sa'un ya siya sey simvuruy assey apporon dasey mamati madagupan ey mandayow an Apudyus as nauy. Ya kama vus an Erastus ey sagitaryun sey ili sana ya as Kuartus ey sunud taku at pakumustaunda vus dakayu.
45016024	Kanana atyén ta kadaguwan Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu dakayu losan. Amen.
45016025	Kanana atyén ta madayow as Apudyus! Mannakabalin siya ey mangimpakasdor assey pammatiyu ey mibasar assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Jesu Cristu ey apporok iwarawarawag ya gapu assey nauy ey nabayag ey katuttuwaan ey aji pun as nipaagammu kon anna ey nipaagammu assey sana.
45016026	At ey sana, niparawag nauy ey katuttuwaan ey nibasar assey ingkur-it dasey profet. At as Apudyus ey niippun lugrugina ya niippun patinggana, imvilinna ey mipaagammu sey nauy ey Ambaru ey Damag as dasey amin ey kikkiili ta mamatida ya unujunda.
45016027	As Apudyus anggey sey kariingan assey amin. Kanana atyén ta madayow siya as ing-inggana gapu an Jesu Cristu. Amen.
46001001	Sa'un an Paul ey najutukan as man-Aposel Jesu Cristu tey siya sey piun Apudyus ya anna vus as sunud taku ey Sostenes ey vurunku.
46001002	Annaya sey suratni an dakayu ey vungguy da mamati ad Corinth ey tagun Apudyus. Dakayu sey tinkonna as mantaguna gapu assey nijugaanyu an Cristu Jesus. Sey surat sana at mitongpar vus asda amin ey awad assey kikkiili ey umapu an Cristu Jesus ya mandaydayow an siya ta ambalin siya as Apuda ey miyanung vus an jitaku ey umapu an siya.
46001003	Kanana atyén ta atjun Apudyus ey Ama taku ya as Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu sey amin ey vumaruwan an dakayu.
46001004	Apporowak mansaramat an Apudyus gapu assey amud ey kinaambaruna an dakayu gapu an Cristu Jesus.
46001005	Tey assey nijugaanyu an Cristu, naatdan kayu as dasey ambabaru ey kaviilan ey manservi an siya kama as dasey liingyu ey guminga ya sey kaviilanyu ey makaawat assey katuttuwaan.
46001006	At sinigurajuyu sey kinatuttuwan dasey amin ey imbagani miipanggop an Cristu.
46001007	At ey sana wadawad an dakayu dasey kaviilanyu ey manservi an siya assey anguullayanyu assey ampuuliyén Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
46001008	Siya sey angimpakasdor assey pammatiyu ta niippun mipabasur an dakayu assey ag-agow ey ampuuliyén Apu Jesu Cristu.
46001009	Makwa da nauy tey matalik as Apudyus ey nanjutuk an dakayu ey mijuga an Anakna ey Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku.
46001010	At ey sana, dakayu ey susunud, gapu an Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu, ampangpangaasiyak an dakayu ta ankikinnaawat kayu ta aji kayu masiyyasiyyan. Masa'an kayu atyén assey koonyu ey ansomsomok ya urey assey panggopyu.
46001011	Ibagak nauy tey inggow dasey kabvuruy Cloe ey nangimpaagammu an sa'un ey dakayu kanu mansosongbat.
46001012	Tey awad ey gey kanu usa ya sabali pey sey umunudana. Kanan kanu da ujum; “As Paul sey umunudak,” unnu “As Apollos sey umunudak.” Ya kanan kanu da ujum, “As Peter sey umunudak,” ya da ujum, kananda vus, “As Cristu vus sey umunudak.”
46001013	Ey naguggugwa atpey as Cristu? Ey sa'un ey Paul sey nikrus para an dakayu? Ey awad navunyagan an dakayu ey nuusar sey ngadanku ey Paul ta ampasurutku dakayu?
46001014	Ansaramatak an Apudyus tey niippun adjuwan as vinunyagak an dakayu tey anggey da Crispus an Gaius.
46001015	At siya sey ajiyu kanan ey navunyagan kayu as ampasurutku.
46001016	(Ay uwa, inggow vus da Estephanas ey simbaryan ey vinunyagak, niippun ujum as ikagasmokku as vinunyagak.)
46001017	Tey dakumpun as siya nangimbaaran Cristu an sa'un sey inyak amvunyag, nu aji imbaarak ta inyak iwarawag sey Ambaru ey Damag. At sey nangokook, ajik pun inusar sey tinatagu ey kinariing ya kinasilib ey gumminga ta aji miwalin sey pannakabalin sey natuyan Cristu assey krus.
46001018	As dasey tagu ey miisina an Apudyus ey majusa, iggadaʼs niippun balor sey tudtuju miipanggop assey natuyan Cristu assey krus, kon an jitaku ey isarakan Apudyus, agammu taku ey siyana sey miil-an sey pannakabalin Apudyus.
46001019	Tey kanan sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, “Dadailuk sey liing dasey angkariing ya ipiilak ey niippun balor sey kinariingda.”
46001020	At nu siyanaʼt, ey awad nallasiyan dasey angkariing? Ya ey awad nallasiyan dasey mimisturun sey Lintog? Ya ey awad lawa nallasiyan dasey nangkariing ey mikajiskas assey sana ey timpu? Tey impiilan Apudyus ey niippun servin sey tinatagu ey liing.
46001021	Tey assey kinariing Apudyus, sisimmokna ey aji pun maggey maagammuwan da tagu siya ey mangusar assey kuwada ey liing. Tey sey panggop Apudyus, isarakana dasey mamati an Cristu gapu assey iwarwarawagni ey ivilang dasey aji pun mamati as inuung-ung.
46001022	Tey as dasey Jews, niippun servina assey somsomokda tey siya anapunda sey milagru ey mipiila as manuttuwaanda. Ya as dasey Greek avus, siya anapunda dasey nuunig ey tudtuju ey midanung assey kinariingda.
46001023	Kon an dakani ey, sey itudtujuni at as Cristu ey natuy assey krus ey sasangngaan dasey Jews nu dongronda ya ivilang dasey Greek as inuung-ung.
46001024	Kon as dasey inayagan Apudyus as mantaguna, Jews man unnu dakumpun as Jews, as Jesu Cristu sey miil-an sey pannakabalin ya kinariing Apudyus.
46001025	Tey sey ngadnun da tagu as inung-ung Apudyus, adayu ey nangatngatu nu sey kinariingda. Ya sey ngadnun da tagu as kinakuyan Apudyus, adayu ey angkaskasdor nu sey kasdorda.
46001026	Somsomkonyu dakayu ey susunud sey katataguyu assey nangayagan Apudyus an dakayu ey mamati an siya. Mavilvilang an dakayu sey nariing as angiilan da tagu ya mavilvilang an dakayu dasey papangat unnu ganak da madadamag ey tagu.
46001027	Kon ginagaran Apudyus pinili dasey inuung-ung assey angiilan dasey tagu ta iviviinna dasey nangkariing. Ya ginagarana vus pinili dasey akkuya assey angiilan dasey tagu ta iviviinna dasey papangat.
46001028	Pinilin Apudyus dasey apporow maamsiw ya da malaylayus ey ivilang da tagu as niippun patigna ta ipiilana ey dasey patpatigun da tagu at niippun balorda an siya.
46001029	Siyana sey kingwan Apudyus ta niippun tagu as mabalin ey ampaspas-um assey sinagungna.
46001030	Kon as Apudyus sey nanginjuga an dakayu an Cristu Jesus. Ya gapu assey kingwan Cristu Jesus, jitaku sey mannumar assey kinariing Apudyus ey nanginsarakan an jitaku. Tey gapu an Jesu Cristu miivilang taku as nalintog ya nambalin taku as niippun basurna an Apudyus ya nawayaan taku assey basur.
46001031	At siya sey kanan sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, “Nu awad maryad ey jumayow, siya atyén idayowna sey kingwan Apudyus.”
46002001	Susunud, assey ummaliyak ey nangiwwarawag an dakayu assey planun Apudyus ey aji pun nipaagammu assey kar-argow, ajiyak pun gumminga asda nababalor ey ginga unnu gingan da jiadar ey tagu.
46002002	Tey sey sisimmokku at niippun ujum as ibagak nu aji anggey sey miipanggop an Jesu Cristu ya sey natuyana assey krus.
46002003	At ummaliyak pun assey iggowyu, nagiknak sey kinakuyak ya namilpilak assey ugyatku
46002004	ya assey nikabagbagaak an dakayu unnu assey nantudtujuwak, ajiyak pun nan-usar as dasey makaawis ey ginga ey marpu asda kinariing da tagu tey impiilak anggey sey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
46002005	Kanaʼsna sey nakwa ta sey pammatiyu at aji pun marpu assey kinariing sey tagu, nu aji gapu assey pannakabalin Apudyus.
46002006	Tuttuwa ey dani inusar dasey nuunig ey kinariing as dasey nat-ong sey pammatina kon dakumpun as kinariing ey anung sey liing dasey tagu assey luta anna unnu liing dasey turey ey nagoddongan sey mapungpungana.
46002007	Tey sey kinariing anna ey apporoni itudtuju at miipanggop assey planun Apudyus ey aji pun nipaagammu assey kar-argow, kon siya nauy sey sisimmokna as midayawan taku urey assey daan pun makwa sey luvung.
46002008	Amin dasey nangangatu ey turey assey luta anna at ajida pun naawatan nauy, tey nu naawatanda atyén, ajida pun illansa assey krus sey Apu ey kangatuwan.
46002009	Kon nakwaji ta awad tumuttuwaan sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Sey ajin pun atgey sey tagu innila ya jingngor ya ajina pun ninamnama ey makwa, siya at avus sey insasagganan Apudyus para as dasey maryad an siya.”
46002010	Da nauy sey impaagammun Apudyus an jitaku gapu assey Ispirituna tey sey Ispiritu at agammuna sey kangamin urey assey kaadaruman ey somsomok Apudyus.
46002011	Tey niippun nangigammu assey somsomok sey usa ey tagu nu dokon vus pigey siya ey mismu. Kama vus an Apudyus, niippun vus ujum as angigammu assey somsomokna nu dokon vus pigey sey Ispirituna.
46002012	Kon an jitaku ey namati, dakumpun assey tinatagu ey somsomok sey inawat taku nu aji sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey imbaarna ta maagammuwan taku dasey amin ey ambabaru ey innatudna an jitaku ey urey nu niippun awanwani ey maatud an jitaku.
46002013	At assey apporoni mangintudtujuwan miipanggop an Apudyus, aji kani pun nan-usar asda ginga ey mibasar assey kinariing sey tagu nu aji siya inusarni sey ginga ey intudtujun sey Ispiritun Apudyus an dakani.
46002014	Tey sey tagu ey aji pun namati ey niippun an siya sey Ispiritu, ajina pun maara ya maawatan dasey marpu assey Ispiritun Apudyus. Tey anggey dasey tagu ey iggawan sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey mabalin ey makaawat.
46002015	Kon an jitaku ey iturturung sey Ispiritun Apudyus, maawatan taku sey kangamin ey itudtujun sey Ispirituna. Kon awad da tagu ey ajida pun vus maawatan jitaku.
46002016	Tey kanan sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, “Ey awad tagu as nangigammu assey somsomok Apudyus ta mabalin ey tugununa siya?” Kon awad an jitaku sey somsomok Cristu.
46003001	An dakayu ey susunud, ajiyak pun guminga an dakayu ey anung sey kook ey manudtuju as dasey nat-ong sey pammatina ey awad sey Ispiritun Apudyus an jida nu aji ivilangku dakayu as anung sey utting assey pammati tey tinatagu atgey sey awad assey somsomokyu.
46003002	At siya sey kama as gatas sey innatuatudku an dakayu ey dakumpun as dasey angkakabnut tey aji kayu pun as mikakotkot. Urey assey sana ey timpu, sissiya kayu ey kamaʼs uttiutting
46003003	tey sey koonyu ey matagu at anung dasey niippun agammuna an Apudyus. Siya mangugudak as nauy tey anna ey man-iinnapos kayu ya apporow kayu man-iisik. Da nauy sey angimpiila ey sey koonyu ey matagu at anung da tagu ey niippun agammuna an Apudyus.
46003004	Tey nu kanan ey sey usa, “As paul sey umunudak,” ya kanan vus da ujum, “As Apollos sey umunudanni,” ey dakumpun as siyanaʼt sey kookoon dasey aji pun mamati?
46003005	Ngey ngadan gey da Apollos an Paul? Anserservi kani mit anggey an Apudyus ey lapun sey namatiyanyu an Jesus, tey an dakani, koonni anggey sey ipakpakwan sey Apu.
46003006	Tey kama as sa'un sey nammura ya as Apollos sey ansayusayug kon as Apudyus sey asi amadokor.
46003007	Sey ammura ya ansayug, ajida pun as ikow importanti tey as Apudyus sey importanti ikow tey siya sey amadokor assey mura.
46003008	Niippun nantoknan sey ammura ya sey ansayug tey an-isu sey panggopda at as Apudyus sey keygad ey angatud as tangdanda ey mibasar assey kingwada.
46003009	Tey dakani an Apollos, antintinnurung kani ey mansiput. Dakayu sey kama as lutan Apudyus ey ansiputanni ya kama kayu vus as vuruy ey ipatpatakjug Apudyus.
46003010	Sa'un sey kama as nangigga assey mipon-adan sey tukjun sey vuruy gapu assey kaviilan ey innatudna an sa'un ya da ujum sey asi anginturuy ey mangwa. Kon usausa at masapur imamadna sey koona ey mangwa.
46003011	Tey aji pun mabalin ey orsan sey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu sey luus impon-ad Apudyus ey siya as Jesu Cristu.
46003012	At awad da ujum ey mangigga as vurawan, gambang ya awad da mangigga asda nabalor ey batu anda kayu ya awad vus da mangigga assey gurun ya dagami.
46003013	Kon nu umdas sey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda amin ey tagu, miila ey ustu nu ngan sey iniggan sey usa assey vuruy tey apuy sey muusar as miil-an sey kinabalorna.
46003014	At sey tagu ey aji pun masgub sey iniggana assey luus nipon-ad, maatdan as gun-guna.
46003015	Kon sey tagu ey masgub sey iniggana, niippun maarana as gun-guna. Misarakan vus pigey kon anungna sey ummawid ey naskuran sey vuruyna.
46003016	Ey ajiyu pun agammu ey dakayu sey kamaʼs Tempél ey iggawan Apudyus tey awad an dakayu sey Ispirituna?
46003017	At nu awad manadail assey Tempél Apudyus, dadailun vus Apudyus siya. Tey sey Tempél Apudyus at naapudyusan at dakayu sey Tempél sana.
46003018	Ajiyu allilawun sey long-agyu! Nu kanam assey somsomoknu ey nariingka assey angakamang da tagu assey luta anna, un-unina at nu kananda an sika ey nuung-ungka ta gun-ujum sey tuttuwa ey liing ey marpu an Apudyus.
46003019	Tey sey tinatagu ey kinariing at niippun balorna assey angiilan Apudyus. Tey sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, kanana “Sey usarun Apudyus ey mangabak asda nasilib ey tagu at sey mismu ey kinasilibda.”
46003020	Ya kanana vus assey usa ey nikukur-it, “Aaggammun Apudyus sey awad assey somsomok dasey nangkariing ey tagu, kon an siya niippun servinaji ey kinariing.”
46003021	At siya sey ajiyu ipaspas-um ey pasurut dakayu assey usa ey tagu tey naatud da kangamin as para an dakayu.
46003022	At sa'un ey Paul ya as Apollos ya as Peter, inusarna dakani losan as maturunganyu tey nanservi an dakayu. At urey dasey amin ey awad assey luvung anna, muusarda as para an dakayu. Ya urey assey matatagguwanyu unnu matuyanyu, ambalinun Apudyus jiyuy as vumaruwanyu. At ngan man dasey makwamakwa assey sana ey timpu unnu as assey daan ey ag-agow, usarun Apudyus jiyuy as maturunganyu. Amin da nauy at para assey mannumaranyu.
46003023	Ya dakayu avus, para an Cristu ya as Cristu, para an Apudyus.
46004001	At sey koonyu atyén, ivilangyu dakani as manserservi an Cristu ey napiyar ey mangintudtuju assey kama as nitataru ey panggop Apudyus ey aji pun nipaagammu assey kar-argow.
46004002	At assey manservi, masapur ey mapiyar assey apuna.
46004003	Kon an sa'un, niippun lawingna nu uwisunak an dakayu unnu assey ngadanna ey korti nu ustu sey apporok koon unnu aji pun. Urey sa'un at ajik pun mabalin as uwisun sey long-agku.
46004004	Nadarus sey somsomokku, kon dakumpun as siyanaʼt sey angimpatuttuwa ey niippun basurku tey keygad sey Apu ey manguwis an sa'un.
46004005	At siya sey aji kayu awwey uwis asda vurunyu tey daan pun umdas sey nigoddong ey timpuna. Oniyén ta umali sey Apu at iluswana dasey aminʼey lawingan ey nitataru ey panggop da tagu ya urey dasey awad assey somsomokda ya dasey nitataru ey panggopda. At assey siyaji ey timpu, as Apudyus sey mangindayow assey usa ya usa ey tagu ey miyambong assey kingwana.
46004006	Susunud, inusarku dakani an Apollos as pani ta awad mansarminganyu as vumaruwanyu ta adarunyu an dakani sey piuna ugujun sey bagbaga ey kanana, “Ajiyu pasor-adan sey luus nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus.” At sey godongna, niippun manginsoksokar assey usa ey tagu ya nilaylayusna sey usa.
46004007	Tey ngan at sey nangwa an dakayu ey nangatngatu kayu nu da ujum? Ey dakumpun as Apudyus sey nangatud asda amin ey awad an dakayu? At nu narpu an Apudyus, ngey pa kayu ampaspas-um ey kama gey as niippun nangatud asda amin ey awad an dakayu?
46004008	Ey wadawad sey amin ey kasapuranyu? Ey vummaknang kayu ogon? Ey naas kayu nambalin as ari kon dakani at aji pun? Ambaru atyén nu nan-ari kayu ta mikaturey kani an dakayu!
46004009	Tey assey somsomokku, nambalinun Apudyus dakani ey aposel as kababaan ey tagu ya nagoddongan ey matuy as vuyvuyaun da amin ey enjel anda tagu.
46004010	Gapu assey manserserviyanni an Cristu, anungni muung-ung-ungan. Kon sabali an dakayu tey sey kananyu assey long-agyu at nangkariing kayu gapu assey nijugaanyu an Cristu! Niippun kanu vus kasdorni, kon an dakayu, angkakasdor kayu. Idayow dakayu vus asda tagu, kon an dakani ey, laylaysun dakani.
46004011	Urey assey sana, muuurat ya muuuwwow kani ya namilumiluy dasey lumvunni ya apporoan dakani vuksingun ya niippun ustuʼs vuruyni
46004012	ya maayoayong kani ey mansiput as ikataguni. Nu arwagan dakani as mivibviinanni, dawatunni an Apudyus ta ambaru sey koona an jida ya nu tongtong-agun dakani, anusanni attuman.
46004013	Nu padngoran dakani as lawingan, songbatanni as ambaru. Ya inggana assey sana, kama kani pey lawa as jimok unnu aggissow assey angimvilangan da tagu.
46004014	Dakumpun as siya manginkur-itak as nauy ta ivibviinku dakayu, nu aji tugunuk dakayu tey imvilangku dakayu as pipiuk ey anakku.
46004015	Tey urey nu adjuwan dasey apporow manugutugun an dakayu miipanggop assey viyagyu an Cristu, anggayak as kamaʼs amayu ey lapun sey namatiyanyu an Jesu Cristu tey sa'un sey ab-avus ey nangiyyali assey Ambaru ey Damag an dakayu.
46004016	At siya sey pangngaasiyu ta unujunyu sey angokook ey matagu.
46004017	Siyana sey gapuna ey imbaarku as Timothy ey imvilangku as pipiuk ey anakku ey matalik vus ey manservi an Cristu. Imbaarku siya assey iggowyu ta turungana dakayu ey angimpaspasmok assey kaviviyagku gapu assey pammatik an Cristu Jesus ey siya nauy vus sey apporok intudtuju asda amin ey vungguy da mamati asda kikkiili ey dak ummayan.
46004018	Awad kanu da ujum an dakayu ey pummasmas-um tey kananda pun nin nu niippun kasinku umaliyan sinaʼt.
46004019	Kon aji pun mabayag at umaliyak nu iparuvus sey Apu. Umaliyak ta inyak man ilan nu tuttuwa sey pannakabalin da apporow ampaspas-um anna ya ngadanna sey apporoda ugujun.
46004020	Tey sey miil-an sey manginturturayan Apudyus an jitaku at dakumpun assey ugud taku nu aji sey pannakabalin Apudyus assey viyag taku.
46004021	Ngey un-uninaunyu nu umaliyak assey iggowyu? Ey iyalik sey kajusaanyu unnu umaliyak ey angimpiila assey layadku ya kinasomkanku?
46005001	Impadamagda an sa'un ey awad an dakayu sey nangwa as ikow pigey lawingan tey maggey nikador-ag assey asawan amana ey nanoman an siya. Urey gey dasey aji pun mamati an Apudyus at niippun maggey mangwaʼs juganji.
46005002	Manomdom kayu atyén assey nakwa sanat an dakayu ya laksigunyu nait ey tagu assey vungguyyu. Kon pa at avus nangatu sey an-anmokyu assey long-agyu?
46005003	Tey urey nu niippunak an dakayu, sosomkok dakayu ey kama as awadak an dakayu. At gapu assey karobbongak ey pannakalong-ag Apu Jesus, naasku inuwis sey tagu sanat ey nangwa assey amud ey dakumpun. At nu madagup kayu ey, kama as awadak an dakayu. At gapu assey pannakabalin Apu taku ey Jesus ey awad an jitaku,
46005005	ipurangyu nait ey tagu an Satanas ta amorna ey matongtong-ag sey long-agna ta misarakan siya nu jumatong sey timpu ey ampuuliyan sey Apu.
46005006	Kinumbot ey pey sey angindayawanyu assey long-agyu. Ey ajiyu pun agammu ey urey sey akittan ey tinuktuk at ipavutarna sey sintakkubow ey natamey ey arina?
46005007	At masapur kaanunyu dasey judaan ey tinuktuk ey awad an dakayu ta mipani kayu assey kattamey ey arina ey nadarus ey aji pun nakoan as tinuktuk ey mipani as basur. Kon agammuk ey kanaʼsji tuttuwa sey mipaniyanyu tey agammu taku mit ey naas Cristu indatun sey long-agna ey siya sey mipani assey karneru ey maparti assey Vista ey Manomsomkan.
46005008	At assey mikavistaan taku assey Manomsomkan, mangan taku assey tinapey ey niippun ipuna, tinapey ey nadarus ya iggawan sey katuttuwaan, dakumpun assey tinapey ey naipuwan ey iggawan sey basur ya lawingan.
46005009	Assey ingkur-itku an dakayu, imbagak ey aji kayu mijujugga assey tagu ey kaggissow sey kopyana.
46005010	Kon dakumpun as siya piuk ugujun dasey aji pun mamati ey kaggissow sey koko'onda unnu da man-agum assey kuwan da ujum unnu da akkawan unnu da mandayow asda ap-apudyus, tey nu kanaʼsji, inggana as teynanyu sey luta anna.
46005011	Kon sey piuk ey kanan, aji kayu mijujugga asda tagu ey kananda ey vurun taku jida ey mamati an Apudyus kon kaggissow sey koko'onda, man-agum assey kuwan da ujum unnu da mandayow asda ap-apudyus unnu angwa as lumawingan da vurunna unnu vu'ukan unnu akkawan. Urey pey sey manganan at aji kayu da mikauvung asda jugannaʼt.
46005012	Tey niippun mit viyang taku ey manguwis asda dakumpun as vurun taku ey mamati tey keygad as Apudyus an jida. Kon awad sey karobbonganyu ey manguwis asda nijujugga an dakayu ey kananda ey vurun ey mamati tey inggow sey nikukur-it ey kanana, “Masapur ey laksigunyu dasey nijujugga an dakayu ey apporow angwaʼs lawingan.”
46006001	At nu awad ajiyu pun angkikinnaawatan asda vurunyu ey mamati, aji kayu maggey da umuy mandarum assey uuwwisan da aji pun mamati ta dasey tagun Apudyus atyén sey angimbanag.
46006002	Agammuyu mit ey jitaku ey tagun Apudyus sey manguwis asda amin ey tagu assey luvung anna. At nu dakayu sey manguwis asda amin ey tagu assey luvung, ey niippun lamugyu ey mangimbanag asda gaggatung ey ajiyu pun mankikinnaawatan?
46006003	Ey ajiyu pun agammu ey urey dasey enjel at jitaku vus sey manguwis an jida? At nu lamug taku uwisun da enjel, kinggura vus dasey gaggatung ey miipanggop assey viyag taku assey sana?
46006004	At nu awad kanaʼsna as piunyu ibanag, payu ipabanag asda niippun patigna an dakayu ey mamati?
46006005	Ibagak da nauy ta vumiin kayu atyén vus pey. Ey niippun lawa sa'an an dakayu ey mamati as angigammu ey mangimbanag nu awad ajiyu angkikinnaawatan?
46006006	Kon sabali at avus sey koonyu tey idarumyu sey vurunyu ey mamati ya pinaruvusanyu dasey niippun pammatina ey mangimbanag.
46006007	Assey kanaʼsna ey awad dasey anjijinnarumanyu, siyana sey mangimpiila ey dakumpun as koko'on da mamati sey koko'onyu. Ey aji un-unina ey jita sey matongtong-ag unnu malugi gapu assey kookoon da ujum.
46006008	Kon dakayu at avus ey mismu sey mangwa as lawingan ya lumugi, am-amud tey vurunyu ey mamati sey dayu mangwaan.
46006009	Agammuyu mit ey dasey mangwaʼs lawingan at ajida pun mijuga assey Tureyn Apudyus. Ilanyu ta ajiyu allilawun sey long-agyu, tey sey mikador-ag assey dakumpun as asawana, mandayow asda ap-apudyus, kaggissow sey kopyana, sey laraki ey dor-aguna sey asinlarakina unnu vubai ey dor-aguna sey asinvubaina,
46006010	da akkawan, antopor, vu'ukan, angwaʼs lumawingan dasey vurunna unnu da alluku asda asintataguna at ajida pun mijuga assey manturayan Apudyus.
46006011	Kanaʼsna sey nakopyaan da ujum an dakayu assey kar-argow. Kon ey sana gapu assey pannakabalin Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu ya assey Ispiritun Apudyus, nuurasan dasey basuryu ya nambalin kayu as tagun Apudyus ya nivilang kayu as niippun basurna.
46006012	Awad da angugud ey kananda, “Mabalin ey koon taku sey kangamin ey piun sey long-ag taku koon.” Tuttuwa nauy kon aji pun as makaturung dasey kangamin ey mabalin koon. Tuttuwa ey mabalin ey koon taku sey kangamin ey piun sey long-ag taku, kon an sa'un ey, ajik pun maggey koon tey oni at lawa ya piingsaun sey long-agku ya ajiyak pun mikapug-an ey mangwa.
46006013	Awad vus da ujum ey kananda, “Sey makan para assey vuwang ya sey vuwang, para assey makan.” Tuttuwa da nauy kon jumatong sey timpu ey pungpungun Apudyus sey muusaran da juwa sana. Tey dakumpun as kingwan Apudyus sey long-ag taku ta koon taku da kaggissow nu aji para as manserviyan assey Apu ya sey Apu avus, siya sey amupuut assey long-ag taku.
46006014	At urey nu matuy sey long-ag taku, taguwun dallu Apudyus gapu assey pannakabalinna ey kama assey nanaguwana an Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
46006015	Ey niippun agammuyu ey jitaku ey namati an Cristu at jitaku sey miivilang as long-agna? At nu kanaʼsji, ey mabalin pun lawa iyaggum taku sey ujum ey long-ag Cristu assey usa ey puta? Aji pun mabalin!
46006016	Ey niippun agammuyu ey sey laraki ey midor-ag assey usa ey puta, ambalindaʼs sa'an ey long-ag? Tey kanan sey Nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, “Sey laraki ya vubai ey mandor-ag, ambalindaʼs sa'an ey long-ag.”
46006017	Kon sey tagu ey nijuga assey Apu, inyaggumna sey somsomokna ta misa'an assey Apu.
46006018	At masapur ey niippun mangwa asda kaggissow ey koko'on da vubai ya laraki. Tey dasey ujum ey basur ey koon da tagu at ajina pun dadailun sey long-ag, kon sey mangwa asda jugannaʼt, sey mismu ey long-agna sey nambasbasurana.
46006019	Yangey niippun agammuyu ey sey long-ag taku at siya vus pigey sey vuruy sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey innatud Apudyus ey nilong-ag an jitaku? At siya sey dakumpun as dakayu sey singkuwa assey long-agyu tey as Apudyus
46006020	tey luusna ningin-an as nangina ey gatad. At masapur ey as Apudyus sey miidayow assey mangusaranyu assey long-agyu.
46007001	At ey sana, songbatak sey sarudsudyu assey suratyu inggow. Sey makanak, un-unina at pey lawa nu aji da tagu mangasawa.
46007002	Kon gapu ta amud dasey tagu ey da manor-ag assey dakumpun as asawada, un-unina at nu awad asawan sey usa ya usa.
46007003	Ya sey laraki, masapur atjuna sey long-agna an asawana tey siya nauy sey kalintogan sey vubai ey aran an asawana ya anungna vus assey vubai at atjuna vus sey kalintogan sey asawana ey aran an siya ta losanda ming-op ey juwa.
46007004	Tey sey vubai, dakumpun as siya sey singkuwa assey long-agna tey sey laraki ey asawana, kama vus assey laraki, dakumpun vus as siya sey singkuwa assey long-agna tey sey vubai ey asawana.
46007005	Aji kayu ampinnaidam, manungad nu manturaganyu ey attuman assey kam-ana ey ag-agow ta ipongsanyu yén ey malluwaru. Kon nu maas ey sey nanturaganyu, andor-ag kayu vus kasin ey siya sey nakopyaan sey an-asawa. At nu kanaʼs jiyuy sey koonyu, aji pun dakayu sulisugun an jimunyu ey angwaʼs dakumpun gapu assey ajiyu pun mangattuman assey liknayu.
46007006	Sey imbagak sana, at narpu anggey assey kasomsomkak. Ajik pun kanan ey siya nauy sey masapur ey koonyu.
46007007	Sey piuk atyén at anungunyu sa'un. Kon aji pun makwa nauy tey nantokotokon sey innatud Apudyus ey kaviilan sey usa ya usa ey tagu.
46007008	Ya an dakayu vus ey niippun asawana ya dakayu ey baru unnu pangis, ambab-aru nu anungunyu sey angokook ey matagu.
46007009	Kon nu ajiyu maattuman sey liknayu, mangasawa kayu. Tey unina sey mangasawa kayu nu sey idamanyu ey manginyaattum gapu assey aji pun matongpar sey piun sey long-agyu.
46007010	Asda awad asawana, annaya sey ibagak an dakayu. Dakumpun as narpu an sa'un nauy ey vilin tey as Apu Jesus sey narpuwana ey masapur ajin sey vubai teynan sey asawana.
46007011	Kon nu teynana sey asawana, masapur ey aji kasin mangasawa, nu aji ey, ampuuli at pey lawa an asawana. Kama vus assey laraki, masapur ajina pun vus teynan sey asawana.
46007012	Asda ujum, annaya sey ibagak ey dakumpun assey Apu sey narpuwana tey kuwak ey goom. An dakayu ey laraki ey susunud assey pammati, nu awad asawayu as aji pun mamati ya piuna ey miyaaggum an dakayu, ajiyu maggey idangan.
46007013	Kama vus assey vubai nu awad asawana as aji pun mamati ya piuna ey miyaaggum, ajina vus maggey idangan.
46007014	Tey miivilang sey aji pun mamati ey laraki as tagun vus Apudyus gapu assey niyaggumana an asawana ey mamati. Ya anungna vus assey vubai ey aji pun mamati tey miivilang vus as tagun Apudyus gapu assey niyaggumana an asawana ey mamati. Tey nu as gagara ya aji pun mabalin, miivilang dasey anakda as anak sey niippun pammatina kon assey katuttuwaan, ivilang Apudyus jida losan.
46007015	Kon nu sey asawa ey aji pun mamati sey maryad ey umidang, amorna ta koona. At nu kanaʼsji sey makwa, naatdan as wayawaya sey mamati saji, laraki man unnu vubai. Tey sey namiliyan Apudyus an jitaku at awad atyén urnus sey koon taku ey matagu.
46007016	Tey sika ey namati ey vubai, ey agammum ta mabalinnu siya awisun ey mamati ta misarakan? Ya kama vus an sika ey laraki, ey agammum vus ta maawisnu siya ey mamati ta misarakan?
46007017	Kon urey nu kanaʼsna, masapur ey anturturuy kayu atyén assey katataguyu ey nangimbatgan Apudyus assey nangayagana an dakayu ey mamati an siya. Siyana sey imvilinku ey koon dasey amin ey vungguy da mamati ey dak ummayan.
46007018	At nu as gagara ya luus nakugit sey usa ey tagu asi at mamati, ajina atyén anapun sey kasinna angimpuuliyan. Isuna vus nu aji pun nakugit, ajina pun atyén vus anapun sey koona ey ampakugit.
46007019	Tey niippun balorna an Apudyus sey nakugit unnu aji pun nakugit tey sey nabalor at sey mangunudan as dasey vilinna.
46007020	At ngan man sey katatagun sey usa ey tagu assey nangayagan Apudyus an siya as mantaguna, siya vus sey iturturuyna.
46007021	Nu as gagara ya alipanka assey nambalinam as tagun Apudyus, niippun karwingna. Kon nu awad wayam as makaanan sey kinaalipannu, koom at, ambaru ta inumdas sey mawayaam.
46007022	Tey sey alipan ey naayagan ey mijuga assey Apu, miivilang siya as nawaya ey tagu assey angiilan sey Apu. Ya anungna vus assey dakumpun as alipan assey naayagana ey mijuga assey Apu tey miivilang vus siya as alipan Cristu.
46007023	Nangina ey gatad sey nangnginan Apudyus an dakayu at siya sey aji kayu ampaalipan asda kanakanan da tagu ey koonyu.
46007024	At kanaʼsji, dakayu ey susunud, anturturuy kayu ey mijujugga an Apudyus ngan man sey katataguyu assey nangayagana an dakayu ey mijuga an siya.
46007025	Nu miipanggop avus as dasey daan pun mangasawa, niippun ivilinku an dakayu as narpu assey Apu, kon anna sey kasomsomkak gapu ta kinadaguwanak an Apudyus at nambalinuna sa'un as usa ey matalik.
46007026	At gapu assey amud ey kinaligat sey viyag assey sana, unina at pey lawa nu sissiyaka assey sigud ey katatagum.
46007027	Ya nu awad asawam, ajim maggey idangan. Kon nu niippun ey, ajika umuy man-anap.
46007028	Kon nu mangasawaka, niippun mit karwingna. Anungna vus an dakayu ey vubai, niippun vus karwingna nu mangasawa kayu. Kon ibagak ey unina sey aji kayu mangasawa tey piuk ey milisi kayu asda nantokotokon ey ligat ey sagrapun dasey awad asawana.
46007029	Susunud assey pammati, siya nangugudak as nauy tey avubbang sey ag-agow ey nivuna assey iggawan taku assey luta anna. At an dakayu ey laraki ey awad asawana, dakumpun assey kinaawad sey asawa unnu niippun asawa sey ikow nabalor.
46007030	Ya isuna vus as dasey ambaksar unnu asda mayokyok, kama atyén as niippun nanomdomanda unnu nallaylaydanda tey dakumpun as nait sey ikow nabalor. Ya anungna vus asda awad ningin-ana unnu laksunna, dakumpun vus da nait sey ikow nabalor.
46007031	Ya as dasey amin ey kookoon taku ey mangusar asda awad assey luta anna as mataguwan taku, dakumpun atyén da jiyuy sey pasig taku sosomkon tey assey daan ey ag-agow, sey luta anna ya dasey nantokotokon ey mapadpadasan taku ey matagu at maminda muumas.
46007032	Sey piuk atyén, aji kayu madadannagan. Sey laraki ey niippun asawana, mabalin ey ipongsanna sey somsomokna ey manservi ya mangwa as dasey angatud as mallaylaydan sey Apu.
46007033	Kon sey awad asawana, sey miipanggop assey luta anna sey ikowna sosomkon ya sey ngannuna ey mangimpalaylayad an asawana
46007034	at siya sey masiyyasiyyan sey somsomokna. Ya sey vubai avus ey niippun asawana unnu sey babarasang, mabalin avus ey ipongsanna sey somsomokna ey manservi assey Apu tey piuna usarun sey amin ey wayana para assey Apu. Kon sey awad asawana, miipanggop avus assey luta anna sey ikowna sosomkon ya sey annuna ey mangimpalaylayad an asawana.
46007035	Sey mangimbag-ak asda nauy tey piuk dakayu turungan ey ajik pun as isanga sey ingkayu mangwaan assey piunyu koon nu aji ibagak da nauy ta mapapanus ya ustu sey koonyu ey matagu ya niippun lumingaling an dakayu assey manserviyanyu assey Apu.
46007036	Nu miipanggop asda luus nanturag ey man-asawa ya kananda ey ajida pun ituruy, kon anna ey jumakumpun sey koon sey laraki assey vubai ey ajina pun maattuman sey liknana ya sosomkona ey man-asawada, niippun lawingna nu man-aggumda at pey lawa ya dakumpun as basur nu man-asawada.
46007037	Kon nu sey laraki at tornona assey somsomokna ey aji pun mangasawa ey niippun mamilit an siya ya maattumana sey liknana ya inggoddongna ey siya nauy sey koona, siyanaʼt sey ustu as koona.
46007038	At siya sey ambaru sey mangasawa kon ambab-aru sey ajita pun mangasawa.
46007039	Sey vubai ey naasaw-an, aji pun mabalin ey mawayaan ey kasin mangasawa nu sissiya ey natattagu as asawana. Kon nu matuy sey asawana, nawaya siya ey kasin mangasawa assey laraki ey piuna kon masapur ey sey laraki at usa ey mamati.
46007040	Kon assey kuwak ey goom, ambab-aru nu aji kasin mangasawa. At agammuk ey sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey manginturturung assey somsomokku assey nauy ey imbagak.
46008001	Anna vus sey ibagak miipanggop assey manginsidaan asda nabniyan ey nidatun asda ap-apudyus. Tuttuwa ey awad da agammu taku kon sey kanan taku ey agammu taku, siyaji at avus sey mangimpaluswa assey ampaspas-uman taku. Kon nu awad layad taku asda vurun taku, ipaluswana sey tumurungan as kumasdoran sey somsomokda.
46008002	Sey tagu ey kanana ey adjuwan sey maawatana, siyaji at avus sey mangimpiila ey awad atgey dasey masapur ey maagammuwana.
46008003	Kon sey tagu ey maryad an Apudyus, agammun vus Apudyus siya.
46008004	Miipanggop ey assey manginsidaan assey nidatun asda ap-apudyus, agammu taku mit ey dasey ap-apudyus at niippun angusda ya agammu taku vus ey saʼsa'an anggey sey Apudyus ey niippun ujum.
46008005	At urey nu ansarum dasey kanakanan da tagu ey ap-apudyus ya dasey ivilangda as umapuwanda ey awad ad langit ya assey luta anna,
46008006	saʼsa'an anggey sey vigvigun taku ey Apudyus. Siya sey Ama taku ey nangwa asda kangamin ya siya sey lapuna ey anna taku assey sana ey matattagu as para an siya. Ya saʼsa'an avus sey vigvigun taku ey Apu ey siya as Jesu Cristu ey nangimpakwaan Apudyus assey kangamin ey awad, at siya sey lapuna ey naatdan taku as viyag.
46008007	Kon aji pun da amin ey tagu maawatan da nauy. Tey awad siya da ujum ey luusda impiingsa ey mandayow asda ap-apudyus at siya sey nu isidada dasey kanaʼsna, ivilangda ey naaggissawanda gapu ta kurang sey angaawatda at ngadnunda ey dakumpun as ustu sey kingwada.
46008008	Kon ibagak an dakayu ey dakumpun assey misida sey mangwa as vumaruwan taku an Apudyus. Niippun itur-eyna an jitaku nu kanun taku ya niippun vus makaanan an jitaku nu aji taku kanun.
46008009	Kon masapur ilan taku ta sey wayawaya taku ey mangwa assey amin ey ajin pun Apudyus isanga, ajina pun vus iluswa sey malivukan dasey daan pun atgey mat-ong sey pammatina.
46008010	Nu as gagara ya sika ey makaawat ey dasey ap-apudyus at niippun angusda ya awad vurun taku as daan pun atgey mat-ong sey pammatina ya innilana sika ey nikakan assey andaydayawanda asda ap-apudyus, oni ey ya naslat vus ey mikakan, aji pey kama as tinurungam siya ey nangan assey nidatun assey ap-apudyus ey isangan sey somsomokna?
46008011	At gapu assey ustu ey maawatam, lamug at lawa sey pammatin sey vurun taku ey kurang sey maawatana madadailan ey urey mit vus siya at ingkatuy Cristu sey basurna.
46008012	At nu kanaʼsji, nakabasurka an Cristu tey nakabasurka assey vurunnu ey kurang sey angaawatna ya nangwaka as mansigaban sey somsomokna.
46008013	At nu awad makan as nu kanuk ya mangwa as madadailan sey pammatin da vurunku, urey pey lawa ajik pun kanun tey oni at lawa ya siya sey mangatud as vumasurana.
46009001	Nawayaak mit ey mangwa assey amin ey piuk koon. Ya usaak vus ey aposel ya innilak as Jesus ey Apu taku. Ya dakayu mit vus sey vungan sey nangwaak assey piun Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
46009002	At urey nu ajiyak pun ivilang as aposel asda ujum, agammuk ey ivilangak an dakayu tey dakayu sey miil-an sey kinaaposelku.
46009003	At da nauy sey songbatku as dasey apporow manillow an sa'un.
46009004	Ibagak an jida ey awad vus sey karobbonganni an Barnabas ey mapakan gapu assey apporoni koon anna.
46009005	Yangey niippun pun lawa karobbonganni ey mangintakin asda asawani ey mamati ey kama assey kookoon dasey ujum ey aposel ey anung vus sey kookoon Peter ya dasey susunud Apu Jesus?
46009006	Ey dakani pun lawa anggey an Barnabas sey asi keygad as ikataguni assey mantudtujuwanni?
46009007	Ey awad surdaju as asi keygad ey mamayad assey gastusna assey kinasurdajuna? Yangey awad pun lawa mankikiwaar as niippun karobbongana ey manimsim assey vungan sey inayongna? Ya sey amupuut assey karneru unnu ganjing, ey niippun pun lawa karobbongana ey manimsim assey gatas dasey animar ey puupuutuna?
46009008	Ajik pun ibaga da nauy gapu anggey assey tinatagu ey kasomsomkan nu aji urey sey lintog at siya vus sey piuna kanan.
46009009	Tey sey nikur-it assey Lintog Moses, kanana, “Ajiyu vub-ujun sey sungad sey animar ey ansiputunyu ta awad agammuna ey mangan nu piuna.” Yangey animar anggey sey piun Apudyus ugujun sina
46009010	ey dakumpun an jitaku? Siguraju ey jitaku sey piuna kanan assey nuugud sana. Tey sey man-araju ya man-ani at namnamauna ey awad maarana as vungan sey siniputna.
46009011	Siyana sey anungna an dakani ey nanginmura assey Gingan Apudyus an dakayu. At ey awad pun lawa karwingna nu awad maarani as kasapuranni an dakayu?
46009012	Tey nu awad karobbongan dasey ujum ey ampaturung an dakayu, ey aji sin-umamud an dakani? Kon ajini pun inusar nauy ey karobbonganni nu aji inan-anusanni dasey amin ey ligat ta niippun matipodan sey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu ey mangngor assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Cristu.
46009013	Agammuyu mit ey dasey tagu ey mansiput assey Tempél at marpu vus pigey assey Tempél sey mangar-anda as ikataguda ya anungna vus as dasey apporow mansiput as midatunan sey animar assey altar at awad vus sey villeyda asda midatun saji.
46009014	Kama vus assey imvilin sey Apu ey dasey apporow mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag at marpu vus pigey as dasey natudtujuwan sey ikataguda.
46009015	Kon ajik pun inusar da nauy ey karobbongan, unnu ajik pun as ikur-it nauy ta atjunyu sey ikataguk. Tey un-unina pey lawa sey matuyak nu sey awad mangaan assey karobbongak ey mangindayow assey apporok mangillibliyan assey dak mantudtujuwan.
46009016	Tey assey apporok mangintudtujuwan assey Ambaru ey Damag, aji pun mabalin ey inyak ampaspas-um tey as Apudyus sey nangimvilin an sa'un ey inyak mantudtuju. Gattok ey kadagdaguwak nu ajik iwarawag sey Ambaru ey Damag.
46009017	Tey nu mantudtujuwak gapu ta siya sey piniuk, awad sey namnamauk ey maatud as tangdanku. Kon gapu ta as Apudyus sey nangimvilin an sa'un, masapur ey kook ey urey niippun namnamauk as tangdanku.
46009018	At ngan pey sey gun-gunak nu'? Sey gun-gunak at siya sey mangintudtujuwak assey Ambaru ey Damag ey niippun kudawuk as tangdanku ey urey nu karobbongak ey matangdanan gapu assey mangintudtujuwak assey Ambaru ey Damag.
46009019	Urey nu niippun tagu as sin-alipan an sa'un, gagarauk ey ambalinun sey long-agku as kamaʼs alipan da amin ey tagu ta umajuaju atyén sey awisuk ey mamati.
46009020	At nu awadak assey iggawan dasey Jews, itajunku assey nakopyaanda ta piga nu awad awisuk an jida ey mamati an Cristu. Ya as dasey manguunnud assey Lintog, itajunku vus assey kookoonda urey nu dokon assey Lintog sey apporok unuunujun ta piga vus nu awad awisuk an jida.
46009021	Kama vus nu awadak assey iggawan dasey Gentil, itajunku vus assey nakopyaanda ey aji pun mangunud assey Lintog ta awad agammuk ey mangawis an jida. Dakumpun as piuk kanan ey ajik pun unujun sey Lintog Apudyus tey uunnujuk mit sey lintog Cristu.
46009022	Siya avus as dasey kurang sey pammatina, itajunku vus assey nakopyaanda ta awad agammuk ey mangimpakasdor assey pammatida. Iggak sey kaviilak ey mangwa assey kangamin asda amin ey tagu ta nu awad atyén kabalinana, maawisku jida ey mamati ta misarakanda.
46009023	Kook amin da nauy as miwarawagan sey Ambaru ey Damag ta mikalak-amak assey gun-guna gapu assey pammatida.
46009024	Mipani sey pammati assey ab-abbak ey tudtuddak. Manuddak losan da mikaab-abbak kon sa'an anggey sey mangabak ey magun-gunaan. At siya anungunyu sey kama kayuʼs mikatudtuddak ey gamgamanyu sey mangabak.
46009025	At da amin ey mikaab-abbak, masapur ey piingsaunda sey long-agda ey amparaparakjis ta awad aranda as gun-guna, gun-guna ey aji pun mannanayun as ing-inggana. Kon an jitaku ey, sey mikaab-abbakan taku at mannanayun sey gun-guna taku.
46009026	At siya sey ajiyak pun as tumuddatuddak ey niippun puntusna unnu kama as vuksingeru ey abvid gey lawa sey vuksinguk.
46009027	At sey kook, piingsauk sey long-agku assey vuksing ta umalley ya iyattumku dasey pipiun sey long-agku, tey oni at lawa ya sa'un at avus sey miwalin ey aji pun magun-gunaan nu maasku tudtujuwan dasey ujum ey tagu.
46010001	Susunud, piuk ey ipakagasmok an dakayu sey nakwa as dasey dakdakor taku, jitaku ey mamati. Nasaraknibanda losan assey livuu ya nandormangda losan ey nanaran assey gawan sey nagugwa ey beybey.
46010002	Ya assey nangalijungan Apudyus an jida assey livuu ya nanarananda assey gawan sey beybey, kama as navunyaganda losan ey angimpiila ey pasurut jida an Moses.
46010003	Ya nanganda losan assey makan ey innatud Apudyus
46010004	ya umminumda losan assey danum ey impaluswan Apudyus assey batu. At sey batu saji, siya as Cristu ey namuvurrun an jida.
46010005	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, aji pun pey dallu nalaylaydan as Apudyus asda kaajuwan an jida at adjuwan sey natuy an jida ey angkabadong assey danak.
46010006	At ey sana, umaney atyén da jiyuy as mansarmingan taku ta aji taku gamgaman dasey lawingan ey kama assey kingwada
46010007	unnu mandayow as dasey ap-apudyus ey anung sey kingwan da ujum an jida. Tey sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus, kanana, “Intukjun dasey tagu ey mangan ya uminum asida at sumikad ey manadok ey mandayow asda ap-apudyus.”
46010008	Siyaji sey masapur ey aji taku koon sey kingwada ey awwey da dor-ag asda dokonda pun as asawa at siya sey natuyan dasey juwampuru ya turu ey livu an jida assey sa'an ey ag-agow.
46010009	Aji taku gan-gannutan sey Apu ey kama assey kingwan dasey ujum an jida at naminda nangkakatuy assey nangtuban dasey tabbad an jida.
46010010	Ya aji taku angnguju ey anung sey kingwan dasey ujum an jida ey siya sey lapun sey nangngatan sey enjel an jida ey imbaar Apudyus.
46010011	Amin da nauy ey nakwa an jida at muusar as mabagbagaan da ujum ya nikur-itda vus as matudtujuwan taku assey sana ey timpu tey tigangey sey mapungpungan sey ag-agow.
46010012	At nu kananyu ey sinjumugot sey pammatiyu, annadanyu tey oni at lawa ya aji pun masinkam-ana ya vummasur kayu.
46010013	Amin dasey masulisugan at nakopyaana nait ey umdas assey viyag sey tagu. Kon matalik as Apudyus at ajina pun iparuvus sey masulisuganyu ey ajiyu pun kaviilan ey malisiyan. Tey assey timpu ey masulisug kayu, atdana dakayu as kasdor ta awad agammuyu ey mangillisi ta aji kayu mar-ug.
46010014	At siya sey dakayu ey pipiuk, man-awidanyu dasey ap-apudyus ta ajiyu jida dayawun.
46010015	Mikabagbagaak an dakayu tey naangsan kayu at siya sey anaanagunyu sey ibagak anna.
46010016	Tey nu koon taku sey Manmanmokan assey Natuyan Jesus, uminum taku assey natatasa ya malluwaru taku ey mansaramat an Apudyus ya mangan taku assey napitpit-ing ey tinapey. Sey mangwaan takuʼsji, ipiilana ey nilak-am taku ey naatdan assey daran Cristu ya assey long-agna assey natuyana.
46010017	At nu nampitpit-ingan taku sey saʼsa'an ey tinapey, nambalin taku as sa'an ey long-ag urey nu adjuwan taku.
46010018	Ya somsomkonyu vus sey koko'on dasey iyIsrael, tey nu mikakanda assey nidatun assey altar, kama as nijugada ey nikadayow assey nidatunan sey datun.
46010019	Ngan sey piuna ugujun sey imbagak saji? Ey sey piuk ey kanan at awad gotok dasey ap-apudyus unnu dasey makan ey nidatun an jida?
46010020	Niippun! Tey sey piuk kanan, niippun ujum as nandatunan dasey niippun pammatina nu aji asda jimunyu ey dakumpun an Apudyus. Sumangaak nu mikakwa kayu asda jimunyu.
46010021	Siyaji sey kanak ey aji kayu mikin-um ya mikakan assey Manmanmokan assey Natuyan sey Apu ya nikin-um ya nikakan kayu vus assey niidatun asda jimunyu.
46010022	Tey nu aaggén taku mangwa, gagaraun taku koon sey angimunan Apudyus. At nu kanaʼsji, yangey angkaskasdor taku nu siya?
46010023	Kanan da ujum ey maparuvusan taku ey mangwa assey kangamin. Tuttuwa nauy kon awad da makwa ey aji pun makaturung asda vurun taku ya awad da makwa ey ajina pun ipakasdor sey pammati nu aji mangatud as ngumayaan.
46010024	At sey koon taku atyén, dakumpun as siya anggey sosomkon taku sey long-ag taku nu aji somsomkon taku vus sey vumaruwan da vurun taku.
46010025	At nu awad makan as isagungda an dakayu ey nangin-an as market, kanunyu ey aji kayu umimuimus nu nabniyan unnu aji pun ta aji malilivukan sey somsomokyu.
46010026	Tey kanan sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus at sey luta anna ya da amin ey awad assey luta at as Apudyus sey singkuwa.
46010027	Isuna vus nu mangiliyun dakayu asda niippun pammatina, at ngan man sey ipasanguda, kanunyu. Aji kayu umimuimus nu nabniyan unnu aji pun ta ambaru as mangananyu.
46010028	Kon mag ey ta awad manukna an dakayu as kanana ey nabniyan sey impasanguda, ajiyu pey lawa kanun para assey vumaruwan sey nangimbaga ta niippun maguruwan sey somsomok.
46010029	Sey piuk ey kanan, assey maguruwan sey somsomok sey nangimbaga saji ey dakumpun as maguruwan sey somsomokyu. Maggey lawa awad mangimbaga ey kanana, “Ina'ayana geyla ey makamang sey piuk ey koon gapu assey somsomok sey usa ey tagu?
46010030	Tey nu mansaramatak an Apudyus assey kanuk, ngey paak lawa jumsikun assey inyak nansaramatan?”
46010031	Asda kangamin ey koonyu, mangan man unnu uminum, koonyu amin as midayawan Apudyus.
46010032	Aji kayu mangwa as urey ngadanna ey lumivuk assey somsomok dasey Jews, Gentil unnu dasey namati an Apudyus.
46010033	Siyana sey dak da koon, ipapatik ey angimpalaylayad asda amin ey tagu assey amin ey kook ey dakumpun anggey sey vumaruwak nu aji sey vumaruwan sey kaajuwan ta ad-aju sey misarakan.
46011001	At siya sey unujunyu atyén sey angokook ey mangunud assey nangokoon Cristu.
46011002	Idayowku dakayu tey sosomkonyu vus pigey sa'un ya apporoyu unujun dasey tudtujuk an dakayu.
46011003	Kon piuk ey ipakaawat an dakayu ey sey kama as urun sey laraki at as Cristu ya sey kama as urun sey vubai at sey asawana ey laraki ya sey kama as urun Cristu at as Apudyus.
46011004	At nu malluwaru sey laraki unnu iparawagna sey Gingan Apudyus masapur ey niippun sakvung sey uruna, tey nu awad sakvungna, ivibviinna sey uruna.
46011005	Kon sey vubai ey aji pun mansakvung nu malluwaru unnu amparawag assey Gingan Apudyus, ivibviinna sey uruna tey anungna nanpapungnguk.
46011006	Tey nu aji mansakvung sey vubai, masapur ey ampapungnguk. Kon gapu ta kaviviin nu mapungngukan unnu ampapukis, masapur ey mansakvung.
46011007	Sey laraki, aji pun masapur ey mansakvung tey siya sey miil-an sey anung Apudyus ya kinangatuna. Ya sey vubai avus, siya sey miil-an sey dayow sey laraki
46011008	tey sey laraki at aji pun nakwa ey narpu assey vubai nu aji sey vubai sey nakwa ey narpu assey laraki.
46011009	Ya aji pun avus nakwa sey laraki ey para assey vubai, nu aji sey vubai sey nakwa para assey laraki.
46011010	At gapu ta kanaʼsji sey nakopyaan sey vubai, masapur ey mansakvung ta ipiilana ey ampaiturey siya assey laraki ey asawana tey urey dasey enjel at vuvuyyaunda.
46011011	Kon urey nu kanaʼsna tey assey nijugaan taku an Apudyus, masapur sey vubai sey laraki ya sey laraki masapurna vus sey vubai.
46011012	Tey urey nu sey pangun ji vubai at narpu assey laraki, amin ey nan-unuunud ey laraki at niyanakda ey narpu assey vubai. Kon as Apudyus vus pigey sey narpuwan sey kangamin.
46011013	At ey sana, somsomkonyu ey ustu nu ambaru ey alluwaru sey vubai an Apudyus ey niippun sakvungna.
46011014	Tey urey nu mibasar assey sigud ey kasomsomkan dasey tagu, kaggaukus nu anjuanju sey vuuk sey laraki
46011015	kon nu sey vubai sey anju sey vuukna, siya sey angimpaporkas an siya tey sey vuukna sey innatud Apudyus as sakvungna.
