46011016	Kon nu awad kumuntra assey nauy ey inugudku, niippun ujum as kasinku ibaga tey siya nauy sey nakopyaan dasey amin ey mamati as koonda ey mandayow an Apudyus.
46011017	Kon sey sumarunu anna ey ugujuk, ajik pun dakayu idayow tey nu madagup kayu ey mandayow an Apudyus, niippun ambaru as mantongparana nu aji umuy as dakumpun.
46011018	Assey damu, inggow sey nangimbaga an sa'un ey aji kayu pun kanu ankikinnaawatan at mabalin nin aan ey tuttuwa.
46011019	Kon masapur ey umdas dallu dasey ajiyu pun ankikinnaawatan ta miila nu ngadanna an dakayu sey ustuustu ey namati.
46011020	Tey nu madagup kayu ey mangan ey manmanmok assey Natuyan Jesus, dakumpun as siyaji sey nabalor
46011021	tey sey mapsuganyu atpey. Tey nu umdas sey timpu ey mangananyu, aji kayu pun an-iinnurey ya anna at ey angkakakan kayu. At siya sey muurat dasey ujum ya mavuuk dasey ujum.
46011022	Ngan gey lawa nait? Yangey niippun vuruyyu as mangananyu? Unnu piunyu anggey idosdos dasey tagun Apudyus ya iviviin dasey niippun mabalinna? Ngan sey namnamaunyu ey miibagak miipanggop assey nauy ey kookoonyu? Ey idayowku pun lawa dakayu? Aji pun mabalin!
46011023	As Apu Jesus sey narpuwan sey tudtuju ey intudtujuk an dakayu. Assey lavi ey naliputan Jesus, nangara assey tinapey
46011024	ya nansaramat an Apudyus asina at pitpit-ingun ey kanana, “Annaya sey long-agku as para an dakayu. Kanunyu nauy ta awad manomsomkanyu an sa'un.”
46011025	Naasda pun vus nangan, kanaʼsji vus sey kingwana ey nangara assey natasa ey bayas at kanana, “Sey bayas anna at siyana sey mipaniyan sey baru ey turag Apudyus ey ipatuttuwan sey darak. At nu uminum kayu assey natatasa anna, koonyu as manmanmokanyu an sa'un.”
46011026	At assey apporoyu manganan assey tinapey ya uminuman assey bayas, ipiilana ey iwarwarawagyu sey natuyan sey Apu inggana assey kasinna umaliyan.
46011027	At ngan man sey amabarang ey mangan assey tinapey ya uminum assey natatasa ey ajina pun somsomkon sey piuna ugujun, nakabasur siya tey nilayusna sey long-ag ya daran sey Apu.
46011028	At masapur ey usisaun sey long-ag asita at mijuga ey mangan assey tinapey ya mikin-um.
46011029	Tey ngan ey sey mikakan ya mikin-um ey ajina pun as sommosommokon sey kinapatig sey long-ag Cristu, kama as kankanuna ya in-inumuna sey kajusaana.
46011030	At siya nauy sey lapuna ey amud pey sey masakit ya akkuya an dakayu ya awad pey da natuy.
46011031	Kon nu ammaan taku usisaun sey long-ag taku, aji taku pun majusa.
46011032	Kon nu nakabasur taku ya disiplinaan Apudyus jitaku, kingwana nauy as aji taku pun mijugaan assey majusaan dasey amin ey aji pun mamati.
46011033	At siya sey dakayu ey susunud, nu madagup kayu ey mangan assey Manomsomkan assey Natuyan sey Apu, masapur ey an-iinnurey kayu.
46011034	At nu awad nuurat an dakayu, mangan yén assey vuruyna ta ajin dakayu jusaun an Apudyus nu madagup kayu ey mandayow an siya. Nu miipanggop ey as dasey ujum, asik itugun nu umaliyak sinat.
46012001	At ey sana dakayu ey susunud, piuk ipaagammu an dakayu dasey katuttuwaan miipanggop as dasey kaviilan ey atjun sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
46012002	Assey daanyu pun mamatiyan, naallilow kayu ey nandayow asda ap-apudyus ey niippun angusna.
46012003	At ey sana, piuk ey agammuwunyu ey sey tagu ey iturturung sey Ispiritun Apudyus at ajina pun mabalin arwagan as Jesus. Ya aji pun mabalin ey ibagan sey usa ey tagu ey as Jesus sey Apuna nu dokon sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey manginturturung an siya.
46012004	Nantokotokon dasey kaviilan ey maatud an jitaku ey mamati kon saʼsa'an anggey sey narpuwana ey siya sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
46012005	Ya nantokotokon avus sey koon taku ey manservi, kon saʼsa'an anggey sey Apu ey manserserviyan taku.
46012006	Ya nantokotokon vus sey kaviilan ey muusar assey mansiputan taku, kon sa'an anggey as Apudyus ey nangatud assey kaviilan sana ey muusar assey manserviyan an siya.
46012007	Ya awad avus sey kaviilan ey maatud assey usa ya usa an jitaku ey mangimpiila assey kaawad sey Ispiritu an jitaku as katurungan dasey vurun taku ey mamati.
46012008	Sey Ispiritun Apudyus atjuna assey usa sey liing ey mangingginga assey tudtujun Apudyus ya sey usa, sey liing ey mangawat ya mangimpakaawat miipanggop an Apudyus.
46012009	Ya sey usa innatud sey Ispiritun Apudyus an siya sey mandogot ey pammati ya siya vus pigey ey Ispiritu sey mangatud assey usa ey tagu assey kaviilan ey mangaan assey sakit.
46012010	Ya atjuna avus as dasey ujum sey kaviilan ey mangwa as dasey nakaskasdaow ya sey ujum, sey kaviilan ey mangimbaga assey ipaagammun Apudyus ya atjuna avus as dasey ujum sey kaviilan ey mangimmatun nu sey nibaga at narpu an Apudyus unnu dakumpun. Ya sey ujum at sey kaviilan ey guminga as dasey nisabsabali ey ginga ya as dasey ujum, sey kaviilan ey mangimpakaawat assey niginga saji.
46012011	Kon amin da nauy ey kaviilan at sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey nangatud, niippun ujum. Ya atjuna da nauy ey kaviilan assey usa ya usa assey piuna ey angatdanan.
46012012	Sa'an sey long-ag sey tagu kon adjuwan sey partina. Urey nu adjuwan sey partina, sa'an anggey ji ey long-ag. Kanaʼsji vus an jitaku ey mamati an Cristu.
46012013	Tey gapu assey sa'an ey Ispiritu, navunyagan taku ey ambalin as sa'an ey long-ag. At urey nu Jews man unnu Gentil, alipan man as dakumpun alipan, sa'an ey Ispiritu sey naatud an jitaku losan.
46012014	Tey sey long-ag, nakwa ey dakumpun as sa'an nu aji adjuwan sey partina.
46012015	Nu as gagara ya kanan sey siki ey dakumpunak as ima at siya sey ajiyak pun miivilang as partin sey long-ag, kon urey gey nu imbaganaji, partin vus pigey sey long-ag siya.
46012016	Ya urey vus nu kanan sey inga ey dakumpunak as partin sey long-ag tey dakumpunak as ata, partin vus pigey sey long-ag siya.
46012017	Tey nu amin ey long-ag at pasig ata, ngannuna ey andongor? Ya nu sey long-ag at pasig inga, ngannuna vus ey anungsung asda masungsung?
46012018	Kon dakumpun as kanaʼsji sey nakopyaan sey long-ag taku ey tagu tey inambarun Apudyus pinanus assey ustu ey iggawanda ey mibasar assey piuna.
46012019	At nu sa'an anggey ey parti, ey kanan taku pun lawa ey long-agji?
46012020	Kon kanaʼsji sey nakwaana, adjuwan sey partina kon sa'an ey long-ag.
46012021	At siya sey aji pun as mabalin ey kanan sey ata assey takrey, “Ajik pun kasapuran sika,” unnu kanan sey uru assey siki, “Ajik pun kasapuran sika.”
46012022	Kon assey katuttuwaan, dasey partin sey long-ag ey ivilang taku as akkuya, jida at avus sey ikow kasapuran taku.
46012023	Ya dasey partin sey long-ag ey kanan taku ey niippun ikow vilangna, da jiyuy at avus sey ikow taku lumvunan. Ya dasey partin sey long-ag ey vuwatna as ipipi'ila, da jiyuy at avus sey ambaruwun taku puutun ey lingban.
46012024	Kon dasey ujum ey partin sey long-ag, ajida pun ikow mapuut. Kon kanaʼsji sey kingwan Apudyus ey namanus assey long-ag ta puutun taku ya ipatig taku dasey partin sey long-ag ey ivilang taku as akittan sey balorna
46012025	ta ajida pun as masiwar nu aji ampipinnuutda.
46012026	At nu masakit sey usa an jida, giknaunda losan. Ya nu miidayow vus sey usa, losanda vus miidayow.
46012027	Sey piuna ey kanan nauy, jitaku ey mamati sey long-ag Cristu, usa ya usa an jitaku at jitaku dasey partin sey long-ag sana.
46012028	Ya sey long-agna sana, awadda jinutukana ey nantokotokon sey siputda. Sey kangatuwan ey jinutukana, dasey aposel, mikagwa dasey profet, mikatlu dasey mangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus asi at dasey mangwa as dasey nakaskasdaow ya da mangaan asda sakit, dasey tumurung as dasey vurunda, dasey awad kaviilana ey mangimpangat as dasey mamati ya asi at dasey guminga asda sabali ey ginga.
46012029	Dakumpun mit as losanda gey aposel unnu umuy mangimbaga assey piun Apudyus ipaagammu unnu mangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus. Ya dakumpun vus as losanda gey angwa as nakaskasdaow.
46012030	Ya dakumpun as losanda gey mangaan as sakit unnu guminga as sabali ey ginga unnu mangimpakaawat assey niginga saji.
46012031	At wasji usa an jitaku, siya gamgamana sey napatig ey kaviilan ey atjun sey Ispiritun Apudyus. Kon awad sey simvumaru as gamgamanyu ey siya sey inyak ipaagammu.
46013001	Urey nu makagingaak as urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey gingan da tagu ya urey dasey gingan da enjel, nu niippun layadku asda asintataguk, niippun servina tey kamaak as gangsa ey nabakas unnu batingting ey tomorong.
46013002	Urey nu awad kaviilak ey mangimbaga assey piun Apudyus ey ipaagammu ya agammuk dasey amin ey aji pun naagammuwan ya kaviilak ey mangawat assey amin ey miipanggop an Apudyus ya mandogot sey pammatik ey mabalinku atunun dasey tagudtud, nu niippun layadku as dasey asintataguk, niippun servik.
46013003	Urey nu aminuk atjun dasey amin ey awad an sa'un asda lumawa ya urey iyuyak sey long-agku ey masgub para asda ujum nu niippun layadku asda asintataguk, niippun maganabku.
46013004	Sey tagu ey awad sey layadna, aji pun allasu as ampatingga sey anusna ya tumuturung asda ujum. Aji pun as maapos ya ajina pun idayow sey long-agna unnu ampaspas-um.
46013005	Aji pun as darasujus unnu marangsit. Ya sey tagu ey awad layadna at dakumpun as pinappapilit. Aji pun allasu as sumanga, ajina pun sosomkon dasey lawingan ey kingwada an siya.
46013006	Ajina pun allaylaydan dasey lawingan ey makwa nu aji siya allaylaydana dasey ambaru ey makwa.
46013007	Ya sey tagu ey awad layadna, maanusana sey amin ya ipuuyna as pasig ambaru sey puntus sey vurunna ya annamnama assey kangamin ya anusana sey amin ey ligatna.
46013008	Sey layad anturturuy as inggana, kon as dasey mangimpaagammu assey piun Apudyus ya as dasey guminga as nisabali ey ginga ya sey kaviilan ey mangawat assey kangamin at ampatingga sey kausaranda.
46013009	Tey amin dasey agammu taku assey sana ya sey koon taku ey angimpaagammu assey piun Apudyus at awad kurangna.
46013010	Kon nu umdas sey timpu ey niippun mankurangana, mamiid dasey awad kurangna.
46013011	Assey kaanakku, inaannak sey kook ey guminga, ansomsomok ya pannakaawatku, kon ey sana ey nat-ongak iwwalinku dasey inaannak ey kopya.
46013012	Kon assey sana, aji pun ikow narawag sey maawatan taku tey anungna angukullarow ey sarming sey kiil-ana kon umdas sey timpu ey pumatak sey kangamin. Tey assey sana, ajik pun agammu dasey kangamin, kon oni ey dallu, maminku maagammuwan sey amin ey anung sey agammun Apudyus miipanggop an sa'un.
46013013	At sey talik taku, namnama taku ya sey layad taku at manturturuyda as ing-inggana, kon sey kapatigan asda turu sana at sey layad.
46014001	Sey dokdokronyu atyén at sey koonyu ey maryad assey asintataguyu ya gamgamanyu avus ey awatun dasey nantokotokon ey kaviilan ey marpu assey Ispiritun Apudyus am-amud sey kaviilan ey mangimbaga as dasey piun Apudyus ipaagammu.
46014002	Tey sey guminga assey nisabali ey ginga at dakumpun as dasey tagu sey kabagbagana nu aji as Apudyus tey niippun mit makaawat assey ibagabagana tey gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus, iginggingana sey aji pun da ujum maawatan.
46014003	Kon sey apporow mangimbaga assey piun Apudyus ipaagammu, kabagbagana dasey tagu as jumgotan sey pammatida ya as kumasdoranda ya as katurunganda nu awad ligatda.
46014004	Sey tagu ey guminga assey nisabali ey ginga at anggey sey mismu ey pammatina as pakasdorona. Kon sey mangimbaga assey piun Apudyus ipaagammu, pakasdorona dasey mamati.
46014005	Piuk atyén ey losan kayu guminga assey nisabsabali ey ginga, kon sey ikok piun, awad atyén sey kaviilanyu ey mangiwwarawag assey piun Apudyus ipaagammu. Tey sey mangiwwarawag assey piun Apudyus ipaagammu at dardallu nu sey guminga assey nisabsabali ey ginga manungad nu awad mangimpakaawat ta maturungan dasey mamati ey mandongor.
46014006	An dakayu ey susunud, ngan sey miiturungna an dakayu nu as gagara ta umaliyak assey iggowyu ya gummingaak as nisabsabali ey ginga? Ey awad pun lawa miiturungna an dakayu nu ajik ibaga sey impiilan Apudyus an sa'un unnu sey impakaawatna ya sey piuna ipaagammu unnu dasey ujum ey mitudtuju ey kasapuran ey maagammuwanyu?
46014007	Urey as dasey pagginga ey kama asda baradong unnu gitara, nu babarangunta pagingaun, ngan annun dasey mandongor ey mangillasin assey ustu ey gingana?
46014008	Kama vus assey tangguyub ey usarun dasey surdaju, nu aji pun narawag sey koon sey manangguyub, niippun mansagana ey mikagubat.
46014009	Isuna vus an dakayu, ngan sey makaawat assey ibagam nu sey tudtujum at aji pun as narawag tey nisabali ey ginga sey inusarnu? Nu kanaʼsji, sey abvid pey lawa sey kinabagbagam.
46014010	Tuttuwa ey amud pey karasin ji ginga assey luta anna ya awad sey kipuuyana.
46014011	Kon nu ajik pun maawatan sey kipuuyana, niippun servina ji an sa'un ya niippun vus servin sey gingak an siya.
46014012	At gapu ta amud sey layadyu ey maatdan assey kaviilan ey atjun sey Ispiritu, siya gamgamanyu sey kaviilan ey makaturung as kumasdoran sey pammatin dasey mamati.
46014013	At nu awad guminga assey nisabsabali ey ginga, masapur kudawuna an Apudyus ta atjuna vus sey kaviilan ey mangimpakaawat.
46014014	Tey nu alluwaruwak ey angingginga assey nisabsabali ey ginga, sey alinnawak anggey sey alluwaluwaru kon aji pun nijuga sey somsomokku.
46014015	At ngan sey kook? Awad sey sin-ujuman ey alluwaruwak unnu mangkankantaak assey ginga ey ipadngor sey kajudwak ya awad vus sey sin-ujuman ey alluwaruwak unnu mankankantaak assey ginga ey maawatan sey somsomokku.
46014016	Tey nu malluwaruka ey mansaramat an Apudyus ey mangusar assey ginga ey ipagingan sey alinnawam, ngan annun dasey vurunnu ey ummali mandongor ey mangavun assey luwarum ey niippun maawatanda assey imbagam?
46014017	Tey urey gey nu mambaru sey nangokoom ey nalluwaru ey nansaramat an Apudyus, niippun niiturungna asda vurunnu.
46014018	Mansaramatak an Apudyus tey nu miipanggop assey gumingaan as nisabsabali ey ginga, dardallu sey angokook nu dakayu.
46014019	Kon assey madagupan taku ey mandayow an Apudyus, un-uniyuk ey urey awad ji lima anggey as igingak ey maawatan as matudtujuwan da ujum nu sey kalivulivu ey aji pun maawatan.
46014020	Dakumpun atyén as inuutting sey somsomokyu miipanggop sina. Kon nu miipanggop assey lawingan, urey kama kayu as utting ey niippun agammuna, kon nu miipanggop assey koonyu ey mansomsomok, masapur ey nat-ong sey insosomsomokyu.
46014021	Awad sey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Ibaarku dasey tagu ey sabali sey gingada ey umuy mangimbaga asda taguk assey piuk ibaga. Kon urey ta pagingauk da nauy ey tagu, ajida pun pey dallu sa'un dongron.”
46014022	At dasey awad kaviilana ey guminga assey nisabsabali ey ginga at dakumpun as para asda mamati nu aji manservi para as dasey aji pun mamati as mangimmatunanda ey awad as Apudyus. Kon sey kaviilan ey mangiwwarawag assey piun Apudyus ipaagammu at para asda mamati ey dakumpun as para asda aji pun mamati.
46014023	At nu madagup kayu ya losan kayu guminga assey nisabsabali ey ginga ya awad aji pun mamati as summakey, yangey ajina kanan ey nuung-ung kayu losan?
46014024	Kon nu losanyu ipaagammu sey piun Apudyus ya awad sumakey as aji pun mamati unnu barangna ey tagu, maawatana ey awad basurna gapu assey jingngorna. At nu sommosommokona sey jingngorna,
46014025	mitokwar dasey nitataru ey awad assey somsomokna. At nu kanaʼsji, masursurjung ya nambabawi ey mandayow an Apudyus ya kanana, “Awad tuttuwa as Apudyus an dakayu!”
46014026	Annaya sey piuk ey ibaga an dakayu ey susunud, nu madagup kayu ey mandayow an Apudyus, kanaʼs sanna sey koonyu. Awad ji mangimpangat assey kankanta, awad ji mantudtuju, awad ji mangimbaga assey piun Apudyus ipaagammu, awad ji guminga as nisabsabali ey ginga ya awad atyén vus ji mangimpakaawat assey niginga saji. Kon ilanyu ta amin ey koonyu at as katurungan sey usa ya usa an dakayu ey mamati.
46014027	Nu awad guminga as nisabsabali ey ginga, masapur awad ji juwa unnu turu as man-or-oros guminga ey ajida pun manggigisan kon masapur awad mangimpakaawat assey niginga.
46014028	Kon nu niippun mangimpakaawat, ajida at luus koon ta igiginnokda ta sey somsomokda anggey sey angwaanda as mangngoran Apudyus.
46014029	Ya awad vus juwa unnu turu as mangimbaga assey piun Apudyus ipaagammu ya dasey ujum, dongronda ta ilasinda nu as Apudyus tuttuwa sey narpuwana unnu dakumpun.
46014030	Kon nu awad usa asda tutukju as nangimpaagammuwan Apudyus assey piuna ibaga, guminok yén sey madama ey gumingaginga.
46014031	An-orooros kayu atyén ey mangimbaga assey piun Apudyus ipaagammu ta losan kayu matudtujuwan ya mipakasdor sey pammatiyu.
46014032	Ya sey tagu ey awad kaviilana ey mangimbaga assey piun Apudyus ipaagammu, awad vus pigey kaviilana ey manginyattum assey jiyuy ey kaviilan
46014033	tey as Apudyus, sumanga ey maguru taku tey siya piuna sey mapanus taku. Anungunyu atyén sey kookoon da amin ey mamati ey nu madagup dasey tagun Apudyus
46014034	gumiginnok dasey vubai. Ajida pun maparuvusan ey guminga tey igiginnokda ey andongor tey siya vus pigey sey kanan sey Lintog.
46014035	Nu awad ey pigey piunda ujikan, asida imusun asda asawada nu vumokrada tey kaviviin sey vubai ey guminga assey sinagung dasey nadadagup ey mamati.
46014036	Somsomkonyu nu dakayu sey narpuwan sey Gingan Apudyus. Ya somsomkonyu avus nu dakayu anggey sey nipadngorana.
46014037	At nu awad mangimbaga an dakayu as kanana ey usa siya ey profet unnu awad kaviilana as innatud sey Ispiritun Apudyus, masapur maawatana ey da nauy ey ingkur-itku an dakayu at as Apudyus sey simvilin.
46014038	At nu awad aji mangngor sina, ajiyu vus siya dongron.
46014039	At kanaʼsji, dakayu ey susunud, gamgamanyu awatun sey kaviilan ey mangiwwarawag assey piun Apudyus ipaagammu ya ajiyu vus isanga sey guminga assey nisabsabali ey ginga
46014040	kon masapur ilanyu ta sey amin ey koonyu at miyustu ya mapanus.
46015001	At ey sana, piuk ipakagasmok an dakayu ey susunud sey Ambaru ey Damag ey apporok intudtuju an dakayu ey inavunanyu ya siya vus pigey sey nipon-adan sey pammatiyu.
46015002	At sey Ambaru ey Damag sana, siya sey misarakananyu nu tornonyu ey mangunud. Kon nu ajiyu tornon ey mangunud, kama as parpaliwa pey lawa sey namatiyanyu.
46015003	Inyawatku an dakayu sey kabaloran ey inawatku an siya, ey siya nauy sey natuyan Cristu gapu assey basur taku. Nakwa nauy tey siya sey kanan sey Gingan Apudyus ey makwa.
46015004	Nilavun pun, tinagun vus Apudyus siya assey mikatlu ey ag-agow tey siya vus pigey sey nikukur-it assey kar-argow assey Gingan Apudyus.
46015005	Nampiila an Peter ya da nasawaran as juwa ey aposel
46015006	ya nampiila vus asda nasuruk as limanggasut ey nadadagup ey susunud taku ey mamati, natuy da ujum an jida kon adjuwan dasey sissiya ey natattagu.
46015007	Oni pun, nampiila vus an James ya da amin ey aposel.
46015008	Ummanungus pun, nampiila an sa'un ey kamaak as niyanak ey daan pun sey vuranna.
46015009	Ugujuk nauy tey sa'un sey kababaan asda amin ey aposel tey ajik pun as karobbongan ey maawagan as aposel tey apporok tinongtong-ag dasey mamati an Apudyus.
46015010	Kon gapu assey amud ey kinaambarun Apudyus an sa'un, nambalinak as kanaʼsna assey sana ya aji pun naramram sey kinaambaruna tey dardallu sey nangwak nu dasey vurunku. Kon dakumpun as mismu ey kasdorku sey nangwa, nu aji sey kinaambaruna ey awad an sa'un.
46015011	Kon niippun natkonana nu sa'un unnu jida sey nangintudtuju tey sey napatig, pinatiyu sey amin ey intudtujuni.
46015012	Nu sey apporoni itudtuju at sey nanaguwan Apudyus an Cristu assey natuyana, ngey pan da ujum an dakayu kanan ey aji pun kasin matagu dasey natuy?
46015013	Tey nu tuttuwa nauy ey aji pun kasin matagu dasey natuy, aji pun atyén kasin natagu as Cristu.
46015014	At nu aji pun siya ummuli, niippun vugas sey iwarwarawagni ya niippun gotok sey namatiyanyu.
46015015	Ya usa pey, man-us-ussat kani ey kama as ang-angwa kani pey lawa as kingwan Apudyus tey takjuganni ey ummuli as Cristu nu assey katuttuwaan at aji pun matagu dasey natuy. Ya nu kanaʼsji, aji pun vus Apudyus tinagu as Cristu.
46015016	Tey nu aji pun umuli sey natuy, aji pun vus ummuli as Cristu.
46015017	At nu aji pun vus ummuli as Cristu, niippun vus kipuuyan sey pammatiyu ya sissiya sey basuryu.
46015018	Ya da amin vus ey nangkakatuy ey namati an Cristu at losanda natarak.
46015019	At nu sey kataguwan taku anggey assey luta anna sey miserviyan sey pammati taku an Cristu ey niippun namnama taku ey kasin matagu, jitaku ey mamati sey ikow kadagdagu asda amin ey tagu.
46015020	Kon assey katuttuwaan, kasin natagu as Cristu ey siya sey pangunji ummuli ey aji pun kasin matmatuy ey siya nauy sey mangimpatuttuwa ey kasin matagu dasey amin ey natuy.
46015021	Gapu ta matuy da amin ey tagu gapu assey kingwan sey sa'an ey tagu, isuna vus ey umuli da amin ey tagu gapu vus assey kingwan sey sa'an ey tagu.
46015022	Tey gapu ta niippun tagu as aji matuy gapu assey nijujug-anda an Adam, isuna vus ey niippun nijujugga an Cristu as aji kasin matagu.
46015023	Kon mapapanus sey ustu ey makwa; As Cristu sey pangun ji ummuli as dasey amin ey natuy. Ya nu ampuuli assey daan ey ag-agow, siyaji sey umuliyén dasey nangkakatuy ey namati an siya.
46015024	Asi at mapungpung sey kangamin ey siya sey mangabakan Cristu assey amin ey turey, pannakabalin ya karobbongan dasey kavusurna asina at ipurang sey Turey an Ama ey Apudyus.
46015025	Tey masapur ituruy Cristu ey manturey inggana as aminuna abakun dasey amin ey kavusurna.
46015026	At assey umanungus, maabak as katuy.
46015027	Tey sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, kanana, “Ipaabak Apudyus sey kangamin an siya ta siya sey manginturey assey kangamin.” Kon maawatan ey sey nibaga anna ey kangamin, aji pun Apudyus injuga sey long-agna assey mangimpaturayana an Cristu assey kangamin tey as Apudyus vus pigey sey angimpaturey an siya.
46015028	At nu maas maabak sey kangamin ey ipaabak Apudyus an Anakna ey Cristu, siyaji sey angimpurangan Cristu assey tureyna mijuga sey long-agna an Apudyus ta as Apudyus sey kangatuwan ey manginturey assey kangamin.
46015029	Sey usa vus, awad da ujum ey ampavunyagda kanu as para asda natuy. At ngan sey kipuuyana ji ey apporoda koon? At nu aji kasin matagu dasey natuy, ngan lawa sey panggopda ey ampavunyag para asda natuy nu'?
46015030	Ya usa pey, pani lawa angkatkatuyan itudtuju da nauy as inag-agow?
46015031	Tuttuwa sey imbagak anna an dakayu ey susunud ey pasigku tata'ayan sey matuyak assey inag-agow. Ya sey gapuna ey ibagak nauy an dakayu tey idayowku dakayu gapu assey nijugaanyu an Cristu Jesus ey Apu taku.
46015032	At nu aji kasin matagu dasey natuy, ngan lawa sey maganabku assey nipasanguwak asda tagu ad Efesus ey kama pigey as ak-akkaunak an jida ey anungku sey mikapatuy asda layun? Aji unina nu unujun taku dasey kanakanan da tagu ey, “Ayu at itukju taku ey mangamangan ya uminuinum tey nu as vigat at matuy taku dallu.”
46015033	Ilanyu ta aji kayu ampaallilow tey tuttuwa sey kanakanan dasey tagu ey, “Nu mijujuggata asda lawingan ey tagu, maalisanta.”
46015034	Masapur sommosommokonyu ta ipog-anyu ey ambasur. Tey awad da ujum an dakayu ey niippun agammuna an Apudyus. Ibagak nauy ta awad vumiinanyu.
46015035	Kon awad da mangimus ey kananda, “Ngan annun da natuy ey umuli? Ngey itjuran sey long-agda?”
46015036	Kon sey kanak, inuung-ung nait ey imusun! Tey sey tagimura ey vukar at aji pun tumuvu nu aji yén imura.
46015037	Ya sey ingka imura at dakumpun mit as jummadakkor ey mura nu aji vukar ey tagimura, mabalin ey baginas unnu da ujum ey vukar.
46015038	Kon as Apudyus sey keygad ey mangatud as allong-ag sey vukar saji ey mitagop assey karasin sey mura.
46015039	Urey avus sey long-ag dasey amin ey awad angusna assey luta anna at aji pun nan-iisu, tey nantokotokon sey long-ag da tagu, ayém, titit ya da aggajiw.
46015040	Nantokon avus sey itjuran dasey awad ad langit ya dasey awad assey luta anna ya nantokotokon avus sey vinaruda.
46015041	Sabali sey vinarun sey init, sabali sey vinarun sey sorag ya as dasey vituwun avus, nantokotokon sey vinarun sey usa ya usa.
46015042	Kanaʼsji vus sey umuliyén sey natuy. Tey sey long-ag ey milavun, siyaji sey long-ag ey mapilok. Kon nu umuli, aji pun ogon mapilok.
46015043	Sey ladag ey milavun at lawingan sey vuyana ya niippun kaviilana kon sey long-ag ey matagu kasin, mangkasdor ya niippun miyisuwan sey siling sey vinaruna.
46015044	At nakopyaana ey awad sey long-ag taku ey para assey luta, kon assey kasinna mataguwan, awad vus sey ilong-agna ey para assey viyag ey niippun patinggana. At awad sey long-ag ey para assey luta anna ya awad vus sey long-ag ey para assey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
46015045	Tey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey as Adam ey laprapun da tagu, inatdan Apudyus siya assey viyag ey para assey luta, kon sey mikagwa ey Adam, siya vus sey mangatud assey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
46015046	At miila ey aji pun namangu sey long-ag ey para assey viyag ey niippun patinggana tey masapur amangu yén sey long-ag ey para assey luta asi at sey long-ag ey para assey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
46015047	Sey namangu ey tagu ey as Adam, luta sey narpuwana kon sey mikagwa ey Adam, ad langit sey narpuwana.
46015048	At amin dasey ganak sey narpu assey luta, an-iisu sey long-agda tey losanda narpu assey luta. Kon dasey tagu ey mijuga assey narpu ad langit, miyisu avus sey long-agda an siya ey midanung assey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
46015049	Gapu ta innatdan Apudyus jitaku as long-ag ey anung sey long-ag sey namangu ey tagu ey narpu assey luta, maatdan taku vus as long-ag ey anung sey long-ag sey narpu ad langit.
46015050	Sey piuk ey ugujun, dakayu ey susunud, sey long-ag ey laman ya dara, aji pun mabalin ey mijuga assey turey Apudyus tey sey long-ag ey mabalin matuy at aji pun mabalin ey mijuga asda aji pun matmatuy.
46015051	Annaya sey piuk ibaga an dakayu ey aji pun naagammuwan inggana assey sana. Aji taku pun mamin matuy kon nu mipaginga sey anungus sey tangguyub, aji pun masinkispey ya losanda long-ag taku naorsan. Tey nu mipaginga sey tangguyub, umuli dasey natuy ey namati an Cristu ta ajida pun kasin matmatuy.
46015053	Tey sey long-ag taku ey mapilok, masapur maorsan as long-ag ey aji pun mapilok ya sey long-ag taku ey ampapattingga, masapur maorsan as aji pun ampatingga.
46015054	At nu maorsan dasey mapilok as aji pun mapilok ya maorsan sey ampapattingga as aji pun ampatingga, nauy sey tumuttuwaan sey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Pinungpung ogon Apudyus sey matuyan ta niippun kasin matmatuy.
46015055	At sika ey katuy, gona sey ingka kasin mangabakan? Gumman sey pannakabalinnu?”
46015056	Tey sey mangar-an sey katuy as pannakabalinna at sey ambasbasuran taku ya sey angabak sey basur at sey aji taku pun mangunudan assey lintog.
46015057	Kon mansaramat taku an Apudyus tey siya sey angatud an jitaku assey pannakabalin taku ey mangabak assey basur gapu assey kingwan Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
46015058	At dakayu ey pipiuk ey susunud, tornonyu ey mamati, aji kayu anjuwajuwa ya pumawot kayu ey manservi assey Apu tey agammuyu ey amin ey koonyu as para an siya at awad miserviyana.
46016001	Nu miipanggop assey madagupan sey miiturung asda tagun Apudyus ad Jerusalem, ambaru nu unujunyu sey imvilinku ey koon dasey mamati ad Galatia.
46016002	Jinuminggu atyén ey usausa at angiwwalin as para assey nauy insigun assey urnungna ta madadagup ta aji pun kasapuran sey mandagup nu umaliyak.
46016003	At nu jumatongak ey, asik ipurang asda matalikyu ey tagu ta iyuyda ad Jerusalem. Angwaak vus as surat ta awad angigammuwan dasey mamati ad Jerusalem ey da nauy dasey tagu sey piniyaryu ey mangiyyuy assey turungyu.
46016004	Kon nu kasapuran ey mivurunak an jida, inyak a.
46016005	Umaaliyak ey mangila an dakayu kon anguyak yén ad Macedonia tey piuk anguy siji.
46016006	Nu umaliyak, maggey lawa ta mabayagak ey mikig-ow an dakayu inggana as maas sey agilid. At nu siyaji, mabalin ey dakayu sey mangimpalibbat an sa'un ey umuy assey kasinku ayan.
46016007	Tey sey piuk atyén nu iparuvus Apudyus, mabab-ayagak an dakayu tey sumangaak ey mikig-ow as sin-akitan ya tineynak dakayu.
46016008	Kon iinggawak yén ad Efesus anna inggana as maas sey Vista ey Pentecos
46016009	tey urey nu amud dasey kumuntra, nawayaak vus pigey ey mangwa assey piun Apudyus ey nabalor sey mantongparana.
46016010	Nu umali as Timothy sinat, masapur ilanyu ta ambaruwunyu siya padatngon tey usa siya ey anungku ey anserservi assey Apu.
46016011	Ilanyu ta niippun mangillayus an siya. Ya nu umayow ey, ambaruwunyu siya palibbatun ta allaylayad sey goomna ey ampuuli an sa'un tey uullayuk siya ya dasey vurunna ey susunud taku ey mamati.
46016012	Nu miipanggop ey avus an sunud taku ey Apollos, kingwak sey kaviilak ey mangawis an siya ta mivurun asda ujum ey susunud taku ey mamati ey umuy mangaggakey an dakayu. Kon kanana ey aji pun makaali assey sana, asi kanu umali nu awad wayana.
46016013	Sey itugunku an dakayu, masapur man-aannad kayu, totornonyu sey pammatiyu, aji kayu umugyat ya pakasdoronyu sey nijujug-anyu an Apudyus.
46016014	Ya ipiilayu sey layadyu asda asintataguyu assey amin ey koonyu.
46016015	Susunud, aagammuyu mit ey da Estephanas ey simbaryan, jida sey ab-avus da mamati ad Acaia ya impapatida ey tummurung asda tagun Apudyus.
46016016	At dawatuk an dakayu ey susunud ta ampaiturey kayu asda jugannaʼt ey tagu ya urey asda ampawot ey mikasiput an jida.
46016017	Amud sey layadku assey jummatong da Estephanas, Fortunatus ya as Acaicus sina. Gapu assey kawaddaʼsna, kama kayu avus as awad sina.
46016018	Jida sey nangwa assey nallaylaydan sey goomku ey anung sey nangimpalaylaydanda an dakayu. At masapur idayowyu sey anung da jugannaʼt ey tagu.
46016019	Amin dasey mamati assey provinsiyan sey Asia at pakumustaun dakayu sinat, kama vus da Aquila an Priscilla ya da amin ey mamati ey apporow madagup assey vuruyda.
46016020	Ya da amin ey susunud taku as nauy at pakumustaun dakayu. Ya urey dakayu sinat ampipinnakumusta kayu avus ey angimpiila ey manlilinnayad kayu.
46016021	Sa'un an Paul ey mismu sey nangingkur-it assey nauy ey pakumustak an dakayu. Kumusta kayu pey.
46016022	Nu awad tagu as niippun layadna an Apu Jesu Cristu, majusa nauy ey tagu. Kanana atyén ta sapsapaun sey Apu ey umali!
46016023	Kanana atyén ta atjun Apu Jesu Cristu sey amin ey vumaruwan an dakayu.
46016024	Amud sey layadku asda amin ey nijuga an Cristu Jesus. Sa'un an Paul.
47001001	Sa'un an Paul ey jinutukan Apudyus as aposel Jesu Cristu. Ya anna sina as sunud taku ey Timothy ey vurunku. Annaya sey suratku an dakayu ey tagun Apudyus ad Corinth ya asda amin ey tagun Apudyus assey kavubruvubruy ad Acaia.
47001002	Kanana atyén ta ipiilan Ama taku ey Apudyus ya as Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu sey amud ey vinaru an dakayu ya maatud an dakayu sey tumarnaan sey somsomokyu.
47001003	Dayawun taku as Apudyus ey Aman Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu. Kumakaddagu ey Ama ya Apudyus ey mangimpakasdor assey somsomok taku.
47001004	Siya sey angimpakasdor assey somsomok taku assey amin ey maligligatan taku ta nu mipakasdor taku, awad agammu taku ey mangimpakasdor asda vurun taku ey maligligatan.
47001005	Tey sey apporow taku mikaligatan assey amud ey natongtong-agan Jesu Cristu, kanaʼsji vus sey milak-aman taku assey dokor ey turung Apudyus gapu an siya.
47001006	Nu matongtong-ag kani, para aminji assey katurunganyu ya as kasarakananyu. Ya nu maturungan kani, para vus assey katurunganyu ta iyaattumyu ey manganus assey anung sey ligat ey anuanusanni.
47001007	Niippun juwajuwan sey namnamani an dakayu tey aaggammuni ey assey mikatongtong-aganyu an dakani, milak-am kayu vus assey manurungan Apudyus an dakani.
47001008	Susunud, piunni ipaagammu an dakayu sey tongtong-ag ey nalak-amni assey provinsiyan sey Asia. Amud sey dagsun sey tongtong-ag ey nalak-amni siji at kananni at nu niippun ogon namnamani ey matagu.
47001009	Tey sey kananni assey timpu saji, inumdas sey matuyanni. Kon nakwa atpey ji ta ajini manjinuwan sey kaviilanni ta sey manjinuwanni at as Apudyus ey kaviilana taguwun dasey natuy.
47001010	At siya vus pigey sey summarak an dakani assey amud ey tongtong-ag ey kananni ey ikatuyni. At namnamaunni ey sumarak vus kasin ey urey nu ngadannaʼsnaʼt sey makwa
47001011	gapu assey luwaruyu. At nu adjuwan sey mangilluwaru an dakani, adjuwan vus sey mansaramat an Apudyus assey manurungana an dakani gapu assey manongbatana assey luwaruyu.
47001012	Aji kani pun maviin ey mangimbaga ya siguraju sey somsomokni ey amin ey apporoni koon asda tagu, am-amud an dakayu at nadarus ey niippun nitataru as lawingan. Ya dakumpun as tinatagu ey kinariing sey narpuwan nauy ey kookoonni tey as Apudyus sey manuturung an dakani gapu assey amud ey vinaruna.
47001013	Narawag sey suratni anna an dakayu ey ajini pun as illiplipog. Kon urey nu ajiyu ikow maawatan dakani assey sana, namnamauk ey umdas dallu sey timpu ey maawatanyu dakani ey ustu ta nu umdas sey ampuuliyén Apu Jesus, idayowyu dakani ey anung sey angindayawanni an dakayu.
47001015	Gapu ta niippun juwajuwak an dakayu, simsimmokku ey andag-usak yén an dakayu assey ayak ad Macedonia ya kasin kani vus anguy assey iggowyu assey ampuuliyanni ta turunganni kasin dakayu ta umam-amud ey kumasdor sey somsomokyu. Ya sey usa vus, ta dakayu sey tumurung ey mangimpalibbat an dakani assey ayanni ad Judea.
47001017	Siyaji sey panggopku, kon gapu ta aji pun naturuy, ajiyu atyén kanan assey somsomokyu ey ussatan kani ey anungna dasey niippun pammatina ey miid ajida avunan kon assey somsomokda ajida pun atpey lamug koon.
47001018	Kon an dakani, nu kananni ey oon koonni, niippun juwajuwana ey koonni ey anung sey kinatuttuwan dasey ibagan Apudyus
47001019	tey niippun mit vus jugannaʼt an Jesu Cristu ey Anak Apudyus tey niippun avunana as ajina pun koon. Siya nauy sey apporoni iwarawag an dakayu ey dakani anda Silvanus ya as Timothy. Tey an siya, ngan ey sey kanana ey koona, koona.
47001020	Tey sey amin ey impostan Apudyus an Cristu at naminna tinongpar. Siyana sey gapuna nu pa taku avunan sey kinatalikna as madayawan Apudyus.
47001021	At as Apudyus sey mangimpakasdor assey pammati taku losan an Jesu Cristu ya piniyarna vus jitaku ey mangwa assey ipakwana.
47001022	Innatjun vus Apudyus sey Ispirituna ey milong-ag an jitaku ey siya sey kama as sinyar ey taguna jitaku as manuttuwaan ey atjuna ey atjun an jitaku dasey amin ey impopostana.
47001023	Agammun Apudyus sey katuttuwaan ey sey lapun sey ajik pun ummaliyan ad Corinth tey sumangaak ey mangimparwing assey somsomokyu assey mangingorak an dakayu.
47001024	Tey dakumpun as siya ingkani iturayan sey pammatiyu tey ustu mit vus pigey sey nipon-adan sey pammatiyu. Tey sey piunni anggey at ingkani jugjug-an sey lumaylaydanyu as kumasdoran sey pammatiyu.
47002001	At siyana sey lapuna nu paʼk lawa onatun sey panggopku ey umali sinaʼt assey sana tey sumangaak ey mangimparwing assey somsomokyu.
47002002	Tey nu parwinguk sey somsomokyu, ngan sey angimpalaylayad an sa'un nu', nu dokon atyén dakayu ey pinarwingku?
47002003	At siya sey imvis ey umaliyak, nanuratak pey lawa ta nu jumatong sey timpu ey umaliyak, dasey tagu ey namnamauk ey mangimpalaylayad an sa'un ajida atyén parwingun sey somsomokku. Tey sigurajuwak ey nu allaylayadak, malaylaydan kayu avus.
47002004	Tey sey inggow nanuratak saji, gadtok pigey ey ansigab sey somsomokku ya nalluruwaak. Ajik pun piun kanan ey parwinguk sey goomyu kon piuk ey agammuwunyu sey amud ey layadku an dakayu.
47002005	At nu awad nangwaʼs lummawingan ji somsomok, dakumpun as anggayak as pinarwingna nu aji urey dakayu. Kon sumangaak atyén ey manginsopsop assey majusaana
47002006	tey ummaney sey kingwayu ey nanusa an siya.
47002007	At pakawanunyu ya liwliwaunyu siya ta aji matarak sey namnamana.
47002008	At ey sana, ampangpangaasiyak ta ipiilayu sey tuttuwa ey layadyu an siya.
47002009	Siyana sey lapun sey inggow nanuratak an dakayu ta ilak sey tuttuwa ey katataguyu, nu tuttuwaunyu vus pigey ey koon dasey amin ey intugunku.
47002010	At assey sana, pakawanunyu siya. Tey nu ngan man sey pakawanunyu, pakawanuk avus. Assey katuttuwaan, naasku siya pinakawan assey sinagung Cristu para assey vumaruwanyu at pinakawanku vus dasey kasapuran ey mapakawan.
47002011	Kook nauy ta ajin jitaku allilawun ya urgun an Satanas tey aagammu taku dasey lawingan ey panggopna.
47002012	Assey ummayak ad Troas ey mangintudtuju assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Cristu, ambaru tey innatdanak as waya an Apudyus ey mantudtuju
47002013	kon ajiyak pun ning-op tey niippun indasak an sunud taku ey Titus siji. At siya sey sin-akitan anggey sey iniggawak siji at nangow-asak ad Macedonia ey manganap an siya.
47002014	Kon mansaramat taku an Apudyus tey gapu assey kingwan Jesu Cristu, anung taku navuvurug ey barud ey ingkarna assey nangabakana. At ey sana, inusarna vus jitaku ey mangiwwarawag asda amin ey kikkiili assey miipanggop an Cristu ey kama assey bangbangun Apudyus ey nisurut sey banguna asda amin ey tagu.
47002015	Tey jitaku ey mamati, anung taku bangbangu ey indatun Cristu an Apudyus ey misurut sey banguna asda amin ey tagu, nasarakan unnu aji pun.
47002016	As dasey aji pun mamati, kumatuy sey anungsunganda an jitaku kon as dasey mamati, tumagu sey anungsunganda an jitaku. At ey awad pun lawa tagu as kaviilana ey mangwa assey kanaʼsna?
47002017	Tey dakani, ajini pun anung dasey ujum ey umuy manginggaggakey assey Gingan Apudyus ey anungda sey awad umuyda ingina as angar-anda as pilak. Kon an dakani, as Apudyus sey nanjutuk an dakani ey niippun ujum as gadtokni nu aji sey mangingginga assey Gingan Apudyus assey apporoni manserviyan an Cristu.
47003001	Asda nauy ey uguugujunni, ey sey piuna kanan, idayowni sey long-agni? Yangey kasapuran ey awad ipiilani as surat an dakayu unnu awad koonyu as surat as angagammuwanda an dakani?
47003002	Aji pun, tey dakayu sey kama as suratni ey nikur-it assey somsomokni. At dakayu sey kama as angagammuwanda ya amasaanda assey kiwaarni.
47003003	At narawag ey as Cristu sey nangingkur-it assey surat sana ey impow-itna an dakani. Ya dakumpun as pinsar sey nuusar ey nikur-it nu aji sey Ispiritun Apudyus ya dakumpun vus assey dapin-ey ey batu sey nikur-itana nu aji assey somsomok da tagu.
47003004	Ansokar kani ey mangugud assey kinatuttuwan da nauy tey antalik kani an Apudyus gapu an Cristu.
47003005	Ajik pun maggey kanan ey narpu an dakani sey pannakabalinni ey mangwa asda koonni tey as Apudyus sey narpuwana.
47003006	Tey siya sey nangatud assey kaviilanni ey manservi assey Baru ey Turag Apudyus. Sey Turag sana, ajina pun anung sey nikur-it ey lintog nu aji gapu assey kiwaar sey Ispiritun Apudyus. Tey sey kipuuyan sey nikur-it ey lintog at sey katuyan kon sey atjun sey Ispiritun Apudyus at sey mataguwan as ing-inggana.
47003007	Somsomkon taku sey nangimpiil-an Apudyus assey kinasilingna assey nangatudana assey Lintogna an Moses ey nikur-it assey dapin-ey ey batu. Assey timpu saji, impiilan Apudyus asda tagu sey kinadayowna gapu assey summilingan sey vusar Moses. Ya urey assey anna ey kumapsukapsut sey siling sey vusar Moses, aji pun dallu dasey iyIsrael miimosdongan ey mangila assey vusarna tey sissiya ey sumiling. At nu nipiila sey kadadayow Apudyus assey Lintog ey niippun ujum as ivungana nu aji sey katuyan,
47003008	ey aji sinjumallu sey siling sey vinarun sey mangkiwaaran sey Ispiritun Apudyus?
47003009	At nu nipiila sey siling Apudyus assey nangatudana assey Lintog ey mangimbaga assey magoddongan da tagu ey matuy, ey aji sinjumallu sey miil-an sey kinaapudyusna gapu assey panggopna ey mangwa an jitaku as niippun basurna?
47003010	Tey assey katuttuwaan, sey kinangatun sey panggop Apudyus assey sana at sinjumallu sey kinangatuna nu sey kinangatun sey namangu ey panggopna.
47003011	Tey nu awad vinarun sey sin-akitan anggey sey nuusarana, ey aji sin-umamud sey vinarun sey mannanayun as ing-inggana.
47003012	At gapu ta siyana sey namnamaun taku, amud sey sokarni ey mantudtuju
47003013	ey niippun linglingbanni. Tey ajini pun anung as Moses ey sinakvungana sey vusarna ta ajin da iyIsrael ilan sey kumapsukapsutan sey silingna.
47003014	Kon luus tummabvug sey somsomokda, tey urey assey sana, nu basaunda sey lintog Moses, ajida pun maawatan sey kipuuyana tey kama as nasasakvungan sey somsomokda. Kon kanaʼsji sey makwa tey inggana dallu as mijuga sey usa ey tagu an Jesu Cristu asi at makaan sey kama as nisasakvung assey somsomokna.
47003015	At urey assey sana nu mabasa sey Lintog Moses saji, kama as sissiya sey sakvung ey nallilingngub assey somsomokda.
47003016	Kon nu mansinagung sey tagu assey Apu, makaan sey nallilingngub saji.
47003017	Sey uguugujuk anna ey Apu at siya sey Ispiritun Apudyus. At ngan man sey tagu ey milong-agan sey Ispiritun Apudyus, mawayawayaan siya.
47003018	An jitaku losan ey nijuga an Cristu, nakaan ogon sey kama as nallilingngub an jitaku tey anung taku aggelelawan as mangil-an da tagu assey kinangatun sey Apu. Ya mabalibaliwan taku ey umambaru inggana as miyanung taku an siya. Ya niippun ujum as mangwa assey kanaʼsna nu dokon sey Apu ey siya sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
47004001	At ey sana, gapu assey dagun Apudyus, naatud an dakani sey nauy ey siput at siya sey aji kani pun ngumaya.
47004002	Nan-awidanni dasey nitataru ya kaviviin ey koko'on da tagu ya niippun vus al-allilawunni. Ya ajini pun vus ikbot ey mangintudtuju assey ustu ey piun sey Gingan Apudyus ey ugujun. Ya assey angiilan Apudyus, ipakaawatni anggey ey mangimbaga assey katuttuwaan at kapilitan ey imatunan da tagu sey awad an dakani.
47004003	Manuat tey tuttuwa ey kama as nalilingban sey Ambaru ey Damag ey apporoni itudtuju, kon dasey nalilingban sey somsomokda, anturungda assey madadailanda.
47004004	Ajida pun mamati tey as Satanas ey turey assey luta anna, siya sey nallilingngub assey somsomokda ta ajida ilan sey silow ey marpu assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop assey Midayawan Cristu ey miil-an sey ustu ey kopyan Apudyus.
47004005	Dakumpun assey long-agni sey ingkani iwarawag nu aji as Jesu Cristu ey Apu. Tey an dakani, alipan dakani anggey an Cristu ey manserservi an dakayu gapu an siya.
47004006	Tey as Apudyus sey nangimbaga ey kanana, “Maawadka ey lawag,” siya vus pigey sey nangatud as lumawagan sey somsomok taku ta maawatan taku sey kinangatuna. Ya niippun vus kasin mangimpiila assey kinangatun Apudyus nu aji as Jesu Cristu.
47004007	Kon an dakani ey apporow mangintudtuju, mipani kani as banga ey nangiggaan Apudyus assey ikow nabalor. Kanaʼsji sey kingwana ta miila ey sey kaviilanni at dakumpun as narpu an dakani nu aji narpu an Apudyus.
47004008	At urey nu miid ajida koon ey manongtong-ag an dakani, aji kani pun maggey maskuk. Ya nanginkinnu ey malivuk sey somsomokni kon aji pun natarak sey namnamani.
47004009	Ya urey nu adjuwan dasey tomongtong-ag, aji pun dakani nan-awidan an Apudyus. Sin-uujuman ey, angakiakitan dakani gongatun, kon anna mit ey sissiya kani umanguangus.
47004010	Assey amin ey umayanni, kama as inag-agow ey tata'ayanni sey katuy ey anung sey natuyan Jesus. At sey long-ag anna ey mamattuy, ipiilana nu ngannun Jesus ey natuy. Kon gapu ta aji kani pun naparuvusan ey matuy, siyaji at avus sey mangil-an da tagu ey natattagu as Jesus ey mamupuut an dakani.
47004012	Kon assey manata'ayanni an katuy, imvungana at avus sey mataguwanyu.
47004013	Awad sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Namatiyak at siya sey gummingaak.” At anungna vus an dakani tey gapu assey namatiyanni, siya sey ingkani iwarawag.
47004014	Tey agammuni ey as Apudyus ey nanagu an Apu Jesus, taguwuna vus dakani gapu assey nijujug-anni an Apu Jesus. Ya urey vus dakayu ta ipuyutna jitaku losan ey mamati ta mijuga taku an siya assey iggowna.
47004015	Amin da nauy ey laklak-amunni at para assey vumaruwanyu tey nu umajuaju dasey tagu ey mikalak-am assey amud ey kinaambarun Apudyus, umaju vus dasey mansaramat an siya as madayawana.
47004016	Siya sey lapuna nu pakani aji ngumaya. Tey urey nu kumuyakuya sey long-agni, inag-agow ey kumasdokasdor sey somsomokni an Apudyus.
47004017	Tey sey tongtong-ag ey laklak-amunni assey sana, ivilangni ey singkimad anggey, kon al-allangpow nu iyisu taku assey gun-ujun taku as daan ey ag-agow. Tey sey mantongparan da nauy ey tongtong-ag at sey ambaru ey viyag ad langit ey niippun miyisuwana.
47004018	Tey dasey mimi'ila assey sana at umdas ey umdas sey mapungpungana, kon dasey aji pun miila at niippun patinggana. At siya sey imumurani assey somsomokni dasey aji pun miila assey sana.
47005001	Sey long-ag taku anna at anungna bawi ey iniiggawan taku assey luta anna. Kon nu mabakas sey bawi anna, agammu taku ey awad sey atjun Apudyus ey vumruyan sey usa ya usa an jitaku ad langit. Dasey vuruy anna ey atjuna at dakumpun as tagu sey nangwa nu aji as Apudyus, at niippun mabakasana as ing-inggana.
47005002	Assey matatagguwan taku assey luta anna, magon ta umag-us taku tey kama as ayuwan taku ey mangillumvun assey baru ey long-ag ey marpu ad langit
47005003	ta aji taku kama as mampoponnas ey niippun illolong-ag taku ey aji pun miila.
47005004	Assey matatagguwan taku, kama taku as umayuayuwwong gapu asda tongtong-ag taku. Kon ajik pun kanan ey piun taku matuy nu aji sey piun taku at malumvunan sey long-ag taku anna ey allasu as matuy assey long-ag ey aji pun matmatuy as ing-inggana.
47005005	As Apudyus sey nanginsagana assey baru ey long-ag ey maatud an jitaku. Ya innatudna vus sey Ispirituna ey milong-ag an jitaku as manuttuwaan taku ey atjuna amin da nauy an jitaku.
47005006	At siya sey lapuna ey aji taku maggey as ngumaya. Agammu taku ey assey iiggawan taku assey luta anna ey vinumruyan sey long-ag, adayu taku assey iggawan sey Apu.
47005007	At urey nu kanaʼsna, sey pammati an Apudyus sey manginturung an jitaku ey dakumpun as dasey mimi'ila.
47005008	Siya sey niippun juwajuwan sey somsomokni ey un-uninaunni ey teynan sey long-ag anna ta ingkani mikig-ow assey Apu.
47005009	At urey nu sissiya kani assey luta anna unnu awad kani assey iggowna, siya pangganni koon sey allaylaydana.
47005010	Tey masapur mamin taku sumangu an Cristu ey muuwis ta usausa at maatud sey miyambong assey kingwana assey natatagguwana assey luta anna, ambaru man unnu lawingan.
47005011	At gapu ta agammuni sey koon ey umugyat an Apu Jesus, pumangug kani ey mangawis asda tagu ta mamatida atyén. Agammun Apudyus sey kangamin ey katataguni. Kanana atyén ta urey vus dakayu at agammuyu da nauy ey nakopyaanni.
47005012	Dakumpun as ibagani da nauy ta idayowni sey long-agni an dakayu tey sey piunni anggey at awad atyén vus pey mamigvig an dakani ya awad isongbatyu asda tagu ey mangimpatpatig asda mimi'ila ey kopyan da tagu ey dakumpun asda ambaru ey ugali.
47005013	At nu as gagara ya kama kani as nuung-ung-ungan assey mangiilan da tagu, siyana gey tey koonni sey midayawan Apudyus. At nu kanan da ujum ey ustu sey awad assey somsomokni, siyana gey tey para vus assey katurunganyu.
47005014	Tey sey layad Cristu sey manginturturung assey amin ey koonni ey matagu tey siguraju kani ey natuy as Cristu para asda amin ey tagu ta miivilangda losan as kama as nikakatuy an siya.
47005015	At natuy siya para asda amin ey tagu ta da amin ey natattagu, dakumpun atyén assey vumaruwan sey long-agda sey apporoda ipapangug nu aji sey piun Cristu ey natuy ya asi at umuli kasin as para an jida.
47005016	At ey sana, sey mamigviganni assey usa ey tagu at aji pun miibasar assey niluluta ey somsomok urey nu kanaʼsji sey kingwani ey namigvig an Cristu assey keysan ey ag-agow. Kon sabali ogon sey angokoonni ey amigvig an siya assey sana.
47005017	At urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey nijuga an Cristu, nambalin siya as barbaru ey tagu. Naorsan dasey minamaliyém at niyoros dasey ambabaru ey kopya.
47005018	As Apudyus anggey sey nangwa asda nauy tey pinuulina jitaku ey mabalin mivurun an siya gapu an Cristu. At piniyarna dakani ey manudtuju asda tagu ta ambalinda vus as vurunna.
47005019	Sey piunni ibaga at impuulin Apudyus sey ambaru ey mivurunan da tagu an siya ey ajina pun singilun sey vummasuranda gapu an Cristu. At siya nauy sey impiyarna an dakani ey itudtujuni nu ngan annun da tagu ey ambalin as vurunna.
47005020	At ey sana, kama as Apudyus ey mismu sey mangaw-awis an dakayu gapu assey mangus-usarana an dakani ey kama as sungad Cristu. At gapu an Cristu, ampangpangaasi kani ta iparuvusyu ey puuliyun Apudyus dakayu as amvurunna.
47005021	Tey gapu an jitaku, impavukud Apudyus an Cristu da amin ey basur taku ey urey nu niippun basurna ta nu mijuga taku an siya, miivilang taku as niippun basurna an Apudyus.
47006001	Dakani ey mikasiput anna an Apudyus, ampangpangaasi kani an dakayu ta ajiyu iggaʼs niippun gotokna sey amud ey kinaambarun Apudyus an dakayu.
47006002	Tey awad sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Jingngorku sey dawatnu tey jummatong sey ustu ey timpu ey mangadaguwak ya manurungak an sika tey nauy sey timpu ey manginsarakanak an sika.” At siyana ey timpu sey ustu ey mangngoran Apudyus an dakayu ya siyana vus ey timpu sey manginsarakanana an dakayu.
47006003	Man-aannad kani ta niippun atyén mankurangan sey angokoonni ey mangwa asda impaviyang Apudyus an dakani ta niippun atyén ilan da tagu as mikumbot assey angokoonni ey manservi.
47006004	At assey amin ey koonni, ipiilani ey as Apudyus sey anserserviyanni gapu assey manginyaattumanni asda amin ey malivukan sey somsomok, ligat ya da kagguugyat ey apporow makwamakwa.
47006005	Apporow kani nadatar ya nibarud anda apporon dakani nilapas. Amud sey naayoayonganni ya sin-uujuman ey, niippun agammuni ey masuyup ya nanginkinnu sey nuuratanni.
47006006	Miila avus ey anserservi kani an Apudyus gapu assey nadarus ey kopyani ya ustu sey maawatanni miipanggop an Apudyus ya aannusanni sey kangamin ya man-aannad kani assey amin ey koonni. Miila avus gapu ta awad sey Ispiritun Apudyus an dakani ya ipipi'ilani sey tuttuwa ey layadni asda tagu.
47006007	Sey katuttuwaan sey apporoni itudtuju ya awad sey pannakabalin Apudyus an dakani. Ya sey karasagni ya armasni ey mikagubat at sey nangimvilangan Apudyus an dakani as niippun basurna an siya.
47006008	Urey nu idayow dakani unnu ivibviin dakani, unnu ambaruwun dakani anda insurtuwun dakani ya ngadnun dakani as ussatan, sey katuttuwaan anggey sey apporoni ibaga.
47006009	Kanan da ujum ey niippun kavigviganni, kon anna at ey jinamag dakani asda amin ey tagu. Ya urey nu kanan da tagu ey mamattuy kani, anna pey dallu ey iillanyu dakani ey matattagu. Urey nu kanan da ujum ey najusa kani, anna pey dallu ey ajida pun dakani gingngat.
47006010	Urey nu awad da anjujuuyanni, pasig kani allaylayad. Urey nu lumawa kani, adjuwan sey pinabaknangni. Niippun vus laksunni assey luta anna, kon kuwani sey kangamin.
47006011	Dakayu ey susunud ad Corinth, imbagani sey amin ey awad assey somsomokni ya sey liknani an dakayu ey niippun insulibni.
47006012	Dakumpun as dakani sey nangkurang sey layadna an dakayu nu aji dakayu sey nangkurang sey layadna an dakani.
47006013	Sey angokook ey guminga at kama as imvilangku dakayu as aanakku, at sey kingwani ey naryad an dakayu, kananaʼs ji atyén vus sey koonyu ey maryad an dakani.
47006014	Aji kayu mikikkiila asda aji pun mamati tey aji pun mabalin miyasawa sey ambaru assey lawingan. Tey yangey mabalin man-aggum sey appawey ya aggikbot?
47006015	Kama avus ey aji pun mabalin ey man-aggum da Cristu an Satanas. Ya aji pun vus angkabagayan dasey mamati ya dasey aji pun mamati.
47006016	Tey yangey mibagey ey mijuga sey ap-apudyus assey ustu ey vuruy Apudyus? Jitaku mit sey ustu ey vuruy sey natattagu ey Apudyus gapu assey imbagana ey kanana “Mikig-awak asda taguk ta jida sey mivuvullunak. Sa'un sey Apudyus ey dayawunda ya jida sey ngadanak as taguk.”
47006017	Ya kanana vus, “Teynanyu jida ya tumalin kayu ya aji kayu da mijuga asda lawingan ey kookoonda at padatngok dakayu.
47006018	Ya sa'un sey man-Amayu ya dakayu vus sey ambalin as aanakku.”
47007001	An dakayu susunud ey pipiuk, gapu ta da nauy sey impostan Apudyus an jitaku, man-awidan taku dasey amin ey kopya ey mangimparwing assey long-ag ya somsomok taku. Ya assey koon taku ey matagu, masapur ey umugyat taku an Apudyus ta vumarubaru sey naapudyusan ey kaviviyag taku.
47007002	Maawatanyu atyén vus pey dakani tey niippun mit kingwani as lawingan assey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu ya niippun mit vus inallilowni anda nilukuni.
47007003	Dakumpun as ibagak da nauy ta pabasuruk dakayu nu aji siya angugudak sina tey gapu assey layadni an dakayu ey siya sey imbabaggak an dakayu assey keysan ey ag-agow. Tey urey ngan man sey makwa, matagu taku man unnu matuy taku, aji pun maggey makakkaan sey layadni an dakayu.
47007004	Siguraju kani assey miipanggop an dakayu ey koonyu dasey ustu at siya sey idayowku dakayu asda ujum ey tagu. At urey nu amud sey tongtong-agni, naliwliwa vus pigey sey somsomokni ya amud sey ragsakni an dakayu.
47007005	Tey urey assey jummatnganni ad Macedonia, niippun summinokanni tey miid ajini nasagrap ey tongtong-ag ya matkon dasey kumuntra ya da amud ey danagni nu ngey makwa an dakayu.
47007006	Kon as Apudyus ey apporow mangimpakasdor asda ngummaya sey somsomokna, pinakasdorna sey somsomokni assey jummatngan Titus.
47007007	Dakumpun anggey sey jummatngana sey nangimpakasdor assey somsomokni nu aji dasey imbagana ey kingwayu ey nangimpalaylayad an siya. Inugudna vus sey inayuyu ey mangila an sa'un ya sey nasursurjunganyu assey lawingan ey kingwayu ya sey layadyu ey mangintakjug an sa'un. Siya nauy sey nangatud as ikow pigey nallaylaydak.
47007008	Tey urey nu pinarwingku sey somsomokyu assey suratku saji, ajiyak pun nanjujuuli. Kon assey katuttuwaana, anna sey jujuulik tey agammuk ey lummawing sey somsomokyu, kon ambaru tey sin-akitan anggey sey lummawingan sey somsomokyu.
47007009	At ey sana, maragsakanak dakumpun as gapu ta pinarwingku sey somsomokyu nu aji sey nambabawiyanyu gapu assey nasursurjunganyu. Tey inusar Apudyus sey lummawingan sey somsomokyu as vummaruwanyu at siya sey niippun atpey kingwani as lawingan an dakayu.
47007010	Tey sey masursurjungan gapu assey basur ey ipakagasmok Apudyus, ivungana sey ambabawiyan ey siya sey kasarakanan ey niippun anjujuuliyan. Kon sey masursurjungan ey niippun iluswana as ambabawiyan, siya sey misinaan an Apudyus as ing-inggana.
47007011	Ilanyu pees sey impakagasmok Apudyus an dakayu gapu assey nasursurjunganyu, illuswana sey nangimpapatiyanyu ey mangimpiila ey ajiyu pun takjugan sey lawingan. Ajiyu pun piniun sey nivibviinanyu ya ummugyat kayu as oni ey ya najusa kayu. Ya piniunyu ey vumaru kasin sey amvuvurnan taku ya piunyu vus sa'un kasin ilan. Ya tillonyu ey nanusa asda nangwa as lawingan. At gapu asda nauy ey kingwayu, impiilayu ey niippun mipabasur an dakayu gapu assey nakwa saji.
47007012	Assey nangingkur-itak assey surat saji, dakumpun as pabasuruk sey tagu ey nakabasur unnu assey tagu ey nambasurana. Tey sey nangingkur-itak ta ipiilan Apudyus an dakayu nu ngan annun sey amapangugyu an dakani.
47007013	At kummasdor sey somsomokni gapu asda nauy ey nakwa. Kon dakumpun anggey asda jiyuy sey nallaylaydanni nu aji ummam-amud sey layadni assey nangil-anni assey ragsak Titus tey vummaru ey ustu sey somsomokna gapu assey impiilayu an siya.
47007014	Tey assey daan pun Titus umaliyan assey iggowyu, apporok indayow dakayu an siya. At ambaru tey tummuttuwa dasey amin ey imbagak at ajiyak pun maviin. Tey anung sey apporoni nangimbagaan assey amin ey tuttuwa an dakayu, kanaʼsji vus ey pasig tuttuwa sey amin ey imbagani an Titus miipanggop an dakayu.
47007015	At assey sana, ummam-amud sey layadna an dakayu tey ajina pun maliwatan sey kingwayu ey namadatong an siya ya sey layadyu ey nangngor assey imbagana ya sey danagyu nu nakwayu sey ustu unnu aji pun.
47007016	At ey sana amud sey layadku ya niippun juwajuwana ey mapiyarku dakayu.
47008001	Susunud, piunni ey ipaagammu an dakayu sey miipanggop assey nantongparan sey amud ey kinaambarun Apudyus asda mamati ad Macedonia.
47008002	Tey urey nu lumawada ya inidamanda sey amud ey tongtong-ag, sin-umamud vus sey layadda tey silalayadda ey mangatud as turungda asda vurunda ey angkasapuran.
47008003	At mabalinku takjugan ey dakumpun anggey as patinggan sey kaviilanda sey apporowda atjun nu aji urey dasey kasapuranda. Ya niippun mit namilit an jida nu aji narpu assey kuwada ey goom.
47008004	Nampangpangaasida an dakani ta mijugada ey mangatud para asda tagun Apudyus ey angkasapuran ad Judea.
47008005	Ajini pun ninamnama ey sin-umamud sey koonda nu sey sisimmokni. Kon sey kingwada, pinanguda impiyar sey long-agda assey Apu ya asida at vus ipiyar an dakani as mangwaanda assey piun Apudyus.
47008006	At kinabagbagani as Titus ta ampuuli sinaʼt ta turungana dakayu ey mangimpadakpus ey managup ey miiturungyu tey siya vus pigey sey nanginsarad ey nangimbaga assey kanaʼsna sey koonyu.
47008007	Adjuwan sey nallasiyanyu tey mandogot sey pammatiyu, kaviilanyu ey mantudtuju, adjuwan sey maawatanyu, ipapangugyu ey tumurung ya amud sey layadyu an dakani. At ey sana, masapur atyén vus ey mallasi kayu miipanggop as tumurungan asda makasapur.
47008008	Ajik pun as ugujun nauy ta mandarak dakayu. Tey sey angugudak assey angokoon da ujum ey tumurung ta awad unujunyu as mangil-anni assey kinatuttuwan sey layadyu.
47008009	Tey naagammuwanyu mit ey amud sey kinaambarun Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu. Tey urey nu baknang siya ad langit, nambalinuna sey long-agna as lumawa gapu an dakayu ta sey nambalinana as lumawa, siya sey vumaknanganyu.
47008010	At sey itugunku an dakayu miipanggop assey iturungyu, ambab-aru nin nu ipadakpusyu dagupun sey luusyu insarad assey keysan ey tawun ta maas tey dakayu dallu sey namangu ey silalayad ey nanginsarad.
47008011	At ilanyu ta ipadakpusyu, ta sey layadyu ey nanginsarad, siya atyén vus sey layadyu ey mangimpadakpus ey mibasar assey awad an dakayu.
47008012	At nu silalayad kayu ey mangatud assey lamugyu atjun, jiyuy sey mallaylaydan Apudyus. Ya ajina pun anapun sey ajiyu pun lamug atjun.
47008013	Ajik pun as kanan ey pasig kayu gey angatuatud ta vumaru da ujum ya dakayu sey maligatan. Kon gapu ta ad-aju sey awad an dakayu assey sana, niippun mit karwingna nu tumurung kayu asda makasapur ta nu dakayu sey angkasapuran as turung assey daan ey ag-agow ya ad-aju vus sey awad an jida, mabalin ey jida vus sey tumurung an dakayu. At nu kanaʼsji sey makwa, niippun makurangan an jitaku losan ey mamati.
47008015	Tey siyana vus pigey sey piuna kanan sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Sey tagu ey panus sey jinagupna, niippun nallasiyana ya sey akittan sey jinagupna, niippun vus nangkurangana.”
47008016	Mansaramat kani an Apudyus gapu ta sey layad Titus, miyisu assey layadni ey tumurung an dakayu.
47008017	Tey imbagani pun gey an Titus ey umali siya sinat, inavunana ey dagus tey siya vus pigey sey sisimmokna ey umali sinaʼt gapu assey layadna an dakayu.
47008018	At anna sey usa ey sunud taku ey ivurunni an siya ey umali sinaʼt. Usa siya ey madadamag asda amin ey mamati assey kavubruvubruy gapu assey angokoona ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag.
47008019	Usa pey, siya sey jinutukan da amin ey mamati ey mivurun an dakani ey manginsiput assey juganna ey makwa. Assey nauy ey karasin sey siput, siya sey midayawan sey Apu ya assey miil-an sey layad taku ey tumurung.
47008020	At ambaruwunni sey koonni ta niippun muugudanni miipanggop assey dokor ey madagup ya urey sey miwarasan sey turung.
47008021	Tey sey piunni at sey ustuustu sey makwa, dakumpun anggey assey angiilan Apudyus nu aji urey assey angiilan da tagu.
47008022	At ivurunni anda Titus sey tagu anna ey sunud taku. Nanginkinnu ey pinaniknikanni sey kinatataguna at innilani sey pawotna ey tumurung. At ummam-amud sey pawotna ey tumurung assey sana gapu assey dokor ey talikna an dakayu.
47008023	Kon as Titus avus, siya sey apporow tumurung an sa'un as para an dakayu. Ya dasey susunud taku anna ey mivurun an siya, jida dasey kama as pannakalong-ag da amin ey mamati assey kavubruvubruy sina. At madayow as Cristu gapu assey angokoonda.
47008024	At sey koonyu, ipiilayu sey layadyu ta mipaniknik an jida ya asda amin ey mamati ey namili an jida sey kinatuttuwan sey layadyu ya mapaniknikan avus sey kinatuttuwan sey apporowni mangindayawan an dakayu.
47009001	Aji pun kasapuran ey manuratak an dakayu miipanggop assey koonyu ey tumurung asda tagun Apudyus ad Judea
47009002	tey agammuk vus pigey ey amud sey layadyu ey tumurung ey siya nauy sey apporok idayow asda iMacedonia. Apporowk imbaga asda iMacedonia ey urey assey keysan ey tawun at nakasagana kayu ey mamati ey awad sinaʼt assey Provinsiyan sey Acaia ey tumurung. Ya gapu assey layadyu, nakarakag vus da ujum ey tumurung.
47009003	At ey sana, ibaarku da Titus ya da juwa ey vurunna sinaʼt ta mapaniknikan sey apporowni nangindayawan an dakayu ey naasyu jinadagup sey iturungyu.
47009004	Kon nu jumatongak sinaʼt ya as gagara ya awad mivurun asda iMacedonia an sa'un ya naagammuwanda ey niippun atpey nisagana as iturungyu, siguraju ey miviviinak tey insigurajuk an jida ey naasyu jinagup ya agammuk ey urey vus dakayu at maviinan kayu.
47009005	At kanak assey somsomokku ey ambab-aru nu amangpanguwuk ibaar dasey susunud taku anna ta turungan dakayu miipanggop assey madagupan sey luusyu impoposta ey iturung. Ta nu jumatong kani ey, naas ogon nakasagana. Tey nu kanaʼsji sey koon taku, miila ey awad sey layadyu ey tumurung ey aji kayu pun as napilit.
47009006	Sommosommokonyu man nauy ya; “Sey tagu ey akittan sey imurana, akittan vus pigey sey vurasuna, kon sey tagu ey panus sey immurana, panus vus pigey sey vurasuna.”
47009007	At usausa an dakayu masapur sommosommokona nu kam-ana sey lamugna atjun ta sey angatdanana at gapu assey layadna ey aji pun as napilit. Tey as Apudyus, mamaryad asda silalayad ey mangatud.
47009008	Ya kaviilan Apudyus ey angatud assey amin ey kasapuranyu inggana as allopyas ta alloplopyas vus sey miiturungyu asda angkasapuran.
47009009	Tey anung sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop asda piya'atud, kanana, “Niippun imutna ey mangatud asda lumawa ya niippun guminkan sey ambabaru ey apporona koon.”
47009010	Tey as Apudyus ey mangatuatud assey imuran dasey ammura ya as kanun da tagu, siya vus pigey sey apporow mangimpaaju assey awad an dakayu ta majugjug-an avus dasey koonyu ey mangatud gapu assey kinaambaruyu.
47009011	Adjuwan sey atjun Apudyus an dakayu ta umajuaju sey miiturungyu asda ujum ey makasapur. At nu siyaji, umaju avus sey mansaramat an Apudyus nu awatunda sey turung ey impow-ityu an dakani.
47009012	Tey assey nauy ey makwa, dakumpun anggey as katurungan dasey tagun Apudyus ey niippun mabalinna nu aji iluswana vus sey layad dasey adjuwan ey tagu ey mansaramat an Apudyus.
47009013	Ya nu mapaniknikan sey kinatuttuwan sey pammatiyu assey nauy ey koonyu, adjuwan sey mandayow an Apudyus tey ilanda ey uunnujunyu sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Cristu ey kananyu ey pinatiyu. Dayawunda avus siya gapu assey kadokor sey turungyu an jida ya asda ujum ey tagu.
47009014	Ya iluwaruwanda avus dakayu ya maryadda an dakayu gapu assey nisabsabali ey nangwan Apudyus ey nangimpiila assey amud ey kinaambaruna an dakayu.
47009015	Mansaramat taku an Apudyus gapu assey nakaskasdaow ey innatudna an jitaku ey niippun miyisuwana.
47010001	Awad da mangimbaga an dakayu ey sa'un kanu at mansokarak anggey nu surat kon niippun gingak nu sangusangu. Ampangpangaasiyak, gapu assey anus ya anguuyyaan Cristu,
47010002	ta ajiyu sa'un pilitun ey mangimpiila assey sinosokar nu jumatongak sinaʼt. Tey nakasaganaak ey sumangu as dasey apporow mangimbaga ey tinatagu kanu sey panggopni ey mangwa as dasey apporoni koon.
47010003	Tuttuwa ey tagu kani anggey assey luta anna ey kama vus an dakayu, kon dakumpun as tinatagu sey angokoonni ey mikagubat as dasey lawingan.
47010004	Tey sey armasni ey mikagubat at dakumpun as dasey tinatagu ey angokoon da tagu assey luta anna nu aji sey pannakabalin Apudyus. Da nauy sey usarunni ey manipod assey kasdor da kavusur. Ya usarunni nauy ey mangimpaginok assey kinariing dasey nariing ey guminga
47010005	ey manipod as mangigammuwan da tagu an Apudyus. Ya usarunni vus nauy ey mangabak assey kinumbot ey somsomok da tagu ta sey miigga atyén assey somsomokda at sey somsomok ey mibasar assey piun Cristu.
47010006	At nu miilani ey jumngor kayu, nakasagana kani ey manusa asda sissiya ey aji pun mangngor an Cristu.
47010007	Sey anggey as nabalor an dakayu at sey iillanyu ey tinatagun da tagu. Tey awaddaʼsnaʼt da mangimbagabaga ey jida kanu sey ustu ey manserservi an Cristu. Kon nu kanaʼsnaʼt sey kananda, somsomkonda atyén ey dakani avus sey ustu ey manserservi an Cristu.
47010008	At nu idayowku sey karobbonganni ey mangimpakasdor an dakayu ey dakumpun assey kadadailan sey pammatiyu, ajiyak pun maviin tey sey Apu sey nangatud assey nauy ey karobbonganni.
47010009	Sey nangimbagaak as nauy ta ajiyu vus kanan assey somsomokyu ey nanuratak ta ug-ugyatuk dakayu.
47010010	Tey awad sinat dasey mangimbaga ey kagguugyatak as dasey suratku kon nu as sangusangu, niippun gotokna ya niippun vugas sey uguugujuna.
47010011	Kon dasey mangugud assey kanaʼsna, piuk ipaagammu ey sey ibagabagak assey suratku, siya vus pigey sey kook nu awadak.
47010012	Tuttuwa ey niippun turudni ey manginyisu assey long-agni asda taguʼsnaʼt ey apporow mangindayow assey kinangatuda an dakayu. Jida sey nangamakamang assey manginyisuwanda assey long-agda ya narpu vus pigey assey kasomsomkanda sey angakamangda assey vinaruda. Nuung-ung-ungan sey mangwa assey kanaʼsnaʼt!
47010013	Kon an dakani ey, ajini pun ipaspas-um sey dakumpun as karobbonganni ey ipaspas-um. Idayowni anggey dasey impiyar Apudyus ey koonni ey siya sey nijugaanyu assey nauy ey siput.
47010014	Dakumpun as paspasor-adanni sey karobbonganni an dakayu tey dakani sey pangun ji ummali assey iggowyu ey nangintudtuju assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Cristu.
47010015	Ajini pun porson sey angindayawan da ujum assey kingwada asda ujum ey vubruy. Kon sey namnamani an dakayu at kumasdor sey pammatiyu ta mabalin ey jumgot vus sey angokoonni ey angkiwaar assey iggowyu ey mangwa assey ipakwan Apudyus an dakani.
47010016	At nu kanaʼsji, mabalin ey ingkani iwarawag sey Ambaru ey Damag asda ujum ey vubruy ey niippun nanudtuju an jida tey sumanga kani ey maggey angakma assey dayow ey kingwan dasey ujum as kananni ey dayowni.
47010017	Tey piuk unujun sey kanan sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Nu awad maryad ey ampaspas-um, ipaspas-umna atyén sey kingwan sey Apu.”
47010018	Tey aji pun miidayow sey mangindayow assey long-agna, tey sey ustu ey miidayow at sey tagu ey as Apudyus sey mangindayow.
47011001	Kanana atyén ta anusanyu sa'un urey nu anungku sey nuung-ung-ungan. At pangngaasiyu ta anusanyu sa'un.
47011002	Tey amud sey imunku an dakayu ey anung sey imun Apudyus asda taguna nu maggey lawa sabali sey unujunda. Tey mipani kayu as usa ey babarasang ey niippun nanordor-ag ey inturagku ey ipaasawa assey usa ey laraki ey siya as Cristu.
47011003	Kon madanaganak tey maggey lawa ta man-awidanyu sey naimpusuwan ey layadyu an Cristu ey anung sey naallilawan Eve gapu assey silib sey tabbad.
47011004	Tey nu awad ey umali ey mangintudtuju assey sabali ey Jesus ey ajina pun anung sey iwwarawagni, allasu as patiyunyu. Ya anungna vus ey allasu kayu as tumimpuyug asda sabali ey ispiritu ya allasu sey umunudanyu asda sabali ey tudtuju ey aji pun miyisu assey Ispiritun Apudyus ya sey Ambaru ey Damag ey jingngoryu an dakani.
47011005	Kon yangey napatpatig pun lawa dasey mangimbagabaga ey nangatuda ey aposel nu sa'un?
47011006	Tey urey nu niippun liingku ey guminga, adjuwan vus pigey sey agammuk. Agammuyu vus pigey ey tuttuwa nauy tey assey nangokook ey nantudtuju, inambaruk illawlawag sey amin an dakayu.
47011007	Assey nangintudtujuwak assey Ambaru ey Damag ey narpu an Apudyus, niippun siningsingilku as tangdanku tey nampakumbabaak ey nikalabvu as ikataguk ta ambalinuk dakayu as napatig. Ey lawingan pun lawa jiyuy ey kingwak?
47011008	Tey assey katuttuwaan, anungku nan-akow tey assey iniiggawak an dakayu, inawaawatku sey turung ey narpu asda ujum ey mamati ta awad agammuk ey manservi an dakayu.
47011009	Ya assey nikig-awak an dakayu ey inggow dasey timpu ey nangkurangak, ajiyak pun nangkudow an dakayu tey inggow dasey vurun taku ey mamati ey narpu ad Macedonia ey nangatud as kasapurak. Kanaʼsji sey kingwak ya siya vus pigey apporok koon tey sumangaak ey manongtong-ag an dakayu.
47011010	Tuttuwa sey ibagak anna ey anung sey kinatuttuwan Cristu ey awad an sa'un ey niippun iyAchaia as mabalin ey mangimpaginok an sa'un assey apporok ipaspas-um anna ey niippun kudawuk as turung an dakayu.
47011011	Sey kanaʼsna ey kookook, ey sey piuna kanan, niippun layadku an dakayu? Dakumpun, tey agammun Apudyus ey pipiuk dakayu.
47011012	At ituruturuyku ey mangwa assey kanaʼsna ey aji angkudow an dakayu ta niippun agammun dasey mangindaydayow assey long-agda ey niippun kanu nanjumaan sey angokoonda assey angokoonni.
47011013	Tey da nauy ey tagu at ipippiilada ey kamada as tuttuwa ey aposel Cristu, kon assey katuttuwaan pinaraparangda pey lawa sey kinaaposelda as maallilawan da ujum.
47011014	Kon aji pun nakaskasdaow tey urey as Satanas at mabalinna ey ambalinun sey long-agna as anung sey long-ag dasey sumilisiling ey enjel.
47011015	Ya dakumpun vus as nakaskasdaow nu dasey manserservi an Satanas at ambalinunda vus sey long-agda as mantudtuju nu ngan annun dasey tagu ey ambalin as nalintog an Apudyus. Kon sey makwa an jida assey daan ey ag-agow at miyambong vus pigey assey lawingan ey apporoda kingwa.
47011016	Ikasinku ibaga ey ajiyu kanan ey muung-ung-unganak. Kon nu kanaʼsji sey kananyu, dongronyu vus pey a sey kook ey manakjug assey long-agku tey maanusanyu mit atpey da ujum.
47011017	Sey nauy ey mangindayawak assey long-agku at dakumpun as nait sey maryadan Cristu nu aji ugalin sey nuung-ung-ungan.
47011018	Kon gapu ta adjuwan da mangimpaspas-um assey kinatataguda, ayu ta ampaspas-umak in pey.
47011019	Nangkariing kayu mit aan at siya sey anuanusanyu ey mamangngor as dasey nuung-ung-ungan.
47011020	Anuanusanyu mit urey nu ambalinun dakayu as alipanda, unnu aminunda aran dasey laksunyu unnu allilawun dakayu ya laylaysun dakayu ya inin-insurtun dakayu.
47011021	Maviinak tey akkuyaak at ajik pun kingwa da nauy ey kingwada an dakayu! Kon nu miipanggop assey turudda ey mangindayow assey long-agda, ayu in pey ta gumingaak vus ey kama as nuung-ung-ungan.
47011022	At nu kananda ey Hebrewda, usaak vus ey Hebrew. Ey ganak jida an Israel ey pinilin Apudyus as taguna? Urey mit avus sa'un! Ey ganak jida an Abraham? As Abraham avus sey singganak an sa'un!
47011023	Nu kananda ey manserservida an Cristu, kamaak as nattallagow ey guminga tey sinjumallu sey kingwak nu jida! Sinjumallu sey nangokook ey nanservi nu jida ya nanginkinnuwak ey nabarud ya nanginkinnuwak avus ey nasaplitan ya nanginkinnuwak avus ey nampuuli assey ngarab sey lavun.
47011024	Nangallima avus sey nanataran da Jews an sa'un as sintutlumpuru ya siyam.
47011025	Namitluwak avus nabokbok asda iRoman ya inggow sey namikuvikunganda an sa'un. Inggow avus sey namitlu ey daʼk nalluganan assey bapor at da nabakas ya nanallum. At inggow sey namingsan ey nanaptapkawak assey beybey ey ummar-argow ya nallablavi.
47011026	Assey ummayaayak, amud dasey nalak-amku ey kagguugyat, kama asda nandormangak asda nandanas ey dawwang. Nanginkinnu avus ey tigangayak kum-ugun asda tulisan assey daran. Inggow avus dasey kagguugyat ey kingwan dasey kadaraak ey Jews ya da Gentil an sa'un. Inggow avus dasey kagguugyat ey nadapunku asda vubvubruy anda danak ya da beybey ey apporok indangkas ya da tongtong-ag ey impalak-am dasey kinumbot ey vuvurun.
47011027	Nikalablabvuwak inggana as amud sey inayongku. Kanayunak ey napuyapuyatan ya inidamak sey nuuraurat ya nuuwouwow ya kaajuwan sey ajiyak pun nangnangan. Inggow avus dasey nakumukumugak gapuʼs kurang sey lumvunku.
47011028	Dakumpun as anggey da nait as mangatud as ligatku tey madadannaganak avus as dasey amin ey mamati nu ngan sey makwa an jida.
47011029	Tey nu awad nakapuy sey pammatina, mijugaak mikalikna an siya. Ya nu awad maawis ey vumasur, amud avus sey sigab sey somsomokku.
47011030	At nu kasapuran ey ampaspas-umak, siya anggey ipaspas-umku dasey mangimpiila assey kinakuyak.
47011031	At as Apudyus ey aman Apu taku ey Jesus ey madayow as ing-inggana, agammuna ey dakumpun as inuussat sey ibagabagak.
47011032	Assey iggawak avus ad Damascus assey timpun sey kinaarin Aretas, sey Gubernador ey jinutukana, impaguwardana dasey kapudapudayan sey vubruy ta dokmaanak.
47011033	Kon inggow dasey nanurung an sa'un at iniggaak assey arat asida at sa'un uyujun assey abvut sey akup at nakalibasak.
47012001	Kasapuran ey ampaspas-umak urey nu niippun ambaru as kipuuyana. At ey sana, ugujuk dasey impiilan sey Apu an sa'un assey kamaʼs in-inop ya dasey impaagammuna an sa'un.
47012002	Assey ummuy ey nasawaran as opat ey tawun, inggow sey usa ey tagu ey mamati an Cristu ey maggey naara assey kangatuwan ey partina ad langit assey iggawan Apudyus. Niippun agammuk nu alinnawana anggey sey ummuy unnu nijuga sey long-agna tey as Apudyus anggey sey nangigammu.
47012003	Sey makanak, anggey as Apudyus sey nangigammu nu sey tagu anna at nijuga sey long-agna unnu aji pun.
47012004	Kon niyuy nauy ey tagu assey iggawan Apudyus ey siya sey nangngorana asda amud sey vinaruna ey aji pun mabalin miiginga ya aji pun vus mabalin ugujun sey barangnaʼsnaʼt ey tagu.
47012005	Mabalin ey idayowku sey kanaʼsji ey tagu gapu assey nipiila an siya, kon sumangaak ey mangindayow assey long-agku nu aji sey anggey as idayowku at dasey mangimpiila assey kinakuyak.
47012006	Kon nu piuk ey mangindayow assey long-agku, dakumpunak as nuung-ung-ungan tey katuttuwaan dasey ugujuk anna. Kon sumangaak ey mangindayow ta ajin da tagu iyam-amud ey mangimpangatu an sa'un. Tey sey piuk ey anomsomokda an sa'un at midanung atyén assey innilada ya jingngorda ey inugudku ya kingwak.
47012007	At gapu ta sumanga as Apudyus ey ampaspas-umak gapu asda adjuwan ey nakaskasdaow ey impiilana an sa'un, naatdanak as amud ey ligat as usarun Satanas ey mamaligat an sa'un as ajik pun ampaspas-uman.
47012008	Namitluwuk kindow an Apudyus ta kaanuna atyén sey nauy ey tongtong-agku.
47012009	Kon sey insongbat Apudyus, kanana, “Urugna sey amud ey kinaambaruk an sika sey kasapuram tey nu akkuyaka, siyaji sey mangimpiil-ak assey pannakabalinku.” At ey sana, allaylayadak ey mangindayow assey kinakuyak ta magiknak sey pannakabalin Cristu an sa'un.
47012010	At ming-opak assey kinakuyak ya urey insurtuwunak anda maligatanak unnu tongtong-agunak anda ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey mangatud as alligatak. Tey nu akkuyaak, siyaji at avus sey kumasdorak gapu assey mangimpakasdorana an sa'un.
47012011	Kamaak as nuung-ung-ungan assey angokook ey mangugud assey long-agku, kon dakayu sey lapuna nu paʼk lawa kanan sina. Tey dakayu atyén sey mangintakjug an sa'un tey urey nu niippun balorku, dakumpunak as nababbaba nu dasey aposelyu ey mangugud ey jida kanu sey kangatuwan.
47012012	Tey assey iniiggawak an dakayu, inan-anusak dasey amin ey ligat assey nangimpiil-ak an dakayu as dasey sinyar anda kaskasdaow ya dasey ujum ey manuttuwaanyu assey kinaaposelku.
47012013	Amin ey kingwak asda mamati as dasey ujum ey vubruy at kingwak vus an dakayu, maraksig anggey assey ajik pun nampagastusan an dakayu. At pakawanunak nu lawinganji ey kingwak.
47012014	Anna ey mansaganaak ey umali kasin ey mangaggakey an dakayu. Mikatlu nauy ey umaliyak assey iggowyu kon ajiyak pun mangkudow as turungyu tey sey gamgamak at dakumpun dasey laksunyu nu aji dakayu ey mismu. Tey dakayu sey kama as aanakku, at dakumpun mit sey anak sey marpuwan sey masapur nu aji sey ama sey marpuwan sey masapur sey anak.
47012015	At amud sey ragsakku ey urey magastusanak ya kook sey kangamin ey urey ijugak sey long-agku ey matongtong-ag as para an dakayu. At ey makakkaanan pun lawa sey layadyu an sa'un gapu ta ummam-amud sey layadku an dakayu?
47012016	Mabalin nin ey takjuganyu ey ajiyak pun nampagastus an dakayu, kon oni at awad da mangimbaga ey gapu assey kinasilibku at inggow dallu dasey nallukuwak an dakayu as ajiyu pun naagammuwan.
47012017	Kon annuna vus gey lawa ey inallilowku dakayu? Ey siniliban pun lawa dakayu as dasey imbaarku ey ummali ey tummurung an dakayu?
47012018	Sa'un sey nangimbaar an Titus ya dasey susunud taku assey pammati ey umali an dakayu. Ey awad pun lawa nallugiyanda an dakayu? Niippun mit, tey man-iisu sey panggopni ya sey angokoonni ey mangwa as dasey nipaviyang an dakani.
47012019	Kon maggey lawa kananyu ey ibagani da nauy as mangintakjuganni assey long-agni. Kon dakumpun tey siya anggey as ugujunni sey piun Jesu Cristu ey ibagani. Ya agammun avus Apudyus ey niippun ujum as panggopni nu dokon anggey sey katurunganyu, dakayu ey pipiunni.
47012020	Kon madanaganak nu umaliyak sinaʼt tey oni at lawa ya ilak dasey ajik pun piun ey ilan. At nu kanaʼsji, sumanga kayu avus assey kook an dakayu. Madanaganak nu umaliyak sinaʼt ya udasak dakayu ey an-iisik anda man-iinnapos anda man-iinnangyag. Ya awad ey usa, long-agna anggey sey sosomkona ya anna da mangwaʼs kadadailan sey vurunna ya awad da mankikinnaput anda mangimpangatu assey long-agna anda niippun urnus an dakayu.
47012021	Madanaganak nu umdasak assey iggowyu ya awad da aji pun nangimbabawi asda basurda ey sissiyada atgey ey mangwa asda lawingan ey koko'on da laraki asda vubai anda mikador-ag assey dakumpun as asawada ya da ujum ey kaggissow ey makwamakwa. At nu kanaʼsji sey udasak an dakayu, siguraju ey amud sey maviinak an Apudyus ya man-ivilak assey sinagungyu.
47013001	Siyana sey mikatlu ey umaliyak mangil-an an dakayu. At siya sey sosomkonyu sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Nu awad mangimpabasur assey vurunna, masapur awad juwa unnu turu as manakjug assey kinatuttuwana.”
47013002	Assey pigwan sey ummaliyak sinaʼt, imbabaggak asda nakabasur ya da ujum ta iyageyda, tey nu aji, siguraju ey majusada assey kasinku ampuuliyén. At ey sana ey niippunak ya adayuwak assey iggowyu, ikasinku ibaga.
47013003	At dakayu ey maryad ey mamaniknik nu as Cristu sey gumingaginga an sa'un, maagammuwanyu sey kinatuttuwana assey inyak manusaan asda angwaangwa as lawingan. Tey dakumpun as akkuya as Cristu ey mangwa assey koona an dakayu nu aji dokor sey pannakabalinna.
47013004	Tey urey nu kamaʼs akkuya as Cristu assey natuyana assey krus, miila ey awad sey pannakabalin Apudyus an siya assey matatagguwana assey sana. An dakani avus, kama as akkuya kani assey nijujug-anni an siya, kon assey koonni ey manservi an dakayu, ipiilani avus ey awad sey pannakabalin Apudyus an dakani gapu assey nijujug-anni an siya.
47013005	At sey koonyu atyén, anaanagunyu sey kinatataguyu ta ilanyu nu tuttuwa ey sey angokoonyu ey matagu at miyambong assey pammatiyu an Cristu. Tey allasu mit as boknon ey awad as Cristu Jesus an dakayu maraksig nu mapaniknikan ey niippun atpey pammatiyu.
47013006	At nu koonyu ji, namnamauk ey boknonyu avus ey awad as Cristu an dakani at aji kani pun nangkurang.
47013007	At assey sana, iluwaruni an Apudyus ta niippun atyén koonyu as lawingan. Assey maryadanni ey kanaʼsji atyén sey makwa at dakumpun as kadayawanni sey apporowni mantudtujuwan an dakayu, nu aji gapu ta piunni ey ustu atyén sey koonyu ey urey nu kama as niippun nantongparan sey siputni.
47013008	Tey aji pun mabalin ey kuntraunni sey manguunnud assey katuttuwaan, nu aji lobbongna ey tumurung kani miipanggop assey kinatuttuwa.
47013009	At urey nu nakapuy sey koonni ey angimpiila assey pannakabalinni, allaylayad kani pey dallu nu mandogot sey pammatiyu. Tey sey anggey as apporoni kudawun an Apudyus at vumaru kayu losan ey niippun mankurangana.
47013010	At siya sey gapuna ey pinangpanguk ingkur-it nauy ey urey annaak assey adayu ta nu umaliyak, aji pun kasapuran ey amud sey kook ey mangimpiila assey karobbongak ey innatud sey Apu ey mandisiplina an dakayu. Tey sey kausaran sey karobbongak atyén at sey kumasdoran sey pammatiyu ey dakumpun as madadailanyu.
47013011	At kanaʼsji dakayu ey susunud, anggey ji as ibagak an dakayu. Kanana atyén ta ammaanyu ambaruwun sey kopyayu ya koonyu sey imbagak ey impangpangaasik an dakayu. Man-iisu atyén sey ansomsomkanyu ya ambaru atyén vus sey koonyu ey matagu. Ya as Apudyus ey marpuwan sey layad ya vumaruwan, mikig-ow an dakayu losan.
47013012	At kanaʼsji dakayu ey susunud, kanana atyén ta ampipinnakumusta kayu losan as mipiil-an sey layadyu asda vurunyu. Ya anna ey pakumustaun vus dakayu asda amin ey mamati ey awad as nauy.
47013013	Kanana atyén ta ambaru sey koon Apu Jesu Cristu an dakayu ya awad an dakayu sey layad Apudyus ya masa'an kayu losan gapu assey Ispirituna ey awad an dakayu.
48001001	Sa'un an Paul ey najutukan ey nambalin as usa ey aposel. Dakumpun as tagu sey nanjutuk unnu nangimbaar an sa'un nu aji as Jesu Cristu ya as Apudyus ey Ama ey nanagu kasin an siya assey natuyana.
