48001002	Amin dasey susunud taku ey mamati ey annaʼsna, at nijuga an sa'un ey mangumusta an dakayu ey mamati ey awad sinat ad Galatia.
48001003	Kanana atyén ta atjun Apudyus ey Ama taku ya Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu sey amin ey vumaruwan an dakayu.
48001004	Innatud Cristu sey long-agna ey matuy as bayad sey basur taku ta mawayaan taku as dasey lawing ey makwamakwa assey luta anna. Kingwana nauy tey siya vus pigey sey piun Apudyus ey Ama taku.
48001005	Kanana atyén ta madayow as Apudyus as ing-inggana! Amen.
48001006	Masdaawak an dakayu tey allasu gey ya nan-awidanyu as Apudyus ey nangayag an dakayu ey mijuga an siya gapu assey kinaambarun Cristu ya siya at avus unujunyu sey sabali ey tudtuju ey siya kanu sey ambaru ey damag as misarakananyu.
48001007	Assey katuttuwaan, niippun ujum as Ambaru ey Damag kon sey nangimbagaak as nauy tey awad kanu da apporow mangallilow an dakayu ey namadas mamaliw assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Cristu.
48001008	Kon urey nu dakani, unnu awadji enjel as narpu ad langit as maggey mangintudtuju assey sabali ey tudtuju ey aji miyanung assey intudtujuni an dakayu, jusaun Apudyus nauy ey tagu ad inférnu.
48001009	Siyaji sey imbagani an dakayu assey ab-avusna, kon ikasinku vus ibaga an dakayu assey sana. Nu awad mangintudtuju an dakayu as sabali ey tudtuju ey aji miyanung assey luusyu pinati ey intudtujuni, jusaun Apudyus nauy ey tagu ad inférnu.
48001010	Ey sey ibagak anna at siya anapuk sey mangindayawan da tagu an sa'un? Dakumpun! Tey siya anapuk sey allaylaydan Apudyus ey dakumpun assey maryadan da tagu an sa'un tey nu kanaʼsji, ajiyak pun miivilang as baba'arun Cristu.
48001011	Dakayu ey susunud, piuk ey maagammuwanyu ey dakumpun as somsomok ji tagu sey narpuwan sey Ambaru ey Damag ey apporok itudtuju.
48001012	Ya dakumpun as tagu sey nangadarak unnu nangintudtuju asda nauy an sa'un tey as Jesu Cristu ey mismu sey nangimpaagammu an sa'un.
48001013	Jingngoryu avus sey miipanggop assey kinatataguk assey apporok nangunudan assey religion da Jews. Ya agammuyu vus sey amud ey kingwak ey nanongtong-ag asda tagun Apudyus ya sey nangiggaak assey kaviilak ey manipod an jida.
48001014	Nu miipanggop assey pammatin da Jews, adayu sey naneynanak asda adjuwan ey kadagwatak ey Jews. Iniggak sey ustu ey kaviilak ey manongpar asda ugali ey tinawidni asda dakdakorni.
48001015	Kon gapu assey kinaambarun Apudyus, pinipilina atpey sa'un urey assey daanku pun miyanakan at inayaganak ey manservi an siya. Assey jummatong sey timpu
48001016	ey maryad ey mangimpiila an sa'un assey Anakna ta inyak iwarawag sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an siya as dasey Gentil, niippun tagu as tinupakku.
48001017	Ya ajiyak pun vus inummuy ad Jerusalem ey mangintupak asda namangu ey aposel nu sa'un, nu aji nangow-asak ad Arabia, asiyak at ampuuli ad Damascus.
48001018	Naas pun sey turu ey tawun mansarad assey namatiyak, ummuyak ad Jerusalem ey nangila an Peter at nikig-awak an siya assey juwa ey juminggu.
48001019	Kon anggeyda an James ey sunud Apu Jesus sey innilak ey aposel. Niippun ujum.
48001020	Agammun Apudyus ey tuttuwa da nauy ey insuratku an dakayu, dakumpun as inuussat.
48001021	Naas pun jiyuy, ummuyak as dasey vubruy ey sakup sey provinsiyan sey Syria ya Cilicia.
48001022	Assey timpu saji, niippun atgey nangil-ila an sa'un as dasey mamati ad Judea.
48001023	Sey anggey as jingngorda at sey damag ey kanana, “Sey tagu ey nanongtong-ag an jitaku assey keysan ey ag-agow, anna at avus gey ey iwarawagna assey sana sey pammati ey pinadasna tinipod.”
48001024	At jinayowda as Apudyus gapu an sa'un.
48002001	Ummayow pun sey nasawaran as opat ey tawun, nampuuli kani an Barnabas ad Jerusalem ey siyaji sey nivurnan Titus.
48002002	Nampuuliyak tey siya sey impaagammun Apudyus ey masapur umuyak. Assey iniggawak siji, nadagup dasey kananda ey mangimpapangat as dasey mamati at illawlawagku an jida sey miipanggop assey Ambaru ey Damag ey apporok iwarawag as dasey Gentil. Kingwak nauy tey piuk ey ipaniknik an jida tey sumangaak nu maggey lawa ta niippun ambanbanagan sey siputku assey keysan ey ag-agow ya urey assey sana.
48002003	At inavunanda mit ya urey as Titus ey iGreek ey vurunku at ajida pun pinilit ey makugit
48002004	urey nu inggow da ujum ey maryad ey makugit siya. Kon da jiyuy dasey pippiila anggey sey pammatida ey nijuga an dakani ey umuy atpey mansisi'im tey piunda ey agammuwun sey wayawaya ey awad an jitaku gapu assey nijugaan taku an Cristu Jesus. Piunda ey ambalinun dakani as alipan.
48002005	Kon tillonni ey ajini pun iyyuya sey piunda ey koon ta sey Ambaru ey Damag ey pinatiyu at aji pun makamsan as dakumpun.
48002006	At dasey mavivigvig ey mangimpapangat as dasey mamati at niippun mit kananda ey kurang sey tudtujuk ta jug-anda. Kanak ey mavivigvigda as mangimpapangat tey assey somsomokku, niippun nijumaana an Apudyus sey kasasaad sey tagu tey as Apudyus, niippun toktoknona.
48002007	Kon dasey kanak ey mavivigvig sana, naawatanda at avus ey impaviyang Apudyus an sa'un sey karobbongan ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag as dasey Gentil ey kama assey nangimpaviyangana an Peter assey karobbongan ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag asda Jews.
48002008	At as Apudyus ey nangimpaviyang an Peter ey ambalin as aposel as dasey Jews, siya vus sey nangimpaviyang an sa'un ey ambalin as aposel as dasey Gentil.
48002009	Inagammun pun da James, Peter ya as John ey jida dasey miivilang as mangimpapangat as dasey mamati siji ey as Apudyus sey nangimpaviyang an sa'un assey napatig anna ey siput, linamanun dakani ey mangimpiila ey saʼsa'an kani assey panggop. At nantuturaganni ey ituruyni an Barnabas ey umuy asda Gentil ya ituruyda ey umuy asda Jews.
48002010	Anggey as imvilinda an dakani sey sosomkonni dasey lumawa ey mamati ad Jerusalem ey siya vus pigey sey impaingsak ey koon.
48002011	Kon assey ummali as Peter ad Anthiok, kinontrak siya assey sinagung dasey tagu tey narawag ey kinumbot sey kingwana.
48002012	Tey assey daan pun jumatong dasey imbaar James, apporow mikakan as Peter as dasey Gentil ey vurun taku ey mamati. Kon jummatong pun dasey tagu sana ey imbaar James, inakiakkitna ey umadayu as dasey Gentil ya impug-anna ey mikakan an jida tey umugyat as dasey vungguy da Jews ey mangimpapilit ey masapur makugit dasey Gentil ey mamati.
48002013	Gapu assey kingwan Peter saji, ummunud dasey ujum ey Jews ey mamati. Ya urey avus as Barnabas at nikikkiila an jida.
48002014	Innilak pun ey dakumpun sey kingwada tey kumuntra assey Ambaru ey Damag ey apporow nitudtuju, kanak an Peter assey sinagungda losan, “Usaka ey Jews kon Gentil sey angokoom ey matagu ey dakumpun as Jews. At nu kanaʼsji, ngey pam ipapilit ey unujun dasey Gentil sey ugalin dasey Jews?”
48002015	At urey nu niyanak taku ey Jews ey dokon taku pun as Gentil ey manangbasur,
48002016	agammu taku ey aji pun mivilang as niyun-un sey usa ey tagu an Apudyus gapu assey manongparana assey Lintog nu aji anggey assey pammatina an Jesu Cristu. At urey vus jitaku at namati taku an Jesu Cristu ta mivilang taku as niyun-un an Apudyus gapu assey pammati taku an siya ey dakumpun assey manongparan assey Lintog. Tey niippun tagu as miivilang ey niyun-un an Apudyus gapu assey manongparana assey Lintog.
48002017	Namnamaun taku ey ambalin taku as niyun-un assey angiilan Apudyus gapu assey nijugaan taku an Cristu. Kon nu sey namnama taku anna at miivilang taku atpey as manangbasur ey anung dasey Gentil, ey sey piuna ugujun at as Cristu atpey sey nanginturung an jitaku ey ambalin as manangbasur? Aji pun as mabalin!
48002018	Tey nu kasinku vus bangunun ey unujun sey Lintog ey nan-awidak, piuna ugujun, nakabasurak tey ajik pun inunud sey Lintog.
48002019	Kon miipanggop ey assey Lintog, kama as natuyak at nakaan sey dogot sey Lintog ey manginturey an sa'un. At assey matatagguwak assey sana at para an Apudyus. Miivilang avus ey nikakatuyak an Cristu assey krus
48002020	at siya sey kama as dakumpun as sa'un sey matattagu assey sana nu aji as Cristu ey nilong-ag an sa'un. At ey sana, matataguwak gapu assey pammatik assey Anak Apudyus ey mamaryad ya nangatud assey viyagna an sa'un.
48002021	Ajik pun ivilang sey kinaambarun Apudyus as niippun servina. Tey nu miivilang as niyun-un sey usa ey tagu assey angiilan Apudyus gapu assey manongparana assey Lintog, niippun servin sey natuyan Cristu!
48003001	Susunud ey iGalatia, pa kama as niippun otokyu! Ey awad nangros assey somsomokyu? Narawag sey apporok imbagabaga an dakayu miipanggop assey natuyan Jesu Cristu assey krus!
48003002	Imusuk uda an dakayu: Ey sey nilong-agan sey Ispiritun Apudyus an dakayu at gapu assey nanongparanyu assey Lintog, unnu gapu assey namatiyanyu assey Ambaru ey Damag ey jingngoryu?
48003003	Ey niippun pigey akit as somsomokyu? Natagu kayu ey nansarad assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus kon ey sana, piunyu at avus ijuga usarun sey kaviilan sey kinatataguyu?
48003004	Ey niippun pigey servin dasey natongtong-aganyu nallugi assey namatiyanyu? Siguraju nin vus pigey ey awad.
48003005	Ey impalong-ag pun lawa Apudyus an dakayu sey Ispirituna ya awad kingwana as kaskasdaow gapu assey nanongparanyu assey Lintog unnu gapu assey namatiyanyu assey Ambaru ey Damag ey jingngoryu?
48003006	Somsomkonyu sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop an Abraham ey kanana, “Pinatin Abraham sey imbagan Apudyus at siya sey nangimvilangana an siya as niyun-un ey tagu.”
48003007	At masapur ey maawatanyu ey dasey miivilang as tuttuwa ey ganak Abraham at dasey awad pammatina.
48003008	Nipapaddaan assey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey ambalin as niyun-un dasey Gentil gapu assey pammatida. Siyana sey piun sey Ambaru ey Damag ey ugujun ey imbagan Apudyus an Abraham ey kanana, “Gapu an sika, vindisiyunan Apudyus dasey amin ey tagu assey luta.”
48003009	At asda amin ey mamati, vindisyunan Apudyus jida ey anung sey kingwana an Abraham gapu assey pammatina.
48003010	Tey dasey mantalik assey manongparanda assey Lintog at sigurajuda ey milunud tey kanan sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, “Sey tagu ey ajina pun aminun tongparun dasey nivilin ey nikur-it assey lintog at siguraju ey milunud.”
48003011	At ey sana, narawag ey niippun purus ambalin as niyun-un assey angiilan Apudyus gapu assey apporona manongparan assey Lintog, tey kanan sey Nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, “Matagu dasey ivilang Apudyus as niyun-un gapu assey pammatida.”
48003012	Sey manongparan assey Lintog at aji pun kasapuran sey pammati tey kanan sey Nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, “Udasan sey tagu sey kataguwana nu aminuna tongparun dasey amin ey nivilin assey Lintog.”
48003013	Kon niippun makatongpar assey amin ey vilin sey Lintog at siya sey losan taku atyén majusa. Kon winayawayaan Cristu jitaku ta aji taku majusa tey siya sey nangingkaru assey jusa ey maatud atyén an jitaku. Tey kanan sey Nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, “Nu awad nagoddongan as matuy ya nilansa assey kayu, siyaji sey kiil-an sey nangillunudan Apudyus an siya.”
48003014	Siyaji sey kingwan Cristu ta sey ambaru ey impostan Apudyus an Abraham at maatud avus asda Gentil gapu an Cristu Jesus at siya sey mabalin taku awatun sey impostan Apudyus ey Ispirituna gapu assey pammati taku losan.
48003015	Dakayu ey susunud, annaya sey mangimpaniyak assey impostan Apudyus an Abraham: Nu as gagara ya awad nakwa as turag ey naas napirmaan, aji pun mit mabalin ey labsingun unnu jug-an.
48003016	Ya anungna vus assey impostan Apudyus an Abraham ya assey saʼsa'an ey iganakna. Tey nu ammaan taku ilan sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, dakumpun mit as kanana ey, “Impostan Apudyus as dasey ganakna nu aji ‘Impostan Apudyus assey saʼsa'an ey iganakna.’” Tey dakumpun as adjuwan ey ganak sey piuna kanan nu aji saʼsa'an anggey ey siya as Cristu.
48003017	Siyana sey piuk ey ugujun: Namangu sey inturag Apudyus an Abraham ya impostana ey koona asi at jumatong sey Lintog ey innatjuna an Moses ey inggana naas sey opat gasut ya turumpuru ey tawun. At sey Lintog sana, aji pun as mabalin ey waswasuna sey luus inturag Apudyus.
48003018	Tey nu tawijun taku sey impostan Apudyus gapu assey manongparan taku assey Lintog, aji pey niippun servin sey impostana? Kon dakumpun as kanaʼs nait, tey assey katuttuwaan, gapu assey kinaambarun Apudyus, innatjuna an Abraham sey kanana ey atjuna gapu tey siya sey impostana.
48003019	At nu kanaʼsna, ngan sey panggop sey Lintog? Sey Lintog, kingwan Apudyus ta maagammuwan da tagu sey kinarwing sey kookoonda. Ya manturturuy sey Lintog ey masapur matongpar inggana as umaliyan sey ganak Abraham ey as Jesu Cristu ey siya sey impostana. Sey Lintog at naatud as dasey enjel ta atjunda an Moses ey siya sey karun da tagu ya an Apudyus.
48003020	Kon aji pun masapur sey karun nu niippun kasupang tey sa'an anggey as Apudyus.
48003021	Ey sey piun nauy ey ibaga at kumuntra assey Lintog sey impostan Apudyus? Aji pun! Tey nu awad inawat da tagu as lintog ey mabalin mangatud as viyag, ambalin dasey tagu as niyun-un assey angiilan Apudyus nu tongparunda sey kanan sey lintog sana.
48003022	Kon ajina pun kanan sinat tey sey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, losan dasey tagu kamaʼs nababarud assey pannakabalin sey basur. At sey impostan Apudyus ey asi anggey maatud gapu assey pammati an Jesu Cristu, siguraju ey maatud as dasey tagu ey mamati.
48003023	Assey timpu ey daan pun atgey mamati dasey tagu an Cristu, anungda sey barud ey nipukuk assey Lintog inggana assey ummaliyan Cristu ey siya sey pinati taku.
48003024	Mabalin avus ey mipani sey Lintog assey man-ujun as anak tey kama as inuugnana jitaku inggana assey ummaliyan Cristu ya asi taku at miivilang as niippun basurna an Apudyus gapu assey pammati.
48003025	Kon assey sana ey jummatong sey timpu ey namatiyan taku an Cristu, napungpung sey nanangjunan sey Lintog an jitaku.
48003026	At ey sana, dakayu ey nijuga an Cristu Jesus gapu assey pammatiyu an siya at miivilang kayu losan as anak Apudyus
48003027	tey navunyagan kayu ey nijuga an Cristu. At siya sey kama as illumvunyu sey mismu ey viyag Cristu.
48003028	At assey angiilan Apudyus, niippun nitoknan dasey Jews as dasey Gentil unnu alipan asda dakumpun as alipan unnu laraki asda vubai tey man-iisuda assey nijujug-anda an Cristu Jesus.
48003029	At nu nijuga kayu an Cristu, nivilang kayu ey ganak Abraham ya mijuga kayu ey mikalaksun assey impostan Apudyus an siya.
48004001	Annaya sey usa ey pani miipanggop assey apporok imbaga. Nu awad anak as manawid assey kuwan amana, kon daan pun atgey sey tawunna, mipani siya assey alipan ey urey nu siya sey singkuwa assey amin ey vinaknang amana
48004002	tey awad dasey mamangjun an siya ya awad avus dasey mangiila as dasey laksunna inggana as jumatong sey timpu ey inggoddong amana.
48004003	Siyaji sey mipaniyan taku. Assey daan taku pun maawatan sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju, kama as inalipan jitaku as dasey nantokotokon ey niilluvungan ey kasomsomkan ey da nauy dasey kamaʼs anturturey assey luta anna.
48004004	Kon jummatong pun sey ustu ey timpu ey inggoddong Apudyus, imbaarna sey anakna ey iyanak sey usa ey tagu. At niyanak as usa ey Jew
48004005	ta siya sey manubvut as dasey inalipan sey Lintog ta jitaku ey mamati at miivilang taku as tuttuwa ey anak Apudyus.
48004006	At sey mangimpatuttuwa ey anak jitaku an Apudyus, imbaarna sey Ispiritun sey Anakna ey manginturey an jitaku. At siya sey mangimpaspasmok an jitaku ey mangawag an Apudyus as “Ama.”
48004007	Assey sana, dakumpun kayu as alipan nu aji anak dakayu an Apudyus. At gapu ta nambalin kayu as anak Apudyus, mabalin kayu vus ey mikalaksun asda amin ey ipalaksunna asda aanakna.
48004008	Assey kar-argow ey daanyu pun agammuwun as Apudyus, inalipan dakayu as dasey ap-apudyus.
48004009	Kon assey sana ey inagammuyu ogon as Apudyus unnu naagammuwana dakayu, ngey payu vus kasin puuliyun dasey niippun pannakabalinna ya balorna ey nililiyawan ey pammati? Pakayu vus kasin ampaalipan an jida?
48004010	Ibagak nauy tey anna vus ey vigvigunyu dasey minamaliyém ey ugalin dasey Jews ey makwa as dasey kananda ey nabalor ey ag-agow, vuran anda vista ya tawun.
48004011	At siya sey madanaganak an dakayu, tey oni at lawa ya niippun servin sey nalligligatak ey nanudtuju an dakayu.
48004012	At siya sey ampangpangaasiyak an dakayu ey susunud, ta ambalin kayu atyén as kama an sa'un tey nambalinak mit as kama an dakayu ey nawayaan assey lintog Moses. Ya niippun lawingan as kingwayu an sa'un assey iniiggawak an dakayu.
48004013	Agammuyu mit ey sey gapun sey iniiggawak an dakayu assey kar-argow ey nantudtuju assey Ambaru ey Damag at gapu tey nasakitak.
48004014	Kon urey nu naligatan kayu gapu assey sakitku saji, ajiyu pun sa'un nilaylayus unnu nan-awidan nu aji minangiliyak ey kama as usa ey enjel Apudyus unnu as Cristu Jesus ey mismu.
48004015	At ey sana, ngan ummayan sey lagowyu saji an sa'un nu'? Tey assey iniiggawak an dakayu, ngadanna ey atyén ya urey ukitunyu sey atayu ta atjunyu an sa'un gapu assey amud ey layadyu.
48004016	At assey sana ey imbagak sey tuttuwa, vusurunak pun lawa an dakayu?
48004017	Kon assey katuttuwaan, dasey ujum anna ey ummali ey manudtuju an dakayu, kama pey kanu as isakit dakayu assey mangawisanda an dakayu, kon dakumpun as siyaji sey ustu ey panggopda. Tey sey piunda anggey at man-awidanyu sa'un ta jida sey isakityu ya unujunyu.
48004018	Ustu mit nu isakit sey tagu sey asintataguna nu ambaru sey panggopna ey anung sey kingwayu an sa'un assey keysan ey ag-agow ya iturturuyyu atyén urey nu niippunak an dakayu.
48004019	Tey kamaʼs sa'un sey inayu ya dakayu sey pipiuk ey aanakku. Ya anna assey sana ey matongtong-agak tey kama as kasinak anggamut ey mangiyyanak an dakayu ey maparpaligat inggana as miyanung sey kopyayu an Cristu.
48004020	Piuk atyén ey awadak an dakayu assey timpu anna ta ajiyak kamaʼs pupumtuk ey guminga ta ambaruwun taku ey man-uugud tey amud sey danagku an dakayu.
48004021	Imusuk uda an dakayu, dakayu ey maryad ey mangunud assey Lintog: Ey ajiyu pun maawatan sey piun sey Lintog sana ey ugujun?
48004022	Tey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey juwa sey anak Abraham ey laraki. Sey usa at anakna an Hagar ey alipan ya sey usa, anakna an Sarah ey asawana ey dokon pun as alipan.
48004023	Sey anak sey alipan at aji pun as niyanak ey nakaskasdaow. Kon sey anak asawana ey dakumpun as alipan at niyanak gapu assey impostan Apudyus.
48004024	Mabalin ey usarun taku sey nakwa anna as pani. Da juwa anna ey vubai at mipanida as juwa ey inturag Apudyus. Sey usa ey turag at sey Lintog ey innatud Apudyus an Moses assey vilig ad Sinai. Sey mipani assey nauy ey turag at as Hagar. At dasey aanakna at alipan tey alipan as inada ey niyanakanda.
48004025	As Hagar at mipani avus assey vilig ey Sinai ad Arabia ey mipani ad Jerusalem assey sana ey timpu ey nambalin as alipan ey mijuga dasey amin ey ummili siji.
48004026	Kon awad sey sabali ey Jerusalem ey siya sey awad ad langit ey dakumpun as alipan dasey ummili ya sey nauy ey Jerusalem at mipani siya as ina taku ey siya as Sarah.
48004027	Tey kanan sey Nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, “Sika ey basig, allaylayadka! Ivuggam sey ragsaknu, sika ey daan pun mamadas ey anggamut. Tey sika ey nan-awidan sey asawana at adjuwan sey iyanaknu nu sey vubai ey aji pun nan-awidan sey asawana.”
48004028	At ey sana, dakayu ey susunud, dakayu dasey anak Apudyus ey anung Isaac ey niyanak gapu assey impostana.
48004029	Assey siyaji ey timpu, sey anak ey niyanak gapu assey nakopyaan sey vubai ya laraki at tinongtong-agna sey niyanak gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus. Kanaʼsna vus assey sana ey timpu tey dasey nambalin as alipan sey lintog at tongtong-agunda vus jitaku.
48004030	Kon ngan sey kanan sey Nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus? Kanana, “Paryawum sey alipan sana ya sey anakna tey aji pun as mabalin ey mikalaksun sey anak sey alipan assey laksunun sey dakumpun as anak sey alipan.”
48004031	At dakayu ey susunud, annaya sey salinunut sey amin ey imbagabagak an dakayu. Aji taku pun mivilang ey anak sey alipan nu aji mivilang taku as anak sey dakumpun as alipan.
48005001	Nawayawayaan taku tuttuwa tey winayaan jitaku an Cristu. At siya sey masapur ilanyu ta nawaya kayu ya aji kayu kasin ampaalipan assey Lintog.
48005002	Tatandaananyu sey ibagak anna! Sa'un an Paul, ibagak an dakayu ey nu ampakugit kayu as kananyu ey ambalin kayu as niyun-un assey angiilan Apudyus, piuna ugujun, niippun servin Cristu an dakayu.
48005003	Ikasinku ibaga, nu awad tagu as kanana ey ampakugit as mivilangana as niyun-un, masapur aminuna tongparun sey amin ey nikur-it assey Lintog.
48005004	At dakayu ey ujum ey maryad ey miivilang as niyun-un an Apudyus gapu assey manongparanyu assey Lintog, dakayu sey nanginsina assey long-agyu an Cristu ya nan-awidanyu sey kinaambarun Apudyus an dakayu.
48005005	Kon an jitaku, namnamaun taku ey ivilang jitaku an Apudyus as niyun-un. Ya sey Ispirituna sey tumuturung an jitaku assey manguullayan taku assey matongparana gapu assey pammati taku.
48005006	Tey nu nijuga taku an Cristu, niippun balorna nu nakugitka man unnu aji pun. Tey sey anggey as nabalor at sey pammati taku ey miila assey layad taku asda vurun taku.
48005007	Assey keysan ey ag-agow, mambaru sey angokoonyu ey mangunud an Cristu. Kon ngadan sey nangimpaginok an dakayu ey mangunud assey katuttuwaan?
48005008	Siguraju ey dakumpun an Apudyus tey siya mit sey nangayag an dakayu.
48005009	Awad sey apporon da tagu ugujun, ey kanana: “Urey akittan ey tinuktuk at ipavutarna sey arina ey mikamsana.”
48005010	Kon urey nu tuttuwa nait, mantalikak pey dallu an dakayu gapu assey nijujug-an taku an Cristu. At siya sey niippun juwajuwak ey ajiyu pun unujun sey dakumpun ey tudtuju. Ya agammuk vus ey jusaun Apudyus sey tagu ey mangal-allilow an dakayu.
48005011	Kon awad da ujum ey kananda ey siya kanu apporok itudtuju ey masapur ampakugit dasey Gentil nu mamatida. Nu tuttuwa nait, ngey paak lawa tongtong-agun asda Jews nu'? Tey nu tuttuwa ey siya itudtujuk sey masapur ampakugit sey tagu, niippun atyén sumang-an dasey Jews assey tudtujuk miipanggop assey natuyan Cristu assey krus.
48005012	Kanana atyén ta dasey mangal-allilow an dakayu, ipaddagusda at pey lawa ta umuyda ampavutu!
48005013	An dakayu ey susunud, inayagan Apudyus dakayu ta mawayaan kayu. Kon ajiyu usarun sey wayawayayu as an-akil-anyu ey mangwa as dasey dakumpun ey pipiun sey long-ag, nu aji gapu assey layadyu assey usa ya usa, mantitinnurung kayu.
48005014	Tey dasey vilin sey Lintog at napongsan assey sa'an ey vilin ey kanana, “Masapur ey maryadka assey asintatagum ey anung sey layadnu assey long-agnu.”
48005015	Kon nu iturturuyyu ey amvivinnusur ey anung dasey asu ey anggagangar, man-annad kayu tey sey mantongparana at sey lumawingan sey usa ya usa an dakayu.
48005016	Annaya sey piuk ey ibaga an dakayu. Iturturuyyu ey ampaiturey assey Ispiritu tey nu kanaʼsji sey koonyu, ajiyu pun makwa dasey lawingan ey pipiun sey long-ag.
48005017	Tey sey pipiun sey long-ag at kumuntra assey piun sey Ispiritu ya sey piun sey Ispiritu at kumuntra assey pipiun sey long-ag. Amvinnusur da nauy ey juwa at siya sey aji taku pun makakwa asda ambaru ey piun taku koon.
48005018	Kon nu sey Ispiritu sey manginturturung an dakayu, niippun mamilit an dakayu ey mangwa as dasey kanan sey Lintog.
48005019	Mimamattunan sey pipiun sey long-ag: Mikadagdagas, aanmok as dasey kaggissow ey makwa, kaviviin ey ugali,
48005020	mandayow as dasey ap-apudyus, ampabni, amvivinnusur, an-iisik, man-iinnapos, allasu as pumtuk, mansokar, long-agna anggey sey sosomkona, mangwa as mansisiyanan,
48005021	maapos assey kuwan da ujum, amvubvuuk ya mikalagragsak asda ummamdan ey lagragsak ya da ujum ey anung dana ey lawingan. At ikasinku ibaga da nauy ey luusku imbaga an dakayu ey dasey mangwa asda kanasnaʼt, ajida pun mijuga assey Turey Apudyus.
48005022	Kon sey kopyan sey tagu ey iturturung sey Ispiritun Apudyus at mananglayad, naragsak, natarna sey ansomsomkana, naanus, tumuturung, ambaru sey koona asda asintataguna, matalik,
48005023	napakumbaba ya maattumana sey long-agna. Niippun Lintog as kumuntra asda nauy ey kopya.
48005024	At dasey tagu ey nijujugga an Cristu Jesus at kamaʼs nilansa assey krus sey judaan ey kinatataguda ya nijuga dasey amin ey lawingan ya niilluvungan ey pipiun sey long-ag.
48005025	At gapu ta narpu assey Ispiritu sey baru ey viyag taku, masapur vus ey siya sey manginturturung an jitaku.
48005026	Ya masapur atyén ey aji taku ampaspas-um, unnu anggiginneygey anda man-iinnapos.
48006001	Dakayu ey susunud, nu awad vurunyu as naagammuwan ey nakabasur, dakayu ey iturturayan sey Ispiritu, ammaanyu tugunun ta kasin ampuuli assey ustu ey kopya. Kon ilanyu tey oni at lawa ya dakayu sey masulisug.
48006002	Antitinnurung kayu nu awad ligat sey usa ya usa an dakayu, tey nu siyaji sey koonyu, antongtongpar kayu assey lintog Cristu.
48006003	Tey ngan man sey tagu ey mangimvilang assey long-agna as napatig kon niippun atpey katuttuwaana, al-allilawuna sey long-agna.
48006004	Masapur ey usausa at sommosommokona sey apporona koon nu ustu unnu aji. Ta nu ustu, mabalin ey siya sey allaylaydana ya masapur ey ajina pun as ipani sey kingwana assey kingwan da ujum
48006005	tey masapur usausa at siya sey sillobbong assey mismu ey koona.
48006006	Sey tagu ey natudtujuwan assey Gingan Apudyus, masapur ey ivillayana sey nanudtuju an siya assey amin ey ambaru ey awad an siya.
48006007	Ajiyu allilawun sey long-agyu tey aji pun as mabalin ey silibanyu as Apudyus. Tey sey iyosok sey tagu, siya vus pigey sey aniyuna.
48006008	At sey tagu ey siya apporona unujun sey pipiun sey long-agna, aniyuna sey jusa ey niippun patinggana. Kon sey tagu ey siya unujuna sey piun sey Ispiritu, aniyuna sey viyag ey niippun patinggana ey marpu assey Ispiritu.
48006009	At siya sey aji taku mappug ey mangwamangwa as dasey ambabaru ey makwa tey jumatong sey ustu ey timpu at awad ji aniyun taku nu aji taku ipog-an ey mangwa assey ambaru.
48006010	At nu nawaya taku, koon taku at dasey ambabaru ey makwa asda amin ey tagu am-amud as dasey susunud taku ey mamati.
48006011	Sa'un ey mismu sey nangingkur-it assey kasalinunutan sey surat anna. Ilanyu at angkadanakkor sey kingwak ey nangingkur-it!
48006012	Dasey tagu ey mangimpapilit ey makugit kayu, jida dasey tagu ey maryad ey angimpiila assey kinaambaruda assey angiilan dasey ujum ey tagu. Tey agammuda ey nu itudtujuda sey natuyan Cristu assey krus ey umaney as kasarakanan, tongtong-agun jida asda vurunda ey Jews. Nauy sey piunda ey ilisiyan.
48006013	Urey dasey nakugit at ajida pun makatongpar assey amin ey Lintog. Kon piunda anggey ey ampakugit kayu ta awad ipaspas-umda ey nampakugit kayu gapu an jida.
48006014	Kon an sa'un, niippun ujum as ipaspas-umku nu aji anggey sey natuyan Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku assey krus. Gapu ta natuy siya, imvilangku ey natuy an sa'un dasey amin ey patpatigun ji tagu assey luta ya mivilang avus as natuyak assey angiilan dasey niilluvungan ey tagu.
48006015	Tey niippun balor sey nakugit unnu aji pun. Sey anggey as nabalor an siya at sey tagu ey naatdan as baru ey viyag.
48006016	Kanana atyén ta dasey mangunud assey imbagak anna at maatdanda as tarna ya kadaguwan Apudyus jida. Nauy sey dawatku as para an jida ya urey dasey amin ey tagun Apudyus.
48006017	Mallugi assey sana, niippun atyén kasin tomongtong-ag, tey dasey pilat assey long-agku anna sey mangimpiila ey tuttuwa ey alipanak an Jesus.
48006018	Kanana atyén ta ambaambaru sey koon Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu an dakayu amin ey susunud. Amen.
49001001	Sa'un an Paul ey usa ey aposel Cristu Jesus tey siya sey piun Apudyus. Annaya sey suratku an dakayu ey mapiyar ey tagun Apudyus ad Efesus ey nijujugga an Cristu Jesus.
49001002	Kanana atyén ta atjun Apudyus ey Ama taku ya as Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu sey amin ey vumaruwan an dakayu losan.
49001003	Madayow as Apudyus ey siya sey Apudyus ya Aman Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu tey gapu assey nijugaan taku an Cristu, vindisyunan Apudyus jitaku as dasey amin ey ambabaru ey marpu ad langit gapu assey Ispirituna.
49001004	Urey assey daan pun makwa sey luvung, naas jitaku pinipili an Apudyus as mantaguna gapu assey mijugaan taku an Cristu ta ambalinuna jitaku as nadarus sey ugalina ya niippun kajumsikana assey angiilan Apudyus. Ya gapu assey layadna,
49001005	sigud ey inggoddongna ey ambalinuna jitaku as aanakna gapu assey kingwan Jesu Cristu ey miyunud assey allaylaydana ya panggopna
49001006	ta siya sey dayawun taku gapu assey kinaambaruna ey niippun miyisuwana ey impiilana an jitaku ey nijujugga assey pipiuna ey anakna.
49001007	Tey gapu assey daran Cristu assey natuyana, impalangpowna sey somsomok taku ey siya sey napakawanan sey basur taku. Siya nauy sey miil-an sey amud ey kinaambarun Apudyus ey niippun miyisuwana
49001008	ey nandangdang-ana innatud an jitaku. Nariing pigey tuttuwa as Apudyus ya ninungnung ey
49001009	mangimpaagammu an jitaku assey panggopna ey aji pun naagammuwan assey kar-argow ey inggoddongna ey matongpar gapu an Cristu.
49001010	Sey nauy ey panggopna at aminuna koon assey ustu ey timpuna. Assey timpu saji, pongsanuna dagupun da amin ey awad ad langit ya assey luta ta as Cristu anggey sey mangimpangat an jida.
49001011	Amin ey makwamakwa at mibasar assey sigud ey somsomok Apudyus ya panggopna. Ya siyana avus sey namiliyana an jitaku as taguna gapu assey nijugaan taku an Cristu. Siyana sey sisimmokna ey makwa mallugi assey saradna.
49001012	Siyaji sey kingwana ta dakani ey Jews ey namangu ey awad namnamana an Cristu at matagu kani ey mandayow assey kinangatun Apudyus.
49001013	At ey sana, nambalin kayu vus as tagun Apudyus assey nangngoranyu assey katuttuwaan ey tudtuju ey siyaji sey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop assey kingwana ey nanginsarakan an dakayu. At assey namatiyanyu an Cristu, minarkaana dakayu as taguna assey nangatdana an dakayu assey Ispirituna ey impostana.
49001014	Sey nilong-agan sey Ispiritu an jitaku, siyaji sey mangimpatuttuwa ey atjun Apudyus dasey amin ey impostana an jitaku ya atjuna vus sey wayawaya an jitaku ey taguna ta madayow sey kinangatuna.
49001015	Assey ab-avus sey nangngorak assey pammatiyu an Apu Jesus ya sey layadyu asda amin ey tagun Apudyus,
49001016	ajiyak pun mappug ey ansaramat an Apudyus gapu an dakayu. Kanayun ey iluwaruwak dakayu
49001017	ya apporok kudawun an Apudyus ey kangatuwan ey aman Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu ta sey Ispirituna ey awad an dakayu at atjuna sey liing ya pannakaawatyu ta maagammuwanyu sey ustu ey miipanggop an Apudyus.
49001018	Ya sey luwaruk avus, silawan atyén Apudyus sey somsomokyu ta lumawag sey maawatanyu assey vinarun sey namnama ey awatunyu gapu assey namiliyana an dakayu. Ya maawatanyu sey niippun miyisuwana ey vinaknang ey impostana atjun asda taguna.
49001019	Ya iluwaruk avus ta maagammuwanyu sey amud ey pannakabalinna ey niippun miyisuwana ey manuruturung an jitaku ey mamati an siya. Siyaji sey pannakabalin ey
49001020	impiilana assey nanaguwana an Cristu assey natuyana ya assey nangimpatukjuwana an siya assey padawananna.
49001021	At as jiyuy sey manginturayana asda amin ey awad tureyna, karobbongana anda awad pannakabalinna ya asda ujum ey awad iturturayanda. Siya sey manginturey asda kangamin assey luvung anna ya urey assey daan ey ag-agow.
49001022	Impaiturey Apudyus an Cristu dasey amin ey kingwana ya jinutukana siya ey mangimpangat an jitaku losan ey mamati
49001023	ey mipani as long-agna. Siya sey uru ya jitaku sey long-agna ey mangumplitu an siya ya siya vus sey mangumplitu asda kangamin.
49002001	Assey kar-argow, miivilang kayu as nanattuy gapu assey ajiyu pun jumngoran ya gapu asda basuryu.
49002002	Assey timpu saji, apporoyu inunud dasey lawingan ey ugalin da aji pun mamati tey tinongparyu sey ap-apun da jimunyu ey aji pun miila ey manginturturey asda tagu ey aji pun umunud an Apudyus.
49002003	Kon assey katuttuwaan, urey jitaku at kanaʼsji vus sey kingwa taku ey natagu. Apporow taku inunud dasey amin ey pipiun sey long-ag ya da ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey masmasmok. At assey kanaʼsna ey kopya ey niippun natkonana asda ujum, niippun kasin manturungana nu aji sey manusaan Apudyus an jitaku.
49002004	Kon niippun miyisuwan sey dagun Apudyus ya sey layadna an jitaku
49002005	tey urey nu kama taku as nanattuy gapu assey basur taku, injugana jitaku ey mikatagu an Cristu. At insarakan Apudyus jitaku gapu anggey assey kinaambaruna.
49002006	At gapu assey nijugaan taku an Cristu, injugana jitaku impangatu ey mikatukju an Cristu ey mikaturey ad langit.
49002007	Kingwan Apudyus nauy ta assey sana ey timpu ya as ing-inggana, ipiilana sey niippun miyisuwana ey kinaambaruna gapu assey layadna an jitaku ey nijuga an Cristu.
49002008	Tey gapu anggey assey kinaambarun Apudyus, insarakana dakayu assey namatiyanyu ey dakumpun as gapu ta awad kingwayu nu aji libli ey innatudna an dakayu.
49002009	At siya sey niippun mabalin ipaspas-um sey ngadannaʼs nait ey tagu ey kingwana sey ambaru at mijuga an Apudyus.
49002010	Tey as Apudyus anggey sey nangwa an jitaku ey mijuga an Cristu ta makakwa taku asda ambabaru ey makwa ey sigud ey insaganan Apudyus ey koon taku.
49002011	Masapur ey somsomkonyu sey katataguyu assey keysan ey ag-agow, dakayu ey niyanak ey Gentil ey apporon da Jews jumsijumsikun ey kananda, “Dasey aji pun nakugit.” Ya sey kananda assey long-agda ey ampaspas-um ey jida sey tagun Apudyus, at kananda, “Dakani ey Nakugit.” (Sey kugit, koon sey tagu assey long-ag).
49002012	Asda jiyuy ey ag-agow, niisina kayu an Cristu. Anungyu mangili anggey ey aji pun nijuga an dakani ey ganak Israel ey pinipilin Apudyus ey taguna. Aji kayu pun vus nijuga assey inturag Apudyus ey awad sey impostana ey atjuna an dakani. Natatagu kayu assey luta anna ey niippun namnamayu ya niippun agammuyu an Apudyus.
49002013	Kon assey sana, gapu assey nijugaanyu an Cristu Jesus, dakayu ey niyadayu an Apudyus assey keysan ey ag-agow, niyadani kayu an siya gapu assey daran Cristu assey natuyana.
49002014	Tey as Cristu ey mismu sey nangwa assey masa'anan dasey Jews ya dasey Gentil. Siya sey nangaan assey namvinnusuranda ey lapun sey nansisiyyanan da Jews ya dasey Gentil.
49002015	Pinungpungna sey tureyn sey Lintog da Jews ey iggawan da amin ey vilvilin ey masapur unujun da Jews. Siyana sey kingwana ta dasey juwa ey karasin da tagu ey Jews ya da Gentil at ambalinuna jida as sa'an anggey ey baru ey tagu gapu assey nijugaanda an Cristu. At sey salinunutna, iyyalina sey napanusanda.
49002016	Kinaanna sey nabayag ey amvivinnusuranda gapu assey natuyana assey krus at sina'anna jida losan an Apudyus.
49002017	Ummali ey nangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag ey siya sey napanusan da tagu losan, da Gentil ey mivilang as adayu an Apudyus ya da Jews ey mivilang as adani an Apudyus.
49002018	At ey sana, Jews man unnu Gentil, mabalinda umadani an Apudyus ey Ama taku gapu assey turung sey saʼsa'an ey Ispirituna ey awad an jitaku.
49002019	At assey sana, dakayu ey Gentil, aji kayu pun miivilang as sabali ey tagu unnu mangili anggey, nu aji vurunyu da amin ey tagun Apudyus ya nijuga kayu assey familyan Apudyus.
49002020	Mipani kayu assey kopyan sey vuruy ey ipatpatakjug Apudyus. Ya dasey aposel anda profet, jida sey kama as turkud ya sey nipon-adana at as Cristu Jesus.
49002021	Ya as Cristu sey nanangjun assey amin ey nansusuupan sey kopyan sey vuruy ey mipatpatakjug inggana as ambalin as naapudyusan ey vuruy ey vigvigun da tagu as para assey Apu.
49002022	Kanaʼsna vus an dakayu tey assey nijugaanyu an Cristu, illagumna dakayu asda ujum ta ambalinuna dakayu as vumruyan sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
49003001	At siyana sey lapuna ey sa'un an Paul, apporok iluwaru dakayu an Apudyus. Annaak ey nibabarud gapu assey nangiwwarawagak an dakayu ey Gentil assey miipanggop an Cristu Jesus.
49003002	Jingngoryu nin sey siputku anna ey impaviyang Apudyus gapu assey daguna para assey vumaruwanyu.
49003003	Tey impaagammun Apudyus an sa'un sey panggopna ey aji pun naagammuwan assey kar-argow. (At siyana vus pigey sey ka'ikur-itku assey suratku anna.
49003004	At nu basaunyu ey ustu sey ingkur-itku anna, maawatanyu ey narawag sey angaawatku assey aji pun naagammuwan miipanggop an Cristu.)
49003005	Assey keysan ey ag-agow, aji pun nipaagammu sey panggop Apudyus asda tagu, kon assey sana, impaagammun sey Ispiritu an dakani ey aposel ya asda profet.
49003006	Annaya sey impaagammuna: Dakayu ey Gentil, gapu assey namatiyanyu assey Ambaru ey Damag, mikalak-am kayu assey laksununni ey Jews ey atjun Apudyus. Miivilang kayu an dakani ey mijuga assey kama as sa'an ey long-ag. Mikavilley kayu avus assey impostan Apudyus asda amin ey nijuga an Cristu Jesus.
49003007	Assey vinarun Apudyus, innatudna sey siput anna an sa'un ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag ey mangusar assey pannakabalinna ey impiyarna an sa'un.
49003008	Urey nu sa'un sey kababaan asda amin ey tagun Apudyus, innatudna pey dallu an sa'un sey waya ey mangimpaagammu asda Gentil sey miipanggop as dasey niippun miyisuwana ey vinarun Cristu.
49003009	Ya imbaarna avus sa'un ta ipaagammuk asda amin ey tagu nu ngan-annun sey panggopna ey mipanad. Tey as Apudyus ey nangwa asda amin, ajina pun as impaagammu sey nauy ey panggopna assey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu assey keysan ey ag-agow.
49003010	At urey dasey ap-apun da enjel ya da ujum ey awad mannakabalinna ad langit at niippun agammuda assey nakaskasdaow ey kinariing Apudyus tey inggana assey sana asida at miila. Tey sey panggop Apudyus, jitaku ey mamati an Cristu Jesus sey mangil-anda assey nauy ey kinariing ey niippun miyisuwana.
49003011	Sey nauy ey kingwan Apudyus at miyunud assey nisisigud ey panggopna, at ey sana, naminda natongpar gapu an Cristu Jesus ey Apu taku.
49003012	At gapu assey nijugaan taku an Cristu ya gapu assey pammati taku an siya, mabalin ey siwawaya taku ey umadani an Apudyus tey niippun juwajuwana ey dongrona jitaku.
49003013	At siyana sey ampangpangaasiyak an dakayu ta aji kayu atyén ngumaya gapu assey apporok matongtong-agan tey para nauy assey annumaranyu.
49003014	Nu sommosommokok amin da nauy, magak gey da mallikkadang ey alluwaru an Apudyus ey Ama taku
49003015	ey nangwa asda amin ey awad ad langit ya assey luta.
49003016	At sey kudakudawuk an siya ey kangatuwan ey niippun miyisuwan sey pannakabalinna, pakasdorona jitaku losan gapu assey Ispirituna.
49003017	Ya gapu assey pammatiyu an Cristu, iluwaruk ta vumruy siya assey somsomokyu. Ya iluwaruk avus ta jumgot sey layadyu an Apudyus ya as dasey vurunyu
49003018	ta dakayu ya da amin ey tagun Apudyus at maatdan kayu as pannakabalin ey makaawat assey amud ey layad Cristu an jitaku ey niippun miyisuwan sey kadogotna.
49003019	Ajita pun tuttuwa makaskasmok assey ustu ey layadna, kon kanana atyén ta maawaawatanyu ya giknaunyu sey layadna sana ta vumaru sey ugaliyu inggana as miyanung assey ustu ey nakopyaan Apudyus.
49003020	Madayow as Apudyus ey mannakabalin assey amin. Tey kaviilana ey mangwa assey sinjumallu nu dasey apporow taku kudawun unnu dasey awad assey somsomok taku gapu assey pannakabalinna ey kama as angkiwaar assey viyag taku.
49003021	Kanana atyén ta an jitaku losan ey mamati, dayawun taku siya ya madayow siya as ing-inggana gapu an Cristu Jesus! Amen.
49004001	Ampangpangaasiyak an dakayu, sa'un ey barud gapu assey anserserviyak an Apu Jesus, masapur ey sey koonyu ey matagu at mitagop assey karasin sey kinatatagu ey piun Apudyus ey namili an dakayu as taguna.
49004002	Assey amin atyén ey timpu, ipiilayu ey napakumbaba kayu ya ambaruwunyu sey koonyu ey guminga asda asintataguyu ya naanus kayu. Man-innanus kayu ey mangimpiila assey man-asilaydanyu.
49004003	Sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey nangwa assey masa'ananyu. At siya sey tornonyu ey amopotpot ta aji mabakas sey ambaru sana ey nasa'ananyu.
49004004	Amin taku ey nijuga an Cristu at anung taku sey sa'an ey long-ag ya sa'an sey Ispiritu ey awad an jitaku. Ya saʼsa'an vus sey namnama taku gapu assey namiliyan Apudyus an jitaku as taguna.
49004005	Sa'an sey Apu taku ya namati taku losan assey sa'an ey tudtuju ya sa'an vus sey piun sey navunyagan taku ey ugujun.
49004006	Sa'an avus sey Apudyus ey Aman da amin ey mamati an siya. Siya sey Apu ey manginturey an jitaku losan ey taguna ya ipakwana sey piuna an jitaku ya aawwad siya an jitaku ey kanayun.
49004007	Kon assey usausa ey mamati, awad sey napatig ey kaviilan ey naatud an siya ey mangimpiila assey kinaambarun Cristu ey angatuatud.
49004008	Tey sey Nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, kanana, “Assey ummayana assey kangangattuwan ey langit, adjuwan sey intakinna ey barud, ya awad sey innatudna asda taguna.”
49004009	Ngan sey piuna ugujun assey ngummatuwan ad langit? Sey piuna ey ugujun, inggow sey vummabaana assey kaadaruman ey partin sey luta.
49004010	At sey vummaba, siya vus pigey sey ngummatu assey kangangattuwan ey langit ta siya sey aawwad assey amin ey jissu.
49004011	At siya sey nangatud as dasey nantokotokon ey kaviilan dasey taguna. Jinutukana da ujum as man-aposel ya dasey ujum as profet ya jinutukana dasey ujum as umuy mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag ya asda ujum, jinutukana ey ambalin as pastor ey amuut asda mamati ya da ujum, innatudna sey kaviilanda ey mantudtuju asda mamati.
49004012	Kanaʼsna sey kingwana ta muusarda ey manginsagana asda amin ey tagun Apudyus ta manservida an siya ya asda vuvurunda. Sey masalinunutana at assey kumasdoran taku ey miivilang as long-ag Cristu
49004013	inggana as masa'an taku losan assey pammati ya maagammuwan taku sey miipanggop assey Anak Apudyus ya kumasdor sey pammati taku inggana as miyanung taku an Cristu ey niippun mangkurangana.
49004014	At nu kanaʼsji, aji taku mikamkama asda anak ey allasu as maatub sey somsomokda unnu kama assey ban-it ey bangka ey allasu as ituppituppiyak sey dalluyun ya iyabvid sey abvid gapu asda dakumpun as ustu ey tudtujun dasey nangkariing ya mootok ey mangal-allilow asda tagu.
49004015	Kon sey koon taku atyén ey matagu, adarun taku ey guminga assey tuttuwa ey mangimpiila assey layad taku. At nu kanaʼsji sey amin ey koon taku, miyanung sey kopya taku assey kopyan Cristu ey siya sey mipani assey urun da amin ey mamati.
49004016	Ya siya sey apporow mangurnus an jitaku ey pannakalong-agna ta muurnus sey amin ey partin sey long-ag ey uugnan sey urat. At nu usausa asda partin sey long-ag at koona sey viyangna, jumakor ya kumasdor sey amin ey partin sey long-ag gapu assey man-asilaydan taku.
49004017	Gapu an Apu ey nangatud assey karobbongan an sa'un; Masapur ilanyu ta man-awidanyu dasey koko'on da Gentil ey niippun balorna
49004018	ya aggikbot sey somsomokda. Ajida pun maatdan assey viyag ey atjun Apudyus tey niippun agammuda an siya ya anongodongorda ey angwa assey kuwada ey goom.
49004019	Niippun pigey akit as viinda ya iyyuyada sey long-agda asda amin ey karasin da aggissow ya kaviviin ey makwa ya niippun agammuda ey mangiyyagey.
49004020	Kon an dakayu, dakumpun da jiyuy dasey inadaryu miipanggop an Cristu
49004021	tey siguraju ey jingngoryu sey miipanggop an siya. Ya assey nijugaanyu an Jesus, natudtujuwan kayu asda katuttuwaan miipanggop an siya.
49004022	At siya sey masapur man-awidanyu dasey lawingan ey ugaliyu ey inunudyu assey daanyu pun mamatiyan tey da jiyuy sey nangallilow ya nanadail an dakayu.
49004023	At masapur ey moorsan sey somsomokyu ya ugaliyu
49004024	ta iyugaliyu sey barbaru ey kopya ey anung sey kopyan Apudyus. Siyaji sey tuttuwa ey ugali ey niyun-un ya nadarus.
49004025	At ipog-anyu ey man-us-ussat ta dasey tuttuwa anggey sey ibagayu asda vurunyu ey mamati tey long-ag jitaku losan an Cristu.
49004026	Nu pumtuk kayu, ajiyu iparuvus sey putuk ey mangwa as vumasuranyu. Ajiyu iparuvus ey mipisuk as init ya sissiya kayu atgey ey pupumtuk
49004027	ta niippun wayan Satanas ey mangawis an dakayu.
49004028	Nu awad ey man-aakow an dakayu, masapur iyageyna ta pumawot at ey mansiput as ikataguna ya ta awad avus mangar-ana as iturungna asda lumawa.
49004029	Ajiyu babarangun ey guminga nu aji sey ibagayu at sey miyunud assey makwamakwa assey siyaji ey timpu as makaturung as dasey mamangngor ya awad ivungana as ambaru asda andongor.
49004030	Ilanyu ta aji kayu angwa as anjujuuyan sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey innatudna an dakayu tey sey Ispirituna ey nilong-ag an dakayu at siya sey sinyarna ey taguna dakayu. Ya siya sey mangimpasiguraju ey umdas sey ag-agow ey wayawayaana dakayu asda amin ey basuryu.
49004031	Aminunyu kaanun dasey amin ey sigab sey somsomokyu, amud ey putuk ey gigin-omyu ya sey ipipi'ilayu ey putukyu ya da apporoyu amvivinnuggaan unnu anjijinnadailan ya da amin ey lawingan ey somsomokyu asda vurunyu.
49004032	Dakumpun atyén as kanaʼs ji sey koonyu nu aji man-iinnanus ya mankikinnadagu kayu. Ampipinnakawan kayu ey anung sey kingwan Apudyus ey namakawan an dakayu gapu an Cristu.
49005001	Assey sana ey anak dakayu an Apudyus ey pipiuna, anungunyu siya
49005002	ta sey anggey as awad an dakayu at sey layad ey anung sey layad Cristu an jitaku ey nangatud assey long-agna ey matuy as para an jitaku. Siyaji sey kamaʼs bangbangu ey midatun an Apudyus ey mangimpalaylayad an siya.
49005003	Gapu ta tagun Apudyus dakayu, aji kayu mikador-ag assey dakumpun as asawayu unnu mangwa asda kaggissow ey koko'on da laraki ya vubai unnu man-agum as kuwan da ujum tey urey sey kuul-ullitan da nauy at aji pun mitagop an dakayu ey tagun Apudyus.
49005004	Aji pun vus mitagop an dakayu sey guminga asda kaggissow ey ginga ya da barangna ey niippun gotokna ya dasey kaggissow ey ur-urnug miipanggop asda vubai ta sey koonyu atyén at sey apporow mansaramat an Apudyus.
49005005	Tey agammuyu ey aji pun mabalin ey mijuga assey manturayan Cristu ya as Apudyus dasey mikador-ag assey dakumpun as asawana unnu da ujum ey mangwa asda kaggissow ey koko'on da laraki ya vubai anda man-agum as kuwan da ujum tey sey agumam, ambalin jiyuy as apudyusnu.
49005006	Aji kayu da ampaallilow asda inuussat ey ul-ullit tey gapu asda nauy, umdas sey manusaan Apudyus as dasey aji pun mamati an siya gapu assey putukna.
49005007	At siyana sey aji kayu da mikavub-urun assey anung da jiyuy ey tagu.
49005008	Tey assey kar-argow, gikbot sey inggow assey somsomokyu, kon assey sana, nasilawan ogon sey somsomokyu gapu assey nijugaanyu an Apu Jesus. At siya sey ilanyu ta mitagop sey koko'onyu assey kopyan da tagu ey nasilawan sey somsomokna.
49005009	Tey sey nasilawan sey somsomokna, ambaru sey kopyana, nalintog ya awad an siya sey kinatuttuwa.
49005010	Ya padasunyu anapun sey mangimpalaylayad assey Apu ta siyaji sey koonyu.
49005011	Aji kayu da mikakwa asda niippun servina ey koko'on da tagu ey aggikbot sey somsomokna nu aji ipiilayu an jida ey lawingan sey kookoonda.
49005012	Tey urey sey angugudan as dasey itarutaruda ey koon at kaviviin.
49005013	Kon nu masilawanda, miila sey ustu ey kinarwing sey nakopyaanda
49005014	tey sey silow sey mangwa as miil-an da kangamin. At siyaji sey kanan sey kankanta ey, “Vumangunka, sika ey suyyupan. Mataguka, sika ey natuy at silawan Cristu sey somsomoknu!”
49005015	At siya sey annadanyu sey koonyu ey matagu ta ajiyu unujun sey koko'on dasey aji pun makaawat nu aji anungunyu dasey masomkan ey tagu.
49005016	Nu nawaya kayu ey mangwa assey ambaru, koonyu at, tey assey sana ey timpu, adjuwan da mangwa assey lawingan.
49005017	At siyana sey ajiyu ung-ung-ungun, nu aji anapunyu sey piun sey Apu ey koonyu.
49005018	Aji kayu amvubvuuk tey nait sey mangwa assey madadailanyu nu aji paruvusanyu sey Ispiritu ey manginturey an dakayu.
49005019	At assey apporoyu madagupan, ampipinnakasdor kayu ey mangingginga as dasey nikur-it assey libnu ey Psalms ya dasey ujum ey kankanta ey mangindayow assey Apu. Allaylayad kayu ey mankankanta ey mangindayow an siya assey amin ey somsomokyu.
49005020	Ya assey amin ey makwamakwa an dakayu, kanayun kayu ey mansaramat an Apudyus ey Ama taku gapu assey nijugaan taku an Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
49005021	Ya sey usa avus, ampipinnakumbaba kayu assey ibagan sey usa ya usa gapu assey mangindayawanyu an Cristu.
49005022	Dakayu ey vubai, ampaiturey kayu as dasey asawayu tey siyana sey piun sey Apu ey koonyu.
49005023	Tey sey laraki sey kama as urun sey asawana ey anung Cristu ey siya sey urun da amin ey mamati ey jida sey mipani assey long-agna. Ya siya sey nanginsarakan an jida.
49005024	At siyana sey dakayu ey vubai, masapur ey ampaiturey kayu asda asawayu ey kama assey mampaiturayan da amin ey mamati an Cristu.
49005025	Dakayu ey laraki, masapur maryad kayu as dasey asawayu ey anung sey maryadan Cristu an jitaku ey mamati ey siya sey nangatudana assey viyagna as para an jitaku losan
49005026	ta ambalinuna jitaku as nadarus ey tagun Apudyus gapu assey nangurasana an jitaku assey danum ey siya sey Gingan Apudyus.
49005027	Sey gapun sey nangwaanaʼs nauy ta isaganana dasey amin ey mamati ey ambalin as kuwana ey nadarus ya niippun akit as kajumsikanda unnu mangkuranganda assey umaliyana ey mangara an jida.
49005028	At dakayu ey laraki, masapur ey maryad kayu as dasey asawayu ey anung sey maryadanyu assey long-agyu. Tey sey tagu ey maryad assey asawana, sey long-agna vus pigey sey nilayadna.
49005029	Niippun tagu as iwarangna sey long-agna nu aji puutuna ya pakanana ey anung sey kingwan Jesus an jitaku ey mamati
49005030	tey imvilangna ey long-agna jitaku.
49005031	Kanan sey Nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, “Sey gapuna ey teynan sey laraki da amana an inana ta miyaggum an asawana ta ambalinda as sa'an ey long-ag.”
49005032	Assey Nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus, awad sey nabalor ya nangindarum ey piuna ugujun. Tey sey maawatak ey miyisuwana at an Cristu ya dasey amin ey mamati.
49005033	Kon awad pey dallu sey piuna ey ugujun miipanggop an dakayu: Sika ey laraki, masapur ey mamaryadka assey asawam ey anung sey mamaryadam assey long-agnu. Ya sika vus ey vubai, masapur ey rispituwum sey asawam.
49006001	Dakayu ey aanak, masapur dongronyu da amayu an inayu tey siyana sey ustu ey koon dasey mamati an Apu Jesus.
49006002	Tey annaya sey imvilin Apudyus ey kanana, “Masapur rispituwum da amam an inam.” Nauy sey namangu ey vilin ey awad sey gun-gunan dasey mangwa
49006003	tey sey impostan Apudyus kanana, “Nu tongparumji, matataguka assey luta anna ya lak-amum dasey ambabaru assey matatagguwam.”
49006004	An dakayu avus ey aama, ilanyu ta aji kayu angwa as sumang-an dasey aanakyu an dakayu nu aji padokronyu jida ya piingsaunyu jida ey mangunud assey vilin Apu Jesus.
49006005	Dakayu ey alipan, dongronyu dasey sin-alipan an dakayu. Rispituwunyu jida ya koonyu sey kaviilanyu ey mangwa as dasey ibagada an dakayu ey anung sey koonyu atyén nu as Cristu sey mangimpakwa an dakayu.
49006006	Dakumpun anggey assey mangiil-anda an dakayu sey mangimpapatiyanyu ey mangwa assey siputyu tey piunyu ey maryadda an dakayu. Kon sey koonyu, ivilangyu ey as Cristu sey manserserviyanyu ey sin-alipan an dakayu ya koonyu sey kaviilanyu ey mangwa assey piun Apudyus.
49006007	Silalayad kayu ey mangwa assey siputyu ey kama as Apu Jesus sey manserserviyanyu ey dokon pun as tagu
49006008	tey agammuyu ey gun-gunaan sey Apu dasey amin ey mangwa assey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey ambaru, alipan man unnu dakumpun.
49006009	Ya an dakayu avus ey sin-alipan, masapur ey ambaruwunyu jida. Ajiyu jida ug-ugyatun tey agammuyu ey man-iisu kayu asda alipanyu ey sa'an sey Apuyu ad langit ya ajina pun antoktoknon da tagu assey man-uwisana.
49006010	Sey muuji ey ibagak, pakasdoronyu sey somsomokyu gapu assey nijugaanyu an Apu ya gapu assey amud ey pannakabalinna.
49006011	Masapur usarunyu sey amin ey innatud Apudyus ey armas ta aji kayu maabak assey lawingan ey allilow Satanas.
49006012	Tey dokon pun as tagu sey kavusur taku nu dokon dasey amin ey lawingan ey aji pun miila ad ngatu ya da awad karobbongana ya awad pannakabalinna ey manginturturey asda tagu ey aggikbot sey somsomokda.
49006013	At siya sey masapur ey usarunyu da amin ey armas ey innatud Apudyus ta nu jumatong sey ag-agow ey maawisanyu, nakasagana kayu ey mangintakjug ey mangabak asda kavusuryu ta nu maas ey, sissiya kayu ey angkasdor ey mangontra asda lawingan.
49006014	At siya sey mansasaggana kayu ey mangiigga asda nauy ey armas. Sey kama as sinturunyu at sey mangibag-anyu assey katuttuwaan. Ya sey manaparyu assey barukungyu at sey nalintog ey kaviviyagyu.
49006015	Sey sapatusyu at sey mansasagganaanyu ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop assey mitimpuyugan an Apudyus.
49006016	Sey karasagyu at sey pammatiyu an Cristu. Siyana sey popotpotanyu ey kanayun ta kaviilanyu ey manarapa assey gumilgillajung ey pana ey kisvun Satanas.
49006017	Sey helmetyu at sey nanginsarakan Apudyus an dakayu. Ya sey bangidyu at sey Gingan Apudyus ey ipakagasmok sey Ispiritu an dakayu.
49006018	Assey mangusaranyu asda nauy, kanayun kayu atyén ey alluwaru ey angkudow as turung Apudyus. Urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey koonyu, nu ngan sey ipakagasmok sey Ispiritu an dakayu, alluwaru kayu. At siya sey masapur ilanyu ta mansasaggana kayu ya ajiyu ipog-an ey mangilluwaluwaru asda amin ey tagun Apudyus.
49006019	Iluwaruwanyu avus sa'un ta nu mawayaanak ey guminga, atjun atyén Apudyus an sa'un sey ustu ey igingak ya turudku ey mangimpaagammu assey Ambaru ey Damag ey aji pun nipaagammu assey kar-argow.
49006020	Tey gapu assey Ambaru ey Damag sana, imbaarak an Apu Jesus ey pannakalong-agna ya siya lapun sey nabarudak. Iluwaruwanak ta tumurudak ey mangintudtuju tey nauy vus pigey sey ustu atyén ey kook.
49006021	Piuk ey maagammuwanyu nu ngan sey makwamakwa an sa'un as nauy ya dasey kookook. At ibaarku as Tikicus an dakayu ta siya sey mangimpaagammu. Siya sey usa ey pipiuk ey sunud taku ya mapiyar ey manserservi assey Apu. Ul-ullituna an dakayu nu ngan sey nakopyaak as nauy ya umali ey mangimpakasdor assey somsomokyu.
49006023	Kanana atyén ta atjun Ama taku ey Apudyus ya as Apu Jesu Cristu sey tumarnaan sey somsomokyu ya sey allilinnaydanyu ey anturturuy assey pammatiyu.
49006024	Kanana atyén ta atjun Apudyus sey vumaruwanyu losan ey aji pun mappug ey mamaryad an Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
50001001	Sa'un an Paul ya as Timothy, anserservi kani an Cristu Jesus. Annaya sey suratni an dakayu losan ey tagun Apudyus ad Filipay ey nijuga an Cristu Jesus ya an dakayu avus ey mangimpapangat asda mamati sinat ya an dakayu ey tumuruturung an jida.
50001002	Kanana atyén ta atjun Apudyus ey Ama taku ya as Jesu Cristu ey Apu sey amin ey vumaruwan an dakayu losan.
50001003	Assey amin ey timpu ey somsomkok dakayu, niippun ujum as kook nu aji mansaramat an Apudyus.
50001004	Ya assey mangilluwaruwak an dakayu losan, amud sey ragsakku
50001005	tey mansarad assey namatiyanyu inggana assey sana, tinuruturunganak an dakayu assey kiwaarku ey mangimpaagammu assey Ambaru ey Damag.
50001006	At siya sey sigurajuwak ey as Apudyus ey nanginsarad assey nauy ey ambaru ey makwamakwa an dakayu, iturturuyna inggana as mipanad sey piuna ey makwa an dakayu assey ag-agow ey ampuuliyén Cristu Jesus.
50001007	Agammuk ey ambaru sey an-ang-angsak miipanggop an dakayu losan gapu assey amud ey layadku an dakayu tey urey nu awadak assey baballudan unnu awadak ey mangimpanpaniknik assey kinatuttuwan sey Ambaru ey Damag ya mangimpaagammu asda ujum, kama vus pigey as nijujugga kayu an sa'un ey mikakiwaar.
50001008	Amud sey inayuk an dakayu tey pipiuk dakayu ey anung sey namiunan Cristu Jesus an dakayu. As Apudyus sey mangintakjug ey tuttuwa sey ibagabagak anna an dakayu.
50001009	Sey luwaruk avus an Apudyus, manturturuy atyén ey jumgot sey manlilinnaydanyu ya umajuaju sey maagammuwanyu miipanggop an Apudyus ya mimatunanyu vus sey ambaru ya lawingan asda kangamin
50001010	ta mabalin ey sey kaambaruwan ey makwa sey piliyunyu ey koon. At nu kanaʼsji, niippun mipabasur an dakayu assey ag-agow ey ampuuliyén Cristu tey udasana dakayu ey niippun basurna
50001011	tey assey amin ey mataguwanyu at ambabaru sey kookoonyu gapu assey turung Jesu Cristu ta dayawun da tagu as Apudyus ya vigvigunda sey kinaambaruna.
50001012	Piuk ey ipaagammu an dakayu ey vuvurun ey dakumpun as lawingan sey nambanagan sey nakwa an sa'un nu aji ambaru at avus tey umam-amud ey nipaagammu sey Ambaru ey Damag.
50001013	Tey sey salinunutna, amin at avus dasey guwarda assey palasyun Emperor ya asda ujum ey tagu at naagammuwanda ey niippun ujum as lapun sey nabarudak nu aji sey nanserserviyak an Cristu.
50001014	Ya gapu assey nabarudak, ummam-amud ey kummasdor sey talik sey kaajuwan as dasey susunud taku ey mamati assey Apu at ummam-amudda ey tummurud ey mangiwwarawag assey Gingan Apudyus ey niippun ugyatda.
50001015	Tuttuwa ey awad da ujum ey umuy mangiwwarawag assey miipanggop an Cristu gapu assey aposda an sa'un ya piunda ey mikaisik kon awad dasey ujum ey nadarus sey panggopda.
50001016	Da nauy ey tagu sey maryad an sa'un tey maawatanda nu paak lawa anna assey baballudan tey innatud Apudyus an sa'un sey nauy ey kiwaar ey mangimpaniknik assey kinatuttuwan sey Ambaru ey Damag.
50001017	Kon as dasey ujum sanat, dakumpun as ustu sey panggopda ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag tey piunda anggey ey ambalin as mavigvig ey tagu. Ya sey mangwaandaʼs nait tey piunda ey umam-amud atyén sey matongtong-agak assey baballudan.
50001018	Kon urey nu kanaʼsna, dakumpun asda nait sey kumwa tey tokon gey nu lawingan unnu ustu sey panggopda, atow-at nu miwarawag sey miipanggop an Cristu, siyana sey mangatud as mallaylaydak. Ya iturturuyku ey allaylayad
50001019	tey agammuk ey umdas sey mawayawayaak as dasey makwamakwa anna an sa'un gapu assey luwaruyu ya assey turung sey Ispiritun Jesu Cristu.
50001020	Sey piuk atyén ikow ya sey namnamauk at niippun atyén kook as miviviinak an Apudyus. Kanayun atyén ey naturudak ey mangiwwarawag assey Gingan Apudyus assey sana ey timpu ta anturturuy ey madayow as Cristu gapu an sa'un, assey sana ey natatagguwak ya urey nu matuyak.
50001021	Tey an sa'un ey, niippun ujum as panggop sey mataguwak nu aji sey mangindayawak an Cristu. Kon nu matuyak, sin-umamud at avus sey vinaruna.
50001022	Kon nu sey manginturturuyak ey matagu, ta miturturuy avus sey nabalor anna ey siputku, siyana sey niippun ogon agammuk nu ngey piliyuk
50001023	tey ansigab as piliyun nu ngadanna asda juwa anna sey ambab-aru. Tey sey piuk atyén, teynak sey viyag anna assey luta ta inyak mikig-ow an Cristu ey siya sey kaambaruwan assey kangamin.
50001024	Kon gapu an dakayu, kasapuran ey iturturuyku ey matagu assey luta anna.
50001025	Sigurajuwak ey kanaʼsna sey makwa at siya sey iturturuyku ey mikig-ow an dakayu losan ta jumgot sey pammatiyu ya majugjug-an avus sey ragsakyu.
50001026	At nu umaliyak kasin assey iggowyu, am-amud ey idayowyu as Cristu Jesus gapu ta nampuuliyak an dakayu.
50001027	Kon urey nu ngan sey makwa, masapur ey sey koonyu ey matagu at miyunud assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Cristu. Kanaʼsna sey koonyu ta urey nu makaaliyak assey iggowyu unnu aji, madamagku atyén ey mandogot sey pammatiyu ey nasa'an kayu assey panggop ey mangintakjug assey Ambaru ey Damag.
50001028	Aji kayu atyén umugyat as dasey kumuntra an dakayu tey sey turudyu, siya sey mangimpaniknik ey jusaun Apudyus jida ya dakayu sey misarakan. As Apudyus sey mangwa assey kanaʼsna.
50001029	Tey innatud Apudyus an dakayu sey wayayu ey manservi an Cristu, dakumpun anggey assey mamatiyanyu an siya nu aji urey vus sey matongtong-aganyu gapu an siya.
50001030	Sey nauy ey laklak-amunyu ey tongtong-ag at kama assey innilayu ey nilak-amku ey tongtong-ag assey keysan ey ag-agow ya anungna vus sey dodongronyu ey makwamakwa an sa'un assey sana ey timpu.
50002001	Kummasdor sey somsomokyu assey nijugaanyu an Cristu ya lummangpow sey ansomsomkanyu gapu ta pipiuna dakayu ya nivurun kayu assey Ispiritu ya agammuyu ey angikagasmok asda vurunyu ya angkikinnadagu kayu.
50002002	At siya sey dawatuk atyén an dakayu ey atjunyu sey ustu ey angimpalaylayad an sa'un ey siya sey angkikinnaawatanyu ya allilinnaydanyu ya masa'an sey ansomsomkanyu ya panggopyu.
50002003	Assey amin ey koonyu, dakumpun atyén assey angimpangatuwanyu assey long-agyu unnu ampaspas-umanyu nu aji ampakumbaba kayu ya ivilangyu da vurunyu as napatpatig nu dakayu.
50002004	Ya usausa atyén an dakayu at dakumpun assey vumaruwana anggey sey sosomkona nu aji sey vumaruwan vus dasey ujum.
50002005	Kasapuran ey sey kopyayu ey matagu at anung sey kopyan Jesu Cristu
50002006	tey urey nu awad an siya sey kinaApudyus Apudyus, ajina pun impilit ey nangusar assey ustu ey kinangatun Apudyus,
50002007	nu aji tineynana jiyuy at ummali ey nambalin as tagu ey anung taku ya nambalin avus as nababa ey baba'arun.
50002008	Impababana sey long-agna ya kingwana da amin ey piun Apudyus urey nu siya sey ingkatuyna ey nilansa assey krus.
50002009	At siya sey nangimpangatuwan Apudyus an siya ya innatudna avus an siya sey kangatuwan ey saad ey sin-umamud sey dayowna ya karobbongana asda amin ey saad.
50002010	At ey sana, as Jesus sey allikkadangan dasey amin ey awad ad langit ya assey luta anna ya urey assey iggawan da nangkakatuy
50002011	ey mangimbag-anda losan ey as Jesu Cristu sey Apu. At madayow as Ama taku ey Apudyus.
50002012	Susunud ey pipiuk, assey iniiggawak an dakayu, inunudyu da aminʼey intugunku. At ey sana ey niippunak an dakayu, sinjumallu atyén sey koonyu ey mangunud assey imbagak. Iturturuyyu ey matagu ey mitagop assey nanginsarakanan Apudyus an dakayu ey awad atyén sey ugyatyu ya rispituyu an siya
50002013	tey as Apudyus vus pigey sey awad an dakayu ey siya sey mangatuatud assey layadyu ya kaviilanyu ey mangwa asda piuna.
50002014	Assey amin ey koonyu, aji kayu angngujunguju unnu mikaisik
50002015	ta niippun amabasuran da tagu an dakayu ya anturturuy kayu ey nadarus ey aanak Apudyus. At urey nu awad kayu ey nijujugga asda tagu assey luta anna ey amud sey kinarwingda, niippun atyén mankurangan sey ugaliyu nu aji kama kayu atyén asda vituwun ey manilow an jida
50002016	assey mangimpaagammuwanyu an jida assey Gingan Apudyus ey mangatud as viyag. Nu kanaʼsna sey koonyu, siguraju ey amud sey ragsakku assey ag-agow ey ampuuliyén Cristu tey mipiila ey aji pun as nakeynga sey inayongku ya kiwaarku an dakayu.
50002017	At urey nu gongatunak ta sey darak sey kama as mivukvuk ey mijuga assey pammatiyu ey siya sey kama as datunyu an Apudyus, allaylayadak pey dallu ya maryadak ey angimvilley assey nauy ey ragsakku an dakayu losan.
50002018	Ya anungna vus an dakayu, masapur ey allaylayad kayu vus ey mikaragsak an sa'un.
50002019	Namnamauk ey aji pun as mabayag at ibaarku as Timothy ey umali assey iggowyu nu iparuvus sey Apu ta nu ampuuli, malaylaydanak ey mangngor assey miipanggop an dakayu.
50002020	Niippun ujum as mangimpaniyak an Timothy tey anggey siya as kama an sa'un ey aanmok assey vumaruwanyu.
50002021	Tey sey koon da ujum, sey vumaruwanda anggey sey sosomkonda ey dakumpun assey piun Jesu Cristu.
50002022	Kon miipanggop ey an Timothy, inagammuyu mit ey napaniknikan sey kinatalikna tey kama kani as man-ama ey nangkiwaar ey nangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag.
50002023	At sey kanak, nu ngan annun sey mibanagan sey kasuk, ipalibbatku siya ey umali an dakayu.
50002024	Ya namnamauk avus ey aji pun as mabayag at iparuvus sey Apu ey umaliyak mangila an dakayu.
50002025	Simsimmokku vus ey masapur ampuuliyuk as sunud taku ey Epaproditus ey imbaaryu ey kamaʼs pannakalong-agyu ey manurung an sa'un assey kasapurak. Siya sey vurunku ey anserservi ey kama as surdajun Cristu.
50002026	Amud sey inayuna an dakayu ya amud sey danagna assey naagammuwana ey jingngoryu ey nasakit siya.
50002027	Tuttuwa ey amud sey sakitna ey tigangeyna ikatuy kon kinadaguwan Apudyus siya. Kon dakumpun anggey as siya sey kinadaguwan Apudyus nu aji urey vus sa'un tey nu natuy, siguraju ey amud sey jujuuyku.
50002028	At siya sey aji atyén as mabayag ya ipalibbatku siya ey ampuuli assey iggowyu ta maragsakan kayu ey mangila kasin an siya ya tumarna sey somsomokku.
50002029	Allaylayad kayu ey amadatong an siya tey kanaʼsnaʼt sey koon ey mangindayow asda tagu ey manserservi assey Apu.
50002030	Impostana sey viyagna ya tigangeyna ikatuy sey nanserserviyana an Cristu. Kanaʼsna sey kingwana ey nanurung an sa'un as pannakalong-agyu.
50003001	Sey usa pey ey piuk ibaga an dakayu ey vuvurun, allaylayad kayu atyén gapu assey nijugaanyu assey Apu. Ajiyak pun mappug ey kasin mangingkur-it assey apporok insurat an dakayu assey keysan ey ag-agow tey siyana sey kamaʼs manaraknib an dakayu assey pammatiyu.
50003002	Masapur man-annad kayu asda lawingan ey tagu ey kamada as marangsit ey asu. Da nauy da tagu sey mangimpilit ey mangogod assey usa ey partin sey long-ag.
50003003	Kon assey katuttuwaan, jitaku sey ivilang Apudyus as tuttuwa ey nakugit ey dakumpun as jida tey jitaku sey andaydayow an Apudyus gapu assey turung sey Ispirituna ya allaylayad taku gapu assey nijugaan taku an Cristu Jesus. Dakumpun as kugit ya dasey lintog unnu ugalin da tagu sey intaku mantalikan.
50003004	Urey sa'un assey keysan ey ag-agow at nantalikak asda nauy ey imvilin sey lintog ji tagu. At nu awad mangimbaga ey awad kingwana unnu kavigvigana as misarakanana, sinjumalluwak.
50003005	Tey nakugitak assey mikawaru ey ag-agow. Niyanakak ey iyIsrael ey narpu assey ginanakan Benjamin at daran sey Hebrew sey man-ay-ayus assey long-agku at aji pun as nakamsan. Nu miipanggop avus assey mangunudan assey Lintogni ey Jews, sinjumallu sey kingwak ey nangunud tey usaak ey Farisis.
50003006	Miipanggop assey nangimpapatiyak ey mangwa assey kanak ey piun Apudyus, amud sey kingwak ey nanongpar tey pinalpaligatku dasey mamati an Jesus. At siya sey nu miibasar assey lintog, amud sey kinalintogku ya niippun mabalin as ipabasurda an sa'un.
50003007	Kon amin da nauy ey kanak ey kook as mangimvilangan Apudyus an sa'un, ivilangku as niippun servina assey sana ey timpu gapu an Cristu.
50003008	Tey assey katuttuwaan, nan-awidak sey kangamin ey anung da nauy tey nabarbalor sey mangigammuwak an Cristu Jesus ey Apuk. Gapu an siya, nan-awidak sey kangamin ey kama as basura ta mabalin ey unujuk as Cristu
50003009	ya mijugaak an siya. At ey sana, nambalinak as niyun-un ey dakumpun assey nangunudak assey lintog tey sey nambalinak as niyun-un at narpu an Apudyus gapu anggey assey pammatik an Cristu.
50003010	Sey gadtok ey piuk at maagammuwak ey ustu as Cristu ya piuk ey giknaun sey pannakabalin ey innatud Apudyus an siya assey kasinna nataguwan ya piuk ey mikalak-am assey natongtong-agana ya miivilangak ey kama as natuy ey anung sey natuyana
50003011	ta taguwunak vus kasin an Apudyus.
50003012	Ajik pun kanan ey nagun-udku amin da nauy unnu kanan ey niippun nangkurangak. Kon sey kook, iggak sey amin ey kaviilak ta magun-udku sey gun-guna tey siya nauy sey lapuna as namiliyan Cristu Jesus an sa'un ey mijuga an siya.
50003013	At dakayu ey susunud, tuttuwa ey daanku pun magun-ud da nauy, kon sey kook assey sana at aminuk liwatan dasey amin ey nakwa assey keysan ey ag-agow ta siya ipangugku sosomkon dasey makwa assey daan ey ag-agow.
50003014	At siya sey angiggaak assey amin ey kaviilak ey kama as mikaab-abbak assey tudtuddak ta maarak sey gun-guna ey atjun Apudyus asda amin ey inayagana ey mijuga an siya ad langit gapu an Cristu Jesus.
50003015	Kanaʼsji atyén sey somsomok taku losan, jitaku ey nat-ong sey pammatina. Kon nu awad sabali sey somsomokna, as Apudyus sey mangimpaagammu assey ustu an siya.
50003016	Kon urey nu ngadannaʼs nait sey somsomok da ujum, iturturuy taku ey mangunud assey tuttuwa ey luus taku inagammu.
50003017	Kanana atyén dakayu ey susunud ta masa'an sey somsomokyu losan ey mangunud an sa'un. Ya ilanyu avus sey kingwan dasey ujum ey nangunud assey impiilani ta siya sey unujunyu.
50003018	Nanginkinnu ey apporok imbaga an dakayu assey keysan ey ag-agow ey adjuwan dasey mangukuntra an Cristu ey laylaysunda sey natuyana assey krus gapu assey lawing ey koonda ey matagu. At anna ey alluruwaak assey sana ey kasin mangimbaga an dakayu.
50003019	Siguraju ey ad inférnu sey kapnonda tey nambalinunda sey pipiun sey long-agda as apudyusda. Ya siya at avus idayowda sey vumiinanda atyén ya niippun ujum as somsomkonda nu aji dasey miipanggop assey linuruta anna.
50003020	Kon an jitaku, ad langit sey ustu ey ili taku ya as jiyuy vus sey marpuwan sey uullayun taku ey manginsarakan an jitaku ey siya as Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku.
50003021	Baliwana sey kadagdagu ey long-ag taku anna ey mabalin matuy as ambaru ey long-ag ey anung sey long-agna assey ummuliyana. Ya mabalin ey koona ji tey awad sey pannakabalinna ya siyaji vus ey pannakabalin sey usaruna ta iturayana sey kangamin.
50004001	At iturturuyyu atyén ey mangintatakjug assey nijugaanyu assey Apu, dakayu ey susunud ey pipiuk. Dakayu sey iggawan sey inayuk ya apporow mangimpalaylayad an sa'un. Dakayu vus sey kama as gun-gunak assey nansiputak.
50004002	Anna sey ibagak an dakayu Euodia an Sintike, pangngaasiyu ta angkinnaawatan kayu tey miivilang kayu as mansunud gapu assey nijugaanyu assey Apu.
50004003	Ya sika vus ey matalik ey vurunku ey anserservi assey Apu, turungam atyén da vubai anna ta angkinnaawatanda tey ampawotda ey nikasiput an sa'un assey nangiwwarawagak assey Ambaru ey Damag. Nikasiputda avus anda Clement ya da ujum ey vurunku ey nansiput. Namin nilista sey ngadanda assey libnu ey nilistaan dasey awad viyagna as ing-inggana.
50004004	Allagragsak kayu ey kanayun gapu assey nijugaanyu assey Apu. Ikasinku ibaga, “Allagragsak kayu!”
50004005	Masapur man-iinnanus kayu losan tey tigangey sey umaliyan sey Apu.
50004006	Aji kayu madanagan assey kangamin kon assey amin ey kasasaadyu, iluwaruyu an Apudyus ey angkudow assey kasapuranyu ey ansaramat an siya.
50004007	Nu kanaʼsji sey koonyu, magiknayu sey tarnan sey somsomok ey marpu an Apudyus, tarna ey niippun miyisuwana. Ya assey amin ey liknayu ya somsomokyu at niippun madadailana gapu assey nijugaanyu an Cristu Jesus.
50004008	Sey piuk iyanungus ibaga an dakayu ey susunud at miipanggop as dasey kasapuran ey sosomkon taku. Masapur ey dasey katuttuwaan anggey sey igga taku assey somsomok taku ya dasey miivilang as nabalor. Ta sey aawwad assey somsomok taku at dasey nadarus ya dasey ivilang Apudyus as ustu ya dasey mangatud as lumin-awaan sey somsomok ya dasey ambabaru ey idayow da tagu.
50004009	Ya amin avus ey inadaryu an sa'un ey innilayu unnu jingngoryu, siyaji atyén sey unujunyu. Ya as Apudyus ey mamapanus assey somsomok taku, sissiya ey aawwad an dakayu.
50004010	Amud sey ragsakku assey nijugaak assey Apu tey assey ummayawan sey kam-ana ey ag-agow kasinyu impiila sey layadyu ey tummurung an sa'un. Ajik pun kanan ey naliwatanyu sa'un tey agammuk ey aji kayu pun naatdan as waya ey mangimpiila assey layadyu ey tumurung.
50004011	Ajik pun as ibaga nauy gapu ta kummurang sey kasapurak tey illuwamku ey ming-op assey urey ngadanna ey awad an sa'un.
50004012	Napadasak ey nangkurang ya nansubra as kasapuran. At urey nu ngadanna sey kasasaadku assey barangna ey uras, mamapsugak man unnu nuuuratak, allopyas man sey kasapurak unnu kumurang, impiingsak ey ming-op.
50004013	Kaviilak ey manganus assey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt gapu assey turung Cristu ey siya sey angatuatud assey kasdorku.
50004014	Kon patiguk sey kinaambaruyu ey tummurung an sa'un assey ligatku.
50004015	Dakayu ey iFilipay, agammuyu mit ey assey nanginsardak ey nangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag assey timpu ey lummibbatak assey provinsiya ad Macedonia ey umuy assey ujum ey ili, dakayu anggey sey tummuruturung an sa'un. Niippun ujum as vungguy da mamati as nangimpow-it assey turungda asda kasapurak, nu aji anggey kayu. At sey kingwayu sana, kama as nijuga kayu ey nikasiput an sa'un ey angatud as vumaruwan ya mangawat vus assey ambaru.
50004016	Urey assey iniiggawak ad Thessalonica, nanginkinnu kayu nampow-it as kasapurak.
50004017	Kon piuk ey ipaagammu an dakayu ey dakumpun assey apporoyu atjun sey anaanapuk nu aji sey umajuwan sey gun-gunayu.
50004018	At ey sana, wadawad sey kasapurak ya anna pey sey nasubra gapu ta inawatku dasey amin ey impow-ityu an Epaproditus. At dasey impow-ityu sana, mipanida as ambangu ey datunyu an Apudyus ey angatud as kapnikana ya allaylaydana.
50004019	At as Apudyus ey anserserviyak ey niippun maaminan sey kinabaknangna, siya sey mangatud assey amin ey kasapuranyu gapu assey nijugaanyu an Cristu Jesus.
50004020	Kanana atyén ta madayow as Apudyus ey Ama taku as ing-inggana. Amen.
50004021	Pakumustauk da amin ey tagun Apudyus as nait ey mamati an Cristu Jesus. Ya pakumustaun vus dakayu losan as dasey susunud taku ey awad as nauy.
50004022	Ya da amin ey mamati ey awad ad Rome anna, am-amud as dasey ansiput assey palasyun Emperor, pakumustaunda vus dakayu.
50004023	Kanana atyén ta atjun Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu sey vumaruwanyu losan.
51001001	Sa'un an Paul ey usa asda aposel Cristu Jesus gapu ta siya sey piniun Apudyus. Ya annaʼsna as Timothy ey vurunku ey usa vus ey sunud taku assey pammati.
51001002	Annaya sey suratni an dakayu ey tagun Apudyus ad Colosay ey matalik ey susunudni ey nijuga an Cristu. Kanana atyén ta atjun Apudyus ey Ama taku sey vumaruwan an dakayu losan.
51001003	Apporow kani mansaramat an Apudyus ey Aman Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu assey mangilluwaruwanni an dakayu
51001004	tey jingngorni sey miipanggop assey pammatiyu an Cristu Jesus ya sey layadyu asda amin ey tagun Apudyus.
51001005	Siyana sey awad an dakayu tey dokor sey namnamayu ey mangawat assey insasagganan Apudyus ad langit ey atjuna an dakayu. Jingngoryu nauy ey namnama assey ab-avusna assey nipaagammu an dakayu sey katuttuwaan ey tudtuju ey siya sey Ambaru ey Damag.
51001006	At sey Ambaru ey Damag sana ey jingngoryu at anjinjinamag assey luvung anna. Ya umaju ey umaju da apporow ambarbaliw ey mamati an Cristu ey anung sey nakwa an dakayu mallugi assey nangngoranyu ya nangagammuwanyu assey katuttuwaan miipanggop assey nakaskasdaow ey vinarun Apudyus.
51001007	Inadaryu nauy an Epapras ey pipiunni ya vurunni assey siput ey matalik ey manservi an Cristu ey siya sey kama as pannakalong-agni ey ummali assey iggowyu.
51001008	Ya siya sey nangul-ullit an dakani miipanggop assey innatud sey Ispiritu ey layadyu asda amin ey tagun Apudyus.
51001009	At nauy sey lapuna ey mallugi assey nangngoranni miipanggop an dakayu, kanayunni ey iluwaruwan dakayu ey angkudow an Apudyus ta sey Ispirituna, atdana dakayu as liing ya pannakaawat ta maagammuwanyu dasey amin ey piuna ey koonyu.
51001010	At nu kanaʼs ji, mabalin ey sey koonyu ey matagu at miyunud assey piun sey Apu ya makwayu sey mallaylaydana. Ya makwayu dasey nantokotokon ey ambabaru ey makwa ya majugjug-an sey agammuyu miipanggop an Apudyus.
51001011	Ya iluwaruni avus ta pakasdoron Apudyus sey somsomokyu gapu assey nakaskasdaow ey pannakabalinna ta urey nu ngan sey tongtong-ag ey jumatong an dakayu, aji kayu pun maabak tey mabalin ey naragsak kayu ey mangaanus
51001012	ya mabalinyu vus ey apporow mansaramat an Apudyus ey Ama ey siya sey nangatud assey karobbonganyu ey mikalaksun assey atjuna asda taguna ey mijuga assey appawey ey Tureyna.
51001013	Tey sinarakana jitaku assey pannakabalin Satanas ey manginturturey asda aggikbot sey somsomokna. At injugana jitaku assey manturayan sey pipiuna ey Anakna
51001014	tey gapu an siya sinubvut Apudyus jitaku ey siya sey napakawanan dasey basur taku as mawayaan taku.
51001015	As Cristu ey innilan da tagu sey itjurana, siya sey kiil-an sey kinaApudyus Apudyus ey aji pun miila. Aawwad siya assey daan pun makwa sey luvung ya siya sey kangangattuwan ey manginturey asda amin ey nakwa.
51001016	Tey gapu an siya, nakwa dasey amin ey awad ad langit ya assey luta, miila man unnu aji pun, mijuga dasey awad pannakabalinna ey aji pun miila ya dasey ap-apu ya dasey tuturey ey enjel ya da awad karobbongana. Ya nakwada vus pigey as para an siya.
51001017	Aawwad as Cristu asi at makwa dasey kangamin ya siya sey simviyang assey nuurnusanda as ajida pun masiwaran.
51001018	Siya sey kamaʼs uru ey mangimpapangat as dasey amin ey mamati ey mivilang as long-agna ya siya sey marpuwan sey viyagda. Siya sey namangu ey Anak ey ummuli assey natuyana at siya sey kangatuwan assey kangamin.
51001019	Tey inggoddong Apudyus ey amin ey kinaApudyusna at awad assey Anakna.
51001020	Ya inggoddong Apudyus ey kasin mipuuli an siya dasey kangamin gapu assey Anakna. Tey sey nivukvukan sey daran sey Anakna assey natuyana assey krus, siya sey nangaanna assey nanamnut assey kangamin ey awad assey luta ya ad langit ey kasin mipuuli an siya.
51001021	Urey dakayu assey dandani, nisisina kayu an Apudyus ya kavusurna dakayu gapu as dasey lawingan ey kookoonyu ya dasey awad assey somsomokyu.
51001022	Kon ey sana gapu assey natuyan Cristu ey anakna, nambalinun Apudyus dakayu as vub-urunna ta ambalin kayu as nadarus ya niippun akit as majumsikana ya niippun miipabasur an dakayu assey sinagungna.
51001023	Kon masapur ey anturturuy ey pumagdot sey pammatiyu an Cristu ey aji pun miwagot. Ajiyu paruvusan ey awad mangaan assey namnamayu ey inawatyu assey nangngoranyu assey Ambaru ey Damag. Nauy sey Ambaru ey Damag ey apporok iwarawarawag assey manserviyak an Cristu at nanjinjinamag asda amin ey tagu assey intiru ey luvung.
51001024	At ey sana, allaylayadak gapu as dasey matongtong-agak ey para an dakayu tey sey tongtong-agku anna at siya sey kama as manginyanungus assey tongtong-ag ey nilak-am Cristu ey para asda amin ey vungguy da mamati ey mipani assey long-agna.
51001025	Nambalinunak an Apudyus as baba'arun da amin ey mamati ya innatjuna an sa'un sey siput sana as vumaruwanyu ta aminuk ipaagammu ey ustu sey Gingan Apudyus an dakayu.
51001026	Sey tudtuju sana ey ipaagammuk at aji pun Apudyus impaagammu as dasey nan-orooros ey ginanakan assey kar-argow kon assey sana nipaagammu an jitaku ey taguna.
51001027	Nauy sey kingwan Apudyus, dakayu ey Gentil tey piuna ey maawatanyu sey niippun miyisuwana ya kadadayow ey panggopna. Nauy ey ajin pun Apudyus impaagammu assey kar-argow at siya sey milong-agan Cristu an dakayu, ey sey piuna ugujun, milak-am kayu assey ambaru ey viyag assey iggawan Apudyus.
51001028	At as Cristu ey apporoni iwarawag asda amin ey tagu, usarunni sey patinggan sey liingni ey innatud Apudyus ta amin ey nijuga an Cristu at matudtujuwanda ta jumgot sey pammatida ey niippun mangkurangana.
51001029	At sey kook, iggak sey kaviilak ta makakwaak asda nauy ey usaruk sey mandogot ey pannakabalin ey innatud Cristu an sa'un.
51002001	Piuk ey maagammuwanyu, dakayu ey susunud ey amud sey angokook ey mangkiwaar as para an dakayu ya anungna vus asda iLaodicea ya da amin ey daan pun mangila an sa'un.
51002002	Sey panggopku ey mangwaʼsna ta kumasdor atyén sey somsommokyu ya urey vus jida ta masa'an kayu losan ey manlilinnayad ya maatdan kayu as amud ey ragsak ey atjun sey ustuustu ey pannakaawat. At nu kanaʼsji, siguraju ey maawaawatanyu ey ustu sey aji pun Apudyus impaagammu assey kar-argow miipanggop an Cristu.
51002003	Tey siya anggey sey mangigammuwan taku assey amin ey kinariing ya somsomok Apudyus.
51002004	Sey mangimbag-ak asda nauy an dakayu ta aji kayu ampaallilow as dasey nangkariing ey guminga gapu assey makaawis ey angokoonda ey kama as tuttuwa.
51002005	Tey urey nu niippunak an dakayu sinat, sosomkok dakayu ya amud sey layadku tey agammuk ey mambaru sey angokoonyu ya mandogot sey pammatiyu an Cristu.
51002006	Assey sana ey tinuttuwayu ey as Cristu Jesus sey Apuyu gapu assey namatiyanyu, masapur ey iturturuyyu ey mangunud assey kaviviyag ey mitagop assey nijugaanyu an siya.
51002007	Iturturuyyu ey mangimpakasdor assey pammatiyu an Jesus ey kama as lummamut sey kayu ta pumagdot ya siya sey mangimpatakjuganyu assey somsomokyu ta kumasdor sey pammatiyu. Siyana sey nitudtuju an dakayu at masapur avus ey kanayun kayu ey mansaramat an siya.
51002008	Ilanyu ta aji kayu ampaalipan as dasey niippun servina ya makaallilow ey tudtuju. Tey sey kanaʼsji ey tudtuju at dakumpun an Cristu sey narpuwana nu aji ugali ey simsimmok da tagu assey kar-argow ya narpu as dasey inuugma ey vilvilin ya dasey liyawan ey anturturey assey luta anna.
51002009	Tey assey katuttuwaan, as Cristu sey nambalin as tagu kon awad an siya sey amin ey kinaApudyus Apudyus.
51002010	At ambaru sey mataguwan taku tey awad siya an jitaku ey niippun kurangna tey siya sey kangatuwan sey pannakabalinna asda amin ey awad pannakabalinna ey aji pun miila anda awad karobbongana.
51002011	Assey nijujug-anyu an Cristu, kama as nakugit kayu ey mangimpiila ey tagun Apudyus dakayu. Sey nakugitanyu at dakumpun as tagu sey nangwa nu aji as Cristu ey siya sey nangaan as dasey niilluvungan ey pipiun sey long-agyu.
51002012	Tey assey navunyaganyu, kama kayu as nijuga ey nilavun an Cristu ya nijuga kayu avus ey natagu assey kasinna nataguwan gapu assey pammatiyu assey pannakabalin Apudyus ey nanagu an siya assey natuyana.
51002013	Ya an dakayu ey Gentil, nivilang kayu ey nanattuy assey angiilan Apudyus gapu as dasey basuryu ya gapu assey ajiyu pun nangunudan assey Lintog, kama assey kugit.
