Kon assey sana, kama as tinagun Apudyus dakayu assey katuy ta ijugana dakayu an Cristu. Pinakawan Apudyus dasey amin ey basur taku
51002014	ey kama as innarana sey listaan sey nidaruman taku gapu assey aji taku pun nangunudan assey Lintog Moses at injugana illansa an Cristu assey krus.
51002015	At gapu assey natuyan Cristu assey krus, kinaan Apudyus sey pannakabalin dasey aji pun as miila ey turey anda awad karobbongana at kama as vinutvutna jida ey niippun aji nangila assey nangabakana an jida.
51002016	At siya sey ajiyu dongron sey ibagabagan dasey ujum ey masapur ey unujunyu dasey amud ey paniyawunda, kama asda paniyawunda ey makan anda miinum ya dasey ag-agow ey apporoda ngilinun assey tinawun ya sey lumuswaan sey sorag ya sey ag-agow ey iillongan.
51002017	Tey amin da nauy at kama anggey as anniniwan dasey makwa assey daan ey ag-agow ey sey itujuda at as Cristu ey mismu.
51002018	Ya ajiyu avus dongron dasey tagu ey mangimbaga ey nilasiyyan dakayu tey awad kanu da impiilan Apudyus an jida kon anna at ampaspas-umda ey mangimpippiila ey napakumbabada kanu pey ey mangimpapilit ey masapur kanu dayawunyu dasey enjel. Kon niippun lasunda ey ampaspas-um tey nauy ey kasomsomkanda at narpu anggey assey niluruta ey kasomsomkan.
51002019	Da nauy ey tagu at impug-anda ey mamangjun assey tudtujun Cristu ey pannakauru taku ya jitaku sey pannakalong-agna ey nan-ab-abtan dasey urat anda tong-ar. Ya as Cristu sey amakan assey long-agna ta jumakor ey mitagop assey piun Apudyus ey kadakorna.
51002020	Dakayu ey mamati, gapu assey nijugaanyu ey nikakatuy assey natuyan Cristu, nawayaan kayu as dasey minamaliyém ey kopya ya dasey liyawan ey anturturey assey luta anna. At nu nawayaan kayu, ngey payu pey dallu unujun dasey niluruta ey ugalin da tagu? Ngey payu dongron dasey vilvilin ey kama asda kanana ey;
51002021	“Ajiyu da ugnan sanna! Ajiyu da simsiman nait! Ajiyu da todkon nait!”
51002022	Amin da nauy at mamiidda nu maasda muusar tey da nauy ey minamaliyém ey kopya at narpu anggey assey kasomsomkan da tagu.
51002023	Tuttuwa aan ey kama as mambaru da nauy tey ipiilana ey naadanida an Apudyus ya ipiilana ey napakumbabada kanu pey ey mangunud assey ugalida ya assey mamaligatanda assey long-agda. Kon assey katuttuwaan, niippun kaviilan da nauy ey mangiyyatub assey lawingan ey somsomok ya sey pipiun sey long-ag.
51003001	At ey sana ey nijuga kayu an Cristu ey kasin natagu, masapur ey pasigyu sosomkon sey miipanggop assey viyag ad langit ey iggawan sey Tureyna ey nangatudan Apudyus an siya assey kangangattuwan ey saad ya karobbongan.
51003002	Dasey miipanggop atyén ad langit sey ikowyu sosomkon, dakumpun pun as dasey niluruta
51003003	tey miivilang kayu as natuy miipanggop assey sigud ey kaviviyagyu ya awad sey baru ey viyagyu gapu assey nijugaanyu an Cristu ey daan pun atgey miila tey nitatarpun an Apudyus ad langit.
51003004	At assey kasin ampiil-an Cristu ey siya sey iggawan sey ustu ey viyagyu, mijuga kayu vus an siya ey mipiila ya mijuga kayu vus ey sumiling assey kinadayowna.
51003005	Masapur ey ipog-anyu dasey lawingan ey niluruta ey koko'on da tagu ey kama asda mikadagdagas, kaviviin ey koko'on da laraki as vubai, sey amud ey layad ey mangwa asda jugannaʼt, sey maryadan ey mangwa asda lawingan ya sey man-agum tey sey kinaagum at mivilang as siyaji sey apudyusnu.
51003006	Tey jusaun Apudyus dasey aji pun mangngor an siya ey apporow mangwa asda jugan da nauy.
51003007	Assey kar-argow, siyana sey kingwayu ey natagu tey da nauy sey manginturturung assey viyagyu.
51003008	Kon ey sana, masapur ey aminunyu kaanun da nauy assey viyagyu, kama asda putuk, ummamdan ey gura, lawingan ey panggop asda vurun, guminga as kadadailan da ujum ya da guminga as kaggissow ey ginga.
51003009	Aji kayu an-iinnussat tey kinaanyu mit da nauy ey koko'onyu anda impiingsan sey long-agyu
51003010	ya kama as illumvunyu sey baru ey kopya. At as Apudyus ey nangatud asda nauy ey baru ey kopya, siya sey kanayun ey mangimpabaru an dakayu ta miyanung kayu an siya ya maagammuwanyu siya ey ustu.
51003011	At siya sey niippun nitoknan dasey Greek as dasey Jews, nakugit man unnu aji pun, dasey niippun adarna, dasey vunag, dasey kumakayow, alipan man unnu dakumpun, an-iisuda losan assey angiilan Apudyus tey as Cristu sey nabalor ey siya sey awad asda amin ey mamati.
51003012	Gapu ta dakayu sey tagun Apudyus ey pipiuna ya pinilina as mantataguna, da naya atyén dasey ugali ey unujunyu; kumakaddagu, ambaru ey koon asda vurun, napakumbaba, ambaru ey koon ey guminga ya man-iinnanus kayu ey amvuvurun.
51003013	Anusanyu dasey vurunyu ya ampipinnakawan kayu nu awad ji ajiyu angkikinnaawatan. Masapur ey ampipinnakawan kayu ey anung sey kingwan sey Apu ey namakawan an dakayu.
51003014	Kon sey kapapatigan ey koonyu atyén at sey manlilinnaydanyu tey siya sey tuttuwa ey mangatud as ustu ey masa'ananyu ey niippun mankurangana.
51003015	At sey urnus ey innatud Cristu an dakayu, siya atyén sey kanayun ey mamangjun assey somsomokyu tey siyana sey gapuna ey pinilin Apudyus dakayu ta ambalin kayu as sa'an ey long-ag an Cristu. Kanayun atyén ey mansaramat kayu an Apudyus.
51003016	Ya mimumura atyén assey somsomokyu dasey nabalor ey intudtujun Cristu. Ya mantitinnudtuju kayu ya mantitinnugun kayu ey mangusar assey liing ey innatud Apudyus an dakayu. Ikantayu an Apudyus dasey Psalms ya dasey Gingana ey niigga assey kankanta ya dasey ujum ey kankantan dasey mamati ey pasig kayu mansaramat assey somsomokyu.
51003017	Ya assey amin ey ugujunyu unnu koonyu, koonyu jiyuy gapu assey nijugaanyu an Apu Jesus ya assey mangwaanyu asda nauy, mansaramat kayu an Apudyus ey Ama taku gapu an siya.
51003018	Dakayu ey vubai, masapur ey ampaiturey kayu as dasey asawayu tey siyana sey ustu ey koon sey mamati assey Apu.
51003019	Ya dakayu avus ey laraki, masapur ey pipiunyu sey asawayu ya ajiyu ivugtak ey guminga an jida.
51003020	Dakayu avus ey aanak, masapur ey dongronyu dasey ummanak an dakayu tey siyanaʼt sey piun Apudyus ey koonyu.
51003021	Dakayu ey aama, now-anyu ey angingor asda anakyu ta ajida ngumaya.
51003022	Dakayu ey alipan, masapur ey dongronyu sey amin ey ibagan sey apuyu. Dakumpun gey as inggana ajugan dakayu asiyu at koon dasey siputyu ta malaylaydanda an dakayu nu aji koonyu ey sipupusu sey siputyu gapu ta ikaviinyu sey Apu.
51003023	At assey amin ey koonyu, masapur ey allaylayad kayu ey mangwa ey kama as Cristu sey singkuwa ey dakumpun as tagu.
51003024	Masapur sosomkonyu ey atjun sey Apu an dakayu sey gun-guna ey impostana as dasey taguna tey as Cristu sey tuttuwa ey Apu ey manserserviyanyu.
51003025	Kon nu awad mangwa as lawingan, awad avus sey jusa ey supapak sey kingwana tey an-iisu sey koon Apudyus ey man-uwis ey niippun toktoknona.
51004001	Dakayu avus ey apun dasey alipan, masapur ey ustu ya ambaru sey koonyu an jida. Masapur sosomkonyu ey awad sey Apuyu ad langit.
51004002	Ipapatiyu ey alluwaru ya assey alluwaruwanyu, masapur ey agammuyu nu ngan sey ibagabagayu an Apudyus ya da kayu mansaramat an siya.
51004003	Ya ilanyu ta iluwaruwanyu avus dakani ta atdan Apudyus dakani as waya ey mangiwwarawag assey aji pun nipaagammu ey gingana miipanggop an Cristu tey siya mit sey lapuna nu paak anna assey baballudan.
51004004	Iluwaruwanyu vus sa'un ta allasu as maawatan da tagu sey itudtujuk an jida.
51004005	Ammaanyu sey koonyu asda aji pun mamati ta aji keynga sey naatud ey wayayu ey mangimbaga an jida assey miipanggop an Cristu.
51004006	Ya ilanyu ta sey koonyu ey guminga at sey mangimpalaylayad ya awad iturungna asda andongor ya agammuwunyu sey ustu ey ibagayu nu awad imusunda an dakayu.
51004007	As Tikicus sey mangimpaagammu an dakayu as dasey amin ey makwamakwa an sa'un. Siya sey usa ey napatig ya matalik ey manservi assey Apu.
51004008	At siya mangimbaarak ta ipaagammuna nu ngan annunni ey anna as nauy ta awad allaylaydanyu.
51004009	Mivurun as Onesimus an siya ey kailiyanyu ey matalik ya pipiunni ey sunud taku assey pammati. Jida sey mangul-ullit an dakayu assey amin ey makwamakwa as nauy.
51004010	As Aristarcus ey vurunku ey barud as nauy ya as Mark ey kapingsan Barnabas, pakumustaunda dakayu. (Impaagammuk mit an dakayu sey miipanggop an Mark, at nu jumatong sinaʼt, ambaruwunyu ey amadatong an siya.)
51004011	Pakumustaun vus dakayu an Jesus ey nangadanan as Justus. Asda amin ey Jews ey mamati ey annaʼsna, anggey da turu sana as apporow tumurung an sa'un ey mansiput miipanggop assey Turey Apudyus. Amud aan sey turungda an sa'un.
51004012	As Epapras vus ey usa ey kailiyanyu ey manserservi an Jesus at pakumustauna avus dakayu. Kanayun ey ipapatina ey mangilluwaru an dakayu ta jumngor ya mat-ong sey pammatiyu ya niippun manjuwajuwaanyu ey mangunud assey amin ey piun Apudyus.
51004013	Takjugak sey kinapawotna ey mansiput as para an dakayu ya para avus as dasey mamati ad Laodicea ya Hierapolis.
51004014	Ya urey as Doctor Luke ey pipiun taku ya as Demas at pakumustaunda avus dakayu.
51004015	Ibagayu vus as dasey susunud taku ey mamati ad Laodicea ey pakpakumustauk jida ya kama avus an Nympha ya dasey mamati ey apporow madagup ey mandayow an Apudyus assey vuruyna.
51004016	Nu maasyu ey basaun nauy ey suratku, ipow-ityu vus as dasey vungguy da mamati ad Laodicea ta basaunda pey. Ya aranyu vus sey suratku an jida ta basaunyu vus sinaʼt ad Colosay.
51004017	Ya usa pey, ibagayu an Archipus ta koona sey siputna ey impaviyang sey Apu an siya.
51004018	Sa'un an Paul sey mismu ey nangingkur-it assey kapungpungan sey surat anna. Ajiyu atyén maliwatan sa'un ey anna assey baballudan. Kanana atyén ta ambaru sey koon Apudyus an dakayu losan.
52001001	Sa'un an Paul ya anna vus da Silas an Timothy ey vurunku. Annaya sey suratni an dakayu ey mamati ad Tesalonica ey mivilang as tagun Ama taku ey Apudyus ya as Apu Jesu Cristu. Kanana atyén ta iturturuy Apudyus ey mangatud as vumaruwan ya tumarnaan sey somsomokyu losan.
52001002	Assey amin ey malluwaruwanni, apporow kani mansaramat an Apudyus gapu an dakayu losan ya kanayun ey ijugani dakayu assey luwaruni
52001003	an Ama taku ey Apudyus tey sosomkonni dasey kookoonyu gapu assey pammatiyu an siya. Sosomkonni vus sey pawotyu ey manservi an Apudyus gapu assey layadyu asda ujum ey mamati ya sey niippun juwajuwayu ey annamnama assey ampuuliyén Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
52001004	Dakayu ey susunudni ey pipiun Apudyus, agammuni ey pinipilin Apudyus dakayu.
52001005	Sey nangigammuwanni at assey nangintudtujuwanni assey Ambaru ey Damag an dakayu. Tey dakumpun anggey asda apporoni imbaga sey jingngoryu nu aji gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus. At niippun juwajuwana ey nipiila an dakayu sey kinatuttuwan sey Ambaru ey Damag. Ya innilayu vus assey nangokoonni ey matagu assey iniiggawanni an dakayu at para assey vumaruwanyu.
52001006	At siya nangatdan sey Ispiritun Apudyus assey layadyu ey nangngor asda tudtujuni urey nu amud sey natongtong-aganyu gapu assey namatiyanyu. At sey kanaʼsna ey kingwayu, niyanung kayu an dakani ya assey Apu.
52001007	At siyana sey lapuna ey dakayu sey nansarmingan dasey amin ey mamati assey provinsiyan sey Macedonia ya Acaia.
52001008	At ey sana, dakumpun anggey as niwaras sey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop an Apu Jesus asda amin ey vubruy ad Macedonia ya Acaia nu aji nanjinamag urey asda adjuwan ey vubruy sey miipanggop assey pammatiyu an Apudyus. At siya sey lapuna ey niippun makananni an dakayu
52001009	tey jida ey mismu sey mangul-ullit an dakani asda ambaru ey kingwayu ey namadatong an dakani ya ngan annunyu ey nangimpug-an asda ap-apudyus ta as Apudyus ey matatagu ya katuttuwaan sey manserviyanyu.
52001010	Imbagada avus an dakani sey manguullayanyu assey ampuuliyén sey Anakna ey marpu ad langit ey siya as Jesu Cristu ey natuy kon tinagun Apudyus. Sey Anakna anna sey manginsarakan an jitaku assey jumatngan sey kagguugyat ey timpu ey manusaan Apudyus asda amin ey tagu ey aji pun mamati.
52002001	Agammuyu vus dakayu ey susunud ey dakumpun as niippun servin sey ummaliyanni assey vubruyyu.
52002002	Ya jingngoryu avus sey nakwa an dakani assey vubruy ad Filipay ey natongtong-agan ya nivibviinanni, asi kani at umali assey iggowyu. Ya urey nu amud avus dasey gummura an dakani assey vubruyyu, innatud pey dallu Apudyus an dakani sey turud ey nangintudtuju assey Ambaru ey Damag ey narpu an siya.
52002003	Tey assey mangawisanni an dakayu ey mantalik an Apudyus at dakumpun as kinumbot unnu awad lawingan as panggopni unnu ingkani gey lawa bab-aliyan da tagu
52002004	nu aji siya anggey koonni sey piun Apudyus tey imvilangna dakani as matalik ey mangintudtuju assey Ambaru ey Damag. Ya dakumpun as maryadan da tagu sey ingkani anapun nu aji sey piun Apudyus tey siya anggey sey nangigammu assey gadtok ey awad assey somsomokni.
52002005	Agammuyu avus ey assey iniggawanni an dakayu, ajini pun inusar dasey makaawis ey ginga as amab-alini an dakayu unnu allingubni assey kinaagum. As Apudyus sey manakjug an dakani.
52002006	Dakumpun assey mangidayawanyu an dakani unnu mangindayawan da ujum ey tagu an dakani sey ingkani anapun.
52002007	At urey awad kalintoganni ey marispitu gapu assey kinaaposelni an Cristu, dakumpun as siyanaʼt sey agabanni. Kon siya kingwani sey nanganuanus ey anung sey ampaspasusu ey ina ey amuut asda anakna.
52002008	At gapu assey amud ey layadni an dakayu, dakumpun anggey assey Ambaru ey Damag ey narpu an Apudyus sey intudtujuni an dakayu nu aji kingwani sey kaviilanni ey nanurung an dakayu tey amud sey layadni an dakayu.
52002009	Dakayu ey susunud, siguraju ey ajiyu pun naliwatan sey kingwani ey nansiput assey iniggawanni an dakayu assey nangintudtujuwanni assey Ambaru ey Damag ey narpu an Apudyus. Tey inag-agow ya nilavi ey nangkiwaar kani ta awad mangar-anni as ikataguni tey sumanga kani nu gapu gey lawa an dakani ya awad maligatan an dakayu ey mangillalagum an dakani.
52002010	Innilayu ya agammun vus Apudyus sey nakopyaanni an dakayu ey mamati sinat. Nadarus ya nalintog sey kingwani ey niippun najumsikanni an dakayu.
52002011	Agammuyu avus ey sey kingwani assey usausa an dakayu at miyanung assey koon sey ama asda anakna.
52002012	Pinakasdorni sey somsomokyu ya tinugutugunni anda vinilivilinni dakayu ta sey koonyu ey matagu at mitagop assey piun Apudyus ey nangayag an dakayu ey mijuga assey tureyna ya assey vinaruna.
52002013	Apporow kani vus ampasaramat an Apudyus tey assey nangimpadngoranni assey gingana an dakayu, jingngoryu ya pinatiyu jiyuy as tuttuwa ey Gingan Apudyus ey dakumpun as tinatagu ey tudtuju. At sey Gingan Apudyus sana sey anturturuy ey mangatub asda viyagyu ey mamati an Cristu Jesus.
52002014	At dasey nakwa an dakayu, susunud ey mamati, anung vus sey nakwa asda tagun Apudyus ey mamati an Jesu Cristu assey provinsiya ad Judea. Tey tinongtong-ag dakayu asda kailiyanyu ey anung dasey mamati ad Judea ey tinongtong-ag vus dasey kailiyanda ey Jews jida.
52002015	Jida ey Jews sey nangngat an Apu Jesus ya da ujum ey profet assey kar-argow ya jida vus dasey nanongtong-ag an dakani. Sey kookoonda anna at vumusur assey piun Apudyus ya nambalinda as kavusur da amin ey tagu.
52002016	Ya pinadasda ey nangimpaginok an dakani ey mantudtuju as dasey Gentil, tudtuju ey manginsarakan atyén an jida. Siyana sey apporoda koon ey manugjuga assey basurda inggana as umajuaju. Kon assey sana jummatong sey manusaan Apudyus an jida.
52002017	Nanipud gey assey sin-akitan ey nansisinaan taku, dakayu ey susunud, amud sey inayuni an dakayu. Tuttuwa ey aawwad kayu assey somsomokni at urey nu nan-asiadayu taku, padasunni assey kaviilanni ey ampuuli sinat ta kasin taku atyén man-asiila
52002018	tey gadtok ey piunni mangila an dakayu, am-amud an sa'un ey Paul. At nanginkinnu ey pinadasku umali kon pasig Satanas tipodon dakani.
52002019	Sey lapuna nu pa lawa amud sey inayuni ey mangila an dakayu at gapu ta dakayu sey iggawan sey ragsakni, namnamani ya midayawanni assey sumanguwanni an Apu taku ey Jesus assey umaliyana kasin.
52002020	Tuttuwa ey dakayu sey idayowni ya iggawan sey layadni!
52003001	At gapu ta aji kani pun makaattum assey amud ey inayuni an dakayu, nan-uugudanni ey urey pey lawa mateynan kani an Silas ad Athens,
52003002	at vinaarni as Timothy ey umali mangila an dakayu. Siya sey vurunni ey manserservi an Apudyus ya vurunni ey mangiwwarawarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Cristu. Imbaarni ta umali ey manurung ya mangimpakasdor assey pammatiyu
52003003	ta niippun atyén pumug-an assey pammatina an dakayu gapu asda tongtong-ag ey makmakwa. Kon agammuyu ey jumatong dallu sey matongtong-agan taku
52003004	tey assey iniiggawanni an dakayu, impapaddaanni ey jumatong dallu sey matongtong-agan taku gapu assey pammati. At ey sana inagammuyu tey anna tuttuwa ey makwa an jitaku.
52003005	At siyana sey lapun sey nangimbaarak an Timothy sinat tey piuk agammuwun nu sissiya ey mangkasdor sey pammatiyu tey ajik pun maanusan ey manguulley assey damag miipanggop an dakayu ya madadannaganak tey oni at lawa ya awad awisun Satanas an dakayu. Tey nu siyaji, keynga at lawa sey inayongni ey nantudtuju an dakayu.
52003006	Kon ey sana, ambaru tey anna as Timothy ey nampuuli at impadamagna ey sissiya ey mangkasdor sey pammatiyu ya layadyu an Apudyus ya asda vurunyu. Imbagana vus ey sosomkonyu ya piunyu dakani ilan ey anung vus sey layadni ey mangila an dakayu.
52003007	At gapu assey impadamag Timothy anna, kummasdor sey somsomokni. At urey nu amud sey ligatni ya inggow dasey apporow manongtong-ag an dakani, vummaru sey somsomokni tey sissiya ey mangkasdor sey pammatiyu.
52003008	At vummaru sey man-ang-angsanni tey sissiya sey kasdor sey pammatiyu assey Apu.
52003009	At ey sana, niippun mipaniyan sey saramatni an Apudyus nu malluwaru kani gapu assey amud ey ragsakni an dakayu.
52003010	Inag-agow ya nilavi ey apporow kani malluwaluwaru an Apudyus ta man-asiila taku atyén kasin ta pakasdoronni ikow sey pammatiyu.
52003011	Kanan atyén Ama taku ey Apudyus ya as Apu Jesus ta iyarawasna sey timpu ey kasin taku man-asiila
52003012	ya jugjug-an sey Apu sey layadyu asda susunudyu ya asda amin ey tagu ey anung sey layadni an dakayu.
52003013	Ta nu kanaʼs ji sey koona ey mangimpakasdor assey somsomokyu, niippun vumasuranyu ya nadarus kayu assey sinagung Apudyus ey Ama taku assey timpu ey ampuuliyén Apu taku ey Jesus ey manguyug asda amin ey mijuga an siya.
52004001	At kanaʼsji, dakayu ey susunud, inadaryu an dakani sey koon taku ey matagu ta mallaylayad as Apudyus. At siya vus pigey sey apporoyu koon. At ey sana, gapu assey karobbongan ey innatud Apu Jesus, ampangpangaasi kani ya itugunni an dakayu ta ambaruwonyu ikow sey ugaliyu sana.
52004002	Tey agammuyu mit dasey imvilinni an dakayu ey impiyar Apu Jesus ey imbagani an dakayu.
52004003	Sey piun Apudyus at ambalin kayu as nadarus ey taguna. At masapur ey aji kayu midor-ag assey dakumpun as asawayu.
52004004	Ya dakayu avus ey laraki, masapur ey agammuyu sey koonyu ey mangasawa as midayawan Apudyus ta niippun kaviviin as makwa.
52004005	Ya dakumpun atyén assey pipiun sey long-agyu sey apporoyu koon ey anung sey koko'on dasey aji pun nangigammu an Apudyus.
52004006	At nu miipanggop as nauy, niippun atyén manilib assey vurunna ey mamati as an akil-ana ey manor-agan assey asawan sey vurunna. Tey impapaddaanni imbaga an dakayu assey kar-argow ey jusaun Apudyus da amin ey mangwa as jugannaʼt.
52004007	Tey sey namiliyan Apudyus an jitaku at ambalinuna as nadarus sey kaviviyag taku ey dakumpun as mangwaan asda kaggissow ey makwa.
52004008	At sey tagu ey mangontra assey tudtuju sana, at dakumpun as tagu sey kinuntrana nu aji as Apudyus ey nangatud assey Ispirituna an dakayu.
52004009	Nu miipanggop assey layadyu asda vurunyu ey mamati, aji pun kasapuran ey isuratni an dakayu tey naas Apudyus intudtuju nu ngan annunyu ey manlilinnayad.
52004010	At assey katuttuwaan, siyana mit sey apporoyu koon asda susunud taku ey awad assey amin ey vubruy ad Macedonia. At sey ibagani anggey an dakayu ey susunud, jugjug-anyu sey koonyu ey maryad an jida.
52004011	Ya iggayu vus sey kaviilanyu ey mikakarubvun ta niippun atyén lawing as makwa. Aji kayu mikaviviyang asda siput da ujum nu aji ampawotonyu at ey mansiput ta awad mangar-anyu as ikataguyu tey nauy sey apporoni imvilin an dakayu assey kar-argow.
52004012	Tey nu kookoonyu da nauy, rispituwun dakayu as dasey aji pun mamati ya aji kayu as kumdowkumdow as kasapuranyu asda ujum.
52004013	At ey sana, piunni ey maagammuwanyu sey katuttuwaan, dakayu ey susunud, miipanggop asda nangkakatuy ey mamati ta aji kayu ikow manjujuuy ey anung da niippun namnamada an Apudyus.
52004014	Patiyun taku mit ey as Jesus at natuy kon kasin natagu, at siya sey lapuna ey patiyun taku vus ey kasin Apudyus taguwun dasey natuy ey mamati an siya ta mijugada an Jesus assey ampuuliyana.
52004015	Annaya sey intudtujun sey Apu ey ipaagammuni an dakayu. Jitaku ey sissiya ey natattagu assey ag-agow ey umaliyan Apu Jesus at aji taku pun amangpangu ey umuy mangabot an siya nu dasey nangkakatuy.
52004016	Kanaʼs sanna sey makwa; Assey ustu ey timpu ey vumabaan Apu Jesus ey marpu ad langit, awad sey ivuggan Apudyus ey vilin ya migisan guminga sey pangat dasey enjel ya madngor vus sey trompetan Apudyus. Assey timpu saji, amangu matagu dasey nangkakatuy ey namati an Cristu.
52004017	At an jitaku ey natattagu assey timpu saji, mivurun taku mijuga an jida ey mipangatu assey livuu ey umuy miyabot an Apu Jesus ta mikig-ow taku an siya as ing-inggana.
52004018	At nauy sey apporoyu ul-ullitun ta masas-alliwa kayu.
52005001	Miipanggop ey as dasey timpu ey makwaan da nauy, dakayu ey susunud, aji pun as kasapuran ey awad isuratni an dakayu,
52005002	tey aaggammuyu ey sey Ag-agow ey umaliyan sey Apu at anungna sey man-akow assey lavi ey aji pun maagammuwan sey umaliyana.
52005003	Asda nauy ey timpu, sey kanan da tagu at angginnong sey viyagda ya niippun andanaganda, kon makornatan jumatong sey majusaanda ey anung sey manggamut ey vubai assey umanakana. At niippun kasin da tagu koon ey mangillasat assey jusa sana.
52005004	Kon an dakayu ey susunud, dakumpun as aggikbot sey iggowyu at siguraju ey aji kayu pun makugwey assey jumatngan nauy ey ag-agow ey kamaʼs umaliyan sey man-aakow.
52005005	Tey jitaku ey mamati an Jesus at sinilawan Apudyus sey somsomok taku. At dakumpun as lavi ey aggikbot sey iniiggawan taku nu aji awad taku assey ag-agow ey appawey.
52005006	At aji taku unujun sey koko'on dasey ujum ey aji pun mamati ey kamada as nasusuyup nu aji masapur ey mansasaggana taku ya attuman sey pipiun sey long-ag.
52005007	Tey lavi sey masuyupan da tagu ya lavi vus sey mavuukanda.
52005008	Kon an jitaku, awad taku assey ag-agow. At masapur attuman sey pipiun sey long-ag taku. Ya sey pammati an Apu Jesus ya sey layad taku asda ujum ey tagu sey kama as karasag taku. Ya sey namnama taku ey sinasarrakan jitaku an Apudyus at siya sey kama as helmet taku.
52005009	Tey dakumpun as pinilin Apudyus jitaku ta jusauna nu aji pinilina jitaku as isarakana gapu an Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu
52005010	ey natuy gapu an jitaku ta urey nu nanattuy sey long-ag taku assey ampuuliyana unnu sissiya ey matattagu, mabalin pey dallu ey mijuga taku matagu an siya.
52005011	At siya sey ituruturuyyu sey kookoonyu ey man-asisas-alliwa ya mantitinnurung ey mangimpakasdor assey pammatiyu.
52005012	Sey ipakpakaasini an dakayu ey susunud, masapur rispituwunyu ey ustu dasey mangimpapati ey mangintudtuju an dakayu miipanggop an Apudyus tey jida sey mangimpapangat ya apporow manugun an dakayu assey mangunudanyu an Apu Jesus.
52005013	Ipatigyu atyén jida ya ipiilayu sey layadyu gapu asda siputda. Ya ilanyu ta masapur angginnong kayu losan ey matagu asda karubvunyu.
52005014	Ya sey ipakpakaasini an dakayu ey susunud, bagbagaanyu dasey tukar ya pakasdoronyu sey somsomok dasey majisjismaya ya ammaanyu turungan dasey nakapuy sey pammatina ya anusanyu da amin ey tagu.
52005015	Ya nu awad mangwa as lawingan an dakayu, ilanyu ta aji kayu vumarus nu aji siya kanayun ey koonyu sey mangwa as ambaru as dasey vurunyu ya asda amin ey tagu.
52005016	Masapur ey kanayun kayu naragsak.
52005017	Ya masapur ey kanayun kayu avus malluwaru.
52005018	Ya urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey makwa an dakayu, mansaramat kayu an Apudyus tey siyana sey piun Apudyus ey koon dasey nijujugga an Cristu Jesus.
52005019	Ya ajiyu tipodon sey piun sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey ipabaga an dakayu.
52005020	Ya ajiyu avus jumsikun sey impaagammun sey Ispiritun Apudyus asda profet.
52005021	Kon masapur paniknikanyu sey amin ey ibagada ta maagammuwanyu nu tuttuwa ey narpu an Apudyus. Ya unujunyu dasey ambabaru ey tudtuju
52005022	ya man-awidanyu dasey amin ey lawing ey nakopyaan da tagu.
52005023	Kanana atyén ta as Apudyus ey marpuwan sey angginnong ey somsomok, ambalinuna dakayu as ikow nadarus ey taguna. Ya kanana atyén vus ta pabaruwuna dasey somsomokyu, viyagyu ya dasey long-agyu ta niippun mipabasur an dakayu assey ampuuliyén Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
52005024	At koon Apudyus da nauy tey siya sey namili an dakayu ya matalik ey mangwa asda imbagana.
52005025	At dakayu ey susunud, iluwaruwanyu pey dakani.
52005026	Ya pakumustaunyu losan dasey susunud taku ey mamati as nait gapu ta mansusunud taku an Apu Jesus.
52005027	Ya gapu assey karobbongak ey narpu an Apu Jesus, ivilinku an dakayu ta ibasayu nauy ey suratku asda amin ey susunud taku sinaʼt.
52005028	Kanana atyén ta ambaru sey koon Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu an dakayu losan.
53001001	Sa'un an Paul ya anna da Silas an Timothy ey vurunku. Annaya sey suratni an dakayu ey mamati ad Tesalonica ey miivilang as tagun Ama taku ey Apudyus ya as Apu Jesu Cristu.
53001002	Kanana atyén ta ituruturuy Ama taku ey Apudyus ya as Apu Jesu Cristu ey mangatud as vumaruwan ya tumarnaanyu losan.
53001003	Niippun kasinni koon nu aji kanayun ey mansaramat an Apudyus gapu an dakayu ey susunud tey kummasdor sey pammatiyu ya kama vus assey koonyu ey manlilinnayad.
53001004	At apporoni dakayu idayow asda mamati an Apudyus assey amin ey ili ey ayanni tey urey nu amud sey tongtong-ag ey apporoyu lak-amun gapu assey namatiyanyu, anuanusanyu pey dallu ya ipapangugyu sey pammatiyu an Jesu Cristu.
53001005	Kon dasey makwamakwa anna an dakayu sey mangimpiila assey ustu ey koon Apudyus ey manguwis asda amin ey tagu. Tey siyana sey koon Apudyus ey manginsagana an dakayu ta ambalin kayu as awad karobbongana ey mijuga assey tureyna. Siyana sey lapun sey apporoyu matongtong-agan.
53001006	Ustu sey koon Apudyus ey man-uwis at tongtong-aguna vus dasey nanongtong-ag an dakayu
53001007	ya man-illongona dakayu as dasey tongtong-agyu ya kama vus an dakani. Siyana sey koon Apudyus assey kasin Apu Jesus umaliyan ey marpu ad langit. Umali siya ya mivurun dasey mannakabalin ey enjelna
53001008	ya awad sey gumilgillajung ey apuy assey liwusna. Umali ey manusa asda sumanga an Apudyus ya asda aji pun mangngor assey Ambaru ey Damag miipanggop an Jesus ey Apu taku.
53001009	Majusada as ing-inggana ey niippun miyisuwana ya misinada assey nakaskasdaow ey pannakabalinna.
53001010	Kon asda amin ey taguna, dayawunda siya assey Ag-agow ey ampuuliyana ey niippun miyisuwan sey vinarun sey madayawana. Ya an dakayu avus, mijuga kayu assey siyaji ey timpu tey pinatiyu sey Gingan Apudyus ey intudtujuni.
53001011	At kanayun ey iluwaruwanni dakayu ta ambalinun Apudyus dakayu as taguna ta koonyu sey piuna ya miyunud sey ugaliyu assey panggopna ey namili an dakayu. Kanana atyén ta turungan dakayu assey pannakabalinna ta makwayu dasey amin ey ambaru ya makwayu vus dasey piunyu koon gapu assey pammatiyu.
53001012	At nu kanaʼs ji, madayow as Apu Jesus gapu assey kingwana an dakayu ya idayow dakayu avus an siya. Makwa amin da nauy gapu assey kinaambarun Apudyus ya as Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku.
53002001	Anna sey piunni ibaga an dakayu ey susunud miipanggop assey ampuuliyén Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu ya assey madagupan taku ey mijuga an siya. Ampangpangaasi kani
53002002	ta aji atyén allasu as makalivussu sey somsomokyu unnu madadannagan as dasey apporoda ibaga ey awad kanu sey impapaddaanni ya iwwarawagni unnu insuratni ey naas ogon inumdas sey Ag-agow ey nampuuliyén sey Apu.
53002003	Urey nu ngan sey imbagabagada, aji kayu ampaallilow assey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu. Tey aji pun as maggey umdas sey ag-agow saji ey ampuuliyén Jesus nu daan umdas sey vumusuran da tagu an Apudyus. Lumuswa vus sey Amud sey Kinarwingna ey nagoddongan ey majusa ad inférnu.
53002004	Gurauna dasey amin ey ap-apudyus ya dasey amin ey daydayawun da tagu. Ambalinuna sey long-agna as kangatuwan asda amin asi at umuy tumukju assey Tempél Apudyus ya ipaagammuna ey siya sey mismu ey Apudyus.
53002005	Sigurajuwak ey ajiyu pun naliwatan da nauy tey nanginkinnuwuk imbaga an dakayu assey iniiggawak sinat.
53002006	Ya agammuyu avus nu ngan sey manitippod an siya ta aji ampiila inggana as jumatong sey ustu ey timpu ey inggoddong Apudyus.
53002007	Kon urey nu daan pun lumuswa siya assey sana, luus nisarad sey lawing ey kookoona, kon ajin pun da tagu madlow. Ya aji pun mabalin ey lumuswa inggana as makaan sey manitippod an siya.
53002008	At nu makaan sey manitippod an siya, lumuswa sey vumuvusur saji. Kon urey anggey assey manap-uyan Jesus an siya at matuy tey assey sumilingan Jesus assey amparangana, nauy sey mangabakna an siya.
53002009	At nu lumuswa sey vumuvusur saji, awad an siya sey pannakabalin Satanas ey mangimpiila as dasey nantokotokon ey kaskasdaow ya sinyar ta allilawuna da tagu.
53002010	Amin dasey lawingan at usaruna ey mangallilow asda tagu ey nagoddongan ey majusa. Majusada tey sumangada ey mangimpatig ya mamati assey katuttuwaan ey siya atyén sey misarakananda.
53002011	At iparuvus Apudyus sey maallilawan sey somsomokda ta patiyunda dasey inuussat ey ibagabagan sey vumuvusur sana,
53002012	asida at magoddongan ey majusa tey ajida pun pinati sey tuttuwa nu aji siya at avus allaylaydanda dasey lawing ey kookoonda.
53002013	Kon apporow kani mansaramat an Apudyus gapu an dakayu ey susunud ey pipiun Apudyus tey assey daan pun sey luvung makwa, pinipilin Apudyus dakayu ey misarakan gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispirituna ey nangwa as kadarusanyu ya gapu assey pammatiyu assey katuttuwaan.
53002014	Nambalinun Apudyus dakayu as misarakan gapu assey Ambaru ey Damag ey iwwarawagni ta mijuga kayu ey midayow assey midayawan Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
53002015	At an dakayu ey susunud, tornonyu ey manginturuy assey pammatiyu ya tornonyu ey mangunud assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju ey iwwarawagni ya insuratni.
53002016	At ey sana, kanana atyén ta as Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu ya as Apudyus ey Ama taku sey mangimpakasdor assey somsomokyu ya manuturung an dakayu ta koonyu dasey ambabaru ey makwa anda igingayu dasey ambabaru ey muugud. Tey as Apudyus pipiuna jitaku ya gapu assey kinaambaruna, aji pun mappug ey mangatuatud as kumasdoran sey somsomok taku ya assey pumagdotan sey namnama taku.
53003001	Sey anungus sey ibagani an dakayu susunud, iluwaruwanyu atyén dakani ta mapgus sey miwarawagan sey Gingan Apu Jesus asda kikkiili ya mamati dasey mandongor ey anung sey kingwayu ey namati.
53003002	Ya iluwaruyu avus ta sarakniban Apudyus dakani asda tagu ey amud sey kinarwingna tey dakumpun as amin ey tagu at mamatida assey tudtuju miipanggop an Jesus.
53003003	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji tey matalik dallu sey Apu ya siya sey mangimpakasdor ya manaraknib an dakayu an Satanas.
53003004	Ya gapu assey pammatiyu an Apu Jesus, aji kani pun anjuwajuwa ey koonyu ya ituruturuyyu ey mangwa asda imvilinni an dakayu.
53003005	Kanana atyén ta turungan sey Apu sey somsomokyu ta ikowyu maawatan sey amud ey layad Apudyus an dakayu ya majugjug-an sey anusyu ey anung sey anus Cristu.
53003006	Gapu assey karobbonganni ey innatud Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu, ivilinni an dakayu ey susunud ta aji kayu mijujugga asda vurunyu ey mamati kon tukarda ey mansiput ya sumangada ey mangunud assey imvilinni an dakayu.
53003007	Tey innilayu mit vus pey sey apporoni kingwa assey iniggawanni an dakayu at siya atyén sey unujunyu. Tey dokon kani pun as tukar ey mansiput
53003008	ya niippun ingkam-utni as ajini pun vinayadan. Tey inag-agow ya nilavi at ingkarkaligatanni ey nansiput ta niippun atyén maligatan an dakayu gapu assey mangillagulagumanyu an dakani.
53003009	Assey katuttuwaan, dakumpun as lawingan nu nangkudow kani asda kasapuranni an dakayu nu aji kingwani jiyuy ta awad mansarminganyu.
53003010	Tey urey assey iniiggawanni an dakayu, apporoni imbaga, “Sey tagu ey sumanga mansiput, aji pun mapakanan.”
53003011	Insuratni nauy an dakayu tey jingngorni ey awad kanu an dakayu dasey apporow sumayasayap ey ajida pun mansiput nu aji siya ambas-oranda sey mikaviyang asda siput da ujum ey tagu.
53003012	At gapu assey karobbongan ey innatud Apu Jesu Cristu an dakani, tudtujuwanni dasey tagu ey jugannaʼt ya ivilinni an jida ta ambaruwunda sey koonda ey matagu ya masapur isaradda atyén ey mansiput ta keygadda assey ikataguda.
53003013	Kon an dakayu ey susunud, aji kayu atyén mappug ey mangwamangwa asda ambabaru ey makwa.
53003014	At nu awad an dakayu sinat sey aji pun mangngor assey imbagani assey suratni anna, tandaananyu nu ngan sey tagu sanat ta aji kayu apporow mivurun an siya ta amorna ey maviinan.
53003015	Kon ajiyu maggey ivilang siya as kavusuryu nu aji bagbagaanyu siya as usa ey sunudyu ey mamati.
53003016	Kanana atyén ta as Apu Jesu Cristu ey marpuwan sey tarna at pabaruwuna sey somsomokyu urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt sey makwa. Kanana atyén ta kanayun ey awad as Apu an dakayu.
53003017	Sa'un an Paul ey mismu sey nangingkur-it assey jummakpusan sey surat anna. Kanaʼsna sey angokook ey angur-it assey amin ey suratku.
53003018	Kanana atyén ta ambaambaru sey koon Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu an dakayu losan.
54001001	Sa'un an Paul ey aposel Jesu Cristu. Annaya sey suratku an sika Timothy ey imvilangku as tuttuwa ey anakku assey pammati. Kanana atyén ta as Apudyus ey Ama taku ya as Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku sey mangatud as vumaruwam. Kadaguwan sika ta natarna sey koom ey matagu. Sey nambalinak as aposel at gapu ta siya sey vilin Apudyus ey nanginsarakan an jitaku ya as Jesu Cristu ey iggawan sey namnama taku.
54001003	Assey narpuwak sinat ey ummuy ad Macedonia, imvilinku an sika ey inggowkaʼsnaʼt ad Efesus tey awad dasey ujum ey apporow mangintudtuju as dasey dakumpun ey tudtuju ta ibagam an jida ta ipog-anda ey apporow mangintudtujuʼs dakumpun.
54001004	Ivilinnu an jida ta ajida iyootok dasey minamaliyém ey ul-ullit ya dasey angkananju ey nilistaan da ngadan dasey dakdakorda tey sey kanaʼsna ey ug-uggud at angilluswa at lawa as an-iisikan. Ya niippun miiturungna assey matongparan sey panggop Apudyus tey sey mangigammuwan assey panggop Apudyus at gapu anggey assey pammati an siya.
54001005	Sey panggopku ey mangimvilin asda nauy, ta da amin ey awad sinat ey mamati an Apudyus at tornonda ey manlilinnayad assey layad ey marpu assey nadarus ya mambaru ey somsommok ya tuttuwa ey pammati.
54001006	Inggow dasey ujum ey tagu ey summina assey ambaru ey ugali at siya at lawa sey apporoda manjijiskasan as kotom.
54001007	Piunda ey maawagan as misturun sey lintog Apudyus kon ajida pun maawatan nu ngan sey piun sey lintog ey ugujun ya urey dasey ipapilitda ey ibaga at niippun vus agammuda nu ngan sey kipuuyana.
54001008	Miipanggop ey assey lintog, agammu taku ey ambaru nu ustu sey muusarana.
54001009	Agammu taku vus ey sey lintog at aji pun as nakwa para as dasey nalintog ey tagu nu aji para as dasey lumalabsing anda aji pun mangngor assey lintog, dasey aji pun mandayow an Apudyus ya ambasbasur, dasey aji pun angimpatig an Apudyus assey kaviviyagda, dasey mangillaylayus asda ipatig Apudyus, dasey mangngat asda dakdakorna anda asintataguna,
54001010	dasey jumadagdagas, dasey laraki unnu vubai ey mangasawa asda anungda ey laraki unnu vubai, dasey jumokma as tagu ya ingnginada ey ambalin as alipan, dasey ussatan ya manakjug assey dakumpun as tuttuwa ya dasey amin ey vumusur assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju.
54001011	At sey nauy ey intudtujuk miipanggop assey lintog at mibasar assey Ambaru ey Damag ey intalik sey kangatuwan ya madaydayow ey Apudyus an sa'un.
54001012	Ampasaramatak an Cristu Jesus ey Apu taku ey nangatud assey kasdorku ey mangwa as dasey siputku tey imvilangna sa'un as usa ey matalik ya jinutukana sa'un ey manservi an siya.
54001013	Kanaʼsna sey kingwana urey nu apporowak gumminga as lawingan ey miivusur an siya assey keysan ey ag-agow ya tinongtong-agku dasey taguna ya inin-insurtuk siya. Kon nadaguwan pey dallu an sa'un tey daanak pun atgey mamati at niippun agammuk as ustuʼs kook.
54001014	Amud sey kinaambaruna ya nambalinunak as usa ey mamati an Cristu Jesus ya maryad asda vurunku tey siya dallu sey mallapuwan sey ustu ey pammati ya layad asda vurun.
54001015	Nabgasan nauy ey tudtuju at siya sey masapur ey mapati. Ummali as Cristu Jesus assey luta anna ta sarakana dasey nakabasur. At sa'un sey kadadagsunan sey basurna as dasey amin ey nakabasur.
54001016	Kon kinadaguwanak an Apudyus ta sa'un sey usa ey miil-an sey niippun kurangna ey kinaanus Cristu. At urey nu sa'un sey kadadagsunan sey basurna, kinadaguwanak pey dallu an Apudyus ta awad unujun sey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu assey daan ey ag-agow ta mabalinda ey mamati an siya ya maatud vus an jida sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
54001017	Kanana atyén ta as Apudyus ey Ari ey niippun patinggan sey tureyna, siya sey mavigvig ya madayow as ing-inggana. Siya sey sa'an ey Apudyus ey aji pun miila ya aji pun matmatuy as ing-inggana. Amen.
54001018	Sika Timothy ey anakku assey pammati, italikku an sika sey vilin anna ey miyunud assey nipapaddaan assey kar-argow miipanggop an sika. Usarum nauy ey impapaddaanda ey kama as armas ey mikagubat ta itatakjugnu sey kinatuttuwan sey Ambaru ey Damag.
54001019	Pakasdorom sey pammatim ya ilam ta pasig nadarus sey awad assey somsomoknu. Tey inggow da ujum ey inidyénda sey nadarus ey somsomok at siya sey nadadailan sey pammatida
54001020	ey kama an da Hymenaeus an Alexander ey impurangku assey pannakabalin Satanas ta awad ji man-adaranda ey aji guminga as vumusur an Apudyus.
54002001	Annaya sey ujum ey ibagak an sika. Sey amangu at masapur ey iluwaruwan taku dasey amin ey tagu. Mansaramat taku ya mangkudow taku an Apudyus as para an jida.
54002002	Ya iluwaruwan taku avus dasey nangangatu ey turey ya da amin ey naatdan as karobbongan ey manturey ta natarna sey koon taku ey matagu ey niippun guru ya awad agammu taku ey mangwa assey piun Apudyus ya da ujum ey ambabaru ey makwa.
54002003	Ambaru nu kanaʼsna sey koon taku tey nauy sey angimpalaylayad an Apudyus ey nanginsarakan an jitaku
54002004	tey as Apudyus, piuna ey miisarakan dasey amin ey tagu ya maagammuwanda sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju.
54002005	Tey sa'an anggey sey Apudyus ya sa'an sey nambalin as karun ey siya as Cristu Jesus ey siya sey nambootan dasey tagu an Apudyus.
54002006	Siya sey nangatud assey viyagna ey matuy para asda amin ey tagu. At nauy sey nangimpatuttuwa ey assey ustu ey timpu, impiilan Apudyus ey piuna ey misarakan dasey amin ey tagu.
54002007	At siyana sey gapuna nu paak lawa nambalin as usa ey aposel ta inyak mantudtuju asda Gentil assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju miipanggop an Cristu ta awadji mamati an jida. Tuttuwa nauy ey ibagabagak, dakumpun as inuussat.
54002008	Asda amin ey madagupan dasey mamati ey mandayow an Apudyus, piuk ey dasey laraki sey mangimpangat assey malluwaruwanyu, laraki ey nadarus sey somsomokna an Apudyus ey dokon pun as puttukan ya allasu as mikaisik.
54002009	Ya as dasey vubai vus, masapur imamadda atyén ta ustu sey koonda ey allumvun ya man-annadda ya agammuda ey vumiin. Ya ilanda atyén vus ta aji umamdan sey koonda ey mangar-arkus assey vuukda unnu man-ang-angga as dasey nabalor ey vurawan anda bongor unnu mamaryad ey mallumvun asda nangkangina
54002010	nu aji ipiilada atyén sey kinaporkasda asda ambaru ey koko'on ey mitagop asda vubai ey andaydayow an Apudyus.
54002011	Ya masapur ey giginnokda nu anna ey mitudtuju sey Gingan Apudyus ya masapur ey ampakumbabada as dasey mantudtuju.
54002012	Ajik pun as iparuvus ey tudtujuwan unnu iturayan sey vubai sey laraki. Masapur ey gumiginnokda
54002013	tey assey nangwaan Apudyus assey tagu, pinanguna kingwa as Adam asi at as Eve.
54002014	Ya dakumpun as Adam sey naallilow nu aji as Eve sey namangu ey nakabasur assey nallabsingana assey imbagan Apudyus.
54002015	Siya nauy sey lapuna nu pa lawa maligatan dasey vubai ey umanak. Kon misarakanda vus pigey nu anturturuyda ey mamati an Apudyus ya awad layadda assey anungda ey tagu ya mangunud assey naapudyusan ey kaviviyag ya agammuda ey vumiin.
54003001	Tuttuwa sey kanan da tagu ey sey maryad ey ambalin as mangimpapangat as dasey mamati at pinilina sey nabalor ey siput.
54003002	At gapu ta nabalor ji ey siput, masapur ey sey mangimpapangat at niippun mad-asan as mipabasur an siya. Ya masapur avus ey sa'an anggey sey asawana ya niippun dagdagasna. Masapur ey naannad ya naotkan ya awad rispitun da tagu an siya ya piyammangili ya masapur awad kaviilana ey mantudtuju.
54003003	Masapur dakumpun as vu'ukan unnu marangsit nu aji naanus ya aji allasu as mikaisik. Ya ajina as gamgamgaman sey pilak.
54003004	Ya masapur avus ey agammuna ey mangasikasu asda kabvuruyna ta jumngor dasey aanakna ya rispituwunda siya.
54003005	Tey nu niippun agammun sey usa ey tagu ey mangasikasu asda kabvuruyna, niippun vus agammuna ey mamuut asda tagun Apudyus.
54003006	Ya masapur ey dakumpun as kaddatu ey mamati tey oni at lawa ya nampaspas-um ya umaney as manusaan Apudyus an siya ey anung sey nakwa an Satanas.
54003007	Ya masapur avus ey ambaru sey ugalina ey urey as dasey daan pun mamati at rispituwunda siya ta niippun ugujunda as mivibviinana ya kingwana at lawa dasey piun Satanas.
54003008	Asda mapili avus ey tumurung as dasey mangimpapangat at masapur ey miivilangda as usa ey marispitu ey tagu ya dakumpun as nampanga sey sungadna ya dokonda pun as marawot assey miinum unnu anggamgam as pilak.
54003009	Ya masapur avus ey nadarus sey somsomokda ya tornonda ey mamati assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju miipanggop assey pammati ey impaagammun Apudyus.
54003010	Ya masapur ey mapadasda yén ta miila nu ustu sey angokoonda ey mamati. At nu ustu assey angiilayu, asiyu at jida jutukan ey tumurung ey manservi.
54003011	Ya dasey asawada avus masapur ey mivilangda as usa ey marispitu ya dakumpun as nampanga sey sungadda ya masapur ey naannadda ya matalikda assey amin ey koonda.
54003012	Sey usa vus ey kasapuran as dasey tumurung asda mangimpapangat asda mamati, masapur avus ey sa'an anggey sey asawada ya niippun dagdagasda. Ya masapur avus ey ustu sey koonda ey mangimpapangat as dasey anakda ya kabvuruyda.
54003013	At nu ambaru sey koonda ey manservi, marispituda as dasey vurunda ya naturudda ey mangimbaga assey miipanggop assey pammatida an Cristu Jesus.
54003014	Isuratku da nauy an sika assey sana urey nu aji as ambayag at namnamauk ey umali ey mangila an sika,
54003015	ta nu as gagara ya awad mataktakak, sey suratku sana sey mangigammuwam nu ngan annun sey kopyan sey usa ey mamati ey mijuga assey familyan Apudyus ey matatagu as ing-inggana. Jitaku ey mamati sey nangintalikan Apudyus assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju. At siya sey masapur itudtuju taku ya takjugan taku sey katuttuwaan.
54003016	Niippun miyisuwan sey ikow kapatig sey pammati taku ey inggana assey sana asin at Apudyus ipaagammu an jitaku ey as Cristu at; Nambalin as tagu. Tinakjugan sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey kinaambaruna. Innilan dasey enjel siya. Nipadngor sey miipanggop an siya assey kikkiili. Inggow dasey namati an siya assey intiru ey luvung. Naas pun ji, nipangatu ey ummuy ad langit.
54004001	Narawag sey kanan sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey assey daan ey ag-agow awad dasey sumina assey ustu ey pammati. Ya siya dongronda dasey inuussat ya umaallilow ya inunudda dasey tudtujun da jimunyu.
54004002	Da nauy ey tudtuju at iwwarawag dasey mangal-allilow ey ussatan ey angimpipi'ila anggey assey pammatida ey niippun agammuda nu ustu unnu lawingan sey apporoda koon.
54004003	Dasey tagu sana, itudtujuda ey misanga sey mangasawa ya manganan as dasey ujum ey makan. Kon kingwan Apudyus da nauy ey karasin ji makan ta kanun dasey mamati an Cristu ya nangigammu assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju nu maasda mansaramat an siya.
54004004	Tey amin ey kingwan Apudyus at ambaru at siya sey niippun atyén paniyawun taku nu mansaramat taku ey mangawat assey amin ey atjuna.
54004005	Tey gapu assey alluwaruwan taku ey mangusar assey Gingan Apudyus, mivilang sey makan as ambaru an Apudyus.
54004006	Nu isurum da nauy ey tugun as dasey susunud taku ey mamati, ambaru sey koom ey manservi an Cristu Jesus ya mipiila ey sika at naawatam sey katuttuwaan miipanggop assey pammati taku ya sey ambaru ey tudtuju ey apporom inunud.
54004007	Adayuwam dasey inuugma ey ug-uggud ey niippun gotokna ey aji pun atyén kasapuran ey muugud. Siya at koom sey piingsaum ey mangadar ya mangunud assey naapudyusan ey kaviviyag.
54004008	Sey kumasdoran sey long-ag at awad miserviyana, kon sin-umamud nu sey pammati sey kumasdor ey mangwa asda piun Apudyus tey dakumpun anggey sey viyag taku assey sana sey miserviyana nu aji sey viyag assey daan ey ag-agow.
54004009	Tuttuwa sey imbagak anna at siya sey masapur ey mapati ey niippun juwajuwana.
54004010	At ipakat taku sey kaviilan ey manservi an Apudyus ey matatagu as ing-inggana tey intalik taku sey namnama taku an siya ey manginsarakan asda amin am-amud dasey mamati an siya.
54004011	At da nauy ey imbagabagak an sika sey itudtujum ya ivilinnu asda mamati.
54004012	Ilam ta niippun koom as mangillaylayusanda an sika gapu ta anakka at gey, nu aji ambalinum sey viyagnu as mansarmingan da mamati assey koom ey guminga, assey ugalim, assey layadnu asda ujum, assey pammatim ya assey kinadarus sey viyagnu.
54004013	Iturturuynu ey apporow mangimbasa assey Gingan Apudyus assey sinagung dasey mamati nu madagup kayu ya ipakaawatnu sey piuna ugujun ya ipapatim ey mantudtuju inggana as umaliyak sinat.
54004014	Ajim maliwatan ey mangusar assey kaviilam ey innatud sey Ispiritun Apudyus an sika assey nangimpatayan dasey papangat da mamati assey imada an sika. Impakagasmok sey Ispiritun Apudyus an jida asida at ibaga an sika ey siyana sey kaviilam.
54004015	Ilam ta gogotmom ey mangunud as dasey intugunku an sika ya piingsaum ey mangwa assey patinggan sey kaviilam ta miilan da amin ey tagu ey ustuustu sey koom ey mangunud assey piun Apudyus.
54004016	Masapur ey annadam sey amin ey koom ya dasey apporom itudtuju. Tey nu ipapatim ey mangwa asda nauy, dakumpun anggey assey long-agnu sey insarakam nu aji urey dasey mandongor an sika.
54005001	Nu as gagara ya awad natnat-ong as laraki nu sika ey nangwa as kaingorana, ajim maggey man-iyingor, nu aji ambaruwum ey mikabagbaga ey anungna sey koom assey amam. Ya anungna avus asda laraki ey an-anak nu sika, ivilangnu vus jida ey kama as mismu ey sunudnu.
54005002	Ya dasey vubai ey namangu nu sika, ivilangnu jida ey kama as inam ya dasey an-anak nu sika, kamaum as sunudnu ey niippun aggissow assey somsomoknu.
54005003	Nu awad baru as niippun mamuut an siya, ipiilam sey rispitum ya turungam siya.
54005004	Kon nu sey baru at awad anakna unnu apuna, masapur maawatan dasey anakna anda apuna ey sey amangu ey koonda ey manservi an Apudyus at sey mamuutanda asda dakdakorda ya asda apuda tey siya sey koonda ey manubalit an jida tey nauy sey angimpalaylayad an Apudyus.
54005005	Kon dasey baru ey niippun anakda unnu apuda as mamuut an jida, as Apudyus anggey sey iggown sey namnamada. At siya sey inag-agow ya nilavi ey alluwaluwaruda ey angkudow as turung an Apudyus.
54005006	Kon sey baru ey siya dokdokrona sey niilluvungan ey lagragsak, mivilang ji as nanattuy ey urey nu sissiya ey umanguangus.
54005007	At ivilinnu da nauy as dasey mamati sinat ta niippun miipabasur an jida.
54005008	Kon nu awad mamati as sumanga ey mamuut as dasey jujugana am-amud as dasey kabvuruyna, piuna ugujun, nan-awidana sey pammatina. Sey tagu ey kanaʼsnaʼt at sin-umamud ey dakumpun sey nakopyaana nu dasey tagu ey aji pun mamati.
54005009	Sey ilistayu ey baru ey maturungan at dasey mantawun as onompuru unnu nasuruk sey tawunna ey namingsan anggey nangasawa.
54005010	Ya masapur avus ey ambaru sey madamaganda assey amin ey kingwada kama assey ambaru ey kingwada ey nanarakin as dasey anakda ya piyammangilida. Napakumbabada ey manservi as dasey ujum ey mamati. Tumuturungda as dasey tagu ey maligatan ya ampawotda ey mikakwa as dasey amin ey ambaru ey makwa.
54005011	Kon ajiyu ijuga assey listaanyu dasey daan pun as ikow mat-ong ey baru tey oni at lawa ya abakun sey liknada sey layadda ey anturturuy ey manservi an Cristu ya kasinda nangasawa.
54005012	At nu siyaji sey koonda, nakabasurda tey ajida pun tinongpar sey impostada an Cristu.
54005013	Sey usa avus nu payu aji jida ijuga assey listaan sey maturungan tey piingsaunda sey tukar ya koonda at lawa ey gumakeygakey as dasey vuruy ey kumapukaput ya mikaviyang asda ujum ya lamugda at lawa mangugudan asda aji pun as lobbongna ey muugud.
54005014	At assey kasomsomkak, unina nu kasin mangasawa dasey an-anak ey baru ta umanakda ta awad puutunda as kabvuruyda ta niippun man-akilan dasey kumukuntra ey mallaylayus an jitaku.
54005015	Siya nangimbagaak as nauy tey awad dasey ujum ey baru ey luusda nan-awidan as Apudyus at ummunudda an Satanas.
54005016	At nu awad vubai as namati ya awad jugana as baru, masapur ey siya sey mamuut ta ajina ipavukud nauy ey viyang asda tagun Apudyus ta sey turunganda at dasey baru ey niippun mamuut an jida.
54005017	Miipanggop asda mangimpapangat ey ambaru sey koonda ey mangimpangat asda mamati, masapur ey marispituda ya matangdananda as ustuustu ey tangdan, am-amud dasey mangimpapati ey mantudtuju ya mangiwwarawag assey Gingan Apudyus.
54005018	Tey inggow sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Ajim vub-ujun sey sungad sey baka nu anna ey man-ilik ta awad agammuna ey mangan.” Ya kanana avus, “Sey mansiput at masapur malabvuwan.”
54005019	Nu awad tagu as mangimpabasur assey mangimpapangat asda mamati, ajim dongron, maraksig nu awad juwa unnu turu as manistigu.
54005020	Kon nu awad mangimpapangat asda mamati ey nakabasur ya ajina pun ibabawi, masapur ey ingoranyu siya assey sangun dasey mamati ta umugyat dasey ujum ey mangwa.
54005021	At sika Timothy, masapur dongrom dasey amin ey imbagak an sika ey ajim antoktoknon dasey tagu tey masapur an-iisuwum sey koom an jida. Ivilinku da nauy an sika assey sangun Apudyus ya as Cristu Jesus ya dasey nasantuwan ey enjel ey angiisjung an jitaku.
54005022	Ajika makamuwan ey manjutuk asda mangimpapangat as dasey mamati. Tey nu as gagara ya awad basurda ya jinutukam, mitakurungka at lawa ey makabasur assey basurda. At siya sey ammaam sey koom ta adayuwam dasey amin ey lawingan.
54005023	Ilam ta ajim pasigun sey danum as inumum, daka vus pigey uminum as akit assey bayas ta makaagas an sika tey siya gey koon sey vuwangnu ey sumigab.
54005024	Awad dasey ujum ey tagu ey mimi'ila sey ambasbasuranda urey nu daan pun jumatong sey muuwisanda. Kon awad vus dasey ujum ey nitataru sey basurda ey asi maagammuwan nu umanungus.
54005025	Anungna vus asda tagu ey mambabaru sey koonda, allasu as maagammuwan kon asda ujum avus, asi maagammuwan nu umanungus.
54006001	Miipanggop avus as dasey alipan ey mamati, masapur ey rispituwunda ey ustu dasey sin-alipan an jida assey amin ey koonda ta niippun maamsiwan Apudyus ya dasey tudtuju taku.
54006002	Ya sey alipan avus nu mamati sey sin-alipan an siya, ajina atyén kanan ey gapu ta vurunna ey namati sey apuna, urey laylaysuna ey ajina rispituwun. Dakumpun atyén as kanaʼsji ta dardallu atyén sey koona ey mansiput tey sey mallak-am assey turungna at vurunna ey mamati ey pipiun Apudyus. Da nauy sey itudtujum ya ivilinnu as dasey mamati sinaʼt.
54006003	Nu awad mangintudtuju as sabali ey aji pun miyunud assey intudtujun Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu ya aji pun as miyunud assey tudtuju ey manginturung an jitaku ey mangwa assey piun Apudyus,
54006004	siyaji sey tagu ey mangimpangpangatu assey long-agna ya niippun akit as maawatana. Sey kanaʼs ji ey tagu, piuna anggey jumiskajiskas ya man-inap as mikasongbatana miipanggop assey kipuuyan sey nuugud. Sey kamaʼsji ey ugali at niippun ayana nu aji iluswana sey apos, iisik ya anginsurtuwan assey vurun. Iluswana vus sey makaanan sey talik assey vurun
54006005	ya kanayun ey iluswana sey manggiginnuraan. Aggikbot sey somsomokna ya nan-awidana sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju. Ya kanana assey somsomokna ey mamatiyak an Apudyus ta vumaknangak.
54006006	Assey katuttuwaan, baknang sey tagu ey mamati an Apudyus nu ming-op assey awad an siya.
54006007	Tey assey niyanakan taku, niippun mit illuswa taku assey luvung anna ya nu umayow taku, niippun vus vukudan taku ey itakin.
54006008	At ming-op taku atyén nu awad umaney as kanun ya ilumvun.
54006009	Kon sey tagu ey siya anggey as gamgamana sey vumaknang, allasu as masulisug ey vumasur ya naallilow asda niluruku ey manadail an siya ey siya sey manginturung an siya assey majusaana as ing-inggana.
54006010	Tey sey layad assey pilak at siya sey lapun sey amin ey karasin sey kinarwing. Awad da tagu ey gapu assey kinaagumda assey pilak at nan-awidanda sey pammatida ya miid ajida madapun ey sigab sey somsomok.
54006011	Kon sika Timothy ey usa ey anserservi an Apudyus, lisiyam amin da nauy ta iggam sey kaviilam ey mangunud assey niyun-un ya naapudyusan ey kaviviyag ya ipapatim avus ey mamati an Jesu Cristu. Ya iggam sey kaviilam ey angimpiila assey layadnu an Apudyus ya as dasey vurunnu ya manganus assey matongtong-agam. Ya ilam ta masapur avus ey naanuska asda vurunnu.
54006012	Iggam sey kaviilam ey mangunud an Apu Jesus ey anungnu mikaab-abbak assey tudtuddak ey ipapatim ta mangabakka. Tey assey nangimbagaam assey kar-argow ey mamatika an Apu Jesus assey sinagung dasey adjuwan ey tagu, innatdan sika an Apudyus assey viyag ey niippun patinggana tey siya vus pigey sey lapun sey nangayagana an sika.
54006013	As Apudyus sey nangatud assey viyag dasey amin ey tagu. At assey sinagungna ya as Cristu Jesus ey nangimpaniknik assey katuttuwaan assey sinagung Pontius Pilate, ivilinku an sika
54006014	ey masapur dongrom sey amin ey nivilin an sika ya tornom ey mangunud ta niippun mangimbaga ey awadji ajim pun kingwa as ustu. Koom da nauy inggana assey ag-agow ey ampuuliyén Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
54006015	As Apudyus ey madaydayow, siya sey angimpuuli an Jesus assey luta nu jumatong sey ustu ey timpu ey inggoddongna. As Apudyus anggey sey Turey asda kangamin, siya sey Ari asda amin ey ari ya Apu asda amin ey apu.
54006016	Siya anggey sey aji pun as matmatuy ya aji pun vus as mabalin ey maadaniyan sey iggowna tey amud sey silingna. Niippun tagu as nangila unnu makaila an siya. Kanana atyén ta dayawun da tagu siya ya manturey siya as ing-inggana! Amen.
54006017	Timothy, vilinum avus dasey babaknang miipanggop assey linuruta ta ajida ampaspas-um ya ajida italik sey namnamada assey vinaknang tey aji pun ambayag at mamiid. Siya atyén mantalikanda, an Apudyus ey niippun imutna ey mangatud assey amin ey allaylaydan taku.
54006018	Ibagam ta siya koonda sey mangwa as dasey ambabaru ey makwa ta baknangda avus panggop asda ambaru ey makwa ey niippun im-imutda nu aji silalayadda ey angatud asda vurunda.
54006019	At nu siyana sey koonda, kamada as nantarpun as vinaknang ad langit ey mipani assey mampagdot ey pon-ad sey mataguwanda as daan ey ag-agow ey siya sey tuttuwa ey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
54006020	Timothy, ammaam puutun dasey intalik Apudyus an sika. Lisiyam dasey dakumpun as naapudyusan ey ug-uggud ya dasey niippun servina ey jisjiskas ey kananda ey “Kinariing.”
54006021	Tey awad dasey ujum ey gapu assey kananda ey awad an jida sey nauy ey “Kinariing,” summinada assey tuttuwa ey pammati an Apudyus. Kanana atyén ta as Apudyus sey mangatud as vumaruwanyu losan.
55001001	Sa'un an Paul ey aposel Cristu Jesus. Annaya sey suratku an sika Timothy ey pipiuk ey ivilangku as anakku. Kanana atyén ta as Apudyus ey Ama taku ya as Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku sey mangatud as vumaruwam. Kadaguwan sika ta natarna sey koom ey matagu. Nambalinak as aposel gapu ta siya sey piun Apudyus ya imbaarak ta inyak iwarawag sey impostan Apudyus ey viyag ey niippun patinggana ey atjuna asda amin ey mamati an Cristu Jesus.
55001003	Timothy, ansaramatak an Apudyus ey apporok manserviyan. Niippun juwajuwan sey somsomokku ey ustu sey kook ey manservi ey anung sey kingwan dasey dakdakorku. Ya ansaramatak avus an Apudyus gapu an sika. Ya assey inag-agow ya nilavi ey alluwaruwak, ijujuggak sika assey luwaruk.
55001004	Amud sey inayuk an sika am-amud nu somsomkok sey nalluluwaam assey nansinaanta assey keysan ey ag-agow at siya sey piuk atyén ey mangila an sika ta maragsakanak.
55001005	Sommosommokok sey kinatuttuwan sey pammatim ey kama vus pigey assey pammatin apum ey Lois ya as inam ey Eunice. Sigurajuwak ey sey pammatida at anung sey pammatim.
55001006	At siya sey ipakagasmokku an sika ta tornom ey mangusar assey kaviilan ey innatud Apudyus assey nangimpatayak assey imak an sika.
55001007	Tey dakumpun as innatud Apudyus an jitaku sey Ispirituna ta umugyat taku nu aji innatudna sey Ispirituna ta maatdan taku as kaviilan ey manservi an siya. Ya sey Ispirituna avus sey nangwa assey maryadan taku asda amin ey tagu ya sey manginyattuman taku asda pipiun sey long-ag.
55001008	At siya sey ajika maviin ey mangintakjug assey miipanggop an Apu taku. Ajim vus ikaviin sa'un ey nibarud gapu assey nanserserviyak an siya nu aji anusam dasey tongtong-ag ey lak-amun taku gapu assey mangiwwarawagan taku assey Ambaru ey Damag tey atjun Apudyus sey kasdor taku ey manganus asda ligat.
55001009	Siya sey nanginsarak ya nangayag an jitaku ta ambalin taku as tuttuwa ey taguna. Kingwana ji ey dakumpun as gapu as dasey ambabaru ey kingwa taku nu aji gapu ta siya sey panggopna ya gapu assey amud ey kinaambaruna an jitaku. Urey assey daan pun makwa sey luvung at sisimmokna ey mangwa as ambaru an jitaku gapu assey koon Cristu Jesus.
55001010	At ey sana, impiilana an jitaku sey nauy ey daguna gapu assey ummaliyan Cristu Jesus assey luta ey nanginsarakan an jitaku. Kinaanna sey pannakabalin sey katuy ya impaagammuna asda tagu sey viyag ey niippun patinggana gapu assey Ambaru ey Damag ey impaagammuna.
55001011	Siyana sey gapuna ey jinutukanak as usa ey aposelna ey umuy mangiwwarawag ya mangintudtuju assey nauy ey Ambaru ey Damag
55001012	ey lapun sey apporok natongtong-agan. Kon ajiyak pun as maviin tey agammuk sey tinalikku ya agammuk ey siguraju ey kaviilan Apudyus ey mamuut assey intalikna an sa'un inggana assey anungus sey ag-agow.
55001013	Timothy, sosomkom dasey nabgasan ey tudtuju ey inadarnu an sa'un ya masapur siya sey unujum. Iturturuynu ey mangimpiila assey pammatim ya sey layadnu asda vurun taku tey siyana sey mangimpiila ey nijujugga taku an Cristu Jesus.
55001014	Masapur ammaam ilan ya unujun dasey nabalor ey tudtuju ey impiyar Apudyus an sika gapu assey turung sey Ispirituna ey awad an jitaku.
55001015	Agammuk ey naagammuwam ey iwwarangak asda amin ey mamati assey provinsiyan sey Asia ya urey da Figelus an Hermogenes.
55001016	Kon kanana atyén ta kadaguwan sey Apu dasey kabvuruy Onesiphorus tey kanayunak aan ey umuy sarsalliwaun an siya. Ya ajina pun as ikaviin sey nibaballudak
55001017	tey assey ummaliyana ad Rome, nandatngana ey ummuy nanginap an sa'un inggana as indasanak.
55001018	Ya siguraju ey agammum avus dasey amin ey kingwana ey nanurung an sa'un ad Efesus. Kanana atyén ta kadaguwan sey Apu siya nu jumatong sey anungus sey ag-agow.
55002001	Miipanggop ey an sika ey imvilangku as anakku, pakasdorom sey somsomoknu gapu assey kinaambarun Apudyus ey naatud an jitaku ey nijujugga an Cristu Jesus.
55002002	At amin dasey jingngornu ey intudtujuk assey sinagung dasey adjuwan ey tagu, siya vus sey itudtujum asda mataliknu ey mamati ey mabalin mangintudtuju asda ujum.
55002003	Mikaligatka assey ligat ey jumatong assey viyag taku gapu assey mamatiyan taku an Cristu Jesus ey kama assey koon sey matalik ey surdaju ey manganus assey ligat.
55002004	Tey sey surdaju ey awad assey servisyu, aji pun mijujugga asda koko'on dasey sivilyan tey masapur ey koona sey mallaylaydan sey kumanderna.
55002005	Ya anungna vus assey mikatudtuddak, aji pun maggey mangabak nu ajina unujun sey lintog sey ay-ayam.
55002006	Ya anungna avus assey usa ey angkiwaar ey ampawot ey mansiput, siya avus sey amangu ey mangara assey vungan sey inayongna.
55002007	At siyaji, sommosommokom ey ustu dasey amin ey ibagabagak tey as Apu sey manurung an sika ta maawatam dasey amin ey ibagabagak.
55002008	Ajim maliwatan as Jesu Cristu ey ganak David ey natuy kon ummuli ey siya sey Ambaru ey Damag ey apporok iwarawarawag.
55002009	At gapu assey nangiwwarawagak assey Ambaru ey Damag sana, siya sey lapun sey natongtong-agak ya nakakawwadak ey anung sey usa ey lumalabsing assey lintog. Kon urey nu kanaʼsna, aji pun mabalin ey makawadan sey Gingan Apudyus.
55002010	At siya sey anuanusak sey amin ey ligatku ta dasey tagu ey pinilin Apudyus as mantataguna at gun-ujunda sey kasarakanan ey atjun Cristu Jesus ey siya sey mijugaanda an Apudyus as ing-inggana.
55002011	Tuttuwa sey tudtuju ey kanana, “Nu mikakatuy taku an Cristu, mikatagu taku vus an siya ad langit.
55002012	Ya nu anusan taku sey ligat gapu an siya, mikaturey taku an siya. Ya nu kanan taku ey aji taku pun siya agammu, kanana vus ey ajina pun jitaku agammu.
55002013	Nu aji taku matalik an siya, matalik dallu siya tey ajina pun mabalin ey man-awidan sey imbagana.”
55002014	Kanayunum ey ipakagasmok asda mamati sinat dasey imbagabagak ya vilinum jida assey sinagung Apudyus ta iginokda ey apporow man-iisik miipanggop assey piun sey ginga ey ugujun tey niippun atjuna as ambaru nu aji jumadail assey pammatin dasey andodongngor.
55002015	Ilam ta iggam sey kaviilam ey mangwa assey allaylaydan Apudyus ya ipapatim ey mangintudtuju assey katuttuwaan ey Gingan Apudyus ey kama assey usa ey angkiwaar ey ajina pun iviin sey siputna.
55002016	Adayuwam dasey aji pun naapudyusan ya da sallawasow ey ug-uggud tey isopsopna iyadayu da tagu an Apudyus.
55002017	Da nauy ey ug-uggud at kama as sakit ey kanser ey miwaras assey amin ey partin sey long-ag. Da Hymenaeus an Philetus sey kama as mipaniyan nauy.
55002018	Summinada assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju tey kananda ey naas ogon sey ummuliyén dasey natuy. At gapu assey kanaʼsna ey tudtujuda, kinurkurda sey pammatin da ujum.
55002019	Kon urey nu awad da kanaʼsji ey mantudtuju as dakumpun, aji pun maggey moorsan sey tuttuwa ey Gingan Apudyus tey anungna sey nikurub ey batu ey nipon-ad ey aji pun miwagot. Ya awad sey nikur-it assey pon-ad ey kanana, “Agammun Apudyus nu ngan dasey taguna ya ngan man dasey mangimbaga ey mamati assey Apu, masapur man-awidana dasey amin ey lawingan.”
55002020	Assey vuruy sey baknang, wadawad dasey nantokotokon ey muusar assey kakakkanan. Awadka ey vurawan sey kopyana anda parata ey nabalor sey muusarana ya awadka ey kayu sey kopyana anda luta ey barangna sey muusarana.
55002021	At nu man-awidan da tagu dasey amin ey lawing, ambalin as napatig sey muusaranda tey tornonda ey ampausar assey Apuda ya nakasaganada ey manservi para asda amin ey ambabaru ey makwa.
55002022	At siya sey masapur ey man-awidam dasey lawingan ey pipiun dasey babaru anda babarasang. Unujum dasey nalintog ey makwa ya dasey mangimpakasdor assey pammatim ya sey maryadam asda vurunnu ey mamati. Ya ambaruwum sey koom ey mijuga as dasey tagu ey nadarus sey somsomokda ey mandaydayow assey Apu.
55002023	Adayuwam dasey niluruku ey ug-uggud ya da niippun servina ey apporon da tagu manjijiskasan tey da nauy sey allapuwan sey iisik.
55002024	Tey sey manservi assey Apu at masapur ey aji pun atyén mikaisik nu aji mambaru sey koona asda amin ey asintataguna. Ya masapur ey nariing ya naanus ey mantudtuju
55002025	ya mambaru sey koona ey manugun asda kumuntra assey ustu ey tudtuju ta mag-at pey Apudyus baliwan sey somsomokda ta ambabawida ya maagammuwanda sey katuttuwaan.
55002026	At nu kanaʼsji sey makwa an jida, ampuuli sey ambaru ey somsomokda ya milisida assey parap-ug Satanas ey mangna an jida ta koonda sey piuna.
55003001	Masapur maawatam nauy Timothy ey assey anungus sey ag-agow jumatong sey timpun sey ligat.
55003002	Tey dasey tagu at long-agda anggey sey pipiunda ya pilak anggey sey gamgamgamanda. Ampaspas-umda ya sey long-agda sey idayowda ya umiinsurtuda ya ajida pun patiyun dasey dakdakorda. Niippun avus agammuda ey mansaramat ya niippun somsomokda miipanggop an Apudyus.
55003003	Niippun layadda asda asintataguda ya niippun agammuda ey pumakawan. Angwada as lumawingan dasey vurunda ya niippun agammuda ey mangiyyattum assey long-agda ya marangsitda ya kagurada dasey ambabaru ey makwa.
55003004	Liputanda dasey vurunda ya darasujusda ya nangatu sey angimvilanganda assey long-agda ya siya dokdokronda sey allagragsak nu sey layadda an Apudyus.
55003005	Ipiilada ey jida at relihyusuda kon sumangada assey pannakabalin Apudyus ey mamarbaliw assey lawing ey ugalida. Ajika mijujugga asda kanaʼsna ey tagu.
55003006	Tey awad da ujum an jida ey nariing ey umallilow ta piga nu summakeyda asda vuvuruy ta allilawunda dasey vubai ey allasu as maawis gapu ta malilivukanda asda ummamdan ey basurda anda nantokotokon ey lawingan ey pipiun sey long-ag ey apporowda kingwa.
55003007	Da nauy dasey vubai ey apporow mandongor ta man-adarda kon ajida pun makad-as assey katuttuwaan.
55003008	At da tagu anna ey umal-allilow, jida dasey kama anda Jannes an Jambres ey nangontra an Moses assey kar-argow. Da umal-allilow anna at pasigda kontraun sey kinatuttuwa, lawingan sey awad assey somsomokda ya inuussat sey pammatida.
55003009	Kon aji pun ambayag at miilan da amin ey tagu sey kinalukuda ey anungna sey nakwa anda Jannes an Jambres.
55003010	Kon an sika Timothy, inagammum ya inunudnu dasey intudtujuk ya sey ugalik ya sey panggopku assey matatagguwak. Agammum nu ngan annun sey pammatik ya ngan annuk ey nanginyaattum ya nangan-anus assey ligatku ya sey layadku assey asintataguk.
55003011	Ya agammum avus nu ngan annun da ujum ey tagu ey nanongtong-ag an sa'un ya sey nasibbanak ey anung sey nakwa an sa'un ad Anthiok, Iconium ya ad Listra. Amud sey natongtong-agak! Kon sinaraknibanak assey Apu asda amin ey tongtong-ag ey nilak-amku.
55003012	Assey katuttuwaan, amin dallu ey maryad ey matagu assey naapudyusan ey kaviviyag gapu assey pammati an Cristu Jesus at matongtong-ag.
55003013	Ya lumawing ey lumawing dasey tagu ey lawingan anda umal-allilow. Ya anturturuyda ey umallilow ya ampaallilow.
55003014	Kon an sika Timothy, masapur iturturuynu ey mamangjun assey nitudtuju an sika ey siya sey tillonnu ey pinati gapu ta agammum avus sey katatagun dasey nangintudtuju an sika.
55003015	At mallugi assey kaban-ugnu, naagammuwam dasey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey siya sey nanginturung an sika assey misarakanam gapu assey pammatim an Cristu Jesus.
55003016	Amin dasey nikur-it ey Gingan Apudyus at siya sey sinsomsomok assey nikur-itana at nabalor sey muusarana as matudtujuwan taku, as maingoran taku, as mangimpaagammu an jitaku assey koon taku ey ambarbaliw ya muusar as umingsaan taku ey matagu assey nalintog ey kaviviyag
55003017	ta sey tagu ey manservi an Apudyus at mitnub ta misagana ey mangwa asda amin ey karasin ji ambaru ey makwa.
55004001	Timothy, assey sinagung Apudyus ya as Cristu Jesus ey manguwis asda amin ey natattagu anda nangkakatuy ya gapu assey umaliyana ey manturey an jitaku, ivilinku an sika ey
55004002	masapur iwarawagnu sey Gingan Apudyus ya mansasagganaka ey mangintudtuju assey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey timpu, maryad man da tagu ey andongor unnu aji. Ipaagammum an jida nu awad kammalida ya ingoram jida ta iginokda ey ambasubasur. Pakasdorom sey somsomokda ey mangwa as dasey ambaru. Ya ilam ta ipiilam sey ustu ey anusnu assey manudtujuwam an jida.
55004003	Tey oni at jumatong sey timpu ey aji pun da tagu dongron sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju tey siya unujunda sey piun dasey long-agda ya man-anapda as mansuru ey mangimbaga as dasey piunda ey dongron.
55004004	Ajida pun piun ey dongron sey miipanggop assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju tey siya dongronda dasey minamaliyém ey ul-ullit.
55004005	Kon an sika Timothy, masapur ey man-annadka assey kangamin urey ngadannaʼs nait sey makwa. Anusam dasey ligat ey jumatong assey viyagnu ya iturturuynu ey mangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag ya koom sey intalik Apudyus an sika.
55004006	Tey an sa'un ey, anna ey jummatong sey timpu ey mamiidak assey luta anna. Anungku sey bayas ey ivukvukda ijuga assey midatun an Apudyus.
55004007	At nu miyanung sey apporok nanserviyan an Apudyus assey tudtuddak, iniggak sey amin ey kaviilak ey nikatudtuddak at pinungpungku sey tudtuddak. Ya inunudku sey pammati taku miipanggop an Cristu Jesus.
55004008	At assey sana, awad sey gun-guna ey maatud an sa'un gapu assey niyun-un ey kaviviyag. Gun-gunaanak assey Apu assey daan ey ag-agow. Siya sey niyun-un ey manguwis asda amin ey tagu kon dakumpun anggey as sa'un sey magun-gunaan nu aji urey dasey amin ey maryad an siya ey manguulley assey ampuuliyana.
55004009	Timothy, ilam ta masapsapaka ey umali sina
55004010	tey nan-awidanak an Demas at ummuy ad Tesalonica gapu ta dokdokrona sey viyag assey luta anna. As Crescens, ummuy ad Galatia ya as Titus, ummuy ad Dalmatia.
55004011	Anggey as Luke sey vurunku ey annaʼsna. Ayagam as Mark ta umali kayu sina tey makaturung siya assey siputku anna.
55004012	As Tikicus, imbaarku at ummuy ad Efesus.
55004013	Nu umalika aram sey jaketku ey tineynak an Carpus ad Troas. Ijugam aran dasey libnuk am-amud dasey larat ey nakukur-itan.
55004014	As Alexander ey ampapandey at amud sey kingwana ey lawingan an sa'un. Kon keygad sey Apu ey mangatud assey mitagop an siya assey kingwana.
55004015	At siya sey man-annadka vus an siya tey amud sey kingwana ey nangontra assey tudtuju taku.
55004016	Assey ab-avus sey nipasanguwak assey uwis, niippun sa'an as nanakjug an sa'un. Naminda sa'un nan-awidan. Kanana atyén ta ajin Apudyus ivilang jiyuy as basurda.
55004017	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji sey nakwa, tinurunganak assey Apu at inatdanak as kasdor at innaminku iwwarawag sey miipanggop an siya asda amin ey Gentil. Ya sinaraknibanak an siya at siya sey aji pun naturuy sey mipagngatak.
55004018	Ya agammuk ey turunganak assey Apu asda amin ey lawingan inggana as aranak an siya assey iggawan sey Tureyna ad langit. Kanana atyén ta madayow siya as ing-inggana. Amen.
55004019	Pakumustaum da Priscilla an Aquila ey an-asawa ya da kabvuruy Onesiphorus.
55004020	As Erastus, nateynan ad Corinth. Kon as Trofimus, tineynak ey masakit ad Miletus.
55004021	Ilam ta masapur masapaka ey umali sina ta daan jumatong sey agilid. Kumustaka kanu ey kanan da Eubulus, Prudens, Linus, Claudia ya da amin ey mamati sina.
55004022	Kanana atyén ta aawwad sey Apu an sika ya ituturuyna ey mangatud as vumaruwan an dakayu losan.
56001001	Sa'un an Paul ey alipan Apudyus ya usa vus asda aposel Jesu Cristu. Imbaarak ta inyak pakasdoron sey pammatin dasey pinilin Apudyus ey taguna ya inyak ipaagammu an jida sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju ey anturung assey naapudyusan ey kaviviyag.
56001002	Kook nauy ta awad namnamaun da tagu assey viyag ey niippun patinggana ey siya sey impostan Apudyus assey daan pun atgey makwa sey luvung. Makwa da nauy tey aji pun man-us-ussat as Apudyus ey nangimbaga.
56001003	Assey ustu ey nigoddong ey timpu, impaagammuna as dasey amin ey tagu sey Ambaru ey Damag. At sey Ambaru ey Damag anna ey nitalik an sa'un at as Apudyus ey nanginsarakan an jitaku sey nangimmandar ta inyak itudtuju.
56001004	At annaya sey suratku an sika Titus ey imvilangku as tuttuwa ey anakku gapu assey pammati taku. Kanana atyén ta atjun Ama taku ey Apudyus ya as Jesu Cristu ey nanginsarakan an jitaku sey vumaruwam ta natarna sey koom ey matagu.
56001005	Siya naneynanak an sika ad Crete ta asikasuwum dasey aji pun naasikasu. Assey usa ey vungguy dasey mamati as dasey munisipyu sinat, manjutukka as mangimpangat an jida. Ya ajim maliwatan sey imbagak an sika miipanggop as dasey majutukan.
56001006	Sey mangimpangat asda mamati, masapur ey niippun mipabasur an siya. Masapur sa'an anggey sey asawana ya masapur vus ey namati dasey anakna an Jesu Cristu ey niippun madamaganda as kinarangsit unnu dongor.
56001007	Sey lapuna ey niippun atyén mipabasur assey usa ey mangimpapangat tey jida sey piyarun Apudyus ey mamuut asda mamati. Masapur vus ey aji pun ampaspas-um, aji allasu as pumtuk, dakumpun as vu'ukan, aji pun as gumuguru ya aji naagum as pilak.
56001008	Masapur ey piyammangili ya allaylaydana koon sey ambaru. Masapur vus ey naannad ya niyun-un sey koona as dasey ujum ey tagu. Masapur vus ey unujuna koon sey mangimpalaylayad an Apudyus ya maattumana dasey lawingan ey pipiun sey long-ag.
56001009	Ya masapur ey mandogot sey pammatina assey Ambaru ey Damag ey nitudtuju an siya ta mabalin ey pakasdorona da ujum assey mangintudtujuwana an jida assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju ya mabalin ey ipaagammuna sey nangkamaliyan dasey gumugura assey katuttuwaan.
56001010	Ibagak da nauy an sika tey adjuwan da tagu ey gumugura assey ustu ey tudtuju am-amud dasey ujum ey mangimpapilit assey kugit. Jida dasey tumikow asda ujum ey tagu gapu asda uguugujunda ey niippun balorna.
56001011	Masapur ey mipaginok da nait ey tagu tey jida sey mangatud as makurkuran sey pammatin sey usa ey familya gapu asda tudtujuda ey dakumpun as lobbongna ey mitudtuju. Usa pey, kaviviin sey panggopda tey siya agabanda sey mangar-anda as pilak.
56001012	Inggow sey usa as dasey kananda ey profet ey kailiyanda ey iCrete ey nangimbaga ey kanana, “Ussatan losan da iCrete ya anungda dasey kagguugyat ey tanan. Tukarda ey mansiput kon mambas-orda ey mangan.”
56001013	Tuttuwa vus aan sey imbagan sey kailiyanda saji. At isasangum ey mangingor an jida ta mipuuli sey ustu ey pammatida
56001014	ya ipug-anda ey mandongor asda inuussat ey uguugujun dasey Jews ya ajida atyén patiyun dasey lintog ey kingwan da tagu ey vumusur assey katuttuwaan.
56001015	Sey tagu ey nadarus sey somsomokna, niippun aggissow an siya kon sey aggissow sey somsomokna ey aji pun mamati, niippun ambaru an siya tey ajina pun mimatunan sey ambaru ya sey lawingan.
56001016	Kananda ey agammuda as Apudyus kon mimatunan assey kopyada ey niippun agammuda an siya. Aggissow sey angiilan Apudyus an jida tey ajida pun unujun sey vilinna ya niippun lamugda ey mangwa asda ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey ambaru ey makwa.
56002001	Kon an sika Titus, masapur ey katuttuwaan sey itudtujum asda mamati.
56002002	Asda angkamarong-ag, bagbagaam jida ta masapur ey tonton-onda ey uminum, ajida koon dasey pipiun sey long-ag, ilanda sey angokoonda ta rispituwun da tagu jida gapu assey ambaru ey ugalida. Ya bagbagaam jida ta masapur lumamut sey pammatida, ipiilada sey dokor ey layadda asda vurunda ya aawwad atyén sey anus an jida.
56002003	Ya as dasey angkamad-an, bagbagaam avus jida ta naapudyusan atyén dasey angokoonda ey matagu ta miyunud assey pammatida. Ajida atyén da an-uguugud as mangimparwing asda ujum ya ajida amvubvuuk ta siya koonda sey mantudtuju as ambaru.
56002004	Tudtujuwanda dasey vubai ey ka'aasawa assey ustu ey koonda ey maryad asda asawada ya da anakda.
56002005	Mabagbagaanda ta iyattumda sey pipiun sey long-agda ya nadarus sey katataguda. Masapur vus ipuutda dasey makwa assey vuruy, naanusda ya ampaiturey asda asawada. At nu kanaʼsna sey makwa, aji pun maamsiw sey Gingan Apudyus ey apporow taku itudtuju.
56002006	Pakasdorom sey somsomok dasey vinabaruwan ta iyattumda sey pipiun sey long-agda.
56002007	Ya sika Titus, masapur atyén ipiilam sey ambaru ey kopya asda amin ey tagu ta awad unujun da ujum. Assey mantudtujuwam, masapur tuttuwa sey panggopnu ya mitagop assey angokoom ey mangingginga assey napatig ey tudtujum.
56002008	Ilam ta ustu sey tudtujum ta niippun mangamsiw. Tey nu siyana sey koom, maviinan dasey gumugura tey niippun udasanda as lawing ey maamsiwan taku.
56002009	Ibagam avus asda alipan ta ampaitureyda asda apuda assey amin ey koonda ta mas-um sey apuda an jida. Ajida atyén da mikasongbat an jida
56002010	unnu iyakow ey mangara assey kuwan sey apuda nu aji siya ipiilada sey kinaambaruda. Matalikda atyén asda amin ey koonda ta mimatunan da tagu sey kinaambarun sey tudtuju miipanggop an Apudyus ey nanginsarakan an jitaku.
56002011	Tey as Apudyus, impiilana sey kinaambaruna ta misarakan da amin ey tagu.
56002012	At gapu assey daguna, tinudtujuwana jitaku ta man-awidan taku sey amin ey lapun dasey umadayuwan an siya. Man-annad taku asda amin ey niilluvungan ey pipiun sey long-ag. Masapur ey awad sey kinalintog an jitaku ya naapudyusan sey nakopyaan taku assey iggawan taku assey luta anna.
56002013	Kanaʼsna sey koon assey anguullayan taku assey kadadayow ey timpu ey mipiil-an sey kinadayow Jesu Cristu ey Apudyus taku ey mannakabalin ya nanginsarakan an jitaku.
56002014	Innatjuna sey long-agna ey matuy para an jitaku ta mawayaan taku assey amin ey pannakabalin sey basur ta ambalinuna jitaku as naapudyusan ey taguna ey silalayad ey mangwa asda ambaru.
56002015	Itudtujum amin da nauy asda tagu sinat tey awad sey karobbongam ey mangimpakasdor asda somsomokda ya mamagbaga an jida. Ilam sey angokoom ta niippun mangamsiw an sika.
56003001	Ipakagasmoknu asda mamati sinat ta masapur ey ampaitureyda asda turey assey gubernu ya asda ujum ey naatdan as karobbongan ey manturey. Nakasaganada ey manongpar asda vilinda ya nakasaganada vus ey tumurung asda ambaru ey makwa.
56003002	Niippun atyén gumingaginga as lawingan ey mivusur asda barangna ey tagu. Ajida mikasongbat nu aji siya atyén koonda sey anusanda ey mikavub-urun ya ampakumbabada asda amin ey tagu.
56003003	Tey urey jitaku assey kar-argow at kurang vus sey agammu taku miipanggop an Apudyus ya aji taku pun vus jumngor. Naallilow taku ya inalipan jitaku asda nantokotokon ey pipiun sey long-ag ya dasey lawingan ey pipiun taku koon. Lawingan sey somsomok taku asda vurun taku ya nan-ap-apos taku. Ginuran jitaku asda tagu ya ginura taku vus jida.
56003004	Kon as Apudyus ey manginsarakan, impiilana sey daguna ya layadna.
56003005	At insarakanna jitaku ey dakumpun as gapu as dasey ambabaru ey kingwa taku nu aji gapu assey daguna. Inurasana dasey kaggissow assey viyag taku ya naatdan taku as baru ey viyag gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispirituna ey kama as kasin taku niyanak.
56003006	Innatudna an jitaku sey Ispirituna ey niippun kinagagaana gapu an Jesu Cristu ey manginsarakan an jitaku.
56003007	Kingwana jiyuy ta laksunun taku sey viyag ey niippun patinggana. Sey mibasaran sey tawid taku at sey nangimvilangana an jitaku as niyun-un gapu assey kinaambaruna.
56003008	Tuttuwa amin da nauy ey imbagak. At da nauy sey piuk ey ipapatim itudtuju as dasey mamati an Apudyus sinat ta ampawotonda ey mangwa asda ambaru. Amud sey vinarun dasey tudtuju sana ya dokor sey miiturungna as dasey amin ey tagu.
56003009	Kon ajika da mikakwa asda niippun servina ey ansosongbatan da tagu, kama asda uraurak, jisjiskas miipanggop assey lintog Moses ya asda angatud as man-iisikan tey da nauy at niippun ambaru as atjuna ya miiturungna assey pammati taku.
56003010	Nu awad tagu as manadail assey amvuvurnanyu ey mangwa as lapun sey mavukaranyu, masapur ey bagbagaam ta iginokna. Nu pinigwam vinagbagaan ya ajina pun dongron, ajika ogon mivurun an siya
56003011	tey agammum ey sey tagu ey kanaʼs ji at ummadayu assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju. At dasey lawingan ey apporona koon sey mangimpiila ey kinumbot siya.
56003012	Ibaarku as Artemas unnu as Tikicus ey umali sinat. At nu awad jumatong as usa an jida, lumibbatka ey dagus ey umali miyabot an sa'un ad Nicopolis tey as jiyuy sey simsimmokku ey iggawak assey agilid sana.
56003013	Iggam sey kaviilam ey manurung anda Apollos an Avugaju ey Zenas assey lumibbatanda ey umuy mantudtuju ta wadawad atyén dasey kasapuranda.
56003014	Ya sey usa vus ey koom, tudtujuwam dasey vurun taku ey mamati sinat ta paingsaunda ey mangwa as ambaru ta makaturungda asda angkasapuran as turung ta awad ambaru as muusaran sey viyag taku assey luta anna.
56003015	Pakumustaunda sika da amin ey vurun taku sina. Pakumustaum avus dasey amin ey mamaryad an dakani gapu assey pammati taku. Kanana atyén ta atjun Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu sey vumaruwanyu losan.
57001001	Sa'un an Paul ey nibarud gapu assey nangintudtujuwak miipanggop an Cristu Jesus. As Timothy ey sunud taku at anna vus as nauy. Anna ey manurat kani an sika Philemon ey pipiunni ya vurunni assey siput ey mangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus.
