57001002	Ya sey surat anna at para vus asda amin ey mamati ey madagudagup assey vuruyyu ya para vus an Apphia ey sunud taku ya an Arkipus ey usa ey vurun taku ey miyanung as surdajun Jesu Cristu.
57001003	Kanana atyén ta as Apudyus ey ama taku ya as Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku sey mangatud as vumaruwanyu ta natarna sey ansomsomkanyu.
57001004	Assey dak manginjug-an ey mangilluwaru an sika, ansarasaramatak an Apudyus
57001005	tey jingngorku sey angokoom ey mamati an Apu Jesus ya sey layadnu asda amin ey tagun Apudyus.
57001006	At sey apporok iluwaru ta sey nasa'anan taku assey pammati, iluswana atyén sey ad-aju ey pannakaawat as dasey ambabaru ey awad an jitaku gapu assey nasa'anan taku an Cristu.
57001007	Assey katuttuwaan, amud sey ragsak ya kummasdor sey an-ang-angsak gapu assey layadnu asda tagun Apudyus ya impakasdornu sey somsomokda.
57001008	At siyana sey lapuna ey anna sey kudawuk an sika. At urey nu awad karobbongak ey sunudnu an Cristu as mangimmandar an sika assey ustu ey kasapuran ey koom, dakumpun as siyana sey kook,
57001009	nu aji ampangpangaasiyak atyén an sika gapu ta man-asilayadta. At sa'un an Paul ey narakey ey nibarud gapu assey nangintudtujuwak an Cristu Jesus,
57001010	ampangpangaasiyak an sika ta kadaguwam as Onesimus ey anakku assey pammati assey timpu ey nibarudak.
57001011	Assey keysan ey ag-agow, niippun servin nauy ey tagu an sika, kon assey sana, dokor sey turungna an jita.
57001012	At assey sana, ipuulik siya an sika, urey nu mansigab assey somsomokku sey umayawana tey pipiuk siya.
57001013	Piuk atyén ey inggow siya as nauy assey nibaballudak gapu assey nangintudtujuwak assey Ambaru ey Damag ta turungana sa'un ta siya sey kama as pannakalong-agnu.
57001014	Kon simsimmokku ey dakumpun as ustu nu kanaʼsna sey kook nu dokon an sika sey mangimparuvus. Tey sumangaak vus ey mangimpapilit an sika ey tumurung an sa'un nu aji sika ey mismu sey marpuwan sey ambaru ey goom.
57001015	Siya nin nisinaan Onesimus an sika as sin-akitan ta nu mipuuli ey, inggow an sika as ing-inggana.
57001016	Kon misarad assey sana, dakumpun ogon as alipan sey vilangna nu aji napatpatig nu sey alipan tey assey sana, siya sey usa ey pipiun taku ey sunud an Cristu. Napatig siya an sa'un, kon agammuk ey sin-umamud an sika tey assey sana, napatig siya ey alipannu ya nambalin vus as usa ey sunudnu an Apu taku.
57001017	At nu tuttuwa ey ivilangnu sa'un as vurunnu ey mamati, ambaruwum padatngon siya assey ampuuliyana ey kama atyén vus assey mamadatongam an sa'un nu sa'un sey umali.
57001018	At nu awad kingwana as lawingan an sika unnu awad utangna, sa'un sey ansingilam.
57001019	Mismu ey sa'un sey sinsurat as nauy ta awad angagammuwam ey tongparuk sey imbagak: “Sa'un as Paul. Bayadak sey utang Onesimus an sika.” Aji pun nin masapur ey ipakagasmokku an sika ey utangnu vus an sa'un sey viyagnu an Cristu as ing-inggana.
57001020	At sika sunud ey Philemon, kanana atyén pey ta tongparum sey piuk ey kudawun an sika gapu assey namatiyan taku an Apu Jesus. Pakasdorom atyén sey somsomokku ya angwaka as allaylayadak tey nansunudta gapu an Cristu.
57001021	Kon urey assey manuratak anna an sika, agammuk ey niippun juwajuwana ey tongparum sey ibagak ya agammuk ey dardallu sey koom nu sey dawatku anna.
57001022	Anna pey dallu sey ujum ey piuk ibaga an sika. Kon nu awad kabalinana, manginsaganaka as kuwartu as iggawak. Tey agammuk ey songbatan Apudyus sey luwaruyu ya mawayaanak ey umali sinat ey mangila an dakayu.
57001023	Anna ey pakumustaun sika an Epapras ey vurunku ey nibarud gapu assey nanserviyana an Cristu Jesus.
57001024	Losan vus sika pakumustaun anda Mark, Aristarcus, Demas ya Luke ey vurunku assey kiwaar ey innatud Apudyus.
57001025	Kanana atyén ta atjun Apu Jesu Cristu sey vumaruwanyu losan.
58001001	Assey keysan ey ag-agow, nanginkinnu ey inggow dasey impaagammun Apudyus as dasey dakdakor taku ey impabagana as dasey profetna ey nantokotokon sey nangwana,
58001002	kon assey sana ey anungus sey ag-agow, sey Anakna sey inusarna ey gumminga an jitaku. Sey Anakna anna sey nangimpakwaana assey kangamin ya siya sey pinilina ey mallaksun assey kangamin.
58001003	Sey Anakna avus sey miil-an sey kinaambaru ya kinangatun Apudyus ya siya sey ustuustu ey miil-an sey kinaApudyus Apudyus. Ya gapu assey pannakabalin sey Gingana at siya sey manginturturung ya mamangjun assey kangamin. Ya naasna pun kingwa sey kadarusan sey basur taku ey tagu, tummukju ey manturey assey padawanan kangatuwan ey Apudyus ad langit.
58001004	At nambalin siya as nangatngatu nu dasey enjel ya kama avus assey ngadan ey impangadan Apudyus an siya at sin-umamud sey madayawana nu sey ngadan dasey enjel.
58001005	Tey niippun nangimbagaan Apudyus as usa asda enjel as kanana, “Sika sey Anakku. At ey sana, ipiilak ey sa'un sey Amam.” Ya niippun vus imbagana miipanggop asda enjel as kanana ey, “Sa'un sey Amana ya siya sey Anakku.”
58001006	Ya anna pun ey tigangey sey mangimbaaran Apudyus assey madadayow ey Anakna assey luta, kanana, “An dakayu losan ey enjelku, mandayow kayu an siya.”
58001007	Kon miipanggop asda enjel, kanan Apudyus, “Ambalinuk da enjelku as abvid baba'aruk ey anungda sey gumilgillajung ey apuy.”
58001008	Kon sey miipanggop assey Anakna, kanana, “Sika ey Apudyus, niippun ampatinggaan sey tureynu as ing-inggana ya nalintog sey angokoom ey manturey.
58001009	Mamaryadka assey nalintog ey makwa ya sasang-am sey lawingan. At jinutukak sika, sa'un ey Apudyusnu as sin-umamud sey ragsaknu nu dasey vurunnu.”
58001010	Kanana vus ey, “Assey saradna, sika ey Apu sey nangwa assey luta ya amin ey awad ad langit.
58001011	Umdas sey timpu ey mapungpungda kon aawwadka as ing-inggana. Umdas sey timpu ey maropokda ey kama assey lumvun.
58001012	Ya kinupikupnu ey kamaʼs jummudaan ey lumvun ta moorsan, kon an sika, niippun ambarbaliwana tey sey viyagnu at sisiyya as ing-inggana.”
58001013	Niippun vus nangimbagaan Apudyus as usa asda enjel as kanana, “Tumukjuka assey padawananku inggana as aminuk ipasuku an sika dasey kavusurnu ey kama as ginugusdam jida.”
58001014	Ngan da enjel sana? Jida dasey aji pun miila ey anserservi an Apudyus ya jida dasey ibaabaarna para as dasey tagu ey misarakan.
58002001	At nu kanaʼsji sey kinangatun sey Anak Apudyus, masapur ey ammaan taku imumura assey somsomok taku dasey tuttuwa ey jingngor taku ta aji taku miyow-ow.
58002002	Sey Gingan Apudyus ey impaagammun dasey enjel as dasey dakdakor taku at napaniknikan ey tuttuwa tey sey tagu ey nallabsing unnu aji pun nangunud at nilak-amna sey ustuustu ey jusa.
58002003	At nu kanaʼsji, yangey aji sin-umamud ey aji taku pun malisiyan sey jusa nu aji taku ipatig sey nabalor ey misarakanan da tagu ey impaagammun Jesus? As Apu Jesus sey ab-avus ey nangimpaagammu assey nauy ey misarakanan. Ya dasey nangngor, impaniknikda an jitaku ey tuttuwa da nauy.
58002004	Ya urey as Apudyus at inavunana ey tuttuwa sey imbagada gapu asda sinyar ya da nakaskasdaow ya da nantokotokon ey kingwana ey nangimpiila assey pannakabalinna. Ya sey usa avus at sey nangatdana assey usa ya usa assey kaviilan ey narpu assey Ispirituna ey mibasar assey piuna.
58002005	Sey ibagabagani anna ey barbaru ey luvung assey daan ey ag-agow at dakumpun as dasey enjel sey pinilin Apudyus ey manginturey nu aji dasey tagu.
58002006	Tey sey nikur-it assey Gingana, kanana, “Apudyus, ngan gey sey katatagun da tagu ta sosomkom ya pupu'utum jida?
58002007	Kingwam jida as nababbaba nu da enjel as sin-akitan ya amud vus sey kingwam ey nangwa as midayawanda ey kama as midayawan ji ari
58002008	ya nambalinum jida as manginturey assey kangamin.” At sey piuna kanan sey kangamin, niippun ajin sey tagu iturayan. Kon miila assey sana ey daan pun jumatong sey makwaan sey manginturayan sey tagu assey kangamin.
58002009	Kon sey nibabagga anna at natongpar an Jesus tey assey sin-akitan, nambalin siya as nababbaba nu dasey enjel assey nambalinana as tagu. Nakwa jiyuy gapu assey kinaambarun Apudyus ta mabalin ey matuy as para asda amin ey tagu. Kon agammu taku ey assey sana, amud sey kingwan Apudyus ey nangimpadayow an siya ey kama assey dayow ji ari gapu assey katuy ey nilak-amna.
58002010	As Apudyus sey nangwa assey kangamin ya nangimpaviyang as mabalin ey koon sey usa ya usa asda kangamin ey kingwana. At niyustuustu sey panggop Apudyus ey nambalinuna as Jesus as ustu ey pangat taku gapu assey tongtong-ag ey nilak-amna, tey siya sey nangimpangat an jitaku assey kasarakanan taku. Kingwan Apudyus ji ta adjuwan sey ambalin as anakna ey ayagana ad langit ey mijuga assey kinangatuna.
58002011	As Jesus sey nanarus as dasey basur taku. At ey sana, as Jesus ya jitaku ey nambalinuna as nadarus at sa'an sey Ama taku losan. At siya sey aji pun as Jesus maviin ey mangimvilang an jitaku as susunudna.
58002012	Tey kanana an Apudyus, “Ibagak as dasey susunudku sey miipanggop an sika. Ikankantak sey dayowku an sika assey apporoda madagupan.”
58002013	Kanana vus, “Mantalikak an Apudyus.” Ya asina at vus kanan, “Annaak ey nijujugga asda aanak Apudyus ey intalikna an sa'un.”
58002014	Gapu ta dasey aanak Apudyus at taguda ey awad long-agna ey mabalin matuy, nambalin vus as Jesus as tagu ey awad long-agna ta awad annuna ey matuy. Kingwana nauy ta assey matuyana, urguna as Jimunyu ey lapun sey matuyan da tagu.
58002015	ya wayawayaana jida tey kamadaʼs nambalin as alipan nisarad assey niyanakanda gapu assey ugyatda ey matuy.
58002016	At maawatan ey dakumpun as dasey enjel sey turuturungana nu aji jitaku ey tagu ey mivilang as ganak Abraham.
58002017	At siya sey nambalin as anung taku ey susunudna ta ambalin as kangatuwan ey paji ey kumakaddagu ya matalik siya ey karun taku an Apudyus. Nambalin siya as kangatuwan ey paji ta koona sey makaanan dasey basur taku.
58002018	At gapu ta nilak-amna sey tongtong-ag anda sulisug, kaviilana ey tumurung asda tagu ey masulisulisug.
58003001	At dakayu ey susunud ey pinilin Apudyus as taguna ya inayagana ey mijuga an siya, sosomkonyu as Jesus ey imbaar Apudyus ey nambalin as kangatuwan ey paji taku assey pammati ey itatakjug taku.
58003002	Matalik siya ey mangwa asda piun Apudyus ey nanjutuk an siya ey anung Moses ey matalik ey nanserservi asda amin ey tagu assey familyan Apudyus.
58003003	Kon dokdokor sey midayawan Jesus nu as Moses tey kama assey ampatakjug as vuruy at dokdokor sey midayawana nu sey nipatakjug ey vuruy.
58003004	At asda amin ey vuruy, awad sey nangwa, kon sey nangwa assey kangamin at as Apudyus.
58003005	Tuttuwa ey matalik as Moses ey nanserservi asda amin ey vuvurunna ey tagun Apudyus ya tinakjugana dasey imbagan Apudyus assey daan ey ag-agow.
58003006	Kon as Cristu, siya sey Anak Apudyus ey matalik ey mamupuut assey vuruy Apudyus. Ya jitaku ey mamati sey kama as vuruyna nu popotpotan taku ya aji taku ikaviin sey namnama taku an siya.
58003007	Masapur dongron taku sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey kanana, “Nu dongronyu sey Gingan Apudyus assey sana ey ag-agow,
58003008	ajiyu pakabnutun sey somsomokyu ey kama assey kingwan dasey dakdakoryu assey iniiggawanda assey danak ey nangontra an Apudyus ta ilanda nu ngey koona an jida.
58003009	Tey kanan Apudyus, urey nu ummuy as opatpuru ey tawun sey apporowda nangil-ail-an as dasey nakaskasdaow ey kingwakingwak, inturturuyda pey dallu ey pinasanga sa'un.
58003010	At siya sey summang-ak asda tagu anna at kanak, ‘Kanayun ey man-awidanyu sa'un ya sumanga kayu ey mangunud as dasey vilinku.’
58003011	At assey sangak an jida, insapatak ey kanak, ‘Ajida pun makasakey assey insaganak ey man-illonganda.’”
58003012	At man-annad kayu dakayu ey susunud ta ajiyu iparuvus sey lawingan ey somsomok ya juwajuwa tey oni at lawa ya nan-awidanyu as Apudyus ey matatagu as ing-inggana.
58003013	At sey koonyu atyén assey inag-agow ta daan mapungpung sey ag-agow, ampipinnakasdor kayu ta niippun atyén maallilow an dakayu assey basur ey mangimpakabnut assey somsomokyu.
58003014	At nu pumangug taku ey anturturuy ey mantalik an Cristu mallugi assey saradna inggana assey anungus sey ag-agow, mijuga taku losan an siya.
58003015	Assey Gingan Apudyus, kanana, “Assey sana ey ag-agow, nu dongronyu sey Gingan Apudyus, ajiyu pakabnutun sey somsomokyu ey kama assey nangontraan dasey dakdakoryu an Apudyus assey kar-argow.”
58003016	Ngan dasey nangngor assey Gingan Apudyus ya nangontra? Yangey dokon dasey tagu ey ingkar Moses ad Egypt?
58003017	Ya ngan dasey tagu ey pinumpumtukan Apudyus assey opatpuru ey tawun? Yangey dokon dasey nakabasur ey namin natuy assey iniggawanda assey danak?
58003018	Ya ngan dasey tagu ey nanginsapataan Apudyus ey ajina pun padatngon assey insaganana ey man-illongan? Yangey dokon dasey kummuntra an siya?
58003019	At nauy sey mangil-an taku nu pada lawa aji nipanad assey luta ey ayanda tey gapu assey ajida pun namatiyan.
58004001	At gapu ta sissiya sey impostan Apudyus ey insasagganana ey intaku man-illongan, masapur ilan taku tey oni at lawa ya awad ji aji pun makasakey.
58004002	Tey jingngor taku sey Ambaru ey Damag ey kama vus asda dakdakor taku kon an jida, niippun ambaru as niserviyan sey jingngorda tey sey jingngorda saji, nangalegalewak assey ingada.
58004003	At jitaku anggey ey mamati sey makasakey assey impostan Apudyus ey man-illongan. Tey sey imbagan Apudyus miipanggop as dasey aji pun makasakey, kanana, “Gapu assey sangak an jida, insapatak ey ajida pun umdas assey luta ey man-illonganda atyén!” Imbagana nauy urey nu insasagganana naas sey man-illonganda misarad assey nakwaan sey luvung.
58004004	Tey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus miipanggop assey mikapitu ey ag-agow ey kanana, “Nan-illong as Apudyus assey mikapitu ey ag-agow assey nangimpadakpusana ey nangwa assey kangamin.”
58004005	Ya ingkasinna imbaga ey kanana, “Ajik pun iparuvus ey umdasda assey luta ey insaganak ey man-illonganda atyén.”
58004006	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, awad dallu dasey ujum ey mabalin sumakey. Kon as dasey namangu ey nangngor assey Ambaru ey Damag at ajida pun nakasakey assey insaganan Apudyus ey man-illonganda tey ajida pun pinati.
58004007	At sey kingwan Apudyus, inggoddongna sey sabali ey ag-agow ta awad agammun da tagu ey sumakey. At sey nauy ey “Ag-agow,” assey sana. At ummayow pun sey kam-ana ey tawun, impabagana vus nauy an Ari David ey kanana, “Assey sana ey ag-agow, nu dongronyu sey Gingan Apudyus, patiyunyu ya ajiyu as pakabnutun sey somsomokyu.”
58004008	Agammu taku avus ey sey impostan Apudyus ey man-illongan at dakumpun ad Canaan ey nangimpangatan Joshua as dasey dakdakor taku assey kar-argow. Tey nu ad Canaan, aji pun atyén Apudyus kasin imbaga ey awad sey sabali ey ag-agow.
58004009	At assey sana, sissiya ey awad sey insasagganan Apudyus ey man-illongan para asda taguna ey anung sey nan-illongana assey mikapitu ey ag-agow.
58004010	At ngan ey dasey sumakey assey insaganan Apudyus ey man-illongan, man-illongda assey siputda ey anung sey nan-illongana assey nangimpadakpusana assey kingwana.
58004011	At masapur ipapati taku sey kaviilan taku ey sumakey assey siyaji ey man-illongan ta niippun mayagyag an jitaku ey anung dasey dakdakor taku ey aji pun nanongpar assey imbagan Apudyus.
58004012	Tey ngan ey sey ibagan Apudyus, kama as awad angusna ey natatagu ya mannakabalin. Ya kama as sin-umamud sey tajumna nu sey bangid ey namviniik sey ngarabna ey manikpus assey nambootan sey tong-ar ya sey otok. Tey sey Gingan Apudyus at kotdona sey kaadaruman ey somsomok ji tagu ya vukitkitana sey nitataru ey panggop ya piun sey tagu.
58004013	At niippun mabalin mitaru an Apudyus tey urey assey kangamin at ampatak assey angiilana. At siya sey songbatan taku an siya dasey amin ey apporow taku kingwa ya amin ey awad assey somsomok taku.
58004014	At gapu ta as Jesus ey Anak Apudyus sey kangatuwan ey paji taku ey siya sey kama as karun taku ey ummuy ad langit assey iggawan Apudyus, masapur aji taku man-awidan sey pammati ey itatakjug taku.
58004015	Ya sey kangatuwan ey paji taku, maawatana sey amin ey angkapuyan taku tey napadasana sey amin ey karasin ji sulisug kon aji pun nakabasur.
58004016	At masapur naturud taku ey umadani an Apudyus assey tureyna tey amud sey kinaambaruna at nu ampangpangaasi taku an siya, kadaguwana jitaku ya turungana jitaku assey timpu ey angkasapuran taku as turung.
58005001	Sey kangatuwan ey paji, napili siya as dasey anungna ey tagu ya jinutukanda siya ta manservi an Apudyus as pannakalong-agda. Siya sey mangindatun asda ayém an Apudyus unnu da ujum ey datun ey atjun dasey asintataguna as mapakawanan dasey basurda.
58005002	Kon urey vus siya ey kangatuwan ey paji at awad vus sey mangkapuyana at siya sey maawatana vus dasey ambasbasur ey aji pun nangigammu ey basur atpey sey kookoonda.
58005003	At gapu ta awad vus angkapuyana, andatun vus an Apudyus as para assey basurna ey dakumpun anggey as para asda nakabasur ey asintataguna.
58005004	Usa pey, niippun paji as ampannanig ey mangimpadayow assey long-agna ta ambalinuna as nangatu ey paji tey keygad as Apudyus ey mamili assey usa ey tagu ey anung sey nakwa an Aaron ey ab-avus ji paji assey kar-argow.
58005005	Anungna avus an Cristu, dakumpun as siya sey nangimpadayow assey long-agna ey ambalin as nangatu ey paji nu aji as Apudyus sey namili an siya ey nangimbaga ey kanana, “Sika sey Anakku. At ey sana ey ag-agow, ipiilak ey sa'un sey Amam.”
58005006	Awad vus sey usa ey nikukur-it ey kanan Apudyus, “Sika sey paji as ing-inggana ey anung sey kinapajin Melkisedek.”
58005007	Assey iniggawan Jesus assey luta anna, magon ta ibaksarna ey mangimpapati ey alluwaru an Apudyus tey siya anggey sey makasarak an siya assey matuyana. At jingngor Apudyus sey luwaruna tey iyyuuyan Jesus sey somsomokna ey nampakumbaba assey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey piun Apudyus.
58005008	Tey urey nu Anak Apudyus siya, inadarna assey natongtong-agana nu ngan annuna ey mangunud an Apudyus.
58005009	Assey kingwana amin sey masapur ey koona, mabalin ey isarakana as ing-inggana dasey amin ey tagu ey mangunud an siya.
58005010	Ya usa pey, jinutukan Apudyus siya as kangatuwan ey paji ey anung sey kinapajin Melkisedek.
58005011	Adjuwan atyén sey piuk ibaga miipanggop assey mipaniyan Jesus as kangatuwan ey paji ey niyanung an Melkisedek kon ansigab as ipakaawat tey kama as kummabnut sey otokyu ey ansigabyuʼs maawatan.
58005012	Nabayag sey namatiyanyu ey lamugyu atyén mantudtuju asda ujum, kon sissiya atgey ey kasapuranyu ey matudtujuwan as dasey allasu as maawatan miipanggop an Apudyus. Sissiya kayu atgey ey sumusususu ey aji pun makakotkot assey kakannun da nat-ong.
58005013	Tey sey ansusu, sissiya ey uttiutting ey niippun agammuna assey tudtuju miipanggop assey ambalinan as niyun-un.
58005014	Kon sey mangkabnut ey makan at para asda tagu ey nat-ong ey nangimpiingsa assey somsomokda ey mangillasin assey ustu ya dakumpun ustu.
58006001	At sey koon taku atyén, adarun taku dasey nuunig ey tudtuju ta jumgot sey pammati taku ya aji taku pasig gey sissiya assey lugrugin sey tudtuju assey namatiyan taku. Aji taku atyén vus ikasin adarun nu ngan annun sey pammati ey mipon-ad kama assey manginyagéyan as dasey kopya ey niippun servina ya sey tuttuwa ey pammati an Apudyus.
58006002	Aji taku atyén vus ikasin adarun sey miipanggop as dasey vunyag, miipanggop assey mangimpatayan assey ima assey tagu ey miluwaruwan, miipanggop assey umuliyén dasey natuy ya sey manguwisan Apudyus as dasey aji pun mamati.
58006003	Sey koon taku atyén nu iparuvus Apudyus, ituruy taku adarun dasey tudtuju ey mangimpapagdot assey pammati taku.
58006004	Tey dasey tagu ey nan-awidanda sey pammatida, aji pun mabalin ey kasinda maawis ey ambabawi. Tey assey namatiyanda, nasilawan mit sey somsomokda ya napadasanda sey libli ey turung Apudyus ya nilagumda avus assey Ispirituna
58006005	ya napadasanda sey kinabarun sey Gingan Apudyus ya sey pannakabalin Apudyus ey mipiila assey daan ey ag-agow.
58006006	At dasey tagu sana, nu man-awidanda amin da nauy, aji pun as mabalin ey ampuulida ey kasin ambabawi tey kama as ilansada kasin sey Anak Apudyus assey krus ta miviviin assey sinagung dasey adjuwan ey tagu.
58006007	Anungna vus assey luta, tey sey luta ey masivusivugan assey udan ya impatuvuna sey mura ey manservi assey silluta, pabaruwun Apudyus jiyuy ey luta.
58006008	Kon sey luta ey sissiit anda niippun servina ey lugam sey ipatuvuna, niippun servin jiyuy ey luta. Niippun ambanagana nu aji milunud ya oni ey jinadail sey apuy.
58006009	Kon urey nu kanaʼsna sey ibagabagani an dakayu ey susunud, niippun juwajuwan sey somsomokni ey simvumaru sey awad an dakayu tey sey koko'onyu at siya sey kopyan dasey insarakan Apudyus.
58006010	Ustu sey koon Apudyus assey kangamin at ajina pun maliwatan dasey ambabaru ey kingwayu ya sey layadyu an siya ey nipiila assey nanuruturunganyu asda vurunyu ey mamati ya anna assey sana ey siya sey apporoyu kookoon.
58006011	Sey piunni atyén, usausa an dakayu at ipapatina ey annamnama inggana assey anungus sey ag-agow ta gun-ujuna sey apporona namnamaun.
58006012	Tey nu koonyu jiyuy, aji kayu antukkatukkar nu aji anungunyu dasey ujum ey tagu ey gapu assey pammatida ya anusda at laksununda sey impostan Apudyus.
58006013	Assey nangimpostaan Apudyus an Abraham ey awad sey koona, insapatana ey koona sey impostana. At gapu ta niippun nangatngatu nu siya, sey long-agna sey inusarna ey nanakjug assey insapatana
58006014	assey nangimbagaana an Abraham ey kanana, “Isigurajuk ey vindisyunak sika ya paganakuk sika.”
58006015	Inaannusan pun Abraham ey nanguulley, naatud tuttuwa an siya sey impostan Apudyus.
58006016	Sey tagu nu awad isapatana ey koon, mansapata ey mangimbaga assey nangatngatu nu siya. At sey kanaʼsji ey kingwana, siyaji sey mangimpaniknik ey koona ey koon sey imbagana at mabalin ey guminok sey ansosongbatanda.
58006017	As Apudyus avus, piuna ey isiguraju as dasey mallaksun assey impostana ey aji pun mabalin mabaliwan sey panggopna ey koon at siyaji sey nanginsapataana ey koona sey impostana.
58006018	Sey impostana ya insapatana, da nauy ey juwa sey aji pun mabalin mabaliwan tey aji pun man-us-ussat as Apudyus. Siyaji sey kingwana ta jitaku ey ummuy nampasaraknib assey iggowna at kumasdor sey somsomok taku ey annamnama ey maatud an jitaku sey impostana.
58006019	At sey namnama taku anna at siya sey mangimpapagdot assey pammati taku tey siguraju ey matongpar. At gapu assey namnama taku, kama as naas taku summakey assey iggawan Apudyus ey kama assey summakayan sey kangatuwan ey paji assey Kasasantuwan ey Kuwartu ey nililingban sey kurtina assey Tempel.
58006020	As jiyuy sey namangpanguwan Jesus ey nikabagbaga an Apudyus as para an jitaku tey siya sey nambalin as kangatuwan ey paji taku as ing-inggana ey anung sey kinapajin Melkisedek.
58007001	As Melkisedek, siya sey ari ad Salem ya paji ey nanservi an Apudyus ey kangatuwan. Usa pun ey ag-agow ey ampuuli da Abraham ey ummuy nikagubat ey siya sey nangabakana asda opat ey ari, ummuy Melkisedek siya inabot asina at vindisyunan as Abraham.
58007002	Kingwan pun Abraham, innatudna an Melkisedek sey pagkapurun sey amin ey sinamsamda. (Sey piun sey ngadan ey Melkisedek ey ugujun at “Arin sey Niyun-un.” Kon gapu vus ta siya sey ari ad Salem ya sey piun sey Salem ey ugujun at “Turnus,” naawagan vus siya as “Arin sey Maturnusan.”)
58007003	Niippun mangigammuwan nu ngey ngadan da amana an inana unnu matuntunan sey singganak an siya. Niippun vus nangigammu nu ngey niyanakana unnu natuyana at siya sey kama as miyanung siya assey Anak Apudyus tey niippun nampatinggaan sey kinapajina.
58007004	At miila avus sey kinangatun Melkisedek tey urey as Abraham ey madadamag ey siya sey narpuwan taku ey Jews, vinigvigna sey kinangatun Melkisedek assey nangatdana an siya assey pagkapurun sey sinamsamda.
58007005	Sey lintog miipanggop assey pagkapuru at anggey dasey amin ey ganak Levi ey ambalin as paji sey awad karobbongana ey mangawat assey pagkapurun dasey kailiyanda ey Jews urey nu anjujugada losan ey ganak an Abraham.
58007006	Kon as Melkisedek, urey nu dakumpun as ganak Levi, inawatna vus pigey sey pagkapurun Abraham. Ya usa pey, vinindisyunana as Abraham urey nu as Abraham sey nangimpostaan Apudyus as dasey amin ey impostana.
58007007	Agammu taku ey sey angatud as vindisyun at nangatngatu nu sey tagu ey maatudana.
58007008	Nu miipanggop as dasey papaji ey apporow mangawat assey pagkapuru, matuyda tey taguda. Kon as Melkisedek ey nangawat assey pagkapurun Abraham, kama as sissiya ey matattagu tey niippun nuugud as natuyana nu aji sissiya sey kinapajina.
58007009	Ya assey nangatdan avus Abraham assey pagkapuru an Melkisedek, kama as nijuga nangatud da ganak Levi
58007010	tey assey nangabtan Melkisedek an Abraham, daan pun atgey miyanak as Levi at kama as sissiya ey awad as Levi assey long-ag Abraham ey singganak an siya.
58007011	Assey nangatdan Apudyus assey Lintog as dasey Jews illagumna assey lintog sey ampajiyan dasey amin ey ganak Levi. Kon sey siput dasey papaji at awad sey kurangna tey aji pun makwa sey amin ey panggop Apudyus at siya sey masapur awad sabali as paji ey mipasani ey anung sey kinapajin Melkisedek ey dakumpun as anung sey kinapajin Aaron ey ganak Levi.
58007012	At nu mabaliwan sey lintog miipanggop assey kinapajin sey paji, kasapuran avus ey mabaliwan sey lintog ey muunud.
58007013	At as Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu ey siya sey muugud as nauy, sabali sey singganak an siya ey dakumpun as ganak Levi tey naagammuwan ey ganak Judah siya. Ya niippun imbagbagan Moses as awad ampaji an jida ya niippun avus ujum as ganak Judah as nampaji.
58007015	Narawag ey nabaliwan sey lintog Apudyus assey lummuswaan sey sabali ey paji ey anung Melkisedek.
58007016	Sey nampajiyana, dakumpun as gapu ta vinnusna sey nakopyaan dasey singganak an siya ey imvilin sey lintog nu aji gapu assey pannakabalin sey viyagna ey niippun patinggana.
58007017	Tey sey nikur-it assey Gingan Apudyus at kanana, “Sika sey paji as ing-inggana ey anung sey kinapajin Melkisedek.”
58007018	At gapu assey nauy ey niginga, niwalin sey judaan ey lintog tey niippun dogotna ya niippun miserviyana.
58007019	Tey sey lintog Moses at niippun kaviilana ey mangimpabaru asda tagu assey ustuustu. Kon assey sana, awad sey namnamaun taku ey am-amud sey vinaruna ey manginyadani an jitaku an Apudyus.
58007020	As dasey ganak Levi, niippun nansapataan Apudyus assey nambalinanda as paji. Kon sey nambalinan Jesus as paji, awad sey insapatan Apudyus an siya ey kanana, “Sa'un ey Apudyus, ajik pun barbaliwan sey somsomokku. Isapatak ey ampajika as ing-inggana.”
58007022	At gapu assey nauy ey insapatan Apudyus, as Jesus sey nangimpatuttuwa assey ambab-aru ey turag.
58007023	Sey usa avus ey nitoknan sey kinapajin Jesus as dasey ganak Levi at adjuwanda ey nan-orooros kon niippun nanturturuy ey nanservi tey naminda nan-unuunud ey nangkakatuy.
58007024	Kon as Jesus, sissiya ey matattagu as ing-inggana at manturturuy sey kinapajina as ing-inggana.
58007025	At mallugi assey sana ya as ing-inggana, kaviilana ey manginsarakan assey urey ngadanna ey tagu ey umadani an Apudyus gapu assey pammatina an Jesus tey sissiya ey itatakjugna da mamati an Apudyus.
58007026	At as Jesus sey kangatuwan ey paji taku ey siya sey karun taku an Apudyus tey naApudyusan siya ya niippun purus basurna ya niippun majillawana. Ya siya avus at niippun mipaniyan sey kinangatun sey saadna ad langit.
58007027	As Jesus at aji pun miyanung as dasey ujum ey kangatuwan ey paji tey aji pun mandatun para assey basurna ya aji pun vus mandatun para as dasey basur da tagu. Tey kingwana pun, namingpingsanuna indatun sey long-agna ey matuy para asda amin ey tagu.
58007028	Tey nu miibasar assey Lintog Moses, sey tagu ey majutukan as kangatuwan ey paji at awad sey mangkurangana. Kon nu miibasar assey insapatan Apudyus ey asi nangudjiji ey ummali nu sey Lintog, niippun mangkurkurangana tey sey Anakna sey najutukan as ampaji as ing-inggana.
58008001	Sey vugas sey uguugujunni anna at awad sey Kangatuwan ey Paji taku ey tummutukju assey padawanan sey mannakabalin ey Apudyus ey mikaturturey an siya ad langit.
58008002	At sey manserserviyan sey Kangatuwan ey Paji at assey ustu ey mandayawan an Apudyus ad langit ey niippun ujum as nangwa nu aji as Apudyus ey dakumpun as kingwan ji tagu.
58008003	Amin ey kangatuwan ey paji, majutukanda ey mandatun an Apudyus as animar unnu da ujum ey karasin ji idatun da tagu. Anungna avus an Jesus ey Kangatuwan ey paji taku, masapur avus ey awad sey idatunna an Apudyus.
58008004	Kon nu awad as Jesus assey luta ey sana, aji pun as mabalin ey ampaji tey anna dasey jummada'an ey papaji ey napiyar ey mandatun an Apudyus ey siya sey vilin sey Lintog Moses.
58008005	Dasey papaji anna at anserservida assey torda ey bawi ey kama as anniniwan sey ustu ey awad ad langit. Tey as Moses, assey nangimpatakjugana assey torda ey bawi as mandayawanda an Apudyus, imvilin Apudyus an siya ey kanana, “Ilam ta masapur koonyu dasey amin ey impiilak an sika assey vilig.”
58008006	Kon sey siput ey intalik Apudyus an Jesus ey Kangatuwan ey Paji taku at nabarbalor nu sey siput dasey jummada'an ey paji. Tey sey baru ey inturag Apudyus asda tagu ey nangkarunan Jesus at ambab-aru nu sey judaan ey turag tey nibasar avus assey simvumaru ey impostan Apudyus.
58008007	Tey nu niippun atyén nangkurangan sey namangu ey turag Apudyus, aji pun atyén kasapuran ey miwalin ta miyoros sey mikagwa ey turag.
58008008	Kon impiilan Apudyus ey awad sey nangkurangan dasey taguna assey nangimbagaana ey kanana, “Jumatong sey timpu ey angwaak assey baru ey turag asda ganak Israel ya da ganak Judah.
58008009	Ya sey baru ey turag anna, aji pun miyanung assey inturagku as dasey dakdakorda assey kar-argow assey namuutak ey nangillayow an jida ta teynanda ad Egypt. Ajida pun inunud sey inturagku an jida at siya sey lapuna ey nan-awidak jida.
58008010	At ey sana, annaya sey baru ey ituragku as dasey ganak Israel assey daan ey ag-agow: Ipakagasmokku an jida dasey Lintogku ta mimumura assey somsomokda ey sa'un sey vigvigunda as Apudyusda ya jida sey ambalin as taguk.
58008011	At assey timpu saji, aji pun kasapuran ey antitinnudtujuda ey angkakarubvun unnu an-asibagbagada ey amvuvurun ey kananda, ‘Masapur agammuwun taku as Apudyus.’ Tey assey timpu saji, maagammuwanda losan sa'un mallugi assey kababaan ey tagu inggana assey kangatuwan.
58008012	Tey pakawanuk dasey basurda ya maliwatak dasey lawingan ey apporoda kingwa.”
58008013	At assey nangimbagaan Apudyus assey baru ey turag, sey piuna ugujun at naas sey kausaran sey namangu ey inturagna. At sey naropok ey niippun miserviyana, aji pun as ambayag at mamiid.
58009001	Assey namangu ey inturag Apudyus as dasey taguna at awad dasey muunud ey lintog ey koko'on da tagu ey mandayow an siya ya awad avus siji sey kingwada ey bawi ey torda ey apporoda mandayawan.
58009002	At sey bawi saji ey torda, juwa sey kuwartuna. Sey amangu ey muudasan ey kuwartu ey kananda ey “Nasantuwan ey kuwartu”, siyaji sey iggawan sey papattangan assey silow ya sey tebol ey awad sey tinapey ey nipapattang ey sigud ey nidadatun an Apudyus.
58009003	Assey mikagwa ey kuwartu ey vinordak sey kurtina, siyaji sey kananda ey “Kasasantuwan ey Kuwartun Apudyus.”
58009004	Assey kuwartu saji, awad sey altar ey vurawan sey kopyana ey siyaji sey apporoda angapuyan assey bangbangu ya awad avus siji sey kasun ey nagotapan as vurawan ey kananda ey “Vuruy sey Turag.” Siyaji avus sey iniggawan sey vurawan ey ammutu ey nakoan as manna ya sey surkud Aaron ey summimit ya asi at sey juwa ey dapin-ey ey batu ey nikur-itan dasey Simpuru ey Vilin Apudyus.
58009005	Ya assey usun avus sey kasun, awad sey juwa ey tinaggutaggu ey napayakan ey kananda ey Cherubim ey mangimpiila ey awad as Apudyus siji. Ya navitvit sey payakda ey nangiijung assey tangub sey kasun ey apporon sey dara miwarsiyan assey tinawun ta malingban sey basur dasey tagu. Kon dakumpun da nauy sey iparawagku assey sana.
58009006	Kanaʼsji sey napanusan da amin ey awad ad darum. At inag-agow ey sumakey dasey papaji assey Nasantuwan ey Kuwartu ey umuy mangwa assey siputda.
58009007	Kon assey mikagwa ey Kasasantuwan ey Kuwartu, anggey sey kangangattuwan ey paji as sumakey ey mamingsan anggey assey makatawun. Kon aji pun avus maggey sumakey nu niippun isakeyna as dara ey umuyna idatun an Apudyus ey para as dasey basurna ya as dasey basur ey kingwan da tagu ey aji pun as nagagara.
58009008	At gapu asda nauy, impaagammun sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey daan pun atgey mabkatan sey ayun da tagu ey umuy assey Kasasantuwan ey Kuwartu nu sissiya ey tatakjug sey vub-ulluy ey torda ey iggawan sey namangu ey kuwartu ey apporon da tagu mandayawan an Apudyus.
58009009	Amin da nauy at awad sey piuna ey itudtuju assey sana ey timpu tey urey nu kam-ana ey animar anda ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey idatunda an Apudyus, aji pun pey dallu umaney as manarus assey basurda as vumaruwan sey somsomokda.
58009010	Amin da nauy ey datun at miipanggop anggey assey makan, miinum ya dasey nantokotokon ey koon ey manguras assey long-ag. Da nauy at vilin anggey ey masapur tongparun da tagu inggana as ipabarun Apudyus da kangamin.
58009011	At assey sana ey impabarun Apudyus sey kangamin, as Cristu sey nambalin as kangatuwan ey paji taku ey siya sey namadasan taku assey ambaru ey makwamakwa. Ya sey manserserviyana assey kinapajina at sin-umamud sey vinaruna ey niippun kurangna tey dakumpun as tagu sey nangwa ya dakumpun as niluluta.
58009012	At sey kingwan Cristu, namingpingsan ey summakey assey Kasasantuwan ey Kuwartun Apudyus ya sey insakeyna ey indatunna an Apudyus at dakumpun as daran sey ganjing ya baka nu aji sey mismu ey darana ey siya sey makaanan sey basur taku as ing-inggana.
58009013	Assey judaan ey nakopyaan, madarusan sey usa ey tagu as dasey paniyow ta mabalinda kasin mandayow an Apudyus gapu anggey assey miwarsiyan sey daran sey ganjing ya lakin sey baka ey nakamsan as dapur sey nasgub ey maginaney ey baka.
58009014	At nu nadarusanda assey daran sey animar, ey aji sin-umamud sey daran Cristu ey manarus an jitaku? At gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritu ey niippun patinggana, indatun Cristu an Apudyus sey mismu ey long-agna ey niippun kurangna. Sey darana at darusana sey somsomok taku as dasey niippun servina ey apporow taku kingwa ta mabalin taku kasin manservi an Apudyus ey matatagu as ing-inggana.
58009015	At as Cristu sey karun assey Baru ey Turag ta dasey nambalinun Apudyus as taguna at awatunda sey impostana ey niippun patinggana. Siguraju ey makwa nauy tey natuy as Cristu ey nanubvut as dasey basur da tagu ey aji pun sey Judaan ey Turag lamug kingwa as miyadaniyan dasey nambasur ey mandayow an Apudyus.
58009016	Nu miipanggop ey assey kasuratan nu ngan sey mangara assey kuwan sey tagu nu matuy, inggana as awad manuttuwaan ey natuy sey singkuwa asi at mabalin ey aran.
58009017	Tey aji pun as mabalin ey aran sey mangara nu sissiya ey matattagu tey inggana as matuy asi at mipatongpar sey kasuratan.
58009018	At urey sey namangu ey turag, aji pun mipatongpar nu miid dara as manuttuwaan ey awad sey natuy.
58009019	Tey sey kingwan Moses assey kar-argow assey naasna imbaga sey amin ey vilin sey Lintog as dasey tagu, nangara assey daran sey laki ey baka ya ganjing asina at kamsan as danum. Oni ey, asi at mangara assey pingin sey kananda ey hisop ya vinub-udna assey addaraag ey sinnun ey naara assey jutjut sey karneru asina at isowsow ya iwwagsikna assey nalulukut ey nikur-itan sey Lintog Apudyus ya asi at asda amin ey tagu ey awad siji.
58009020	Assey angiwwagwagsikana, kanana, “Sey dara sana sey mangimpapagdot assey turag ey imvilin Apudyus ey unujun taku.”
58009021	Maas ey ji, wagsikan vus Moses assey pasig ey dara sey bawi ey torda ya sey amin ey apporoda usarun ey mandayow an Apudyus.
58009022	Tey assey katuttuwaan, nibagabaga assey lintog ey dara anggey sey mabalin ey manarus assey kaajuwan ey basur da tagu ya niippun vus mabalin ey mapakawan as tagu as dasey basurna nu niippun mivukvuk as dara.
58009023	At amin dasey nuugud anna ey kama as iglatun dasey awad ad langit at masapur kanaʼsna sey makwa as madarusanda. Kon dasey ambabaru ey awad ad langit, masapur sin-umamud sey vinarun sey miidatun nu da nauy.
58009024	Tey sey summakayan Cristu at dakumpun assey Kasasantuwan ey Kuwartu ey kingwan da tagu assey luta anna ey kamaʼs iglatun sey tuttuwa ey awad ad langit, nu aji sey summakayana at ad langit ey mismu. At ey sana, siya sey kama as pannakalong-ag taku assey sinagung Apudyus.
58009025	Ya aji pun as summakey ad langit ey umuy mangingkasikasin ey mangindatun assey long-agna ey anung sey kookoon sey kangatuwan ey paji ey tinawun ey isakeyna sey daran sey ayém assey Kasasantuwan ey Kuwartun Apudyus assey bawi ey torda.
58009026	Tey nu kanaʼsji, aji pey manginkinnu vus ey matongtong-ag as Cristu mallapu assey nakwaan sey luvung. Kon dakumpun as kanaʼsji, tey sey nakwa assey umanungus, namingpingsan ey ummali as Cristu ta kaanuna sey basur gapu assey nangindatunana assey long-agna.
58009027	Tey nagoddongan ey mamingsan matuy sey tagu asin at Apudyus uwisun.
58009028	At anungna vus an Cristu tey namingsan ey nidatun ta kaanuna sey basur taku. At nu kasin umali, dakumpun as miipanggop assey basur sey umuyna asikasuwun nu aji umali ey umuy manginsarakan as dasey manguulley an siya.
58010001	Sey Lintog Moses at anungna sey kummupas ey iglatu ey aji pun ikow ampatak ey mangimpiila as dasey ambabaru assey daan ey ag-agow tey dakumpun as siyanaʼt sey ikow katuttuwaan. At urey nu tinawun ey ikasikasinda ey mandatun assey anung jiyuy ey datun ey imvilin sey Lintog, ajina pun ambalinun dasey mandaydayow an Apudyus as niippun mangkurangana.
58010002	Tey nu ummaney atyén jiyuy as madarusanda as dasey basurda, ning-op atyén sey somsomokda ey nakaan tuttuwa sey basurda ya impug-anda ey mangingkasikasin ey mandatun an Apudyus.
58010003	Kon assey mandatudatunanda sana, tinawun ey siya sey angingkagasmokanda as dasey basurda
58010004	tey sey daran sey baka ya ganjing at ajina pun mabalin ey kaanun sey basur.
58010005	At siyaji sey nangimbagaan Cristu an Apudyus assey tigangeyna umaliyan assey luta anna ey kanana, “Dakumpun as naparti ey animar unnu ujum ey midatun sey pinium nu aji nangwaka as long-ag ey para an sa'un.
58010006	Ajim pun nallaylaydan dasey animar ey singgubda assey altar unnu da nidatun as makaanan dasey basur.
58010007	At kanak, ‘Annaak Apudyus ey mangwa assey pium tey siya dallu sey nikukur-it assey nalulukut ey libnu miipanggop an sa'un.’”
58010008	Assey nangimbagaan Cristu an Apudyus ey kanana: “Ajim pun piniun unnu nallaylaydan dasey datun ya dasey innatud da tagu an sika unnu da animar ey singgubda assey altar ya dasey datun ey mangaan asda basur,” imbagana ji urey nu niidatun da nauy ey miyunud assey Lintog.
58010009	At inturuy Cristu ey gumminga, kanana, “Apudyus, annaak ey mangwa as dasey pium ey kook.” Assey nangimbagaana as jiyuy, ipiilana ey niwalin sey judaan ey datun at niyoros sey midatunan Cristu.
58010010	At gapu assey piun Apudyus ey tinongpar Jesu Cristu, nadarusan dasey basur taku assey nangindatunan Jesus assey mismu ey long-agna as ampatinggaan dasey amin ey datun.
58010011	Inag-agow ey an-orooros da amin ey papajiʼn da Jews ey umuy mangwa assey siputda ey ikasikasinda mandatun assey datun ey aji pun as mabalin ey mangaan assey basur.
58010012	Kon as Cristu, sa'an anggey sey indatunna as makaanan sey basur, datun ey umaney as ing-inggana, asi at umuy tummukju assey padawanan Apudyus.
58010013	At ey sana, uullayuna sey maabakan dasey amin ey kavusurna.
58010014	Tey gapu assey sa'an ey datun, nambalinuna as niippun mangkurangana as ing-inggana dasey amin ey mamati ey tinkonna ey ambalin as naapudyusan.
58010015	Ya sey Ispiritun Apudyus avus, tinakjugana sey kinatuttuwan da nauy an jitaku tey sey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus, kanana,
58010016	“Annaya sey Baru ey Ituragku as dasey taguk assey daan ey ag-agow: Iggak sey Lintogku assey somsomokda ya imurak assey otokda.”
58010017	Inturuyna ey kanana, “Ajik pun sosomkon dasey basurda ya dasey lawingan ey apporoda kingwa.”
58010018	At nu napakawan da nauy, aji pun as kasapuran ey awad kasin midatun as makaanan dasey basur.
58010019	At dakayu ey susunud, gapu assey nivukvukan sey daran Jesus assey natuyana, siwawaya taku ey sumakey assey mismu ey Kasasantuwan ey Kuwartu.
58010020	Tey gapu assey natuyana ey mipani assey navissayan sey kurtina ey nipupunnut assey sumakayan, kama as vinkatan Jesus sey baru ey daran ey ayun taku ey umuy an Apudyus ey matatagu tey sey daran anna at sey mismu ey long-agna.
58010021	At ey sana gapu ta awad sey nangatu ey paji taku ey mamupuut assey iggawan sey mandayawan an Apudyus,
58010022	tornon taku ey umadani assey sinagung Apudyus ey nadarus sey somsomok taku ya niippun juwajuwa assey pammati taku. Ya niippun malivukan sey somsomok taku tey nadarusan ya kama as nuurasan taku assey nadarus ey danum.
58010023	Ya masapur papagdoton taku uugnan sey namnama ey tinatakjugan taku tey as Apudyus at matalik ey manongpar as dasey impostana.
58010024	Ya anapun taku nu ngan annun taku ey antitinnurung ta ikow umam-amud sey allilinnaydan sey usa ya usa ya mangwa taku as dasey ambabaru ey makwa.
58010025	Ya aji taku iyagey ey apporow madagup ey mandayow an Apudyus ey anung sey kookoon da ujum nu aji ampipinnakasdor taku am-amud tey anna ummadani sey ag-agow ey ampuuliyén sey Apu.
58010026	Tey nu gagaraun taku ey apporow ambasubasur urey nu naas taku naagammuwan sey katuttuwaan, niippun kasin midatun as makaanan sey basur.
58010027	Ya niippun ogon kasin muulley nu aji sey kagguugyat ey jumatngan sey manusaan Apudyus asda tagu ya sey gumilgillajung ey apuy ey mansugub as dasey kumukuntra an siya.
58010028	Asda amin ey nallabsing assey Lintog Moses, aji pun mapasinsiya tey masapur mipagngat nu awad turu unnu juwa as mantistigu assey nallabsingana.
58010029	At nu kanaʼsji sey jusan dasey tagu ey nallabsing assey Lintog Moses, aji am-amud sey jusa ey lak-amun sey apporow mangillayus assey Anak Apudyus. Tey imvilangna sey daran Jesus as niippun balorna urey nu sey darana sana sey nangimpatuttuwa assey Baru ey Turag Apudyus ey siya sey namayad assey basurna. At siguraju ey sin-umamud sey majusaana tey ininsurtuna sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey nangadagu asda tagu.
58010030	Tey agammu taku ey as Apudyus sey nangimbaga ey kanana, “Sa'un sey awad karobbongana ey vumarus ya atjuk sey jusa ey mitagop assey kingwada.” Ya kanana vus, “Sa'un sey manguwis as dasey taguk.”
58010031	At siya sey amud ey kagguugyat sey mallak-am assey jusa ey atjun sey matatagu ey Apudyus.
58010032	Somsomkonyu sey nakwa an dakayu assey kar-argow. Assey namatiyanyu, sinilawan Apudyus sey somsomokyu at urey nu adjuwan sey nilak-amyu ey amud ey tongtong-ag, inanusanyu pey dallu at aji kayu pun as naabak.
58010033	Awad dasey timpu ey inin-insurtun dakayu assey sinagung da tagu ya tinongtong-ag dakayu. Ya awad dasey timpu ey urey nu dakumpun as dakayu sey apporoda tongtong-agun, kama as nijuga kayu natongtong-ag asda vurunyu.
58010034	Ya kama as nijuga kayu natongtong-ag as dasey vurunyu ey nibarud. Ya nallaylayad kayu pey dallu ey nanganus assey namrosanda asda laksunyu tey agammuyu ey awad sey nabarbalor ey mannanayun ey laksununyu ad langit.
58010035	At siya sey aji kayu angngangaya tey dokor sey magun-gunayu.
58010036	Masapur ey man-anus kayu ta tongparunyu sey piun Apudyus at magun-udyu sey impostana an jitaku.
58010037	Tey awad sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Aji pun as mabayag at umali sey uullayunyu tey ajina pun ipannapanna.
58010038	Kon as dasey niyun-un ey taguk at mataguda gapu assey pammatida. Kon ajiyak pun as allaylayad asda tagu ey man-awidanda sa'un.”
58010039	Kon an jitaku, dakumpun as jitaku dasey tagu ey man-awid assey pammatida ey miballu ey majusa as ing-inggana nu aji jitaku sey awad pammatina an Cristu ey nisarakan.
58011001	At ey sana, ngan sey piun sey pammati ey ugujun? Siya sey manigurajuwan taku ey mangawat as dasey apporow taku namnamaun ya siguraju taku ey tuttuwa dasey naagammuwan taku urey ajin sey ata miila.
58011002	At gapu assey pammatin da dakdakor taku assey kar-argow, impiilan Apudyus ey nalaylaydan siya an jida.
58011003	Gapu ta awad sey pammati taku, maawatan taku ey nakwa sey luvung gapu anggey assey nangimvilinan Apudyus ta dasey miila at nakwa ey narpu assey aji pun miila.
58011004	Gapu assey pammatin Abel, ambab-aru sey indatunna an Apudyus ey aji pun mikama assey kingwan sunudna ey Cain. At gapu assey kanaʼsji ey pammatina, impiilan Apudyus ey niyun-un siya ey tagu gapu ta nalaylaydan assey indatunna. At urey nu natuy as Abel assey kar-argow, kama as sissiya assey sana ey manudtutudtuju an jitaku.
58011005	As Enoch, gapu assey pammatina, naayagan ad langit ey natattagu at niippun nad-asan an siya assey luta anna. Ya inggow sey nikur-it miipanggop an Enoch ey assey daan pun Apudyus mangar-an an siya, kingwana sey nallaylaydan Apudyus.
58011006	At niippun tagu as mabalin mangimpalaylayad an Apudyus nu niippun pammatina. Tey sey maryad ey mandayow an Apudyus, masapur patiyuna ey awad as Apudyus ya patiyuna vus ey gun-gunaan Apudyus dasey maryad ey mangigammu an siya.
58011007	As Noah, gapu assey pammatina, jingngorna sey imbagan Apudyus an siya miipanggop assey umali ey makwa ey daan pun miila. Pinatina sey imbagan Apudyus at kingwana sey dokodokor ey bapor ey nataguwanda ey simbaryan. At gapu assey kingwana, nuuwis da amin ey tagu assey luvung ey najusa kon an siya, imvilang Apudyus as niyun-un ey tagu gapu assey pammatina.
58011008	As Abraham, gapu assey pammatina, tinongparna sey nangayagan Apudyus an siya ey umuy assey sabali ey luta ey impostan Apudyus ey ipatawidna. At tineynana sey mismu ey ilina urey nu niippun agammuna nu gona ayana.
58011009	At gapu assey pammatina, inan-anusana ey vinuvumruy assey torda ey kama as vunag assey ili saji ey impostan Apudyus ey angkuwana. At siya avus sey kingwan Isaac ey anakna ya as Jacob ey apuna ey nivilang avus ey mikalaksun assey impostan Apudyus an siya.
58011010	Tey as Abraham, uullayuna ey vumruy assey vubruy ey as Apudyus sey sinsomsomok assey nakopyaana ya nakwaana ey mannanayun sey pon-adna.
58011011	At gapu avus assey pammatin Abraham, ummanakda ey an-asawa an Sarah urey nu narakey as Abraham ya basig as Sarah. Pinatin Abraham ey tongparun Apudyus sey impostana.
58011012	At urey nu mivilang ey natuy as Abraham gapu assey kinarakeyna, siya vus pigey sey singganak assey amud ey tagu ey aji pun as mavilang tey anungna kaajun sey vituwun ad langit unnu kaajun sey gallis assey igid sey beybey.
58011013	Amin da jiyuy ey tagu at nantatallikda an Apudyus inggana as nangkakatuyda ey ajida pun innila sey tummuttuwaan sey impostan Apudyus assey natatagguwanda. Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, kama dallu as inniilada ya nallaylayadda assey makwaana assey daan ey ag-agow. At siya sey iyyuuyada sey somsomokda ey kamada as vunag assey nauy ey luta tey dakumpun as siyana sey ustu ey iggawanda.
58011014	Dasey tagu avus ey mangavun ey kanaʼsna sey makwa, piuna ugujun, awad avus sey sabali ey vubruy ey uullayunda as vumubruyanda.
58011015	Tey nu umaayyuda assey vubruy ey tineynanda, nawayada mit atyén ey ampuuli.
58011016	Kon dakumpun as kanaʼsji sey nakwa tey sey awad assey somsomokda at umuyda vumubruy assey ambab-aru ey vubruy ey awad ad langit. At siya sey aji pun as Apudyus maviin nu awaganda siya as Apudyusda tey awad sey insaganana ey vubruy ad langit as iggawanda.
58011017	As Abraham, gapu assey pammatina, indatunna as Isaac ey anakna assey namadasan Apudyus an siya. As Abraham sey nangawat assey impostan Apudyus kon nakasagana ey mangngat an Isaac ey saʼsa'an ey anakna ey mangindatun an Apudyus.
58011018	Sey impostan Apudyus an Abraham, kanana: “As Isaac sey matuntunan da ganaknu.”
58011019	As Abraham at dokor sey pammatina ey kaviilan Apudyus ey managu kasin an Isaac urey nu matuy. At tuttuwa ey kama as tinagun Apudyus kasin tey nu ajin atyén Apudyus tinoknaan as Abraham, siguraju ey gingngatna as Isaac ey anakna.
58011020	As Isaac, gapu assey pammatina, vinindisyunana dasey juwa ey anakna ey da Jacob an Esau tey sinigurajuna ey awad sey atjun Apudyus an jida assey daan ey ag-agow.
58011021	Ya gapu assey pammatin Jacob, sinin-us-ana ey namindisyun as dasey aapuna ey anak da Joseph assey tigangeyna matuyan. Assey nangwaanaʼsji, nanagmudana sey surkudna ey mandayow an Apudyus.
58011022	Ya gapu assey pammatin Joseph, impapaddaanna imbaga sey umayawan dasey iyIsrael ad Egypt at siya sey nanugunana as dasey jujugana miipanggop assey koonda assey tung-arna.
58011023	At gapu avus assey pammatin dasey dakdakor Moses, inturudda ey nangintaru assey ka'iyanak ey utting assey turu ey vuran tey innilada ey mangkasdor sey anak saji. Ajida pun inugyatan sey vilin sey ari urey nu ngan sey makwa an jida.
58011024	As Moses, gapu assey pammatina assey jummakrana, ajina pun inavunan ey miivilang siya as anak sey anak Faraw.
58011025	Simsimmokna ey un-unina ey mijuga matongtong-ag as dasey tagun Apudyus nu sey allamram-ey as sin-akitan ey lagsak ey atjun sey basur.
58011026	Imvilangna ey un-unina nu matongtong-ag gapu an Cristu ey manginsarakan nu sey angkuwana sey amin ey vinaknang ad Egypt. Tey sey sosomkona at sey gun-guna ey maatud an siya assey daan ey ag-agow.
58011027	At gapu avus assey pammatina, tineynana ad Egypt ey ajina pun inugyatan sey sangan Ari. At urey nu natongtong-ag, inturturuyna ey ummayow tey kama as iillana as Apudyus ey aji pun miila.
58011028	At gapu avus assey pammatina, intudtujuna as dasey iyIsrael sey masapur ey koonda assey kananda ey “Nallausan sey Enjel ad Egypt.” Imvilinna ey pakpakanda as daran sey karneru dasey sawangda ta nu mallaus sey enjel ey umuy mangngat as dasey pangu ey aanak ey laraki ad Egypt, lausana dasey vuruy ey napakpakan as dara ta niippun matuy an jida ey ganak Israel.
58011029	At gapu avus assey pammatin dasey ganak Israel, nandormangda ey nanaran assey gawan sey beybey ey kananda ey “Addaraag” assey nagugwaan sey danum, kon andormang pun dasey iyEgypt ey manugjug an jida, naminda nuuvur ey kama as nilukmus sey beybey jida.
58011030	Ya gapu avus assey pammatida, nikur-ub sey sijil sey vubruy ad Jericho assey mikapitu ey ag-agow ey nalliwusan dasey ganak Israel.
58011031	Ya gapu assey pammatin Rahab ey puta, minangilina dasey iyIsrael ey ummuy nansiim assey vubruyda at aji pun siya nijuga ey natuy assey natuyan dasey kailiyana gapu assey ajida pun mamatiyan an Apudyus.
58011032	Amud pey sey mabalin ey ibagak miipanggop assey pammatin dasey dakdakor taku assey kar-argow kon ayaka vus aminuk ugujun sey miipanggop anda Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jeptha, David, Samuel ya dasey ujum ey profet.
58011033	Gapu assey pammatida, apporow nangabak dasey ujum an jida assey nikagubatanda asda nantokotokon ey ili. Nalintog sey nangokoonda ya awad an jida dasey nangawat assey impostan Apudyus. Ya awad an jida da nangimpaginok asda layun ey nambalinda as naamu.
58011034	Inggow an jida dasey aji pun nasgub assey nipisukanda assey gumilgillajung ey apuy, ya da ujum an jida nalisiyanda dasey tagu ey maniwat atyén an jida. Akkuya da ujum kon nambalinun Apudyus jida as angkasdor. Awad da ujum an jida ey nambalin as maarmot ey mikagubat at impaawidda dasey adjuwan ey surdaju.
58011035	Inggow avus dasey vubai ey ummuli dasey natuy ey jujugada. Kon asda ujum, natongtong-agda inggana as natuyanda tey ajida pun as insulib sey pammatida as mawayaanda atyén tey ninamnamada sey mikagwa ey mataguwan kasin ey ambab-aru.
58011036	Awad da ujum ey nalaylayus ya nadatadatar ya awad da napusasan ey nibarud.
58011037	Da ujum, kinub-ukub-ungda jida inggana as natuyda. Ya awad da ujum ey nilagajida ey nangkagwa ya vinakagda ey nangngat asda ujum. Ya awad vus da ujum ey lumawa gapu assey pammatida at gaddang pey lawa sey karneru anda ganjing sey illumvunda. Amud sey nalaylayusanda ya natongtong-aganda.
58011038	Inidamanda pey lawa ey umawiawid asda danak anda tagtagudtud. Vinumruy da ujum asda liyang anda abvut. Kon assey katuttuwaan, adayu ey aji pun miyisu sey vinaruda asda tagu assey luta anna.
58011039	Nalaylaydan as Apudyus asda tagu sana gapu assey pammatida. Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, daanda pun awatun dasey amin ey impostan Apudyus an jida.
58011040	Tey awad sey ambab-aru ey planun Apudyus ey ajina pun yén ipatongpar sey impostana an jida inggana as mijuga taku ta ambalinun jitaku losan as niippun mangkurangana.
58012001	An jitaku assey sana, kama taku as mikatudtuddak ey vuvuyyaun jitaku asda jiyuy ey tagu ey nangimpatuttuwa assey pammatida assey keysan ey ag-agow. At ipayagpag taku dasey amin ey tumipar assey pammati taku, am-amud dasey basur ey kama as pinupumkot an jitaku. Ambaruwun taku sey koon ey matagu kama assey mangiggaan assey kaviilan ey manuddak assey tudtuddak ey insaganan Apudyus as para an jitaku.
58012002	At sey ikow taku sosomkon at as Jesus ey siya sey ustu ey muunud ey siya sey lapun sey pammati taku ya mamupuut inggana as niippun mankurangana. Gapu assey lagsak ey namnamauna, inanusana sey amin ey natongtong-agana assey krus ey ajina pun as ingkaskasu sey niviviinana. At ey sana, awad ey tummutukju assey padawanan Apudyus ey manturey.
58012003	At sosomkon taku sey kingwan Jesus ey nangan-anus assey kingwan dasey ambasbasur ey tagu an siya ta aji taku ngumayngaya tey oni at lawa ya ipug-an taku ey mantalik an Apudyus.
58012004	Tey assey katuttuwaan, niippun mit gingngatda an dakayu gapu assey nangidyényu ey mangwa assey lawing.
58012005	Ajiyu pun mit nin naliwatan sey imbagan Apudyus ey mangimpakasdor an dakayu ey aanakna assey kanana, “Masapur jumngor kayu ey ustu assey tudtuju ya disiplinan sey Apu an dakayu ya masapur aji kayu ngumaya nu ingorana dakayu
58012006	tey tudtujuwana ya disiplinaana dasey amin ey pipiuna ya lapsitana dasey aanakna as vumaruwanda.”
58012007	Anusanyu sey tongtong-ag ey ivilangyu jiyuy as usarun Apudyus as madisiplinaanyu tey jiyuy sey mangimpiila ey ivilang Apudyus dakayu as tuttuwa ey aanakna. Tey yangey awad anak as ajin sey amana disiplinaan?
58012008	Tey nu ajin dakayu disiplinaan an Apudyus, dakumpun kayu as tuttuwa ey anakna unnu maggey lawa sabali sey sin-anak an dakayu tey amin ey anak Apudyus at madisiplinaanda.
58012009	Rispituwun taku mit dasey dakdakor taku nu disiplinaan jitaku, ey aji am-amud sey koon taku ey ampaiturey an Ama taku ad langit tey sey masalinunutana at sey mataguwan taku?
58012010	Tey dasey dakdakor taku assey luta anna at sin-akitan anggey sey mandisiplinaanda an jitaku miibasar assey patinggan sey maawatanda assey vumaruwan taku. Kon assey mandisiplinaan Apudyus an jitaku, muusar jiyuy assey tuttuwa ey vumaruwan taku ta mijuga taku milak-am assey kinaApudyusna.
58012011	Tuttuwa ey nu madisiplinaan taku, jujuuy sey atjuna ey ajina pun atjun sey allaylaydan, kon nu masuruwan taku gapu asda nauy, ambaru sey ambanagana tey anturung assey angginnok ey kataguwan ya miyunud assey piun Apudyus.
58012012	At dakayu ey kamaʼs natley sey takreyna ya kama as amilpilpil sey gung-una gapu asda tongtong-ag, pakasdoronyu sey somsomokyu.
58012013	Iturturuyyu sey ustu ey pammatiyu ey kama as anggogoddong sey koonyu ey manaran ta aji kayu misopsop ey kumuya nu aji kumasdor kayu atyén.
58012014	Koonyu sey kaviilanyu ey manganap nu ngan annunyu ey mikaurnus asda amin ey tagu. Ya koonyu vus sey kaviilanyu ey matagu ey nadarus tey sey tagu ey dakumpun as kanaʼsnaʼt, ajina pun miila sey Apu.
58012015	Ammaanyu ilan ta niippun atyén usa an dakayu as magna gey man-awidan sey kinaambarun Apudyus. Tey sey jugan ji ey tagu, anungda sey lugam ey tumangga ey nu tumuvuda assey iggowyu, adjuwan sey iluswada ey lawingan ey makwa.
58012016	Ya ilanyu vus ta niippun atyén usa an dakayu as maggey midor-ag assey dakumpun as asawana, unnu mikama an Esau ey niippun somsomokna an Apudyus ey gapu assey sa'an anggey ey kumakan, iyyorosna sey karobbongana ey pangu ey anak.
58012017	Oni pun, agammu taku mit ey piuna aran sey vindisyun ey atjun amana tey siya sey karobbongana ey pangu ey anak kon aji pun mabalin. At urey nu nampangpangaasi ya iyivilna ey angdow, aji pun mabalin tey luus naatud at niippun kasinna koon.
58012018	Sabali sey koonyu ey umadani an Apudyus assey sana. Tey assey kar-argow, assey ummadaniyan da iyIsrael, iillanda sey gumilgillajung ey vilig ey kananda ey Sinai. Ya napadasanda sey amud ey gikbot ya angkopar ey livuu ya asi at sey andangsor ey abvid.
58012019	Ya jingngorda avus sey nanangguyub ya inggow sey gumminga an jida ey kagguugyat as dongron. At assey nangngoranda assey ginga saji, nampangpangaasida an Apudyus ta ipug-anna ey guminga
58012020	tey ajida pun maturdan ey mangngor assey vilin ey kanana, “Nu awad mangusdan assey vilig anna, urey nu animar, masapur batuwunyu inggana as matuy.”
58012021	Amud ey kagguugyat tey urey avus as Moses at kanana, “Amilpipilpilak assey ugyatku.”
58012022	Kon an dakayu, sabali ey vilig sey ummadaniyanyu ey siya sey Vilig ey Zion ey iggawan sey matatagu ey Apudyus. Siya sey vubruy ey kananda ey Jerusalem ad langit ey iggawan avus dasey kalivulivu ey enjel ey apporow allagragsak.
58012023	Kama as nijuga kayu mikaragsak assey amung dasey namangu ey aanak Apudyus ey nilista dasey ngadanda ad langit. Awad siji dasey amin ey natuy ey namati ey imvilang Apudyus as niippun basurna. Ya urey jitaku avus at mijuga taku an Apudyus ey siya sey manguwis asda amin ey tagu
58012024	ya an Jesus ey karun sey Baru ey Turag Apudyus. At sey darana ey niwagsik assey nanarusana assey basur da tagu at sin-umamud sey vinarun sey piuna ipaagammu nu sey daran Abel ey angkudow as barus.
58012025	At siya sey man-annad kayu ta masapur dongronyu as Apudyus ey siya sey mikabagbaga an dakayu. Tey nu dasey dakdakor taku at ajida pun nilisiyan sey jusa assey ajida pun nanongparan assey imbagan Moses ey tagu anggey assey luta anna, aji sin-umamud sey majusaan taku nu sumanga taku assey ibagan sey awad ad langit.
58012026	Tey assey timpu saji, nallunig sey luta assey gummingaana, kon assey sana, impostana ey kanana, “Ikasinku iwagot sey luta ya dakumpun anggey sey luta nu aji amin ey awad ad langit.”
58012027	Assey nangimbagaan Apudyus ey kanana, “Ikasinku iwagot,” piuna ugujun, amin dasey kingwana ey miwagot at maakiyakda ta anggey as mavun-an dasey aji pun as miwagot.
58012028	At sey koon taku, mansaramat taku an Apudyus tey injugana jitaku assey mannanayun ey tureyna ey aji pun mabalin ey miwagot. At mansaramat taku ya mandayow taku an siya as mallaylaydana ya masapur ey iviin taku ya rispituwun taku siya.
58012029	Tey as Apudyus ey daydayawun taku at anungna apuy ey manadail as dasey niippun talikna an siya.
58013001	Iturturuyyu ey manlilinnayad ey mansusunud an Apudyus.
58013002	Ya ilanyu ta piyammangili kayu tey inggow dasey nammangili as kananda pun nu anungda ey tagu sey minangilida, kon enjelda atpey.
58013003	Ajiyu maliwatan dasey barud ey kama kayu as nijujugga an jida nibarud. Ya ajiyu vus maliwatan dasey apporow matongtong-ag ey kama kayu as nijuga ey matongtong-ag.
58013004	Masapur atyén ipatig taku sey nakopyaan sey man-asawa ya niippun midor-ag as dakumpun as asawana tey jusaun Apudyus sey mangwa asda kanaʼsna ya urey vus dasey niippun asawana ey mangwa assey gagangeyn sey man-asawa.
58013005	Noanyu ey angimpatig assey pilak ya ming-op kayu assey awad an dakayu tey sey imbagan Apudyus kanana, “Ajik pun dakayu iwarang ya man-awidan.”
58013006	At siya sey naturud taku ey angimbaga ey kanan taku, “As Apudyus sey tumuruturung an sa'un, at siya sey ajiyak pun umugyat. Ngan gey lawa sey mabalin da tagu koon an sa'un?”
58013007	Somsomkonyu dasey nangimpangpangat an dakayu assey kar-argow ey nangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus. Somsomkonyu sey ambaru ey nambanagan sey viyagda ta unujunyu sey anung sey kingwada ey namati.
58013008	Tey as Jesu Cristu, aji pun ambaliw tey sissiya vus pigey ey kama assey kar-argow, assey sana ya as ing-inggana.
58013009	At siya sey aji kayu ampaallilow as dasey sabali ey tudtuju ey aji pun miyunud assey katuttuwaan. Tey sey mangimpakasdor assey somsomok taku at sey amud ey kinaambarun Apudyus ey dakumpun as dasey vilvilin miipanggop asda makan. Tey dasey nangunuunud asda jugan jiyuy ey vilvilin at niippun niiturungna an jida.
58013010	At dasey papaji ey anserservi assey mandayawan dasey Jews an Apudyus at niippun kalintoganda ey mijuga mikaamung ey mikakan assey baru ey mandayawan taku an Apudyus.
58013011	Sey judaan ey koko'on dasey Jews assey lintogda, sey kangangattuwan ey paji sey mangiyyuy assey daran sey animar assey Kasasantuwan ey Kuwartu ta idatunna an Apudyus as makaanan sey basur. Kon sey vugas sey indatunna saji, miyuy assey lasin sey vubruy ta as jiyuy sey masgubana.
58013012	At siyana sey lasun ey as lasin vus sey vubruy sey natuyan Jesus ey nivukvukan sey darana as kadarusan sey basur dasey tagu.
58013013	At ey sana, intaku mijuga an siya assey lasin sey vubruy ta mikalak-am taku assey nivibviinana.
58013014	Tey assey luta anna at niippun iggawan taku as ili ey mannanayun tey sey uullayun taku at sey ustu ey ili assey daan ey ag-agow.
58013015	At gapu an Jesus, masapur kanayun ey idatun taku an Apudyus sey dayow taku ya sey saramat taku an siya tey siyana sey ustu ey datun dasey tuttuwa ey mangimbaga ey as Jesus sey Apuda.
58013016	Aji taku iginok ey mangwa asda ambaru ya mantitinnurung tey da nauy ey datun sey mangimpalaylayad an Apudyus.
58013017	Dongronyu sey ibagan dasey mangimpapangat an dakayu ya ampaiturey kayu an jida tey jida sey piniyar Apudyus ey mamupuut assey pammatiyu ya agammuda ey songbatanda an Apudyus sey amin ey nipiyar an jida. Dongronyu jida ta awad mallaylaydan sey somsomokda ey mangwa assey viyangda tey nu ajiyu jida dongron ta tumkarda, niippun ambaru as miiturungna an dakayu.
58013018	Iturturuyyu vus pigey ey apporow mangilluwaru an dakani tey urey assey sana ning-op sey somsomokni ey ustu sey apporoni koon ya niippun dallu ujum as piunni ey koon nu aji anggey sey ustu.
58013019	Ya ipapatiyu ey mangilluwaru an sa'un ta aji pun atyén as mabayag ya nampuuliyunak an Apudyus ey mangila an dakayu.
58013020	Kanana atyén ta as Apudyus ey marpuwan sey tarna ya nanagu an Jesu Cristu assey natuyana sey mangatud an dakayu assey amin ey kasapuranyu ta makakwa kayu assey piuna. Kanana atyén ta ambalinuna dakayu as tagu ey mangimpalaylayad an siya gapu assey pannakabalin Jesu Cristu. As Jesus sey kangatuwan ey Pastor ey mamupuut asda amin ey mamati ey mivilang as karneruna. Ya sey darana sey nangimpapagdot assey Baru ey Turag ey niippun patinggana. Madayow siya as ing-inggana! Amen.
58013022	Susunud, pangngaasiyu ta dongronyu nauy ey itugunku ey mangimpakasdor assey somsomokyu, aji bali tey avubbang anggey sey insuratku anna an dakayu.
58013023	Sey usa uwa ey piuk ipaagammu an dakayu at sey miipanggop an Timothy ey vurun taku tey ey sana nivukkey siya assey baballudan. At nu jumatong atyén sinaʼt, ayagak siya ta vurnana sa'un ta umali kani ey mangila an dakayu.
58013024	Pakumustaunyu pey da amin ey papangatyu sinat ya kama avus asda amin ey mamati. Dasey vuvurun taku ey narpu ad Italy at pakumustaunda vus dakayu.
58013025	Kanana atyén ta atjun Apudyus sey vumaruwanyu losan.
59001001	Sa'un an James ey anserservi an Apudyus ya an Apu Jesus. Ngan annunyu pey amin, dakayu ey Jews ey mamati an Cristu ey nasinasinak assey ujum ey ili.
59001002	Dakayu ey susunud, ivilangyu as allaylaydanyu nu umdas an dakayu dasey nantokotokon ey tongtong-ag
59001003	tey agammuyu ey nu malasatanyu jiyuy ey tongtong-ag ey mamadas assey pammatiyu, iluswana sey kaviilanyu ey manganus assey amin ey tongtong-ag as jumgotan sey pammatiyu an Apudyus.
59001004	Ilanyu ta ammaanyu anusan dasey amin ey tongtong-ag tey niippun ujum as antongparana nu aji sey vumaruwan sey nakopyaanyu inggana as niippun mangkurangana.
59001005	Kon nu awad usa an dakayu as niippun ikow agammuna as ustuʼs koona, masapur alluwaru an Apudyus ta ipakagasmokna an siya sey ustu ey koona. Tey as Apudyus, mamaryad ey mangatud assey amin ey kudawun taku ya aji pun mappug ey angatuatud.
59001006	Kon nu awad angkudow an Apudyus, masapur patiyuna ey atjun Apudyus sey kudawuna ey aji anjuwajuwa tey sey tagu ey anjuwajuwa, anungna sey dalluyun assey beybey ey miid ajin sey abvid manginjuyagan.
59001007	Sey kanaʼs ji ey tagu, niippun mipanadan sey somsomokna at niippun namnamauna as awad atjun Apudyus an siya as urey lawa akit.
59001009	Nu awad lumawa as sunud taku assey pammati, masapur amud atyén sey allaylaydana tey nangatu ji ey tagu assey angiilan Apudyus.
59001010	Ya dakayu vus ey babaknang, masapur allaylayad kayu nu umdas dasey makwa ey mibabaanyu tey imvilang vus pigey Apudyus dakayu gapu assey pammatiyu. Tey sey tagu ey baknang at anungna sey sayyavung assey tar-an ey sin-akitan ya naryow ya nayakayak
59001011	nu jumgot as init. At nu mayakayak sey sayyavungna, nakaan sey vinaruna. Kanaʼs ji sey muumasan sey vinarun sey vinaknang urey nu siya sey puupuutun.
59001012	Nagasat sey tagu ey aji pun mangiwwarang assey pammatina urey nu idamana sey amud ey tongtong-ag assey viyagna tey nu mipiila ey nat-ong sey pammatina, maatud an siya sey gun-gunana ey impostan Apudyus ey atjuna as dasey maryad an siya ey siya sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
59001013	Nu awad tagu as masulisug ya anna sey layadna ey mangwa as lawingan, ajina maggey kanan ey as Apudyus sey nanulisug an siya. Tey as Apudyus, aji pun mabalin ey masulisug ya niippun tagu as sinulisugna.
59001014	Tey sey masulisugan sey tagu at dasey lawingan ey pipiun sey long-agna ey kamaʼs mangortib an siya.
59001015	At nu ipanuy sey somsomokna sey piun sey long-agna ey makwa, siyaji sey angatud as vumasurana. Oni ey nu uminainam ey mangwa as basur, siya sey ikatuyna ey misinaana an Apudyus as ing-inggana.
59001016	At dakayu ey ipatpatigku ey susunud, aji kayu maallilow ya kananyu ey as Apudyus sey manulisulisug asda tagu,
59001017	tey assey katuttuwaan, as Apudyus ad langit sey marpuwan dasey amin ey ambaru ya ustu. Siya vus sey nangwa assey amin ey sumilow ad langit. At urey nu maatub sey kiil-an dasey amin ey kingwana, aji pun maggey maatub as Apudyus.
59001018	At gapu ta siya sey nannanmok ey ambalinuna jitaku as aanakna gapu assey namatiyan taku assey katuttuwaan ey Gingana, nambalinuna jitaku as kangatuwan assey amin ey kingwana.
59001019	Ajiyu maliwliwatan nauy, dakayu ey susunud. Masapur imamad taku yén ey mangngor asita at guminga. Ya ajita allasu as sumanga,
59001020	tey sey sanga at niippun iturungna as makwaan dasey nalintog ey piun Apudyus ey makwa.
59001021	At siya sey masapur man-awidanyu dasey amin ey lawing ey awad assey somsomokyu asda ujum ey tagu ya dasey lawingan ey kookoonyu. Masapur ampakumbaba kayu ey manongpar assey Gingan Apudyus ey nimura assey somsomokyu tey siya anggey sey manginsarakan an dakayu.
59001022	Dakumpun as dongronyu anggey sey Gingan Apudyus, tey masapur koon sey kanana. Tey nu ingayu anggey sey mamangngor ya ajiyu pun koon, kama as ut-utyukanyu sey long-agyu.
59001023	Tey sey tagu ey mamangngor anggey assey Gingan Apudyus ya ajina pun koon, siyaji sey tagu ey anungna sey nangila assey vusarna assey aggelelawan,
59001024	kon nu naasna ey innila ya nan-awid, naliwatana sey itjurana.
59001025	Kon sey tagu ey angimpupuut ey angngor assey ambaru ey lintog Apudyus ey angatud as wayawaya taku ey mangwa assey piuna, siya sey tagu ey nagasat gapu asda nauy ey kookoona tey dakumpun anggey as nandongor nu aji koona sey jingngorna ey ajina pun maliwatan.
59001026	Nu awad mangugud as kanana ey usa siya ey relihyusu kon niippun annad sey sungadna, ut-utyukana sey long-agna ya niippun servin sey kinarelihyusuna.
59001027	Tey sey ivilang Ama taku ey Apudyus as ustu ey relihyusu ey manguunnud assey piuna at dasey tagu ey mangwa as ambaru, kama as dasey tumuturung asda kadagdagu ey ulila ya dasey baru. Ya sumanga ey maalisan as dasey lawingan ey ugali ey mivusur assey piun Apudyus.
59002001	Dakayu ey susunud, gapu ta namati kayu an Apu Jesu Cristu ey madaydayow ya kangatuwan ey Apu, niippun atyén toktoknonyu asda tagu.
59002002	Anungna nu awad ji umali as baknang an dakayu ey mijuga ey mandayow an Apudyus ya nansingsing as vurawan ya nallumvun as ambaru ya kananyu an siya, “Umalika ta itukjum assey ambaru anna ey tukjuwan.” Ya awad ey vus umali as lumawa ey namilumiluy sey lumvunna ya kananyu an siya, “Itatakjugnu pey lawaʼs sanna unnu dokon ey, allupitakka pey lawa assey dot-ar.”
59002004	At nu kanaʼsji sey koonyu ey vigvigunyu da ujum gapu assey vinaknangda, siyaji sey angimpiila ey kinumbot sey awad assey somsomokyu ya sey panggopyu.
59002005	Sosomkonyu nauy, dakayu ey susunud. Yangey dokon dasey lumawa assey luvung anna sey pinilin Apudyus ta ambalinuna as baknang assey pammati? Ijugana vus jida assey tureyna ey siya vus pigey sey impostana ey koona as dasey mamaryad an siya.
59002006	Kon an dakayu, iwwalinyu at avus dasey lumawa. Yangey dakumpun dasey babaknang sey apporow manongtong-ag ya mangindarum an dakayu?
59002007	Ya jida avus sey nangillaylayus an Jesu Cristu ey madaydayow ey sintagu an jitaku.
59002008	Awad sey napatig ey lintog ey impakur-it Apudyus assey kar-argow ey kanana, “Masapur maryadka as dasey anungnu ey tagu ey kama vus assey maryadam assey long-agnu.” At nu tornonyu ey mangunud assey lintog sana, niyun-un ya ustu sey angokoonyu.
59002009	Kon nu antoktoknonyu da tagu ey napatpatig sey angimvilanganyu asda ujum, nambasur kayu tey nilabsingyu sey lintog Apudyus.
59002010	Tey nu kananyu ey inunudyu sey amin ey lintog Apudyus, kon awad sa'an as nilabsingyu, nilabsingyu sey amin ey lintog.
59002011	Tey as Apudyus ey nangimbaga ey kanana, “Ajika mikadagdagas,” imbagana mit vus ey kanana, “Ajika gumngat.” At urey nu niippun dagdagasnu kon awad gingngatnu, nilabsingnu dallu sey lintog Apudyus.
59002012	At masapur annadanyu sey amin ey ugujunyu anda koonyu tey muuwis kayu assey daan ey ag-agow ey mibasar assey lintogna ey nangatud assey waya taku ey mangwa assey piuna.
59002013	Tey sey tagu ey niippun daguna assey asintataguna, niippun vus dagun Apudyus an siya assey man-uwisana. Kon sey tagu ey mangadagu assey vurunna, kadaguwan vus Apudyus siya.
59002014	Dakayu ey susunud, ngan sey servina nu kanan taku ey awad pammati taku an Jesu Cristu kon niippun koon taku as angimpiila ey tuttuwa ey namati taku? Yangey umaney pun lawa sey mangugudan ey awad pammati ya nisarakanta an Apudyus?
59002015	Nu as gagara ya awad usa as vurun taku as angkurang as lumvun unnu makan
59002016	ya kanan taku an siya, “As Apudyus atyén sey mamindisyun an sika. Ajika madanagan assey ikilugnu ya assey ilumvunnu.” Ngey servin sey nangimbagaam siji nu ajim siya atdan?
59002017	Anungna vus assey pammati. Nu sungad anggey sey anguguugud kon niippun miil-ana assey kopya taku, niippun servinaji ey pammati.
59002018	Kon nu awad mikajiskas ey kanana, “Nantokotokon mit sey koon sey tagu ey mamati an Apudyus. Sey usa, mabalin ey pammati anggey sey awad an siya ya sey usa avus, mabalin ey sey ambaru ey koko'on sey awad an siya.” Nu awad mangimbaga as kanasnaʼt, annaya sey isongbatku; “Ngan annum ey angimpiila ey awad pammatim nu niippun manuttuwaan? Tey sa'un, ipiilak assey nakopyaak ey awad pammatik.”
59002019	Ey mamatika ey sa'an anggey as Apudyus? Nu siyanaʼt sey pammatim, ambaru mit. Kon urey vus dasey jimunyu at patiyunda ey sa'an as Apudyus kon mamilpilda assey ugyatda gapu assey umali ey timpu ey manusaan Apudyus an jida.
59002020	Yangey ung-ung kayu? Ey ajiyu pun maawatan ey sey pammati ey niippun miil-ana at niippun servina?
59002021	Ilanyu man as Abraham ey apu taku assey kar-argow. Tey sey nangimvilangan Apudyus an siya as niyun-un ey tagu at sey nangwaana assey imbagan Apudyus assey nangindatunana an anakna ey Isaac assey altar.
59002022	Siyaji sey mangil-an taku ey nitimpuyug sey pammatina ya sey kingwana. At sey kingwana saji sey nangimpiila ey ustu ya tuttuwa sey pammatina.
59002023	At siyaji sey piun sey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Pinatin Abraham sey imbagan Apudyus at imvilang Apudyus siya as ambaru ey tagu.” At nauy vus sey gapuna nu pa lawa maawagan siya as vurun Apudyus.
59002024	At siyana sey angigammuwan ey sey angimvilangan Apudyus an jitaku as niippun basurna at sey koko'on taku, dakumpun anggey assey pammati.
59002025	Anungna vus an Rahab ey usa ey puta assey kar-argow. Tey sey nangimvilangan Apudyus an siya as niippun basurna at sey ambaru ey kingwana as dasey imbaar Apudyus ey ummuy nansiim assey ilina. Minangilina jida ya intudtujuna sey daran ey ayunda ey ampuuli ta ajin dasey kavusur jida dokmaan.
59002026	At anungna vus assey long-ag ji tagu. Tey nu niippun kajudwana, nanattuy jiyuy ey long-ag. Kanaʼsji vus assey pammati. Tey nu niippun ambaru as koon taku, nanattuy jiyuy ey pammati.
59003001	Dakayu ey susunudku, ilanyu ta dakumpun as losan kayu gey ambalin as mantudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus. Tey agammuyu ey dokdokor sey majusaan dasey mangintudtuju assey Gingan Apudyus nu kumbot sey itudtujuda nu dasey matudtujuwan.
59003002	Amin taku ey tagu at adjuwan sey angkammaliyan taku. Kon nu awad tagu as manginyattum assey sungadna ey niippun angkammaliyan sey ugujuna, siyaji sey tagu ey niippun angkurangana tey lamugna ey manginyattum assey amin ey partin sey long-agna.
59003003	Ta ipani taku assey kabayu, tey nu ipakat taku sey ban-it ey baliyang assey sungadna, mabalin taku iturung assey piun taku angimpuuyan.
59003004	Anungna avus as dasey bapor, tey urey nu danakkorda ya ingganaʼs andangsor ey abvid sey mabalin ey angiju, mabalin vus ey miturung gapu anggey assey banban-it ey baliyang ey kamaʼs ipeyna ey awad assey likudna ey usarun sey anginturung assey piuna ey mangimpuuyan.
59003005	Anungna avus assey sungad sey tagu, tey urey nu ban-ug sey sungad ey partin sey long-ag taku, dokor sey ilugub sey igingana. Kama vus assey apuy, urey nu akittan anggey sey saradna, mabalin ey dagadaguna sey arwaarwa ey tarun.
59003006	Siyaji sey anung sey sungad taku ey tagu ey kamaʼs apuy. Siya sey partin sey long-ag taku ey iggawan sey nantokotokon ey lawingan ya ilugubna ey mangimparwing assey katatagu taku. At niippun ujum as marpuwan da nauy ey lawingan nu dokon an jimunyu ey siya sey kamaʼs manginsugnasugnad an jitaku.
59003007	Amin ey karasin ji animar assey luta anna at mabalin ey ipaamun sey tagu, kama asda titit, dasey angkaddarap ya dasey awad assey beybey.
59003008	Kon niippun tagu as nangimpaamu assey sungadna. Tey sey sungad, kamaʼs napnu assey mandogot ey tangga ey kanayun ey nakasagana ey mangugud assey lawingan.
59003009	Dakayu ey susunud, sa'an sey sungad taku, kon mabalin ey usarun taku ey mandayow an Apudyus ey Ama taku ya usarun taku vus ey mangarawag asda asintatagu taku ey kingwan Apudyus as anungna. Aji pun atyén mabalin nauy.
59003011	Tey yangey awad vuvun as iluswana sey ambaru ya ampiit ey danum?
59003012	Ya niippun mit vus fig as kayu ey mamunga as olib, unnu greps ey mamunga as fig. Ya aji pun vus lumuswa sey ambaru ey danum ey inumun assey lumuswaan sey asiga.
59003013	Nu awad nasomkan an dakayu unnu mannakaawat, ipiilana atyén sey sinomkanna assey ambaru ey ugalina ya sey ampakumbabaana ey mangwa assey ambaru.
59003014	Kon nu itatarpunyu assey somsomokyu sey apos ta sey midayawanyu anggey sey sosomkonyu, aji kayu ampaspas-um ey angugud assey kinasomkanyu tey nu siya sey koonyu, kamaʼs kinuntrayu sey katuttuwaan ey tudtujun Apudyus.
59003015	Sey anung da jiyuy ey sinomkan, dakumpun an Apudyus ad langit sey narpuwana tey niluruta jiyuy ey somsomok ey dakumpun as naapudyusan. At sey jugannaʼt ey sinomkan, as jimunyu sey narpuwana.
59003016	Tey nu awad apos ya mangindayow assey long-agna, niippun juwajuwana ey awad sey guru anda lawingan ey makwa.
59003017	Kon nu narpu an Apudyus sey sinomkan sey tagu, nadarus sey awad assey somsomokna. Sumanga ey awad guru as makwa, makaawat, ajina pun ipilit sey piuna, kadaguwana sey asintataguna, pasig ambaru sey koona, niippun toktoknona as tagu ya amin ey puntusna at pasig ey vumaruwan.
59003018	At sey tagu ey siya itatakjugna sey muurnusan, kama as nammura siya as mura ey miid ajina ivunga as ambaru.
59004001	Ngan sey lapun sey anggiginnuraan ya an-iisikanyu? Yangey dakumpun asda adjuwan ey pipiun sey long-agyu sey lumivuk assey katataguyu?
59004002	Tey awad dasey piunyu ey aran kon aji kayu pun makaara at siya sey piunyu ey gumngat ta maarayu. Awad vus dasey gamgamanyu ey kuwan da ujum kon nu aji kayu pun ey makaara, nanggiginnura anda nan-iisik kayu. Kon assey katuttuwaan, ajiyu pun maara sey gamgamanyu ey aran tey ajiyu pun kudawun an Apudyus.
59004003	Kon urey vus nu angkudow kayu an Apudyus, ajina pun vus atjun tey lawingan sey panggopyu ey angkudow tey sey allaylaydan anggey sey long-agyu sey piunyu.
59004004	Anungyu dasey tagu ey apporow mikadagdagas tey aji kayu pun matalik ey mangunud an Apudyus. Ey ajiyu pun agammu ey nu mamaryad kayu asda niluruta, sey piuna ugujun, kukuntraunyu as Apudyus? At ngan man sey tagu ey mamaryad assey niluruta, nambalinuna sey long-agna as kavusur Apudyus.
59004005	Ajiyu maggey kanan ey niippun servin sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey imbaarna ey milong-ag an jitaku at amud sey imunna nu aji taku ipongsan sey layad taku an siya.”
59004006	Kon urey nu kanasnaʼt, amud dallu sey kinaambaruna ey manurung an jitaku ta unujun taku siya ey ustu, tey awad vus sey impakur-itna ey kanana, “Vusurun Apudyus dasey tagu ey ampaspas-um, kon ambaru sey koona as dasey ampakumbaba.”
59004007	At sey koonyu, ampaturey kayu an Apudyus. Ya ipapatiyu ey man-awidan as jimunyu at umawid ey maneynan an dakayu.
59004008	Tornonyu ey mantalik an Apudyus at awad siya ey kamaʼs umaaddani an dakayu. Ya dakayu ey nakabasur, ibabawiyu dasey basuryu ta madarusan sey viyagyu. Dakayu vus ey anjuwajuwa, ipongsanyu amin an Apudyus.
59004009	Masursurjung kayu atyén ey an-anmok asda basuryu. Ambaksar kayu ey aji kayu as mayokyok ya manomdom kayu gapu asda basuryu ey aji kayu as allagragsak.
59004010	Tey nu ampakumbaba kayu an Apudyus, ipangatuna dakayu.
59004011	Dakayu ey susunud, aji kayu ampipinnarwing tey sey mangimparwing assey vurunna, imparwingna vus sey imvilin Apudyus ey masapur allilinnayad taku. At sey tagu ey mangimparwing assey lintog Apudyus, ipipi'ilana ey ajina pun patiyun sey lintog sana nu aji ivilangna as niippun servina.
59004012	As Apudyus anggey sey nangatud an jitaku assey lintog. At siya anggey sey awad karobbongana ey manguwis asda tagu ya manginsarakan unnu manusa an jida. At nu kanasnaʼt, niippun karobbongan taku ey mangimbaga ey lawingan sey vurun taku.
59004013	Dongronyu nauy, dakayu ey mangimbagabaga ey, “Assey sana ey ag-agow, unnu as vigat, ingkani assey ujum ey ili ta ingkani angkumérsu as makatawun ta umaju sey pilakni.”
59004014	Ey agammum sey makwa as vigat? Aji pun mit. Ya usa pey, sey viyag taku ey tagu at anungna asuk ey urey awad assey sana, aji pun masinkimad ya nuumas.
59004015	Sey koon taku atyén ey guminga at kanaʼs sanna, “Kanan atyén pey Apudyus ta matagu taku ta awad agammu taku ey mangwa asda makwa.”
59004016	Kon dakumpun mit as siyana sey apporoyu koon tey ipaspas-umyu at avus dasey piunyu ey koon. Amin akey ey ipaspas-um da tagu ey jugannaʼt at lawingan.
59004017	At nu agammun sey tagu sey ustu ey makwa ya ajina pun koon, basurna jiyuy an Apudyus.
59005001	An dakayu vus ey babaknang, annaya sey ibagak an dakayu. Ambaksar kayu ya an-ayuwwong kayu tey awad sey kagguugyat ey tongtong-ag ey jumatong an dakayu.
59005002	Tey namin naropok sey vinaknangyu ya namin nalakuy dasey intatarpunyu ey lumvun.
59005003	Nallati vus dasey vurawan ya da pilakyu. At sey latida, siya sey angimpiila ey dakumpun as ustu sey kingwayu ey nangusar asda vinaknangyu. At jusaun Apudyus dakayu tey sey kingwayu anggey at sey nandagudagup as vinaknangyu assey anungus sey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda amin ey tagu.
59005004	Sey usa vus ey koko'onyu, ajiyu pun da atjun sey tangdan dasey nansiputunyu ey nan-ani assey payowyu. Nilukuyu at avus jida at sey tangdanda ey intatarpunyu, siya sey kamaʼs angaraarawag an dakayu. At naktad ad langit sey lilin dasey nansiputunyu ey ampangpangaasi at niippun juwajuwana ey jingngor Apudyus ey mannakabalin.
59005005	Assey natatagguwanyu assey luta anna, niippun ujum as somsomkonyu nu aji anggey sey iggayu assey vuwangyu ya sey allamram-ayanyu. At ey sana, anungyu sey baka ey mangamangan ta tumaba kon niippun agammuna ey jumatong sey timpu ey mapartiyana.
59005006	Pinabasuryu ya impagngatyu dasey niippun basurna gapu pey lawa ta ajida pun kaviilan ey mangontra an dakayu.
