59005007	Dakayu ey susunud, ammaan taku anusan sey amin ey makwa an jitaku inggana as ampuuliyén Apu Jesu Cristu. Anungun taku sey kinaanus sey ammura. Aannusana ey anguulley as udan asi at ammura ya uullayuna vus sey amung-an ya vumgasan sey nabalor ey immurana asina at aniyun.
59005008	At siya sey masapur anusan taku ya angkasdoron taku sey somsomok taku tey tigangey sey umaliyan sey Apu.
59005009	Aji kayu ampinnabasur dakayu ey susunud ta aji kayu mapabasur ey majusa tey anna ey tigangey sey manguwisana asda tagu.
59005010	Dakayu ey susunud, unujunyu sey kinaanus dasey profet assey kar-argow ey nangimpaagammu assey impiilan Apudyus an jida. Inan-anusanda dasey amin ey tongtong-ag ey nakwa an jida.
59005011	Ya ivilang taku mit vus as nagasat dasey nanginyaattum assey natongtong-aganda gapu assey pammatida an Apudyus. Jingngoryu mit sey miipanggop assey kinaanus Job assey kar-argow. Tey urey nu amud sey natongtong-agana, inturuturuyna ey namati at umanungus pun, naagammuwanyu mit sey ambaru ey planun Apudyus an siya. Tey as Apudyus, madagu ya amud sey layadna asda tagu.
59005012	Anna sey ibagak an dakayu susunud ey usa vus ey napatig. Nu awad ibagayu, aji kayu maggey mansapata. Ajiyu isapata ad langit unnu sey luta anna unnu ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey mansapsapataan da tagu. Urugna sey kananyu, “Oon” nu oon, “dokon” nu dokon. Siyana sey koonyu ta ajin Apudyus dakayu jusaun.
59005013	Nu awad maligatan an dakayu, masapur ey alluwaru ey angkudow an Apudyus as turung. Anungna atyén nu awad naragsak an dakayu, ikankantana atyén sey layadna ey mandayow an Apudyus.
59005014	At nu awad vus masakit an dakayu, ipaayagna dasey mangimpapangat as dasey mamati ta iluwaruwanda siya. At assey alluwaruwanda, aprusanda siya assey lana ey mangusar assey ngadan Apu Jesus ey angkudow as turung.
59005015	At nu patiyunda ey songbatan Apu Jesus sey luwaruda, makaan sey sakitna tey kaanun sey Apu. At nu nakabasur, pakawanun vus Apudyus.
59005016	Nu nakabasur kayu, ampipinnudnu kayu as dasey basuryu ya mallilinnuwaru kayu ta vumaru kayu. Tey sey luwarun sey niyun-un ey tagu at mandogot ya ambaru sey mantongparana.
59005017	Sey usa ey mipaniyana at as Elijah ey profet assey kar-argow. Anung taku vus siya ey tagu, kon impapatina pun ey nalluwaru an Apudyus ta aji umudan, ummangag tuttuwa as turu ey tawun ya onom ey vuran.
59005018	Oni pun, nalluwaru avus ey mangkudow an Apudyus as udan at ummudan tuttuwa asi at pey tumuvu dasey mura assey luta.
59005019	Dakayu ey susunud, nu awad usa an dakayu as nan-awidana sey ustu ey tudtuju ey piun Apudyus ya awad ji usa an dakayu as mamagbaga ta ampuuliyuna siya assey ustu ey tudtuju,
59005020	kama as siya sey nanagu assey nakabasur ta aji miisina an Apudyus. Ya pakawanun vus Apudyus sey basur sey tagu saji ey urey nu adjuwan sey basurna.
60001001	Sa'un an Peter ey aposel Jesu Cristu. Annaya sey suratku an dakayu ey sigud ey jinutukan Apudyus as taguna ey nasinasinak ey vunag assey kikkiili ad Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia ya Bithynia.
60001002	Jinutukan Ama ey Apudyus dakayu ey mibasar assey nisissigud ey sisimmokna ya dakayu sey tinkon sey Ispirituna as taguna ey mangngor an Jesu Cristu ya nadarusan gapu assey darana. Kanana atyén ta maatud sey vumaruwanyu ya sey tumarnaan sey somsomokyu losan.
60001003	Madayow as Apudyus ey Aman Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku! Niippun miyisuwan sey nangadaguwana an jitaku at siya sey nangatudana an jitaku assey baru ey viyag gapu assey nanaguwana an Jesu Cristu assey natuyana. At siguraju sey apporow taku namnamaun
60001004	ey mikakuwa assey amin ey intatarpun Apudyus para asda taguna. Intarpunna ad langit ta niippun madadailana ya niippun lumawlawingana anda ambaliwana as ing-inggana.
60001005	At dakayu ey mantalik assey pannakabalin Apudyus, angkuwayu da nauy. At ipiilan Apudyus sey nauy ey kasarakanan assey anungus sey ag-agow ey matongparana.
60001006	Allaylayad kayu urey nu awad ji jumatong as manjujuuyanyu gapu asda nantokotokon ey tongtong-ag tey sin-akitan anggey da nauy.
60001007	Makwa da nauy ta miila nu tuttuwa ey mamati kayu assey Apu unnu aji. Urey sey vurawan ey ampapattingga assey luta anna at masapur ey maapuyan as miil-an sey kinavurawanna. At siya sey masapur ey mapadas vus sey pammatiyu tey nabarbalor ey adayu nu sey vurawan. At nu mavud-asan sey kinaustun sey pammatiyu, ambaru sey mangimvilangan Apudyus an dakayu ya ambalinuna dakayu as nangatu ya idayowna dakayu assey ag-agow ey mipiil-an Jesu Cristu asda amin ey tagu.
60001008	Urey nu niippun innilayu an siya mamaryad kayu pey dallu an siya ya urey nu ajiyu pun siya iillan assey sana, mamati kayu pey dallu an siya. At amud sey allaylayadanyu ey niippun miyisuwana
60001009	tey anna ey misarakan kayu gapu assey pammatiyu an siya.
60001010	Sey kasarakanan anna, siya nauy sey imbagabagan dasey profet miipanggop assey kinaambarun Apudyus ya piunda vukitkitan nu ngey piuna ugujun sey impapaddaanda ey manginsarakanan Apudyus an dakayu ey mamati.
60001011	Ya piunda atyén agammuwun nu ngan sey ustu ey timpu ey makwaana ya nu ngan sey mangillasinan assey makwaana. Tey sey Ispiritun Cristu ey awad an jida, impaagammuna sey matongtong-agan sey Cristu kon nu maas sey matongtong-agana siya ji vus sey mingatuwana.
60001012	Impaagammun Apudyus asda profet ey sey nauy ey impapaddaanda at dakumpun as para an jida nu aji para an dakayu. Tey sey imbagabagan da profet anna at siya avus sey imbagabagan dasey nangiwwarawag assey Ambaru ey Damag an dakayu gapu assey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey siya sey nibaar assey luta anna ey narpu ad langit. Urey vus dasey enjel at piunda pigey ey maawatan sey miipanggop asda nauy.
60001013	At siya gogotmonyu ey mangwa assey piuna ya ilanyu ta ambaruwunyu ey ansomsomok. Ya aji kayu anjuwajuwa assey ambaru ey namnamaunyu ey atjun Apudyus an dakayu assey ampiil-an Jesu Cristu.
60001014	Masapur jumngor kayu an Apudyus ya ajiyu iparuvus ey maawis sey somsomokyu ey mangwa asda lawingan ey apporoyu kingwa assey daanyu pun mangigammuwan assey katuttuwaan.
60001015	Kon assey amin ey koonyu, ilanyu ta masapur nadarus sey ugaliyu ey anung sey kinadarus Apudyus ey nangayag an dakayu.
60001016	Tey awad sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Masapur ey nadarus sey ugaliyu ey anung sey kinadarus sey nakopyaak.”
60001017	Gapu ta apporoyu awagan as Apudyus as Amayu assey malluwaruwanyu, masapur ey assey iiggawanyu assey luta anna ey kamaʼs vunag, umugyat kayu atyén an siya tey niippun toktoknona assey manguwisana asda amin ey tagu ey mibasar assey kingwada.
60001018	Tey agammuyu ey dakumpun as parata unnu vurawan ey mamiid sey balorna as oros sey mawayawayaanyu asda niippun servina ey kaviviyag ey impabnus dasey dakdakoryu
60001019	nu aji sey nabalor ey daran Cristu ey mipani as niippun purus sakitna ey karneru.
60001020	Pinipilin Apudyus as Cristu assey daan pun sey luvung makwa kon aji pun as naagammuwan inggana assey sana ey ag-agow para assey vumaruwanyu.
60001021	Gapu an Cristu, tinalikyu as Apudyus ey nanagu ya nangimpangatu an siya as madayawana. At as Apudyus sey pinatiyu ya nipongsanan sey namnamayu.
60001022	Assey nangunudanyu assey katuttuwaan miipanggop an Cristu, nadarusan sey basuryu at siya sey narmu sey tuttuwa ey layadyu asda vurunyu ey mamati. At masapur ey tornonyu ey manlilinnayad.
60001023	Tey niyanak kayu kasin assey baru ey viyag ey dakumpun as anung sey tagu ey ampapattingga. Kon sey baru ey viyagyu anna at mannanayun tey narpu assey Gingan Apudyus ey niippun matarakana as ing-inggana.
60001024	Siyana sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Da amin ey tagu kamadaʼs lugam, sey kinadayowda kama assey sayyavung, maryow sey lugam, mayakayak sey sayyavungna.
60001025	Kon sey Gingan Apudyus matannadan as ing-inggana.” Sey nauy ey Gingan sey Apu at siya sey Ambaru ey Damag ey nitudtuju an dakayu.
60002001	At gapu ta niyanak kayu kasin assey baru ey viyag, idyanyu dasey amin ey kinarwing, kama asda ussat, aginsosomkan, apos ya da gumingaʼs lumawingan da ujum.
60002002	Sey ka'iyanak ey utting, allinlin-okna sey susu. Kanaʼsji atyén vus an dakayu ey mamaryad assey Gingan Apudyus ta jumgot sey pammatiyu inggana as matongpar sey kasarakananyu
60002003	tey kanan sey Gingan Apudyus, “Anna ey napadasanyu sey vinarun sey Apu.”
60002004	Umadani kayu assey matatagu ey batu ey siya as Cristu ey iwwalin dasey ampatpatakjug as vuruy ey ngadnunda as niippun servina kon siya at avus sey pinilin Apudyus as kabaloran ey batu.
60002005	At gapu assey umadaniyanyu an siya, mipani kayu vus as matatagu ey batu at iyuyayu sey long-agyu ta muusar as makwaan sey vuruyna as madayawana. At ambalinun avus Apudyus dakayu as paji ey manservi an siya ey mangindatun asda datun ey ming-opana ya maryadana gapu an Jesu Cristu.
60002006	Tey siya nauy sey nikukur-it assey Gingan Apudyus ey kanana, “Awad sey pinipilik ey kabaloran ey batu ey ipatukjuk ipon-ad ad Zion ey mangimpapagdot assey vuruy. At ngadannaʼsnaʼt man ey tagu ey mamati an siya at aji pun miviviin.”
60002007	At an dakayu ey namati, nabalor nauy ey batu. Kon as dasey aji pun namati, tandaananda atyén sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Sey batu ey iwwalin dasey ampatpatakjug as vuruy at nambalinun Apudyus as kabaloran ey batu ey mangimpapagdot assey vuruy.”
60002008	Ya kanana vus assey usa ey impakur-it Apudyus, “Nauy ey batu sey misaballutan dasey tagu ya malikwadanda.” Misaballutda tey ajida pun mamati assey Gingan Apudyus. Siya vus pigey nauy sey inggoddong Apudyus an jida.
60002009	Kon dakayu sey pinilin Apudyus ya nambalinuna as paji ey manservi an siya ey Ari. Ya jinarusana avus dakayu ta mitkon kayu asda ujum ey tagu as mantataguna ey mangiwwarawag assey kaskasdaow ey vinarun sey kingwana. Siya sey nangara an dakayu assey iggawanyu assey gikbot at iniggana dakayu assey appawey.
60002010	Assey kar-argow, dakumpun as tagun Apudyus dakayu ya niippun agammuyu assey daguna kon assey sana, taguna dakayu ya naagammuwanyu sey daguna.
60002011	An dakayu ey vuvurun, anung taku vunag assey luta anna ey apporow man-attuattun. At siya sey masapur aji taku koon dasey lawingan ey pipiun sey long-ag ey vumuvusur assey viyag taku an Apudyus.
60002012	Siya atyén uunnujunyu sey ambaru ey kaviviyagyu as ilan dasey aji pun mamati ta urey nu vumusurda an dakayu, miilada dasey ambaru ey kookoonyu at dayawunda as Apudyus assey ag-agow ey umaliyana ey man-uwis.
60002013	Gapu an Apu Jesus, ampaiturey kayu asda tagu ey awad karobbongana ey manginturey an jitaku ey kama an Emperor
60002014	ya dasey gubernador tey jida sey piniyarna ey manusa asda mangwaʼs lawingan ya piniyarna vus jida ey mangindayow as dasey mangwaʼs ambaru.
60002015	Tey sey piun Apudyus, guminok dasey niluruku ey tagu ey an-uguugud asda niippun servina nu ilanda dasey ambabaru ey kookoonyu.
60002016	Masapur nawaya kayu ey matagu kon ajiyu manjigayanji ey mangwa asda lawingan nu aji usarunyu sey wayayu ey manservi an Apudyus.
60002017	Masapur rispituwunyu da amin ey tagu ya pipiunyu da vurunyu ey mamati ya ugyatanyu as Apudyus ya ipiilayu sey rispituyu an Emperor.
60002018	Dakayu ey alipan, masapur dongronyu sey ibagan dasey sin-alipan an dakayu ya ipiilayu sey ustu ey rispitu dakumpun anggey asda naanus ya manang-awat kon urey vus dasey mangingit.
60002019	Tey as Apudyus, malaylaydan assey tagu ey gapu assey pammatina, aannusana sey matongtong-agana as urey niippun lapuna.
60002020	Tey yangey midayowka pun lawa nu aannusam sey matongtong-agam gapuʼs kingwam ey lawingan? Kon nu koonyu sey ustu ya tinongtong-ag dakayu ya inaannusanyu, siyaji sey mas-uman Apudyus.
60002021	Tey siya nauy sey nangayagan Apudyus an dakayu ta unujunyu sey kanaʼsna ey kaviviyag. Tey as Cristu at natongtong-ag para an dakayu ya nangwa siya as mansarminganyu.
60002022	Niippun basur as kingwana ya niippun nadngor as ussatna.
60002023	Inin-insurtuda siya kon niippun insongbatna as lawingan. Tinongtong-agda pun siya, ajina pun vus jida kinogma nu aji intalikna an Apudyus ey niyun-un sey koona ey man-uwis.
60002024	As Cristu ey mismu sey nangingkaru assey basur taku assey natuyana assey krus ta mawayawayaan taku assey kaviilan sey basur. Tey gapu assey navigadanana, vummaru taku.
60002025	Tey assey kar-argow, anungyu sey niyow-ow ey karneru. Kon assey sana nipuuli kayu an Cristu ey mangaajug ya mamupuut an dakayu.
60003001	An dakayu avus ey vubai ey naasaw-an, masapur ampaiturey kayu as dasey asawayu ta nu awad aji namati an jida assey Gingan Apudyus, maawisda ey mamati gapu assey ambaru ey ugaliyu. Urey nu ajiyu as iginga at mamatida,
60003002	tey iillanda sey ambaru ya naapudyusan ey ugaliyu.
60003003	Ya dakumpun atyén assey mangiggaanyu asda ang-anggayu sey mangimpiila assey pinorkasyu, kama assey mangang-anggaanyu asda vuukyu, angusaranyu asda lubey unnu asda nababalor ey lumvun.
60003004	Sey miil-an atyén sey aji pun angkupas ey pinorkasyu at sey kinabarun sey ugali kama assey anus ya annadyu. Tey siyana sey pinorkas ey nabalor as angiilan Apudyus.
60003005	Tey siya nauy sey ugali ey inunud dasey naapudyusan ey vubai assey kar-argow ey nantatallik an Apudyus. At sey kingwada ey nangimpaporkas assey long-agda at sey nampaiturayanda asda asawada
60003006	ey anung sey kingwan Sarah ey namapati an Abraham ya imvilangna siya as umapuwana. Mivilang kayu as aanak Sarah nu ustu sey koonyu ey niippun umugyatanyu.
60003007	An dakayu vus ey laraki ey naasaw-an, masapur manang-awat kayu as dasey asawayu ey mangimmamad assey koonyu ey matagu tey ak-akkuyada nu dakayu. Ipiilayu sey rispituyu an jida tey vurunyu jida ey maatdan as viyag ey niippun patinggana. Da nauy sey koonyu ta niippun manipod asda luwaruyu.
60003008	Annaya sey salinunut sey apporok imbagabaga. Masasa'an kayu assey somsomok, mansisinnakit kayu, manlilinnayad kayu, silalayad kayu ey tumurung nu ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey angkasapuran an dakayu ya man-asiuya kayu.
60003009	Nu awad angwaʼs lawingan an dakayu, aji kayu angwaʼs lawingan an jida ya nu padngoran dakayu, ajiyu vus jida padngoran tey sey namiliyan Apudyus an dakayu at sey mangwaanyu as ambaru ta ambaru vus sey koona an dakayu.
60003010	Tey awad sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Nu piunyu ey allaylayad ya ambaru sey mataguwanyu, masapur ey aji kayu an-uguugud as lawingan ya ipug-anyu sey inuussat.
60003011	Masapur man-awidanyu dasey lawingan ta koonyu sey ambaru ya ipakatyu sey kaviilanyu ey manganap assey mapanusan da tagu.
60003012	Tey as Apudyus puutuna dasey mangwaʼs ambaru ya dongrona sey luwaruda kon sasangngaana dasey mangwaʼs lawingan.”
60003013	Tey nu silalayadka ey mangwa as ambaru, ey awad pun lawa lawingan as koonda an sika?
60003014	Kon nu koonyu sey ambaru ya tinongtong-ag dakayu, nagasat kayu. Aji kayu umugyat anda malilivukan assey koonda an dakayu
60003015	nu aji idayowyu as Cristu ey Apuyu. Masapur nakasagana kayu ey sumongbat nu awad man-imus an dakayu miipanggop assey namnamayu
60003016	kon ilanyu ta ambaruwunyu ey mangimbaga assey songbatyu ey mangimpiila assey rispituyu an jida ya niippun itataruyu as lawing assey somsomokyu. At nu awad mangillaylayus an dakayu, maviinanda gapu asda ambaru ey ugaliyu, dakayu ey nijujugga an Cristu.
60003017	Tey un-unina sey matongtong-agta gapuʼs mangwaan assey ambaru nu siya sey piun Apudyus nu sey matongtong-agta gapu assey lawingan ey kingwa.
60003018	Tey urey as Cristu, natongtong-ag ya natuy gapu assey basur taku. Namingpingsan anggey sey natuyana ey nangingkaru assey basur taku at aji pun ogon kasin mipigwa. Ambaru siya ey tagu kon natuy para asda lawingan ta iyadanina jitaku an Apudyus. Gingngatda sey long-agna kon natatagu sey Ispirituna.
60003019	At ummuy sey Ispirituna assey iggawan dasey nibabarud ey alinnawan dasey nangkakatuy at inggow sey imbagana an jida miipanggop an siya.
60003020	Da nauy ey nibabarud, jida dasey aji pun namati assey timpun Noah assey kar-argow. Assey timpu saji ey nangwaan Noah assey bapor, inan-anusan Apudyus ey nanguulley assey mamatiyan atyén dasey tagu an siya kon waru anggey dasey summakey assey bapor ey natagu assey nallitapana.
60003021	Sey danum saji, sey kama as iglatun sey navunyaganyu ey mangimpiila assey nasarakananyu. Kon dakumpun assey maslopan assey danum ey muurasan sey daping sey manginsarakan an dakayu nu aji sey malluwaruwanyu an Apudyus ta darusana dasey somsomokyu gapu assey ummuliyén Jesu Cristu.
60003022	Ummuli pun, ummuy ad langit at awad assey sana assey padawanan Apudyus ey manginturturey asda amin ey enjel ya da aji pun miila ey awad karobbongana anda awad pannakabalinna.
60004001	Gapu ta natongtong-ag as Cristu assey iniiggawana assey luta anna, masapur miyanung sey somsomokyu an siya ey nakasagana ey matongtong-ag tey sey matongtong-ag ey tagu ey kama an Cristu, piuna ugujun, nan-awidana sey basur.
60004002	At mallugi assey sana inggana assey matuyanyu, masapur ey dakumpun assey pipiun sey long-agyu sey unujunyu nu aji sey piun Apudyus.
60004003	Assey daanyu pun mamatiyan, inunudyu sey koko'on dasey aji pun mamati kama asda, ummamdan ey kaggissow ya kaviviin ey pipiun sey long-ag, vubvuuk, ummamdan ey lagragsak ya sey apporoyu nandayawan asda ap-apudyus.
60004004	At ey sana, masdaow dasey niippun agammuna assey Apu nu ngey pakayu aji mijuga an jida asda amud ey lawingan ey kookoonda at siya sey mangin-insurtuwanda an dakayu.
60004005	Kon aji bali tey jumatong dallu sey ag-agow ey masapur songbatanda an Apudyus sey amin ey kingwada. Tey as Apudyus, nakasagana ey manguwis asda amin ey tagu, natattagu man unnu da nangkakatuy.
60004006	Siyana sey lapuna ey niwarawag avus sey Ambaru ey Damag asda nangkakatuy ta urey nu natuy sey long-agda ey siya dallu sey makwa asda amin ey tagu gapu assey basur, matatagu sey alinnawada ey kama assey matatagguwan Apudyus.
60004007	Tigangey sey pungpung sey kangamin at siya sey masapur aji kayu awwey mangwa assey koonyu nu aji man-annad kayu ta niippun manipod assey malluwaruwanyu.
60004008	Sey ikow kabaloran atyén ey koonyu at masapur manlilinnayad kayu tey sey manlilinnaydanyu iluswana sey allasu as ampipinnakawananyu.
60004009	Piingsaunyu ey ammangili ey niippun atyén angngayatungut.
60004010	At gapu ta wasji usa at inatdan Apudyus assey ambabaru ey kaviilan ey manservi asda vurunna, masapur ey ambaruwuna ey mangusar as katurunganda.
60004011	At sey naatdan as kaviilan ey mantudtuju, masapur itudtujuna sey ustu ey imbagan Apudyus. Ya sey naatdan as kaviilan ey tumurung, masapur tumurung assey patinggan sey kaviilana ey innatud Apudyus. Siyaji sey koonyu ta as Apudyus sey madayow assey kangamin gapu an Jesu Cristu. Madayow as Apudyus ya manturey siya as ing-inggana. Amen.
60004012	Dakayu ey susunud ey pipiuk, aji kayu masdaow assey amud ey tongtong-ag ey kama as nisabsabali ey makwamakwa. Tey jumatong da nauy ey tongtong-ag ta mapadas sey kinatuttuwan sey pammatiyu.
60004013	Kon sey koonyu, allaylayad kayu atyén tey kama as nijuga kayu ey matongtong-ag an Cristu ta umam-amud sey mallaylaydanyu nu jumatong sey kadadayow ey ag-agow ey ampuuliyana.
60004014	Nagasat kayu nu insurtuwun dakayu gapu ta pasurut dakayu an Cristu tey siya nauy sey mangimpiila ey awad sey kinabarun sey Ispiritun Apudyus an dakayu.
60004015	Kon nu matongtong-ag kayu, dakumpun atyén as siya matongtong-aganyu gapu asda lawingan ey kingwayu ey kama asda gumngat, man-akow, angguru anda mikaviyang asda ujum.
60004016	Kon nu matongtong-ag kayu gapu assey pammatiyu an Cristu, aji kayu maviin nu aji dayawunyu as Apudyus tey lobbongna ey maawagan kayu as pasurut Cristu.
60004017	Jummatong sey manginsardan Apudyus ey manguwis asda tagu ey isaradna asda taguna. At nu jitaku ey taguna sey misardana, aji sin-umamud sey makwa asda aji pun mamati assey Ambaru ey Damag ey narpu an Apudyus?
60004018	Tey inggow sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Nu ansigab as misarakan dasey ambaru ey tagu, aji sin-umamud as dasey niippun somsomokna an Apudyus ey angwaangwa as lawingan?”
60004019	At nu matongtong-ag kayu ey mibasar assey piun Apudyus, masapur ituturuyyu ey mangwa assey ambaru ya italikyu sey long-agyu an siya. Siya vus pigey sey nangwa an dakayu at ajina pun maliwatan dasey impostana.
60005001	An dakayu ey mangimpapangat asda mamati, usaak vus ey kama an dakayu ya ininggawak assey natongtong-agan Cristu. At milak-amak vus assey midayawana nu umdas sey miparangana. Ampangpangaasiyak an dakayu ta
60005002	masapur puutunyu ey ustu dasey mamati ey nipiyar an dakayu. Assey mangwaanyu assey viyangyu dakumpun atyén as mapatut kayu ta sey mangwaanyu at gapu atyén pigey assey layadyu ey dakumpun as layadyu assey pilak nu aji gapu assey layadyu ey manservi an Apudyus.
60005003	Aji kayu kama as ap-apu ey manginturey as dasey tagu ey nipiyar an dakayu nu aji dakayu atyén sey mansarminganda asda kinaambaru.
60005004	At nu amparang as Jesu Cristu ey apun dasey mamati, awad sey magun-gunayu ey mannanayun as ing-inggana.
60005005	Dakayu vus ey vinabaruwan, masapur ey ampaiturey kayu asda natnat-ong nu dakayu. Ya masapur atyén ampakumbaba kayu asda vurunyu ey mamati. Tey inggow sey impakur-it Apudyus ey kanana, “Vusurun Apudyus sey tagu ey mangimpangatu assey long-agna kon turungana dasey ampakumbaba.”
60005006	Ampaiturey kayu an Apudyus ey mannakabalin at ipangatuna dakayu nu jumatong sey timpuna.
60005007	Italikyu sey amin ey andanaganyu an Apudyus tey siya sey mamupuut an dakayu.
60005008	Masapur man-aannad ya man-orom kayu tey as jimunyu ey kavusuryu at anungna layun ey mangag-aggakow ey man-anap as kanuna.
60005009	Ammaanyu pagdoton sey pammatiyu ya idyanyu sey awisna. Tey agammuyu ey dakumpun anggey as dakayu sey matongtong-ag assey jugan da nait ey tongtong-ag tey urey vus dasey vurunyu ey mamati assey intiru ey luvung.
60005010	Kon nu maas sey sin-akitan ey matongtong-aganyu, as Apudyus ey ambaru sey koona ey tumurung ey namili an dakayu, ijugana dakayu assey kinadayowna ey niippun pungpungna gapu assey nijugaanyu an Cristu. Ya ambalinuna dakayu as niippun mankurangana ya pakasdorona dakayu ta jumgot ya aji pun miwagot sey pammatiyu.
60005011	Siya sey madaydayow as ing-inggana tey niippun patinggan sey pannakabalinna. Amen.
60005012	As Silvanus ey matalik ey sunud taku ey mamati sey nanurung an sa'un ey nangingkur-it assey avubbang ey suratku anna an dakayu. Sey panggopku ey nangingkur-it as nauy an dakayu ta pakasdorok sey pammatiyu ya ipaniknikku an dakayu sey kinatuttuwan nauy ey ingkur-itku miipanggop assey kinaambarun Apudyus an dakayu. At masapur papagdotonyu assey somsomokyu sey nangadaguwan Apudyus an dakayu.
60005013	Dasey mamati ey susunudyu ey awad ad Babylon ey pinilin vus Apudyus, losan dakayu pakumustaun ya urey as Mark ey ivilangku as anakku at pakumustauna vus dakayu.
60005014	Ampipinnakumusta kayu ey mangimpiila ey manlilinnayad kayu ey pasurut Cristu. Kanana atyén ta natarna sey somsomokyu losan ey nijuga an Cristu.
61001001	Sa'un an Simon Peter ey usa asda Aposel Jesu Cristu ey anserservi an siya. Annaya sey suratku an dakayu losan ey mamati an Cristu ey anung vus sey kingwani ey namati gapu assey kinalintog Jesu Cristu ey Apudyus taku ya nanginsarakan an jitaku.
61001002	Kanana atyén ta mapadasanyu sey amud ey vinaru ey marpu an Apudyus ya sey tumarnaan sey somsomokyu gapu assey nangigammuwanyu an Apudyus ya an Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku.
61001003	Gapu assey pannakabalin Apudyus, innatudna an jitaku sey amin ey kasapuran taku ey matagu ey mitagop assey pammati taku. Naatud nauy an jitaku assey inagammu taku as Cristu. Siya sey nangayag an jitaku ey mikavilley assey kinangatuna ya kinaambaruna.
61001004	At gapu asda nauy, awad sey innatudna an jitaku ey ikow nabalor ya ambabaru ey impostana. At gapu asda nauy ey innatudna, niilisi kayu asda lawingan ey makwamakwa assey luvung anna ey madadailan da tagu ta mikavilley kayu assey kinaApudyusna.
61001005	Assey mantatallikanyu an Cristu, ipapatiyu ey mangwa asda ambaru. Ya assey mangwaanyu assey ambaru, ipapatiyu vus agammuwun sey ustu ey makwa.
61001006	Ya assey mangagammuwanyu assey ustu ey makwa, ijugayu attuman sey pipiun sey long-ag. Ya assey mangaattumanyu assey pipiun sey long-ag, ijugayu anusan sey amin. Ya assey mangaannusanyu assey amin, ijugayu vus sey naapudyusan ey ugali.
61001007	Ya assey naapudyusan ey ugaliyu, ijugayu sey maryadanyu asda vurunyu ey mamati. Ya assey maryadanyu asda vurunyu ey mamati, ijugayu vus sey maryadanyu asda amin ey tagu.
61001008	At nu wadawad amin da nauy ey ugali an dakayu, ajiyu pun anung sey ullawig ey mura ey niippun servina nu aji mipani kayu assey mura ey mayukyuk as vunga. At dokor sey ambanagan sey nangigammuwanyu an Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku.
61001009	Kon nu awad tagu as aji pun mangunud asda nauy ey ugali, naradab nait ey tagu. Niippun gama ilana ya naliwatana ey nadarusan dasey judaan ey basurna.
61001010	At dakayu ey susunud, iggayu sey ustu ey kaviilanyu ey mangunud assey ambaru ey kaviviyag ta mapaniknikan sey nangayagan ya namiliyan Apudyus an dakayu. Tey nu koonyu nauy, ajiyu pun maggey man-awidan sey pammatiyu.
61001011	Ya allaylayad as Apudyus ey amasakey an dakayu ey mijuga assey mannanayun ey turey Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu ey nanginsarakan an jitaku.
61001012	At urey nu aaggammuyu ya nimumura assey somsomokyu da nauy ey katuttuwaan ey tudtuju, kanayun ey ipakagasmokku an dakayu.
61001013	Assey kasomsomkak, ambab-aru nu apporok ipakagasmok da nauy an dakayu nu sissiyaak ey matattagu.
61001014	Tey agammuk ey tigangey sey maneynanak assey luta anna tey siya sey imbabaggan Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu ey makwa an sa'un.
61001015	At iggak sey ustu ey kaviilak ey mangwa asda nauy ta urey nu matuyak, ajiyu pun maliwatan.
61001016	Sey amin ey intudtujuni an dakayu miipanggop assey ampuuliyén Jesu Cristu ya sey pannakabalinna, dakumpun as ul-ullit ey narpu assey kinariing ji tagu tey innilan pigey sey atani sey summilingan sey kinangatuna.
61001017	Tey ininggow kani assey nangimpadayawan ya nangimpasilingan Ama ey Apudyus an siya. Nivuvullun kani an siya assey vilig ey kananda ey naapudyusan ey gummingaan Apudyus ey kangatuwan ey kanana, “Nauy sey pipiuk ey anakku ey siya sey da mangimpalaylayad an sa'un.”
61001019	At gapu asda jingngorni ya innilani, niippun juwajuwani assey kinatuttuwan sey iwwarawag dasey profet assey kar-argow. At ambaru nu papannaaganyu dasey imbagada tey da jiyuy sey kamaʼs silow ey jumilang assey aggikbot inggana as pumawey ey lumuswaan sey Ambassalelow ey vituwun ey manilow assey somsomokyu.
61001020	Kon masapur sosomkonyu ey niippun tagu as magna gey maawatan dasey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus assey kuwana ey kasomsomkan nu aji ipakaawat sey Ispiritu an siya.
61001021	Tey amin dasey nikukur-it ey Gingan Apudyus at dakumpun as narpu assey kasomsomkan da tagu nu aji sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey manginturung assey somsomok da profet assey apporoda mangimbag-an assey tudtuju ey narpu an Apudyus.
61002001	Kon assey kar-argow, inggow dasey sinangprofet. At kama vus assey sana, awad da lumuswa ey ampammarang as profet ey mangintudtuju as inuussat ey manadail assey pammatiyu ya ajida pun vigvigun sey Apu ey nangingkaru assey basurda at siya sey makornatanda ey majusa.
61002002	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, adjuwan pey dallu dasey mangunud assey kaggissow ey kaviviyagda. At gapu an jida, alliwliw-an da tagu sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju ey anturung an Apudyus.
61002003	At gapu assey kinaagumda as pilak, miid ajida parangun as itudtujuda ey narpu assey kuwada ey somsomok ta ampilakan dakayu. Kon nakasagana as Apudyus ey manguwis an jida tey nagogoddonganda assey kar-argow ya nisasaggana sey majusaanda.
61002004	As Apudyus, ajina pun pinasinsiya dasey enjel ey nambasur nu aji imballuna jida ey nakakawwadan ad inférnu assey iggawan sey amud ey gikbot as anguullayanda assey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda kangamin.
61002005	Ya kama vus asda lawing ey tagu assey kar-argow assey timpun Noah at ajida pun vus napasinsiya nu aji namin Apudyus jida inuvur. At waru anggey dasey nisarakan ey da Noah ey simbaryan. Tey as Noah, siya anggey sey apporow nangintudtuju assey piun Apudyus.
61002006	Anungna vus sey nakwa asda tagu ad Sodom ya ad Gomorah ey singgub Apudyus ey nijuga sey ilida inggana as naminda jummapur ta awad mangil-an taku as anung sey makwa asda niippun somsomokna an Apudyus.
61002007	Kon illisina as Lot tey ambaru ey tagu ya apporow malilivukan ey mangiila assey kaggissow ey kookoon dasey kailiyana.
61002008	Nikig-ow siya an jida at inag-agow ey inidamana ey mangiila ya mamangngor asda dakumpun ey kookoonda.
61002009	At amin da jiyuy ey nakwa assey kar-argow, da jiyuy dasey mansarmingan taku ey as Apudyus, agammuna ey mangillisi as dasey naapudyusan ey tagu assey matongtong-aganda. Ya agammuna ey manginsagana asda lawing ey tagu assey majusaanda assey anungus sey ag-agow ey manguwisana asda kangamin
61002010	am-amud as dasey apporow mangwa assey kaggissow ey pipiun sey long-agda ya da mangillaylayus assey karobbongan dasey nangatngatu nu jida. Da sinangprofet anna, marangsitda ya mansokarda ey niippun ugyatda ey guminga as lawingan asda kadadayow ey awad pannakabalinna ad langit.
61002011	Urey gey dasey enjel ey nangatu sey pannakabalinda nu dasey sinangprofet anna at ajida pun gumminga as lawingan ey amabasur an jida assey sinagung Apudyus.
61002012	Kon da nauy ey tagu, anungda kagguugyat ey atap ey animar ey niippun ujum as mantongparanda nu aji madokmaanda ya nipagngatda. Anungda asu ey niippun purus viinda ya amin ey ajida pun maawatan, an-ut-utyukanda. At niippun mantongparanda nu aji miballuda
61002013	as mangdasanda assey kagguugyat ey majusaanda ey miyambong assey kingwada ey nanongtong-ag asda ujum. Sey iggowʼn sey layadda at sey mangwa asda kaviviin ey pipiun sey long-agda as ming-opanda, ag-agow man unnu assey sinagung da tagu. Mipanida as mansa ey mangaggissow an dakayu assey mijugaanda ey mikakan an dakayu ya allaylaydanda sey mangal-allilow an dakayu.
61002014	Ya nu ilanda dasey vubai, sabali pey sey umuy assey somsomokda ey ajida pun ming-op ey mangwaʼs da vumasuranda. Ya nariingda ey amab-ali asda allasu as mabarbaliyan. Ya nitong-ar sey kinaagum assey long-agda. Oni at jusaun Apudyus jida!
61002015	Tineynanda sey nanggodong ey daran at inunudda sey daran ey innuy Balaam ey anak Beor. Tey as Balaam, mamaryad ey nangara assey pilak gapu asda lawingan ey kingwana
61002016	at naingoran siya gapu assey basurna. At sey donkey ey nangakabbayuwana, maggey gumminga assey gingan ji tagu ey nangingor an siya at inonat Balaam sey inuung-ung ey panggopna.
61002017	Da nauy ey sinangprofet, niippun servida tey mipanida as natjukan ey vuvun ya kamada vus as gommongot ey livuu ey iyyabvid sey bali at niippun tinokdagnaʼs udan. At insaganan Apudyus sey amud ey aggongot ey lugar ey iggawan da nauy ey tagu as ing-inggana.
61002018	Ampaspas-umda ey guminga ya awweyda ginga asda niippun itakipna as vumaruwan. Itudtujuda ey dakumpun as lawingan ey koon sey pipiun sey long-ag as mangawisda asda barbaru ey namati ey ka'ipog-anda ey mangwa as vumasuran ey summiyén asda lawingan ey vurunda.
61002019	Ya impostada ey nawaya sey urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu ey mangwa assey piuna. Kon assey katuttuwaan, jida ey mismu sey dakumpun as nawaya tey inalipan jida asda kinumbot ey kopya ey ajida pun mikapug-an assey impiingsan sey long-agda. Tey tuttuwa ey sey tagu ey aji pun mikapug-an assey lawing ey kopyana, sey kopyana vus pigey saji sey nangalipan an siya.
61002020	Nu sey tagu at ingginokna sey kaggissow ey kopya assey luvung anna gapu assey nangigammuwana an Jesu Cristu ey Apu ya nanginsarakan an jitaku, ya as oni ey pinuulina ey kasin nampaalipan assey pannakabalin da nauy ey kaggissow ey kopya, sin-umamud sey kinarwingna nu assey damuna.
61002021	Un-unina nu ajina pey lawa naagammuwan sey koon sey tagu ey ambalin as niyun-un nu sey naagammuwana kon oni ey nan-awidana jiyuy ey immandar Apudyus an siya.
61002022	At sey makwa assey kanaʼsna ey tagu, siya sey tumuttuwaan sey kananda ey, “Sey asu, kanuna kasin sey iyyutlokna ya urey vus amsum sey borok, kasin allujug assey piyok.”
61003001	Dakayu ey susunud, mikagwa nauy ey suratku an dakayu. Sey panggopku asda nauy ey suratku, piuk atyén ey ipakagasmok an dakayu dasey luusyu inagammu ta makarakag sey nadarus ey somsomokyu.
61003002	Sey piuk atyén pigey, ajiyu maliwliwatan sey intudtujun dasey profet Apudyus assey kar-argow ya kama vus asda imvilin sey Apu ey nanginsarakan an jitaku ey siya nauy sey intudtujun dasey aposelyu an dakayu.
61003003	Sey pangpanguwuk ibaga, masapur maawatanyu ey nu jumatong sey anungus sey ag-agow, awad da tagu ey lumuswa ey niippun kasin manginturung an jida nu aji dasey pipiun sey long-agda. Apporoan dakayu
61003004	ey kananda, “Impostan mit Jesus ey ampuuli, gumman vus gey nu'? Anna ey nangkakatuy dasey dakdakor taku ya niippun mit gey nampuuli? Mallugi assey nakwaan sey luvung inggana assey sana, sissiya mit ey niippun nambaliwana.”
61003005	Dasey mangimbaga assey kanaʼsna, gagaraunda pey lawa ey aji pun mamati assey kingwan Apudyus assey kar-argow assey lugrugina ey magna gey ingginga ya nakwa sey langit ya sey luta. Danum sey inusarna ey nangwa assey luta at kama as lummuswa sey luta ey narpu assey danum.
61003006	Ya gapu avus assey vilinna, danum avus sey nuusar ey nanadail assey luta assey timpun sey litap as nanusaana asda tagu.
61003007	At anungna avus assey sana tey aawwad sey langit ya sey luta gapu assey inggingana inggana assey timpu ey inggoddongna ey mangapuyana. At sissiya ey aawwad sey kangamin inggana assey ag-agow ey manguwisana asda lawingan ey tagu ta majusada as ing-inggana.
61003008	Kon an dakayu susunud ey pipiuk, ajiyu atyén maliwatan ey as Apudyus, an-isu sey kabayag sey usa ey ag-agow ya sey sillivu ey tawun. Ya sey sillivu ey tawun at kama vus as sa'an anggey ey ag-agow an siya.
61003009	Assey kasomsomkan da ujum, itantatantan Apudyus ey manongpar assey impostana. Kon dakumpun as tuttuwanaʼt nu aji aannusana ey anguulley as ambabawiyan da tagu tey sey piuna, niippun atyén majusa as urey sa'an ey tagu.
61003010	Kon jumatong ey jumatong sey ag-agow ey ampuuliyén sey Apu ey anung sey umaliyan sey man-aakow ey aji pun maagammuwan. At assey ag-agow saji, awad sey madngor ey mandangsor ey agajuud ya muumas ad langit. Masgub ya muumas dasey amin ey awad ad langit ya sey luta ya da kangamin ey awad.
61003011	Nu kanasnaʼt sey kadadailan sey kangamin, ngey piuna ugujun nauy assey angokoonyu ey matagu? Masapur ey naapudyusan sey koonyu ey matagu ey mangunud anggey assey piun Apudyus.
61003012	At assey anguullayanyu assey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda amin ey tagu, iggayu sey kaviilanyu ey mangwa as mapgusan sey umaliyana. Tey tuttuwa ey assey ag-agow saji, masgub ad langit ya marunow sey amin ey awad ad langit at maminda mamiid.
61003013	Kon an jitaku, namnamaun taku sey mangimpaluswaan Apudyus assey impostana ey baru ey langit ya luta as iggawan dasey pasig niyun-un ey tagu.
61003014	At dakayu ey susunud, gapu ta siya nauy sey uullayunyu, iggayu sey kaviilanyu ta masapur nadarus kayu ey niippun mankuranganyu assey angiilan Apudyus ya ambaru sey mijujug-anyu an siya.
61003015	Iggayu assey somsomokyu ey sey lapuna nu pan lawa Apudyus aannusan ey mangintantatantan assey ampuuliyana tey piuna atjun sey wayawayan da ujum as misarakananda ey siya vus pigey sey ingkur-it sunud taku ey Paul assey nanuratana an dakayu ey inusarna sey liing ey innatud Apudyus an siya.
61003016	Siya nauy sey imbagabagan Paul asda amin ey suratna assey nanuratana miipanggop assey ampuuliyén Jesu Cristu. Manuwat tey awad da ujum ey ingkur-itna ey ansigab as maawatan. At da tagu ey kurang sey agammuna ya anjuwajuwa assey pammatina, magda pey lawa da baliwan sey piuna ugujun ey anung vus sey apporoda koon asda ujum ey impakur-it Apudyus. At assey kanaʼsna ey kookoonda, jida vus pigey ey mismu sey mangwa as majusaanda.
61003017	Kon an dakayu ey susunud, nibabagga da nauy an dakayu. At masapur ilanyu ta aji kayu maallilow asda tagu ey aji pun umunud assey lintog ta ajiyu teynan sey ustuustu ey kinapagdot sey pammatiyu.
61003018	Sey koon taku atyén, panggan taku ey mangadaadar miipanggop an Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu ey nanginsarakan an jitaku ta majugjug-an sey maawatan taku miipanggop assey layad ya kinaambaruna an jitaku. Siya anggey sey madayow assey sana ya as ing-inggana ey niippun patinggana! Amen.
62001001	Assey suratku anna, ul-ullituk an dakayu sey miipanggop assey kananda ey Ginga ey siya sey marpuwan sey mataguwan ey niippun patinggana. Nisisigud ey awad siya an Ama taku ey Apudyus urey assey daan pun makwa sey luvung. Ya urey as ing-inggana at aawwad siya. Nambalin pun as tagu, innilani ey mismu siya. Jingngorni siya assey amin ey nikabagbagaana an dakani ya dani inugnan siya. Impaagammuna an dakani sey tudtuju ey marpuwan sey viyag ey niippun patinggana. At gapu ta dakani sey nangimpiil-an Apudyus assey marpuwan sey kataguwan sana, takjuganni ya iwarawagni an dakayu dasey innilani.
62001003	At assey sana, iwarawagni an dakayu sey innilani ya jingngorni ta mijuga kayu an dakani ey mivurun an Ama taku ey Apudyus ya an Anakna ey Jesu Cristu.
62001004	Ikur-itni da nauy an dakayu ta allaylayad taku losan.
62001005	Nauy sey damag ey jingngorni an siya ey Anak Apudyus ey ipaagammuni an dakayu: As Apudyus sey silow at niippun purus gikbot an siya.
62001006	At nu kanan taku ey nijujugga taku an siya ya sissiya taku assey gikbot, nan-us-ussat taku tey aji pun miyunud sey angokoon taku ey matagu assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju ey narpu an Apudyus.
62001007	Kon nu awad taku assey appawey ey kama assey nakopyaan Apudyus, ambaru sey amvuvurnan taku ya sey daran Jesus ey Anakna assey natuyana sey manguras asda amin ey basur taku.
62001008	Nu kanan taku ey niippun basur taku, al-allilawun taku sey long-ag taku tey aji taku pun umayun assey katuttuwaan.
62001009	Kon nu ibabawi taku an Apudyus sey basur taku, pakawanuna jitaku ya darusana jitaku as dasey amin ey lawingan ey kingwa taku. Siyana sey koona tey matalik ey mangwa ya ustu sey angokoona.
62001010	Kon nu kanan taku ey niippun basur taku, sey piuna ugujun, nambalinun taku ey ussatan as Apudyus ya aji pun nimura assey somsomok taku sey Gingana.
62002001	Dakayu ey ivilangku as aanakku gapu assey pammati, isuratku da nauy an dakayu ta aji kayu vumasur. Kon nu awad vumasur an dakayu, awad as Jesu Cristu ey niippun basurna ey siya sey tumurung ey mikabagbaga an Ama taku ey Apudyus para an jitaku.
62002002	Ya siya avus sey nangingkaru assey bayad sey basur taku ya kadaguwan jitaku ta mapakawan dasey basur taku. Ya dakumpun anggey as sey basur taku tey urey vus sey basur dasey amin ey tagu.
62002003	Nu uunnujun taku sey imvilin Apudyus, siyaji sey angimpiila ey tuttuwa ey agammu taku siya.
62002004	At nu kanan taku ey agammu taku as Apudyus ya aji taku pun dongron sey vilinna, ussatan taku ya niippun an jitaku sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju.
62002005	Kon nu tongparun taku sey Gingan Apudyus, niippun nangkurangan sey layad taku an siya ey kama assey layadna an jitaku. At annaya sey manigurajuwan ey nijujugga taku an Apudyus:
62002006	Nu kanan taku ey nijujugga taku an siya, masapur ey anungun taku sey nakopyaan Jesus.
62002007	Dakayu ey vuvurun ey pipiuk, sey ingkur-itku anna ey vilin an dakayu at dakumpun as kaddatu tey nanipud assey namatiyanyu, nanginkinnuwunyu jingngor da nauy ey vilin ey masapur manlilinnayad taku.
62002008	Kon kama tuttuwa as kaddatu nauy ey vilin ey ingkur-itku tey impiilan Jesus sey ustu ey layad assey kingwana ya miila avus nauy ey layad assey katataguyu assey sana. Tey anna ogon ey maakkiakkit ey makaan sey gikbot ya anna ey nambalin kayu ey kama as ustu ey silow.
62002009	At nu awad angimbaga ey awad siya assey silow, kon gurauna sey vurunna, sissiya ey awad siya assey gikbot.
62002010	Kon sey awad layadna assey vurunna, siya sey awad assey appawey at niippun koona as vumasuran da ujum.
62002011	Kon sey vusuruna sey vurunna, awad siya assey gikbot. Niippun agammuna as kapnona tey vinurag siya assey gikbot.
62002012	Manuratak an dakayu ey aanakku tey pinakawan Apudyus dasey basuryu gapu assey kingwan Cristu.
62002013	Manuratak vus an dakayu ey angkamarong-ag tey agammuyu as Apudyus ey nisisigud ey iniinggow assey lugrugina. Ya manuratak vus an dakayu ey vinabaruwan tey inabakyu as Satanas.
62002014	At ipigwak ey angimbaga nu ngan sey gapuna nu paak lawa manurat an dakayu. Nanuratak an dakayu ey aanakku tey agammuyu as Ama taku. Dakayu vus ey angkamarong-ag, tey agammuyu ey awad siya ey sigud assey lugrugina. An dakayu vus ey vinabaruwan, tey mangkanasdor kayu ya immurayu assey somsomokyu sey Gingan Apudyus ya inabakyu vus as Satanas.
62002015	Ajiyu gamgaman sey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey awad assey luta ey aji pun miyunud assey piun Apudyus. Ya aji kayu mikikkiila assey lawing ey nakopyaan dasey niippun agammuna an Apudyus. Tey nu siyaji sey koonyu, piuna ugujun, niippun layadyu an Apudyus ey Ama taku.
62002016	Tey amin dasey gamgamgaman da tagu assey luta anna at aji pun miyunud assey piun Apudyus, kama as dasey lawingan ey patpatigun sey long-ag, dasey ilan sey ata ey gamgaman ey aran, dasey angindayow as dasey laksunda ya sey kasasaadda. Amin da nauy at dakumpun as Apudyus ey Ama sey narpuwana tey narpu assey niluruta.
62002017	Dasey awad assey luta ya dasey lawingan ey patpatigun da tagu at ampatingga, kon sey tagu ey mangwa assey piun Apudyus, matagu as ing-inggana.
62002018	Dakayu ey aanakku, anna ey umadani sey anungus sey ag-agow. Sigud ey jingngoryu ey awad sey umali ey vumusur an Cristu, at ey sana, adjuwan sey lummuswa ey vumusur an siya. At nauy sey angimmatunan taku ey tigangey sey anungus sey ag-agow.
62002019	Da nauy ey tagu ey vumuvusur an Cristu at sigud ey nijujuggada an jitaku assey kar-argow, kon dakumpunda as tuttuwa ey namati at siya sey summinaanda. Nu tuttuwa ey vurun taku jida, ajida pun atyén summina. Kon summinada ta awad miil-ana ey niippun usa an jida as vurun taku.
62002020	Kon an jitaku, awad sey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey naatud an jitaku ey narpu an Cristu at agammu taku sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju ya dasey dakumpun.
62002021	Dakumpun as kanak ey manuratak an dakayu tey niippun agammuyu assey katuttuwaan, siya nanuratak an dakayu gapu ta agammuk ey agammuyu ey niippun us-ussat as marpu assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju.
62002022	Sey ussatan ey tagu, ibagana ey dakumpun as Cristu sey imbaar Apudyus ey manginsarakan asda tagu. Sey angimbagaʼs jiyuy, siya sey kavusur Cristu. At dakumpun anggey as Cristu sey ajina pun ivilang tey urey as Apudyus.
62002023	Tey sey tagu ey ajina pun vigvigun as Jesus ey Anak Apudyus, ajina pun vus vigvigun sey Amana ey Apudyus kon sey amigvig assey anak Apudyus ey ajina pun vuyagun, awad avus an siya as Ama ey Apudyus.
62002024	At sey itugunku an dakayu, imumurayu assey somsomokyu sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju ey jingngoryu manipud assey namatiyanyu. Tey nu siya sey koonyu, anturturuy ey mijujugga kayu assey Anak ya assey Ama.
62002025	At sey impostana ey atjuna an jitaku at sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
62002026	Isuratku da nauy an dakayu ta man-annad kayu miipanggop as dasey tagu ey mangal-allilow an dakayu.
62002027	Kon an dakayu, agammuk ey awad sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey innatud Cristu at aji pun kasapuran ey awad ujum as manudtuju an dakayu tey awad siya ey mangintudtuju an dakayu asda amin ey masapur maagammuwanyu. Ya pasig tuttuwa sey itudtujuna ey niippun ussat. At unujunyu sey itudtujuna ya iturturuyyu ey mamati an Cristu.
62002028	At assey sana, dakayu ey aanakku, iturturuyyu ey mijujugga an siya ta aji kayu umugyat ya maviinan assey ampuuliyana.
62002029	Agammuyu mit ey niyun-un as Apudyus, at siya sey masapur maawatanyu ey dasey amin ey angwa assey ustu ya ambaru at anak Apudyus.
62003001	Somsomkon taku sey layad Apudyus an jitaku, tey gapu assey nakaskasdaow ey layadna, imvilangna jitaku as aanakna. At siya nauy sey ustu ey katatagu taku. Kon dasey aji pun mamati, ajida pun maawatan sey katatagu taku tey niippun agammuda an Apudyus ey Ama taku.
62003002	Dakayu ey vuvurunku, urey nu anak Apudyus jitaku assey sana, daan pun atgey Apudyus ilawlawag nu ngan sey ambarbalinan taku assey daan ey ag-agow. Kon agammu taku ey nu ampuuli as Cristu, miyanung taku an siya tey ilan taku sey mismu ey itjurana.
62003003	At dasey amin ey annamnama ey tumuttuwa da nauy, masapur man-awidanda dasey lawingan ta nadarus sey viyagda ey kanayun ey kama an Jesus.
62003004	Amin ey nakabasur, nilabsingda sey lintog Apudyus tey sey ambasuran, siya sey mallabsingan assey lintog.
62003005	Agammuyu mit ey niippun basur Cristu kon ummali ta kaanuna sey basur taku.
62003006	At dasey amin ey nijujugga an Cristu, ajida pun iturturuy ey vumasur. Kon sey tagu ey anginturturuy ey vumasur, niippun pammatina an Cristu ya niippun purus agammuna an siya.
62003007	Aji kayu ampaallilow, dakayu ey aanakku. Koonyu sey ambaru tey da amin ey angwa as ambaru, niyun-unda ey tagu ey kama vus an Cristu.
62003008	Kon sey anginturturuy ey ambasbasur, nijujuggaji an Satanas tey nanipud assey saradna, insisigud Satanas ey ambasubasur. At siya sey gapuna nu pa lawa umali sey Anak Apudyus ta dadailuna sey kingwan Satanas.
62003009	At da amin ey tagu ey aanak Apudyus, ajida pun anturturuy ey ambasbasur tey nilong-ag sey nakopyaan Apudyus an jida. At ajida pun mabalin ey anturturuy ey ambasbasur tey inanak Apudyus jida.
62003010	Annaya sey narawag ey angimmatunan asda aanak Apudyus ya da aanak Satanas: Sey tagu ey dakumpun as anak Apudyus at jida sey aji pun angwa assey ambaru ya niippun layadda asda asintataguda.
62003011	Sey tudtuju ey jingngoryu manipud assey namatiyanyu at masapur ey manlilinnayad taku.
62003012	Aji taku atyén anungun as Cain ey tagun jimunyu ey nangngat an Abel ey sunudna. Tey sey lapun sey nangngatana an Abel at sey lawingan ey koko'ona kon ambaru sey koko'on Abel ey sunudna.
62003013	At siya sey aji kayu masdaow ey susunud nu guraun dasey aji pun mamati dakayu.
62003014	Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, tey agammu taku ey assey kar-argow, nisisina taku avus an Apudyus, kon assey sana, awad sey viyag taku ey niippun patinggana. Agammu taku ey tuttuwa nauy tey anna ey pipiun taku da susunud taku ey mamati. Kon dasey aji pun maryad asda sunudda, jida dasey nisisina an Apudyus.
62003015	Tey sey gumugura assey sunudna, mivilang as pumapatuy. At agammu taku mit ey da amin ey pumapatuy at niippun an jida sey mannanayun ey kataguwan.
62003016	Sey angigammuwan taku assey tuttuwa ey layad, at sey kingwan Jesu Cristu ey nangatud assey viyagna as para an jitaku. At siya sey nakasagana taku avus ey mangatud assey viyag taku ey para asda susunud taku ey mamati.
62003017	Kon sey awad mabarbalinna ya innilana sey vurunna ey mamati ey angkasapuran ya aji pun madaguwan ey tumurung, ey awad pun lawa layadna an Apudyus?
62003018	At dakayu ey aanakku, ilan taku ta dakumpun atyén anggey as ginga sey angimpiil-an taku assey layad, nu aji ipiila taku sey tuttuwa ey layad gapu assey manurungan taku an jida.
62003019	Sey angil-an nu tuttuwa ey uunnujun taku sey tudtuju ey piun Apudyus at nu manlilinnayad taku. At sey salinunutna, mapapanus sey somsomok taku ey niippun vumiinan taku ey alluwaru an siya.
62003020	At urey nu niippun kapanusan sey somsomok taku gapu assey vummasuran, aji taku madanagan tey dokdokor sey kaviilan Apudyus ey mangaan assey basur nu sey somsomok taku. At kumasdor atyén sey somsomok taku tey agammun Apudyus sey kangamin ya ning-op siya assey napakawanan sey basur taku.
62003021	At dakayu susunud ey pipiuk, nu napapanus sey somsomok taku, naturud taku ey umadani an Apudyus assey alluwaruwan taku.
62003022	Ya urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey kudawun taku an siya, atjuna tey inunud taku dasey vilinna ya kingwa taku sey mallaylaydana.
62003023	At naya sey imvilinna: Masapur ey mamati taku an anakna ey Jesu Cristu ya manlilinnayad taku tey siya vus pigey sey imvilinna an jitaku.
62003024	At ngan ey sey tagu ey manguunnud assey lintog Apudyus, niyunud sey somsomokna an Apudyus ya niyunud vus sey somsomok Apudyus an siya. Ya sey angigammuwan taku ey awad as Apudyus an jitaku at gapu assey Ispirituna ey innatjuna an jitaku.
62004001	Dakayu ey vuvurun, aji kayu awwey dongor asda amin ey mangimbaga ey sey tudtujuda at narpu assey Ispiritun Apudyus. Masapur imamad taku imatunan nu tuttuwa ey narpu an Apudyus sey tudtujuda unnu sabali sey narpuwana tey adjuwan da tagu assey luta ey magda gey da amparang as tudtujun kanu sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
62004002	At sey angillasinanyu nu tuttuwa ey Ispiritun Apudyus sey narpuwan sey tudtujuda at nu avunanda ey as Jesus sey Cristu ey nambalin as tagu. Siyana sey angimpatuttuwa ey awad sey Ispiritun Apudyus an jida.
62004003	Kon nu ajida avunan ey as Jesus sey Cristu ey nambalin as tagu, dakumpun as Ispiritun Apudyus sey awad an jida tey an-isu sey somsomokda assey kavusur Cristu ey narpuwan sey ibagabagada. Jingngoryu ey umali siya assey luta, at anna tuttuwa ey mitudtuju sey juganna ey mivusur an Cristu.
62004004	Kon an dakayu ey aanakku, as Apudyus sey sintagu an dakayu at inabakyu dasey tagu ey dakumpun as ustu sey tudtujuda tey andogdogot sey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey awad an dakayu nu as Satanas ey awad an jida.
62004005	At gapu ta itajunda sey tudtujuda as dasey niippun pammatina, mamaryad vus dasey aji pun mamati ey andodongor an jida tey mitagop assey koko'onda.
62004006	Kon an jitaku, anak jitaku an Apudyus at dasey tagu ey mamaryad ey andodongor assey tudtuju taku, jida dasey vurun taku ey nangigammu an Apudyus. Kon dasey dakumpun as anak Apudyus, sumangada ey angngor an jitaku. Siyana sey angigammuwan taku nu ngan sey narpuwan sey tudtuju, nu narpu assey Ispiritun Apudyus ey puun sey katuttuwaan unnu narpu an Satanas ey puun sey ussat.
62004007	Dakayu ey susunud, masapur ey manlilinnayad taku tey nu awad layad taku, siyaji sey kasomsomkan ey narpu an Apudyus. At ngan ey sey tagu ey awad layadna assey vurunna, siya sey anak Apudyus ya agammuna vus as Apudyus.
62004008	As Apudyus, mamaryad asda tagu, at sey tagu ey niippun layadna assey vurunna, niippun agammuna an Apudyus.
62004009	At sey kingwan Apudyus ey nangimpiila assey amud ey layadna an jitaku at sey nangimbaarana assey sa'an ey anakna assey luta ta awad an-annun taku ey mijuga ey matagu an siya as ing-inggana.
62004010	At sey miil-an sey tuttuwa ey layad ey niippun kurangna, at aji pun mibasar assey angokoon taku ey maryad an Apudyus nu aji sey kingwana ey nangimpiila assey layadna an jitaku assey nangimbaarana assey anakna ta ikaruna sey jusan sey basur taku ta kadaguwan jitaku an Apudyus ya mapakawan dasey basur taku.
62004011	Dakayu ey vuvurun, nu kanaʼsji sey kingwan Apudyus ey nangimpiila assey layadna an jitaku, masapur avus ey manlilinnayad taku.
62004012	Tey urey niippun tagu as nangila assey long-ag Apudyus, nu manlilinnayad taku, nijujugga as Apudyus an jitaku at miila assey viyag taku sey layad Apudyus ey niippun kurangna.
62004013	Sey mangigammuwan taku nu tuttuwa ey awad as Apudyus an jitaku ya nijujugga taku an siya at sey Ispirituna ey innatudna ey nilong-ag an jitaku.
62004014	Innilani as Jesus, at assey sana mabalin ey takjuganni ey imbaar Apudyus sey anakna assey luta ta isarakanna da tagu.
62004015	At ngan ey sey tagu ey mamigvig ey as Jesus sey anak Apudyus, nijujuggaji an Apudyus ya nijujugga vus as Apudyus an siya.
62004016	At jitaku ey mamigvig an Jesus, mamati taku ey pipiun Apudyus jitaku ya miila assey angokoon taku ey matagu sey layadna an jitaku at mabalin ey manlilinnayad taku. Pipiun Apudyus da tagu, at ngan ey sey tagu ey maryad an Apudyus ya asda asintataguna, awad siya an Apudyus ya awad vus as Apudyus an siya.
62004017	At nu kanaʼsji sey koon taku ey matagu, umam-amud sey manlilinnaydan taku inggana as niippun angkurangana. At nu jumatong sey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus asda amin ey tagu, aji taku pun umugyat ey sumangu tey sey nakopyaan taku assey natatagguwan taku at kama assey nakopyaan Cristu.
62004018	Aji pun man-unud sey layad assey ugyat tey sey layad ey niippun kurangna, kaanuna sey ugyat. At sey tagu ey awad ugyatna gapu ta sosomkona sey jusa ey marpu an Apudyus, nauy sey mangimpiila ey kurang pey dallu sey layadna.
62004019	Manlilinnayad taku tey as Apudyus sey namangu ey naryad an jitaku.
62004020	At nu awad angimbaga ey kanana, “Pipiuk as Apudyus,” kon kagurana dasey vurunna, ussatanji ey tagu. Tey nu niippun layadna assey vurunna ey iillana, kinggura vus an Apudyus ey aji pun miila?
62004021	Tey sey imvilin Apudyus an jitaku, kanana, “Sey tagu ey awad layadna an Apudyus, masapur vus awad layadna as dasey vurunna.”
62005001	Ngan ey sey tagu ey mamati ey as Jesus sey Cristu ey imbaar Apudyus ey ummali, siya sey anak Apudyus. At ngan ey sey tagu ey maryad assey ama, siguraju ey piuna vus sey anakna.
62005002	At nu maryad taku an Apudyus ya koon taku dasey vilinna, nauy sey angimpiila ey awad layad taku as dasey susunud taku ey mamati an Apudyus.
62005003	Tey sey maryadan taku an Apudyus, piuna ugujun, unujun taku sey vilinna. At dakumpun mit as ansigab da nauy as koon,
62005004	tey amin taku ey anak Apudyus at awad sey kaviilan taku ey mangabak assey amin ey kinarwing assey luta. At niippun ujum as angabak taku nu dokon sey pammati taku an Jesu Cristu.
62005005	Tey niippun ujum as mabalin mangabak assey kinarwing assey luta nu dokon anggey dasey tagu ey mamati ey as Jesus at anak Apudyus.
62005006	Assey ummaliyan Jesu Cristu assey luta, awad sey turu ey mangimpiila ey siya sey anak Apudyus. Sey usa at sey navunyagana assey danum. Kon dakumpun anggey sey navunyagana assey danum sey angimpatuttuwa tey nivukvuk vus sey darana assey natuyana. Sey mikatlu at sey Ispiritun Apudyus ey pasig tuttuwa sey ibagana. Amin da turu anna at an-iisu sey piunda ey ugujun miipanggop an Jesu Cristu.
62005009	Nu awad mangintakjug assey ugujun sey usa ey tagu, patiyun taku mit, aji am-amud ey mapati nu as Apudyus sey mangintakjug? At da nauy ey turu sey mangimpiila ey tuttuwa sey kanan Apudyus miipanggop assey anakna.
62005010	At ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey tagu sey mamati assey anak Apudyus, awad assey somsomokna sey impaagammun Apudyus miipanggop assey anakna. Kon sey tagu ey aji pun mamati assey imbagan Apudyus, ambalinunaʼs ussatan as Apudyus tey ajina pun patiyun sey imbagan Apudyus miipanggop assey anakna.
62005011	Annaya sey kanan Apudyus: Atjuna an jitaku sey viyag ey niippun patinggana at niippun ujum as marpuwana nu dokon anggey sey anakna.
62005012	At sey tagu ey nijuga assey anak Apudyus, awad an siya sey viyag ey niippun patinggana. Kon sey aji pun nijuga assey anak Apudyus, niippun an siya sey viyag sana.
62005013	Isuratku da nauy an dakayu ey mamati assey anak Apudyus ta aji kayu anjuwajuwa ey awad an dakayu sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
62005014	Naturud taku ey alluwaru an Apudyus tey siguraju ey dongrona sey amin ey dawatun taku an siya nu miyunud assey piuna.
62005015	At gapu ta agammu taku ey dongrona sey amin ey ibaga taku, agammu taku avus ey nu angkudow taku an siya, siguraju ey songbatana sey luwaru taku.
62005016	Nu awad ilan taku as vurun taku ey mamati ey ambasbasur assey basur ey ajina pun lamug ey manginsina an siya an Apudyus, iluwaruwan taku ta atjun Apudyus an siya sey viyag ey niippun patinggana. Koon taku ji nu sey basurna at dakumpun as basur ey manginturung an siya assey mannanayun ey jusa. Tey awad sey kanaʼsji ey basur at ajik pun kanan ey iluwaruwan taku jiyuy.
62005017	Kon awad sey karasin ji basur ey mabalin pakawanun Apudyus. At da nauy ey basur, ajina pun isina sey tagu an Apudyus as ing-inggana.
62005018	Agammu taku ey da amin ey anak Apudyus at aji pun anturturuy ey vumasur tey awad sey kaviilan Apudyus ey manarasaraknib an jida at siya sey aji pun da lawingan ey ispiritu kaviilan abakun jida.
62005019	Agammu taku ey as Apudyus sey sintagu an jitaku urey nu iturturayan dasey lawingan ey ispiritu da ujum ey tagu assey luta anna.
62005020	Agammu taku avus ey ummali sey Anak Apudyus assey luta ta silawana sey somsomok taku ta maagammuwan taku sey tuttuwa ey Apudyus. At nijuga taku assey tuttuwa ey Apudyus tey nijuga taku assey Anakna ey Jesu Cristu. Siya sey tuttuwa ey Apudyus ya siya sey marpuwan sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
62005021	Dakayu ey aanakku, man-annad kayu as dasey ap-apudyus ta ajiyu jida dayawun.
63001001	Sa'un an John ey usa ey pangat dasey mamati. Annaya sey suratku an sika pipiuk ey Ina ey pinilin Apudyus ya an dakayu ey aanakna. Amud sey layadku an dakayu ey man-iina. Ya dakumpun gey as anggayak nu aji urey vus dasey amin ey nangigammu assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju at pipiunda vus dakayu.
63001002	Siyana sey koon taku ey manlilinnayad tey nimura assey somsomok taku sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju at aji pun makaan da nauy ey tudtuju an jitaku as ing-inggana.
63001003	As Ama taku ey Apudyus atyén ya as Anakna ey Jesu Cristu sey mangatud as vumaruwan ya mangakaddagu an jitaku ya sey tumarnaan sey somsomok taku. Mapadasan taku da nauy, jitaku ey manlilinnayad ya manguunnud assey katuttuwaan.
63001004	Amud sey layadku assey jingngorku ey awad da ujum as dasey aanaknu ey manguunnud assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju ey imvilin Ama taku ey Apudyus.
63001005	At assey sana, piuk ey ibaga an dakayu ey masapur manlilinnayad taku. Dakumpun as kaddatu nauy ey vilin ey ibagak an dakayu tey sigud ey jingngoryu nauy nanipud assey sarad sey namatiyanyu.
63001006	At nu tuttuwa ey manlilinnayad taku, unujun taku sey imvilin Apudyus. At sey vilin ey naagammuwan taku nanipud assey namatiyan taku at masapur manlilinnayad taku.
63001007	Ibagak da nauy an dakayu tey adjuwan sey lummuswa ey ummuy assey kikkiili ey mangal-allilow asda tagu. Ya ajida pun vigvigun ey as Jesu Cristu at nambalin as tuttuwa ey tagu assey ummaliyana assey luta. Da nauy ey tagu at jida dasey mangal-allilow ya jida sey kavusur Cristu.
63001008	Ilanyu ta awad servin sey nantudtujuwanni an dakayu ta maawatyu sey amin ey gun-guna ey atjun Apudyus an dakayu.
63001009	At ngan ey sey tagu ey angimpasor-ad assey tudtujun Cristu ey ajina pun unujun sey ustu ey tudtujuna, niippun as Apudyus an siya. Kon sey tagu ey mangunud assey tudtujun Cristu, awad an siya as Apudyus ya as Jesu Cristu ey Anakna.
63001010	At nu awad umali as sabali sey itudtujuna an dakayu, ajiyu pasakayun ya ajiyu siya kabagbaga.
63001011	Tey nu pasakayunyu ya kinabagbagayu siya, kamaʼs nikakkakwa kayu assey lawingan ey kookoona.
63001012	Ansarum atyén sey piuk ey ibaga an dakayu, kon ansigab as isuratku amin tey sey kanak, umaliyak ey mangila an dakayu ta ambaru as ambagbag-an taku ey ansasangu.
63001013	Dasey aanak sey sunudnu ey anna sina ey pinilin vus Apudyus, pakumustaunda vus dakayu nu ngan annunyu pey sinaʼt. Anggey nauy as piuk ey ibaga an dakayu.
64001001	Sa'un an John ey usa asda mangimpapangat as dasey mamati an Apu Jesus. Annaya sey suratku an sika Gaius, pipiuk ey sunud.
64001002	Dawatuk an Apudyus ta atjuna atyén sey ambaru ey kataguwam ya urey sey anggidgijuwam ey kama assey kinadogot sey pammatim an Apudyus.
64001003	Ummali pun dasey susunud taku sina, imbagada ey ipapangugnu ey mangunud assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju ya amin kanu ey koom at mitagop assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju at amud sey layadku.
64001004	Niippun ujum as angatud as allaylaydak nu dokon sey mangngorak ey jumngor dasey anakku assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju.
64001005	Ambaru tuttuwa sey kookoom, sika ey sunud tey urey nu niippun agammum as dasey vurun taku ey mamati an Cristu, inambarum jida minangili.
64001006	Tey jummatongda pun as nauy dasey minangilim, imbagada an dakani ey mamatiʼsna sey kingwam ey nangimpiila assey layadnu an jida. At kanaʼsji atyén sey kookoom nu awad umaliʼsnaʼt as kama an jida. Ya angatudka avus as kasapuranda ey umuy mantudtuju. Ya nu awad kabalinana, ilam ta sey turungnu an jida at mitagop assey napatig ey kiwaarda ey anserservi an Apudyus.
64001007	Tey assey lummibbatanda ey ummuy mantudtuju miipanggop an Apu Jesus, ajida pun inawat sey turung dasey aji pun mamati an Jesus.
64001008	At siya sey masapur jitaku ey mamati sey manurung an jida ta mikasiput taku an jida assey mitudtujuwan sey tuttuwa ey tudtuju.
64001009	Inggow sey suratku an dakayu ey mamati sinat, kon aji pun Diotrefes ingkaskasu tey ajina pun vigvigun dakani tey sey piuna, siya sey ambalin as pangatyu.
64001010	At nu umaliyak, aminuk iluswa sey amin ey lawingan ey kookoona kama as dasey apporona ipabasur an dakani ey dakumpun as tuttuwa. Ya usa pey, isangana sey sumakayan dasey vurun taku ey mamati nu anguyda assey iggawanyu ey umuy assey ujum ey vubruy. Ya sumanga avus as dasey tagu ey maryad ey ammangili an jida. At nu awad ey mangwaʼsji, padasuna vus ey amaryow an jida assey vungguyyu ey mamati.
64001011	At sika ey sunudku ey pipiuk, ilam ta ajim unujun sey lawing ey nakopyaan da tagu ta siya unujum sey ambaru ey kookoonda. Tey sey angwa as ambaru, as Apudyus sey sintagu an siya, kon sey angwa as lawingan, niippun agammuna an Apudyus.
64001012	At nu anguy as Demetrius sinat, ilam ta mangiliyum siya. Tey amin akey da taguʼs nauy at ambaru sey ugudda an siya. Ya sey angokoona vus ey matagu at miyambong assey tuttuwa ey tudtuju. At urey vus dakani at takjuganni siya at agammum mit ey amin ey ugujunni at tuttuwa.
64001013	Ansarum atyén sey piuk ey ikur-it kon ansigab as aminuk isurat
64001014	tey sey kanak, umaliyak ey mismu ey umuy mangila an sika ta ambaru as ambagbag-anta.
64001015	Mapapanus atyén sey somsomok taku losan. Amin dasey susunud taku ey annaʼsna at pakumustaunda sika. Ya pakumustaum vus dasey susunud taku sinat.
65001001	Sa'un an Jude ey sunud James, usaak vus ey manserservi an Jesu Cristu. Annaya sey suratku an dakayu losan ey inayagan Ama Apudyus as taguna ey pipiuna ya puupuutun vus Jesu Cristu.
65001002	Kanana atyén ta kakaddaguwan Apudyus dakayu ya vumaru sey ansomsomkanyu ya magiknayu sey amud ey layadna an dakayu.
65001003	Susunud ey pipiuk, sey piuk atyén pigey, manuratak an dakayu miipanggop assey nisarakanan taku losan. Kon simsimmokku ey sey kasapuran ey isuratku at sey mangimpakasdor assey somsomokyu ta itakjugyu sey katuttuwaan ey nipon-adan sey pammatiyu ey intalik Apudyus an jitaku ey taguna ta aji maat-atub.
65001004	Tey awad da nijuga an dakayu ey niippun ugyatda an Apudyus ey ajiyu pun nadnadlow ey apporoda ikbot sey kipuuyan sey kinaambarun Apudyus ya nan-awidanda as Jesu Cristu ey siya anggey sey Pangat ya Apu. Koonda nauy ta awad an-akil-anda ey mangwa as dasey kaggissow ey koko'on dasey laraki as vubai. Assey keysan ey ag-agow, luus nibabagga assey Gingan Apudyus sey kajusaanda.
65001005	Urey nu agammuyu sey kingwan sey Apu as dasey taguna ey iyIsrael ey nangkar an jida ad Egypt, kasinku vus ugujun ta awad mansarminganyu. Tey tokon gey nu naminna jida sinarakan, gingngatna dallu dasey aji pun mamati an siya.
65001006	Siya vus somsomkonyu dasey enjel ey aji pun nangwa assey siputda ey naneynan assey ustu ey iggowda ad langit. Gapu assey kingwada saji, impakawad Apudyus jida assey kawad ey niippun muug-uggasana assey iggawan sey amud ey gikbot ad darum ey abvut inggana assey kadadayow ey ag-agow ey manguwisan Apudyus an jida.
65001007	Kama vus assey nakwa as dasey ummili ad Sodom ya Gomorah ya asda dor-agda ey ili. Kingwada sey anung sey kingwan da enjel anna ey nangwa asda kaggissow ey koko'on sey laraki as vubai ya da ujum ey kaviviin ey kinarwing. At ingkaruda sey jusada ey maatuatungan assey apuy ey aji pun as matmatuy ta awad umugyatan taku losan.
65001008	Ya da tagu anna ey kanak, anungda sey koko'on dasey manommosommok asda kaggissow ey siya sey madadailan sey long-agda. Laylaysunda dasey awad karobbongana ya arwaganda dasey enjel ad langit.
65001009	Urey as Michael ey kangatuwan ey enjel at niippun kingwana as kanaʼsji. Tey assey nikaisikana an Jimunyu nu ngan sey mangara assey long-ag Moses, niippun kanana ey awad karobbongana ey manguwis an Jimunyu tey sey imbagana anggey, kanana, “Keygad sey Apu ey mangingor an sika.”
65001010	Kon da nauy ey tagu, patbokda pey lawa laylaysun sey kangamin ey urey ajida pun maawatan. Anungda animar ey niippun somsomokda ey ambasarda anggey assey magiknan sey long-agda. Sey kananda ey ambaru an jida, siyaji at avus sey madadailanda.
65001011	Kadagdagu da nauy ey tagu tey kagguugyat sey majusaanda! Inunudda sey kingwan Cain. Ya gapu assey layadda assey pilak, inunudda vus sey kingwan Balaam. Kuntraunda sey apuda ey anung sey kingwan Korah ey nangontra an Moses assey kar-argow. At siguraju ey majusada ey anung sey jusan Korah.
65001012	Nu mikakan da nauy ey tagu assey dayu madagupan ey mandayow an Apudyus, anungda mansa ey mangimparwing assey kinadarusyu. Niippun pigey akit as viinda tey sey long-agda anggey sey apporoda sosomkon. Anungda livuu ey miyabviabvid ey niippun otdagunaʼs udan. Anungda vus ullawig ey mura ey niippun amung-ana urey assey timpun sey imvuvunga. Ya anungda vus nababaggut ey mura ey nangisnad narangu.
65001013	Anungda sey danakkor ey dalluyun assey beybey. Ya dasey kaviviin ey kookoonda, mipani da jiyuy assey tarkutak ey kaggissow ey sinonson sey dalluyun assey tarantag. Ya kamada avus asda nattabow ey vituwun ey nasama sey ayanda. At awad sey lugar ey amud sey gikbotna ey insasagganan Apudyus as iggawanda as ing-inggana.
65001014	Urey as Enoch ey mikapitu ey ginanakan mallugi an Adam at impapaddaanna sey miipanggop asda jugan da nauy ey tagu assey nangimbagaana, “Ilanyu, tey umali as Apudyus at ikuyugna dasey kalivulivu ey nasantuwan ey enjelna
65001015	ta uwisuna da amin ey tagu. Goddongana da amin ey niippun ugyatna an Apudyus gapu asda lawingan ey kookoonda ya da kaiinsurtu ey inggingada ey mangontra an siya!”
65001016	Da nauy ey tagu at kanayunda ey angnguju ya niippun ming-opanda. Ya siya anggeyʼs unujunda sey pipiun sey long-agda. Ampaspas-umda ya nariingda ey man-ay-ayu ta pigpiga nu maarada sey piunda ey aran.
65001017	Kon an dakayu ey susunud ey pipiuk, ajiyu maggey maliwatan sey impapaddaan dasey aposel Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu.
65001018	Kananda an dakayu, “Nu tigangey sey anungus sey ag-agow, lumuswa dasey tagu ey angut-utyuk an dakayu ya niippun ujum as koonda nu aji sey lawingan ey pipiun sey long-agda.”
65001019	Da nauy ey tagu sey apporow mangwaʼs mansisiyananyu. Sey anggey as unujunda at sey niluruta ey somsomokda tey niippun sey Ispiritun Apudyus an jida.
65001020	Kon an dakayu ey susunud ey pipiuk, masapur ituruturuyyu ey mangimpagodong assey pammatiyu gapu assey mangadaadaranyu assey naapudyusan ey tudtuju ey pinatiyu. Masapur alluwaru ya ilanyu ta sey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus sey manginturung assey luwaruyu.
65001021	Ya ilanyu ta sey koonyu ey matagu assey timpu sana at mitajun assey layad Apudyus assey manguullayanyu assey mangatudan Apu taku ey Jesu Cristu assey viyag ey niippun patinggana gapu assey daguna an jitaku.
65001022	Kadaguwanyu dasey anjuwajuwa sey pammatina.
65001023	Tudtujuwanyu da ujum ta misarakanda ey kama as illabsutyu jida assey mitunguwanda assey apuy. Kadaguwanyu vus dasey ambasubasur kon annadanyu ta aji kayu mitakurung ey mamansaan asda kaggissow ey kookoonda.
65001024	Kanana atyén ta madayow sey sa'sa'an ey Apudyus ey nanginsarakan an jitaku gapu an Jesu Cristu ey Apu taku. Kaviilana ey manginsarakan an jitaku ta aji taku vumasur ya oni at niippun mankurangan taku at siya sey allaylayad taku ey tumakjug assey iggawan sey sumilisiling ey kinaApudyusna. Madayow siya ey kangatuwan ya mannakabalin ey Apudyus ey niippun patinggan sey karobbongana mallugi assey saradna ya as ing-inggana. Amen.
66001001	Sey libnu sana at siya sey nikur-itan dasey impaagammun Apudyus an Jesu Cristu ta ipaagammuna avus asda amin ey manserservi an siya miipanggop as dasey makwa tey aji pun mabayag at jumatong sey makwaana. At siya sey nangimbaaran Jesu Cristu assey enjelna ey umuyna ipaagammu an sa'un ey John ey manserservi an siya.
66001002	At sa'un an John, takjugak ey da nauy at tuttuwa ey Gingan Apudyus ey tinakjugan vus Jesu Cristu.
66001003	Nagasat sey tagu ey mangimbasa asda nipapaddaan ey makwa ey nikur-it sina ya allaylayad vus da tagu ey andongor ya mangunud tey tigangey sey timpu ey makwaana.
66001004	Sa'un an John, annaya sey suratku an dakayu ey mamati ey awad asda pitu ey vubruy assey provinsiyan sey Asia. Kanana atyén ta maatud an dakayu sey vumaruwan ya tarna ey marpu an Apudyus ey aawwad assey sana ya assey saradna ya siya ey umali. Umali ey marpu as dasey pitu ey Ispirituna ey aawwad assey sinagung sey tronu
66001005	ya marpu an Jesu Cristu ey matalik ey mangimpaagammu miipanggop an Apudyus. Siya sey namangu asda natuy ey natagu ey aji pun matmatuy ya siya avus sey manginturturey asda amin ey turey assey luta anna. Pipiuna jitaku ya winayaana jitaku asda basur taku gapu assey darana ey nivukvuk assey natuyana.
66001006	Injugana jitaku assey tureyna ya nambalinuna avus jitaku as paji ey manservi an Apudyusna ya amana ey manserserviyana. Kanana atyén ta as Jesu Cristu sey madayow ya manturturuy sey tureyna as ing-inggana. Amen.
66001007	Ilanyu man, tey kasin umali as Jesus ey mivurun assey livuu. At niippun tagu as aji mangila an siya urey dasey inggow nanuyuk an siya. At amin ey tagu assey luvung anna at ngumanugngugda ey siiivil gapu an siya. Siyana sey nakopyaana tey siguraju ey makwa.
66001008	As Apudyus ey mannakabalin ey awad assey saradna ya assey sana ya aawwad as ing-inggana ya kasin vus umali, kanana, “Sa'un sey maawagan as Alfa ya Omega.”
66001009	Sa'un an John ey sunudyu assey pammati ey vurunyu ey mangaanus asda amin ey tongtong-ag ey lak-amun dasey iturturayana. Impuuyda sa'un intalin ad Patmos anna ey ban-it ey ili ey nanggagawa assey beybey gapu assey nangiwwarawagak assey Gingan Apudyus ya sey tudtuju ey impaagammun Jesus.
66001010	Usa pun ey ag-agow assey Juminggu, indaran sey Ispiritun Apudyus sa'un. At jingngorku sey mandangsor ey ginga assey udjugak ey kamaʼs vungugji trompeta.
66001011	Kanana, “Ikur-itnu assey libnu sey innilam ta ipuuynu asda pitu ey danakkor ey vubruy ad Efesus, Smirna, Pergamum, Tiyatira, Sardis, Filadelfia ya ad Laodicea.”
66001012	Nambaliwitak pun ey mangila nu ngadan sey gumminga saji, innilak at avus sey pitu ey papattangan as silow ey vurawan.
66001013	Assey nanggawaan dasey papattangan as silow, inggow sey kamaʼs tagu sey ilana. Anjuanju sey lumvunna ey nagayad inggana assey sikina ya nakorpayanan as vurawan sey barukungna.
66001014	Ya sey vuukna avus, amud sey itakna ey kamaʼs itak sey dararu ya sey atana avus at kama as ginugumngot ey apuy.
66001015	Sey sikina avus, sumilisiling ey kama as an-imnur ey bakrow ey narunow assey apuy ya sey gingana at amud sey dangsorna ey kama as agangaang sey jinakor.
66001016	Ya inuugnan sey padawananna sey pitu ey vituwun. Ya sey sungadna, lumuswaluswa sey mantajum ey bangid ey namviniik sey ngarabna. Ya amud sey siling sey vusarna ey kamaʼs siling sey init assey mamatuk.
66001017	Assey nangil-ak an siya, magak gey nalikwad assey sinagungna ey kamaak as natuy. Kon impateyna sey padawanan ey imana an sa'un at kanana, “Ajika umugyat tey sa'un sey sarad sey kangamin ya sey mapungpungana.
66001018	Sa'un sey matattagu as ing-inggana. Natuyak, kon ilam! Annaak ey matattagu as ing-inggana. Sa'un sey nanangjun assey pannakabalin sey katuy ya awad vus an sa'un sey pannakabalin ad Hades ey iggow dasey nangkakatuy.
66001019	At ikur-itnu dasey iillam ey makwamakwa assey sana ya dasey makwa assey daan ey ag-agow.
66001020	Sey pitu ey vituwun ey innilam assey dawanan ey imak at jida dasey pitu ey enjel ey mamabantey asda pitu ey vungguy da mamati ya sey pitu ey papattangan as silow at jida vus pigey dasey pitu sana ey vungguy da mamati.”
66002001	“Annaya sey ikur-itnu ey mipuuy assey enjel ey mamabantey assey vungguy da mamati ad Efesus: ‘Sa'un sey nanangjun assey pitu ey vituwun assey padawananku ya sa'un vus sey manaradaran assey gawan dasey pitu ey papattangan as silow ey vurawan.
66002002	Agammuk dasey kookoonyu urey dasey pawotyu ey mangkiwaar as para an sa'un ya dasey anusyu. Agammuk vus ey ajiyu pun mangiggaun dasey lawingan ey tagu ya napaniknikanyu ey ussatan atpey dasey apporow mangugud ey jida at usada kanu ey aposel.
66002003	Inan-anusanyu ey natongtong-ag gapu an sa'un ya ajiyu pun impug-an sey pammatiyu.
66002004	Kon annaya sey sumang-ak an dakayu. Nakaan sey layadyu an sa'un ya asda vurunyu ey aji pun miyanung assey layadyu assey keysan ey ag-agow.
66002005	Masapur sommosommokonyu sey kinadogot sey layadyu assey keysan ey ag-agow. Man-awidanyu dasey basuryu ya ipuuliyu atyén sey layadyu an sa'un ey kama assey kar-argow. Tey nu aji kayu ambabawi, umaliyak paan ya kaanuk sey papattangan sey silow an dakayu.
66002006	Kon awad sey usa ey maryadak an dakayu tey sumanga kayu assey koko'on dasey Nicolaita ey urey sa'un at sumangaak.
66002007	At siyaji, dongronyu sey ibagan sey Ispiritun Apudyus nu awad ingayu, dakayu amin ey mamati ey awad asda kavubruvubruy. Sey tagu ey urguna sey lawingan, atjuk an siya sey karobbongan ey mikakan assey vungan sey kayu ey awad assey iggawan Apudyus ey siyaji sey mangatud as viyag.’”
66002008	Asina at vus kanan, “Annaya sey ikur-itnu assey enjel ey mamabantey assey vungguy da mamati ad Esmirna. ‘Sa'un sey laprapun ya kapungpungan sey kangamin. Sa'un sey natuy ey kasin natagu. Annaya sey ibagak an dakayu;
66002009	Agammuk dasey tongtong-agyu ya agammuk ey lumawa kayu kon assey katuttuwaan, baknang kayu. Agammuk dasey lawingan ey ibagabagan dasey Jews ey kumuntra an dakayu. Kananda ey Jewsda ey tagun Apudyus kon assey katuttuwaan, jida dasey tagun Satanas.
66002010	Aji kayu umugyat assey umadani ey matongtong-aganyu. Oni at mapadas kayu ya mipisuk da ujum an dakayu assey baballudan ey matongtong-ag assey simpuru ey ag-agow. Kon ajiyu maggey man-awidan sey pammatiyu an sa'un inggana assey katuyanyu tey atjuk sey gun-gunayu ey siya sey viyag ey niippun patinggana.
66002011	“‘At siyaji, dongronyu sey ibagan sey Ispiritun Apudyus nu awad ingayu, dakayu amin ey mamati ey awad asda kavubruvubruy. Sey tagu ey urguna sey lawingan at aji pun mijuga ey majusa assey kananda ey mikagwa ey matuyan.’”
66002012	Asina at vus kanan, “Annaya sey ikur-itnu assey enjel ey mamabantey asda vungguy da mamati ad Pergamum: ‘Sa'un sey nambabangngid as mantubong ey namviniik sey ngarabna. Annaya sey ibagak an dakayu:
66002013	Agammuk ey urey nu vummubruy kayu assey ili ey iturturayan Satanas, patpatigunak pey dallu an dakayu. Tey urey nu gingngatda as Antipas ey mangintatakjug ey mantudtuju miipanggop an sa'un assey vubruyyu anna ey iggow Satanas, ajiyu pun nan-awidan sey pammatiyu.
66002014	“‘Kon awad sey akit ey sumang-ak an dakayu tey awad da ujum an dakayu ey apporow mangngor assey tudtujun Balaam. Siya sey nangintudtuju an Balak ey mangwa as vumasuran dasey ganak Israel ey mangan asda nidatun as dasey ap-apudyus anda mikador-ag asda dakumpun pun as asawada.
66002015	Ya awad vus da ujum an dakayu ey apporow mangngor assey tudtujun dasey Nicolaita.
66002016	Ibabawiyu dasey basuryu tey nu aji kayu ambabawi, aji pun ambayag at umaliyak sinat ey mikalaban an jida ey mangusar assey bangid ey lumuswaluswa assey sungadku.
66002017	At siyaji, dongronyu sey ibagan sey Ispiritun Apudyus nu awad ingayu, dakayu amin ey mamati asda kavubruvubruy. Sey tagu ey urguna sey lawingan, siya sey angatdak assey makan ey nitataru ad langit. Ya atdak siya assey apputak ey batu ey nikur-itan sey barbaru ey ngadan ey niippun tagu as nangigammu nu aji anggey sey naatudana.’”
66002018	Asina at vus kanan, “Annaya sey ikur-itnu assey enjel ey mamabantey assey vungguy da mamati ad Tiatira. ‘Sa'un sey anak Apudyus. Sey atak at kama as ginugumngot ey apuy ya sey sikik, kama as an-imnur ey bakrow.
66002019	“‘Agammuk dasey amin ey kookoonyu. Agammuk ey manlilinnayad kayu ya napasnik sey pammatiyu an sa'un ya sey koonyu ey manservi asda vurunyu ya sey natongtong-aganyu. Agammuk ey sin-umamud sey kinabarun sey kookoonyu assey sana nu assey keysan ey ag-agow.
66002020	Kon awad sey sumang-ak an dakayu: tey imparuvusyu as Jezebel ey nijuga an dakayu ey nambalinuna sey long-agna as profet. At gapu assey tudtujuna, inawisna dasey manserservi an sa'un ta dor-agunda dasey dakumpun as asawada ya manganda asda makan ey nidatun asda ap-apudyus.
66002021	Innatjuk sey wayana ey ambabawi asda basurna kon sumanga ey mangingginok assey dakumpun ey kookoona ey midor-ador-ag assey dakumpun as asawana.
66002022	Atdak siya as mandogot ey sakit inggana as aji pun makabangun assey uvugna. Amud sey kook ey manongtong-ag an siya ya urey dasey apporow nanor-ag an siya nu ajida ibabawi dasey kaggissow ey kingwada an siya.
66002023	Ya gongatuk dasey pasurutna ey mivilang as aanakna ta awad angigammuwan da amin ey vungguy da mamati ey sa'un at aaggammuk sey awad assey somsomok ya sey nitataru ey panggop dasey tagu. Atjuk sey supapak assey usa ya usa an dakayu ey mibasar as dasey kingwayu.
66002024	“‘Kon awad da ujum an dakayu sinat ad Tiatira ey aji pun nangngor assey tudtujuna ya aji pun nangadar assey kananda ey nuunig ey tudtujun Satanas. At sey makanak an dakayu, niippun ujum as ijugak ey vilin as unujunyu.
66002025	Siya anggey ibagak an dakayu ta iturturuyyu ey mantalik an sa'un inggana as umaliyak.
66002026	Sey tagu ey urguna sey lawingan ya ituruturuyna ey mangwa assey piuk inggana as katuyana, atdak siya as karobbongan ey manginturey as dasey kiiliili ey anung sey pannakabalin ey innatud Ama ey Apudyus an sa'un. Niippun mangabak an siya tey naistriktu sey koona ey manturey ey kamaʼs mamvutak asda banga ey mangabak asda aji pun mamigvig assey tureyna. Atjuk vus an siya sey batakagan ey vituwun.
66002029	“‘At siyaji, dongronyu sey ibagan sey Ispiritun Apudyus nu awad ingayu, dakayu amin ey mamati ey awad asda kavubruvubruy.’”
66003001	Kanana ey nanginturuy, “Annaya sey ikur-itnu assey enjel ey mamabantey assey vungguy da mamati ad Sardis: ‘Sa'un ey iggawan sey pitu ey Ispiritun Apudyus ya nanangjun assey pitu ey vituwun: Annaya sey ibagak an dakayu. Agammuk sey kookoonyu. Nanjinjinamag ey natattagu kayu an Apudyus kon assey katuttuwaan, nanattuy kayu an siya.
66003002	At siya sey vumangun kayu ta pakasdoronyu sey matmatayyén ey pammatiyu ta aji as makusmud tey agammuk ey aji pun umaney sey kookoonyu as ming-opan Apudyusku an dakayu.
66003003	Ammaanyu somsomkon sey nitudtuju an dakayu assey dandani ey siya sey pinatiyu. Unujunyu da jiyuy ya ibabawiyu dasey basuryu. Tey nu aji kayu lumikna, umaliyak ey manusa an dakayu assey timpu ey ajiyu pun as mapuppuutan ey kamaʼs umaliyan sey man-aakow ey niippun agammuyu assey umaliyana.
66003004	Kon awad dasey mavilvilang an dakayu ad Sardis sanat ey ajida pun minansaan sey lumvunda as basur. At assey daan ey ag-agow, malumvunanda as anni'itak tey jida sey lobbongna ey mivurun an sa'un.
66003005	At sey tagu ey urguna sey lawingan, malumvunan as anni'itak. Ajik pun kaanun sey ngadanda assey libnu ey nikur-itan sey ngadan dasey awad viyagna as ing-inggana. At ibagak an Ama ya dasey enjelna ey da nauy dasey tagu ey pasurutku.
66003006	“‘At siyaji, dongronyu sey ibagan sey Ispiritun Apudyus nu awad ingayu, dakayu amin ey mamati ey awad asda kavubruvubruy!’”
66003007	Inturuyna ey kanana, “Annaya sey ikur-itnu assey enjel ey mamabantey assey vungguy da mamati ad Filadelfia: ‘Sa'un sey naApudyusan ya katuttuwaan ey nanangjun assey turvik sey ilin David. Nu vukatak sey sawang, niippun mabalin mangnub at nu umbak, niippun mabalin mamkat.
66003008	Agammuk sey kookoonyu. Agammuk ey nampapattingga sey kaviilanyu kon urey nu kanaʼs ji, tinongparyu sey tudtujuk ya tillonyu ey namati an sa'un. At awad sey mipani as sawang ey vinuktak as para an dakayu ey niippun mabalin mangnub.
66003009	Guminok kayu yén ta andongor kayu. Miipanggop ey asda pasurut Satanas ey jida dasey mangibagabaga ey Jewsda urey nu dakumpunda as tuttuwa ey tagun Apudyus, jida dasey ussatan. Oni at pilituk jida ey umuy mallikkadang assey sinagungyu. At siyaji sey mangigammuwanda ey pipiuk dakayu.
66003010	Awad sey jumatong ey kagguugyat ey tongtong-ag as matongtong-agan sey silluvungan. Kon gapu ta pinatiyu sey vilinku ey inanusanyu sey natongtong-aganyu, ilisik dakayu assey umali ey amudʼey tongtong-ag.
66003011	Tigangey sey umaliyak. At siya sey pangganyu ey mangunud assey ustu ey tudtuju ta niippun amros assey gun-gunayu.
66003012	Sey tagu ey urguna sey lawingan, ambalinuk siya as turkud sey Tempél Apudyus. At iinggow siji ey niippun umayawana. Markaak siya assey ngadan Apudyus ey Apuk ya sey ngadan sey ilin Apudyus ey siya sey baru ey Jerusalem ey marpu an Apudyus ad langit. Ya markaak avus siya assey mismu ey baru ey ngadanku.
