66003013	At siyaji, dongronyu sey ibagan sey Ispiritun Apudyus nu awad ingayu, dakayu amin ey mamati ey awad asda kavubruvubruy.’”
66003014	Asina at vus kanan, “Annaya sey ikur-itnu assey enjel ey mamabantey assey vungguy da mamati ad Laodicea: ‘Sa'un sey maawagan as Amen tey matalikak ya pasig tuttuwa sey ibagak miipanggop an Apudyus. Sa'un vus sey laprapun sey amin ey kingwan Apudyus. At annaya sey ibagak an dakayu.
66003015	Agammuk sey kookoonyu. Mipani kayu assey danum ey aji pun ikow man-atung unnu mantagaliyong. Sey piuk atyén at ampili kayu asda juwa anna.
66003016	Kon gapu ta aji kayu pun ikow as man-atung unnu mantagaliyong, ituppak dakayu.
66003017	Kananyu ey baknang kayu ya vummaru sey viyagyu ya wadawad amin sey kasapuranyu kon ajiyu pun agammu ey assey katuttuwaan, niippun lagsakyu, kadagdagu kayu, lumawa kayu, nampoponnas kayu ya nabvurag kayu.
66003018	At sey ibagak an dakayu, sa'un sey ngumin-anyu assey pasigʼey vurawan ey nuutu assey apuy ta vumaknang kayu ey tuttuwa. Sa'un vus sey ngumin-anyu assey apputak ey lumvun as ilumvunyu ta aji kayu ampoponnas ta aji kayu maviinan. Sa'un atyén avus sey ngumin-anyuʼs agas ey iyagasyu assey atayu ta makaila kayu kasin.
66003019	Amin ey tagu ey pipiuk at tugunuk ya lapsitak as madisiplinaanda. At siya sey ganasanyu ta ibabawiyu dasey basuryu.
66003020	Guminok kayu yén tey annaak ey summisikad assey sawang ey kumugkukugkug ta ngan ey sey mangngor ya vinuktana sey sawang ey amasakey an sa'un, sumakayak ey mikauvung an siya.
66003021	Sey tagu ey urguna sey lawingan, atdak as karobbongan ey mikatukju an sa'un ey manturey ey anung sey nikatukjuwak an Ama ey mikaturey gapu assey nangabakak an Satanas.
66003022	At siyaji, dongronyu sey ibagabagan sey Ispiritun Apudyus nu awad ingayu, dakayu amin ey mamati ey awad asda kavubruvubruy.’”
66004001	Naas pun jiyuy, tinangadku sey sawang ey navuvukkatan ad langit. At jingngorku vus sey ginga ey siya sey sigud ey apporow nikabagbaga an sa'un ey kamaʼs vungug ji trompeta sey koona ey guminga. Kanana, “Ngumatuka as sanna ta ipiilak an sika sey makwa assey daan ey ag-agow.”
66004002	Oni pun, jinumgot sey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus an sa'un at innilak sey tronu ad langit ey inggow sey tummutukju.
66004003	Sey kiil-an sey tummutukju saji at sumilisiling ey kama assey nabalor ey batu ey kananda ey jasper ya carnelian. Assey liwus sey tronu, inggow sey tibvungarun ey sey gallitna at anungna sey kananda ey batu ey emerald ey allinsi.
66004004	Sey tronu vus saji at nampaliwus as juwampuru ya opat ey tronu ey tummutukjuwan dasey juwampuru ya opat ey angkamarong-ag ey papangat. Nallulumvunda as anni'itak ya nakoronaanda as vurawan.
66004005	Assey nanggagawa saji ey tronu, inggow sey angulkuliyabbang ya umag-agajuud ey kijur. Ya assey sinagungna avus, inggow sey pitu ey gugumngot ey silow ey siya sey mipaniyan sey pitu ey kiil-an sey pannakabalin sey Ispiritun Apudyus.
66004006	Assey sinasagung avus sey tronu, inggow sey anungna beybey ey sarming sey kopyana ey kama as crystal. Assey liwus sey tummutukju saji, awad dasey opat ey matattagu ey parsuwa ey pasig ata sey sinagung ya ujugda.
66004007	Sey usa asda matattagu sana ey parsuwa at anungna sey layun ya sey mikagwa, anungna baka, sey mikatlu, anungna sey vusar sey tagu ya sey mikapat, anungna sey vukow ey manassassayow.
66004008	Usausa asda opat ey parsuwa sana at napayakanda as sin-oonom ey pasig ata sey long-agda anda payakda. Inag-agow ya nilavi ey pasigda kumantakanta ey kananda, “Niippun mipaniyan sey vinarun sey mannakabalin ey Apu taku ey Apudyus tey siya sey kababaruwan. Aawwad siya assey saradna ya aawwad assey sana ya aawwad as ing-inggana.”
66004009	Dasey opat sana ey matattagu ey parsuwa, ikantakantada sey kinangatun sey tummutukju assey tronu ey matatagu as ing-inggana. Ya siya sey dayadayawunda ya mansarasaramatanda. Anna ey gey ey ikankantada,
66004010	nallukvub pey dasey juwampuru ya opat ey angkamarong-ag ey mandayow assey sinagung sey tummutukju assey tronu ey matatagu as ing-inggana. Kaanunda vus sey ingkoronada ey vurawan asida at ibadong assey sinagung sey tronu ya kananda ey manginkankanta,
66004011	“Sika ey Apu ya Apudyusni, sika sey lobbongna ey dayawunni ya vigvigunni sey kinaambarum ya sey pannakabalinnu. Tey sika sey nangwa assey kangamin. Lummuswa sey kangamin ya nataguda gapu assey panggopnu.”
66005001	Naas pun ji, innilak sey nalulukut ey papil ey nakur-itan sey namviniik ey inuugnan sey padawanan ey iman sey tummutukju assey tronu. Sey nalulukut ey papil saji, awad sey pitu ey nipakot as ajina pun mavukyadan.
66005002	Oni pun, innilak vus sey enjel ey dokor sey kaviilana ey mandangsor sey gingana ey kanana, “Ngan gey lawa sey awad lobbongna ey mangokkab assey nipakot ta mavukyad sey papil?”
66005003	Kon niippun mad-asan as awad lobbongna ey mamukyad assey papil. Tey niippun makaviil urey asda awad ad langit unnu assey luta anna, unnu ad darum assey luta.
66005004	At magak gey nan-ivil tey niippun nad-asan as awad lobbongna ey mamukyad ta basauna.
66005005	Kon kanan sey usa as dasey angkamarong-ag an sa'un, “Ustu, iginoknu ey man-ivil. Ilam man, anji sey kananda ey layun ey narpu assey ginanakan Judah ya mavivigvig ey ganak David. Inabakna as Satanas at siya sey awad lobbongna ey mangokkab asda pitu ey nipakot assey nalulukut ey papil ta vukyajuna.”
66005006	Imbagana pun jiyuy, innilak sey ubvun sey karneru ey summisikad assey gawan sey tronu ey niliwus dasey opat ey matatagu ey parsuwa ya dasey angkamarong-ag. Sey kiil-an sey karneru sana at kama as awad nangngat an siya assey dandani. Pitu sey sakgudna ya pitu sey atana ey siya sey pitu ey Ispiritun Apudyus ey nipuuy asda amin ey ili assey luvung.
66005007	Ummadani sey Karneru assey tronu at innarana sey nalulukut ey papil assey padawanan ey iman sey tummutukju.
66005008	Innarana pun ji, nallukvub dasey opat ey matatagu ey parsuwa ya dasey juwampuru ya opat ey angkamarong-ag assey sinagung sey karneru. Usausa asda angkamarong-ag sana, narnubda as sinus-a ey gitara ya mallukung ey vurawan ey nakokoan as bangbangu ey siya sey luwarun dasey tagun Apudyus.
66005009	Nangkankantada as barbaru ey kanta ey kananda, “Sika sey awad lobbongna ey mangara assey nalulukut ey papil ya mangokkab as dasey nipapakkot. Tey sika sey gingngatda ya sey daram sey nanubvut as dasey katagutagu ta awad ambalin as tagun Apudyus ey marpu asda amin ey kapuun ji tagu asda nantokotokon ey ili ya nantokotokon ey ginga anda kublit.
66005010	Injugam jida assey tureynu ta mikatureyda an sika assey luta ya nambalinum vus jida as papaji ey manservi an Apudyus ey dayadayawun taku.”
66005011	Allangrangaak pun vus kasin, jingngorku sey gingan dasey kalivulivu ey enjel ey angkasikad assey liwus sey tronu ya dasey opat ey matattagu ey parsuwa ya da angkamarong-ag.
66005012	Indangsorda ey nangingkankanta ey kananda, “Sey karneru ey gingngatda at siya sey awad lobbongna ey madayow gapu assey kinangatun sey pannakabalinna ya vinaknangna, kinasilibna ya kasdorna. Siya sey awad lobbongna ey mingatu ya madayow.”
66005013	Oni pun, jingngorku sey nangkankantaan dasey amin ey awad ad langit, da awad assey luta, da awad assey beybey ya urey da awad ad darum assey luta. Losanda mankankanta ey kananda, “Kanana atyén ta sey tummutukju assey tronu ya sey Karneru at madayowda as ing-inggana ya mipadngopadngor sey kinaambaruda ya sey kinangatuda ya sey pannakabalinda as ing-inggana ey niippun patinggana.”
66005014	At summongbat dasey opat ey matatagu ey parsuwa at kananda, “Amen!” Asi at vus mallukvub dasey angkamarong-ag ey mandayow assey Karneru ya sey tummutukju assey tronu.
66006001	Assey amuyvuyaak, inokkab sey Karneru sey usa asda nipakot. At inggow sey jingngorku ey anungna kijur ey gingan sey usa asda opat ey matatagu ey parsuwa ey kanana, “Umali ka!”
66006002	Allangrangaak pun, innilak sey apputak ey kabayu ey inggow sey nangakabbayu ey nanangjun as pana. Naatdan siya as korona at ummuy nikagubat ta abakuna da amin ey kavusurna.
66006003	Oni pun vus, inokkab sey Karneru sey mikagwa ey nipapakkot. At jingngorku sey gingan sey mikagwa ey matatagu ey parsuwa ey kanana, “Umalika!”
66006004	Inggow vus sey usa ey kabayu ey addaraag ey lummuswa. Sey nangakabbayu as jiyuy at naatdan as anjuanju ey bangid ya naatdan vus as karobbongan ey gumuru assey luta anna ta manggiginnongat da tagu.
66006005	Inokkab pun sey Karneru sey mikatlu ey nipapakkot, jingngorku sey gingan sey mikatlu ey matatagu ey parsuwa ey kanana, “Umalika!” Ilak pun, inggow sey angngitit ey kabayu ya awad sey nangakabbayu ey nanangjun as kiluwan.
66006006	Asik at dongron sey ginga ey kama as narpu assey gawan dasey opat ey matatagu ey parsuwa ey kanana, “Awad sey jumatong ey urat assey luta anna at sey tangdan sey usa ey tagu assey umargow at umaney anggey as kanuna assey siyaji ey ag-agow, vugas man unnu gassilang. Kon ajiyu dadailun sey lanan sey olib ya sey bayas ey naara assey greps.”
66006007	Anna pun ey inokkab sey Karneru sey mikapat ey nipapakkot, jingngorku sey gingan sey mikapat ey matatagu ey parsuwa ey kanana, “Umalika!”
66006008	Ilak pun, nantollongak sey an-uupsat ey kabayu ya inggow sey nangakabbayu ey nangadnan as Katuy. Ya sey vurunna ey umunnuunnud at as Hades ey iggawan dasey natuy. Naatdanda as karobbongan ey mangngat assey pagkapat dasey tagu assey luta anna gapu asda gubat, urat, sakit ya da kagguugyat ey tanan.
66006009	Inokkab pun sey Karneru sey mikalima ey nipapakkot, innilak assey doran sey altar dasey alinnawan dasey tagu ey apporowda gingngat gapu assey nangintatakjuganda ey nangiwwarawag assey Gingan Apudyus.
66006010	Idangsodangsorda ey kananda, “Mannakabalin ey Apudyus ey Apu ey niippun makaabak ya niippun miyisuwan sey vinarum ya matalikka ey mangwa asda imbagam; ayaka ji as manguullayanni assey manguwisam asda tagu ey aji pun mamati as barus sey nangngatanda an dakani?”
66006011	Imbagada pun ji, usausa an jida at naatdanda as apputak ey lumvun ey malungrunggayad. Nibaga an jida ey iyon-onida yén as akit inggana as mamin mipagngat dasey vurunda ey anserservi ey anung sey nagngatanda ta umustu sey nigoddong ey vilangda.
66006012	Assey amuvuyyaak, inokkab sey Karneru sey mikonom ey nipapakkot. Oni pun, inggow sey mandangsor ey lunig. Gummikbot sey ag-agow ey kamaʼs angngitit ey sinnun ya jummaraag sey sorag ey anungna dara.
66006013	Ya nayakayak dasey vituwun assey luta ey kamaʼs vungan ji kayu ey fig ey daan pun muutu ey matabnak assey angokokoon sey mandangsor ey bali.
66006014	Assey timpu vus saji, namiid ad langit ey kamaʼs nalukut ey papil at nikunud dasey vilig ya dasey luta ey awad assey gawan sey beybey at naminda nikiwag.
66006015	At dasey Ari, da tuturey, dasey opisyar dasey surdaju, dasey babaknang anda ujum ey awad pannakabalinna ya da amin ey tagu, alipan man as dakumpun, naminda nikuugyat at ummuyda nantaru asda liyang ya da longrongab da batbatu asda vib-ilig.
66006016	At kanakananda ey angipkow asda vilig anda batu, “Magdey kayu pit ta tab-unanyu dakani ta ajin dakani ilan assey tummutukju assey tronu ya malisiyanni sey kagguugyat ey putuk sey Karneru.
66006017	Tey anna ey jummatong sey kagguugyat ey ag-agow ey manusaanda asda amin ey tagu assey luta at niippun mabalin manipod assey makwaana!”
66007001	Naas pun jiyuy, innilak dasey opat ey enjel ey summisikad as dasey opat ey jugyun sey luta. Impupda dasey opat ey marpuwan sey bali ta aji mabali sey luta, beybey ya da kayu.
66007002	Da nauy ey enjel sey nangatdan Apudyus assey pannakabalin ey manadail assey luta ya beybey. Oni pun, innilak vus sey sabali ey enjel ey ngumatungatu ey narpu assey lumuswaan init ey nanangjun assey markan sey matatagu ey Apudyus. Ip-ipkowna asda opat ey vurunna ey enjel ey kanana,
66007003	“Ajiyu dadailun sey luta, beybey unnu kayu inggana as imarkani sey markan Apudyus ey dayadayawun taku asda kitung dasey manserservi an siya.”
66007004	Naasda pun nammarka, nibaga an sa'un sey vilang dasey tagu ey namarkaan at ummuy as 144,000. Amin da nauy ey tagu at narpuda asda nasawaran as juwa ey ginanakan Israel.
66007005	Angkasawaran as juwa ey livu sey vilang dasey namarkaan ey narpu assey usausa ey ginanakan Israel ey jida da Judah, Ruben, Gad, Aser, Naptali, Manasses, Simeon, Levi, Issakar, Zebulun, Joseph ya as Benjamin.
66007009	Naas pun ji, innilak vus da amud ey tagu ey aji pun mavilang sey kaajuda. Ya miid ajida narpuwan, tey awadka ey narpu asda amin ey nantokotokon ey kapuun ji tagu ya da nantokotokon ey vubruy ya da nantokotokon ey Nasyun ya da nantokotokon ey karasin ji ginga. Angkatakjugda assey sinagung sey tronu ya sey Karneru ey losanda nallulumvun as ani'itak ey malungrunggayad ya nampa'ujundaʼs tuvun sey bangaan ey mangimpiila assey ragsakda.
66007010	Ip-ipkowda ey kananda, “Sey nanginsarakan an jitaku at sey Apudyus ey dayadayawun taku ey tummutukju assey tronu ya sey Karneru!”
66007011	Nalikub da amin ey enjel assey liwus sey tronu ya dasey angkamarong-ag ya dasey opat ey matatagu ey parsuwa. Asida at mallukvub assey sinagung sey tronu ey mandayow an Apudyus
66007012	ey kanakananda, “Siyana paan pey! Tey sika Apudyus ey manserserviyanni sey lobbongna ey madayow. Sika sey mingatu, sika sey kariingan ya sika sey mansaramatanni. Sika ey maririspitu, kakasdoran ya mannakabalin ey Apudyus ey manserserviyanni as ing-inggana. Amen!”
66007013	Inimus sey usa asda angkamarong-ag an sa'un ey kanana, “Ey agammum nu ngan da tagu anna ey nallulumvun as ani'itak ya ngan sey narpuwanda?”
66007014	“Niippun agammuk, apu, kon agammuk ey agammum,” kanak ey summongbat. At kanana, “Da nauy dasey tagu ey nakalasat assey kagguugyat ey tongtong-ag. Sinor-akanda dasey lumvunda assey daran sey Karneru at siya sey nangimpiitak.
66007015	Siyana sey lapuna ey andanaʼsna assey sinagung sey tronun Apudyus ey manservi an siya assey inag-agow ya nilavi assey Tempelna. At sey ininggow assey tronu, vuvurnana jida ya siya sey mamupuut an jida.
66007016	Niippun kasinda muuratan anda muuwwawan ya niippun ogon kasinda maatungan assey init unnu ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey umatung
66007017	tey sey Karneru ey awad assey gawan sey tronu sey amupuut an jida. Ya ipuyutna jida assey vuvun ey marpuwan sey danum ey mangatud as Viyag. Punasan Apudyus sey luwada ta niippun kasinda man-ivilan.”
66008001	Inokkab pun sey Karneru sey mikapitu ey nipapakkot, natatmok sey amin ey awad ad langit as kagugwan ji uras.
66008002	Naas pun ji, innilak dasey pitu ey enjel ey summisikad assey sinagung Apudyus. Naatdanda as pitu ey tangguyub.
66008003	Oni pun, jummatong vus sey usa ey enjel ey nanangjun assey mallukung ey vurawan ey nakokoan as bangbangu at ummuy summikad assey iggawan sey altar. Naatdan siya as adjuwan ey bangbangu ta mijuga assey luwarun dasey tagun Apudyus ey midatun assey altar ey vurawan ey inggow assey sinagung sey tronu ta midatun an Apudyus.
66008004	Anna pun ey ngumatu sey asuk sey naapuyan ey bangbangu ey narpu assey mallukung ey inuugnan sey enjel ey summisikad assey sinagung Apudyus, nikamus assey luwarun dasey mamati at nallapurap assey iggawan Apudyus.
66008005	Naas pun ji, pinnun sey enjel sey mallukung ey iggawan sey bangbangu assey baran sey apuy ey naara assey altar asina at ipitlak assey luta. At maggey nanguliyabbang ya naagajuud sey kijur ya nallunig.
66008006	At nansagana dasey pitu ey enjel ey mangimpaginga assey tangguyubda.
66008007	Nanangguyub pun sey namangu ey enjel, maggey ummudan as dararu ya apuy ey nakamsan as dara ey nayakayak assey luta. At nasgub sey pagkatlun sey luta ya pagkatlun da kayu ya pagkatlun dasey lugam at naminda naskuran.
66008008	Nanangguyub pun vus sey mikagwa ey enjel, inggow sey anungna kadokor sey tagudtud ey madagadagadag ey nivintug assey beybey. At nambalin as dara sey pagkatlun sey beybey
66008009	at naminda nangkakatuy dasey pagkatlun sey amin ey anggiju assey beybey ey nijuga nadadail sey pagkatlun sey amin ey bapor.
66008010	Nanangguyub pun vus sey mikatlu ey enjel, inggow sey dokor ey vituwun ey anungna gumilgillajung ey apuy ey narpu ad langit ey naotdag at nibatug assey amin ey pagkatlun sey dawwang ya pagkatlun dasey vuvun.
66008011	Sey vituwun saji at nangadanan as “Ampiit.” At nambalin as ampiit dasey amin ey pagkatlun sey danum at adjuwan sey tagu ey natuy gapu assey nanginumanda assey danum ey ampiit.
66008012	Naas pun ji, nanangguyub avus sey mikapat ey enjel at maggey nakakosong sey pagkatlun sey dérang sey init, sorag ya da vituwun. At gummongot sey pagkatlun sey ag-agow ya lavi.
66008013	Anna pun ey amvuyvuyaak, innilak sey usa ey vukow ey tumayatayap ad ngatu. Indangsorna ey gumminga ey kanana, “Anuy akey! Kadagdagu da amin ey tagu ey awad assey luta ey manapun assey kagguugyat ey makwa nu ipagingan dasey turu ey enjel sey tangguyubda.”
66009001	Oni pun vus, nanangguyub tuttuwa sey mikalima ey enjel. At innilak sey inggow naotdag ey vituwun assey luta ey narpu ad langit. Sey vituwun sana, naatud an siya sey turvik ey mamkat assey sawang sey vitu ey niippun patinggan sey kaadarumna.
66009002	Vinuktana pun sey vitu saji, lummuswa sey amud koparna ey asuk ey kamaʼs asuk sey dagadag ey nangimpagikbot assey init ya ag-agow.
66009003	Ya maggey lummuswa dasey jujun ey narpu assey asuk saji at nan-opada assey luta ya naatdanda as pannakabalin ey sumilud ey kama as dasey gayyaman.
66009004	Nibaga an jida ey ajida dadailun dasey lugam, kayu ya da ujum ey mura. Siya anggey as koonda sey manongtong-ag asda tagu ey aji pun namarkaan sey kitungda assey markan Apudyus.
66009005	Kon ajida pun naparuvusan ey mangngat asda tagu tey sey anggey as koonda sey manongtong-ag an jida assey unig sey lima ey vuran. Sey dogot sey sakit ey atjunda asda tagu sana at kama assey sigab sey kintub sey gayyaman.
66009006	Assey unig sey lima ey vuran saji, piun atyén dasey tagu ey matuy ya iyanaanapda sey matuyanda kon ajida pun kaviilan.
66009007	Sey kiil-an da nauy ey jujun at kamadaʼs kabayu ey nakasagana ey mikagubat. Nampabbatkungda as isuna sey korona ey vurawan ya sey vusarda, kamaʼs vusar ji tagu.
66009008	Angkananju sey vuukda ey anungna sey vuuk sey vubai ya sey vub-ada, kamaʼs vub-an ji layun.
66009009	Sey barukungda at kama as awad sibsibna ey baliyang ya sey banabbab sey payakda, kama as ngurjungud sey ansarum ey kalisa ey guyuguyujun da kabayu ey situtuddak ey umuy mikagubat.
66009010	Awad sey ipusda ya siludda ey kama assey gayyaman. At assey ipusda sey iggawan sey dogotda ey manongtong-ag asda tagu assey unig sey liman vuran.
66009011	Inggow sey arida ey manginturturey an jida ey siya sey enjel ey nangigammu assey vitu ey niippun patinggan sey kaadarumna. Sey ngadan sey enjel sana assey ginga ey Hebrew, “Abaddon,” ya assey ginga ey Greek, “Apollyon,” ey sey piuna ugujun, “Lumaranggas.”
66009012	Siyana sey patinggan sey namangu ey kagguugyat ey tongtong-ag, kon awad pey dallu sey juwa ey jumatong.
66009013	Oni pun, impagingan sey mikonom ey enjel sey tangguyubna. At jingngorku sey ginga ey narpu assey opat ey jugyun sey vurawan ey altar ey awad assey sinagung Apudyus.
66009014	Kanan sey gumminga assey mikonom ey enjel, “Ingka uggasun dasey opat ey enjel ey nababarud assey dokor ey dawwang ad Eufrates.”
66009015	At nivukkey dasey opat sana ey enjel ey nakasagana ey mangngat assey pagkatlun da amin ey tagu assey siyana vus pigey ey ag-agow assey siyaji ey vuran assey siyaji ey tawun.
66009016	Nibaga an sa'un sey vilang dasey surdajuda ey nangakabbayu at ummuyda as juwanggasut ey milyun.
66009017	Sey nipiila an sa'un assey kamaʼs in-inop ey kiil-an dasey kabayu ya dasey nangakabbayu at awad sey karasag sey barukungda ey nagallitan as turu ey karasin ji gallit. Awad sey addaraag ey kama as apuy ya awad sey pagallumarum ey anung sey gallit ji nabalor ey batu ey kananda ey safire ya awad sey gallit ey judjurow ey kama as asufre. Sey urun dasey kabayu at kama as urun sey layun ya inggow sey lumuswaluswa assey sungadda ey apuy, asuk ya asufre.
66009018	At natuy sey pagkatlun da amin ey tagu gapu asda turu sana ey gumngat ey apuy, asuk ya asufre ey lumusluswa assey sungad dasey kabayu.
66009019	Tey sey marpuwan sey dogot dasey kabayu ey gumngat at assey sungadda ya assey ipusda. Sey ipusda, nuuruwan ey anungna tabbad ey manibban asda tagu.
66009020	Kon dasey tagu ey aji pun natuy assey siyaji ey ligat, ajida pun pey dallu man-awidan dasey lawing ey kookoonda tey ajida pun ipug-an ey mandayow asda jimunyu ya da ap-apudyus ey kingwada ey nakwa asda vurawan, parata, bakrow, batu anda kayu ey aji pun makaila, makadngor unnu makadaran.
66009021	Ajida pun vus ibabawi dasey kingwakingwada ey lawingan ey kama assey ginumngatanda ya sey apporowda nan-usiwan as matongtong-agan da ujum ey tagu unnu as malligatanda ya sey apporowda nikadagdagasan anda nan-akawan.
66010001	Oni pun vus, innilak sey usa ey mannakabalin ey enjel ey lumagulagud ey marpu ad langit ey nakukummutan as livuu ya nan-aappungut as tibvungarun. Sumilisiling sey vusarna ey kama assey init ya sey sikina, anungna sey gumilgillajung ey apuy.
66010002	Inuugnana sey ban-it ey papil ey navuvukyad. Ginugusdan sey padawanan ey sikina sey beybey ya sey padawigina, inggugusdanna assey luta.
66010003	Namvugga ey kama as taguung sey layun. Naas pun namvugga, naagajuud dasey pitu ey kijur ey tinumbar.
66010004	Anna atyén ey ikur-itku sey jingngorku ey imbagan dasey pitu kijur, jingngorku at avus sey ginga ey narpu ad langit ey kanana, “Iginongnu yén, ajim ikur-it sey kanan dasey pitu ey kijur.”
66010005	Sey inggow enjel ey summisikad assey beybey ya luta, ingngatuna sey padawanan ey imana
66010006	at insapatana an Apudyus ey matatagu as ing-inggana ey nangwa assey langit, luta ya beybey ya da amin ey ininggow, kanana, “Niippun kasin muulley at aji pun ambayag sey makwaana.
66010007	Tey nu manangguyub ey gey sey mikapitu ey enjel, ipadakpus Apudyus sey amin ey planuna ey ajina pun impaagammu asda ujum tey anggey dasey profetna ey nanserservi an siya sey nangimbagaana.”
66010008	Oni pun, kasin vus nikabagbaga an sa'un sey ginga ey narpu ad langit ey kanana, “Ingka aran sey navuvukyad ey papil ey inuugnan sey enjel ey nangugusdan assey beybey ya luta.”
66010009	Ummuyak assey enjel saji at kindowku sey ban-it ey papil ey inuugnana. Kanana an sa'un, “Aram ta kanum, man-umis sey simsimna assey sungadnu ey kama as jilu kon mansigab nu maronad assey vuwangnu gapu assey piitna.”
66010010	Innarak sey papil saji ey inuugnana at kinanku. Man-umis tuttuwa sey simsimna ey kama as jilu, kon naronad pun, mansigab sey vuwangku gapu assey piitna.
66010011	Inggow sey nangimbaga an sa'un ey kanana, “Masapur ey ikasinnu ipaagammu sey luus Apudyus sisimmok ey makwa asda amin ey tagu asda adjuwan ey ili ey mijuga da papangatda ya asda nantokotokon ey ginanakan ya asda nantokotokon ey ginga.”
66011001	Oni pun, inggow sey nangatud an sa'un assey kamang ey kama as surkud. Imbagana an sa'un ey kanana, “Ingka kamangun sey Tempél Apudyus ya sey altar ya vilangum nu kam-ana dasey mandaydayow siji.
66011002	Kon ajim ijuga kamangun sey paweyn sey tempel tey nipurang as dasey tagu ey dakumpun as tagun Apudyus. Jida sey mangimpaaggissow assey naapudyusan ey vubruy ey Jerusalem assey opatpuru ya juwa ey vuran.
66011003	Assey unig sey sillivu ya juwanggasut ya onompuru ey ag-agow, awad sey juwa ey tistiguk ey ibaarku ey mallurumvunda as saku ya iwarawagda asda tagu sey ipaagammuk an jida miipanggop an sa'un.”
66011004	Da juwa ey tistigu sana, mipanida as juwa ey kayu ey olib ya sey juwa ey papattangan as silow ey awad assey sinagung Apudyus ey Apun dasey amin ey tagu assey luta.
66011005	At nu awad mamadas ey manibban an jida, lumuswa sey apuy assey sungadda ey mansugub assey kavusurda. At kanaʼsna sey ikatuy sey urey ngadanna ey mamadas ey manibban an jida.
66011006	Naatdanda avus as pannakabalin ey mangiyyumug ta aji umud-udan assey timpu ey mangiwwarawaganda assey ipaagammun Apudyus an jida. Awad avus sey pannakabalinda ey ambalinunda sey danum as dara. Ya kaviilanda vus ey manongtong-ag asda tagu assey luta asda nantokotokon ey tongtong-ag urey anginkinnu nu siya sey piunda.
66011007	At nu maasda ibaga sey impaagammun Apudyus an jida, umali sey kagguugyat ey animar ey lumuswa assey vitu ey niippun patinggan sey kaadarumna at gubatuna da juwa anna ya gongatuna jida.
66011008	At babaddong pey lawa sey ladagda assey karsan sey nanjinamag ey vubruy ey siya vus sey nikrusan sey Apuda. Sey vubruy saji, mipani assey vubruy ad Sodom unnu Egypt.
66011009	Turu ya kagugwa ey ag-agow sey apporon da tagu amuvuyyaan assey ladagda. Da tagu anna ey amuvuya, narpuda asda nantokotokon ey Nasyun, nantokotokon ey kapuun, nantokotokon ey ginga anda nantokotokon ey gallit sey kublit da tagu. Ajida pun vus iparuvus sey milabnanda.
66011010	Amud sey layad dasey tagu assey luta anna ey aji pun mamati an Apudyus gapu assey natuyan dasey juwa sana. At gapu assey ragsakda, mamparti da tagu ya nan-iinnatudda as kasapuran tey natuy da juwa sana ey profet ey natongtong-ag asda amin ey tagu assey luta.
66011011	Kon naas pun sey turu ya kagugwa ey ag-agow, insap-uy Apudyus sey angusna an jida at ummulida at summikadda. At nikuugyat dasey amin ey nangila an jida.
66011012	Oni pun, jingngor dasey juwa sana ey profet sey mandangsor ey ginga ey narpu ad langit ey kanana an jida, “Umali kayu as sanna.” Oni pun, nivurunda assey livuu ey nampangatu ad langit ey vuyvuyaun dasey kavusurda.
66011013	Oni pun vus, maggey nallunig as amud sey dangsorna at nabakas sey pagkapurun sey vubruy saji. At natuy da pitunlivu ey tagu. Amud sey ugyat dasey tagu ey aji pun natuy at jinaydayowda sey pannakabalin Apudyus ey awad ad langit.
66011014	Siyana sey patinggan sey mikagwa ey kagguugyat ey tongtong-ag, kon awad pey dallu sey mikatlu ey daan pun umdas.
66011015	Oni pun, impagingan sey mikapitu ey enjel sey tangguyubna ya inggow dasey mangkadanangsor ey ginga ad langit ey kananda, “Misarad assey sana, niippun ujum as manturey assey luvung nu dokon anggey sey Apu taku ya sey jinutukana ey Cristu at manturey siya as ing-inggana.”
66011016	Oni pun, nallukvub dasey juwampuru ya opat ey angkamarong-ag ey tummutukju assey tronuda assey sinagung Apudyus ey mandayow an siya.
66011017	Kananda, “Apudyus ey mannakabalin assey amin ey aawwad assey saradna ya as ing-inggana, mansaramat kani an sika tey anna ey impiilam sey niippun mipaniyana ey pannakabalinnu ya insaradnu ey manturey assey amin ey luvung.
66011018	Amud sey putuk dasey dakumpun as tagum ey aji pun mamati tey inumdas sey timpu ey manusaam an jida tey assey sana ey timpu sey manguwisam asda nangkakatuy. Ya assey sana vus ey timpu sey mangun-gunaam asda profet ey nanserservi an sika ya da amin ey tagum ey nandayow an sika, nangatu man as nababa. Siyana sey ustu ey timpu sey manadailam as dasey apporow nanadail asda tagu assey luta.”
66011019	Naas pun ji, navuktan sey Tempél Apudyus ad langit at niila siji sey kasun ey iggawan sey nikur-itan sey turag Apudyus. Oni pun, insaradna ey kumulikuliyabbang ya vinumligit sey kijur ya nallunig ya ummudan as amud ey dararu.
66012001	Naas pun ji, inggow sey nakaskasdaow ey nisabsabali ey sinyar ey nampiila ad langit. Nampiila sey usa ey vubai ey nalumvunan assey sumiling ey kama assey init ey tummatakjug ey nangugusdan assey sorag. Ingkoronana dasey nasawaran as juwa ey vituwun.
66012002	Anna ey anggamut tey tigangey umanak at kumilakilaruy assey sigab sey vuwangna.
66012003	Oni pun vus, inggow sey usa ey nakaskasdaow ey sinyar ey nampiila ad langit. Nampiila sey addaraag ya dokor ey amoraga ey pitu sey uruna ey namin nakoronaan ya simpuru sey sakgudna.
66012004	Insapdakna sey ipusna at nayakayak assey luta sey pagkatlun dasey vituwun ad langit. Oni pun, ummuy tummakjug assey sinagung sey vubai saji ey anggamut ta kanuna sey utting nu lumuswa.
66012005	Kon lummuswa pun sey anakna ey laraki, inggow sey nangara an siya ey nangiyyuy assey iggawan Apudyus ey anturturey. Tey sey utting sana, siya sey manginturey assey amin ey ili ey estriktu sey koona ya aminuna abakun dasey aji pun mamigvig assey tureyna.
66012006	Ummawid sey vubai saji ey ummuy assey danak assey iggawan sey insaganan Apudyus ta as jiyuy sey mapuutana assey unig sey sillivu ya juwanggasut ya onompuru ey ag-agow.
66012007	Oni pun, vinumtak sey gubat ad langit. As Michael ya dasey vuyutna ey enjel, ginubatda sey amoraga saji ya dasey vuyutna ey enjel ey ummunud an siya.
66012008	Naabak sey amoraga ya dasey vuyutna at pinaryowda jida ad langit tey nakaan sey karobbonganda ey inggow siji.
66012009	At niballu sey amoraga sana ya dasey enjelna assey luta. Sey dokor ey amoraga sana, siya vus pigey sey tabbad assey kar-argow ey mangadnan as Satanas. Siya sey mangal-allilow asda amin ey tagu asda amin ey jugyun sey luta.
66012010	Oni pun, jingngorku sey mandangsor ey ginga ad langit ey kanana, “Anna tuttuwa ey natongpar assey sana sey manginsarakanan Apudyus asda tagu tey impiilana sey pannakabalinna ey manturey. Assey sana vus, as Cristu ey imbaarna ey umali, impiilana vus sey karobbongana. Tey sey apporow mangimpabasur asda vurun taku ey mamati as inag-agow ya nilavi assey sinagung Apudyus at naabak ey niballu ey narpu ad langit.
66012011	Inabak dasey vurun taku ey mamati as Satanas gapu assey daran sey Karneru ey nivukvuk assey natuyana ya gapu assey Ambaru ey Damag ey iwwarawagda ya inturuturuyda sey pammatida ey ajida pun nambabbabangun ey urey nu siya sey ingkatuyda.
66012012	At mallagragsak kayu losan ey inggow ad langit! Kon kadagdagu lawa dasey awad assey luta ya assey beybey tey vummaba as Satanas assey iggowda ey amud sey sangana tey agammuna ey avubbang anggey sey daan ey ag-agowna ey mangwa assey piuna.”
66012013	Anna pun ey naagammuwan sey amoraga ey niballu siya assey luta, insaradna ey manugjug assey inggow vubai ey nangiyyanak assey utting ey laraki.
66012014	Kon naatdan sey vubai as juwa ey payak ey kama as payak ji dokor ey vukow ta awad agammuna ey tumayap ey umuy assey danak ey insaganan Apudyus as iggawana ya mapuutana as turu ya kagugwa ey tawun ta malisiyana sey amoraga.
66012015	Kingwan pun sey amoraga sana, imvug-isna sey danum ey anungna jinakor ta maanud atyén sey vubai saji.
66012016	Kon tinurungan sey luta sey vubai sana at nantakang ey nangisup assey danum ey imvug-is sey amoraga.
66012017	At ummam-amud sey putuk sey amoraga assey vubai at kingwana pun insaradna ey mangubat as dasey ujum ey anak sey vubai sana ey jida dasey manguunnud assey vilin Apudyus ya sey tudtuju ey impaagammun Jesus.
66012018	Kingwan pun sey amoraga, umuy tummatakjug assey igid sey beybey.
66013001	Oni pun, innilak sey kagguugyat ey animar ey lummuswa assey beybey. Pitu sey uruna ya simpuru sey sakgudna ey namin nakoronaan. Usausa ey uru, inggow sey nikur-it ey ngadan ey kaiinsurtu an Apudyus.
66013002	Sey kiil-an sey kagguugyat ey animar saji, anungna sey leopard kon sey dapanna, anungna sey dapan sey bear ya sey sungadna, anungna sungad sey layun. At sey amoraga sana, impabnusna assey kagguugyat ey animar sey pannakabalinna ya tureyna ya sey dokor ey karobbongana.
66013003	Sey usa ey urun sey kagguugyat ey animar, inggow sey pilat sey vigad ey narokdan. Tigangeyna ikatuy sey vigadna sana, kon napilatan at avus at siya sey nasdaawan dasey katagutagu at ummunudda assey kagguugyat ey animar sana.
66013004	Jinaydayow da tagu sey amoraga sana tey siya sey nangatud as karobbongan sey kagguugyat ey animar. Jinayowda vus sey kagguugyat sana ey animar ey kanakananda, “Ngan gey la sey mipaniyan sey kagguugyat ey animar sana? Ey awad pun lawa mangabak an siya?”
66013005	Imparuvus Apudyus ey manturey sey kagguugyat ey animar saji as opatpuru ya juwa ey vuran ya nawayaan ey ampaspas-um ey guminga as mivusur an Apudyus.
66013006	At insaradna ey mangamsiw an Apudyus ya sey ngadanna ya assey vuruyna ad langit ya dasey amin ey awad ad langit.
66013007	Naparuvusan avus siya ey mangubat asda tagun Apudyus ya mangabak an jida. Naatdan as karobbongan ey manginturey asda amin ey kapuun ji tagu, nantokotokon ey Nasyun, nantokotokon ey ginga anda nantokotokon ey gallit ji kublit da tagu.
66013008	At losan da tagu dayawun sey kagguugyat sana ey animar maraksig asda tagu ey nikur-it sey ngadanda assey libnu ey nikur-itan dasey awad viyagna ey niippun patinggana. Urey assey daan pun makwa sey luvung, nikukur-it sey ngadanda assey libnu sana ey libnun sey Karneru ey gingngatda ey nidatun.
66013009	Naingaan kayu at masapur dongronyu nauy!
66013010	Tey dasey tagu ey singgasat ey mabarud, mabarudda. Ya sey singgasat ey matuy assey bangid, bangid vus pigey sey ikatuyda. At dakayu ey tagun Apudyus, masapur ey anusanyu sey tongtong-ag ey lak-amunyu ya pangganyu ey mamati.
66013011	Naas pun ji, innilak vus sey usa ey kagguugyat ey animar ey lummuswa assey luta. Juwa sey sakgudna ey kamaʼs sakgud sey ubvun ji karneru kon sey gingana, anungna gingan sey amoraga.
66013012	Awad an siya sey amin ey karobbongan sey inggow namangu ey kagguugyat ey animar tey siya sey kama as pannakalong-agna. Pinilitna da amin ey tagu assey luta anna ta dayawunda sey namangu saji ey animar ey narokdan sey vigadna ey tigangeyna ikatuy kon napilat at avus.
66013013	Sey mikagwa sana ey kagguugyat ey animar, nangwa as nakaskasdaow ey sinyar tey impatokdagna sey apuy ey narpu ad langit ey vuyvuyaun da tagu.
66013014	At inallilowna dasey amin ey tagu assey luta gapu assey nakaskasdaow ey sinyar ey niparuvus as koona as mangindayawana assey namangu ey kagguugyat ey animar. Vinilinna vus da tagu ey mangwada as sinang-animar as madayawan sey inggow namangu ey kagguugyat ey animar ey narokdan sey vigadna assey bangid kon natagu.
66013015	Naparuvusan vus sey mikagwa sana ey animar ey manginsap-uy assey viyag ta matagu sey sinang-animar ey iglatun sey namangu ey kagguugyat ey animar ta mabalin makaginga ya ipagngatna dasey amin ey aji pun mandayow an siya.
66013016	Pinilitna avus ey mamarkaan sey padawanan ey takrey unnu kitung dasey amin ey tagu, nangatu man as nababa, baknang man as lumawa, alipan man as dakumpun alipan.
66013017	At niippun tagu as mabalin ey ngumina anda angingngina nu ajida mamarkaan assey ngadan sey namangu ey kagguugyat ey animar unnu vilang ey sinyar sey ngadanna.
66013018	Kasapuran ey nariing sey tagu ey mangigammu nu ngan sey piuna ugujun sey vilang ey sinyar sey kagguugyat ey animar. Tey sey vilang saji at awad sey itakjugna ey ngadan sey usa ey tagu. Sey vilang sana at 666.
66014001	Kasinak pun mallangranga, nantollongak sey Karneru ey tummatakjug assey tagudtud ad Zion ya inggow dasey 144,000 ey tagu ey angkasikad siji ey nakur-itan sey kitungda assey ngadanna ya sey ngadan Amana.
66014002	Oni pun, jingngorku vus sey kamaʼs pumoypoyyaas ey danum ad langit ey anungna sey vinnumligit ey kijur. Kama vus as gingan sey mansarum ey gitara ey impagingan dasey gumigitara.
66014003	Summisikad dasey 144,000 ey tagu assey sinagung sey tronu ya assey sinagung dasey opat ey matatagu ey parsuwa ya da angkamarong-ag. Inggow sey barbaru ey kankantaunda ey niippun ujum as nangigammu nu aji jida anggey ey insarakan Apudyus.
66014004	Da nauy dasey tagu ey aji pun nangimparuvus assey long-agda ey maaggisawan miipanggop assey koko'on da vubai anda laraki. Umunnuunnudda assey Karneru urey ngan sey ayana. Jida dasey tagu ey nadarusan sey basurda ey amangu midatun an Apudyus ya assey Karneru.
66014005	Niippun nan-us-ussatanda ya niippun mipabasur an jida.
66014006	Oni pun, innilak vus sey usa ey enjel ey antattayap ad ngatu. Awad sey Ambaru ey Damag ey niippun patinggana ey iwarwarawagna asda amin ey awad assey luta ya asda amin ey nantokotokon ey gallit ji kublit, nantokotokon ey kapuun ji tagu ya asda nantokotokon ey ginga anda nantokotokon ey Nasyun.
66014007	Ivuggavuggana ey kanana, “Ipatigyu as Apudyus ya dayawunyu sey kinangatuna tey inumdas sey timpu ey manguwisana asda amin ey tagu. Masapur dayawunyu siya ey nangwa assey langit, luta ya beybey anda amin ey lumuswaan sey danum.”
66014008	Inggow vus sey usa ey mikagwa ey enjel ey ummunud assey namangu saji ey kanana, “Anna ey nikur-ub sey madadamag ey vubruy ey Babylon! Kama as vinuukna dasey katagutagu assey amin ey ili assey mandogot ey bayasna tey naawisda ey mangwa asda amin ey lawingan ey kookoona.”
66014009	Inggow vus sey mikatlu ey enjel ey ummunud asda juwa ey namangu ey nangimvugga ey kanana, “Ngan ey dasey nandayow assey kagguugyat ey animar ya sey sinang-animar ey iglatuna ya namarkaan sey kitungda unnu takreyda assey markan sey kagguugyat saji ey animar,
66014010	ipin-um Apudyus an jida sey mandogot ey bayasna ey niippun kamusna ey siyaji sey mipaniyan sey amud ey putukna. Jusaun Apudyus jida assey apuy ya assey gumilgillajung ey asufre assey sinagung dasey enjel Apudyus ya sey Karneru.
66014011	Sey apuy ey manongtong-ag an jida at gumilgillajung as ing-inggana. Inag-agow ya nilavi ey niippun lumin-awaan sey tongtong-ag dasey nanaydayow assey kagguugyat ey animar ya sey sinang-animar ey anuanungna ya dasey nampamarka assey markana.”
66014012	At dakayu ey tagun Apudyus ey nanguunnud assey vilinna ya nantatallik an Jesus, masapur pakasdoronyu sey pammatiyu urey ngadannaʼsnaʼt sey makwa an dakayu.
66014013	Oni pun vus, jingngorku sey ginga ey narpu ad langit ey kanana, “Ikur-itnu nauy: Misarad assey sana, gadtok ey nagasat dasey tagu ey matuy gapu assey umuunnudanda an Apu Jesus.” “Nagasatda tuttuwa,” kanan sey Ispiritun Apudyus. “Man-illongda assey mansigab ey siputda tey anna ey magun-gunaanda gapu asda ambaru ey kingwada.”
66014014	Mantangadak pun kasin, inggow sey apputak ey livuu ey tummutukjuwan sey kama as tagu ey nangkorona as vurawan ya nanangjun as mantajum ey kumpey.
66014015	Oni pun, lummogsad sey usa vus ey enjel ey narpu assey Tempél ad langit at imvuggana assey tummutukju saji assey livuu ey kanana, “Ayu, aram sey kumpeynu tey anna ey inumdas sey inggagapas. Naas nuutu sey magapas ey jida dasey tagu assey luta anna.”
66014016	At iwwasiwas sey tummutukju assey livuu sey kumpeyna at nikbaas ogon.
66014017	Oni pun, innilak vus sey usa ey enjel ey lummuswa ey narpu assey Tempél ad langit ey nanangjun assey mantajum ey kumpey.
66014018	Lummuswa vus sey usa ey enjel ey narpu assey altar ey siya sey amupuut assey apuy. Imvuggana assey vurunna ey enjel ey nanangjun as mantajum ey kumpey ey kanana, “Ayu, aram sey kumpeynu ta ingka vurasun dasey greps assey luta tey nuutuda!”
66014019	At iwwasiwasna sey kumpeyna assey luta at navuras amin ey vungan sey greps, asina at ipintok assey dokor ey aastan sey greps ey siya sey mipaniyan sey kagguugyat ey putuk Apudyus ey manusa asda tagu.
66014020	Naasot sey greps assey lasin sey ili. At mallugi assey aastan, nanginarwang as turung gasut ya juwampuru ey kilameter sey kama as jinakor ey dara ey keygad as bagang sey kabayu sey kaadarumna.
66015001	Naas pun jiyuy, innilak sey usa ey nisabsabali ey sinyar ey napatig ya nakaskasdaow ad langit. Innilak dasey pitu ey enjel ey nipurangan dasey pitu ey pang-or da tagu. Da nauy sey anungus ey matongtong-agan da tagu tey siya nauy sey mapungpungan sey kagguugyat ey putuk Apudyus.
66015002	Innilak vus sey kama as beybey ey anganniniwan ey sarming sey kopyana ya nakamsan as apuy ya inggow da tagu ey angkatakjug assey igidna ey ampa'ujun as gitara ey innatud Apudyus. Da nauy dasey tagu ey nangabak assey kagguugyat ey animar tey inidyénda ey mandayow assey sinang-animar ey anuanungna ya ajida pun nampamarka assey vilang ey sinyar sey ngadanna.
66015003	Kankantaunda sey kantan Moses ey nanservi an Apudyus assey dandani ey siya vus sey kantan sey Karneru. Kananda ey angkankanta, “Apudyus ey Apu ey mannakabalin assey amin, nabalor ya nakaskasdaow sey kingwam. Sika ey Arin dasey amin ey awad assey luta. Ustu ya niyun-un sey amin ey apporom kingwa.
66015004	Niippun aji mamigvig ya mandayow an sika, Apu. Sika anggey sey gattok ey kabaruwan. Madagup dasey amin ey tagu assey sinagungnu ey marpu assey amin ey nasyun ta dayawunda sika tey apporoda innila dasey niyun-un ey kingwam.”
66015005	Naas pun ji, innilak ey nabkatan sey ikow kasasantuwan ey kuwartun Apudyus assey Tempél ad langit ey iniggawan dasey nikur-it ey vilinna.
66015006	At lummuswa dasey pitu ey enjel assey Tempél ey jida sey nipurangan dasey pitu ey pang-or da tagu. Nallulumvunda as nabalor ya ani'itak ey lumvun ey sumilisiling ya nakorpayanan as vurawan sey barukungda.
66015007	Sey usa asda matatagu ey parsuwa, iwwarasna asda pitu ey enjel sey pitu ey mallukung ey vurawan ey nakokoan assey sangan Apudyus ey matatagu as ing-inggana.
66015008	At maggey napnu sey Tempél as asuk ey mangimpiila assey vinaru ya pannakabalin Apudyus. At niippun sumaksakey siji inggana as jumakpus sey pitu ey matongtong-agan da tagu ey ipadatong dasey pitu ey enjel.
66016001	Oni pun, jingngorku sey mandangsor ey ginga ey narpu assey Tempél ey kanana asda pitu ey enjel, “Ingkayu itu'ug assey luta sey sangan Apudyus ey awad assey pitu ey mallukung.”
66016002	Ummuy sey namangu ey enjel intu'ug assey luta sey ininggow assey mallukungna. At dasey tagu ey namarkaan assey markan sey inggow kagguugyat ey animar ya da nandayow assey sinang-animar ey anuanungna, naminda naggulid ey amud sey sungsungna ya sigabna.
66016003	Oni pun, ummuy vus sey mikagwa ey enjel intu'ug assey beybey sey ininggow assey mallukungna at maggey nambalin sey beybey as kama as ladong at natuy dasey amin ey manggiju assey beybey.
66016004	Ummuy vus sey mikatlu ey enjel at intu'ugna asda dawwang anda wail sey ininggow assey mallukungna at nambalin sey danum as dara.
66016005	At kanan sey enjel ey simviyang assey danum, “Sika ey Apudyus ey aawwad assey saradna ya aawwad assey sana ey niippun miyisuwan sey vinarum, niyustuustu sey jusa ey inggoddongnu asda tagu.
66016006	Tey dasey lawingan ey tagu ey jusajusaum assey sana at jida dasey nangngat asda tagum ya dasey profetnu ey kama as nitu'ug sey darada. At assey sana, dara vus sey innatudnu ey ipin-um an jida tey siya sey mitagop assey kingwada!”
66016007	Oni pun, jingngorku vus sey ginga ey narpu assey altar ey kanana, “Sika sey Apu ey Apudyus ey mannakabalin assey amin. Ustu ya nalintog tuttuwa sey koom ey manusa asda tagu.”
66016008	Oni pun, ummuy vus sey mikapat ey enjel at intu'ugna sey ininggow assey mallukungna assey init. At jinumgot sey atung sey init inggana as naatungan da tagu gapu assey dogotna.
66016009	Kon urey nu naatunganda assey amud ey dogot sey init, ajida pun imbabawi dasey basurda ta dayawunda atyén as Apudyus ey sillobbong asda nauy ey kagguugyat ey tongtong-ag, nu aji inar-arwaganda at avus sey ngadanna.
66016010	Oni pun vus, ummuy sey mikalima ey enjel intu'ug sey ininggow assey mallukungna assey tronun sey kagguugyat ey animar. At gummikbot dasey amin ey manturturayana. At kingwan pun da tagu gapu assey amud ey ligatda, kinotkotda dasey jilada
66016011	ya inar-arwaganda as Apudyus ad langit gapu assey sigab sey giknaunda ya sey gulidda. Kon urey nu kanaʼsji, ajida pun pey dallu imbabawi dasey lawingan ey kookoonda.
66016012	At ummuy vus sey mikonom ey enjel intu'ug sey ininggow assey mallukungna assey dokor ey dawwang ey kananda ey Eufrates. At natjukan sey danum ta awad ayun dasey Ari ya dasey susurdajuda ey marpu assey nangkapon jumunglitan init.
66016013	Oni pun, innilak dasey turu ey kaggissow ey liyawan ey anungda tukak. Sey usa, lummuswa ey narpu assey sungad sey amoraga ya sey usa, assey sungad sey kagguugyat ey animar sey lummuswaana ya sey usa, lummuswa assey sungad sey sinangprofet.
66016014	Jida da nauy dasey jimunyu ey naatdan as pannakabalin ey mangwa as kaskasdaow. Da turu sana ey jimunyu, umuyda dagupun dasey amin ey turey assey luvung ta gubatunda as Apudyus ey mannakabalin assey amin nu jumatong sey ag-agow ey manguwisana asda amin ey tagu.
66016015	At jinagup dasey jimunyu dasey turey ya dasey surdajuda assey lugar ey kananda ey “Armageddon” assey ginga ey Hebrew. At siya sey nangimbagaana ey kanana, “Dongronyu sey ibagak anna, tey sey ampuuliyak at kama assey umaliyan sey man-aakow ey aji pun mapuppuutan. At nagasat dasey aji pun nasusuyup ey nakasagana ey daan pun mamponas tey ajida pun mad-asan ey nampoponnas as maviinanda.”
66016017	Naas pun ji, intu'ug sey mikapitu ey enjel sey ininggow assey mallukungna assey abvid. At inggow sey mandangsor ey ginga ey narpu assey tronu assey Tempél ey kanana, “Naas ogon sey kangamin!”
66016018	At insaradna ey mangulkuliyabbang ya vinnumligit sey kijur asi at mallunig as mandangsor. Niippun miyisuwan sey lunig sana tey misarad assey nakwaan sey tagu at niippun kanaʼsna as kadangsor sey lunig.
66016019	At nangkatlu ey napitpit-ang sey madadamag ey vubruy ad Babylon ya nadadail vus dasey amin ey angkadanakkor ey vubruy assey amin ey luta. Aji pun Apudyus naliwatan ey jusaun dasey iBabylon. At pinilitna impin-um an jida sey bayas ey siya sey nuugpunan sey putukna.
66016020	Nayyugayug pun sey luta, namin nuumas dasey luta ey nanggagawa assey beybey ya da amin ey tagudtud.
66016021	Asi at vus umudan as angkadanakkor ey dararu ey umavut as limampuru ey kilu sey kadagsun sey usa, at nuutmugan dasey tagu assey luta. At iyyam-amud dasey tagu ey mangarawag an Apudyus gapu asda dararu tey ummamdan sey jusa ey innatud Apudyus an jida.
66017001	Naas pun jiyuy, ummadani sey usa as dasey inggow pitu ey enjel ey nangintu'ug assey mallukungda at kanana an sa'un, “Umalika ta ipiilak an sika sey majusaan sey inggow madadamag ey vubai ey mangin-an sey kinavubaina. Siya sey dokor ey vubruy ey nipatakjug assey adani asda kadawwadawwang.
66017002	At impapas dasey kaariari asda kiiliili sey aggissow ey liknada an siya. Urey vus dasey katagutagu assey luta anna at kamadaʼs navuuk ey nanginum assey bayasna ey siya sey kaggissow ey nakopyaana ey uunnujunda.”
66017003	Oni pun, indaran sey Ispiritun Apudyus sa'un at iniyuy sey enjel sa'un assey danak. Innilak siji sey vubai ey nangakabbayu assey kagguugyat ey animar ey addaraag ya pitu sey uruna ya simpuru sey sakgudna. Namin nakur-itan sey long-agna as adjuwan ey ngadan ey manginsurtu an Apudyus.
66017004	Nallulumvun sey vubai saji as lumvun ji ari ey addaraag ya pagallumarum ya naang-anggaan as vurawan, perlas anda nabalor ey karasin ji batu. Inuugnana sey vurawan ey tasa ey napnu asda kaggissow ya da lawingan ey kookoona.
66017005	Nikukur-it assey kitungna sey ngadan ey aji pun naagammuwan sey piuna ey ugujun. Kanan sey nikur-it, “Madadamag ey Babylon ey inan dasey kavubavubai ey angingngina assey long-agda ya nallapuwan dasey amin ey kaggissow ey makwamakwa assey luta anna.”
66017006	Innilak ey navuuk sey vubai saji assey daran dasey tagun Apudyus ey jida dasey gingngatda gapu assey pammatida an Jesus. At amud sey nasdaawak assey nangil-ak an siya.
66017007	Kon kanan sey enjel an sa'un, “Ngey paka lawa masdaow? Dongrom ta ibagak an sika sey piuna ugujun sey aji pun nipaagammu assey kar-argow miipanggop assey vubai sana ya sey kagguugyat ey animar ey nangakabbayuwana ey pitu sey uruna ya simpuru sey sakgudna.
66017008	Sey animar saji ey innilam at jummada'an assey kar-argow, kon assey sana, natuy. At assey daan ey ag-agow, lumuswa siya assey nibaballudana ey vitu ey niippun patinggan sey kaadarumna ya miyuy assey kadadailana. Da tagu assey luta anna ey niippun ngadanda assey libnu ey nikur-itan sey ngadan dasey awad viyagna at amud sey masdaawanda nu ilanda sey kagguugyat ey animar sana. Masdaowda tey jummada'an assey kar-argow kon assey sana natuy ya kasin vus lumuswa.”
66017009	Inturuy sey enjel ey kanana, “Masapur ey nariing ya naangsan sey tagu ey makaawat sina. Sey piuna ugujun sey pitu ey uru, siya sey pitu ey tagudtud ey tummutukjuwan sey vubai.
66017010	Sey usa ey piuna kanan nauy at pitu ey ari. Naas natuy dasey lima at anturturey assey sana sey usa ya awad pey dallu sey usa ey umali ey manturey assey daan ey ag-agow kon sin-akitan anggey sey miparuvusana ey manturey.
66017011	Innilam vus sey kagguugyat ey animar ey nadada'an assey kar-argow ya niippun assey sana. Sey animar sana at usa asda pitu ey aari ey ampuuli ey mivilang as makawaru ey ari kon niippun kasin ambanagana nu aji sey madadailana.”
66017012	Inturuy sey enjel ey kanana, “Sey simpuru ey sakgud ey innilam, jida dasey simpuru ey aari ey daan pun manturey kon maatdanda as karobbongan ey mikaturey assey kagguugyat ey animar as sin-akitan ey kama as sa'an ey uras.
66017013	Nasa'an sey panggop da nauy ey simpuru. Oni at ipurangda sey pannakabalinda ya karobbonganda assey kagguugyat ey animar.
66017014	Gubatunda sey Karneru kon abakuna jida. Ya sey vurun sey karneru ey mangabak at dasey matalik ey pasurutna ey pinipilin Apudyus ya inayagana. Mangabak siya tey siya sey kangatuwan ey Apu asda amin ey apu ya siya sey Ari asda amin ey ari.”
66017015	Inturuy vus sey enjel ey nangimbaga an sa'un ey kanana, “Dasey kadawwadawwang ey innilam ey tummutukjuwan sey vubai ey angingngina assey long-agna at jida dasey nantokotokon ey Nasyun, nantokotokon ey tagu, nantokotokon ey gallit ji kublit da tagu ya da nantokotokon ey ginga.
66017016	At sey simpuru ey sakgud ey innilam ya sey kagguugyat ey animar, umdas sey timpu ey vumusurda assey vubai sana. Aminunda aran dasey amin ey awad an siya, ponasanda ya kanunda sey long-agna ya sikuranda sey mavun-an ey long-agna.
66017017	Koonda nauy an siya tey as Apudyus sey angigga assey somsomokda ey mantitimpuyug ey angimpatongpar assey panggopna. At siya sey ipurangda assey kagguugyat ey animar sey karobbonganda ey manturey inggana as matongpar sey amin ey imbagan Apudyus.
66017018	Sey vubai saji ey innilam at siya sey madadamag ey dakkorag ey vubruy ey manginturey asda amin ey ari assey luta anna.”
66018001	Naas pun jiyuy, innilak sey usa ey enjel ey lumagulagud ey narpuʼd langit. Nangatu sey pannakabalinna at nasilawan sey amin ey luta gapu assey jilangna.
66018002	Kanana ey nangimvugga, “Nikusvu sey madadamag ey vubruy ad Babylon! At ey sana, siya sey vinubruyan dasey jimunyu anda nantokotokon ey aji pun miila anda amin ey karasin ji lamsow ey titit.
66018003	Tey kama as impin-umna as dasey amin ey tagu assey kikkiili sey mandogot ey bayasna ey siyaji dasey kaggissow ey nakopyaana. At impapas dasey turey assey luta anna sey liknada an siya at vummaknang dasey angkukumérsu assey luta anna gapu assey ummamdan ey agumna.”
66018004	Naas pun ji, jingngorku vus sey sabali ey ginga ey narpuʼd langit ey kanana, “Dakayu ey taguk, umayow kayuʼsnaʼt. Teynanyu sey vubruy sana tey oni at lawa ya milugub kayu asda basurna ya nijuga kayu assey matongtong-agana.
66018005	Tey amud sey basurna ey kamaʼs nanturtur-ug ey naktad ad langit. At aji pun Apudyus maliwatan dasey lawingan ey apporona kingwa.
66018006	At makwa vus pigey an siya dasey kingwana asda ujum. At sin-umamud sey magiknana ey tongtong-ag nu sey nanongtong-agana asda ujum. Ya sey tasa ey pinnuna as mandogot ey bayas ey impin-umna, sin-umamud sey dogot sey miigga assey tasa ey mipin-um an siya.
66018007	Ya sey kinabayag sey nangimpapasana assey vinaknangna ya nallamram-ayana ya sey nangimpaspas-umana assey long-agna, siyaji vus sey kabayag sey matongtong-agana ya sigab sey somsomokna. Tey kanana assey somsomokna, ‘Sa'un sey reyna ey turey! Dokonak pun as baru at niippun inyak mambaksaran.’
66018008	At gapu assey nauy ey paspas-umna, aji pun ambayag at manggigisan mandatodatong an siya dasey nantokotokon ey matongtong-agana, manomdomana ya miinggiyana asi at mitungu assey apuy tey mannakabalin as Apudyus ey manusa an siya.”
66018009	At dasey tuturey assey luta anna ey apporow nikadagdagas ya nikalamram-ey assey vubruy sana ey mipani as puta at amud sey sigab sey somsomokda ya umiviivilda nu ilanda sey asuk sey apuy ey mansugusugub an siya.
66018010	At gapu ta umugyatda ey mijuga assey amud ey sigab sey jusana, sumisikadda assey addayuwan ya kanakananda, “Anuy lawa! Kadagdagu akey sey madadamag ey vubruy ey Babylon! Pa gey nakornatan namiid assey sa'an anggey ey uras!”
66018011	Urey vus dasey angkukumérsu assey kalutaluta at ivilanda siya ya manomdomda tey anna ey niippun ogon ngumina asda inginada.
66018012	Niippun ogon anginngin-anda asda vurawan, pilak ya dasey nabalor ey batu anda perlas. Niippun vus ngumina as dasey ambabaru ya angkangina ey karasin ji sinnun ya kama avus asda apputak, addaraag anda pagallumarum ey sinnun. Ya niippun vus ngumina asda inginada ey ambabangu ey kayu ya da karasin ji muusar ey naara assey vub-an da elefant ya amin dasey nantokotokon ey muusar ey naara as dasey angkangina ey kayu, gambang, baliyang anda an-imnur ey batu.
66018013	Niippun vus ngumina as dasey cinamun ey bangbangu ya da mangimpapiya as makan ya da ujum ey bangbangu ya lana ey kananda ey mira anda frankinsens. Niippun vus ngumina asda bayas, mantika, arina, paguy, baka, karneru, kabayu, kalisa ya urey da tagu ey ambalinunda as alipan.
66018014	Amin dasey angkukumérsu at kananda an siya, “Keynga pey lawa! Namin namiid dasey mambabaru ey pipium ey angkuwa. Amin ey vinaknangnu ya dasey kidayawam at namiid ya niippun ogon kasinnu muudasan.”
66018015	At dasey angkukumérsu ey vummaknang gapu assey nangkumersuwanda assey vubruy sana at angkatakjugda assey addayuwan gapu assey ugyatda ey mijuga assey jusana. Man-ivilda ya manomdomda
66018016	ey kananda, “Anuy lawa! Kadagdagu akey sey madadamag ey vubruy ey Babylon! Tey assey keysan ey ag-agow, mallurumvun dasey ummiliʼsji as angkangina ey sumiling ya addaraag anda pagallumarum ey lumvun. Gattok ey naang-anggaandaʼs vurawan anda angkangina ey batu anda perlas!
66018017	Kon namin napunasan sey vinaknangda assey sa'an anggey ey uras!” At da amin ey Kapitan assey bapor ya dasey ansiput ya dasey apporow ambaat ey nallulugan ya da amin ey mikatangdan assey beybey, sumisikadda losan
66018018	ey amuvuya assey asuk sey apuy ey mansugusugub an siya. At assey amuvuyyaanda, ivuggada ey kananda, “Niippun ujum as vubruy as mipaniyan sey kinapatig sey vubruy sanat!”
66018019	Gab-uranda sey uruda as lapuk ey man-ivil ya manomdom ey kananda, “Anuy lawa! Kadagdagu akey sey madadamag sana ey ili! Siya nauy sey vubruy ey vummaknangan dasey awad baporna kon maggey nakornatan namiid assey sa'an anggey ey uras!”
66018020	At dakayu ey awad ad langit, allaylayad kayu. Dakayu ey tagun Apudyus, dakayu ey aposel ya da profet, allaylayad kayu losan tey imbarus Apudyus dakayu tey sey nanusaana assey vubruy sana at gapu assey kingwana an dakayu.
66018021	Oni pun, inoppat sey inggow mannakabalin ey enjel sey dakkorag ey batu at imvintugna assey beybey ey kanana, “Kanaʼsna sey makwa ey mikusvuwan sey madadamag ey vubruy ey Babylon ey niippun ogon kasinna miil-an as ing-inggana.
66018022	At niippun kasin madngor as vungug ji gitara anda tagu as mankankanta anda baradong anda tangguyub. Niippun vus kasin mangdasan asda nangkariing ey mangwa asda nantokotokon ey makwa ya niippun ogon madngor as vungug ji kiskisan.
66018023	Niippun ogon sumilsilow as silow ya niippun kasin madngor as mangkakasar assey iggowyu. At urey nu dasey angkukumérsu assey iggowyu at jida sey kabaknangan assey luta anda nangatu sey katataguda, mamiidda ya urey vus dasey mamvuvuni anda ammadmajik ey inusarnu ey nangal-allilow asda tagu assey kalutaluta at namiidda.
66018024	Najusa sey Babylon tey as jiyuy sey nan-ayusan sey daran dasey profet ya da tagun Apudyus ya dasey amin ey gingngatda assey luta anna.”
66019001	Naas pun gumminga sey inggow mannakabalin ey enjel, jingngorku sey mandangsor ey ginga ey kamaʼs gingan dasey adjuwan ey tagu ad langit. Kananda ey nanginkankanta, “Dayawun taku as Apudyus ey Apu taku ey nanginsarakan an jitaku! Siya sey mannakabalin ya siya sey madayow
66019002	tey niyun-un ya ustu sey angokoona ey man-uwis. Inggoddongna ey majusa sey madadamag ey vubai ey mangin-an sey kinavubaina ey siya sey nangawis asda katagutagu ey mijuga assey kaggissow ey koko'ona. At ey sana imbarus Apudyus dasey manserservi an siya ey gingngat sey vubai sana.”
66019003	Kasinda indangsor sey gingada ey kananda, “Dayawun taku as Apudyus! Niippun patinggan sey asuk ey ampangpangatu as ing-inggana ey marpu assey apuy ey mansugusugub ad Babylon.”
66019004	Asi at mallukvub dasey juwampuru ya opat ey angkamarong-ag ya dasey opat ey matatagu ey parsuwa at jinayowda as Apudyus ey tummutukju assey tronu. At kananda, “Tuttuwa aan! Ikankanta taku ey mandayow an Apudyus!”
66019005	Naas pun sey jingngorku saji, inggow sey gumminga ey narpu assey tronu ey kanana, “Dakayu amin ey manserservi ya mandaydayow an Apudyus, nababa man as nangatu, dayawunyu as Apudyus!”
66019006	Oni pun, jingngorku vus sey mandangsor ey kamaʼs gingan ji amud ey tagu. Sey kadangsorna at anungna sey pumoypoyyaas ey dokor ey danum ya vinnumligit sey kijur. Dodongrok ey kananda, “Dayawun taku as Apudyus ey Apu taku ey mannakabalin assey amin tey anna ey jummatong sey manturayana.
66019007	Mallaylayad taku ya dayawun taku sey kinangatuna tey assey sana sey mangkasaran sey Karneru ya nakasagana vus sey vubai ey ikasarna.
66019008	Naatdan sey vubai as nadarus ya sumilisiling ey lumvun.” Sey piuna ey ugujun sey nadarus ya sumilisiling ey lumvun at da nauy dasey mambabaru ey apporon dasey tagun Apudyus kingwa.
66019009	At kanan sey enjel an sa'un, “Ikur-itnu nauy: Nagasat sey tagu ey maayagan ey umuy mikakan assey kasar sey Karneru.” Asina at ituruy ey kanana, “Nauy dasey tuttuwa ey Gingan Apudyus.”
66019010	Imbagana pun jiyuy, nallikkadangak ey nanjumug assey sinagungna ey mandayow atyén an siya. Kon kanana, “Na! Ajim koon naʼt! As Apudyus anggey sey dayawum tey sa'un at usaak vus ey manserservi an siya ey anungnu ya dasey susunudnu ey manguunnud assey tudtuju ey impaagammun Jesus. Tey sey impabagan sey Ispiritun Apudyus as dasey Profet at narpu vus pigey assey impaagammun Jesus.”
66019011	Naas pun ji, innilak ey nabkatan ad langit at lummuswa sey ani'itak ey kabayu ey inggow sey nangakabbayu ey nangadnan as “Matalik ya Tuttuwa.” Niyun-un sey koona ey man-uwis ya kama vus assey koona ey mangubat asda kavusurna.
66019012	Sey atana at kama as ginugumngot ey apuy ya adjuwan sey korona assey uruna. Nikukur-it vus sey ngadanna assey long-agna kon niippun nangigammu assey piuna ey ugujun nu dokon vus pigey siya.
66019013	Nallulumvun siya as malungrunggayad ey naslop assey dara. Ya sey impangadanda an siya at “Gingan Apudyus.”
66019014	At umunnuunnud dasey adjuwan ey surdaju ad langit an siya ey losanda vus nangakabbayu as ani'itak ya nallulumvunda as nadarus ey ikow ani'itak.
66019015	Assey sungadna vus, lummuluswa sey mantajum ey bangid ey siya sey usaruna ey mangabak as dasey amin ey tagu assey luta. At siya sey manginturey an jida ey estriktu sey koona at jusauna sey ngadannaʼsnaʼt ey aji pun mamigvig assey tureyna. Ipiilana sey kagguugyat ey sangan mannakabalin ey Apudyus as dasey nakabasur tey jusauna jida ey kama assey koon sey tagu ey mangasot assey greps ta maara sey bératna.
66019016	Sey lumvunna ya sey urpuna, nakur-itan assey ngadan ey kanana, “Arin dasey amin ey ari ya Apun dasey amin ey apu.”
66019017	Oni pun, innilak sey enjel ey summisikad an init. Inipkowna asda katitititit ey antattayap ad ngatu ey kanana, “Umali kayu! Madagup kayu ta mangan kayu assey amud ey makan ey ipakan Apudyus an dakayu.
66019018	Umali kayu ta kanunyu sey ladag dasey ari, surdaju ya da ap-apuda, da kabayu ya da nangakabbayu ya da amin ey tagu, alipan man as dakumpun, nangatu man as nababa.”
66019019	Oni pun, innilak sey inggow kagguugyat ey animar ya dasey turey assey luta asi at dasey susurdajuda ey nadagup ta gubatunda sey nangakabbayu assey ani'itak ey kabayu ya dasey surdajuna.
66019020	Kon nadokmaan sey kagguugyat ey animar ya sey sinangprofet at niballuda ey juwa assey arwaarwa ey labong ey sey danumna at gumilgillajung ey asufre. Sey sinangprofet anna, siya sey apporow nangwaʼs nakaskasdaow ey sinyar assey sinagung sey mannakabalin ey animar. Da nauy ey nakaskasdaow, siya sey inusarna ey nangallilow asda tagu ey namarkaan assey ngadan sey kagguugyat ey animar ya apporow nanaydayow assey sinang-animar ey anuanungna.
66019021	At dasey surdajuda, naminda nikisap gapu assey bangid ey lummuluswa assey sungad sey nangakabbayu as ani'itak ey kabayu. At koon pey dasey nadagup ey titit ey mangan asda ladag inggana as ning-opda.
66020001	Naabak pun sey kagguugyat ey animar ya sey sinangprofet ya dasey surdajuda, innilak sey enjel ey lumagulagud ey narpuʼd langit ey nanangjun assey dokor ey kawad ya turvik ey mamkat assey vitu ey niippun patinggan sey kaadarumna.
66020002	Jinokmaana sey amoraga asina at kawadan inggana as mapungpung sey sillivu ey tawun. Sey amoraga sana at siya sey inggow nampiila ey tabbad assey kar-argow ey siya as Satanas ey ap-apun da jimunyu.
66020003	Kingwan pun sey enjel, imballuna as Satanas assey vitu ey niippun patinggan sey kaadarumna asina at pagdoton ey mangnub ya markaan sey tangubna ta amorna ey matatangban ta niippun agammuna ey mangallilow asda tagu assey kalutaluta inggana as mapungpung sey sillivu ey tawun. Kon nu maas ey ji, masapur ey kasin mivukkey kon sin-akitan anggey.
66020004	Oni pun, innilak dasey tronu ya dasey angkatukju ey naatdan as karobbongan ey man-uwis. Innilak vus sey linnawan dasey apporoda gingngat gapu assey nangiwwarawaganda assey Gingan Apudyus ya sey tudtuju ey impaagammun Jesus. Jida da nauy dasey aji pun nandayow assey kagguugyat ey animar ya sey sinang-animar ey anuanungna ya ajida pun nampamarka assey markana assey kitung unnu takreyda. Ummulida kasin at nikatureyda an Cristu assey sillivu ey tawun.
66020005	Siyana sey ab-avus ey umuliyén dasey nangkakatuy. Kon dasey ujum, ajida pun yén umuli inggana as mapungpung sey sillivu ey tawun.
66020006	Dasey mijuga assey amangu ey umuliyén dasey natuy at nagasatda ya mivilangda as naapudyusan ey tagun Apudyus. Ajida pun mijuga ey matongtong-ag assey mikagwa ey matuyan nu aji ambalinda as papaji ey manservi an Apudyus ya an Cristu. At mijugada ey mikaturey an siya assey sillivu ey tawun.
66020007	At nu mapungpung sey sillivu ey tawun, mivukkey as Satanas assey nibaballudana
66020008	ta umuyna allilawun sey kananda ey “Gog ya Magog,” ey jida dasey katagutagu assey amin ey jugyun sey luta. Dagupuna losan jida ta umuyda mikagubat. At niippun makavilang assey kaajuda tey kamadaʼs kaajun sey gallis assey igid sey beybey.
66020009	Jumangrapda assey amin ey jugyun sey luta ta likuvunda sey vubruy ey pipiun Apudyus ey kumampuwan dasey taguna kon umudan as apuy ey narpu ad langit ey nangupilat an jida.
66020010	At as Satanas ey nangallilow an jida, mivintug assey arwaarwa ey labong ey sey danumna at gumilgillajung ey asufre ey as jiyuy vus sey nivintugan sey kagguugyat ey animar ya sey sinangprofet. At inag-agow ya nilavi ey matongtong-agda as jiyuy as ing-inggana.
66020011	Naas pun ji, innilak sey dokodokor ey ani'itak ey tronu ya sey tummutukju. Nampiila pun siya, maggey nuumas sey luta ya langit ey niippun kasinda miil-an as ing-inggana.
66020012	Oni pun, innilak dasey nangkakatuy, nangatu man as nababa ey angkasikad assey sinagung sey tronun Apudyus. Ya inggow vus dasey narpu ad Hades ey iggawan dasey natuy ya urey vus dasey amin ey natuy assey beybey at inggowda ey angkasikad assey sinagung sey tronu, asi at maokag dasey libnu. Oni pun, naokag avus sey sabali ey libnu ey nikur-itan sey ngadan dasey awad viyagna as ing-inggana. At nuuwis dasey nangkakatuy ey nibasar asda libnu nu ngan sey nikur-it ey kingwan sey usa ya usa.
66020014	Naas pun ji, niballu as Katuy ya Hades ey iggawan dasey natuy assey arwaarwa ey labong ey sey danumna at gumilgillajung ey apuy. Siyana sey kananda ey mikagwa ey matuyan.
66020015	At ngan ey sey niippun ngadanna assey libnu ey nikur-itan dasey awad viyagna as ing-inggana, miballuda assey iggawan sey labong ey sey danumna at gumilgillajung ey apuy.
66021001	Naas pun ji, innilak sey barbaru ey langit ya barbaru ey luta tey niippun ogon sey namangu ey langit ya luta anda beybey tey naminda nuumas.
66021002	Innilak vus sey naapudyusan ey vubruy ey siya sey baru ey Jerusalem ey lumagulagud ey narpu an Apudyus ad langit. Anungna sey usa ey vubai ey nan-ang-angga ey nakasagana ey umuy mangabot assey manginkasar an siya.
66021003	Oni pun, jingngorku sey mandangsor ey ginga ey narpu assey tronu ey kanana, “Jummatong assey sana sey mikig-awan Apudyus asda taguna. Mikig-ow siya an jida ta jida sey mantaguna. Vuvurnana jida ya siya sey vigvigunda as Apudyusda.
66021004	Punasana dasey luwada. Niippun ogon kasin matuy ya niippun kasin manomdom anda man-ivil ya niippun mansaksakit tey amin da nauy ey makwamakwa assey kar-argow at narakpusda.”
66021005	At kanan sey tummutukju assey tronu, “Assey sana, orsak sey amin ey kingwak ta vumaru sey kangamin.” Asina at vus kanan an sa'un, “Ikur-itnu da nauy ey imbagak tey tuttuwa ya siguraju ey makwa.”
66021006	At kanana vus, “Naas sey kangamin! Sa'un sey Alfa ya Omega. Pin-umak sey nuuwwow ey tagu assey danum ey niippun bayadna ey narpu assey vuvun ey mangatud as viyag ey niippun patinggana.
66021007	Da nauy sey ipalaksunku asda tagu ey urguna sey lawingan ya ambalinuk jida as aanakku ya sa'un sey vigvigunda as Apudyusda.
66021008	Kon sey tagu ey umugyat ey mangunud an sa'un, tagu ey nan-awidana sey pammatina, tagu ey inaggisawana sey viyagna ey nandaydayow asda ap-apudyus, tagu ey pumapatuy, tagu ey mikador-ag assey dakumpun as asawana, tagu ey mamvuvuni unnu ammadmajik, tagu ey mandayow asda ap-apudyus ya da amin ey ussatan at mipisukda losan assey arwaarwa ey labong ey sey danumna at gumilgillajung ey asufre ey siya sey mikagwa ey matuyan.”
66021009	Naas pun ji, ummadani an sa'un sey usa asda pitu ey enjel ey nangintu'ug assey inggow assey mallukungna ey nanapnu as anungus ji tongtong-ag. Kanana, “Umalika ta ipiilak an sika sey vubai ey asawaun sey Karneru.”
66021010	Oni pun indaran sey Ispiritun Apudyus sa'un at inniyuyak assey enjel assey usun sey ataataknang ey vilig. Asina at ipiila sey naapudyusan ey vubruy ad Jerusalem ey lumagulagud ey narpu an Apudyus ad langit.
66021011	Sumiling sey vubruy saji assey siling Apudyus ya sumilasilap ey kama assey an-imnur ey nabalor ey batu unnu silap ji allinsi ya addaraag ya judjurow ey batu ey kananda ey jasper ya crystal ey kama as anultulinownow ey danum.
66021012	Mangkopar ya ataknang sey sijil sey vubruy saji. Nasawaran as juwa sey sawangna ya assey usausa ey sawang, inggow sey angaajug ey enjel. Ya usausa asda sawang, nikur-it sey usa ey ngadan dasey nasawaran as juwa ey ganak Israel.
66021013	Sintutlu sey namviniviniik ey sawangna, turu assey kapon assey lumuswaan init, turu vus assey kapon assey mipisukan init ya sintutlu assey kapon ad ngatu ya kapon ad lagud.
66021014	Dasey nipon-ad assey sijil sey vubruy saji at ummuy as nasawaran as juwa ey angkadanakkor ey batu ey nikur-itan sey usa ya usa ey ngadan dasey nasawaran as juwa ey aposel sey Karneru.
66021015	Sey enjel sana ey nikabagbaga an sa'un, inggow sey inuugnana ey kamang ey vurawan as mangamangna assey vubruy sana ya dasey sawangna ya sijilna.
66021016	Kinamang pun sey enjel sey vubruy saji, ummuy as juwallivu ya opat gasut ey kilameter sey kaanjuna ya urey sey kaarwana ya sey kataknangna at namparpartong sey kaanjuna, kaarwana ya kataknangna.
66021017	Kinamangna avus sey sijil sey vubruy at ummuy as onompuru ya onom ey meter sey kataknangna. Sey meter ey inusar sey enjel at anungna sey meter ey us-usarun da tagu ey angkamang.
66021018	Sey sijil sey vubruy saji at nakwa ey naara assey addaraag ya judjurow ey batu ey kananda ey jasper ya naan-anan ey vurawan sey kopyana ya ampatak ey kamaʼs sarming ey anganniniwan.
66021019	Dasey nasawaran as juwa ey batu ey nipon-ad ey tummakjugan sey sijil at naang-anggaan as nantokotokon ey karasin ji nababalor ey batu. Sey namangu ey batu ey nipon-ad at naang-anggaan as jasper, sey mikagwa at naang-anggaan as kamaʼs gallit ji langit ey kananda ey safire, sey mikatlu at naang-anggaan as nantokotokon ey gallit ey nabalingowngow ey kananda ey agate, sey mikapat at allinsi ey batu ey kananda ey emerald.
66021020	Sey mikalima at naang-anggaan as nanggotagotap ey gallit ey kananda ey oniks ya sey mikonom at ambabbabang as addaraag unnu apputak ey kananda ey carnelian ya sey mikapitu at naang-anggaan as batu ey aji pun as ikow allinsi ey kananda ey krisolit. Sey mikawaru at naang-anggaan as batu ey pagallumarum sey linsina ey kananda ey beril ya sey mikasiyam at judjurow ey kananda ey topas ya sey mikasimpuru at an-uupsat sey linsina ey kananda ey krisopres. Sey mikasawar as sa'an, naang-anggaan assey kananda ey jacint ey mangkamus as addaraag ya judjurow sey gallitna ya sey mikasawar as juwa, naang-anggaan as kamaʼs luta sey daraagna ey kananda ey ametist.
66021021	Asda nasawaran as juwa ey sawang sey sijil, sin-us-a ey perlas sey kopyana. Sey daran assey vubruy saji, nakwa assey naan-anan ey vurawan ey kamaʼs sarming ey ammussilow.
66021022	Niippun innilak as tempel assey vubruy saji tey as Apudyus ey mannakabalin ya sey Karneru at jida mismu sey Tempél assey vubruy saji.
66021023	Ya aji pun vus sey vubruy saji kasapuran sey jilang sey init ya sorag tey masisillawanda assey jilang Apudyus ya sey Karneru.
66021024	Losan da tagu assey luta anna at masilawanda assey jilangna. Ya da amin ey turey assey kalutaluta at iyuyda dasey vinaknangda assey vubruy saji.
66021025	Umar-argow ey mamabkatan dasey sawangna tey niippun ogon lumaviyana.
66021026	Amin dasey mambabaru ya da amin ey laksun da tagu assey kikkiili at maminda miyuy siji.
66021027	Kon niippun makasakey as dasey ivilang Apudyus as kaggissow ey kamaʼs dasey apporow nangwaʼs kaviviin ya nan-us-ussat tey siya anggeyʼs mabalin sumakey dasey nikur-it sey ngadanna assey libnun sey Karneru ey nikur-itan dasey awad viyagna as ing-inggana.
66022001	Naas pun ji, impiilan vus sey enjel an sa'un sey dawwang ey sey danumna at mangatud as viyag. Anultulinownow sey danumna ey kama as crystal ey lummuswa assey tronun Apudyus ya sey Karneru.
66022002	Sey man-ayusana at assey gawan sey karsa assey vubruy saji. Assey ampasiigid sey dawwang, awad dasey kayu ey angatud as viyag sey vungada. Da kayu anna at manginsimpuru ya juwa sey mamungaanda assey usa ey tawun tey vinuran ey mamungada. At sey tuvuda vus, muusar as agas dasey tagu asda kiiliili.
66022003	At da amin ey illunud Apudyus, ajida pun mabalin inggow assey vubruy saji. Sey awad assey vubruy saji at sey tronun Apudyus ya sey Karneru. At dasey manserservi an Apudyus at pasigda mandaydayow an siya
66022004	ya miilada sey vusarna ya mikur-it assey kitungda sey ngadanna.
66022005	Niippun ogon lumaviyana at ajida pun masapur sey silow anda init tey as Apudyus ey Apu sey manilow an jida ya mikatureyda an siya as ing-inggana.
66022006	At kanan sey enjel an sa'un, “Tuttuwa ya siguraju ey makwa dasey nibaga anna an sika. Tey as Apudyus ey nangatud assey Ispirituna ey manginturung assey somsomok dasey profet, siya vus pigey sey nangimbaar an sa'un ey enjelna ta ipaagammuk asda manserservi an Apudyus dasey tigangey umdas ey makwa.”
66022007	Kanan Jesus, “Dongronyu sey ibagak anna. Tigangey umdas sey umaliyak. At nagasat sey tagu ey manguunnud as dasey nipapaddaan assey libnu sana ey makwa.”
66022008	Sa'un an John sey nangngor ya nangila asda nikur-it sana. Assey nangngorak ya nangil-ak, nallikkadangak assey sinagung sey enjel ey nangimpiila an sa'un ta dayawuk atyén siya.
66022009	Kon kanana an sa'un, “Ajim kaʼn sinat! As Apudyus anggey sey dayawum! Tey sa'un ey, usaak vus ey manserservi an siya ey kama an sika ya dasey vurunnu ey profet ya dasey amin ey manguunnud as dasey nikur-it assey libnu sana.”
66022010	Inturuyna ey kanana, “Ajim itaru as dasey tagu dasey ingkur-itnu assey libnu sana ey nipapaddaan ey makwa tey tigangey sey makwaana.
66022011	Urey nu tigangey sey makwaana, anturturuy pey dallu ey lumawilawing anda umaggiaggissow da tagu ey lawingan anda aggissow sey kookoonda. Kon dasey ambaru sey kookoona ya dasey naapudyusan sey katataguna, ituruturuyda vus pigey ey mangwaʼs ambaru ya manguunnud assey naapudyusan ey kaviviyag.”
66022012	Kanan Jesus, “Dongronyu sey ibagak anna! Tigangey sey umaliyak. At nu umaliyak, iyalik sey gun-guna ey atjuk assey usa ya usa ey mibasar assey kingwakingwana.
66022013	Sa'un sey maawagan as Alfa ya Omega tey sa'un sey namangu ya sey manganungus. Ya sa'un vus sey lugrugina ya sey pungpungna.
66022014	Nagasat dasey tagu ey manor-ak assey lumvunda tey awad sey karobbonganda ey sumakey assey liwangan sey vubruy saji ya mangan assey vungan sey kayu ey mangatud as viyag.
66022015	Kon dasey angwaangwaʼs lawingan ey kamaʼs atap ey asu ya dasey ammadmajik ya da mikador-ag as dakumpun as asawada ya da pumapatuy ya mandayow asda ap-apudyus ya dasey ussatan, jida dasey aji pun makasakey siji.”
66022016	Kanan vus Jesus, “Sa'un an Jesus ey nangimbaar assey enjelku ey umuy mangimpaniknik assey kinatuttuwan da nauy an dakayu ey vungguy da mamati. Sa'un sey ganak David ya sa'un vus sey maawagan as Ambassalelow ey Vituwun assey Viggaviggat.”
66022017	“Umalika,” kanan sey Ispiritun Apudyus ya dasey taguna ey mipani as asawan sey Karneru. “Ayu umalika,” kanan vus atyén dasey mangngor sina. At ngan man sey muuwwow, umali ta uminum assey danum ey niippun bayadna ey mangatud as viyag.
66022018	Andanaya dasey ipapaddaanku ibaga an dakayu ey nanangngor asda nipapaddaan ey makwa ey nikur-it assey libnu anna. At nu awad manor-op as dasey nikur-it assey libnu anna, tor-opan vus Apudyus dasey tongtong-ag ey nuugud assey libnu sana as majusaana.
66022019	At nu awad vus mangakkaan asda nipapaddaan ey makwa ey nikur-it assey libnu sana, kaanun vus Apudyus sey lobbongna ey mikakan assey vungan sey kayu ey mangatud as viyag ya sey lobbongna ey mikig-ow assey naapudyusan ey vubruy ey nuugud assey libnu sana.
66022020	As Jesus sey mangimpaniknik ey tuttuwa sey amin ey nikur-it sina at kanana, “Tuttuwa ey tigangey sey umaliyak!” Amen. Umalika Apu Jesus.
66022021	Kanana atyén ta aawwad an dakayu losan ey tagun Apudyus sey vumaruwan ey marpu an Apu Jesus. Amen.
